[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]'byung ba'i phyir a ng+ga'i ming can zhes brda chad byed do/_/Ta/_nga si nga sA mi nA t+s+ya:/_TA nga si ngas rnams kyi in a ta s+ya rnams so/_/rtags a yig mtha' can a ng+ga zhes brda chad byas pa de'i pha rol rnam dbye gsum pa'i gcig tshig TA ni in dang /_lnga ba'i gcig tshig nga si ni 
[\[43a.2\]]a ta/_drug pa'i gcig tshig ngas ni s+ya rnams su 'gyur te/_TA/_in /_a las yon tan nos e/_ra Sha dag la zhes pa'i mdos/_na Na/_rA me Na/_rA ma la/_gsum pa'i b+h+yAM/_su pi tsi/_su pa la'ang ngo /_/rtags a thung mtha' a ng+ga'i ming can las/_su pa la sogs pa'i rnam dbye ya nya so sor 
[\[43a.3\]]bsdu ba'i yi ge byung na rtags mtha' ring por 'gyur ro/_/rA mA b+ng+yAM/_rA ma la/_gsum pa'i/_b+hi sa/_a to b+hi sa ai sa/_a ta las g+his 'i ai sa 'o/_/dga' byed cig/_rtags a thung mtha' a ng+ga'i ming can las/_rnam dbye gsum pa'i mang tshig b+hi sa ni ai sa ru bsgyur ro/_/e tsa las 'phel pa dang /_/
[\[43a.4\]]sa sa dzu Sha sogs kyis/_rA mai:/_rA ma la/_bzhi ba'i de/_dga' byed dag gis/_/nge:ya:/_nge ya'o/_rtags a thung mtha' can a ng+ga'i ming can las pha rol gyi nge ni ya ru 'gyur te/_nge ya ru bsgyur/_su pa la 'ang ngos ring ngo /_rA mA ya/_rA ma la bzhi ba'i b+h+yaM/_su ba la 'ang ngo /_/rA mA 
[\[43a.5\]]g+hu/_rA ma la bzhi pa'i/_dga' byed rnams kyis/_mang tshig b+h+yas/_ba hu ba tsa ni dz+ha l+yeta/_mang tshig la dz+ha la la e ta 'o/_/rtags mtha' a thung a ng+ga'i ming can las/_rnam dbye mang tshig dz+hal gyi yi ge dang po can gang byung yang rtags/_dga' byed kyi ched du/_mja' a yig tu/_dga' byed dag gi ched du/
[\[43a.6\]]'gyur te/_rA me b+haH_e ta/_zhes pa bshad pa ni ta yig da'i dus kyi'o/_/zhes pa'i don no/_rA ma la/_lnga ba'i ngasi/_DA nga si ngas rnams kyi i na a ta s+ya rnams so zhes pas/_ngasi a ta/_aka 'dra ba sogs kyis/_rA mAta/_rA ma la/_lnga pa'i b+haM dang b+h+yas/_gong gi bzhi pa'i skabs/
[\[43a.7\]]dga' byed rnams kyi ched du/_ltar bsgrubs pas/_rA mA b+h+yAM/_dga' khyad dag las/_dA me b+h+ya:/_dga' byed rnams las/_rA ma la/_drug pa'i ngas/_TA nga si sogs kyi mdos/_rA ma s+ya/_dga' byed kyi/_rA ma la/_gnyis tshig os/_dga' byed las/_o sa la'ang ngo /_rnam dbye os pha rol la 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]rtags a ng+ga'i ming can de e ru 'gyur ro/_/e ca'i a ya sogs dang /_sa sa dzu Sha sogs kyi mdos/_rA ma la/_drug pa'i A ma/_hra swa na byA po nuT/_thung ngu na dI A pa rnams las nuT 'o/_/rtags mtha' thung ngu rnams dang na dI ming can te bud med kyi rtags I U gnyis 
[\[43b.2\]]dang A pa ste mo rtags A ring mtha' can rnams las pha rol rnam dbye drug pa'i mang tshig A ma la nuT A ga ma_dag byed dag gi/_ster te/_Ta yig D+ki ta sogs kyi don u brjod don/_rA ma/_nA ma/_nAmi/_nA ma la'o/_nA ma pha rol la rtags mtha'i a ca gang yin kyang ring bor 'gyur te/
[\[43b.3\]]rtags mtha'i ring po aT ku pu sogs kyi mdos/_nA NA/_rA mA NAM/_rA ma la/_bdun pa'i nge /_nga 'gro ba'i ming can yin pas phyis/_a la yon tan nos/_rA me/_rA ma la bdun pa'i o'o/_gang drug pa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/_ra ma yo:/_rA ma la bdun pa'i mang tshig su pa 
[\[43b.4\]]pa so sor bsdu ba'i don yin pas byis/_dga' byed rnams kyi/_mang tshig la dz+ha la la e ta 'os/_rA me su/_A de sha bra t+ya ya yo:/_kun nas bsgyur ba dang /_dga' byed la/_rkyen dag la'o/_/chu rol i Na so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang ka sde/_dga' byed dag la/_yod la/_pha rol Sha sar 
[\[43b.5\]]bsgyur zin pa lta bu kun nas bsgyur ba dang /_rkyen gyis tshig mtha' min pa rnams Sha ru 'gyur te/_rA me Shu/_tshig mtha' yin na mi 'gyur te/_ha ri sta tra/_zhes pa lta bu la tshu rol i Na so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge i mthong yang pha rol sa Sha ra mi 'gyur bar sa nyid du gnas pa lta ba'o/_/de 
[\[43b.6\]]ltar a tsa mtha' can skyes ba'i rtags las spyir btang a thung mtha' can gyi cho ga rnams bshad_dga' byed rnams/_zin nas a thung mtha' can las _'phrog byed de la/_dmigs bsal sa rba la sogs pa'i cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/_sarbA dI ni sarba nA mA ni/_sarba la sogs pa rnams la sarba'i 
[\[43b.7\]]ming can no/_/sarba la sogs pa ni 'di rnams te/_sarba/_thams cad/_bi shwa/_sna tshogs/_u b+ha/_gnyis/_u b+ha ya/_Da ta ra/_Da ta ma/_i ta ra/_rang ngam tha dad/_a n+ya/_gzhan/_a n+ya ta ra/_gzhan dang gzhan/_twa ta/_khyod/_twa/_rang /_ne ma/_khrims/_sa ma/_mnyam pa/_si ma/_sa cha 'am mnga' zhabs/
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]pU R+Wa/_par/_a wa ra/_dak+Shi Na/_u t+ta ra/_a pa ra/_ad+ha ra/_/swa/_an+ta ra/_t+ya da/_ta da/_yang /_e ta da/_i dam/_a das/_e ka/_dI/_yu Sh+ma da/_a smad/_b+ha/_wa ta/_ci ki ma rnams so/_/Da tar dang /_Da tar dang /_Da ta ma gnyis ni ming min yang rkyen de gnyis gang la sbyar 
[\[44a.2\]]shar ram bdun nam sngon/_pha rol/_gzhan/_lho/_byang /_gzhan zhig/_dma' ba dang mchu/_mtho ris/_bar mtshams/_de/_gang /_de/_'di/_'di/_gcig/_gnyis/_khyod/_bdag/_yod/_ba'i ming de yang sarba'i ming can du shes par bya'o/_/'di rnams ni rtags gsum cho ga thams cad 'jug 
[\[44a.3\]]rung yin ni/_/sa rba la rnam dbye dang po'i su dang au gnyis gong sbyor btang a thung mtha' can rA ma'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/_sar+b+ba:/_sar+b+bau/_sarba la/_dzas/_dza sa:shI/_dzas kyi shI'o/_a thung mtha' can sarba'i rtags la rnam dbye dang po'i ming tshig dzas ni shI ru 'gyur te/_sha 'gro 
[\[44a.4\]]ba'i ming can yin pas phyis/_a las zhes pa'i mdos sarbe/_rnam dbye gnyis pa rnams gong rA ma'i skabs ltar/_/sarbaM/_sarbau/_sarbA ma/_rnam dbye gsum pa rnams kyang gong bzhin/_sarbe Na/_sarbA b+h+yAM/_sar+b+bai:/_sarba la bzhi pa'i nge /_sarba nAm+na:smai/_sarba'i ming can las smai'o/_/
[\[44a.5\]]a thung mtha' can sarba'i ming can te sarba sogs la rnam dbye bzhi ba'i de ni smai ru 'gyur ro/_/sarba smai/_sarba la bzhi pa'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig gnyis/_/gong rA ma'i skabs ltar/_/sarba b+h+yAM/_sarba la lnga ba'i nga si/_nga si ng+YoHsmA t+s+mi nau/_nga si ngi dag gi smAta smin dag go/_/sarba 
[\[44a.6\]]sogs la rnam dbye lnga ba'i gcig tshig nga si ni smA ta dang /_bdun pa'i gcig tshig ngi ni smin du 'gyur ro/_/sarba smAta/_sarbA b+h+yAM/_sarbeb+h+ya:/_sarba la drug pa'i ngas dang os gnyis gong rA mi'i skabs ltar/_/sarba s+ya/_sarba yo:/_sarba la/_rnam dbye drug pa'i mang tshig A ma/_A mi 
[\[44a.7\]]sarba nA m+na:su Ta/_A ma las rba'i ming can rnams las su Ta'o/_/a thung mtha' can sarba sogs la rnam dbye drug pa'i mang tshig A ma la suT A ga ma 'jug go/_/sarba sAM/_mang tshig la/_zhes dang /_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyi mdos/_sarbe Sh+ShaM/_sarba la/_di/_nga si/_ngi dag 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]gi zhes pa'i mdos/_sarba smin/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig spyir btang dang 'dra bas/_sarba yo:/_sarbaShu/_kun tu bod pa'i don can rnams la/_he sarba/_hesarbau/_he sa rbe/_zhes ba ltar bi Sha sogs sa rba'i ming can rnams la cho ga 'di kho na bzhin bsgrub pa'o/_/sarba'i 
[\[44b.2\]]ming can gyi nang tshan/_u b+ha la ni/_su sogs gcig tshig bdun dang dzas sogs mang tshig bdun mi 'jug_gnyis tshig bdun po kho na 'jug pas/_rnam dbye dang po la/_u b+hau/_gnyis pa la/_u b+hau/_gsum pa la/_u b+hA b+h+yI/_bzhi ba la/_u b+h+wa b+hA+e/_lnga ba la/_u g+hA b+h+yAM/
[\[44b.3\]]drug pa la/_u b+ha yo:/_bdun pa la/_u b+ha yo:/_de rnams rnam dbye rnams kyi gnyis tshig kho nas grub pa'o/_/sarba'i ming can gyi nang tshan/_pU rba sogs la/_rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig gong ltar/_pU rba:/_pU rbau/_mang tshig dzas kyi skabs yang na ba ste/_pU rba 
[\[44b.4\]]la/_dzas/_bU rba parA wa ra dak+Shi No t+ta rA parA k+ha rA Ni bya wa s+thA yA ma saM dz+nyA yAM/_pU rba/_bar/_a war/_dak+Shi Na/_u t+ta ra/_a pa ra/_a d+har rnams rnam par bzhag pa ste ming ma yin pa la'o/_/sarba'i nang tshan/_pU rba sogs te pU rba nas/_a d+ha ra'i bar rnams la rnam par bzhag pa ste 
[\[44b.5\]]ming ma yin nas rba nA ma'i cho ga dang /_ming yin na sbyor bting a thung mtha' can rA ma'i cho ga ltar bsgrub pa'o/_/pU rbe/_pU rbA:/_de bzhin swa'i sgra la dzas/_swa ma dz+nyA ti d+ha nA khyA yAM/_swa la gnyen dang nor dag la ma yin no/_sarba'i nang tshan swa la gnyen dang nor dag dang sbyor ba'i tshe sarba 'i 
[\[44b.6\]]ming can ma yin te/_sarba sogs kyi cho ga ltar dzas shIr mi 'gyur bar spyir btang a thung mtha' can kho na'i cho gas bsgrub pa'o/_/swA:dz+nyA ta ya:/_a n+ta ra la dzas/_a n+ta ra ba hi r+Y+Yo go pa saM byA na yo:/_a n+tar la phyi dang sbyor ba gon pa dag las so/_/sarba'i ming can a n+ta ra'i sgra la/
[\[44b.7\]]phyi dang sbyor ba dang gos gyon pa'i smra sbyor ba'i tshe/_sarba nA ma'i bya ba mi 'jug par/_rA ma'i cho ga khe nas bsgrubs pas/_a n+ta rA:dang /_mtho ris zhes pa/_phyi dang gon pa'i don ma yin na sa rba'i ming can ltar bsgrubs pas/_a n+tare/_bA rbA di b+h+yon wa b+h+yo bA/_pU rba sogs dgu las yang 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]na'o/_pU rba la sogs pa dgu las/_rnam dbye lnga pa'i gcig tshig nga si dang /_bdun pa'i gcig tshig di gnyis ni yang na ba ste/_spyir btang a thung mtha' can rA ma'i cho ga dang sarba nA ma'i cho ga gang rung 'jug pas/_lnga pa la/_pU rba ta/_pU rba smA ta/_bdun pa la/_pU rbe/
[\[45a.2\]]pU rba smin lta bu'o/_/de bzhin du/_ba rA ta/_pa ra smA ta/_lnga pa/_pa re/_par smin/_bdun pa ste/_de ltar pU rba nas/_/a n+tar pU rba nas/_a rta ra'i bar thams cad rigs 'gre'o/_/sarba'i ming can rnams la nyer bsgyur sbyor ba dang /_ming dang /_sa ma la mnyam pa'i don/_swa la nor dang gnyen gyi don/_an+ta la phyi'i 
[\[45a.3\]]don rnams sbyor ba las rba'i ming can ma yin te/_sarba nA ma'i cho ga rnams mi 'jug par sbyor btang a thung can gyi skabs su bshad pa ltar bya'o/_de yang dper na/_a ti sarbA:/_zhes nyer bsgyur a ti yod pa'i sarba la dzas shIr mi 'gyur ba ra rA ma ltar bsgrubs pa lta bu'o/_/na pa hu brI hau/
[\[45a.4\]]'brum po la ma yin no/_/sarba sogs la 'brum da po'i tshig sdud gnas pa la yang sarba nA ma'i cho ga rnams mi 'jug ste/_dper na/_pri yas rba la/_shin tu thams cad rnams/_de byin pa smai ru mi 'gyur bar/_de yang bsgyur bas/_pri ya sarba ya/_tr-i twi yA sa mA se/_gsum pa'i tshig sdud 
[\[45a.5\]]la'o/_/gsum pa'i tshig sdud ces pa de'i skyes bu'i bsdu bu'i khyad par rnam dbye gsum pa tshig sdud kyis phyis pa dang skabs 'gar ma phyis kyang 'dra ste/_rtags sarba'i ming can rnams las sarba'i bya ba mi 'jug par spyir btang a thung /_dga' ba thams cad kyi ched du/_mtha' can gyi chog byed pas/
[\[45a.6\]]dpe na/_mas pU rbU ya/_ma sen pU rbA ya/_lta bu'o/_/dwa n+d+waM tsa/_zlas dbye la'ang ngo /_rtags mtha' a yig sa rba'i ming na tshig sdud kyi khyad par zlas dbye gnas pa las kyang sa rba nA ma'i bya ba rnams mi 'jug pas spyir btang gi cho gas bsgrub pa'o/_/pU rba pa rA wa rA NAM/_suT mi 'jug 
[\[45a.7\]]nuT 'jug pa lta bu'o/_mtshungs ba'i sngon/_/bi g+hA ShA dza si/_dzas la gdam nga'o/_sarba nA ma las/_zlas dbye'i tshig sdud gnas pa la sarba'i ming can gyi bya ba dang sbyor btang a thung mtha' gyi cho ga rnams dbye dang po'i dzas la gdam nga bya ste/_shar pha rol gzhan rnams kyi/_shI ru 'gyur ba dang 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]a ka 'dra ba'i cho ga gnyis ka 'jug pa'o/_/brtA shra me ta re/_bar+Nashra me ta rA:_lta bu'o/_pra tham tsar ma tI yA lpA r+d+haka ti pa ya ne mAsh+tsa/_pa tha ma/_tsa ra ma/_tI ya/_a lnga/_a r+d+ha/_ka ti pa ya/_ne ma rnams la yang ngo /_pra tha ma sogs la yang rnam dbye dang po'i mang tshig dzas ni sarba sogs kyi 
[\[45b.2\]]skabs ltar shI ru 'gyur ba dang spyir btang a thung mtha' can ltar a ka 'dra ba'i cho ga gnyis kar 'jug pas gdam nga'o/_/pra tha me/_pra tha mA:/_dang po'am thogs pags ga chung du/_phyed/_ji tsam/_khrims/_tI ya'i rkyen sbyar ba ni/_dwi tI ye/_dwi tI ye/_dwi tI yA:_lta bu'o/_/pra tha ma sogs la dzas ma gtogs rnam 
[\[45b.3\]]dbye lhag ma gzhan thams cad rA ma'i skabs dang 'dra'o/_/'grel bar lung drangs pa/_tI ya s+ya/_ngi t+su bA sa rba nA ma tA bA ts+bA/_dang po rnams/_tI ya'i nga 'gro ba rnams la sarba'i ming can du yang na bshad do/_/tI ya'i rkyan la/_gnyis pa rnams/_yang nga 'gro ba'i ming can rnams sarba'i bya ba dang /
[\[45b.4\]]rA ma'i bya ba gnyis gdam nga can yin pas gnyis ka 'jug ste/_rnam dbye bzhi pa'i nge la/_dwi hI ya smai/_dwi hI yA ya/_lnga pa/_dwi tI ya smAta/_dwi tI yA ta/_bdun pa/_dwitI ya smin/_dwa tI ye/_lta bu'o/_lhag ma rnams rA ma dang 'dra'o/_/dza rA yA dza ra sa n+ya ta ra s+yAM/_dza rA'i dza ras yang 
[\[45b.5\]]na'o/_/dza rA'i sgra la rnam dbye hal te gsal byed thog ma can rnams ma yin pa'i a tsa thog ma can rnams la/_dza rA/_dza ras zhes par bsgyur ba'o/_/su la ni rdza ra:/_a ca la/_dza ras su bsgyur bas/_ni rdza ra so/_ni rdza ras:/_gnyis pa la/_ni rdza ra saM/_ni rdza ra sau/_ni rdza ras:/_ni rdzar 
[\[45b.6\]]la/_rnam dbye gsum pa'i TA/_'dir 'grel par gzhan nas lung drangs pa/_ke tsidA dA be nA tA wA de shA pi tsha n+ti/_rgas/_la lar sda ma/_e na_a ta dag tu kun _ma rgas la/_nas bsgyur bar 'dod do/_/zhes byung bas/_ni rdza rA/_zhes pa'i rtags 'di/_dzaras/_dzaras/_dzaras na/_rnams su 
[\[45b.7\]]'gyur bas/_ni rdza rba sA/_ni rdzar sen/_ni rdzar se ne na ste gzugs gsum 'byung ngo /_TA ma na chad rnam dbye thams cad la gzugs gsum du dbye pa dang /_gzhung nyid kyis bshad pa ltar/_a tsa thogs can rnams la dza ras su bsgyur/_ha la thog ma can rnams la/_dza rA 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]nyid du gnas pa 'dam ka can du bya'o/_/nerdzar se/_nirdza rasA ya/_ni rdzar se nA ya/_zhes pa lta bu thams cad la rigs 'gre'o/_/pad+da n+no mAs hr-i n+ni sha sa n+bA Sha na do ShaM ya ka ny+tsha ka n+nu ka n+nu da n+nA sa ny+tsha sbra b+h+r-i ti Shu/_shas la sogs pa rnams la bad data nas mAs hr-id ni sha 
[\[46a.2\]]a san/_pU Sha na_do Sha na _ya ka na_sha ka na _u da na _A san rnams so/_/pa da la sogs pa 'di rnams la rnam dbye dang po gsum dang /_gnyis pa'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig rnams gong a thung mtha' can spyir btang rA ma'i skabs dang 'dra/_rnam dbye gnyis pa'i mdo tshig shas nas 
[\[46a.3\]]brtsams te/_bdun pa'i mang tshig sub kye bar rnam dbye rnams gang byung yang /_pA da/_ni/_pad/_dan+ta ni/_da ta/_nA si kA ni/_nas/_mA sa ni/_mA sa/_hr-i da ya ni/_hr-i da/_ni shA zhes pa/_ni sha/_a sr-i dza ni/_a sa na/_pU Sha ni/_pU Sha na/_do Sha/_ni/_do Shan/_ya kr-i ta/_ni/_ya kan/
[\[46a.4\]]sha kr-i ta/_ni/_sha ka na/_u da ka/_ni/_u nga na/_A sa na rnams su/_rkang pa/_ya ngan/_ma chab/_sna/_mnyam pa 'am mtshungs pa/_'gyur zhing /_skabs snying /_mi mthong ba/_'gar bu brgyud/_mi 'gro ba/_ma sbyin pa/_dag pa/_kyi rkyen la'ang /_mtshan mo/_thob par byed/_'gyur te/_pad ya/
[\[46a.5\]]nus/_la shas/_ba da ya/_chu/_pad du 'gyur drangs/_gdan/_pad:/_grub/_de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/_padA/_pad+d+h+yi:/_bad+b+hi:/_da ta/_da tA/_dad+b+hAM/_na sa:/_na sA/_no p+c+tsAM/_mA sa:/_mA sA/_mA b+hUM/_hr-i da:/_hr-i dA/_hr-i d+b+hAM/_ni sha:/_ni shA/_ni d+b+h+yaM/_a sa na:/_as nA/_a sa b+h+yAM/_p+bu Sh+Na:/_bU Sh+DA/_pU Sha
[\[46a.6\]]b+h+yAM/_do Sh+Na:/_do Sh+Na/_do Shab+h+yAM/_ya k+na ma/_ya k+na/_ya ka b+h+yAM/_sha kA:/_sha k+na/_sha ka b+h+yAM/_u d+na:/_u d+nA/_ud+nA/_u da b+hAM/_A snA/_a sa b+h+yAM/_zhes pa lta bu thams cad la rigs 'gre'o/_/hr-ing sogs su ma 'gyur ba'i phyogs rA ma dang 'dra'o/_/su Da na puMs ka s+ya/_suT ma Ning 
[\[46a.7\]]ma yin pa'i 'o/_/rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig su nas gnyis pa'i gnyis tshig au Ta'i bra lnga po rnams ma yin pa ste ma ning por pa'i skyes ba'i rtags sogs la suT so sor bsdu ba'am/_suTa'i ming can nam thams cad gnas pa'i ming can zhes dgos pa'i ched du brda chad byed do/_/
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]swA di Sh+wa sarba nA ma s+thA ni/_su sogs rnams la thams cad gnas pa'i ming can ma yin la'o/_/su sogs nyi shu rtsa gcig las gong du bshad pa ltar rnam dbye dang po'i su nas gnyis pa'i gnyis tshig au Ta'i phar lnga bo rnams thams cad gnas pa'i ming can dang /_lnga bo rnams por ba'i shas 
[\[46b.2\]]nas su bkyi bar rnams la thams cad gnas pa'i ming can ma yin pa zhes dgos pa'i dbang gis ming 'dogs byed de/_dgos pa ni/_shas sogs thams cad gnas pa'i ming can ma yin pa rnams kyi snga ma'i ming de la rnam 'gyur byung ba'i phyir pa da zhes ming 'dod byed de 'og nas ci rigs 
[\[46b.3\]]pa 'byung ngo /_/ya ciM b+haM/_ya a tsa la b+ha 'o/_/ya'i rkyen dang shas sogs thams gnas pa'i ming can ma yin pa rnams kyi rnam dbye a tsa ste dbyangs thog ma can rnams kyi snga ma'i ming ngam rtags de la ng+ha zhes dgos pa'i ched du ming 'dogs byed do/_/a l+lo bo na:/_na'i ata 
[\[46b.4\]]dbyi'o/_/rtags b+ha'i ming can gyi pU Sha na zhes pa lta bu'i pha rol du shas sogs thams cad gnas pa'i ming can ma yin pa a tsa thog ma can pha rol rtags mtha' na srog med kyi snga ma'i a de dbyi'o/_/pU Sha na la/_shas a phyis/_ra Sha sogs kyi mdos na Na drangs/_pU Sh+NaH
[\[46b.5\]]pU Sha na la b+h+yAM/_na lo pa:/_prA ti pa di kI ta s+ya ming mtha'i na dbyi'o/_/ming mtha'i na srog med ni rnam dbye ha la thog ma can rnams la dbyi ste na phyis/_pU Sha b+h+yAM/_pU Sha na la/_bdun pa'i ngi byin/_bib+hA ShA di sh+yo:/_daM shi dag la gdam nga'o/_/rnam dbye bdun pa'i di dang shI ste/_ma ning gi 
[\[46b.6\]]rtags la au shIr bsgyur ba gnyis kyi snga ma'i rtags mtha' na srog med gnas pa'i a dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba gang rung 'dam ka can du bya ste/_pU Sh+Ne/_pU Sha Ni/_saM khyA bi sA ya pU rba s+yA han n+ya ta ra s+yAM ngo /_grangs bi sA ya snga ma'i a ha na di la yang na'o/_/grangs rnams dang nyer 
[\[46b.7\]]bsgyur bi dang /_dgongs mo'i skad dod/_sA ya rnams snga ma'i a h+na'i sgra ni rnam dbye bdun pa'i gcig tshig di la a han zhes par yang na 'gyur te/_grangs thog ma can la/_dwe a h+na la di la sbyin pas/_d+h+ya h+ne/_nyi ma gnyis/_d+b+ya ha ni/_d+b+ya hI/_nyi ma gnyis/_pi thog mar bzhag pa la/
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]bya h+ne/_bya ha ni/_bya h+ni/_sA ya thog mar bzhag pa la/_swa yA h+ne/_sA yA ha ne/_sA yA h+ni/_zhes pa lta bu'i gzugs gsum gsum byung ba'i rjes ma rnams na'i a ta dbyi 'o zhes pas bsgrubs pa'o/_/zhes ba de rnams ni skyes pa'i rtags las a thung mtha' can rnams so//_!_//
[\[47a.2\]]skyes pa'i rtags/_nyi bral/_A ring mtha' can la/_bi shwa pA/_zhes pa'i rtags la dper brjod na/_bi shwa pA zhes pa la/_rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig/_su/_de dbyi 'os u phyis/_sa sa ju Sha sogs dang /_/khar sogs kyi mdos bsgrubs pas/_bi shwa p+wa:/_au dang dzas la/_dI r+g+h+wa dz+dza si 
[\[47a.3\]]tsi/_ring po las dzas i tsa la'o/_/a yig_sna tshogs 'thung /_ring po'i mtha' las pha rol gyi rnam dbye i tsa so sor bsdu ba dang po can rnams dang dzas la/_dang po dag la snga ma 'dra'o/_zhes pa'i mdo'i cho ga 'jug pa ma yin te/_e tsa'i 'phel ba dang /_a ka 'dra ba la ring bo byas pas/
[\[47a.4\]]bi shwa pau/_bi shwa pA:/_gnyis pa'i gcig tshig la/_a ma la snga ma 'os/_bi shwapAM/_gnyis tshig la/_bishwa pau/_mang tshig shas la/_A to d+hA to:/_byings kyi A ta kyi 'o/_/rnam dbye gnyis pa'i shas nas brtsams te/_bdun pa'i su pa kyi bar gyi rnam dbye a tsa thog ma can gang byung yang /
[\[47a.5\]]rtags byings kyi A ring mtha' can yin pa'i A de dbyi ste/_A phyis pas/_bi shwa pa:/_rnam dbye lhag ma'ang bshad ma thag ba'i cho ga ltar gyis bsgrubs pa/_gsum pa la/_bi shwa pA/_bi shwa pA b+h+yAM/_bi shwa pA p+hi:/_bzhi pa la/_bi shwa pe/_bi shwa pA b+h+yAM/_bi shwa pA b+h+ya:/_lnga ba la/_bi 
[\[47a.6\]]shwa pa:/_bi shwa pA b+h+yAM/_bi shwa pA b+h+ya:/_drug pa la/_bi shwa pa:/_bi shwa pAM/_bdun pa la/_bi shwa po:/_bi shwa pA su/_bod tshig la/_he'i shwa pA:/_hebi shwa pA:/_de bzhin du/_som pA/_kI lba la pA/_shaM kha d+gA/_hA hA/_s+t+wA/_snA la sogs pa mang po 
[\[47a.7\]]dag kyang bi shwa pA dang bya dang bya ba 'dra ba'o/_/zhes pa skyes ba'i rtags kyi A ring mtha' can gyi bya ba bshad zin to/_!_/da ni skyes pa'i rtags i thung mtha' can gyi bya ba rnams bshad par bya ste/_ha ri la/_'phrog byed/_zhi ba 'thung /_ngur bzo ba/_dri za/_rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]su/_sa sa dzu Sha dang khar sogs kyi mdos/_ha ri:/_ha ri la/_au/_dang po dag la/_zhes pas/_harI/_ha ri la dzas/_dza si tsa/_dzas la 'ang ngo /_i ka so sor bsdu ba thung ngu rnams kyi pha rol rnam dbye dang po'i mang tshig dzas mthong na rtags a ng+ga'i ming can de yon tan du 'gyur te/
[\[47b.2\]]ha re/_dzas/_dza phyis/_e tsa'i a ya a wa sogs kyi mdos/_ha ra ya:/_ha ri la/_kun tu bod pa'i gcig tshig saM bu d+ng+hi'i ming can/_su/_tra swa s+ya gu Na:/_thung ngu'i yon tan no/_i ka thung ngu rnams saM bu d+d+hi la yon tan du 'gyur te/_he ha re/_su/_thung ngu dang eng la zhes pas/
[\[47b.3\]]su phyis/_he ha re/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig gong rnam dbye dang po dang 'dra bas/_he ha rI/_he ra ya:/_ha ri la/_gnyis pa'i a ma dang /_au/_a ma la snga ma'o zhes pas/_ha ri/_ha rI/_ha ri la/_shas sha phyis/_dang po dag la zhes pas/_ha rIs/
[\[47b.4\]]de yang shas kyi na skyes pa la'o/_/zhes pas sa srog med na/_ha rI na/_ha ri la gsum pa'i/_TA/_she Sho g+h+ya sa khi/_sa khim yin pa la lhag ma g+hi'o/_/na dI ming can dang rtags i ka so sor bsdu ba thung ngu rnams kyi nang nas sa khi ma yin pa ste/_sa khi'i sgra bor ba'i i ka thung ngu'i mtha' 
[\[47b.5\]]rnams kyi pha rol du rnam dbye lhag ma ste/_dang po dang gnyis pa ma yin pa'i rnam dbye gsum pa'i TA nas brtsams te/_bdun pa'i sub kyi par pha rol du byung na rtags mtha'i dbyangs de la g+hi zhes ming rtags byed de dgos pa'i ched du 'o/_/A bo nA s+t+ri yaM/_bud med ma yin pa la Ang gi nA'o/_/
[\[47b.6\]]rtags mtha' g+hi'i ming can gyi pha rol Ang ste/_TA ni bud med kyi rtags ma yin pa la nA ra 'gyur ro/_/ha ri NA/_gnyis tshig dang ming tshig la bya ba lhag po med pas/_ha ri b+h+yAM/_ha ri b+hi:/_ha ri la/_bzhi pa'i de/_g+ha rdzi ti/_g+hi'i pa 'gro ba las so/_/rtags mtha' g+hi'i ming can de pha rol 
[\[47b.7\]]rnam dbye nga 'gro ba'i ming rnams dang phrad na rtags mtha' g+hi'i ming can de yon tan 'gyur bas/_ha re/_de/_da phyis/_e tsa'i a ya sogs kyi mdos/_ha ra ye/_ha ri b+h+yAM/_ha ri b+h+ya:/_ha ri la/_lda pa'i da si/_ha ri/_nga si/_bshad ma thag pa'i mdos/_ha ri/_a sa/_nga si 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]nga so:tsa/_nga si ngas dag gi yang ngo /_/rtags mtha' eng so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yod na pha rol rnam dbye lnga ba'i nga si dang /_drug pa'i ngas gnyis kyi da 'gro ba'i ming can phyis pa'i a de ni snga ma eng gi yi ge gang mthong ba de'i gzugs su 'gyur te/_ha re:/_ha ri b+h+yAM/
[\[48a.2\]]ha ri b+he:/_ha ri la/_drug pa'i/_ngas/_lnga ba dang 'dra bas/_ha re:/_ha ri/_os/_i ka gi zhes pas/_ha r+Y+Yo:/_ha ri/_A ma/_thung ngu sogs kyis nuT/_ra Sha dag la zhes pas/_na Na/_nA ma la 'os rtags mtha' ring por 'gyur/_ha rI NAM/_ha ri la/_di/_a ts+dzu g+he:/_g+hi'i a ta yang 
[\[48a.3\]]ngo /_/rtags mtha' g+hi'i ming can gyi pha rol du rnam dbye bdun pa'i ngi byung na/_rtags mtha' g+hi'i ming can de ata du 'gyur la/_yang gi sgras ngi yang au ru 'gyur te/_ha ra/_au/_e tsa la 'os/_ha rau/_ha r+Y+Y+Yau:/_ha ri Shu/_de bzhin du/_shrI pa ti/_a g+ni/_ra bi/_ka wi la sogs pa mang 
[\[48a.4\]]po dag kyang ha ri dang bya ba 'dra'o/_/sa khi'i sgra la cung mi 'dra ste/_sa khi la rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig su byin/_sa khi/_su/_a nang sau/_su la a na nga ngo /_/sa khi'i sgra la kun du bod pa'i don du sbyin pa'i saM bu d+d+h+ri ma yin pa'i/_dpal gyi bdag po/_me/_nyi ma/_snyan ngag/_su la rtags 
[\[48a.5\]]mtha' a nang du 'gyur te/_/sa kha na/_grogs po/_su/_a lo n+t+ra t+pU rba u ba d+hA/_a la mtha' las snga ma u pa ng+hA'o/_/rtags mtha' a la te gsal byed dam skabs 'gar dbyangs kyang rung ste mtha'i snga ma'i yi ge de ni u pa ng+hA'i ming can no/_/sarba nA ma s+thA ne tsA saM bu d+d+hau/_saM bu d+d+hi ma yin pa'i mtha' 
[\[48a.6\]]cad gnas pa'i ming can la yang ngo /_/rtags mtha' na yi ge srog med kyi u pa d+hA'i a ca di ni bod pa'i don du sbyin pa'i su/_saM bu d+d+hi'i ming can ma yin pa'i thams cad gnas pa'i ming can gyi rnam dbye rnams la ring por 'gyur ro/_/sa khAn su/_aM praM k+ta e kA la pra t+ya ya:/_rkyen al 
[\[48a.7\]]gcig pa a pr-i k+ta'o/_/rkyen al gcig pa ste yi ge srog ldan dang gnyis gsum lta bu ma yin pa'i gsal byed srog med gcig po de la/_/pr-i k+ta'i ming can zhes dgos pa'i dbang gis ming 'dogs byed do/_/ha la d+yA b+h+yo dI r+g+hA ta su ti s+ya pr-i k+taM ha la/_ha la dI pa/_A pa/_ring po 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]rnams las su ti si a pr-i k+ta'i ha la'o/_/rtags mtha' la ha la te gsal byed srog med dang /_/bud med du bsgrub pa'i rkyen dI pa dang A pa kye mtha' dang ring po rnams las/_su dang /_ti sogs kyi ti dang /_si rnams kyi u dang i phyis bas/_/ha la a tsa med pa'i yi ge gcig pa/_/
[\[48b.2\]]a pr-i k+ta'i ming can de dbyi bar bya ste/_su phyis/_sa khA na/_ming mtha'i nang byi'o zhes pa ma/_na phyis/_sa khA/_sa khyur saM bu d+d+ho/_sa khi las saM bu d+d+hi ma yin pa la'o/_/sa khi'i skabs 'dir kun du bod pa'i don gyi gcig tshig saM bu d+d+hi ma yin pa'i dang po'i su nas gnyis pa'i au Ta'i 
[\[48b.3\]]bar gyi rnam dbye lnga po sngar thams cad gnas pa'i ming can zhes brda chad chad byas pa de rnams la skabs 'dir Ni ta ste/_Na 'gro ba'i ming can zhes dgos pa'i ched du ming 'dogs byed do/_/sa khi la/_dang po'i au dang dzas/_gnyis pa'i am dang au rnams sbyin/_a tsa ny+Ni ti/_ny+ra N+ra 'gro ba la 
[\[48b.4\]]a ca'i'o/_/pha rol du nya Na 'gro ba'i ming can byung na rtags mtha'i a ca ste dbyangs de 'phel bar 'gyur bas skabs 'dir yang au sogs bzhi la Na yig 'gro ba'i ming can zhes ming 'dogs byas pa'i dgos pa ni 'di yin pas rtags mtha' 'phel ba/_e tsa'i a ya a wa sogs kyi mdos/
[\[48b.5\]]sa khA yau/_sa khA ya:/_sa khA yaM/_sa khA yau/_sa khi la/_kun du bod pa'i su sbyin saM bu d+d+hi ma yin pa zhes pas skabs 'dir bshad ma thag pa'i bya mi 'jug_/gong ha ri'i skabs dang 'dra bas/_he sa khe/_gnyis tshig dang ming tshig bshad ma thag ba'i rnam dbye dang po'i gnyis tshig dang 
[\[48b.6\]]mang tshig ltar bsgrubs pas/_he sa khA yau/_he sa khA ya:gnyis pa'i mang tshig shas kyi skabs ha ri dang 'dra bas/_sa khIn/_gsum pa rnams la/_sa khyA/_sa khi b+hi:/_bzhi pa la/_sa khye/_sa khi b+h+yAM/_sa khi b+h+ya:/_sa khi la/_lnga ba'i/_nga si sbyin/_khya t+tA t+par s+ya/_/be ti 
[\[48b.7\]]dag las pha rol gyi a'i'o/_/rtags mtha' khi ring po dang thung ngu ti ring po dang thung ngu rnams kyi pha rol rnam dbye lnga pa dang drug pa'i nga si dang ngas gnyis kyi da phyis pa'i a de ni u ru 'gyur te/_sa khyu:/_sa khi b+h+yaM/_si khi b+h+ya:/_sa khi la rnam dbyi drug pa rnams/_sa khyu:/_sa khyo:/_sa khI nA/
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]sa khi la/_bdun pa'i nge byon/_au 'o/_/rtags na dI'i ming can dang g+hi'i ming can ma yin pa'i i thung dang u thung dag las pha rol gyi rnam dbye bdun pa'i ngi ni au ru 'gyur te/_nga au/_i ka gi a ca la/_ya Na/_sa khyau/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_sa khyo:/
[\[49a.2\]]sa khi Shu/_pa ti:sa mA sa e wa/_pa ti tshig sdud med pa 'di bzhin no/_/pa ti'i sgra tshig sdud med pa ste/_pa ti zhes pa lta bu las khi'i sgra kho na'i bya ba rnams 'jug la/_chig sdud dang 'brel pa ni/_dper na/_pra dzA pa ti lta bu la ni g+hi'i ming can yin pas spyir btang i thung mtha' can ha ri'i 
[\[49a.3\]]skabs dang cho ga thams cad 'dra'o/_/i thung mtha' can ka ti'i sgra la ni mang tshig kho na 'jug la gcig_bdag po/_tshig dang gnyis tshig dag mi 'jug go/_/ba hu ga Na ba tu Di saM khyA/_mang du 'dren pa btu skye da bu'i bdag po/_Da ti rnams saM khyA'o/_/mang du 'dren pa ste mang tshig kho na thob pa 
[\[49a.4\]]rnams dang /_btu dang /_Da ti'i rkyen rnams la saM khyA'i ming can zhes dgos pa'i dbang gis ming 'dogs byed do/_/Da ti tsa/_Da ti la yang ngo /_/gong du bshad pa'i saM khyA'i ming can de rnams kyi nang nas kyang ka ti lta bu Da ti'i rkyen mtha' can de la Sha Ta'i ming can zhes slar yang ming 'dogs 
[\[49a.5\]]byed do/_/pra t+ya ya s+ya lu ka shU lu pa:/_rkyen gyi lug shU lu pa rnams so/_/pha rol gyi rkyen dbyi ba de la lu ka 'am shU 'am lu pa zhes zer ro/_/dper na/_dzas/_lu ka zer ba'am/_dzas shU zer ba las/_dzas lu ba zer ba lta bu gang byung yang /_/dzas de dbyi ba kho na'o/_/ka til/_rnam dbye 
[\[49a.6\]]dang po'i mang tshig dzas dang /_gnyis pa'i mang tshig shas gnyis byin/_Sha D+d+h+yo lu ka/_Sha Ta rnams las dbyi'o/_/Sha Ta'i ming can gyi rtags las pha rol rnam dbye dang po'i mang tshig dzas dang /_gnyis pa'i mang tshig shas rnams dbyi ste/_la ti'i sgra Sha Ta'i _ji tsam/_ming can yin 
[\[49a.7\]]pas/_dzas shas dag phyis/_ka ti/_ka ti zhes pa grub/_pra t+ya ya lo pe pra t+ya ya la k+Sha NaM/_rkyen phyis pa la rkyen gyi mtshan nyid do/_/pha rol rkyen byin pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rkyen gyi bya ba thob bo zhes rtags mtha'i i er 'gyur ba'i spyir btang thob kyang /_na lu ma tI ga s+ya/
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]phyis pa la a ng+ga'i mi yin no/_/zhes dmigs bsal lu ka'am sh+lu'am lu pa ces pa'i sgras phyis zin de la/_ang+ga te/_rtags de la bya ba med pas/_ka te zhes mi 'gyur bar ka ti nyid du gnas so/_/rnam dbye gsum pa'i mang tshig la/_ka ti b+hi:/_bzhi pa la/_ka ti b+h+ya:/_lnga ba la/
[\[49b.2\]]ka ti b+h+ya:/_drug pa la/_ka tI nI/_bdun pa la/_bod tshig la/_he ka ti/_zhes pa lta bu'o/_/i thung mtha' can tri'i sgra la yang grangs bgrang ba'i skabs su mang tshig kho na sbyor bas/_tri la/_rnam dbye dang po dang /_gnyis pa/_gsum pa/_bzhi pa/_lnga ba rnams kyi mang tshig 
[\[49b.3\]]rnams byin/_gong ha ri ltar bsgrubs pas/_tra ya:/_trI na/_ta b+hi:/_tri b+ha:/_tri la/_drug pa'i mang tshig A ma/_tri:tra ya:/_tri'i tra ya'o/_/rnam dbye drug pa'i A ma pha rol la tri zhes/_gsum/_pa'i sgra ni tra ya zhes par 'gyur te/_tri tra ya/_thung ngu zhes pas nuT/_nA ma la 'os 
[\[49b.4\]]rtags mtha' 'i ring po/_ra Sha sogs kyi mdos/_na Na/_tra yA NAM/_bdun pa la/_tri Nu/_bod tshig/_he tra ya:/_i thung mtha' can dwi'i sgra la yang grangs bgrang ba'i skabs su gnyis tshig kho na sbyor ro/_/t+ya dA dI nA ma:/_t+ya da sogs rnams kyi a'o/_/t+ya da la sogs te d+ya da nas dwe'i bar 
[\[49b.5\]]brgyad po rnams pha rol rnam dbye gang mthong yang rtags mtha' a ru 'gyur te/_dwi la/_rnam dbye dang po dang gnyis pa gnyis kyi gnyis tshig_/au/_dwi'i i a mtshams sbyar bas/_dwau dwau/_rnam dbye gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_lnga pa rnams la/_dwA b+h+yAM/_dwA b+h+yAM/_dwA b+h+yAM/_drug 
[\[49b.6\]]pa dang /_bdun pa la/_dwa yo:/_dwa yo:/_dwe'i sgra la ming dang nyer bsgyur/_gnyis/_thog ma can rnams la dwi'i i ar mi 'gyur zhing /_rnam dbye yang su nas pa'i bar thams cad 'jug la de'i tshe cho ga yang spyir btang i thung mtha' can ha ri'i skabs dang 'dra'o/_/de yan gyis skyes 
[\[49b.7\]]pa'i rtags i thung mtha' can gyi sde tshan spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas rags pa rnams bshad zin to//_!_//da ni skyes ba'i rtags I rid mtha' can ni/_bA ta pra mI la/_ri dwags kr-iSh+Na/_su/_sa sa ju Sha'i mdo dang /_khar sogs kyi mdos/_bA ta bra mIH/_bA ta bra mI la/_au dang 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]dzas i ka gi a tsa la ya Na 'os/_bA ta pra myau/_bA ta pra myaH/_rnamadabye gnyis pa la/_bA ta pra mIM/_bA ta pra myau/_gsum pa la/_bA ta bra myA/_bA ta pra mI+u b+h+rIH/_bA ta pra mI b+hiH/_bzhi pa la/_bA ta pra n+ye/_bA ta pra mI b+haM/_bA ta pra mI b+h+yaH/_lnga pa la/_bA ta pra myaH/_bA ta pra mI b+h+yAM/
[\[50a.2\]]bA ta pra mI b+h+yaH/_drug pa la/_bA ta pra myaH/_bA ta pra myoH/_bA ta pra myAM/_bdun pa la/_bA ta bra mI/_bA ta pra myoH/_bA ta pra mIShu/_bod tshig_he pA ta pra mIH/_he pA ta bra myau/_he pA ta phra myaH/_he pA ta pra myaH/_rnams grub ste cho ga go bde 'o/_/de bzhin du/_de wa ya dzI/_a ti la k+ShI la sogs pa mang po 
[\[50a.3\]]dag cho ga 'di kho na dang 'dra'o/_/I ring mtha' can byings gnas pa rnams bya ba cung mi 'dra ste/_su d+d+hi la/_su/_su d+d+hi:/_sud+d+hI/_su d+d+hIl/_au dang /_dzas/_a tsi shU d+tA tu b+hA wAM y+wo ri ya ngu wa ngau /_a tsa la sh+nu byings b+h+rU rnams kyi i u dag gi i ya u wa lha mchod pa/_shid tu phun tshogs pa/
[\[50a.4\]]dag go/_pha rol a tsa ste dbyangs gang mthong yang rkyen sh+nu dang byings kyi i ring thung u ring thung /_blo bzang ngam legs pa'i blo/_b+h+ru'i sgra rnams kyi i rnams i ya dang /_u rnams u wa ru 'gyur zhing /_spyir btang i ka gi a Na 'o zhes pa thob kyang /_na b+hU su d+d+hI dag la ma yin no/_/
[\[50a.5\]]b+hU dang su d+d+hI dag gi I dag a tsa pha rol la yaN ra 'gyur ba ma yin te/_i yar bsgyur bas/_su d+d+hi yau/_su d+d+hi yaH/_rnam dbye gnyis pa rnams la/_su d+d+hi yaM/_su ng+d+hi yau/_su d+d+hi yaH/_gsum pa la/_su d+d+hi yA/_su d+d+hI b+h+yAM/_sud+d+hI b+hiH_lta bu ste/_rnam dbye lhag ma rnams la yang ha la thog 
[\[50a.6\]]ma can rnams la bya ba med/_a tsa thog ma can rnams la i yar bsgyur ba kho na yin pas go bde'o/_/de bzhin du/_su shrI/_ya wa krI sogs kyang rig par bya'o/_/pra d+hI la/_su/_pra d+hIH/_pra d+hI la/_au/_dzas/_er ne kA tso saM yo ga pU rba s+ya/_I'i a tsa mang po'i snga ma brtsegs 
[\[50a.7\]]pa ma yin pa'i 'o/_/rtags mtha' byings kyi I yig dang U yig_gzugs mdzes sam dpal lam phun tshogs pa'am bde bar 'byor ba/_nas tshong /_a tsa gcig pa ma yin pa ste/_blo rab/_dbyangs gnyis sam mang po yod pa sngon na yi ge mang po brtsegs pa med pa de ni a tsa pha rol la ya Nar 'gyur te/
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]pra d+h+yau/_pra d+h+yaH/_gnyis pa la/_pra d+h+yaM/_pra d+hau/_prad+h+yaH/_gsum pa/_pra d+hA/_prad+h+yi b+hIH/_pra d+hI b+hi:/_rnam dbye lhag ma rnams kyang rigs 'gro'o/_/'di dang 'dra ba ni/_di d+hI/_su d+hi la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo /_/a tsa mang po zhes pas dbyangs gcig pa la bshad ma thag pa'i bya ba mi 
[\[50b.2\]]'jug ste/_dper na/_nI zhes pa a tsa gcig pa yin pas pra d+hI'i bya ba rnams mi 'jug/_rnam dbye bdun pa'i ngi ma gtogs cho ga thams cad su d+d+hI'i skabs dang 'dra ste/_'dzin/_blo bzang /_nIH/_nIH/_ni yau/_ni yaH/_lta bu rigs 'gre/_bdun pa'i ngi la cung mi 'dra ste/_nI la ngi /_de rI na d+yA m+nI b+h+ya:/
[\[50b.3\]]ngi'i A ma/_nadI A pa/_'dren pa/_nI rnams las so/_/rnam dbye bdun pa'i de ni bud med kyi rtags/_na nI ming can rnams dang /_A pa kyi mtha'i rnams dang /_nI'i sgra rnams la A ma du 'gyur te/_ni yAM/_grA ma NI yang rnam dbye bdun pa'i gcig tshig ngi ma gtogs pra b+hI'i skabs dang 
[\[50b.4\]]'dra/_ngi la bshad ma thag pa nI dang 'dra ste/_grA ma NI:/_grAm N+yau/_grA maN+ya:sogs dang /_bdun pa la/_grA ma Ni yAM/_sa khI dang pa tI ring po'i mtha' can yang rnam dbye lnga ba'i nga si dang /_grong sde'i phra ma mkhan/_drug pa'i ngas ma gtogs rnam dbye gzhan thams cad la cho ga sra d+hI 
[\[50b.5\]]dang 'dra zhing /_nga si/_ngas gnyis las khI dang /_ba tI la/_nga si dang ngas byin/_khi ti dag las pha rol gyi a'i lo a zhes pas nga se dang ngas kyi a u mtshams sbyar/_sa khU:/_ba t+yu:/_drug pa yang gzugs dang bsgrub tshul gnyis ka 'dra'o/_/lU nI'i sgra yang rnam dbye bdun pa'i 
[\[50b.6\]]ngi la nI'i skabs dang 'dra zhing /_ngi ma yin pa'i rnam dbye gzhan thams cad la pra d+hI'i skabs kyi cho ga dang 'dra'o/_/de ltar skyes pa'i rtags las I ring mtha' can spyir btang dmigs pas dang bcas par rags pa bshad zin to/_!_/da ni skyes/_zhing rnga bar byed/_pa'i rtags u thung gi bya ba 
[\[50b.7\]]rnams bshad par bya ste/_shaM b+hu la/_su/_sa sa ju Shar zhes dang /_kha ra dang zhes pa'i mdos/_shaM b+hu:/_lha chen po/_shaM b+hu la/_au/_dang po dag gi zhes pas/_shaM b+hU/_shaMb+hu la/_dzas/_dzas la 'ang ngos/_u o mtshams sbyar/_shaM b+ha wa:/_shaM b+hu la/_a ma/_a ma la snga ma 'os/
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]shaM b+huM/_/o gong dang 'dra bas/_/shaM b+hUM/_/shi b+hu la shas/_/dang po dag la zhes dang /_de yang shas kyi na zhes bas/_shaM b+hU na/_shaM b+hu la/_DA bud med ma yin pa la/_Ang gi nA'o zhes bas/_/shaM b+hu nA/_/gnyis tshig dang shaM b+hu b+hUMH/_shaM b+hu la/_nge/_g+hi'i 
[\[51a.2\]]pa 'gro ba las so zhes pas u o mtshams sbyar/_shaM b+ha we/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_shaM b+hu b+h+yAM/_shaM b+hu b+h+yaH/_shaM b+hu la/_dasi/_g+hi'i nga 'gro ba zhes dang /_dasi/_ngas dag gi zhes pa'i mdos/_/shaM b+hoH/_shaM b+hu b+h+yAM/_shaM b+hu la/_ngas byin/_nga si'i skabs dang 
[\[51a.3\]]'dra bas/_shaM b+hoH/_shaM b+hA+oH/_shaM b+hU nUM/_shaM b+hu la/_ngi/_g+hi'i a ta yang ngos/_shaM b+hau/_shaM b+h+woMH/_shaM b+hu Shu/_bo da tshig_/he shaM b+ho/_he shaM b+hU/_he shaM b+ha waHrnams grub ste/_spyir btang u thung mtha' can shaM b+hu'i sgra dang i thung mtha' can ha ri'i skabs rnams dbyangs 
[\[51a.4\]]mi 'dra ba'i 'gyur khyad phran bu me gtogs cho ga khyad par med do/_/bish+shu/_bA yu/_bA nu la sogs te skyes pa'i rtags spyir btang u thung mtha' can thams cad 'di dang 'dra'o/_/u thung mtha' can gyi nang tshan/_/kroSh+Tu'i cho ga spyir btang dang cung mi 'dra ste/_kroSh+Tul/_su/_tr-i dzA ta kroSh+TuH/
[\[51a.5\]]kroSh+Tu'i tri ca bzhin no/_/kroSh+Tu zhes pa'i sgra ni saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa'i_khyab 'jug/_rlung /_nyi ma/_rnam dbye dang po'i su nas/_gnyis ba'i oM Ta'i bar thams cad gnas pa'i ming can zhes brda chad byas pa/_/de rnams pha rol tu byung na kr-ita rkyen tr-i tsa'i mtha' can_ce sbyang /_dang bya ba 'dra bas rtags 
[\[51a.6\]]mtha'i u de r-ir 'gyur te/_kroSh+T-I/_su/_r-i du shan slur daM sho\u0f85ne ha sAM tsa/_r-ita_u sha nas_bu ra daM shas an has rnams kyi yang ngo /_/rtags r-i ta mtha' rnams dang u sha nas/_pu ra daM shas/_a ne has rnams kyi rtags mtha' ni saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa'i su la a nang du 'gyur te/_na'i 
[\[51a.7\]]a dang 'gro ba yin pas phyis/_saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa'i zhes pa'i mdos u pad+hA ring por song /_hal dwi A pa zhes bas su phyis/_ming mtha'i na dbyi 'os na phyis pas/_kroSh+TA/_kroSh+TUl/_dang po'i au dang dzas/_gnyis pa'i aM dang auT rnams byin/_r-i to_ngi sarbanA ma l+thA na yoH/
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]r-ita kyi di thams cad gnas pa'i ming can dag las so/_/rtags r-ita mtha' can las so/_/rtags r-ita mtha' can las rnam dbye thams cad gnas pa'i ming can rnams dang /_rnam dbye bdun pa'i ngi pha rol la rtags mtha' yon tan du 'gyur te/_r-i ar du bsgyur/_ab+h+r-i n+t+r-i tsa swa sr-in Sh-Ine Sh+T-i twa Sh+T+r-i k+Sha tr-i ho tr-i bo tr-i bra sha s+t+r-I NAM/_a pa 
[\[51b.2\]]tr-in_tr-i tsa swa sri_nab+h+r-i_neSh+TA_twaSh+T-i_k+Sha tr-i_hotraM_potr-i_bra shas+t+r-i rnams kyi'o/_/rtags ab dang kr-ita kyi rkyen tr-in dang tr-i ca gnyis byin pa'i mtha' dang /_rtags swa sri la sogs pa dgu bo ni saM bud+d+haM ma yin pa'i rnam dbye thams cad gnas pa'i ming can rnams la u pad+hA ring por 'gyur te/_kroSh+TA rau/
[\[51b.3\]]kroSh+TA raH/_kroSh+TA raM/_kroSh+TA rau/_shas la shaM b+hu dang 'dra bas/_kroSh+Tu la gsum pa'i TA/_bi b+hA ShA tr-i tI yA di Sh+wa tsi/_gsum pa sogs rnams la a tsa la 'dam ka'o/_/kroSh+Tu'i sgra la pha rol du rnam dbye gsum pa'i DA nas/_bdun pa'i os kyi rab a tsa 
[\[51b.4\]]thog ma can rnams gang byung yang spyir btang u thud mtha' can shaM b+hu'i skabs kyi bya ba dang /_bshad ma thag pa bzhin rtags mtha' r-ir 'gyur ba'i phyogs gnyis ka thab pas 'dam ka can du bya ste/_kroSh+TA/_kroSh+Tu nA/_kroSh+Tu b+h+yAM/_kroSh+TA b+hiH/_bzhi pa la/_kroSh+Tu_kroSh+Ta we/_kroSh+Tu b+h+raM/
[\[51b.5\]]kroSh+Tu b+h+yaH/_kroSh+Tu la lnga pa'i/_nga si/_shaM b+hu ltar bsgrubs pas/_kroSh+ToH/_r-ir 'gyur ba'i phyogs la/_R-i ta ur/_r-i ya las ur 'o/_/rtags r-i ta mtha' can la pha rol rnam dbye lnga ba'i nga si dang /_drug pa'i ngas dag gi a dang rtags mtha'i r-i gnyis 'dus par ur du 'gyur 
[\[51b.6\]]te/_/kroSh+Ta/_u rA swa/_zhes pa la/_rA t+sa s+ya/_ra las sa'i 'o/_/ra yig srog med las pha rol gyis yig srog med ni dbyi bar bya ste/_sa phyis/_ra rnam bcad byas pas/_kroSh+TuH/_b+h+yAm b+has la/_kroSh+Tu b+h+yAM/_kroSh+Tu b+h+yaH/_drug pa'i ngas yang bya ba lnga ba'i ngasi dang 'dra bas/
[\[51b.7\]]kroSh+ToH/_kroSh+TuH/_os la/_kroSh+To+uH/_kroSh+TA+oH/_kroSh+Tu la drug pa'i Am shaM b+hu ltar bsgribs bas/_/kroSh+TU nAM/_lugs gcig la/_nu ma tsi ra tr-i dz+wad+b+hA be b+h+yo nu Ta/_ra a tsa la nu m-i tra tsa bzhin 'gyur ba rnams kyi nu Ta'o/_/rtags mtha' ra yig a tsa dang ldan pa nu ma A ga ma thob pa 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]rnams dang kroSh+Tu_tr-i tsa bzhin du 'gyur ba'i pha rol rnam dbye drug pa'i mang tsheg A ma la nu Ta A ga ma nges bar 'jug ste/_nu Ta A ga ma byin pas/_kroSh+T+r-I NAM/_rnam dbye bdun pa'i ngi la/_kroSh+Ta ri/_kroSh+Tau/_os la/_kroSh+T+roH/_kroSh+T+roH/_su pa la/_kroSh+Tu Shu/_bod tshig_/
[\[52a.2\]]he kroSh+To/_he kroSh+TA rau/_he kroSh+TA raH/_gnyis pa'i shas la yang na kroSh+T+rAM na zhes pa'ang 'byung ngo /_/de yan gyis skyes pa'i rtags kyi u thung mtha' can spyir btang bar de migs bsal rnams bshad zin to/_!_/da ni skyes pa'i rtags las U ring mtha'i can gyi bya ba rnams ston par byed de/_hU hU 
[\[52a.3\]]zhes pa'i sgra la dper brjod du bya ste/_dbyangs mi 'dra ba'i 'gyur khyad phran bu ma gtogs pA ta pra mI dang 'dra bas/_hU hUl/_rnam dbyed dang po rnams byin/_gong ltar gyi cho gas bsgrubs bas/_hU hUH/_hU hA+au/_hU haH/_gnyis pa la/_hU hwaM/_hU hwaM/_hU h+yaH_gsum pa la/_hU hA/_hU 
[\[52a.4\]]hU b+h+yAM/_hU hU b+hiH/_lta bu ste a ca thog ma can rnams la/_u war 'gyur/_ha la thog ma can rnams la bya ba lhag po med bas go bde'o/_/de ba nin du/_a ti tsa mU la sogs pa spyir btang_dris_U ring skyes pa'i rtags thams cad cho ga 'di dang 'dra'o/_/U ring mtha' can kha la pU la su 
[\[52a.5\]]byin/_kha la pUH/_kha la pU la/_au/_oHsu pi/_U'i su ba la'o/_/byings kyi U rnam dbye dang po'i su nas/_bdun pa'i mang tshig gi pa'i bar gyi a tsa _shin tu g.yo ba/_thog ma can gang byung yang U de wa kho nar 'gyur te/_de yang mtha' U de'i sngon du yi ge gnyis sam gsum sogs 
[\[52a.6\]]yod pa yi ge brtsegs pa med pa zhig dgos so/_/kha la bA+au/_kha la braH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_kha la p+waM/_kha la p+wau/_kha la p+waH/_gsumapa rnams la/_kha la pA/_kha la pU b+hAM/_kha la pU b+hiH/_sogs te la sgrub tshul rigs 'gre'o/_/su lU la sogs pa yang 'di dang 'dra'o/_/swa b+h+ya 
[\[52a.7\]]zhes pa/_su d+d+hi'i skabs dang 'dra bas/_su la swa b+hUH/_rnam dbye a tsa thog ma can rnams la/_u war 'gyur bas/_swa b+hu wau/_swa b+hu waH/_gnyis pa la/_swa b+hu waM/_swa b+hu wau/_swa b+hu waH/_gsum pa la/_swa b+hu wA/_swab+hu b+h+yAM/_legs gcod/_swa b+hU b+hiH/_sogs so/_/ka Ta_bdag yod/
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]sU/_swa yaM b+hU/_sogs kyang 'di dang 'dra'o/_/b+hU su d+hA+e dag lam yin no/_/ya Nar 'gyur ba ma yin kyang dmigs bsal bar+ShA b+hU zhes pa'i sgra ni b+hU'i mtha' yin kyang ya Nar 'gyur te/_su la/_bar+ShA b+huH/_bar+ShA b+hUH/_bar+ShA b+hU la au/_bar+ShA b+hA sh+tsa/_bar+ShA b+hU'i 'ang ngo /_/bar+ShA b+hU zhes pa'i sgra 'di su sogs 
[\[52b.2\]]kyi rnam dbye zhes pas/_/a tsa thog ma can rnams la ya nar 'gyur te/_/U war bsgyur bas/_/bar+ShA b+h+wau/_bar+ShA b+hAHsogs/_lo dus su 'byung ba/_kha la pU'i skabs dang 'dra'o/_/'grel par/_dr-ig+g+hU/_kA rA b+hU/_pun r+b+hU rnams kyang bar+ShA b+hU dang 'dra'o zhes byung bas/_'di rnams la yang rnam dbye 
[\[52b.3\]]byin pa'i bya ba thams cad bar+ShA b+hU dang 'dra bas bshad mkhrag pa'i tshogs bsgrub pa'o/_/de ltar U ring mtha' can las skyes ba'i rtags kyi bya ba rnams bshad zin to/_!_/da ni skyes ba'i byed pa 'byung ba/_slar yang 'byung ba/_rtags ri yig mtha' can gyi cho ga rnams ston par bya ste/_b+hA tr-i la/
[\[52b.4\]]su/_r-ita u sha nas/_bu ru da shas a ne has rnams kyi yang ngo /_/zhes pas/_r-i a nang /_saM bu d+d+hi ma yin pa'i zhes pas u pa d+hA ring po/_ha la dI A pa ces pas su phyis/_ming mtha'i na dbye 'os/_na phyis pas/_b+hA tA/_b+hA tr-i la dang po'i au dang jas/_gnyis pa'i a_'dzin byed/
[\[52b.5\]]dang au rnams byin/_r-i ta kyi de thams cad gnas pa'i ming can dag las so/_/zhes bas/_r-i a ra du bsgyur/_a ba tr-i na tr-i tsha sogs kyi mdos/_u pab+hU red por drang /_b+hA tA rau/_b+hA tA raH/_b+hA tA raM/_b+hA tA rau/_b+hA tr-i la shas/_dang po dag la snga ma 'dra ba'o dang /_de yang shas kyin 
[\[52b.6\]]skyes pa la 'os/_b+hA tr-In/_gsum pa/_b+hA trA/_b+hA tri b+h+yAM/_b+hA tr-i b+hiH/_bzhi pa la/_b+hA tre/_b+hA tr-i b+h+yAM/_b+hA tr-i b+h+yaH/_b+hA tr-i/_nga se/_r-i ta las ur 'o zhes dang /_ra las sa'i'o zhes pas/_b+hA tuH/_b+hA tr-i b+h+yA/_b+hU tr-i b+h+yaH/_drug pa'i gcig tshig kyang nga si dang 'dra bas/_b+hA tuH/_o sa la/
[\[52b.7\]]b+hA troH/_A ma la/_ra a tsa sogs kyis nuT/_nA ma la 'os rtags mtha' ring po/_'grel bar lung drangs pa/_r-ibar+NAn+na s+yaN twaM bAMts+ya/_r-i las na'i Nar brjod do/_/ra Sha gnyis sum zad dbyangs r-i'i pha rol gyen yang Nar 'gyur te/_b+hA tr-I NAM/_bdun pa'i ri la r-ita kyi di thams cad gnas pa 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]zhes pas yon tan/_b+hA ta ri/_b+hA troH/_b+hA tri rtsa/_kun tu bod pa'i su la/_r-i ta kyi de thams cad gnas pa'i ming can zhes pas yon tan/_he r+b+hA taH/_gnyis tsheg dang mang tshig dang po'i skabs dang 'dra/_he b+hA tA rau/_he b+hA tA raH/_de bzhin du/_na b+h+r-i/_ho tr-i/_po tr-i sogs mang 
[\[53a.2\]]po zhig 'di dang 'dra'o/_/pi tri la/_su/_gong bzhin bsgrubs pas/_pi dA/_pi tra'i skabs 'dir gzhan cho ga thams cad snga ma b+hA tr-i'i skabs dang 'dra la/_dang po'i au nas gnyis pa'i au'i bar rnams la u pa b+hA reng bor mi 'gyur te/_b+hA tr-i zhes ba rkyen _tsha bo/_sbyin sreg_sbyin sreg_tr-i tsa tr-i 
[\[53a.3\]]mtha' can yin la/_pho/_pi tr-i zhes pa tr-i tsa mtha' can ma yin pas so/_/pi ta rau/_pi taraH_lta bu'o/_/gzhan rnams rigs 'gre'o/_dzA mA tri/_b+hA tr-i sogs kyang 'di dang 'dra'o/_nr-i ca/_nr-i'i yang na'o/_/nr-i zhes pa'i rtags la rnam dbye drug pa'i A ma ma gtogs pi tr-i'i skabs dang 
[\[53a.4\]]'dra/_A ma la rtags mtha' ring por 'gyur ba dang mi 'gyur ba 'dam ka can du bya ste/_ran-I NAM bam/_yang na nr-i NAM lta bu'o/_/de rnams kyis mag pa_/spun zla/_skyes pa'i rtags la r-i yig mtha' can gyi bya ba rnams bshad mi zin to/_!_/skabs 'dir r-I ta dang l-i ta dang e ta rnams kyi mtha' can gyi 
[\[53a.5\]]rtags med bar grags so/_!_/o yig mtha' las go'i sgra la dper brjod du bya ste/_go to Ni ta/_go las Ni ta'o/_/o mtha' can mgo lta bu'i pha rol gyi rnam dbye dang po nas gnyis pa'i auTa'i bar sngar thams cad gnas pa'i ming zhes brda chad byas pa de rnams skabs 'dir Na 'gro ba'i 
[\[53a.6\]]ming can zhes ming 'dogs byed do/_/go la/_su au jas rnams/_nya? Na 'gro ba la a tsa'i 'o zhes pa'i mdos rtags mtha' 'phel ba/_gauH/_gA wau/_gA waH/_gnyis pa'i a ma dang_shas la/_o to \u0f85m+sha so/_/o ta las a ma shas dag la'o/_/rtags o yig mtha' can las 
[\[53a.7\]]rnam dbye gnyis pa'i a ma shas pha rol la rtags mtha'i o dang pa pha rol gyi a 'dus pas A ru 'gyur te/_a ma la/_gAM/_au la/_gA wau/_shas la/_gAH/_gsum pa rnams la/_ga wA/_go b+h+yAM/_go b+hiH/_bzhi pa rnams la/_ga we/_go b+h+yAM/_go b+h+yaH/_lnga ba rnams la/_goH/_go b+h+yAM 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]go b+h+yaH/_drug pa rnams la/_goH/_ga wAMH/_ga wAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_ga wi/_ga woH/_go Shu/_bod tshig_/he gauH/_he gA wau/_he gA waH/_de bzhin du/_su d+yo sogs kyang 'di dang 'dra'o/_/de ltar o mtha' can rnams bshad zin to/_!_/de ni e yig mtha' can las rai'i sgra la 
[\[53b.2\]]dper brjod na/_Rail su/_rA yo ha li/_rai'i ha la la'o/_/ai yig mtha' can rai sgra lta bu'i pha rol du rnam dbye ha la thog ma can gang byung yang rtags mtha'i ai de A ru 'gyur ro/_/nyi ga_/rAH/_rA yau/_rA yaH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_rA yaM/_rA yau/_rA yaH/_gsum pa rnams la/_gser ram nor/
[\[53b.3\]]rA yA/_rA b+h+yAM/_rA b+hiH/_bzhi pa rnams la/_rA ye/_rA b+h+yAM/_rA b+h+yaH/_lnga ba rnams la/_rA yaH/_rA b+h+yA/_rA b+h+yaH/_drug pa rnams la/_rA yaH/_rA yoH/_rA yAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_rA yi/_rA yoH/_rA su/_bod tshig la/_he rAH/_he rA yau/_ha rA yaH/_au yig mtha' can glau zhes pa'i 
[\[53b.4\]]sgra la dper brjod bya ste/_a tsa thog ma can rnams la au A war 'gyur/_hal thog ma can rnams la bya ba lhag po med pas/_rnam dbye dang po rnams la/_glauH/_glA wau/_glA waH/_gnyis pa la/_glA wA/_glau b+h+yAM/_glA+au b+h+yAMH/_sogs so/_/naul 
[\[53b.5\]]sogs ba rnams kyang 'di dang 'dra'o/_i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU tA da than+ta bu rling+gA sA mA b+hAH/_zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las a tsa'i mtha' can skyes pa'i rtags rnams rdzogs so/_/de rnams kyis brda spyod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga_su/
[\[53b.6\]]dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las skyes pa'i rtags a tsa mtha' can rnams kyi cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags ba rnams re zhig rdzogs so/_!_/da ni bud med kyi rtags las a tsa mtha' can gyi cho ga rnams 
[\[53b.7\]]bshad par bya ste/_ramA la/_rtsa bam/_su/_ha la dI ba A pa ring po sogs kyis su phyis/_ra mA/_ra mA la/_au/_au pa A paH/_au'i A pa las so/_/bud med kyi rtags A pa kyi rtags A pa kyi mtha' can las rnam dbye dang po'i gnyis tshig au dang /_gnyis pa'i gnyis tshig au gnyis ni shI 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]ru 'gyur te/_/sha 'gro ba'i ming can yin pas phyis mtshams sbyar bas/_/ra me/_ra mA la dzas dang po dag la zhes pas/_ra mAH/_ra mA la/_kun tu bod pa'i su/_saM bu d+d+hau laM yang ngo /_/A pa mtha' can ni saM bu d+d+hi pha rol la er 'gyur te/_rtags mtha' i/_thung 
[\[54a.2\]]du eng sogs kyis saM bud+d+hi phyis pas/_he ra me/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig gong dang 'dra ste/_he ra me/_he ra mAH/_ra mA la/_aM/_am la snga ma 'os/_ra mAM/_au la/_ra me/_shas la dang po dag gi zhes pas/_ra mAH/_ra mA la gsum pa'i TA/_A ri tsA baH/_A pa kyi Ang la 
[\[54a.3\]]'ang ngo /_/rtags A pa mtha' can ni Ang ste rnam dbye gsum pa'i TA dang yang gi sgras drug pa dang bdun pa'i os rnams pha rol la rtags mtha' e ru 'gyur te/_rtags mtha' e mtshams sbyar/_ra ma yA/_b+h+yAM b+hi sa la/_ra mA b+h+yAM/_ra mA b+hiH/_ra mA la/_de/_yA TA paH/_A ba las yA Ta 'o/_/
[\[54a.4\]]rtags A ba kyi mtha' las pha rol tu nga 'gro ba'i ming can gyi rnam dbye rnams byung na yang TA A ga ma 'jug go/_/ra mA yA/_e/_A Ta sh+tsa/_A Ta las 'ang ngo /_/yA Ta lta bu A mtha' can gyi A ga ma byung ba de pha rol a tsa thog ma can dang phrad na 'phel bar 'gyur te/_ra mA ye/_ra mA ya/_ra mA b+h+yAM/
[\[54a.5\]]ra mA b+h+yaH/_lnga pa'i/_nga si/_yA Ta byin gong ltar bsgrubs pas/_ra mA yAH/_ra mA b+h+yAM/_ra mA b+h+yaH/_drug pa la/_ra mA yAH/_ra ma yoH/_ra mA NAM/_bdun pa'i/_di yA Ta/_ngi'i A ma _na dI_A pa nI rnams las sos/_ngi A ma/_ra mA yAM/_os/_ra ma yoH/_ra mA su/_de bzhin du/_gAng+gA/
[\[54a.6\]]du rgya/_am+di kA sogs mang po 'di dang 'dra'o/_/mo rtags sarbA'i sgra la/_rnam dbye dang po rnams dang /_bod tshig rnams dang /_gnyis pa rnams bshad ma thag par mA dang 'dra/_sarbA/_sarbe/_sarbAH/_he sa rbe/_he sa rbaM/_he sa rbAH/_sarbAM/_sarbe/_sarbAH/_gsum pa yang 'dra bas/
[\[54a.7\]]bgrod dka' ma/_/na gar ko Ta'i lha mo/_sarba yA/_sarbA b+h+yaM/_sarbA b+hiH/_sarbA la/_nge /_sarba nA m+naH/_s+yA b+h+yA swa sh+tsa/_sarba nA ma las s+yA Ta ste thung du'ang ngo /_/sarba'i ming can A pa mtha' rnams las pha rol du rnam dbye nga 'gro ba rnams byung na s+yAT A ga ma 'jug cing rtags mtha' thung ngur 'gyur ro/_/sarba 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]s+yai/_b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa la/_sarbA b+h+yAM/_sarbA b+h+yAM/_nga sil/_sarbA s+yAH/_sarbA b+h+yA/_sarbA b+h+yaH/_drug pa la/_sarba s+yAH/_sarba yoH/_sarbA sAM/_bdun pa la/_/sarba s+yAM/_sarba yoH/_sarbA su/_de bzhin du/_bi shwA la sogs pa rnams kyang rigs 'gre'o/_/u d+ha ra pU nA zhes pa la rnam dbye nga 'gro ba rnams 
[\[54b.2\]]ma gtogs sarbA dang 'dra/_nga 'gro ba rnams la ngamA'i skabs dang sarbA skabs gnyis kar gyi bya ba 'jug pas 'dam ka can no/_/u d+ta ra pU rbA/_ut+ta ra pU rba/_ut+ta ra pU rbAH/_he u t+ta ra pU rbe/_sna tshogs ma/_he u tA ra pU tre/_he u t+ta ra pU rbaH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_u t+ta ra pU rbAM/_u t+ta ra 
[\[54b.3\]]pU rbe/_u t+ta ra pu rbAH/_gsum pa rnams la/_ut+ta ra pU rba yA/_ut+ta ra pU rbA b+h+yAM/_ut+ta ra pU rbA la/_de/_bib+hA ShI di ka sa mA se ba hu brI hau/_'bru mang po'i tshig sdud la phyogs la 'dam ka'o/_/phyogs kyi sgra 'bru mang po'i tshig sdud byas pa A pa mtha' can ni rnam dbye nga 'gro 
[\[54b.4\]]ba'i ming can rnams la sarbA'i skabs ltar s+yAT A ga ma byin/_rtags mtha' thung dur byed pa dang /_ra mA'i skabs ltar lAT ster ba 'dam ka can no/_/ut+ta ra phU rba s+yai/_ut+ta ra pU rbA b+h+yAM/_ut+ta ra pU rbA b+h+yaH/_sogs so/_bib+hA ShA dwi tI yA tr-i t-I yA b+h+yAM/_dwi tI yA tr-i tI yA dag las 
[\[54b.5\]]'dam ka'o/_/dwi trI yA dang tr-i tI yA gnyis la'ang rnam dbye nga 'gro ba rnams la yA Ta dang s+yA Ta 'dam ka can te/_dper na/_bzhi pa'i de la/_dwi tI yA yai/_dwi tI yA yai/_tr-i tI ya s+yai/_tr-i tI ya s+yai/_lta bu'o/_/am+bA zhes pa yang saM bu d+b+hi ma gtogs rnam dbye thams cad ra m+nga'i skabs dang 'dra/
[\[54b.6\]]sa bud+d+hi la cung mi 'dra ste/_am+bA la/_saM bu d+d+hi/_am+bA r+tha na d+yoHhra swaH/_a m+bA'i don na dI rnams kyi thung ngu'o/_/am+bA'i sgra dang na dI'i ming can rnams saM bud+d+hi pha rol la rtags mtha' thung ngur 'gyur te/_he am+ba/_ak+kA dang /_al+lA yang 'di dang 'dra'o/_'grel par/_am+bA'i don can yin 
[\[54b.7\]]gyang de phan gyi rkyen Da dang /_la deng /_ka gnas pa de la mo rtags su bsgrub pa'i rkyen TA pa byin pa lta bu la saM bud+d+hi la yang thung ngur mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes bshad pas/_dper na/_am+bADAl/_am+bA n+b+hi byin thung ngur_nor rgyun ma/_'bigs khyed lha mo/_mi 'gyur/_ra mA dang 'dra bas/_he a m+bA De/_de 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]bzhin du/_he am+bA le/_he am+bI ge_/lta bu'o/_/ja rA zhes ba'i sgra la rnam dbye ha la thog ma can la ra m+bA'i skabs dang 'dra/_a tsa thog ma can rnams la ja rA nyid dza ras zhes par 'gyur ba dang ra mA'i skabs gnyis 'dam ka can du bya ste/_rnam dbye dang po rnams la 
[\[55a.2\]]dza rA/_dza ra sau/_dza ra saH/_bod tshig la/_he dza re/_he dza ra sau/_rgan mo/_he dza rasaH/_gnyis pa la/_dza ra saM/_dza ra sau/_dza ra saH/_gsum pa la/_dza ra sA/_dza rA b+h+yAM/_dza rA b+hiH/_bzhi pa la/_dza ra se/_dza rA b+h+yAM/_dza rA b+h+yaH/_lnga ba la/_dza ra saH/_dza rA b+h+yAM/_dza rA b+h+yaH/_drug pa 
[\[55a.3\]]la/_dza ra saH/_dza ra soH/_dza ra sAM/_bdun pa la/_dza ra si/_dza ra soH/_dza rA su/_'di rnams dza ra sa su 'gyur ba'i phyogs yin la/_ra mA dang 'dra ba'i skabs kyi dper brjod go bde bsam bkod do/_/nA si kA zhes pa rnams dbye dang po rnams dang /_kun tu bod pa'i don can rnams dang /
[\[55a.4\]]rnam dbye gnyis pa'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig rnams ramA'i skabs dang 'dra/_shas nas brtsams te/_shas la sogs pa rnams la pad da tan bzhes pa'i/_mdos/_nA si kA nas zhes par 'gyur bas/_shas la/_na saH/_gsum pa rnams la/_na sA/_nob+h+yAM/_nob+haMH/
[\[55a.5\]]bzhi pa la/_na se/_no b+h+yA/_no b+h+yaH/_lnga ba la/_nas/_no b+h+yAM/_nob+h+yaH/_drug pa la/_nasaH/_na soH/_na sAM/_bdun pa la/_na si/_na soH/_nasU/_ni shA/_zhes pa'ang su nas shas kyi bar mA dang 'dra/_shas nas bzung ste/_shas la sogs pa rnams la zhes pa'i/_mdos/
[\[55a.6\]]ni shA/_ni shA ru 'gyur/_shas la/_ni shaH/_TA la/_ni shA/_ni shal/_b+h+yAM/_bra sh+tsa b+h+ra snga sri dza mri dza ya dza rA dza b+h+ra dza cha shAM Sha/_bra sh+tsa b+h+ra snga sr-i dza mr-i dza ya dza_rA dza_b+h+rA dza tsha sha rnams kyi Sha 'o/_/bra sh+tsa sogs bdun dang /_tsha dang sha srog med ming ma bra 'a yin pa de dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi 
[\[55a.7\]]ge gang mthong yang Sha ru 'gyur ro/_/b+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams so zhes pas Sha Da drangs/_niD+b+h+yAM/_ni D+b+hiH/_bzhi pa la/_ni she/_ni D+b+h+yAM/_ni D+b+h+yaH/_lnga pa la/_ni shaH/_ni D+b+h+yAM/_niD+b+h+yaH/_drug pa la/_ni shaH/_ni shoH/_ni sh+daM_bdun pa'i ngi dang os la/_ni shi/_ni shoH/_ni sha/
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]su/_sha Sha/_Sha Da/_Da las sa la b+huTa'o/_/zhes pas/_b+hu Ta A ga ma/_khar la ca ra'o zhes pas/_b+ha ta/_Da Ta/_ni ta/_mAMs pr-i ta nA rnams kyang rnam dbye thams cad gnas pa'i ming can rnams la ra mA dang 'dra/_shas nas bzung 'dam ka can te/_'grel par mAM sa pr-i ta nA 
[\[55b.2\]]sA nu rnams kyi mAMs_pr-i ta_snu rnams su yang na'o zhes byung bas/_rnam dbye shas sogs pa rol la/_mA sa/_ne/_mAMs/_pr-i ta nI/_ni/_pr-i ta/_sA nu ni/_snu rnams su yar na 'gyur ro/_/shas la/_mAM saH/_TA la/_mAM sA/_b+h+yAM b+his gnyis la/_yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' 
[\[55b.3\]]dbyi'o zhes pas sa phyis/_mAM b+h+yAM/_mAM b+hiH/_sogs so/_de bzhin du/_pr-i taH/_pr-i tA/_pr-i b+h+yIH/_sogs so/_snu ni 'chad 'gyur b+he nu dang 'dra'o/_/bi shwa pA dang /_go pA sogs ra mA dang 'dra'o/_/de rnams kyis bud med du brjod pa A ring mtha' can gyi bya ba rnams 
[\[55b.4\]]bstan zin to/_!_/da ni mo rtags i thung mtha' can gyi bya ba rnams bshad par bya ste/_ma ti/_su/_ma tiH/_ma ti pa/_au/_dang po dag gi zhes pas/_ma tI/_ma ti dzas/_sna tshogs 'thung ma/_ba lang skyong ma/_dzas la'ang ngos/_ma ta ya/_ma ti/_a ma/_aM la snga ma zhes pas/_ma tiM/_au la/
[\[55b.5\]]ma tI/_ma ti/_shas dang po dag gi mdos/_matIH/_ma ti/_TA/_'dir bud med_blo gros_kyi rtags yin pas TA nar mi 'gyur/_ma t+yA/_ma ti b+h+yAM/_ma ti b+hiH/_ma ti la/_de/_ngi ti hra swa sh+tsa/_da 'gro ba la thung ngu'i yang na'o/_/bud med du brjod pa'i i u thung ngu rnams dang /
[\[55b.6\]]i ya u wa thob ba'i I ring U ring rnams kyang rnam dbye nga 'gro ba rnams pha rol pa na dI'i ming can gyi cho ga rnams yang na bar bya ste/_A na_d+yaH/_na dI las A Ta'o/_/bud med kyi rtags na dI'i ming can las rnam dbye nga 'gro pa rnams la A Ta A ga ma ster ro/_/ma ti la yang na bar byas bas/
[\[55b.7\]]ma t+yai/_ma ta ye/_ma ti b+h+yAM/_ma ti b+h+yaH/_lnga ba'i nga si la 'dam ka/_mat+yAH/_ma teH/_ma ti b+h+yAM/_ma ti b+h+yaH/_drug pa la'ang /_ma t+yAH/_ma teH/_ma d+yoH/_ma tI nAM/_ngi la/_mat+yAM/_ma tau/_ma t+yoH/_ma ti Shu/_bod tshig_/he ma te/_he ma tI/_he ma ta yaH/_shru ti/_thos pa/_smr-i te/_dran pa/
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]pud+d+hi rnams kyang 'di dang 'dra'o/_/tri la dzas/_tri tsha tu roHs+t+ri yaM ti sr-i tsa ta sr-i/_tri tsa tur dag gi bud med la ti sr-i tsa ta sr-i dag go/_/gsum gyi skad dod tri dang /_bzhi'i skad dod tsa tur gnyis ni mo rtags kyi skabs rnam dbye pha rol la tri ni/_ti sr-i dang /_tsa tur ni/_tsa ta sr-i zhes 
[\[56a.2\]]par 'gyur ro/_blo/_ti sr-i/_dzas/_tsa ta sr-i/_dzas/_a tsir r-i taH/_r-i ta kyi a tsa la ra'o/_/ti sr-i tsa ta sr-i zhes r-i ta mtha' 'gyur pa'i r-i ta de rnam dbye a tsa thog ma can rnams lar srog med du 'gyur ro/_/ti sraH/_tsa ta sraH/_sha sa la/_ti sraH/_tsa ta sraH/_ti sr-i b+h-iH/_tsa ta sr-i b+hiH/_bzhi pa lnga pa 
[\[56a.3\]]gnyis la/_ti sri b+h+yaH/_tsa ta sr-i b+h+yaH/_drug pa'i A ma la/_ra a tsa zhes pa'i mdos/_nuT/_na ti sr-i tsa ta sr-i/_ti sr-i tsa ta sr-i dag lam yin no/_/spyir btang nAM la rtags mtha' ring po thob kyang dmigs bsal ti sr-i dang /_tsa ta sr-i dag nAM pha rol la ring por 'gyur pa ma yin te/_ti sr-i NAM/_tsa ta 
[\[56a.4\]]sr-i NAM/_bdun pa la/_ti sr-i Shu/_tsa ta sr-i Shu/_bod tshig la/_he ti sraH/_he tsa ta sraH/_pri ya tri zhes pa lta bu ming thog ma can la tri/_tri sr-i zhes par mi 'gyur la/_rnam dbye yang mang tshig tu ma zad thams cad 'jug ste/_cho ga yang skyes pa'i rtags ha ri'i skabs su bshad pa dang 
[\[56a.5\]]'dra la/_TA dang shas nang mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du/_pri ya tsa tur zhesapa yang /_dga' ba gsum/_tsa ta srir mi 'gyur te/_dper brjod rgyas pa 'og tu 'byung ngo /_yang skabs 'gar ming dang po can la yang /_ti sr-i/_tsa ta sr-i/_zhes par 'gyur pa'ang srid do/_/zhes 'grel par 
[\[56a.6\]]bshad do/_/dwi'i sgra la/_tad sogs kyi rnam dbye la a/_dga' ba bzhi/_a la bud med du brjod pa'i TA pa sbyar bas dwA zhes grub/_de la rnam dbye rnams kyi gnyis tshig rnams byin/_ramA ltar bsgrubs pas/_au gnyis la/_dwe/_b+h+yAM gsum la/_dwA b+h+yAM/_o sa gnyis la/_dwa yoH/_de yan 
[\[56a.7\]]gyis bud med kyi rtags i thung mtha' can rnams kyi bya ba bshad zin to/_!_/da ni mo rtags I ring gi cho ga rnams ston par bya ste/_gau rIl/_su/_hal bI zhes par su phyis/_gau rI/_au dang /_dza sa la/_gau r+Y+Yau/_gaur+Y+YaH/_yU s+b+h+yA khyau na dAM/_I U bud med brjod pa dag na dI'o/_I ring dang 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]U ring bud med du brjod pa rnams na dwi'i ming can zhes bya'o/_/gau rI la/_saM bu d+d+hi su/_am+bA'i don rnams kyi thung ngu'o zhes pas rtags mtha' thung ngur 'gyur/_eng thung ngu /_zhes bas saM bu d+d+hi phyis/_he gau ri/_he gaur+Y+YaH/_gau rI la/_am/_aM la snga ma 'os/_gau rIM/_au la/_gaur+Y+Yau/_shas la/_/
[\[56b.2\]]dang po dag gi zhes pas/_gaurIH/_gsum pa rnams_dkar mo/_la/_gaur+YA/_gaurIb+h+yAM/_gau rI b+hiH/_bzhi pa'i de la/_na dI las a+wa Ta'o zhes pas/_a+waT_a+wa gam/_gaur+Y+Yai/_b+h+yAM b+h+yas la/_gaurI b+h+yAM/_gau rI b+h+yaH/_nga si la/_gaur+Y+YAH/_b+h+yAM b+h+yaHla/_gau rI b+h+yAM/_gau rI b+h+yaH/_ngas la yang /_gaur+YAH/
[\[56b.3\]]o sa la/_gau r+YoH/_AM la/_thung du dwi zhes pas/_nuT/_gau rI NAM/_ngi la/_gaur+YAM/_os la/_gaur+YoH/_su pa la/_gau rI Shu/_bA nI/_na dI la sogs mang po zhig 'di dang 'dra'o/_/la k+Sh+mI zhes/_dI pa kyi rjes ma yin pas/_su mi dbyi ba ste/_lak+Sh+mIH/_gzhan ma rnams gau rI 
[\[56b.4\]]dang 'dra'o/_/tA rI dang /_ta n+tI yang /_lak+Sh+mI dang 'dra'o/_/s+t+rI zhes pa'i sgra la su/_su phyis/_s+t+ri/_s+t+rA+e/_au/_s+t+rI yAH/_s+t+rI'a'o/_/rgyun can ta chu bo/_rnam dbye a tsa dang po can rnams la s+t+rI zhes_dpal mo/_pa'i rtags kyi I yar 'gyur te/_s+t+ri yau/_sa la/_sti yaH/_bod tshig la/
[\[56b.5\]]he stA+e/_he stA+e yau/_sgrol ma/_he ste yaH/_s+t+rI ya am/_bud med/_bA mA soH/_am shas dag la yang na'o/_/rnam dbye gnyis pa'i gcig tshig am dang mang tshig shas dag pha rol la s+t+rI'i i yar yang na 'gyur te/_s+t+ri yaM/_yang na am la snga ma 'os/_s+t+rIM/_aul/_s+t+ri yau/_shas/
[\[56b.6\]]bshad ma thag pa'i mdos/_s+t+ri yaH/_yang na dang po dag gi zhes pas/_s+t+riH/_gsum pa la/_s+t+ri yA/_s+t+rI b+h+yAM/_s+t+rI b+hiH/_nge la/_AT dang /_i ya/_s+t+ri yai/_s+t+rI b+h+yAm/_s+t+rI b+h+yaH/_lnga pa la/_s+t+rI yAH/_s+t+rI b+h+yA ma/_s+t+rI b+h+yaH/_drug pa la/_s+t+ri yAH/_s+t+ri yoH/_s+t+rA NAM/_bdun 
[\[56b.7\]]pa la/_s+t+ri yAM/_s+t+ri yoH/_s+t+rI Shu/_shI/_dpal mo/_la su shrIH/_shrI la/_au dang dzas/_a tsa la sh+nu byings b+hU rnams kyi zhes pa'i mdos i ya/_shri yau/_shri yaH/_shrI las du d+d+hi byin/_shrI/_su/_ne ya du wang s+thA nA wa s+t+rI/_s+t+rI ma yen pa'i i ya u wa gnas pa dag ma yin no/_/
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]s+t+rI ma yin pa zhes s+t+rI'i sgra ni i ya u war 'gyur yang na dI'i ming can yin la/_s+t+rI ma yin pa i ya u wa gnas pa ste/_i yar 'gyur pa dang U u war 'gyur pa rnams bud med du brjod pa'i skabs 'dir yang na na dI'i ming can ma yin te/_skabs 'dir shrI yang /_na pI'i 
[\[57a.2\]]ming can ma yin bas saM bud+d+hi dbyi ba dang rtags thung ngur 'gyur pa sogs mi byed/_he shrIH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_shri yaM/_shri yau/_shri yaH/_gsum pa la/_shri yA/_shrA b+h+yAM/_shrAb+hiH/_shrI la/_nge /_spyir btang i ya u wa thob pa rnams bud med du brjod pa'i 
[\[57a.3\]]skabs na dI'i ming can ma yin no zhes bkag kyang dmigs bsal/_nga 'gro ba la thung ngu'i yang na'o zhes pa'i 'grel par/_I U dag kyang yang na par bshad pas/_rnam dbye nga 'gro ba'i ming can rnams lan dI'i ming can gyi bya ba ltar A Ta ster ba dang i ya u war 'gyur pa gnyis ka thob 
[\[57a.4\]]bas/_shri ye/_shri yai/_b+h+ya ma b+h+yaHla/_shrI b+h+yAM/_shrI b+h+yaH/_lnga pa'i nga sil/_shri yaH/_shri yAH/_b+h+yA ma b+h+yaHla/_shrIb+h+yAM/_shrI b+h+yaH/_drug ba'i ngas la/_shri yaH/_shri yAH/_o sa la/_shri yoH/_shrI la/_A ma/_bA mi/_Am la yang na'o/_/i ya u wa thob pa rnams rnam dbye 
[\[57a.5\]]drug pa'i A ma pha rol la na dI'i ming can yang na'o/_shri yAM/_na dI'i ming can ltar na/_thung du ni dI'i zhes bas/_nuT/_shrI NAM/_bdun pa'i ngi la/_shri yAM/_shri yi/_o sa dang sub la/_shri yoH/_shrI Shu/_sud+d+hi la sogs pa yang 'di dang 'dra'o/_/pra d+hI zhes pa'i sgra mo rtags la 
[\[57a.6\]]yang chog thams cad skyes pa'i skabs su bshad pa dang khyad par med do/_/de rnams kyis bud med kyi rtags las I ring mtha' can gyi bya ba rnams bstan zin to/_!_/da ni mo rtags u thung mtha' can rnams/_blo bzang ma/_brjod par bya ste/_d+he nu la/_su/_blo bar ma/_d+he nuH/_au la/_dang po 
[\[57a.7\]]dag gi zhes pas/_d+he nU/_d+hi nu/_dzas/_dzas la 'ang ngos/_d+he na baH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_d+he nu/_a ma/_a ma la snga ma zhes bas/_d+henuM/_d+henu/_au/_d+ha nU/_d+he nu/_shas/_dang po dag gi mdos/_ng+he nUH/_gsum pa rnams la/_'jo ma/_d+he nu TA/_TA nAr mi 'gyur/_d+he nA/_d+he nu b+h+yAM/
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]d+he nu b+hiH/_bzhi pa la/_d+he nu/_nge/_nga 'gro ba la thung ngu'i yang na 'os/_d+he n+wai/_d+he na wai/_d+he nu b+h+yAM/_d+he nu b+h+yaH/_lnga pa'i nga sil/_d+he nAH/_d+he noH/_b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa'i ngas la/_d+hen+wAH/_d+he noH/_os la/_d+hen+woH/_A ma le/_d+he nU nAM/_bdun pa'i ngi la/_ng+he nAM/_ng+he nAM/_ng+he nau/_os 
[\[57b.2\]]laT/_ng+he n+woH_ng+he nuShu/_bod tshig rnams la/_he d+he no/_he d+he nA/_he d+he na wa rnams grub ste a tsa mi gcig pa'i 'gyur khyad phran tsam ma gtogs gong du bshad pa ma te'i skabs dang 'dra'o/_/ta nu la sogs pa yang 'di dang 'dra'o/_u thung mtha' can kreSh+Tu la bshad ma thag pa 
[\[57b.3\]]dang bya ba mi 'dra ste/_s+t+ri yAM tsa/_bud med la'ang ngo /_/kroSh+Tu'i sgra ni bud med kyi rtags la tr-i tsa bzhin ri mthar 'gyur pas/_kroSh+T+r-i 'gyur/_r-in+ni b+h+yo dI pa/_r-i ta na rnams las dI pa'o/_/sus phra ma/_rtags R-i ta mtha' can rnams dang nam mtha' can rnams la bud med du bsgrub pa'i rkyen dI pa 
[\[57b.4\]]'gyur te/_dI pa byin/_kroSh+T+rA zhes par 'gyur ro/_ce sbyang mo/_cho ga thams cad sngar mo rtags I ring skabs su bshad pa'i gau rA+e dang 'dra'o/_/de rnams kyis u thung mtha' can mo rtags kyi cho ga bstan zin to/_!_/da ni mo rtags A ring mtha' can rnams kyi bya ba brjod par bya ste/_bad+hU/_su/
[\[57b.5\]]bad+hUH/_au dang /_dzas/_bad+h+wau/_bid+h+waH/_bad+hU la/_saM bu d+d+hi/_su/_am+bA'i don na dI rnams kyi thung du 'os/_rtags mtha' thung ngur 'gyur/_eng thung ngu zhes pas su phyes/_he ba d+hu/_he ba d+h+wo/_he ba d+hA+oH/_bad+hU la/_am la sngon ma'i 'os/_bad+hUM/_au la/_bad+hA+au/_shas la/_dang po_mna' ma/
[\[57b.6\]]dag gis mdos/_bad+hUH/_gsum pa rnams la/_bad+hA/_bad+hU b+h+yA ma/_bad+hU b+hiH/_de la/_bad+h+wai/_bad+hU b+h+yAM/_bad+hU b+h+yaH/_ngas la/_bad+h+wAH/_b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/_ngas la yang /_bad+hAH/_o sa la/_bad+h+wA+oH/_a+wa ma la/_thung ngu na dI zhes pas nuT/_bad+hU nAM/_bil/_bad+h+wAM/_o sa la/_bad+hA+oH/_su ba 
[\[57b.7\]]la/_bad+hU Shu rnams grub ste gau rI'i skabs dang 'dra'o/_/de bzhin du/_g.yo ma/_tsamU la sogs pa rnams kyang 'di dang 'dra'o/_/gsal bar brjod ma/_b+h+rU zhes pa'i sgra 'di bya ba thams cad shrI'i skabs dang 'dra/_saM bud+d+hi la thung ngur byed pa 'dam ka yin pas/_he b+h+ru/_he b+h+rUH/
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]pun r+b+hU zhes pa gzhan cho ga thams cad bad+hU dang 'dra/_drug pa'i A ma la/_e kA dzu t+tar pa de NaH/_rjes ma'i tshig a tsa gcig pa la Na'o/_/rnam dbye tshig sdud kyis bsdus pa'i ming snga mar Sha' mar lta bu na Nar 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can yod na de'i rjes ma'i tshig a tsa gcig 
[\[58a.2\]]pa ste dbyangs gcig las slar yang 'byung ma/_med pa dper na yod kyang na Nar 'gyur ro/_/bu na r+b+hU NAM lta bu'o/_/bar+ShA b+hUH/_o dang /_dzas_bar+ShA b+hA sh+tsa/_bar+ShA b+hU zhes pa'i sgra ni rnam dbye dbyangs thog ma can gang mthong yang ya Nar 'gyur ro/_/bar+ShA b+hA+au/_bar+ShA b+hAH/
[\[58a.3\]]bod tshig la/_he bar+ShA b+hUH/_he bar+ShA b+hA+au/_he bar+ShA b+hAH/_rnam dbye gzhan rnams la'ang a tsa thog ma_lo dus su 'byung ngam/_can rnams la u war 'gyur/_/nga 'gro ba'i ming can rnams la A Ta ster/_he la thog ma can rnams la bya ba lhag po med do/_/swa yaM b+hU zhes pa la/_nga 'gro ba'i ming can rnams 
[\[58a.4\]]la A Ta ster/_gzhan skyes pa'i rtags kyi skabs su bshad pa dang khyad par med do/_/de rnams kyis bud med kyi rtags U ring rnams kyi cho ga bshad zin to/_!_/da ni dmigs bsal r-i ta mtha' can ni/_na Sha Ta swa srA di b+h+yaH/_swa sw-i sogs Sha Ta rnams las ma yin no/_/swa sr-i sogs 
[\[58a.5\]]Sha Ta'i ming can zhes brda chad byas bde rnams la bud med du bsgrubs pa'i rkyen dI ba dang TA pa sogs mi 'jug_/r-i ta na rnams las dI pa'o zhes spyir gtang thob kyang mdo 'dis bkag pa'o/_/Sha Ta'i ming can ni 'di rnams te/_swa sr-i/_ti sr-i/_tsa ta sr-i/_na nAM tr-i/_du hi hr-i/_ya tr-i/_mA tr-i/_bdun 
[\[58a.6\]]po 'di rnams la Sha Ta'i ming can zhes bya'o/_/swa sr-i la/_su/_r-i ta u sha nas sogs kyi mdos/_ri a nang /_saM du d+d+hi ma yin pa zhes pas u pa d+hA ring po/_ha la dI pa zhes pas su phyis/_ming mtha'i nang byi 'os/_/na phyis/_sgug mo/_gsum/_bzhi/_tsha mo/_bu zho'am/_gzhon nu ma/_ma/_swa sA/
[\[58a.7\]]au dzas/_am au rnams la skyes pa'i rtags _sgyug mo/_kyi skabs su/_d+hA tr-i la bshad ba'i cho ga dang 'dra bas/_swa sA rau/_swa sA raH/_swa sA rau/_shas dang TA nAr mi 'gyur te/_bud med kyi rtags yin pas so/_/shas la dang po dag gi zhes pa'i mdos/_swa sr-IH/_TA la/
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]swa swA/_swa sr-i b+hiH/_lhag ma rnams kyang d+hA tr-i'i skabs dang 'dra'o/_/gzhan Sha Ta'i ming can bdun po thams cad cho ga 'di kho nas rigs 'gre'o/_/de rnams kyis r-i ta mtha'i bya ba rnams bstan zin to/_!_/bud med kyi rtags o yig mtha' can skyes pa'i rtags kyi 
[\[58b.2\]]skabs su bshad pa'i go'i skabs dang 'dra/_i yig mtha' can rnams rai sgra dang 'dra/_au yig mtha' can rnams glau zhes pa'i skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra ste/_mdor na o mtha' dang ai mtha' can rnams skyes pa'i rtags kyi skabs su bshad pa'i cho ga kho na las spros pa 
[\[58b.3\]]med do/_/i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trA da dzan+ta s+t+rI ling+gA s+sa mA p+tAH/_zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las a tsa'i mtha' du da med kyi rtags rnams rdzogs so//_//de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su 
[\[58b.4\]]bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya bas/_a tsa' mtha' can bud med kyi rtags rnams kyi cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas par rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so//_//da ni a tsa'i mtha' can ma nang gi rtags rnams bshad par bya ste/_spyir btang a thung mtha' 
[\[58b.5\]]can dz+nyAn zhes pa'i sgra la dper brjod bya ste/_dz+nyA na/_su/_a to \u0f85 mra/_a ta la sa a ma'o/_/ma ning a thung gi mtha'i pha rol du rnam dbye dang po'i su dang gnyis pa'i am ni am du 'gyur ro/_/su/_am/_am la snga ma'o zhes pas/_dz+nyA naM/_dz+nyA na/_au/_na puMs kAts+tsa/_ma ning 
[\[58b.6\]]la'ang ngo /_/ma ning gi rtags las rnam dbye _ye shes/_dang po'i au dang gnyis pa'i au ni shI zhes par 'gyur la de la b+ha'i ming can zhes brda chad do/_/au shI/_ya s+ye ti tsa/_gang gi i ta la'ang ngo /_/I yig b+ha'i ming can dang de phan gyi rkyen rnams la rtags mtha'i a yig dang i 
[\[58b.7\]]yig dbyi'o zhes pas spyir btang a dbyir thob kyang dmigs bsal 'grel par gzhan nas lung drangs te/_au shIr 'gyur pa la a dbyi ba ma yin no/_/zhes pa byung bas a mi dbyi mtshams sbyar/_dz+nyA ni/_dz+nyA na la/_dzas/_dzash+sha soHshiH/_dzas shas dag gi shi'o/_/ma ning gi 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]rtags las pha rol rnam dbye dang po'i dzas dang gnyis pa'i shas ni zhes par 'gyur ro/_/shis rbanA mas+thA naM/_shi thams cad gnas pa'i ming can no/_/dzas dang shas shi zhes par 'gyur pa de la thams can gnas pa'i ming can zhes ming 'dogs byed do/_/na puMs ka s+ya 
[\[59a.2\]]dz+ha la tsa/_ma ning gi dz+ha la a tsa'i 'o/_/ma ning gi rtags dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams dang a tsa'i mtha' las thams cad gnas pa'i ming can pha rol la nu ma A ga ma ster ro/_/u brjod don/_ma ni ma 'gro ba a tsa'i mtha' la pha rol zhes pa'i don/_saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa'i thams cad gnas 
[\[59a.3\]]pa'i ming can la yang ngo zhes pas/_u pad+hA ring por bsgyur/_dz+nyA nA ni/_gnyis pa rnams la'ang sgrub tshul dang gzugs gnyis ka 'dra bas/_dz+nyA naM/_dz+nyA ni/_dz+nyA nA ni/_saM bu d+d+hi la/_eng thung ngu zhes saM bud+d+hi phyis/_he dz+nyA na/_he dz+nyA nA ni/_rnam dbye lhag ma thams cad skyes pa'i 
[\[59a.4\]]rtags kyi skabs su bshad pa'i rA ma'i skabs dang 'dra'o/_de bzhin du/_ng+han/_ban/_phal/_la sogs mang po zhig 'di 'dra'o/_ka tar sogs la su dang a ma la byang mi 'dra ste/_aD+ha ta rA di b+h+yaHpany+tsa b+h+yaH/_Da ta ra sogs lnga rnams las a daDa'o/_/ma ning gi rtags kyi 
[\[59a.5\]]skabs su Da ta ra'i mtha' can/_ka ta ra dang /_ka ta ma/_a n+ya ta ra/_a n+ya tam/_nor/_nags/_'bras bu/_i ta ra ste lnga po'i pha rol gyi rnam dbye dang po'i su dang gnyis pa'i am ni/_a da Da zhes par 'gyur ro/_/ka ta ra/_a da Da zhes pa byung /_TeH/_Ti'i'o/_rkyen Da 'gro ba pha rol la rtags 
[\[59a.6\]]sogs kyi Ti dbyi bar bya ste/_Ti phyis/_drangs/_ka ta rang /_bA wa sA ne/_gnas med pa la yang na'o/_/gnas med pa ste tshig mtha' ha la a tsa med pa de dz+ha la so sor bsdu pa'i yi ge yin na rang dang gnas mthun pa'i tsar so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams su yang na 'gyur te/_ka ta ra ta/_ka ta 
[\[59a.7\]]ra da/_au dang dzas la/_ka ta re/_ka ta rA Ni/_bod tshig kyang rnam dbye dang po 'dra bas/_he ka ta ra da/_he ka ta ra ta/_he ka ta re/_he ka ta rA Ni/_gnyis pa rnams la'ang /_ka ta ra da/_ka ta ra da/_ka ta re/_ka ta rA Ni/_rnam dbye lhag ma rnams skyes pa'i skabs su bshad pa'i 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]sarba'i rtags dang 'dra/_de bzhin du/_ka ta ma/_a n+ya ta ra/_a n+ya ta ma/_ita ra sogs kyang 'di dang 'dra'o/_/a dzar/_zhes pa'i rtags la a tsa thog ma can rnams la sngar bshad pa'i mdos/_a dza ras/_zhes par 'gyur pa dang mi 'gyur ba 'dam ka ste/_su la/_a dza raM/_a dza ra saM/
[\[59b.2\]]au la/_a dza ri/_a dza ra sI/_dzas la a dza ras su mi 'gyur pa'i phyogs la/_a dza rA Ni/_lugs gcig la/_a dza ra na sa/_i zhes gnas pa la/_sAM ta ma ha taHsaM yog s+ya/_sa mtha' ma ha ta dag gi yang dag par sbyor ba'i 'o/_/sa mtha' na dang yang dag sbyor ba ste brtsegs pa 
[\[59b.3\]]dang ma ha ta la num byin pa'i na lta bu'i u pa d+hA ni/_saM bu d+d+hi ma yin pa'i rnam dbye thams cad gnas pa'i ming can rnams la ring por 'gyur ro/_/adza rA n+si/_saM bu d+d+hi la/_he a dza ra/_he a dza re/_he a dza sI/_he a dza rA Ni/_he a dza rA n+si/_gnyis pa rnams dang po dang 'dra/_gsum 
[\[59b.4\]]pa rnams la/_a dza ri Na/_a dza Ra sA/_a dza rA b+h+yAM/_a dza riH/_bzhi pa la/_a dza rA ya/_a dza ra si/_a dza rA b+h+yAM/_a dza ri b+h+yaH/_lnga pa la/_a dza rA ta/_a dza rasaH/_b+h+yAM b+h+yaH'dra/_drug pa la/_a dza ra s+ya/_a dza ra saH/_a dza ra yoH/_a dza ra soH/_a dza rA NAM/_a dza ra sAM/_bdun pa 
[\[59b.5\]]la/_a dza ri/_a dza ra si/_a dza ra yoH/_a dza ra soH/_a dza ra Shu/_hr-i da ya la/_rnam dbye dang po rnams dang bod tshig rnams dang /_rnam dbye gnyis pa'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig rnams dz+nyA na'i skabs dang 'dra ste/_hr-i da yaM/_hr-i da ye/_hraM da yA ni/_he hr-i da ya/_he hr-i da ye/_he hr-i da yA nI/
[\[59b.6\]]hra da yaM/_hr-i da ye/_hr-i da ya la/_shas/_shas sogs rnams la zhes_snyig_pa'i mdos hr-i da ya/_hr-i da du 'gyur/_dzas shas dag gi shi/_ma ning gi dz+ha la a tsa'i 'os nu ma/_hr-I nI/_lugs gcig_/hr-i da yA ni/_TA la/_hr-i dA/_hr-i da ye na/_b+h+yAM la/_hr-i b+h+rAM/_hr-i da lA b+h+yAM/_b+hiHla/_hr-i d+b+hiH/
[\[59b.7\]]hr-i da yiH/_nge la/_hr-i da/_hri da yA ya/_b+h+yAM'adra/_b+h+yaHla/_hr-i ng+b+h+yaH/_hr-i da ye b+h+yaH/_nga si la/_h+y-i daH/_hr-i da yA ta/_b+h+yA ma b+h+yAH'dra/_nga sa la/_hr-i daH/_hr-i da ya s+ya/_os la/_hr-i doH/_hr-i da ya yoH/_A ma la/_hr-i dAM/_hri da yA nAM/_ngi la/_hr-i da ye/_os 'dra/_hr-i sbu/_hr-i da ye Shu/
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]u da ka la yang /_rnam dbye dang po'i su nas gnyis pa'i au Ta'i bar dz+nyA dang 'dra ste/_u da kaM/_u da ke/_u da kA ni/_he u da ka_/he u da ke/_he u da kA ni/_gnyis pa la/_u da kaM/_u da ke/_shas la/_u du kA ni/_u dA ni/_TA la/_u da ke ma/_lugs gcig la/
[\[60a.2\]]u da na du 'gyur/_chu'am 'o na/_na'i a ta nga byi 'os/_u pad+hA'i a phyis/_u d+nA/_b+h+yAM la/_u da kA b+h+yAM/_lugs gcig la/_ming mtha'i nad byi 'os na phyis/_u da b+h+yAM b+hi sa la/_u da kaiH/_u da b+hiH/_nge la/_u da ne/_u da kA ya/_b+h+yAM b+h+yas la/_u da b+h+yAM/_u da kA b+h+yA ma/_u da b+h+yaH/_u da 
[\[60a.3\]]ke b+h+yaH/_nga si la/_u d+naH/_u da kA ta/_b+h+yAM b+h+yaH'dra/_nga sa la/_u d+naH/_u da ka s+ya/_o sa la/_u ng+noH/_u da ka yoH/_A ma la/_u d+nAM/_u da kA nAM/_ngi la/_u d+ni/_u da ke/_o sa 'dra/_su ba la/_u da su/_u da ke Shu/_A sa nas yang dang po sogs 'dra ste/_A sa naM/
[\[60a.4\]]A sa ne/_A sa nA ni/_he A sa na/_he A sa ne/_he A sa nA ni/_he A sa nA ni/_gnyis pa la/_A sa ni/_A sa ne/_sha sa la/_A sA ni/_A sa nA ni/_DA la/_A snA/_A sa ne na/_b+h+yAM la/_A sa b+h+yAM/_A sa nA b+h+yAM/_lhag ma rnams kyang lugs gnyis _gdag_ka u da ka dang 'dra'o/_mgo_/shIr+Sha zhes 
[\[60a.5\]]pa la yang dang po lnga dz+nyA na dang 'dra/_shIr+ShaM/_shIr+ShA+e/_shIr+ShA Ni/_he shIr+Sha/_he shIr+She/_he shIr+ShA Ni/_a ma la/_shIr+ShaM/_au la/_shIr+She/_sha sa la/_shIr+ShA Ni/_'grel par gzhan sa lung drangs pa/_DA sogs la shIr+Sha'i shIr+Sha na yang na'o/_/shIr+Sha zhes pa'i rtags ni rnam dbye gsum 
[\[60a.6\]]pa'i TA nas brtsams te bdun pa'i sub kyi bar gang mthong yang shIr+Sha na zhes par yang na 'gyur bas/_TA la/_shIr+She Na/_shIr+Sha na du bsgyur na/_na'i a ta dbyi 'os/_a phyis/_Sha ra sogs kyis na Na/_shIr+ShA/_b+h+yAM la/_shI r+ShA b+h+yAM/_lugs gcig la/_ming mtha'i na dbyi 'os/_na phyis/_shIr+Sha 
[\[60a.7\]]b+h+yAM/_b+haMs la/_shIr+ShaiH/_shIr+Sha b+hiH/_de la/_shIr+ShA ya/_b+h+yA ma 'dra/_b+h+yas la/_shIr+She b+h+yaH/_shIr+Sha b+h+yaH/_nga si la/_shI r+ShA ta/_shIr+ShA ta/_shIr+ShAH/_b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'dra/_ngas la/_shIr+Sha s+ya/_shIr+ShAH/_o sa la/_shIr+Sha yoH/_shI r+ShA+oH/_A ma la/_shIr+ShA NAM/_shI r+ShAM/_ngi la/_shIr+She/_shI r+ShI/
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]os ra dra_/su pa la/_shIr+She Shu/_shIr+Sha su/_hra sron puMs ke pru ti pa di ka s+ya/_ma ning las ming gi thung ngu'o/_rtags mtha' a tsa ring po rnams ni ma ning gi rtags kyi skabs su thung ngur 'gyur te/_dper na/_shI pA zhes pa A ring mtha' can yin kyang bshad ma thag pa'i mdos thung ngur 'gyur/
[\[60b.2\]]shA+e paM/_shA+e pe_shrI pA ni lta bu ste A ring thams cad a thung ngu 'gyur te/_rnam dbye dang phrad pa'i bya ba thams cad a thung mtha' can spyir btang dz+nyA na'i skabs su bshad dang 'dra'o/_de rnams kyis _dpal spyod/_ma ning gi rtags las A ring a thung gi bya ba rnams bshad zin to/_!_/da ni 
[\[60b.3\]]ma ning gi rtags i ring thung gi mtha' can rnams bshad par bya ste/_bA ri/_la/_su/_swa mo rna puMs kAng /_ma ning las su a ma dag gi'o/_ma ning gi rtags las rnam dbye dang po'i su dang gnyis pa'i a ma ni 'jig go/_/zhes pas su 'jig_pA ri/_pA ri la/_au/_ma ning la 
[\[60b.4\]]'ang ngos au shI/_i ko tsi bi b+ha k+tau/_rnam dbye a tsa la i ka gi 'o/_chu/_ma ning gi rtags i ka so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yong la rnam dbye a ca thog ma can byung na nu ma A ga ma ster ro/_/bA ri NI/_dzas la/_dzas shas dag gi shi/_rnam dbye a tsa la zhes pas nu ma/_sam+bu d+b+hi ma yin pa'i zhes 
[\[60b.5\]]pas u pad+hA ring po/_bA rI Ni/_saM bu d+b+hi la/_thung ngu'i yon tan no zhes dang /_thung ngu dang eng zhes pas saM bud+d+hi phyis/_he bA re/_he bA ri NI/_he bA rI Ni/_rnam dbye gnyis pa rnams dang po dang 'dra/_TA la/_bAri NA/_b+h+yAM la/_bA ri b+d+hAM/_b+hiHla/_bA ri b+hiH/_nge la/_bA ri Ne/_b+h+yAM 'dra/
[\[60b.6\]]b+h+yas la/_bA re b+h+yaH/_nga si la/_bA ri NaH/_b+h+yAM b+h+yaH'dra/_nga sa la/_bA ri NaH/_os la/_bA re NoH/_bA rA+e NA/_ngi la/_bA ri Ni/_os 'dra/_su pa la/_bA ri Shu/_a nA di zhes pa'ang rnam dbye TA yan chad bA ri dang 'dra ste/_dang po rnams la/_a nA de/_a nA de nI/_a nA dI ni/_bong 
[\[60b.7\]]tshig la/_he a nA de/_he a nA di nI/_he a nA dI ni/_gnyis pa rnams kyang dang po dang 'dra/_anA di/_TA/_tr-i tI yA di Shu b+hA Shi ta puM skaM puM bang+gAl wa s+ya/_gsum pa sogs rnams la skyes pa bzhin ga la wa'i'o/_/rtags i ka so sor bsdu ba'i mtha' can las pha rol 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]rnam dbye gsum pa'i TA nas bdun pa'i sub kyi bar gyi a tsa thog ma can rnams la/_sngar skyes pa'i rtags kyi skabs su bshad pa'i cho ga rnams dang /_mi ning gi rang lugs ltar a tsa thog ma can rnams la num ster ba sngon gyi drang srong ga la ba'i lugs so/_/a nA di nA ste lugs gnyis ka 
[\[61a.2\]]gzugs 'dra/_skyes pa ltar na TA nA/_ma ning rang lugs ltar na nu ma byin drangs pa'o/_b+h+yAM b+he sa la/_a nA di b+h+yAM/_a nA di b+hiH/_nge la/_a nA da ye/_a nA di ne/_b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'ad/_nga si la/_a nA deH/_a nA di naH/_b+h+yAM b+ha sa 'dra/_nga sa la/_a nA deH/_a nA da naH/_o sa la/_a nA 
[\[61a.3\]]d+yoH/_a nA di noH/_A ma la/_a nA dI nAM/_a nA dI nAM/_ngi la/_a nA di ni/_o sa 'dra/_a nA di Shu/_a s+thi/_au la/_a s+thi nI/_dza sa la/_a s+thI ni/_bod tshig la/_he la s+the/_he a s+thi nI/_he a s+thI ni/_he a s+thI ni/_gnyis pa rnams kyang 'dra/_a s+thi da b+hi sha k+th+yA k+ShAM ma na du dA t+taH/
[\[61a.4\]]a s+thi da b+hi sha ha k+thi a k+Shi rnams kyi a nang u dA t+ta'o/_/ma ning gi rtags a s+thi sogs kyi rnam dbye TA sogs a tsa _rus ba/_thog ma can rnams la rtags mtha' a nang du 'gyur la de la u dA t+ta zer ro/_/a s+thi TA/_rtags mtha' a nang du 'gyur/_na'i a ta dbyi 'os/_a phyis/_/sa s+th+mA/_b+h+yAM 
[\[61a.5\]]b+hiHla/_a s+thi b+h+yAM/_a s+thi b+hiH/_nge la/_a s+b+ne/_b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/_nga si la/_a s+th+naH/_b+h+yAM b+h+yaH'dra/_nga sa la/_a s+th+naH/_o sa la/_a s+th+noH/_A ma la/_a s+th+naM/_yang na ngi shI dag la 'dam ka'o/_/zhes pas a s+tha ni/_os 'dra/_su pa la/_as+thidaShu/_dad+hi/_shak+thi 
[\[61a.6\]]ak+Shi rnams kyang 'di dang 'dra'o/_/'grel par/_pri ya da b+h+yA brA h+ma Ne na/_pri ya shak+Sh+nA shu ri Na/_pri yA k+Sh+NA sa rbe Na/_pri yA s+th+nA shu nA zhes pa byung ste/_TA byin pa'i gzugs so/_sung+hI zhes pa la'ang ma ning las ming gi thung ngu'o zhes pas rtags mtha' thung ngur 'gyur/_su phyis/_zho/_nus 
[\[61a.7\]]mig_/sung+hi/_au la/_su ng+hi nI/_dza sa la/_bram ze dga' ba'o/_dmangs rigs kyi dga' ba nus pa/_thams cad kyi dga' ba mig_/khyi'i dga' ba rus pa/_sud+hI ni/_bod tshig rnams la/_he su d+hi/_blo bzang /_he su d+he/_he su d+hi nI/_he su d+hI ni/_gnyis pa rnams dang po dang 'dra/_su d+hi TA/_gsum pa sogs 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]la zhes pas/_ma ning rang lugs ltar na num byin/_su d+hi nA/_skyes pa'i lugs ltar la rtags mtha' thung ngur mi 'gyur/_a tsa la/_zhes pas i yar 'gyur/_su b+hi yA/_su d+hi b+h+yAM/_su d+hi b+hiH/_nge la/_su d+hi ne/_su d+hi ye/_b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/_nga si la/_su d+hi naH/_su d+hi naH/_su d+hi yaH/_baM b+h+yaH'dra/
[\[61b.2\]]ngas la/_su d+hi yaH/_os la/_su d+hi noH/_sud+hi yoH/_A ma la/_su d+hi nI/_su d+hi yAM/_ngi la/_su d+hi yi/_os 'dra/_su pa la/_su d+hi Shu/_pra d+hI la sogs pa yang 'di dang 'dra'o/_/de rnams kyis ma ning gi rtags i ring thung rnams kyi cho ga bstan zin 
[\[61b.3\]]to/_!_da ni ma ning gi rtags u mtha' can rnams bshad par bya sta/_mad+hu su/_ma ning la su aM 'jig_/ma d+hu/_au shI/_num/_mad+hu nI/_dza sa shi nu ma/_u pa d+hA ring po/_mad+hU ni/_he ma d+hu/_he ma d+ho/_he ma d+hU ni/_gnyis pa rnams dang po dang 'dra/_TA la num/
