[\[61b.4\]]ma d+hu nA/_ma d+hu b+h+yAM/_ma b+hu b+hiH/_nge la/_ma d+hu ne/_b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/_nga si la/_sbrang rtsi/_mad+hu naH/_b+h+yAM b+h+yaH'dra/_nga sa la/_ma d+hu naH/_o sa la/_ma d+hu noH/_A ma la/_ma d+hU nAM/_nge la/_mad+hu ni/_os 'dra/_mad+hu Shu/_am+bu yang 'di dang 'dra'/_/su lU/_zhes pa'ang rtags mtha' thung 
[\[61b.5\]]ngur 'gyur/_rnam dbye dang po rnams la/_su 'u/_su lu nI/_su lU ni/_he su lu/_he su lo/_/he su lu nI/_he su lU ni/_gnyis pa rnams dang po dang 'dra/_TA la/_ma ning rang lugs ltar na/_nu ma/_su lu nA/_skyes pa'i lugs ltar na_legs gcod/_rtags mtha' thung ngur mi 
[\[61b.6\]]'gyur/_ig gi a tsa la ya Na/_su lwA/_su lu b+h+yAM/_su lu b+h+yAMH/_nge la/_su lu ne/_su lwe/_b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_su lu naH/_su lwa naH/_b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/_nga sa la/_su lu naH/_su lwaH/_os la/_su lu noH/_su lwoH/_A ma la/_su lU nI/_su lwAM/_ngi la/_su lu ni/
[\[61b.7\]]su lwi/_os 'dra/_su lu Shu/_si lU yang 'di dang 'dra'o/_/kroSh+Tu la/_su/_ma ni da la su am 'jig_/pri ya kro Sh+Tu/_au shI/_pri ya kroSh+Tu nI/_dzas she/_pri ya kroSh+TU ni/_saM bu d+d+hi/_he pri ya kroSh+Tu/_he priya kroSh+To/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig 'dra/_gnyis pa dang po dang 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]'dra/_TA la/_ma ning rang lugs ltar na/_nu ma/_pri ya kroSh+Tu nA/_skyes pa'i lugs ltar na rtags mtha' r-ir 'gyur/_i ka gi a tsa la yaN/_pri ya kroSh+Tu/_pri ya kroSh+Tu b+h+yAM/_pri ya kroSh+Tu b+hiH/_nge la/_pri ya kroSh+Tu ne/_pri ya kroSh+Tu/_b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/_nga si la/
[\[62a.2\]]bri ya kroSh+Tu naH/_pri ya kroSh+TuH/_b+h+yAM b+h+yaH'dra/_ngas yang si dang 'dra/_os/_pri ya kroSh+T+ra noH/_pri ya kroSh+TuH/_A ma la/_pri ya kroSh+Tu nAM/_ngi la/_pri ya kroSh+Tu ni/_pri ya kroSh+Ta ri/_os 'dra/_pri ya kraSh+Tu Shu/_de rnams kyis u yig ring thung gi mtha' can ma ning gi rtags rnams bshad 
[\[62a.3\]]zin to/_!_/ma Ni nga r-i mtha' can ni/_dz+nyA tr-i/_su/_su am 'jig_/dz+nyA tr-i/_au ShI/_dz+nyA tr-i Ni/_bod tshig_/he dz+nyA tr-i/_he dz+nyA tri NI/_he dz+nyA trI Ni/_gnyis pa rnams kyang 'dra/_TA la/_dz+nyA tr-i NA/_dz+nyA trA/_b+h+yAM b+hiH'dra/_nge/_dz+nyA tr-i ni/_dz+nyA tri/_b+h+yAM b+h+yaH'dra/_nga si la/
[\[62a.4\]]dz+nyA tri NaH/_dz+nyA tuH/_b+h+yAM b+h+yaH'dra/_ngas/_nga si dang 'dra/_os la/_dz+nyA tri NoH/_dz+nyA troH/_AM la/_dz+nyA tr-I NAM/_ngi /_dz+nyA tr-i Ni/_dz+nyA ta ri/_os 'dra/_b+h+yA tr-i Shu/_kart-I yang 'di dang 'dra'o/_/de rnams kyis ma ning gi rtags las r-i mtha' rnams bshad zin to/_!_/da ni e tsa mtha' 
[\[62a.5\]]can ne/_bra rdo su/_e tsa i g+g+hA swA de she/_zhe ca'i i ka thung ngur kun nas bsgyur ro/_/ma ning gi rtags las e tsa so sor bsdu ba'i mtha' can rnams ni i ka so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge thung ngu rnams su 'gyur bas/_brang+hu zhes par 'gyur/_su phyis/_pra ng+hu/_pra ng+hu nI/_pra ng+hU nI/_he pra ng+hu/
[\[62a.6\]]he pra ng+hu nI/_he pra ng+hU ni/_gnyis pa rnams 'dra/_TA man chad la a ca dang po can rnams la ma ning rang lugs kyi cho ga ltar na nu ma byin/_skyes pa'i lugs ltar e tsa'i a ya a wa sogs bya ste/_pra ng+hu nA/_pra ng+ha l+l+wa/_pra ng+hu b+h+yAM/_pra ng+hu b+h+yIH/_pra ng+hu ni/_pra ng+ha we/_b+h+yA b+h+yaH'dra/_nga si la/
[\[62a.7\]]pra ng+hunaH/_pra ng+hoH/_b+h+yAM b+h+yaH'dra/_ngas yang nga si dang 'dra/_o sa la/_pra ng+hu noH/_pra ng+ha noH/_pra ng+ha woH/_A ma la/_pra ng+hU nAM/_pra ng+ha wAM/_ngi la/_pra ng+ha wi/_o sa 'dra/_pra ng+hu Shu/_nor rab/_pra ri zhes pa'ang pra ri zhes par_gru bzang po/_'gyur /_pra ri/_pra ri NI/_bra rI Ni/
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]he pra ri/_he pra ri NI/_he pra rI Ni/_gnyis pa rnams 'dra/_TA sogs la ma ning rang lugs ltar na num ster/_skyes pa'i lugs ltar na ai A yar 'gyur te/_rai zhes pa'i skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra'o/_/su no zhes pa/_su nu zhes par 'gyur/_o A ya dang o A wa'i khyad ma 
[\[62b.2\]]gtogs pra rai skabs dang 'dra'o/_/i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU tA da jan+ha na puM sa ka ling+gA ni samA p+tAH/_zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las a tsa'i mtha' can ma ning gi rtags rnams rdzogs so/_/de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po bA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don 
[\[62b.3\]]cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las a tsa'i mtha' can ma ning gi rtags rnams kyi bya ba spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so//_//da ni ha la gyi mtha' can te gsal byed mtha' can 
[\[62b.4\]]las dang por pho rtags rnams bshad bar bya'o/_/de yang dang po ha mtha' can la/_la ha zhes pa la/_ho D+haH/_ha yi D+ha'o/_dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge pha rol na yod pa'i chu rol gyi ha srog med dang tshig mtha'i ha srog med ni D+ha ru 'gyur ro/_/li ha/_su/_ha yi D+ha 'os/_ha D+ha/_ha la 
[\[62b.5\]]dI pa a+wa pa ring rnams la zhes bas/_su phyis/_gnas med pa la yang na 'os/_myong /_li Da/_li Ta/_au dang dzas la/_a tsa dman pa pha rol du rab tu sbyor ro/_/zhes pas drangs/_li hau/_li haH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_li haM/_li hau/_li haH/_TA la/_li hA/_b+h+yA la/_ha yi 
[\[62b.6\]]D+ha/_dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza rnams sos/_D+ha Da drangs/_li b+h+yAM/_b+hiH/_liD+b+hiH/_nge la/_li he/_b+h+yAMb+h+yaHla/_liMD+b+h+yA/_laD+b+h+yaH/_ngasi la/_li haH/_b+h+yAMMb+h+yaHla/_liD+b+h+yaH/_laD+b+h+yaH/_ngas la/_li haH/_A mal/_li hAM/_A ma la/_li hAM/_ngi la/_li he/_o sa la/_li hoH/
[\[62b.7\]]su pa la/_ha yi D+ha 'os ha D+ha/_khar la car 'os/_D+ha Ta drangs/_liT+su/_bod tshig rnams kyang rnam dbye dang po dang 'dra bas/_he li Ta/_heliT/_he li hau/_he li haH/_'jog_du ha zhes pa cung mi 'dra ste/_du ha/_su/_bA de r+b+hA to r+g+haH/_da snga ma'i byings kyi g+ha'o/_/da sngon na yong 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]pa'i byings kyi ha yig srog med ni/_dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge gang rung pha rol du byung ba dang tshig mtha' la yang g+ha ru 'gyur te/_ha g+ha ra 'gyur/_du g+ha/_su/_e kA tso ba sho b+haSha dz+ha ShaM ta s+ya s+d+hA+oH/_a cag gcig pa'i ba sha'i b+ha Sha dz+ha Sha mtha'i sa d+h+wa da la'o/_/
[\[63a.2\]]byings a tsa gcig pa dz+ha Sha so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge mtha' na yod pa'i snga ma'i ba sha'i yi ge rnams b+haSha so sor bsdu pa'i yi ge rang dang gnas mthun pa rnams su 'gyur la/_de yang dz+haSha'i yi ge de'i pha rol du sa yig dang d+h+wa zhes pa dang /_dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yod pa tshig mtha' yin pa 
[\[63a.3\]]zhig dgos so/_/skabs 'dir dz+haSha'i nang tshan g+ha yig gi snga ma bsha'i nang tshan da de b+ha Sha'i nang tshad ng+ha ru 'gyur/_hal/_dI pa A ba zhes pas su phyis/_gnas med pa la yang na 'os/_g+ha/_ka'am ba/_d+hu ka_/d+hu ga_/au dang dza sa la/_du hau/_du haH/_gnyis pa rnams la/
[\[63a.4\]]du haM/_du hau/_du haH/_TAl/_du hA/_b+h+yAM la/_da sngon ma'i zhes pas hag+ha/_a ca gcig pa'i zhes pas/_da ng+ha/_dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dz+ha sha 'os/_g+ha ga drangs/_d+hu g+b+h+yAM/_d+hu g+b+hiH/_bzhi pa rnams la/_du he/_d+hu s+b+h+yAM/_d+hu g+b+h+yaH/_lnga ba rnams la/_du haH/_d+hug+b+haM/_d+hu g+b+h+yaH/_drug 
[\[63a.5\]]pa rnams la/_du haH/_du hoH/_du hAM_ngi la/_du hi/_o sa la/_du hoH/_su ba la/_ha g+ha/_da d+ha/_khar la zhes pas/_g+ha ka_kun nas bsgyur pa dang zhes pas/_ga Sha/_d+hu k+Sha/_bod tshig rnams rnam dbye dang po dang 'dra/_he g+hu ka_/he dU ga_/he du hau/_he du haH/_bA dru ha mu ha 
[\[63a.6\]]snu ha sni hAM/_dru ha/_mu ha/_snu ha/_sni ha rnams kyi yang na'o/_dru ha la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi gong li ha zhes pa'i skabs ltar ha D+ha 'gyur pa dang bshad ma thag pa du ha'i skabs ltar ha g+har 'gyur ba gnyis 'dam ka can du bya ste/_dru hal/_su/_d+hU ka_/d+hU ga_/ng+hU Ta/_d+h+ru Ta/_zhes 
[\[63a.7\]]gzugs bzhi 'byung ngo /_rmongs pa/_au dang dzas la/_du hau/_dru haH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_dru haM/_dru hau/_dru haH/_TA la/_dru hA/_b+h+yAM la/_d+h+ru g+b+hUM/_d+h+ru g+b+h+yAM/_b+his la/_d+h+ru g+b+hiH/_d+h+ruD+b+hiH/_nge la/_dru he/_b+h+yA ma b+h+yaHla/_d+h+ru g+b+h+yaM/_d+h+ru g+b+h+yaM/_'a khu sa/_d+h+ru D+b+h+yaH/_nga si la/_dru haH/_b+h+yAM b+h+yaH/_'dra/
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]drug pa rnams la/_dru haH/_dru hoH/_dru hI/_ngi os la/_dru hi/_dru hoH/_su pa la/_d+h+ru T+su/_d+h+ru T+su/_saM bud+d+hi rnam dbye dang po dang 'dra/_/mu ha/_snu ha/_sni ha rnams kyang 'di dang 'dra'o/_/bi shwa wA ha la su/_bi shwa wA Da/_au dang dzas/_bi shwa wA hau/_bi shwa wA haH/
[\[63b.2\]]he bi shwa wA Ta/_he baM shwa wA Ta/_he bi shwa wA to/_he bi shwa wA haH/_a ma la/_bi shwa wA haM/_au Ta la/_bi shwa wA hau/_sha sa la/_wA ha U Tha/_wA ha'i U Tha'o/_wA ha zhes pa'i sgra 'di'i _sna tshogs thob/_wa ni rnam dbye gnyis pa'i shas nas bzung a tsa thog ma can rnams la U Tha zhes 
[\[63b.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/wa U e ti e ng+ha ti U Tha rnams la'o/_zhes pas 'phel ba/_bi shrau haH/_TA la/_bi shwau hA/_b+h+yAM b+hi sa la/_bi shwa bAD+b+h+yAM/_bi shwa bA d+b+hAMH/_nge la/_bi shwau he/_b+h+yAM b+h+yaH'dra/_nga si la/_bi shwo haH/_b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/_nga sa la/_bi shwau haH/_o sa la/_bu shwau hoH/_A ma la/
[\[63b.4\]]bu shwau hAM/_ngi la/_bu shwau hi/_bi shwau hoH/_su ba la/_bu shwa bA T+su/_b+hU wa ha yang 'di dang 'dra'o/_ha yig mtha' can a na Du ha la/_glang khyug su/_tsa tu ra na Du ho rA mu dA d+haH/_tsa tu ra a na Du ha dag gi A ma u dA t+ta'o/_/tsa tu ra dang a na Du ha dag la/_rnam dbye thams cad nas pa'i ming can 
[\[63b.5\]]rnams pha rol la A ma A gam ster te de la u dA t+ta'i ming can zhes ming 'dogs byed do/_/A ma zhes pa'i ma ni ma 'gro ba a tsa'i mtha' las pha rol zhes pa'i don no/_/a na D+wA ha/_su/_sA wa na Du haH/_a na Du ha'i su la'o/_/a na Du ha zhes pa'i rtags la rnam dbye dang po'i 
[\[63b.6\]]gcig tshig su dang saM bu ng+ng+hi'i ming can gyi su pha rol la num A ga ma 'gyur te/_nu ma byin/_ha la dI pa A pa zhes pas su phyis/_yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/_hi phyis/_a na D+wA na/_au dang dza sa la/_a na D+wA hau/_a na D+wA haH/_a na Du ha la/_saM bu d+d+hi/_a ma saM 
[\[63b.7\]]bud+d+hau/_saM bu d+d+hi la a ma'o/_a na Du ha dang tsa tur gnyis la saM bud+d+hi pha rol la a ma A ga ma ster ro/_/a na Du ha'i si la 'os nu ma/_he a na D+wa na/_he an D+wA hoM/_he a na D+wA haH/_a ma la/_a na D+wA haM/_au la/_a na D+wA hau/_sha sa la/_a na Du haH/_TA la/_a na 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]Du hA/_a na Du ha la/_b+h+yaM b+h+yas/_bsu sraM sU d+h+waM swa na D+wa hAM daH/_ba su sraM sud+h+waM su a na Du ha rnams kyi da'o/_ba su dang sraM su dang d+h+waM su dang a na Du ha rnams kyis mtha' rnams dang ha yig ni dz+hal so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge gang rung pha rol na yod pa dang tshig mtha' la da ru 'gyu ro 
[\[64a.2\]]a na Du d+d+huM/_a na Du d+d+hiH/_bzhi pa rnams la/_a na Du he/_a na Du d+b+h+yAM/_a na Du d+b+h+yaH/_lnga pa rnams la/_a na Du haH/_a na Du d+b+h+yAM/_a na Du d+b+h+yaH/_drug pa rnams la/_a na Du haH/_a na Du hoH/_a na Du hAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_a na Du hi/_a na Du hoH/_a na Du t+su/_shwe ta wA ha zhes 
[\[64a.3\]]pa cung mi 'dra ste/_'grel bar/_shwe ta wA ha/_u kla shA sa/_bu ro DA sa/_a la yA dza/_rnams la tshig mtha' ma yin pa la Da sa'i rkyen 'jug go zhes pa byung bas/_rtags de rnams la dbyangs ma yin pa'i ha la thog ma can gyi rnam dbye rnams la Da sa'i rkyen byin/_Da yig _dkar po thob pa 
[\[64a.4\]]Ti'i lo zhes pa'i don yin pas Ti phyis/_shwe ta bas su/_a twa saM ta s+ya tsA d+hA toH/_a tu a sa mtha' dbyings ma yin pa'i'o/_a tu'i mtha' dang as kyi mtha' byings ma yin pa dag saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa'i su pha rol la u pad+hA ring bor 'gyur ro/_/shwe ta bAH/_au dang dza sa la/_shwe ta 
[\[64a.5\]]bA hau/_shwe ta bA haH/_a ma la/_shwe ta bA haM/_au la/_shwi ta bA hau/_shwe ta bA ha/_shas/_shas nas bzung a ca thog ma can rnams la sngar bi shwa wA ha'i skabs su bshad pa ltar U Thar 'gyur ba dang mi 'gyur ba yang na ba ste/_shwe tau haH/_shwe ta wA haH/_TA la/_shwe tau hA/_shwe ta wA hA 
[\[64a.6\]]b+h+yAM la/_Da sa'i rkyen/_ti phyis/_sa sa ju Sha dag gi ru/_a las yon tan/_shwe ta po b+h+yAM/_b+his la/_shwe ta bo b+hiH/_nge la/_shwe ta bA he/_shwe tau he/_b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa la/_shwe ta bo b+h+yAM/_shwe ta bo b+h+yaH/_nga si la/_shwe tau haH/_shwe ta bA haH/_b+h+yAM b+h+yaH'dra/_ngas la/_shwe tau haH/_shwe ta bA haH/
[\[64a.7\]]o sa la/_shwe tau hoH/_shwe ta bA hoH/_A ma la/_shwe tau hAM/_shwe ta bA hAM/_ngi la/_shwe tau hi/_shwe ta bA hi/_os 'dra/_su pa la/_shwe ta ba s+su/_saM bu d+d+hi la/_a wa yAH/_shwe ta bAHpu ro DA sh+tsa/_a wa yA ja shwe ta bA ha bu ro DA sa rnams kyi'ang ngo /_/gong du/
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]a tu/_as mtha'i byings ma yin pa'i 'o zhes pa'i 'grel par/_saM bud+d+hi yin pa'i su pha rol la zhes pa byung yang /_a wa yA dza/_shwe ta bA ta/_pu ro DAs zhes pa 'di rnams kyi saM bu d+d+hi la u pa d+hA ring por 'gyur ro zhes pa byung bas gnyis ka 'jug pas 'dam ka can du bzung ngo /_/
[\[64b.2\]]he shwe ta bAH/_he shwe ta baH/_he shwe ta bA tau/_he shwe ya bA haH/_u k+tha shA sa/_sogs kyang shwe ta bA ha dang 'dra ste/_su la/_Das/_Ti phyis/_u pa d+hA ring po/_u k+tha shAH/_au dang dza sa la/_u k+tha shA saH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_u k+tha shA saM/_uk+tha shA sau/_u k+tha 
[\[64b.3\]]shA saH/_TA la/_u k+tha shA sA/_b+h+yAM la/_Das Ti phyis/_mtshams sbyar/_u k+tha sho b+h+yAM/_u k+tha sho b+hiH/_bzhi pa rnams la/_u k+tha shA se/_u k+tha sho b+h+yAM/_u k+tha sho b+h+yAH/_nga si la/_u k+tha shA saH/_b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_u k+tha shA saH/_u k+tha shA soH/_u k+tha shA soH/_u k+tha shA sAM/_ngi la/
[\[64b.4\]]u k+tha shA si/_os 'dra/_su pa la/_u k+tha shAHsu/_u k+tha shA s+su/_bod tshig_/he u k+tha shAH/_he u k+tha shaH/_he u k+tha shaH/_he mu k+tha shA sau/_he u k+tha shA saH/_u wa yA dza/_bu ro DA sa dag kyang 'di dang 'dra'o/_twa rA sA ha/_su/_ha'i D+ha 'os/_ha D+ha/_sa he s+sA D+ha s+saH/_sA ha'i sA D+ha'i sa'o/_/
[\[64b.5\]]sA ha zhes pa'i rtags sA D+ha zhes par 'gyur ba'i snga ma'i sa de Sha yig tu 'gyur te/_Sha sa ha la dI pa/_zhes pas su phyis/_gnas med pa la 'os D+ha Da'am/_Ta/_tA rA ShA Da/_twa rA ShA Ta/_au dang dza sa la/_brgya byin gyi rta/_twa rA sA hauH/_twa rA sA haH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_twa rA sA haM/_twa rA 
[\[64b.6\]]sA hau/_twa rA sA haH/_TA/_twa rA sA hA/_b+h+yAM b+hi sa la/_twa rA ShA D+b+h+yAM/_twa rA ShA D+b+hiH/_de la/_twa rA sA he/_b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa/_twa rA ShA D+b+h+yAM/_twa rA ShA D+b+h+yaH/_nga si la/_twa rA sA haH/_b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_twa rA sA haH/_twa rA sA hoH/_twa rA sA hAM/_ngi la/_twa rA sA hi/_os 'dra/_su pa la/
[\[64b.7\]]twa rA ShA T+su/_bod tshig la/_he twa rA ShA Ta/_he twa rA ShA Ta/_he twa rA ShA Da/_he twa rA sA ho/_he twa rA sA haH/_pa yig mtha'i can su di wa la su/_nyi ma bzang po/_di wa au ta/_di wA'i au'i/_/di wa zhes pa'i wa ni su pha rol la au ru 'gyur ro/_/su d+yauH/_au dang dza sa la/_su di wau/_su di waH/_a ma la/
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]'grel par di wa'i wa a ma la yang na a'o zhes pa byung bas/_lugs gcig la di wa'i wa a/_i ka'i a tsa la ya Na/_a ma la snga 'os/_su d+yaM/_lugs gcig la/_su di waM/_au dang shas la/_su de wau/_su di waH/_TA la/_su di waH/_b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa la/_di wa 
[\[65a.2\]]u ta di wa'i u ta'o/_/di wa zhes pa'i wa ni rnam dbye dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge pha rol la u ru 'gyur ro/_/su d+yu b+h+yAM/_su d+yU b+hiH/_nge la/_su di wi/_b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa la/_su dU b+h+yAM/_su d+yA b+h+yaH/_nga si la/_su di waH/_b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_su di waH/_su di woH/_su di wAM/_di la/_su di wi/
[\[65a.3\]]os la/_su di woH/_su pa la/_su d+yu Shu/_bod tshig la/_he su d+yauH/_he su di wau/_he su di waH/_ra mtha' can la tsa tu ra zhes par mang tshig bdun po sbyor te/_tsa tu ra/_dza sa/_tsa tu ra an Du ha dag gi A ma u dA t+ta'o zhes pa'i mdos A ma A ga ma/_tsa twA raH/_sha sa la/_tsa tu raH/
[\[65a.4\]]b+his la/_tsa tu r+b+hiH/_b+h+ya sa gnyis la/_tsa tu r+b+h+yaH/_A ma la/_Sha Ta tsa tu r+b+h+ya sh+tsa/_Sha Ta tsa tur rnams las kyang ngo /_bzhi/_/Sha Ta dang tsa tu ra zhes pa la/_rnam dbye drug pa'i A ma la nu Ta ster ro/_/ra Sha sogs kyis na Na/_a tsa las ra ha la zhes pas Da gnyis/_tsa tu r+b+hA/_su ba la/_ro sbu gi 
[\[65a.5\]]ra'i su pa la'o/_/tsa tu ra gyi ra ni rnam dbye bdun pa'i mang tshig su pa pha rol la rnam par bcad par mi 'gyur bar ra nyid 'dren pa'o/_/tsa tu r+Shu/_spyir btang ra ha la/_zhes pas Sha gnyis su bya ba thob kyang /_sha ro ci/_a tsa la shar gyi'o/_/shar so so'i bsdu ba'i yi ge a tsa dang ldan pa dag ra 
[\[65a.6\]]ha la gnyis su mi 'gyur ro zhes pas dmigs bsal gyi mdos gnyis su mi 'gyur/_he tsa twA raH/_pri ya tsa tu ra zhes pa lta bu rnam dbye thams cad 'jug ste/_su la/_pri ya tsa twAH/_au dang dza sa la/_pri ya tsa twA raH/_a ma la/_pri ya tsa twA raM/_au la/_pri ya tsa twA rau/_sha sa la/
[\[65a.7\]]pri ya tsa tu raH/_gsum pa rnams la/_pri ya tsa tu rA/_pri ya tsa tu r+b+haM/_pri ya tsa tu r+b+hiH/_bzhi pa rnams la/_dga' ba bzhi/_pri ya tsa tur+b+h+yaH/_da si la/_pri ya tsa tu raH/_b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/_nga sa la/_pri ya tsa tu raH/_o sa la/_pri ya tsa tu roH/_A ma la/_grangs bgrod 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]pa'i skabs ma gtogs nu Ta mi 'jug_/pri ya tsa tu rAM/_ngi ya/_pri ya tsa tu ri/_o sa la/_pri ya tsa tu roH/_pri ya tsa tu r+Shu/_saM bu d+d+hi la aM/_he tsa twaH/_he tsa twA ra!/_he tsa twA raH/_ma mtha' can la/_pra shA ma la su/_mo no d+sA toH/_byings kyi ma'i na'o/_/byings kyi ma ni dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi 
[\[65b.2\]]ge rnams pha rol dang tshig mtha' la na ru 'gyur te/_ma na/_su phyis/_pra shA na/_au dang dza sa la/_/pra shA mau/_pra shA maH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_pra shA mi/_pa shA mau/_pra shA maH/_TA la/_pra shA mA/_b+h+yAM la/_pra shA n+b+hAMH/_bzhi pa rnams la/_pra shA me/_pra shA n+b+h+yAM/
[\[65b.3\]]pra shA n+b+haH/_nga si la/_pra sha maH/_b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_pra shA maH/_pra shA moH/_pra shA mAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_pra shA mi/_pra shA moH/_pra shA n+su/_he pra shA na/_he pra shA mau/_he pra shA maH/_ki ma la/_su/_ki maHkaH/_ki ma gyi ka'o/_/ki ma zhes pa'i sgra ni rnam dbye gang 
[\[65b.4\]]mthong yang ka zhes pa 'gyur ro/_/kaH/_kau/_ke/_sogs te po rtags sa rba'i skabs dang 'dra'o/_/sa rba nA ma'i nang tshan i dam la/_su/_i dmo maH/_i dam gyi ma'o/_i dam zhes pa'i ma_i ni su pha rol lam nyid du gnas te/_t+ya da sogs rnams kyi a'o zhes pa 'gog 
[\[65b.5\]]pa'i don no/_/i da mo ya puM si/_i dam gyi a y+ra skyes pa la'o/_i dam zhes pa'i i dang da srog med ni skyas pa'i rtags_'di/_kyi skabs si pha rol la yang a ya zhes par 'gyur te/_a yaM/_i dam la/_au/_t+ya da sogs rnams kyi a 'os ma a/_a to du Ne/_a da kyi yon 
[\[65b.6\]]tan la'o/_/tshig mtha' ma yin pa'i a ya mtha' las i dam gyis ar 'gyur ba lta bu'i a yig yon tan gyi ming can de snga ma'i gzugs su 'gyur ro/_/i da/_au/_da sh+tsa/_da'i'ang ngo /_i dam zhes pa'i ma ar 'gyur ba snga ma'i gzugs su sor ba'i da de'ang rnam dbye gang mthong 
[\[65b.7\]]yang ma ru 'gyur ro/_/i ma/_au/_e ca la 'phel ba 'os/_i mau/_dzas la/_i dam/_i ma/_dzas shI a las yon tan/_i me/_gnyis pa rnams la/_i maM/_i mau/_i mA na/_TA la/_a nA bya kaH/_A pa la a na ka ma yin pa la'o/_i dam zhes t+yad sogs rnams 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]kyi a 'os/_i da zhes par bsgyur ba ni ka'i rkyan mtha' can ma yin na A pa so sor bsdu ba ste rnam dbye gsum pa'i TA nas bdun pa'i su pa kyi pa'i par gyi rnam dbye gang mthong yang an zhes par 'gyur ro/_/TA in/_a ne na/_b+h+yAM la/_ha li lo paH/_hal la dbyi'o/_/TA sogs kyi 
[\[66a.2\]]nang tshan yin kyang rnam dbye ha la thog ma can rnams la yid zhes pa a nar mi 'gyur bar i dang da gnyis dbyi'o/_/a b+h+yAM/_su ba la'ang ngos ring po/_A b+h+yAM/_b+hi sa la/_a b+hiH/_ne dam da sor koH/_ka ma yin pa dag gi i dam a das dag la ma yin no/_/ka'i rkyen mtha' can ma yin pa'i i 
[\[66a.3\]]dam dang a das dag las rnams dbye gsum pa'i mang tshig b+his ni ais zhes par mi 'gyur ro/_/mang tshig la dz+hal la e ta 'os/_e b+hiH/_nge la/_t+ya da sogs rnams kyi a 'os/_i da/_de/_sarba'i ming can las smai 'os/_nge smai/_hal la dbyi 'os/_i dang dbyi sa/_a smai/_b+h+yAM dang b+h+yas la/
[\[66a.4\]]A b+h+yAM/_e b+h+yaH/_i da/_nga si/_nga si ngi dag gi smA ta smyin dag gos/_nga si/_smA ta/_ha la la dbyi 'os id phyis/_a smAng /_A b+h+yAM/_e b+h+yaH/_nga sa la/_a s+ya/_o sa la/_A pa la an kam yin pa la 'os i da a na zhes par 'gyur/_os la'ang ngos/_rtags mtha' e/
[\[66a.5\]]a na yoH/_A ma la/_e ShI/_ngi la/_a smin/_os la/_a na yoH/_su pa la/_e Sha/_yang mi dam gyi lus 'gyur lugs gcig la/_id zhes pa rnam dbye gnyis pa rnams dang /_gsum pa'i nA dang drug pa dang bdun pa'i os rnams la yang na ba ste/_dwi tI yA Tau s+s+we na/_gnyis 
[\[66a.6\]]pa TA/_os rnams la e na'o/_rnam dbye gnyis pa rnams dang TA dang os gnyis rnams pha rol la i dam dang e ta da ni e na zhes par 'gyur ro/_/gnyis pa rnams la/_e naM/_e nau/_e nA na/_TA la/_e ne na/_o sa la/_e na yoH/_t+ya da sogs la bod tshig mi 'jug go/_!_/
[\[66a.7\]]na mtha' can la/_rA dza na la/_rgyal po'am gsal ba/_su/_saM bu d+d+hi ma yin pa'i thams cad gnas pa'i ming can la'ang ngaso/_u pa d+hA ring po/_ha la dI pa A pa sogs kyis/_su phyi sa/_ming mtha'i ma dbyi 'os/_na phyis/_RA dzA/_au dang dza sa la/_saM bu d+d+hi ma yin pa zhes pas/_u pa 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]d+hA ring po/_rA dzA namauH/_rA dzA naH/_rA dza na? la/_saM bud+d+hi'i ming can su/_na ngi saM bud+d+h+yoH/_ngi saM bud+d+hi dag la ma yin no/_/rnam dbye bdun pa'i ngi dang saM bud+d+hi pha rol la ming mtha'i na dbyi ba ma yin no zhes pas na mi phyi/_he rA dza na/_he rA dzA nau/_he rA dzA naH/_aM dang au la/_rA dzA na/_rA dzA nau/_rA dzA ma la shas/
[\[66b.2\]]na'i a ta dbyi 'os/_dza'i a phyis/_a tu'i sha tsu la sha tsu 'os/_na nya/_dza nya 'dus pa dz+nya/_rA dz+nyaH/_TA la/_RA dz+nyA/_b+h+yAM la/_ming mtha'i na dbyi 'os/_na phyis/_na lo paHsu p+s+wa ra saM dz+nyA tu g+pi d+hi Shu kr-i ti/_na dbyi ba su pa dbyangs ming kraM ta tu ka gi cho ga rnams la'o/_/su pa ste su sogs rnam dbye rnams 
[\[66b.3\]]dang dbyangs pha rol dang ming dang kr-i ta kyi rkyen rnams dang /_tu ka A ga ma sogs la na phyis pa'i rjes la cho ga gzhan mi 'jug ste/_dper na b+h+yAM gyi skabs su ma phyis pa'i rjes la su ba la'o zhes pa'i ring mo byed pa lta bu'o/_/rA dza b+h+yAM/_b+hi sa la/_rA dza b+hiH/_bzhi pa rnams la/_rA dz+nya/_rA dza 
[\[66b.4\]]b+h+yaM/_rA dza b+h+yaH/_nga si la/_rA dz+nyaH/_b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/_nga sa la/_rA dz+nyaH/_o sa la/_rA dz+nyoH/_U ma la/_rA dz+nyAM/_ngi la/_ngis bud+d+hi dag la ma yin no zhes pas/_lugs gcig la/_rA dza ni/_yang na/_rA dz+nyi/_o sa la/_rA dz+nyauH/_su pa la/_rA dza su/_!_pra ti di wan la su/_pra ti di wA/
[\[66b.5\]]au dang dzas/_pra ti di wA nau/_pra ti di wA naH/_a ma la/_pra ti di wA naM/_au la/_pra ti di wA nau/_shas la/_'grel par a phyis pa las u pa d+hA ring po'o zhes pa byung bas/_na'i a dbyi 'os/_a phyis/_u pa d+hA ring po/_pra ti dI b+naH/_gsumapa rnams la/_pra ti dI b+nA/_so sor gsal ba/
[\[66b.6\]]pra te di wa b+h+yAM/_pra ti di wa b+hiH/_sogs/_rA dza na gyi skabs dang 'dra'o/_!_/ya dz+wa na la su/_ya dz+wA/_au la/_ya dz+wA nau/_dzas la/_ya dz+wA naH/_a ma dang au la/_ya dz+wA naM/_ya dz+wA nau/_shas la/_na saM yo gA dwa maM tA ta/_wa ma yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' las ma yin no/_/rtags 
[\[66b.7\]]kyi u pa dz+hA wa yig dang ma yig brtsegs pa yod na spyir btang na'i a dbyi'o/_lha mchod mkhan/_zhes pa'i a mi dbyi ba ni nyid a tsa thog ma can rnams la 'dren pa kho na'o/_/ya dz+wa naH/_TA la/_ya dz+wa nA/_b+h+yAM b+hi sa/_ya dz+wa b+h+yAM/_ya dz+wa b+hiH/_nge la/_ya dzA ni/_b+h+yAM b+h+yaH'dra/_nga si la/_ya dz+r+wa naH/
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_ya dz+wa naH/_ya dz+wa noH/_ya dz+wa nAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_ya dzA ni/_ya dz+wa noH/_ya dz+wa su/_bod tshig la/_he ya dz+wa na/_he ya dz+wA nau/_he ya dz+wA naH/_!_bra h+ma na yang 'di dang 'dra'o/_/br-i ta han la su/_sau tsa/_su la'ang ngo /_/rtags in mtha' 
[\[67a.2\]]dang han dang /_pu Sha na/_a r+Ya man rnams kyi saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa'i yu la u pa d+hA rtag tu ring por 'gyur te/_br-i tra hA/_au la/_rjes ma'i tshig a tsa gcig pa la Na 'o zhes pas/_na Na/_br-i tra ha Nau/_tshangs pa/_'dir su ma gtogs rnam _'phel 'joms/_dbye thams can gnas pa'i ming can rnams 
[\[67a.3\]]la u pad+hA ring por mi 'gyur te/_dza sa la/_br-i tra ha NaH/_a ma la/_br-i tra ha NaM/_au la/_br-i tra ha nau/_sha sa la/_na'i a dbyi 'os a phyis/_ho haM te rnyI n+ni Sha/_han gyi ha'i nya Na 'gro ba na rnams la'o/_/byings tan 'tshe ba la'o zhes pa'i han gyi ha ni rkyen nya Na 'gro ba'i ming can rnams 
[\[67a.4\]]dang ba pha rol la g+ha ru 'gyur ro/_/bri tra hag+han/_shas/_haM ter th+pU rba s+ya/_han gyi a ta snga ma'i'o/_ha na zhes pa'i sgra'i sngon na a ta ste a yig yod na nar mi 'gyur te/_gong du rjes ma'i tshig a tsa gcig pa la Na'o zhes pa'i spyir btang 'gog pa'i don no/_/br-i tra g+h+naH/_gsum pa rnams 
[\[67a.5\]]la/_br-i tra g+h+nA/_br-i tra ha b+h+yAM/_br-i tra ha b+hiH/_de la/_br-i tra g+h+ne/_b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/_nga si la/_br-i tra g+h+naH/_b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_br-i tra g+h+naH/_br-i tra g+h+naM/_bdun pa rnams la/_br-i tra g+h+ni/_br-i tra g+h+noH/_br-i tra ha su/_bod tshig la/_he br-i tra ha na/_he br-i tra ha Nau/_he pr-i tra ha NaH/
[\[67a.6\]]sha N+gi na/_ya shA swi na/_pu Sha na/_a r+YA ma na rnams kyang 'di dang 'dra la/_pu Sha na la/_'grel par ngi la Ti yang na dbyi'o zhes pa byung bas/_lugs gcig la/_Ti phyis/_pu Shi/_pu Sh+Ni/_pu Sha Ni ste gzugs gsum 'byung ngo /_!_/ma g+ha wan la/_su/_ma g+ha wA ba hu laM/_mag+ha wa na 
[\[67a.7\]]ri dwags kr-i Sh+Na sA ra/_rgyas la/_nyi ma/_gyi yang na'o/_ma g+ha wa na zhes pa'i sgra ni rnam dbye gang mthong yang ma g+ha wa tr-i zhes par yang na 'gyur ro/_r-i 'gro ba'i ming can yin pas mi gnas kyang dgos pa'i ched du'o/_/u g+di tsA sa rba _brgya byin/_nA ma s+thA ne d+hA toH/_u ka 'gro ba a tsa rnams kyi 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]thams cad gnas pa'i ming tsa rnams la byings ma yin pa la'o/_/rtags mthar u ka ste u yig dang r-i yig dang l-i yig 'gro ba rnams dang a tsa zhes pa'i rtags byings ma yin pa dag la pha rol rnam dbye thams cad gnas pa'i ming tsa na gang byung yang num A ga ma ster ro/_/ma g+ha wa na tra/_su/
[\[67b.2\]]a tu as mtha'i 'ang byings ma yin pa'i 'os/_u pa d+hA ring po/_ha la dI pa A ba sogs kyi mdos su phyis/_yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/_ta phyis/_mag+ha wA na/_au dang dza sa la/_ma g+ha wA n+tau/_mag+ha wA n+taH/_a ma dang au la/_mag+ha wA n+taM/_mag+ha wA n+tau/_sha sa la/_mag+ha 
[\[67b.3\]]wa taH/_gsum pa rnams la/_mag+ha wa tA/_mag+ha wa d+b+h+yA/_mag+ha wa d+b+hiH/_nge la/_mag+ha wa te/_b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/_nga si la/_mag+ha wa taH/_b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_mag+ha wa taH/_mag+ha wA toH/_mag+ha wa tAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_mag+ha wa ti/_mag+ha wa toH/_mag+ha wa t+su/
[\[67b.4\]]bod tshig rnams la/_he mag+ha wa na/_he mag+ha wA n+tau/_he mag+ha wA n+taH/_mag+ha wa na/_zhes pa/_mag+ha wa tr-i zhes par ma 'gyur pa'i phyogs ni/_rnam dbye dang po rnams la/_mag+ha wA/_mag+ha wA nau/_mag+ha wA naH/_a ma dang au la/_mag+ha wA naM/_mag+ha wA nau/_sha sa la/_i gya NaHsaM 
[\[67b.5\]]pra sA ra NaM/_ya Na'i i ka tu slar yang dag par bsgyur ro/_/ya Na so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams i ka so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge grangs mnyam pa rnams su 'gyur te/_de la slar yang dag par bsgyur ba'i ming can zhes zer ro/_/shA yu wa mag+ho nA ma ta d+d+hi te/_shwa na yu wa na mag+ha wa na rnams kyi de 
[\[67b.6\]]phan ma yin pa la'o/_/shwa na la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi de phan gyi rkyen ma yin pa rnam dbye/_shas nas/_bdun pa'i sub kyi bar a tsa thog ma can rnams la slar yang dag par bsgyur te/_wa?/_u/_mag+ha u/_an/_shas/_saM pra sA raNA ts+tsa/_saM pra sA ra Na las kyang ngo /_slar yang 
[\[67b.7\]]dag par bsgyur ba las pha rol gyi a tsa de yang snga ma'i gzugs su 'gyur bas a u dang bcas pa u/_a la yon tan nos au/_mag+ho naH/_gsum pa rnams la/_mag+ho nA/_mag+ha wa b+h+yAM/_mag+ha wa b+hiH/_nge la/_mag+ho ni/_b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/_nga si la/_mag+ho naH/_b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_mag+ho naH/_mag+ha noH/_mag+ho nAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_mag+ho ni/_mag+ho noH/_mag+ha wa su/_bod tshig la/_he mag+ha ba na/_he mag+ha wA nau/_hem g+ha bAnaH/_!_khyi/_shwa na la su/_shwA/_au dang dza sa la/_shwA naH/_a ma dang au la/
[\[68a.2\]]shwA naM/_shwA nau/_shwan la/_shas/_shwan_yu wa na mag+ha wa na rnams kyi zhes pas/_wa u/_shunaH/_TA la/_shunA/_b+h+yA ma b+his la/_shwa b+hi/_shA b+hiH/_rnam dbye lhag ma rnams la'ang a tsa thog ma can rnams shas dang 'dra/_ha la thog ma can rnams b+h+yAM dang 'dra'o/_!_/yu wa na la su/_yu wA/
[\[68a.3\]]au dang dzas la/_yu wA nau/_yu wA naH/_a ma dang au la/_yu wA naM/_yu wA nau/_shas la/_shwa na yu wa na sogs kyi mdos wa u/_yu u in/_shas/_na saM pra sAr Ni saM pra sA ra NaM/_slar yang dag par bsgyur ba la slar yang dag par bsgyur ba mi yin no/_/wa u nga _lang tsho'am dar bab/
[\[68a.4\]]bsgyur ba lta bu'i slar yang dag par bsgyur zin pa'i sngon na ya Na'i yi ge yod kyang slar yang dag par bsgyur ba ma yin te/_u'i sngun ma'i ya ir mi 'gyur/_a ka 'dra ba la ring po 'os/_yUnaH/_TA la/_yU nA/_b+h+yAM la/_yu wa b+hiH/_sogs rigs 'gre'o/_!_/a rba na la su/
[\[68a.5\]]arbA/_au dang dzas la/_arba Na s+t+ra sA wa na nyaH/_arba na gyi tri na nya dang su ma yin pa la'o/_arba na zhes pa'i rtags mtha'i na yig ni na nya sngun na yod pa dang rnam dbye dang po gcig tshig su dang saM bud+d+hI rnams ma yin pa'i rnam dbye gang mthong yang tr-i zhes par 'gyur ro/_/arba tr-i/_dzas/_uka
[\[68a.6\]]'gro ba a tsa rnams kyi zhes pa'i mdos num/_u pad+hA ring po/_a rbA n+tau/_arbA n+taH/_a ma dang au la'ang /_arbA n+taM/_arbA n+tau/_shas la/_arba taH/_gsum pa rnams la/_arba tA/_arba d+b+hAM/_arba d+b+hiH/_bzhi pa rnams la/_arba te/_arba d+b+h+yAM/_arba d+b+h+yaH/_nga si la/_arba taH/_b+h+yAM b+h+yas 
[\[68a.7\]]'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_arba taH/_arba toH/_arba tAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_arba ti/_arba toH/_arba tU/_bod tshig la/_he arba na/_he arbA n+tau/_he arbA n+taH/_na nya sngun na yod pa/_a na rba na zhes pa'i rtags mtha' tr-i zhes par mi 'gyur te/_cho ga thams cad ya dz+wa na zhes pa'i rtags 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]kyi skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra'o/_!_/pa thin la/_su/_pa thim th+YI b+hu k+ShA mA ta/_pa thin ma thi n-i ra b+hu k+Shan rnams kyi A ta'o/_/pa thin la sogs pa'i sgra 'di rnams kyi rtags mtha'i na yig ni su pha rol la A ta du 'gyur ro/_/pa thi A/_su/_i to t+sa rba nA ma s+thA ne/_i ta kyi a ta thams cad 
[\[68b.2\]]gnas pa'i ming can rnams la'o/_lam/_pa thin la sogs pa rnams kyi i yig ni rnam dbye thams cad gnas pa'i ming can rnams la a yig tu 'gyur te/_pa tha A/_su/_thon+thaH/_tha'i n+tha'o/_/pa thi dang ma thi zhes pa'i tha yig ni rnam dbye thams cad gnas pa'i ming can rnams pha rol 
[\[68b.3\]]la n+tha zhes par 'gyur ro/_/pan+tha A/_su/_a ka gi 'dra ba la ring po/_sa sa dzu la sogs dang khar sogs kyi mdos/_pan+thAH/_au dang dzas la/_pan+thA nau/_pan+thA naH/_a ma la/_pan+thA ni/_au la/_pan+thA nau/_pa thin la/_shas/_b+ha s+ya TeHlo paH/_b+ha'i Ti dbyi'o/_b+ha'i ming can 
[\[68b.4\]]pa thin la sogs pa rnams kyi Ti rnam dbye thams cad gnas pa'i ming can ma yin pa a tsa thog ma can rnams la dbyi ste/_pa thaH/_TA la/_Ti phyis drangs/_pa thU/_b+h+yAM ma b+his la/_ming mtha'i na phyis/_pi thi b+h+yIH/_bzhi pa rnams la/_pa the/_pa thi b+h+yAM/_pa thi b+h+yaH/_nga si la/
[\[68b.5\]]pa thaH/_b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_pa thaH/_pa thoH/_pa thAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_pa thi/_pa thoH/_pa thiShu/_bod tshig la/_he pan+thA/_he pan+thA no/_he pan+thA naH/_ma thi na yang 'di dang 'dra'o/_!_/r-i b+hu k+Shan la/_su/_pa thin ma thin r-i b+huk+Sha na rnams kyi A ta 'os/_na A/
[\[68b.6\]]a ka gi 'dra ba lang ring po/_R-i b+hu k+ShAH/_au dang dzas la/_r-i b+hu k+ShA nau/_r-i b+hu k+ShA naH/_a ma dang au/_r-i b+hu k+ShA naM/_ri b+hu k+ShA nau/_shas la/_b+ha'i Ti dbyi 'os/_Ti phyis drangs/_srungs pa/_r-i b+hu k+ShaH/_TA la/_brgya byin/_r-i b+hu k+ShA/_b+h+yAM la/_r-i b+hu k+Sha b+h+yA/_lta bu ste/_a tsa thog ma can rnams 
[\[68b.7\]]la Ti dbyi/_ha la thogs ma can rnams la ming mtha'i na dbyi ba kho na'o/_!_/na mtha' can/_pany+tsa na la/_lnga/_dzas dang shas/_Sh+NaM tA Sha Ta/_Sha na mtha' rnams Sha Ta'o/_/grangs kyi don can gyi Sha yig mtha' can rnams dang na yig mtha' can rnams la Sha Ta'i ming can zhes ming 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]'dogs byed do/_/ming mtha'i na phyis/_/Sha Ta rnams las dbyi 'os/_dzas shas dag phyis/_pa ny+tsa/_bod tshig la/_he pa ny+tsa/_b+his dang b+h+yas gnyis la/_ming mtha'i na dbyi 'os/_na phyis/_pany+tsa b+hiH/_pany+tsa b+h+yaH/_pany+tsa b+h+yaH/_A ma la/_Sha Ta ca tur rnams las kyang 
[\[69a.2\]]ngos/_nu Ta/_no pa d+hA yA/_na'i u pa d+h+yA'i'o/_/na mtha'i u pad+hA nAM pha rol la ring por 'gyur te/_u pad+hA ring po/_ming mtha'i na dbyi 'os/_na gong ma phyis/_pany+tsa nAM/_su pa la/_pany+tsa su/_sap+ta na/_na wan/_da shan rnams la'ang cho ga thams cad pany+tsa na dang 'dra'o/_/'di rnams la 
[\[69a.3\]]grangs ba grang sa'i skabs su rnam dbye rnams kyi mang tshig kho na 'jug go/_!_/na yig mtha' can/_aSh+Ta na la/_dzas/_aSh+Ta na A bib+ha k+tau/_aSh+Ta na gyi A rnam dbye la'o/_/aSh+Ta na zhes pa'i rtags/_bdun/_dgu/_bcu/_kyi Ti ni rnam dbye pha rol la A ru 'gyur te/_aSh+TA/_dzas/_aSh+TA b+h+ya au sha/_aSh+TA 
[\[69a.4\]]las au'o/_/rtags aSh+TA zhes 'gyur pa'i pha rol dzas shas dag au zhes pe 'gyur te/_brgyad/_dzas au/_e tsa la 'phel ba 'os/_aSh+To/_'grel par yang na par bshad bas/_lugs gcig la/_Sha Ta rnams las dbyi'o zhes pas/_dzas phyis/_aSh+TA/_shas la yang na bar byas 
[\[69a.5\]]pas/_aSh+Tau/_aSh+TA/_bod tshig la/_he aSh+Tau/_he aSh+TA/_b+his la/_aSh+TA b+hiH/_b+h+yas gnyis la/_aSh+TA b+h+yaH/_aSh+TA b+h+yaH/_A ma la/_aSh+TA nAM/_aSh+TA su/_'grel bar dzas dang shas dag yang na mi dbyi bar a ka 'dra ba'i cho ga dang sar ra rnam bcad byas pas/_aSh+TAHzhes pa yang byed 
[\[69a.6\]]gsung ngo /_/A ma la yang na nu Ta mi ster bas aSh+TAM zhes pa yang 'byung ngo /_!_/d+ha yig mtha' can/_bud+hA la/_su/_a tsa gcig pa'i ba sha'i b+haSha_dz+ha'i mtha'i sa d+hA dag la 'os/_bad+ha/_hal_dI pa A pa ces pas/_su phyis/_gnas med ba la yang na 'os/_d+ha dra'am ta/_b+hu ta/_dU da/
[\[69a.7\]]au dang dzas la/_bu d+hau/_bu d+haH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_bun+haM/_bud+hau/_bud+haH/_TA la/_bud+hAH/_bud+hA/_b+h+yI la/_rtags pa/_ba b+ha/_dz+ha sha la d+b+ha la rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/_d+ha da/_b+hu d+b+h+yAM/_b+his la/_b+hu d+hIH/_bzhi la rnams la/_bu d+he/_b+hu d+b+h+yAM/_b+hu d+b+h+yaH/_nga si la/_bud+haH/_b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]rnams la/_bu d+haH/_bu d+hoH/_bu b+hAM/_ngi la/_bud+hi/_os 'dra/_su pa la/_ba b+ha/_khar la tsar 'os/_b+ha ta/_b+hu tU/_bod tshig rnams la/_he b+hu ta/_he b+hu da/_he bu d+hau/_he bu d+haH/_!_/dza yig mtha' can/_yu dza/_r-i tw-i gA b+h-I ka sr-i g+h+r-i gu sh+ni gaM tsu yu dzi kruM tsAM tsa/_r-i twi ka_da d+h-I ka/_sri ka/_dr-ika
[\[69b.2\]]u sh+ni ka a ny+tsu yu dza kruM ca rnams kyi 'ang ngo /_r-i twi ka sogs 'di rnams la byings las ming du bsgrub pa'i rkyen kr-i ta sogs kyi nang tshan kwi na 'gyur te/_yu dza la kwi na byin/_yu dza la kwin byin/_yu dza/_kwin/_ha la mtha'i 'os na phyis/_de phan _sta mchod/_ma yin pa la la sha ku rnams kyi 'os ka phyis/_yu dza/_wi/_i brjod don/
[\[69b.3\]]yin pas phyis/_kr-i da ting /_ting ma yin pa kraM ta'o/_ti sogs kyi rkyen ma yin pa'i ming du bsgrub ba'i rkyen rnams la kr-i ta ces zer ro/_be ra pr-ik+ta s+ya/_ba'i a pr-ik+ta'i 'o/_kwin gyi rjes 'brang phyis zin pa'i bsrog med lta du'i bde la a pri k+ta zer zhing de ni dbyi bar bya ste/_ba phyis/_krit+ta d+d+hi tas mA sA sh+tsa/
[\[69b.4\]]kr-i ta de phan tshig sdud rnams kyang ngo /_/kring rkyen byin pa'i byings las 'gyur zhin pa de dang de phan gyi rkyen mtha' dang tshig sdud byas pa'i mtha' rnam dbye byin ma grub pa de la ming ngam rtags sam sgra zhes zer te su sogs 'jug pa'i yul yen pas/_yu dza la/_su/_yu dza ras mA se/_yu dza'i tshig 
[\[69b.5\]]sdud ma yin pa la'o/_/tshig sdud med pa'i yu dza zhes pa'i rtags la rnam dbye thams cad gnas pa'i ming can rnams pha rol du byung na num u ga ma 'gyur te/_yu nu ju/_ha la dI ba A pa sogs kyis su phyis/_yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/_dza phyis/_kwin+b+ra t+ya ya s+ya kuH/_kwin rkyen gyi ku'o/
[\[69b.6\]]kwin gyi rkyen byin pa'i mtha' na gnas pa'i yi ge rnams pha rol dz+nya la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang tshig mtha' la grangs mnyam pa'i ku ste kwa sder 'gyur te/_ta snga'i lnga pa na/_ka sde'i lnga par 'gyur/_yuM/_au dang dzas la/_yu ny+dzau/_yu ny+dzaH/_am dang au la/_yu ny+dzaM/_yu ny+dzau/_shas la/_yu dzaH/
[\[69b.7\]]T+wa/_yu dzA/_b+h+yAM b+h+ras la/_kwin rkyen gyi ku 'os dza ga_yu g+b+hi/_yu g+b+hiH/_nge la/_yu dze/_b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_yu dza/_b+h+yAM b+h+ya 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_yu dzAH/_yu dzoH/_yu dzAM/_ngi la/_yu dzi/_os la/_yu dzaMH/_su pa la/_dza ga_/khar la car 'os/_ga ka_/i nya sogs kyis sa 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]'dra ngas/_yu k+Shu/_bod tshig rnams la/_he yuM/_he yuny+dzau/_he yu ny+dzaH/_!_/yu dza tshig sdud can ni/_su yuSh+tsa/_su/_tso d+kuH/_tsu'i ku'o/_/dz+nya laso sor bsdu ba'i yi ge gad rung pha rol du byung ba dang tshig mtha' la tsu ste tsa sde srog med pa rnams ku ste ka sdi'i grangs mthun pa rnams su 'gyur 
[\[70a.2\]]te/_dza ga_/gnas med pa la yang na 'os kar 'gyur ba'am gnyid du gnas pa 'dam ka can du byas pas/_su yu ka_/lags par lha mchod pa/_su yug_/au dang dzas la/_'dren pa ma gtogs bya ba gzhan lhag po med/_su yu dzau/_su yu dzaH/_bod tshig rnams la/_he su yu ka_/he su yu ga_/
[\[70a.3\]]he su yu dzau/_he su yu dzaH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_su yu dzaM/_su yu dzau/_su yu dzaH/_TA la/_su yu dzA/_b+h+yAm b+his la/_tsu'i ku/_su yu g+b+h+yAM/_su yu g+b+hiH/_sogs a tsa dang po can rnams la 'dren pa dang /_ha la thogs ma can rnams la tsu'i kur 'gyur ba kho na ste snga ma rnams kyis rigs 
[\[70a.4\]]'gre'o/_/'grel par/_yu dza/_ting 'dzin gyi don la num mi 'jug go zhes byung bas/_de'i cha su yu dza'i skabs dang 'dra'o/_!_/dza yig mtha' can sany+dza la/_su ha la dIb A pa sogs kyis su phyis/_yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/_dza byis/_rgyu mtshan med na rgyu mtshan can yang med 
[\[70a.5\]]do zhes pas nya nar log_/san/_au dang dzas la/_sany+dzau/_sany+dzaH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_sa ny+dzaM/_sa ny+dzau/_sa ny+dzaH/_TA la/_sany+dzA/_b+h+yAM b+his la yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/_dza phyis/_nang ro/_saM b+h+yAM/_saM b+hiH/_bzhi pa rnams la/_sa ny+dze/_saM b+h+yAM/_saM b+h+yaH/_nga si la/_sany+dzaH/_b+h+yAM b+h+yas 
[\[70a.6\]]'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_sa ny+dzaH/_sany+dzoH/_sany+dzaM/_bdun pa rnams la/_sany+dzi/_sany+dzoH/_saM su/_bod tshig rnams la/_he san/_he sany+dzau/_he sany+dzaH/_!_dza yig mtha' can/_rA dzA la/_su/_bra sh+tsa b+h+ra s+dza sr-i dza sogs kyi mdos/_dza Sha/_ha la_dI pa/_A pa sogs kyis su phyis/_gnas med pa 
[\[70a.7\]]la yang na 'os/_/ma Da 'am Ta/_rA Ta/_rA Ta/_au dang dzas la/_rA dzau/_rA dzaH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_rA dzaM/_rA dzau/_rA dzaH/_TA la/_rA dzA/_b+h+yA ma b+his la/_dza Sha/_gsal las 'bal la/_dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos Sha Da/_rA n+b+h+yAM/_rA n+b+hiH/_de la/_rA dze/_b+h+yA b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]rA dzaH/_b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_rA dzaH/_rA dzoH/_rA dzAM/_ngi la/_rA dzi/_os 'dra/_su pa la/_dza Sha/_Sha Da/_khar la tsar 'os/_TA TA/_rA TU/_bod tshig rnams la/_he rA Ta/_he rA Da/_he rA dzau/_he rA dzaH/_bi b+hA dza/_de we dza/_bi shwa sr-i dza/_pa ri sr-i dza/_pa ri pra dza rnams kyang rA dza 
[\[70b.2\]]dang 'dra'o/_!_/bi shwa rA dza/_su/_dza Sha/_Sha Da/_bi shwa rA Da/_bi shwa s+ya ba su rA ToH/_pi shwa'i ba su rA Ta dag la'o/_bi shwa zhes pa/_bsu dang rAdza rA Ta zhes par 'gyur ba'i sngon na yod na rtags ma [\[]ba'i [\]]ring bor 'gyur te/_bi shwA rI ta lta bu ste/_ha la thog ma can rnams la rA dza rA Sha zhes par 'gyur la/
[\[70b.3\]]de'i tshe bi shwa'i_sna tshogs gsal ba/_a ring por 'gyur ba ma gtogs rA dza rang gi skabs su bshad pa dang khyad par med do/_bsu zhes pa u yig mtha' can ni/_cho ga thams cad b+ha nu'i skabs dang 'dra/_de'i sngon du bi shwa zhes pa byung na/_bi shwa'i bsu rA Ta dag la 'os ring por 'gyur te/
[\[70b.4\]]dper na/_bi shwA bsuHlta bu'o/_!_/dza yig mtha' can b+h+r-i s+dza la/_su/_skoHsaM yo gA d+yo ra n+te tsa/_yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' lasnga ma'i sra kra dag ge'ang ngo /_/rtags mtha' yang dag par sbyor ba ste/_srog med gnyis brtsegs pa'i mtha'i snga ma des yig gam ka yig yin na dz+hal so 
[\[70b.5\]]sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams pha rol dang tshig mtha' la dbyi bar bya ste/_sa phyis/_bra sh+tsa b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis dza Sha/_gnas med pa la yang na 'os Da 'am Ta/_b+h+r-i Ta/_b+h+r-i Ta/_aul/_dz+ha shal dz+hal rnams sos/_dz+ha sha so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dza'i snga ma'i dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i nad tshan 
[\[70b.6\]]sa yig de kho rang dang skye gnas mthun pa'i da yig tu 'gyur/_sa tu'i sha tsu la sha tsu 'os/_dang drangs/_b+h+r-i dz+dzau/_dzas la/_b+h+r-i dz+h+raH/_am dang au la/_b+h+r-i dz+dzaM/_bab+h+r-i dz+dzau/_shas la/_b+h+r-i dz+dzaH/_TA la/_b+h+r-i dz+dzA/_b+h+yAM b+his la/_yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' la snga ma'i sa ka dag gis 'os/
[\[70b.7\]]sa phyis/_dza Sha/_Sha Da/_b+h+r-i d+b+h+yAM/_b+h+r-i d+b+hiH/_de la/_b+h+r-i dz+dze/_b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_b+h+r-i dz+dz+raH/_b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_b+h+r-i dz+dzaH/_b+h+r-i dz+dzoH/_b+h+r-i dz+dzAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_b+h+r-i dz+dzi/_b+h+r-i dz+dz+roH/_b+h+r-i T+su/_bod tshig la/_he b+h+r-i Ta/_he b+h+r-i Ta/_he b+h+r-i Da/_he b+h+r-i dz+dzo/_he b+h+r-i dz+dzaH/_!_/dza yig mtha' can/
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]R-i twi dza la/_su/_r-i twi dza zhes pa ming du bsgrub pa'i rkyen kwin byin pa'i rjes yin pas/_kwin rkyen gyi ku 'os/_dza ga/_gnas med pa la yar na 'os/_r-i twi ka/_r-i twi ga/_au dang dzas la/_r-i twi dzau/_r-i twi dzaH/_bod tshig rnams la/_he ri ti ka_/he ri twi ga_/he r-i twi dzau/_he r-i twi dzaH/_b+h+yAM la/
[\[71a.2\]]R-i twi g+b+h+yI/_sogs rigs 'gre'o/_!_/dza mtha' can/_U rdza la su/_kwin rkyen gyi ku 'os/_dza ga/_ha la sogs kyis su phyis/_ra yig las ma gtogs yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' mi dbyi/_gnas med pa la yang na 'os/_U rku/_U rgu/_au la/_U rdzau/_des a tsa dang po can rnams 
[\[71a.3\]]rigs 'gre/_b+h+yAM la/_U b+h+yAM/_'dis ha la dang po can rnams rigs 'gre'o/_!_/da yig mtha' can/_t+ya da/_la/_su/_t+ya da sogs rnams kyi a 'os/_da/_a/_a ta kyi yon tan la 'os/_snga ma'i gzugs su song /_t+ya/_su/_ta dos+saHsA wa ni t+ya yoH/_ta da dag gi su la sa mtha' 
[\[71a.4\]]ma yin pa la'o/_/t+yad sogs kyi mtha' ma yin pa'i ta yig dang da yig dag su pha rol las yig tu 'gyur ro/_de/_s+yaH/_o la/_t+yau/_dzas/_shI/_t+ye sogs te/_sarba po rtags kyi skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra'o/_!_/da yig mtha' can ta da kyang bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra ste/_saH/_tau/_te sogs 
[\[71a.5\]]so/_yang ces pa la'ang /_yaH/_yau/_ye/_sogs so/_/e ta da la/_e ShaH/_e tau/_e te/_sogs rigs 'gre/_yang e ta da kyi lus 'gyur gzhan ni rnam dbye gnyis pa rnams dang /_TA dang os gnyis la/_gnyis pa TA_de/_os rnams la e na'o zhes pas/_e ta da/_e na zhes 
[\[71a.6\]]par 'gyur/_dang /_gnyis pa rnams la/_e naM/_e nau/_e nA na/_de/_TA la/_e zhe na/_os gnyis la/_e na yoH/_zhes pa'ang lugs gcig go/_!_/da yig mtha' can/_yuSh+ma da/_a smad la/_su/_de pra tha ma yor ma/_de dang po dag gi a ma'o/_/yuSh+ma da dang aSh+ma da ces pa'i rtags las 
[\[71a.7\]]rnam dbye dang po rnams dang gnyis pa rnams dang bzhi pa'i de rnams ni a ma zhes par 'gyur te/_su am du 'gyur/_yuSh+ma da/_a ma/_a smad/_am/_twA hau sau/_su la twa a ha 'o/_bod/_nga'am bdag_/rnam dbye dang po'i su pha rol la yuSh+ma_da kyi a da bzhag pa'i yu Sha ma gsum ni/_twa zhes par 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]'gyur la/_a smad kyi a da bor ba'i A sma rnams a ta zhes par 'gyur te/_twa ad/_a ma/_a ha ad/_a ma/_she She lo paH/_lhag ma la dbyi'o/_/yu Sh+ma da dang a smad ces pa'i da yig A dang ya ru 'gyur ba dag mi dbyi la/_A ya ru 'gyur ba ma yin pa rnams dbyi bar bya ste/_da phyis/
[\[71b.2\]]twa a/_a ma/_a ha a/_am/_a da kyi yon tan la'o dang /_am la snga ma 'os/_twaM/_a haM/_yuSh+ma da/_a smad la au/_de dang po dag gi am 'os/_au/_am du 'gyur/_yuSh+ma da/_am/_a smad/_am/_yu wA wo+au dwi ba tsa ne/_gnyis tshig la/_yu wa A wa dag go/_/rnam dbye gnyis 
[\[71b.3\]]tshig rnams la/_ad bor ba'i/_yuSh+ma ni/_yu wa dang ad bor ba'i a smA ni/_A wa zhes par 'gyur te/_yu wa ad/_am/_A wa ad/_am/_pra tha mA yA sh+tsa dwi ba tsa ne b+hA ShA yaM/_dang po'i 'ang gnyis tshig brjod pa la'o/_/rnam dbye dang po'i gnyis tshig pha rol la yuSh+ma da ces pa'i 
[\[71b.4\]]mtha' Ar 'gyur te/_da yig A ru 'gyur/_yu wa a A/_am/_A wa a A/_am/_a ta kyi yon tan la 'os/_yu wa A/_am/_A wa A/_am/_a ka gi 'dra ba la ring po dang /_am la snga ma 'os/_yu wAM/_A wAM/_yuSh+mad/_a smad la dzas/_de dang po dag gi am 
[\[71b.5\]]'os dzas am/_yuSh+mad/_am/_a smad/_am/_yU ya ba yau dza si/_dzas la yU ya ba ya'o/_/rnam dbye dang po'i mang tshig dzas pha rol la ad bor ba'i yuSh+m+ra ni yU ya dang ad bor ba'i a sma ni pa ya zhes par 'gyur ro/_/yU ya ad/_am/_ba ya ad/_am/_lhag ma la 
[\[71b.6\]]dbyi 'os da phyis/_a da kyi yon tan la 'o dang /_am lasnga ma 'os/_yU yaM/_ba yaM/_yuSh+mad/_a smad la/_gnyis pa'i am/_de dang po dag gi zhes pas am am du 'gyur/_yuSh+mad/_am/_a smad/_am/_twa mA we ka ba tsa ne/_gcig tshig la twa ma dag go/_/rnam dbye gcig 
[\[71b.7\]]tshig rnams pha rol la/_ad bor ba'i yuSh+m+ra ni twa dang ad bor ba'i a smra ni ma zhes par 'gyur te/_twa ad/_am/_ma ad/_am/_dwi tI yA yAM tsa/_gnyis pa la'ang ngo /_/rnam dbye gnyis pa rnams pha rol la'ang yuSh+mad a smad dag gi mtha' ste da A ru 'gyur te/_twa a A am 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]maM a A/_am/_a ta kyi yon tan la'o dang /_a ka gi 'dra ba la ring po/_am la snga ma 'os/_twAM/_mAM/_yuSh+mad/_a smad la/_gnyis pa'i au/_de dang po dag gi am 'os/_au am/_gnyis tshig la yu wa A wa dag gos/_yu wa ad/_am/_A wa ad am/
[\[72a.2\]]gnyis pa la'ang ngas da A/_a ta kyi yon tan la'o dang /_a ka gi 'dra ba la ring po/_am la snga ma 'os/_yu wAM/_A wAM/_yuSh+ma de a smad la/_gnyis pa'i mang tshig shas/_sha so naH/_shas kyi na 'o/_/yuSh+mad a smad la rnam dbye gnyis pa'i mang tshig shas ni na srog med tu 'gyur ro/_/shas na/
[\[72a.3\]]gnyis pa la'ang ngos/_mtha' A/_a ka gi 'dra ba la ring po 'os/_yuSh+mA na/_a smAn/_yuSh+mad/_asmad la/_gsum pa'i TA/_gcig tshig la twa ma dag gos/_twa ad/_TA ma ad/_TA/_yo tsi/_a tsa la ya'o/_au am du 'gyur ba lta bu ma yin pa'i rnam dbye a tsa thog ma can 
[\[72a.4\]]gzhan du ma 'gyur ba rnams la/_yuSh+mad/_a smad byi mtha' rten ya ru 'gyur te/_da ya ru bsgyur/_a ta kyi yon tan la'o dang ya drangs pas/_twa yA/_ma yA/_yuSh+mad/_a smad la gsum pa'i b+h+yAM/_gnyis tshig la yu wa A wa dag gos/_yu wa ad/_b+h+yAM/_A wa ad/_b+h+yAM/_yuSh+ma_da sma 
[\[72a.5\]]dor nA de she/_yuSh+mad a smad dag gi kun nas bsgyur ba la'o/_su am du bsgyur ba lta bu ma yin pa'i rnam dbye ha la thog ma can gzhan du ma 'gyur ba rnams pha rol la yuSh+ma da a smad dag gi mtha' A ru 'gyur te/_da U/_a ta kyi yon tan la'o dang /_a ki gi 'dra ba la ring po 'os/_yuwA 
[\[72a.6\]]b+h+yAM/_A wA b+h+yAM/_b+his la/_yuSh+ma da a smad dag gi kun nas ma bsgyur ba la'os/_da A/_a ka gi 'dra ba la ring po 'os/_yuSh+sA b+hiH/_asmA b+hiH/_yuSh+mad a smad la/_nge /_de dang po dag gi am 'os/_de am/_tu b+h+ya ma h+Yaud yi/_nge la tu b+h+ya h+Ya dag go/_/rnam dbye bzhi pa'i de pha rol la ad 
[\[72a.7\]]bor ba'i yuSh+ma ni tu b+h+ya dang ad bor ba'i asmra ni mah+Ya zhes par 'gyur te/_tu b+h+ya dang ma h+la ra bsgyur/_lhag ma la dbyi 'os da phyis/_ata kyi yon tan la'o dang /_am la snga ma 'os/_tu b+h+yaM/_mah+YaM/_b+h+yAM gsum pa'i skabs dang 'dra ste/_yuwA b+h+yAM/_A wA b+h+yAM/_yuSh+mad/_a smad la bzhi pa'i b+h+yas/_b+h+ya so 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]b+h+ya ma/_b+h+yas b+h+ya ma'o/_/yuSh+ma da/_a smad dag la/_b+h+yas ni b+h+yam zhes par 'gyur te/_b+h+yas b+h+yaM du bsgyur/_lhag ma la dbyi bos da phyis/_yuSh+ma b+h+yaM/_a smab+h+yaM/_yuSh+ma da a smad la/_lnga ba'i da si/_gcig tshig la twa ma dag gos/_twa ad/_nga si/_ma ad/_nga si/_e ka ba tsan s+ya tsa/_gcig 
[\[72b.2\]]tshig gi'ang ngo /_/rnam dbye lnga pa'i gcig tshig nga si ni/_yuSh+ma da/_asmad la'ang a ta ces par 'gyur te/_nga si/_a ta/_a ta kyi yon tan la 'os/_a gnyis ka snga ma'i gzugs su song /_twa ta/_ma ta/_lnga pa'i b+h+yA ma yang gsum pa dang bzhi pa'i skabs dang 'dra bas/_yu wA b+h+yAM/_A wA b+h+yA ma/
[\[72b.3\]]yuSh+ma da/_a smad la lnga pa'i b+h+yas/_pany+tsa myA a ta/_lnga pa'i a ta'o/_/yuSh+ma dA a smad dag la rnam dbye lnga pa'i b+h+yas ni a ha ces par 'gyur te/_b+h+yas a ta du bsgyur/_lhag ma la dbyi 'os/_da phyis/_a ta kyi yon tan la'os/_yuSh+ma ta/_a smad/_yuSh+mad asmad la/_drug pa'i ngas/
[\[72b.4\]]ta wa ma maung si/_ngas la ta wa ma ma dag go/_/rnam dbye drug pa'i ngas pha rol la ad bor ba'i yuSh+ma ni ta wa dang ad bor ba'i asmra ni ma ma zhes par 'gyur te/_ta wa ad/_ngas/_ma ma ad/_ngas/_yuSh+ma da smad+b+h+yAM da so a shwa/_yuSh+ma da a smad dag las ngas kyi a sha 'o/_/yu smad a smad 
[\[72b.5\]]dag las rnam dbye drug pa'i ngas ni a sha zhes par 'gyur te/_ngas/_a sha ru bsgyur/_sha 'gro ba'i ming can yin pas phyis/_lhag ma la dbye 'os daphyis/_a ta kyi yon tan la 'os a gnyer snga ba'i gzugs su song /_ta wa/_ma ma/_yu Sh+mad a smad la drug pa'i os/_gnyis tshig 
[\[72b.6\]]la yu wa A dag gos/_yu wa ad/_os/_A wa ad/_/os/_a tsal ya 'os/_da ya/_a ta kyi yon tan la 'os/_a snga ma'i gzugs su song drangs bas/_yu wa yoH/_Awa yoH/_yuSh+ma da a smad la drug pa'i A ma/_lhag ma la dbyi 'os/_da phyis/_A ma la sarba'i ming can 
[\[72b.7\]]rnams la su Ta 'os/_su Ta A ga ma/_yuSh+ma/_sA ma/_a sma/_sA ma/_sA ma a kaM_sA ma gyi A kaM do/_/yuSh+mad a smad la rnam dbye drug pa'i A ma suT dang bcas pa'i sA ma zhes pa ni/_A kaM zhes par 'gyur te/_sAM A kaM du bsgyur/_a ka gi 'dra ba la ring po 'os/_yuSh+mA kaM//
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]asmA kaM/_yuSh+ma da a smad la rnam dbye bdun pa'i ngi/_gcig tshig la twa ma dag gos/_twa ad/_ngi/_ma ad/_ngi/_a tsa la ya 'os/_nga ya/_twa yi/_ma ya/_os drug pa'i skabs dang 'dra ste/_yu wa yoH/_A wa yoH/_yuSh+ma da a smad la/_bdun pa'i ma da tshig su pa/
[\[73a.2\]]yuSh+mad a smad dag gi kun nas ma bsgyur ba la 'os/_da A/_a ka gi 'dra pa la ring po 'os/_yuSh+mA su/_a smA su/_!_yang yuSh+mad a smad kyi lus 'gyur gzhan ni mi zad pa'i tshig sdud kyis rnam dbye rnams kyi gcig tshig bsdus rjes a ti snga ma can ni rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig dang mang tshig dang 
[\[73a.3\]]bzhi ba'i ngi/_drug pa'i ngas rnams ma gtogs pha rol du rnam dbye gang byung yang ad bor ba'i yuSh+ma ni twa dang ad por ba'i a sma ni ma zhes pa kho nar 'gyur te/_dper na/_twAM bA a ti/_mAM bA a ti zhes pa rnam dbye gnyis pa'i gcig tshig am/_tshig sdud kyis bsdus a ti sngon/_a ti 
[\[73a.4\]]yuSh+ma da/_a ti a smad ces pa la/_rnam dbye gong du smos pa rnams ma gtogs gang byung yang yuSh+ma twa dang asnam zhes par 'gyur/_de nas gong du bstan pa'i rang rang gi tshogs bsgrub ste/_rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig la/_a ti twaM/_a t+ya haM/_gnyis tshig la/_a ti twAM/_a timAM/
[\[73a.5\]]mang tshig ya/_a ti yU yaM/_a ti pa yaM/_gnyis pa'i gcig tshig la/_a ti tI/_a ti mAM/_gnyis tshig la/_a te twAM/_a ti mAM/_mang tshig la/_a ti twA na/_a ti mA na/_gsum pa'i gcig tshig la/_a ti twa yA/_a te ma yA/_gnyis tshig la/_a ti twA b+h+yAM/_a ti mA b+h+yaM/_mang 
[\[73a.6\]]tshig la/_a ti twA b+hiH/_a ti mA b+hiH/_bzhi pa'i gcig tshig la/_a ti tu b+h+yaM/_a tayi ma h+YaM/_gnyis tshig la/_a ti twA b+h+yAM/_a ti mA b+h+yAM/_mang tshig la/_a ti twa b+h+yaM/_a ti ma b+h+yaM/_lnga pa'i gcig tshig la/_a ti twa ta/_a ti ma ta/_gnyis tshig la/_a ti twA b+h+yAM/_a ti mA b+h+yAM/_mang 
[\[73a.7\]]tshig la/_a ti twa ta/_a ti ma ta/_dag pa'i gcig tshig la/_a ti ta wa/_a ti ma ma/_gnyis tshig la/_a ti twa yoH/_a ti ma yoH/_mang tshig la/_a ti twA kaM_/a ti mA kaM_/bdun pa'i gcig tshig la/_a ti twa yi/_a ti ma yi/_gnyis tshig la/_a ti tA yoH/_a ti ma yoH/
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]mang tshig la/_a ti twA su/_a ti mA su/_lta bu'o/_/yang mi zad pa'i tshig bsdu sa rjes a ti snga ma can ni gong du smos pa'i rnam dbye rnams bor ba'i pha rol du rnam dbye gang byung yang ad bor ba'i yuSh+ma ni yu wa dang /_ad por ba'i a sma nI wa zhes par 
[\[73b.2\]]'gyur te/_dper na/_yu waM a ti/_A waM a ti/_zhes ba la rnam dbye gnyis pa'i gnyis tshig au sdud kyis bsdus/_a ti sngon/_a ti yuSh+ma da/_a ti a sman ces pa la rnam dbye dmigs bsal bzhi po ma gtogs rnam dbye gang byung yang yuSh+ma ni yu wa dang /_asma ni A wa kho nar 
[\[73b.3\]]'gyur/_de nas rang rang gi cho ga gong du bshad pa rnams kyis bsgrubs bas/_dper na/_rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig la a te twaM/_a d+ya haM/_gnyis tshig la/_a ti yu wAM/_a ti A wAM/_mang tshig la/_a ti yU yaM/_a ti ba yaM/_gnyis pa'i gcig tshig la/_a te yu wAM/
[\[73b.4\]]a ti A wAM/_gnyis tshig la/_a ti yu wAM/_a ti A wAM/_mang tshig la/_a ti yu wA na/_a ti A wA na/_gsum pa'i gcig tshig la/_a ti yu wa yA/_a ti A wa yA/_gnyis tshig la/_a ti yu wA b+h+yAM/_a ti A wA b+h+yAM/_mang tshig la/_a ti yu wA b+hiH/_a ti A wA b+hiH/_bzhi pa'i 
[\[73b.5\]]gcig tshig la/_a ti tu b+h+yaM/_a ti ma h+YaM/_gnyis tshig la/_a ti yu wA b+h+yAM/_a ti A wA b+h+yAM/_ming tshig la/_ati yu wab+h+yaM/_a ti yu A wa b+h+yaM/_lnga pa'i gcig tshig la/_a te yu wa ta/_a ti A wa ta/_gnyis tshig la/_a ti yu wA b+h+yAM/_a ti A wA b+h+yAM/_mang tshig la/_a ti yu wa ta/
[\[73b.6\]]a ti A wa ta/_drug pa'i gcig tshig la/_a ti ta pa/_a ti ma ma/_gnyis tshig la/_a ti yu ba yoH/_a ti A ba yoH/_ming tshig la/_a ti yu bA kaM/_a ti A bA kaM/_bdun pa'i gcig tshig la/_a ti yu ba yi/_a ti A ba yi/_gnyis tshig la/_a ti yu ba yoH/_a ti A ba yoH/_mang 
[\[73b.7\]]tshig la/_a ti yu bA su/_a ti A bA su/_yang yuSh+man a ti/_asmAn a te/_gong bzhin mi zad pa'i tshig sdang[(]kyis [,]gis [)]rnam dbye rnams kyi mang tshig bsdus rjes a ti snga ma ni rnam dbye dmigs bsal bzhi po ma gtogs rnam dbye gang byung yang gzugs gzhan du mi 'gyur bar yuSh+mad_asmAn ces 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]pa nyid du gnas la/_de nas rnam dbye rang rang gi cho ga gong du bshad pa ltar bya ste/_gnyis pa'i mang tshig shas tshig sdud kyis bsdus te a ti sngon/_rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig la/_a ti twaM/_a ti a twaM/_gnyis tshig la/_a ti yuSh+mAM/_a ti a smAM/_mang tshig la/
[\[74a.2\]]a ti yU yaM/_a ti pa yaM/_gnyis pa'i gcig tshig la/_a ti yuSh+mAM/_a ti a smAM/_gnyis tshig la/_a ti yuSh+mAM/_a ti a smAM/_mang tshig la/_a ti yuSh+mAn/_a ti a smAn/_a ti a smAn/_gsum pa'i gcig tshig la/_a ti yuSh+ma yA/_a ti a sma yA/_gnyis tshig la/_a ti yuSh+mA b+h+yAM/_a ti 
[\[74a.3\]]asmA b+h+yAM/_mang tshig la/_a ti yuSh+mA b+hiH/_a ti a smA b+hiH/_bzhi pa'i gcig tshig la/_a ti tu b+h+yAM/_a ti ma h+YaM/_gnyis tshig la/_gnyis tshig la/_a ti yuSh+mA b+h+yAM/_a ti a smra b+h+yAM/_mang tshig la/_a ti yuSh+ma b+h+yaM/_a ti a sma b+h+yaM/_lnga ba'i gcig tshig la/_a ti yuSh+ma ta/_a ti a sma ta/_gnyis tshig 
[\[74a.4\]]la/_a ti yuSh+mA b+h+yAM/_a ti asmA b+h+yAM/_ming tshig la/_a ti yuSh+ma ta/_a ti asmata/_drug pa'i gcig tshig la/_a ti ra wa/_a ti ma ma/_gnyis tshig la/_a ti yuSh+ma yoH/_a ti asma yoH/_mang tshig la/_a ti yuSh+mA kaM/_a ti a smA kaM/_bdun pa'i gcig tshig la/_a ti yuSh+ma 
[\[74a.5\]]yi/_a ti a sma yi/_gnyis tshig la/_a ti yuSh+ma yoH/_a ti a sma yoH/_mang tshig la/_a ti yuSh+mA su/_a ti a smA su/_yuSh+ma da a smad rnam dbye dang bcas pa slar yang khyad par gzhan du 'gyur tshul ni/_yuSh+ma da sma doHSha Sh+ShI tsa tu n+b+ri twi tI yA s+tha yo rbAM nA wau/_yuSh+ma da a smad dag 
[\[74a.6\]]gi drug pa bzhi pa gnyis pa rnams gnas pa dag gi bAM no dag go/_/tshig gi thog ma ma yin pa la rnam dbye drug pa bzhi pa gnyis pa rnams kyi gnyis tshig gis bsgrubs zin pa/_yuSh+ma da a smad rnam dbye dang bcas pa bAM no zhes par 'gyur te/_dper na/_yuSh+ma da rnam dbye drug pa'i 
[\[74a.7\]]gnyis tshig gis bsgrubs zin pa/_yu ba yoH/_zhes pa bAM zhes par 'gyur/_a smad drug pa'i gnyis tshig gis bsgrubs zin pa/_a ba yoH/_zhes pa nau zhes par 'gyur/_de bzhin du bzhi pa'i gnyis tshig gis bsgrubs zhin pa/_yu bA b+h+yAM ni bAM dang /_A bA b+h+yAM ni no zhes par 'gyur/
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]de bzhin du/_gnyis pa'i gnyis tshig gis bsgrubs zin pa/_yu bAM/_ni/_bAM dang /_A bAM ni nau zhes par 'gyur ro/_/ba hu ba tsa na s+ya ba sna sau/_mang tshig gi bas nas dag go/_/rnam dbye drug pa bzhi pa gnyis pa rnams kyi mang tshig gis bsgrubs zin pa/_yuSh+mA kaM dang yuSh+ma b+h+yaM dang yuSh+mA na rnams pas zhes 
[\[74b.2\]]par 'gyur/_a smA kaM dang /_asmab+h+yaM dang /_a smAn rnams nas zhes par 'gyur ro/_/te ma yA be ka ba tsa na s+ya/_gcig tshig gi te me dag go/_/rnam dbye drug pa dang bzhi pa'i gcig tshig gis bsgrubs zin pa/_tu b+h+ya ma dang ta pa dag te zhes par 'gyur/_ma h+YaM dang /_ma ma dag me zhes par 
[\[74b.3\]]'gyur ro/_twA mau dwi tI yA yAH/_gnyis pa'i twA mA dag go/_/rnam dbye gnyis ba'i gcig tshig gis bsgrubs zin pa'i/_twAM zhes pa ni twA dang /_mAM zhes pa ni mA zhes par 'gyur ro/_!_/de dag tshigs bcad dang sbyar ba'i dper brjod ni/_shrI sha s+t+wA wa tu mA pI ha da N+wA t+te me bi sha rmasaH/_swA mI 
[\[74b.4\]]te me bis ha riHbA ta bA ma pi nau pi b+huH/_de yang bod skad la/_dpal gyi dbang phyug khyod bsrung ba dag la yang /_/khyod la sbyin pa bdag la'ang bde ba stsol/_/khyod kyi rje de 'phrog byed bdag gi yang /_/mnga' bdag khyod dag la bsrung pa dag la yang /_/zhes pa ste/_tshig rkang dang po'i yi ge 
[\[74b.5\]]gsum pa la twA dang drug pa la mA zhes pa ni khyod la dang bdag la zhes gnyis ba'i gcig tshig dang /_tshig rkang gnyis pa'i yi ge gnyis pa la te dang gsum pa la me ni khyod kyi ched don la bdag gi ched don la zhes pa'i don gyi khyod la dang bdag la ste bzhi pa'i gcig tshig_/tshig rkang gsum pa'i yi 
[\[74b.6\]]ge gsum pa te dang bzhi ba me ni khyod kyi dang bdag gi zhes drug pa'i gcig tshig_/tshig rkang bzhi ba'i yi ge gsum pa bAM dang lnga pa nau ni khyod dag la dang nged dag la zhes gnyis pa'i gnyis tshig go/_/de bzhin du/_su khaM bAM da dA twI shaH/_dbang phyug khyod dag la bde ba sbyin/_su khaM nau da dA twI shaH/
[\[74b.7\]]dbang phyug nged dag la bde ba sbyin/_zhes pa/_bA ma dang nau ni khyod dag la dang nged dag la zhes bzhi ba'i gnyis tshig go/_/pa ti bAM ha riH/_khyed dag gi bdag po 'phrog byed/_pa ti nau gu ruH/_nged dag gi bdag po bla ma/_zhes pa'i bAM dang nau ni khyed dag gi dang nged dag gi zhes drug pa'i gnyis 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]tshig go/_/ta myA byA two/_de'i khyed rnams la bsrung bar mdzod/_ta s+yA byA tA+o/_de'i nged rnams la yang bsrung bar mdzod/_ces pa'i bo dang no ni khyed rnams la nged rnams la zhes gnyis pa'i mang tshig go/_/su khaM bo da d+yAr/_bde ba khyed rnams la sbyin/_su khaM no da byA ra/_bde ba 
[\[75a.2\]]nged rnams la sbyin/_zhes pa'i/_bo dang no ni khyod rnams la nged rnams la zhes bzhi ba'i mang tshig go/_/ba ti baHha riH/_khyod rnams kyi bdag po 'phrog byed/_ba tinaHbud+d+haH/_nged rnams kyi bdag po sangs rgyas/_zhes pa'i/_baHdang naHni khyed rnams kyi dang ded rnams kyi zhes drug pa'i 
[\[75a.3\]]mang tshig go/_/slar yang kun nas bsgyur ba de rnams 'dod na yin gyi mi byed du mi rung ba ma yin pas 'dam ka can no/_/tshig gi thog ma ma yin pa la zhes pas/_tshig re re'i dang po ste thog ma la/_twAM mAM sogs rnam 'gyur thog ma kho na byed kyi/_twA mA la sogs pa rnams su mi 'gyur te/
[\[75a.4\]]dper na/_twAM pA tu/_mAM pA tu/_zhes pa lta bu dwA mA zhes par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du/_gnyis pa'i mang tshig gi dper brjod/_yuSh+mA na rak+Sha tu go bin+daH/_asmAn bud+d+haHsarba dA pA tu/_zhes pa bas nas su mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar drug pa'i gnyis tshig gi dper brjod/_yu wa yoHpu tra/_A wa yoH
[\[75a.5\]]pu tra/_zhes_khyed la bsrung /_pa yu ba yoH/_bAM dang /_A ba yoH/_no zhes bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gzhan rnams kyang_khyod la bsrung ba'i mdzod khyab 'jug_/bdag la sangs rgyas kyis rtag tu skyong bar mdzod/_de dag gis rigs 'gre'o/_na tsa bA hA he ba yuk+te/_tsa bA a ha ha e wa rnams _khyod dag gi bu/_nged dag gi bu/
[\[75a.6\]]sbyor ba lam yin no/_tsa la sogs pa lnga po rnams dang sbyor ba'i tshe yang te me sogs slar yang kun nas bsgyur pa de dag mi byed do/_/dper na/_ta wa tsa ma ma tsa me trI tsan+da le khe ba d+d+ha te/_khyod dang nga yi byams 'dris ni/_zla ba yar ngo bzhin du 'phel/_/zhes pa lta bu ste/_te tsa me tsa mi zer bar/_/ha wa 
[\[75a.7\]]tsa mam tsa zer ba lta bu'o/_/sdeb sbyor bsgrigs pa dang tshig rkang mi 'grig pa'i skyon yod na tsa sogs dang sbyor ba'i skabs yin kyang te me sogs su bsgyur ba mi 'gog go zhes pa 'grel par gsung ngo /_/pa sh+yA m+bai sh+yA nA lo tsa na/_lta ba'i don rnams kyi yang mig gis mi mthong ba la'o/_/lta ba'i don dang 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]sbyor ba'i cha yang mig gis mthong ba'i don yin te me sogs su 'gyur la _mig gis mthong ba'i don ma yin na te me sogs su mi 'gyur bar ta ba ma ma sogs kho nar gnas so/_/'grel yar bod tshig bar ma chad pa gnyis sngon yod na te me sogs su 'gyur la/_bod tshig byin pa'i tshig gcig sngon na yod 
[\[75b.2\]]na te me sogs su mi 'gyur zhes pa byung ste/_de yang dper na/_de bA smA n+pA hi nr-i ha re/_bi Sh+No sa nyasmA nrak+Sha sa rba dA/_kye lha bdag rnams la skyong mi'i seng ge/_rtag par bdag rnams la srungs khyab 'jug kye/_zhes pa lta bu ste/_de ba nas sogs mi 'byung bar/_de ba smAn/_biSh+No_a smAn zhes byung ba bzhin no/
[\[75b.3\]]bod tshig byin pa gnyis sngon na yod na 'gyur te/_dper na/_ha re kr-i pA lonaHpA hi/_nged rnams la skyongs brtse ldan 'phrog byed kye/_zhes pa lta bu ste/_ha re _kr-i pA lo zhes bod tshig byin pa gnyis kyi rjes su naH/_zhes byung ba lta bu'o/_bod tshig byin pa gcig las med kyang nga'i gong na tshig gzhan 
[\[75b.4\]]yod nanaHsogs su 'gyur te/_sa rA dA rak+Sha de ba naH/_kyi lha bdag rnams la srungs rtag tu ni/_/zhes pa lta bu/_de ba zhes bod tshig byin pa gcig las med kyang de'i gong nas rba dA rak+Sha zhes tshig gnyis yod pas naH/_zhes pa byung ba lta bu'o/_/de rnams kyis yuSh+ma da asmad kyi cho ga rnams bshad 
[\[75b.5\]]zin to/_/yuSh+ma da asmad gnyis ni yul pho mo ma ning gsum po gang la yang 'jug tu rung ba la/_dngos su pho mo ma ning gi rnam 'gyur logs na med do/_!_/da yig mtha' can/_su pA da la/_su/_ha la dI pa A ba sogs kyis su phyis/_gnas med pa la yang na 'os/_su pA ta/_su pA da/_au dang 
[\[75b.6\]]dzas la/_su bA dau/_su bA daH/_bod tshig kyang dang po dang 'dra/_am dang au la/_su bA daM/_su bA dau/_shes la/_bA daH/_ba ta/_bA da kyi pa da'o_/bA da ces pa'i rtags ni/_rkang mdzes/_shas nas bzung rnam dbye a tsa thog ma can rnams la ba da ces u pa d+hA thung ngur 'gyur ro/_/su pa ngaH/
[\[75b.7\]]gsum pa rnams la/_su ba dA/_su bA d+b+hAM/_su bA d+b+hiH/_bzhi pa rnams la/_su ba de/_su bA d+b+h+yAM/_su pA d+b+h+yaH/_nga si la/_su pa daH/_b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_su ba daH/_su pa doH/_su pa dAM/_bdun pa la/_su pa di/_su pa doH/_su pA dA/_!_/tha yig mtha' can/_mi srubs ba/_ag+ni ma tha 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]la su/_ha la dI pa sogs kyis su phyis/_gnas med pa la yang na 'os/_tha? da? 'am tra/_ag+ni ma ta/_a ga ni mad/_au dang dzas la/_ag+ni mthau/_ag+ni ma thaH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_ag+ni ma thaM/_a g+ni mthau/_a g+ni ma thaH/_TA la/_ag+ni ma thA/_b+h+yA ma b+his la/_dz+ha la gyi dza sha 'os/_tha? da? 
[\[76a.2\]]a g+ni mad+b+hAM/_a g+ni ma d+b+haMH/_nga si la/_ag+ni ma thaH/_b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_ag+ni ma thaH/_ag+ni ma thoH/_ag+ni ma thAM/_ngi la/_ag+ni ma thi/_os la/_ag+ni ma thoH/_su pa la/_dz+ha la gyi dza sha 'os/_tha? da?/_/bar la tsar 'os da? ta?/_ag+ni ma trU/_bod tshig la?/_he ag+ni ma ta?/_he 
[\[76a.3\]]ag+ni ma da?/_he ag+ni mthau/_he ag+ni ma thaH/_!_tsa yig mtha' can/_pra aM tsuM/_r-i twi ka sogs kyis kwin/_kwin yongs rdzogs phyis/_a ni di tAM ha la u bad+hA ya' k+di ti/_ita 'gro ba rnams ma yin pa'i hal gyi u pad+hA'i kwa da? 'gro ba la'o/_/ita 'gro ba rnams ma yin pa'i ha la te gsal 
[\[76a.4\]]byed srog med mtha' can gyi u bad+hA'i na yig ni ka? yig 'gro ba'i/_sngon nam shar/_rkyen pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste/_'dir kwi na ka 'gro ba yin pas u pad+hA'i na phyis/_pra a tsu la/_su/_ug 'gro ba a tsa rnams kyi thams cad gnas pa'i ming can rnams la byings ma yin pa la 'os/
[\[76a.5\]]num u de'i don yin pas phyis/_pra an tsa/_su/_ha la sogs kyis su phyis/_yang dag bar sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/_tsa? phyis/_rkyen/_kwin gyi ku 'os/_nang /_brAd/_au dang dzas la num/_prA ny+tsau/_prA ny+tsaH/_a ma dang au la yang /_num/_prA ny+tsaM/_prA ny+tsau/_shas la/_a tsaH/_/
[\[76a.6\]]a tsa'i 'o/_a tsa zhes u pad+hA'i na phyis pa de'i pha rol du shas la sogs pa a tsa thog ma can rnams byung na a tsa zhes pa'i a yang dbyi bar bya ste/_a phyis/_pa? tsa?/_shas/_tsau/_tsa la'o/_a phyis zin pa'i tsa? zhes pa de'i sngon na a Na so sor bsdu ba ste/_a i u gsum yod 
[\[76a.7\]]na ring por 'gyur te/_pra ring par bsgyur/_prA tsaH/_TA la/_prA tsA/_b+h+yAM b+his la/_rkyen/_kwin gyi ku 'os/_tsA ku/_dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/_kra gra/_prA g+b+h+yAM/_prA g+b+hiH/_bzhi pa rnams la/_brA tse/_prA g+b+h+yAM/_prA g+b+h+yaH/_nga si la/_prA tsaH/_b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]rnams la/_prA tsaH/_prAtsoH/_brA tsAM/_ngios la/_prA tsi/_prA tsoH/_su pa la/_kwin gyi ku 'os/_tsa?ka?/_kun nas bsgyur ba dang rkyen dag la 'os/_saSha/_ka Sha 'dus pa k+Sha/_prA k+Sha/_bod tshig la/_he prA nga /_he prA ny+tsaH/_!_bra t+ya tsa sogs kyang 'di dang 'dra'o/_/yang any+tsa la 
[\[76b.2\]]brten pa'i ming sngon ma la rnam 'gyur 'jug tshul ni/_biSh+pa g+de ba yo sh+tsa Te ra d+r+yaM tsa tau rkyen/_ba bra t+ya ye/_bi Sh+wa ka de wa dag gi'ang Ti'i a dri any+tsa ba 'gro pa'i rkyen can la'o/_/any+tsa ba'i rkyen can gyi sngon du biSh+wa ka ces pa'i rtags dang de wa dang sa rba'i ming can rnams byung na rtags de rnams kyi tri ni a dri 
[\[76b.3\]]zhes par 'gyur te/_a dang i/_a tsa zhes gnas pa la/_a da so sa rdA du domaH/_a das kyi sa'i ra la u ste da'i 'ang ma'o/_/a das zhes pa'i sa ni da rung gyur la/_da la u ste da de yang ma ru 'gyur zhing /_de yang sngon gyi slob dpon rnams la las da gnyis ka ma dang u ru 'gyur bar 
[\[76b.4\]]'dod/_la las phyi ma kho na ing dai mi zad pa'o/_mu zhes par 'gyur bar 'dod do/_/a mu mu ya tsa/_su/_uka 'gro ba a tsa rnams kyi zhes pas/_num/_ha la sogs kyis su phyis/_yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi'os/_tsa phyis/_kwin gyi ku 'os nang /_a mu mu yang /_au dang dzas la/_a 
[\[76b.5\]]mu mu yAny+tsau/_a mu mu ta ny+tsaH/_am dang au la/_a mu mu yany+tsaM/_a mu mu yany+tsau/_shas la/_a tsa'i 'os a phyis/_u mu mu i tsa shas/_tsa? la 'os/_i ring po/_a mu mu I tsoH/_DA la/_a mu mu I tsAM/_b+h+yAm b+his la/_kwan gyi ku/_rkyen/_dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dzad sha rnams sos/_ka? ga?/
[\[76b.6\]]a mu mu ya k+ShAM/_a mu mu ya g+hiH/_nge la a mu mu I tse/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_a mu mu I tsaH/_b+h+yam b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_a mu mu I tsaH/_a mu mu I tsauH/_a mu mu I tsAM/_ngi aus la/_a mu mu I tsi/_rkyen/_a mu mu I tsoH/_ku ba la/_kwin gyi ku/_kun nas 
[\[76b.7\]]bsgyur pa sogs kyis saSha/_ka Sha 'dus pak+Sha/_a mu mu yak+Shu/_bod tshig rnams kyang dang po dang 'dra'o/_/yang na da phyi ma kho na mu ru 'gyur/_a da mu ya tsa/_zhes pa la/_cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra/_yang na/_bi? Sh+wa kwa de wa dag gi'ang Ti'i a _rkyan /_dri sogs kyi mdos 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]a das kyi Ti/_a dri ru 'gyur/_la las snga ma kho na'i dmar 'gyur bar 'dod pas/_a mu d+r+ya tsa zhes par 'gyur/_rnam dbye dang phrad pa'i cho ga snga ma rnams dang 'dra/_yang na da snga ma yang mar ma bsgyur pa/_a da d+r+ya tsa/_zhes pa la rnam dbye rnams ster te/_de dag a das a tsa dang 
[\[77a.2\]]bcas pa la rnam dbye 'jug tshul gzugs bzhi po 'dam ka can no/_/yang u ta snga ma'i a tsa/_u da tsa la/_su au dzas/_u dang /_u dany+tsau/_u dany+tsaH/_a ma dang au la/_u dany+tsaM/_u dany+tsau/_u da tsa/_shas la/_u daH/_I ta/_u ta las I ta'o/_/u ta snga ma'i a tsa'i a rnam dbye shas 
[\[77a.3\]]la sogs pa a tsa thog ma can rnams pha rol la I ru 'gyur ro/_/u dI tsaH/_TA la/_u dI tsA/_b+h+yA ma b+his la/_u da g+b+h+yAM/_a da g+b+hiH/_nge la/_u dI tse/_b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_u dI tsaH/_b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_u dI tsoH/_u dI tsAM/_bdun pa rnams la/
[\[77a.4\]]u dI tsi/_u dI tsoH/_u da k+Shu/_bod tshig rnams rnam dbye dang po dang 'dra'o/_/sa maHsa miH/_sam gyi sa mi 'o/_/a tsa zhes pa'i rtags kyi snga ma'i nyer bskyur sam ni sa mi zhes bar 'gyur te/_sa mya tsa zhes pa'ang cho ga rnams bra tsa'i skabs dang 'dra'o/_/ti ras a tsa/_su/_ti 
[\[77a.5\]]rAsti r+Ya lo pi/_ti ras kyi ti ri mi dbyi ba la'o/_/ti ras zhes pa ni a tsa a dbyi ba ma yin pa pha rol la ti ri zhes par 'gyur te/_ti r+Ya tsa/_su/_u ka 'gro ba sogs kyis num/_hal dI pa A ba sogs kyis yang dag pa su phyis yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os ca phyis/_kwin gyi ku 'os nang 
[\[77a.6\]]ti r+Yang /_au dang dzas la/_tir+Ya ny+tsau/_ti r+Ya ny+tsaH/_a ma dang aul/_ti r+Yany+tsaM/_ti r+Ya ny+tsau/_shas la/_a tsa'i 'os/_a phyis/_ti ras kyi ti ji mi dbyi ba la'o zhes pas a ma phyis na ti ri zhes par 'gyur yang 'dir shas nas bzung dbyangs thog ma can rnams la a dbyi bas ti ras nyid rkyen/_du gnas/
[\[77a.7\]]dud 'gro rgyags po/_sa tu'i sha tsu la sha tsu 'os/_sa sha/_tir sh+tsaH/_TA la/_tir sh+tsA/_b+h+yAM b+his la/_tir+Ya g+b+h+yaM/_tir+Ya g+b+hiH/_nge la/_ti ra sh+tse/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_ti ra sh+tsaH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_ti ra sh+tsaH/_tir sh+tsoH/_ti ra sh+tsoH/_tir Sh+tsAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_ti ra sh+tsi/_tir sh+tsoH/
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]ti r+Yak+Shu/_bod tshig dang po dang 'dra'o/_/nAM tsaHpU dzA yAM/_any+tsa'i mchod pa la ma yin no/_/mchod pa'i don la any+tsa zhes pa'i u pa d+hA'i na dbyi ba ma yin te/_bra any+tsa su/_ha la sogs kyis su phyis/_yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/_tsa phyis/_kwan gyi ku 'os/_na da/_brAng /_au 
[\[77b.2\]]dar dzas la/_brA ny+tsau/_brAny+tsaH/_a ma au shas rnams la/_brA ny+tsaM/_prA ny+tsau/_prA ny+tsaH/_TA 'a/_prA ny+tsA/_b+h+yA ma b+his la/_yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/_rab tu mthong /_tsa phyis/_kwin gyi ku 'os/_nra du/_prA d+b+h+yAM/_prA d+d+hiH/_nge la/_prA ny+tse/_b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_byin/_prA ny+tsaH/_b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'dra/_drug 
[\[77b.3\]]pa rnams la/_prA ny+tsaH/_prA ny+tsoH/_prA ny+tsAM/_ngi dang os la/_brA ny+tsi/_prAny+tsoH/_su ba la/_dra Na dag gi shar la kuka Tu ka 'os/_ku ka A ga ma/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/_rkyen/_ka Sha 'dus pa k+Sha/_prAM k+Sha/_yang na kuka A gam mi ster/_prAM Shu/_bod tshig rnams la/_he prA pa/_te prA ny+tsau/_he 
[\[77b.4\]]prA ny+tsaH/_kruny+tsa yang 'di dang 'dra'i/_!_/tsa yig mtha' can/_pa yo mu tsa la/_su/_tsu'i ku 'os/_tsa ku/_gnas med pa la yang na 'os/_pa yo mu ka_/pa yo mu ga_/au dang dzas la/_pa yo mu tso/_pa yo mu tsaH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_pa yo mu tsa/_ba yo mu tsau/_pa yo mu tsaH/_TA la/_pa yo mu tsA/_b+h+yAM b+h+rais la/
[\[77b.5\]]tsu'i gu 'os/_tsa? ka?/_dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/_kra ga_/ba yo mu g+b+h+yAM/_pa yo mu g+b+hiH/_nge la/_pa yo mu tseH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_pa yo mu tsaH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_pa yo mu tsaH/_pa yomu tsoH/_pa yo mu tsAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_pa yo mu tsi/_pa yo mu tsoH/_pa yo muk+Shu/_bod 
[\[77b.6\]]tshig rnams rnam dbye dang po dang 'dra/_!_tsa yig mtha' can/_su b-i Sh+tsal/_su/_yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' snga ma'i su ku dag gi'ang ngos/_sha phyis/_pra sh+tsa b+h+ra sh+dza sogs kyis tsaShA/_dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/_Sha Da/_gnas med pa la yang na 'os/_su bri Ta_/su br-i Da/
[\[77b.7\]]o dang dzas la/_su khri sh+tsau/_su br-i sh+tsaH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_su br-i sh+tsaM/_su br-i sh+tsau/_su br-i sh+tsaH/_TA la/_su br-i sh+tsA/_b+h+yAM b+his la/_su br-i d+b+h+yAM/_su br-i d+b+hiH/_nge la/_su br-i sh+tse/_b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_su br-i sh+tsaH/_b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_su bri sh+tsaH/_su br-i sh+tsoH/_bdun pa rnams la/
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]su br-i sh+tsi/_su br-i sh+tsoH/_bod tshig rnams la/_he su dr-i Da/_he su br-i Ta/_he su br-i sh+tsaH/_!_ta yig mtha' can/_ma ha ta la/_su/_u ka 'gro ba sogs kyis num/_sa mtha' ma ha ta dag gi yang dag par sbyor ba'i 'os u pa b+h+yA ring po/_ta la sogs kyis su phyis/_yang 
[\[78a.2\]]dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/_ta byis/_ma hA na/_au dang dzas la/_ma hA n+tau/_ma hA n+taH/_am dang o la/_ma hA n+taM/_ma hA n+to/_shas la/_ma ha te/_chen po/_TA la/_b+h+yAm dang b+his la/_dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/_tra dra/_ma ha d+d+h+yaM/_ma ha d+d+hiH/_nge la/_ma ha te/_b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/
[\[78a.3\]]ma ha taH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_ma ha taH/_ma ha toH/_ma ha toH/_ma ha tAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_ma ha ti/_ma ha toH/_ma ha t+su/_bod tshig la/_he ma ha na/_he ma hA n+tau+u/_he ma hA n+tAH/_b+ha wa ta la yang u pad+b+hA ring por mi 'gyur/_gzhan cho ga thams cad ma ha ta dang 'dra'o/_d+he ma te ces ba la yang /_a ta as 
[\[78a.4\]]mtha'i 'ang byings ma yin pa'i 'o zhes pas su'i skabs su u pad+hA ring po byed/_gzhan thams cad b+ha wa ta dang 'dra'o/_/a tra b+ha wa ta dang /_ta tra b+ha wa ta ces pa la'ang mchod pa'i don la su'i skabs su u pad+hA ring po byed/_gzhan ma thams cad ng+him ra dang 'dra'o/_/dza sha su ta ces pa' ba a tra b+ha wa ta dang 
[\[78a.5\]]'dra'o/_/a b+ha wa ta dang b+ha ga wa ta gnyis kyang cho ga thams cad d+hi ma ta dang 'dra/_saM bu d+d+hi la 'dam ka can te/_d+hi ma ta dang 'dra pa'i phyogs la/_he b+ha ga wa na/_he a g+ha wa na/_yang na 'dam ka/_d+ha wa ta b+ha ga wa ta a ta a g+ha wa ta rnams kyi yang na ste a wa o ta yeng ngos/_a wa o ta du 'gyur/_yang spras ta 
[\[78a.6\]]sro ga med ru u brjod don/_skal ldan/_he b+ha boH/_he a g+ho la/_!_u b+he a b+h+ya staM/_gnyis pa la a bru sta'o/_/da da ta ces pa lta bu'i yi ge 'dra ba gnyis btud nas yod pa de la a b+h+ya sta'i ming can zhes brda chad byed do/_/da da ta la/_su/_nA b+ha stA ts+tsha tu/_a b+h+ya sta las sha tu'i ma yin no/_/a b+h+ya sta'o ming 
[\[78a.7\]]can las kr-i sogs kyi rkyen sha tu'i mtha' can la rnam dbye thams cad gnas pa rnams la'ang num ster ba ma yin te/_sbyin/_num mi steng /_ha la sogs kyis su phyis/_gnas med pa la yang na 'os/_da dang /_da da ta/_au la/_da da tau/_rnam dbye a tsa thog ma can thams cad de dang 'dra la/_b+h+yA ma la/_dz+ha sha la dz+ha la 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/_ta da/_da da d+b+hAM/_ha la dang po can rnams 'di dang 'dra/_bod tshig dang po dang 'dra'o/_/ta yig mtha' can dzak+Sha ta thogs la/_dzak+Sha tA da yaHShaT/_dzak+Sha sogs drug la'ang ngo /_/dzak+Sha sogs drug dang tsakAs rnams la'ang sha tu'i rkyen mtha' can la ya b+ha sta'i ming can zer te/_num 
[\[78b.2\]]'gog pa'i don du'o/_/dzak+Sha sogs sha tu'i mtha' can ni/_dzak+Shatra/_dI b+h+ya ta/_da ri dra ta/_shA sa ta/_bya bya ta/_tsa kwas da/_rnams te 'di rnams la rnam dbye sbyor ba'i cho ga thams cad da da ta dang 'dra'o/_!_/ba yig mtha' can ha maM gu ba la su/_hal sogs kyis su phyis/_gnas med pa la yang na 'os/
[\[78b.3\]]d+harma gug_d+harma gug_au dang dzas la/_d+ha rma ku bau/_d+ha rma gu baH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_d+harma gu raM/_d+ha rma gu pau/_d+harma gu paH/_/TA la/_d+ha rma gu pA/_b+h+yAM b+his la/_dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/_pas/_d+ha rma gu b+h+yAM/_d+ha rma gu bliH/_chos gsang pa/_bzhi ba rnams la/_d+ha rma gu be/_d+ha rma gu s+b+h+yAM/_d+harma gu b+b+h+yAH/_nga si 
[\[78b.4\]]la/_d+ha rma gu paH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_d+harma gu paH/_d+harma gu poH/_d+ha rma gu pAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_d+ha rma gu pi/_d+ha rma gu po/_d+ha rma gu p+su/_bod tshig rnams la/_he d+harma gu pa/_he d+harma gu ba/_he d+harma gu pau/_he d+harma gu paH/_!_/sha yig mtha' can/_t+yA dr-i sha la/_su/_hal sogs kyis su 
[\[78b.5\]]phyis/_kwan gyi ku 'os/_she ka/_gnas med pa la yang 'os/_t+yA dr-i ka/_t+yA dri ga/_o dang dzas la/_t+yA dr-i shaH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_t+yA dr-i shaM/_t+yA dr-i shaMH/_t+yA dr-i shaH/_gsum pa rnams la/_t+yA dr-i shA/_t+yA dr-i l+b+hAM/_de la/_trA dr-i sha/_b+ham b+has 'dra/_nga si la/_de mthong ba/_b+hAm b+h+yas 'dra/_drug 
[\[78b.6\]]ba rnams la/_d+yAdr-i shaH/_t+yA dr-i shoH/_t+yA dr-i shAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_t+yA dr-i shi/_t+yA dr-i shoH/_t+yA dr-i k+ShA/_bod tshig rnam dbye dang po dang 'dra/_t+ya dA diShu dr-i sho nyan+Da la tsa ne kany+tsa/_t+ya da sogs rnams ka dr-i sha'i mi mthong ba la ka nya'ang ngo /_/t+yad sogs snga ma'i dr-i sha la mthong ba'i don ma yin pa la kra ta sogs kyi 
[\[78b.7\]]ming du bsgrub pa'i rkyen ka nya yang na 'jug bas/_ka nya byin na/_t+yA dr-i sha/_zhes pa grub ste/_de'i tshe rnam dbye'i cho ga rnams spyir btang a thung mtha' can rA ma'i skabs dang 'dra'o/_/'grel par/_sa mA na snga ma'i dr-i sha la krin kho na 'jug ste/_de'i ches mA na yang sa zhes par 'gyur ro zhes byung pas/
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]sa dri sha/_zhes pa la rnam dbye dang phrad pa'i cho ga rnams t+yA dr-i sha dang 'dra'o/_!_/sha yig mtha' can/_bi sha la/_su/_brash+tsa b+h+raSh+dza sogs kyi mdos sha Sha/_ha la dI ba zhes pas su phyis/_gnas med pa la yang na 'os/_biT/_biT/_au dang dzas la/_bi shau/_bi shaH/_gnyis pa rnams 
[\[79a.2\]]mnyam par blta ba'am mtshungs ba blta/_bi shaM/_baM shau/_bi shaH/_TA la/_bi shA/_b+h+yAm b+his la/_brash+tsa sogs kyi sha Sha/_dz+hasha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/_ShaDa/_bid+b+h+yAM/_bid+b+hiH/_nge la/_bi she/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_bishaH/_b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_bi shaH/_bishoH/_bishAM/_ngi la/
[\[79a.3\]]bi shi/_os la/_bi shoH/_su pa la/_biTU/_yang na Da las la d+huT 'os/_d+huT u ga ma/_khar la tsar 'os/_d+ha ta Da Ta/_baD+b+h+yA/_bod tshig rnams la/_he bi Ta/_he bi Da/_he bi shau/_he bi shaH/_sha yig mtha' can/_na sha la/_su/_na she nA/_na sha'i yang na'o/_/na sha zhes pa'i sha ni dz+hal so sor 
[\[79a.4\]]bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams pha rol dang tshig mtha' la yang sha ka ru 'gyur te/_sha ka/_su phyis/_gnas med pas/_nag_/nag_/yang na brash+tsa sogs kyis sha Sha/_gnas med pa sogs kyis naT/_naT/_au dang dzas la/_mi mthong ba'am nyams pa/_na sha/_na shaH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_na shaM/_na shau/_na shaH/_TA 
[\[79a.5\]]la/_na shA/_b+h+yAm la yang na bar byas bas/_na D+b+h+yAM/_na D+b+h+yAM/_b+his la/_na Sh+b+hiH/_nag+b+hiH/_nge la/_na she/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_na shaH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_na shaH/_na shoH/_na shAM/_ngi la/_na shi/_os la/_na shoH/_sub la/_na d+bU/_naD+Yu/_nak+Shu/_bod tshig la/_he na ka/_he na ga/_he na Ta/_he na Da/
[\[79a.6\]]he na shau/_he na shaH/_!_sbra sho nu da ke kwi na/_sbr-i sha'o chu ma yin pa la kwi na'o/_/spri sha reg ba la'o zhes ba'i byings la chu'i don ma yin pa la ming du bsgrub pa'i rkyen kwin 'dug go/_/zhes bas kwin byin pa'i mtha' can g+h+r-i ta spr-i sha la/_su/_kIn gyi ku 'os sha ka/_su phyis/_gnas med pa la yang na 'os/_g+h+r-i ta spr-i ka/
[\[79a.7\]]g+h+r-i ta spr-i ka/_au dang dzas la/_g+h+r-i ta spri shau/_g+h+r-i ta spr-i shaH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_g+h+r-i ta spr-i shaM/_g+h+r-i ta spr-i shau/_g+h+r-i ta sprar shaH/_TA la/_g+h+r-i ta spr-i shA/_b+h+yAM b+his la/_rkyen/_kwin gyi ku 'os sha ka/_dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/_mnga' reg/_rkyen/_ka ga/_g+h+r-i ta spr-i g+b+h+yAM/_g+h+r-i ta spr-i g+b+hiH/_sogs rigs 'gre'o/_/chu'i don 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]yin na/_u da ka spr-i sha la/_su/_braSh+tsa sogs kyis sha Sha/_gnas med pa sogs kyis/_u da ka spr-iT/_u da ka spr-iT sogs bi sha dang 'dra'o/_!_Sha rigs mtha' can/_dad+h-i Sha la/_su/_kwin gyi ku 'os/_Sha ka/_gnas med pa sogs kyis/_da d+h-I ka_/dad+h+r-i ga_/au dang dzas la/_da d+h+r-i Shau/_da d+h+r-i ShaH/_gnyis 
[\[79b.2\]]pa rnams la/_nus deg_da d+h+r-i ShaM/_da d+h+r-i Shau/_da d+h+r-i ShaH/_TA la/_da d+h+r-i ShA/_b+h+yAm b+his la/_kwin gyi gu 'os/_Sha ka/_dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/_ku gu/_da d+h+r-i g+b+h+yIH/_da d+h+r-i g+b+hiH/_nge la/_rtsem/_da d+h+r-i She/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_da d+h+r-i ShaH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_da d+h+r-i ShaH/_da d+h+r-i ShoH/_da 
[\[79b.3\]]d+h+r-i ShAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_dad+h+r-i Shi/_da d+h+r-i ShoH/_da d+h+r-i k+Shu/_bod tshig rnams la/_he da d+h+r-i ka_rtses_har d+h+r-i ga/_her ng+h+raShau/_he da d+h+r-i ShaH/_!_Sha yig mtha' can/_rat+na mu Sha la/_su/_su phyis/_dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/_ShaDa/_gnas med pa la yang na 'os/_rat+na mu Ta/_rat+na mu Ta/_au dang dzas 
[\[79b.4\]]la/_rat+na mu Shau/_rat+na mu ShaH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_rat+na mu ShaM/_rat+na mu Shau/_rat+na mu ShaH/_TA la/_rat+na mu ShA/_b+h+yAm b+his la/_dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/_rat+na mu d+b+h+yAM/_rat+na ma d+b+hiH/_nge la/_rat+na mu She/_b+h+yA b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_rat+na mu ShaH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_rat+na 
[\[79b.5\]]mu ShaH/_rat+na mu ShoH/_rat+na mu ShAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_rat+na mu Shi/_rat+na ShoH/_rat+na mu T+su/_bod tshig rnams rnam dbye dang po dang 'dra/_!_/Sha yig mtha' can/_Sha Sha la dzas/_Sha Ta rnams la dbyi 'os/_dzas/_shas/_'jig/_dz+ho sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/_Sha Ta/_gnas med pa 
[\[79b.6\]]sogs kyis/_Sha Ta/_Sha Ta/_shas la'ang /_Sha Ta/_Sha Ta/_b+his la/_Sha d+b+hiH/_b+h+yas gnyis la/_Sha d+b+h+yaH/_A ma la/_Sha Da tsa tu ra rnams la'ang ngos/_nu Ta/_drug_ra Sha sogs kyis na Na/_dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/_Sha Da/_yar gyi rjes su sna ldan la rjes su sna ldan yang na 'os/_Da Na/
[\[79b.7\]]ShaD+b+h+yAM/_Sha d+b+haM/_su pa la/_ShaT+su/_ShaT+t+su/_bod tshig la/_he Sha Ta/_he Sha Ta/_!_Sha Sha zhes grangs bgrod ba'i don ma yin na rnam dbye thams cad 'jug la/_de'i tshe rnam dbye 'jug tshul gyi tshogs thams cad rat+na mu Sha'-i skabs dang 'dra'o/_!_/Sha yig mtha' can/_bi pa Thi Sha la/_su/_su phyis/_sas 
[\[80a\]]
