[\[80a.1\]]juSha dag gi ru 'os/_Sha ru u brjod don/_pi pa Thir/_rbo ru pa d+hA yA dI r+g+ha i kaH/_ru bu dag gi u pa d+hA'i ring po i ka gi 'o/_/ru yig dang bu yig srog med kyi u pad+lA i ka so sor bsdu pa'i yi ge rnams ring por 'gyur te/_i ring po/_khar dag gis rnam par bcad bya/_pi ma 
[\[80a.2\]]ThIH/_au dang dzas la/_pi ba Thi Shau/_pi pa Thi ShaH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_pi pa Thi ShaM/_pi pa Thi ShaM/_pi pa Thi Shau/_pi pa Thi ShaH/_TA la/_pi pa Thi ShA/_d+h+yAm d+his la/_su'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/_pi pa ThI b+h+yA/_pi pa ThI r+b+hiH/_nge la/_pi pa Thi She/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_pi pa Thi ShaH/_b+h+yam b+h+yas 'dra/
[\[80a.3\]]drug pa rnams la/_pi pa Thi ShaH/_pi pa Thi ShoH/_pi pa Thi Sh-I/_bdun pa rnams la/_pi pa Thi Shi/_pi pa Thi ShoH/_pi pa tA r+She/_yang na/_num bi sa rdza nI ya sha r+b+ya bA ye pi/_shar la rnam bcad num par na yod kyang ngo /_/in so sor bsdu ba sogs pa gar 'gro ba'i rgyu mtshan yod na de gnyis kyi par na num 
[\[80a.4\]]A ga ma dang rnam bcad yod kyang shar pha rol la Shar 'gyur te/_sa Sha/_pi pa ThIHShu/_bod tshig rnams la/_he pi pa ThIH/_pi pa Thi Shau/_he pe pa Thi ShaH/_!_sa yig mtha' can/_tsi kIR+sa la/_su/_ha la sogs kyis phyis/_yang dag bar sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/_sa phyis/_ra rnam bcad/_tsi kInaH/_au 
[\[80a.5\]]dang dzas la/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis/_saSha/_tsikId+Shau/_tsikIr+ShaH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_tsikI r+ShaM/_tsikIr+Sho/_tsikI r+ShaH/_TA la/_tsikIr+Sha/_b+h+yAm b+his la/_yang dag par sbyor byed 'dod/_ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/_sa phyis/_tsikIr+b+h+yAM/_tsikI r+ShIH/_nge la/_tsikIr+Shai/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_tsikIr+ShaH/_b+h+yam b+h+yas 
[\[80a.6\]]'dra/_drug ba rnams la/_tsikIr+ShaH/_tsikIr+ShoH/_tsikIr+ShAM/_bdun ba rnams la/_tsikIr+Shi/_tsikIr+ShoH/_tsikIr+Shu/_bod tshig rnams la/_he tsikIH/_he tsikIr+Sha/_he tsikIr+ShaH/_!_sa yig mtha' can/_ngos la su/_so phyis/_su sa dzu Sha'i ru/_ngoH/_au dang dzas la/_kun nas bsgyur pa sogs kyis/_sa Sha/_do Shau/_do ShaH/
[\[80a.7\]]ma ma la/_do ShaM/_au la/_do Shau/_shas la/_shes la sogs pa rnams la/_bad/_da ta nas/_mAs sogs kyis/_do Sha/_do Sha na du 'gyur/_na'i a ta dbyi 'os/_u pa d+hA'i a phyis/_shar sogs kyi mdos na Na/_doSh+NaH/_yang na/_do ShaH/_TA la/_do Sh+tA/_doShA/_b+h+yAm b+his la/_do Sha na du bskyur ba dang ma bsgyur ba gnyis 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]gzugs gcig pas/_tsas dzu' sogs kyis Shar/_dor+b+h+yAM/_dor+b+hiH/_nge la/_doSh+DaH/_doShe/_b+h+yam b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_do Sh+NaH/_do ShaH/_b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'dra/_ngas la/_doSh+NoH/_doShoH/_os la/_doSh+NAM/_doShAM/_A ma la/_doSh+DaM/_doSha Ni/_ngil_doShi/_doSha Ni/_sho Shi/_os la/_doSh+NoH/_do ShoH/
[\[80b.2\]]su pa la/_dor+Shu/_bod tshig rnams la/_he doH/_he da Shau/_he do SheH/_!_k+Sha yig mtha' can/_bi bi k+Sha la su/_ha la dI pa sogs kyis su phyis/_yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' snga ma'i sru ka dag gi'ang ngos/_ku phyis/_dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/_Sha ka_/gnas med pa la la dan 'os/_bi'i 
[\[80b.3\]]bi bi Ta/_au dang dzas la/_bi bi k+Shau/_bi bi k+ShaH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_bi bi k+ShaM/_bi bi k+Shau/_bi bi k+ShaH/_TA la/_ba bi k+Sha/_b+h+yAm b+his la/_dang po'i gcig tshig gi skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/_bi bi r+b+h+yI/_bi bi d+b+hiH/_nge la/_bi bi k+She/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_bi bi k+ShaH/_b+h+yA b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams lan bi bik+ShaH/
[\[80b.4\]]bi bi k+ShoH/_bi bi k+ShAM/_ngi la/_ba bi k+Shi/_os la/_bi bi k+ShoH/_sub la/_bi bi T+su/_bi bi T+su/_bod tshig rnams la/_he bi bi Ta/_he bi bi Ta/_he bi bi k+Shau+u/_he bi bi k+ShaH/_!_k+Sha yig mtha' can/_tam+Sha yang cho ga thams cad bi bi k+Sha dang 'dra/_gor k+Sha yar lugs gcig pa bak+Sha dang 'dra/_yang na/_yang dag par 
[\[80b.5\]]sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/_Sha phyis/_gor ka/_gor ga/_rnam dbye a ca thog ma can rnams bi bi k+Sha dang 'dra/_b+h+yAm la/_go ra g+b+h+yAM/_bi sa la/_gor g+b+hiH/_su pa la/_gor k+Shu sogs so/_phra mo/_yang k+Sha yig mtha' can/_pi pa k+Sha_su/_babar skyong /_su phyis/_yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/_Sha 
[\[80b.6\]]phyis/_gnas med pa sogs kyis pi bkwa/_pi pa ga/_au dang dzas la/_pi pa k+Shau/_pi pa k+ShaH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_pi pa k+ShaM/_pi pa k+Shau/_pi pa k+ShaH/_DA la/_pi pa k+ShA/_b+h+yAm b+his la/_yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/_Sha phyis/_dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/_ga ga/_pi pa g+b+h+yAM/_pi pa g+b+hin/
[\[80b.7\]]nge la/_pi pa k+She/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_pi pa k+ShaH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_pi pa k+ShaH/_pi pak+ShoH/_pi pa k+ShAM/_nga la/_pi pak+Shi/_os 'dra/_su ba la/_pi pak+Shu/_bod tshig rnams dang po dang 'dra/_skabs 'dir yang na bar mi byed do/_!_/k+Sha yig mtha' can dad+ha k+Sha zhes pa'ang cho ga thams 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]cad bi bik+Sha dang 'dra'o/!_/sa yig mtha' can su pis la su/_su phyis/_sa sa dzul dag ge ru 'os sa ru/_u brjod don/_ru bdag gi u pad+hA'i ring po i ka gi 'os/_i ring por bsgyur/_su pIH/_au dang dzas la/_su pi sau/_su bi saH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_su pi saM/_su pi so/_su pi saH/
[\[81a.2\]]TA la/_su bi sA/_b+h+yAm b+his la/_sas dzu Sha'i ru/_ru b+na sogs kyis mdos/_u pa d+hA ring po/_su pI N+h+yIH/_su pI N+hiH/_nge la/_su pi se/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_su pi saH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_su pi saH/_su pi soH/_su pi sAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_su pi si/_su pi soH/_su pI r+Shu/_su pIHShu/
[\[81a.3\]]bod tshig rnam dbye dang po dang 'dra/_su nus zhes pa'ang cho ga rnams su pis dang 'dra'o/_!_/sa yig mtha' can u rjes 'brel can/_bi dwa su la/_su/_u num gyi don yin pas phyis/_u ga 'gro ba a tsa rnams kyi thams cad gnas pa'i ming can rnams la byings ma yin pa la 'os/_num/_si bu d+d+hi ma yin 
[\[81a.4\]]pa'i thams cad gnas pa'i ming can la yang ngos/_u pa d+hu ring po/_ha la dI ba sogs dang /_yang dag par sbyor ba sogs kyis/_mkhas pa/_bi dwAn/_au dang dzas la/_bidwAn+sau/_pidwAn+saH/_am dang au la/_pidwAn+saM/_pi dwAn+sau/_shas la/_wa soHsaM pra sAr NaM/_was kyi saM pra sAr Na'o/_/rtags mtha' was 
[\[81a.5\]]zhes pa'i pha rol du shas la sogs pa'i rnam dbye a tsa thog a can gang byung yang slar yang dag par bsgyur ba ste wa srog med ur 'gyur ro/_/bid/_u as/_shas/_so pra sAr Na las kyang ngos/_a snga ma'i gzugs su song /_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis/_sa Sha/_bi du ShaH/_TA la/_pi du ShA/_b+h+yAm 
[\[81a.6\]]b+his la/_bsu sraM su h+yAM su an Du ha rnams kyid 'os sad/_pi dwa d+b+hiH/_bi dwa d+b+hiH/_ngar la/_bu du She/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_bi du ShaH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_bi du ShaH/_bi du ShoH/_pi duShAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_pi du Shi/_bi du ShoH/_bi dwa dU/_bod tshig rnams la he bi dwa na/_he bi dwA m+sau/_he mi dwA n+saH/
[\[81a.7\]]!_sa mtha' u rjes 'brel can/_pi tsi wa su la/_su/_u ka 'gro ba sogs kyis nu ma/_su phyis/_yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' phyis/_saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa sogs kyis u pad+hA ring po/_pe tsi wA na/_au dang dzas la/_pi tsi wA r+Shau/_pi tsi wA n+saM/_pi tsi wA n+sau/_shas la/_was kyis pra sA 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]ra Na 'os/_wu u/_saM bra sAr Na las kyang ngos/_a snga ma'i gzugs su song /_was u ru 'gyur iT 'jig go zhes pa 'grel par byung bas/_tsa'i srog gi i phyis/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis Sha/_pe tsu ShaH/_TA la/_pi tsu ShA/_b+h+yAm b+his la/_wa su sraM su sogs kyis sad/_pi tsi wa d+b+haM/_pi tsi wa d+b+hiH/_nga la/_pi tsu'i 
[\[81b.2\]]b+h+yam b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_pi tsu ShaH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_pi tsu ShaH/_pi tsu ShoH/_pi tsuShAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_pi tsu Sha/_pi tsu ShoH/_pi tsu wa t+su/_bod tshig rnams la/_he pi tsi wa na/_he pi tsi wa n+sau/_he pi tsi wA n+saH/_!_sa mtha' can/_dza ga ma su/_la su/_spoHtsa/_ma bdag la'ang ngo /_ma yi ge dang ba yig dag gi 
[\[81b.3\]]rkyen pha rol la byings kyi ma yig ni na ru 'gyur te/_man/_dza ga nA su/_su/_u/_'gro ba sogs kyis num/_u de'i don/_ha la sogs kyis su phyis/_yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' phyis/_saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa sogs kyis u pad+hA ring po/_dza ga nA na/_au dang dzas la/_dza ga nA n+sau/_dzag nA n+saH/_a ma dang au la/
[\[81b.4\]]dzagan+wA nAM/_dza ga n+wA nA+au/_sha sa la/_gam ha na dza na khan g+ha sAM lo paHk+di t+ya na ngi/_gam ha na dza na khan g+has rnams kyi dbyi ba ang ma yin pa'i krang 'gro ba la'o/_/gam la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi u pad+hA'i a ni ti sogs kyi rkyen ang ma yin pa'i rkyen ka yig 'gro ba dang nga yig 'gro ba rnams rnam dbye shas nas 
[\[81b.5\]]bzung /_bdun pa'i aus kyi bar a tsa thog ma can gang byung yang dbyi ste/_ga'i a phyis/_was kyi saM pra sA raN 'os/_wu u/_wa las phyungs pa'i a/_saM pra sA raN las kyang ngos/_snga ma'i gzugs su song /_wa ur 'gyur bas/_na yar mar log kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis/_sa Sha/
[\[81b.6\]]dzag+muShaH/_TA la/_dzag+muShA/_b+h+yAm b+his la/_wa su swaM su sogs kyis/_sad/_dza ga nA d+b+h+yAM/_dza ga n+wa d+b+hiH/_nge la/_dzag+muShe/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_dzag+muShaH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra_drug pa rnams la/_dzag+mu ShaH/_dzag+mu ShoH/_dzag+mu ShAM/_ngi la/_dzag+Yu Shi/_o sa la/_dzag+mu ShoH/_su pa la/_dza ga n+wa t+sA/
[\[81b.7\]]bod tshig rnams la/_he dza ga nA na/_he dza ga n+wA nA+au/_he dza ga n+wA n+saH/_sa yig mtha' can/_shin tu 'tsho ba/_su hi n+sa la/_su/_he la sogs kyis su phyis/_yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/_sa phyis/_su hi da/_au dang dzas la/_su hi d+sau/_su hi d+laH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_su hi d+saM/_su 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]hid+sau/_su hid+saH/_TA la/_su hi ng+sA/_b+h+yAm b+his la/_yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/_sa phyis/_su hiM b+h+yAM/_su hiM b+hiH/_nge la/_su hi d+se/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_su hi d+saH/_b+h+yam b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_su hi d+saH/_su he d+soH/_su hi d+saM/_bdun pa rnams la/
[\[82a.2\]]su hi d+si/_su hi d+soH/_su hi d+su/_bod tshig rnams la/_he su hi da/_he su hi d+sau/_he su hi d+saH/_!_sa yig mtha' can/_bu m+su la su/_dum+so \u0f85 srung /_pum+sa'i a srung ngo /_/pum+sa zhes pa'i mtha'i sa yig ni rnam dbye su Ta rnams pha rol la a srung zhes par 'gyur te/_sa a su da/_da rjes 'brel/_u ka 
[\[82a.3\]]'gro ba sogs kyis num/_u de'i don/_ha la sogs kyis su phyis/_yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/_sa phyis/_skyes pa/_saM bud+b+hi ma yin pa sogs kyis u pa d+hA ring po/_pumAn/_au dang dzas la/_pu mAn+sau/_pu mAn+saH/_am dang aul/_pu ma n+saM/_pu mAn+sau/_shas la/_puM saH/_TA la/_puM sA/
[\[82a.4\]]b+h+yAm b+h+yas la/_yang dag par sbyor ba' mtha' dbyi 'os/_sa phyis/_pu m+b+hAM/_pum+b+hiH/_nge la/_puM se/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_puM saH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_puM saH/_puM soH/_puM sAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_puM si/_puM soH/_puM su/_bod tshig rnams la/_he pu man/_he pu mAn+sau/_he pu 
[\[82a.5\]]mA T+saH/_!_sa yig mtha' can/_u shan sa la su/_r-i ta u sha nas/_pu ru daM shas a ne has rnams kyi yang ngos/_rtags mtha' a nang du 'gyur/_na'i srog gi a dang rjes 'brel/_saM bud+b+hI ma yin pa sogs kyis u pad+hA ring po/_ming mtha'i nad kyi 'os na phyis/_u sham+la_au dang dzas la/_u shan 
[\[82a.6\]]sau/_u shan saH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_bsang pa/_u shan saM/_u shan sau/_u shan saH/_TA la/_u shan sA/_TA la/_u shan sA/_b+h+yAM b+his la/_u sha no b+h+yAM/_u shan b+hiH/_nge la/_u shan se/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_u sha nasaH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_u sha na saH/_u sha na soH/_u sha na sAM/_bdun 
[\[82a.7\]]pa rnams la/_u sha na si/_u shan soH/_u sha na s+su/_saM bu d+d+hi la/_gzugs gsum 'byung bas lugs gcig la/_ha la sogs kyis su phyis/_sa sa dzu Sha sogs kyis/_he u sha naH/_yang na 'grel par/_saM bud+d+hi la rtags mtha' a nang du yang na 'gyur te/_nad byi ba dang mid byi ba 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]'dam ka can no zhes pa byung bas/_rtags mtha' a nang /_nad byi ba dang mid byi ba yang na ba byas pas/_he u sha na/_he u sha na na/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig dang po dang 'dra'o/_/a ne has/_pu ru daM shas gnyis la'ang saM bud+d+hi la yang na ba mi byed gzhan cho ga thams cad u sha nas dang 
[\[82b.2\]]'dra'o/_!_/sa mtha' can/_bed+has la su/_su phyis/_a tu as mtha'i 'dra byings ma yin pa'i 'os/_u pad+hA ring po/_be d+hAH/_saM bud+b+hi la/_he bed+haH/_gzhan ma thams cad u shan sa dang 'dra/_su bas zhes pa'ang su la u pad+hA ring por mi 'gyur gzhan cho ga rnams bshad ma thag pa be 
[\[82b.3\]]d+has dang 'dra'o/_!_/sarba sogs kyi nang tshan sa yig mtha' can/_a das la/_su/_a das au su lo pash+tsa/_a das kyi au ste su dbyi ba'ang ngo /_/a das zhes pa'i rtags mtha'i sa ni au ru 'gyur la/_su yang dbyi ste/_sa au/_su phyis/_ta da dag gi su las mtha' ma yin pa la 
[\[82b.4\]]'os/_das/_e tsa la 'phel ba 'os/_a sau/_a das la/_'di/_a ka tsa'i rkyen byin pas/_as ka/_zhes pa grub pa la/_sA du twaM tsa/_sa las u'ang ngo /_/a das la a ka tsa'i rkyen byin pa'i skabs das yig tu bsgyur zin pa'i spo ga a yig de ni u ru 'gyur te/_a su 
[\[82b.5\]]ka zhes pa grub/_de la rnam dbye'i cho ga thams cad spyir btang a thub mtha' can rA ma dang 'dra'o/_/aul/_t+ya da sogs rnams kyi rnam dbye la a 'os/_sa a/_a ta kyi yon tan la 'os/_snga ma'i gzugs/_e tsa la 'phel ba 'os/_a dau/_a da so rdA du do maH/_a das kyi da la u ste da'i 
[\[82b.6\]]'ang ma'o/_/a das zhes pa'i da ni rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig su ma gtogs rnam dbye gang mthong yang na yig tu 'gyur zhing da'i srog a tsa ring po gang yod kyang U ring du 'gyur/_thung du gad yod kyang u thung du 'gyur te/_a mU/_dzas la/_t+ya da sogs kyis a da/_dzas/_a

[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]mUn/_TA la/_a mu nA/_b+h+yAm la/_a mU b+h+yAM/_b+his la/_ka ma yin pa dag gi i daM a das dag lam yin nos/_b+his ai sar mi 'gyur/_mang tshig la dz+hal la e ta 'os e/_e ta kyi i ta mang tshig la 'os/_a mI b+hiH/_de la a muShai/_b+h+yAm la/_a mU b+h+yAM/_b+h+yas 
[\[83a.2\]]la/_a mI b+h+yaH/_nga sai la/_a muSh+mAta/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_nga sa la/_a muSh+ya/_os la/_a mu yoH/_A ma la/_a mI ShA/_ngi la/_a muSh+mi na/_os la/_a mu yoH/_su pa la/_a mIShu/_i ti pA Ni ni b+h+yA kar Na s+ya sU trA t+yu rlid+ga ha lan+tAHsa mA b+hAH/_zhes pa bA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mang las skyes 
[\[83a.3\]]pa'i rtags su ha la mtha' can rnams rdzogs so//_//de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni na byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las skyes pa'i rtags ha la mtha' can rnams rnam dbye dang phrad 
[\[83a.4\]]pa'i cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas par rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so//_//da ni bud med kyi rtags ha la mtha' can rnams bshad par bya ste/_de la dang por mo rtags ha yig mtha' can ni/_u pA na ha la/_su/_na ho d+haH/_na ha yi d+ha'o/_/na hra zhes pa'i ha ni rnam dbye 
[\[83a.5\]]dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams dang tshig mtha' d+ha yig tu 'gyur ro/_/ha d+ha/_dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/_d+ha da/_gnas med pa la yang na 'os/_u pA nad/_au dang dzas la/_nye bar bcing bsta lhas spro ba/_u A na hau/_u bA na haH/_gnyis pa rnams la/
[\[83a.6\]]u bA na haM/_u pA na hau/_u pA na haH/_TA la/_u bA na hA/_b+h+yAm b+his la/_na ha yi d+ha 'os/_ha ng+ha/_d+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/_d+ha da/_u pA na d+b+hiH/_u pAn ng+d+hiH/_nge la/_u pA na he/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_u bA na haH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_u pAn haH/
[\[83a.7\]]u pA na hoH/_u pA na hAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_u pA na hi/_u bA na hoH/_u bA na D+shu/_bod tshig rnams rnam dbye dang po dang 'dra/_ha yig mtha' can/_uSh+Ni he la/_su/_rkyen/_kun gyi ku 'os/_ha g+ha/_dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/_g+ha ga/_gnas med pa la sogs 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]gyis/_u Sh+Naka/_u Sh+Di ga/_au dang dzas la/_uSh+Ni hau/_uSh+Ni haH/_sogs te/_rnam dbye a tsa thog ma tsa na rnams des rigs 'gre/_b+hAm b+his la/_kwin gyi ku/_dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/_uSh+Ni g+b+hi/_uSh+Na g+b+hiH/_su pa la/_kwin gyi ku/_khar la tsa ra 'os/_g+ha ka/_ka 
[\[83b.2\]]Sha 'dus pak+Sha/_uSh+Ni k+Shu/_bod tshig dang po dang 'dra/_!_ba yig mtha' can/_di ba la/_su/_di w+ra'i w+ra au/_d+yauH/_au dang dzas la/_dibau/_di baH/_am la _rkyen/_yang na par bshad pa ltar/_d+yaM/_di gi_au dang shas la/_di ba/_di baH_TA la/_rkyen/_di wA/_b+h+yAm b+his la/_di bra'i u ta 'os 
[\[83b.3\]]ba u/_dU b+h+yAM/_dU b+hi na/_nga la/_di be/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_di paH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_'od gsal/_drug pa rnams la/_di baH/_di ngoH/_di bAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_di bi/_di poH/_d+yAShu/_bod tshig la/_he d+yauH/_he di bau/_he di baH/_!_de ba snga ma'i ta yig mtha' can/_d+YUr+Na ta 'grel par gzhan 
[\[83b.4\]]nas lung drangs te/_u yig pha rol la di bra kyib ur 'gyur ro zhes pa byung bas/_ba u/_a ka ki 'dra ba la ring bo/_i ka'i a tsa pa yaN/_d+YUr+Na ta la/_su/_ha la sogs kyis su phyis/_gnas med pa la yang na 'os/_d+YUr+Nuta/_d+YUr+Nud/_au dang dzas la/_d+YUr+Nu tau/_d+YUr+Na taH/_sogs te a tsa 
[\[83b.5\]]thog ma can rnams nges rigs 'gre/_b+h+yAm la/_dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/_tad/_d+YUr+Nad+b+h+yAM/_b+his b+h+yAm b+h+yas sogs kyang rigs 'gre/_su pa la/_d+YAr+Na t+su/_bod tshig rnams la/_hed+YUr+Nu ta/_he d+YUr+NA da/_he d+YUr+Nu tau/_he d+YUr+Nu taH/_ra yig mtha' can/_gi ra la/_su/_ru ba dag gi u bab+hA ring po 'os/_i ring go su phyis/
[\[83b.6\]]gIH/_au dang dzas la/gi rau/_gi raH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_gi ri/_gi rau/_gi raH/_TA la/_gi rA/_b+h+yAm b+his la/_ra ba sogs kyi mdos/_u pad+hA ring po/_gIr+b+h+yAM/_gIr+b+hi/_nge la/_gi re/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_da sa la/_gi raH/_b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa/_smrag_rnams la/_gi raH/_gi roH/_gi rAM/_bdun pa rnams 
[\[83b.7\]]la/_gi ri/_gI roH/_gI rU/_bod tshig la/_he gUH/_he gi rau/_he gi raH/_!_ra yig mtha' can/_pur zhes ba dang /_dur zhes pa'ang /_cho ga thams cad gir gyi skabs dang 'dra'o/_!_/ra yig mtha' can/_tsa tu ra la/_dzas/_tri tsa tur bdag gi bud med la/_ti s-i tsa ta sr-i dag 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]gos/_tsa ta sr-ir 'gyur/_tsa ta sraH/_shas la/_tsa ta sraH/_b+his la/_tsa ta sr-i b+h-iH/_b+h+yas gnyis la/_tsa ti sri b+hiH/_tsa ta sr-i b+h+yaH/_A ma la/_tsa ta sr-i NAM/_su pa la/_tsa ta sr-i Shu/_bod tshig la/_he tsa ta sraH/_!_ma yig mtha' can/_kim la/_kim gyi ka 'os/_bud 
[\[84a.2\]]med du brjod pa'i rkyen TA pa/_kA la/_su/_ha la dI pa A pa ces pas su phyis/_kA/_oM la/_au'i A pa las sos/_ke/_dzas la/_dang po dag la zhes pas/_kAH/_sogs te cho ga thams cad mo rtags rba'i skabs bshad pa dang 'dra'o/_ma yig mtha' can/_i daM la/_su/_-i daM gyi ma 'os/_Ti 
[\[84a.3\]]ar mi 'gyur/_yaHsau/_sU la ya'o/_id ma zhes pa'i da ni bud med du brjod pa'i skabs su pha rol laya ru 'gyur ro/_/da ya/_su phyis/_i yaM/_au~M la/_t+ya da sogs kyi a 'os/_ma a/_a ta kyi yon tan la 'os snga ma'i gzugs/_da'i'ang nges dam/_bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen TA pa/_i mA/
[\[84a.4\]]au'i A pa pas so/_au shI/_i me/_dzas la/_i mAH/_a ma la/_i mAM/_au la i me/_shas la/_i mAH/_TA la/_A pa la an sogs kyis/_id/_a na/_bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen/_TA pa/_a nA/_Ang kyi Ang la'ang ngos/_an yA/_b+h+ya ma lo/_ha la la dbyi 'os/_i dang da phyis/_a/_TA pa/_A 
[\[84a.5\]]b+h+yAM/_b+his la/_A b+hiH/_nga la/_i daM/_a/_TApa/_sarba nA ma las s+yA Ta ste thung ngu 'ang ngos/_s+yAT/_a s+yai/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas la/_A b+h+yAm/_A b+h+yaH/_nga si la/_a s+yAH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_ngas la/_a s+yA/_o sa la/_an yoH/_A ma la/_A sAM/_ngi la/_a s+yAM/_o sa la/_an yoH/_su pa la/_A 
[\[84a.6\]]su/_rnam dbye gnyis pa rnams dang TA dang os gnyis la yang na bar bshad pa ltar/_lugs gcig la/_gnyis pa rnams la/_enA/_en/_enaH/_TA la/_en yA/_os gnyis la/_en yoH/_!_dza yig mtha' can/_sra dza la/_su/_tsu'i su 'os/_dza ga/_su phyis/_gnas med pa la yang 
[\[84a.7\]]na 'os/_sra ka/_sa ga/_au dang dzas la/_sra dzau/_sra dzaH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_sra dzaM/_sra dzau/_sra dzaH/_TA la/_sra dzA/_b+h+yAM b+his la tsu'i ku 'os/_sra g+b+h+yAM/_sra g+b+hiH/_nge la/_sra dze/_b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/_nga sil/_sra dzaH/_b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_sra dzaH/_sradzoH/_sra dzAM/_ngi la/_sra dzi/_os 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]la/_sra dzoH/_su pa la/_tsu'i ku 'os/_dza ga/_khar la tsar/_sra k+Shu/_bod tshig rnams dang po 'dra/_!_da yig mtha' can/_t+yad la/_su/_t+yad sogs kyis a/_a ta kyi yon tan la 'os snga ma'i gzugs/_mo rkyen TA pa/_ta da dag gi su las mtha' ma yin pa la 'os/_ta sa/_su phyis/
[\[84b.2\]]sta/_au la/_t+ye/_dzas/_t+yAH/_sogs mo rtags sa rba'i skabs dang 'dra'o/_/ta da yang gnyis kyang cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra'o/_!_/tsa yig mtha' can/_bA tsa la/_su/_tsu'i ku'o sa/_tsa ka/_su phyis/_gnas med pa la yang na 'os/_bA ka/_bA ga/_au dang dzas la/_pA tsau/_bA 
[\[84b.3\]]tsaH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_bA tsi/_bA tsau/_bA tsaH/_TA la/_bA tsA/_b+h+yAm b+his la/_tsu'i ku 'os/_tsa ka/_dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/_ka ga/_bAg+b+h+yAM/_bAg+b+haMH/_dag gam brjod dang /_nge la/_bA ce/_b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_bA tsaH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_bA tsaH/_bA tsoH/_bA tsAM/
[\[84b.4\]]bdun pa rnams la/_bA tsi/_bA tsoH/_bAk+Shu/_bod tshig rnams rnam dbye dang po dang 'dra/_!_pa yig mtha' can/_chu_a pa la ni mang tshig kho na ma gtogs rnam dbye rnams kyi gcig tshig rnams mi 'jug pas/_a pa la dzas/_a pa tr-in sogs kyis u pa d+hA ring po/_A paH/
[\[84b.5\]]shas la/_a paH/_b+his la/_a bod+hi/_a pa kyi b+ha la'o/_a pa ces pa'i pa yig ni rnam dbye b+ha yig pha rol la ta ru 'gyur te/_pa ta/_dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/_tad/_ad+b+hiH/_b+h+yas gnyis la/_a d+b+h+yaH/_A ma la/_a pAM/_su pa la/_a p+su/_bod tshig la/_he A paH/_!_sha yig mtha' can/
[\[84b.6\]]di sha la/_su/_dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/_sha dza/_cu'i ku 'os/_dza ga/_gnas med pa la yang na 'os/_di ka/_di ga/_au dang dzas la/_di shau/_di shaH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_di shaM/_di shaH/di shau/_di shaH/_TA la/_di shA/_b+h+yAm b+his la/_dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/_sha dza/_tsu'i ku 'os/
[\[84b.7\]]ga/_dig+b+h+yAM/_dig+b+hiH/_nge la/_di she/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_di shaH/_b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_di shaH/_di shoH/_phog ga/_di shAM_bdun pa rnams la/_di zi/_di shoH/_dik+Shu/_bod tshig rnams dang po dang 'dra/_dr-i sha zhes pa'ang cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra'o/_!_/Sha yig mtha' can/_tISha 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]la/_su/_dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/_sha Da/_gnas med pa la yang na 'os/_twiT/_twi Ta/_au dang dzas la/_twi Shau/_twi ShaH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_twi Shi/_twi Shau/_twi ShaH/_TA la/_twi ShA/_g+b+h+yAm b+his la/_dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/_ShaDa/_twi g+b+h+yI/_twi g+b+hiH/_nge la/
[\[85a.2\]]tI She/_b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_twi ShaH/_b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_twi ShaH/_twi ShoH/_twi ShAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_twi Shi/_twi ShoH/_twi T+su/_twi T+tU/_bod tshig rnams rnam dbye dang po dang 'dra'o/_!_/Sha yig mtha' can/_sa dzu Sha la/_su/_su phyis/_sa sa dzu Sha dag gi ru 'os/_Sha ra/_ra bdag gi zhes pas 
[\[85a.3\]]u pad+hA ring po/_sa dzUH/_au dang dzas la/_sa dzu Shau/_sa dzu ShaH/_gnyis pa rnams la/_sa dzu ShaM/_sa dzu Shau/_sa dzu ShaMH/_TA la/_sa dzuShA/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas la/_sa dzU r+b+h+yAM/_sa dzU r+b+hiH/_nge la/_sa dzuShe/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_sa dag bam/_dzu ShaH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_sa dzu 
[\[85a.4\]]ShoH/_sa dzuShAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_sa dzuShi/_sa dzu ShoH/_sa dzUr+Shu/_bod tshig rnams la/_he sa dzUH/_he sa dzu ShoH/_hes dzu ShaH/_a Sha shi Sha yang bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra'o/_!_/sa yig mtha' can/_a das la/_su/_a das kyi au ste su dbyi ba'ang ngos/_sa au/_su byis/_ta da dag gi zhes pas/
[\[85a.5\]]das/_a sau/_au la/_t+ya da sogs kyis a/_a ta kyi yon tan la'os snga ma'i gzugs/_bud med du brjed pa'i rkyen/_TA pa/_a dA/_au/_au'i A pa las sos/_au I/_a la yon tan nos/_a e/_a das kyi da la u ste de'i 'dam 'os/_a mU/_dzas/_a mUH/_am la/_amUM/_au la/_amU/
[\[85a.6\]]Shal la/_a mUH/_TA la/_a mu yA/_b+h+yAm la/_a mU b+h+yAM/_b+his la/_a mU b+hiH/_nge la/_a mu Sh+ye/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_a mu Sh+yAH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_ngas la/_a mu Sh+yAH/_os la/_a mu yoH/_A ma la/_a mU ShAM/_ngi la/_a mu Sh+yAM/_os la/_a mu yoH/_su pa la/_a mU Shu/_i ti pA Ni ni byA kar Na 
[\[85a.7\]]s+ya sU trA ta s+t+rI yid+ga ha la n+tAHsa mA patAH/_zhes pa bA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las bud med kyi rtags ha la mtha' can rnams rdzogs so//_//de rnams kyis brdo sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]shing rta zhes bya ba las bud med kyi rtags ha lam mtha' can rnams rnam dbye dang phrad pa'i tshig sbyor btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so//_//da ni hal gyi mtha' can ma ning gi rtags rnams brjod par bya ste/[ a] yig mtha' can/_swa na Du hal/_su/_tsa tu ra a na Du ha dag 
[\[85b.2\]]gi Am/_u dA t+ta 'os/_A ma A gam/_ma ning la su am 'jig/_ba su sraM su d+haM su a na Du ha rnams kyi da 'os/_ha da/_gnas med pa la yang na 'os/_swa na D+wA ta/_swa na D+wA da/_au la/_ma ning la'ang ngos/_au shI/_swa na D+wA hI/_dzas la/_dzas shas dag gi shi 'os/_dzas/_glang khyung bzang po/_shi/_ma ning gi 
[\[85b.3\]]dz+hal a tsa'i 'os/_nu ma saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa'i zhes pas u pa d+hA ring po/_swa na D+wAM hi/_gnyis pa rnams la/_swa na D+wA ta/_swa na D+wA da/_swan D+wA hi/_swa na D+wAM hi/_bod tshig dang po dang 'dra/_TA nas bzung rnam dbye lhag ma thams cad skyes pa'i rtags a na Du ha'i skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra'o/_!_/ra yig 
[\[85b.4\]]mtha' can/_bA ra la/_su/_ma ning la su am dag 'jig/_bAH/_au la/_bA rI/_dzas la/_bA ri/_gnyis pa rnams la'ang /_bAH/_bArI/_bAri/_bod tshig rnams la/_ha bAH/_he bArI/_he bAri/_TA la/_bA rA/_b+h+yA b+his la/_bA r+b+h+yAM_bAr+b+hIH/_bzhi pa rnams la/_bA re/_bA r+b+h+yAM/_bA r+b+h+yaH/_lnga pa rnams la/_bA raH/
[\[85b.5\]]bA r+b+h+yAM/_bA r+b+h+yaH/_drug pa rnams la/_bA raH/_bA roH/_bU rAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_bA re/_bA roH/_bA r+Shu/_!_ra yig mtha' can/_tsa tu ra la/_dzas/_sha tur a na Du ha dag gi AM u dA d+ha 'os/_A ma/_dzas shas dag gi shi/_tsa t+bA ri/_shas la/_tsa twA ri/_b+his la/_tsa tu r+b+haMH/_b+h+yas gnyis la/_tur+b+b+yaH/
[\[85b.6\]]A ma la/_tsa tu r+NAM/_su pa la/_tsa tur+Shu/_bod tshig la/_he tsa twa ri/_pri ya tsa tur zhes pa lta bu grangs kyi don ma yin na rnam dbye thams cad 'jug ste/_dang po rnams la/_pri ya tsa tuH/_pri ya tsa tu rI/_/pri ya tsa tu ri/_gnyis pa rnams la'ang /_pri ya tsa tuH/_pri ya tsa tu rI/_pri ya tsa tu 
[\[85b.7\]]ri/_gsumapa rnams la/_pri ya tsa tu rA/_pri ya tsa tu r+b+h+yAM/_pri ya tsa tu r+b+hiH/_bzhi pa rnams la/_bri ya tsha tu re/_pri ya tsa tu r+b+h+yAM/_pri ya tsa tu r+b+h+yaH/_nga si la/_pri ya tsa tu raH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_pri ya tsa tu raH/_pri ya tsa tu roH/_pri ya tsa tu rAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_pri ya 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]tsa tu ri/_pri ya tsa turoH/_pri ya tsa tu r+Shu/_bod tshig rnams dang po dang 'dra/_!_ma yig mtha' can/_kim la/_su/_ma ning la su am dag 'jig pas/_su phyis/_kim/_aul/_kiM ka/_au/_I/_ke/_dzas la/_kA ni/_gnyis pa rnams la'ang /_kim/_ka/_kA ni/_TA 
[\[86a.2\]]sogs lhag ma rnams la/_kim kar 'gyur cho ga thams cad sarba dang 'dra'o/_!_/ma yig mtha' can/_i dam la su/_ma ning su am 'jig/_i daM/_au la/_i me/_dzas la/_imA ni/_gnyis pa rnams la/_i daM/_i me/_i mA ni/_TA la sogs pa rnam dbye lhag ma rnams skyes pa'i skabs 
[\[86a.3\]]dang 'dra/_!_/na yig mtha' can/_brah+ma na la/_su/_ming mtha'i na dbyi 'os/_na phyis/_ma ning la/_su am 'jig/_brah+ma/_aul/_brah+ma NI/_dzas la/_brah+ma Ni/_gnyis pa rnams la'ang /_brah+ma/_brah+ma NI/_brah+ma Ni/_TA la/_brah+ma NA/_b+h+yAM b+his la/_ming mtha'i na phyis/_brah+ma b+h+yAM/_bah+ma b+hiH/_pel/
[\[86a.4\]]brah+ma Ne/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_tshang pa/_brah+ma NaH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_brah+ma NaH/_brah+ma NoH/_brah+ma NAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_brah+ma NoH/_brah+ma su/_bod tshig la 'grel par nad byi ba dang mid byi ba 'dam ka can no zhes pa byung bas/_he brah+ma/_he brah+ma na/_he brah+ma 
[\[86a.5\]]NI/_he brah+ma Ni/_!_/ma yig mtha' can/_a han la/_su/_a han raH/_a had gyi ra'o/_/a han zhes pa'i na naM ma ning gi rtags kyi skabs dz+hal so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams dang tshig mtha' la ra ru 'gyur te/_su 'jig/_a haH/_aul/_di shI dag la 'dam ka 'os/_a_ha nI/_a h+nI/_dzas 
[\[86a.6\]]la/_a ha ni/_gnyis pa rnams kyang 'dra/_nyi ma/_TA la/_na'i a ta dbyi 'os/_u pad+hA'i a phyis/_ah+nA/_b+h+yAm b+h+yis la/_a ho b+h+yAM/_a ho b+hiH/_nge la/_a h+ne/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_a snaH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_a h+naH/_a h+noH/_a hAM/_ngi la/_a h+naM/_a hani/_os 
[\[86a.7\]]la/_a h+noH/_su pa la/_a haH/_su/_bod tshig rnams rnam dbye dang po dang 'dra/_!_na yig mtha' can/_su dan+Di na la/_dbyug pa bzang po/_su/_ming mtha'i na phyis/_ma ning la _u a ma 'jig_/su da n+Di/_aul/_su dan+Di nI/_dzas la/_dzas shis dag gi shaM/_in han pU 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]ShAr+Ya ma NAM shau/_in tan bU Sha na Ar+Ya ma na rnams kyi shi la'o/_/in mtha' la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi u pad+hA ni dzas shas shir 'gyur ba pha rol la ring bor 'gyur te/_sU da N+DI ni/_gnyis pa rnams kyang 'dra/_TA la/_sud N+Di nI/_b+h+yAm b+his la/_mid mtha'i na phyis/_su N+Di b+h+yAM/_su da N+Di b+hiH/
[\[86b.2\]]nge la/_su da Ni ni/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_ngas le/_su da N+Di naH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'ad/_drug pa rnams la/_su da N+Di naH/_su da N+Di noH/_su da N+Di nI/_ngi la/_su da N+Di ni/_os la/_su da k+Sha noH/_su pa la/_sud N+DiShu/_bod tshig rnams dang po dang 'dra/_!_ni yig mtha' can/_ba hu br-i tra ha na la/_su/
[\[86b.3\]]ma ning la su am 'jig/_ming mtha'i na phyis/_ba hu br-i tra ha/_au la/_ba hu pri tra ha NI/_dzas la/_in han sogs kyis u pad+hA ring po/_pa hu br-i tra hA Ni/_gnyis pa rnams kyang 'dra/_TA la sogs pa rnams skyes pa'i rtags br-i tra han gyi skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra'o/_!_/na yig mtha' 
[\[86b.4\]]can/_ba hAr+Ya ma na la/_su/_ming mtha'i na phyis_ma ning la_su am 'jig/_ba hAr+Ya ma/_au la/_ba hUr+Ya ma NI/_dzas la/_in han sogs kyis u pad+hA ring po/_ba hAr+Ya ma NI/_gnyis pa rnams kyang gzugs dang sgrub tshul gnyis ka dang dang po dang 'dra/_TA la/_na'i a dbyi 'os/_u pa ng+dA'i 
[\[86b.5\]]a phyis/_ba hAr+Ya m+Na/_b+h+yAm b+h+yis la/_ming mtha'i nang byi'o/_bahwa r+Ya ma b+h+yAM/_bahA r+Ya ma b+hiH/_nge la/_bahA mar+Yam b+h+yA/_b+h+yam b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si/_bahu r+Ya m+Na \u0f7f/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_ba hwa r+Ya m+Na \u0f7f/_bahwa r+Ya m+No \u0f7f/
[\[86b.6\]]hwa r+Ya ma su/_bod tshig rnams dang po dang 'dra'o/_!_/na yig mtha' can/_ba hu pu Shan la/_su/_ming mtha'i na phyis/_su am 'jig/_ba hupuSha/_au Sha/_pa hu pu Sha NI/_dzas la/_in han zhes pas u pad+hA ring bo/_pa hu pu ShA Ni/_gnyis pa rnams kyang 'dra/_TA la/_ba hu puSh+NA/_b+h+yam b+his 
[\[86b.7\]]la/_ming mtha'i na phyis/_ba hu pu Shab+h+yAM/_ba hu pu Sha b+hiH/_nge la/_ba hu pu Sh+Ne/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_ba hu pu Sh+NaH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_ba hu puSh+NaH/_pa hu pu Sh+NoH/_ba hu pu Sh+NAM/_ngi la/_ba hu pu Sh+Ni/_ba hu pu Sha Ni/_os 'dra/_su pa la/_ba hu pu Sha su/_bod 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]tshig dang po dang 'dra/_!_dza yig mtha' can/_a sr-i dza la/_su/_ma ning la su am 'jig/_kwin gyi ku 'os/_dza ga/_gnas med pa la yang na 'os/_a sr-i ka/_a sr-i ga/_au la/_a sr-i dzI/_dzas la/_nu ma/_a sr-iny+dzi/_gnyis pa rnams kyang 'dra/_TA la/_a 
[\[87a.2\]]sr-i dzA/_b+h+yAm b+his la/_kwin gyi ku/_a sr-i g+b+h+yAM/_a sr-i g+gIH/_nge la/_a sraM dze/_b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/_nge si la/_a sr-i/_rkyen/_dzaH/_ma b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_a sr-i dzaH/_a sr-i dzauH/_a sr-i dzAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_a sr-i dzi/_a sr-i dzoH/_a sr-i k+Shu/_bod tshig dang po dang 
[\[87a.3\]]'dra/_dza yig mtha'_rkyen/_can/_Urdza la/_su/_ma ning la su am 'jig/_kwin kyi ku/_yang dag bar sbyor ba'i mtha' mi dbyi/_gnas med pa la yang na 'os/_Urka/_Urga/_aul/_UrdzI/_dzas/_shas la 'grel par num yang na bar bshad pas/_AM rdzi/_yang 
[\[87a.4\]]na U rdzi/_gnyis pa rnams kyang bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra/_TA la/_urdzA/_b+h+yAm b+his la/_kwin gyi _rkyen/_ku/_U h+h+rAM/_u r+g+b+hiH/_nge la/_U rdze/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_U rdzaH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_U rdzaH/_U rdzoH/_U rdzAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_U rdzi/_U rdoH/
[\[87a.5\]]U r+k+tsa/_bod tshig dang po dang 'ad/_!_nga yig mtha' can/_t+ya da la/_su/_ma ning la su/_rkyen/_am 'jig/_gnas med pa la yang na 'os/_t+ya ta/_t+ya da/_au la/_au shI/_t+ya da sogs kyis da a_a ta kyi yon tan la 'os snga ma'i gzugs/_a la yon tan/_t+ye/_dzas shi/
[\[87a.6\]]num/_t+yA ni/_gnyis pa rnams kyang bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra/_TA sogs rnam dbye lhag ma rnams skyes pa'i rtags rba'i skabs dang 'dra/_de bzhin du tad dang yang dang e tad kyang bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra'o/_!_/tsa yig mtha' can/_go a ca la su/_su phyis/_tsu'i ku/_gnas 
[\[87a.7\]]med pa la yang na 'os/_go a ka/_go a ga/_au la/_a ca'i 'os/_a phyis/_gotsAM/_dzas la/_go A ny+tsi/_gnyis pa rnams kyang 'dra/_TA sogs rnam dbye lhag ma rnams skyes pa'i rtags phra tsa'i skabs dang 'dra'o/_!_/ta yig mtha' can/_ya kr-i ta la/_su/_su am 'jig/
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]gnas med pa la yang na 'os/_ya kr-i ta/_ya kr-id/_au la/_yakr-itI/_dzas la/_ya kr-its+taM/_gnyis pa rnams kyang 'dra/_TA la/_yakr-i tA/_b+h+yAm b+his la/_ya kr-id+b+h+yA/_ya kr-id+b+hiH/_de la/_ya kra te/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_ya kr-i taH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_ya kr-i 
[\[87b.2\]]taH/_ya kr-i toH/_ya kr-i tAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_ya kr-i ti/_ya kra toH/_ya kr-i t+su/_bod tshig rnams dang po dang 'dra'o/_/sha kr-i ta nges pa'i cho ga thams cad ya kr-i ta dang 'dra'o/_!_/ta yig mtha' can/_da da ta la/_su/_su a ma 'jig/_gnas med pa la yang na 'os/_da dad/
[\[87b.3\]]da da ta/_au la/_da da tI/_dzas la/_dzas shas shi/_bA na puMs ka s+ya/_ma ning gi yang na'o/_/a b+h+ya sta'i ming sha tu'i rkyan mtha' can ma ning gi rtags kyi skabs dzas shas shir 'gyur ba thams cad gnas pa'i ming can la num A ga ma yang na 'jug go/_/da dAn+te/_da da ti/_gnyis pa 
[\[87b.4\]]rnams kyang 'dra/_TA la/_da da tA/_b+h+yAm b+his la/_dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/_da da d+b+hI/_da da d+b+hiH/_nge la/_dad te/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_dad taH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_dad haH/_da da toH/_da da tAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_da da ti/_da da toH/_da da l+su/
[\[87b.5\]]bod tshig rnams dang po dang 'dra/_dzA gr-i ta dang /_dza kA ta sogs kyang bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra'o/_!_/ta yig mtha' can/_tu da ta la/_su/_su a ma phyis/_gnas me pa li yang na 'os/_tu dad/_tu data/_au la/_au shI/_Ats+tshI na d+yoH/_num/_A las shIn dI dag la na ma'o/_/byings 
[\[87b.6\]]A sha tu'i rkyen mtha' can las/_pha rol du au shIr 'gyur ba'i shI dang na dI mid can rnams la nu ma yang na 'jug ste/_tu dan+tI/_tu da tI/_dzas la/_tu dan+ti/_gnyis pa rnams kyang 'dra/_TA sogs da da ta dang 'dra'o/_/b+ha ta bcas pa'ang tu da ta dang tshogs thams cad 'dra'o/_!_/ta yig mtha' 
[\[87b.7\]]can/_pa tsa ta la/_bcas/_su/_su am phyis/_gnas med pa sogs kyis/_pa tsa ta/_ba tsa da/_aul/_au shI/_sha pa sh+ya no rni t+yaM/_sha pa sh+yan dag la des pa'o/_/a yig ring thung gi mtha' sha pa dang sh+yan gyi rkyen can las au shI dang na dI ming can rnams la nu ma la ngan ba mi 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]byed par gtan du nges par ster te/_btsan+hI/_dzas la/_btsan+ti/_gnyis pa rnams kyang 'dra/_TA sogs da da ta dang 'dra'o/_/dI bya ta ces pa'ang pa tsa ta dang cho ga thams cad 'dra'o/_!_/pa yig mtha' can/_swa pa la/_su/_su a ma phyis/_gnas med pa sogs kyis/_swa pa/_swa pa/
[\[88a.2\]]au la/_swa pI/_dzas la/_swAM pi/_gnyis pa rnams kyang 'dra/_TA la/_swa pA/_b+h+yAm b+his la/_a pa kyi b+ha la 'os/_swa d+b+h+yI/_swa d+b+hiH/_nge la/_swa pe/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_nga si la/_swa baH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_swa paH/_swa poH/_swa pAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_swa pi/_swa poH/_swa p+su/
[\[88a.3\]]bod tshig rnams dang po dang 'dra/_!_sa yig mtha' can/_d+ha nus la/_su/_su am phyis/_sa sa dzu Sha sogs kyis d+ha nuH/_o la/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis/_sa Sha/_d+ha nu ShI/_dzas la/_d+ha nUM Shi/_gnyis pa rnams kyang 'dra/_TA la/_d+ha nu ShA/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_sa sa dzu Sha sogs 
[\[88a.4\]]kyis sar/_d+ha nu r+b+n+yAM/_d+ha nu r+b+hiH/_nge la/_d+ha nu She/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas_gzhu/_'dra/_nga si la/_d+ha nu ShaH/_b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/_drug pa rnams la/_d+ha nu ShaH/_d+ha nu ShA+oH/_d+ha nu ShAM/_bdun pa rnams la/_d+ha nu Shi/_d+ha nu ShoH/_d+ha nu r+Shu/_bod tshig rnams rnam dbye dang po dang 'dra/_ha bis 
[\[88a.5\]]dang po yas sogs kyang d+ha nus dang 'dra'o/_!_/sa yig mtha' can/_a das la/_su/_ma ning la su am phyis/_sa sa dzu Sha dag gis ru/_a daH/_au la/_t+ya da sogs kyis a/_a la yon tan/_a de/_a das kyi nga la u ste da'i'ang ma 'os/_a mU/_dzas la/_a mU 
[\[88a.6\]]ni/_gnyis pa rnams kyang dang po dang 'dra/_TA nas bzung rnam dbya lhag ma rnams kyi cho ga thams cad a das skyes pa'i rtags kyi skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra'o/_/i ti pA Ni ni byA ga ra Na s+ya sU trA d+na puM sa ka ying+ga ha lan+tAHsa mA pyAH/_zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las ma ning gi 
[\[88a.7\]]rtags ha la mtha' can rnams rdzogs so//_//de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don dper brjod cho ga sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las ma ning gi rtags ha la mtha' can rnams rnam 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]dbye dang phrad pa'i tshig sbyor btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so//_//de ltar rtags drug tshig tu bsgrub pa'i cho ga rnams bshad zin nas/_da ni ming gcig gis don du ma ston pa ni bA ta'am mi zad pa'i sde rnams ston par bya ste/_swa rA di ni pA ta ma 
[\[88b.2\]]bya yaM/_swa ra la sogs pa rnams ni pA ta mi zad pa'o/_/swa ra la sogs pa rnams la a byA ste mi zad pa zhes sa ma ni pA ta zhes bya'o/_/swa ra la sogs pa na 'di rnams te/_spar/_aM ta ra/_prA ta ra/_pu na ra/_sa nu/_ta ra/_a ts+tshais/_nits+tshais/_sa ne sa/_r-id+ha ka/_r-i te/_yu 
[\[88b.3\]]ga pa ta/_gnyis/_A rA ta/_pr-i thag/_h+Yas/_swa sa/_di wA/_rA tA+au/_sA yaM/_tse raM/_ma nA ga/_i Sha ta/_dzau ShaM/_tA Sh+NiM/_ba his/_phyi/_a wa sa/_sa ma yA/_mtho ris/_bar mtshams/_snga dro'am zhog kha/_slar/_nyung ngu'am chung ngu/_brgyal/_mtho ba'am ring pa/_dma' ba/_g.ye' ma da la po/_grub pa'am 'dzin pa/_sbangs pa 
[\[88b.4\]]thag ring thung gnyis ka la 'jug/_so so/_phyin nas/_kha sang /_song nyin/_nyin mo/_mtshan mo/_dgong ma mang po/_ye shes/_chung ngu /_dga' ba/_mi smra ba/_zha dang bsrung ba dang rgyan rnams la/_dam tshig gam nye ba/_ni ka ShA/_swa/_swa yaM/_br-i thA/_na k+taM/_na nya/_he hau/_i b+d+hA/_ad+d+hA/_sA mi/_bat+p+ra t+ya yAM taM tsa/_ba tu'i rkyen mtha' rnams 
[\[88b.5\]]kyang ngo /_/byings sam rtags ba tu'i rkyen mtha' can rnams kyang mi zad pa'o/_/brAh+ma Na pa ta/_k+Sha tr-i ya pa ta/_ces pa lta bu pa tu'i rkyen mtha' can dang /_gzhan yang /_swa na/_thag nye ba/_nga'am rang /[ {]brdzun[,]rdzun[}]/_mtshan mo/_dgag tshig/_gnyen/_ma 'dres pa/_ma 'dres pa/_mtshungs pa'am 'dra pa/_u pad+b+hA/_sa na ta/_swa 
[\[88b.6\]]nA ta/_tr-i ras/_a n+tA ra/_a n+ta re Na/_dz+yoka/_kaM/_shaM/_bde ba'am skyid pa/_bram ze ltar ram bram ze can/_rgyal rigs ltar ram can/_sa ha sA/_pi nA/_nA nA/_swa sti/_bden pa'am des so/_swa d+hA/_a laM/_ba Sha Ta/_a n+ya ta/_a sti/_u pAM shu/_k+Sha mA/_di hA/_thag nye ba'am ring ba min la snying ba'am sngon ma'am snga sor/
[\[88b.7\]]'phur ba/_bar ram mtshams/_gsal ba dang srog chags phra mo/_mtho ris bram ze lta bu'am 'dra ba/_ya sA/_doTA/_mtshan mo/_mr-iShA/[ {]brdzun[,]rdzun[}]/_mi th+yA/_bcas/_spangs pa/_sna tshogs/_bde legs/_pa ma'i don/_rgyan nam gang ba/_sngags/_gzhan/_yod pa/_ring po/_bzod pa/_gnam la 'phur ba/_mu d+hA/_dga' ba/_pu rA/_sngon nam shar/_'grel chags sam/_mi 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]tho/_mi thas/_prA yas/_mu has/_brA bA hu kaM/_Ar+Ya ha laM/_a bak+She Ni/_gzi brjid/_sA kaM/_sA r+b+haM/_sa ha/_ma nas/_hi ru ka/_d+hi ka sogs kyang mi zad pa'o/_/ta si lA di sta d+h+yi ta ed+hA ca pa rnaMta/_ta si la sogs de phan gyi ad+hA'i rab rnams kyang ngo /_/de phan gyi rkyen ta sil nas 
[\[89a.2\]]e d+hA'i bar gyi _mthun pa/_mang po/_slar ram par yang /_bab tu rang pa/_mkhas pa'am slob dpon/_mthun pa'am grogs/_rkyen gang rung _bcas/_yid/_khra bo/_ngan pa/_byin pa'i rkyen mtha' rnams kyang mi zad pa'o/_/de phan gyi rkyen kr-i twa su tsa/_sa sta si/_A r+ya lau/_ts+b+yAN+yA Sh+a rnams kyi mtha' can yang mi zad pa'o/_/
[\[89a.3\]]gzhan yang /_a tha/_A ma/_pratA ma/_pra sA na/_pra tA na/_mA/_mAng rnams te/_de rnams swar la sogs pa rnams so/_/tsa/_bA/_hA/_a ha/_e ba/_'di ci nges pa/_e baM/_nU naM/_sha shwa ta/_ku pa ta/_ku tsita/_ne ta/_tse ta/_tsaN/_kwa tsi ta/_a tra/_gang la/_ne ha/_he n+ha/_mA kiM/_yA 
[\[89a.4\]]bta/_tA/_de nas bkra shis/_glo bur dang nad/_mi shes pa/_bzang ba/_rgyas pa/_dgag tshig/_sems pa/_bta/_twai/_dwai/_shrai/_bau Sha Ta/_sbA hA/_dang yang /_yang na dang 'dra ga nges pa/_tshig gi/_ba bskang smras pa/_de bzhin/_nges pa/_'os pa/_blun po/_ngan pa/_spangs pa/_yod/_'jigs pa/_ya lar ram skabs bar gang /_'ching ga sdug bsngal/_ci'ang med/_tu ma/
[\[89a.5\]]chu gang la/_twa thA hi/_la lu/_ki la/_ta thA/_smA/_smi/_a/_i/_u/_r-i/_Sh-i/_e ai/_de'i rgyu la/_de kho na nyid/_drang /_dpal/_sngags/_gzhi chugs/_o au sogs dbyangs re re rnams dang /_A ba/_dgag tshig/_a/_mA/_no/_nA/_bzhi dang /_u ta/_U nya/_o gas/_A da ta/_A taM ka/_be lA yAM/_ya thA/_ki~M/_ci/_nas 
[\[89a.6\]]de'i dus nges pa/_gtam sam tshig rgyan nam nges pa/_de'i/_yod pa/_ya ta/_yi/_hA/_hai/_he/_a+YAT/_yA ta/_a ho/_na nu/_ma N+ye/_na hi/_u tA ho/_a si/_brU hi/_na tu/_mtshams sam ces/_ai ti/_I ba/_au/_phaT/_ya di/_ster/_tog gag_khang pa/_thal pa/_phyong ba/_dus/_gang gi dus/_ho/_i hi/_i ha/
[\[89a.7\]]na mas/_'dud/_a ho/_nyung ngu bam nyung ngu /_swa ta/_u pa r+yi/_steng /_gang /_gang la/_dri ba/_kye zhes bod tshig/_thob pa/_ngo mtshar/_snga ma'i dus/_sems pa/_med/_tog ge ba/_yod dang ral gri/_smra ba/_med/_A bAM/_bdag/_su/_zhes sa nyam pa/_gang gi dus/_kaM/_bde ba'am mtho ris/_shu ka/_ne mo/_a nu kaM/_rjes su mtho ris/_yod/_'di/_'di/_na hi 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]kaM/_sa t+yaM/_r-i ta ma/_no tse ta/_na tse ta/_dzA ta/_ka thaM/_ku taH/_ku tra/_sha ka TaM/_ad+ya/_di Sh+D+ya/_pa shu/_A nu Sha ka/_b+hadza ka/_aM ga/_DA ka/_phra an/_a re/_tsa Tu/_ngan byed man ngag/_tsA Tu/_hAM/_kuM/_muM/_khuM/_luM/_be/_b+hU ya ma/_a ni shaM/_suSh+Du/_kA maM/_bu ru taH/_A shu/_ta r+hi/_ra has/
[\[89b.2\]]mtho ris med/_bden pa/_bden ba/_med dam dgag tshig/_le lar/_ci'am gang /_ci nas/_ci la/_shing rta/_de ring /_skar ra/_byol song /_dong pa/_nor gong ba'am snod/_lus sam gzugs/_khor zhes ba lta bu rang las chung ba'i bod tshig/_sa ba di/_bod pa/_blo rtse gnyis/_nges ba/_yang yang /_rgyun du'am rtag tu/_mchog/_'dod pa/_da lta/_mgyogs pa/_de la/_dben gnas/_u 
[\[89b.3\]]ri/_U ra ri/_de rnams kyang mi zad pa'o/_/tad+d+hi ta sh+tsAs rba bi b+hak+hiH/_de phan las rnam dbye thams cad me 'jug pa rnams kyang ngo /_/de phan gyi rkyen rnam dbye rnams mi 'jug pa _mgyogs pa/_rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams kyang mi zad pa'o/_/de yang dper na de phan gyi rkyen rnam dbye lnga ba'i don 
[\[89b.4\]]mang pa las gcig bzung ba'i don/_dang /_bdun pa'i don la tes tra sbyar ba'i/_ta haH/_ya taH/_ta tra/_ya tra lta bu'o/_/kr-in+me dzaMtaH/_kr-i ta kyi ma e tsa mtha' 'ang ngo /_/kr-i ta sogs kyi rkyen ma yig mtha' can rnams dang e tsa so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge'i mtha' can rnams kyang mi zad pa'o/_/dper na/_smA raM/
[\[89b.5\]]zhes ma mtha' can dang /_dzI ba se/_ping d+h+yaM/_zhes pa e tsa'i mtha' can/_de las/_de la/_gang las/_de la/_gang la/_lta bu rnams kyang mi zang pa'o/_k+t+wA to sun+ka su naH/_k+t+wA to sun ka sun rnams kyang ngo /_/k+t+wA dang to sun dang ka sun zhes pa'i rkyen byin pa'i mtha' rnams kyang mi zad pa'o/_/de yang dper na _dran pa'i gyis 
[\[89b.6\]]k+tA rkyen mtha' can/_kr-i twA/_to _chor ba 'thung ba/_sun gyi mtha'/_u de to ma ka sun gyi rkyen mtha' can/_bi sr-i paH/_lta bu'o/_/a bya yA t+su paH/_mi zad pa las su pa kyi'o/_/mi zad pa'i sde rnams las su ba ste su sogs rnam dbye thams cad 'jig go/_/'grel par ji skad du/_sa dr-i shaM tr-i Shuling+ge Shu sarbA su 
[\[89b.7\]]ca bi b+hak+ti Shu/_btsa_byas nas/_ne Shu tsa sa rbeShu yan+na bye ti ta da bya_steng /_yaM/_zhes pa byung ste/_bod skad du/_rnam par mgyogs pa/_rtags gsum la ni mnyam par mtshungs/_/rnam dbye thams cad la yang ngo /_/tshig rnams thams cad la yang ste/_/dbyer med gang de mi zad pa'o/_/zhes mi zad pa'i sde 'di 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]rnams la pho mo ma ning gi dbye ba'i rtags kyi mtha' da mi 'dra ba cung zad tsam yang med de/_kun la sbyor ba kho na yin pas/_gang las kyang mi 'gyur bas na mi zad pa'am/_yang tshig gcig gis don sna tshogs ston pas na don zad pa med pa'i phyir mi zad pa zhes kyang bya'o/_/nyer bsgyur a 
[\[90a.2\]]ba dang a pi gnyis kyi a dbyi ba dang /_ni sha dang btsa/_di sha gsum la TA pa ster ba sngon gyi drang sreng b+ha gu ri 'dod do zhes yang 'grel par byung ngo /_/i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya trA da bya yAHsa mA byAH/_zhes bA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las mi zad pa rnams rdzogs so//_//de rnams kyis brda 
[\[90a.3\]]spyod pa'i bstan bcos chen po bA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don dper brjod cho ga sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las mi zad pa'i sde rags rim du bstan ba'i sde tshan rnams re zhig rdzogs so//_//da ni rtags gsum ngos bzung ba'i 
[\[90a.4\]]don du rtags so so'i dbye ba shes par 'dod pas/_mo rtags kyi rkyen nam bud med du bsgrub pa'i rkyen rnams kyi 'jug tshul bshad par bya ste/_a dzA d+ya ta Sh+DApa/_a dza sogs a ta las TA pa'o/_/a dza sogs a ta mtha' rnams las bud med du bsgrub pa'i rkyen TA pa ster ro/_/a dza la/_TA pa/_mtha'i 
[\[90a.5\]]ha la 'os pa phyis/_cu Tu dag sogs Ta phyis/_a ka gi 'dra ba la rid po 'os/_a dzA/_de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/_e Da kA/_a shwA/_tsa Ta kA/_mU'i kA/_bA lA/_to TI/_bA kA/_ba t+sA/_man+gA/_bi la/_tA/_meng+hA/_ko kilA/_sarbA sogs dang a ta mtha' can ma yin kyang /_bAtsa/_ni sha/_di sha/_gsum la TA pa 'jug pa b+ha gu 
[\[90a.6\]]ri 'dod do zhes pa ltar/_TA pa sbyar bas/_bA tsA/_ni shA/_di shwa/_sogs dang /_/yang 'grel _lug mo'am ma mo/_rgod ma/_bye'u mo/_byid mo/_bu mo lo bcu drug ma/_dbang can/_tshod ma/_bi'u mo/_dal bus 'gro ma/_khrel med ma/_blo ldan ma/_khu byug mo/_thams cad/_par gzhan nas lung drangs pa/_ha laM tA dwA/_ha la mtha' las yang na'o/_/zhes 
[\[90a.7\]]pa byung bas skabs 'gar a ta mthar_dag ma/_mtshan mo/_phyogs ma/_ma zad ha la gyi mtha' can la yang TA pa 'jug par bshad do/_/shU drA ts+tsA ma ha t+pu rbA dz+dza tiH/_shU dra zhes pa'i rtags las ched po'i skad dod/_ma ha ta sngon na med pa'i rigs kyi don brjod pa la 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]TA pa 'jug go/_shUdrA/_dmang ris/_saM b+ha dzin sha Na pi N+De b+h+yaHpa lwa ta/_saM b+ha s+t+ra a dzin sha Na piN+Da rnams las pha la las so/_/saM dang b+ha s+t+ra dang a dzin/_sha Na dang piN+Da rnams sngon na yod pa'i pha la la bud med kyi rkyen TA pa 'jug go/_/saM ba lA/_b+ha s+t+ra pha lA/_a dzin pha lA/_sha Na pha lA/_paN+Da pha la/_'grel par 
[\[90b.2\]]skabs 'gar e ka sngon ma la'ang 'gyur ro zhes ba byung bas/_e ka pha lA/_'grel par gzhan nas lung drangs te/_sa ta/_prA kAM Da/_prA ta/_sha ta/_e ka rnams snga ma'i bu Sh+pa la'ang TA pa 'jug go zhes _yang dag pa'i 'bras bu ma/_gsungs b+ha s+t+ra'i 'brus bu ga a dzin pa'i 'bras bu ma/_sha Ni'i 'bras bu ma/_buN+Da'i 'bras bus/_pas/
[\[90b.3\]]sa t+pu t+pA/_prA kAM Da pu Sh+pA/_prAM ta pu Sh+pA/_sha ta pu Sh+pA/_e ka puSh+pA/_'bras bu gcig/_yang 'grel par/_dz+yeSh+Tha/_ka niSh+Tha/_mad+h+ya ma rnams dang na nya snga ma'i mU la la TU pa 'jug go zhes pa byung bas/_dz+yeSh+ThA/_ka ni Sh+ThA/_ma d+h+ya mA/_a mU lA/_gong du r-i ta na rnams las dI pa'o zhes pa byung pa ltar dI pa/_mtha'i ha la 
[\[90b.4\]]me tog dam pa/_'os pa phyis/_de phan mi/_me tog ma brgya/_me tog ma gcig/_yin pa la la sha ku rnams sos/_da phyis/_kar+t+t+rI/_daN+Di nI/_rA dz+wI/_shu nI/_mag+ho nI/_ma g+ha pa tI rgan mo/_na chung ma/_'bring ma ste dang babs/_rtsa med ma/_sogs so/_u gi ta sh+tsa/_u ka 'gro ba las 
[\[90b.5\]]kyang ngo /_/rtags mtha' u ka so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams 'gro ba las kyang bud med du bsgrub pa'i rkyen byed pa mo/_dbyug pa can ma/_rgyal mo/_khyi mo/_brgya byin ma/_dI pa 'jug ste/_bi du ShI/_shrA ma tI/_b+ha ba tI/_pa tsa n+tI/_di bya n+tI/_tu dan+tI/_b+hun+tI/_pa t+yi tsI/_pra t+yaM tsI/_tir sh+tsI/_u dI 
[\[90b.6\]]tsI/_ba no ra tsa/_wa na las ra'i 'ang ngo /_/wa yig u pa d+hu na yod pa'i na mtha' la dI pa 'jug par ma zad na yig kyang ra yig tu 'gyur te/_d+hi ba na? la dI pa/_d+hi ba rI/_de bzhin du/_ha ri dr-i shwa rI/_mkhas ma/_dpal ldan ma/_skal can ma/_g.yos ma/_rtsed mo mkhan ma/_nad can ma/_mdzes ma/_nub phyogs kyi bud med/_dud 'gro ma/_yang 
[\[90b.7\]]byang phyogs kyi bud med /_'grel par lung drangs pa/_ba no na ha sha ban gyi ha sha las ma yin no/_/gong du ba na mtha' can la dI ba 'gyur zhing na rang 'gyur ba bshad bA+o ldan ma/_kyang de'i dmigs bsal wa de dang ha sha so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge gang rung nyis brtsegs su yod na dI pa kyang mi 'jug cing na rar mi 'gyur te/
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]dper na/_rA dza yu d+hAn/_sa ha yu d+hAn/_zhes pa lta bu la dI pa mi 'jig go_/'grel par gzhan nas lung drangs pa/_ba hu brI hau bA/_'bru mang po yang na'o/_/tshig sdud kyi na mtshan 'bru mang po'i tshig sdud kyi mtha' la dI ba ster ba dang na ra ra 'gyur ba yang na ba ster 'dam ka can no/_ba hu ng+hi 
[\[91a.2\]]ba rI'am yang na dI pa ma byin par gong ha la mtha'i skabs su bshad pa ltar bsgrubs pas/_ba hu d+hi bA lta bu'o/_bA do n+ya ta ra s+yAM/_bA da las yang na'o/_/bA da las dI ba yang na ba ste ster mi ster 'das ka can no/_/dI ba dI/_yang na/_bA da ba ta sogs so/_/TA bri tsi/_rig byed _blo ldan ma mang po/
[\[91a.3\]]la TA pa'o/_/pad ces pa rig byed kyi don can yin na mo rkyen TA pa 'jug ste/_dwi pa dA/_ma naHma na las so/_/ma u pad+hu na yod pa'i na yig mtha' can la mo rkyen dI la 'jug pa ma yin te/_dper na/_sim na/_rkang gnyis ma/_zhes pa lta bu la dI ba mi 'jug/_su/_gong ha la mtha'i skabs ltar/_si 
[\[91a.4\]]mA lta bu'o/_a no ba hu br-I he/_an las 'bru mang po'i 'o/_/'bru mang po'i tshig rkang gnyis ma/_sdud kyi mtha' an mtha' la dI pa mi 'jug go zhes gong du 'bru mang gi tshig sdud kyi mtha' la tI pa yang na bar bshad pas dmigs bsal lo/_/dper na/_ba hu ya dz+wa na/_zhes pa la/_dI pa mi 
[\[91a.5\]]gla ba mo/_'jug gong ha la gyi mtha' can ltar bsgrubs pas/_ba hu ya dz+wA zhes pa 'byung ba lta bu'o/_/'on kyang mdo 'di ya dz+wa na kho nam gtogs gzhan la mi 'jug gsung /_DA bu D+hA b+h+yA ma n+ya ta ra s+thaM/_gnyis dag la DU pa yang na'o/_/'bru mang po'i tshig sdud kyi mtha' can/_ba hu ya dz+wa dang si man 
[\[91a.6\]]gnyis la bud med kyi rkyen DA ba yang na 'jug ste/_DA pa/_mtha'i ha la 'os/_pa phyis/_Ti 'os/_phyis/_da'i don gyi Da phyis/_si mA/_ba hu ya dzA/_yang na gong du bshad pa ltar ba hu rA dz+nyI/_pra t+ya ya s+thA t+kA t+pU rbas+yA ta i dA bya su baH/_rkyen gnas pa las ka las snga ma'i a ta kyi i ta su pa ma yin pa'i A pa la'o/_/ka'i 
[\[91a.7\]]rkyen byin pa'i ka'i snga ma'i a ta ste a yig ni su pa ma yin pa'i zhes su pa kyi rnam dbye nA nas bdun pa'i mang tshig gi bar so sor bsdu ba la A pa zer ba de ma yin pa'i bud med kyi rkyen A pa pha rol la i ta ste i yig tu 'gyur te/_dper na/_sarba ka dang /_kA ra ka la/_TA ba/_a i/_sarbi kA/_thams cad/_gA ri 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]kA/_mA mi kA/_na ri kA lta bu'o/_/a ta ma yin na ir mi 'gyur te/_naukA/_yang a ta yin kyang /_ba hu pa ri brA dza kA/_zhes pa ir mi 'gyur zhes 'grel par byung ngo /_/t+yaka t+ya yo sh+tsa/_t+ya ka t+ya ya dag gi'ang ngo /_/da phan gyi rkyen t+ya ka dang t+ya ya dag kyang A pa pha rol la i ru 'gyur te/_dper na/_dA k+Shi 
[\[91b.2\]]tshig pe'u byed pa/_mi mo ste bud med/_NA t+yi kA/_i ha t+yi kA/_kwa t+y-i kA/_gru mkhan ma/_lta bu'o/_/na yAs yoH/_yas dag gi ma yin no/_/ka'i snga ma yin kyang a ste yang dang sa ste ta da gnyis kyi a ni i ru 'gyur ba ma yin ta/_dper na/_ya kA/_sa kA zhes par gnas la/_yi kA/_si kA/_zhes par 
[\[91b.3\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/'grel par/_t+ya ka na ma yin no zhes pas de phan gyi rkyen t+ya kan gyi mtha' ni ir mi 'gyur bas/_dper na/_a d+hit+ya kA/_u pa t+ya kA/_zhes pa nyid du gnas so/_/yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/_shis brjod la bun gyi ma yin no/_/bun gyi rkyen shis brjod kyi don can yin na a ir mi 
[\[91b.4\]]'gyur te/_dzI ba kA/_b+ha ba kA lta bu ste/_bun a kar 'gyur ba'i rjes so/_/tshig rjes ma la mi 'gyur te/_de ba da t+ti kA/_ya dz+nyi kA/_yang 'grel par/_k+Shi pa kA sogs las ma yin no zhes pa byung pa'i/_k+Shipa kA/_tsa Ta kA/_d+h+ru ba kA/_tAr kA rnams kyang a ir mi 'gyur ro/_/par+Na kA zhes skud 
[\[91b.5\]]pa'i mdog_'tsho bam/_ya dang ma yin/_lta bu skud pa'i don yin na a ir 'gyur la/_don gzhan yin na ni 'gyur _lhas sbyin ma/[ (]mchad sbyin [,]mchod sbyin[)] ma/_ro/_/pa r+t+ta kA zhes pa'ang shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta rnams de kar gnas _zad ma/_byi'u ma/_brtan ngam/_sgrol ba ma/_par 'dod la/_byang phyogs kyi paN+Di/_mdog ma/_ta 
[\[91b.6\]]rnams ba rti kA zhes a ir 'gyur ba 'dod ces 'grel par byung ngo /_gtor ma/_/aSh+Ta kA zhes pa'ang lha dang pha'i don yin na a ir mi 'gyur la/_don gzhan la a ir 'gyur bas/_lo brgyad ma/_a Sh+Ti kA zhes pa 'byung ngo /_/yang 'grel par gzhan nas lung drangs te/_sU ta kA sogs la 'dam ka'o zhes pa byung bas/
[\[91b.7\]]sU ta kA bud med sbum ma bcas nas zhag bcu las mang bab song ba'i ming /_sU te kA/_bu mo/_pu ti kA/_bri n+dAr kA/_bud med mang po tshogs pa'am/_br-in+dA ri kA/_yul bcom brlag gi bud med pa yang zer/_u dI tsA mA ta sa \u0fb6\u0f97\u0f71ne la ka pU rbA yAH/_byung pa rnamasaA ta kyi shul ya ka snga ma'i 'o/_/byang phyogs kyi paN+Dita rnams A phyis pa'i shul ya yig dang ka 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]yig ka dang bcas pa'i A pa pha rol la a ir 'gyur ba dang mi 'gyur ba 'dam ka can du 'dod pas/_A r+Y+Ya kA/_A r+Y+Yi kA/_tsa Ta ka kA/_tsa Ta ki kA/_yang 'grel par/_A kA sh+ya kA sogs ir 'gyur ba kho na'o zhes pa byung bas/_sAM kA sh+yi kA/_a shI kA/_shu b+ha yi kA/_su na yi kA/
[\[92a.2\]]su pA ki kA/_'di rnams la yang na pa mi byed do/_/b+ha s+t+rai/_ShA dzA dz+nyA dwA swA na nya pU rbA NA ma pi/_b+ha s+t+ra e _'phags ma/_Sha a dza dz+ha_bye'u so/_dwa swa rnams la na nya snga ma las kyang yang na'o/_/b+ha stA la sogs pa de rnams lan nya sngon na yod/_ka shI bud med/_rgod ma/_mdzes ma/_med 
[\[92a.3\]]shin tu mdzes ma/_g.yos bzhad ma/_gang yin kyang a ir 'gyur ba dang mi 'gyur ba 'dam ka can no/_b+ha s+t+ra kA/_b+ha s+t+ri kA/_e Sha kA/_e Shi kA/_a dza kA/_a dzi kA/_dz+nya kA/_dz+nyi kA/_dwa kA/_dwi kA/_sa kA/_si kA/_a b+ha s+t+ri kA/_b+ha s+t+ri kA/_lta bu'o/_/yang de rnams kyi nang nas kyang na nya 
[\[92a.4\]]snga ma'i e Sha kA ni ir mi 'gyur ro zhes 'grel par byung bas/_a ne Sha kA zhes pa nyid du gnas so/_'grel khol tho/_bar/_b+ha s+t+ra kA zhes pa'i sngon du nyer _ram/_bsgyur gang _she sam/_byung _gnyis ma/_yang er 'gyur ba dang mi 'gyur ba 'dam ka byed do zhes pa byung bas/_ni r+b+ha s+t+ra kA/_ni r+b+ha s+t+ri 
[\[92a.5\]]kA/_a b+hA Shi ta puM skA ts+tsa/_skyes pa las ma bshad pa la yang na'o/_/sngar skyes pa'i rtags kyi skabs su ma bshad pa rnams la yang a ir 'gyur ba dang mi 'gyur ba 'dam ka can du bya ste/_ga ga kA/_gaM gi kA/_a gaM ga kA/_ba ra ma ga ga kA/_par ma gaM gi kA/_skyes 
[\[92a.6\]]pa'i rtags kyi skabs su bshad pa rnams la a ir 'gyur ba kho na byed la yang na mi byed de/_shu b+h+ri kA lta bu'o/_ba hu brI hau tu ni t+yaM/_'bru mang po la nges pa'o/_/sngar skyes pa'i rtags kyi skabs su bshad ma thag pa'i rtags 'bru mang gi tshig sdud can la yang na bar mi byed par a ir 'gyur ba kho na 
[\[92a.7\]]bya ste/_a kha T+ri kA lata bu'o/_/A dA tsA r+Y+YA NAM/_slob dpon rnams kyi A ta la'o/_/sngon gyi slob dpon 'ga' zhig sngar skyes pa'i rtags kyi skabs su ma bshad pa'i rtags mtha' ring po rnams TA pa dang bcas pa'i ka pha rol la thung ngur bsgyur bar yang ga 'dod de/_dper na/_gaM gA kA zhes pa la/
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]gaM ga kA lta bu'o/_/Ti D+h+ya Na nya dwa ya sa dza da g+h+nany+mA tra tsa ta ya pa Tha ka Tha nya ka nya kA ra pa bU nAM/_Ti D+hi a Na a nya dwa yas dza da g+hA nya mA tra tsa ta ya pa Tha ka Tha nya ka nya kwa rab blun rnams kyi'o/_/rkyen Ta 'gro ba rnams dang D+ha 'gro ba rnams dang a Na la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi mtha' la'ang bud med du brjod pa'i 
[\[92b.2\]]rkyen dI ba 'jug ste/_de yang dper na/_Ta 'gro ba'i rkyen mtha' la/_ku ru tsa rI/_na dI sogs dang /_D+ha 'gro ba la/_sau pa r+Ne yI/_a Na la/_an+d+rI/_a nya la/_au t+sAM dr-i yas dza la/_u ru dwa ya sI/_da g+h+nanyal/_u ru da g+ni/_mA tra tsa la/_u ru mA trI/_ta ya pa la/_pany+tsa tA yI/
[\[92b.3\]]Tha ka le/_a+wa k+Shi kI/_Tha nya la/_lA wa Ni kI/_ka nya la/_yA dr-i shI/_ku ru'i yul du spyod pa/_rgyun can te chu bo/_kwa ra pa la/_i twa rI/_khUn la/_A d+yaM/_mig mo/_ka ra NI sogs so/_/yang a Na'i _zad ldan ma/_dmigs bsal/_pa hu ku ru tsa ra dang /_daN+Da la dwi pa mi 'jug TA pa 'jug_lnga len ma/
[\[92b.4\]]mig ldan ma/_go zhes pa 'grel _lan tshwa can ma/_par 'byung bas/_ba hu ku ru tsa rA/_daN+DA zhes pa lta bu'o/_/na nya sna nyi _'gro ba/_nyin byed ma /_ka k+ta ru Na ta lu nA nAM tsa/_na nya sna nya I ka ka ta ru Na ta lu na rnams kyi 'ang ngo /_/rkyen na nya sna nya sgra ngan du spyod ma mang po/_dbyug pa ma/_I ka ka rnams dang ta ru Na 
[\[92b.5\]]zhes pa'i rtags rnams la yang dI pa 'gyur te/_dper na/_sgra ngan du sbyod pa mang po/_dbyug pa can ma/_na nya la/_stai NI/_sna nya la/_pauM snI/_I ka ka la/_yA Sh+TI kI/_sha k+tI kI/_ta ru NI/_ta lu ni sogs so/_/prA tsAM Sh+ga tad+R+hi taHshar pa rnams Sh+ka tad+R+hi ta'o/_/ya nya mtha' la rgya gar shar phyogs kyi 
[\[92b.6\]]slob dpon rnams bud med du bsgrub pa'i rkyen Sh+ka 'jug la/_de la tad+R+hi ta ste de phan gyi ming can zhes brda chad _bud med/_byed de/_gA rgyal/_Sh+ka/_sa chod sbyin byed ma/_ma dung can ma/_lus phra ma/_ShaHpra t+ya ya s+ya/_rkyen gyi Sha'o/_/w+ka lta bu'i rkyen gyi thog ma'i Sha yig ni 'gro ba'i ming can yin te/
[\[92b.7\]]Sha phyis/_nye ba'i yul la a tsa dang rjes su sna ldan 'gro ba'o zhes pas/_a phyis/_mtha'i ha la 'os/_ka phyis/_gA rgya/_ya nya sh+tsaH/_ya nya las 'ang ngo /_/ya nya'i rkyen mtha' las kyang bud med du byed pa'i rkyen dI pa 'jug ste/_gA rgya/_dI pa/_gang gi i ta la'ang ngos/_rtags mtha'i a phyis/_ha 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]la stad+d+hi twa s+ya/_ha la las de phan gyi'o/_/hal gyi pha rol la de phan gyi ya yig ni dbyi bar bya ste/_ya phyis/_ga rgI/_A ya ne yI nI yi yAHpha D+ha la tsha gAM/_pha D+ha la tsag+ha rnams kyi A yan e yan In ya i ya rnams so/_de phan gyi rkyen gyi pha rnams A ya na ru 
[\[93a.2\]]'gyur/_D+ha rnams e ya/_ka rnams In/_tsha rnams I ya/_g+ha rnams i ya zhes par 'gyur te/_gA rgya la/_pha nya/_drang srong gA rga'i chung ma/_pha A ya nang bsgyur/_gA rgA ya Na/_Shi d+gau rA di b+h+ya sh+tsa/_Shi ta gau ra sogs rnams las kyang ngo /_/rkyen Sha 'gro ba rnams dang gau ngal sogs 
[\[93a.3\]]pa rnams la bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen dI Sha 'jug ste/_gA rgyu ya Na zhes pa gau nga sogs kyi nang tshan yin pas/_di Sha/_mtha'i ha la 'os/_Sha phyis/_la sha ku zhes pas da phyis/_gang gi i ta la'ang ngos/_rtags mtha'i a phyis/_gArgyA ya NI/_na rta kI/_gau rI/_ba ya si pra tha me/
[\[93a.4\]]dang po'i na tshod la'o/_/dang po'i na tshod ces pa lo bcu tshun gyi na tshod brjod pa'i don can gyi a yig mtha' can la'ang dI Sha 'jug ste/_ku mA rI/_ki shwa rI/_'grel bar lo bcu tshun du ma zad rgan mo min pa'i dar bab la yang dI Sha 'jug go zhes pa 'byung bas/_gar ma/_dkar mo/_tsi ra TI/_rgan mo 
[\[93a.5\]]yin na dI pa mi 'gyur TA pa 'jug pas/_br-id+d+hA/_a ta mtha' ma yin na dang po'i na tshod yin kyang mi 'gyur te/_dper na/_shi shu zhes pa/_gzhon nu ma/_'a dISha mi 'jug go_/a ta mtha' yin kyang ka n+ya la dI Sha mi 'jug TA pa 'jug ste/_/ka n+yA/_dwi goHphyog gnyis pa las _sgang yo sam/_so/
[\[93a.6\]]tshig sdud kyi nang tshan phyogs gnyis/_rgan mo/_pa'i tshig sdud byas pa'i a mtha' can la bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen _gzhon nu/_dI ba 'jug ste/_pany+tsa mU lI/_phyogs gnyis pa yin kyang tri pha la la dI pa mi 'jug TA pa 'gyur te/_gzhon nu ma/_tri pha lA/_a pa ri mA Na bistA tsi ta kam+ba l+ye b+h+yo na 
[\[93a.7\]]ta d+d+hi ta lu ki/_chad ma yin pa'i snya a tsi ta kam+da l+ya rnams las de phan phyis pa la ma yin no/_/pi sta sogs 'di rnams la phyogs gnyis pa'i tshig sdud _rtsa ba lnga ma/_kyis de phan gyi rkyen phyis pa dang tshad kyi sgra ma yin pa rnams la dI pa 'jug pa ma yin 'bras bu gsum ma/_te TA pa 'jug go_/
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]bany+tsa shwa/_dwi bar+ShA/_dwi bi stA/_d+w+ya tsi tA/_dwi kam+ba l+yA/_tshad yin na dI pa 'jug ste/_d+w+yA Da ki/_kA N+DAM tA ta k+She tre/_kAN+Da mtha' las zhing la'o/_/grangs snga ma'i kAN+Da la zhing brjod pa'i don las de phan gyi rkyen phyis pa la dI pa 'jug pa ma yin te/_dwi kAN+DA k+She tra b+ha k+tiH/_zhing ma yin na dI pa 'gyur 
[\[93b.2\]]rgod ma lnga/_lo gnyis/_mtho gnyis/_mchod pa gnyis ma/_lab gnyis ma/_te/_dwi kA N+DI _bro do/_ra rdzuHpu ru ShA t+p+ra mA Ne n+ya ta ra s+yAM/_pu ru Sha las tshad la yang na'o/_/grangs snga ma'i de phan phyis pa la pu ru Sha las tshad la dwi pa yang na ste/_dwi pu ra _tsher ma gnyis pa'i shing zos/_ShI ya Sh+tsiHdwi pu ru ShA/
[\[93b.3\]]U d+ha so nar/_U d+has kyi a nang ngo /_U ng+has zhes pa'i Ti ni _tshe ras ma gnyis pa'i thag pa/_bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen ma yin na Ti a nang du mi 'gyur te/_/Ti a nang du bsgyur/_mtha'i hal 'os/_da phyis/_na'i a brjod don U ng+d+ha na/_bahu brI he rU ng+ha so rI Sha/_skyes bu gnyis kyi mchod sdong /
[\[93b.4\]]'bru ma mang po la U ng+has la sa dI Sha'o/_'bru mang gi tshig sdud can U ng+has la bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen dI Sha 'gyur te/_na'i a dbyi 'os u pa ng+hA'i a phyis/_pI no ng+h+ni/_bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen ma yin na Ti a nang du mi 'gyur to/_/dA ma hrA ya nAM tA ts+tsha/_dA ma na hA yan las 'ang ngo /_/
[\[93b.5\]]grangs snga ma'i dA ma na dang hA ya na las na tshod la dI Sha 'gyur te/_dI rA m+ni/_dwi hA ya nI/_yang 'grel par hA yan lan tshod la dI Sha 'gyur zhing /_tri tsa tur/_nu ma 'o mas gang ba/_nu ma 'o mas gang ba/_dag sngon du byung na na'i 'ang Na'o zhes pa byung bas/_tri hA ya NI/_tsa tu D+hA ya NI/_na tshod min na dI Sha mi 'gyur te/_/
[\[93b.6\]]tri hA ya nA shA lwa/_an+da rba t+pa ti rnuka/_an+ta rba ta pa ti/_chu bo gnyis ma/_lo gnyis ma/_ba ta las nu ka'o/_/an+ta rba ta dang pa ti bta dag las bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen pha rol la nu ka A ga ma 'gyur te/_an+ta rba p+mI/_pa ti ba t+nI/_pa lo gsum ma/_mo bzhi ma/_t+yA rno ya dz+nya saM yi ge/_pa ti lin 
[\[93b.7\]]lo gsum gyi mgron khang /_mchod sbyin sbyor ba la'o/_/pe ti'i sgra las mchod sbyin sbyor ba can te bdag po dang ldan pa'i don la Ti nar 'gyur zhing dI Sha 'jug ste/_pat+nI/_bdag ldan ma/_big+hA ShA sa dU rbas+ya/_sda ma/_mngal ldan ma/_bdag po ldan ma ste chung ma/_dang bcas pa'i yang na'o/_/ming gzhan snga ma dang 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]bcas pa'i pa ti'i sgran pu 'gyur ba dang dI Sha yang na ste/_dr-i b+ha pa t+nI/_dr-i b+ha pa tiHni byis pa h+n+yA di Sha/_sa pat+nI sogs rnams la rtag tu'o/_/sa mA na la sogs pa rnams las pha rol gyi pa ti sgra rta ka tu na dang dI Sha 'gyur te/_sa pA t+nI/_e ka pat+nI sogs so/_/bU ta kra tor tse/_mU ta 
[\[94a.2\]]kra tu'i ai yang ngo /_/pU ta ka tu'i sgra ni ai ru 'gyur zhing dI Da 'jug ste/_bstan ba'i bdag mo/_bstan pa'i bdag po/_pU ta kA tA yI/_br-i ShA kA d+ya g+ni ku si ta ku sI dA mu dA t+taH/_br-i ShA ka pi ag+ni ku si ta ku sId rnams kyi u dA t+ta'o/_bdag bcas ma/_bdag po gcig ma/_/br-i ShA ka pi sogs 'di rnams 
[\[94a.3\]]kyi skyes pa ldan pa las dA+eSha 'gyur zhing mtha' ai ru yang 'gyur te/_udA t+ta'i ming can zhes zer ro/_/b-I ShAH/_gtsang ma'i mchod sbyin/_ka pA yI/_ag+nA yI/_ku si tA yI/_ku sI dA yI/_ma no rau bA/_ma nu las au yang na'o/_/ma nu las skyes pa ldan pa la di Sha yang na ste mtha' au ru 'gyur 
[\[94a.4\]]pa'am yang na au ru 'gyur te/_mnA wI/_ma nA yI/_ma nuH/_bar+NA da nu dA t+tA t+to pa d+hAt+to naH/_dbyangs a nu dA t+ta las u pa/_ce sbyang 'dra ba'i spre'u mo/_me lha mo/_b+ha'i ta/_ngan ma/_le lo ma/_na'o/_mtha'i dbyangs a nu dA t+ta ste sgra skad gsang dma' bar brjod pa a yig thung ngu'i u pa ng+hI ta yig ni 
[\[94a.5\]]dI Sha pha rol lan yig tu 'gyur te/_mi mo/_mi mo/_mi/_e nI/_yang na a tA/_mtha' a yig min na a nurA t+ta yin kyang ta nar mi 'gyur te/_shi tI/_lta bu'o/_'grel par gung drangs pa/_pa shaMg las 'ang ngo /_/pa shaMg la'ang bud med du brjod pa'i 'i rkyen dI Sha 'gyur zhes pa 'byung bas/_pi 
[\[94a.6\]]shaM g+Shi/_yang 'grel bar a shi ta dang pa li ta la dI Sha 'jug_sna ba mo/_pa ma yin zhing TA pa 'gyur ro zhes pa byung bas/_a shi tA/_ba li tA/_yang_dkar mo/_k+na'i rkyen can la dI Sha 'gyur te/_a shi g+nI/_ba li g+nI/_sUr+Ya ti Sh+yAg skya ma t+s+yAnAM ya u pa b+hA yAH/_sUr+Ya ti Sh+ya a ga s+t+ya ma t+h+ya rnams 
[\[94a.7\]]kyi u pa d+hA'i ya'o/_/sUr+Ya sogs de rnams la dISha 'gyur zhing u pad+hA'i ya dbyi ste/_sdu rI/_nyi ma'i/_ti ShI/_a gastI/_ches cher rgan mo/_ma t+sI/_nya mo/_'grel bar pu Sh+ya kyi ya'ang dbyi'o zhes ba byung _ches cher rgan mo/_bas/_buShI/_rgyal/_dzAn pad kuN+Da go Na m+thA ka b+hA dza nA ga lA la nI la 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]ku shakAmu ka ka Da r-I d+d+ra t+yaM na trA baM pa nA kr-i t+ti mA shrA NA s+thau l+ya ba r+NA nA tshA da nA yo ba'i kA ra mai thu ne tshA ke sha be she Shu/_dzA na pa da kuN+da go Na s+thA la b+hA dza nA ga kA la nI la ku sha kA mu ka ka bar rnams las rgyu snod gang kha la/_ma bcos ba lo ma sbom ba mdog khebs min pa khyim 'khrig 'dod/_skra chas 
[\[94b.2\]]rnams la'o/_/dzAn pad la sogs pa bcu gcig po de rnams la [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin rgyu la sogs pa bcu gcig rnams kyi don brjod pa'i tshe dISha 'jug ste/_dzA na pa dI/_ku N+DI/_go NI/_s+thA lI/_b+hA dz+Shi/_nA gI/_kA lI/_nI lI/_ku shI/_kA mu kI/_ka ba rI/_lta bu yin la/_de dag 
[\[94b.3\]]las gzhan la TA pa 'jug pas/_dzA na pa dA nas/_ka ba rA'i bar ro/_/'grel par gzhan nas lus drangs te/_nI la las srog_skyes yul gyi rgyu ma/_snod ma/_glang khal ma/_ma bcos ma/_lo'am 'dab ma/_sbos ba'am phyug mo/_nag mo/_rim mam sngon mo/_lcags khyim/_'khrig 'dod ma/_thor cog ma/_chags dang sman 
[\[94b.4\]]dag la bang ngo /_/zhes pa 'byung bas/_nI lI ba Da bA/_nI mI o Sha d+hiH/_zhes pa lta bu'o/_/yang 'grel par sho Na las shar gyi paN+Di ta rnams dI Sha 'jug par yang na 'dod zhes 'byung bas/_shoNI/_sho NA/_u ngaM tA ng+gu Na ba tsa nA ta/_u ta mtha' las yon tan brjod pa las so/_/u ta 
[\[94b.5\]]mtha' las yon tan brjod pa la _rgod ma sngon mo/_sman sngon mo/_dI Sha yang na 'gyur te/_mri dwI/_mri duH/_pa T+wI/_pa TuH/_u ta mtha' ma yin na yon tan brjod pa yin kyang dI Sha mi 'gyur te/_dmar mo/_shru tsiHsbI/_u ta mtha' yin kyang yon tan brjod pa ma yin na dI Sha mi 'jug 
[\[94b.6\]]ste/_A khuH/_'grel par lung drangs pa/_kha ru dang u pa d+hA na brtsegs pa yod na dI Sha_'jam mnye nam/_mkhas ma/_'gyur ba ma yin no zhes pa byung bas/_kha ruH/_pA N+DuH/_ba hwA di b+h+ya sh+tsa/_ba hu sogs _bud med gtsang ma/_rnams las yang na'o/_/ba hu la sogs pa rnams la dI Sha 
[\[94b.7\]]'jug_byi ba/_ba dang mi 'jug pa 'dam ka can te/_bahwI/_mang pos/_ba huH/_mang bo/_pad+d+ha tI/_dra las/_pad+d+ha tiH/_dral/_i tAH/_prA t+yAM gA ta/_i ta las srog chags_skya sangs/_kyi lus las so/_/i ha mtha' las srog chags kyi lus kyi yan lag brjod pa la dISha yang na 'gyur te/
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]aM gu lI/_aM gu liH/_kr-i di kA rA dak+tinaH/_kr-i ta i yig las k+tin ma yin pa las so/_/kri ta sogs kyi rkyen i ta mtha' las k+tin ma yin pa la thISha yang na 'gyur te/_rA dzI/_rA dziH/_A dziH/_k+tin la/_bud+d+hiH/_ma tiH/_puM yo bA dA khyA yAM/_skyes 
[\[95a.2\]]pa'i ming dang ldan pa la'o/_mdzub mo/_skyes pa'i ming dang ldan pa la dI Sha 'gyur te/_go pI/_a na Du hI/_a na D+wa hI/_ma tA ma hI/_pi tA ma hI/_go bA li kA sogs la dI Sha 'gyur ba _gsal bam/_gsab ba/_rmo mo'am a hI/_ma yin no zhes _blo gros/_'grel bar byung bas/_go sA 
[\[95a.3\]]li kA/_sUr+YAd+de ba tA yAM tsA ya/_sUr+Ya las lha la tsA ba'o/_/skyes pa'i ming dang _'brog mo/_ldan _'bri/_pa sUr+Ya la lha _sa'i ma/_pha'i ma/_las te nyi ma'i chung ma brjod pa la tsA ba 'gyur te/_mtha'i hal 'os ba phyis/_tsu Tu sogs kyis ca phyis/_sUr+YA/_yang na/_sUr+Ya ti Sh+ya 
[\[95a.4\]]ba lang sbyor ma/_sogs kyis/_sU rI/_in+d+ra ba ru Na b+ha ba sharba ru dra mr-i Da hi mAr N+ya ya ba ya ba na mA tu lnga tsAr+YA NA mA nu ka/_inA ba ru Na b+ha ba sha rba ru dra mr-i Da hi ma a ra N+ya ya ba na mA tu la A tsAr+Ya rnams kyi A nu ka'o/_/in+d+ra sogs 'di rnams _nyi ma'i lta mo/_la skyes pa dang ldan pa la 
[\[95a.5\]]dISha 'gyur zhing A nu ka A ga ma yang 'gyur te/_in+dA NI/_ba su d+ha ran+d+rA NI/_ba ru NA NI/_b+ha bA nI/_sha rbA NI/_ru dwA NI/_mr-i DA nI/_hi mA nI/_/a ra N+yA nI/_ya bA nI/_ya ba nA nI/_mA tu lA nI/_A tsAr+YA NI/_'grel par bra h+ma las A nu ka dang dI Sha yang na'o zhes pa byung bas/
[\[95a.6\]]brah+ma NI/_'grel par mA tu la dang u pa/_dbang mo/_nor 'dzin dbang mo/_b+h+yA ya gnyis _tshu pA mo/_srid pa mo/_'tshe byed mo/_dag mo/_bde ba mo/_kha ba mo/_dgon pa mo/_nas ma/_'dres mo/_zhang bo'i mna' ma/_slob dpon kyi tshung ma/_la yang na bar bshad pas/_mA tu lA nI/_mA tu li/_u pA b+h+yA 
[\[95a.7\]]tshangs pa mo/_yA nI/_mkhan mo/_u pA d+h+yA yi/_'grel par Ar+Ya k+Sha tri ya gnyis la yang na lo zhes ba byung bas/_Ar+YA NI/_rje mo'ang ngo mo 'am 'phags ma/_Ar+YA/_k+Sha tri yA NI/_rgyal rigs ma/_k+Sha tri yA/_yang na dI Sha 'gyur A nu ka ma byin bas/_Ar+YI/_k+Sha tri yI/_zhang po'i mna' ma/_sUr+Ya la yang 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]skabs la lar Anu ka 'jug pa srid de/_sUr+YA NI/_krI tA t+ka ra Na dU rbA ta/_krI ta las byed pa snga ma las so/_/byed pa'i tshig snga ma'i krI ta las dI Sha 'gyur te/_bas+t+ra krI tA/_'grel par la lar byed pa'i tshig snga ma can la dI Sha mi 'gyur ba yang yod do zhes pa byung bas/_d+ha na krI tA/_k+tA 
[\[95b.2\]]da wA khyA yAM/_k+ta las chung ngu brjod pa _nyi ma'i chung ma/_la'o/_/byed pa snga ma'i k+ta'i mtha' las chung ngu brjod pa la dI Sha 'gyur te/_/a b+h+ra bi li b+hI/_ba hu brI _gos to ma/_he sh+tsAM to dA t+tA ta/_'bru mang po'i mtha' la'ang u dIt+ta las so/_/'bru mang po'i tshig stad k+ta'i _nor nyo ma/_mtha' 
[\[95b.3\]]can u dA t+ta las kyang dI Sha 'gyur te/_U ru b+hi n+nI/_'grel par/_dzA ta las dI Sha 'gyur pa ma yin no zhes pa byung bas/_dan+ta dzA tA/_sprin gyi ma khebs ma/_pa hu na nya su kA la su khA di pA rbA ts+tsa ni/_ba hu na nya su kA la su kha sogs snga ma las kyang ma yin no/_/ba hu la sogs pa 'di rnams sngon 
[\[95b.4\]]na yod pa'i mtha' la'ang dI Sha 'gyur ba ma yin te/_ba hu kr-i tA/_a kr-i tA/_su kr-i tA/_kA la kr-i tA/_su kha kr-i tA/_sogs so/_so skyes ma/_/'grel par pA Ni gr-i hI ta las bag ma brjod pa la dI Sha'o zhes pa byung bas/_pA Na gr-i tI tI/_gzhan la pA Ni gr-i hI tA/_a sAM ga pA rba ba rA dwA/_rang lus 
[\[95b.5\]]ma yin pa'i tshig snga ma las yang na'o/_/rang gi _mang byed ma/_byed min ma/_bzang byed ma/_ngus khyed ma/_nga de byed ma/_lus ma yin pa'i tshig snga ma can k+ta'i mtha' las dI Sha yang na 'gyur te/_su rA pI _lag pa nas bzung ma ste 'gam/_lag 'dzin ma/_tI/_su rA pI tA/_swA gAts+tso pas rdza nA da 
[\[95b.6\]]saM yo go bad+hA ta/_rang gi yan lag la'ang nyer bsgyur las u ba d+hA yang dag par sbyor ba med pa las so/_/rang gi lus las nyer bsgyur snga ma can u pa d+hA yang dag par sbyor ba ste brtsegs pa ma yin pa la dISha yang na 'gyur te/_su mu khA/_su mu khI/_chang 'thung ma/_a ti ke shA/_a ti ke shI/
[\[95b.7\]]u bad+hA yang dag bar sbyor ba yod na dI Sha mi 'gyur te/_su gu wA/_rkang tshigs mdzes ma/_'grel par aM ga gA tra ka N+Tha rnams la dISha yang na'o zhes pa byung bas/_swaM gI/_gzugs mdzes ma/_swaM gA/_su gA trI/_lus mdzes ma/_su gA _gdong mdzes ma/_trA/_su _skra bzang ma/_skra bzang ma/
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]kaN+ShI/_su ka N+ThA/_yang 'grel par ba nyu swe da sogs la dI Sha 'jug pa ma yin no zhes pa byung bas/_ba hu sA+e dA/_su dz+wA nA/_su so pA/_yang 'grel par srog chags ma yin pa la dISha yang na'o zhes pa byung bas/_su sta nI/_su sta nA/_nA si ko da rau Sh+Tha dzi g+hA da n+tA ka rta 
[\[96a.2\]]shrA gA ts+tsa/_nA si ka_mgrin mdzes ma/_u dar o Sh+Tha dzaM g+ha ngan+ta kar+Na shr-i ng+ga las 'ang ngo /_n+da so ka la sogs pa'i da _lus la rngul mang po 'dzag ma/_ye shes bzang mo/_khang bzang ma/_rnams la dI Sha yang na 'gyur te/_su nA si kI/_sri Sho _nu ma mdzes ma/_da rI/_pr-i Sho da rA/_bim+da Sh+ShA/_bam+ba Sh+ThA su 
[\[96a.3\]]dzi g+h+nge/_su dzaM g+hA/_su da n+tI/_su dan+tA/_su kar+NI/_su kar+NA/_su shr-ing+gI/_su shr-ing+gA/_'grel par su buts+tsha las dI ma yang na'o zhes 'byung bas/_supu ts+tshI/_supu ts+tshA/_yang 'grel par/_ka ba ra/_ma Ni/_bi Sha/_sha ri sna mdzes ma/_rgyas pa'i lto ba ma'am [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]lto ba ma/_bim pa'i mchu ma/
[\[96a.4\]]rnams _byin mdzes ma/_so mdzes ma/_snga ma'i pu ts+tsha _sna mdzes ma/_rA mdzes ma/_las dISha rtag tu 'gyur te yang na ba mi byed do gsung bas/_ka ba ra _'jug mdzes ma/_puts+tsI/_ma Ni pu ts+tshI/_shar pu ts+tshA/_u bamA nA t+pa k+Sha pu ts+tshA b+haM/_nye bar 'jal ba las pa k+Sha pu ts+tsha dag las so/_/
[\[96a.5\]]nye bar 'jal ba las pak+Sha dang puts+tsha'i sbra dga' dwiSha yang na 'gyur te/_sh+ye na pak+ShI/_sh+ye na pak+ShA/_ulU ka pu ts+tshI/_u lU ka pu ts+tshA/_na kro DA di bah+b+r-i tsaH/_ko Da _mjug ma phra mo/_nor bu'i mjug ma/_dug 'jug ma/_sogs dang bah+b+ri tsa las ma yin no/_/kro Da la sogs pa rnams dang 
[\[96a.6\]]bah+b+r-i tsa las dI Sha 'gyur ba ma yin te/_su kro DA/_su dza g+ha nA/_bah+b+r-i khra'i spro lta bu ma/_khra'i sgro lta bu'am/_'ug ba'i mjug ma lta bu ma/_tsA/_sa ha na nyI d+ya mA na pU rbA ts+tsha/_sa ha na nya di d+ya mA na snga ma las kyang ngo /_/sa ha la sogs ba 'di rnams snga ma'i rang lus la dI Sha 'gyur ba ma yin te/_sA ke shA/_a nA si 
[\[96a.7\]]kA brang yo na/_bi d+ya mA no da rA/_'grel _rmig pa mdzes ma/_brla mdzes ma/_par/_Na kha/_mu kha dag las ming la dI Sha 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes ba byung bas/_sU rba na khA/_mna' ma'i min mo/_/gau ra mu khA/_gdong dkar ma/_ming ma yin na/_zangs sen ma/_ShA ma na khI/_bzhin mdzes ma/_tsA ru _skra bcas ma/_sna med ma/
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]mukhI/_bA haH/_bu ta las so/_/bA ha'i mtha' la'ang dI Sha 'gyur te/_b+hA ro hI/_sa khya shi shwI b+hA ShA yAM/_sa khi a shi shwi brjod pa la'o/_/sa khi dang a shi shwi la dI Sha sbyar ba'i/_/sa khI/_a shi shwI dag bud med brjod pa la tshig phrad do/_/dzA ti ra stI bi Sha yA da yo pa d+hA ta/_ya u pa d+hA ma yin pa'i rigs 
[\[96b.2\]]las bud med kyi yul ma yin pa las so/_/u pa d+hA ya yig ma _khur po 'khur ma/_yin pa rigs thun mong gi tshig las bud med kyi yul ma yin pa las dI Sha 'gyur te/_grogs mo/_mo gsham/_mr-i gA/_haM sI/_d+ha TI/_ku k+ku TI/_su ka rI/_rigs ma yin na dI Sha mi 'gyur te/_muM D+na/
[\[96b.3\]]bud med kyi yul yin na dI Sha mi 'gyur te/_ba lnga kA/_ya yig u pa d+hA la_k+Sha tri yA/_yang 'grel par ya yig u bad+hA yin kyang yul ma yin pa las dI Sha 'gyur ro zhes 'byung bas/_ga pa[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mo/_ngang mo/_srang ma/_bya gag mo/_phag mo/_yI/_ha yI/_mu kA yI/_ma t+s+yI/_ma nu Sh+TA/
[\[96b.4\]]pA ka kar+Na par+Na pu Sh+pa pha la mU la bA lo t+tar _stobs ldan ma/_pa dA ts+tsa/_pA ka/_rgyal rigs ma/_kar+Na/_bar+Na/_buSh+Na/_ba la/_mU la/_bA la rnams tshig phyi ma las kyang ngo /_/rigs brjod pa can gyi pA ka sogs tshig phyi ma la dI Sha 'gyur te/_o _rkyang mo/_rgod ma/_rdzab ra mo/_ha mo/_mi mo ste bud med/
[\[96b.5\]]da na pA kI/_shaM ku kar+NI/_shA la bar+NI/_shaM Sha puSh+pI/_dA sa pha lI/_da r+b+ha mU lA/_go bA lI/_i to ma nu Sh+ya dzA teH/_i ta las mi'i rigs las so/_/i ta ste i yig mtha' can mi'i rigs brjod pa las dI ma 'gyur te/_a ba b+tI/_dA k+ShI/_ku n+tI/_U du taH/_u ta las U nga'o/_/u
[\[96b.6\]]zan 'tshod ma/_rna rgyas ma/_lo 'dab ma/_dung gi me tog ma/_bsus bu ril mo/_ku sha'i rtsa ba ma/_ba lang gzhon nu ma/_yig mtha' las bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen Ung 'gyur te/_ku rUH/_brah+ma ban+dUH/_d+h+ri ban+hUH/_yus srung byed ma/_tshangs pa'i bu'am na' ma/_mdung can ma/_'grel par ya yig u 
[\[96b.7\]]pa d+hA can las Ung 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes pa byung bas/_a ng+ha r+YuH/_mchod sbyin ma/_'grel par srog chags ma yin pa rnams kyi yin pa rnams kyi radzU sogs ma yin pa _ku ru yul gyi bud med/_tshangs pa'i rtsa lag ma/_blo'i tsu lag ma/_rnams las Ung 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pas/_a lA bUH/_su nga /_thug pa/_ya bA 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]gUH/_srog chags yin na d+he nuH/_radz+dzA sogs la/_radz+dzuH/_ha nuH/_ta nUH/_'grel par lung drangs pa/_pi gu shwa shru dag las kyang ngo /_/paM gu dang shwa shru dag las kyang bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen Ung 'gyur te/_paM gUH_shwa shruH/_de dag bud med du brjod pa 
[\[97a.2\]]la tshig prad do/_/A rA t+ta ra pa dA dau pa /[{]mye[,]me[}]/_U/_'dod 'jom/_ru tshig phyi ma _thag pa/_'gram pa/_sna las/_las he bar 'jal ba la'o/_/U ru zhes pa'i sgra tshig phyi ma yin na nye par 'jal pa'i don can bud med du brjod pa la Ung 'gyur te/_gong mo/_rgyud mo/_ka ra b+ho rUH/_nye bar 'jal 
[\[97a.3\]]ba ma yin na/_br-i to ruH/_saM hi ta sha pha la k+Sha Na bA mA de sh+tsa/_saM hi ta/_sha pha/_lak+Sha Na/_bU ma sogs las kyang ngo /_/saM hi ta la sogs pa 'di rnams sngon ma'i U rul Ung 'gyur te/_saM hi to rUH/_sha pho rUH/_lak+Sha No rUH/_bA mo rAH/_brla mdzas ma/_byang po'i brla lta bu ma/_sa hi ta sa 
[\[97a.4\]]hA b+h+yI tsa/_sa hi _brla snyoms pa/_ta sa ha dag las kyang ngo /_/sa hi ta dang sa ha snga ma'i U ru las kyang Ung du 'gyur te/_sa hi to rAH/_sa ho rUH/_'grel par/_ta nu _brla dang bcas ma ste brla shin tu sbom pa/_brla'i spu/_brla phun tshogs ma'am brla mtshan nyid can ma/_sogs la Ung yang na 'gyur bar 
[\[97a.5\]]ba shid pas/_ta nUH/_ta nuH/_tsany+tsuH/_tsany+tsuH/_shA r+ng+ga ra bA d+ya nyoHdU na/_shA r+d+ga ra bA sogs a nya yas dI na'o/_/shA r+ng+ga _brla dang bcas pa/_ra bA sogs a nya'i rkyen mtha' can la bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen dI na 'gyur te/_shA r+ng+ga ra bI/_bai dI/_nr-i na ra yo r+b+r-i d+d+hi sh+tsa/_nr-i na ra dag las 
[\[97a.6\]]'phel ba'ang ngo /_/gzugs/_nr-i ba ra_chu/_dag las bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen dI na 'gyur te 'phel ba'ang ngo /_/nA rI/_yang nga sh+tsA pa/_yang las tsA ba'o/_/yang gi mtha' las bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen [ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi skad 'dra ma/_rig byad ma/_tsA pa 'gyur te tsa ni rigs kyi mtshon 
[\[97a.7\]]byed TA ba 'gog ba'i don no/_/ka rI Sha gan+b+h+yA/_gci pa'i dri ma/_kau mu da gaM d+h+yA_ku muda'i dri ma/_bA rA h+yA/_phag mo/_'grel _mi mo/_bar Sha las pha rol gyi ya nya la'ang ngo shes 'byung bas/_pau nyi mA Sh+tsA_sa nam gtsang ma/_yUn stiH/_yu ba na las ti'o/_yub na gyi sbra las bud med du brjod pa'i 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]rkyen ti 'gyur te ming mtha'i na dbyi 'os/_na phyis/_yub tiH/_gang tshom/_i ti bA Na ni byU ka ra Na s+ya trA ta s+t+ri yo btsan pra t+ya yA s+sa mA b+hAH/_zhes ba pA Ni ni byu ka ra Na'i mdo las bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen rnams rdzogs so//_//de rnams kyi brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pI Ni ni byA ka 
[\[97b.2\]]ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las/_bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen ngos bzung 'jug yul cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rnams re zhing rdzogs so//_//da ni byed ga 
[\[97b.3\]]can gyi le'u bshad par bya ste/_le'u 'dis gong du bshad pa'i rnam dbye rnams kyi 'jug yul rgyas par ston par byed de/_prA ti pa di kA tshA ling+ga ba ri mA NA ma tre bra tha ma/_rtags kyi mtshan nyid ming gi don tsam brjod pa la dang po'o/_/rtags gsum po gang yang 'jug tu rung pa'i mtshan 
[\[97b.4\]]nyid can de la ming gi don tsam brjod pa la rnam dbye dang po rnams 'gyur te/_u ts+tsaiH/_ni ts+naiH/_kr-iSh+NaH/_shrIH/_dz+nyA naM/_khA rIH/_droNaH/_A D+ha kaM/_e kaH/_dwau/_ba ha waH/_yung /_au ba ga waH/_tsi tra guH/_zhes pa lta bu ste ming gi don tsam brjod pa kho na'o/_/saM bong+ha ne 
[\[97b.5\]]tsa/_kun du bod pa la'ang ngo /_/kun du bod pa'i don la'ang rnam dbye dang po _mtho ba/_dma' ba/_nag po/_dpal/_ye shes/_khal/_gre mo che/_gla bo che/_gcig/_gnyis dag/_mang 'o rnams/_sbyor ba/_nyi ba'i ba lang /_ba lar khra'o/_rnams 'gyur te/_he rA ma/_he rA mau/_he rA mAH/_de ltar rnam 
[\[97b.6\]]dbye sde tshan bdun las dang po rnams kyi 'jug tshul spyir btang bshad nas/_!_/gnyis pa'i 'jug tshul ni/_ka rtu rI b+si ta ta maM ka rma/_byed po'i 'dod pa las so/_/gang byed pa po'i 'dod pa'i bya ba'i las ka de la las zhes brda chad _bye dga' byed/_bye dga' byed dang /_phye dga' byed rnams/_byed 
[\[97b.7\]]do/_/karma Ni dwi tA+e yA/_las las gnyis pa'o/_/las te gang bya ba'i las ka ston pa'i don la rnam dbye gnyis pa rnams 'jug ste/_ka TaM ka ro ti/_rtswa lhas byed/_o da na ma pa ca ti/_zas 'tshed/_grA maMgats+tsha na/_grong la 'gro/_yang 'grel bar b+ha ba karma te/_dngos po dang las la rnam dbye dang 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]po 'jug go zhes byung ste/_se bya te se bi taH/_lak+Sh+m+yA sa dA ha riH/_sha te na krI taHsha t+yaH/_ta thA yu k+taM tsA nI p+si taM/_de'i sbyor ba mi 'dod pa la'ang ngo /_/byed pa po 'dod pa'i bya ba'i las ka de las zer bar ma zad byed pa po'i 'dod pa ma yin zhing las mtshan nyid pa ma yin kyang 
[\[98a.2\]]gang bya ba'i las ka de la'ang gnyis pa 'gyur te/_mchod pa su mchod/_dbang rtag tu 'grog byed/_brgya'i rdzas brgya/_dper na/_bi ShaM b+huM k+te/_dug bza' zhes pa byed pa po'i 'dod pa dang las mtshan nyid pa ma yin kyang /_pi ShaM zhes rnam dbye gnyis pa byung pa lta bu'o/_/a ka thi taM tsa/_ma bshad
