[\[98a.3\]]pa'ang ngo /_/nges bar kun sbyin pa sogs dang yang na bar ma bshad pa rnams la'ang las zhes ming 'dogs byed do/_/dug bza'/_byings du ha 'jo pa/_yA tsa slong pa/_ru d+hi sgrib pa/_pra tshi 'gri ba/_tsi ga sogs pa/_brU gsal por brjod pa/_shA su rjes su bstod pa/_dzi rgyal ba 
[\[98a.4\]]rnams dang /_NI thob pa/_hr-i 'phrog pa/_kr-i Sha rkob/_man+tha srub pa/_ba ha thob pa/_daN+Da chad pa/_gra ha he bar len pa/_mu Sha rkub/_ba tsa 'tshod pa rnams dang sbyong ba las kyi tshig gnyis gnyis skyor dgos la de yang rnam dbye gnyis pa kho na 'jug ste/_dper brjod 'grel par 
[\[98a.5\]]tshigs bcad du byung ba ni/_yau du do haR+ha ra man+ni ya yA tsa ba su d+hAM pa laM/_du do d+ha dai t+yA na pA tA laM pa pra tsha n+d+raM tsa bAM tshi taM/_1_/d+ha rmA na bA tsi no dwe da ma bra b+Shi t+tA na swa se bi naH/_gA r+thi bA na nA shA d+b+ha kriM tri lo kI ma dza ya dri b+bu na/_dwA ra kA ma na ya dwa n+b+hU na ru k+ni NI ma ha ra d+pu raM/_tsa ka r+Sha kaM saM bi pi naM ma man+tha k+ShI ra 
[\[98a.6\]]d+hiM su d+haM/_gang dag sa la za yang ngo ma/_/stobs ldan pa slong nor 'dzin sa/_/snya min rnams la sa lag sgrib/_/dpang po la yang 'grib par 'dod/_/chos rnams kun gsog rig byed la/_/de dmas 'ang g.yon rnams la smras/_/sa bdag rnams la bstod nas mchod/_/'jig rten gshum pas dgra rnams rgyal/_/sgo lnga na gnas ba gtan rnams thob/_/grong la gzhon nu ma srogs te/_/nags la b+ha min rkeng 'byed 
[\[98a.7\]]kyi mtshos sru la 'dud rtsil/_a ba ha n+ma n+da raM siM d+hu ma daN+Da ya da rI na sU na/_rgya mtsho thob man+da ra/_/dgra bo rnams la nor chad byung /_/dza grA ha d+yu ta ruM sha kra ma mu Sh+NA d+di ti dzA na su d+hAM/_dpag bas mang shing la da rang mos bzung /_/lha min mam la bdud rtsi brkus/_/ba tsa ti prA Ni nAM karma yaHpha li ti hi raM b+ha dze/_srog tshags rnams kyi 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]bas tshod pa/_/gang bde kha 'phrog byed mchod/_/zhes pa tshig rkang re re la gong du smos pa'i byings ting mtha' can re dang /_tshig grogs rnam dbye gnyis mtha' can gnyis gnyis byung ba lta bu'o/_/ga ti bu d+d+hi pra d+ya ba sA nA r+tha sha b+ha ka rma ka rmA NA ma Ni ka rtA sa Nau/_'gro ba dang rtogs pa dang zas dang sgra'i 
[\[98b.2\]]don gyi las dang las med pa rnams kyi Ni dang lhan cig pa ma yin pa'i Ni med pa la byed pa po la'o/_/'gro ba la sogs pa de rnams kyi sgra sbyar bar bya ba'i rtags tshig grogs Ni tsa dang lhan cig pa ma yin pa Ni tsa med pa dang spyir ba'i byed pa po la rnam dbye gnyis pa 'gyur la/_Ni tsa dang lhan cig pa yin 
[\[98b.3\]]na las kyi don la gnyis pa 'gyur te/_dper brjod 'grel par tshigs bcad byung ba ni/_sha trU na gam ya t+s+warga m+be dA r+thaM s+tha na bed ya ta/_A sha yats+tsA mr-i taM de pA na bde mang+h+yA pa ya dwi ng+hiM/_A sa yat+sa li le pr-i th+bIM yos me shrI ha ri rga tiH/_zhes gong du smos pa'i don rnams dang sbyor ba'i tshig 
[\[98b.4\]]rkang re rer rnam dbye gnyis pa'i rjes byung ba lta bu'o/_/'grel par NI ba ha/_mtho ris la song dgra bo rnams/_rig byed don la nged rnams mig_/bdud rtsi bzas shas lha rnams kyang /_/tshangs bas sngon dus rig byed bklags/_/sa gzhi la ldad chu bo rnams/_/'dro ga byed gang de ba bdag gi dbal/_/dag dang sbyor ba las byed pa po la 
[\[98b.5\]]gnyis pa 'gyur ba ma yin te gsum pa nyid do zhes pa byung bas/_nA ya ti b+hA raM b+h+r-i t+ye na/_bA ha ya ti b+hA raM b+h+r-i t+ye na/_yang 'grel par A di dang khA di dag sbyor ba'i rtags de la'ang /_gnyis pa rnams 'gyur ba ma yin gyi gsum pa kho na 'gyur bar bshad pas/_de gnyis dang sbyor ba'i 
[\[98b.6\]]rtags de ba dat+ta la TA sbyar bas/_A da ya ti de ba dat+te nA n+naM/_khA da _bran gyis khur 'dren/_/bran gyis khur 'khur 'thob/_ya ti de ba da t+te nA n+ni/_yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/_b+hak+Sha'i 'tshe ba ma yin pa la ma yin no/_b+ha k+Sha'i sgra 'tshe ba'i don ma yin pa'i sbyor ba la byed pa po la gnyis pa 
[\[98b.7\]]'gyur ba ma yin te/_srob ma zan bza' ru 'jug/_b+hak+Sha ya _lus skyin gyi bza' ru 'jug zan/_t+yan+naM ba Tu nA/_'tshe ba yin na gnyis sa 'gyur te/_b+hak+Sha ya ti pha lI wa rda ta sa s+yaM/_bza' ru 'jug glang rnams yo tog la/_yang 'grel bar shru gra ha dr-i sha rnams don sbyor ba la byed pa po la gnyis pa 'gyur ba sngon 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]gyi slob dpon kha cig 'dod do zhes pa byung bas/_shrA ba ya ti gI taM de ba dat+taM/_grA ha ya ti ba TuM de daM/_dar+sha ba ti b+ha k+taM de baM/_yang 'grel bar/_a ya kran+da shab+dA pa hwe nya rnams kyi sbyor ba la gnyis pa 'gyur ba ma yin gyi gsum pa nyid do zhes pa byung bas/_a 
[\[99a.2\]]ya ya ti sai ni kai ra rI na/_kran+da ya ti sai ni kai ra rIn/_shab+hA ya ya ti sai_lhas byin slu nyan du 'jug/_slob ma rig byed len du 'jug/_lha mchod gtong du 'jug/_ni kai ra rIn/_hwA ya ya ti shU rai ra rI na/_hr-i kror n+ya tar s+yAM/_hraM kraM dag gi yang na'o/_/hraM nya dang kri nya gnyis kyi sgra sbyor ba'i byed pa 
[\[99a.3\]]dmag 'gro ru 'jug dgra po rnams pa/_dmag rnams kyis dgra bo rnams du ru 'jug/_po la gnyis pa yang na 'gyur te/_hA ra ya ti b+hA raM b+h-i_dmag rnams kyis dgra po rnams sgra sgrog du 'jug/_dba' bo rnams kyis 'gron du dgra po rnams la/_t+yaM/_hA ra ya ti b+hA raM b+h+raM t+ye na/_kAr ya ti 
[\[99a.4\]]ka TAM de ba da t+taM/_kA ra la ti ka TaM de ba da t+te na/_yang 'grel par a b+hi bA di dang dr-i sha sbyor ba las byed pa po la tang An sbyor ba'i yul gnyis pa yang na 'gyur ro zhes pa byung bas/_a b+hi wA da ya te ku rU na ba Tu/_a b+hi wA da ya te gu rU na _bran phur 'grog tu 'jug/_ba Tu nA/_dar+sha ya te _lhas byed ra lde byed du 'jug/
[\[99a.5\]]rA dzA b+h+r-i t+yaM/_dar+sha ya te rA dzA g+h+r-i t+ye na/_a d+hi shIng s+thA A pa rnams kyi 'angango /_/nyer bsgyur ad+hi snga ma'i shI da s+thA dang A pa rnams sbyor ba'i bdun pa'i _bla ma slob ma la gsong por smra ru 'jug/_don la gnyis pa 'gyur te/_a d+hi she te be ku N+ThaM ha riH/_a d+hi tiSh+Tha ti bai 
[\[99a.6\]]rgyal po'i bran la lta ru 'jug/_ku N+ThaM ha riH/_ad+b+h+yA ste bai ku N+ThaM ha riH/_a b+hi ni bi sha sh+tsa/_a b+hi ni bi sha'i 'ang ngo /_/nyer bsgyur a b+hiM dang ni snga ma'i bi sha dang sbyor ba'i 'ang bdun ba'i don la gnyis pa 'gyur te/_a b+hi bi sha te sam+mA rgaM/_ni bi sha te_'phrog byed mthar sa la nyal/_sam+mA rgaM/
[\[99a.7\]]'grel bar ni dang a b+hi snga ma yin_'phrog byed mtho ris la gnas/_kyang la lar gnyis pa mi 'gyur te bdun pa nyid do zhes pa byung bas/_pA pe a b+hi ni bi shaH/_sdigs la nges bar 'gro/_u bA n+wa d+h+yA ng+ba saH/_u pa a nu ad+hi/_legs ba'i la ni ya mngon par 'gro/_legs pa'i lam la nges par 'gro/_Ang 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]rnams bas la'o/_/nyer bsgyur u pa a ru a d+hi Ang rnams snga ma'i bas dang sbyor ba la bdun pa'i don la gnyis pa 'gyur te/_u pa bas ti bai kuN+ThaM ha riH/_zhes pa nas/_A bas ti bai kuN+ThaM ha riH/_zhes ba'i bar g+ta bu'o/_/'grel par/_u pa sogs sna ma'i bas dang sbyor 
[\[99b.2\]]ba yin kyang gnas pa'i yul de bza' btung med pa'i sa yin na bdun pa'i don la gnyis pa mi 'gyur zhing bdun pa nyid do zhes pa byung bas/_ba ne_'phrog byed mtho ris la kun du gnas/_u pa bas ti/_u bas rba ta soHkA r+YA ng+hi gu bar+YA di Shu tri Shu dwi tI yA mre Di tAM te Shu ta 
[\[99b.3\]]to n+ya trA pi dr-i sh+ya te/_gnyis dang /_thams cad de dag gi bya ba dang /_'dzin pa dang /_yang yang la sogs par gsum du dang /_zlos pa'i mtha' rnams su dang /_de las gzhan du yang dag gnyis pa mthong ngo /_nag sal nye bar gnas/_/u pa ya dang sarba tas kyi mtha' can de dag gi bya ba ste/
[\[99b.4\]]de gnyis dang 'brel pa'i ming gzhan dang 'dzin pa steng na pa'i don ng+hika sbyor ba dang /_yang yang la sogs par gsum pa zlos pa'i mtha' zhes pa/_u pa ri/_a d+hi/_a ho gsum yang yang zlos pa'i mtha' rnams dang /_de las gzhan du yang zhes ba/_a b+hi taH/_pa ri taH/_sa ma yA/
[\[99b.5\]]ni ka Sh+'a/_hA/_r-i te/_pra ti rnams sbyor ba la'ang rnam dbye gnyis pa 'gyur te/_dper brjod rim pa bzhin/_u pa ya taH/_go pA kr-i Sh+NaM/_sarba taHkr-i Sh+NaM/_d+hi ka kr-i Sh+Na bak+taM/_u pa r+Yu pa ri lo kaM ha riH/_a ng+h+ya ng+hi lo kaM/_a d+ho nya d+ho lo kaM/_a bi taH_b-iSha/_pa ri taHkr-iSh+NaM/_sam yA 
[\[99b.6\]]kr-i Sh+NaM/_ni ka ShA kr-i Sh+NaM/_hA kr-iSh+NaM/_r-i to kr-iSh+NaM/_pra ti kr-iSh+NaM/_an+ta rA an+ta re Na yu ste/_an+ta ra an+ta_'drog ba nag bo gnyis/_thams cad du nag po ba/_ngan pa nag po mi mtshan/_steng ma steng ma'i 'jig rten la 'phrog byed/_lhag pa lhag pa'i 'jig rten/_'og ma 'og ma'i 'jig rten/_mngon par nag a+wo/_yongs su nag po 'dus ba'i nag po la/
[\[99b.7\]]nye ba'i nag po la/_kye ma nag po/_nges par nag po/_so sar nag po/_re Na sbyor la'o/_/an+ta ra dang _nang /_an+ta re Na_bar ram mtshams sam dbral/_sbyor ba la'ang rnam dbye gnyis pa 'gyur te/_an+ta rA gA rta pa _khyim bdag gi nang /_t+yaM/_an+ta re Na da rmaM su khan+na b+ha ba ti/_chos kyi bar du gcod pa la bde bar mi 'gyur/
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]a nu rlak+Sha Ne/_a nu'i mtshan nyid la'o/_/mtshan nyid kyi don la a nu sbyor ba la yang gnyis pa 'gyur te/_/dzab ma nu bra ba r+Shata/_hr-i tI yAr+the/_gsum ba'i don la'o/_a nu sbyor ba las rnam dbye gsum pa'i don la'ang gnyis pa 'gyur te/_na dI ma n+wa ba si tA se 
[\[100a.2\]]nA/_hI ne/_dman pa la'o/_dman pa'i don la a nu yis sbyor ba la yang rnam dbye gnyis pa 'gyur te/_anu ha riM su rAH/_bzlas bas rjes su chang rab tu lab/_u ba lhag pa la'ang ngo /_dman pa'i don dang lhag pa'i don la'ang u pa yis sbyor _chu'o la rjes su nye ba'i dmag/_/
[\[100a.3\]]ba la gnyis pa 'gyur te/_/u ba hari su rAH/_/lak+Sha Ne t+thaMb+hUtAkhyA na b+hAg bIp+sAsu bra ti brlan paH/_/mtshan 'phrog byed rjes su lha/_/nyid dang 'di ltar gyur pa dang bgo skal dang zlos pa rnams la bra ti ba ri anu rnams las so/_/mtshan nyid la sogs pa de rnams kyi don la bra til sogs 
[\[100a.4\]]ba sbyor ba la gnyis pa _'phrog khyed la nye ba lha/_'gyur te/_mtshan nyid la/_hari braMti/_ha ri ma nu/_'di ltar gyur pa la/_b+hak+to bu ng+d+haM bra ti/_b+ha k+ho bi Sh+NuM pa ri/_b+hak+hobu ng+d+ha ma nu/_bgo skal la/_lak+Sh+mIHha ri m+b+ra ti/_lak+Sh+mIHhari m+b+ra ti/_lak+Sh+mIHha ri ma nu/_zlos ba 
[\[100a.5\]]la_!_b+hU taMb+hU taM pa ri pra b+huH/_b+hU taMb+hU taM pa ri pra b+huH/_b+hU taMb+hU taM pa ri pra b+huH/_'phrog byed la so sor/_'phrog bye la rgyas ba/_'phrog byed la rjes su/_so so sangs rgyas kyi 'bangs/_khyag 'jug gi 'bangs rgyas/_rjes su sangs rgyas kyi 'bangs/_'phrog byed dpal so sor byed/_'phrog byed dpal rgyas/_'phrog byed dpal rjes su/
[\[100a.6\]]sems can dang sems can la so sor bdag po/_sems can dang sems can rgyas pa'i bdag po/_sems can dang sems can la rjes su bdag po/_a b+hir b+hA ge/_ab+hi bgo skal ma yin pa la'o/_bgo skal gyi don ma yin pa'i a b+hi sbyor ba la gnyis ba 'gyur te/_hari ma b+hi brta to b+ha k+haM/_a tir ti kram Ne/
[\[100a.7\]]a ti shin tu pa'i bya ba la'o/_a ti phul du byung ba'i bya ba sbyor ba la gnyis pa 'gyur te/_a te de bAn kr-iSh+NaH_lha rnams las phul du byur ba nag po/_kA lA d+h+wa no ra t+yaM ta saM yo ge/_dus dang lam bar mtshams med par sbyor ba la'o/_dus la_don bar yod 'grog byed la 'bangs/_bltos nas 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]lo re bzhin lan re klog ces pa lta bu dang lam bar mchad pa'i don sbyor ba la gnyis pa 'gyur te/_mAsaM ka l+YaNI/_mA sa ma b+hi te/_mA saM gu Dad+hA nAH/_kroshaM ku Ta lAn hI/_kro sham gi riH/_yang de lta bu las gzhan bar mchad ba ma yin pa la gnyis pa mi 'gyur 
[\[100b.2\]]te/_mAs s+yadwir d+hI te/_kro sha s+ya ka de shaHpa rbata/_de rnams kyis rnam dbye gnyis/_zla ba la piSh+ji/_zla ba la klogs/_zla ba la bu ram dang sos bza'/_rgyang grags la ba gyog por chu/_rgyang grags la glog go/_rgyang phrags la ri bo/_ba 'jug yul bshad nas da ni gsum pa'i yul bshad par bya'o/_!_/swa 
[\[100b.3\]]tan+t+raH_zla ba gnyis klog go_rgyang grags kyi yul gcig ri bo/_kartA/_rang dbang can de byed po'o/_/shing gcod mkhan lta bu rang dbang dang ldan pa de la byed po zhes brda chad byed do/_/sAd+ha ka ta maM ka ra NaM/_bsgrub nus pa de byed pa'o/_bya ba gang yang bde blag tu bsgrub nus pa de la byed pa 
[\[100b.4\]]zhes brdar btags so/_/kar+t+w-ika ra Na yo sny-itI yA/_/byed pa po dang byed pa dag la gsum pa'o/_/bya ba gang yang byed pa be dang byed pa gnyis kyi don ston pa la rnam dbye gsum pa 'gyur te/_/rA me Na pA na ha to bA lI Ne na ha bA lI zhes pa rA me Na byed pa po bA Ne na byed pa lta bu'o/_/bra kr-i t+ya di b+h+ya tI yA/_/pra kr-i ti 
[\[100b.5\]]sogs rnams las gsum pa'o/_/bra kr-i ti la sogs pa rnams la yang rnam dbye gsum pa 'gyur te/_bra kr-i t+yatsA ruH/_brA ye NasaH/_go tI Na gA rgyaH/_sa me ni ti/_bi Shame ni ti/_dwi dro _dga' byed kyis mda' yil spre'u bsad/_Ni na d+hAn+yAM krI NA ti/_pa ny+ca ke na pa shUn hwa ti/_su khen duHkhen yA ti/
[\[100b.6\]]de baHkarma tsa/_di ba'i la sa la'ang ngo /_/di ba'i sgra sbyor ba la las kyi don la'ang gsum pa _rang bzhin mdzes pa/_de rab tu mang ba'i/_gA rgya'i rims/_song cha/_ong zhes/_yang na 'gyur te/_/ak+She+eHdI bya ti/_/a _'bru dri the po che gnyis chong du 'jug/_/phugs lnga sprong du 'jug/_/sdug bsngal las bde ba thob/_/
[\[100b.7\]]k+ShAn dI bya ti/_a ba brge t+p-itI yA/_'bras bu thob pa la gsum pa'o/_/yang dag bar shes sam bya ba gang gi 'bras bu thob pa'i don la dus dang lam par mtshams med bar sbyor ba la gsum pa 'gyur _sho tsal 'jug/_te/_ah+nA be don d+h+di taH/_nyin mo rig byad glog go/_kro she na be do nya b+hI 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]taH/_/'bras bu thob pa'i don ma yin na gsum pa mi 'gyur te/_mA sam d+hI tonAyA tAH/_sa ha yu k+te prad+hA ne/_lhan cig sbyor ba la'o/_lhan cig pa'i sgra sbyor ba'i don la gsum pa 'gyur te/_pu tre Nas hA ga taH/_'grel par sAr+ng+haM sA kaM sa maM rnams sbyor ba 
[\[101a.2\]]rgyang grags pa'i khyed slog go/_la gsum pa 'gyur ro zhes pa byur bas/_pu tre Na sar+ng+ha _zla bar bklags kyang ma shes/_mA ga taH/_pu tre Na sa kaM ga taH/_shi Sh+yi Na sa maM tiSh+Na ti/_/ye nAM ga bi kA ram/_/gang gi lus kyi rnam 'gyur/_/bu dang lhan du yod/_/la'o/_/gang gi lus kyi rnam par 'gyur 
[\[101a.3\]]ba yod pa gsal par gzhan mtshon nus pa de la rnam dbye dang po'i don la gsum pa 'gyur te/_ak+NA+A kA/_/su dang lhan du yod/_bu dang lhan du song /_slob ma dang nye bar gnas/_NaH/_pA de na khany+dzaH/_kar+Ne na ba d+hi raH/_shir sA kha lbATaH/_i t+thaM b+hU ta la k+Sha Ne/_'di 'drar yod pa'i mtshan 
[\[101a.4\]]nyid la'o/_/'di dang 'di 'dra'o zhes ba'i mtshan nyid kyi don kyi don la gsum pa 'gyur te/_/k+Shatre No pA/_/mig zhar ba'o/_/ng+h+yaM ya ma drAk+ShI ta/_/saM dz+nyo n+ya ta ra s+yAM karma Ne/_yang dag/_/rkang pa 'theng po'o/_rna ba 'on pa'o/_/mgo bo spyi ther ba'o/_/par shes pa'i las la yang na'o/_/yang dag par shes pa'i 
[\[101a.5\]]las kyi don la gsum pa yang na 'gyur te/_pitrA sany+dzA nI te/_pi ta raM sany+dzA nI te/_he _mkhan po dang 'dra bar slob ma la ba lta'o//_to+o/_rgyul 'o/_/bya ba sbyor ba'i rgyu la gsum pa 'gyur te/_pu N+yen dr-i th+to gu ruH/_'grel par de'i bya ba sbyor ba'i rgyul zlos pa la'ang skabs 'gar gsum pa 
[\[101a.6\]]'gyur ro zhes byur bas/_/sha te na sha te na/_/phar yang dag par shes/_/phar yang dag par shes/_/bat+sAn bA ya ya ti pa yaHsha taM sha ta bat+sAn bA ya ya ti pa yaH/_/yang 'grel par/_/dal _bsod nams kyis mthong bla ma'o/_/po'i don sbyor ba la gsum pa 'gyur ro zhes pa byur bas/_/a lam+be la m+be

[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]zhes pa byung bas/_mA sen bUrbaHabaraH/_bu N+nen hI naH/_shas+t+re NaM ka la haH/_asr-iSh+Tas+ya bya ba hA re tsa tu r+b+h+yar+the tr-i hI yA mi 'os pa'i rgyul bzhi pa'i don la gsum pa'o/_gang mi 'os pa'i bya ba'i rgyu sbyor ba la bzhi pa'i don la gsum pa 'gyur te/_dA sbA saM yats+tsha ti kAmu kaH/_mi 
[\[101b.2\]]'os pa ma yin na gsum _gzhan zla ba sngam/_bsod nams dman pa/_mtshon chas 'khrugs/_pa mi 'gyur te/_b+hAr+YA yai saM yats+tsha ti kA mu kaH/_de rnams kyis gsum pa'i 'jug yul bshad zin nas da ni bzhi pa'i 'jug yul bshad par bya'o//_!_karmaNA _than mol thig le sbyin/_ya ma b+hi 
[\[101b.3\]]bri tis sa bra dA naM/_gang gi par rab tu sbyin pa la bzhi pa'o/_/gang gi _gang gi chung ma la thig le sbyin/_ched du sbyin par 'dod pa dang len par 'dod pa ste sbyin pa'i las dang /_gang gi ched du 'gro ba dang 'ong ba rnams la yang dag par rab tu sbyin pa zhes tha snyad btags 
[\[101b.4\]]so/_/tsa tu nrIs pra dA ne/_/yang dag par rab tu sbyin pa la bzhi pa'o/_/gang gi ched du mang dag par rab tu sbyin pa zhes brda chad byas bde la rnam dbye bzhi pa 'gyur te/_/brAh+ma Ne b+h+yaHgAMd dA ti/_/de be b+h+yaHpu da dA ti/_/upA ng+h+yA yA ya su lba r+NaM da dA ti/_/yang dag par rab tu sbyin pa ma yin na 
[\[101b.5\]]sbyin pa'i don yin kyang bzhi pa mi 'gyur te/_/dA nI yo pi praHzhes pa rnams sbyin pa'i las kyi don 'ong ba'i don la/_prat+ye she te s+t+rI/_ru ts+yar r+thA nAM pri ya mA NaH/_/srid _bram ze rnams lab lang sbyin/_lha rnams la che tog sbyin/_mkhan po la gser 'bul/_nga'i don dang ldan pa'i dga' bal 'o/_/gang 
[\[101b.6\]]srid pa'i don dang ldan pa'am sred pa la dga' bram ze la shog ma sprod/_ba'i byed ba can la bzhi pa 'gyur te/_ha ra ye ro_bud med bdag po'i ched du nyal/_/tsate b+hak+tiH/_/shA g+ha ng+hU s+thA sha bI dz+nyi p+sa mAnaH/_sh+la g+ha h+nung s+thA sha pa rnams kyi shes pa'i 'dod pa dang ldan pa la'o/_/byings sh+lA g+ha dang h+nu dang s+thA 
[\[101b.7\]]dang sha pa rnams kyi sbyor ba'i shes par 'dod pa'i byed ba can la bzhi ba 'gyur te/_go pI smarA ta kr-iSh+NAya sh+lA g+ha te/_'brog mo nag po bran bzhin 'dod/_'brog khyed 'bran sred ba byed/_kr-iSh+NA yah+nu t-i/_nag po la ngan pa smra/_kr-iSh+Naya tiSh+Tha te/_nag po la gnas/_kraMSh+NA ya sha pa te/_nag po la bram byed/_b+hA re ru d+ta ma r+NaH/_'dzin pa'i bu lon lalhag 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]pa la'o/_/gang 'dzin pa'i sbyor ba bu lon lhag pa'i byed pa can la bzhi pa 'gyur te/_a haM mo k+ShA ya d+hA ra pa te bu d+ng+haH/_smr-i he rIp+sitaM/_grogs 'dod pa la'o/_gang gi grogs 'dod pa'i sbyor ba'i byed pa can la bzhi ba 'gyur te/_har ye sbr-iha ya ti/_kru ng+ha 
[\[102a.2\]]dru he r+ThA sU yAr+thanAM yaM pra ti ko paH/_/krung+ha dru ha I r+Sh+ya/_/a sU rnams gang la so sor khro ba'i don la'o/_/krung+ha _bdag grol ba'i phyir 'dzin par byed sangs rgyas/_/sogs rnams khro ba'i don bya ba ma yin pa so sor brjod pa'i sbyor ba la bzhi pa 'gyur te/_ha ra ye kru ng+h+ya ti/_ha ra 'phrog byed 'dod 
[\[102a.3\]]ye dru t+ya ti/_ha ra ye I r+Sh+ya ti/_ha ra ye sha bU ya ti/_kru d+ha dru ho ru pa sr-iSh+Ta yoH/_kru d+ha dru ha dag gi nye bar 'os pa dag la'o/_/kru d+ha dang dru ha dag gi sbyor ba mi 'os pa ma yin pa 'os ba'i don gyi sbyor ba ste khro ba'i don ma yin na bzhi pa 'gyur 'phrog byed la khro bar byed/_bam yin pas 
[\[102a.4\]]'phrog byed la 'khu bar byed/_'phrog byed la phrag dog byed/_'phrog byed la phram byed/_gnyis pa nyid 'gyur te/_brAh+ma Nam b+hikru d+h+ya ti/_rA d+hI k+Sho R+Y+Ya s+ya bi pra sh+naH/_rAd+ha Ik+Sha dag las gang gi 'dri ba la'o/_rAd+ha dang IkA dag 'dre ba'i don la sbyor ba la bzhi pa 'gyur te/_/
[\[102a.5\]]kr-iSh+ThayarAng+h+yate/_kr-iSh+cA ye k+ShA te/_prat+yAt+b+h+yaM shru ba pU rba s+ya ka rta/_pra ti Ang dag las shru'i snga _bram ze la khro bar mi byed/_bram ze la 'khu bar mi byed/_ma'i byed pa 'ol 'o/_/nyer bsgyur pra ti dang Ang yad pa'i shru'i snga ma'i rtags de la byed pa po'i don la sbyor ba la bzhi pa 'gyur te/_/pi prA ya g+hAM pra ti shri No ti/
[\[102a.6\]]bi prA ya/_nag pa la 'dri par byed/_gA mA shI No ti/_a nu prati gr-i Nash+tsa/_a nu prati dag gi gr-i Na la'ang ngo /_a nu dang pra ti snga ma'i gr-i Na dang sbyor ba'i rtags snga ma de la'ang byed pa po'i don la bzhi pa 'gyur te/_ho tre anu gr-iNAti/_ho tre pra ti gr-i NA ti/_ba ri kra _bram ze ri ba lang so sor thos/
[\[102a.7\]]bram ze ba lang kun du thos/_ya Ne saM pra dA na ma n+ya ta ra s+yAM/_pa ri kri ya'i yang dag par rab tu sbyin pa yang na'o/_/pa ri kri ya'i sbyor ba las byed pa po'i don yang dag par rab tu sbyin pa'i don can la bzhin pa yang _sbyin sreg mkhan la so sor rjod par byed/_sbyin sreg mkhan la rjes su rjod par byed/_na 'gyur 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]la yang na gsum pa nyid de/_shatA la pa ri krIto nya nu bU ti/_sha te na pa ri krI to nu bU hi/_tad r+thA+etsa tu r+thI bA ts+ya/_de'i don la bzhi pa brjod do/_/de'i don zhes pa don shin tu bzang ba bsgrubs na myur du 'grub nges pa da lta mngon du ma gyur pa zhig la zer la don de la bzhi ba 'gyur te/_/dper brjod 
[\[102b.2\]]'grel par tshigs bcad du byung ba ni/_saM _brgya yis yongs su nyos pa rjes su smros/_ya mA ya shru taM d+han+te na ro ng+ha rmA la saM ya maM/_d+ha rmi mo k+Sha ya me d+hA ya me d+hA bI ng+ha naM dA nA ya b+duk+ta ye/_zhes pa/_mA ya gnyis dang k+Sha ya dang nA ya zhes bzhi ba'i de sbyar ba ltabu'o/_de bzhin du bu ng+d+ho b+ha be yaM dza ga te hi tA 
[\[102b.3\]]ya ma mAr+thA ya ma nu ka m+pA ya me bi g+ho ltabu'o/_/yang 'grel par lung drangs _sdom brtson ched du thos ba 'dzin/_/mi dag sdom brtson chos kyi ched/_/blo ldan thar pa'i ched du chos/_/sbyin pa'i phyir dang zas phyir nor/_/pa/_he tu yo ga tsa/_rgyu sbyor ba la'ang ngo /_/gang gi _'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'phru ba par shog/
[\[102b.4\]]rgyu'i don sbyor ba la bzhi pa 'gyur te/_brAh+ma NA ya he taM k+ShI raM/_kri yA r+thob par s+yatsa ka rma Ni s+tha ni naH/_bya ba'i don gyi nye ba'i tshig la'ang las la'o/_bya ba'i don gyi nye ba'i tshig la las te gnyis pa'i don la bzhi pa yang na 'gyur te/_pha la b+h+yo yA ti/_tu mar+thAts+tsa b+hA ba ba tsa nA ta/_tum gyi don las 
[\[102b.5\]]kyang dngos po brjod pa las so/_/rkyen tu ma tham ze'i rgyu 'bres zan/_dang /_g+hanya sogs dngos po brjod pa'i don du sbyin pa'i sbyor ba la'ang bzhi pa 'gyur te/_yA gA ya yA ti/_namaHswastiswA hA la ba ShaD+yo gAts+tsa/_na ma sa swa sti sbAcA/_a la ba 'phras bu rnams thob par byed/_ShaDa rnams sbyor ba las kyang 
[\[102b.6\]]ngo /_/nam sal sogs pa de rnams kyi sbyor ba la bzhi pa 'gyur te/_na mo bu d+t+hAya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_nam s+sa g+hA ya/_swasti pradzA b+b+yaH/_swAhApi/_mchod sbyin thob/_t-ib+h+yaH/_aMl b+hU te b+b+yaH/_pa Sha Da n+d+rI ya/_yang 'grol par lung drangs pa/_us pa da bi b+hak+teHkAr ka bi b+ha k+ta rba lI ya sI/
[\[102b.7\]]nye ba'i tshig gi rnam dbye las byed ba can gyi rnam dbye ba can gyi rnam dbye stabs dang ldan _sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bde legs su cis skye dgu rnams/_pha mes rnams legs par tshim mo/_tshim ba 'byung po rnams/_dbang byed dbang po la/_pa la'o/_/gong du na mas sbyor ba la rnam dbye bzhi pa kho 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]na 'jug par bshad kyang lung 'dis gcig tu ma nges te gong du rnam dbye bzhi pa 'jug par bshad pa ni nye ba'i tshig la ltos pa yin la/_skabs 'dir byed pa can ni gnyis pa yin pas nams dang sbyor ba la yang skabs 'gar gnyis pa 'jug go zhes pa byung bas/
[\[103a.2\]]dper na/_oM na maHsid+ng+haM/_na ma ska ro ti de bA na ltabu'o/_/man+ya kar+m+ma N+r+ya nA dA re bi g+hA ShAprANi Shu/_ma na'i las la srog chags ma yin pa rnams la smad pa la yang ma'o/_/man+ya'i las srog chags ma yin pa la smad pa la bzhi pa yang na 'jug cing yang na gnyis pa nyid do/_/natwAMtr-i NA ya ma n+ye/_na 
[\[103a.3\]]trAM tr-i NaM ma grub thob la phyag 'tshal lo/_/n+ye/_smad pa ma yin na bzhi pa mi 'gyur te/_twAMdebaM man+ye/_yang srog chags ma yin kyang no+o la bzhi pa mi 'gyur te/_na twAM nA daM ma n+ye/_srog chags yin na smad pa yin kyang bzhi pa mi 'gyur te/_/khyod rtswar lang mi sems/
[\[103a.4\]]na twAM shu kaM man+ye/_na twAM shrig laMm n+ye/_ga t+ya tswa ka r+m+ma Ni dwi tI yAtsa tu r+tho+otsa Sh+TA yA na ng+h+wani/_'gro ba'i don gyi las khyod lhar sems/_la gnyis pa dang bzhi pa dag g.yo ba la ste lam ma/_khyod grung yang mi sems/_yin pa la'o/_/'gro ba'i don la 'jug pa'i byings kyi las su bya ba la rnam 
[\[103a.5\]]khyod ni tsor yang ma sems/_/khyod be spyang du'ang mi sems/_dbye bzhi pa dang gnyis pa gang ru 'gyur te/_de'ang g.yo bste 'gro bzhin pa de yang lam la 'gro ba ma yin pa la'o/_pradzaM bradza ti kr-iSh+NA/_bradzA ya bra dza ti kr-iSh+NA/_g.yo bzhin pa ma yin na bzhi pa mi 'gyur te/_man sA banaM yA ti/
[\[103a.6\]]lam sa yin na'ang gnyis pa nyid de/_mArgaM gats+tsha nyi/_yang 'grel par lam yin kyang ut+pa then snga ma'i ba thil 'gro ba'i don la bzhi pa 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa/_ut+pa _bcom rlags 'gro bar byed do nag so/_then pa the gats+tsha ti/_yang 'grel par/_'gro ba'i _sems kyis nags la sreg 
[\[103a.7\]]don yin na g.yo ba dang /_ma yin min la _lam la 'gro bar byed/_yang mi bltos par bzhi pa dang gnyis pa yang na bar skabs 'gar srid do zhes byung bas/_grA mA ya gaM tA/_gro ba la 'gro bar byed/_gra maM gaM tA_de rnams_'grul ba lam la 'gro bar byed/_/kyis bzhi ba'i yul bshad nas da ni lnga pa'i yul 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]bshad par bya ste/_!_ng+h+ru ba ma pA ye pA dA naM/_brtan pa las bral ba de nges par kun sbyin pa'o/_gang brtan pa las 'bral ba'am sngar 'dus pa'am 'byar ba gyis shing zhag pa'am so sor phral ba de la nges par kun sbyin pa zhes tha snyad byed do/_/apAdA ne pany+tsa mI/_/nges par kun sbyin pa 
[\[103b.2\]]la lnga pa'o/_/gong du nges par kun sbyin pa zhes brda chang byas pa de la rnam dbye lnga pa 'gyur te/_grA mA dA yA ti/_ng+h+nga ba to nya shwAt+pa ta ti/_yang 'grel par gram dang dga' ba dang bral ba dang 'os ma yin pa rnams dang sbyor ba las kyang lnga pa 'gyur ro zhes byung bas/_pA pA dz+ngu gu p+sa te/_pA pI dri 
[\[103b.3\]]ra ma ti/_d+harmAd+p+ra mA d+ya ti/_b+hI twA n+pA nAM p+ha ya he tuH/_'jigs pa dang bsrung ba'i don rnams kyi _grong las 'ongs so//_bang brgyugs ba'i rta las lhung ngo /_'jigs pa'i rgyu la'o/_/'jigs pa'i don dang bsrung ba'i don rnams kyi sbyor ba las 'jigs pa'i rgyu la yang lnga ba 'gyur te/_sdig pa las phrag dog byed/
[\[103b.4\]]sdig pa las dga' ba dang bral bar 'gyur/_chos las mi 'os pa byed/_tso+orAdwi b+heti/_/tso+o rA y+wa te/_pa'A dzer so D+haH/_rgyal ba ma yin pa'i 'pham pa la'o/_gang rgyal ba ma yin pa'i 'pham pa'i don sbyor ba la lnga pa 'gyur te/_pA pA t+pa rA dza ya te/_bAr NAnrAnA mI p+si taH/_spangs pa'i don rnams kyi 'dod pa 
[\[103b.5\]]la'o/_gang spangs pa'i don rnams la de spang bar/_/chos rkun las 'jigs so/_chos rkun las bsrung ngo /_'dod pa la lnga pa 'gyur te/_ya bi b+h+yo gAHbAr ya ti/_an+ta r+ng+ho+o yinA dar+shan mi tsha ti/_gang gis mi mthong bar/_sdig pa las 'pham par 'gyur/_/byed pa'i sbe dpa' 'o/_/gang gis mi mthong bar 'dod 
[\[103b.6\]]pa'i sbed pa'i don sbyor ba la lnga pa 'gyur te/_mA tu rni lI ya te kr-iSh+NaH/_AkhyAto pa yo ge/_klog pa dang nye bar sbyor ba la'o/_slob nas rnams las pa lang rnams zlog par byed/_pa'i don nye bar sbyor ba'i klog pa'i sgra sbyor ba la yang lnga pa 'gyur te/_u pA ng+h+yA yA da ng+hI te ba TuH/_slob pa'i don nye bar sbyor ba

[\[106a.1\]]ng+hod ka s+yo pasaM sku ru te/_ru dzA r+thA nAM b+hA ba tsa nA nA ma dz+wa reH/_nad kyi don rnams kyi dngos po brjod pa rnams kyi dz+war ma yin pa la'o/_nad dang brdeg pa la sogs pa 'tshe ba'i don can gyi byings rnams las grub pa rnams kyi dz+war ma yin pa ste ma rtogs pa'i tshig gi sbyor ba'i rta gas la

[\[106b.1\]]sbyor ba'i kr-ita las lhag par byed pa la'o/_kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen dus kyi don brjod pa dang sbyor ba las lhag par byed pa ste rnam dbye bdun pa'i don la drug pa 'gyur te/_pany+tsa kr-i twa nyah+haHb+huM k+te/_dwi ra h+no p+huMk+te/_ka rt-ika rma NoHkr-itiH/_byed pa po dang las dag la kr-ita la'o/_/byed pa po dang las

[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]Shat+karaHahA ri/_tr-iN sogs lda ni 'di rnams te/_tr-i/_shAnatsa/_tsAn/_sha tr-i/_tr-iN sogs lnga po yin la thog mar tr-i'i rkyen mtha' can la/_lo kAn kartA/_shAn tsa la/_so maM pa bamA naH/_tsa na la/_/At+mA naM maN+Da ya mAnaH/_bdag nyid gsal ba/_shatril/_be da ma ng+hI yan/_rig byed klog/_dri Na la/
[\[107a.2\]]lo kAn ka rtA brah+ma/_yang 'gral mar/_nyung ngu bas/_dwiSha sha tu'i rkyen can dang sbyor ba la gnyis pa'i don la drug pa yang na 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/_mu ra s+yadwi Shan/_mu raM dwiShan/_a ke nor b+hi 'jig rten byed go zhib 'byur bar byed/_biSh+ya dA r+ha ma r+N+ya yoH/_aka in dag gi 'byung 'gyur bu lon ngan pa la'o/_a ka dang in 
[\[107a.3\]]'jig rten byed po tsha nges pa/_gyi rkyen dus 'byung 'gyur brjod pa bu lon ngan pa'i don can dang sbyor ba la gnyis pa'i don la drug pa gyur ba ma yin te/_sa taHbA la/_lha min gyi sgra/_ko\u0f85 pa ta ra ti/_su kha mr-i NaM dA yI/_kr-i t+yA nAM karta ri bA/_kr-i ta rnams kyi byed pa po la yang na'o/_/kr-i ta sogs kyi rkyen mtha'

[\[107a.5\]]pa mang na'o/_/mnyam pa'i don gyi sgra rnams kyi sbyor ba dang /_bdag gi dbyangs can ma mchod/_bdag gi dbyangs can ma mchod/_mnyam par nye bar 'jal ba ma yin pa ste mnyam pa med ba sbyor ba dag la drug pa dang gsum pa yang na ste/_pitrAtu l+yaHpu traH/_/bituHtul+yaHpu traH/_/pi 
[\[107a.6\]]tuHsa dr-i shaHpu traH/_pi tuHsa dr-i shaHputraH/_pi trAs mak+putraH/_pi tu s+sam k+pu traH/_bung+ng+ha s+ya tu l+yaHnAsti/_bung+ng+he na tu l+yaHnAsti/bu ng+ng+he na tu l+yaHnA sti/_tsatur+thitsA shi Sh+yayu Sh+yam dra b+ha dra ku shal su khAr+tha hi tiH/_smon pa _AyuSh+ya _madra _b+hadra _ku sha la bde ba'i don rnams dang hi ta _pha dang 'dra ba bu/_rnams kyi bzhi pa'ang _pha dang mnyam pa bu/

[\[107b.1\]]bar gyur cig/_madraMtu b+hAMb+hU yAta/_b+ha draM tu b+h+yaMb+hA yAta/_b+ha draM tu b+h+yaMb+hA yAta/_ku sha laM ta b+hU yAta/_ku sha laMtub+hAMb+hU yAta/_su khaM ta ba b+hU yAta/_su khaM tu b+h+yaM b+hU yAta/_tsiraMdzI bi taMm ma b+hU yA ta/_tsi raM dzI be haM ma h+yaM b+hU yAta/_ka l+yANaMta ba b+hU yAta/_kal+yA NaM tu b+h+yaM b+hU yA ta/_hi taM ta ba b+gU yAta/_hi

[\[108a.1\]]ring ba'i dpe ni/_ban s+ya ngUre/_banas+yAn+ti ke/_'grel par/_k+ta'i rgyen can dang sbyor ba la gnyis pa'i don la bdun pa yang na'o zhes bshad pas/_ang+hI tI byA kar Ne/_yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/_sAdwA sAng+hu pra yo ge tsa/_legs pa po dang legs pa po ma yin pa rab tu

[\[109a.1\]]bzhi pas bya ba ston pa'o/_pany+tsa mI bi b+hak+te/_rnam par gus pa la lnga pa'o/_rnam par gus pa ste dad pa phul du byung pa gzhan las bkar ba'i don la rnam dbye lnga pa 'gyur te/_udI ts+yAdAk+Shi Na t+ye b+h+yaHsu shrotri yAH/_sAng+hu ni bu NA r+thA b+h+yA maHyAMsap+ta myapra teH/_pra

[\[109b.1\]]don chog dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las/_byed pa can te rnam dbye rnams kyi 'jug tshul zhib ma mor ston pa las spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so//_//da ni 
[\[109b.2\]]tshig sdud kyi rnam gzhag 'chad par bya ste/_sa mar+thaHpa da bing+hiH/_don sdud pa tshig gi cho ga'o/_/tshig gnyis sam mang po don gcig tu sdud pa'i cho ga ston par byed pa ni tshig sdud kyi cho ga'o/_sa mAs sh+tsatur+ng+hA/_tshig sdud bzho'o/_ga lA pa/_tsan+ha pa/_dbyangs can ma

[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]sbyar bas/_sngar tshig mang ba dang brjod pa ma bde ba rnams tshig nyung zhing brjod pa bde bar 'gyur ba ni tshig sdud kyi dgos pa'o zhes bshad do/_de rnams las dang po mi zad pa'i bsdu ba bshad par bya ste/_ha ro+o a ng+hikrit+ya/_zhes pa tshig sbyor ram ngag ces bya ste tshig 
[\[110a.2\]]sdud byed pa'i gzhi yin no/_pra tha mAni r+ng+diSh+TaM sa mA sa u pa sa jaM naM/_dang nges par sbyor ba'i tshig sdud nyer bsgyur ro/_rnam dbye dang po dang sbyor ba'i bsdu ba byed pa'i yul rnam dbye dang po thob pa de la nyer bsgyur zhes ming _'phrog byed d+ya ba lhag por/_'dogs byed do/_u pa sardza naM pUMrbaM/

[\[110a.4\]]byings prA ti pa di ka dag las su pa kyi'o/_byings dang sbyor ba dang tshig sdud kyi skabs prA ti pa di ka zhes ming 'dogs byas pa bsdu bya der gnas pa'i rnam dbye rnams dbyi zhing der ma zad gzhi dang /_phrad dang /_khyad par dang 'dra ba'i skad dod sogs tshig gi rjes 'brang rnams kyang dbyibs ha ri 
[\[110a.5\]]la sbyin pa'i di dang kr-it+ya phyis/_ang+hi ha ri/_de ltar rnam dbye rjes 'brang dang bcas pa phyis pas tshig sdud kyi ming thogs pa de la slar tshig tu sgrub byed kyi rnam dbye rnams 'jug pa las mtshon byed su byin/_a ng+hi ha ri su/_a bya yI b+hA bash+tsa/_mi zad par gyur pa la'ang ngo /_mi zad 
[\[110a.6\]]par kyur pa ste mi zad pa sngon na yod pa mi zad pa'i bsdu ba byas pa de la rnam dbye thams cad 'jig cing bya ba yang med pas su phyis/_de'i rjes su don ston pa'i tshig gzhan sbyor dgos te/_ang+hi ha ri prabr-it+tA ka thA/_de bzhin du/_rA yam ti krAn+ta/_rnam dbye rjes 'bang dang bcas pa phyis/_a 
[\[110a.7\]]ti re+e/_zhes pa la/_mi zad pa'i bsdu ba'i mtha' ma ning du 'gyur zhing /_ma ning la thung ngur 'gyur bas/_a ti ri/_'byor ldan/_de bzhin du/_nA ba ma tikrAn+tal/_gru shin tu non pa/_lhag par rab tu 'phel ba'i brjod pa 'phrog byed/_chos 'byor pa dang ldan pa/_a ti nu/_hru nub la khar/_de rnams mi zad 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]pa'o/_'grel par/_don tshang zhing brjod bden gong du bshad pa ltar tshig sdud kyi bya ba 'jug la don mi ston cing brjod pa mi bde na cho ga sdud kyi cho ga rnams mi 'jug ste/_dper na/_san+ti gu NAHharo+o/_zhes pa lta bu la tshig sdud kyi bya ba mi 'jug go_nye ba la/_kr-iSh+Nas+ya 
[\[110b.2\]]u pa/_zhes pa la/_upa kr-iSh+Nasu/_nA bya yI b+hAbAd to masto pany+tsa myAH/_mi zad par gyur ba las atal ma yin zhing lnga bam yin pa'i ama'o/_spyir btang mi zad pa'i bsdu ba'i mtha' 'phrog byed la son tan rnams yod/_las rnam dbye thams cad 'jig par bshad _nag po'i nyi la/
[\[110b.3\]]kyang dmigs bsal mi zad par gyur pa las kyang a yig mtha' can la rnam dbye rnams mi 'jig cing rnam dbye lnga pa rnams ma gtogs rnam dbye thams cad am du 'gyur te/_su am/_upakr-iSh+NaM/_lnga pa la/_u pa kr-iSh+NA ta sogs so/_tr-i tI yAs p+ta myorba hulaM/_gsum pa 
[\[110b.4\]]bdun pa dag yang na'o/_gong du mi zad bar gyur pa'i a yig mtha' la rnam dbye lnga pa ma gtogs rnam dbye lhag thams cad am du 'gyur bar bshad kyang /_mdo 'dis rnam dbye gsum _nag po nye ba/_pa dang bdun pa/_dag po nyams/_dag am du 'gyur ba dang spyir btang a 
[\[110b.5\]]thung mtha' can gyi bya ba gnyis ka 'jug pas 'dam ka can du bya ste/_gsum pa la/_upakr-iSh+Nen/_u pa kraMSh+Na/_bdun pa la/_u pa kr-iSh+Ne/_u pa kr-iSh+NaM ltabu'o/_/'grub pa la/_ma drANAM sa mr-i ng+hiH/_zhes pa la gong bzhin rnam dbye rnams bsdus sa mr-ing+d+hi'i don nyer 
[\[110b.6\]]bskyur su sngon/_su ma draM/_/yang 'grel par mi zad par gyur pa'i a yig mtha' _nye bar nag po yis/_can yin kyang su ma dra dang _nye ba nag po la/_un+mat+ta gang+gal bdun pa rnams _dge ba rnams kyi bgrub pa/_a ma nyid du 'gyur gyi yang na ba mi byed do/_zhes bshad 
[\[110b.7\]]pas/_ngi la/_dge ba bzang po/_sum draM/_un+mat+ta gang+gaM/_gang+hAsmyon pa la/_'phel ba la/_yam nA nAM br-ing+ng+hiH/_kla klo rnams kyi 'phel ba/_zhes pa la/_gong bzhin rnam dbye bsdus pr-ing+ng+hi'i don nyer bsgyur dur sngon/_dur+Y+Ya pa naM/_kla klo 'phel ba/_/dngos med kyi don la/_/sbrang ma nyid med pa _mak+Shi 
[\[111a\]]

[\[114b.1\]]D+haH/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye gnyis pa'i rjes phyis/_kharU T+haH/_sAsI/_sAmi'o/_k+ta'i rkyen mtha' can dang sbyor ba'i sA mi yang de'i skyes bu'i bsdu bar 'gyur te/_sA mi kr-i taM/_kA lAH/_dus rnams so/_/dus brjod pa'i gnyis pa'i mtha' 'ang kA'i rkyen can pha rol las su pa dang

[\[118a.1\]]aM/_/can rnams la ba ti'i ming can zhes brda chad byed de gong du ku ga ti pral sogs pa rnams kyang ngo zhes pa'i don du ming 'dogs byas te/_dper brjod na/_am U rI kr-i t+ya/_su _am ur rI kr-i t+ya/_su am alaM kr-i t+ya/_su yam an+taHkr-itaM su/_nga tham na skr-i taM/_ngi _bu r-iskrataM/

[\[118a.5\]]tiraskratA/_tiraHkr-i twA/_tir spa ti/_ti raHpa ti/_'grel par/_ha ste lto 'grob krad+ya/_bedaM dzI _yid 'brog _bi kA/_pA No kr-i t+ya/_rnam dbye bdun pa'i rjes mi dbyi yang nges pa'i tshig sdud zer ro zhes byung ngo /_bral sogs pa'i dper brjod ni/_su prakr-i t+ya/_saMb+ha ba ti/_su hr-itaM/_a b+hi She

[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]ya ti sha yen rA dzA/_zhes pa la/_ati rA dzA/_suSh+Ta s+ya uk+taH/_zhes pa la/_sUk+tA/_a ti sha yen dz+nyA/_zhes pa la/_a ti dz+nya/_yang 'grel par/_Ang gi nyung du'i don dang sngon par khyab pa'i don gcig par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/_iShata bang+haM/_zhes pa'i 
[\[118b.2\]]don la/_phul du byung ba'i rgyal po/_Abang+haM/_de bzhin _legs bar smras pa/_du/_a b+hibya stiHna _mkhyen pa phul du byung ba/_garaH/_zhes pa'i don la/_An garaH/_yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/_a t+yA da yaHkran+tA da yaHkrAn+tA ng+yar+thetwi tI yA la/_a ti sogs _cung zad 'ching /_rnams 
[\[118b.3\]]khyab pa sogs kyi don la gnyis pa'i'o/_/cung zad 'ching /_a ti la sogs pa rnams _mngon par khyab pa'i grong /_khyab pa sogs kyi don brjod pa la gnyis pa'i mtha' don gcig par 'gyur te/_a ti krAn+to mA lAM/_/zhes pa la rnam dbye rjes 'brang dang bcas pa phyis/_a ti mAlA su/
[\[118b.4\]]e ka pi b+hak+hi tsA pU rba ni pA te/_rnam dbye gcig la'ang sngam ma yin pa'i nges tshig la'o/_nges pa'i tshig rnam dbye gcig tu sdud pa'i cho ga tshig sbyor gyi skabs kyi tshig gnyis bzhag pa'i sngam ma _shin tu khyab pa'i phreng pa/_yin pa'i tshig phyi ma de la u pa rdza zhes ming 'dogs byed do/_/
[\[118b.5\]]go s+t+ri yo ru pas rdza s+ya/_go bud med dag gi u pas rdza'i'o/_rnam dbye bsdus pa'i mtha'i go'i sgra dang bud med kyi rkyen mtha' can u pa sa rdza'i med mtha' can de thung dur 'gyur te/_gong du u pas rdza'i ming can zhes brda cha dbyas pa'ang dgos pa 'di'i don yin/_des na mA lA'i 
[\[118b.6\]]lnga thung ngur 'gyur/_a ti mA laH/_de bzhin du/_a ti krAn+ta gang+gAM/_zhes pa la/_a ti gaM ga/_de bzhin du/_urga taHbelA/_zhes pa'ang rnam dbye dang rjes 'brang phyis/_rtags mtha 'thung ngu /_u dwe laH/_de bzhin du/_a b+himu khaMpra san+naH/_zhes pa la/_ab+himu 
[\[118b.7\]]khaH/_mngon par phyogs pa/_khyab pa'i phreng ba/_gaM gA'i shin tu khyab pa/_pra ti ak+shaM/_zhes pa la gang+gA'i khyab pa/_gnyis pa'i rjes _khyab par 'gro ba'i dus/_phyis/_prat+yak+ShaH/_cho lo so sor/_bud med kyi rkyen mtha' ma yin na thung ngur mi 'gyur te/_khyab pa'i dus/_a ti tan+t+rI/_nyu shin cu non pa/_ati lak+Sh+mI/_shin tu dpal dang ldan pa'am 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]shin tu phun gsum tshogs pa/_a ti shrIH/_'grel par/_a ba sogs rnams kuSh+ta sogs dang sbyor ba la gsum pa'i mtha' don gcig par 'gyur zhes bshad pas/_a ba kuSh+TaH/_ko ki la yA zhes pa la/_rnam dbye rjes 'brang dang bcas ba phyis/_a bko 
[\[119a.2\]]ki laH/_yang 'grel par/_pa ri sogs glA na sogs kyi don brjod pa la bzhi pa'i mtha' don gcig par 'gyur ra zhes bshad pas/_pa ri glAnaH/_a ng+yaya nA ya/_zhes pa'i _khu byugs snyad snyan bo 'don/_ngag sbyor la rnam dbye rjes 'brang dang bcas pa phyis/_par+Ya ng+ya yanaH/
[\[119a.3\]]de bzhin du/_a laM su b.raHku mAr+Ye+e/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye rjes 'brang dang bcas pa phyis/_a laM ku mA riH/_yongs su klog _par pi 'dod/_nir sogs rnams khyab pa sogs kyi don du sbyor ba la lnga ba'i mtha' don gcig par 'gyur ro _glog mi 'dod/
[\[119a.4\]]zhes pa _gzhon nu ma'i phyed kyi byis pa rgyan bzang po/_byung bas/_nith+k+rAn+taH/_ko+o shAm+b+h+yaH/_zhes pa _gzhon nu ma rgyan bzang /_la/_o+o_ni lgo shAm+wiH/_yang 'grel par/_i ba dang sbyor ba la rnam dbye rnams mi dbyi zhing de la mi dbyi ba'i tshig sdud zer ro zhes bshad pas/_to+o ibaH/_bA sasI 
[\[119a.5\]]ib/_zhes pa lta bu la rnam dbye ming byi mtshams sbyar/_tA bib/_bAsasApa/_pUrba kA le+e ka sarba dzar t+purA Nan tsa ke ba nges par mdzod ldan/_lAH/_samA nAng+hi kar Ne na/_snga ma'i dus_ e ka sarba _dzarata _bu rA Na rnams gcig ma yin pa la'ang mnyam de dag 'dra ba/_gos dag 'dra ba/
[\[119a.6\]]pa'i lhag par byed ba la'o/_/snga ma'i dus te 'das ba'i dus dang sbyor ba dang e ka sogs dang sbyor ba la'ang tshog gcig min bdon mnyam pa'i lhag par byed pa la sub dang su pa don gcig par 'gyur te/_sna ten anu lip+taH/_zhes pa la/_gsum pa'i rjes bsdus/_sna tAnu lip+taH/

[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]ra dwa yaH/_de bzhin du/_burA Nen uk+taH/_zhes pa la/_burA Nok+taH/_burANok+taH/_tshig gcig yin na bsdu ba'i tha snyad med de/_bUrbaH/_zhes ba lta bu la bsdu ba'i cho ga med do/_mnyam pa'i don lhag par byed pa ma yin pa ste/_don 'gal bal tshig gnyis dang gsum la sogs pa yod kyang

[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]pa la/_pA tsa ka dzAtI yaH/_de bzhin du/_pA tsa kash+tsa de shI ya sh+tsa/_zhes pa la/_bA tsa ka de shI yaH/_de bzhin du/_sarbe tsa de bash+tsa/_zhes pa la/_sarga de baH/_de bzhin du/_dzarats+tsa so+ob ti sh+tsa/_zhes pa la/_dzarat+tsati/_u pa mAnA ni sA mA n+ya ba tsa ne+eH/

[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]bdag/_sa bdag ste rkya la bo'i ming /_zhes pa la/_tshig snga ma'i phyi ma dang rnam dbye rnams phyis/_shwaka bAr+thibaH/_da dang 'dra bar/_debaHpU dzalobrAh+ma NaH/_zhes pa la'ang /_tshig snga ma'i phyi ma pU dza ka dang rnam dbye phyis/_de ba brAh+ma NaH/_nanya/_nanya'i'o/_/dgag pa'i na nya s+jon du 'jog pa yang

[\[120b.5\]]shwaH/_/'grel par lung drangs pa/_na nyo na lo paH/_ti ngi k+She ye/_ting la med pa la na nya'i na dbyi'o/_/ting mtha' _rta las gzhan pa/_can gyi sngon du 'jog pa'i nanya'i na'ang med pa'i don brjod pa yin na dbyi ste/_na pa tsi si/_zhes pa la na phyis/_a pa tsa si/_rta las gzhan pa/_

[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]ma ut+k+r-iSh+Ta rnams mchod bsems pa rnams kyi'o/_sata sogs de rnams mchod pa dang legs par sems pa'i don brjod pa'i phyir du sbyor ba yang don gcig pa'i de'i skyes bu'i nang tshan las 'dzen gyi bsdu bar 'gyur te/_sat+tsaso ng+harma sh+tsa/_zhes pa la rnam

[\[121a.5\]]shiSh+Ta _lha chen po/_rnams pha rol la A yi ge tu _mchog kyang 'di lha yang ngo /_/lha mchog/_mchog kyang 'di bla ma yang ngo /_brjod par bya zhing g+hAs sogs _bla ma mchog/_gzi brjid can kyang 'di lha yang ngo /_lha gzi brjid can/_/pha rol kha ma ha tI zhes pa'ang ma ha ru 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/_ma ha tI la Ta/_b+hAs la

[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]rnams bsdus/_pUrba shA la b+ha ba/_zhes pa la/_di ka pUrba pa dA da saMdz+nyAyAM nyA/_phyogs kyi tshig snga ma las ming ma yin pa la la nya'o/_phyogs kyi tsheg snga ma can la ming ma yin pa la dngos bo'i don la de phan gyi rkyen nya 'gyur ro/_zhes pas/_de phan gyi don can gyi tshig phyi ma b+ha ba phyis/_de'i 
[\[121b.2\]]don gyi rkyen nya/_nya 'gro bal 'phel ba/_po+orba shAlaH/_dika saMMkhyesaM dzA yAM/_phyogs grangs ngag la ming la'o/_phyogs kyi sgra dang grangs dag ming brjod pa na don gcig par 'gyur te/_dak+Shi NA tsA so+o ag+ni sh+tsa/_zhes pa la/_dak+Sha NAg+ninaH/_de bzhin du/_sap+ha tsa te grA mAsh+tsa/_zhes pa la/
[\[121b.3\]]sab+tagwAmAH/_de bzhin du/_sap+ta tsa r-i _'gron khang shar/_Sha ya sh+tsa/_zhes pa la/_sap+tar+Sha yan/_saM khyA pUrbo dwiguH/_grangs thog ma can ni phyogs gnyis pa'o/_dngos po gang zhig grangs kyi _lho yang 'di me yang ngo /_sgra dang 'grel ba _lho'i me/_grong yang de bdun yang ngo /_na grangs kyi sgra sngon du 
[\[121b.4\]]'jog_grong 'dun rnams/_drang srong yang de bdun lang /_cing de la de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba'i nang _drang srong bdun rnams/_tshan phyogs gnyis pa'i bsdu ba zhes brda chad byed do/_/ban+tsa su ka pA leShusaMskr-itaH/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye rnams dang rjes 'brang bsdus/_pany+tsa ka pA la/_saMskr-i taM bak+ShaH/_'dus 
[\[121b.5\]]pa la zas la'o/_/zas kyi don gyi 'das ba'i don la de phan gyi rkyen aNa'o zhes pas aN 'jug kyang /_dwi goHlug na pa t+ye/_phyogs gnyis pa'i bu brgyud ma yin pa la dbyi'o/_ha bA li lnga 'dus/_phyogs gnyis pa'i tshig sdud kyi skabs 'dir bu brgyud kyi rkyen _ka bAli lnga/_ma yin pa'i de phan gyi 
[\[121b.6\]]rkyen rnams dbyi snye/_pany+tsa ka pA la la yang aNam sbyin kyang chog/_sbyin kyang mdo 'dis dbyibs gzugs 'dra'o/_bu brgyud kyi rkyen yin na mi dbyi ste/_dwa yoH/_mi tra yoH/_putraH/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye rnams bsdus pu brgyud kyi rkyen nyi nya 'gro ba la 'phel ba/_dwe+e mi triH/_zhes 
[\[121b.7\]]pa lta bu mi dbyi'o/_yang /_pany+tsa p+hiHgo b+hiHkrIta/_bal nga lnga yis tshong /_/zhes pa la/_rnam dbye rnams bsdus/_pa dang lda/_pany+tsa guH/_te na krA+e tag de yis rdzas brje ba la'o/_de yis rdzas brje ba ste tshong gi don la de phan gyi rkyen ka 'gyur ro zhes pa thob kyang /_a t+h+ya r+b+ba pU rbAng+d+wi _phrogs gnyis kyi phu/
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]go rlu ga saM dzAyAM/_lhag pa'i don snga ma las phyogs gnyis pa la ming ma yin pa la dbyi'o/_lhag pa'i don snga ma can las/_phyogs gnyis pa'i tshig stud kyi skabs 'dir ming ma yin pa la de phan gyi rkyen rnams dbyibs/_ka byin ma byin la gzugs khyad par 
[\[122a.2\]]med do/_yang /_pany+tsa ga bo ng+ga na yas+ya/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye rjes 'brang dang bcas pa phyis/_pany+tsa go ng+ha naM/_gor ta ng+ng+hi ta lung ki/_go yis de phan dbyi ba ma yin no/_go yis sgra'i mtha' dang de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba'i mtha' la de phan gyi rkyen a tsa 'gyur zhing dbyi ba'ang ma yin no 
[\[122a.3\]]zhes pas atsa'i rkyen/_gang gi nor ba lang lnga/_pany+tsa ga paH/_zhes pa la/_dwi gu re ka pa tsa naM/_phyogs nor ba lang lnga/_gnyis pa la gcig tshig go/_/phyogs gnyis pa'i bsdu ba byas pa'i mtha' las rnam dbye rnams kyi gcig tshig kho na 'jug pa shas che'o/_/sa na puM sa kaM/_/de ma 
[\[122a.4\]]ning ngo /_/phyogs gnyis pa'i bsdu ba byas pa'i ba dar lnga/_mtha' gcig tshig 'jug pa de rnams ma ning gi rtags su 'gyur ro/_/ma ning la su a ma du 'gyur/_pany+tsa ga paM ng+hanaM/_a kArAn+tot+ta ra ba do dwi guH/_phyogs gnyis pa a yig mtha' tshig phyi ma la'o/_phyogs gnyis 
[\[122a.5\]]pa'i bsdu pa'i skabs tshig phyi ma a yig mtha' can las bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen dI ba 'gyur te/_trayA NAM lokA nAM/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye bsdus/_bud med du gang gi nor ba lang lnga/_brjod pa'i rkyen dI pa/_tri lo kI/_A baM to bA/_Apa mtha' la yang na'o/_phyogs 
[\[122a.6\]]gnyis pa'i tshig sdud kyaM skabs tshig phyi ma'i mtha' de A ba mtha' can yin na yang na dI pa 'gyur _'jig rten rnams kyi gsum rnams kyi/_zhing yang na ma ning gi rtags su 'gyur te/_tra yAnAM kha T+wAnAM/_zhes pa la/_tri kha T+wI/_'jig rten gsum/_tri ba T+waMM_'grel par lung drangs pa/_a no rlo pa sh+tsa 
[\[122a.7\]]stI yAbA/_an gyi dbyi zhing bud med du yang na'o/_phyogs gnyis pa'i an gyi mtha' dbyi zhing bud med kyi rtags su yang na 'gyur te/_lnga rnams kyi las rnams kyi/_pany+tsA nAM karmA _khri rnams kyi gsum rnams kyi/_khri gsum ma/_NAM/_zhes pa la rnam dbye khri gsum/_phyis/_pany+tsa ka rma na/_go yis de phan dbyi 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]ba ma yin no zhes pa'i mdos atsa an phyis/_dI pa yang na ba byas pas/_pany+tsa karmI/_pany+tsa karmaM/_yang lung drangs pa/_bat+DA do+o na dIng /_pA tra sogs la dI pa mi 'gyur ro/_/phyogs gnyis pa'i bsdu ba byas pa'i mtha' pA tra sogs la bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen dI pa 'gyur ba ma yin te/_pany+tsa nAM pA tA NAM/_zhes 
[\[122b.2\]]pa la/_rnam dbye phyis dI pa mi 'gyur/_pany+tsa pAtraM/_de bzhin du/_las lnga ma/_las lnga/_tsa tur+Yu gaM/_tri b+hu ba naM/_tad+pu ru Sha s+yAM gu leHsaM khyA bye yA deH/_aM gu li las de'i skyes bu'i grangs mi zad pa sogs kyi'o/_de'i skyes bu'i bsdu _snod rnams kyi lnga rnams kyi/_ba'i 
[\[122b.3\]]skabs drangs dang mi zad pa snga ma'i aM gu snod lnga/_li zhes pa'i rtags la rkyen a tsa _gzugs bzhi/_sa gsum/_'gyur te+e/_dwo+o aM gu lI pra mA Na ma s+ya/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye rjes 'brel dang bcas pa phyis/_rkyen a tsa byin/_d+w+yaM gu laM/_de bzhin 
[\[122b.4\]]du/_niraM gu laM/_agas+sarbe+eka de shasaM byA ta pu N+yAts+tsa rAtA+eH/_a han sarba saMs khyAta pu N+ya rnams las rA tri las kyang ngo /_a han sogs de rnams lnga ma'i rA tri'i sgral rkyen _srog chags kyi mdzub mo gnyis/_atsa 'gyur zhing yang gi sgras mi zad pa dang grangs sngon ma la'ang 'gyur te/_mdzub mo gnyis/
[\[122b.5\]]mdzub mo med pa/_a hash+tsa rA tri sh+tsa/_zhes pa la rnam dbye bsdus/_atsa'i rkyen/_a ho rA traM/_rAtrAh+nA hAHpuM si/_rA tri aha na aha rnams skyes pa'o/_rA tri la sogs pa de rnams yang na skyes pa'i rtags su 'gyur te/_sarba sh+tsa so+orAtrish+tsa/_zhes pa la rnam dbye bsdus/_yang na a 
[\[122b.6\]]han sogs kyi _nyin mo dang mtshan mo/_mdos a ca'i rkyen byin ma ning gi rtags su_nyin mtshan/_'gyur/_yang mdo 'dis skyes pa'i rtags su 'gyur te/_sarba rA traM/_sarba rAtriH/_/de bzhin du/_pUrbadAtriH/_zhes pa la/_mtshan mo yang 'di thams cad kyang ngo /_bUrba rA traM/_pUrbarA triH/_de bzhin 
[\[122b.7\]]du/_a ma_saMkhyA tarA traM/_a ma saMkhyA ta rA traM/_driH/_mtshan mo bshad/_am _pu N+ya rA traM/_triH/_mtshan mo'i bsod nams/_sh+tsa dwi rA traM/_triH/_mtshan lo gnyis/_a ti rA traM/_tIH/_shin tu mtshan mo/_rA dzA haH_mtshon mo thams cad _sa khi b+h+yaSh+Tatsa/_nA _mtshan mo'i s+jon la/_dzan _a han _sa khi rnams las Ta tsa'o/_mtshan mo'i sngon ma/_de'i skyes 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]bu'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir rAdzan sogs rtags gsum po de'i mtha' lags tsa'i rkyen 'jug ste/_ma hAMsh+tsA so+o rA dzA tsa/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye rjes 'brang dang bcas pa phyis/_ma ha ta rA dzan du log/_'dis Tatsa/_tsA Tu sogs kyis tsa phyis/_an gyi dbyi zhing zhes pas an 
[\[123a.2\]]phyis/_mahA rA dzaH/_rgyal po chen po/_de bzhin du/_a ti sha yen rAdza/_zhes pa la/_a ti rA dzA//zhes pa la/_a ti rA dza/_a chen po yang bor rgyal po yang ngo /_ti rA dzI/_de bzhin du/_rA ma s+ya sa khA/_zhes pa la/_rA ma sa khaH/_ma hAM sh+tsA so+os khA_Ta/_Ti ta D+ha sogs kyi son yin bas phyis/_tsa/_zhes pa la/_mahA sa khaH/
[\[123a.3\]]mnyam pa'i lhag par byed pa sogs kyis ma ha ta ma hA ru 'gyur/_phul du byung ba'i rgyal bo/_ah+na Sha kho re ba/_a rgyal bo phul byung /_han gyiT kha de dag las phul du byung ba'i rgyal po/_nges pa'o/_dga' byed kyi grogs go a _dga' byed grogs bo/_han gyi mtha' _chen po yang 'di grogs po yang ngo /_las Ta dang kha'i _grogs po chen po/
[\[123a.4\]]rkyen 'gyur zhing rkyen de dag pha ro la la a han gyi Ti nges par dbye ste/_u t+da ma sh+tsA so+o atash+tsa/_zhes ba la/_rnam dbye phyis/_Ta'i rkyen byin/_Ti phyis/_ut+ha mAhaH/_de bzhin du/_dwe a ha nI/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye bsdus rkyen kha byin kha I nar 'gyur Ti phyis/_ng+h+yahI naH/_yang 
[\[123a.5\]]'grel par/_rAdzan gyi mtha' yin kyang /_ma drA NAM rA dzI/_zhes mchog kyang 'di nyi ma'ang ngo /_palta bu la rnam dbye dbyi ba ma gtogs Ta tsa'i rkyen mi nyi ma mchog/_'jug go zhes bshad _nyi ma dag gnyis dag/_pas/_ma dra rA dz+nyA/_yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/_anyi ma gnyis/_han gyi 
[\[123a.6\]]mtha' la mchod sbyin brjod pa'i pung po'i don _bzang pa rnams kyi rgyal yo/_la rkyen kha 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/_a hInaHkratuH/_ah+Sho nya h+na e te b+h+yaH/_a han gyi ah+na 'di rnams las so/_'di rnams zhes pa rgyal mo dge ba/_sarba la sogs pa sdo nan yod pa'i a han gyi mtha' 
[\[123a.7\]]las rkyen Ta tsha 'gyur zhing a han gyi ah+na zhes par yang 'gyur te/_sarba sh+tsA so+o a ha sh+tsa/_thams cad kyang 'di nyi ma'ang /_zhes mchod sbyin byed pa'i phung bo/_pa la/_rnam dbye sogs phyis/_Ta tsa'i rkyen mdo 'dis ah+na ru 'gyur/_sarbAh+na/_zhim thams cad/_zhes pal/_ah+no nyadan+tA ta/_a 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]han gyi a ta mtha' las so/_a han zhes pa a ta mthar 'gyur ba las de'i tshig sngam de la na Nar 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan gyi yi ge re pha yod na ah+na'i na yang Nar 'gyur te/_sarbAh+DaH/_de bzhin du/_pUrba a haH/_zhes pa la/_pUrbAh+NaH/_pa ri ahaH/_zhes pa la/_parAd+Na/_na 
[\[123b.2\]]saM khyA deHsamAha re/_grangs la sogs pa'i kun sdud pa la ma yin no/_grangs dang po la sogs pa'i kun sdud pa la a han gyi mtha' ah+na zhes par 'gyur ba ma yin te/_dwe a hi nA/_zhes pa la rnam dbye bsdus/_Ta tsa'i nyi ma snga dro/_rkyen _nyi ma phyi dro/_byin mtha' ah+na _nyi ma phyi dro/
[\[123b.3\]]ru mi 'gyur bas/_d+w+ya haH/_de bzhin du/_t+r+yahaH/_ut+ta me+e kA b+h+yAM tsa/_ut+ta ma e ka dag las kyang ngo /_ut+ta ma dang e ka dag las pha rol gyi a han gyi mtha' yang _nyi ma dag gnyis dag/_ah+na zhes par 'gyur ba ma yin te/_ut+ta ma dang pu N+ya don gcig pas/_puN+yash+tsA 
[\[123b.4\]]so+oa gash+tsa/_zhes nyi ma gnyis/_pa la rnam _nyi ma gsum/_dbye bsdus Ta tsa'i rkyen byin/_puN+yA ha su/_'grel bar lung drangs pa/_pu N+ya su ti nA b+h+yAM na pus kaM/_puN+ya su di na dag las ma ning ngo /_puN+ya dang su din dag las pha rol gyi a han zhes pa ni ma ning /_bsod nams kyang 'di nyi ma yang ngo /
[\[123b.5\]]gi rtags su 'gyur te/_bu N+yA haM/_de bzhin du/_ekash+tsA so+o a hash+tsa/_zhes pa la/_/e kAhaH/_a grA khyA yA mu rasaH/_u ras las tsub las so/_u ras las de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba'i mtha' las tsub kyi don la rkyen a tsa 'gyur te/_a shwa s+ya u rasaHa gre a khyA/_zhes pa la rnam dbye phyis/_a 
[\[123b.6\]]gra A khyA gyi don a tsa _bsod nams nye ma/_sbyar te/_a gcig kyang bde nyi ma yang ngo /_shwar saM/_a no nya sh+mA _nyi ma gcig/_yas sar sAM dzA ti saMdzA ti saMdz+nya yoH/_a nas _ash+ma _a yas _sa ras rnams kyi rigs ming dag las so/_a _rta yi brang gi rtse'i tsu pa/_nas la sogs pa 'di rnams la de'i skyes 
[\[123b.7\]]bu'i bsdu ba'i mtha' las rigs dang ming gi don la rkyen atsa 'gyur te/_rta yi brang tsug su/_su pa a na saM/_g.yos khar la nye ba/_zhes pa la/_gnyis pa'i rjes phyis a tsa byin/_su am u pAn saM/_g.yos khang nyeg/_de bzhin du/_a mr-i taM a sh+maH/_zhes pa la/_Ta ci su ma mr-i 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]dAsh+maH/_de bzhin du/_kAlaM a ya saM/_zhes pa la/_kAlA yasaM/_de bzhin du/_mAN+yU kA nAM sa ra sAM/_zhes pa la/_mAN+DUka sa rasaM/_grA ma ko+oTA b+h+yAM tsa ta k+Th+TaH/_grA ma ko+oT dag las kyang ta k+Shi las so/_grA ma dang ko+o Ta dgo snga ma'i ta k+Shi las kyang de'i skyes bu'i 
[\[124a.2\]]bsdu ba'i mtha' _'chi med ngal bu'am bdud rtsi ril bu/_la Ta tsa'i rkyen 'gyur te/_grA me _lcags nag_a tsa u am/_tak+Shi/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye phyis Ta'i rkyen _mtsho yi sbal pa/_byin/_grA ma tak+ShaH/_de bzhin du/_ko+oT sh+tsA so+o tak+Shi tsa/_zhes pa la/_ko+oT ta k+ShaH/_ataHshunaH/_a ti las shwan 
[\[124a.3\]]las so/_a ti snga ma'i shwan las kyang de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba'i mtha' las/_Ta tsa'i rkyen 'jug ste/_a hi sha yen shwA/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye rjes 'brang dang bcas pa phyis/_grong la shing mtho ba/_Ta tsha sbyin/_a ti shwaH/_shing bzo bag yo sgyu can/_shing bzo ba g.yo sgyu can/_a ti shwI/_u pa mAnA dprANi Shu/
[\[124a.4\]]nye bar 'jal ba las srog chags ma yin pa rnams la'o/_shwan gyi sgra la nye bar 'jal ba la yang srog chags ma yin pa las de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba'i mtha' laT tsa 'gyur te/_A kar+Sha shwA i ba/_zhes pa la/_ri phag/_Akar+Sha shwaH/_srog chags yin _TiD+di sogs kyis dI pa/_ri phag mo/_na/_Ta tsa mi 
[\[124a.5\]]'gyur te/_bA na raHshwA i ba/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye sogs bsdus/_Tatsa mi 'gyur_/bA na rang shwA/_ut+ta ra mraMg pUrbAts+tsa sak+thanaH/_ut+ta ri mraM ga pUrba rnams lasak+thi _khyi 'dra ba'i lcags kyu/_las kyang ngo /_khyi 'dra ba'i lcags kyu/_ut+ta ra dang mraMg dang pUrba rnams snga ma'i sak+thi las Ta tsa 'gyur zhing 
[\[124a.6\]]kyang gi sgras nye _khyi 'dra ba spre'u/_bar 'jal ba la'ang 'gyur te/_ut+ta ra s+yas k+thi i ba/_khyi 'dra ba spre'u/_zhes pa la/_ut+tar sak+thaM/_de bzhin du/_bUrba s+ya sak+thi i ba/_zhes pa la/_pUrba sak+thaM/_mr-ig s+ya shraMng+ga i ba sak+Thi/_zhes pa la/_mraM ga sak+thaM/_phal ka s+ya i ba sak+thi/_zhes pa la/_pa 
[\[124a.7\]]la ka sak+tha/_bod lcags 'dra ba'i mdung /_nA bo dwi goHno+o las phyogs _byang bim tung 'dra ba/_gnyis pa las so/_no+o _Tatsas yam/_byang gi mdung 'dra ba/_zhes pa'i sgra las _shar gyi mdung ba dra ba/_Ta tsa su am/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rA 'dra ba'i mdung /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]phyi rwa 'dra ba'i mdung /_thong lcags 'dra ba'i mdung /_phyogs gnyis pa'i 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]bsdu ba'i mtha' laT tsa 'jug ste/_dwe nA po+o/_zhes pa la/_di nA baM/_de bzhin du/_tI nA baM/_pany+tsa nAbaM/_aT+hAts+tsa/_ar+d+ha las kyang ngo /_ar+ng+ha las pha rol gyi no+o las kyang Ta tsa'i rkyen 'jug ste/_ad+haMnA baH/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye bsdus/_Tatsa byin/_ar+d+hanA baM/_khAr+YAHbrAtsI/_khArI las shar 
[\[124b.2\]]pa rnams kyi'o/_/rtsa r+ng+ha dang _gru dag gnyis dag/_Ta tsa su am/_gru gnyis/_Tatsa u a ma/_/gru gsum/_bru lnga/_grangs snga ma'i khA rI las Tatsa 'jug par shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta rnams yang na 'dod de/_dwe khAr+Yo/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye phyis Ta tsa yang na bar byas bas/_glu byed/_dwe khA re/_dwe khA rI/_de 
[\[124b.3\]]bzhin du/_ar+ng+haMkhA rI/_zhes pa la/_ar+ng+hakhA rAM/_dI tri b+d+hA many+jalaH/_dwi tri dag las any+dza li las so/_/dwi tri snga ma'i any+dza li laT tsa yang na 'gyur te/_dwe an+dza lwaM/_khal dag gnyis dag/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye phyis/_Tatsa yang na bar byas bas/_khal gnyis _d+w+yany+dza laM/_d+w+yany+dza 
[\[124b.4\]]li/_de bzhin du/_ti sraHany+dza la yaH/_khal byed/_zhes pa _khal byed/_la/_t+r+yany+ja laM/_t+r+yany+ja li/_brah+ma No dzAn pa dA khyA yAM/_brah+man las yul brjod pa la'o/_yul snyim po dag do dag/_dang 'brel pa'i bra h+man la Tatsa 'gyur te/_swa rwAThA brah+ma/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbya phyis/_snyim po do/
[\[124b.5\]]Tatsa byin pas/_snyim po rnams gsum rnams/_b-I mdzas/_bud me la tr-i tsa cung dag gi ti sr-itsa ta sr-i 'os bsgrubs pa'o//_swarASh+ta brah+ma/_ku ma ha b+b+h+yA man+ya ta ra s+yAM/_ku ma ha ta ngag las lang na'o/_/ku dang ma ha ta snga ma'i brah+man laT tsa yang na 'gyur te/_ku brat+maH/_ku brat+maH/_de bzhin du/_ma hA brah+maH/_mahA 
[\[124b.6\]]brah+mA/_ta tro pa pa daM sap+ta mI s+thaM/_de la bdun pa gnas pa la nye ba'i tshig go/_/bsdu ba'i bzhi _rang lu las tshar la pa/_tshig gnyis bsgrigs pa'i snga ma rnam dbye bdun pa gnas bde la nye ba'i tshig ces ming 'dogs byed do/_/u pa pa _tshangs ba chung ngu /_da ma hing /_nye ba'i tshig la _tshangs pa chen po
[\[124b.7\]]ting ma yin pa la'o/_/gong du nye ba'i tshig ces ming 'dogs byas bde las pha rol tu ting mtha' can ma yin pa'i tshig gang byung yang don gcig pa de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba nges bar 'jug ste/_gum+b+haM kAraH/_zhes pa la rnam dbye bsdus/_kum+b+ha kAraH/_bum ba byed ba ste dza mkhan/_tu mun NU lo+o kr-i yA yA 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]mi tis b+ta myA nirde shA ti dan+ta s+yo pa pa da twaM/_tu mun NU la dag dang bya ba sbyor ba bdun pa'i yul ting mtha' ma yin pa'i nye ba'i tshig gi'o/_/tu mun dang NUl dag gi rkyen mtha' can dang kr-ita sogs kyi bya ba'i rkyen dang sbyor ba'i ting mtha' ma yin ba'i nye ba'i tshig rnam dbye bdun pa'i yul 
[\[125a.2\]]can kyang don gcig de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba 'jug ste/_swa du kA ra b+huk+te/_zhes pa la/_a me+e bAbya yen/_mi zad pa'i nges par a ma'o/_gong du smos pa'i bsdu ba de dang 'brel ba'i mi zad pa sngon na yod na am A ga ma 'gyur te/_'dis a ma/_a ma la sngon ma'i gzugs/_ma nga ro/_/
[\[125a.3\]]swaduM kArab+hu k+te/_tu mun la/_kA le b+hak+tuM/_zhes pa la/_kAl b+huk+tuM/_tr-itI yA pr-i b+h+r-itI n+ya n+ya ta ra s+yAM/_gsum pa sogs rnams yang na'o/_/u pa daM sha pha rol na yod pa'i mU la ka gsum pa sogs kyi mtha' don gcig par yang na 'gyur te/_mU la ken u pa daM shaHb+huk+te/_zhes pa 
[\[125a.4\]]ro dang ldan za bar byed/_rang gnas sam yang na rnam dbye bsdus/_dus zos nas/_pas/_mUl ko pa daM shaM b+huk+te/_k+tA tsa/_k+t+wA yang ngo /_/k+t+wA'i rkyen mtha' can dang sbyor ba la yang gsum pa'i mtha' don gcig par 'gyur te/_uts+tse+eHkr-i twU/_u pa dz+nyo pa rtsa ba can nye bar so yis bzang /_kra ma ta dA ng+yA bi khyA 
[\[125a.5\]]sayAM/_u ba dz+nyA u pa kra ma de sogs 'dod pa la'o/_/u padz+nyA/_u pa kram sogs dang sbyor ba yang 'dod pa'i don can yin don gcig pa de'i skyes bu'i bsdu bar 'gyur zhing de dag ma ning gi rtags su'ang 'gyur te/_Ta phyis ba'o/_mtho bar byas nas/_pANi neH/_ngas umadz+nyA/_zhes ba la/_rnam 
[\[125a.6\]]dbye bsdus/_pANi n+yu ba dz+nyaM/_de bzhin du/_nan+da s+yo ba kra maH/_zhes pa la/_nan+do pa kramaH/_tshA yA bA hu l+ye/_tshA yA mang po la'o/_de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir mang po brjod pa dang 'brel ba'i tshA yA zhes pa'i sgra yang ma ning gi rtags su 'gyur te/_shal b+hAnAM tshA yA/_zhes pa la/
[\[125a.7\]]sha la b+hatshA _pANi ni nye bar shes/_yaM/_phye ma'i ba rnams kyi grib ma/_dga' ba'i nye ba'i rim pa/_dga' ba'i nye ba'i rim ga_sab+hArA dzA ma nu Sh+ya pUrbA rA dzan dang mi ma yin pa snga ma'i sa b+hA la'o/_/rA dzan dang mi ma yin pa'i sgra snga ma'i sab+hA zhes pa ma ning gi rtags su 'gyur te/_in s+ya sa _phye ma le ba rnams kyi grib ma/_b+hA/_zhes pa la/_tshoT 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]ba 'di'i/_in sab+haM/_de bzhin du/_I shwa ra s+ya sa b+tA/_zhes pa la/_I shwar sa b+haM/_rAdz+nyaHsa b+hA/_zhes pa la/_rA dza sa b+haM/_de bzhin du/_mi shAtsa s+ya sa b+hA/_zhes pa la/_pi shAtsas b+haM/_a shA lA tsa/_'gron khang ma yin pa la'ang ngo /_/gong du mi ma yin ba zhes byung yang mdo 'dis 'gron 
[\[125b.2\]]khang du 'tshogs pa lta bu ma yin pa'i 'tshogs dbang phyug gi tshogs/_pa'i don lam dbang phyug gi tshogs pa_/rgyal pa'i tshogs pa/_rgyal bo'i tshogs/_ning gi rtags su 'gyur te/_snrA NAMs _sha ba'i tshogs gab+hA/_zhes pa _sha za'i tshogs la/_sdI sab+haM/_pib+hAShA senAsu rA tshA yA shA lU ni shA nAM_/senA _gurAtshA yA _shA lA _ni shA rnams 
[\[125b.3\]]kyi 'dam ka'o/_/se nA la sogs pa de rnams bsdu ba'i mtha' ma ning gi rtags su yang na 'gyur te/_dwidzA nAM sa nA/zhes pa la/_dwi dza se na/_dwi dza se nA/_de bzhin du/_ya bA nAM su rA/_bud med kyi tshogs/_zhes pa la/_ya ba suraM/_rA/_brak+Sha s+ya tshA yA/_zhes pa la/_pr-i k+Sha tshA yaM/_yA/_ga 
[\[125b.4\]]bAM shA lA/_zhes pa la/_go shwa laM/_lA/_su ni shA/_su ni shaM/_senA la sogs pa de rnams gnyis skyes te bram ze'i sde/_de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba'i nang tshan las 'dzin dang _nas rnams kyi chang /_na nya snga ma can lam ning gi rtags su mi 'gyur te/_shing gi grib ma/_dr-i D+ha sh+Na so+o se nA _ba lang gi 'gran khag tsa/
[\[125b.5\]]zhes pa lta bu la rnam dbye phyis ma ning gi rtags su mi _legs pa'i mtshan mo/_'gyur te/_go bud med sogs kyis thung ngu /_dr-i D+ha senaH/_de bzhin du/_na se nA/_zhes pa la/_a se naH/_par ba l+ling+gaMdwan+d+wa tat+pu tu Sha yoH/_rtags pha rol 'dra bar zlas _bstan ba'ang 'di sde yang ba di/_dbye de'i skyes 
[\[125b.6\]]bu dag gi'o/_/de'i skyes du'i bsdu ba dang zlas dbye'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'gar rtags gnyis bsgrigs pa'i snga ma pha rol tu _sde ba snyan pa/_song zhing phyi ma sngon mar song la de'i skabs rtags dang rnam dbye phrad pa'i bya ba rnams pha rol tu song ba'i rtags de nyid rtags gsum po gang yin kyang de dang 'dra 
[\[125b.7\]]bar bsgrub ste/_kuk+kuT sh+tsa ma yU rI tsa/_khyim bya dang rma bya/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye bsdus rtags snga phyi yang na brjes rnam dbye dang phrad pa'i cho ga pha rol tu gang byung ba de'i lugs byas pas/_ma yUrI ku k+kuTo+o/_yang na/_kuk+kuT ma yUr+Yo+o/_de bzhin du/_pi pi ling byed kyi/_ar+ng+ha s+ya pip+pa lI/
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]zhes pa la/_pip+par+ng+ha/_yang na/_ar+ng+ha pap+pa lI/_pUrba bad shwab Da bo+o/_snga ma 'dra bar a shwa ba Da bdag go/_a shwa dang ba Da bdag snga ma dang 'dra bar rnam dbye rnams 'jug ste/_a shwa sh+tsa pa Da bA tsa/_zhes pa la/_a shwa ba Da bo+o/_bAr+ng+hartsaD+ha/_a r+ng+hartsaH/_ar+ng+ha ri tsa'i 
[\[126a.2\]]yang na'o/_/ar+ng+ha dang sbyor ba'i ri tsa yang na ma ning gi rtags su 'gyur zhing lang na pho rtags nyid do/_/raMtsaHar+ng+haM/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye phyis/_snga phyi bsgyur/_Ta tsa byin/_ar+ng+hartsaM/_ar+ng+ha rtsaH/_d+w+yaSh+ta rta dang rgod ma/_naHsaM khyA yA ma ba hu brI _rta dang rgod ma h+ya shI t+yoH/_dwi aSh+tan dag gi 
[\[126a.3\]]grangs la 'bru mang po dang brgyad cu ma yin pa dag la'o/_/dwi dang aSh+Tan dag gi mtha' grangs brjod pa _nges tshig phyed/_can 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba dang brgyad cu ma yin pa la A yig tu 'gyur te/_d+w+yang+hi kAd sha/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye rjes 'brel dang bcas pa phyis/_dwi dwA zhes par 'gyur/
[\[126a.4\]]dwA da shaH/_lung drangs pa/_paMk+ti bi sha ti tri shats+tsa twA ri shat+pany+tsA shata ShaSh+Thi sab+ta t+yA shI tin ba ti sha me te saM khyA shab+da ni pA taH/_paMk+ti/_bi shaM ti/_triM sha ta/_tsa twA riM shata/_tsatwA riM shata/_bany+tsA shata/_ShaSh+Thi/_sab+ta bcu las lhag po gnyis/_ti/_a shI ti/_na pa ti/_na pa ti/_sha taM_/de rnams grangs kyi sbra la tshig

[\[126b.1\]]ng+hikA shI ti/_zhes pa la/_aSh+DA a shIti/_'grel par lung drangs pa/_prAka sha tA ta pra yo genaH/_brgya las mang ba rab tu sbyor ba la ma yin no/_brgya las mang ba zhes pa nyis brgya brgyad brgya stong phrag gnyis stong phrag brgyad sogs sbyor ba la dwi dang aSh+Tan gyi mtha' A ta du 'gyur ba

[\[127a.1\]]Sha Sha zhes pa da shan dang phrad na Sha yig u ru 'gyur zhing da'ang Da ru 'gyur te/_Sha Da ng+hikA da sha/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye phyis/_ShaSha da shan/_mdo 'dis Sha pyi ma u/_a la yon tan nos o/_da Da/_ShoDa sha/_de rnams kyis de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba bshad

[\[129a.1\]]dar+sha nI yAM mAn nA ya s+ya/_zhes pa la/_dar+shanI ya mAni nI/_na ko pang+hAyAH/_ka u pa ng+hA'i ma yin no/_de phan gyi ka u ba ng+hAn yod pa la skyes pa bzhin 'gyur ba ma yin te/_pAtsi kA b+hAr+YAya s+ya/_zhes pa la/_pAtsi kAb+hAr+YaH/_de bzhin du/_res kAb+ngAr+YA ya s+ya/_zhes

[\[129b.1\]]ke sha mAni nI/_dzA te sh+tsa/_rigs kyi'ang ngo /_rigs brjod pa can bud med kyi rtags dISha mtha' can yang skyes pa bzhin du 'gyur ba ma yin te/_dISha brAd+ma NI b+hAr+YA ya s+ya/_zhes pa la/_thung ngur mi 'gyur/_de Sha _brAh+ma NI b+hAr+YaH/_saM khya yA bya yAs n+nA ngUrA ng+hi ka saM khyAHsaM khye ye/_grangs kyi mi zad pa A /

[\[129b.3\]]saM khye yeDa tsa ba hug NAta/_'gru mang po la grangs laDa tsa sta ba hug Na ma yin pa las so/_'bru mang po'i bsdu ba'i mtha' las grangs kyi sgra la ba hu dang gaN ma yin pa la Da tsa'i rkyen 'dug ste/_u pa ga taHda sha yeShAM te/_zhes pa la/_bshad ma thag pa'i mdo snga mas rnam dbye phrad dang 
[\[129b.4\]]bcas pa phyis/_u pa da shan/_zhes pa la/_mdo 'dis Da tsa/_tsu Tu sogs kyi tsa phyis/_Ti dbyi 'os an phyis/_Da de'i don yin pas phyis/_dzas/_u pad shAH/_ti pi _gang rnams byi de rnams nye bar 'gro ba bcu/_sha ti r+Ti ti/_biM sha ti'i Da 'gro ba la ti'o/_Da 'gro ba'i rkyen

[\[130a.1\]]s+ya/_zhes pa la/_u pa ga NAH/_'grol par lung drangs pa/_saM khyA yasA sta t+pu ru Shas+ya Datsa/_grangs la de'i skyes bu'i Da tsa'o/_/'bru mang por ma zad grangs la de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba'i mtha' las kyang Da tsa'i rkyen 'gyur te/_ni r+t+riM shataHaM gu li b+h+yaH/_zhes pa la/_rnam

[\[132b.1\]]dak+ShiNe rmA_/zhes pa mda' bsnun pa lta bu'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gzhogs rman pa can brjod pa la 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba tshig phrad do/_/pra sa m+ng+b+yaMdzAnu no dz+nyuH/_pra sam dag la dzA nu na gyi dzU'o/_/dbru mang po'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir nyer bskyur bra dang sam sngon du byung na/_dzanu na zhes pa'i sgra dz+nyu zhes par 
[\[132b.2\]{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gzhogs g.yas phul ba/_'gyur te/_brag te dzAnunI ya s+ya/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye phrad sogs bsdus/_dzAnu dz+nya ru 'gyur/_pradz+nyuH/_de bzhin du/_saMdzA nunI ya s+ya/_zhes pa la/_saMdz+nyuH/_'grel par lung drangs pa/_Ur+ng+hA dwi b+hA Sha/_Ur+ng+ha las yang na'o/_/Ur+ng+ha sngon ma'i dzA nun

[\[132b.5\]]ming zhes par 'gyur te/_yu ba gzhu srab pa'i/_ri dzA yA ya s+ya/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye phrad sogs phyis/_yA las A phyung A de ning du 'gyur nga rjes 'brel/_yu _Sha a nang du bskyur ng+ha nu an la su _na'i u pang+hA ring po hal sogs kyis su gyis _ming mtha'i na gyis _i ka gi a tsa la yaN byas ba'o _gzhu srab/_ba dzA ya ni/_su/
[\[132b.6\]]lo po byo R+l+ra yi/_bra y+ra dag gi lba la _gang gi chung ma dar ma/_la dA byi'o/_/byings dang byings ma yin pa'i 'ang ya srog med dang bra srog med dag lbal so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge gang rung pha ro la la dbyi ste/_yu badzAniH/_de bzhin du/_lak+Sh+mIHdzA yA ya s+yA so+o/_zhes pa la/_lak+sh+mI dzAniH/_gan+ng+h+ya s+yi du n+pU

[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]ung+gan+ng+ho yas+ya/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye sogs phyis/_a i ta du 'gyur/_ung+ga n+ng+hiH/_de bzhin du/_pU tiHgan+ng+ho ya s+ya/_zhes pa la/_pU ti gan+ng+hiH/_su gan+ng+ho ya s+ya/_zhes pa la/_su gan+ng+hiH/_sur b+hiHgan+ng+ha ya s+ya/_zhes pa la/_su ra b+hi gan+ng+hiH/_alpA khyA yAM/_chung 
[\[133a.2\]]du brjod pa la'o/_/chung _gang gi dri khyab ma/_du brjod pa'i don dang 'brel ba'i gan+ng+ha'i mtha' yang 'bru mang _dri khyab/_gang gi dri gtsang ma/_po'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir dri gtsang ma/_gang gi dri bzang po/_i ta du 'gyur te/_g+h+r-i _bri bzang /_gang gi g.yag gi dri ma/_ta s+ya gan+ng+ho ya s+ya/_g.yag dri/_zhes pa la/_g+h+r-i 
[\[133a.3\]]ta gan+ng+hiH/_u pa mA nAts+tsa/_nye bar gzhal ba la'o/_/nye bar gzhal ba'i don brjod pa can gyi gan+ng+ha'i mtha' yang ita du 'gyur te/_pad+ma s+ya -i ba gan+ng+ho ya s+ya/_zhes pa la/_pad+ma gan+ng+hiH/_pA da s+ya lo po nya ha di b+h+yaH/_hasti sogs _gang gi mar gyi dri/_rnams ma yin pa las pA da'i mar k+Shi dri/
[\[133a.4\]]dbyi'o/_/'bru mang po'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir ha sti la sogs pa 'di rnams ma yin pa las pA de'i mtha' dbyi ste/_byA g+h+ra s+ya bA do+o i ba pA do+o ya s+ya/_zhes pa la/_gang gi pang+ma'i dri 'dra ba/_rnam dbye phrad sogs dang bA da'i mtha' phyis/_byA g+h+ra pAd/_ha sti sogs la/_hasti 
[\[133a.5\]]naHpA do+o i ba pA do+o ya s+ya/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye phrad sogs phyis/_bA de'i mtha' mi dbyi/_ha sti pA daH/_gang gi rkang pa stag gi rkang pa 'dra ba/_de bzhin du/_ku sU la bA do+o ya s+ya/_zhes pa la/_ku sU la pA daH/_kum+ng+ha pA dI Shu tsa/_kunam+ng+ha pA dI Shu tsa/_kum+b+ha pA dI _stag gi rkang pa/_rnams la'ang ngo /_/'bru 
[\[133a.6\]]gang gi rkang ba glang po che'i rkang pa 'dra ba/_mang po'i mtha' ku m+b+ha pA da sogs la bud med du brjod pa na/_pA da/_glang po che'i rkang pa/_pad du 'gyur ba dang dIpa sbyin bas kum+ng+ha gang gi rkang ba skyog go pangI sogs tshig phrad du bya ste/_rkang ba skyog po/_kum+ng+has+yapA do+o i bapA do+o ya s+ya/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye sogs bsdus/_kum+ng+ha 
[\[133a.7\]]pA daH/_de bud med du brjod pa nam ngo 'dis/_kum+b+ha pa dI/_bum rkar ma/_de bzhin du/_gang gi nyang pa brgya rnams/_sha ta pA ngAHya s+ya/_zhes pa la/_shasha ta pA daH/_rkang ba brgya pa/_sha ta pa dI/_rkang brgya ma/_saM khyA su pUrba s+ya/_grangs _gang gi rkang pa bum pa'i rkang pa 'dra ba dag/_dang su snga ma'i'o/_/grangs kyi bu ma rkang /
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]sgra rnams dang nyer bsgyur su sngon na yod pa'i pA da'i mtha' yang 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir dbyi ste/_dwo+o pA do+o ya s+ya/_zhes pa la/_dwi pAta/_dwi pAd/_de bzhin du/_sa ha sra pA ngAHya s+ya/_zhes pa la/_sa ha sra pAta/_su bA do+o ya s+ya/_zhes pa la/_su pAta/_su 
[\[133b.2\]]pAd/_ba ya si dan+ta s+yad traM/_na tshod la dan+ta'i da tr-i'o/_/'bru mang po'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir na tshod brjod pa'i gang gi rang ba gnyis/_don dang _rkang pa gnyis/_'brel ba'i dan+ta ni su dang grangs sngon _gang gi rkang ba stong /_rkang ba stong /_rkang ba stong /_gang gi rkang pa mdzes ba/_du byung na da tr-i zhes _rkang mdzes/
[\[133b.3\]]par 'gyur te/_dwo+od n+to+o ya s+ya/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye sogs phyis/_ngan+ta da tr-i ru 'gyur/_r-i u ka 'gro ba la nuM gyi don/_dwi dan/_de bzhin du/_tsa twa raHdan+tAHya s+ya/_zhes pa la/_tsa tu rdan/_de bzhin du/_ShaT dan+tAHya s+ya/_zhes pa la/_Sho Dan/_su dan+tAHya s+ya/_zhes 
[\[133b.4\]]pa la/_su dan/_gang gi so dag gnyis/_da tr-il su _u ka 'gro ba rnams la nu m-i ra de'i don yin pas phyis _hal sogs kyis su phyis brtsegs pa'i mtha' dbyi 'os ra phyis/_so gnyis/_gang gi so bzhi pa rnams/_na tshod kyi don can _so bzhi pa/_gang gi so drug pa/_min na da tr-ir mi _so drug pa ste rta bong /_gang gi so mdzes/_'gyur 
[\[133b.5\]]te!_dwo+o _si mdzes te dar bab/_dan+to+o ya s+ya/_zhes pa la/_dwi dan+ta karI/_agrA ta shung+ng+ha shu b+h+ra br-i Sha pA rA he b+h+yash+tsa/_a gra an+ta shung+ng+ha shu b+h+ra br-i Sha _bA rA ha rnams las kyang ngo /_/a gra la sogs pa 'di rnams sngon du byung na 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir dan+ta ni da tr-i ru yang na 'gyur te/
[\[133b.6\]]kuD+mA la s+yA gra dan+to ya s+ya/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye sogs mche gnyis pa ste glang po che/_phyis/_dan+ta da tr-i ru yang na 'gyur bas/_kuD+mA lA gra dan+taH/_kuD+ma lA gra dan/_de bzhin du/_shat+ng+haHdan+to ya s+ya/_zhes pa la/_shut+ng+ha dan+taH/_shung+ng+ha dan/_shu b+h+raHdan+to ya s+ya/_zhes pa la/_shu b+h+ra 
[\[133b.7\]]dam+taH/_so dkar po/_shu _gang gi so gug ba'i rtse mo/_b+h+ra dan/_br-i Shas+ya dan+to ya s+ya/_gang gi glang gi so/_zhes pa la/_br-iSha dan+taH/_glang so/_br-iSha dan/_bA _so gug pa'i rtse mo/_rA ha s+ya dan+to ya s+ya _gang gi phag pa'i so/_gang gis gtsang ma/_zhes pa la/_so gtsang ma/_gang gi so dkar po/_bA rA hadan+taH/_phag so/_bA rA 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]hadan/_'grel par kyang gi sgras mU Shaka dang a hi gnyis las kyang /_yang na bar bshad pas/_mUSha kas+ya dan+to ya s+ya/_zhes pa la/_mU Shaka dan+taH/_mU Shaka dan/_de bzhin du/_u heHdan+to ya s+ya/_zhes pa la/_a hi dan+taH/_a hi dan/_ka ku da s+ya bas+thA yAM 
[\[134a.2\]]lo paH/_ka ku da yi _lag so/_na tshod la dbyi'o/_/'bru mang po'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir na tshod kyi don dang 'brel ka gang gi byi ba'i so/_ku da zhes pa'i mtha' dbyi phyi so/_byi so/_byi so/_ste/_a dzA to ka ku daM ya gang gi sbrul gyi so/_s+ya/_zhes pa _sbrul so/_sbrul so/_la/_rnam dbye sogs phyis/
[\[134a.3\]]ka ku da'i mtha' yang byis/_a dzA ta ka ku da/_a dzA ta ka kuta/_de bzhin du/_pUr+NaM ka ku daM ya s+ya/_zhes pa la/_pUr+Na ka kud/_bU r+Na ka kuta/_u dru b+hAM ka ku nga s+ya/_uta bi dag las ka gang gi tshogs nam gang ba/_kud yi'o/_/'bru mang bo'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir nyer bsgyur u ta

[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]ku zhes ba byung bas de phan gyi ga yin bas mi dbyi/_b+YUb+hor skaH/_de bzhin du/_pri yaHsarbiHya s+ya/_zhes pa la/_pri ya sar+piSh+kaH/_inaHs+t+ri yAM/_in las bud med la'o/_/'bru mang po'i bsdu ba'i mtha' can las bud med du brjod pa na ka ba rkyen du 'gyur te/_bahu daN+Di naHya smin de she/

[\[135b.1\]]ba'i skabs 'dir tshig sbyor gyi skabs rnam dbye bdun pa thob pa tshig gral bsgrigs kyi phyi ma la yod na bsdu ba tshar nas sngon du 'jog dgos kyang /_dmigs bsal in+ngu sogs ni phyi mar spo ba ma yin te/_i n+du mU lo+o ya gya/zhes pa la/_rnam dbye sogs phyis/_mU lo+o zhes pa la bdun pa

[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]sha kA shaM/_yang 'grel bar lung drangs pa/_ab+h+yartitaM tsa/_mchod pa la'ang ngo /_/mchod pa ste gus pa'i yul gyi rtags de sngon du 'jog go zhes bshad pas/_ta pas sh+tsapa r+pata/_zhes pa la/_ta pa sa parba to+o/_gus pa'i yul dka' thub pa sngon du byur ba lta bu'o/_/de 
[\[137a.2\]]bzhin du/_brAh+ma Nash+tsa ku she kA sha/_k+Sha tri yash+tsa bi Ta tsa shU drash+tsa/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye sogs bsdus/_brAh+ma Na k+Na tri ya biD+shU drAH/_yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/_b+hA tu r+j+ya las/_dka' thub pa dang ri bo dag/_spun gyi _dka' thub pa dang ri bo dag/_rgan pa'o/_/zlas dbye'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir spun rgan pa

[\[137a.5\]]yan lag dang /_gnyis dang cu dang /_bcu gnyis/_dpung gi yan lag rnams la bsdu ba'i mtha' la rnam dbye rnams khyi gcig tshig kho na 'jug pa shas che ste/_dan+tash+tsa oSh+Thash+tsa/_zhes pa la rnam dbye phrad sogs phyis/_mdo 'dis gcig tshig su/_dan+toSh+ThaM/_de bzhin du/_mAr+ng+daM gi kash+tsa/
[\[137a.6\]]pA Na pi kash+tsa/_zhes pa la/_mAr+d+ngaM gi ka pAN bi kaM/_ra thi kash+tsa a shwa ha stish+tsa/_zhes pa la/_ra thi kA shwa ta sdi+uM/_dzA taM re prA NinA/_srog chags sam _so dang mchu dang /_yin pa'i rigs rnams kyi'o/_/srog chags ma yin pa'i rigs rnams kyi_ rnga zlum dang 'khar rnga dang /_thun mong gi sgra 
[\[137a.7\]]rnams kun sdud pa don gcig _rnga zlum dang 'khar ja/_shing rta dang glang po che dang /_par 'gyur te/_ng+hA nA _shing rta rta glang po che/_tsa shaSh+ku lA tsi/_yos dang 'khur ba dang /_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye sogs phyis/_ng+hAnA shaShU li/_yos 'khur ba/_bi shiSh+Tha ling+go na ngI de sho nya grA mAH/_grong khyer ma yin pa'i yul 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]dang chu bo rnams kyi rtags tha dad pa'i 'o/_/grong khyer gyi sgra brjod pa ma yin pa'i yul gyi sgra dang /_chu bo'i sgra rnams kun sdud pa la don gcig par 'gyur te/_gang+gA tsa sho Na sh+tsa/_zhes pa la/_gang+rA sho NaM/_de bzhin du/_ku ru sh+tsa k+She+e traM tsa/_zhes pa la/_ku'u k+She traM/_rtags thad dam yin na kun 
[\[137b.2\]]sdud par mi 'gyur zhung /_gcig gcig sbyor bzlas dbye'i bsdu ba 'gyur te/_gang+gA tsa ya mu nA tsa/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye sogs phyis/_'dir kun sdud pa ma yin _gang+gA dang chu bo dmar po/_bas gcig tshig mi 'jug/_sba ngan dang zhing /_gang+gA ya mu ne/_grong _sba ngan zhing /_gi sgra brjod pa yin na

[\[137b.4\]]'gyur te/_yU kA tsa li k+ShaMtsa/_zhes pa la/_yU kA _dzAmU'i grong dang sA lU'i grong /_lik+ShaM/_ye ShAM tsa bi ro ng+haHsha shA ti kaH/_dzA m+bu'i grong dang sA lU'i grong dag/_gang rnams kyi gtan gyi dgra rnams kyi'o/_/srog chags gang dang gang gi gtan gyi dgra rtag tu 'khon pa rnams kun sdud pa don

[\[139a.1\]]kraMsh+Nash+tsa/_zhes pa la/_shu klakraMSh+No+o/_Ad+yash+tsa a ba sA naM tsa/_zhes pa la/_Ad+yA ba sAne/_ya dzatsa anu bA kyaM tsa/_zhes pa la/_yadzA nu pA kye/_u lU kha laM tsa mu sha laM tsa/_zhes pa la/_ngas _u lU kha la mu sha le/_ha rish+tsa ba sa lbAsh+tsa/_zhes pa la/

[\[139b.1\]]zhes pa la/_mi tra b.ru No+o/_Id g+niHsom ba ru Na yoH/_a g+ni'i som ba ru Na dag la I ta'o/_/zlas dbye'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir so ma dang ba ru Na dag pha rol la ag+na'i mtha' Ita du 'gyur te/_ag+neHsU t+s+to ma so mAH/_ag+ni las stuta sto ma so ma rnams so/_/zlas dbye'i bsdu ba'i skabs

[\[140b.1\]]d+yata sogs rnams la thams cad rnams kyi rtag tu'o/_/zlas dbye'i skabs 'dir t+yad sogs rnams la rtags gzhan thams cad rtag tu dbye ste/_sa tsa de ba dad+tash+tsa/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye tshig grogs dang bcas pa phyis_/to+o/_'grel par/_d+yad sogs gnyis tshogs pa la ni sngon ma dbyi'o zhes

[\[140b.3\]]pa brjod pa la/_gzhon _de dang gang dang /_nu ma 'am chung ngu ma yin pa ste bor ba'i gzhan ma _de gang dag/_rtags mo rtags rnams gnas shing rtags gzhan ma rnams yang na dbyi ste/_gA bash+tsa imAsh+tsa/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye sogs phyis/_go dbyi pa dang mi dbyi ba yang na bar byas pas/_imAH/_yang na _ga bimAH/
[\[140b.4\]]ga de bzhin du/_adzAsh+tsa i mAsh+tsa/_zhes pa la/_imAH/_yang na/_adza imAH/_grong du gnas pa ma yin na mi dbye ste/_ru rab sh+tsa imAsh+tsa/_bal rnams dang 'di rnams dang /_i mA ni i daM bud med du bsgrubs pa'o/_zhes pa la/_ru ru imAH/_phyugs ma yin na _ba lang 'di rnams/_ba lang 'di rnams/_'dus 
[\[140b.5\]]pa'i don yin kyang mi dbyi ste/_re rnams 'di rnams/_brAh+ma NAsh+tsa i mAsh+tsa/_ra 'di rnams/_zhes pa la/_brAh+ma Na i mAH/_gzhon nu yin [ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rung rnams dang 'di rnams dang /_na mi dbyi ste/_bat+sAsh+tsa i mAsh+tsa/_zhes pa la/_bat+sa i mAH/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]ru lu 'di rnams/_de rnams kyis zlas dbye'am gnyis gnyis 
[\[140b.6\]]pa'i bsdu ba rnams bshad zin to/_!_/da ni tshig sdud bram ze rnams dang 'di rnams dang /_bram ze 'di rnams/_bzhi po'i cho gci rigs thun mong du bshad pa las/_r-ig pUr b+ng+rAHpathA ma nak+She/_r-itsa pur ng+hur be bye rnams dang 'di rnams dang /_be'u 'di rnams/_pa thin rnams kyi ak+Sha ma yin pa las a pa'o/_/ng+hur dang

[\[143b.1\]]pas/_de yang ji skad du/_lum+ped ba sh+yamaHkr-i t+ye tuM kA ma ma na sor pi/_sa mo rA gi ta ta ta yorgAM sa s+ya pa tsi yuT+g+ha nyoH/_zhes pa byung ste/_de bod skad du/_kr-i ta la a ba sh+yam gyi ma dbye ste/_kA ma ma nas dag las dum gyi yang /_hi ta ta ta la sam gyi yang na ste/_mA sa'i a ni yuT g+ha nya la/_zhes

[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]peSha la sogs pa 'di rnams dang sbyor ba'i u dka 'ang yang na u da zhes par 'gyur te/_u dke na peShaM/_zhes pa la/_ung pe ShaM/_yang na/_u dka be+e Sha/_de bzhin du/_ud ke b+nga saH/_zhes pa la/_ud bA saH/_yang na/_u dka bAsaH/_ud ka s+ya bA 
[\[144a.2\]]ha naH/_zhes pa la/_u dbA hanaH/_yang na/_u dka bA hanaH/_u dkaMng+hi ya smin/_zhes pa la/_ud ng+hiH/_chu yis phye mar byas/_yang na/_ud kang+hiH/_e ka ha lA do+o pUr yi ta bye nyan+ya tar s+yAM/_dang _tshul gnas pa/_por hal _chu gnas/_chu gnas/_gcig pa la gang bar byed pa 
[\[144a.3\]]la yang na'o/_/gang ba'i don dang _chu thob pa/_'brel pa'i u dka dang sbyor ba'i tshig _gang la chu gter/_chu gter/_grogs de la tshig de'i yi ge dang po de hal/_chu gter gcig pa ste/_yi ge gnyis gsum brtsegs pa min na u dka nyid u da ru yang na 'gyur te/_ud ka s+ya pUr NaM 
[\[144a.4\]]kum+b+haM/_zhes pa la/_ud kum+b+haM/_yang na/_u dka kum+b+haM/_de bzhin du/_ud ka s+ya pU ra NaMpA traM/_zhes pa la/ud bA traM/_yang na/_ud ka bA traM/_yi ge sngon ma brtsegs pa yin na mi 'gyur te/_ud ka s+ya bU ra NaM s+thA lI/_zhes pa la/_u da ka s+thA lI/_chus gang ba'i bu ma gaman+tho+o 
[\[144a.5\]]da na sak+tu ba'i n+tu badzra b+hA ra hAr bI chu bum/_bang+ha gA he Shu tsa/_man+tha_chubum/_chus gang ba'i snod/_od na _sak+tu _ban+tI+u _badzra _b+hAr _hA ra bI _pa chu snod/_chu snod/_ng+ha _gA ha rnams la'ang ngo /_/man+tha sogs 'di rnams pha rol _chus gang ba'i snod/_la'ang ud ka ni ud zhes par _chu snod/_yang na 'gyur te/_ud 
[\[144a.6\]]ka man+thaH/_zhes pa la/_ud man+thaH/_ya nge na/_ud ka man+thaH/_de bzhin du/_u dkash+tsa o da naM tsa/_zhes pa la/_u do da naM/_u dkod naM/_u dken mi shri to sak+tuH/_zhes pa la/_ud sak+tu/_u da ka sak+tu/_ud ka s+ya bin+tuH/_zhes pa la/_u dbaMMn+duH/_u dka bin+duH/_u dka

[\[148a.1\]]zhes pa la/_shwAkun+daH/_shwa tsa b.rAhash+tsa/_zhes pa la/_shwAbarA haH/_shunaHputs+tshaH/_zhes pa la/_shwA buts+tshaH/_shu naHpadaH/_zhes pa la/_shwA bdaM/_pra ni ran+taHshare k+Shu p+la k+bA mrakAr+ya kha dir bI lduk+ShA b+h+yo saMdzA yA mi pa/_pra nir _an+tar _shar _ik+Shu _blak+Sha _A mra

[\[150a.1\]]hal mtha' can dang a ta mtha' las pha rol gyi bdun pa ni ming la tshig phyi ma la mi dbyi ste/_/ga bi yu d+hi b+h+yAM s+thi raHga bi yu d+hi dag las s+thi ra'i 'o/_/ga bi dang yu d+hi dag las pha rol gyi s+thir zhes pa'i sa ni Sha ru 'gyur ro/_/ga bi s+thi raH/_zhes pa la

[\[151a.1\]]she pha pu ts+tsha lA d+gu la rnams la'o/_/shwa na las pha rol gyi drug pa ni she pha sogs 'di rnams tshig phyi mar gyur pa la mi dbyi ste/_shu naHshe phaH/_shu naHpu ts+tshaH/_shu naHlU d+gu laH/_pu tre nya n+ya ta ra s+yAM/_pu tra la yang na'o/_pu tra tshig phyi ma la khros tshig
