[\[151a.6\]]bi tuHswa sA/_pi tr-i swa sA/_mA tr-i pi tr-i b+h+ya ma r+ya twa ra s+yAM/_me yi spun te sru mo/_mA traM pi tr-i dag la yang na'o/_/swa sr-i mA tr-i dang pi tr-i dag gi tshig phyi mar gyur pa yang na Shar mi 'gyur te/_mA tr-i Sh+wa sA/_mA tr-i swa sA/_ma li spun te sru mo/_pi tr-i Sh+wa sU/_pi tr-i swa sA/_rnam dbye ma phyis ma la Sha ra mi 
[\[151a.7\]]pha ya sbun te e bu'i/_/'gyur te dper brjod gong du bstan zin to/_/e ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trA t+sa mA s+sa mA b+hAH/_zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra/_na'i mdo las tshig sdud rnams rdzogs so//_ma'i sdun/_//de rnams kyis brda sprod ba'i bstan pa'i spun/_bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]'grel gyi go don dper brjod cho ga sogs zin bris si bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las/_tshig sdud kyi cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so//_!_//da ni ming las rang dang 'brel pa yis/
[\[151b.2\]]ming gzhan bsgrub pa de phan te/_/zhes pa'i de phan gyi rkyen rnams kyi 'jug yul bshad par bya ste/_/brA grI bya to \u0f85Na/_rtses pa las gong du ana'o/_/'og nas 'byung ba'i mdo de yis rtses so/_thul lo/_/rgyal lo/_/brkos zhes 'byung ba las gong du de phan gyi 'jug 
[\[151b.3\]]yul bshad pa de rnams la aN yang na 'gyur te spyir btang ngo /_/ta s+yA pa t+yaM/_de'i bu brgyud la'o/_/rtags gang dang gang la'ang drug pa'i mtha' las de'i bu brgyud kyi don la a Nal sogs pa 'gyur so/_/sa mat+dA nAM pra mA dwA/_yang dag pa'i don rnams kyi thog ma las yang 
[\[151b.4\]]na'o/_/yang dag pa'i don zhes pa bu brgyud kyi rkyen ster rgyu'i mi bde don 'ga' ba ma yin pa don mthun pa'i tshig bu brgyud sogs kyi rkyen ster yul de'i sngon na yod na'ang an la sogs pa rnams yang na 'gyur te/_u pa go ra pa t+yaM/_zhes pa ngag sbyor la rnam dbye phyis/_a 
[\[151b.5\]]pa t+ya'i don aN byin/_ta t+d+hi te Sha tsA mA deH/_de phan rnams la a tsa rnams kyi dang po'i'o/_/de phan gyi rkyen rnams la nya na rjes su 'phrel pa las rkyen ster yul gyi ming rnams kyi a tsa rnams las dang po de 'phel bar 'gyur te/_nye ba'i ba lang gi bu/_au pa gu/_an/_Na de'i don yin 
[\[151b.6\]]pas byis/_u'i yon tan nos/_u o/_e tsa'i a ya sogs kyi mdos/_au ba ga baH/_bud med du brjod pa na/_Ti ta D+ha sogs kyis dI pa/_au pa ga bI/_a pa t+yaM pau tra pra b+h+r-i ti go traM/_bu brgyud la bu'i bu la sogs pa rnams la rigs la'o/_/bu brgyud brdod pa can bu'i bu 
[\[151b.7\]]la sogs pa la rigs rtogs par byed pa la'ang an la sogs pa 'gyur ro/_/nye ba'i ba lang gi bu/_a \u0f7ako go tre/_rigs la gcig pa'o/_/bu brgyud _nye ba'i ba lang gi bu mo/_kyi rkyen rnams rigs rtogs par byed pa la'ang 'jug ste rkyen gcig pa zhes so/_au pa ga paH/_nye ba'i ba lang gi rigs/
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]-i taHi nya/_a ta las i nya'o/_a ta mtha' las bu brgyud kyi don la i nya 'gyur te/_dak+Sha s+yA pa t+yaM/_zhes pa dag sbyor la/_rnam dbye a pa t+ya dang bcas pa phyis/_mdo 'dis a pa t+ya gyi don i nya de phan rnams la sogs pa'i mdos 'phel ba/_nya de'i 
[\[152a.2\]]don yin pas phyis/_gang gi i ta la'ang ngos/_rtags mtha'i a phyis pas/_dA k+Sh-iH/_ya nyi nyo sh+tsa/_ya nya i nya dag _mkhas pa'i bu/_las so/_/bu'i bu la sogs pa brjod pa la ya nya dang i nya dag gi mtha' las pha ka 'gyur te/_ki ti tsa/_ka 'gro ba la'ang ngo /_/de phan 
[\[152a.3\]]gyi rkyen ka rjes su 'brel ba las kyang ming gi a tsa dang po de 'phel par 'gyur ro/_/dA k+SheH/_mkhas pa'i bu/_a ba t+yaM/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye a pa t+ya dang bcas pa phyis/_dak+Sha i nya'i rkyen can la mdo 'dis phag byin/_ka 'phel ba'i don/_pha A ya Nar 'gyur/_dA k+Sha ya NaH/_gargA 
[\[152a.4\]]di b+h+yo yanya/_garga sogs rnams las yanya'o/_garga sogs rnams las bu brgyud _mkhas pa'i bu'i bu/_kyi don la yanya 'gyur te/_garga s+yA pa t+yaM/_zhes pa la/_rnam dbye sogs phyis/_mdo 'dis yanya de phan rnams la zhes pas 'phel ba nya de'i don/_gang gi ita la'ang_mkhas pa'i bu'i bu/
[\[152a.5\]]ngos a phyis/_gA rgyaH/_de bzhin du/_pat+sa s+yA pa t+yaM/_zhes pa'i don la/_bA t+s+yaH/_yanya nyo sh+tsa/_yanya anya dag gi'ang ngo /_garga'i bu/_yanya dang anya'i rgyen ni rnam dbye rnams kyi mang tshig pha rol la 'jigs ste/_gA rgya dang bA t+s+ya/_la dzas/_yanya 'jig kyang don gnas so/_gargAH/_bat+sAH/
[\[152a.6\]]yang /_garga s+yA pa/_garga'i bu/_ti/_zhes pa la/_rnam _de nyid shin pa'i bu/_dbye sogs _gnyen gshin pa'i bu/_phyis/_yanya inya dag las sos pha ka_/ka 'phel ba'i don/_pha A yaN/_gang gi ita la 'ang ngos/_aphyis/_gA rgya/_A ya Na zhes gnas pa la/_A pa _gna'i bu/_gnyen gshin gyi bu/
[\[152a.7\]]garga'i bu'i bu/_t+ya s+ya tsa r+d+hi te nA ti/_bu brgyud kyi'ang de phan la u tam yin pa la'o/_/bu brgyud kyi rkyen pa yig ni hal srog med brtsegs pa'i mtha' yin na de phan gyi rkyen gzhan pha rol la rkyen gyi yi ge thog ma de A yig ma yin pa la dbyi dgos kyang skabs 'dir A yig yin pas ya mi dbyi 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]drangs pas/_gA rgyA ya NAH/_de bzhin du/_bA t+s+ya s+yA pa t+yaM/_zhes pa'i don la/_pA t+s+yA ya NaH/_ba hA di b+h+ya sh+tsa/_ba hu la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo /_ba ho la sogs pa rnams las bu brgyud la inya 'gyur te/_ba hu ra pa t+yaM/_zhes pa'i don la/_bA ha biH/_de bzhin du/_u 
[\[152b.2\]]pa bi n+dor pa t+yaM/_garga li bu'i bu/_zhes pa'i don la/_au _gnyen gshin gyi bu'i bu/_pa bi n+da piH/_gnyen gshin gyi bu'i bu/_u Du lo m+naHa pa t+yaM/_zhes pa la/_au Du lo miH/_'grel par/_u Du lo man la bu brgyud mang po'i don la a 'gyur mang po'i bu/_ro zhes bshad pas/_mer po'i bu/_u D+ya lo m+naHba hu 
[\[152b.3\]]nye [\[]ba'i thir [\]]pa'i bu/_sha khra can gyi bu/_a pa t+yA ni/_zhes pa'i sha khra can gyi bu/_nye ba'i thig pa'i bu/_don la/_u Du lo mAH/_zhes pa'o/_ba spu la das pa'i bu/_ba spu [\[]khangs [\]]pa'i bu/_u Du yo man la inya 'phel ba na'i de [\[]phan la 'os [\]]Ti phyis su/_ag+ni sha r+m+naHa pa t+yaM/_zhes pa'i don la/_A g+di sha rmiH/_su kr-i Sh+Na s+yA pa t+yaM/_zhes pa 
[\[152b.4\]]la/_kA r+Sh+NiH/_a rdzun s+yA pa _ba spu [\[]langs [\]]pa'i bu mang po/_t+yaM/_zhes bya ba la/_A rdu ni+uH/_su t+hA tu kang tsa/_ba spu la das pa'i bu mad po/_su d+hA tr-i'i a kang ngo /_su d+hA tr-il bu brgyud brjod pa la i nya 'gyur te mtha' a kang du 'gyur ro/_/su d+hA tuHA pa t+yaM/_zhes pa la/_dge ba'i me'i bu/_nag po'i bu/_rnam 
[\[152b.5\]]dbyi a pa _nag po'i bu/[ \[]sbing snub [\]]kyi bu/_t+yaM sogs phyis/_inya/_mtha' a _srid sgrub kyi bu/_ka dang rjes 'brel/_sau b+hA da kiH/_'grel par lung drangs ba/_byA sa b.rU D+ha ni ShA da tsa n+Da la piM bA nAM tse Sh+TiH/_byA sa/_ba rU D+ha ni ShA da tsa N+Da la biM ba rnams_legs 'dzin gyi bu/_kyi'ang 'dod do/_byAs srogs 
[\[152b.6\]]'di rnams la bu brgyud la i nya 'gyur zhing di rnams kyi mtha' a kang du 'gyur bar 'dod pas/_byA sa s+ya pa t+yaM/_rnam dbye legs 'dzin gyi bu sogs phyis/_inya mtha' a ga/_byAs ka_/inya/_na y+wA b+h+yAM pa dA n+hA b+hAM pU rbau tu tA b+h+ya mai tsa/_ya? wa? tshig dang po dag gi ma yin zhing de dag gi ai tsa'o/_/
[\[152b.7\]]de phan gyi rkyen 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can pha rol la rkyen ster yul gyi tshig de la ya yig dang ba yig tshig rgyas pa'i bu/_gi dang po dang nye ba can yod na 'phel bar mi byed cing de dag la ai tsa A ga ma ster te/_de'ang i tsa ni so sor bsdu ba yin pas ya yig yod na ai dang ba yod na au 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]ster te/_ka lA pa ra/_ya ba tshig dang po dag gi ma yin zhing 'phel ba A ga ma'i zhes byung ba dang gcig go/_/skabs 'dir ya yin pas ai byin/_bai yA sa kiH/_tshig sbyor sngon ma ltar byas pas/_bA rU D+ha kiH/_nai ShA da kiH/_tsA c+Da la kiH/_pai m+ba kiH/
[\[153a.2\]]go tre ku \u0f85\u0fab\u0f71 di b+h+ya sh+ts+lanya/_ku ny+dza sogs rnams las rigs la'ang ts+pa nya'o/_/kuny+dza la sogs pa rnams la bu brgyud kyi don dang rigs brjod pa la'ang ts+phanya 'gyur te/_ku ny+dza s+yA pa rgyas pa'i bu/_t+yaM/_zhes pa'am/_ku ny+dza s+ya go traH/_zhi dul can gyi bu/_nags kyi mi'i bu/_ga tu ma po'i bu/_di mI'i mdog 'dra ba'i bu ste shin tu 
[\[153a.3\]]dmar ba'i bu/_zhes pa'i don la/_ts+panya/_nya 'phel ba'i don tsa dbyangs don/_phe/_skabs 'gar a ya Nar 'gyur/_skabs 'gar A ya nar 'gyur zhes _glang po'i bu/_'grel par byung bas/_A ya nar 'gyur/_glang po'i rigs/_kauny+dzA ya naH/_prA ta ts+pha nyor s+t+ri yAM/_brA ta las ts+phanya la 
[\[153a.4\]]bud med min pa la'o/_brA ta sogs la bud med ma yin pa la ts+pha nya'i mtha' la rang don la ny+ya 'gyur te/_/brA ta la ts+phanya byin nas gong ltar bsgrubs pas/_brA tA ya na s+ya swA thraM/_zhes pa'i don la/_brA tA yA n+yaH/_de bzhin du/_kau ny+dzA ya n+yaH/_glang po'i bu'i rigs/_ny+ya da ya sta drA dzAH/_ny+ya sogs 
[\[153a.5\]]rnams de'i rgyal po'o/_/ny+ya la sogs pa'i rkyen rnams la de'i rgyal po zhes ming 'dogs byed do/_/ta dra dza s+ya ba hu Shu te ni bA sti y+waM/_de'i rgyal po mang po rnams la bud _th+wa ta'i bu'i rang don/_med ma yin th+wa ta'i bu'i rang don/_pa la de yis so/_gleng po'i bu'i rang don/_gong du de'i rgyal po zhes ming 
[\[153a.6\]]'dogs byas pa de rnams bud med du brjod pa ma yin pa'i rnam dbye rnams kyi mang tshig pha rol la 'jigs ste/_gong du ny+ya gyis bsgrubs zin pa/_brA tA ya n+ya dang /_kauny+dzA ya n+ya la/_dzas/_mdo 'dis/_ny+ya phyis/_brA tA ya nAH/_kauny+dzA ya nAH/_naDA di b+h+yaHphaka_/na Da sogs rnams 
[\[153a.7\]]las pa ka'o/_na Da sogs la bu brgyud dang rigs kyi don la pha ka 'gyur te/_na Da s+ya pa t+yaM/_zhes pa'am/_na Da s+ya go traM/_zhes pa'i don la_nA TA ya Na_drang srong na Da'i bu'am rigs/_de bzhin du/_tsA rA ya NaH_drang srong tsa ra'i bu'am rigs/_glang po'i bu'i rang don rnams/_A mu Sh+yA ya NaH/_drang 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]srong che [\[]zhe [\]]mo'i bu/_shi bA di b+h+yo nyan/_shi ba sogs la a Na'o/_/shi ba sogs la bu brgyud la aN 'gyur te/_shi ba s+yA pa t+yaM/_zhes pa'i don la/_shi baH/_r-i [\[]Sh+yAM [\]]ku ru b+h+ya sh+tsa/_drang srong a[\[]N+nyA[\]]ka pr-i ru Sh+na ku ru rnams las kyang ngo /_/drang srong gi rigs dang /_a[\[]n+dA [\]]ka'i rigs dang /
[\[153b.2\]]br-i Sh+NA'i rigs dang /_ku ru'i rigs rnams kyi bu brgyud la aN 'gyur te/_bu brgyud kyi rkyen rnams la ngag sbyor rnam dbye zhi ba'i bya/_drug pa dang /_a ba t+ya _zhes pa'i bu/_kho na sbyor ba ste/_sngon ma rnams kyis rigs 'gre'o/_/drang srong gi rigs la/_aN _bA shiSh+ThaH/_a Na [ \[]briM [\]]shrA mi traH/[ \[]an+d+ha 
[\[153b.3\]]ka'i [\]]rigs la/_a Na _shwA pha[\[] lkaH/[\] ]aN _rA n+yA saH/_br-i Sh+Na'i rigs la/_bA su de baH/_sA ha de byaH/_ku ru'i rigs la/_nA ku laH/_mA tu ru t+saM khyA si b+ha dra pU tsA yAH/_grangs sam b+ha dra sngon ma'i mA tr-i las u ta'o/_/grangs dang sam dang b+ha dra rnams snga _gnas 'jog gi bu/_sna tshogs bshes [\[]gnyen [\]]gyi bu 
[\[153b.4\]]ma'i mA tr-i las bu brgyud la _shwa tha lka'i bu/_ra [\[]n+h+yA [\]]ma'i bu/_a Na 'gyur zhing tr-i'i t-i u ta du _nor lha'i bu/_lhar bcas kyi bu/_'gyur te/_Nai mA tu raH/_rigs med kyi bu/_khA [\[]N+mA [\]]tu raH/_sA mA tu raH/_b+hA dra mA tu raH/_b+hA dra mA turaH/_kan+yA yA ka ni na tsa/_kan+yA gyi ka nI na'ang ngo /_kan+yA la bu brgyud la aN 'gyur zhing ka nA ne ke nI na zhes 
[\[153b.5\]]par 'gyur te/_kA nA naH/_s+t+rI+u D+ha ka_/bud med rnams las D+ha ka'o/_/dri m+na tr-i la a Na dang po [\[]'phel ba ti u ta ra'i a Na las ra la sos ra A ga ma/_ma gnyis kyi bu/_ma [\]]drug gi bu/_kun du ma'i bu/_mazang mo'i bu/_bud med kyi rkyen mtha' can rnams la bu brgyud la D+ha ka 'gyur te/_tsan+d+ra pa ra/_dI pa A pa ti Ung las 
[\[153b.6\]]so zhes ba dang gcig go_/bu mo'i bu sten la bu/_pi na tA yAHa pa t+y-i/_zhes pa la/_D+haka_/ka 'phel pa'i don/_D+ha/_e yar 'gyur/_bai Na te yaH/_de bzhin du/_mA te yaH/_yau ba te yaH/_yu [\[]tha nyi la D+haka[\]]/_shu b+hA de b+h+Yash+tsa/_shu b+h+ra la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo /_shu b+h+ra la sogs pa rnams 
[\[153b.7\]]las kyang bu brgyud la ma D+ha ka 'gyur te/_shau b+h+re yaH/_dkar po'i bu/_gad+ge yaH/_gang ga'i bu/_D+ha lo po \u0f85ka drAH/_ka drU ma yin pa'i D+ha la dbyi'o/_'dus byed ma'i bu/_ma he la D+haka_/sa phe bu ste mig dmar/_na chung ma'i bu/_de phan gyi rkyen D+ha pha rol la ka [\[]d+hU [\]]ma yin pa'i mtha'i u yig dbyi ste/_kA ma N+Da le ya ma N+Da la 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]shu b+h+ra sogs kyis D+ha ka mdo 'dis u phyis D+ha ma ya mu/_yaH/_ka d+hU la mi dbyi ste/_k+Sha dra be yaH/_gzar bu ma'i bya/_'grel par lung drangs pa/_baN+Do sh+tsa na/_paN+Du'i 'ang ma yin no/_D+ha'i rkyen pha rol la paN+Du'i u yang mi dbyi ste/_pA N+Da be yaH/_sbya po'am skya sangs kyi bu/_i ta sh+tsA ni nyaH/
[\[154a.2\]]i ta las kyang i nyam yin pa las so/_a ta las i nya'i zhes _ril ba can gyi 'u/_pa lta bu'i _kadrU la shu b+h+ra sogs kyi paD+ha ka 'phel gaD+ha e la u ta yon tan/_de phan gyi rkyen inya byin pa'i ita mtha' ma yin pa'i i yig mtha' las kyang bu brgyud la D+haka_bat+Du la shu b+h+ra sogs kyis D+ha ga D+ha i ya u yon tan/_'gyur te/
[\[154a.3\]]A tre yaH/_rgyan shes kyi bu/_nai d+he yaH/_nges 'dzin gyi bu/_ka l+yA N+yA dI nA mi nang /_ka l+yA NI la sogs pa rnams kyi i nang ngo /_/ka l+yA NI la sogs pa rnams kyi bu brgyud la D+ha ka 'gyur zhing ka l+yA NI sogs kyi mtha' i nang du'ang 'gyur te/_kA l+yA Ni ne yaH/_dge ba ma'i bu/_dzau br-i Ni ne yaH/_rgan ldan ma'i bu/
[\[154a.4\]]e tri dang ni D+hig mdo 'dis rtag 'phel baD+ha e ya gang gi mi ta la yang ngos i phyis/_dz+yi Sh+Tha ne yaH/_hr-i d+b+ha ga si n+d+h+wa n+he pU rba pa da s+ya tsa/_hr-i da b+ha ga si n+d+hu rnams mtha' la tshig snga ma'i 'ang ngo /_/de phan gyi rkyen 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can pha rol la hr-i ta _ka l+yA NI dang dzu bri NI la mdo'i D+ha ka dang mtha' iN dang rje[\[]sa phre la na'i a [\]]brjod don/
[\[154a.5\]]sogs 'di rnams tshig phyi ma yin zhing de'i sngon du tshig_rgan mo'i bu/_dz+yi Sh+tha la D+ha ka ma [\[]bar mi nang /[\] ]gzhan yod na tshig snga phyi gnyis kar gyi'ang a tsa dang po 'phel bar 'gyur te/_sau hA rdaH/_yid gcugs kyi bu/_sau b+hA gi ne yaH/_legs pa'i sring mo'i bu/_sau sain+d+ha baH/_legs ba'i se n+d+ha'iH/_'grel par lung 
[\[154a.6\]]drangs pa/_a nu sha ti kA dI nAM tsa/_a nu sha ti ka la sogs pa rnams kyi'ang ngo /_su [\[]hrid [\]]la de'i bu brgyud la sogs aN snga phyi gnyis 'phel ba/_su b+ha gi ni la bud med rnams las D+ha ka 'os D+ha ka mdo 'dis snga phyi gnyis 'phel ba/_su saM n+d+hu ba de'i bu brgyud la ngos a na mdo 'dis lda phyi gnyis 'phel ba/_a nu sha 
[\[154a.7\]]ti ka la sogs pa rnams kyi'ang de phan gyi rkyen 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can pha rol la tshig snga phyi gnyis kar gyi a tsa dang po 'phel bar 'gyur te/_a nu sha ri ka la de'i bu brgyud la 'os_aN mdo 'dis snga phyi gnyis 'phel ba/_A Nu shA ti kaM/[ \[]b+sha pal+yI la ga l+d+h+riNi [\]]la sogs pa rnams kyis i nang ngos D+ha dang mtha' i nang mdo 'dis bA phyi gnyis 'phel ba 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]T+ha i yu/_pA ra s+t+rai ne yaH/_ku la TA yA bA/_ku la TA'i yang na'o/_/ku la TA la bu brgyud la D+ha ka 'gyur zhing ku la TA'i mtha' i nang du yang na 'gyur te/_kau la Ti ne yaH/_kau la Te yaH/_tsa Ta kA yAHai ra ka_/tsa Ta kA las ai ra ka'o/_/tsa Ta ka dang /_tsa Ta kA gnyis las bu brgyud la 
[\[154b.2\]]ai ra ka 'gyur te/_pha rol gyi bud med kyi bu/_tsa Ta kA yAHa pa t+yaM/_zhes pa la/_tsA TA kai raH/_de bzhin du/_tsa Ta ka s+yA ba t+yaM/_zhes pa la/_tsA Ta kai raH/_yang 'grel _'byon ma'i bya/_'byon ma'i bu/_par/_tsa Ta kA bud med kyi rkyen can la byin pa'i ai ra ka ni rnam dbye mang tshig pha rol la 'jig ste/
[\[154b.3\]]tsaT kAH/_dzas a+wai ka phyis pa'o/_/go d+hA yAHD+hA ka_/go ng+hA las/_khug rta'i bu/_khug rta'i bu/_tsa Ta ka la/_ai ra ka ka 'phel ba'i don/_khug rta ma'i bu/_D+h+ra ka'o/_go d+hA las bu _khug rta yo'i bu/_brgyud la D+h+ra ka 'gyur te/_gau d+he raH/_cings pa'am dbyid mo'i bu/_'grel par lung drangs pa/_A ra gu dI tsI shar pa rnams kyi A 
[\[154b.4\]]khug rta mo'i bu rnams/_ra ka'o/_go d+hA las bu brgyud la shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta rnams A ra ka ster bar 'dod pas/_gau d+hA raH/_rtsangs pa'am dbyid mo'i bu/_k+Shu drA b+h+yo bA/_phra mo rnams las yang na'o/_/god+hA la [\[]D+h+raka[\]]/'phel ba D+ha e phra bra yu dag gi lbal la [\[]dbyi [\]]'os ya phyis/_phra mo rnams las bu brgyud la D+h+ra ka yang 
[\[154b.5\]]na 'gyur te/_yang na D+ha ka 'gyur ro/_/ko la Te raH/_'phyon ma'i bu/_kau la Te yaH/_b+ha ka d+ha e ya/_D+ha ka _dA se _god+hA la A ra ka_/'phel ba'i don/_raH/_D+haka _dA se yaH/_D+h+raka _kA Ne raH/_b+ha ka _kA Ne yaH/_pi tr-i Sh+wa pu sh+tsha Na/_pi tr-i Sh+wa sr-i las tsha tsha Na'o/_pi tr-i sngon ma'i swa sr-i las bu brgyud la che Na 'gyur 
[\[154b.6\]]te/_ku la Ta la D+h+ra ka 'phel baD+ha [\[]e y+ra bra phra [\]]dag gi [\[]pha las [\]]dbyi 'os ya phyis/_pai hr-i Sh+wa srI nayaH/_'phyin ma'i bu/_D+ha ki lo paH/_D+ha ka la dbyi'o/_/pi tr-i snga ma'i swa_zag ma'i bu/_si las bu brgyud la _bran gyi bu/_D+ha ga 'gyur zhing D+ha ka pha rol la swa sr-i'i r-i yang dbyi ste/_pai t-I Sh+wa se yaH/_pha'i sring mo'i bu'am a ni'i bu/_mA 
[\[154b.7\]]pi [\[]tri Sh+tha [\]]srel/_cha NaN 'phel ba'i don/_tshA I ya/_i ka gi a tsal yaN su/_pa'i sring mo'i bu'am a ne'i bu/_tr-i Sh+wa su sh+tsa/_mA tr-i Sh+wa sr-i las 'ang ngo /_mA tr-i sngon ma'i swa sp-i las kyang bu brgyud la tshaN dang D+haka 'gyur zhing D+haka pha rol la r-i'ang dbyi ste/_pi t-ISh+ra sr-il/_D+ha ka mdo 'dis r-i phyis/_D+ha e ya 'phel ba su/_mA 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]tr-i Sh+wa srI yaH/_ma'i nu ma'i bu'am sru mo'i bu/_mA tr-i Sh+wa se yaH/_ma'i nu ma'i bu'am sru mo'i bu/_rA [\[]dzar [\]]shwa su rA d+ya ta/_rA dza na shwa su ra las ya ta'o/_/rA dza na dang shwa sur dag las bu brgyud la ya ta 'gyur te/_rA dza n+yaH/[ \[]r+ts+ya labo phu[\]]/_shwa su rlaH/_mna' ma'i zha rA dz+nyo dzA tau ya ta/_rA dza na las rigs la 
[\[155a.2\]]mA tr-i Sh+wa sri la tshaN na la 'phel ba/_tsha I ya i ka gi a tsa la yaN su/_mA tr-i ShA sr-i la _D+ha ka krita la'ang ngos 'phel ba/_D+ha e ya mdo 'dis ri phyis/_ya ta'o/_/rA dzan las rigs brjod pa la'ang yata 'gyur te/[ \[]dra s+ya rA dz+nyaHjA [\]]t-i/_zhes pa'i don la/_rA dzan dang shwa sur gnyis la ya ta ta ta li de'i dus kyi 'os phyis/_ya ta su _rA dza nraH/_k+Sha trA d+l+haH/
[\[155a.3\]]k+Sha tra la g+ha'o/_/k+Sha tra la rigs dang bu brgyud dag la g+ha 'gyur te/_k+Sha tri yaH/_'grel par lung drangs pa/_k+Sha trA dz+d+rA hau inya/_k+Sha tra las rigs brjod pa la yang _rgyal po'i rigs/_inya 'gyur te/_k+Sha triH/_ku lA t+baH/_ku la las kha'o/_ku la'i sgra 'ba' zhig _rgyal rigs/_pa dang 
[\[155a.4\]]tshig gzhan gyi phyi mar gyur pa las kyang bu brgyud la kha 'gyur k+Sha tra las b+ha i ya/_rgyal rogs rgyal po'i bu/_te/_ku lI naH/_A D+h+ya ku lI naH/_a pU rba pa dA da n+ya ta ra s+yAM ya ta D+ha ka nyau/_tshig sngon na med pa las/_rgyal rigs/_ya ta D+ha ka nya dag yang na'o/_ku la las sngon na tshig gzhan med pa la 
[\[155a.5\]]bu brgyud la yata dang D+ha kanya dag yang na 'gyur te/_ku l+yaH/_kau le ya kaH/_khar [\[]sbyin [\]]ku rgyal rigs kyi bu/_ku[\[]ra la kha lnga I [\]]na/_phyug po'i rogs kyi bu/_lI naH/_ma hA ku lA da nya kha nyau/_ma hA ku la las a nya kha nya dag go/_/ma hA ku la las bu brgyud la a nya dang kha nya dag yang na 'gyur te/
[\[155a.6\]]mA hA ku laH/_rigs chen po'i bu/_ma hA ku lI _ku[\[] la la [\]]ya ta/_rigs kyi bu/_ku la la D+ha ka nya nya 'bel ba'i [\[]don [\]]d+ha e ya/_naH/_duHku lA ta D+ha ka_/du Sh+ku la las D+ha ka'o/_rigs kyi bu/_du Sh+ka la las bu brgyud la D+ha ka yang na 'gyur te/_dau Sh+ku le yaH/_du Sh+ku lI naH/_swa su sh+tsha/_swa sr-i las tsha'o/_sra sr-i las 
[\[155a.7\]]la nya 'phel ba'i don/_rigs chen po'i bu/_nya 'phel ba'i don ba I na/_bu brgyud la tsha 'gyur te/_sring mo'i bu/_sA srI yaH/_sA y+raM ya tsha tsha I ya mtshams sbyar/_b+h+rA tu r+b+ya tsU/_b+hA tr-i las bya ta 'ang ngo /_b+h+rA tr-i las bu brgyud la bya ta 'gyur _D+ha ka kang sel ba'i don D+ha e ya/_rigs ngan gyi bu/_kha I na/_zhing 'ang gi sgras cha yang 'gyur te/
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]b+h+rA tri byaH/[ \[]spun drA'i [\]]bu/_b+ha trI yaH/_b+h+rA hr-i la tsha tsha I ya/_bya n+sa pha t+ne/_dgra bo la byan la'o/_/b+h+rA tri las dgra bo'i bu brgyud brjod pa la byan 'gyur te/_b+hA tr-i byaH/_re ba t+yA di b+h+ya Sh+Tha ka_/re ba tI la sogs pa rnams las Tha ka'o/_/re ba tI la sogs pa rnams las bu brgyud la Tha ka 'gyur ro/_Tha s+ye kaH
[\[155b.2\]]b+h+rA tra la bya ta ta ni ta yi de'i dus kyi 'os don/_Tha'i i ka'o/_/rkyen gyi Tha ni i kar 'gyur te/_rai ba ti kaH/_nam gru'i bu/_A _b+h+rA tri la byan na dbyangs don su/_dgra bo'i spun bla'i bu/_shwa pA li kaH/_rta skyong ba'i bu/_a nr-i Sh+yA naM ta r+Ye bi dA di b+h+yo \u0f85nya/_drang srong ma yin pa'i rgyun ma chad pa la bid la sogs pa rnams las 
[\[155b.3\]]a nya'o/_/drang srong ma yin pa'i bid sogs las bu brgyud dang rgyun ma _re ba tI la _Tha ka _ka 'phel ba'i don Tha i kang 'gyur/_chad pa ste bu'i bu la sogs pa la'ang a shwa pA la la thaka ka 'phal pa'i don Tha i ka/_a nya 'gyur te/_bai daH/_rig byed kyi bu'i bu/_au rbaH/_ya ska di b+h+yo go tre/_ya ska la sogs 
[\[155b.4\]]pa rnams las rigs la'o/_ya ska la sogs pa las rigs brjod pa la a nya 'gyur te/_de rnam dbye rnams kyi mang tshig pha rol la dbyi'o/_yA skaH/_'khar ba'i rigs/_dzas la/_ya skAH/_'khar ba'i rigs rnams/_'di dang u rba la a nya nya 'phel ba'i don/_rba rlabs kyi bu/_de bzhin du/_lA h+yaH/_dzas la/
[\[155b.5\]]la h+YAH/_a tr-i b+h+r-i gu ku t+sa ba si Sh+Tha go ta mA d+gi ro b+h+ya sh+tsa/_a tri _b+h+r-i gu _ku t+sa _bsi Sh+Tha _go ta ma _a d+gi ras rnams las kyang ngo /_a tr-i _ya ska la a nya _nya 'phel ba'i don/_ya ska la _dzas _mang tshig la _a nya phyis rgyu mtshan med na zhes pas zung ngu /_la sogs pa 'di rnams las kyang rnam dbyi mang _thob pa'i rigs/
[\[155b.6\]]thab pa'i rigs rnams/_tshig pha rol la bu brgyud rnams 'jig ste/_dzas _a tra yaH/_dzas N+ya _b+h+r-i ga paH/_dzas N+ya _ku t+sAH/_ba shiSh+ThAH/_shas N+ya go ta mAH/_shas N+ya _a d+gi ra saH/_dza na pa da sha p+tA k+Sha tri yA da nya/_ljongs kyi sgra las rgyal rigs las anya'o/_/ljongs kyi sgra dang 'brel 
[\[155b.7\]]pa'i rgyal rigs brjod pa can las bu brgyud la a nya 'gyur te/_rgyun shes kyi bu rnams/_D+ha ka gyis pa'o/_dan spong gi bu rnams/_smad pa'i bu rnams/_gnas 'jig gi bu rnams/_regs mchog gi bu rnams/_yan lag skyes sam nyi ma'i bu rnams/_lnga len pa'i rgyal po'i bu/_pA ny+tsA laH/[ \[]pa ny+tsA la [\] ]a nya nya 'phel ba'i don/_kA li d+gaH/[ \[]kA ling+ga'i [\]]rgyal po'i bu/
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]hra swaM la g+hu/_thung ngu yang ba'o/_yi ge gang la dbyangs thung du zhugs pa de yang pa'o/_saM yo ge gu ru/_/saM yo ge gu ru/_yang dag par sbyor ba la lci ba'o/_yang dag par sbyor ba ste yi ge brtsigs pa pha rol na yod na de'i sngon ma'i dbyangs te thung ngu yin kyang de 
[\[156a.2\]]yang ba ma yin te lci ba'o/_dI r+g+haM tsa/_ring po 'ang ngo /_/yi ge gang la yang dbyangs ring po zhugs pa'am dbyangs ring po kho na'ang lci ba'o/_/a ni nyo ra nA r+Sha yo rgu rU po t+ta ma yo N+yang go tre/_drang srong ma yin pa lci ba mtha' nye ldan pa las rigs la aN inya dag ni Sh+ya nga'o/_drang srong 
[\[156a.3\]]ma yin pa brjod pa can gyi lci ba mtha' nye ldan pa las rigs kyi don gyi aN i nya dag gi mtha' ni bud med la Sh+yang du bsgyur bar bya ste/_da ni yang [\[]lo [\]]tsA pa po'i don dang /_Sha ni Shi ta la dI Sha'i don te/_kau mu da gan+d+h+yA/_bA rA hA/_a shwa pa t+ya di b+h+ya sh+tsa/_a shwa pa ti la sogs pa 
[\[156a.4\]]rnams las kyang ngo /_a shwa pa ti la sogs pa rnams las kyang bu brgyud la a Na 'gyur te/_aN_a shwa pa taH/_aN_gau pa taM/_aN _gA na pa taM/_di t+ya di t+ya di pa t+yu t+ta ra pa dA ta N+yaH/_ku mu da'i dri ma/_phag rgod ma/_di ti a di ti A di bya ba ti tshig phyi ma las N+ya'o/_/
[\[156a.5\]]di ti _a di ti/_A di t+ya rnams dang pa ti tshig phyi mar 'gyur pa las kyang bu brgyud la N+ya 'gyur te/_rta'i bdag po'i bu/_ba lang gi bdag po'i bu/_tshogs bdag gi bu/_dai t+yaH/_sbyin pa'i bu/_N+ya _a d-i t+yaH/_ma sbyin ma'i bu/_A dai tAH/_kun du sbyin ma'i bu/_N+ya prA dzA pa t+yaM/_N+ya _sai nA pa t+yi/_'grel 
[\[156a.6\]]bar lung dngas pa/_ya mA ts+tsa/_ya ma las kyang ngo /_ya ma las kyang bu brgyud la N+ya 'gyur te/_yA myaM/_yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/_de ba s+ya yanya _N+ya Na 'phel ba'i don /_A di t+yal_N+ya na 'phel ba'i don _nyal las ya ma rnams kyi ya ma dbyi 'os ya sngon ma phyis pa'o/_/skye [\[]rgu'i [\]]bdag po'i bu/_sde'i bdag po'i bu/
[\[156a.7\]]nyau/_de ba'i ya nya a nya dag go/_de ba las bu brgyud la yanya dang any+ha dag 'gyur te/_gzhin rje'i bu/_yanya dai byaM/_lha'i bu/_yanya dai baH/_yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/_ba he ShaHTi lo po yaN/_ba he Sha las yaN ste Ti dbya'o/_/ba he Sha las bu brgyud la yaN 'gyur zhing Ti'ang 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]dbyi ste/_bA h+yaH/_yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/_I ka ka_/i ka ka'o/_/ba hi Sha las bu brgyud la I ka ka 'gyur zhing Ti dbye ba 'ang ngo /_/bA hI kaHphyi'i bu/_u t+sA di b+h+yonya nya/_u t+sa la sogs pa rnams las anya'o/_/u t+sa la sogs pa rnams las bu brgyud la anya 'gyur te/
[\[156b.2\]]phyi'i bu'am 'di phyi rang la rang 'jug go/_/anya _au t+saH/_anya _au da pA naH/_s+t+wa puMsA b+h+yaM nanya sna nyau b+ha ba nA ta/_s+t+ri puM sa dag las dngos po la nanya snanya dag go/_bA+e heSha la I ka kra 'phel ba'i don Te phyis/_sti dang puM sa dag las dngos po brjod pa la rim pa bzhin nanya sna nya dag 'gyur te/_nanya _s+t+reNaH/_bud med 
[\[156b.3\]]pauM snaH/_de rnams bu brgyud kyi rkyen _chu lha'i bu/_btung ba'i chu'i bu/_rnams so/_/te na rak+taM rA gA ta/_de yis btsos pa'i tshos las so/_ngur smrig dang gur kum lta bu de yis btsos pa'i tshos brjod pa las gsum pa'i mtha' las aN 'gyur te/_ka ShA ye na ra k+taH/_zhes pa'i don la/
[\[156b.4\]]skyes ba/_bus la sna nya 'phel ba yang dag par skyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os sa sngon ma phyis pa'o/_/kA ShA yaH/_de bzhin du/_ku d+ku me na ra k+taH/_zhes pa'i don la/_aN _kau dU naH/_lA k+ShA ro tsa nA sha ka la ka r+d+daHTha ka_/lA k+ShA ro tsa na _sha ka la _ka r+d+da ma rnams las Tha ka'o/_/lA k+ShA sogs _ngur smrig gis bcos pa/_'di 
[\[156b.5\]]rnams las de yis btsos pa la Tha ka 'gyur [(]ta[,]te[)]/_lnga k+ShA _ngur smig gis bcos pa/_aN Na la 'phel ga_gur kum gyis bcos g.yA rak+taH/_zhes pa'i don la/_lA k+Shi kaH/_gur gum gyis btsos pa/_tshig sbyor de dang 'dra bar byas pas/_Thaka _rau tsa ni kaH/_Thaka _shA ka li kaM_'grel par/_sha ka 
[\[156b.6\]]la dang /_kar+ng+da ma dag las de yis btsos pa la aN yang na 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/_aN _kar+d+da maM/_aN _shA ka rgya skyegs kyis btsos pa/_lA k+ShA la Tha ka 'phel ba'i don Tha i ka/_laM/_'grel par lung drangs pa/_ni lA ta da na/_ni la lbang gis btsos pa/_shing shun gyis btsos pa/_'dam gyis btsos pa/_las a na'o/_/
[\[156b.7\]]ni la las de yis btsos pa la a na 'gyur te/_a na na dbyangs don/_ni laM/_rams kyi btsos pa/_yang 'grel 'dam gyis btsos pa/_par lung drangs pa/_pi tA t+ka tsa/_pi ta las katsa'o/_/shing gyis btsos pa/_pi ta las de yis btsos pa la katsa 'gyur te/_ser pos btsos pa/_pi ta kaM/_ka tsa tsa dbyangs don/
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]yang 'grel bar lung drangs ba/_ha ri dra yaHanya/_ha ri drA las a nya'o/_/ha ri dA las de yis btsos pa la anya 'gyur te/_hA ri draM/_na k+Sha tre Na yu k+taHkA laH/_rgyu skur gyi sbyor ba'i dus la'o/_/rgyu skar rnams dang zla ba ldan pa'i sbyor ba'i dus mtshon 
[\[157a.2\]]pa la aN 'gyur te/_pu Sh+yi Na yu k+taH/_zhes pa'i don la/_rnam dbye yu k+ta dang bcas pa phyis/_aN/_pau ShaH/_de la Ti D+ha sogs kyis ska ser gyis bcos pa/_anya nya 'phal ba'i don/_dI pa byin/_pau ShI/_rtags so so'i rnam dbye dang phrad pa'i lus 'gyur tsam ma gtogs tshig sbyor de 
[\[157a.3\]]rgyal dang 'dus pa ste rgyal gyi zla ba/_dang 'dra bar byas pas/_mA g+haH/_mA g+hI/_mchus nya ga_phA lgu NaH/_phA lgu N+Shi/_rgyal zla/_ts-i traH/_tsaitr-I/_yaN bA+e ga_bai shA khaH/_bi shA khI/_dzaiSh+ThaH/_n+ya 'gyis nya bste dkar phyogs kyi tshes bco lnga/_dzaiSh+bI/_A ShA D+haH/_aShA dz+nya la a ma dIng _A ShA D+shI/
[\[157a.4\]]shrA ba NaH/_shra ba Na la an dI ba/_shrA ba N+rI/[ \[]shra ba Da 'tha' na 'dA+e ga pa g+ha ka sha mdu'i D+ha ba/[\] \[]mag+ha la aN dA+e ga pha lku Na la aN/_dpo'i zA ga aDa rI gad po'i nya gtso tra la a ma nanya ba'i zla ga nag pas nya gas pa'i zla ga'i shA kha la aN/_sa gas nya ga snron gyi zla ba/[\]]b+hA dra pa dI/_chu stod kyis nya ga 
[\[157a.5\]\[]bro bzhin gyi zla ga_gro [\]]bzhin gyis nya ga_A shaThe naH/_a shwi ni la aN/_A shi nI/_tha skar gyis nya ga_kArti kaH/_kri ti ka aN dI pa/_kArti kI/_mgo'i zla ba/_mArga shi raH/_mA rga shi rI/_dr-i Sh+TaM sA ma/_mnyam par lta ba _khums stod kyi zla ba/_b+ha dra bad la aN/_la'o/_/mnyam par lta [ \[]spangs [\]]stod kyis nya ba/_b+ha dra ba dal aN dI ba/_pa'i 
[\[157a.6\]]don la gsum pa'i mtha' _za skar gyi zla ba/_la anya a shwi ni la aN dI pa/_'gyur te/_smin drug gi zla ba/_ba shi Sh+Tha na dr-i Sh+TaM/_smin drug gis ta ba/_mr-i ga shir kha aN dI/_mgo yis nya ba/_zhes pa'i don la/_bA shi Sh+ThaH/_pa ri br-i tor thaH/_shing rta yongs su kris pa'o/_/shing rta yongs su dkris 
[\[157a.7\]]pa zhes pa 'di'i don la bas+t+ra dang /_tsarma la anya 'gyur te/_pas+t+re Na pa ri draM to ra thaH/_shing rta gos kyis yongs su dkris/_gnas 'jog gis blta/_zhing pa'i don la/_gos kyis dkris/_bA staH/_anya nya 'phel ga anya nya 'phel ba'i don/_gnas 'jog gis blta/_de bzhin du/_tsA rma NaH/_pags pas dkris/_ta tro t+d+h+r-i tri pA tre b+h+yaH/
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]snod rnams la der blugs pa la'o/_/snod rnams las snod der blugs pa la bdun pa'i mtha' la anya 'gyur te/_sa ra be u d+d+h+r-i taM/_zhes pa'i don la/_sA ra baH/_saM skr-i taM b+ha k+ShAH/_zas legs par sbyar ba rnams so/_/zas legs par sbyar ba brjod pa las bdun pa'i mtha' la anya 
[\[157b.2\]]'gyur te/[ \[]b+h+rASh+DAH[\]]/_sA smin pau r+Na sA ti saM dz+hA yi/_de 'di la zla ba nya gang ba'i ming la'o/_de 'di la zla ba gang bste rdza phor du blugs pa/_thog mtha' _rdza phor du blugs pa/_mnya nya 'phel ga_rdzogs pa'i zla ba brjod pa la dang po dang bdun pa'i mtha' la anya 'gyur te/_pau ShI pau r+Na mA sI a smin/_zhes 
[\[157b.3\]]anya 'phel ba/_btsos ba/_ba'i don la/_bau Sho mA saH/_sA s+ya se ba tA/_de 'di'i lha nyid la'o/_de 'di'i lha nyid du brjod pa la dang po dang /_drug pa'i mtha' la anya la sogs par 'gyur te/_bu d+dA+o de ba tA ya s+ya/_zhes pa'i don la/_anya _baud+d+haH/_rgyal gyis nya ba zla ba nya gang ba'i 'di la/_de bzhin du/
[\[157b.4\]]tshig sbyor byas pas/_aN shai baH/_anya 'phel ba/_rgyal gyi zla ba/_aN ai n+d+raH/_bA rta sA t+yaM/_ka s+ye ta/_ka'i i ta'o/_don mang po la 'jug pa'i ka'i sgra lha brjod pa can la aN 'gyur zhing ka'i mtha' i ta gang gi lha sangs rgyas/_du 'gyur te/_gA yaM ha _sangs rgyas pa/_biH/_shu kru d+g+ha na/_shu kra las 
[\[157b.5\]]g+ha na'o/_/shu kra las de 'di'i [\[]zhibs[\]]/_lha brjod pa la g+han_dbang po pa/_phur bu pa/_gri ha snga til yanya 'phel ba/_'gyur te/_shu kri yaH/_bsangs/_so mA d+ya na/_so ma las ya Na'o/_/so ma las de 'di'i lha brjod pa la yaN_skye dgu'i bdag po/_/[\[]sha laaN [\]]ka [\[]ki ra 'gyur Na 'phel ba e tsa'i a la [\]]sogs/
[\[157b.6\]]'gyur te/_sau myaH/[ \[]thos la yaN Nal 'phel ba[\]]/_pA y+w-i tu bi tru Sha so ya ta/_bA yu r-i tu tr-i u Shas rnams las yata'o/_shu kra la g+ha nan dbyangs g+ha i ya/_bA yul sogs pa 'di rnams las de 'di'i lha brjod pa la ya ta 'gyur te/_bA ya byaM/[ \[]yo a lba r-i ta byaM[\]]/_dus ba/_u Sha s+yaM_gdung byed pa/
[\[157b.7\]\[]bsil ba ba'ang zla ba ga[\] ]pi tr-i la ya ta/_rIng ri taH/_r-i ta kyi rI nga'o/_/kri ta sogs kyi rkyen ma yin pa'i rkyen dang byings thams cad pa rnams dang /_tswi ba rol la r-i ta kyi rIng du 'gyur te nga dbyangs don no/_/ya rta pi taD+yaM/[ \[]pha mes pa[\]]/_rlung [\[]lhag pA phu dang ra tu la panya ta ta'i da'i dus u'i yon tan pha rol la la'i mtha' can no[\]]/_/
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]ag+neHD+ha ka_/ag+ni las D+ha ka'o/_ag+ni las de 'di'i lha brjod pa la D+ha 'gyur te/_A g+ne ya/[ \[]mes[\]]/_de ba tA dAM de tsa/_lha nyid la zlas dbye la'ang do/_/de 'di'i lha brjod pa la zlas dbye'i bsdu ba'i mtha' la anya 'gyur zhing 'ang gi sgras tshig snga phyi gnyis kyi a tsa'ang 
[\[158a.2\]]'phel bar 'gyur te/_ag+ni sh+tsa ma ru ta sh+tsa/_zhes pa la rnam dbye sogs phyis/_mdo 'dis anya snga phyi [ \[]ag+ni la D+ha ka ka 'phel ba'i don D+ha e pha gang gi yi ta ba'ang ngos [\]]i phyis/_gnyis ka 'phel ba/_A g+ni mA ru taM/_ne n+d+ra s+ya par s+ya/_i n+d+ra pha rol gyi ma yin no/_/zlas dbyi'i bsdu ba'i mtha' 
[\[158a.3\]]yin kyang i n+d+ra tshig _me lta dang rlung lta yang /_phyi ma yin na tshig ma la 'phel pa mi byed de/_sau man+RaM/_phyi ma zhes pa'i rnam bcad kyi i n+d+ra tshig snga ma yin na gnyis ka 'phel 'gyur te/_ai n+da g+naM/_dI r+g+dA ts+tsa ba ru Na s+ya/_ring po las kyang ba ru Na'o 'o/_zlas dbye'i 
[\[158a.4\]]bsdu ba'i mtha' yin kyang tshig snga ma'i mtha' a tsa de ring po yin na de'i pha rol gyi ba ru Na zhes_zla ba dbang bo pa/_som in+d+ra anya/_pa la 'phel ba mi 'byung ste/_en+d+ra ba ru NaM/_ta s+ya sa mU haH/_de'i tshogs _dbang pos pi/_la'o/_de'i tshogs brjod pa la drug ba'i mtha' las aN la sogs pa 
[\[158a.5\]]'gyur te/_kA kA nI sa mU haH/_zhes pa'i don la/_aN _kwa kaM/_tshig sbyor de bzhin byas pas/_bA na spa t+yaM/_s+t+ri Ni/_bud med kyi tshogs/_bau snaM/[ \[]b+ha nya aN[\]]/_dbang po dang rgyu lta ba/_b+hik+ShA di b+b+yonya [\[]NA[\]]/_b+hi k+Sha la sogs pa rnams la ana'o/_/b+hi k+Sha la sogs pa rnams las de'i tshogs pa brjod pa la drug 
[\[158a.6\]]pa'i mtha' la aN 'gyur _bya rog rnams tshogs te/_b+hi k+ShA NAM sa mu haH/_bya rog tshogs/_zhes pa'i don la/_ya ta aN/_shing shi chogs/_nenya aN/_skyes pa'i tshogs/_aDA _b+hai k+ShAM/_aN_k+She traM/_yau ba yaM/_ya ba til aN/_go tro k+Sho Sh+D+ro ra b+h+ra rA dza rA dza rA dza N+ya rA dza pu tra bat+sa ma nu [\[]Sh+D+ya dzA d+bu [\]]nya/_rigs yu k+Sha na_uSh+Ta_u ra b+h+ra _rA dza 
[\[158a.7\]]rA dza N+ya _rA dza pu tra_bat+sa ma nu Sh+D+ya a dza las bu nya'o/_/[\[]blod [\]]mo rnams kyi tshogs/_rigs la sogs pa 'di rnams las tshogs pa brjod pa la drug pa'i [ \[]slob pas[\]]tshogs/_zhing gi tshogs/_khad mo ma'i tshogs _mtha' la bunya 'gyur te/_nye ba'i ba lang rnams kyi tshogs/_o pa ga bA nAM sa mU haH/_zhes pa'i don la/
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]au pa ga ba kaM/[ \[]su a[\]]/_nya ba'i ba lang gi tshogs/_zhes pa rigs dang /_de bzhin du/_au k+Sha kaM/_sog can te glang gi tshogs/_au Sha kaM/_bu nya _au ra b+h+ra kaM_bu nya _rA dza kaM/_bunya _rA dza N+ya kaM/_bu nya _rA dza bu tra ka/_bunya _bA tA kaM/_bunya _mA ru Sh+D+ya kaM/_A dza kaM/_br-i d+d+h+ra ts+tsa/_bri d+d+ha las kyang ngo /_br-i d+d+ha las kyang 
[\[158b.2\]\[]o ba ga ba la bunya [\] ]nya 'phel ba'i don/_tshogs pa brjod pa la bu nya 'gyur te/[ \[]bu nya nya 'phel ba bu a ga na'i de ba na la'ang ngos gang shi i ta la rang ngos a phyis[\]]/[ \[]rnga mo bcos sa[\]]/[ \[]lto bral te bshan pa'i [\]]tshogs/_rgyal po'i tshogs/_rgyal rigs tshogs/_rgyal po'i du'i tshogs/[ \[]be'u'i tshogs/_me'i tshogs/_ba'i tshogs/_bA N+d+ha kraM/_kedA rA d+ya ny+tsa[\]]/_ke dA ra las yanya 'ang ngo /_/
[\[158b.3\]]ke dA ra las tshogs pa brjod pa la drug pa'i mtha' la bu nya 'gyur te ya nya yang ngo /_kaidA ra kaM/_kai dA r+YaM/_yu bor nA kau/_yu bu dag gi a na a ka dag go/_/rkyen gyi yu dang bu dag ni rim pa bzhin a na dang a ka dag tu 'gyur ro/_/rgan po'i tshogs/_br-i d+d+he la bu nya nya 'phel ba bu a ka su a ma/_'grel bar 
[\[158b.4\]]lung drangs pa/_ga Ni kA yAHyanya/_ga Ni kA las yanya'o/_ga Ni kA la de'i tshogs pa brjod pa [ \[]nya ba'i tshogs sam zhing gi tshogs sam nags kyi tshogs[\] ]la drug pa'i mtha' la yanya 'gyur te/_gA Ni kya/_Tha nya ka ba tsi na sh+tsa/_ka ba tsi na las tha nya yang do/_/ka ba tsi na dang ke dA ra las kyang tshogs pa brjod pa la drug pa'i 
[\[158b.5\]]mtha' la Tha nya 'gyur te/_kA ba tsi kaM/_go cha can gyi tshogs/_kai bA ri kaM/_zhing pa'i tshogs/_brA h+p+ra Na mA na ba bA na ba bA Da bA D+ya ta/_brA t+ma Na mA na bA Da ba las ya ta'o/_/brA t+ma Na sogs 'di rnams _rtsis mkhan gyi chung ma'i tshogs sam smad 'tshong ma'i tshogs las tshogs pa brjod pa la drug pa'i mtha' la yata 'gyur te/_yata _byA h+ma N+ya/_bram ze'i tshogs 
[\[158b.6\]\[]ka 'tshon la ta nyanya 'phel ba'i don pa'i gan 'di lan pa'ang ros na byis gang gi i ta la'ang ngos a phyis pa'o/_/a ta/_mAn byaM/_bA Da byaM/_grA ma dza na baN+b+ng+kus hA ye b+h+ya sta la/_brA ma/_dza na/_ban+t+nu/[\] ]sa hA ya rnams la su tal 'o/_/grwam sogs 'di rnams tshogs pa brjod pa la drug pa'i mtha' _ya ta ta tayi de'i dum gyi don/ la/
[\[158b.7\]]ta la 'gyur zhing ya dbyangs don dang tal gyi mtha' rang bzhin gyi mo rtags so/_/[\[]bram ze'i bu'i tshogs _nod ma'i tshogs/[\] \[]brong gi [\]]tshogs/_grA ma tA/[ \[]ta le TA 'a[\]]/_dza na tA/_skye bo'i tshogs/[ \[]gnyen nam rtsa [\]]lag gi tshogs/_ban+d+hu tA/_ta la NA pha_sa hA ya tA/_grogs kyi tshogs/_'grol 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]bar lung drangs pa/_ga dzA ts+tsa/_ga dza las kyang ngo /_ga dza las kyang tshogs pa brjod pa la drug pa'i mtha' la tal 'gyur te/_ga dza tA/_a tsi t+ta ha sti d+he no Sh+Tha ka_/sems med pa ha sti na d+hi nu las Tha ka'o/_/sems med pa dang ha sti na dang d+he nus rnams las tshogs pa brjod 
[\[159a.2\]]pa drug pa'i mtha' la Tha ka 'gyur te/_A bU pi kaM/[ \[]spang ba'i tshogs[\]]/_hA sti kaM/_Thaka_/i su su k+tA n+ta tA [\[]skaH[\]]/_is us u ka mtha' _glang po'i tshogs/_rnams las ka'o/_/rkyen is dang us dang u ka dang ta rnams [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]mtha' can las pha rol gyi rkyen Tha ni ka ru 'gyur te/_d+hai nu 
[\[159a.3\]]kaM/[ \[]zhon pa'i blu[\]]/_de bzhin du/_a b+wu pa la Na ka ka bsel ba'i don yin/[ \[]la Sha sdan ce'u nya snyig la Tha ka ka sel ba'i don pa'i ka na'i de na la'ang ngos na byis _gang gis a tala'ang ngos i byis a ma[\]]/_sA rba [\[]Sh+ki[\]]/_bar gsur gyi tshogs/_d+hA nu Sh+kaM/[ \[]ga bu'i tshogs[\]]/_'grel par lung grangs ba/_br-i tsha tA su [\[]sh+nA [\]]ta di b+h+yaH/[ \[]d+hai nu la Tha ga la 'phel ba thaka[\]]/
[\[159a.4\]]bri tsha ta su Sh+Na ta la sogs pa rnams las so/_/pr-i tsha ta dang su Sh+Na ta sogs rnams las kyang tshogs brjod pa la drug pa'i mtha' la Tha ka 'gyur te [\[]Sha ka pA r+tsha [\]]ti ka na [ \[]sa bi Sha las Tha ka 'phel ba Thaka_/rta nu Sha 'a Tha ka la phel ba Tha ka[\] ]Thaka _sau Sh+Na ti kaH/_tai ma d+gi la kaH/_nya chen po'i tshogs/_gau ny+dzi kaH/_tha ny+dza la Tha ka
[\[159a.5\]]sau kha shA yi kaH/[ \[]nu kha shA ya Tha ka[\] ]/sai d+na li kaH/_bA shA di b+h+yo yaH/_pA sha la sags pa rnams las ya'o/_/bA sha la sogs pa rnams_dri ba'i tshogs/[ \[]la [\]]tshogs pa brjod pa la drug pa'i mtha' las ya[ \[]rdus kyi tshogs/_ti ma rne ba Tha ka[\] ]/dmar ru mgo nag gi tshogs/_'gyur te/[ \[]la dA sh+yA[\] ]/
[\[159a.6\]\[]bde bar nyal ba'i tshogs las dmar ser gyi tshogs/_se sna le la d+ha/_/ya _bA tra/_ba tr-i N+ya[\]]/_U lonya pi/_U la 'ang ngo /_ba ta las tshogs pa brjod pa la U la'ang 'gyur te/_bA tU laH/_U la/_'grel bar lung drangs pa/_kha la go ra thA d+ya/_kha la go ra tha las ya'o/_/kha la _zhags pa'i tshogs/
[\[159a.7\]]sogs pa 'di rnams las tshogs pa brjod pa la ya[ \[]chu ba ni tshogs/[\] ]Da ba sbyar ba stir bzhin gyi mo rtags so/_/'gyur te/_ya _kha l+ya/_D+wa be tha chad dam ngan pa'i tshogs [ \[]la ga byA DA ba _ba la nga'i tshogs/_rlung gi tshogs[\]]/[ \[]ya _rath+yA/_Ta pa _shing ny+ta'i tshogs[\] ]i ni tra ka d+ya tsa sh+tsa/_i ni tra tsa rnams kyang ngo /_/kha la gor tha rnams 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]las tshogs pa brjod pa la rim pa bzhin i ni tA ka d+ya tsa rnams 'gyur te/_kha li n+Shi/[\[]ba lang gi tshogs sam rigs kyi tshogs/[\] ]go trA/_go sda la DA/_ra tha ka dra/_shing rta'i tshogs/_ta da s+y+raM pra ha ra Na mi ti kr-I DA yA N+NaH/_mtshon cha las de 'di la rtse bar byed pa zhes pa la Na'o/_/mtshon cha las de 'di la 
[\[159b.2\]]rtse bar byed pa zhes pa'i don la dang po'i mtha' bdun[ \[]tha can dam [\]]dan pa'i tshogs/[ \[]Sha la si nin e brjod don ri tan ma bzhes par dIr[\]]/[ \[]ratha la ka d+ya tsa tsa dbyangs don[\]]/_ba'i don can laN 'gyur te/_daN+daHpra ha ra Na ma s+yaM gr-I dA yAM/_zhes pa'i don la/_dan+Da la Na/[ \[]dA N+DA/_Na DA ga[\] ]de bzhin du/_mau Sh+Ta/
[\[159b.3\]]g+ha nyaH_sA s+yAM kr-I ye ti nyaH/_de 'di bya ba zhes pa'i g+ha nya la nya'o/_bya ba'i tshig sngon na yod pa g+ha nya'i mtha' las bdun pa'i don la nya 'gyur te/_sh+ye na pA ta la nya/_sh+ye na ti la s+ya bA te nye/[ \[]'di la mtshon chad thug paT skye bar byed/_sh+ye na ti la'i b+Tan nya la 'o[\]]/_/[\[]lcug pas rtse/_mu N+Ti la Na bsel ba TA ga_khu ru ba'i rtse [\]]
[\[159b.4\]]b+wa ta ha'i rkyen can pha rol la sh+ye na dang til dag la mu ma A ga ma 'gyur te/_ma ni ma 'gro ba a tsa'i mtha' las pha rol gyi don dang u brjod don no/_/[\[]nya TA ba_shrai naM pA tA[\]]/_de bzhin du/_tai laM bA tA/_snum thog_ta da d+hI te ta dwe da/_de brjod pa dang de rig pa'o/_/de brjod pa dang de rig pa'i 
[\[159b.5\]]don la gnyis pa'i mtha' la aN la sogs pa 'gyur te/_i[\[]N+d+rA [\]]da yaH/_i Sh+Ta byA ka ra NaM a r+hi te pA Ni r-i ShiH/_zhes pa'i don la/_bai [ \[]la lha bu na[\]]/_yA ka ra _til sngon ma'i pA ta la nya[\[] 'phel ba sh+ye na ti la'i zhes pa na baTA ba[\]]/_NaM pA Ni ni ri Shi tha/_de bzhin du/[ \[]i n+t+na [\]]da yaH/[ \[]aSh+Ta byA ka ra NaM be hi 
[\[159b.6\]]i n+d+ra sogs zhes pa'i brda sprod brgyad ni i N+D+ra ka ra Na bi bA byA ka ra Na shA ka TA ya Na b+y+ra ga ra Na pI Ni ni byA ka ra ma n+ta d+ha dra b+ha ka ra Na ba he tsha li byA ka ra Na ma nu dze n+d+ra b+y+ra ka ra Na rnams so[\]]/_dbang po [\[]sogs brda sprod brgyad klog pa brang spong bA NaM ba[\]]/_bA Ni ni r-i ShiH/[ \[]byA ka ra Na ma a na e A ga ma su ya ga[\]]/_brda sprod klog pa drang srong bA Ni ba/_zhes pa'i don la/_aN _bai 
[\[159b.7\]]yA ka ra NaM bA Ni ni r-i ShiH/_brda sprod rig pa dang srong bA Ni ba/_kra mA di b+h+yo bu na/_kra ma la sogs pa rnams las bu na'o/_/kra ma la sogs pa rnams las de brjod pa _dbang po sogs brda sprod brgyad rig pa drang srong bA Ni ga_dang de rig pa'i don la bu rda 'gyur te/_na dbyangs don bu a ka/_bu na kra ma kaH/[ \[]ru ma ba shes[\]]/
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]bu na pa da kaH/_ta da smi na sdI ti she ta n+nA m+ni/_de 'di na yod pa zhes pa yul la de'i ming la'o/_/de 'di na yod pa zhes yul gyi ming yang go bar byed pa'i don la bdun pa'i mtha' la aN 'gyur te/_u du m+ba rA Ni saM ti a smin de she/_zhes pa'i don la/
[\[160a.2\]]au du mA raH/_te na ni r+b+r-i t+taM/_tshig rig pa/_de yis rdzogs pa la'o/_/de yis rdzogs pa'i don la gsum pa'i mtha' la aN la sogs pa 'gyur te/_ku shu shA m+be na ni nr-i t+ta/_zhes pa'i don la/_kau sha m+b+Shi_na ga ti/_ta s+ya ni bA saH/_de'i _'di na u du mA ra rnams yod pa'i yul/_gnas la'o/_/
[\[160a.3\]]u du bya ra lod ba/_gnas su sdod pa la de'i ming la drug pa'i mtha' la a Na la sogs pa 'gyur te/_shi bA nI ni bA saH/_zhes pa'i don la/_shai baH/_a dU ra b+ha ba sh+tsa/_ngan sel gyis [\[]gangag [\]]mi ring ba grong khyer [\[]mdzod[\]] ldan/_ku sha mA la aN 'phel ba Ti ta D+ha sogs kyis dI ba/_nyid las kyang do/_/mi ring ba nyid brjod pa la drug 
[\[160a.4\]]pa'i mtha' la aN la sogs pa 'gyur te/_bi [{]ding [,]deng [}]shA NA ma du ra b+ha baM/_zhes pa'i don la/_bai di shaM/_aN 'phe ba/_zhi ba rnams kyi gnas/_zhi ba pa/_aN bsel ba/_dza na pa de lu ba/_ljongs la dbyi'o/_/gnas kyi don can gyi rkyen rnams ljongs brjod pa'i don yin na rnam dbye mang tshig la 'jig ste/
[\[160a.5\]]paM tsa lAH/_aN phyis pa'o/_/yul rnams kyi mi ring ba nyid/_ba ra NA di b+h+ya sh+tsa/_ba ra Na la sogs pa rnams yul mi ring ba/_las kyang ngo /_/ba ra Na la sogs pa rnams kyi mi ring ba'i don gyi rkyen rnams kyang rnam dbye mang tshig pha rol la 'jig ste/_pa ra NaH/_rigs nye ba rnams/_she She/_lhag ma la'o/_/gong du 
[\[160a.6\]]ljongs lnga len pa rnams/_bshad pa de rnams las nye bar sbyar ba la lhag ma don gzhan la aN la sogs pa 'gyur te/_tsa k+Shu ShA gr-i h+ya te/_zhes pa'i don la/_tsA k+Shu ShaM/_aN _shrA ba NaH/_aN _rA sa naH/_aN _sbA r+sha naH/_dzas la aN phyis pa'o/_/ta tra dzA taH/_der skyes pa las so/_/
[\[160a.7\]]der skyes pa'i don la bdun pa'i mtha' la aN la sogs pa rnams 'gyur te/_bcom brlag tu skyes pa/_ma thu rA yAM _ba lta bya mig_/dzA taH/_zhes pa'i don la/_blta bya/_aN su a mi/_mnyan bya/_myang bya/_reg bya/_bcom brlag tu skyes/_mA thu raH/_aN 'phel ba/_brA br-i Sha Sh+Tha ka_/prA pr-i Sha 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]las Tha ka'o/_/prA br-i Sha'i sgra las der skyes pa'i do na la bdun pa'i mtha' la Tha ka 'gyur te/_prA br-i Shi kaH/_ta tra baha baH/_de la dngos po la'o/_/de'i dngos po brjod pa la bdun pa'i mtha' la aN la sogs pa 'gyur te/_ma thu rA yAM b+ha baH/_zhes pa'i don la/_mA thu raH/_di gA 
[\[160b.2\]]di b+h+yo ya ta/_di sha la sogs pa rnams las yata'o/_/di sha la sogs Tha ka ka 'phel do na Thaka e ka_/dbyar skyes/_pa rnams la dngos po la ya ta 'gyur te/_ya ta _di sh+yaM/_ya ta _brgyi/_sha ri rA ba ya bA ts+tsa/_lus kyi cha shas las kyang ngo /_/bcom brlag nyid/_lus kyi cha shas _bcom baR+lag nyid 
[\[160b.3\]]las kyang dngos po la yata 'gyur te/_yata _da n+h+yi/_yata _kar+N+yaM/_yata _ha s+t+yaM/[ \[]auSh+Sh+yaM/[\] ]yata _pA d+yaM/_'grel par lung drangs pa/_ad+h+yA t+mA deHka_/phyogs nyid/_sde tshan nyid/_ad+h+yA t+ma la sogs pa rnams las Tha ka'o/_/a d+h+yA t+ma la sogs pa rnams las dngos po la Tha ka 
[\[160b.4\]]'gyur te/_A d+h+yA t+mi kaM/_A t+hi dai ba _so nyid/_rna ba nyid/_lag pa nyid/_mchu nyid/_rkang pa nyid/_kraM/_ai ha lau ki kaM/_ta ta A ga taH/_de las 'ongs pa la'o/_/de las 'ongs pa'i don brjod pa las lnga pa'i mtha' la iN 'gyur te/_mthu rA yAHA ga taH/_zhes 
[\[160b.5\]]Tha ka ka la 'phel ba Na eka_/nang pa nyid/_Thaka na a cu shar ka la sobs kyis snga phyi gnyis 'phel ga_pa'i don la/_mA thu raH/_lhag pa'i lha can/_'jig rten bde/_Thaka 'phel ba/_gnas nas 'ongs pa la Thaka'o/_/gnas nas 'ongs pa brjod pa la lnga pa'i mtha' la Thaka/_bcom brlag nas 'ongs pa/
[\[160b.6\]]'gyur te/_Thaka A paNi kaM/_so\u0f85 s+ya ni bA saH/_de 'di'i gnas la'o/_/de de'i gnas _bcom brlag nas 'ongs pa/_brjod pa la drug pa'i mtha' la aN 'gyur te/_ma thu raHpa ni bA so s+ya/_zhes pa'i don la/_mA thu raH/_te na pro k+taM/_des rab tu gsung ba la'o/_des rab tu gsung 
[\[160b.7\]]pa'i don la gsum _rang gnas nas 'ongs/_pa'i mtha' la aN 'gyur te/_b+ha ga ba tA pro k+taM/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu gsungs pa/_zhes pa'i don la/_aN _b+h+ra ga ba ti/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu gsungs ba/_'di'i gnas bcom brlag_/bcom brlag pa/_mA na baH/_mi yis rab tu gsungs pa/_kr-i te gra n+thi/_byas 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]pa'i gzhung la'o/_/de byas pa'i gzhung gi don la gsum pa'i mtha' la aN 'gyur te/_pA Ni ne na kr-i gra n+thaH/_zhes pa'i don la/_aN _pA Ni no gra n+thaH/_ta s+ye daM/_de'i 'dis la'o/_/de'i 'di zhes pa'i don la drug pa'i mtha' la aN 'gyur te/_u pa go ri naM/
[\[161a.2\]]zhes pa'i don la/_au pa ga baH/_ra thA d+ya ta/_ra tha las yata 'o/_/ra tha las de'i 'di zhes pa'i don la ya ta 'gyur _bA Ni bas byas pa'i gzhung /_te/_ra tha s+yedaM/_pA Ni bas byas [\[]kha ra [\]]gzhung /_zhes pa'i don la/_ra th+yaM/_grA mA d+ya kha nyau/_grA ma las ya kha nya dag go/_/grA ma las _nye ba'i[\[] ba [\]]yang red/
[\[161a.3\]]lhag ma la ya dang kha nya dag _nye ba'i ba lang 'di/_'gyur te/_grA me dza taH/_grA mA dA ga taH/_grA me b+ha baH/_zhes pa rnams kyi don la/_ya grA myaM/_shing rta 'di/_grA mI NaH/_na d+yA di b+h+yo d+h+ya D+ha ka_/na dI la _shing rta 'di/_sogs pa rnams las D+ha ka'o/_/na dI la sogs pa rnams las 
[\[161a.4\]]lhag ma ste skyes pa sogs don tshan gsum po de rnams _grong du skyes/_grong nas 'ongs/_laD+haka _grong nyid/_'gyur te/_grong ngam grong nas 'ongs sam grong du ba gro/_/ba nya nya 'phel don kha I nar bskyur/_nA de yaH/_chu klung du skyes sa mchu klung nas 'ongs sam chu klung nyid/_yA mu ne yaH/_chu bo ya mu na ru skyes sam ya mu 
[\[161a.5\]]na ma 'ongs sam ya mu na/_mA he yaH/_ma hI la D+ta la ka/_dak+Shi NA sh+tsa t+pu ra sa s+t+ra ka_/tak+Shi NA pa sh+tsA ta phu ras t+yaka 'o/_/dak+Shi NA sogs 'di rnams las lhag ma la t+ya ka 'gyur te/_D+ha ka ka la 'phel baD+ha e ya/_t+yaka _dak+Shi NA t+yaH/_t+yaka pA sh+tsA t+yaH/[ \[]dz+nyar las dz+nyar zhes ra phyis[\]]/_ya mu na la D+ha ka _/t+yaka _pau ra s+t+yaH/_d+Yu brA ga 
[\[161a.6\]]sa nas skyes sam sa nas 'ongs sam sa gzhi/_bA gu dka pra tI tso ya ta/_dib prA tsa a bA tsa _u dI tsa/_pra tI tsa las yata'o/_/di pa sogs 'di rnams las lhag lho phyogs su skyes pa'am lho phyogs nas 'ongs pa'am lho phyogs pa/_nub phyogs su skyes pa'am nub phyogs nas 'ongs sam nub phyogs pa/_shar phyogs su skyes pa'am shar phyogs 
[\[161a.7\]]nas 'ongs pa'am shar phyogs pa/_ma la yata 'gyur te/_yata _di byaH/_mtho ris su skyes pa'am mtho ri su nas 'ongs pa'am mtho ris pa/_ya ta _prA ts+yaH/_shar du skyes pa'am shar nas 'ongs pa'am shar ba/_yata _a bA ts+yaH/_nub tu skyes pa'am nub nas 'ongs pa'am nub pa/_ya ta _u dI ts+yaH/_byang du skyes pa'am byang nas 'ongs pa'am byang ba/
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]yata _pra tI ts+yaH/_a bya yA t+h+ya ba/_mi zad pa las t+ya pa'o/_mi zad pa'i nang tshan a ma i ha/_kwa rnams dang ta sil dang tral gyi rkyen mtha' rnams las lhag ma la t+ya pa 'gyur te/_a mA taH/_t+yab pa dbyangs do na/_t+yab _i ha t+yaH/_t+yab _kwa t+yaH/[\[]thi las [\]]skyes sam ci nas 'ongs pa'am ci/_t+yatha ta 
[\[161b.2\]]nub tu skyes pa'am nub nas 'ongs pa'am nub pa/_ta s+h+raH/_t+yab _ta tra t+yaH/_t+yapa neHd+h+ru be/_ni las brtan pa la t+yapa 'o/_/ni las brtan pa'i don la t+yab 'gyur te/_ni ya [\[]taM d+g+ru baM[\]]/_zhes pa'i _blon po'am blon po las skyes pa/_don la/_t+yapa ni t+yaM/[ \[]'di ma [\]]'di las skyes pa'am 'di nas 'ongs/_ai Sha mo h+yaH/_shwa so nya n+ya ta ra 
[\[161b.3\]]de las skyes sam de nas 'ongs pa'am de la/_de las skyes sam de nas 'ongs sam de la/_s+yI/_ai Sha mas h+yas _shwa sa las yang na'o/_/ai Sha mas sogs rnams las rnams las lhag ma la nges pa'am brtan pa/_t+yapa yang na 'gyur te/_nges pa'am brtan pa'am mi g.yo ga_t+yab _ai Sha ma s+t+yaM/_'di las skyes sam 'di nas 'ongs 
[\[161b.4\]]sam 'di/_t+yab _h+ya s+t+yaM/_t+yab _shwa sbyaM/_rlung las skyes sam rlung nas 'ongs sam rlung /_yang na/_ai Sha ma sta naM/_sogs te 'og tu 'chad do/_/br-i d+hiHya s+yA mA di sta d+b+r-i d+t+hi/_gang gi atsa rnams kyi dang po 'phal ba de 'phel ba'o/_/rtags gang gi'ang atsa rnams kyi dang po 'phel ba'i yi 
[\[161b.5\]]ge yod pa de la _kha sang skyes sam kha sang 'ongs sam kha sang /_'phel pa'i ming can zhes ming 'dogs byed de dgos pa ni 'phel ba las tsha'i zhes sogs kyi ched de/_br-id+d+hats+tsaH/_'phel pa las tsha'o/_/gong du 'phel ba'i ming can zhes pa rda chang byas pa de las lhag ma la tsha 
[\[161b.6\]]'gyur te/_gA rgye dza taH/_gA rgye dza taH/_zhes pa'i don la/_gA rgI yaH/_gA rgA'i bu 'am ga rga'i bu las skyes pa/_A ga ste yaH/_tsha I ya/_shA lI yaH/_t+ya dA dI ni tsa/_t+yad las sogs pa rnams kyang ngo /_t+yad las sogs pa rnams las kyang lhag ma la cha 'gyur te/_t+ya rI yaM/_tsha ta 
[\[161b.7\]\[]sha rga'i [\]]bu las skyes pa/_ga rga'i bu nyid/_gargya la tsha tsha I ya bu brgyud kyi tha na la A ma yin bzhes ya [\[]phyis[\]]/_ri bya'i bu'am ri bya'i bu las skyes ga rab du skyes pa'am rab nas 'ongs pa'am rag_dI yaM/_de las skyes pa'am de nas 'ongs pa'am de/_tsha ya dI [\[]yaM gang las skyes pa ma gang nas 'ongs pa'am gang /[\] ]de las skyes pa'am de nas 'ongs pa'am de/
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]bra t+ya yo t+ta ra pa da yo sh+tsa/_rkyen dang tshig phyi ma dag las kyang ngo /_/yu Sh+ma da dang a smad gnyis kyi da bor ba'i yu Sh+masma a sma dag ni rkyen pha rol dang tshig gzhan pha rol las kyang rim pa bzhin twa dang ma dag tu 'gyur te/_twa dI yaH/_yu Sh+Ya da a sA da la/_ma dI nayaH/_bdag 
[\[162a.2\]]las skyes pa'am bdag_/tshig phyi ma la/_twa t+bu traH/_ba d+bu traH/_b+ha ta Sh+Tha ka tshe sau/_/b+ha bta las Tha ka zhas dag go/_/b+ha ba ta las lhag ma la Tha ka dang tshas dag 'gyur te/[ \[]tsha I la[\] ]b+hA bat+kaH/_b+ha bta la tshas si ti tsa/_sa 'gro ba byod [\[]pa tha skyes pa'am kyodA[\]]/[ \[]ny+yad la sogs bzhes pas tsha shra sma tsa dang a sma bu 'gyur[\]]
[\[162a.3\]]la'ang ngo /_/rkyen sa 'go ba dang _khyod kyi bu/_bdag gi bu/_ya la sogs pa pha rol tu byung na rkyen ster yul gyi mang de la tshig ces ming 'dogs byed do/_/khyod las skyes pa'am khyod las 'ongs pa'am khyod/_b+ha ba ta la Tha ka ka 'phel ba is us uka ta sogs kyis Thaka_/dgos pa ni mtha'i dz+nya la rnams kyi dza sha rnams so/
[\[162a.4\]]zhes pas/_ta dar 'gyur ba'i ched yon no/_b+ha pa dI yaH/_i nya sh+tsa/_i nya las kyang ngo /_/rigs kyi don du byin pa'i i nya'i mtha' las lhag ma la aN 'gyur te/_ngA k+Shau b+ha baH/_dA k+Shau dza taH/_zhes pa'i don la/_i nya aN _dA k+ShaH/_k+Sha traH/_inya aN/_ga hA di [\[]b+b+yash+za[\]]/_ga ha la 
[\[162a.5\]\[]b+ha bta wa tshas sa ta dar [\]]'gyur ba'i don tsha I ya/_khyod las skyes sam khyod/_sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo /_/ga ha la sogs pa rnams las kyang lhag ma la tsha 'gyur te/_ga hI yaH/_mkhas pa'i rigs/_mkhas pa'i rigs las skyes pa/_mkhas pa'i rigs las skyes pa'am mkhas pa'i rigs/_rgyal po'i rigs las skyes pa'am rgyal po'i rigs/
[\[162a.6\]]dza na par yoHku ka tsa/_dzan par dag las ku ka'ang ngo /_/ga ha sogs kyi nang tshan dzan dang par dag las rkyen tsha _khang pa ru skyes pa'am khang pa nas 'ongs ba'am khang pa/_tsha I ya/_pha rol la ku ka A ga ma 'gyur te/_dza na kI yi/_mi'am mi las skyes pa/_par kI yaM/_'grel par lung drangs pa/
[\[162a.7\]]da ba s+ya bA/_de ba'i yang na'o/_/de ba las tsha pha rol la ku ka A ga ma yang na 'gyur te/_de ba kI yaM/_lha'am lha las skyes pa/_de bI yaM/_yu Sh+mad do ra n+ya ta ra s+yaM kha ny+tsa/_yu Sh+mad _dza na dang par la tsha tsha I ya ku ka A gam ka gnas kyi don u brjod don/_pha rol lam/_pha rol tu skyes pa'am pha rol nas 'ongs pa/
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]asmad dag las khanya yang na 'ang ngo /_/yu Sh+mad naa smad dag las lhag ma la kha nya yang na 'gyur zhing yang na aN dang 'ang gi sgras tsha yang 'gyur te/_ta smi n+naNi tsa yu Sh+mA kA smA kau_/de la aN la'ang yu Sh+mA ka a smA ka dag gau/_/khanya dang aN pha rol la'ang yu Sh+mad a smad dag ni

[\[162b.3\]]gcig tshig nyid la 'jug pa'i yu Sh+ma a smad [ \[] nya 'phel ba kha I na[\]]/_khyod dam khyod las skyes pa'am khyod las 'ong ba/_khyod dam khyod las skyed pa'am skyes pa'am khyod las 'ong ba/_bdag gam bdag las skyed pa'am bdag las 'ong ba/_bdag gam bdag las skyes pa'am bdag las 'ong ba/_dag lhag ma'i don gyi rkyen kha nya dang aN pha rol la tab ka dang ma ma

[\[163a.1\]]nai shi kAM/_Thanya 'phel ba Tha ika_/prA do Shi kaM/_Thanya 'phel ba ika_/shwa sa s+hu ts+Ta/_shwas las tuT+ra 'ang ngo /_/shwas las lhag ma la Thanya 'gyur zhing tuT A ga ma yang ster te/_shwas la Thanya/_tuT/[ \[]d+hA [\]]sogs kyis i tsa A ga ma/_Tha I ka_/shau ba sti kaM/_rlung ngam rlung las skyes/

[\[163b.1\]]kyi ngos te [\[]gongs byis ba'o/_sang pa nu t+naM/[ \]]gnangs pa rA ri tI/_yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/_brag s+ya ga lo ba sh+tsa/_pra ga'i ga dbyi ba'ang ngo /_/pra ga las dus brjod pa la t+na 'gyur zhing ga dbyi ba 'ang ngo /_/pra t+naM/_snga mo'i dus/_a bra pa sh+tsA di man/_a gra pa sh+tsa ta las i ma na'o/_a gra dang ba sh+tsa ta dag las lhag ma la i

[\[164a.1\]]'gyur te/_ma yaT _A mra ma yaM/_ma yaT_a ra ma yaM/_ma yaTu[ \[]da n+ta ma yaM[\]]/_'grel bar lung drangs pa/_e kA tsonya bi ma yaT/_a tsa gcig pa las kyang ma yaT 'o/_/rtags gang zhig a tsa gcig pa rnams las rnam 'gyur dang yan lag gi don la ma

[\[164b.1\]]bla k+ShA di b+h+yonya na/_bA k+Sha la sogs pa rnams las aN 'o/_/pA k+Sha la sogs pa rnams las 'bras bu brjod pa la aN 'gyur zhing dbyib 'ang ma yin te/_bA k+Sha s+ya pa laM/_zhes pa'i don la/_aN _p+lA k+ShaM/_de bzhin du/_A shwA t+tha/_o ranya/_u las anya'o/_/rtags u yig ring thung 
[\[164b.2\]]mtha'i can las rnam 'gyur la anya 'gyur te 'bras bu brjod pa la 'jig go/_/dzam+b+rA pha laM/_zhes pa'i don la/_dza m+ba'uH/_dza m+b+bAHbA/_dza m+bu las [ \[]b+ba [\]]k+Sha'i 'bras bu/_yang na'o/_dza m+bU las/_pA k+Sha'i 'bras bu/_rtag nas kyi 'bras bu/_aN su a ma/_'bras bu la aN 'gyur te/_dza m+bU'i 'bras bu/_dzA m+ba baM/
[\[164b.3\]]lu b+tsa/_dbyi ba'ang ngo /_/dza m+bU la 'bras bu'i don du byim pa'i aN yang na dbyi ste/_dzam bu'i 'bras bu/_an phyis pa'o/_/dza m+bu'i 'bras bu/_dzA m+ba baM/_dzam+bUH/_ha rI ta kyA di b+h+ya sh+tsa/_ha rI ta kI la sogs pa rnams kyi 'ang ngo /_/ha rI ta kI las sogs dza m+bu las aN 'phel ba u'i yon tan tan A tsa'i a ya ba su/

[\[164b.5\]]pa'i mtha' la thag 'gyur te/_dwa re ni yu k+taH/_zhes pa'i don la/_dau bA ri kaH/_sgo srung /_kA ru Ni _a ru ra'i 'bras bu/_kaH/_shau lka sha li kaH/_'grel yang brjod pa'i _a ru ra'i 'bras bu/_rgun 'brum/_don la'ang tha ka 'gyur ro zhes pa bshad pas/_swa sti t+ya haH/_zhes pa'i don la/_sau 
[\[164b.6\]]bsti kaH/_bde legs su byung zhes brjod pa/_sbro la nges par sbyor ba/_drA ra la Thaka drA ra sogs kyi ai tsa [\[]A ga ma Tha i [\]]ka/[ \[]Thaka 'phel ba Tha'i ika[\] ]/snying rje can/_sho gam gyi bal _n+ya gro d+ha s+ya tsa ke la s+ya/_n+ya gro d+ha'i 'ang gcig nyid la'o/_/n+ya gro d+ha'i 'ang tshig grogs gzhan med pa'i gcig_bde legs su gyur ces brjod pa/_nyid la de phan gyi

[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]zhes pa'i don la/_aN sel ba /_n+ya gro d+ha m+bU laM/_swA ga tA dI nAM tsa/_swA ga ta la sogs pa rnams kyi 'ang ngo /_/A ga ta la sogs pa rnams pha rol gyi swa la'ang ai tsa A ga ma 'gyur ba ma yin te/_swA ga te kaH/_swA d+h+wa ri kaH/_swA d+giH/_rang lus kyi bu/
[\[165a.2\]]byA DiH/_chong ba _byA+e ba hA ri kaH/_'grel par lung drangs ba/[ \[]n+yaM gro d+ha'i ratsa ba[\]]/_pa th+ya ti thi ba sa ti swa pa te D+ha nya/_ba thi a ti thi _ba sa ti swa pa ta la D+ha nya'o/_/pa thi la sogs pa 'di rnams la dngos po la D+hanya 'gyur _rang yongs pa/[ \[]lhag sogs kyis Thaka 'phel ba/_Tha i ka Shang gi tshon sbyin/_a ta ba i nya 'os i nya 
[\[165a.3\]]'phel ba rtsol ba can gyi bu/_lhag pa sogs kyis Tha ka 'phel ba la aika[\]]/te/_bA bre yaH/_A ti the yaH/_bA te yaH/_swA pa te yaH/_shwA de ri nyi/_shwA de ri nyi/_shwa na la sogs pa rnams kyi i nya la'o/_/shA na la sogs pa rnams kyi i nya pha rol la ai tsa mi 'gyur te/_shwa b+ha sta s+yA pa t+yaM/_zhes pa'i don la/
[\[165a.4\]\[]aN pa i nya mos e nya[\]]/_shrA ba stiH/[ \[]shwa gaN+D+wa T+D+ya nya tsa[\]]/_shwa [\[]gaN _lam_/ga[\] ]dge slong /[ \[]D+hanya _nya 'gro ba la 'phel ga _ga rdas ba/_D+ha e la su/[\] ]nyal ba/_las Tha nya 'ang ngo /_shwa ga Na las ga yo ba'i don la Tha nye 'gyur zhing 'ang gi smras Than yang ngo /_/shwa ga Ni tsa ra ti/_zhes pa'i don la/[ \[]ci gos can gyi bu[\]]/_shwA [\[]ga Ni [\]]
[\[165a.5\]]kaH/_shwa ga Ni kaH/[ \[]rgya'i gos [\]]can gyi bu/_pa dA n+ta s+yA ha ra s+yAM/_bad mtha'i yang na'o/_/bad mtha'i shwan sogs la de phan gyi rkyen 'phel pa'i rgyu mtshan can pha rol la ai tsa A ga ma yang na 'gyur te/_shwa ba das+ya i daM/_zhes _chu'i tshogs g.yo ba/_pa'i don la/_shau ba pa daM/_bsel ba Tha ika/
[\[165a.6\]]bya'i tshogs g.yo ba/_Tha nan dbyangs don Tha ika_/sh+w+ba pa da/_'grel par/[ \[]n+ya d+gul [\]]yang ai tsa yang na 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/_Nai ya [\[]d+ga [\]]baM/_yan lag mtshan ma can 'di/[ \[]n+yA d+ka baM[\]]/_su [\[]sarbA r+d+hA [\]]ta dza na ba da s+ya/_su sarma ar+d+ha _kyi'i rkang pa 'di/_aN i tsa A ga ma dang 'phel ba yang na bar bya ba'o/_khyi'i rkang pa 'di las 
[\[165a.7\]]aN ai tsa A ga ma dang 'phal ba yang na bar bya ba'o/_/khyi'i rkang pa 'di/_ljongs kyi'o/_/su sarba a r+d+nya_rnams snga ma las ljongs brjod pa la aN ai tsa dang 'phel ba yang na ba u'i yon tan/_aN 'gyur zhing rtags phyi ma kho na 'phel ba byed de/[ \[]lA len [\]]gyi ljongs ba legs pa/_su pA [\[]ny+T+ra laH[\]]/_aN rtags [\[]bye ma [\]]'phel ba su/_sarba pA ny+tsa laH/_lnga len 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]gyi ljongs thams cad/_ar+d+ha pA ny+tsA laH/_saM yo gA di sh+tsa/_yang dag par sbyor ba sogs kyang ngo /_/yang dag par sbyor ba ste rtags gang gi u pa d+hA yi ge gnyis sogs brtsegs pa yod la/_aN dang in pha rol tu byung na Ti dbyib sogs mi byed de/_tsA kri NaH/_'khor lo can gyi bu/_yA dz+wa naH
[\[165b.2\]]lnga len gyi ljongs phyed/_aN rtags phyi ma 'phol ba su/_na ma pU rbo\u0f85 t+yenya t+yenya ba rma NaH/_ba rman ma yin pa'i ma sngon ma las bu brgyud la ma yin no/_/ba rman ma yin pa'i ma yig sngon na yod na bu brgyud brjod pa la Ti mi dbyi ba ma yin te dbyi ba nyid [\[]tsa kri Na dang dz+wa na [\]]la aN 'phel ba Ti mi dbyi/_mtshod sbyin can gyi bu/_do/_/
[\[165b.3\]]sau sA maMH/_snyan tshig bzang po'i bu/_b+ha dra shra maH/_dge ba bzang bo'i bu/_ba rman ma yin pa zhes pas rnam bcad kyi ba rman la/_b+hA dra ba rmaNaH/_'grel par lung dngas ba/_karmA ta shI le/_ka rman las dang tshul la'o/_/ka rman las dang tshul brjod pa la aN 'gyur zhing Ti'ang dbyi bar bya ste/_kArmaH/
[\[165b.4\]\[]su sra man dang b+ha dra shra man la an [\]]'phel ba Ti phyis/_au k+Sha man pa t+ye/_au k+ShaM bu brgyud ma yin pa la'o/_/u k+Sha na _aN 'phel ba Ti mi dbyi/_go cha bzang po'i bu/_la aN sbyar ba'i au k+ShaM/_zhes pa bu brgyud ma yin pa'i glang nyid brjod pa la tshig phrad do/_/Sha b+du rba han d+h+ri ta rA dz+nyA maNi/_las kyi dad tshul/_ka chan la aN 'phel ba/
[\[165b.5\]]Sha sngon ma han d+h+ri dzan rnams kyi aN la'o/_/Sha yig sngon na yod pa dang han dang d+h+r-i ta rA dzan rnams kyi u pa d+ha'i a tsa aN phyi rol la dbyi ste/_glang /_auk+ShaH/_lha min 'joms byed kyi bu/_bA rta b+h+naH/_'dzin byed rkyal po'i bu/_d+hA rta rA dz+nyaH/_prA gwa ha ta Tha ka_/'dren pa las gong du Tha ga'o/_/
[\[165b.6\]]ra tha yu ga prA sad+ga la de 'dren no la'o zhes pa'i 'dren pa las sngon du don gang yin pa rkyen dmigs bsal med pa thams cad la Thaka rkyen du 'gyur ro [\[]glang gi bu[\]]/_u k+Sha N-i la aN 'phal kha u pa[\[] d+hA d+ye a[\]]/[ \[]br-i ta han [\]]la aN 'phel ba u pa [\[]d+hA phyis han gyi ha'i b+ha[\]]/_d+h+r-i ta dA dzan la/_aN 'phel ba u ba d+hA phyis [\[]su tu'i zhes pas ranyadza ta 'dus pa dz+nya[\]]/_zhes 
[\[165b.7\]]spyir btang pa'o/_ten dI kha na ti dza ti dzi taM/_de yis rtsas so brkos so rgyal lo thul pa rnams la'o/_/rtses so la sogs pa don 'di rnams las gsum pa'i mtha' la Thaka 'gyur te/_ak+ShaiH dI bya t-i/_cho lo rnams kyis rtses so/_/zhes pa'i don la/[ \[]aka 'phel pan mig/_A k+Shi kaH[\]]/_cho lo rnams 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]kyis rtses so/_/ku dA len kha na ti/_zhes pa'i don la/_kau dA li kaH/_sha ste Na dza ya ti/_zhes pa'i don la/_shwa sti k+ShaH/_shas+t+ri Na dzaM taM/_zhes pa'i don la/_shA s+t+ri kaH/_'grel par lung drangs pa/_b+hA ba pra t+ya yAM ni r+b+raM t+te i man/_dngos po'i rkyen mtha' ma tshar ba 
[\[166a.2\]]la i ma na'o/_/kr-ita sogs kyi/_ton tses brkos so/_/rkyen dngos _tog rtses bat+kos so/_/ku rA la Thaka 'phal ba Tha e ka/_mtshon chas rgyal lo/_mtshon chas rgyal lo/_/sha s+t+ra la Thaka 'phel ba [\[]Tha'i eka[\] ]mtshon chas Thul lo/_/[\[]sha s+t+ra la Thaka ka la 'phel ba Tha'i ika[\] ]/po'i don can gyi mtha' las tshar ba la i man 'gyur te/_pA ke na ni r+b+raM taH/_zhes 
[\[166a.3\]]pa'i don la/_pA ki maH/_bcos tshar/_bak+Shi ma t+s+ya mr-i pA ka ha n+ti/_bya nya ri dwags rnams la gsod do la'o/_/bya'i rigs dang /_nya'i rigs dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rigs rnams la gsod do la gnyis pa'i mtha' la Thaka 'gyur te/_bak+Shi Ni han+ti/_zhes pa'i don la/_bA k+Shi _bcos tshar/_kaH/
[\[166a.4\]\[]pa tsal [\]]dngos po'i don la b+hanya pA ka de la [\[]i mnan [\]]dbyangs don/_de bzhin du/_bya gsod pa/_shA ku ni kaH/_tai t+ti ri kaH/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gsod/_mA rgi kaH/_hA ri Ni kaH/[ \[]shA rad+gi kaH/_shA rad+ga la Thaka/_mA t+s+yi kaHpa/_nya gsod/_min ba Tha ka/_maini kaH_bya rnams gsod/_dak+Shin la Thaka 'phel ba na'i de phan la'ang ngos Ti phyis tha'i ika[\] ]/bya rnams gsod/
[\[166a.5\]]sa skr-i taM/_yang dag par byas pa la'o/_yang dag par/_ku ni la thaka_/mthing ril gsod/[ \[]ti N+te ta la Thaka 'thel ga_mr-i ga la Thaka/_sha ba gsod/_ha ri Na la Thaka/_khri sta nas le gsod/_ma rgyal Thaka 'phel Tha eka sbu rla ti Sh+ya sogs kyis byis/[\] ]nya chen po gsod/_byas so zhes pa'i don la gsum pa'i mtha' la Thaka 'gyur te/_Thaka_dA d+hi kaM/
[\[166a.6\]]sha b+da da rdu raM ka ro ti/[ \[]shab+dadang da rdur dag la byed do la'o/_/sha b+da dang da rdu ra dag la byed dol gnyis pa'i mtha' la Thaka 'gyur te/_shab+daM [\]]ka ro ti/_zhes pa'i don la/_Thaka_shA b+di kaH/_de bzhin du/_Thaka _dA rdu ri kaH/_dA rdu ri kaH/_d+ha rmaM tsa ra ti/_d+ha rma la spyod do la'o/_/d+ha rma la spyod do la [ \[]zho thas so[\]]/

[\[166b.1\]\[]ad+ha [\]]rmaMkaH/_asti NA staM di Sh+TaM ma ti/_asti NA sti di Sh+ta la blo gros la'o/_/a sti _nA sti _di Sh+Ta rnams la dang pa'i mtha' blo gros brjod pa la Thaka 'gyur te/_yang _A sti kaH/_nA sti kaH/_dai Sh+Ti kaH/_pra g+g+ti tA bya ta/_phan pa las sngon du yata'o/_/de la phan pa la'o zhes pas 
[\[166b.2\]]chos[\[] lha yin pa [\]]la spyod ba/_phan pa las gong du don gang yin pa de la rkyen dmigs bsal med pa rnams la yaT 'gyur ro zhes pa spyir btang ba'o/_/ta dwa ha ti ra tha yu ga prA so gaM/_ra tha yu ga med pa/_ston pa/_brA sa d+ga la de 'dren no la'o/_/ra tha la sogs pa 'di rnams la de 'dren no la gnyis 
[\[166b.3\]]pa'i mtha' la [\[]yata [\]]'gyur te/[ \[]rathaM ba [\]]ha ti/_zhes pa'i don la/_yata _rath+yaH/_shing rta 'dren pa/_de bzhin du/_yata _yu gyaH/_gnya' shing 'dren pa/_yata _brA so gyaH/_glang drug gis 'dren pa/_d+hu ro yata D+ha kau/_d+hur las yata D+ha ka dag go/_/d+hur las de 'dren no la yata dang D+ha ka dag 'gyur 
[\[166b.4\]]te/_yata _d+hu r+YaH/_d+hau ra yaH/[ \[]D+haka 'phel bad+ha el[\]]/_ha li tsa/_hal la'ang ngo /_/ra yig dang ba yig srog med kyi u ba d+hA i ka so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yod na hal pha rol la ring bor 'gyur ro/_/na b+ha ku r+tshu rAM/_b+ha ku ra chur rnams kyi ma yin no/_/b+ha'i ming can rnams dang shing 
[\[166b.5\]]rta'i 'khor lo gnyis kyis lcags 'dir 'dren pa/_kur dang tshur rnams kyi u pa d+ha'i i ka so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams tal pha rol la ring por 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/khaHsa rba d+hu rA ta/_satra d+hu ra las kha'o/_/sarba snga ma'i d+hu ra las de 'dren nol kha 'gyur te/_sarba d+hu rI NaH/_e ka d+hu [\[]rA lku ka[\]]
