[\[166b.7\]]sA+e ra las Thaka 'o/_/ha la dang sI ra las[\[] de 'dred no [\]]la Thaka 'gyur te/_kha phyis pa/_lcags 'ding gcig 'dren pa/[ \[]kha a'es/_Thaka_hA li kaH[\]]/_thong gshol 'dren pa/[ \[]ske ra las Thaka 'phel ba thaeka[\]]/_/sai ri kaH/_thong ba 'dren pa/_ta tra [ \[]Thaka [ \]]'phel ba/_shing rta [\[]'dren [\]]pa/_sA t+yuH/_der legs pa la'o/_/der legs pa la bdun 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]pa'i mtha' la yata 'gyur te/_sA ma su sA d+huH/_zhes pa'i don la/_sA ma n+yaM/_sA ma n+yaM/_de bzhin du/_karma D+yaH/_ka rma nas yata/_sa b+hA las ya'o/_/sa b+hA la der legs pa la ya 'gyur te/_sa b+h+yaH/[ \[]'du khang [\]]ngam tshogs khang legs pa/_sa mA na [\[]tI rbe bA mi[\]]/_sa mA na 
[\[167a.2\]]ti r+tha la gnas pa la'o/_/sa mA na tI r+tha las/_snyan tshig rnams la legs pa/_bdun pa'i su ba/_snyan tshig legs pa/_sA man ba taya/_las legs pa'am las su rung ba/_der gnas pa la bdun pa'i mtha' la ya 'gyur te/_sa mA na tI r+the bA si/_zhes _sa b+ha la yaH/_pa'i don la/_sa tI r+th+yaH/_sa mA no da re sha yi taH/_sa mA 
[\[167a.3\]]ni u dar la nyal ba la'o/_/sa mA na u dar la nyal ba'i don la ya 'gyur te/_sa mA nod re sha yi te/_zhes pa'i don la/_sa mA no da r+YaH/_so da rA d+yaH/_so dar las _bsti gnas mtshungs par gnas/_sa mA [\[]na tI tha la ya mA na'i sa 'os sa sa ma nas[\]]/_bsti gnas mtshungs par gnas/_ya'o/_/sa mA na 
[\[167a.4\]]sar 'gyur bas so dar las kyang nyal ba la ya 'gyur te/[ \[]ya so da r+YaH/_agrA _lto mtshangs pa la nyal pa/_lto mtshungs pa la nyal ba ste spun bla[\]]/_d+ya ta/_a gra las ya ta'o/_/a gra las gdongs po brjod pa la ya ta 'gyur te/_a gre b+ha baH/_zhes pa'i don la/_yata _a g+r+yaH/_g+ha tshau tsa/_g+ha 
[\[167a.5\]]tsha dag kyang ngo /_/a gra las dngos po brjod pa la g+ha dang tsha/_lto mtshungs pa la nyal ba/_dag kyang 'gyur te/_a gri yaH/_a grI yaH/_ta smo hi taM/_de'i ches du phan pa la'o/_/de'i ched du phan pa'i don la bzhi ba'i mtha' la _rtse mo nyid/_tsha 'gyur [\[]te/[\] ]sbu r+YA ya hi taM/_rtse mo/_zhes pa'i don 
[\[167a.6\]]la/[ \[]sU rI yaH/_sha rI rA pa ya bA d+ya ta/_lus kyi cha shas la ya ta'o/_/lus kyi cha shas la phan pa'i _g+ha i ya/_rtse mo nyid/_tsha I ya/_don la bzhi pa'i mtha' la yata 'gyur te/_dan+tA ya hi taM/_zhes pa'i don la/_yata _dan+t+yaM/_de bzhin du/_yata [ \[]o Sh+th+yaM[\]]/_nyi ma'i ched [\[]du phan pa[\]]/_yata _nA byaM/
[\[167a.7\]]shi ma la phan pa/[ \[]sgu r+Ya la tsha tsha'i sI ya sU r+Ya tI Sh+ya sogs kyis ya skyis[\]]/[ \[]A d+man bi [\]]shwa dzan b+ho got+ta ra ba dA t+khaH/_b+hog tshig phyi ma dang A t+man bi shwa dza na las kha'o/_/rtags gang gi'ang b+ho ga tshig phyi mar _so yi ched du phan pa/_gyur pa dang /_so la phan pa/_A t+ma na bi [ \[]ma chu la [\]]phan pa/_shwa dzan rnams las _lte ba la phan pa/
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]phan pa'i don la bzhi ba'i mtha' la kha 'gyur te/[ \[]mA tr-i b+ho g+thi nasaH/_pi tr-i b+ho gI naH/_kha kha a+win/_ba n+hu b+ho g+ShinaH/_bi shwa dza ni nyaH/_kha kha'i I na/_A t+man la kha[\]]/_A d+mA d+hA nai khe/_a+da t+man [ \[]a d+h+rAn dag kha la'o[\]]/_/A t+man dang /[ \[]a d+h+wAn dag gi T+ri khi pha[\]] rol la dbyi ba ma yin te/_A t+ma nI naH/
[\[167b.2\]]te na krI taM/_des nyos pa la'o/_/des _ma'i longs spyod la phan pa/_kha kha'i [\[]A+e na[\]]/[ \[]pha ro longs [\]]spyod la phan pa/_gnyen gyi _longs spyod la phan pa/_skyi po sna tshogs la phan pa/_nyos pa'i don la gsum pa'i mtha' la Thaka 'gyur te/_sa b+ta t+yA gri taH/_zhes pa'i don la/_sA b+ha ti kaH/_A t+man la kha kha'i In Ti mi dbyi/_bdag nyid la 
[\[167b.3\]]phan pa/_sa khyA yA ya ti sha dan+tA yAHkan/_ti shata kyi mtha' can ma yin pa'i grangs las ka na'o/_/sa n+ta ti dang tsa twA riM sha bu ti dang shata kyi mtha' can ma yin pa'i grangs las nyos pa sogs _bdun cu yis nyos pa/[ \[]ab+ta tel _Thaka 'phel ba Tha yin/[\]]/bdun cu yis nyos pa/_la ka na 'gyur te/_bany+tsa 
[\[167b.4\]]b+hiH_krI taH/_zhes pa'i don la/_bany+tsa kaH/_lnga yis nyos pa'am lnga pa/_ti dang shata mtha' can la/_A shI ti kaH/_tsA twA riM shat+kaH/_bzhi bcus nyos pa'am bzhi bcu pa/_ba to riDA/_ba tu'i iT yang na'o/_/ba tu'i rkyen mtha' can las kyang nyos pa sogs la kan 'byung te iT yang na'o/_/
[\[167b.5\]]lnga yis nyos pa/[ \[]ba ny+tsa na la _kan ming mtha'i na phyis[\] ]tA ba ti kaH/_de srid/_tA ba t+gaH/_a shi til des nyos bzhes pas Thaka 'phel pa Tha ika/_brgyad cu nyos pa'am brgyad cu/[ \[]tsa t+dAM ri sha ta la [\] ]des nyos pa zhes pas Thaka ka 'phel ba is us sogs kyi mdos Thaka_/[\[]biM sha triM sha d+sh+d+y+wa T+Shu na saM r+d+nyA yAM[\]]/_biM sha ti triM shata dag las [\[]ming ma yin pa Du na'o[\]]
[\[167b.6\]]biM sha ti dang triM shata [ \[]nyata la ba tu tA ba ta ka na ika [\] ]sa rba sogs A/[ \[]ta ba ta la kan[\]]/[ \[]de sis[\]]/_dag las ming ma yin pa la nyos sogs kyi don la Dun 'gyur te/_biM sha kaH/_nyi shu ba/_tring sha kaH/_sha tA ts+tsa Tha n+ya tA ba sha te/_shata las kyang Than ya ta dag ste sha ta ma yin pa la'o/_/sha ta gzhan brjod pa ma 
[\[167b.7\]]yin pa'i nyos pa'i don kho na brjod pa'i sha ta las kyang nyos pa'i bing sha ti la [\[]DUn Da [\]]'gro ba la thing sha dbyi 'os ti phyis [\[]Da de'i don gus [\]]ka gang gi [\[]inya gyi'ang ngos [\]]a phyis/_don la Than sum cu ba/[ \[]trid shad la DUnaDa 'gro ba la Ti phyis bu aka [\]]dang yata dag 'gyur te/_sha te na kr-I taH/[ \[]brgya yis nyos pa[\]]/_zhes pa'i don la/_yata _sha 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]t+yaH/_than _sha ti kaH/_nyos ba'i don ma yin na mi 'gyur te/_sha taM ba ri mA NaM/_zhes pa'i don la/_sha ta kaH/_ta s+yeM shwa raH/_de'i dbang phyug la'o/_/sa [\[]rba bU [\]\[] dang pr-i bli_ bri [\]]dag las dbang phyug gi don la drug pa'i mtha' ma aN an 'gyur te/[ \[]sa rba b+hu me [\]]rI shwaraH/
[\[168a.2\]]zhes pa'i don la/_swa rba [ \[]brgya yis [\]]nyal ba/[ \[]b+hU maH[\]]/_de bzhin du/_bA[\[] r+thi baH[\]]/_te na tu l+yaM/[ \[]brgya li [\]]chad/_/kr-i yA tse dwa ti/_des _ka nan dbyangs don/_mnyam par bya ba la bti'o/_/de dang de 'dra zhes pa lta bu des mnyam par bya ba'i don la bti 'gyur te/[ \[]brA h+ma Ne tu l+yaM kha thams [\]]dbang phyug_/
[\[168a.3\]]a Na 'am anya/_sa tha mas cad kyi dbang phyug_sa rigs kyi dbang phyug_/br-i thi bI la aN 'am anya 'phel ba/_zhes pa'i don la/_sa h+ma Na ba ta/_de bzhin du/_k+Sha tri ya bta/_ta tra ta s+ye ba/_de la de'i lta bu la'o/_/lta bu'am bzhin nam ltar zhes pa'i don la drug pa_zam ze dang mnyam pa/_dang bdun pa'i 
[\[168a.4\]]mtha' la ba ti 'gyur te/_de ba s+ya i ba/_de ba i ba/_zhes pa'i don la/_ba ti _de ba _bta/_de bzhin du/_bram ze dang mnyam pa'am 'dra ba/_ba te i brjod don/_rgyal rigs dang mnyam ba'am 'dra ba'am mtshungs ba/_ba ti _ba rba ta bta/_ba ti _rA dza bta/_ta dartaM/_de mchod pa la'o/_/de mchod do zhes pa'i don 
[\[168a.5\]]la gnyis pa'i mtha' la ti 'gyur lta bzhin/_lta bzhin/_te bi d+hiM a r+d+haH/_zhes _lha bzhin nam lha ltar/_pa'i don la/_bi d+hi ba ta/_ta s+ya b+hA ba s+t+wa ta lau/_/de'i dngos po la twa ta la dag go/_/de'i ngo bo'am _ri bo ltar/_dngos po'i rgyal po bzhin/_don la drug pa'i mtha' la twa dang tal dag 'gyur zhing 
[\[168a.6\]]twa byin pa na ma ning dang tal byin pa rnams bud med kyi rtags _tshogs mchod/_so/_/ngas [ \[]sA d+hA+o c+h+Sha ba[\]]/_zhes pa'i chogs[\[] mchod[\]]/[ \[]ba ti'i i badzad don[\]]/_don la/[ \[]sA d+hu su tAM[\]]/_legs pa mnyid/[ \[]sA d+hu d+hA[\]]/[ \[]ha swA t+dA dau ta d+d+hI [\]]te/_thung du las de ba na ta la sogs pa la'o/_/rtags gang gi u pa d+hA dbyangs thung ngu 
[\[168a.7\]]yin pa de'i a rol gyis ni de phan gyi rkyen ta te twa la sogs pa byin na Sha ru 'gyur te/_legs po nyod/_dza yu Sh+TaM/[ \[]dza yus la tA bung bu zhes sam sa Sha Sha phu ca taTu bas taT su am[\]]/_legs po nid/_twa su ma ning la su am/_tal la dbyangs don a dza sogs kyi TAs/_thung [\[]ngu [\]]zhes pas rnam bcad kyi ring bo la mi 'gyur te/_nga gnyid _gI stAM/[ \[]gling la twaM ra rnam kha cad[\]]
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]rnam par bcad pa'i sa/_pri th+wa di b+h+ya i ma ni dz+dA/_pr-i thu la sogs pa rnams las i man dang i tsa y-ing na'o/_/pra thu la sogs pa rnams las dngos po la twa ta la 'gyur bar ma zad i man dang i tsa dag kyang yang na 'gyur ro/_/TiH/_Ti'i 'o/_/by-i thu sogs kyi Ti i man i tsa i 
[\[168b.2\]]yas dag pha rol la dbyi'o/_/r-i toHha lA de rla g+hoH/_hal dang po'i r-i ta yang ba'i 'o/_/hal dang po na yod pa'i r-ita yang ba ni rkyen i man dang i tsa dang e yas rnams pha rol la ra ru 'gyur te/[ \[]pra thi mA/_pra thiH/_twa br-i thu twa twaM[\]]/[ \[]a dam pa/_ta la pr-i thu tA[\]]/_hal dang po zhes pas rnam 
[\[168b.3\]]bcad kyi hal dang po na med na r-i thung du yin kyang rar mi 'gyur te/_ra dzi mA/_yang ba zhes pas rnams bcad kyi [ \[]pra thub i man Ti'i D+hos Te phyis hal dang ba la zhes pas rar bra thi man su na'i u ba d+hA ring ba ming mtha'i phyis hal sogs kyis su ba cig yangs ba nyid do[\]]/_/yangs pa/[ \[]tha thu la i tsa tsa dbyangs don[\]]/_lci ba la rar mi 'gyur te/_i man _kr-i [\[]Sh+NaM T+Sha [\]]
[\[168b.4\]]pri thu sogs ni/_phr-i thu/_mr-i du/_r-i dzu/_'jam pa nyid dam sla ba nyid/[ \[]ri dzu la e ma na[\]]/_dr-i D+ha/_b+h+raMsha_/kr-i sha_/br-i D+ha/_kr-i Sh+Na rnams so/_/bar+Na dr-i D+hA di b+h+yaHSh+ya ny+tsa/_kha dog dang dr-i D+ha la sogs pa rnams las Sh+ya nya 'ang ngo /_/kha dog gi khyad par brjod pa dang dr-i D+ha sogs la dngos po [ \[]nad po nying /[\]]
[\[168b.5\]]la Sh+yanya 'gyur te _yangs ba/_'jam ba'am sla ba/_i man 'ang ngo /_/shau k+l+yaM/_dkar btid/_brtan pa/_shin tu/_nad/_'phel ba/_nag po/_shu kri mA/[ \[]Sh+yakya_dA b+d+h+yaM/_dra D+d+hi mA/_Sh+ya ha_lA ba N+d+yaM[\]]/_la ba Ni mA/_gu Na ba tsan brA b+ma NA di b+h+yaHka rma Ni tsa/_yon tan brjod pa dang brA h+ma Na la sogs pa rnams las las 
[\[168b.6\]]la'ang ngo /_/yon tan brjod pa rnams dang brA h+ma Na la sogs _ShA nya nya 'phel don/_Shi ta la dI ba'i don/_pa rnams las dngos po _i yan/_dgar ba nyid/[ \[]brtan pa nyid[\]]/[ \[]i man[\]]/_dza nyid/_i man/[ \[]ba nyid[\]]/_dang las la'ang Sh+yanya 'gyur te/_dza Da s+ya b+ha ba/_dza Da s+ya karma/_zhes pa dag gi don pa/[ \[]Sh+yanya_dzA D+yaM[\]]
[\[168b.7\]]de bzhin du/[ \[]Sh+yanya _brA h+la T+yaM[\]]/[ \[]tha ma dri nyid dam dram ze'i lags[\]]/_Sh+yanya _tsau rmaM/_chom rkun nyi dang mchom kun[\[]byings[\]]/_'grel bar lung drangs la/_tsa tu rba [\[]r+NA 'I nI swA r+the Sh+yanya[\]]/[ \[]tse tu rba r+Na [\]]la sags pa rnams kyi rang don la Sh+ya nya'o/_/[\[]tsa tu rba r+Na [\]]la sogs pa _blun po nyid/_blun po'i las/_rnams [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]rang don _blun po nyid dam blun po'i las/
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]la Sh+yanya 'gyur te/_Sh+yanya _tsA tu rba N+yi _Sh+yanya_tsA tu rba N+yi _Sh+yanya_tsA tu rA shrA maM/[ \[]Shanya _ti lo kyi[\]]/_'gril par/_tsa t+ya rbed las kyang rang don la Sh+yanya 'gyur zhing tshig snga phyi gnyis kar gyi 'phel ba'o/_/zhes bshad pas/_Sh+yanya _tsA tu rbai d+yaM/_ste nA [\[]d+ya n+nya [\]]lo pa shu/_sten las yata sten 
[\[169a.2\]]dbyi ba'ang ngo /_/ste na las dngos po dang las kyi don rigs bzhi/_la Sh+yanya dal ba bzhi/_'jig rten gsum/_'gyur bar ma zad yata kyang 'gyur te yata pha rol la na yang dbyi ste/_stai n+yaM/_ste yaM/_sakhyu rbaH/_sa khi las ya'o/_/sa khi'i las dngos _rig byed bzhi/[ \[]bo [\]]dang las la ya 'gyur te/_sakhyaM/_dU 
[\[169a.3\]]ta pa [\[]Ni g+b+h+yaM tsa[\]]/_dU ta pa Ni dza dag las kyang ngo /_/dU ta dang pa Ni dza dag las kyang dngos po dang las kyi don la 'gyur te/_dU t+yaM/_chom rkun nyid dam chom rkun gyi las/_sten la Sh+yanya/_ste na la la ta gang gi ita kyi 'ang ngos na'i srog a kyis mdo 'dis na [\[]phyes[\]]/[ \[]pra Ni dz+yaM[\]]/_grogs po nyid dam grogs po'i las/_sa khel ya/_ka 
[\[169a.4\]]pi dz+wA do dz+haMka_/ka pi dz+nyA ti dag las D+ha ka'o/_/ka pi dz+nyA ti dag las dngos po dang las kyi don la D+ha ka 'gyur te/_phonya nyid dam po nya'i las/_D+haka _kA pe yaM/_D+haka_dz+nyA te yaM/_pa t+ya n+ta pu ro hi tA di b+h+yo laka_/pa ti mtha' dang pu [ \[]tshong pa nyid dam tshong pa li bas[\]]/_ro hi ta la sogs pa rnams las yaka lo lo 
[\[169a.5\]]nga ti tshig phyi mar gyur pa dang bu ro hi ta la sogs pa las dngos po dang las kyi don la yaka 'gyur te/_sa nA pa d+yaM/_bau ro hi _spre'u nyid dam [\[]spre'u'i las[\]]/_shes pa nyid dam shes pa'i las/_t+yaM/[\[]rA radz+yaM[\]]/_rgyal pa nyid dam rgyal po'am rgyal po'i las/_prA Na dzA ti ba yo ba tsa no d+gA trA di b+h+yo nya nya/_srog chags kyi rigs 
[\[169a.6\]]dang na tshod brjod pa dang [\[]u d+bA tra[\]] la sogs pa rnams las anya 'o/_/sde'i bdag po nyid dam sde'i bdag po'i las/[\[ ]sen pa ti la yaka[\]]/_rgyal po'i mdun na 'don nyid mad las/_srog chags kyi rigs dang na tshod [ \[]pu ri te ha la yaka[\] \[]rA dza na la yaka na'i de pa na la'ang [\]]ngos Ti phyis/_brjod pa dang u dwA tra la sogs pa rnams las dngos po 
[\[169a.7\]]dang las kyi don la anya 'gyur te/_aN _A shwaM/_rta nyid/_ku mA ra la aN/[ \[]ko m+ba raM[\]]/_gzhon nu nyid/[ \[]dul gyi sha sher ba nyid [\] ]od+gA traM/[ \[]u rnA N+ra aN[\]]/_ho tr-i la aN [\[]ika gi ab la[\]] yan/_hau traM/_sbyin sreg nyid/_hA la nA n+ta yu pA d+h+yo nyaN/_hA yan mtha' dang yu ba la sogs pa rnams las anya'o/_hA ya na tshig lci mar 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]'gyur ba dang yu ba la sogs pa rnams las dngos po dang las la an 'gyur te/_aN _dwe hA yanaM/_aN _yau ba naM/_shau ba naM/_gya nyid/_so tA rdaM/[ \[]yi dag drugs nyid dam mthar byo nyid[\]]/_i ga [\[]n+h+ra ts+tsa la glu pU rbA ta[\]]/_yang ba sngon ma las ika mtha' las kyang ngo /_/rtags kyi yi ge sngon ma 
[\[169b.2\]]yang ba las pha rol gyi mtha' ika so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yod na'ang dngos po _lo gnyis banyid/[ \[]yang chos dang pa nyid[\]]/[ \[]shad pa an _hUr sogs kyis ai tsa yA gas[\]]/[ \[]sa tra da la aN su draMng b+ha ga sogs kyi mdos cho ga snga khyi gnyis kar [\]]'phel ba/_dang las kyi don la aN 'gyur te/_mau nai/_mu nai aN/_gaur paM/_yang ba nyid/_lA g+ha 
[\[169b.3\]]baM/_yang ba zhes pas rnam bcad kyis lci ba la/[ \[]kA N+DA [\]]twaM/_yo pa [\[]d+h+da d+hu rU po t+ha mA dwunya[\]]/_ya u pa d+ha las lci ba nye ba las bunya 'o/_/rtags gang gi'ang u ba d+hA ya yig yin pa de'i sngon ma'i nye ba'i yi ge de lci ba yod pa las dngos po dang [ \[]thub pa nyid/_bla ma nyid[\]]/[ \[]zhu ru ya aN 'phel ba khu'i yon ta na[\]]/
[\[169b.4\]\[]la g+ha la [\]]aN/_las kyi don la bu nya 'gyur te/_rA ma NI ya ka/_bzang ba nyid/_'grel par lung drangs pa/_sa hA yA dwA/_sa hA ya las yang na'o/_mdo snga ma'i don rnams tshang yang sa hA ya las dngos po dang las kyi don la bu nya yang na ba ste/_bunya _sA hA ya ka/_sA hA y+yaM/[ \[]d+hA n+yA [\]]nAM b+ha nga 
[\[169b.5\]]ni k+She tA+e khanya/_'bru rnams kyi _dga' bar bya ba nyid/_ngam NI ya la bu nya nya 'phel pa'i don du aka_/yod pa'i zhing la khanya'o/_'bru brjod pa'i sgra rnams la de yod pa'i zhing brjod pa la kha nya 'gyur te/_mu d+gA nAM b+ha ba ne k+She tre/_zhes pa'i don la/_mau d+gI naH/_phrI hi shA l+yo [\[]r+D+ha kaTazA [\]]bo nyid/[ \[]sa hA yal kha ti[\]] mtha' dang du'o 
[\[169b.6\]\[]hi ta sogs kyi mdos yaka 'phel ga[\] ]brI hi dang shA li dag las D+haka 'o/_/brI hi dang shA li dag las de yod pa'i zhing brjod pa la D+haka 'gyur te/_pre he yaM/_hA yaM la D+ha ka/_shA le yaM/_ya ba ya ba kaSha Sh+Thi _sran ma [\[]mu rga rnams yod pa'i zhing /_kA d+ya ta/_mu dga'i zhing /[ \[]mu rgal kha nya nya 'phal ba iN[\]]/_ya ba ya ba kaSha Sh+Thi ka las 
[\[169b.7\]]yata 'o/_/ya ba ka [\[]Sha Sh+khika [\]]rnams las di yod pa'i zhing brjod pa la yata 'gyur te/_yata _ya byi/_nas kyi zhing /_yata _ya ba _'bru'i zhing /[ \[]brA+e hil [\]]D+ha ka_/[\[]'bras [\]]kyi zhing /_kyiM/_yata_Shi Sh+Tha kyaM/_drug cu pa'i zhing ste nyi ma drug cu la 'bru [\[]smin [\]]pa'i zhing /_pi b+hA ShA ti la ma' Sho mA d+gA [\[]NA [\]]b+h+yaH/_ti la _mA Sha _u mA _b+ha d+gagA _a 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]Nu rnams la yang na'o/_/til la sogs pa 'di rnams las de yod pa'i zhing brjod pa la ya ta yang na 'gyur te/_yata _ti l+yaM/_khanya _tai lI naM/_yata mA Sh+yaM/_khanya _mA ShI naM/_yata _u myaM/_khanya _au mI naM/_yata _b+hA d+g+yaM/_yanya _b+hA d+gI naM/_a Na byaM/_khanya _A Na bI naM/
[\[170a.2\]]ta t+sa rbA deHb-i th+ya ga ka rma ba tra [\[]bA traM byA b+no [\]]ti/_sarba dang po'i pa thi _aM ga _karma _pa tra _bA tra la de rnams par khyab ba la'o/_/sarba dang po'i ba thi til gyi zhing /_la sogs pa _sran ma'i zhing /_'di rnams la de [ \[]thar pa'i [\]]zhing /_rnam par khyab/_so mar tsa'i zhing /_pa'i don la kha _phra mo'i zhing /_'gyur te/
[\[170a.3\]]sha sa _sarba pa thA na bya b+ho ti/_zhes pa'i don la/_sarba pa thI naH/_de bzhin du/_kha _sarba cA d+hI NaH/_kha _sarba ka rmI NaH/_kha _sarba pa trI NaH/_kha _sarba pA trI NaH/_a d+ha no ya tA+au/_a d+hA na las ya ta kha dag go/_/a d+hA na las myur ba bgrod pa'i don la yata dang kha dog 'gyur te/_a d+h+wa na 
[\[170a.4\]]lam thams cad khyab ba/_ma lad+ga ts+tsha ti/_zhes pa'i kha kha A+en/_lam thams cad khyab gdon la/_lus thams cad khyab pa/_las thams cad khyab pa/_'dab ma thams cad khyab pa/_snod thams cad khyab pa/[ \[]lata _a d+hA n+yaH[\]]/_kha [\[]ad+hA [\]]nI naH/[ \[]ta s+ya pA ka mU le pI lwA di ka r+NA di b+h+yaHku Na b+dzA ha tsau[\]]/_pI lu la sogs pa rnams las 
[\[170a.5\]]smin pa dang kar+Na lam myur bar bgrod/_la sogs pa rnams las de'i rtsa ba la ku Nab dzA hatsa dag go/_/pI lu la sogs pa rnams kyi smin pa brjod pa la ku Na pa dang kar+Na la _lam myur bar 'grod/_sogs pa rnams kyi de'i rtsa ba brjod pa la dzA ha tsi 'gyur te/_pI lU nAM pA kaH/_zhes pa'i 
[\[170a.6\]]don la/_pI lu ku NaH/_de bzhin du/_a shwa t+tha ku NaH/[ \[]ku Na ba/_ka rka n+d+hu ku NaH[\]]/_kar+Na s+ya mU laM/_zhes pa'i don la/_kar+Na dzA haH/_de bzhin du/[ \[]dzA ha tsa _a k+Shi dzA haM/_dzA ha tsa _pu Sh+ba dzA haM/_dzA ha tsa _br-i k+ShA haM/_de ni bi t+ta sh+tsu tsu b+tsa Na pau[\]]/_des rig pa la tsu ny+cu pa _se yab smin/_tsa Na pa dag 
[\[170a.7\]]pI lu la ku Nab par byangs don/_se yab smin pa/_khyad par gnas smin pa/_ku Na ba/[ \[]che ba kha [\]]smin pa/_rna ba'i rtsa ba/_'o/_/_/des rig pa _rna ba'i rtsa ba/_dzA ha tsa tsa dbyangs don/_brjod pa la/_mig gi rtsa ba/_me tog gi rtsa'o/_gsum pa'i _shing gi rtsa ba/_mtha' la [\[]tsu ny+cu [\]]pa dang ca Na pa dag 'gyur te/_skabs 'dis tsa rnams 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]'gro ba'i ming can ma yin no/_/she b+de na pi t+taM/_zhes pa'i don la/_sha b+ha cu ny+tsu rma/_sgra rig pa/_sha b+ha tsa NaH/_saM prod sh+tsa ka Ta tsa swA r+the/_saM pra u ta rnams las rang don la ka Ta tsa'o/_/saM bra u ta rnams dang 'ang gi sgras bi las kyang rang don la ka Ta 'gyur te/[ \[]ka Ta tsha [\] ]saM ka TaH/_/
[\[170b.2\]]ka Ta tsa _pra ka TaM/[ \[]sma rig [\]]ba'am shes pa/_ka Ta tsa _baM ka TaH/_'grel bar lung drangs pa/_a lA bU ti lo mA b+haM gA [\[]b+h+yo ra[\]] dza si ka Ta dz+wA ts+yaH/_a lA bU _ti la _u mA _b+ha d+gA rnams las thal pa la ka Ta tsa'o/_/shin tu sdug pa/
[\[170b.3\]]rab tu g.yo ba/_a lA bU la sogs pa 'di rnams _shin tu brtsigs pa/_la thal ba brjod pa la kaT tsa 'gyur te/[ \[]ka Ta a so ma [\]]gcod/_lA bU ka TaH/_til ka TaH/_u mA ka TaH/_b+ha d+gA ka TaH/[ \[]go Sh+thA dzA da yaH_y+thA nA di Shu ba Shu nA b+h+yaH[\]]/_a dza la sogs pa phyugs [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]ming rnams la gnas la 
[\[170b.4\]]sogs pa ran+mas la go Sh+tha'o/_/a dza la sogs pa phyugs kyi ming rnams las gnas la sogs pa rnams kyi don la drug _so mar tsa'i thal ba/_til gyi thal ba/_zar ma'i thal ba/_so mar tsa'i thal ba/_pa'i mtha' go Sh+Tha 'gyur te/_ga bAM s+thA naM/_zhes pa'i don la/_go go Sh+Tha/_de bzhin du/
[\[170b.5\]]ma hi ShI go Sh+ThaM/_a dza go Sh+ThaM/_saM g+haM te ka Ta tsa/_'dus pa la ka Ta tsa 'o/_'dus pa brjod pa la ka Ta tsa 'gyur te/_a bI nAM [\[]saM g+thA [\]]taH/_zhes pa'i don la/_a bi ka TaH/[ \[]pi s+tha re ya Ta tsa[\]]/_rgyal pa la ya Ta tsa'o/_/rgyal pa yang rnams kyi gnas/_pa'i don la/[ \[]ba lang gi gnas[\]]/_ya Ta tsa 
[\[170b.6\]\[]ma he'i [\]]gnas/_ra'i gnas/_'gyur te/_a [\[]bI nAM bi stA raM[\]]/_zhes pa'i don la/_a pi ya TaH/_a pi ya TaH/_dwi dwe [\[]yu ga tsa[\]]/_gnyis _lug rnams kyi tshogs/_pa la go yug tsa 'o/_lug gi tshogs/_grangs gnyis kyi don la go [\[]yu gtsa [\]]'gyur te /[ \[]u Sh+TA dwau[\]]/_zhes pa'i don la/_a Sh+Ta go gaM/_Sha Te dwe Sha TA 
[\[170b.7\]]ba tsa/_drug pa la [\[]Shad+ga [\]]btsa'o/_/lug rnams kyi rgyal pa/_lug rgyas ba ste mang po'i don/_yaT tsa tsa dbyings don/_grangs drug gi don la Sha D+gab tsa 'gyur te/_a shwaH ShaT/_rta rnams drug rnams/_zhes pa'i don la/_rta drug_a shA [\[]Sha D+ga baM[\]]/_mo dag gnyis dag_/sna ha [\[]te la tsa[\]]/_rnga mo gnyis/_rnga mo gnyis/_snum pa [\[]la tai la tsa'o[\]]/_/
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]snum pa'i don la tai la tsa 'gyur te/_ti lA nAM sne haM/_zhes pa'i don la/_ti la ti laM/_de bzhin du/_g+h+r-i ta tai laM/_b+ha ba ne k+She tre shA ka Ta shA ki nau/_yod pa'i zhing la shA kaT shA kin dag go/_/de yod pa'i zhing brjod pa la shA ka TA dang shA ki na dag 'gyur te/
[\[171a.2\]]i [\[]k+ShU nAM [\]]b+ha ba ne k+She tre/_zhes pa'i don la/_i k+Sha shA ka TaM/_til rnams kyi snum pa/_i k+Shu shwa ki naM/_til gyi snum pa/[ \[]tad s+ya saM dzA taM[\]]/_mar gyi snum pa/_tA ra[\[] kA di b+h+ya i ta[\]] tsa/_de 'di'i yang dag par skyes pa la tA ra ka la sogs pa rnams las i ta tsa 'o/_/de 'di'i yang dag par skyes pa la 
[\[171a.3\]]bu ram shing rnams yod pa'i zhing /_dang po'i mtha' drug pa'i don _bu ram shing gi zhing /_can la tA ra ka la sogs pa rnams la i ta tsa 'gyur te/_tA ra kAHsaM dzA tAHa s+ya/_zhes pa'i don la/_tA ra ki taM/_na b+haH/_de bzhin du/_bu [\[]Sh+thi [\]]taMH/_bu k+ShaH/_pra ma Ne dwa las [\[]dz+da g+h+Na ny+mA tra tsaH[\]]/_tshad 
[\[171a.4\]]la dwa ya sa tsa [ \[]dag+n+Nanya [\] ]mA tra tsa rnams so/_/tshad la dang po'i mtha' drug pa'i don can la dwa ya sa tsa/[ \[]dag+h+ya nya mA [\]]tra tsa rnams 'gyur te/_skar ma rnams yang dag par skyes pa 'di/_ha staHbra mA NaHa _skar ma can te/_nam mkha'/_s+ya/_zhes [ \[]me togacan [\]]te/_shing /_ba'i don la/_ha sta dwa ya saM/_de bzhin 
[\[171a.5\]]du/_dzA nu dag+h+naM/_na b+hi mA traM/_bra mA Ne laH/_tshad la dbyi'o/_/tshad kyi don la byin pa'i rkyen rnams sdeb sbyor sogs kyi dgos pa yod na dbyi'o/_/dwi goHnaM t+yaM/_khru gang tsam 'di/_phyogs gnyis pa las rtag tu'o/_/phyogs gnyis pa'i bsdu ba'i [ \[]da yas nA tsa dbyangs don _khru gang tsham[\]]/
[\[171a.6\]\[]da g+ny+da nya nya [\]]'phel don/_pus mo tsam/_lte ba tsam/[ \[]ma tra tsa tsa [\]]dbyangs don/_mtha' la tshad kyi don gyi rkyen rnams rtag tu dbyi ste/_dwi bi steH/_tri bi sti/_dwaD+ha kI/_bu ru Sha ha sti b+h+yA ma Na tsa/_bu ru ha sti na dag las an 'ang ngo /_/pu ru Sha dang ha sti na dag las tshad la dwa yas tsa sogs 'gyur bar ma zad 
[\[171a.7\]]aN 'ang 'gyur te/_aN _bau ru ShaH/_skyes pa tsam/_pu ru Sha dwa ya saM/_da ya sa tsa/[ \[]da k+h+nanya [\] ]bau ru Sha/_mthong ngo /_/dwa yas tsa phyis ba'o/_/mtho gsum/[ \[]bre do[\]]/_/ma tra tsa phyis ba'o/[ \[]dag+h+naH[\]]/_skyis pa tsam/_sA tra tsa _bu ru Sha mA traH/_skyes pa tsam/_ha stin la/_aN/_i na N+ya na pa t+ye/_bu brgyud ma yin pa la aN la in 'o/
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]bu brgyud brjod pa ma yin pa'i aN pha rol la rtags in mtha'i Ti dbyi ba ma yin te/_aN _hA sti naM/_ha sti dA ya saM/[ \[]dag+h+nanya [\] \[]hA sti dag+hAH[\]]/[ \[]mA dA tsa _ha sta mA traH/[\] \[]ya t+ta de te b+h+yaHpha rol mA Na ba tu pa/_yata _ta ta _e ta ta rnams las tshad la ba tu ba'o/_/ya ta la sogs 
[\[171b.2\]]pa 'di rnams la tshad la ba tu pa 'gyur te/_lA ba ta/_ba tu bA tA ba ta/_de tsam/_ba tu ba _e ta ba te/_de tsam/_glang po che tsam/_ha sten la dwa yas tsa tsa dbyangs don ming mtha' na phyis/_glang po che tsam/_ki mi daM b+h+yaM bo g+haH/_ki ma i dam dag las pa'i g+ha'o/_/ki ma dang i dam dag las tshad [\[]la ba tu ba [\]]'gyur zhing ba tu ba kyi ba 
[\[171b.3\]]yang g+har 'gyur te/_ci tsam/_ki yA na/_ci tsam/_ya ta la[\[] ba tu ba dbyangs don u num gyi don sa cha'i ming can rnams kyi a 'os Ti a[\]]/_'di tsam/_i yA na/[ \[]i ta ba la ba tu ba ba dbyangs don u du ma gyi don i dam kim dag gi I sha[\] ]sha 'gro ma mdo 'dis ba g+ha [\[]i ya gang gi i ta kyi 'ang ngos i phyis nus [\]]sogs/_ki maHsaM khyA pa ri mA Ni De ti tsa/
[\[171b.4\]]kim las grangs kyi tshad la Da ti'ang ngo /[ \[]kim la ba tub ba dbyangs don i dam kim dag gi I sha kI sha dag gos kim kI sha [\] ]sha 'gro ba mdo [\[]'dis ba b+ha g+ha'i i ya gang gi ita kyi'ang ngos i phyis uka 'gro ba zhes pas num na'i u ba d+hA [\]]ring bo brtsegs pa'i mtha' dbyi 'os ta phyis/_kim las grangs kyi tshad la Da ti 'ang 'gyur te/_ci tsam/_ka tiH/
[\[171b.5\]]k+She pen/_khangs tshig la ma yin no/_/khengs tshig brjod pa'i kim la tshad kyi rkyen rnams 'gyur ba ma yin te/_kA saM khyA e ShaM de shA nAM/_'grel par lung drangs ba/[ \[]yat+ta t+h+ya ma bi Da ti ngi ti ke tsi ta[\]]/[ \[]yata ta ta dag [\]]las kyang Da ti zhes pa/[ \[]kim laDa ti Da 'gro ba las Ti dbyi 'os phyis Da de'i don[\]]/_skabs 
[\[171b.6\]]'gar ro/_/skabs 'gar [\[]yata ta ta dag [\]]las kyang tshad laDa ti 'gyur te/_ji tsam [ \[]ya tIH[\]]/_de tsam ta ti/[ \[]saM khyA yA a ba ya be ta [\] \[]yu bde [\]]rnams la brangs ci/_yab/_grangs las cha shas la ta yapa'o/_/grangs las cha shas brjod pa la ta yab 'gyur te/_pany+tsA ba ya ba ya s+ya/
[\[171b.7\]]zhes pa'i don la/_lnga cha _bany+tsa ta yaM/[ \[]bany+nan la ta yab pa dbyangs don ing mtha'i na [\]]phyis/[ \[]yata dang lba Da 'gro ba la De phyis[\]]/[ \[]dwi tri b+h+yA ta ya s+yA ya dz+wA[\]]/_dwi tri dag las ta yab kyi a ya tsa yang na'o/_/dwi dang tri dag las cha shas kyi ta rkyen ta ya ba ni a ya tsar yang na 'gyur te/[ \[]gang gi lnga cha/_til ta yab byin ta yab [\]]

[\[172a.1\]]a la tsar 'gyur tsa dbyangs don gang gi zhes pas i gyis/_da yaM/_gnyis cha/_dwi ta yaM/_tra yaM/_tri ta yaM/[ \[]u b+hA ti taM[\]]/_u b+ha las rtag du'o/_/u b+ha las cha shas brjod pa'i rkyen ta yab ni rtag tu a tsar 'gyur te/_u b+hA yaH/_ta da smin d+hi ka mi ti da [\[]shA n+ta [\]]taDa/

[\[173b.1\]]e ha na zhes pas ring po ming mtha'i na dbyi 'os na phyis ta la sogs kyi su 'jig_/de bzhin du/_bU rba ma ne na pI taM/_zhes pa'i don la/_bU rbI/_sngon du 'thung /_sa bU rbA ts+tsa/_snga ma dang bcas pa las kyang ngo /_/tshig gzhan snga ma dang bcas pa'i bU rba las kyang 'dis zos pa sogs kyi don la i ni 'gyur te/

[\[175a.1\]]la rim pa bzhin i ran dang i ras dag kyang 'gyur te/_i ran _me d+hi raH/_ma tu pa _me d+hA bAn/_i ratsa _ra thi raH/_ma tub _ra tha pAn/_kA N+DA N+DA dI ba n+nI ra tsau/_kA N+Da A N+Da las a+di ran I ratsa dag go/_/kAN+Da dang AN+Da dag las rim pa bzhin I ran dang I ratsa dag 'gyur

[\[175a.4\]]kyang ngo /_/brI hi la sogs pa rnams las kyang ma tub kyi don la i ni dang Than yang na 'gyur te/_i ni _brI hI/_tan bri hI kaH/_dbyug pa can/_ma tub brI hi mAn/_skra can/_skra can/_i ni go d+yu mi/_skra can/_Thad god+yu _skra can/_mi kaH/_ma tub _go d+yu ma bAn/_shi khA deHna Than/_shi kha la sogs pa rnams

[\[175a.6\]]brjod pa las bdun pa'i don la i ni dang Than dag 'gyur ba ma yin te/_ma tub _swa bAn/_ma tub _si d+ha bAn/_tu n+dA di b+h+yaHi lats+tsa/_tu n+ha la sogs pa rnams las _btsug phud can/_a latsa 'o/_/tun+da la sogs pa rnams las ma tub kyi don la i latsa 'gyur te/_i latsa _tu n+di laH/_ma tub _tu n+da bAn/
[\[175a.7\]]i ni _tu n+dI _ltob sbom po can/_Than tu n+di kaH/_a smA yA mo d+hA sra jo bo niH/_as mA yA _me _bdag ldan/_seng ge can/_d+hA _sra ja las si ni'o/_/as mtha' can rnams dang /_mA mA/_me d+hA/_sra dza rnams la ma tub kyi don la bi ni 'gyur te/_bi ni i brjod don su na'i mu pa d+hA ring bo ming mtha'i na byis/_te _lto ba sbom po can/[ \[]sha su sbyin [\]]
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]swI/[ \[]phA si brjed na[\]]/_ma tub_ta pa swA na/_bi ni ta pa swI/_ma tub _ta ba swA na/_bi ni_mA yA bI/_ma tu pa _mA yA bA na/_bi ni _me d+h+na bI/_ma tu pa _mi d+hA bA na/_bi ni_sra g+h+ri/_ma tub _sra krA na/_shri d+ga br-i[\[]n+d+na b+m+ya[\]]mA ra ka tsa/_shri d+ga br-i n+da dag las A ra ga tsa'o/_/shri d+ga dang br-in+da dag las ma tub kyi don la A ra ka tsa

[\[177b.1\]]te/_ku ha/_sarbi kA/_rgya kim yat+ta daHkA le dA/_sarba e ka _an+ya _kim _yad _tata rnams las dus la dA'o/_/sarba la sogs pa 'di rnams las bdun pa'i mtha' las dus la 'jug pa la dA 'gyur te/_e ka dA/_an+ya dA/_ka dA/_ya dA/_ta dA/_sarba la/_dA/

[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]rwa ri/_ba ra ya A ri/_ai Sha maH/_pa re d+ya biH/_n+da ma'i dus/_ad+ya/_'di'i dus/_pU rbe d+YuH/_snga dus/_a n+ye d+YuH/_gzhan dus/_a n+ya ta re d+YaH/_dus gzhan pa/_i ta re d+YuH/_i ta sa la ed+Yus/_a pa re d+YuH/_a pa ba la e tul/_a d+ha re d+YuH/_a d+ha ra la e d+Yus/_u b+ha ye d+YuH/
[\[178a.2\]]u d+ha re d+YuH/_i dam la ma tsa i dam e Shar 'dung /_'di'i dus/_bar la e bya bi sa/_i dam la d+ya'i dam a/_b+hu ca la awa d+Yus/_rnams so/_/sa dal [ \[]e bas d+YuH/[\] \[]sa n+ya ta ra la e smus[\]]/_sogs pa 'di rnams bdun dus [\[]tshig shos/[\] ]pa'i mtha' can dus _dus gzhan/_brjod pa la tshig _dus tshog ma/_gnyis ka'i dus sam nyi ma gnyis ka/_u b+ha sa la e d+Yul/

[\[178a.4\]]i dam s+tha muH/_i dam las tha mu'o/_/i dam las rnam pa brjod pa la tha mu 'gyur te/_i t+thaM/_kim sh+tsa/_kim las kyang ngo /_/kim las kyang rnam pa brjod pa la tha mu 'gyur te/_kathaM/_dika _rnam bci/_sha b+de b+h+yaH_sa b+ha mI pany+ca mI _rnam pa ci/_pra tha mA b+h+yo _de ltar/_de ltar/_rnam pa thams cad du/
[\[178a.5\]]dig+de sha kA le Sh+wa stA tiH/_phyogs kyi sgra rnams las bdun pa lnga pa dang bo rnams las phyogs dus i dam la tha mu u brjod don ta tha dag la e ta i ta 'os i ta du 'gyur mang ngo /_/yul rnams la a stA ti'o/_rnam pa ni/_phyogs kyi sgrar grags pa rnams las bdun pa dang lnga pa dang dang po rnams kyi mtha'

[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]sogs pa rnams su 'gyur te/_pu ra stA ta/_shang ram shang du las gang las/_a d+ha sta ta/_a d+ha ra la a sta ti/_a bstA ta/_a ba ra la a stA ti _pu raH/_pU Na la a si i brjod don/_ad+haH/_ad+ha ra la a saM/_a baH/_a ba ra la a si/_a bi b+hA ShA ba ra s+ya/_a ba ra'i 'dam ka'o/_/rkyen a stA ti pha rol 
[\[178b.2\]]bU rba la a stA ti i brjod bU rba pu ra du 'gyur/_las a _'og gam 'og las sam 'og tu/_gzhan nam gzhan las sam gzhan du ba ra ni a ba shar ram shar nas sam shar du/_ru 'gyur ba _'og gam 'og nas sam 'og tu/_gzhan phyogs sam gzhan phyogs nas sam gzhan phyogs su/_dang mi 'gyur pa 'dam ka can du bya ste/_a ba 
[\[178b.3\]]rastA ta/_a ba ra stA ta/_dak+Shi Ni t+ta rA b+h+yA ma ta su tsa/_dak+Shi Na u t+ta ra dag las ata su tsa'o/_/dak+Shi Na u t+ta ra dag las bdun pa sogs gong du smos pa'i don de rnams la a ta su tsa 'gyur te/_dak+Shi Na taH/_lho phyogs su/_u t+ta ra taH/_byang phyogs su/_phyogs gzhan nam phyogs gzhan las sam phyogs gzhan du/
[\[178b.4\]]bi b+hA ShA ba rA pa rA b+h+yaM/_bir a bar dag las yang na'o/_/bdun pa sogs kyi don la pa ra a ba ra dag la a ta su tsa yang na 'gyur te/_bar taH/_a ba ra taH/_dak+Shi Nal a ta su tsa dbyangs don u brjod don/_u t+ta ra la a ta su tsa/_a ny+tse lu ka/_any+tsa las dbyi'o/_/a ny+tsa ti mtha' can gyi phyogs 
[\[178b.5\]]kyi sgra las a stA ti 'jig par 'gyur te/_prA g+ba pa ti/_shar du gnas/_prA gA ga taH/_u par+Yu ba ri Sh+TA ta/_u pa ri Sh+TA ta'o/_/A r+d+ha'i a ta su tsa/_pha rol tu/_a ta su tsa/_phyogs nub tu/_sgra la a stA ti'i don la a ril dang a ri Sh+TA til 'gyur zhing U r+d+ha u pa ru 'gyur bas u ba ri dang /_u pa ri Sh+TA ta dag 
[\[178b.6\]]tshig phrad do/_/pa sh+tsA ta/_pa sh+tsA ta'o/_bra [\[]sdo rda tha'i a tu la [\]]a stA ti phyis ba'o/_shar nas 'ong /_a ba ra pa sha ru 'gyur ba dang _u pa ri/_a stA ti'i don la A ti don la A ti byin pas/_pa sh+tsA ta/_sa pa tshig phrad do/_/u t+ta ra rA dak+Shi NA dA ti/_u t+ta ra _ad+ha ra _dak+Shi Na las A ti'o/_steng phyogs su/_u t+ta ra 
[\[178b.7\]]dang /_ad+ha ra dang /_dak+Shi Na rnams las a stA ti'i don la A ti 'gyur te/_byang phyogs su/_u t+ta rA ta/_A ti brjod don/_a d+ha rA ta/_'og phyogs su/_dak+Shi NA ta/_lho phyogs su/_nub phyogs su/_e na pa n+ya ta ra s+yA ma du re\u0f85 bany+tsa m+bAH/_ring po ma yin pa ya lnga pa ma yin pa las e nas na'o/_/
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]lnga ba'i mtha' ma yin pa'i bdun pa dang dang po dag gi mtha' las/_ad+ha ra/_dak+ShiN/_u t+ta ra rnams las thag ring po ma yin pa la e nas yang na 'gyur te/_a d+ha re Nab sa ti/_dak+Shi Ne na bas ti/_u t+ta re Na bas ti/_lnga pa min pa zhes pas lnga ba'i mtha' 
[\[179a.2\]]la mi 'gyur te/_nga si _u t+ta rA dA ga taH/_ring po yin na e nas mi 'gyur te/_nya sil _u t+ta da to hi ma bA na/_'grel bar lung drangs pa/[ \[]dik+Sha[\]]b+da mA trA ta/_phyogs tsam las kyang _'og ga nye bar gnas/_lho'i nye bar gnas/_byang gi nye bar gnas/_ro/_/phyogs brjod pa tsam la'ang e nas 'gyur 
[\[179a.3\]]te/_bU rbe Na/_dak+Shi Ne na/_byang nas 'ongs/_a bar Na/_u t+ta re Na/_dak+Shi NA dA tsa/_byang thag ring kha ba can/_dak+Shi Na las A tsa'o/_/dak+Shi Na las lnga pa bor ba'i bdun pa dang dang po'i mtha' las A tsa 'gyur te/_dak+Shi NA ba sa ti/_atsa _dak+Shi NA ra ma NI yaM/_lnga pa min pa 
[\[179a.4\]]shar phyogs/_lho phyogs/_zhes pas lnga pa la/_nub phyogs/_byang phyogs/_dak+Shi NA dA ga taH/_A hi tsa dU re/_ring bo las A hi 'ang ngo /_ring po brjod pa dang 'brel pa'i dak+Shi Na la bdun pa dang dang po'i mtha' la/_a tsa tsa dbyangs don/_lho ru gnas/_lho ru rtse/_A ha 'gyur te 'ang gi sgras atsa 
[\[179a.5\]]'ang ngo /_/A nyi _dak+Shi NA hi ba sa ti/_atsa _dak+Shi NA ba sa ti/_u t+ta rA ts+tsa/_lho nas 'ongs/_u t+ta ra las kyang ngo /_/u t+ta ra las kyang A tsa dang A hi dag 'gyur te/_atsa _u t+ta rA ba sa ti/_A hi _u t+ta rA hi ba sa ti/_saM khyA yA bi d+hA D+re d+hA/_grangs las rnam pa'i don la d+ha'o/_/grangs 
[\[179a.6\]]kyi sgra rnams las rnam pa'i don thag ring po'i lho phyogs su gnas/_la d+hA 'gyur nye/_tsa tuHpra kA raM/_zhes pa'i don la/_ca tu d+hA/_de bzhin du _e ka d+hA/_dwi d+hA/_ShoD+ha/_rnam pa drug/_thag ring po'am lhor gnas/_ShaD+D+hA/_pany+tsa d+hA/_sogs so/_/i kA r+d+ho d+h+ya munya n+ya ta ra s+yaM/_a ka las d+ha'i d+h+ya mu nya 
[\[179a.7\]]yang na'o/_/e ka las rnam pa'i don gyi rkyen d+hA ni d+hA mu nya zhes par yang na _rnam pa bzhi/_'gyur te/_rnam pa bzhi/_rnam pa gcig_/rnam pa gnyis/[ \[]Sha Sha la d+hA Sha'i u te d+ha'i D+ha 'os/_dz+ha la gyi dza sha 'os ShaDa/_rnam pa lnga/_e ka la d+hA d+hA d+h+ya nu nya 'phel don u brjod don /_ai kad+h+ya ma/_rnam pa gcig/_e 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]kad+hA/_e d+hA ts+tsa/_e d+hA 'ang ngo /_/dwi dang tri dag las rnam pa'i don gyi rkyen d+hA na e d+hA zhes par yang na 'gyur te/_dwe d+hA/_dwi d+hA/_tre d+hA/_tri ng+hi/_yA s+ye pA sha pa/_smad pa la pA sha pa'o/_/smad pa brjod pa las rang don lap+Shasha ba 'gyur te/_ku t+si to b+haM Sha ba/_/zhes pa'i don 
[\[179b.2\]]la/_b+hi Sha k+pA shaH/_'grel par lung drangs pa/_bA sha ka lba ka /[{]mye[,]me[}]/_'dod pa la/_pA sha pa ka lba dag go/_/rnam pa gnyis/_rnam pa gsum/_'dod pa'i don la'ang pA sha pa dang ka mya dag 'gyur te/_pa yaHka /[{]mye[,]me[}]/_zhes pa'i don la/_pA sha ba_pa ya sbA _mtsho byed ngan pa/_shaM/_kalba _pa 
[\[179b.3\]]'tsho byed ngan pa/_bA sha ba pa dbyangs don/_yaska lpaM/_i NaH ShaH/_i Na las Sha'o/_/rtags i Na so sor bsdu ba'i pha rol gyi rnam bcad ni rkyen pa sde dang ka sde dang po can pha rol la Sha yig ru 'gyur te/_sa rbi Sh+bA shaM/_'o ma 'dod dam chu 'dod/_pU ra Na d+b+hA ge yA da na/_'o ma 'dod dam chu 'dod/_rdzogs 
[\[179b.4\]]pa las tI ya las cha la a na'o/_/rdzogs pa'i rkyen tI ya'i mtha' can las cha'am skal pa'i don la _aN 'gyur te/_dI tI yo b+hA gaH/_zhes pa'i don la/_dwi tA yaH/_de bzhin du/_an _tri tI yaH/_sarbe la bA sha ba/_'o ma 'dod/_prA ge kA da sha b+h+yonya ts+tsha n+da si/_sdeb sbyor ma yin pa la bcu 
[\[179b.5\]]gcig gi snga ma rnams las so/_/rig byed brjod pa'i sdeb sbyor gyi don ma yin pas bcu gcig las snga ma ste grangs gnyis cha'am skal ba gnyis pa/_kyi sgra/_gnyis cha/_a nan dbyangs don/_rdzogs pa'i gsum cha/_rkyen can gcig nas bcu'i bar la chal an 'gyur te/_an/_tsa tu nraH/_an da sha 
[\[179b.6\]]maH/_sogs so/_/Sha Sh+ShA Sh+Ta mA b+h+yAM nya tsa/_ShaSh+Tha aSh+Ta ma dag las nya 'ang ngo /_/Sha Sh+Tha dang a Sh+Ta ma dag la chal nya'ang 'gyur te/_ShA Sh+ThaH/_an _Sha Sh+ThaH/_nya _A Sh+Ta maH/_an aSh+Ta maH/_b+hU ra rU rbe ca ra Ta_byung ba snga ma la tsa ra Ta'o/_/dus sngon du byung ba'i don bzhi cha/_bcu cha/
[\[179b.7\]]la tsa ra Ta 'gyur te/_b+hU ta pU rbo dri Sh+TaH/_sngon mthong bar gyur/_zhes pa'i don la/_tsa ra Ta Ta Ti ta sogs kyi don/_dr-i Sh+Ta tsa raH/_sngon mthong bar 'gyur/_nya nya 'gro ba la D+haphel/_drug pa/_de bzhin du/_tshar du A _brgyad pa/_D+h+ya ca raH/_sngon phyug por gyur/_sngon bzhon nur gyur/_ku mA ra tsa raH/_tsar Ta/_Sha Sh+Th+ya rU pya tsa/_drug ba las rU bya yang 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]ngo /_/drug pa'i mtha' lad dus sngon du byung ba brjod pa la rU pya 'gyur zhing tsa raT 'ang ngo /_/kri Sh+Na s+ya b+hA ta pU rbo gau/_zhes pa'i don la/_kr-i Sh+Na rU pyaHgau/_yang na tsa raT sbyar bas/_kr-i Sh+Na tsa raH gau/_de bzhin du/_b+hU ta pU rbA yA shu b+h+rA/_zhes pa'i don la/
[\[180a.2\]]shu b+hA rU pyaH_shu b+h+rA tsa raH/_a ti shA ya ne ta ma biSh+Sha no/_phul du byung ba la ta ma pa i Sh+Tha na dag ga go/_/mang po'i _nag po'i sngon du byung ba'i ba lang /_nang nas gcig_nag po'i sngon du byung ba'i ba lang /_phul du byung ba _nag po'i sngon du byung ba'i ba lang /_brjod pa la sngon dkar por gyur/_ta ma pa dang i Sh+Sha na 
[\[180a.3\]]rU pya _sngon dkar por gyur/_tsar Ta/_dag 'gyur te/_a yi me Sha ma ti sha ye na la g+tuH/_zhes pa'i don la/_la g+hu ta maH/_la g+hi Sh+Tha na/_la g+hu la/_ti ra sh+tsa/_ting las kyang ngo /_/pa tsa ti lta bu ting gi mtha' las kyang phul du byung ba brjod pa la ta ma pa 'gyur te/_a ti sha ye na pa tsa ti/
[\[180a.4\]]zhes pa'i don la/_pa tsa ti ta mAM/_mcho ba tA la dag 'di rnams kyi nang nas ches thung ba/_de bzhin du/_tam pa pa dbyangs dod/_ches thung ba/_yi Sh+Tha na na dbyangs don Ti'i 'os Ti phyis/_b+ha ba ti ta mAM/_dwi ba tsa na bi b+ha dz+yo pa pa de ta ra bI ya su nau/_brjod pa gnyis las bkar ba dang nye ba'i tshig phul du byung bar 'tshod ba/_la tar pa 
[\[180a.5\]]pa tsa til ta ma pa dang kim tir mi zad pa zhes pa la A mu/_I ya su na'o/_/brjod pa gnyis las gcig bkar te phul du byung ba brjod pa dang nye ba'i b+ha ba tel ta na pa dang A su/_mchog tu yod pa/_tshig ste tshig gzhan gong na yod pa las kyang phul du byung ba brjod pa la tar ba dang a'i ya sun dag 'gyur te/_a yam 
[\[180a.6\]]na yo ra ti sha ye na la g+huH/_zhes pa'i don la/_ches thung ba/_la g+hu ta raH/_la g+hI yA na/_ches thung ba/_de bzhin du nye ba'i tshig can la/_u d+hI ts+yAH_a ti sha ye na pa Ta baH/_byang pa rnams ches mkhas pa/_zhes pa'i don la/_byang pa rnams ches mkhas pra/_u dI tsI pa Tu _'di 'di dag gi nang nas phul byung ba'i thung ba/
[\[180a.7\]]ta raH/_ta ra ba dzas/_de bzhin du/_la g+hu la tar pa pa dbyangs don/_la g+hu la I ya spun Ti'o 'os Ti phyes na dbyangs don sa'i u uka 'gro ba la num gyi don num na'i u bad+hA ring po su phyis brtsegs pa'i mtha' phyis/_pA ts+yA pa Ti yA nas/_I ya su na Ti phyis dzas num u pa d+hA ring bo/_a dzA di gu Na ba tsa nA de ba/_a dza la sogs 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]pa rnams las yon tan brjod pa las 'di'o/_/a dza la sogs pa rnams las phul du byung ba la 'jug pa'i yon tan brjod pa la/_'di ste i Sh+Tha na dang I ya sun 'gyur te/_a ti sha ye na pr-i thuH/_zhes pa'i don la/_pra thi Sh+thaH/_rgya phud du byung ba/_ba thI yA na/_pr-i thu la A 
[\[180b.2\]]ya su/_ta ra p+ta ma bau g+haH/_ta ra pa _ta ma pa dag lta'o/_/phul du byung ba sogs brjod pa'i rkyen ta ra ba dang ta ma pa dag la g+ha'i ming can zhes brda chad byed do/_/ki ma ti da bya ya g+hA dA m+wa dra bya pra kar+She/_rgya phud du byung /_pri thu la iSh+Tha na ta la dang po'i ta zhes pas r-i ra Ti'i 'os u phyis/_rdzas ma yin _rgya phul du byung ba 
[\[180b.3\]]pa phul du byung ba la ki ma dang e dang ting dang mi zad pa rnams la g+ha las A mu'o/_/rdzas ma yin pa phul du byung ba mngon par brjod pa la kim dang e yig mtha' can rnams dang ting mtha' can rnams dang mi zad pa rnams las pha rol gyi rkyen g+ha'i ming can las A mu 'gyur te/
[\[180b.4\]]a ti sha ye na ki ma/_zhes pa'i don la/_kiM ta rAM/_ci zhig mchog_/ki ta mAM/_de bzhin du/_prA h+na ta rAM/_grA h+na ta mAM/_pa tsa ti tA rAM/_mchog tu 'tshod pa/_pa tsa ti ta mAM/_u ts+tse ta rAM/_u ts+tsai sta mA/_sogs te A mu'i mtha' can rnams kyang mi zad pa'o/_/rdzas ma yin pa zhes pas rnam bcad kyi 
[\[180b.5\]]ci zhig mchog_/ki ma la ta rab dang A mu u brjod don/_kim la ta ma pa dang A mu/_ci zhig mchog_/pra h+Ne la ta ra pa A mu/_nyi ma snga ma mchog/_drA h+ne la ta ma pa A mu/_ta ra pa A mu/_ta ma pa A mu/_u ts+tsau ta ra pa A mu/_ches mthong ba/_ta ma pa A su/_rdzas yin na A mu mi 'gyur te/_ta ra ba u ts+tsai ta raHta ruH/_lta bu'o/_/tu sh+tsha n+da si/
[\[180b.6\]]tr-i las sdeb sbyor la'o/_/kr-i ta sogs kyi rkyen tr-in dang tr-i tsa'i mtha' las rig byed kyi sdeb sbyor las kyang phul du byung pa'i don la i Sh+Tha na dang I ya sun 'gyur ro/_/tu ri Sh+Tha me yas s+su/_tra'i iSh+Tha na i man I ya sun rnams la'o/_/shing chos ring ba/_tr-in dang tr-i tsa'i rkyen gyi 
[\[180b.7\]]de phan gyi rkyen iSh+Sha na dang i man dang I ya sun pha rol la dbyi ste/_tril i Sh+Sha na tr-i phyis/_ka ri Sh+ThaH/_mchog tu byed pa/_ka ri maH/_kar+t+raM la i man/_kar+t+ri la I ya sun/_ka rI yA na/_mchog tu byed pa/_do hi trel i Sh+Tha na mdo 'dis tr-i phyis Ti'i 'os i phyis/_do hi Sh+ThaH/_mchog tu 'job/_do hi tr-il i man/_do hi maH/_mchog 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]tu 'jog _do hwi yA na/_pra sha s+ya s+ya shraH/_/pra sha s+ya zhes pa'i rtags ni iSh+Tha na dang I ya sun pha rol la shra zhes par 'gyur ro/_/pra kri t+yai kA tsa/_a tsa gcig pa la rang bzhin gyis so/_/rtags a ca gcig pa'i pha rol tu iSh+Tha na 
[\[181a.2\]]sogs gsum po byung na Ti dbyi [ \[]de te tral I [\]]ya sun/_ba ma yin te/_shre Sh+ThaH/_shre yA nA/_dz+ya tsa/_j+ya 'ang ngo /_/eSh+Tha na dang I ya sun pha rol la pra sha s+ya ni dz+ya zhes par 'gyur te/_/iSh+Tha na _dze Sh+ThaH/_dz+ya la I ya sun/_dz+yA dA dI yasaH/_dz+ya las I yas kyi A ta'o/_/pra sha s+ya 
[\[181a.3\]]dang br-i[\[] d+d+ha [\]]dz+ya du 'gyur _bra sha s+ya la iSh+Tha na pra s+ya shra ra 'gyur Ti me dbyi yon tan/_mchog gam gtso bo/_pra sha s+ya la I ya su na/_ba'i dz+ya kyi pha rol gyi I yas kyi I yas kyi I ni A ta du 'gyur te/_dz+yA yA na/_dr-i d+d+ha s+ya tsa/_br-i d+d+ha'i _bsu bo/_'ang ngo /_/i Sh+Tha na dang I ya sun pa rol la br-i d+d+ha zhes pa'ang dz+ya zhes par 
[\[181a.4\]]'gyur te/_a ti sha ye na bri d+d+haHpa/_zhes pa'i don la/_dz+yeSh+ThaH/_dz+yA yAn/_an+ti ka bA D+ha yo r+Na da sA d+hau/_an+ti ka dang bA D+ha dag gi ne da sA d+ha dag go/_/mthu bo'am gtso bo/_bra sha s+ya la I ya sun pra sha s+ya dz+ya du 'gyur I yas kyi I A aka 'dra ba la ring po num sogs/_rkyen iSh+Tha na dang I ya sun dag pha rol 
[\[181a.5\]]ches rgas ba'am rgas pa phul du byung ba/_la an+ti _br-i d+d+ha la iSh+Tha na/_ches rgas ba/_br-i d+d+ha la I ya sun/_ches rgas pa/_ka ni ne dang bA D+ha ni sA d+ha zhes par 'gyur te/_ne di Sh+ThaH/_ne dI yA na/_sA d+hi Sh+ThaH/_sA d+hiSh+ThaH/_che shos/_sA d+hi yA na/_s+thu la dU ra yu ba hra swa k+Shi pra k+Shu drA NAM ya NA di pa raM pU rba s+ya tsa gu Na/_s+thU la _dU ra 
[\[181a.6\]]yu ba _hra swa _k+Shi pra _k+Shu dra rnams kyi pha rol gyi dang po'i yaN ste snga mas kyang yon tan no/_/s+thu la sogs _an+ti ka la iSh+Tha ka ne dar 'gyur Ti phyis/_chung shos/_an+ti ka la I ya sun/_sA rta la/_iSh+Tha na dang I ya sun/_bA D+ha sA re d+ha re 'gyur Ta phyis/_pa 'di rnams kyi rkyen iSh+Tha na dang I ya sun dang i man pha rol 
[\[181a.7\]]gyi dang po'i rtags kyi mtha' na yaN so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yod na dbyi ste/_rtags kyi dang po'i atsa dang po'ang yon tan du 'gyur te/_s+tha biSh+ThaH/_ches sbom pa _lba bI yA na/_sU la la iSh+Tha dang I ya sun Ti phyis mdo 'dis aNa'i yi ge la phyis su yon tan i ca li bA ya sogs/_da biSh+ThaH/_ches ring ba/_dra bI lA na/_d+lu ra 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]la iSh+Than dang I la sun Ti phyis mdo 'dis _ya Na'i yi ger phyis dU yaM u yon tan e tsa'i a ya'o/_/ches dang bab/_ya beSh+ThaH/_yu ba la iSh+Than dang I ya sun Ti phyis mdo 'dis ya Na'i yi ge lba phyis u yon tan e ca'i ya ya sogs/_ya bI yA na/_ches dar bab/_hra siSh+ThaH/_ches thung ba/_hra sI yA na/_k+She piSh+ThaH/_ches mgyogs 
[\[181b.2\]]pa!_k+She pI yA na/_k+Shi di Sh+ThaH/_ches phran tshogs/_k+Sho dA+e yA na/_i man ni pri thu la sogs pa'i sogs khong hra swa dang /_k+Shi bra dang /_k+Shu dra gsum la 'jug pa nyid de s+thu la sogs 'di rnams thams cad la _hwa swa la i t+ta na dang I ya sun Ti phyis mdo 'dis yaNa'i yi ge lba phyis/_k+Shi za la aSh+Than dang I ya sun Ti phyis 
[\[181b.3\]]mdo 'dis ya Na'i ger gyis i yon tan/_k+Shu dral iSh+Than dang I ya sun Ti phyis mdo 'dis ya Na'i yi ger phyis u yon [(]tano[,]tan[)]/_'jug pa ma yin no/_/hra si maH/_thung du nyid/_k+Shepi maH/_k+Sho di maH/_pri ya s+thir sbi ru ba hu la gu ru br-i d+d+ha tr-i p+ta dI rgya dr-i n+ba ra kA NAM pra s+tha sba barbaM hi garba r+Shi hra pa drA g+hi pr-i n+dAH/_pri ya _s+thi ra _s+thi ra _u ru 
[\[181b.4\]]ba hu la _gu ru _br-i d+d+ha _tr-i p+ta _dI r+g+ha _br-i n+dA ra ka rnams kyi pra _sba _s+pha ba ra _hra swa la i man Ti phyis mdo 'dis yaNa'i yi ge lba phyis ba'o/_/k+Shi pra la i man/_mgyogs pa nyid/_phran chogs nyid/_k+Shu dra la i man/_baM hi _ga ra _bar+Shi _tra pa _drA g+hi _br-in+ha rnams so/_/iSh+Than dang I ya sun i man rnams pha rol la pri ya la 
[\[181b.5\]]sogs pa 'di rnams rim pa bzhin pra la sogs pa 'di rnams su 'gyur te/_bre Sh+ThaH/_mchog tu dga' ba/_pre yAn/_s+theSh+ThaH/_mchog tu brtan pa/_s+the yAn/_mchog tu 'phel ba/_s+pheSh+ThaH/_sbe yAn/_mchog tu 'phel ba/_ba ri Sh+ThaH/_bde legs ba'am mchog/_ba rI yAn/_baM hi t+ThaH/_mchog tu mang ba/_baM hI 
[\[181b.6\]]yAn/_ga ri Sh+ThaH/_mchog tu lcig_ga rI yA na/_pri ya la iSh+Than dang I ya sun mdo 'dis pri ya bra ru 'gyur bar yon tan/_s+thir la iSh+Thin dang I a sun mdo 'dis s+thir s+thar 'gyur yon tan/_s+thir la iSh+Than dang I ya sun sbir s+phar 'gyur yon tan/_u ru la iSh+Tha ya sun mdo 'dis u ru ba rar 'gyur Ti phyis/_ba tu la iSh+Than dang a'i la sun mdo 'dis ba hu 
[\[181b.7\]]la baM hir 'gyur Ti phyis/_yu ru la iSh+Than dang I ya sun mdi 'dis su ru ga rar 'gyur Ti phyis/_bar+Shi Sh+ThaH/_ches rgas ba/_bar+ShI yA na/_br-id+d+ha la iSh+Than dang I ya sun mdo 'dis baMd+d+ha bar+Shi ru 'gyur Ti phyis/_hra piSh+ThaH/_ches chom pa/_ta bI yA na/_tr-i b+ta la iSh+Than dang I la sun mdo 'dis hra b+ha tra pa ru 'gyur Ti gyis/_drA g+hiSh+ThaH/_ches ring ga drA g+hi yAn/_dri d+ha ba iSh+Than dang a'i ya sun mdo 'dis dI r+d+ha chA g+hi ru 'gyur 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]Ti phyis/_br-i n+ngi Sh+ThaH/_ches tshogs pa/_br-i n+dI yAn/_'di rnams kyi nang nas pri ya a ru _a ru _ba hu la _gu ru _dI r+g+ha rnams pr-i thu la sogs pa'i nang tshan yin pas i man 'gyur te/_pre maH/_dga' ba nyid/_ba ri maH/_brang nyid/_mang bo nyid/_baM nyi maH/_ba hu la/_i man ba hu la baM hir 'gyur 
[\[182a.2\]]phyis/_ga ri maH/_br-i n+dA nga ka la iSh+Than dang I ya sun mdo 'dis br-in+dA ra ka bra n+dar 'gyur Ti phyis/_drA g+hi maH/_ba ho rmo po b+hU tsa ba haH/_ba hu las dbyi ste ba hu'i b+hU'o/_ba hu'i pha rol tu I ya sun iSh+Tha na i man _thi ya la i man thi ya thu ru 'gyur yon tan/_u ru la i man u ru ba rar 'gyur Ti phyis/_rnams byung na rkyen de rnams kyi thog 
[\[182a.3\]]b+ho ba nyid/_tha ru la i man gu ru ga rar 'gyur Ti phyis/_dI r+d+ha la i man dI r+g+ha drA b+hir 'gyur Ti phyis/_cher ring ba/_ma'i yi ge dbyi zhing ba hu'ang b+hU zhes par 'gyur te/_b+hU yAn/_ches mang ba/_b+hA maH/_mang ba nyid/_i Sh+Tha s+ya yiT+tsa/_iSh+Than gyi yiT 'ang ngo /_/ba hu la iSh+Than sbyin pa na iSh+Than phyi i dbyi zhing ba hu la b+hUr 
[\[182a.4\]]'gyur la iSh+Than la yiT A ga ma yang 'gyur te/_b+hU yi Sh+ThaH/_ches mang ba/_yu bA lba yoHka nA n+ya ta ra s+yAM/_ba hu la I ya sun mdo 'dis I phyis ba hu b+hUr 'gyur/_ba hu la i man mdo 'dis i phyis ba tu b+hU ru 'gyur/_yu ba alba dag gi ka na yang na'o/_/iSh+Than a'i ya sun dag pha rol la yu ba dang alba dag ni 
[\[182a.5\]]ka na zhes par yang na 'gyur te/_ka nyiSh+ThaH/_ches dar ba la bam ches tung ba/_ka nI yA na/_ches dar bab bam ches chung ba/_yang na/_ya bi Sh+ThaH/_ches dang badra/_ya bI yA na/_ches nyung ba/_a lbiSh+ThaH/_a lbiSh+ThaH/_iSh+Than/_I ya sun/_a lbI yA na/_chas nyung ba/_bin+ma to t+lu ka_/bin ma tu pa dag gis 'jig go/_/rtags 
[\[182a.6\]]yu ba 'am a lba la iSh+Than tu ba'am a lba ka nar 'gyur Ti phyis/_yu ba'am a lbal I ya sun rtags ka nar 'gyur Ti phyis/_/yu ba la iSh+Than dang I ya un Ti gyis s+thu la blu sogs kyi mdos yaNa'i yi ge ba phyis u yon tan e tsa'i a ya sogs/_de bin dang ma tu pa kyi mtha' can yin la rkyen iSh+Than dang a'i ya sun pha rol la bin dang ma tu pa 'jig ste/
[\[182a.7\]]sra dziSh+ThaH/_ches byed can/_sra rda'i yAn/_bin gyi mtha' can sra sbin la iSh+Tan dang I ya sun mdo 'dis bin 'dig/_twa dziSh+ThaH/_ches pa bas ba can/_twa dzI yA na/[ \[]ma num kyi mtha' can twa bA tu la iSh+Than dang I ya sun mdo 'dis ma tu ba 'jig[\] ]/pra shaM sA yAM tU ba yaH/_kha bsgyur ba la rU pa ya'o/_/mi mkhas pa la mkhas par ba rdzus pa lta bu'i 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]don la rtags dang ting mtha' las kyang rU pa ya 'gyur te/_bra sha staHpaTuH/_zhes pa'i don la/_ba Tu dU baH/_de bzhin du/_pa tsa ti rU paM/_I Shad pa ris mA p+tau ka lba pa de shI ya raH/_cung zad yongs su ma rdzogs pa dag la ka lba pa de sh+ya de shI yar rnams so/_/
[\[182b.2\]]bya ba gang yin pa de phal cher rdzogs _rdzus ma'i cha las ba/_mkhas pa'i gzugs sam rdzus ma'i mkhas pa/_ba Tu la ya ya dbyangs don/_'chod par brdzus pa/_zin pa cung zad tsam yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i don ting mtha' dang rtags rnams las ka lba pa _de sh+ya _de shI yar rnams 'gyur te/_I ShA 
[\[182b.3\]]dU no bi dwA na/_zhes pa'i don la/_bi dwa t+ka lbaH/_cung zad dman pa'i mkhas pa/_de bzhin du/_ya sha ska lbaH/_cung zad dman pa'i grags pa can/_bi dwa d+de sh+yaH/_cung zad dman pa'i mkhas pa/_bi dwa d+de shI yaH/_ba tsa ti kalbaM/_ba tsa ti de sh+yaH/_pa tsa ti de shI yaH/_bi b+hA ShA _cung zad dman pa'i mkhas pa/
[\[182b.4\]]su bo ba hu c+mu ra stA ta/_bi tra sa la kasma bas dbyangs don ba su sra su d+hAM su aN Tu ha sogs kyi mdos sad khar la tsar 'os da [\[]te[\]]/_su ba las ba hu tsa yang na ste dang _bi dwi sa las de sh+ya dang de shI ya rar dbyangs don bsu sogs kyi mdos sa da/_bor 'o/_/sub _cung zad chos pa/_cung zad mu chos pa/_ste su sogs 'jug pa'i gzhi'i rtags rnams 
[\[182b.5\]]las cung zad ma rdzogs pa'i don la ba hu tsa yang na 'gyur te rkyen ba hu tsa ni rtags de'i sngon du'ang 'jogs par bya'o/_/I Sha dU no pa TuH/_zhes pa'i don la/_ba hu pa TuH/_pa Tu kalbaH/_pra kA ra ba tsa ne dzA tI yar _rnam pa brjod pa la dzA tI yar 'o/_/rnam pa brjod pa'i don la 
[\[182b.6\]]dzA tI yar 'gyur [\[]te[\]]/_maTu bra kA raH/_zhes pa'i don la/_paTu dzA tI yaH/_g+ha rU ba ka lba tse laT brub go _cung zad dman pa'i mkhas pa/_baTu la rkyen ba hu tsa sngon du bzhag tsa dbyangs don/_cung zad dman pa'i mkhas pa/_tra ma ta ha te Shu d+Ye\u0f85ne kA tso hwa swaH/_g+ha rU pa _kalba _tse laT _bru ba _go tra _ma ta _ha ta rnams 
[\[182b.7\]]mkhas pa'i rigs sam rang bzhin _la dI'i atsa [ \[]mkhas [\]]pa'i rang bzhin/_bA tA+ai ya rar dbyangs don/_gcig ma yin pa las thung du'o/_/rkyen g+ha'i ming can rnams dang rU pa la sogs pa 'di rnams pha rol la rtags a tsa gcig pa ma yin pa'i mtha'i bud med du brjod pas rkyen dI ba dang dISha dag thung ngur 'gyur 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]te/_brA h+ma NI la/_tar sogs sbyar bas/_brA h+ma Ni ta rA/_brA h+ma ta mA/_brA h+ma Ni rU pAM/_rU pa TA ba/_brA h+ma Ni ka lbA/_kalba TA ba/_brA h+ma Ni tso lI/_the laT dI ba/_brA h+ma Ni bru bA/_thu ba TA ba/_brA h+ma Ni go trA/_po tra T+ra ba/_brA h+ma Ni ma tA/_pa ta TA pa/_brA h+ma Ni ha tA/_ha ha TA pa/_sogs te mdo 
[\[183a.2\]]'dis dI mtha' thung ngur bsgyur ba'o/_/na d+yAHa n+ya ta ra s+yaM/_na dI'i _bram ze mo mchog tar ba TA ba/_bram zes mo brju sam/_cung zad dman pa'i bram ze mo/_cung zad dman pa'i bram ze mo/_cung zad dman pa'i bram ze mo/_yang na'o/_/bram ze ma'i rigs/_dI mtha' ma _cung zad dman pa'i bram ze mo/_yin kyang bshad ma thag pa'i 
[\[183a.3\]]rkyen rnams pha rol la na dI'i ming can rnams kyi'ang thung ngur yang na 'gyur te/_ba mo ru ta rA/_ba mo rU ta rA/_sti ta rA/_stI ta rA/_sogs te rtags mtha' thung ngur byed pa dang mi byed pa yang na bste rkyen gzhan rnams la'ang rigs 'gre'o/_/na dI'i ming can yin kyang la k+Shi dang ta 
[\[183a.4\]]rI dang ta n+tI rnams ni thung ngur mi 'gyur te/_la k+Sh+mi ta rA/_ta rI ta rA/_ta n+tI ta rA/_mchog tu brla mdzes ma/_bud [\[]med [\]]mchog ma/_sogs so/_/u gi ta sh+tsa/_u ka 'gro ba las kyang ngo /_/rtags u ka so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge 'gro ba la dI byin pa' mtha' yang rkyen g+ha'i ming can 
[\[183a.5\]]dpa' mchog ma'am mchog tu bun sum tshogs ma/_sogs pha rol la thu mchog ma/_sgra snyan mchog ma/_thung ngur yang na 'gyur te/_bi du Sha ta rA/_mchog tu mkhas ma/_bi du ShI ta rA/_sa ti ta rA/_mchog tu'ang tshul ma/_sa tI ta mA/_prA gi bA t+kaH/_'di las gong du ka'o/_/'di las zhes pa grangs med pa 
[\[183a.6\]]thi dA su la Sha 'phro ba gaur sogs kyis rI sa u 'phro ba ba su'i slar yang dag par 'gyur ro zhes pas pa u mdo 'dis yang na thung ngur 'gyur ba dang mi 'gyur ba yang na ba/_sa tr-i la Shi ta gaur sogs kyis dI [\[]ba mi 'gro ba [\]]mdo 'dis thung 'gyur ba dang pi 'gyur ba yang na ba/_sa tha nA ma rnams kyi Ti'i sngon du a ka tsa'o zhas pa las gong du don gang yin pa de la ka 
[\[183a.7\]]'gyur ro zhes skyer btang ba'o/_/a dz+hA ti/_mi shes pa la'o/_/mi shes pa'i don brjod pa la ka 'gyur te/_ka s+ya a yi a shaH/_'di su'i rta/_zhes pa'i don la/_a shA kaH/_su'i rta/_de bzhin du/_pa ya skaM/_su'i chu'am su'i 'o ma/_ku t+si te/_smad pa la'o/_/smad pa'i don la'ang ka 'gyur te/
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]ku t+si tonya shwa/_zhes pa'i don la/_a shwa kaH/_'grel par/_de [\[]bar [\]]t+ta lta bu rtags yi ge gnyis gnyis byas pa gnyis bsgrigs pas rtags phyi ma ka pha rol la yang na dbyi'o zhes bshad pas de ba dA t+ta kaHde ba kaH/_apya ya sarba nA m+nA ma ka ts+p+ra ka TeH/_mi zad pa sarba nA pa rnams 
[\[183b.2\]]rta ngan pa/_gyi Ta'i gong du a ka tsa'o/_/rtang na pa/_mi zad pa rnams dang sa rba nA ma rnams las mi shes pa sogs kyi don la a ka tsa 'gyur zhing de yang rtags kyi Ti'i gong du sbyin par bya ste/_u ts+tsa ltas sbyin ngan ba'am su'i [\[]ltas sbyin[\]]/[ \[]da t+ta phyis pa'o[\]]/_/kaiH/_mtho ba sug _nI tsa kaiH/_dma' ba su'i/_thams cad su'i 'am thams 
[\[183b.3\]]cad ngan pa/_sarba ke/_dzas shi/_dzas she/_u b+ha ke/_ba tis su'i 'am ngan pa/_'grel par/_rtags su ba kyi mtha' can rnams dang byings ting gi mtha' can rnams las kyang mi shes pa sogs _u ts+tsus la Ti'i sngon du a ka tsa tsa dbyangs don a brjod don/_kyi don la _ni tsi sa la ti'i sngon du aka tsa/_sub mtha' yin 
[\[183b.4\]]sarba la Ti'i sngon du katsa/_u b+ha la Ti'i sngon du a ka tsa/_na rtags dang ting mtha' yin na ti sogs kyi Ti'i gong du a ka tsa 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/_yu Sh+ma kA b+hiH/_khyed rnams kyis mi shas/_a sma kA b+hiH/_yu ba ka yoH/_khyed dag gis mi shes/_A ba ka yoH/_rang dag gis mi shes/_byed rnams la mi shes/_yu Sh+ma 
[\[183b.5\]]kA su/_a sma kA su/_bed rnams la mi shes/_tA ya kA/_khyed kyis mi shes/_ma ya kI/_ded kyis mi shes/_twa ya ki/_ma ya kyi/_ded la yi shes/_yA Sh+mA b+hoHdang a smA b+haH/_rtags kyi Ti'i gong du a ka tsa byin pa'o/_/nged rnams kyis mi shes/_yu ba ka yoHdang A ba yoHdag gi Ti'i gong du ka tsa/_pa tsa ta ki/_'tshod par ngan pa'am mi shes/
[\[183b.6\]]yu smA su dang smA su dag rtags kyi Ti'i gong du a ka tsa/_tA yA dang ma yA dag gi rtags kyi Ti'i gong du a ka tsa/_pa Tha ta ki/_khyed la mi shes/_tA yi dang ma yi dag gi rtags [\[]kyi[\]] gong du a ka tsa/_ka s+ya tsadaH/_ka'i 'ang da'o/_/mi zad pa rnams kyi mthar ka yig yod na de'i Ti'i gong du a ka tsa/_pa tsa ti la Ti'i gong du a ka tsa/_byin pa na ka 
[\[183b.7\]]srog mad de da srog med du 'gyur te/_su ngan ba/_b+ha kita/_d+ha ki dang he ru _ba Tha te la Ti'i gong du a ka tsa/_su'i klog/_ka dang br-i thag rnams las Ti'i gong du a ka tsa mdo 'dis ka rnams dag nas med pa sogs phyis da bA hi ra _ku ta/_su'i nad/_pri tha ka ta/_so sor su/_ku tA+e sha mI shu N+DAb+h+yoHraH/_ku TI _sha mI _shuN+DA rnams las ra'o/_/
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]ku Ti sogs 'di rnams las thung ngu'i don lar 'gyur te/_hra sra ku TI/_zhes pa'i don la/_ku TI raH/_de bzhin du/_sha mI raH/_shu N+Da raH/_bat+so k+Sha _shwa r+Sha b+he sh+tsa ta nu twe/_ba t+sa _u k+Sha _a shwa rnams las lus nyid la'o/_/bet+sa la sogs pa 'di 
[\[184a.2\]]rnams las rang bzhin gyi lus nyid brjod pa la Sh+Ta ra tsa 'gyur te/_Sha 'gro ba'i ming _sa phug chung du/_can te Shi ta la dI Sha'i don _sa phug chung du/_rgyu mtshan _shing sha mi thung ngu/_glang po che'i sna bu ga thung du/_med na rgyu mtshan can yang med do zhes pas Ta yang tar log go/_ta nu ba t+saH/_zhes pa'i don la/
[\[184a.3\]]bat+sa ta raH/_rI/_ma dIg de bzhin du/_u k+Sha ta raH/_rI/_mdISha/_a shA ta raH/_rI/_mdISha/_r-i Sha g+ha ta raH/_rI/_mdISha/_kim yat+ta do ni r+d+d+hAr dwa yo ka s+ya ta ra za/_kim yata tad las gnyis las gcig nges par 'dzin pa la Ta ra tsa'o/_/kim yad _be'u'i lus sam byis pa'i lus/_tad 
[\[184a.4\]]be'u'i lus sam byis pa'i lus/_dar ma'i lus sam glang gi dus/_rnams las _rta yi lus/_gnyis kyi nang _khyu mchog gi bus/_nas gcig nges par 'dzin pa'i don la Da ta ra tsa 'gyur te/_a na yo ka ta ro paTuH/_a na yo ya ta ro paTuH/_a na yo ta ta ro pa Tu rA ga ts+tsha tu/_bA ba hU nAM dzA ti ba ri pra sh+ne Da ta ma tsa/
[\[184a.5\]]mang po rnams kyi rigs 'dri ba la Da ta ma tsa yang na'o/_mang po rnams kyi nang nas gcig nges par bkar te rigs 'dri ba'i don la Da ta _kim la Da ta ra tsa ced byangs don Di ha la Ti phyes de'i don/_'di dag las mkhas pa su/_yad laDa ta ra tsa/_'di dag las mkhas pa gang yin/_'di dag las mkhas pa de tshud shog_/ma tsa yang na 
[\[184a.6\]]'gyur te/_e ShAM ka ta mo brA h+ma NaH/_e ShAM ya ta mo brA h+ma NaH/_e ShAM ta ta mo brA h+ma NaH/_yang na a ka tsa sbyar bas/[ \[]e ShAM ka kaHbrA h+ma NaH/_e ShAM ya kaHbrA g+ma NaH/_'di rnams kyi nang nas bram ze gang /_e ShAM sa kaHbrA h+ma NaH/_e kA ts+tsa bA tsAM/_e ka las kyang shar pa rnams 
[\[184a.7\]]kyi'o/_/'di rnams kyi nang nas bram ze su/_kim laDa ta ma tsa/_'di rnams kyi nang nas bram ze gar/[ \[]yad [\]]'aDa ta ma tsa/_'di rnams kyi nang nas bram ze de/_ta ta laDa ta ma tsa/_'di rnams kyi nang nas bram ze su/_kaHla a ka tsa Ta'i [\[]shor du[\]]/_ya ra la Ti'i gong du a katsa/_sa tsa la Ti'i sngon du a ka tsa/_'di rnams kyi nang nas bram ze de/_bshad ma thag pa'i don de dag la e_ka las kyang 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]Ta ta ra tsa dang Da ta ma tsa dag 'gyur te/_sngon gyi shar phyogs kyi slob dpon rnams kyi 'dod pas so/_/e ta yo re ka ta ro bi praH/_e ShA me ka ta mo bi praH/_e Sh+Tha me ka kaHbi praH/_'grel par lung drangs pa/_a n+ya sha b+hA taDa ta na ts+tsa/_a n+ya gyi sgra las Da ta ma tsa'ang ngo /_/a n+ya gyi sgra las kyang Da ta ma tsa 'gyur 
[\[184b.2\]]te/_e shA mya n+ya ta maH/_sarba sha b+de b+h+yaHswA r+the ka na/_skra thams cad las rang don la kana'o/_/'di dag las gcig bram ze/_e ka Da ta ra tsa/_'di rnams kyi nang nas gcig bram ze/_e ka la Da ta ra tsa/_e ka ta la Ti'i gong du a ga tsa/_'di rnams kyi nang nas gcig bram ze/_sgra thams cad de gang yang rung ba de la rang don brjod pa la ka na 'gyur 
[\[184b.3\]]te/_ba hu ta ra ka/_a [\[]n+ya[\]] la Da ta ma tsa/_'di rnams kyi nang na gzhan yod/_kan+yA la kaH/_kenyaNaH/_ka la aNa'i 'o/_/rkyen kan pha rol la rtags mtha' aN so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge ring po yod na thung ngur 'gyur te/_ga n+ya kA aN so sor bsdu ba ma yin na thung ngur mi 'gyur te/_nau kaH/_'grel par lung drangs pa/_tI yA 
[\[184b.4\]]ka nan dbyangs don/_mchog tu mang ba/_dI ka ka swA nre/_tI ya las rang don la I ka ka'o/_/rkyen tI yi mtha' can la rang don la I ka ka 'gyur te/_dA+ai tI yI kaH/_gnyis pa nyid/_gzhon nu ma/_tA rtI yI kaH/_pra dz+nyA di b+h+ya sh+tsa/_pra dz+nyA la sogs pa _gru nyid/_rnams las kyang ngo /_/pra dz+nyA la sogs 
[\[184b.5\]]pa rnams las kyang rang don la aN 'gyur te/_prA dz+nyaH/_dI pa _drA dz+nyI/_tsau raH/_dI ba _tsau rIH/_saM khyA yAH_kr-i yA b+h+yAM br-i t+ti gaN ne ky-i twa su tsa/_hwi tI ya la _I ka ka ka 'gro ba la 'phel ba/_gsus pa nyid/_tr-i t-I ya la I ka ka/_grangs las bya ba lan grangs la tr-i twa su tsa'o/_/grangs las bya ba dang 'brel 
[\[184b.6\]]pa'i lan grangs brjod pa la kr-i twa su tsa 'gyur te/_pra dz+nyA la aN 'phel ba/_shes rab/_shes rab ma/_tsau ra aN/_chom rkun/_chom rkun ma/_pa ny+tsa bA rA na b+huM k+ta/_zhes pa'i don la/_pany+tsa kr-i twaHb+huM k+te/_de bzhin du/_ka ti kr-i twaHb+huM k+te/_dwi traM tsa tu r+b+h+yaH su tsa/_dwi tr-i tsa tu ra rnams las su tsa 'o/_/dwi dang tr-i dang tsa tu ra 
[\[184b.7\]]rnams las bya ba dang 'brel pa'i lan grangs brjod pa la su tsa 'gyur te/_lan grangs lnga za bar byed/_lan grangs lnga za bar byed/_lan grangs ci tsam za bar byed/_dwi ya su tsa tsa dbyangs don u brjod don sa sa dzu sogs/dri r+b+huM k+te/_lan grangs gnyis za bar byed/[ \[]tri 'a [\]]su tsa tsa dbyangs don u brjod don sa sa dzu sogs/[ \[]t-i k+ba Tha [\]]
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]ti/_lan grangs gsum klog par byed/_tsa tu dra Tha ti/_lan grangs bzhi klog par byed/_e ka s+ya sa kr-i ts+tsa/_e ka 'is kr-i ta'ang ngo /_/e ka las bya ba dang 'brel ba'i lan grangs brjod pa la su tsa 'gyur zhing /_su tsa pha rol e ka su tsa dang bcas pas kr-i ta zhes par 
[\[185a.2\]]'gyur te/_sa kr-i te/_ba hwa l+b+yA r+thA ts+tsha skA ra kA da n+ya ta ra s+yI/_ba tu ra la su tsa tsa dbyangs don u brjod don ra las sa 'os sa yang phyis/_mang ba dang nyung ba'i don las byed pa las shas yang na'o/_/mang ba dang nyung ba'i don brjod pa las byed pa ste rnam dbye byed pa can rnams kyi don la shas yang na 'gyur te/[ \[]pha bu 
[\[185a.3\]]hU [\]]ni/_rkyen shas lan gcig/_be hu shaH/[ \[]b+hil[\] ]ba hu b+hiH/_shas _ba hu shaH/_b+h+yas _ba hu b+h+yAH/_shas _ba hu shaH/_sub _ba hu ShuH/_shas _ba hu shaH/_de bzhin du/_b+hu rI shaH/_b+hu rIn sogs dang /_al+b+ya shaH/_a l+b+yaM/_sta ka shaH/_sta kaM/_sogs so/_/byed pa can zhes pas rnam 
[\[185a.4\]]bcad _mang po rnams/_kyi byed can _mang po rnams kyis/_mang po rnams kyis/_mang po rnams las/_mang po rnams la/_mang po rnams las/_mang po rnams la/_min na mi 'gyur te/_mang po rnams la/_ba hU nAM swA mI/_saM _thung du la/_thung ngu la/_khyai ka ba tsa _nyung ngu la/_nA ts+tsa pi p+mA yAM/_grangs gcig tshig las thob par 
[\[185a.5\]]'dod pa la'ang ngo /_/grangs kyi sgra gcig tu brjod pa la thob bar 'dod pa'i don la'ang shas 'gyur te/_dwau dwau de hi/_zhes pa'i don la/_shas _dwi shaH de hi/_de bzhin du/_mang po rnams kyi [\[]rtso [\]]bo/_shas _tri shaHde hi/_pra ti yo ge dany+tsa myA sta si/_pra ti sbyor ba la lnga pa las ta si'o/_/bra ti 
[\[185a.6\]]sbyor ba las rnam dbyi lnga pa'i don la ta si 'gyur te/_bA su de bA t+b+ra ti/_zhes pa'i don la/_bA su de ba taH_gnyis gnyis dag byin cig/_pra ti/_A di ma d+h+yA t+ta _gnyis byin cig_/pr-i Sh+Tha pA r+shA de sh+tsa/_A di ma d+h+ya las ta te _gsum byin cig_/pr-i Sh+Tha pA r+shA pA r+shA la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo /_A di dang ma 
[\[185a.7\]]d+h+ya dag las lnga pa'i don la ta 'gyur zhing priSh+Tha bA r+shA la/_nor lha'i bu las so so/_sogs pa rnams _ta si i brjod don/_las kyang 'gyur te/_nor lha'i bu las so so/_A di ta/_dang po las/_ma d+h+ya ta/_dbus ma [\[]la[\]]sa/_br-i sh+Tha ta/_phyi ma las/_br-i Sh+Tha ta/_phyi ma las/_pA r+Sha ta/_a pA dA na tsA hI ya ru hoH/_byung khungs la yang hI ya ru ha dag 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]ma yin ba las so/_/hI ya ste byings o hA ka dang ru ha dag dang sbyor ba ma yin pa'i byung khungs brjod pa'i lnga pa'i don la'ang ta si 'gyur te/_ngas _grA mA dA ya ti/_grA mA taHA yati/_spyas tsau re b+h+yo baM b+he ti/_ta si _tsau ra taHbi b+he ti/_ta si _tsau ra taHbi b+he te/_hA ka ru ha dag dang sbyor ba la ta si mi 'gyur ba'i dper 
[\[185b.2\]]brjod ni/_ngasi_sA r+thA ta hi te/_ngasi _parba tA da ba ro ha hi/_a b+hu ta ta b+b+ha be kr-i b+h+wa sti yo ge saM pa d+ya ka r+t+ta ri tswiH/_ma byung ba de byung ba la kr-i b+hU a sti sbyor _brong nas 'ongs so/_/ta saM i brjod don/_ba la phun sum _chom dun rnams [\[]las 'jigs [\]]so/_tshogs pa'i byed pa la tswi'o/_/phun sum tshogs pa'i byed pa 
[\[185b.3\]]brjod pa can dus dang 'brel _de don la 'phags/_de las 'thab/_pa ma byung ba de byung bar byed pa'i don la kr-i dang b+hU dang a sti rnams dang sbyor ba la tsI 'gyur te/_a s+ya tswau/_a'i tswi la'o/_/rtags mtha'i a yig mtha' can ni rkyen tswi pha rol la I ru 'gyur te/_be rlo paH/_bi'i dbyi'o/_/rkyen tsi'i 
[\[185b.4\]]rkyen gyi ngang po'i tsu Tu zhes pas tsa phyis pa'i rjes pi yang dbyi ste/_a kr-iSh+NaHkr-i Sh+NaH/_saM pa d+ya te ga ro ti/_zhes pa'i don la/_kr-iSh+NI _ka ro ti/_dkar po min pa dkar po byed/_a bra h+ma bra h+d+ma saM pa d+ya te b+ha ba ti/_zhes pa'i don la/_tsi _bra h+mA b+ha ba ti/_tshig sbyor de dang 'dra bar byas pas/_ma tri ka ro ti/
[\[185b.5\]]a gad+gA ga d+gA saM pa d+ya te s+ya/_zhes pa'i don la/_gad+gI ka ro ti/_nag po man pa nag po/_phun sum tshogs par byed/_kr-i D+NA la tsI tsa phyis baM dbyi'o sa'i phyis a'i tsI la 'os a I/_a gAH gA rgyaHsaM bad+ya ka ro ti/_tshangs pa min pa tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa byung /_zhes pa'i don la/_gA rgya la tswi/_ka ro ti/_tshangs pa byung /_kya tswau tsa/_ma tri la tswir te khyi rI 'os r-i dI nI phyis/_mar byed/
[\[185b.6\]]gang snga ma yin pa gang gA phun sum tshogs par gyur/_gad+gAr gyur/_kya tswi la 'ang ngo /_/rkyen kya dang tswi pha rol la/[ \[]drang [\]]srong gargA'i bu ma yin pa gargA'i bur byed do/_/rtags byings kyi mtha'i hal dang brtsegs pa'i ya yig ni dbyi ste/_gA rgI ka ro ti/_tswau tsa/_tswi la 'ang ngo /_/tswi pha rol la rtags mtha' 
[\[185b.7\]]ika so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yin na ring por 'gyur te/_shu tsi la tsi/_shu tsI b+ha ba ti/_gtsang ma byung /_gtsang ma byung /_baTu la tsI/_ba TU s+yA ta/_mkhas par 'gyur/_'grel bar lung drangs pa/_a bya ya s+ye twa dI r+g+hau ne ti ke tsi ta/_mi zad gargA'i bur bya'o/_pa'i i ring po dag la lar mi 'gyur ro/_/mi zad pa'i sde 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]yin na tswi pha rol la a Ir 'gyur ba dang i ka ring por 'gyur ba sogs la lar mi byed de/_tswi _di bA s+yA t+ya/_tswi _swa sti s+yA ta/_a ru t+ma na sh+tsa k+tsa sh+tse to ra hor dza swaM lo pa sh+tsa/_a rus _ma nas _tsa k+Shus _tse tas _ra has ra dzas rnams kyi dbyi'o/_/a rus 
[\[186a.2\]]sogs 'di rnams kyi mtha'i sa yig rnams tswi pha rol la dbyi ste/_a rU ka ro ti/_rma byung ngo /_a rU b+ha ba ti/_rma byed do/_/nyid mor gyur/_bde legs su gyur cig_/a rU s+ha ta/_rmar gyur/_de bzhin du/_u n+ma nI/_u ts+tsa k+ShU/_bi tsi tI/_ba ra hI/_mi ra dzI/_sogs te rnams la a ka 
[\[186a.3\]]ro ti dang b+ha ba ti dang s+yAta sbyor ba sogs rigs 'gre'o/_/bi b+hA ShA sA ti kA [\[]k+Sh+s+wa/[\] ]tswis phyis ika ring po/_tswis phyis ika ring po/_rdzogs pa la sA ti yang na'o/_/rdzogs tswis phyis ika ring po/_ba'i don dang 'brel ba'i [\[]skyo ba/[\] ]gyan mig/_sems log_/chags 'dod/_rdu ba med/_tswi'i yul la sA ti yang na 'gyur ro/_/
[\[186a.4\]]sA t+ba _dA d+yoH/_sA ta dang tshig gi dang po dag gi'o/_/sa Shar 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can gyi yi ge sngon na yod kyang tshig kho rang gi cha shas ma yin pa'i tshig gzhan gyi thog ma'i sa yig dang rkyen sA ti sa ni Shar mi 'gyur ro/_/tshig gzhan gyi thog ma la mi 'gyur ba'i dper brjod ni/_da d+hi sany+tsa twi/
[\[186a.5\]]kr-i t+k+naM sha s+t+raM a g+niHsaM ba t+ya te ka ro ta/_zhes pa'i don la/_ag+ni sA taM ka ro ti/_yang na/_ag+ni ka ro ti/_a b+hi bi d+hau saM pa dA tsa/_mngon par khyab pa la saM ba da las kyang ngo /_/mngon par khyab pa'i don la kr-i dang b+hU dang a sti saM pa da rnams dang sbyor ba las kyang sA ti 'gyur te/_zho ldugs par byed/
[\[186a.6\]]me yi mtshon chas rdzogs par phun sum tshogs par byed/_sA ti _ag+ni sA t+saM pa d+ya ti/_mes rdzogs par byed/_mes rdzogs par byed/_sA ti _ag+ni sA t+ka ro ti/_sA ti _ab+ni sA ta b+ha ba ti/_sA rti _ag+ni sA t+s+ya ta/_ta da d+hi na ba tsa ne/_de'i g.yog 'khor brjod pa la'o/_/de'i g.yog 'khor brjod pa'i don la kraM b+hU a sti saM 
[\[186a.7\]]ba da rnams dang sbyor ba la sA ti 'gyur te/_me phun sum tshogs pas khyab par byed/_rA dz+nyaHa d+hi na ka ro ti/_rgyal po'i g.yog 'khor byed/_mes khyab par byed/_mes khyab par byung /_mes khyab par gyur/_zhes pa'i don la/_sA ti _rA dza sA t+ka ro ti/_rgyal po'i g.yog 'khor byed/_de bzhin du/_sA ti _rA dza sA ta b+ha ba ti/_rgyal 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]po'i g.yog po byung /_sAti _rA dza sA t+s+ya ta/_sA ti _rA t+saM pa d+ya ti/_de yi trA tsa/_sbyin par bya ba la trA yang ngo /_/gang gi ched du gang sbyin par bya ba de'i dbang po mngon par brjod pa'i don la kr-i b+hU a sti saM pa da rnams sbyor ba la trA 'gyur zhing 'ang gi sgras sA ti'ang 'gyur te/_bi brA d+hi nAM de ka ro ti/
[\[186b.2\]]zhes pa'i don la/_rgyal po'i g.yog por gyur/_rgyal po'i g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs par byed/_trA _bi pra trA ka ro ti/_sA ti _pi pra sA t+ka ro ti/_de bzhin du/_trA _bi pra trA b+ha ba ti/_sA ti _bi bra sA ta b+ha ba ti/_trA _bi bra sA ta b+ha ba ti/_trA _bi bra trA s+yA ta/_sA ti _bi pra sA t+s+ya ta/_bi pra trA saM pa bya ti/_bi bra trA saM pa bya ti/_bi bra _bram ze las rag las par sbyin pa byed/
[\[186b.3\]]sA t+saM pa d+ya ti/_de ba ma nu bya pu ru Sha pu ru ma r+t+ye b+h+yo dwi tI yA sa b+ha myo rba hu laM/_de ba ma nu Sh+ya _bram ze las rag las par sbyin pa byed/_pu ru Sha pu ru ma r+t+ya rnams las _bram ze las rag las par sbyin pa byung /_bram ze las rag las par sbyin pa gyur/_bram ze las rag las par sbyin pa gyur/_bram ze las rag las par sbyin pa phun sum tshogs/_gnyis pa dang 
[\[186b.4\]]bdun pa dag la mang po'o/_/de ba la sogs pa 'di rnams las rnams dbye gnyis pa dang bdun pa'i don la mang po la ste/_kr-i b+hA a sti saM da rnams dang de rnams ma yin pa gzhan dang sbyor ba las kyang trA 'gyur te/_de bA na gats+tsha ti/_de ba trA gats+tsha ti/_de be Shu gats+tsha ti/_de ba trA gats+tsha ti/
[\[186b.5\]]de bzhin du/_ma nu Sh+ya trA/_bu ru Sha trA/_pu ru trA/_ma r+t+ya trA/_a bya k+tA nu ka ra NAd ne kA tso/_ni tau nar+t+ra tsa/_mi gsal ba rjes su byed pa las atsa gcig ma yin pa las i ti ma yin pa la DA tsa 'o/_sgra mi gsal ba rjes su byed _lha rnams la 'gro/_pa'i rtags a tsa gcig _lha rnams la 'gro/_/ma 
[\[186b.6\]]yin pa las kr-i b+hU/_mi rnams la/_skyes pa rnams la/_rnying ba rnams la/_a sti rnams sbyor ba las i ti ma yin pa la DA tsa 'gyur te/_ba Tata ba Tata/_TA tsa/_tsa dbyangs 'gog pa'i don Di ta la Ti phyis/_pa Tata pa TA/_zhes pa la/_ta s+ya pa ra mA mrai Di taM/_des zlos pa la pha rol 
[\[186b.7\]]lo/_/pa Tata pa Tata zhes pa lta bu rtags gcig lan gnyis sogs ldabs nas bzhag pa na rtags snga ma de'i mtha' yang pha rol de'i gzugs su 'gyur ro/_/ni t+yaM A mre De ti DA tsi/_zlos pa la rtag tu DA tsa la'o/_/bshad ma thag pa ltar rtags gcig lan gnyis ldabs pa na DA tsa 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]pha rol la rtag tu pha rol gyi gzugs su 'gyur te ta srog med dang pha rol gyi ba 'dres pa ba gcig tu song /_baT pa TA ka ro ti/_a tsa gcig ma yin pa zhes pas rnam pa cad kyi shra t+ka ti/_i ti ma yin pa zhes pas/_ba Titi ka ro ti/_snam bu 'di byed/
[\[187a.2\]]kr-i nyo dwi tI ya tri tI ya sham+bA bI dzA [\[]t+ki [\]]Shau/_kr-i nya yi dI tI ya tr-i tI ya _sha sba bI dza las rko ba la'o/_/kr-inya yi sbyor ba la dI tI ya la sogs sman bur byed/_ba 'di rnams las rko ba ste zhing rmod pa'i don la DA tsa/_dad pa bya/_baTata la i ti mi shes pa rjes su bya ba'i ata i ru song /_'gyur 
[\[187a.3\]]te/_DA tsa _dwi tI yaM ka r+Sha NaM ka ro ti/_zhes pa'i don la/[ \[]DA tsa [\] ]dwi tI yA ka ro ti/_de bzhin du/_DA tsa _tr-i tAM yA/_gsum rmod par byed/_shasmA/_DA tsa _bI dzA _son rmo bar byed/_saM khyA yA sh+tsa gu NA n+tA yAH/_grangs las kyang guN mtha' las so/_/grangs kyi sgra dang po can guN mthar yod pa 
[\[187a.4\]]gnyis rgo bar byed dam rmod par byed/_las kyang kr-inya dang sbyor ba _gnyis rmod par byed/_sngon la gzhung la lan cig rmos nas slar 'gred la rmo ba'i don/_sngon las bon btab nas slar rmo pa'i don/_las zhing rmod pa'i don la DA tsa 'gyur te/_dwi gu NaM kar+Sha NaM ka ro ti/_zhes pa'i don la/_DA tsa _dI gu NA ka ro ti/_sa ma yA ts+tsa 
[\[187a.5\]]yA pa nA yAM/_sa ma ya las kyang thob par byed pa la'o/_/sa ma ya las kyang thob par byed pa'i don la kr-inya sbyor ba laDA tsa 'gyur te/_sa ma yaM yA pa nA ka ro ti/_zhes pa'i don la/_nyes 'gyur rmod par byed/_DA tsa _sa ma yA ka ro ti/_nyis _'gyur rmod par byed/_sa pa tra ni Sh+pa 
[\[187a.6\]]trA ti bya tha ne/_sa pa tra ni Sh+pa tra las shin tu 'khrugs pa la'o/_/sa pa tra dang ni Sh+pa tra dag las shin tu 'khrugs pa'i don la kr-inya sbyor ba la _dus su thob par byed/_DA tsa 'gyur te/_sa pa traM dza raM mr-i ga kA ye bra be sha ya ti/_zhes _dus su thob par byad/_pa'i don la/_DA tsa sa ba trA ka ro ti mr-i 
[\[187a.7\]]gaM/_de bzhin du/_mda' sbro pha rol tu ma song ba go chas/_ni Sh+pa traM sha raM ma pa raM ni rga ma ya ti ka ba tse na/_zhes pa'i don la/_DA tsa _niSh+pa trA ka ro ti ka ba tse na/_sgro mi 'gro bar byed go chas/_sbo dang bcas pa'i mdas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi lus 'begs par byed/_niSh+ku lA n+ni ko Sha Ne/_niSh+ku _sgro dang bcas 'begs par byed [{]ri dgas[,]ri dwags[}]/_la 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]las shubs med pa la'o/_/ni Sh+ku la las bar du gnas pa'i shubs med pa'i don la kr-inya sbyor ba laDA tsa 'gyur te/_ni ShA sha ya ti dA Di maM/_zhes pa'i don la/_ni Sh+ku lA ka ro ti dA Di maM/_su kha bri yA dA nu lo /[{]mye[,]me[}]/_su kha bri ya las rjes su mthun pa la'o/_/su kha dang bri ya dag las rjes su 
[\[187b.2\]]mthun pa brjod pa las kr-inya sbyor ba la DA tsa 'gyur te/_DA tsa _su khA ka ro ti/_DA tsa _pri yA ka ro ti/_duH khA t+b+ra ti lo /[{]mye[,]me[}]/_shubs med par byed se 'bru/_duHkha las rjes su _shubs med par byed se 'thu/_mi mthun pa la'o/_/duHkha las rjes su mi mthun pa brjod pa las kr-inya sbyor ba la DA tsa 'gyur te/
[\[187b.3\]]DA tsa _duHkhA ka ro ti/_shu lA t+bA ke/_shUl las tshos _bde ba rjes gu mthun par byed/_dka' ba rjes su mthun par byed/_/ba la'o/_/shU la las tshos pa brjod pa la kr-inya sbyor ba la DA tsa 'gyur te/_shU len pa tsa ti/_zhes pa'i don la/_shU lA ka ro ti/_sa t+yA da sha pa the/_sa t+ya las mna' ma 
[\[187b.4\]]rjes su mi mthun pa dang sdug bsngal bar byed/_yin pa la'o/_/sa t+ya las mna' ma yin pa gzhan la kr-inya sbyor ba la DA tsa 'gyur te/_sa t+ye na kre ta byaM/_zhes pa'i don la/_DA tsa _ba t+yA ka ro ti/_ma drA t+ba _lcags 'ding gis tshod par byed/_ri bA ba Ni/_ma drag lcags 'ding gis tshod par byed/_las skra 'dreg pa la'o/_/ma hra 
[\[187b.5\]]las skra 'dregs pa brjod pa la kr-inya sbyor ba la DA tsa 'gyur te/_ma traM pa ri bA pa naM ka ro ti/_zhes pa'i don la/_DA tsa _ma trA ka ro ti/_b+ha drA ts+tsa/_bden pas tshong byed/_b+ha da las kyang ngo /_/bden pas tshong byed/_b+ha dra las kyang skra 'dreg pa brjod pa las kr-inya sbyor ba la DA tsa 'gyur te/_b+ha drA ka ro ti/_rkyen tsi ba ti DA tsa rnams 
[\[187b.6\]]kyi mtha' can kyang mi zad pa'o/_/a ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na sgra bregs nas bzang bor byed de chos byed pa'i don no/_/s+ya sU trA t+ta t+t+hi ta pra t+yA _bzang por byed/_yA sA mA p+taH/_zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las de phan gyi rkyen rnams rdzogs so//_//de rnams _bzang por byed/_kyis brda sprod pa'i 
[\[187b.7\]]bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las/_de pan gyi rkyen ngos gzung 'jug yul dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so//_//da ni 'phrod don 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]thor bu cung zad 'chad bar bya ste/_ni t+ya bi p+sa yoH/_khyab par 'dod pa las rtag tu'o/_/khyab par 'dod pa la 'jug pa na brjod pa'i tshig gang yin ba de gzugs gnyis su rtag tu 'gyur te/_ba tsa ti pa tsa ti b+hu k+tAM/_u ts+tsai su ts+tsai stiSh+Tha ti/_br-i k+ShaM br-i k+ShaM sa ny+tsa ti/_grA mo grA 
[\[188a.2\]]mor ma NI yaH/_ba re rba rdza ne/_ba ri'i sbangs pa la'o/_/spangs pa la zhugs pa'i tshig dang sbyor ba las ba ri'i sgra gnyis su 'gyur te/_pa ri pa ri paM ge b+h+yoHbr-iSh+To de baH/_u bar+Ya d+t+ya d+ha saHsA mI bye/_u ba ri _tshod cing chod nas bza'/_mtho bar mtho bar gnas/_shing dang shing la thor/_grong dang grong la rtse/
[\[188a.3\]]a d+gi _a d+has rnams kyi nye ba la'o/_/u ba ri la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi grong dang dus dag las nye ba la 'jug pa la gzugs gnyis su 'gyur te/_nam mkha' ma yin pa rnams las lha char bab/_u pa ri u pa ri grA ma/_a d+hi a r+hi su khaM/_ad+honya d+ho barba taM/_bA kyA de rA maM tri ta s+yA sU yA 
[\[188a.4\]]saM ma ti ko pa kut+sa na b+ha r+t+sa na Shu/_khro ba dang smad pa dang mi sdug pa rnams la go bar mi bzod pa dang yang dag par 'dod pa dag la bos nas brjod pa tshig dang po'o/_/khro ba dang smad pa dang mi sdug pa steng dang steng du grong /_lhag par lhag par bde ba/_'og nas 'og tu ri bo/_brjod pa na lan gnyis sogs 
[\[188a.5\]]ma brjod na go bar mi bzod pa ste go mi nus pa dang yang dag par 'dod pa dag la kun du bos nas brjod pa'i tshig dang po de gzugs gnyis su 'gyur te/_he sun+da ra ha sun+da ra te pr-i thA saun+da r+YaM/_zhes pa ngan tshig dang /_he de pa he de ba twAM ba n+dA+o si/_zhes pa yang dag par 'dod pa dang /
[\[188a.6\]]du rbi nI ta du rbi nI te/_dA nAM dz+nya bi/_zhes pa khro ba dang /_he d+hU nuSh+ga he d+hU nuSh+ka bya r+thaM te d+ha nuH/_zhes pa'ang smad ba dang /_he tsau ra he tso ra b+hA/_ta yi Sh+ya mi twAM/_kye mdzes ba kye mdzes ba khyod kyi mdzes pas ci byed/_zhes pa mi sdug pa _kye lta kye lta khyed la phyag 'tshal ba stod do/_/rnams so/_/e kaM pa hu brI hi ba ta/
[\[188a.7\]]lugs ngan ba lugs ngan pa/_de ni shas zin 'dug_/kye gzhu 'dzin pa kye gzhu 'dzin pa khyed kyi gzhus don med/_e ka 'bru mang po 'dra'o/_/kye chom rkun kye chom rkun khyod song zhig_/khyab par 'dod pa la e ka gnyis su gyur ba ni 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba dang 'dra ba ste e ka snga ma'i rnam dbye dbyi'o/_/e kai kaM k+Sha 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]raM/_A bA d+he tsa/_kun du gnod pa la'ang ngo /_/kun du gnod pa ste sems kyi dgra bor gyur ba'i gnod pa dang sbyor ba la gzugs gnyis su 'gyur te/_ga ta ga taH/_pra kA re gu Na ba tsa na s+ya/_rnam pa la yon tan gyi'o/_/rnam pa rtogs par byed pa la yon tan gyi 
[\[188b.2\]]yi ge re re 'am gcig gcig/_gzugs gnyis su 'gyur te/_paTu paTuH/_mU le mU le s+thU la/_'grel bar lung drangs ba/_kri mA sa ma b+hi ha re tsa/_bya ba yang dag par _song song /_mngon par 'phrog pa la'o/_/bya ba'i tshig yang dag par mngon par 'phrog pa brjod pa la gzugs 
[\[188b.3\]]gnyis su 'gyur te/_lu nI di lu nI hi/_yang 'grel _mkhas pa mkhas pa/_rtsa ba rtsa ba sdom po/_bar lung drangs ba/_karma bya ti hA res rba nam+no dwe staH/_las phan tshun byed pa las rba nA ma rnams kyi gnyis so/_/las phan tshun byed pa rtogs bar byed pa las rba nA ma rnams kyi gzugs gnyis 
[\[188b.4\]]su 'gyur te/_samA _gcod par byed gcod par byed/_sa bats+tsa ba hu laM/_tshig sdud ltar mang po la'o/_/gzugs gnyis su brjod pa can mang po tshig sdud ltar snga ma'i rnam dbye dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba dang mo rkyen rnams thung ngur 'gyur ba sogs kyang bya'o/_/su _a n+yonya n+yaM bi pA na man+ti/
[\[188b.5\]]su _a n+yonya n+ye b+ha dza yan+ti/_'grel par lung drangs pa/_i ta ra shab+da s+ya ni t+yaM sa mA ba ta/_i ta ra'i sgra ni rtag tu tshig sdud bzhin no/_/i ta ra'i sgra ni gzugs gnyis su byas pa na rtag tu tshig sdud bzhin bya ste/_i ta re ta raM/_yang 'grel bar lung drangs pa/_bram ze phan tshun phyag byed 
[\[188b.6\]]phan tshun za bar byed/_s+t+rIn buMs ka yo ru pa da s+ya bA A ma b+hA bo bA ts+yaH/_bud med dang ma ning dag las tshig phyi ma yang na A ma gyi dngos por brjod do/_/skyes pa'i rtags ma yin pa'i bud med dang ma ning gi rtags _gzhan dang gzhan/_pha rol la tshig snga ma gzugs gnyis su gyur ba de'i phyi 
[\[188b.7\]]ma'i mja' Am du yang na 'gyur te/_a n+yonya n+yAM s+t+rI/_bud med phan tshun/_bar sba rI na buM sa kaM/_pha rol pha rol na ma ning /_a n+yonya n+yA mi me prA h+ma Nau b+ho dza ya taH/_bram ze mo 'di dag phan tshun za bar byed/_yang na/_pham tshun nam gzhan dang gzhan/_a n+yonya n+yaM/_sogs so/_/i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trA b+h+wo 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]ru k+tA s+sa mA b+tAH/_zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las gnyis su brjod pa rnams rdzogs so//_//de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po bA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad 
[\[189a.2\]]nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las/_'phros don tshig gnyis su brjod pa bshad pa'i sde tshan rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so//_//!bla ma dang dpal gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de ltar rtags drug tshig tu bsgrub pa/_mi zad pa'i sde 
[\[189a.3\]]rags rim du bstan pa/_bud med du bsgrub pa'i rkyen/_byed pa can gyi le'u/_tshig sdud bzhi/_de phan gyi rkyen/_zhar byung 'phros don dang bcas pa de rnams kyi su ba kyi bya ba mtha' dag bshad zin nas/_da ni rnam dbye sde tshan gnyis pa byings las tshig tu bsgrub pa ting gi bya ba 
[\[189a.4\]]rnam pa bshad par bya ste/_de yang 'grel ba'i thog mar ji skad du/_br-i kra tiHsA dza la t+yA d+yA ya yA d+hA twA di rU ba yA/_bya dz+yaM te sha b+da rU pA Ni pa ra ba t+ya ya saM ni d+heH_de bod skad du/_dang po rang bzhin rgyal po de'i/_/gang gi byings la sogs pa'i gzugs/_/gsal bar byed pa sgra yi 
[\[189a.5\]]gzugs/_/pha rol rkyen dang sbyor ba'o/_/zhes pa byung ste/_dang por rang bzhin gyi rgyal ba sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams kyi thugs rje dang smon lam gyi mthu las/_gang brjod par bya ba'i gzhi byings la sogs pa rnams la sgra de gsal bar bya ba'i brjod bya'i don ston pa'i gzugs
