[\[189a.6\]]su bsgrub ba'i phyir/_pha rol gyi rkyen dang sbyor ba'i tshig la sogs pa byung ba'o/_/zhes pa'o/_/d+hA toHbyings las so/_/byings tshu rol tu yod pa las byings de tshig tu bsgrub pa'i phyir pha rol tu laT la sogs pa'i rnam dbye rnams 'jug go zhes rnam dbyi ti sogs kyi 'jug yul 
[\[189a.7\]]bstan pa'o/_/laT la sogs pa ci zhe na/_laT/_liT/_luT/_l+r-iT/_loT/_lang /_ling _lung /_smon pa'i ling /_l+r-ing rnams so/_/de rnams kyi laT nas loTa'i bar lngaT 'gro ba'i ming can dang /_lang nas l+r-ing gi bar lnga po rnams pa 'gro ba'i ming can no/_/
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]brta mA ne laT/_da ltar ba la laT 'o/_/la yig bcu po de rnams kyi nang nas da ltar ba'i bya ba'i don la byings las laT 'gyur ro/_/aTA bi tau/_aT dag 'gro ba'o/_/laTa'i Ta yig dang la'i srog gi a yig dag 'gro ba'i ming can te dbyi'o/_/ti b+ta stI si p+tha s+tha mi b+ba sma stA tAM dz+ha lngA sA 
[\[189b.2\]]thAM d+h+wa miT ba hi ma hing /_ti ba _tas _dz+hi _sib _thas _tha _mib _bas _mas _ta _A _tAM _dz+haM_thAs _A thAM _d+h+waM _aTi _bahi _ma hing ngo /_/laTa'i Ta dang a phyis pa lta bu la yig bcu po de rnams kyi rjes 'brel rnams phyis thas la yig srog med rnams ni ti pa la sogs pa bco brgyad po 
[\[189b.3\]]'di rnams su 'gyur ro/_/laHba ra smai pa daM/_la rnams pa ra smai ba da'o/_/la yig 'gyur ba'i ti ba la sogs pa dang po dgu po rnams par smai pa da ste gzhan gyi ched du bya ba'i tshig ces bya'o/_/ta dA nA bA t+ma ne ba daM/_ta da A na dag A t+ma ne ba da'o/_/tang zhes pa la srog med kyi 'gyur ba 
[\[189b.4\]]ta nas da'i nar dgu po rnams dang A na zhes pa kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen shA na tsa dang kA na tsa dag A t+ma ne pa da ste bdag gi ched du bya ba'i tshig ces bya'o/_/sheShA t+ga rta re ba ra smai ba daM/_lhag ma byed pa la ba ra smai ba da'o/_/bdag gi ched du bya ba'i tshig rnams ma yin pa'i lhag ma ste ti pa la 
[\[189b.5\]]sogs pa dgu po rnams par smai pa da zhes bya ste byed po gzhan gyi ched du bya ba'i tshig go/_/a nu dA t+ta di A t+ma ne ba daM/_a nu dU t+ta dang di ta dag gi At+ma ne ba da'o/_/byings gang la'ang a nu dA t+ta ste atsa skad gdangs dma' bar 'gro ba rnams dang nga ti steng 'gro ba rnams At+ma ne ba da ste 
[\[189b.6\]]bdag gi ched du bya ba'i tshig gi rnam dbye rnams 'jug ste bdag don gyi byings zhes bya ba'o/_/swa ri ta nyi ts+tsa u b+he/_swa ri ta dang nyita kyi gnyis ka'o/_/byings gang la swa ri ta ste sgra skad gsang 'bring po rnams 'gro ba dang nyita ste nya yig 'gro ba rnams ni bdag don dang gzhan don gnyis ka la 'jug 
[\[189b.7\]]pas gnyis ka'i byings zhes so/_/she She bar smai ba daM/_lhag ma bar smai ba da'o/_/gong du bshad pa'i a nu dA t+ta dang /_nga 'gro ba dang /_swa ri ta dang /_nya 'gro pa rnams ma yin pa ste de rnams bor ba'i lhag ma rnams ni gzhan don gyi byings zhes bya'o/_/ting s+t+rI Ni tri Ni pra tha mam D+b+ya mo t+ta mA/
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]ting gi gsum gsum rnams dang po dpus ma phyi ma rnams so/_/ting zhes pa so sor bsdu ba ste ti nas nga'i bar yin la/_de rnams bco brgyad po las A t+ma ne pa da dgu dang /_ba ra smai pa da dgu las gsum gsum du gnas pa la snga ma gsum skyes bu dang po 
[\[190a.2\]]dang dbus ma gsum skyes bu dbus ma dang phyi ma gsum skyes bu phyi ma'o/_/tA n+ye ka ba tsan dwi ba tsan ba hu ba tsa nA n+ye ka shaH/_de rnams re la gcig tshig gnyis tshig mang tshig rnams so/_/tib la sogs pa gsum gsum du bcad pa de rnams re re la 'ang gcig tshig gnyis tshig mang tshig 
[\[190a.3\]]rnams su yod do/_/shi She pra maH/_lhag ma la dang po'o/_/tib la sogs pa rnams kyi skyes bu dang po dbus ma phyi ma gsum las nye ba'i tshig ste dang por bzhag pa'i tshig de yu smad dang a smad gnyis ma yin pa ste/_spangs pa'i lhag ma tshig gang dang sbyor yang skyes bu dang po gsum 
[\[190a.4\]]po 'jug go zhes pa spyir btang ba'o/_/yuSh+ma d+yu pa des mA d+hi ka ra Ne s+thA ni n+ya pi ma d+h+ya maH_yuSh+mad nye ba'i tshig mnyam pa'i lhag par byed pa gnas pa las kyang dbus ma'o/_/yu Sh+mad nye ba'i tshig tu gnas pa las mnyam pa'i lhag par byed pa ste de dang sbyor ba'i byings de la skyes bu dbus ma 
[\[190a.5\]]gsum po 'jug go/_/a sma d+yu t+ta ma/_asmad la phyi ma'o/_/nye ba'i tshig asmad yin na de dang sbyor ba'i byings de la skyes bu phyi ma rnams 'jug go/_/de ltar 'jug yul bshad nas da ni de rnams kyi cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/_b+hU yod pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la da ltar ba la 
[\[190a.6\]]'aTa'o zhes pas laT/_ting shi t+sA rba d+hA tu kaM/_ting gi sha 'gro ba byings thams cad pa'o/_/ti sogs kyi bar rkyen sha 'gro ba 'jug pa de la byings thams cad pa'i rnam dbye zhes brda chad byed do/_/[\[]karta[\]] ri shab/_byed pa po la sha ba'o/_/byings thams cad pa zhes brda chad byas pa'i 
[\[190a.7\]]rnam dbye rnams pha rol la byings las byed pa po la shapa 'gyur te/_shapa byin/_laTa'i/_aT 'gro ba yin pas phyis la tib tu bsgyur/_mtha'i ha la'o zhes pas ba phyis/_sha yig dang ba yig dag 'gro ba'i ming can yin pas phyis/_b+hU a ti/_sA rba b+ha tu kA r+d+hA d+hA tu ka yoH/_byings 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag las so/_byings thams cad pa'i ming can gyi rkyen rnams dang /_'og nas 'byung ba'i byings phyed pa'i ming can rnams pha rol la rnam dbye de rnams yul gyi byings de'i mtha' i ka so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yod na yonatan du 'gyur te/_yod _b+ha ba 
[\[190b.2\]]ti/_skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig go/_/gnyis tshig la/_dag yod/_b+ha ba taH/_mang tshig la la dz+hi ru bsgyur/_b+hU/_a dz+hi/_t+tonya n+taH/_dz+ta'i an+ta'o/_/ti sogs kyi rnam dbye'i dang po'i dz+ha yig srog med ni an+ta zhes par 'gyur te/_b+ha ban+ti/_rnams yod/_skyes bu dbus ma rnams la'ang /
[\[190b.3\]]gong ltar bsgrubs pas/_b+ha ba si/_yod/_dag yod/_b+ha ba thaH/_rnams yod/_b+ha [\[]rnU[\]] la Na laT la ta su sha ba yon tan sa rur rnam bcad/_pa tha/_skyes bu phyi ma rnams kyang /_b+hU/_b+ha bar 'gyur ba'i bar snga ma rnams dang _b+hu la/_laT la dz+hi dz+ha las i phyung /_dz+ha a n+t+ra drangs yon tan e tsa'i a ya a ba sogs a'i yon tan nog gnyis dag gi snga ma'i gzugs su song /
[\[190b.4\]]'dra/_b+ha ba/_mi ba/[ \[]b+hUl[\]]/_laT/_shab yon tan la sib/_thas ba rnams su 'gyur ro/_/a to dA r+g+ho ya nyi/_yanya la ata kyi ring po'o/_/rkyen dang rnam dbye byings thams cad pa'i ming can yanya so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang po can pha rol la mtha'i a yig ni ring por 'gyur te/_b+ha bA mi/_yod/_gnyis tshig dang 
[\[190b.5\]]mang tshig la'ang de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/_b+ha bA baH/_dag yod/_b+ha bA maH/_rnams yod/_de rnams tshig grogs dang sbyar ba ni/_su/_saHb+ha ba ti/_au/_tau b+ha ba taH/_dzas/_te b+ha ba n+ti/_skyes bu dang po dang /_su/_twaM b+ha ba si/_b+hUl/_'aT shab la mib pa 'gro ba yon tan sogs kyis b+ha ba mdo 'dis ring po/
[\[190b.6\]]b+hUl/_laT shas la ba sa dang mas su 'gyur yon tan sogs mdo 'dis ring po/_au yu bAM b+ha ba thaH/_dzas/_yU yaM b+ha ba tha/_skyes dbus ma dang /_su a _de yod/_haM b+ha bA mi/_de dag yod/_de rnams yod/_au/_A bA b+ha bA baH/_dzas/_ba yaM b+ha _khyod yod/_bA ma/_de rnams skyes bu phyi ma rnams te/_gzhan gyi ched kyi tshig 
[\[190b.7\]]rnams so/_/'grel par drangs pa/_b+hU prAb+tA bAt+ma ne pa di/_khyed dag yod/_khyod rnams yod/_b+hU thob pa la A t+ma ne pa da'o/_/byings b+hU thob _bdag yod/_ba la'ang 'jug ste de'i tshe rnam dbye _bdag dag yod/_bdag rnams yod/_A t+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug ste/_b+hU la/_laT/_la ta ra 'gyur/_sha pa/
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]b+ha pa ta/_Ti taHa+wat+ma ne pa dA nI Ti ri/_Ta 'gro ba'i At+ma ne pa da rnams kyi Ti'i e'o/_/laT la sogs pa Ta 'gro ba A t+ma ne pa da rnams kyi mtha'i Ti ni e yig tu 'gyur te/_b+ha ba te/_gnyis tshig la/_b+hU la/_laT sha pa la A tAM du 'gyur/_Ti e/_b+ha ba/_A te/
[\[191a.2\]]sA rba d+hA tu ka ma pata/_byings thams cad pa pa 'gro ba ma yin pa'o/_/byings thams cad pa'i ming can rnams kyi nang nas pa yig 'gro ba rnams ma yin pa ste bor ba'i rnam dbye gzhan rnams la dgos [ \[]thog [\] ]pa'i dbang gis nga 'gro ba'i ming can zhes brda chad byed do/_/A to ngi taH/_nga 'gro ba'i 
[\[191a.3\]]Ata kyi'o/_/tshu rol b+ha ba lta bu a yig mtha' can gyi pha rol gyi rnam dbye nga 'gro ba'i ming can rnams kyi dang po'i yi ge de A yig yin na a yig de i ya zhes par 'gyur ro/_/dag thog_b+ha be te/_mang tshig la yang a i yang mi 'gyur gzhan ma gong bzhin bsgrubs pas/_b+h+ra 
[\[191a.4\]]ban+te/_rnams thong /_de rnams A t+ma ne pa da'i bu dang po rnams so/_/skyes bu dbus ma rnams la/_b+hU la/_laT sha pa la thAs su 'gyur/_b+ha ba _thAs _thA saHseH_b+hUl/_laT/_sha ba rjes 'brel phyis nas la A tAM du 'gyur/_Ta 'gro ba'i shes pas Ti e nga 'bro atA kyi 'os A i la/[ \[]bra ya? dag gi ba la la dbye 'os ya phyis yon tan/_b+hUl/
[\[191a.5\]]baT sha pa la dz+ta 'gyur/_dz+ha bas a [\[]gyung dz+ha an+tar 'gyur/[\] ]Ta 'gro legs pa la Ti ata kyi yon tan nos gnyis dag gi snga ma'i gzugs/_thAs kyi se'o/_/ta 'gro ba'i la yig 'gyur ba'i thAs ni se zhes par 'gyur te/_b+hUl/_laT sha ba la thAs su 'gyur thAs kyi se'i thAs se/_b+ha ba se/_thob pa/_gnyis tshig la/_b+ha be the/_thob pa dag
[\[191a.6\]]mang tshig la/_thob pa rnams/_b+ha ba d+he/_skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshigs la/_b+ha be/_thob pa/_gnyis tshig la/_b+ha bA he/_thob pa dag/[ \[]b+hU [\]]ba laT shas la ba hi ra 'gyur ya nya las ata kyi ring po 'os a ring boT 'gro ba sogs kyi saTi a/_b+hU la/_laT sha ba la A thAM du 'gyur Ta 'gro ba'i At+ma ne pa da zhes pas Ti awang 'gro ba'i Ata kyi 'os/_A i ya ba? ya \u0f84dag gi bal pa dbyi 'os phyis yon tan/
[\[191a.7\]]b+hUl/_laT sha ba la d+hAM du 'gyur _Ta 'gro ba'i A rba na bad zhes pas Ti er 'gyur/_b+hUl/_lata sha la la i Tar 'gyur Ta 'gro ba'i ming can/_Ta 'gro ba zhes pas Ti e ata las yon tan nos gnyis dag gi pha rol gyi gzugs/_mang tshig la/_thong pa rnams/_b+ha bA ma he/_b+hUl/_laT sha ba la ma hir du 'gyur nga so sor bsdu ba'i don yanya bas zhes pas ring poT 'gro ba sogs kyis Ti e/_bi d+hi ni maM tra 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]NA ma n+t+ra NA d+hI Sh+Ta saM pra sh+na prA r+tha ne Shu ling /_cho ga bsgrub pa _nges par bod pa _kun tu bod pa _gsol ba gdab pa _yang dag par dri ba _don du gnyer ba rnams la ling 'o/_/cho ga bsgrub pa la sogs pa 'di rnams la bya ba'i don la byings la ling 'gyur ro/_/b+hUl/_lang /_sha pa da ngi ta kyi don i brjod don/
[\[191b.2\]]tib tas sogs kyis ya tib tu 'gyur/_b+ha ba _tipa _yA suT pa ra smai ba de ShU dA t+to ngi ts+tsa/_pa ra smai ba dal A suT ste ba 'gro ba'i u t+ta 'ang ngo /_/ling 'gyur ba'i rnam dbye bar smai bad rnams la A su Ta A ga ma ster zhing yA su Ta de la nga 'gro ba'i u dA t+ta zhas ming 'dogs byed do/_/
[\[191b.3\]]na ngi ts+tsa/_nga 'gro ba'ang ma yin no/_/gong du yA suT de nga 'gro ba'i u dA t+ta'o zhes ming 'dogs byas ba de yA suT rang du gnas na nga 'gro ba'i ming can yin la yA suT de i ya? lta bu gzugs gzhan du 'gyur na de ni nga 'gro ba'i ming can ma yin no/_/b+ha ba _ti ba la lA suT/_Ta gnas don/_u brjod 
[\[191b.4\]]don/_b+ha pa _yAs _ti/_lingaHsa lo ponya n+ta s+ya/_ling gi mtha' ma yin ba'i sa dbyi'o/_/ling gi 'gyur ba'i rnam dbye byings thams cad pa'i ming can rnams kyi mtha' ma yin pa'i sa yig ni dbyi'o/_/b+ha ba yA ti/_i ta sh+tsa/_ita kyi'ang ngo /_/nga 'gro ba'i la yig gi 'gyur ba pa da smi pa da 
[\[191b.5\]]rnams kyi ita kyang dbyi ste ti'i i phyis/_a to yeyaH_ata las yA I ya'o/_/b+ha ba lta bu ata mtha'i pha rol gyi bying thams cad pa'i ming can gyi rnam dbyi rnams kyi thog ma'i yA yig ni i ya zhes par 'gyur te/_ba ya dag gi bal la dbyi 'os ya yang phyis/_b+ha beta/_gnyis tshig la/_b+hU 
[\[191b.6\]]la/_ling _shab/_la tas su 'gyur/_yA suT/_b+hab _yA _t+sa/_ta s+tha s+tha me phAM tAM taM tA maH/_tas _thas _tha _mi pa rnams kyi nyAM taM ta am rnams so/_/ling sogs nga 'gro ba'i ming can bzhi po'i la'i lus 'gyur gyi tas/_thas _tha mi pa rnams ni rim pa bzhin du/_tAM taM ta a ma rnams 
[\[191b.7\]]su 'gyur te/_tas tAM du 'gyur/_b+ha ba _yA tA/_yA I ya/_b+ha be tAM/_ba ya dag gi zhes pas ya pyis yon tan/_mang tshig la/_b+hU sha pa yA dz+hi/_dz+hi rdzus/_dz+hi'i dzus so/_/ling gi lus 'gyur gyi dz+hi ni dzus zhes par 'gyur te/_b+ha be yuH/_b+hUl/_ling sha pa la dz+hi yA suT Ta gnas don u brjod don ling gi mtha' ma yin pa'i sa phyis/_/
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]ata las yA I ya mdo 'dis dz+ta dzus su 'gyur/_tsu Tu sogs kyi dza phyis/_ya drangs sa ru/_ra rnams tha cad mtshams sbyar/_ling gi skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/_b+ha beH_ling gi skyes bu dbus ma'i gnyis tshig la/[ \u0f1c ]mab+ha be taM/_ling gi skyes bu dbus ma'i mang tshig la/_b+ha be 
[\[192a.2\]]b+hU la/_ling sha ba la seb pa be ta kyi don phA suT/_Ta yum rnams phyis/_A ta la a ya ba dag gi ba la la dbyi'o sa ya phyis/_yon tan ita kyi ngos sa'i sog gi i phyis sa ru u brjod don ra rnam bcad/[ \u0f1c ]b+ha la sha pa ling la zas su 'gyur lA suT suT gnyis phyis ata la A I ya/_ba ya sogs kyis phyis/_mtshams sbyar/_ta ma thal/_tha mi ba rnams kyi zhes pas thas taM ru 'gyur ro/
[\[192a.3\]]ta/_ling gi skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig la/_b+ha be yaM/_b+hU la sha ba/_ling la mi pa du 'gyur yA suT/_suT phyis/_ata la yA I ya yon tan/_tas thas/_tha m-i pa rnams kyi/_tAM/_taM ta/_am rnams sos mi pa am du 'gyur la drangs/_ling gi skyes bu phyi ma'i gnyis tshig la/_b+hU _shab _yA _suT _ling la bas su 'gyur/_yA 
[\[192a.4\]]b+hU la/_sha ba ling la tha ru 'gyur lA suT/_suT phyis yA I ya/_ba ya sogs kyis ya phyis mtshams sbyar tas thas tha mi pa rnams kyi/_tAM taM ta/_am rnams sos thatar 'gyur/_I ya _ba ya sogs kyis ya phyis/_b+ha be bas/_ni t+yaM ngi taH/_nga 'gro ba'i rtag tu'o/_/ling sogs nga 'gro ba rnams kyi lus 'gyur gyi mtha'i sa yig srog med ni 
[\[192a.5\]]rtag tu dbyi ste bas kyis phyis/_b+ha be ba/_ling gi skyes bu phyi ma'i mang tshig la/_b+ha be ma/_d+hU la/_sha pa ling la mas su 'gyur/_nga 'gro ba'i rtag tu 'os sa phyis/_yA suT/_suT phyis ata la yA I ya?/_tha? ya? dag gi bal la dbyi 'os la phyis/_mtshams sbyar/_de rnams par smi ba da rnams so/_/b+hU thob pa la'o zhes pa la/
[\[192a.6\]]At+ma ne ba da rnams 'jug ste/_de yang b+hU la sha pa byin pas b+ha bar 'gyur ba sogs cho ga lnga ma rnams dang 'dra/_rnam dbye'i lus 'gyur sogs ni skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_b+ha ba la _ling la/_ta ru 'gyur/_b+ha ba/_ta/_lingaH_sI yuT/_ling gi sI yuTa'o/_/A t+ma ne pa da'i 
[\[192a.7\]]ling gi lus 'gyur gyi rnam dbye rnams la sI yuT A ga ma ster te/_b+ha be ta/_b+ha ba la/_ling rjes 'brel phyis/_lata ru 'gyur/_mdo 'dis sI yuT A ga ma Ta gnas don u brjod don/_ling gi mtha' ma yin pa'i sa dbyi'os sa phyis/_ba ya dag gi ba la dbyi 'os ya phyis mtshams sbyar/_ming gi A t+ma ne'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]tshig la/_b+ha be yA tAM/_b+ha ba la/_ling la? A tA du 'gyur sI yuT/_Ta dang u phyis/_sa yang phyis/_mtshams sbyar ya drangs pa'o/_/ling gi At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i mang tshig la/_dz+ha s+ya ran/_dz+ha'i rana'o/_/ling gi lus 'gyur At+ma ne pa da'i dz+ha ni ran du 'gyur te/_b+ha be ran/_b+ha ba la/_ling la dz+ha 
[\[192b.2\]]mdo 'dis dz+ha ran du 'gyur sI yuT Ta us rnams phyis ba la dag gi bal la dbyi'os ya phyis mtshams sbyar/_ling gi At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_b+ha ba thAH_b+ha ba la/_ling la thas su 'gyur sA+e uT A ga maT dang u phyis/_bal la dbyi 'os ya yang phyis/_ling gi mtha' ma yin pa'i nas pas sa yang phyis/_mtshams sbyar/_b+ha be yA thAM/_b+ha ba la/
[\[192b.3\]]ling la A thAM du 'gyur sI yuT/_Ta dang u phyis/_ling gi mtha' ma yin pa zhes pas sa phyis mtshams sbyar ya drangs/_b+ha ba d+hAM/_b+ha ba la/_ling la d+hAM du 'gyur sI yuT A ga ma Ta dang u phyis/[ \[]ngal[\]] la dbyi'o sa ya yang phyis/_ling gi mtha' ma yin pa'i zhes pas sa yang phyis/_mtshams sbyar/_ling gi skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig la/_i To\u0f85 tra/_i Ta'i 
[\[192b.4\]]ata'o/_/ling gi lus 'gyur gyi iT ni iT du 'gyur te ta yig ni ta yi de'i dus kya'o'i don no/_b+ha ba ya/_b+ha ba la/_ling tha iT mdo 'dis iT ata du 'gyur/_sI/_guT/_Ta dang u phyis/_ming gi mtha' ma yin pa'i zhes pas sa phyis/_mtshams sbyar ya drangs/_ling gi skyes bu phyi ma'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_b+ha be ra 
[\[192b.5\]]hi/_b+ha ba la/_ming la/_ba hi ru 'gyur sI suT Ta dang u phyis/_ba la la dbyi'os ya yang phyis/_ming gi mtha' yin bzhes pas sa phyis/_mtshams sbyar/_b+ha be ma hi/_b+ha ba la/_ling lam hing du 'gyur/_nga so sor bsdu ba'i don sI yuT Ta dang u phyis/_bal la dbyi'os ya yang phyis ling gi mtha' min pa'i zhes pas sa phyis/_mtshams sbyar/_de rnams [\[]seng ge [\]]
[\[192b.6\]]'jug yul rnam 'gyur dang bcas pa ste/_ka la pa ras b+ta me zhes zer so/_/loT tsa/_lo Ta'ang ngo /_/chog bsgrubs pa nges par bod pa/_kun du bod pa/_gsol ba gdab pa/_yang dag par dri ba/_don du gnyer ba rnams la bya ba 'don la byings la ling 'gyur bar ma zad loTa'ang 'gyur ro/_/
[\[192b.7\]]Asha Shi ling lo Tau/_sman pa la ling loT dag go/_/smon pa'am bkra shis pa la bya ba'i don la'ang byings la loT dang 'og nas 'byung ba'i smon pa'i ling dag 'gyur ro/_/e ruH_i'i u'o/_/loT 'gyur ba'i rnam dbye rnams kyi i yig rnams ni u yig tu 'gyur te/_b+hU la byed pa po la sha ba 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]byin pas b+hU b+ha bar 'gyur ba sogs snga ma rnams dang 'dra'o/_/b+hab tu/_b+hab la/_lo Ta Ta Ta 'gro ba o brjod don la tib pa bod kyi don mdo 'dis i u/_tu h+yo stA ta dA shi Sh+ya n+ya ta ra s+yAM/_tu hi dag gi shis brjod la tA tang yang na'o/_/loT 'gyur ba'i tu dang hi dag gi cho ga bsgrubs ba sogs ma 
[\[193a.2\]]yin pa shis brjod dam smon ba'i don du ster na tA tang du yang na 'gyur [\[]te[\]]/_b+ha ba tA ta/_b+ha ba la/_sman pa la ling loT dag gos loT rjes 'brel phyis nas la tib ba bi ta kyi don i'i u 'as tu/_mdo 'dis tu tA tang dang /_nga dita kyi don ta'i a brjod don/_b+ha ba tu/_b+ha ba la loT la tib e mi u 'os tu/_loTa'i pa ra sme ba da'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig 
[\[193a.3\]]la/_loT la ra ba ta/_loTa'i lang 'dra ba'o/_/loTa'i bya ba'i skabs 'gar lang dang 'dra bar bsgrub pa 'byung ste/_dper na/_loT 'gyur ba'i tas lta bu tas zas tha mi ba rnams kyi tAM taM ta a ma rnams su 'gyur ro zhes pas/_'grel bar/_nga 'gro bzhes pa byung bas loT nga 'gro ba ma yin kyang 
[\[193a.4\]]mdo 'dis yang dang 'dra'i zhes pas tas tAM du 'gyur ba lta bu'o/_/b+ha ba tAM/_b+ha ba la/_loT la tas su 'gyur/_loTa'i yang 'dra ba'i zhes pas tas tAM pu 'gyur/_loTa'i pa ra smai ba da'i skyes bu dang po'i mang tshig la/_b+ha ba n+tu/_b+ha ba/_loT la dz+taM ru 'gyur dz+ta las i phyung dz+ta'i an+ta 'os a n+tar 'gyur i'i 'os i ur 'gyur ata kyi yon tan/
[\[193a.5\]]nos gnyis dag gi gcig snga ma'i gzugs su song /_an+t+ra u la drangs/_loTa'i par smai pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/_ser+h+yali ts+tsa/_si'i hi ste pa 'gro ba'ang ma yin no/_/loT 'gyur ba'i si ba ni hi ru 'gyur te/_de yang pa 'gro ba'i ming can ma yin bzhes brda chad byed do/_/a to heH_a ta las 
[\[193a.6\]]tili'o/_/b+ha ba lta bu a yig las pha rol gyi loT 'gyur ba'i hi yig ni dbyi ste/_b+ha ba/_b+ha ba la/_loT la si ba si'i hi steng 'gro ba 'ang ma yin nos si hi mdo 'dis hi phyis pa'o/_yang na/_b+ha ba tA ta/_b+ha ba la/_loT si ba si'i hi ste ba 'gro ba 'ang ma yin nos se hi tu hi dag gi shis brjod la tA tar yang na 'os/_hi tA tang [\[]du 'gyur 'di tar yon tan 'gog 
[\[193a.7\]]pa'i don ta'i a brjod don/_loTa'i ba ra smai da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_b+ha ba taM/_b+ha ba la/_loT la thas su 'gyur/_loT li'ang 'dra ba 'os thas taM du 'gyur ba'o/_/b+ha ba ta/_b+ha ba/_loT ba tha ru 'gyur/_loT li a dra ba 'os tha ta ru 'gyur ba'o/_/loT di ba ra smai pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig la/_metha niH_ma'i ni'o/_/
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]loT 'gyur ba'i mi ste mi pa ni ni zhes par 'gyur ro/_/A Du t+ta ma s+ya bi ts+tsa/_phyi ma'i AT ste pa 'gro ba'ang ngo /_/loT 'gyur ba'i skyes bu phyi ma rnams la AT A ga ma sbyin par bya ste/_b+ha bA ni/_b+ha ba la/_loT la mi ba tu 'gyur mi'i ni 'os/_le ni pa 'gyur/_mdo 'dis AT A ga maT gnas don a ka 'dra ba la ring po 
[\[193b.2\]]loTa'i ba ra smai ba da'i skyes bu phyi ma'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_b+ha bA ba/_b+ha ba la/_loT la bas su 'gyur phyi ma'i AT ste tha 'gro ba'ang ngos AT A ga maT gnas don/_a ka 'dra ba la ring po loTa'i lang 'dra ba'os sa phyis/_b+ha bA ma/_te brA b+d+ha toH_de rnams byings kyi dang po'o/_/de rnams te nyer bsgyur rnams byings dang 
[\[193b.3\]]sbyor ba'i tshe nyer bsgyur de rnams byings kyi dang por 'jog go zhes pa spyir btang ngo /_/pra b+ha bA ni/_A ni loTaHloTa'i Ani'o/_/byings kyi dang por pra lta bu nyer bsgyur na yig Nar 'gyur pa'i/_b+ha ba la loT la mas su 'gyur phyi ma AT ste ba 'gro ba'ang [\[]'os [\]]AT ta gnas don a ka 'dra bar ring loTa'i lang 'dra ma 'os sa phyis/
[\[193b.4\]]rgyu mtshan can yod na loTa'i mi pa kyi 'gyur ba ni AT dang bcas pa ste A ni'i na yig_rab tu gyur cig_/niN yig tu 'gyur te/_pra b+ha bA Ni/_'grel par lung drangs pa/_sra dan+ta raHu ba sarga bta/_srata an+ta ra dag gnyar bsgyur 'dra ba'o/_/srata dang an+tar dag ni nyer bsgyur 'dra'o/_/zhes pas ste 
[\[193b.5\]]dgos pa ni byings kyi dang por 'jog pa sogs kyi'o/_/lam yod/_sra d+b+ha bA ni/_gzhan du gyur cig/_an+ta r+b+ha bA Ni/_loTa'i A ni 'os naNar 'gyur ba'o/_/yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/_duraHpar s+ya Na twa na ke ci ta/_dur gyi pha rol laN nyid la lar ma yin no/_/nyer bsgyur dur gyi pha rol gyi loTa' A ni ni 
[\[193b.6\]]skabs la lar Nar 'gyur ba'am yin te/_dir+b+ha bA ni/_b+hU thob pa la'o zhes pa la sha pa byin nas yon tan sogs byas pas b+ha ba zhes bsgrub pa sogs sngar ltar byas nas loTa'i A t+ma ne ba da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_A me taH_eta kyi A ma'o/_/loT 'gyur ba'i rnam 
[\[193b.7\]]dbye rnams kyi mtha'i e yig rnams ni A ma ngan bar gyur cig_/du 'gyur te/_thob bar shog/_b+ha ba tAM/_b+ha ba la/_loT lata ru 'gyur Ta 'gro bzhes pas ta'i srog a e ru 'gyur/_mdo 'dis e A ma ru 'gyur/_loTa'i At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_thob ba dag shog_/b+ha pe tAM/_b+ha ba la/_loT la A tAM ba 'gro 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]ba la A ta kyi 'os/_A e la 'di rang 'gro ba ma yin kyang loTa'i [\[]yang 'dra ba 'os/[\] \[]ba la[\]] sogs kyis sa phyis/_Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis A ma e eta kyi A ma 'os slar A ma du log_/b+ha ban+taM/_loTa'i A t+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/_sa bA b+hAM bA mau/_sa bdag las ba am dag go/_/loT 'gyur 
[\[194a.2\]]ba'i sa yig dang ba yig gi srog gi e yig ni rim pa bzhin pa am dag tu 'gyur te/[ \u0f1c ]b+ha ba swa/_loTa'i At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gnyis tshig dang /_b+ha ba ma/_loT la[\[] dz+ha dang dz+ha b+hA thos pas sogs kyis cha la [\]]e e ha kyi A la[\[] 'os [\]]A ma nya gyi yon tan pa 'os gnyis dag gi gcig snga ma'i gzugs su sod/_mang tshig la/
[\[194a.3\]]b+hA ba la/_loT la thAs su 'gyur thAs kyi be 'os thAs se ru 'gyur/_mdo 'dis e ba srog bcas su 'gyur/_sra drangs pa'o/_/thob ba dag shog/_b+ha be thAM/_b+ha ba la/_loT la A b+hAM ru 'gyur A ta gyi ngi ta la'o dang 'o Ta'i 'ang 'drang 'os/_A i ya pa ya sogs kyis ya phyis mtshams sbyar/_Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis A e ata kyi A ma 'os slar sA ma su log_/b+ha ba d+h+waM/_b+ha ba la/_loT la d+hAM du 
[\[194a.4\]]'gyur/_Ta 'gro ba sogs kyi mtha'i Ti es bdag la ba a ma dag gos[\[] slar[\]] yang e am du 'gyur/_loTa'i A t+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig la/_e taHai/_eta kyi ai'o/_/loT 'gyur ba'i skyes bu phyi ma'i rnam dbye rnams kyi e yig rnams ni ai ru 'gyur te/_thab par shog/_/b+ha bi/_b+ha ba la/_loT la iT 'gyur 
[\[194a.5\]]phyi ma'i AT ge dis bas AT A ga ma Te gnas don a ka 'dra ba la ring go_mdo 'dis e e ru 'gyur tsa'i rel ba/_loTa'i A t+Ya ne pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_b+ha bA ba hai/_b+ha ba ma hai/_b+ha ba la/_loT la ma hi ru 'gyur phyi ma'i AT ste sogs kyis AT song /_aka 'dra ba la ring boT 'gro ba sogs kyis i e e ta kyi ai 
[\[194a.6\]\[]o ra [\]]ai ru 'gyur/_de rnams loT ste ka lA pa ra bany+tsa mi zer zhing dbyangs can bya ka ra Na shis brjod kyi rkyen zhes brda chad byed do/_/b+ha ba la/_loT la ba hi ru 'gyur phyi ma'i AT ste zhes pas A TaT sor a ka 'dra ba la ring poT 'gro ba sogs kyis i e eta kyi i 'os ai ru 'gyur/_a na d+ya ta ne yang /_de ring mo yin pa la lang ngo /
[\[194a.7\]]de ring ma yin pa ste de ring yod pa ma yin pa 'das nas yun ring lon pa ma yin pa kha sang lta bu byung ba la 'jug pa'i bya ba'i don la byings la lang 'gyur ro/_/b+hU yod pa la byed pa po la sha ba dang yon tan sogs byas pas b+ha ba sgrub tshul gong ma rnams dang 'dra/_b+ha ba la/_lang /_nga yig 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]nga 'gro ba la yon tan 'gog pa'i don a brjod do/_/l+ra ti ba/_lung lang l+r-ing k+Shu a Du dat+taH/_lung lang l+r-ing rnams la aT ste u dAt+ta 'ang ngo /_/lung dang /_lang dang /_l+r-ing rnams pha rol la byings la aT A ga ma ster te/_de la u dA t+ta zhes brda chad byed do/_/a b+ha ba ta/_b+ha ba la 
[\[194b.2\]]lang /_lung lang l+r-ing zhes pas byings la aT Ta gnas don lang gi nga yig nga 'gro ba la yon tan 'gog pa'i don la brjod don/_lnga ti pa nu 'gyur pa yig bi ta kyi don yita kyi'ang ngos i kyis/_lang gi pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_a b+ha ba tAM/_b+ha ba lang la tas/_lung lang l+r-ing zhes pas aT A gas Ta gnas don/_tas thas 
[\[194b.3\]]tha mi pa rnams kyi/_tAM taM ta _a ma rnams sos/_tas tAM du gyur/_a b+ha ba na/_b+ha ba la lang /_lung lang phr-ing sogs kyi ba byings la aT A ga ma la dz+hi ru 'gyur/_dz+ha las i [\[]sgyur [\]]dz+ha'i an+ta'os b+ha an+ta ita kyi 'ang dos i phyis brtsegs pa'i mtha' dbyi 'os ta phyis/_a ra kyi yon tan la 'os gnyis dag gi gcig snga ma'i gzugs su song /_lang gi pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu 
[\[194b.4\]]dbus ma gsum la/_a b+ha baH_b+ha ba la la bung lang gr-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don la? si pa du 'gyur ba'i ta kyi don iha kyi 'ang ngos i phyis sa dzu la sogs kyis sa ru u phyis ra rna bas/_a b+ha ba haM/_b+ha ba la lang lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don/_lnga thas su 'gyur tag thas tha mi ba rnams kyi tAM taM ta a ma rnams sos thas taM mu 'gyur/
[\[194b.5\]]a b+ha ba ta/_b+ha ba la/_lang lung lang gr-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga maT gnas don la tha ru 'gyur/_tas thas tha mi ba rnams kyi tAM taM ta a ma rnams sos tha ta ru 'gyur/_lang gi pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a b+ha baM/_b+ha ba la lang /_lung lang sr-id sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don la ming du 'gyur tas thas tha mi pa rnams kyi tAM taM ta 
[\[194b.6\]]am rnam la sos mi pa am du 'gyur ata kyi yon tan la 'os gnyis dag gi gcig snga ma'i gzugs so/_/a b+ha bA ba/_b+ha ba la lang /_lung lang sr-id sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don/_la bas su 'gyur/_ata kyi ya ta la ring po 'os ring po/_nga 'gro ba la rtag tu 'os sa phyis/_a b+ha bA ma/_b+ha ba la yang /_lung yang lang sogs kyis byings la aT 
[\[194b.7\]]A ga ma/_Ta gnas don/_l+ra mas su 'gyur aT kyi lanya la ring po 'os ring po nga 'gro ba la rtag tu 'os sa phyis/_de rnams pa ra smai pa da'o/_/b+hU thob pa la sha pa byin yon tan sogs byas pas b+ha ba sgrub lugs gong dang 'dra/_At+ma ne da'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a b+ha ba ta/_b+ha ba pha lang /_lung lang l+r-id sogs 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don la ta ru 'gyur/_a b+ha be tAM/_b+ha ba la lang lung lang sr-id sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don la A tAM du 'gyur/_nga 'gro ba la A ta kyi 'os A i la/[ \[]ba la dag [\]]gi ba la la dbyi 'os la byis mtshams sbyar/_a b+ha ban+ta/_b+ha ba la lang lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don la 
[\[195a.2\]]dz+ha ru 'gyur dz+ha las a byung dz+ha'i an+ta 'os dz+ha an+tar [\[]'gyur [\]]ata kyi yon tan la[\[] 'os [\]]gnyis dag gi gcig snga ma rig gzugs su song /_lang gi At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a b+ha ba thAH_b+ha ba la lang /_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don la thAs su 'gyur sa ju Sha dag gi ru u phyis ra rnam bcad/_a b+ha be thAM/_b+ha ba la/[ \[]lang[\]]/
[\[195a.3\]]lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga maT gnas don/_la A TAM du 'gyur/_nga 'gro ba la Ata kyi 'os A i ya ru 'gyur/_ba la dag gi bal la 'os ya phyis/_mtshams sbyar/_a b+ha ba d+hAM/_b+ha ba la lang lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga maT gnas don la d+hAM du 'gyur/_lang gi At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a b+ha be/_a b+ha baH/
[\[195a.4\]\[]lang lung lang l+r-ing[\]] sogs kyis byings la aT A gam Ta gnas don la aT ru 'gyur mtshams su sbyar/_a b+ha bA ba hi/_b+ha ba la lang lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis aT A ga ma Ta gnas don/[ \[]la pa [\]]hi ru 'gyur ata kyi anya la ring bo 'os ring bo/_a b+ha bA ma hi/_b+ha ba la _lang /_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis aT A ga ma Ta gnas don lam hing du 'gyur/_nga do dor bsdu ba'i don aha 
[\[195a.5\]]kyi ya nya la ring po 'os ring po/_de rnams lang dang byings phrad pa'i cho ga ste 'di dang tsad+n+ra par lang zer la/_ka lA par h+yasta nI zer zhing dbyangs can brda sprod du de ring ma yin pa zhes brda chang byed do/_/lung /_lung 'o/_byung ba'am 'das pa la 'jug par byed pa las bya ba'i don la byings la lung 'gyur te/
[\[195a.6\]]de yang 'angs nas dus yun ring lon pa'i bya ba'i don la 'jug pa shas che'o/_/mA ngi lung /_mA ngal lung 'o/_/mAng sbyor ba'i byings la 'byung 'gyur gyi don la 'jug pa la'ang lung 'gyur te/_de yang rnam dbye lung rang 'angs pa ston pa'i rkyen yin kyang mAng gis bkag bas ma 'ongs pa ston pa'o/_/
[\[195a.7\]]smo t+ta re lang tsa/_sma phyi ma lang 'ang ngo /_/mAng sbyor ba sma phyi ma la byings la 'byung 'gyur gyi don la lang 'gyur zhing 'ang gi sgras lung yang 'gyur ro/_/ts+li lu ngi /_lung la ts+li'o/_/lung pha rol la byings la [\[]ts+li [\]]bar rkyen du ster ro/_/ts+liHsitsa/_ts+li'i si tsa'o/_/lung pha rol gyi rkyen c+li ni tsa zhes par 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/gA ti sgrA g+hu pA b+hU b+h+yaH_si tsaHpa ra sme pa de Sh+tsa/_gA ti gnas pa g+hu pA b+hU rnams las pa ra smai pa da rnams la si tsa'i 'o/_/gA ti gnas pa ste byings gai sgra la'o/_/pA btung ba/_iN 'gro ba rnams dang byings g+hu'i ming can rnams dang pA skyong ba dang b+hU yod pa rnams las lung gi 
[\[195b.2\]]bar sme pa da rnams pha rol la rkyen ts+li 'gyur ba'i si tsa ni 'jig go/_/b+hU su bo sti ngi/_b+hU ShU dag las ting la'o/_/byings b+hU dang ShUnya dag gi pha rol du byung ba'i lung gi par smai pa da'i ti ste ti sogs dgu po la byings thams cad pa zhes ming 'dogs byed de rnam dbye de rnams pha rol la b+hU dang ShUnya dag la 
[\[195b.3\]]yon tan dang 'phel ba sogs mi byed do/_/a b+hU ta/_b+hU yod pa la/_lung 'os lung byi nang ngi ta kyi don u rigs don lung la [\[]ts+li [\]]'os/_ts+li bar rkyen du byin [\[]tsI'i [\]]si tsa 'os [\[]ts+li'i [\]]si tsa 'os [\[]ts+la si [\]]tsar 'gyur/_gA ti sogs kyis si tsa 'jig_/lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don la tib [\[]bu [\]]'gyur/_pa yon tan gyi don yin kyang skabs 'dir b+hU ShU dag las yon tan mi byed/
[\[195b.4\]]ita kyi 'ang ngos ti'i srog i gyis/k+ngi ti tsa/_krang 'grau ba la'ang ngo /_/byings kyi pha rol tu ka yig 'gro ba dang /_nga yig 'gro ba dag pha rol la yon tan dang 'phel ba sogs mi byed do/_/lung gi par smai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig la/_ab+hUtAM/_b+hU la lung /_lung lang grang sogs kyis 
[\[195b.5\]]byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don/_lung la ts+li 'os ts+li byin sli'i si tsa 'os ts+li si tsar gA ti sogs kyis se tsa 'jig_/la tas su 'gyur/_tas thas tha ming rnams kyi tAM taM ta a ma rnams sos/_tas tAM du 'gyur/_byings thams cad pa pa 'gro ba ma yin pa'i zhes pas/_'dir tas nga 'gro ba'i ming can yin la krang 'gro ba la'ang ngos yon tan mi byed/_lung gi 
[\[195b.6\]]bar smai ba da'i skyes bu dang po'i mang tshig la/_b+hu bo bu ka lung li ToH/_lung liT dag las b+hU'i bu ka'o/_/lung liT dag gi 'gyur ba'i rnam dbyi a tsa dang po can rnams pha rol las byings b+hU la bu ka A ga ma ster so/_/a b+hU ba na/_b+hU la/_lung /_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don la 
[\[195b.7\]]lung la tsa 'os ts+li byin ts+li'i si tsa 'os si tsang 'gyur gA ti sogs kyis si tsa 'jig_/la dz+hi dz+ha las i phyung dz+ha an+d+ra i ta kyi 'ang ngos i phyis brtsegs pa'i mtha' dbyi 'os ta phyis/_mdo 'dis bu ga a ga ma ka gnas don u brjod don ba drangs/_lung gi pa ra smi pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_/a b+hUH/_b+hU la/_lung /_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]la aT A ga ma gnas don lung pa ts+li 'os ts+li byin ts+li si tsa 'os si tsar 'gyur/_gA ti sogs kyis si tsa 'jig la/_si ba i ta kyi'ang ngos i phyis sa rur rnam bcad [\[]d+hUsbu [\]]dag ces pas yon tan mi byed/_a b+hU taM/_b+hU la lung /_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don lung la ts+li 'os ts+li byin ts+li si tsa 'os si car 'gyur gtA ti sogs 
[\[196a.2\]]kyis si tsa 'jig su 'gyur tas bas tha mi pa rnams kyi tAM taM ta A ma sogs kyis thas taM du 'gyur/_a g+hU ta/_b+hU la lung /_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don lung la ts+le 'os ts+li byin se tsa 'os si tsar 'gyur/_gA ti sogs kyis sitsa 'jig la thar 'gyur/_tas thas tha mi pa rnams kyi tAM taM ta aM rnams sos za ta ru 'gyur/_lung gi pa ra smai pa da'i 
[\[196a.3\]]skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a b+hU baM/_b+hU la/_lung /_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don lung la c+le 'os c+le byin si tsa 'os tsar 'gyur/_/gA ti sogs kyis si tsa 'jig la mi pa tu 'gyur/_tas thas tha mi pa rnams kyi hAM taM ta a ma rnams sos mi ba a ma du 'gyur/_/lungayiT dgas las b+hU'i bu ga 'os/_bu ka A ga ma ka gnas don u brjod 
[\[196a.4\]]don ba drangs/_a b+hU ba/_b+hU la lung /_lung lang l+r-ing kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don lung la ts+li 'os ts+li byin ts+li'i si tsi 'os i tsa ra 'gyur/_gA ti sogs kyis si tsa 'jig_/la bas su 'gyur ngi ta la rtag tu 'os sa phyis/_a b+hU ma/_b+hU la lung lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don lung la ts+li 'os ts+li byin/_ts+li'i si tsa 'os si tsa ra 'gyur/
[\[196a.5\]]gA ti sogs kyis si tsa 'jig_/la mas su 'gyur/_nga 'gro ba la rtag tu 'os sa phyis/_b+hU thob pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la lung gi At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug tshul ni/_/A r+d+ha d+hA tu kaM she She/_lhag ma byings phyed pa'o/_/sngar bshad zin pa laT/_ling /_loT/[ \[]yang [\]]rnams dang byings b+hA dang ShUnya la ster ba'i lung gi 
[\[196a.6\]]par smai par rnams ma yin pa'i lhag ma ste At+ma ne ba da sogs dang 'og nas 'byung ba'i la yig gzhan rnams dang kr-i ta sogs kyi rkyen dmigs bsal med pa rnams la'ang byings phyed pa can zhes brda chad byed do/_/a+war+d+ha d+hA tu ka s+ye DA lA deH_byings phyed pa'i bal dang po la iTa'o/_/byings phyed 
[\[196a.7\]]pa'i ming can gyi rnam dbye dang rkyen rnams kyi dang po na wal so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yod na lbal gyi yi ge de la iT A ga ma steng ro/_/a b+ha bi Sh+Ta/_b+hU la lung /_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings laaT A ga ma Ta gnas don lung ba ts+li 'os ts+li byin/_ts+li si tsa 'os si tsar 'gyur/_tsa dang i 'gro ba'i ming can yin pas phyis/_la ta ru 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]'gyur/_byings phyed pa'i lba la la iT 'os iT A ga ma Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi ngos byings la yon tan e tsa'i a ya a ba sogs kyi mdos o a ba ba i la drangs kun nas sgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha Sha Tu yi Sha Tu 'os ta Ta drangs/_lung gi At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig la/_a b+ha bi ShA 
[\[196b.2\]]tAM/_b+hU la lung /_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don/_lung la ts+li 'os/_tsI byin tsI'i si tsa 'os si tsa ra 'gyur/_tsa dang i phyis/_byings phyed pa'i lbal la iT 'os iT A ga maT gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa'i a ya sogs kyis o a tha kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis 
[\[196b.3\]]sra Sh+ra/_ya? A tAM du 'gyur Ta drangs/_mang tshig la/_At+ma ne pa de ShA na taH/_At+ma ne pa da rnams la a ta ma yin paM las so/_/b+ha ba lta bu ata mtha' can gyi pha rol ma yin pa'i At+ma ne pa da'i dz+ha ni ata ces bar 'gyur te/_a b+ha bi Sha ta/_b+hU la/_lung /_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis bying sa la aT A ga ma 
[\[196b.4\]]Ta gnas don/_lung la ts+li 'os ts+li byin ts+li'i si tsa 'os si tsar 'gyur/_tsa dang i phyis/_byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT A ga ma Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa can dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a ba drangs/_la dz+ha ru 'gyur dz+ha las a phyung mdo 'dis dz+ha ata du 'gyur/_ta a la drangs kun nas bsgyur ba sogs 
[\[196b.5\]]kyis sa ShA ShA a la drangs/_lung gi At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/_a b+ha bi Sh+thAH/_b+hU la lung /_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don lung la ts+li 'os/_ts+li byin/_ts+li'i sitsa 'os si tsar 'gyur/_tsa dang i phyis byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT A ga ma Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa 
[\[196b.6\]]can dang byings byed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ang la thas su 'gyur kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sra Sh+ra/_Sha Tu yi Sha Tu 'os brA ThA sa ru u phyis ta rnam bcad/_lung gi At+sa ne pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gnyis tshig la/_a b+ha bi ShA thAM/_b+hU la lung /_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis bye ras la aT A ga ma Ta gnas 
[\[196b.7\]]don/_lung la tsI 'os tsI byin tsa 'os si tsar 'gyur/_tsa dang i phyis byings phyed ba'i bal la 'os iT A ga ma/_Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a ba/_la A thAM du 'gyur kun nas bsgyur ba sogs gyis [\[]la Shu Shu \u0f84\u0f84\u0f84\u0f84\u0f84\u0f84[\]]A la drangs/_lung gi At+ma ne ba da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i mang tshig la/_/
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]d+hI tsa/_b+ha la'ang ngo /_/rnam dbye d+ha yig dang po can pha rol la sra srog meng dbyi'o/_/bi b+hA She DaH_i Ta'i 'dam ka'o/_/byings iN so sor bsdu ba'i mtha' yin la/_de la iT A ga ma byin pa'i i Ta'i pha rol gyi lung dang liT 'gyur ba'i d+ha yig dang smon pa'i ling 
[\[197a.2\]]gi sI d+hAM gyi yig ni D+ha yig tu yang na 'gyur te gdam nga can no/_/a b+ha bi D+hAM/_a b+ha bi d+hAM/_'grel bar lung drangs pa/_d+has lo po bA sa s+yad ke tsi ta/_d+hAM las dbyi ba'am yang na sa'i de 'ga' zhig tu'o/_/gong du bshad pa ltar rnam dbye d+ha yig pha rol la sa dbyi zhing skabs 'gar 
[\[197a.3\]]b+hU la/_lung lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings ba aT A ga maT gnas don lung la ts+li 'os tsI byin ts+li'i si tsa 'os si tsar 'gyur/_/tsa dang i byis/_byings byed pa'i lba la la iT 'os/_iT A ga ma Ta gnas don bying sa thams cad pa dang bying ba phyed ba dag gi 'os bying sa la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a ba la d+hAM du 'gyur d+ha la'ang ngos sa gyis/_mdo 'dis d+ha D+har 'gyur ba dang mi 'gyur 
[\[197a.4\]]ba yang na bar byas ba'o/_/yang nas de mi dbyi bar sra de nyid dra yig tu 'gyur ba yang bya ste/_a b+ha bi d+d+tAM/_a d+ha di d+haM/_lung gi At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_b+hUl/_khung lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don lung la ts+li 'os tsI byin tsI si 'os si tsar 'gyur tsa dang i byis sa phyed pa'i lba la ba iT 
[\[197a.5\]]'os/_iT A ga ma Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa [\[]dang [\]]byings byed pa dag gi byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o agra/_la d+h+raM du 'gyur 'da'i sa dbyi ba dang dar 'gyur ba yang na bar byas ba'o/_/a b+ha bi Shi/[ \[]b+hU la lung [\]]/_lung lar gr-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don/_lung la ts+li 'os/_tsI byin [\[]ts+li [\]]si 'os si tsar 'gyur tsa dang i phyin bying sa byed pa'i lbal la 
[\[197a.6\]]iT 'os/_iT A ga maT gnas don byings thams cad ba dang byings phyed pa dag gi pos byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a ba la iT ra 'gyur/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa [\[]Sha [\]]drangs/_a b+ha bi Sh+wa hi/_b+hU la lung /_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings ya aT Ta gnas don lung la ts+li 'os ts+li byin ts+li si tsa 'os si tsar 'gyur tsa dang i phyis byings phyed pa'i 
[\[197a.7\]]lbal la iT 'os iT A ga ma Ta gnas don gyis thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a lbal ba hi ru 'gyur/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha drangs/_a b+ha ba Sh+mi hi/[ \[]b+hU [\]]lung /_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don lung la ts+li 'os/_ts+li byin ts+li'i ni tsa 'os si tsar 'gyur tsa dang i 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]phyis/_byings phyed pa'i ngal la iT 'os/_iT A ga ma Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag go 'os byings la yon tan etsa sogs kyis o a lba/_la ma hir duHkyur nga so sor bsdu ba'i don/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sra [\[]ShA [\]]drangs/_na mAng yo ge/_mAng sbyor ba la ma yin no/_/gong du lung lang l+r-ing rnams pha rol 
[\[197b.2\]]la byings la aT A ga ma ster bar bshad kyang de'i dmigs bas la lung lang l+r-ing rnams pha rol la'ang mAng sbyor ba la byings la aT 'gyur ba na yin te/[ \[]byod [\]]ma byung /_mA b+ha bA na b+hU ta/_b+hU la lung la tib aT mi ster/_b+hU la lang sha ba la tib/_mA sma b+ha ba ta/_ma byung /_b+hU la lung la ting ba du 'gyur ba'o/_/mA sma b+hU ta/_ma byung /
[\[197b.3\]]de rnams la 'di dang tsan+d+ra par lung zhes brda chad byed la/_ka lA bar si dang lhan cig pa'i di ba sogs zer zhing byangs can byA ka ra Nar byung ba'i rnam dbye zer ro/_/pa ro\u0f85k+She liT/_lkog tu gyur ba la liTa'o/_/lkog gyur ni lkog tu gyur ba'i dus te/_de yang 'das pa dang ma 
[\[197b.4\]]'ongs pa gnyis su yod pa las/_'das pa'i byung ba brjod pa la byings la liT 'gyur te/_de yang 'das nas yun ring song ba la 'jug pa shas che'o/_/liD+ca/_liT 'ang ngo /_liT 'gyur ba'i rnam dbye rnams la yang byings s+yed pa can zhes brda chad byed do/_/pa ra smai ba dA 
[\[197b.5\]]nAM Na la tu su s+tha la thu saN lba mAH/_pa ra smai pa da rnams kyi Nal_a tus _us _thal _a thus _a Nal _ba ma rnams so/_/liT 'gyur pa ti pa sogs pa ra smai pad dgu po ni rim pa bzhin Nal la sogs pa dgu po 'di rnams su 'gyur ro/_/i n+d+hi b+ha ba ti b+h+yAM tsa/_i n+d+hi b+ha ba ti 
[\[197b.6\]]dag la 'ang ngo /_/byings in+d+hi gsal ba dang d+ha ba ti ste byings b+hU dag gi pha rol gyi liT 'gyur ba'i rnam dbye rnams la ka 'gro ba'i ming can zhes ming 'dogs byed de dgos pa ni yon tan 'gog pa'i don du'o/_liTi b+hA to ra na b+h+yA sa s+ya/_liT la byings a b+h+yA sa med pa'i 'o/_/byings 
[\[197b.7\]]lan gnyis brjod pa'i snga ma de la a b+hA sa zhes ming 'dogs byed la/_a b+h+yA sa med pa ste sngar byings lan gnyis byas zin yin na slar lan gnyis su me 'gyur bas/_sngar gnyis su ma 'gyur ba a b+h+yA sa med pa'i byings de ni liT pha rol la gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/e kA tso dwe pra tha ma s+ya/
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]a tsa gcig ba'i dang po'i gnyis so/_/sngar bshad pa ltar a b+h+yA sa med pa'i byings yin pa de yang a tsa gcig pa'i byings yin na de'i mtha' na ha la yon kyang liT pha rol la dang po de gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/pU rbonya b+h+ya saH/_sda ma a b+h+yA sa'o/_/gong du bshad pa/
[\[198a.2\]]ltar byings lan gnyis brjod pa'i snga ma de la a b+h+yA sa zhes ming 'dogs byed do/_/hra swa rtsaH/_thung ngu'o/_/byings gnyis brjod pa'i snga ma a b+h+yA sa'i ming can de ni a tsa ring po yin na thung ngur 'gyur ro/_/a b+h+yA se tsa r+ts+tsa/_a b+h+yA sa la tsar 'ang ngo /_a b+h+yA sa'i ming can de dz+ha la so 
[\[198a.3\]]sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yin na tsar so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang 'ang gi sgras dza sha so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams su 'gyur te/_de yang dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams kyi nang nas kha ya so sor bsdu ba rnams tsar so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge sde pa dang skye gnas mthun pa rnams su 'gyur la/
[\[198a.4\]]de 'phrod kyi dz+hal gyi yi ge rnams sde pa gcig cing skye gnas mthun pa'i dza sha so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams su 'gyur ro/_/b+ha ba te raH/_b+ha ba ti'i a'o/_/b+ha ba ti ste byings b+hU gnyis brjod pa'i snga ma a b+h+yA sa'i ming can de'i u ni liT pha rol la a yig tu 'gyur ro/_/de rnams 
[\[198a.5\]]kyi dper brjod ni b+hU yod pa la liTa'i pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_ba b+hU ba/_b+hU la/_lkog tu gyur pa la laT 'os/_liTaHniT Ti kyi don i khyad don la tib du 'gyur ba bar sme ba ba rnams kyi Nal a tus sogs kyis ti ba Nal du 'gyur/_Na yig Na 'gro ba la 'phel ba'i don yin kyang 'dir in+d+hi b+ha ba ti dag las kyang ngos/_'phel ba mi byed 
[\[198a.6\]]i khyad par gyi don/_liT la byings a b+h+yA sa med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod thung ngu 'os U thung ngur 'gyur/_b+ha ba ti'i 'os u a ru 'gyur/_a b+h+yA sa la tsa ra'ang ngos b+ha ba ru 'gyur/_b+hU'i bu ka 'os bu ka A ga ma ka gnas don u brjod don pa a la drangs pa'o/_/liTa'i pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig la/_ba b+hU ba taH/_b+hU 
[\[198a.7\]]la liT la tas su 'gyur/_par smai pad rnams kyi Nal a rkus sogs kyis tas a tus su 'gyur/_liT la byings b+h+yA sa med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod/_thung ngu 'os U yig u ru 'gyur/_b+ha ba ti'i a 'os u a yig tu 'gyur/_a b+h+yA sa la tsar 'ang ngos b+ha yig ba ru 'gyur b+hU'i bu ka 'os bu ka A ga ma ka gnas don u brjod don pa i la drangs/_liTa'i 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]par smai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i mang tshig la/[ \[]tha b+hU buH[\]]/_b+hU la liT/_la dz+nyu ru bsgyur/_thar smai ba da rnams kyi Nal a tus us sogs kyis dz+hi us su 'gyur liT la byings a b+h+yA sa med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod glung du 'os U blud dur 'gyur/_b+ha ba ti'i a 'os u ar song /_a [\[]b+h+yA sa la tsa ra sar b+ha lbar [\]]'gyur/_b+hU'i bu [\[]ka 'os bu ka [\]]A ga ma ka gnas 
[\[198b.2\]]don u brjod don ba us la drangs/_liTa'i ba ra smai ba da'i skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ba b+hU bi tha/_b+hU sa liT rjes 'brel phyis nas la sib tu bsgyur/_ba ra smai ba da rnams kyi Nal a tu sa us thal sogs kyis sib thal du 'gyur la khyad don liT la bying sa [\[]a b+h+yA sa lbin [\]]'di 'os byings gnyis bsdod/_thung ngu 'os thung ngur song b+ha ba ti'i a 'os u ar 'gyur/
[\[198b.3\]]a b+h+yA ra la tsar 'ang ngos b+ha bar 'gyur b+hU'i bu ka 'os bu ka A ga ma ka gnos don u brjod don byings byed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT byin Ta gnas don i la drangs/_tha b+hU pa thuH/_b+hU la/_liT rjes 'brel phyis nas la thas su 'gyur/_par smai ba da rnams [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]Nal a tus us thal a thus sogs kyis a thas a thus bsgyur/_liT la byings a b+h+yA sa med pa'i 'os byings 
[\[198b.4\]]gnyis brjod thung 'os thung ngur 'gyur/_b+ha ba ti'i a 'os u a ru song /_a b+h+yA sa la tsar 'ang ngos b+ha bar 'gyur/_b+hU'i buka 'os buka A ga ma ka gnas don u brjod don ba a la drangs/_ba b+hU ba/_b+hU la/_liT rjes 'brel gyis nas la thar bsgyur bar smai ba da rnams kyi Nal a tus us thal a thus a sogs kyis tha ata du 'gyur/_liT la byings a 
[\[198b.5\]]b+h+yAs [\[]zad [\]]pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod thung ngu 'os U thung ngur 'gyur/_b+ha ba ti'i a 'os u a ru song /_a b+h+yAs la tsar 'os b+ha bar 'gyur b+hU'i buka 'os buka A ga ma ka gnas don u brjod don yin pas phyis/_ba a la drangs/_liTa'i par smai pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ba b+hU ba/_b+hU la/_liT rjes 'brel phyis nas la mi ba tu bsgyur bar smai bar da 
[\[198b.6\]]rnams kyi Nal/_a tus us thal a thus aN la sogs kyis mi ba Nal du bsgyur/_la khyad don Na yig 'dir 'phel ba mi byed kyang gzhan du 'phel ba'i don liT la byings a b+h+yAs med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod thung ngu 'os U thung ngur bsgyur/_b+ha ba ti'i a 'os u a ru bsgyur/_a b+h+yAs la tsar 'os b+ha bar song /_b+hU'i buka 'os buka A ga ma ka gnas don u brjod 
[\[198b.7\]]don ba a la drangs/_ba b+hU bi ba/_b+hU la liT rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la lba su bsgyur/_thar smai pa da rnams kyi Nal a tus us thal a thus a Nal pa sogs kyis bas lbar bsgyur liT la byings a ng+n+nga sa med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod/_thung ngu 'os U thung ngur bsgyur/_b+ha ti'i a 'os u a ru yong /_a b+h+yA sa la tsar 'os b+ha ba b+hU'i buka 'os buka A ga 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]ma ka gnas don u brjod don byings byed ba'i bal la iT 'os iT A ga ma Ta gnas don ba i la drangs/_ba b+hU bi ma/_b+hU la/_liT rjes 'brel phyis nas lam sa su bsgyur/_pa ra smai ba da rnams kyi Nal _a tus _us _thal _a thus a Nal/_tha ma rnams sos mas mar bsgyur/_liT la byings a b+hA sa med pa'i 'os 
[\[199a.2\]]byings gnyis brjod/_thung ngu 'os A thung ngur bsgyur/_b+ha ba ti'i a 'os u a ru song /_a b+h+ya sa la tsar 'os b+ha bar bsgyur b+hU'i buka 'os/_buka A ga ma byin ka gnas don u brjod don bying sa phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don l+b+ra i la drangs/_de rnams liTa'i bar smai bad rnams so/_b+hU thob pa la'o zhes pa la A t+sa ni pa da rnams 
[\[199a.3\]]byin pa'i dper brjod ni/_liTa'i At+ma ne da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_liT sta dz+ha yo re shi re tsa/_liTa'i ta dz+ha dag gi e sha i re tsa'o/_/liT 'gyur ba'i At+ma ne ba da'i ta yig ni e sha dang dz+ha yig ni i re tsa zhes par 'gyur te/_ba b+hU be/_b+hU la/_liT rjes 'brel gyis nas la ta 
[\[199a.4\]]ru bsgyur/_mdo 'dis ta e shar bsgyur/_mtha'i ha la 'os sha phyis/_liT la byings a b+h+yAs med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod thung ngu 'os U thung ngur bsgyur/_b+ha ba ti'i a 'os u ar song /_a b+h+yAs la tsar 'os b+ha lbar bsgyur/_b+hU'i buka 'os buka A ga ma byin gnas don u brjod don lba e la drangs/_liTa'i At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu 
[\[199a.5\]]dang po'i gnyis tshig la/_ba b+hU bA te/_b+hU ba liT rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la A dI du bsgyur/_Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' er 'gyur/_liT la byings a b+hUs med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod thung ngu 'os U thung ngur bsgyur/_b+ha ba ti'i a 'os u ar [\[]bsgyur a b+h+yUr a b+h+yAs la tsar 'os b+ha lbar bsgyur/_b+hU'i bu ka 'os buka A ga ma byin/_ka 
[\[199a.6\]]gnas don u brjod don lba A la dungs/_liTa'i At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i mang tshig la/_ba b+hU bi re/_b+hU la liT rjes 'brel phyis nas la dz+har bsgyur/_liTa'i ta dz+ha dag gi e ri tsa 'os d+ha i tsa ra bsgyur/_mtha'i ha la 'os za phyis liT la byings a b+h+yAs med pa'i byings gnyis brjod/_bur du 'os U thung ngur bsgyur/_b+ha ba 
[\[199a.7\]]ti'i a 'os u ar bsgyur/_a b+h+yAs la tsar 'os/_b+ha ba/_b+hA'i bu ka 'os bu ka A ga ma ga gnas don u brjod don yin pas phyis/_la i la drangs/_liTa'i At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ba b+hU bi She/_b+hU la/_liT rjes 'brel phyis nas la thAs bu bsgyur/_nyAs kyi se ngos thAs ser bsgyur/_liT la byings a 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]b+h+yAs med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod/_thung ngu 'os U thung ngur bsgyur/_b+ha ba ti'i 'os u ar song a_b+h+yA sa la tsar 'os b+ha lbar bsgyur/_b+hA'i bu ka 'os bu ka A ga ma ka gnas don u brjod don byings phyed pa'i bal la iT Ta gnas don i la bu drangs/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis Sha/_ba b+hU bA tha/_b+hU la/_liT rjes 
[\[199b.2\]]'brel phyis nas/_la A thA du bsgyur/_Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e liT la byings a b+h+yA sa med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod/_thung ngu 'os U thung ngur bsgyur/_b+ha ba ti a 'os u la/_a b+h+yU sa tsar 'ang ngos b+ha bar bsgyur/_b+hU'i buka 'os ka A ga ma byin/_ka gnas don u brjod don lba A la drangs/_/ba b+hA bi d+he/_ba b+hA bi D+hA+e/
[\[199b.3\]\[]D+tA+au+ul[\]]/_liT rjes 'brel phyis nas sa d+hI ru bsgyur Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e liT byings a b+h+yAs med ba'i 'os byings gnyis brjod/_thung ngu 'os U thung ngur song /_b+ha ba ti'i a 'os u ar bsgyur/_a b+h+yA sa la tsar 'ang ngos b+ha bar bsgyur/_b+hU'i bu ka 'os bu ka A ga ma byin/_ka gnas don u brjod don byings byed pa'i lba las iT 'os yiT Ta 
[\[199b.4\]]gnas don iTa'i 'dam ka 'os d+ha d+har 'gyur mi 'gyur ba yang na byas ba'o/_/liTa'i At+ma ne ba da'i skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ba d+hU be/_b+hU la/_liT rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la i Tar bsgyur Ta khyad don Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis i a iT la byings a b+h+yAs med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod thung ngu 'os U thung ngur bsgyur/_b+ha ba ti'i a 'os u a/
[\[199b.5\]]b+hU'i bu ka 'os bu ka A ga ma byin ka gnas don u brjod don/_lba? e la drangs/_ba b+hU bi ba he/_b+hU la/_liT rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la ba hi ra bsgyur/_liT la byings a b+h+yAs med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod/_thung ngu 'os U thung rur bsgyur/_b+ha ba ti'i a 'os u a ra bsgyur/_a b+h+yA sa la tsor 'ang ngos b+ha bar bsgyur/_byings byed pa'i bal 
[\[199b.6\]]la iT 'os iT byin Ta gnas don/_b+hU'i bu ka 'os bu ka A ga ma byin/_ka gnas de ni u brjod don lba i la drangs/_ba b+hU bi ma he/_b+hU la/_liT rjes 'brel phyis nas/_lam hir du bsgyur/_nga so sor bsdu ba'i don liT la byings a b+h+yAs med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod/_thung ngu 'os U thung ngur bsgyur/_a b+h+yA ba ti'i a 'os u ar bsgyur/_a b+h+yAs la tsar 'ang 
[\[199b.7\]]ngos b+ha bar bsgyur/_byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don b+hU'i bu ga 'os bu ka A ga ma ka gnas don u brjod don l+b+ra e la drangs/_de rnams liT ste 'di dang tsa n+d+ra par liT zer la/_ka lA pa dang dbyangs can byA ka ra Na gnyis su lkog gyur gyi rnam dbye zhes zer ro/_/a na d+ya ta ni luT/_de ring ma yin pa la 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]luTa'o/_/de ring yod pa ma yin pa 'byung 'gyur gyi don la 'jug pa'i bya ba'i don la byings la luT 'jug ste/_de yang ma 'ongs pa shin tu dus thag ring ba ma yin pa la 'jug pa shas che'o/_/s+ya tA sI l+r-i lu ToH/_s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la'o/_/byings la l+r-i zhes pa l+r-ing 
[\[200a.2\]]dang l+r-ing dag gzung bar bya ste/_l+r-ing dang l+r-iT dag pha rol la s+ya ster zhing luT pha rol la tAs sbyar bar bya'o/_/luTaH_pra tha ma s+ya DA rau ra saH_luTa'i dang po rnams kyi DA ro ras rnams so/_/luT bsgyur ba'i pa ra smai ba da'i skyes bu dang bo rnams dang /_At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dang po rnams ni rim pa 
[\[200a.3\]]bzhin DA rau ras rnams su 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni dper brjod rim pa bzhin pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_b+ha bi tA/_b+hU la/_de ring ma yin pa la luT 'os luT Ti ta kyi don/_u luTa'i dang po sogs kyi khyad don la ti ba tu 'gyur/_luTa'i dang po rnams kyi DA [\[]rau [\]]ras rnams sos tib DA ru bsgyur/
[\[200a.4\]]Da Di ta la Ti dbyi ba'i don s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os tAs byin ti'i 'os ti phyis ta drangs/_byings [\[]phyed [\]]pa'i bal la iT 'os iT byin/_byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a lba l+b+ra i la drangs/_lu Ta'i ba ra smai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig la/_ri tsa/_ra la 
[\[200a.5\]]'ang ngo /_/ra yig pa rol la tAs dang byings as yod pa dag gi sa yig srog med ni dbyi ste/_b+ha bi tA rau/_b+hU la/_liT rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la tas su bsgyur luTa'i dang po rnams kyi zhes pas tas rau ru bsgyur/_s+ya tAs dag lb-i luT dag la 'os tAs byin/_mdo 'dis phyis byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 
[\[200a.6\]]'os iT A ga ma Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed bdag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o lba drangs/_luTa'i pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i mang tshig la/_b+ha bi tA raH_b+hU la/_luT rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la dz+hi ru bsgyur/_luTa'i dang po sogs kyis dz+hi ras su bsgyur/_s+ya tAs dag ces 
[\[200a.7\]]pas tAs byin/_ral 'ang ngos sa phyis/_byings phyed pa'i lbal la aT 'os iT A ga maT gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings byed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a lba drangs/_luTa'i pa ra smai ba da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/_tA sa s+t+yo rmo paH/_tA sa a sti dag gi dbyi'o/_/
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]tas dang a sti ste byings as dag gi sa yig ni rkyen sa yig dang po can pha rol la dbyi ste/_b+ha bi tA si/_b+hU la/_luT rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la sib tu bsgyur/_ba bita phyi don/_s+ya tAs dag ces pas tAs byin/_mdo 'dis phyis byings phyed pa'i bas la iT 'os iT byan Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os 
[\[200b.2\]]byings la yon tan e tsa'i sogs kyis o a lba drangs/_luTa'i pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gnyis tshig la/_b+ha bi tA [\[]sbraH[\] ]b+hU la/_luT rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la thas su bsgyur s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os tAs byin sa thal drangs byings phyed pa'i bal iT 'os iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi byings 
[\[200b.3\]]la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o aT drangs/_luTa'i pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i mang tshig la/_b+ha bi tA s+tha/_b+hU la/_luT rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la thar bsgyur/_s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os tAs byin sa thal drangs/_byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT byin/_Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 
[\[200b.4\]]'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a lba drangs so/_/luTa'i pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_b+ha bi tA smi/_b+hU la/_luT rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la mi ba tu bsgyur/_ba [\[]mi[\]] ta kyi don s+ya tAs dag ces pas tAs byin/_byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag 
[\[200b.5\]]gi 'os byengs la yon tan awa tsa sogs kyis o a ba drangs/_b+ha bi tA lbaH/_b+hU la/_luT rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la bas su sgyur s+ya tAs dag ces pas tAs sbyar/_byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a ba/_b+ha bi tA smaH_b+hU la/
[\[200b.6\]]aT rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la mas su bsgyur s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os tAs sbyaraH/_byings phyed pa'i bal iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a lba drangs/_de rnams par smai pa da'o/_/da ni b+hU thob ba la At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyar bas skyes 
[\[200b.7\]]du dang bo gsum par smai pa da'i skyes bu dang po gsum dang 'dra ste/_b+ha bi tA/_b+hU la/_luT la ta ta DAr 'gyur tAs iT sogs/_b+ha bi tA rau/_la A tAM A tAM rau sgyur tAs iT sogs/_la dz+ha dz+ha ras su 'gyur/_tAs dang iT sogs kyis o a ba/_b+ha bi tA raH/_luTa'i At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]b+ha ngi tA se/_b+hU la/_luT rjes 'brel phyis nas/_l+ra thas su bsgyur thas kyi se 'os thAs sa s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os tAs byin tAs a sti dag gi dbyi 'os phyis/_byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan i tsa sogs kyis o abra/
[\[201a.2\]]luTa'i At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gnyis tshig la/_b+ha bi tA sA tha/_b+hU la/_liT rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la A tAM du bsgyur/_Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os tAs sbyar/_byings phyed pa'i bal iT byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa'i sogs kyis o 
[\[201a.3\]]a ba drangs/_luTa'i At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i mang tshig la/_b+ha bi tA[\[] d+hA[\]]/_d+hU la/_luT rjes 'brel phyis nas/[ \[]bra d+h+raM du bsgyur[\]]/_Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/_s+ya tAs dag ces pas tAs sbyar/_d+tA la 'ang ngos sa byis/_byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon 
[\[201a.4\]]tan e tsa sogs kyis o a l+b+ra drangs/_luTa'i At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig la/_ha e ti/_eta la ha'o/_/tAs dang byings as dag gi sa yig ni rkyen a pha rol la ha yig tu 'gyur te/_b+ha bi tA he/[ \[]b+hU la[\]]/_luT rjes 'brel byis nas/_lnga iTar 'gyur Ta khyad don Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis i e 
[\[201a.5\]]s+ya tAs dag l+r-i liT dag la 'os tAs byin/_mdo 'dis sra hra byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings phyed pa dang thams cad pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis abra/_luTa'i At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma'i gnyis tshig la/_b+ha bi tA sA he/_b+hU laH/_luT rjes 'brel phyi ma nas/[ \[]la[\]] ba hir 'gyur[\]]/
[\[201a.6\]]Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT zhes pa tAs sbyar/_byings phyed pa'i bal iT yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a bra/_luTa'i At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma'i mang tshig la/_b+ha bi tA sma he/_b+hU la/_luT rjes 'brel phyis nas/_lam hing dung sgyur da so sor bsdu ba'i don 'gro ba sogs kyis i er song /_byings 
[\[201a.7\]]byed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a bra drangs/_de rnams luT ste 'di dang tsan+d+ra pa gnyis su luT zer la/_ka lA pa dbyangs can byA ka ra Na gnyis su shwa sta ni zer ro/_/li dA shi Shi/_smon pa la ling 'o/_smon 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]pa'i don la 'jug pa'i bya ba'i don la ling 'gyur te/_de yang smon pa'i ling zhes brda chad byed la/_ling phyi ma smon pa'i ling zhes brda chad byas pa 'di ni byings phyed pa'i ming can yang yin no/_/ki dA shi Shi/_smon pa la ki ta'o/_/smon pa'i don gyi lita 'gyur ba'i pa ra smai pa da rnams 
[\[201b.2\]]la'ang yA suT 'jug cing smon pa'i ling gi skabs 'dir yA suT la ka 'gro ba'i ming can zhes brda chad byed do/_/smon pa'i ling byings la sbyar ba'i dper brjod ni/_smon pa'i ling gi pa ra sme ba da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_b+hU lA ta/_b+hU la/_smon pa'i [\[]ling nga rita kyi don i khyad don la ti ya du 
[\[201b.3\]]bsgyur/_pa pita kyi don ita ita kyi 'ang ngos i phyis pa ra smai pa dal A luT steng 'gro ba'i u dA d+ta 'ang ngos A uT/_smon pa la ki ta 'os de ki ta kyi ming can du gnas don u brjod don/_yang dag par sbyor ba'i dang po'i sa ka dag gi 'os sa phyis/_smon pa'i don gyi ling gi par smai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig la/_b+hU yA stAM/
[\[201b.4\]]d+hU la/_smon ling rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la dAs sung sgyur/_tas/_thas/_tha me pa rnams kyi dAM taM ha a ma rnams sos/_tas t+daM du bsgyur/_pa ra smai pa da zhes pas yA suT/_Ta gnas don u brjod don sra drangs/_smon pa'i ling gi pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i mang tshig la/_b+hU yA suH_b+hU la/_smon pa'i ling rjes 'brel phyis 
[\[201b.5\]]nas la dz+hi ru bsgyur/_dz+hi'i dzus 'os dz+hi dzus su bsgyur/_tsu Tu sogs kyis dza phyis/_pa ra smai pa da zhes pas yA suT/_Ta gnas don u brjod don/_swa u la drangs/_smon pa'i ling gi ba ra smai'i pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_b+hU yAH/_b+hU la/_smon ling rjes 'brel phyis/_la si ba tu bsgyur ba pi ta kyi don ita kyi 'ang ngos i phyis pa 
[\[201b.6\]\[]nga [\]]smi pa da sogs kyis yA suT/_Ta gnas don u brjod don yang dag par sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i dang po'i sa? ka? dag gi 'os lnga su Ta'i sa phyi/_si pa kyis ru u phyis ru u phyis ra rnam bcad/_b+hU yA staM/_b+hU la/_smon ling rjes 'brail phyis nas/_mthas su bsgyur/_tas thas sogs kyis thas taM thas du bsgyur/_par smai ba de sogs kyis y+ba suT/_Ta gnas don 
[\[201b.7\]]u brjod don spa taM la [\]]drangs/_b+hU yA sta/_d+hU la/_smon ling rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la thar bsgyur/_tas thas tha mi pa sogs kyis tha tar 'gyur/_pa ra smai sogs kyis yA suT/_Ta gnas don u brjod don sa tal drangs/_smon pa'i ling gi pa ra smai pa da'i sgyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_b+hU yA saM/_b+hU la/_smon pa'i ling rjes 'dral 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]phyis nas/_la mi pa du bsgyur tas thas tha mi pa sogs kyis mi pa a ma du bsgyur ba ra smai ba da sogs kyis [\[]sA u/[\] ]Ta gnas don u brjod don sra a ma la drangs [\[]mra pa ro[\]]/_b+hU yA sA/_b+hU la/_smon pa'i lir rjes 'brel phyis nas/_langs su bsgyur/_ri ta la rtag tu 'os sa phyis/_pa ra smai ba da sogs kyis yA suT/_Ta gnas 
[\[202a.2\]]don u brjod don sra mra la drangs/_b+hA yA sma/_b+hU la/_smon ling rjes 'brel phyis nas la mas su bsgyur/_ngi ta la rtag tu 'os sa phyis/_pa ra smi ba da sogs kyis yA suT/_Ta gnas don u brjod don sA ma la drangs/_b+hU thob pa la At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyar ba'i dper brjod ni/_smon pa'i ling gi At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dang 
[\[202a.3\]]po'i gcig tshig la/_suT ti thoH/_ta tha dag gi suTa'o/_/smon pa'i ling 'gyur ba'i At+ma ne pa da'i rnam dbye ta yig dang tha yig dag la luT A ga ma ster te/_b+ha bi ShI Sh+Ta/[ \[]b+hU la [\]]smon pa'i ling rjes 'brel byis nas/_la tar bsgyur ling gi lI uT sos sI uT_Ta gnas don u brjod don byings byed pa'i bal la 
[\[202a.4\]]iT 'os iT byin/_Ta gnas don byings thams cad ba dang byings byed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan etsa sogs kyis o a ba ba i la drangs/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sra Sha?ba? ya? dag gi bal la dbyi 'os phyis/_mdo 'dis suT A ga ma Ta gnas don u brjod don kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha drangs Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os tra D+ra Sh+da la drangs/
[\[202a.5\]]smon pa'i lig gi At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig la/_b+ha bi ShI yA stUM/_b+hUs smon pa'i ling rjes 'brel phyis nas/_lwa A tAM du bsgyur/_ling gi sI luT 'os sa'i yuT/_Ta gnas don u brjod don byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os/_iT A ga ma Ta gnas don u brjod don byings thams cad pa dang phyings phyed pa sogs 
[\[202a.6\]]kyis yon tan e tsa kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis swa Sha y+ra A la drangs/_ta tha dag gi suT 'os tAM dang Ta'i bar du suT Ta gnas don u brjod don sra tAM la drangs/_smon pa'i ling gi At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i mang tshig la/_b+ha bi ShI ran/_b+hU la smon pa'i ling rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la? dz+ha ra bsgyur/ dz+halir na 'os dz+ha ran du 
[\[202a.7\]]bsgyur/_ling gi sI yuT 'os sI uT Ta gnas don u brjod don byings phyed ba'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don/_byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed dag gi 'os/_byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a lba [\[]l+b+Ta[\]] i la drangs/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/[ \[]ba ya dag [\]]gi bal dbyi 'os ya phyis/_smon pa'i 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]ping gi At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_b+ha bi ShI Sh+TaH/_b+hU la smon pa'i ling rjes 'brel byis nas/_la thA sa su bsgyur/_ta ba dag gi suT Ta gnas don u brjod don/_ling gi sI luT Ta gnas don u brjod don/[ \[]ba ya [\]]dag gi bal la dbyi [\[]phog [\]]la phyis/_byings phyed ba'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad ba dang 
[\[202b.2\]]byings byed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan etsa sogs kyis o a ba/_lnga il drangs kun nas bsgyur ba sogs gyis sa gnyis Sha/_Sha Tul Sha Tu 'os thA ThA Sha ThA la drangs ras ru rnam bcad/_b+ha bi ShI yA s+thAM/_b+hU la/_smon pa li ling rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la? A thAM ru bskyur/_ta tha dag gi su Ta 'os/_A dar thAM gyi bar du suT/_Ta gnas don u brjod don 
[\[202b.3\]\[]lu thAM la drangs[\]]/_ling gi sI yuT 'os/_sI yuT/_Ta gnas don u brjod don/_byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os/_byings la yon tan/_etsa sogs kyis o a ba/_lba i a drangs kun nas bsgyur pa sogs kyis sraShA/[ \[]a? tha sA [\]]ba drangs/_b+ha bi ShI d+gAM/_b+ha bi ShI d+haM/_smon 
[\[202b.4\]]d+hU la smon ling rjes 'brel byed nas/_la d+hI du bsgyur ling gi sI uT 'os sa'i yuT/_Ta gnas don u brjod don ba ya dag gi bal la dbyi 'os la phyis byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o u ba/_lba? i la drangs kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis [\[]sra Sha [\]]
[\[202b.5\]]iTa'i gdam nga 'os d+ha D+har 'gyur ba dang mi 'gyur ba 'dam ka byas pa'o/_pa'i ling gi At+ma ne da'i skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_b+ha bi ShI ya/_b+hU la smon pa'i ling rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la iTar bsgyur iTa'i ata 'os/_iT ata du bsgyur/_ta yig ta yi de'i dus kyi don/_ling gi sI uT 'os/_sI yaT/_Ta gnas don u 
[\[202b.6\]]brjod don byings byed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'o ma byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a ba lba i la drangs kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa? Sha?/_ya a la drangs/_b+ha bi ShI ba hi/_d+hU la smon pa'i ling rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la ba hir bsgyur/_ling gi sI yuT 'os sI yaT Ta gnas don 
[\[202b.7\]]u brjod don ba ya dag gi bal la dbyi 'os a phyis byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a ba tha i la drangs/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis saSha ru bsgyur/_b+ha bi ShI ma hi/_b+hU la smon pa'i ling rjes 'brel phyis nas/[ \[]sa? ma hing [\]]
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]du bsgyur/_nga so sor bsdu ba'i don/_ling gi sI yuT 'os sI yuT Ta gnas don u brjod don ba la dag gi bal la dbyi 'os ya phyis byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e ca sogs kyis e a ba ba? i la drangs/_kun 
[\[203a.2\]]nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sra Sha/_de rnams smon pa'i don gyi ling ste/_'di dang tsan+d+ra pa ra smon pa'i ling zer la/_ka lA pa dang dbyangs can byA ka ra Na gnyis su smon pa'i yA ta sogs zhes zer ro/_/b+ha bi Sh+ya ti l+r-iT/_'byung bar 'gyur ba la l+r-iTa'o/_/de ring ma yin pa'i 'byung 'gyur gyi bya 
[\[203a.3\]]ba'i don la byings la liT 'gyur zhing 'byung 'gyur de yang ma 'ongs pa dus ring po'i don la 'jug bshas che'o/_/'byung 'gyur gyi rnam dbye de dag byings dang sbyar ba'i dper brjod ni/_pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/_b+hU la _lbiT/_Ta/_Ta te kyi don [\[]r-i khyad don Ta tir tu bsgyur[\]]/_ba bita 
[\[203a.4\]]gyi don/_s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya byin/_byings byed pa'i bal la iT 'os iTaT gnas don/_byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan etsa sogs kyis i aka/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa? ShA/_b+ha bi Sh+ya taH/_b+hU la/_phr-iT rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la tas su bsgyur/_s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag 
[\[203a.5\]]la 'os s+ya sbyar/_byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iTaT gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan etsa sogs kyis o a ba kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis saSha/_b+ha bi Sh+ya [\[]n+ti[\]]/_b+hU la/_l+r-iT rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la dz+hi ru bsgyur/_dz+ha'i an+ta 'os dz+ha an+ta/_s+ya tAs [\[]dag l+r-i luT [\]]dag la 'os s+ya 
[\[203a.6\]]s+ya sbyar aT kyi yon tan la 'os gnyis dag gi gcig snga ma'i gzugs/_byings phyed pa'i ngal la iT 'os/_iTaT gnas son/_byings thams cad pa dang byings byed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan etsa sogs kyis o ya ba kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa? Sha?/_l+r-iTa'i pa ra smai ba da'i skyes bu dbus ma gsum 
[\[203a.7\]]la/_b+ha bi Sh+ya si/_b+hU la/_l+r-iT rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la sib ba pi ta kyi don/_s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya byings phyed pa'i bal la iT Ta gnas son/_byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa'i a la a lba A la A lba rnams sos o a ba/_bra i la drangs/_kun nas bsgyur ba dang rkyen sogs 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]kyis sa Sha/_b+ha bi Sh+ya thaH/_b+hU la/_l+r-iT rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la? thas su bsgyur/_s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya sbyar/_byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os/_iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings byed pa dag gi 'os/_byings la yon tan e tsa sogs gyis o [\[]as/[\] ]kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/
[\[203b.2\]]b+ha bi Sh+ya tha/_b+hU la/_l+r-iT rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la Sha ru bsgyur/_s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya sbyar/_byings phyed pa'i bal la iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o as/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis la Sha/_liTa'i bar smai ba da'i skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_b+ha bi 
[\[203b.3\]\[]b+h+yA mi[\]]/_b+hU la/_lb-iT rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la mi pa du bsgyur/_ba bita kyi don/_s+ya tA sa dag l+r-iT dag la 'os s+ya byin/_yanya la ata gyi ring bo 'os/_s+ya ring bor song byir sa phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT byin Ta gnas don byings thams cad tha dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab/_kun 
[\[203b.4\]]nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/_b+ha bi Sh+yAbaH/_b+hU la/_liT rjes 'brel phyis nas phabs dang mas su bsgyur/_s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya sbyar/_ya ta la ata kyi ring po 'os/_s+ya ring por slong /_byings phyed pa'i bal la iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis 
[\[203b.5\]]o ab/_bra i la drangs/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis s+ya ShA/_b+ha bi Sh+yA maH/_b+ha bi Sh+yA maH/_de rnams bU la l+r-iTa'i par smai ba da rnams sbyar ba'o/_/b+hU thob pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyar ba'i dper brjod ni/_l+r-iTa'i At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_b+ha bi Sh+ya te/_b+hU la/_l+r-iT 
[\[203b.6\]]rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la ta ru bsgyur/_Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/_s+ya tAs dag sr-i luT dag la 'os/_s+ya/_byings phyed pa'i bal iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os/_byings ka yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis saSha/_b+ha bi Sh+ye te/[ \[]b+hU la/[\] ]l-iT rjes 
[\[203b.7\]]'brel phyis nas/[ \[]la?[\]]A tAM du bsgyur/_Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/_s+ya tAs dag l+r-i uT dag la 'os s+ya byin byings phyed pa'i ral la iT 'os/_iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ang /_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis la Sha/_nga 'gro ba'i A ta kyi 'os A tI gyi 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]A i ya/_ba ya dag gi ba bal 'os ya phyis/_a las yon tan nos e/_b+ha bi Sh+ya n+te/_b+hU la/_l+r-iT rjes 'brel phyis nas/_ya dz+har bsgyur/_d+ha'i an+ta 'os dz+ha an+ta ra bsgyur/_na 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' a/_s+ya tAs dag khr-i luT dag la 'os s+ya sbyar/_a ta kyi yon tan la 'os gnyis dag gi gcig snga ma'i 
[\[204a.2\]]gzugs/_byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT byin/_Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan etsa sogs kyis o ab/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis [\[]seSha/[\] ]l+r-iTa'i At+ma ni pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_b+ha bi Sh+ya se/_b+hU la/[ \[]l-i?T [\]]rjes 'bral phyis nas la thAs su bsgyur thAs 
[\[204a.3\]]kyis 'os thAs ser bsgyur s+ya tA sa dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya sbyang /_byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os/_iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings byed pa dag gi byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab/_kun nas bsgyur ba dang rkyen sogs kyis sa Sha/_b+ha bi Sh+ye the/_b+hU la/_l+r-iT rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la A thA ma du bsgyur 
[\[204a.4\]]Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/_s+ya tAs dag l+r-i phuT dag la 'os s+ya sbyar/_nga 'gro ba'i A ta kyi 'os A thA ma gyi A il/_ba ya dag gi bal la dbyi 'os phyis/_a las yon tan mtshams sbyar byings phyed pa'i bal la iT yon tan sogs/_b+ha bi Sh+ya d+hA+e/_b+hU la/_liT rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la d+g+ra du bsgyur/
[\[204a.5\]]Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/_s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya sbyar/_byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis saSha/_l+r-iTa'i At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_b+ha bi [\[]Sh+ye[\]]/_b+hU la/_l-i?T rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la iT ra bsgyur/_Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis 
[\[204a.6\]]e/_s+ya tAs dag l+ra luT dag la 'os/_s+ya sbyar/_ata kyi yon tan la 'os/_gnyis dag gi gcig pha rol gyi gzugs/_byings phyed pa'i bal la eT 'os iT Ta gnas don/_byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa? Sha?/_b+hA bi Sh+yA ba he/_b+ha bi Sh+yA 
[\[204a.7\]]ma he/_b+hU la/_l+r-iT rjes 'brel phyis nas/_l-i? ba hi dang ma hing du bsgyur/_Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/_s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os/_s+ya sbyar/_yanyal a ta kyi ring po 'os/_s+ya ring po/_byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os -iT Ta gnas don/_byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a ga kun 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa? ShA/_de rnams l+r-iT ste 'di dang tsa n+d+ra ba ra l+r-iT zer la/_ka lA ba dang dbyangs can byA ka ra Na gnyis su s+ya dang lhan cig pa'i ti sogs sam b+ha bi Sh+ya n+ti zer ro/_/lid ni mi t+te s+y-ing kri yA ti pa t+tau/_ling gi yul la bya ba shor ba la l+r-ing 'o/_/bya ba shor ba ste dus la [\[]mtho la [\]]
[\[204b.2\]]pa'am/_rgyu tshogs ma 'dzom pa'i don la ling gi yul la l+r-ing 'jug cing /_skabs 'gar bya ba ma rdzogs par 'phro lus pa'i don dang /_bya ba zin ba thag pa'i grub pa gsar pa la yang 'jug par bshad do/_/de yang l+r-ing dang byings sbyar ba'i per brjod ni/_l+r-ing gi pa ra smi ba da'i 
[\[204b.3\]]skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a b+ha bi Sh+ya ta/_b+hU la/_l+r-ing /_nga /_ngita kyi don/_ri s+ya gyi don/[ \[]la? [\]]tin tu bsgyur[\]]/_ba bi ta kyi don ita kyi 'ang ngos/_i phyis/_s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os/_s+ya sbyar/_lung lang /_l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas dan/_byings phyed pa'i tha sal -i+iT byings thams cad pa dang byings byed pa dge gi 
[\[204b.4\]]'os yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab/_kun nas bsgyur ba dang rkyen sogs kyis sa Sha/_a b+ha bi Sh+ya tAM/_b+hU la/_l+r-ing rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la? ta sa su bsgyur/_tas thas tha mi pa sogs kyis tas tA ma du bsgyur/_s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don/_byings phyed pa'i bar 
[\[204b.5\]]la 'os/_iTaT gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/_a b+ha pi Sh+ya na/_b+hU la/_l-ing rjes 'brel phyis nas/[ \[]l+ra??[\]]dz+hi ru bsgyur/_s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os/_s+ya sbyar/_dz+ha'i an+ta 'os dz+ha an+ta ita kyi 'os i 
[\[204b.6\]]byis brtsegs pa'i mtha' dbyi 'os tA phyis/_ata kyi yon tan la 'os gnyis dag gi gcig sta ma'i gzugs/_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings aT Ta gnas don byings byed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os yon tan e tsa sogs dang kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/_l+r-ing gi napa ra smai ba da'i skyes 
[\[204b.7\]]bud bus ma gsum la/_a b+ha bi Sh+yaH/_b+hU la/_l+r-ing rjes 'brel phyis nas/_l+ra sib du bsgyur/_pa pita kyi don ita kyi 'ang ngos/_i byis/_phya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os/_s+ya sbyar/[ \[]sa sa dzra Sha sogs kyis sa ru/_u phyis ra rnam bcad/[ \[]lung la l+r-ing [\]]sogs kyis byings la aTaT gnas don byings phyed pa'i bal la aT 'os iTaT 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/_a b+ha bi Sh+ya taM/_b+hU la/_l+r-ing rjes 'brel phyes nas/_l+ra thas su bsgyur/_tas thas tha mi ba sogs kyi thas tAM du bsgyur/_s+ya tAs dag l+raM luT dag la 'os/_s+ya 
[\[205a.2\]]sbyar/_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT/_Ta gnas don byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/_a b+ha bi Sh+ya ta/_b+hU la/_l+r-ing rjes 'brel phyis nas/_l+ra bar bsgyur/_tas thas tha m-i ba sogs kyis 
[\[205a.3\]]tha tar bsgyur/_s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya sbyar/_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la a Ta Ta gnas don byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os/_iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed bdag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/_l+r-ing gi pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma gsum 
[\[205a.4\]]la rim pa bzhin/_a b+ha bi Sh+yi/_b+hU la/_l+r-ing rjes 'brel phyis na so_la mi ba tu bsgyur/_tas thas tha mi pa sogs kyis mi ba am du bsgyur/_s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os/_s+ya sbyar/_ata gyi yon tan la 'os/_gnyis dag gi gcig pha rol gyi gzugs mang ngo lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don byings phyed pa'i bal la 
[\[205a.5\]]iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os yon tan e tsa sogs kyis a ab/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/_a b+ha bi Sh+yA ba/_a b+ha bi Sh+yA ma/_b+hU thob pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la l+rang gi At+ma ne pad rnams sbyar ba'i dper brjod ni/_l+r-ing gi At+ma ne pa da'i spyes bu dang po 
[\[205a.6\]]gsum la/_b+hU la/_l+r-ing rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la bas dang mas su bsgyur/_s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT ngag la 'os s+ya sbyar/_yanyal ata kyi ring po 'os s+ya ring por song /_bi tas rtag tu 'os sa phyis/_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag 
[\[205a.7\]\[]ni ngom [\]] byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ag_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis saSha/_a b+ha bi Sh+ya ta/_b+hU la/_l+r-ing rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la tar bsgyur/_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis aT s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya sbyar/_byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab/_kun nas bsgyur ba dang rkyen sogs saSha/_a b+ha bi Sh+ye tAM/_b+hU la/_l+r-ing rjes 'brel phyis nas/_l+ra A tAM du bsgyur/_s+ya tAs dag l+raM luT dag la 'os s+ya sbyar ba 'gro ba la A ta kyi 'os/_A tAM gyi A i ya bra ya dag gi bal la dbyi 'os ya? phyis/_a las yon tan nos e lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis 
[\[205b.2\]]byings la aT Ta gnas don byings byed pa'i bal la iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/_a b+ha bi Sh+ya n+ta/_b+hu la/_l+r-ing rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la dz+har bsgyur/_dz+ha'i an+t+ra 'os/_dz+ha an+tar bsgyur s+ya tAs dag gi l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya 
[\[205b.3\]]sbyar/_ata kyi yon tan la 'os gnyis dag gi gcig snga ma'i gzugs su song /_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os phyings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a ba kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/_l+r-ing gi At+ma ne pa de'i 
[\[205b.4\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a b+ha bi Sh+ya thAH/_b+hU la/_l+r-ing rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la? thAs su bsgyur/_s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya sbyar/_byings phyed ba'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis ab/_kun nas bsgyur ba dang rkyen sogs kyis sa Sha/
[\[205b.5\]]lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don/_a b+ha bi Sh+ye [\[]ShAM/[\] ]b+hU la/_l+r-ing rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la? A thAM du bsgyur/_s+ya d+tas dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya sbyar/_nga 'gro ba'i A ta kyi 'os A thA ma gyi A i ya/_ba ya dag gi bal la dbyi 'os yu kyis/_a las yon tan nos e lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don byings phyed 
[\[205b.6\]]pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/_a b+ha bi Sh+ya d+hAM/_b+hU la l+r-ing rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la d+hAM du bsgyur/_s+ya tAs dag praM luT dag la 'os s+ya sbyar/_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don 
[\[205b.7\]]byings byed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/_l+r-ing gi At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a b+ha bi Sh+ye/_b+hU la/_l+r-ing rjes 'brel phyis nas/_l+ra iTar bsgyur/_s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dang 
[\[206a\]]
