[\[206a.1\]]la 'os s+ya sbyar/_a las yon tan nos e byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os/_byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT/_a b+ha bi Sh+ya ba hi/_a b+ha 
[\[206a.2\]]bi Sh+yA ma hi/_b+hU la/_l+r-ing rjes 'brel phyis nas/_lab hi dang ma hing du bsgyur/_s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya sbyar/_ya ta la ata kyi rung po 'os s+ya ring po/_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT/_Ta gnas don byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT/_Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byengs la yon tan a tsa 
[\[206a.3\]]sogs kyis o ar/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/_de dang /_tu bkod pa ni/_ya dA br-iSh+TiHsu rA dz+yaM tsA b+ha bi Sh+ya ta/_gang dag tu char babs shing rgyal po bde bar gyur/_ta dA su b+he k+Sha ma b+ha bi Sh+ya ta/_ces pa ste char 'beb pa'i rgyal po [\[]bde ba ni [\]]grub zin gsar pa dang /_slong mo thob par 'gyur zhes pa 
[\[206a.4\]]ni/_da lta thob ma zin pas bya ba ma rdzogs pa'i dpe'o/_/de rnams l+r-ing ste 'di dang tsa n+d+ra par l+r-ing zer la/_ka lA par bya ba shor ba'i di ba sogs dang ba/_de dag tu slong mo bzang po thob par 'gyur/_dbyangs can byA ka ra Nar bya ba lus pa'i rnam dbye zer ro/_/de ltar laT la sogs pa bcu po ngos 
[\[206a.5\]]bzung ba dang /_de dag gi 'gyur sogs cha tsam bshad nas da ni de dag dang byings sbyor ba'i cho ga spyir btang dmigs pas la dang bcas pa bshad par bya ste/_a ka khA dA ba Sha n+te bA Thi bA/_bklags ba la dang por ka kha med pa mthar Sha med pa la yang na'o/_/bstan pa'am bklags pa la byings 
[\[206a.6\]]nad sogs dang /_gad sogs dang /_byings gang gi thog mar ka yig dang kha yig med pa mthar Sha med pa dag pha rol la pra la sogs pan nar 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can snga ma las nye bar bsgyur ni'i na yig tu yang na 'gyur te/_bra Ni b+ha ba ti/_rab tu des par yod/_bra ni b+ha ba ti/_pu gan+ta la b+hU 
[\[206a.7\]]ba d+ha s+ya tsa/_pu ka mtha' dang u pa d+hA thung du dag gi 'ang ngo /_/u ka A ga ma sbyin pa'i mtha' dang byings u ba d+hA i ka so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge thung du yod pa rnams rnam dbye byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa yon tan 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan b+hU la laT sha pa/_la ti gcan pha rol la yon tan du 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]'gyur te/_!_tsa ta ti/_tsa tA yang dag par shes pa la laT sha ba l+ra tib/_mdo 'dis yon tan/_tsa te ta/_tse ta tu/_a tsa ta ta/_tsi tI la byed pa po la shapa sbyar nas laT sogs byings thams cad pa'i ming can bzhi ba cho ga thams cad b+hU'i sgabs dang 'dra la/_pa ra smai pad rnams 'jug 
[\[206b.2\]]cing /_At+ma ne ba da rnams mi 'jug go/_/tsi tI la lung sbyar ba'i dper brjod _tsi ta ling [\[]shab[\]] yA suT la tipa/_tsi ta la poT [\[]shab [\]]la tib/_tsi ta la lang shab la tib/_b+hU'i skabs dang cung mi 'dra ste/_ba da bradza ha la n+ta s+yA tsaH_bad bra dza ha la mtha' rnams kyi a tsa'i 'o/_/byings bad dang /_bra dza dang /
[\[206b.3\]]byings gal mtha' can gyi dang po'i atsa ni ts+lir bsgyur ba si tsa bar smai pad rnams pha rol la 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/ne Ti/_iT lam yin no/_gong du byings hal mtha' sogs kyi dang po'i atsa ts+lir bsgyur ba'i sitsa bar smai pad pha rol la 'phel bar 'gyur par bshad kyang de'i dmigs bsal 
[\[206b.4\]]rgyu mtshan de dag 'dzom yang /_byings phyed pa'i lbal la iTa'o zhes pa lta bu'i iT bar na yod pa la atsa de 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro/_/a sti si tso\u0f85 pr-i k+to/_a sti si tsa'i a pr-i k+ta la'o/_/byings as dang ts+li 'gyur ba si tsa'i pha rol tu a pr-i k+ta'i ming can te ha la srog med lung gi 'gyur ba'i 
[\[206b.5\]]rnam dbye yin pa bzhin byung na rnam dbye ha la de la IT A ga ma ster ro/_/dI d+hI pe thI TAM/_dI d+hI be bA+e iT rnams kyi'o/_/byings dI b+hI dang /_be bI dag dang /_bar rkyen iTa'i 'phel ba dang yon tan sogs mi byed do/_/iTaHITi/_iT las I Ta la'o/_iTa'i pha rol gyi si tsa ni 
[\[206b.6\]]IT A ga ma pha rol 'jig go/_/'grel par sitsa phyis ba la slar mtshams mi sbyor ba ma yin no zhes bshad pas aka 'dra ba la ring po/_/a tse tI ta/[ \[]tsi nya la/[\] ]lung /_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don/_rjes 'brel phyis nas l+ra tib du bsgyur/_lung la ts+li 'os ts+li byin/_ts+li'i si tsa 'os 
[\[206b.7\]]si tsar bsgyur/_tsa dang i byis/_byings byed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT/_Ta gnas don/_pu ka mtha' dang u ma d+hA thung ngu dag gi 'ang ngos byings la yon tan ita kyi 'ang ngos/_ti'i i phyis/_a sti si tsa'i a br-i k+ta 'os IT A ga ma byin/_Ta gnas don iT las IT la 'os sitsa 'jig_/a ka 'dra ba la ring po 'os ring po/_a 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]tse tiSh+TAM/_tsi ta la/_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don/_l+ra tAs su bsgyur/_l+ra tAs su bsgyur/_lung lang ts+li 'os ts+li byin/_ts+li'i si tsa 'os si tsar bsgyur/_tsa dang i phyis/_byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don/_bu ka mtha' u ba ng+da zung du dag gi 'os/_byings la yon tan kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha 
[\[207a.2\]]tas bras tha mi ba sogs kyis tas tA ma du bsgyur/_laTA la Sha Tu 'os taT Sha drangs/_lung gi pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i mang tshig la/_si[\[] dza [\]]b+h+yasta bi b+h+ya sh+tsa/_si tsa a b+h+yasta bi di rnams las kyang ngo /_/rkyen sitsa dang a b+h+yasta'i ming can rnams dang byings bi di rnams kyi pha rol gyi dz+hi ni dzus su 'gyur te/
[\[207a.3\]]a tse ti ShuH_tsi ta la/_lung /_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don/_lung la ts+li 'os ts+li byin/_ts+li sitsa 'os sitsar bsgyur/_tsa dang i phyis byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT/[ \[]lug [\]]mtha' u [\[]ba d+hA thung [\]]du dag gi 'ang ngos byings la yon tan la dz+hi/_mdo 'dis dz+hi dzus su bsgyur/_tsu Tu sogs kyis dza phyis/_kun nas bsgyur ba dang rkyen sogs kyis 
[\[207a.4\]]sa Sha/_lung gi ba ra smai ba da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/_a tse hIH_tsi ta la lung /_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la a Ta Ta gnas don/_la si ba ru bsgyur/_ita kyi 'ang [\[]byos[\]]i phyis/_lung la ts+li 'os ts+li byin/_ts+li'i saM tsa 'os si tsar bsgyur/_i dang tsa phyis/_byings phyid pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don/_bu ka mtha' u pa d+hA zung du dag gi 
[\[207a.5\]]'os byings la yon tan/_asti si tsa'i aphr-i k+ta la 'os iT A ga ma Ta gnas don/_iT las IT la 'os si tsa 'jig_/a ka 'dra ring po sa sa dzuSha sogs kyis sa ru u phyis ra rnam bcad/_lung gi ba ra smi ba da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_a tse ti Sh+TaM/_a tse ti Sh+Ta/_lung gi ba ra smai ba da'i skyes bu byim gsum 
[\[207a.6\]]tsa ta la/_lung /_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don/_la thas dang thar bsgyur/_de yang tas thas tha mi ba sogs kyis taM dang tar bsgyur/_lung pa ts+li 'os tsI byin ts+li si tsa 'os si tsar bsgyur/_i dang tsa phyis/_byings byed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don/_puka mtha' u pa d+hA thung du dag gi 'os/_byings la yon tan kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/[ \[]Sha Tu la Sha Tu [\]]'os 
[\[207a.7\]]ta gnyis Ta Sha drangs/_la/_a tse ti ShaM/_tsita la lung /_lung /_lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don/_la mi pa du bsgyur/_tas thas tha mi pa sogs kyis mi pa am du bsgyur/_ts+li'i si tsa 'os si tsar bsgyur/_tsa dang i phyis/_byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don/_puka mtha' u bad+hA thung du sogs kyis byings la yon tan 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]kun nas bsgyur ba dang [\[]rkyen [\]]sogs kyis saSha/_a tse ti Sh+wa/_a tsi ti Sh+Ya/_tsi ta la/_lung /_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis aT Ta gnas don/_la? bas dang mas su bsgyur/_di ta la rtag tu 'os sa gnyis phyis/_lung la ts+li 'os ts+li byin/_ts+li si tsa 'os si tsar bsgyur/_tsa dang i phyis/_bal dang po'i iT 'os i TaT gnas don/_bu ka mtha' dang u bad+hA thung du dag 
[\[207b.2\]]gi 'os byings la yon tan kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha ba dang mal drangs/_tsi ta la liT sbyar ba'i dper brjod ni/_par smai ba da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_tsi tse ta/_shes/_a saM yo gA lIT+ki ta/_brtsegs pa ma yin pa las liT ka 'gro ba la'o/_/byings yi ge brtsegs pa ma yin pa'i 
[\[207b.3\]]tse ta la/_liT liT la byings a b+h+yA sa med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod/_hal dang bo _lhag po 'os/_ta phyis la tib du bsgyur bar smai ba da rnams kyis Nal a tus us sogs kyis ti pa Nal du bsgyur/_buka mtha' dang u ba d+hA thung ngu dag gi 'os/[ \[]ci phyim [\]]yon tan ta a la drangs/_pha rol gyi liT bsgyur ba'i rnam dbye pa pa 'gro ba'i ming can 
[\[207b.4\]]ma yin pa rnams la ka 'gro ba'i ming can zhes brda chad byed do/_dgos pa ni byings la yon tan mi byed pa'i don no/_/liTa'i pa rasmai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_tsi tsi ta tuH_tsi ta la/_liT/_liT ba byings a b+h+yAs med pa'i byings gnyis brjod/_hal dang po lhag po 'os ta [\[]mong [\]]
[\[207b.5\]]ma phyis/_la tas dang dz+hi ru bsgyur/_par snai ba da'i Nal a tus/_us zhes bas/_tas/_a tus dang /_dz+haya us su bsgyur/_ta gnyis drangs/_sas dzu Sha sogs kyis sa gnyis ru ru bsgyur/_u gnyis phyis/_ra gnyis rnam bcad/_tsi tsituH_liTa'i pa rasmai ba da'i skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tsi tsi ti tha/_tsi tal liT/_liT la byings 
[\[207b.6\]]a b+h+yA sa med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod/_hal dang po lhag po 'os ta phyis/_la sib tu bsgyur pa rasmai pa da rnams kyi zhes bas sib thal du bsgyur mtha'i hal sogs kyis la phyis byings phyed ba'i bal la iT buka mtha' u ba d+hA thung du sogs kyis byings la yon tan/_tsi tsi ta thuH_tsi tsi ta/_tsi ta la/_liT/_liT la byings a sbyAs med pa'i 'os byings 
[\[207b.7\]]gnyis brjod/_hal dang po lhag po 'os ta phyis/_l+ra thas dang thar bsgyur/_ba ra smai pa da rnams kyi zhes pas/_thas a thus dang /_tha ar bsgyur/_liTa'i pa rasmai pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsi tsi ta/_tsi ta la/_liT liT la byings a b+h+yAs med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod/_hal dang po lhag bol mi pa du bsgyur/_ba ra smai pa da rnams zhes

[\[208a.1\]]pas mi ba Nal du bsgyur/_bu ka mtha' u bad+hA thung du sogs kyis byings la yon tan/_tsi tsiti ba/_tsi tsiti ma/_tsita la luT sbyar bas/_tse ti tA/_tse ti tA rau/_tse ti tA raH_sogs te cho ga thams cad b+hU yod pa la luT sbyar ba'i skabs dang 'dra'o/_/tsita la smon pa'i ling sbyar de'i 
[\[208a.2\]]tsita la/_liT byings gnyis brjod/_hal dang bo lhag po la bas dang mas su bsgyur/_pa ra smai pa da sogs kyis bas ba dang /_ma su mar bsgyur/_byings phyed pa'i bal la iT/_buka maRa' dang u bad+hA thung ngu sogs kyis byings yon tan/_pa ra smai ba da'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tsi t+yA stAM/_tsi t+yA suH_skyes bu dbus ma

[\[209b.1\]]'dam ka can du byas pas ang gi phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a sh+ts+yu ta ta/_a sh+ts+yu ta tA/_a sh+ts+yu ta na/[ \[]skyes [\]]bu dbus ma gsum la/_a sh+ts+yu taH_a sh+ts+yu ta ta/_a sh+ts+yu ha ta/[ \[]skyes[\]] bu phyi ma gsum la/_a sh+ts+yu taM/_a sh+ts+yu tA pa/_a sh+ts+yu tA ma/_tsI si tsar bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum

[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a sh+ts+yo ti Sh+yaH_a sh+ts+yo ti Sh+ya taM/_a sh+ts+yo ti Sh+ya ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a sh+ts+yo ti Sh+yaM/_a sh+ts+yo ti Sh+yA ba/_a sh+ts+yo ti Sh+yA ma/_!_ma n+tha sru ba pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la laT sogs la yig bcu po'i pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga thams cad bshad ma 
[\[210a.2\]]thag pa dang 'dra la/_'o na kyang smon pa'i ling la i 'gro ba ma yin pa rnams kyi ha la u pa d+hA'i kang 'gro ba la'o zhes pas na dbyi ba bon [\[]ste/[\] ]laT la/_ma n+tha ti sogs so/_/ling la/_ma n+thita sogs dang /_loT la/_man+tha tu sogs dang /_lang la/_a man+thata sogs so/_/lung la/_a man+thAti sogs 
[\[210a.3\]]dang /_liT ya/_ma ma n+tha/_man+tha tuH/_sogs so/_/luT la/_man+tha tI/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_smon pa la ki ta'o zhes pas na phyis/_math+yAta sogs so/_/l+r-iT la man+thi Sh+ya ti sogs so/_/l+r-ing la a man+thi Sh+ya ta sogs te/_bya ba lhag po dang mi 'dra ba ci yang med do/_/i di to num d+hA to/_/i ta 
[\[210a.4\]]brtsegs pa ma yin pa la liT kita'o [\[]nas byung bas [\]]brtsegs pa yin pas liT ka ti ma yin pas na mid byi'o/_/'gro ba'i byings kyi nu ma'o/_/byings ku thi lta bu ita 'gro ba rnams kyi pha rol tu ming du bsgrubs pa'i rkyen dang /_tshig tu bsgrubs pa'i rkyen gang byung yang byings de la nu ma A ga ma ster te /_ma gnas don dang u brjod don no//_!_byings ku ti 
[\[210a.5\]]'tshe ba dang nyon mongs pa dag la'o [\[]zhes pa[\]]la la Tasogs ba ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i laT la/_kun+tha ti sogs so/_/ling la/_ku n+thi ta sogs so/_/liT la/_a kun+d+ra tu sogs so/_lang la/_a ku n+tha ta sogs so/_/lung la a kan+thI ta sogs so/_/liT la/_ku ho Sh+tsuH_ku ha dag gi tsu'o/_/byings gnyis brjod pa'i a b+h+yA sa'i ming 
[\[210a.6\]]can de ku ste sde yin na grangs mthun pa'i tsa sbar 'gyur zhing ha yig na dz+ha yig tu 'gyur la/_dz+ha di yang a b+h+yA sa'i car 'ang ngo zhes pas dza yig tu 'gyur te/_tsu kun+tha/_cu kun+tha tuH_tsu kun+thuH_sogs so/_/luT la/_kun+tha tI sogs dang /_smon pa'i ling la skabs 'dir i 'gro ba'i num yin pas nra ying sh+khi/
[\[210a.7\]]kuSh+Th+ya tas gas so/_/l+r-iT la/_kun+thi Sh+ya ti sogs so/_l+r-ing la/_a kun+thi Sh+ya ta sogs te rigs 'gre'o/_/d+hA dA deH_ShaHsaH_byings kyi dang po'i Sha'i sa'o/_/Shi d+hu lta bu byings kyi dang po'i Sha yig ni sa yig tu 'gyur te/_!_Shi d+hu 'gro ba la'o/_/zhes pa'i byings la laT sogs pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i laTa'i 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_se d+ha ti/_u pa sargA d+su no ti su ba ti s+ya ti stau ti stau d+ha ti s+thA se na ya se b+ha si tsa sany+dza swa ny+dzAM/_nyer bsgyur las/_su ni ti_su bti_s+ya ti_stau ti _sto b+ha ti_s+thA_se na ya _se d+ha_si tsa_sany+dza_sA ny+dza rnams kyi'o/_/nyer bsgyur sa yig Sha yig tu 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can snga 
[\[210b.2\]]ma las byings su ni taM sogs te/_ShU ta bskyed pa/_ShU nya ded pa/_Sho mtha'i las/_Sh+Tu nya bstod pa/_Sh+Tu b+ha rengs pa/_Sh+ThA gnas pa/_Shi nya 'ching ba/_Shi b+hu 'gro ba/_Shi tsa 'dzag pa/_Shany+dza chags ba/_Shany+dza 'khyur ba rnams kyi dang po'i Sha yig byings kyi ngang po'i Sha'i sa 'os Sha sar bsgyur ba rnams 
[\[210b.3\]]slar yang Sha yig tu 'gyur ro/_/sa dir pra teH_pra ti ma yin pas sa di'i/_/pra ti ma yin pa ste bor bas nyer bsgyur gzhan Shar 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can dang po las sa di ste byings Sha d+li 'gro Sha 'gyur ba'i sa yang slar Shar 'gyur ro/_staM b+heH_sta m+b+hi'i'o/_/nyer bsgyur rgyu mtshan can sngon ma 
[\[210b.4\]]las sa zhi [\]]te/_byings Sh+Ta b+hi so sor 'ching ba _sa yig kyang slar Sha yig tu 'gyur ro/_a bA ts+tsA la m+ba nA bi dU r+Ya yoH_a ba las kyang brten pa dang mi ring ba dag la'o/_/a ba snga ma las kyang sta m+b+hi'i yig brten pa dang mi ring ba'i don la 'jug pa na Sha yig tu 'gyur ro/_/pe sh+tsa sba no b+ho dza ne/_bi 
[\[210b.5\]\[]yas kyang [\]]swa na'i zas la'o/_/bi dang yang gi sgras a ba sngon ma las kyang swa na ti zas kyi don la 'jug pa na Sha yig tu 'gyur ro/_/pa ri ni bi b+h+yaHse ba si tas ya si ba sa ha suT stu Sh+wa ny+dzuM/_ba ri ni bi rnams las se ba si ta _sa ya_si ba_sa ha _stu _Sh+wany+dza _suT rnams kyi'o/_/nyer bsgyur ba ti dang /
[\[210b.6\]]ni dang bi rnams snga ma las/_byings se ba sogs te/_She br-i 'thong ba/_si ta dang Shi nya 'ching ba/_Shi bu thags 'thag pa/_kha ha bzod pa/_Sh+Tunya bstod pa/_Sh+wany+dza 'khyud pa rnams dang suT dang 'brel pa'i sa yig rnams Sha yig tu 'gyur ro/_/ni sngon ma'i Shi d+hu la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT la/
[\[210b.7\]]ni She d+ha ti sogs so/_/ling la/_ni She d+he ta sogs so/_/loT la/_ni She d+ha tu sogs so/_/bra ka si tA da T+ya ba yonya bi/_si ta las dang por aT sa bar chod pa las kyang ngo /_/nyer bsgyur rgyu mtshan can sngon na yod pa las si ta ste su no ti la sogs pa rnams kyi sa yig ni aT A ga ma bar na yod ba 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]las kyang Sha yig tu 'gyur te/_lang la/_n+ya She d+ha ta sogs so/_/lung la/_n+ya She d+hi ta sogs so/_/s+thA di Sh+wa b+h+yA se na tsA b+h+yA sa s+ya/_s+tha la sogs pa rnams la a b+h+yA sa yis kyang a b+h+yA sa'i 'o/_/nyer bsgyur rgyu mtshan can snga ma las/_s+thA la sogs pa rnams kyi byings gnyis 
[\[211a.2\]]brjod pa a b+h+yA sa'i ming can yod na a b+h+yA sa de nyid Sha yig tu 'gyur te/_liT la/_ni Shi She d+ha/_mdo 'dis sa snga ma Sha dang kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa phyi ma Sha/_ni Shi Shi d+hi tuH_ni Shi Shi d+huH_brtsegs pa ma yin pa'i zhes pas 'dir piT kita li na pas yon tan mi byed/_sogs so/_/luT la/_ni She d+hi tA sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling 
[\[211a.3\]]la ni Shi d+h+yA ta sogs so/_/l+r-iT la ni She d+hi Sh+ya ti sogs dang /_khr-ing la n+ya She d+hi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/se d+ha te rga tau/_/se d+ha ti 'gro ba la'o/_/nyer bsgyur rgyu mtshan can sngon na yod kyang byings Shi d+ha 'gyur ba'i sa yig ni 'gro ba'i don brjod pa la Shar 'gyur ba ma yin te/_ni snga ma'i Shi d+ha 'gro ba 
[\[211a.4\]]la laT sogs pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i/[ \[]latral[\]]/_ni se d+ha ti sogs te/[ \[]dag [\]]tu sbyar na/_ni se d+ha ti pAM/_ling la ni se d+he ta/_sogs so/_/loT la/_ni se d+ha tu/_sogs so/_/lang la/_n+ya se d+ha ta sogs so/_/lung la n+ya se d+hi ta/_sogs so/_/liT la/_ni si se d+ha/_ni si si d+ha tuH
[\[211a.5\]]sogs so/_/luT la/_ni se d+hi tA sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_ni si d+h+yA ta/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_ba lang rnams nges par 'gro bar byed/_ni se d+hi Sh+ya ti sogs so/_/l+r-ing la/_n+ya si d+hi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/!Shi d+hU bstan bcos la _brtsegs pa ma yin pa la zhes pas 'dir liT kita yin pa u ba d+hA yon tan mi byed/_ste 'akra shis 
[\[211a.6\]]ba lang 'ang ngo /_/zhes pa'i byings la laT sogs sbyar ba'i cho ga _smon pa la kita 'os u pa d+hA yon tan me byed/_rnams kyang bshad ma thag pa rnams dang 'dra ste 'on kyang lung man chad byings phyed pa'i ming can rnams kyi skabs su cung mi 'dra'o/_/laT la/_sed+ha ti sogs dang /_ling la/_se d+he ta/_sogs dang /_loT la 
[\[211a.7\]]se d+ha tu sogs dang /_lang la/_a se d+ha ta sogs so/_/lung la/_swa ra ti sU ti sU ya ti d+hUnyU di to bA/_swa ra ti sU ya ti _d+hUnya _U 'gro ba rnams yang na'o/_/byings/_sbr-i sgra la'o dang /_ShUnya dang ShU nga mngon par skye ba dang /_b+hU [\[]ta [\]]g.yo ba rnams dang /_byings U 'gro ba rnams la byings phyed pa lbal dang po rnams 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]la iT yang na ba bya ste/_iT+wa byin pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang pa gsum la/_a se d+hI ta/_a se d+hI Sh+TAM/_a se d+hi ShAH_skye_/bu dbus ma gsum la/_a se d+hiH_a se d+hi Sh+TaM/_a si d+hi Sh+Ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a se d+hi ShaM/_a se d+hi Sh+wa/_a se d+hi Sh+ma/_sogs te snga ma rnams dang 'dra la/_iT mi 
[\[211b.2\]]ster ba'i phyogs kyi lung gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_a sai t+sI ta/[ \[]Shi d+hU [\]]la lung U iT yang na pa'i don/_byings kyi dang po'i Sha'i sa 'os sa Sha/_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don rjes 'brel byes nas/_la ti ba du bsgyur/_ita kyi 'ang ngos i phyis/_lung la ts+la'i sa ts+li byin/_ts+li'i si tsa 'os si tsar bsgyur/_tsa dang i phyis ba ta bra dza ha la mtha' rnams 
[\[211b.3\]]kyi a tsa'i 'os byings kyi u pa d+hA 'phel ga a sti bi ca'i a br-i ltas 'os _IT/_gnas don/_khar la tsa ra 'os d+ha ta/_dz+ha lo dz+ha li/_dz+hal gyi dz+hal la'o/_/byings kyi mtha' dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yin pa'i pha rol gyi ts+li 'gyur ba'i si tsa ni rnam dbye dz+hal so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang po can pha rol la 'jig go/_/dz+ha Sha sta tho dz+honya d+haH
[\[211b.4\]]t+tA ma yin pa'i dz+ha Sha las ta tha dag gi d+ha'o/_/phyings Du dz+hAnya ma yin pa'i byings mtha' dz+haSha so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yin pa'i pha rol gyi ta yig dang bra yig dag ni d+ha yig ru 'gyur ro/_/lung gi skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig la/_a sai d+hUM/_Shi d+hU la lung /_byings kyi dang po'i Sha'i sa 'os Sha sa/_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la 
[\[211b.5\]]aT/_lung la ts+li 'os ts+li byin/_ts+li'i si tsa 'os si tsar bsgyur/_bad tha dza ta la mtha' rnams kyi a tsa'i 'os byings 'phel brjes 'brel phyis la tas su bsgyur/_tas thas mi tha mi ba sogs kyis tas tAM du bsgyur/_dz+ha la gyi sh+tsA la la 'os si tsa 'jig/_mdo 'dis ta d+har bsgyur/_dz+ha shab dz+ha rnams kyi dza 'os d+ha gong ma dar bsgyur da [\[]dra bka[\] ]skyes bu dang po'i mang tshig la/_a si sat+suH[ \[]Shi b+hU ba/[\]]
[\[211b.6\]\[]thang [\] ]byings kyi dang po'i Sha'i sa 'os sa ma lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT/_lung la ts+li 'os tsI byin ts+Yi'i si tsa 'os si tsar bsgyug a dang tsa phyis rjes 'brel phyis nas/_la dz+hir bsgyur/_si tsa a b+h+yAs bi di rnams las kyang ngos dz+hi dus su bsgyur/_tsu Tu sogs kyis dza phyis/_bad bra dza ha la mtha' rnams kyi a tsa'i 'os byings 'phel ba/_khar la tsar 'os _dz+ha ta ri ma bzhin drangs/_skyes bu dbus 
[\[211b.7\]]ma gsum la/_a sai t+sI/_a sai d+d+haM/_a sai d+d+ha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a sai t+saM/_a sai t+s+ma/_a sai t+s+ma/_Shi d+hU la liT pa ra smai ba da rnams sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_si se d+ha/_si se d+ha/_si se tuH_si se d+huH_skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la iT yang na bar byas pas/_si se d+hi tha/_si si d+ng+ha/_skyes 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]bu dbus ma'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_si se d+ha thuH_si se d+ha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_si se d+ha/_si se d+hA/_la bas/_bas bar bsgyur d+ha drangs/_si se d+h+ma/_la mas/_mas mar bsgyur d+ha ma la drangs/_Shi d+hU la luT ba ra smrai bad rnams sbyar/_iT yang na bar byas pa'i iT byin pa'i 
[\[212a.2\]]phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_se d+hi tA/_se d+hi tA rau/_se d+hi tA raH_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_se d+hi tA si/_se d+hi tA s+thaH_se d+ha tA s+tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_se d+hi tA mi/_se d+hi tA sAH_se d+hi tA smaH_sogs so/_/iT ma ster ba'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_se d+d+hA/
[\[212a.3\]]se d+t+hA rau/_sad+t+hA raH_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_se d+t+hA si/_se d+t+hA s+thaH_se d+t+hA s+tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_sed+t+hA mi/_se d+t+hA swaH_se d+t+hA swaH_se d+t+hA smaH_Shi d+hU la smon pa'i ling gi pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar pa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_si d+h+yA ta/_si d+h+yA staM/_si d+h+yA su/_skyes bu dbus mi gsum 
[\[212a.4\]]la/_si d+h+yAH_si d+h+ya staM/_si d+h+ya sta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_si d+h+yA saM/_si d+h+yA sma/_si d+h+yA sma/_Shi d+hU la l-iT pa ra smai pa da rnams sa sbyar iT sting ba dang mi stir ba 'dam ka can du byas ba'i iT sbyar pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_se d+hi Sh+ya ti/_se d+hi Sh+ya taH_si d+hi Sh+ya n+ti/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum 
[\[212a.5\]]la/_se d+hi Sh+ya si/_se d+hi Sh+ya thaH_se d+hi Sh+ya tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_se d+hi Sh+yA mi/_sa d+hi Sh+yA maH_iT mi ster ba'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a se t+s+ya ti/_se t+s+ya taH_se t+s+ya n+ti/_se t+s+ya n+ti/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_e t+m+ya si/_se t+s+ya thaH_se t+s+ya tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/
[\[212a.6\]]se t+s+yA mi/_se t+s+yA baH_se t+s+yA maH_Shi d+hU la l+r-ing pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar/_iT yang na pa ra byas pa'i iT sbyin pa'i _phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a se d+hi Sh+ya ta/_a se d+hi Sh+ya tAM/_a se d+hi Sh+ya na/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a se d+hi Sh+ya taM/_a se d+hi Sh+ya ta/_skyes 
[\[212a.7\]]bu gsum la/_a se d+hi Sh+yaM/_a se d+hi Sh+yA ba/_a se d+ha Sh+yA ma/_iT ma byin pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a se t+s+ya ta/_a se t+s+ya tAM/_a se t+s+ya na/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a se t+s+yaH_a se t+s+ya taM/_a se t+s+ya ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]set+s+yAM/_a se t+s+yA ba/_a se t+s+yA ma/_!_khad brtan pa la ste 'tshe ba la'ang ngo /_/zhes pa'i byings la laT sogs pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga rnams kyang snga ma rnams dang 'dra la 'on kyang lung gi skabs cung zad mi 'dra ste/_de yang laT la/_kha da ti/_sogs dang /_ling 
[\[212b.2\]]la/_kha de ta/_sogs dang /_kho Ta la/_khad tu/_sogs dang /_lang la/_a kha da ta/_sogs so/_/a to ha lA de rA g+hoH_hal dang po'i ata thung ngu'i 'o/_/ts+li 'gyur ba'i si tsa ba ra smi pa da can pha rol la byings hal dang po ste atsa gcig pu ma yin pa'i hal gyi srog 
[\[212b.3\]]tu zhugs pa'i a yig thung ngu ni 'phel ba byed pa dang mi byed pa 'dam kha can te/_lung gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_a kha dI ta/_a khA dIta/_gnyis tshig la/_a kha diSh+TAM/_a khA di Sh+TAM/_mang tshig la/_a kha di ShuH_a khA di ShuH_sogs so/_a ta 
[\[212b.4\]]u pa d+hA yAH_u ba d+hA'i a ta kyi'o/_/rkyen nya 'gro ba dang Na 'gro ba dag pha rol la byings kyi u pa d+hA'i a yig ni 'phel bar 'gyur te/_liTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_tsa khA da/_khad la/_liT/_liT la byings a b+h+yAs med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod/_hal dang po lhag po 
[\[212b.5\]]'os dra gang ma phyis/[ \[]ku[\]] ha dag gcu 'os/_kha gong ma tsha/_a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/_tsha tsar bsgyur/_rjes 'brel byis nas/_l+ra tib du bsgyur/_pa ra smai bde rnams kyi Nal sogs kyis ti pa Nal du bsgyur la khyad don mdo 'dis u pad+hA'i a 'phel ba sogs Na de'i don da a la drangs/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_tsa kha da tuH_tsa kha duH_skyes 
[\[212b.6\]]bu dbus ma gsum la/_tsa kha di tha/_tsa kha da thuH_tsa kha da/_Na lu d+ha mo bA/_Nal phyi ma'i yang na'o/_/liTa'i skyes bu phyi ma'i Nal pha rol la u pa d+hA'i a 'phel bar byed pa dang mi byed pa yang na ba bya ste/_skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig la/_tsa khA da/_tsa kha da/_gnyis tshig 
[\[212b.7\]]dang mang tshig la/_tsa kha di ba/_tsa kha di ma/_luT la/_kha di tA sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_kha d+yA ta sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_kha di Sh+ya ti sogs so/_/l+r-ing la/_a kha di Sh+ya ta sogs so/_/!ga da gsal bar brjod pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la'ang laT sogs pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]cho ga rnams kyang sA ma rnams dang 'dra ste/_laT la/_ga da ti sogs so/_/ling la/_ga de ta/_sogs so/_/loT la/_ga da tu sogs so/_/lang la/_a ga da ta/_sogs so/_/lung la u ba d+hA 'phel ba yang na bar byas pas/_a gA dI ta/_a ga dI ta/_sogs so/_/liT la/_dza gA da/
[\[213a.2\]]dza ga da tuH_dza ga duH_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_dza ga di tha/_dza ga da thuH_dza ga da/_skyes bu [\[]phyi [\]]ma gsam la/_dza gA da/_dza ga da/_Nal phyi ma'i yang na 'os 'phel ba dang ma ka byas ba'o/_/[\[]dzag di ba/[\] ]dza ga di ma/_luT la/_ga di tA sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_ga d+yA ta _byings gnyis brjod nas ku har [\[]ga ge tsu [\]]'os ga dza ra bsgyur/
[\[213a.3\]]sogs so/_/l+riT la/_ga di Sh+ya taM sogs so/_/l+r-ing la/_a ga di Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/byings gad sogs pha rol la nyer bsgyur ni la rnam 'gyur 'byung tshul ni/_ne rga dan da ba ta pa da stu mA s+ya ti ha n+ti yA ti pA ti drA ti b+sA tib ya ti ba ha ti shA mya ti tsi no ti deg+g+hIShu tsa/_ni'i gad/_gad gsal por brjod [\[]pa la'o stan da Nad [\]]mi gsal ba'i 
[\[213a.4\]]s+tha la'o/_/pa ta ba tI ldung ba la'o/_ba da _bad 'gro ba la ro/_/gU byings d+hu'i ming can [\[]Du[\]] d+hAnya 'dzin pa dang [\[]D+ya [\]]dAnya sbyin pa gnyis/_mA mang [(]mchad [,]ma chad [)]ba la'o/_/s+ya ti _Sho mtha'i las la'o/_/ha n+ti _ha na 'tsho ba la ste 'gro ba la'ang ngo /_/yA ti lnga thob par byed pa la'o/_/pA ti _ba 'gro ba la ste dri la'ang ngo /_/drA ti _dA smad pa kha ro/_/p+sA ti _blA mtha' ba la'o/_pa ya ti be nya lags [\[]'thag [\]]ba stsa'o/_/ba ha ti _ba ha thob 
[\[213a.5\]]pa la go/_shA mya ti sha mu nye bar zhi ba la'o/_tsi no ti tsinya gsog pa la'o/_/de ha de ha ga thog pa la'o/_rnams pa'ang ngo /_/byings ga da la sogs pa 'di rnams pha rol la nyer bsgyur na Nar 'gyur pa'i rgyu mtshan can rnams las pha rol gyi nyer bsgyur ni'i na yig Na ru 'gyur te/_bra dang ni snga ma'i ga da la laT sogs sbyar ni'i na Nar 
[\[213a.6\]]bsgyur bas/_pra Ni ga da ti/_sogs so/_/!_rang rnam par rko ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la'ang laT sogs pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i liTa'i skabs su cung zad gtogs snga ma rnams dang 'dra ste/_laT la/_ra di ta/_sogs sa/_/ling la/_ra de ta sogs so/_/loT la/_ra da tu sogs so/_/
[\[213a.7\]]nges par rab tu rjod par byed/_lang la/_a ra da ta sogs so/_/lung la/_'phel ba yang na ba byas pas/_a rA rI ta/_a ra dI ta/_sogs so/_/liTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_ra rA da/_a ta e [\[]ka ha l+ma d+h+yenya nA [\]]de shA de rmi Ti/_liT la dang po kun nas bsgyur ba ma yin pa'i hal gcig 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]pa dbus ma'i ata kyi'o/_/liT ka 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po a b+h+ya sa'i can di a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngo 'am/_ku ha dag gi tsu'o zhes ba lta bu'i kun nas bsgyur pa ma yin pa'i dbus ma ste/_de'i pha rol gyi yi ge de brtsegs pa ma yin pa hal 
[\[213b.2\]]gcig pa yin pa'i srog gi a yig ni e yig tu 'gyur zhing a b+h+yasa'i ming can de yang dbyi ste/_liTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_red tuH_re duH_tha li tsa se Ti/_thal la'ang iT dang bcas pa la'o/_liTa'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig 
[\[213b.3\]\[]re[\]]da la/_laT/_liT la byings a b+h+yAs med pa'i 'os/_byings gnyis brjod/_hal dang po lhag pa'o zhes pas dgong ma phyis/_rjes 'brel phyis nas/_l+ra tas dang dz+hi ru bsgyur ba ra smai [\[]bar [\]]rnams kyi zhes pas/_tas a tus dang dz+hi us su bsgyur/_mdo 'dis phyi ma'i sog i dang [\[]sho ma [\]]phyis dwa a dang us pa drangs/_thal i n+da dang bcas pa 
[\[213b.4\]]pha rol la'ang bshad ma thag pa bzhin 'gyur te/_ra di tha/_skyes bu dbus ma dang phyi ma la/_red thuH_red/_skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig la 'phel ba yang na bar byas pas/_ra rA da/_ra ra da/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_re di ba/_re di ma/_luT sogs snga ma rnams dang 'dra ste/
[\[213b.5\]]luT la/_ra di tA/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling _rang la liT/_la/_ra d+yA ta sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_ra di Sh+ya ti sogs so/_/l+r-ing la/_ar di Sh+ya ta sogs so/_/Ni naH_Na'i na'o/_/byings kyi dang po'i Na yig ni na yig tu 'gyur te/_!_byings Na da mi gsal ba'i sgra la'o/_/zhes pa la laT 
[\[213b.6\]]sogs sbyar mdo 'dis Na na ru bsgyur/_gzhan cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra ste/_laT la/_nad ti sogs so/_/ling la/_na da ta sogs so/_/loT la/_nad tu sogs so/_/lang la/_a na da ta sogs so/_/lang la/_a na da ta sogs so/_/lung la 'phel ba yang na bar byas pas/_a nA dI ta/_a 
[\[213b.7\]]na dI ta/_sogs so/_/liT la/_na nA da/_med tuH_ne duH_sogs so/_/luT la/_na di tA sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_na d+yA ta sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_na di Sh+ya ti sogs so/_/l+r-ing la/_a na di Sh+ya ta sogs te cho ga mi 'dra ba ci yang me do/_/u pas rgAd sa mA se\u0f85pi no pa de sha s+ya/_nyer bsgyur las

[\[214a.1\]]tshig sdud ma yin pa las kyang Na nye ba'i yul gyi'o/_/Na nye ba'i yul te byings kyi dang po'i Na Na'i na 'os/_na yig tu bsgyur ba'i ha yig ni nyer bsgyur na _Nar 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can dang po las/_tshig sdud dang tshig sdud ma yin pa las kyang Nar 'gyur te/_pra snga ma'i Nad la 
[\[214a.2\]]laT/_na'i na 'os/_Na nar bsgyur/_mdo 'dis slar yang Nar bsgyur/_pra Na da ti sogs so/_!_/a rda 'gro ba la ste slong ba la'ang do zhes pa'i byings la laT sogs sbyar ba'i cho ga rnams kyang liTa'i skabs phran bu ma gtogs bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra ste/_laT la/
[\[214a.3\]]a rda ti sogs so/_ling la a rde ta sogs so/_/loT la/_a rda tu sogs so/_/rab tu mi gsal ba'i sgra/_lang la/_A rda ta/_a rda la lang byed pa po la sha ba 'os sha ba byin pa dang sha phyis/_rjes 'brel phyis nas/_l+ra tib tu bsgyur/_ita kyi 'ang ngos i phyis/_lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyi byings la aT Ta gnas don atsa dang 
[\[214a.4\]]po rnams kyi AT 'os byings la AT yang byin/_Ta gnas don a ka 'dra ba la ring po 'os a A a gsum ring po gcig tu song /_sogs so/_/lung la/_A [\[]rdI [\]]ta sogs so/_/a ta A deH_dang po'i a ta kyi'o/_/byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po a b+h+yA sa'i ming can de hal gyi srog tu zhugs pa lta bu ma yin 
[\[214a.5\]]pa'i a yig kho na yin na a de ring por 'gyur ro/_/ta smA n+nu Ta dwi ha laH_de las nuT hal gnyis pa rnams so/_/gong du bshad _atsa dang po rnams kyi AT 'os AT Ta gnas son/_pa'i a ring por song ba de las pha rol gyi a yig la nuT A ga ma ster te de yang a yig de'i pha rol tu hal nyis

[\[214a.7\]]A r+d+yA ta _a rda la/_a tsa gcig pa'i gnyis so so a gnyis brjod/_dang po'i aT kyi 'os a gong ma ring por song /_mdo 'di_sa a phyi ma la nuT A ga ma byin/_Ta gnas don u brjod don rjes 'brel rnams phyis nas/_l+ra ti pa tas [\[]dz+hi [\]]rnams su bsgyur pa ra smai bad rnams kyi zhes pas ti pa sogs rim bzhin/[ \[]nal[\]]/[ \[]a tas yus na mas su bsgyur ba'o[\]]

[\[214b.1\]]sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_ardiSh+ya ti sogs so/_/l+ring la/_Ardi Sh+yata sogs so//_!_i di mchog gi dbang phyug nyid la'o zhes pa'i byings la laT sogs bar sme+e pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga rnams kyang phal cher 'dra ste/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_in+da ti/_in+dataHin+tan+ti/
[\[214b.2\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a tsa dang po rnams kyi AT 'os/_AT dang byings kyi a mtshams sbyar bas a ring bo gcig tu song /_in+dasi/_i n+da thaH_in+da tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_in+bA mi/_in+dA baH_in+dAmaH/_ling gi_i 'phro bal nus 'os/[ \[]phyi[\]]ngas nus ma gnas don u brjod don/_skyes 
[\[214b.3\]]bu dang po gsum la/_in+deta/_in+detAM/_in+deyuH_ling gi skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_inreH_in+de taM/_in+de taM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_in+da yaM/_in+de pa/_in+de ma/_loTa'i skyes bu dang bo gsum la/_in+da tu/_in+da tAta/_in+da tAM/

[\[215a.1\]]dbye rnams byung na byings de'i mtha' la A ma rkyen du ster te skabs 'di'i ma yig ni gnas kyi don ma yin pas mi dbyi'o/_/AmaH_Am las so/_/byings la Am sbyar ba'i pha rol las liT 'gyur pa'i rnam dbye thams cad 'jig go/_/kr-iny+shu nu pra yu dz+ya te li Ti/_kr-inya'ang

[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]gsum la/_bi bA ya/_bi byatuH_bi b+tuH_a tsa[\[]b+ng+hAmA tA l+ya [\]]niTo ni t+yo/_atsa las tAs 'dra bar [\[]thal la [\]]iT rtag tu 'gyur bam yin no/_/byings atsa gcig pa mtha' brten hal mid ba las tAs dang 'dras stes la la iT rtag tu 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/ri ta b+h+rar ng+rA[\[]dzamyaM/[\] ]r-ita las [\[]staradwA dza'i 'o/_/
[\[218b.2\]]gong du tAs dang thal dag la byings atsa gcig pa mtha' rten hal med pa las iT rtag tu 'gyur pa ma yin no zhes byung yang de'i dmigs bsal byings r-ita mtha' rnams dang atsa gcig pa mtha' rten hal med pa las byang thal dang tAs dang bal dang po rnams las kyang iT 'jug par sngon gyi drang srong 
[\[218b.3\]]b+hAr dwA dza 'dod do zhes byung bas thal gyi skabs 'dir gzugs gsum 'byung ste/_bal dang po'i byings phyed pa la yang na bar 'dod do zhes pas/_a dzabI ru 'gyur pa dang mi 'gyur ba yang na ba dang /[ \[]yIru [\]]'gyur ba'i phyogs la mdo 'di gnyis kyis iT yang na par byas pas/_A [\[]dzi bo/[\] ]bi 
[\[218b.4\]]ba yi tha/_bi be tha/_skyes bu dbus ma'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_bi byathuH_bibya/_skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig la 'phel pa dang yon tan yang na bar byas pas/_bibA ya/_bi ba ya/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_bI ru 'gyur ba dang a dza nyid du gnas pa yang na bar byas pas

[\[219a.1\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_bI yAH_bI yA staM/_bI yA sta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_bI yA saM/_bIyA swa/_bI yA sma/_a dza bI rum bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi lb-iTa'i skyes bu dang bo gsum la/_a dzi Sh+yati/_a dziSh+ya taH_a dzi Sh+yan+ti/_skyes bu dbus ma

[\[219b.1\]]k+She tA'am/_k+Sha yi tA sogs so/_/a kr-it+sArba ng+hA tu ka yo rdI r+g+haH/_kr-ita ma yin pa byings thams cad pa dag la ring po'o/_/kr-ita sogs kyi nang tshan ma yin pa'i rnam dbye byings phyed pa dang byings thams cad pa dag pha rol gyi rkyen ya yig ka dang nga 'gro ba'i ming can la byings mtha'i a tsa ring por 'gyur

[\[220a.1\]]sogs pa'i mtha' rnams byings so/_/san la sogs pa'i rkyen rnams sbyar ba'i mtha' dang ka mu laNe sbyar ba'i mtha' yang byings nyid du gnas te byings su bsgrub pa'i rkyen dang /_ming byings su bsgrub ba'i rkyen zhes zer ro/_!_/gu bU bsrung bal A ya sbyar a+ngu yig

[\[220b.1\]]sbyar/_Am las so zhes pas liT yang 'jig_/kr-inya b+hU as sogs liT dang bcas pa rjes su sbyar bas go pA yA mAs/_go pA yAM ba b+hU ba/_sogs so/_/yang na A ya mi sbyor te/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_dzu go pa/_dzu gu pa tuH_dzu gu puH_skyes bu dbus

[\[221b.1\]]shab+h+la sha b+h+ra mu [\[]kra[\]]mu[\[]kla [\]]mu tra sI truTi la ShaH/[ \[]ng+hU[\]]shaH[ \[]b+h+mA[\]]shaH_b+h+ra muH_kra maH_kla muH_tra sIH_hru tri/_la Sha las yang na'o/_/byings b+hA shr-i dang /_Tu b+h+la shr-i 'bar ba/_b+h+ra mu g.yo ba/_kra mu rkang pa bskyod pa/_kla mu dman pa/_tra sI skyo ba/_tU Ti gcod pa/_laSha mdzes pa

[\[222a.1\]]yam ram namA tI sak+tsa/_yamaH_ramaH_namaH_Ata rnams kyis ka'o/_/byings ya mu nye bar 'gog pa/_ra mu rtse ba/_Na mu 'dud pa gsum dang /_yA thob pa lta bu Ata mra' can rnams la ts+tshi 'gyur ba sitsa pha rol las ka Ag ma 'gyur zhing sitsa la iT 'ang 'gyur te/

[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]ha yi tA sogs so/_/smin pa'i ling la/_ha y+yAta sogs so/_l+r-iT la/_ha yi Sh+ya ti sogs so/_/l+r-ing la/_a ha yiSh+yata sogs so/_!_/de la rnam par rgyu ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la'ang laT sogs pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga rnams kyang lung la 'phel ba byed pa'i khyad par 
[\[222b.2\]]tsam ma gtogs snga ma rnams dang 'dra ste/_laT la/_da la ti sogs so/_/ling la/_da leta sogs so/_/loT la/_da la tu sogs so/_/lang la/_a da lata sogs so/_/a to l+rAn+ta s+ya/_l+rar mtha'i ata kyi'o/_/la yig dang ra yig dag mtha' na yod pa'i u pa

[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]so/_/iT med pa'i phyogs la/_roSh+da/_ro+oth+DA ro+o/_roth+DA raHsogs so/_/smon ba'i ling la/_ru Shata/_ru Sh+yAta/_ru Sh+yAsAM/_ru Sh+yA suH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_/rok+Sh+ya ti/_ro k+Sh+yAtaH/_roSh+yan+ti/_sogs so/_/l+r-ing la/_a roSh+yata/_a rok+Sh+ya tAM/_a rok+Sh+yan sogs so/_!_/ri Sha 
[\[226b.2\]]'tsho ba ba'i zhes pa'i byings la'ang khaT sogs par sme+e pad rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag ba dang 'dra ste/_'on kyang luT la iT yang na bar byed la/_gzhan bal dang po rnams la iT rtag tu sbyor te/_laT la/_reSha ti sogs so/_/lang la/_re Sheta sogs so/_/loT la/
[\[226b.3\]]riSha tu sogs so/_/lang la/_a reSha ta sogs so/_/lung la/_a reShAte/_areShiSh+DAM/_a ra Shi ShuHsogs so/_/liT la/_ri re Sha/_ri ri Sha tuH/_ri ri ShaH/_ri re tha sogs so/_/luT la_/iT yang na bar byas bas reShi tA sogs sam/_/reSh+DA sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling 
[\[226b.4\]]la/_ri Sh+yAT sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_re Shi Sh+ya ti sogs so/_/l+r-ing la/_a re ShiSh+yata sogs so/_!_/u Sha sreg pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la/_laT sogs par sme+e pad rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga rnams kyang liDa'i skabs ma gtogs snga ma rnams dang 'dra ste/_laT la/_oSha ti sogs so/_/
[\[226b.5\]]ling la/_o Sha ta sogs so/_/loT la/_o Sha tu sogs so/_/lang la/_o+o Sha ta/_sogs so/_/lung la/_o+o ShI ta sogs so/_/u Sha bid dzAgr-i b+h+yosha n+ya ta ra s+yAM/_u Sha _bing dzAgr-i rnams las yang na'o/_/byings uSha sreg pa/_bid shes pa/_dzAgr-i gnyid sad ba rnams 
[\[226b.6\]]las leT pha rol la Am yang na 'gyur te/_u Sha la liT/_Am sbyar ba'i phyogs la/_o a ca dang bo'i AT 'os/_AT byin/_aT las kyang ngos 'phel ba/_ShAM ba b+hU ba/_o ShAM tsa kAr/_o ShA mAs/_sogs so/_/Am ma sbyar ba'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ubo Sha/_U Sha tuH/_UdaShaH/_skyes 
[\[226b.7\]]bu dbus ma gsum la/_u bo Shi tha/_U Sha thuH/_U Sha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_u bo Sha/_u boShi ba/_u po Shi ma/_luT la/_o Shi tA sogs so/_/smon pa'i laMng la/_uSh+yAta sogs so/_/l-iT la/_o Shi Sh+ya ti sogs so/_/l+r-ing la/_o+o Shi Sh+ya sogs so/_/
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]sha sha ring du 'gro ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/_laT sogs par sme+e pa da rnams sbyar ba'i chog rnams kyang snga ma rnams kyis rigs 'gre ste/_laT la/_sha sha ti/_sogs so/_/ling la/_sha sheta sogs so/_/loT la/_sha sha tu sogs so/_/lang la/_a sha shata 
[\[227a.2\]]sogs so/_/lung la/_a sha shIta sogs so/_/liT la/_sha shA sha/_sha sha sha tuH/_sha sha shuHsogs so/_/luT la/_sha shitA sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_sha sh+yAta sogs/_/l+r-iTal/_sha shi Sh+ya ti sogs so/_/l+r-ing la/_a sha shi Sh+yata sogs so/_/mi ha 'khrud 
[\[227a.3\]]pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la laT sogs par sme+e pa da rnams sbyar ba'i bya ba yang phal cher snga ma rnams dang 'dra ste/_laT la/_me ha ti sogs so/_/ling la/_me hata sogs so/_/loT la/_me ha tu sogs so/_/lang la/_a me ha ta sogs so/_/lung la/_a mi k+Shata/_a mi k+Sha tAM/_a mi 
[\[227a.4\]]k+Shan sogs so/_/liT li _mi hal lung lung sogs kyis aT _lung la _ts+li'os _ts+li byin _shal ig u pang+hA zhes pas ts+lik+sha ru bsgyur _ka phyis ha'i D+ha 'os ha D+ham laShang+ha dag gi ka 'os/_D+haka kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/_kaSha 'dus pa k+Sha/_latipa/_has dz+nyi rnams su bsgyur ba'o/_/skyes bu 
[\[227a.5\]]dang po gsum la/_mi me ha/_mi mi ha tuH/_mi mi huH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_mi me hi tha/_mi meD+ha/_mi mi ha thuH/_mi mi ha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_mi me ha/_mi me hi ba/_mi me hi ma/_D+hoD+he lo paH/_D+ha'i D+ha la dbyi'o/_/mtha'i D+ha srog med ni D+ha 
[\[227a.6\]]pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste/_luT la/_meD+hA/_me D+hAro+o/_/me+e D+hAraD+hasogs so/_/smon pa'i ling mi ha la/_liT byings gnyis brjod ha phyis la sib par smi ba da zhes pas sapa thal ru bsgyur/_ha'i D+ha 'o/_haD+ha _dz+haSha las ta tha dag gis thang+ha Sha thul Shatu 'os ng+haD+ha'i D+hal dbyi 'os D+ha sngon ma phyis/_la/_mi h+yAta sogs 
[\[227a.7\]]so/_/mi hal _luT _tAl _laDA Ta phyis bas tA ha'i D+ha 'os _haD+ha dz+ha Sha las ta tha sogs kyis ha [\[]rnya[\]]ShaTu la Sha Tu 'os/_ng+haD+ha _mdo 'dis r+ha gong ma gyis/_l+r-iT la/_mek+Sh+ya ti/_ha'i D+ha'os haD+nya/_sal ShaD+hadag gi ka'os/_rtaka kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha ka Sha 'dus pa Sha/_sogs so/_/l+r-ing la/_a me k+Sh+yata sogs 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]so/_/da ha thal khar byed ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la laT sogs par smi pa da rnams sbyar/_cho ga bshad ma thag dang phal cher 'dra ste/_laT la/_da ha ti sogs so/_/ling la/_da he ta sogs so/_/loT la/_da ha tu sogs so/_/yang la_/a da hata sogs so/_/lung gi skyes bu 
[\[227b.2\]]dang po'i gcig tshig la_/an+hAk+ShIta_/nga ha la_lung _tsItsa tsar bsgyur_-i dang tsa phyis_phra to pa du bsgyur_iT bya'i ba ngos i phyis _a sti si tsa zhes pas IT _da ha sogs kyi b+ha _dz+ha Sha'i a tsa gcig pa sogs kyis dang+ha bad bra dza sogs kyis 'phel ba la khang la tsar 'os _g+ha ka kun nas bsgru rab sogs kyis sa Sha kaSha bdu du tha pha k+Sha/
[\[227b.3\]]lung gi skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig la/_a dA g+d+hAM/_da ha la_lung li tsha _btal _nyal bas sogs kyis _tas tI _dang sogs kyi g+ha'o la ha g+ha bad bradza sogs kyis 'phel ba/_dz+hal las dz+nyal la 'os si tsa phyis dz+haSha bas ta tha yogs kyis tang+ha/_dz+hasha ba b+hang zhabs kyi dza ga 'os lha la brangs/_/skyes bu dang po'i mang tshog la/_a 
[\[227b.4\]]ng+hAk+ShAH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a ng+hAk+ShIH/_a dAg+ng+ha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ang+hAk+ShaM/_ang+hAk+Sh+wa/_a ng+hAk+Sh+ma/_liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la_/dadA ha_/de ha tuH/_de huH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_de he tha/_dad g+ha/_de ha thuH/_de ha/_skyes 
[\[227b.5\]]bu phyis _da ha la lung sitsa _l+radz+hi_dz+nyidzus dza_phyis_da ha sogs kyi g+ha 'os ha g+ha_dz+haSha'i a tsa gcig pa sogs kyis dang+ha/_bad bra dza sogs kyis 'phel ba/_khar la tsar 'os g+h+rakra/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis saSha_/kraSha 'dul ba k+Sha drangs_/gsum la_/dadA ha_/da da ha_/de hi ba_/de hi ma/_luT la/_dag+ng+ha/
[\[227b.6\]]dag+ng+ha ro+o/_dag+hA raH/_smon pa'i ling la/_da h+yAta/_l+r-iT la_/ng+hak+Sh+yati/_ng+hak+Sh+ya taH/_ng+hak+Sh+yan+ti sogs so/_/l+r-ing la/_a ng+hak+Sh+yata/_a ng+hak+Sh+yatAM/_a ng+hak+Sh+yan sogs so/_!_/tsa ha yongs su snyog pa la'o zhes pa la/_laT sogs par sme+e bad rnams sbyar/_byings aT can yin 
[\[227b.7\]]pas chog go bde ste/_laT la_/tsa hati sogs so/_/ling la/_tsa he ta sogs so/_/loT la_/tsa ha tu sogs so/_/lang la/_a tsa ha ta sogs so/_/lung la/_a tsa hIta sogs so/_/liT la/_tsa tsA ha/_tse ha tuH/_tse huH/_sogs so/_/luT la_/tsa hi tA sogs so/_/
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]smon pa'i ling la/_tsa h+ya ta sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_tsa hiSh+ya ti sogs so/_/l+r-ing la/_a tsahi Sh+yata sogs so/_!_/shu tsa mya ngan la'o zhes pa'i byings la/_laT sogs pa rasme+e pa da rnams sbyar bas/_laT la/_sho tsa ti sogs so/_/ling[\[]laT[\]]/_shatsa ta sogs

[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]bu dang po'i gcig tshig Nal dang skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig Nal gnyis ni o+o zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/_skyes bu dang bo'i gcig tshig la/_dza glo/_A to lo ba iTi tsa/_iT la'ang Ata kyi dbyi'o/_/byings phyed pa kang 'gro ba'i ming can a tsa dang bo rnams dang iT pha rol la'ang byings

[\[228b.4\]]rnams dang /_mA mchod pa Sh+Tha 'gro ba las ldog pa rnams dang /_gzhan yang A ta mtha' yi gi brtsegs pa sogs kyi 'ang smon pa'i ling kang 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la e ru yang na 'gyur te/_g+hA yA ta sogs so/_/yang na er bsgyur bas gle yAta/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_glA s+ya

[\[228b.7\]]o tAka gtong ba/_Sho mtha'i las rnams kyi mtha' ni smin pa'i ling kang 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la e'u 'gyur te/_ge+el/_smon pa'i ling /_sha 'gri ba ma yin pa sogs kyis etsa/_Ata/_mdo 'dis e/_ge yAta/_ge+e yAstA+e/_ge yA suHsogs so/_/l+riT la_/sA s+ya 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]ti sogs so/_/l+r-ing la/_a gA si Sh+yata/_sogs so/_!_/Sh+sh+ye+esgra dang kun tu 'tshe ba dag la'o zhes pa'i byings la 'a[\[]pa kha Ta[\]]sogs par sme+e pad rnams sbyar/_cho ga snga mas rigs 'gre ste/[ \[]Sh+sh+ya [\]]ya ti sogs so/_/ling la/[ \[]Sh+sh+yA[\]] yeta sogs so/_/loT la/_b+h+ya ya tu sogs 
[\[229a.2\]]so/_/lang la/_a[\[]Sh+D+ya [\]]ya ta_/sogs so/_/lung la/_a[\[]Sh+sh+yA[\]] sIta/_aSh+D+yA siSh+shAM/_aSh+sh+yA si ShuHsogs so/_/liT la/_taSh+n+yo+o/_taTh+b+ya tuH/_ta[\[]D+D+b+ya[\]]sogs so/_/luT la/_sub kyi byings skye+e/_Sh+walka sogs kyis Sha sar mi 'gyur/_Sh+b+yAtA/_Th+b+yA tAro+o/_Sh+b+ya tAraH/_smon pe'i 'ing la/
[\[229a.3\]\[]s+t+yai[\]]la liT sha 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis mtha' A _a byA sa med pa sogs kyis byings gnyis brjod _shang sngon ma'i Sha ya 'os Sha dang ya phyis _rgyu mtshan can yang med di zhes pas Sha phyis pas _Tha yang zar log _a [\[]b+h+yA[\]]sa'i tsar 'ang ngos tha ta' Nal A ta laNal kyi o 'os _Dal so mtshams sbyar/
[\[229a.4\]]gzhan brtsegs ba sogs kyi yang na'o zhes pa'i mtha' i du 'gyur ba dang mi 'gyur ba yang na bar byas pas/[ \[]ng+b+yA [\]]yAta/[ \[]Sh+T+yA[\]] yAs+h+raM/_Sh+sh+yA yA uHsogs sam/yang na/_yang na/_Sh+n+ye yata/[ \[]ng+t+yai[\]]yAstAM/_Sh+D+ye yAsuHsogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_Sh+b+yA s+ya ti sogs so/_/l+r-ing la/_aSh+n+yA s+yata sogs 
[\[229a.5\]]so/_/de+e bra dag pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la'ang laT sogs par smi pa da rnams sbyar/_cho ga bshad ma thag ba dang 'dra ste/_brjes 'drel yin pas phyis/_laT la/_dA ya ti sogs so/_/ling la/_dA yeta sogs so/_/loT la/_dA ya tu sogs so/_/lang la/_a ngA yaha 
[\[229a.6\]]sogs so/_/ngA+aid+hA g+h+ra dA pa/_dA pa min pa'i dA d+hA rnams glu'o/_/byings dApa gcod pa dang de+epa dag pa dag ma yin pa'i Da dA nya sbyin Du ng+hAnya 'dzin pa/_do gcod pa/_deng bsru ba sogs dA dang ng+hA'i gzugs su byu ba rnams la/_glu'i ming can zhes tha snyad byed de/_tsan+tha par dIn med 
[\[229a.7\]]pa'i 'o zhes dang /_kalA par dA ba min pa'i dAd+hA dag dA'o zhes pa dang don gcig go/_skabs 'dir yang de+eng g+hu'i ming can ma yin pas/_tsI 'gyur bsi tsa mi dbyi ste/_lung la/_a ngA sIta/_adAsISh+nAM/_adA siShuHsogs so/_/liT la/_da do+o/_dad tuH/_da duH sogs so/_/luT 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]la/_ngAtA/_dAtA ro+o_/dA tAraHsogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la g+hu'i ming can ma yin pas mtha' er mi 'gyur te/_hA yAta sogs so/_/l+riT la/_dAs+ya ti sogs so/_/l+r-ing la/_angA s+yata sogs so/_!_/ng+nya Ta btung ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/_laT sogs par smi pa de rnams sbyar/
[\[229b.2\]]cho ga phal cher snga ma rnams dang 'dra ste/_laT la/_ng+haya ti sogs/_/loT la/_ng+ha ya tu sogs so/_/lang la/_ang+ha ya ta sogs so/_/bi b+hA ShA ng+heT sh+yoH/_ng+heT shri dag lag dam ba'o/_/byings ng+heT dang shwi dag las lung lats+li'o zes pa'i ts+lini si tsar bsgyur ba dang tsang zhes par bsgyur 
[\[229b.3\]]pa 'dam ga can du bya'o/_/tsa di/_tsang la'o/_/cang pho rol la byings a b+h+yA sa med pa gnyis brjod par bya ste/_ng+heT la/_lung /_ts+li/_tsang du bsgyur/_tsang gi nga yig nga 'gro ba'i don dang tsa yig tsang la'o zhes byings gnyis brjod pa'i don/_sha 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis mtha' Ata/_byings gnyis

[\[229b.5\]]da ng+hAb/_a dang+hAm/_ts+lisi tsa ra bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_bing+hA ShAk+sA ng+heT shAtshAsaH/[ \[]g+hA[\]]ng+heT_shA tshA sAr sa yang na'o/_/byings z+ShA drinye bar len pa/_ng+heT btung ba/_sho phra mor byed pa/_tsho gcod pa/_/ro mtha'i sa rnams las par smi pa dal ts+li 'gyur ba'i si sha yang na 'jig ste/_si tsa 
[\[229b.6\]]byis pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/_ang+hAta/_AtaH/_Ata las so/_/sitsa 'jig pa'i byings Ata mtha' las/_l+ra bsgyur ba'i j+hi ni dus su 'gyur te/_arUH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ang+hAH/_ang+hA taM/_a ng+hA ta/_skyes 
[\[229b.7\]]bu phyi ma gsum la/_ng+heT la/_lung ts+lis tsa_/li [\[]dz+hi[\]]/_lung sogs kyis byings ba aT/_b+hA sogs kyis si tsa 'jig/_mdo 'dis/_dz+nyi dzus/_tsu Tu sogs kyis dza phyis/_us la tshig mtha' min pa las sos/_gnyis dag ge gcig pha rol gyi gzugs/_ang+hAM/_ang+hA ba/_a ng+hA mi/_si tsa mi 'jig pa'i phyogs la/
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]yaM ram ma Ata mtha' sogs kyis ka dang iT sbyar bas/_ang+hA sIta/_ang+hAsi[\[]Sh+haM[\]]/_ang+hasi ShuHsogs so/_/liT la_/ngang+ho+o_/dang+hatuH/_dang+huHsogs so/_/luT la/_ng+hAtA/_ng+hAtA/_ng+hAtAro+o/_ng+hAtAraHsogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la_/ling la e 'os_/ng+he 
[\[230a.2\]]yAta_/ng+he yA staM_/ng+he yAsuHsogs so/_/l+raMT la/_lhA s+yati/_ng+hAs+yataH/_ng+hAs+ya'+ti sogs so/_/l+r-ing la_/a lhAs+ya ta/_a ng+tAs+ya tAM/_a ng+hAs+yan sogs so/_/pAg+hAng+h+ma s+thAm+nAngA Na draSh+yarti sa rti shad sa dA pi baji g+h+rang+ha ma tiSh+tha ma na ya tsha pa sh+yatsha ng+ho+oshI ya sIdAH/_pA g+hA ng+d+mA snA m+nA ngAN 
[\[230a.3\]]driSh+Di arti sarti shad sad rnams kyi pi pa dzi g+h+ra ng+ha ma tiSh+Tha man ya cha pash+ya r-i tsa ng+ho+o shrI ya sId rnams so/_/byings/_pA btung ba/_b+thA drinye bar len pa/_ng+h+nAsgri dang me kun hu sbyor ba/_Sh+ThA 'gro ba bas ldog pa/_m+nA goms pa/_dAN sbyin pa/_draSh+Ti te dra shir lte ba/_a rti 
[\[230a.4\]]te r-ita 'grogs rtid[\[] skri 'grog [\]]Shang+l-i 'gro ba rnams kyi rkyen sha 'gros pha rol la rim pa bzhin pi ba la sogs pa 'di rnams su 'gyur te/_!_/pA btur ba la laT sogs par smi pa da rnams sbyar bas/_laT la/_pi ba ti sogs so/_/ling la_/pi bi ta sogs so/_/loT la/_pi ba tu 
[\[230a.5\]]sogs so/_/lang la/_a bi bta sogs so/_/lud la/_gAti s+thA/_g+hupA b+hU rnams las zhes pas si tsa 'jig_a pA tA/_a pA tAM_/a puH/_liT kha/_pha po+o/_ma pa tuH/_pa puHsogs so/_/luT la/_pA ta/_pAtAro+o/_pA tA raH/_smon pa'i ling la/
[\[230a.6\]]ling la e'os/_mtha' e/_pe yAta/_pe yAstAM/_pe sAsuH/_luT-i la/_pA s+ya ti/_pA s+ya ti/_pA s+yataH/_pA s+yan+ti sogs so/_/l+r-ing la/_a bAs+yata/_a_A ta las sos/_dz+hi sus/_us la tshig mtha' min pa sogs kyis gnyis dag gi gcig pha rol gyi gzugs/_pA s+ya tAM/_apAs+yan sogs so/_/
[\[230a.7\]]g+nyAdri nye bar len pa la/_laT sogs par sme+e pa de rnams sbyar bas/_laT la/_dzig+h+ra ti sogs so/_/ling la/_dzi g+h+re ta sogs so/_/loT la/_dzig+h+ra tu sogs so/_/lang la/_adzi g+h+rata sogs so/_/lung la_/g+h+rA ng+heT shA tshA sA las yang na 'os si tsa yang na 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]'jig ste phyis pa'i phyogs la/_agrAta/_ag+h+rA tAM/_ag+h+ruHsogs so/_/si tsam phyis pa'i phyogs la/_yam/_ram/_nam/_Ata mtha' sogs kyis sag dang iT sbyar bas/_ag+h+rA sIta/_ag+h+rA siSh+TI/_ag+h+rAsiShuHsogs so/_/liT la/_dzag+h+rA+o+o/_dzag+h+rA tuH/_dza 
[\[230b.2\]]s+huHsogs so/_/luT la/_g+h+rAtA/_g+h+rAtAro+o/_g+h+rA tAraH/_g+h+rAtAraH/_smon pa'i ling la/_gzhan brtsegs pa sogs kyis yang na 'os/_er bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/_g+h+re yI ta/_g+h+reyAstAM/_g+h+re yA suHsogs sam/_yang na/_g+h+rAyAta/_g+h+rAyang s+hAM/_g+h+rAMyA 
[\[230b.3\]]b+huHsogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_g+hA s+yati/_g+h+rAs+ya taH/_g+h+rA s+yan+ti sogs so/_/l+r-ing la_/ag+h+rAs+yata_/ag+h+rA s+ya taM/_a g+h+rA s+yan sogs so/_l+ring /_a g+h+rA s+yata/_a g+h+rAs+ya tAM/_ag+h+rA s+yan sogs so/_!_/[\[]ng+h+nA[\]]sgra dang me kun tu sbyor ba la'ang laT sogs par sme+e pad rnams sbyar bas/_laT la/_ng+ham ti sogs so/_/ling la/_ng+ha meta 
[\[230b.4\]]sogs so/_/loT la/_ng+ham tu sogs so/_/lang la_/ang+ha ma ta sogs so/_/lang la_/ang+ham ta sogs so/_/lung la_/yam ram_/nam Ata mtha' sogs kyis saka dang iT byin bas_/ang+h+ma sIta_/ang+p+mA siSh+TAM_/ang+h+mA siShuHsogs so/_/liT la/_pang+h+mo/_dang+p+ma tuH/_dang+p+muHsogs so/_/

[\[230b.6\]]ang+s+ma s+ya tAM/_ang+p+mA s+yan sogs so/_/Sh+ThA 'gro ba las ldog pa la'o/_zhes pa la/_laT sogs par sme pa da rnams sbyar bas/_laT la/_tiSh+Tha ti sogs so/_ling la/_tiSh+Thata sogs so/_/loT la/_tiSh+Tha tu sogs so/_/lang la/_a tiSh+Thata sogs so/_/lung la_/byings kyi 
[\[230b.7\]]dang po'i Shazhis 'os Sha sa/_rgyu mtshan med na rgyu mtshan can yang med do zhes Tha 'ang thar log_/gAti s+thA sogs kyis si tsa phyis/_as+thAta/_as+thA tAM/_as+thuHsogs so/_/liT la_/shar sngon ma la_/tas+tho+o_/tas+thatuH/_la ya logs phyis ash+thas ri tsa ra bang ri tsar bang ngos thata/_tas+thuHsogs 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]so/_/luT la_/s+thA dA_/s+thA tA ro+o_/s+thA tA raHsogs so_/smon pa'i ling la_/ling la e'os_/mtha' e/_s+the yAta/_s+the yAstAM/_s+the yA uHsogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_s+thA s+yati/_s+thA s+yataH/_s+thAs+yan+t+ri sogs so/_/l+r-ing la/_as+thA 
[\[231a.2\]]s+yata/_a sbA s+ya tAM/_asbAs+yan sogs so/_/m+nA goms pa la/_laT sogs par smai pa da rnams sbyar bas/_laT la/_ma na ti sogs so/_/ling la/_ma ne sog so/_loT la/_ma na tu sogs so/_/lang la/_a man ta sogs so/_/lung la/_ya ma/_ra ma/

[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]'phel pa bar sme+e pad rnams la 'os_/'phel ba byas pas skyes bu dang po gsum la_/a hwAr+ShIta/_ah+nAr+Sh+DAM/_ag+m+YarngaH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ah+mAr+ShIH/_a hwAD+Sh+TaM/_a hwA r+Sh+Ta/_skyes bu phye ma gsum la/_a hwAr+Sh+Ti/_ahwAr+Sh+ma/_a hwa r+Sh+Ta/_liTa'i skyes bu dang 
[\[231b.2\]]po'i gcig tshig la/_byings_'dir dz+hal gnyis phyi bar yin kyang si tsa mi dbye ste/_'grel bar dper na/_bu tshad du songs nas pa la gnod pa mi skye lab pa bzhin du/_dz+hal s+jon mar yig yong ba'i ng+tsu mtshan si tsa yin bas de dbyi bam yin ces byung bas so/_gnyis brjod/_hal dang po lhag po/_raMta kyi a ta/_k+Shu ha dag gi tsu/
[\[231b.3\]]a byA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos sogs dang 'phel ba byas pas/_dzashwAr/_r-i ta sh+tsa saM yo gA de rgu NaH/_brtsegs pa dang po'i r-ita kyi'ang yon tan no/_/byings yi ge brtsegs pa dang po can gyi r-iha mtha'i l-iT 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can min pa pha rol la yon tan du 'gyur te/_skyes bu dang po'i gnyis

[\[231b.5\]]byoH/_arti ba rtsegs pa dang po _'grel par r-ita mtha' las pha rol gyi bal la eT mi 'jug go zhas bshad pas iT mi ster/_dag gi yon tan no/_/arti ste byings raM 'gro ba_kr-i sr-i sogs kyis iT ba dang mas/_laste/_thob pa la'ang ngo zhes pa dang byings yi ge brtsegs pa dang po can

[\[232a.1\]]ba'i cho ga phal cher bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra ste/_laT la/_swar ti sogs so/_/ling la/_swa re ta sogs so/_/loT la/_swar tu sogs so/_/lang la_/a swar ta sogs so/_/lung la/_/swar ti sU ti/_sU ba ting+hUnya U 'gro ba sogs kyis iT

[\[232a.5\]]laT sogs par sme+e pa da rnams sbyar/_bAg+h+rA ng+h+mA sogs kyi mdos sr-i ng+ho+oru bsgyur byed pa po la/_shad ng+hA bti sogs so/_/ling la/_ng+hA beta sogs so/_/loT la/_ng+hA btu sogs so/_/lang la/_a ng+hA bta/_sogs so/_yang 'grel bar sr-i 'gro bde yang shin tu mgyogs par 'gro ba'i don la 'jug pa na sha 'gro ba pha rol la ng+ho+o

[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]r-ita mtha' dang dr-i shir lta ba dag gi ts+li 'gyur ba ang pha rol la yon tan du 'gyur te/_a sar ta/_a sar tAM/_a sa ran sogs so/_/'grel bar lung drangs pa/_r-i sr-i b+h+yA mang+bA ke tsi ta/_r-isr-i dag las la lar ang yang na'o/_/gong du s+r+waM/_shA u/_r-i rnams lats+li ang du 'gyur

[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]mtha' rnams kyi liT 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can ma yin pa dag pha rol la yon tan du 'gyur te/_skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_Ar tuH/_AruH/_skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la_/iT t+b+yarti bya yatInAM/_at+ti arti bya ya ti rnams kyi iTa'o/

[\[233a.4\]]Ari Sh+ya tAM/_A ri Sh+yan sogs so/_/shru baH/_shr-itsa/_shru'i shr-i'ang ngo /_/byings shru thos pa la'o zhes pa la byings thams cad pa rnams pha rol la byed pa po la sha pa kyi don la sh+tsu 'gyur zhing der ma zad byings shru nyid kyang shraM zhes par 'gyur te/_sha yig ni sha 'gro ba'i don no/_/laTa'i/
[\[233a.5\]]skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/_shr-iNo ti/_shr-i Nu haH/_hush+nu boH/_sArba ng+hA tu ke/_hush+nu dag gi byings thams cad pa la'o/_/byings hu sbyin pa dang rkyen sh+nu dang gzhan lang byings a tsa gcig pa dang /_yi ge brtsegs pa ma yin pa rnams kyi mtha'i u yig ni rnam dbye 
[\[233a.6\]]byings thams cad pa a tsa dang po can raSha sogs kyis naN byings phyed pa dang byings thams cad bdag gi 'os yon tan/_rnams pha rol la ya Nar 'gyur te/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i mang tshig la/_shr-i Sh+han+ti/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_shr-i No Shi/_shr-i Nu thaH/_shr-i Nu tha/_skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig 
[\[233a.7\]]tshig la/_shraMNo mi/_lo pa sh+tsA s+yAn+ya ta ras+yAM b+soH/_ba ma dag la 'di'i dbyi ba'ang yang na'o/_/rkyen gyi u yig ni pa 'gro ba'i ming can ma yin pa'i rnam dbye ba yig dang ma yig dang po can rnams la yang na dbyi ste/_skyis bu phyi ma'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_shr-iNu baH/_shr-i NuH/

[\[233b.1\]]shr-iNumaH/_shr-i N+maH/_ling gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_shraM Nu yAta/_shr-i Nu yAstAM/_shr-iNu rA suH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_shraM Nu yAH/_shraMNu yAstaM/_shr-i Nu yAsta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_shr-i Nu yAM/_shraM NuyA ba/_shraMNu yA ma/_loTa'i skyes bu dang po

[\[233b.3\]]cu hi dag gi tA tar yang 'os/_hi tAtang rub sgyur/_shraNu tAta/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_shraMNu taM/_shraMNu ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_shr-i Na bANi/_shr-iN bA ba/_shr-iN bA ma/_lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a sh-iN tAM/_a shr-i Nu trI/_a shr-i N+wan/_skyes bu dbus ma

[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]Sh+ya na sogs so/_/Shu rab tu skye ba la'o zhes pa la laT sogs par sme+e pa da rnams sbyar/_byings kyi dang po'i Sha 'is dang byed pa po la sha pa byin pas/_laT la/_sa bti sogs so/_/ling la/_sa geta sogs so/_/loT la/_sa btu sogs so/_/lang la/_a 
[\[234a.2\]]sa bta sogs so/_/stu su ng+hUnya b+h+yaHpar sme+e pa deShu/_stu su ng+hUnya rnams las pa rasme+e bad rnams la'o/_/byings Sh+Dunya bstod pa/_Shu rab tu skye bdag gi byings kyi dang po'i Sha sa byas pas stu su dag dang /_ng+hUnya 'gul ba rnams las si tsa par sme+e bad rnams la iT 'gyur te/_sul/_lung 
[\[234a.3\]]a sA bIta/_a sAbaMSh+DAM/_a sA bi ShuHsogs so/_/'grel bar lung drangs pa/_ru du sunu ng+hAtU nAM liTaM pi nA iDA/_byings ru du su nu rnams kyi liT ma yin pa la iT yang na'o/_/byings ru sgra/_du 'gro ba/_Shu rab tu skye ba/_Nu bstod pa rnams las bal dang po can gyi liT la 
[\[234a.4\]]iT rtag tu 'gyur zhing liT ma yin pa gzhan bal dang po la aT yang na 'gyur te/_su la lung /_iT sbyar ba'i dper brjod bshad ma thag pa/_a sa bIta sogs yin la/_iT med pa'i phyogs la 'phel ba byas pas/_a so ShInya/_aso+oSh+TAM/_a so+o ShuHsogs so/_/liTa'i 
[\[234a.5\]]skyes bu dang po gsum la/_suShA ba/_suShu btuH/_su Shu buH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_su Sho tha/_suShu bathuH/_suShu ba/_su daShu ba/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum pa/_su ShA ba/_su Sha ba/_su Shu bi ba/_su Shu bi ma/_luT la/_iT yang na bar byas pas/_sabi tA/_sa 
[\[234a.6\]]bi tA ro+o/_sa bi tAraHsogs sam/_yang na/_so tA/_so tA ro+o/_so tAraHsogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_kraMta ma yin pa sogs kyis ring po byas pas/_sU yUta/_sUyAstAM/_sU yA suHsogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_iT yang na bar byas pas/_sa bi Sh+ya ti/_sa bi Sh+ya taH/_sa bi 
[\[234a.7\]]Sh+yan+ti sogs sam/_yang na/_so Sh+ya ti/_so Sh+ya taH/_so Sh+yan+yi/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du l+r-ing la/_a sa bi Sh+yata/_a sa bi Sh+ya tAM/_a sa bi Sh+yan sogs sam/_yang na/_a so Sh+yata/_a soSh+yatAM/_a so Sh+yan sogs so/_!_/sru 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la/_laT sogs pa 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]ra smai pad rnams sbyar bas/_laT la/_sra bti sogs so/_/ling la/_sra beta sogs so/_/loT la/_sra bcu sogs so/_/la pa la/_a sra bta sogs so/_/Ni shri dru sru [\[]srub+h+ya[\]\u0f7f]karta ri tsang /_Ni shri dru sru rnams la byed pa la tsang 'o/_/rkyen Ni'i mtha' can khyi byi ba rnams dang /_shrinya bsten

[\[234b.3\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a su srubaH/_a su srub taM/_a su sru bta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a su srubaM/_a su sru bA ba/_a su sru bAm/_liT la/_skyes bu dang bo gsum la/_su srAg su sru btuH/_su sru buH/_skyes bu dbu sam gsum la/_su sro tha/_su srub thuH/_su srub/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_su swA ba [\[]Nal [\]]su sra

[\[235b.1\]]'gro ba las par sme+eb da rnams la'o/_/byings puSha la sogs pa rnams da d+yata la sogs pa rnams dang byings l-i 'gro ba rnams las lung gi par sme+e bad rnams la lung la ts+li ni ang du 'gyur te/_da yig ni ang ma yin ba la zhes u bad+hA mi dbyi ba'i don no/_/gam+laM la lung /_ts+li ang du

[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]yin pa la am 'os/_am a+wag ma byin pas/_draSh+DA/_draSh+DA ro+o/_draSh+DA raHsogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_dri sh+yAta/_dr-i sh+yAstAM/_dr-i sh+yA suHsogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_an A gam dang /_grash+dza b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis shaSha/_sal Sha D+hadag gi ka_/kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa

[\[238a.6\]]Sha byas pas/_daMk+Sh+yati/_daMk+Sh+ya taH/_daMk+Sh+ya taH/_daM k+Sh+yan+ti sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la'ang /_adaM k+Sh+yata/_adaM k+Sh+yatrAM/_a daM k+Sh+yan sogs so/_/gup+tadz+kid+b+h+yaHsan/_gu pa _ti dza _kita rnams las sana'o/_/byings gu pU sbed pa dang smad pa dag la 'o dang /_ti dza rno ba la ste bzod pa la yang 
[\[238a.7\]]po dang /_kita nges par gnas pa la ste nang sel bar byed pa la yang ngo zhes pa'i byings gsum la san pha rol tu 'gyur te/_san gyin yig ni san yang dag la'o zhes byings gnyis brjod pa'i don no/_/san+yadoHsan yang dag la'o/_/san dang yang dag pha rol la byings ab+h+yA sa med ba'i gnyis 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]brjod par bya'o/_/bUrbat+sanaH/san gyi snga ma dang 'dra'o/_/byings la san byin pa'i san gyi mtha' yang snga ma dang 'dra ba ste byings nyid du gnas pas byings byings su bsgrub pa'i rkyen zhes bya'o/_/'grel bar lung drangs pa/_deHkra mni n+dA k+Sha ma ru g+dzayeShu san+ni Sh+ya te/_gu pa sogs las ram ba bzhin

[\[240a.1\]]lba dga' ba am dag gos/_e pha/_eng+heshrAM/_er+hal sha ba loT la A dzAMAta kyi ngi ta la 'os _A i yab ya dag gi zhes bas ya phyis _i mtshams sbyar/_Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/_eta kyi A ma 'os _e skar As/_eng+hang+sAM/_eb+hal _shab loT phoT la[\[]ng+hAMT[\]]'bro ba sogs kyis mtha' es bdag la ba

[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]sa Sha/_e+eng+hi Sha ta/_la dz+ha ru bsgyur/_dz+ha las a phyung nas/_At+mane bad rnams la ata ma yin pa las sos/_dz+ta ata du bsgyur/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_e+e b+hiShAHl+na thas gun nas bsgyur tha sogs kyis sa Sha/_Sh+Dul thU 'os tha Tha/_ang+hi ShAthAM/_laA thA kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/_e+e ng+heng+hAM/_lang+hAng+ha

[\[241a.1\]]la/_i NaHShIng+h+waM lung li DAMng+honya n+dAta/_iN mtha' las ShIng+h+waM lung liT rnams kyi ng+ha'i 'o/_/byings iN so sor bsdu ba'i mtha' las pha rol gyi smon pa'i ling gi sing+sh+waM dang lung liT rnams kyi ng+ha yig ni D+ha yig tu 'gyur te/_eng+h+raM tsakr-iD+h+we/_kr-il laT byings gnyis brjod _r-i'i ata 
[\[241a.2\]]'os/_r-i a kuha dag gi tsu 'os/_katsa/_lang+h+waMT 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/_mdo 'dis ng+haD+ha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_e ng+hAM tsa kre/_la iT ru bsgyur Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/_e ng+haM tsa kri ba he/_la bahi dang ma hing du bsgyur/_Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/_e ng+hAM tsa kr-im he/_eng+hAMtsa kr-im he/_eng+ha la buT lbal

[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]bu phyi ma gsum la/_e+eng+hiSh+ye/_e+eng+haSh+ya ba hi/_e+e ng+hiSh+ya ma hi sogs te/_cho ga la la cher b+hU thob pa'i skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra'o/_!_ik+Sha lta ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/_/laT sogs At+ma ne pad rnams sbyor ba'i chog thams cad bshad ma thag dang 'dra'o/_!_/dad sbyin pa la'o zhes pa la laT

[\[241b.4\]]di She/_dad dA the/_da da [{]ding[,]deng[}\u0fb7\u0fad]/_da dadin+h+we/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_da dade/_dad di ba he/_da dadi ma he sogs te/_'dir sha sha/_dad/_ba dang po sogs kyi mdos/_ang+h+yAs dbyib dang o ra bsgyur ba sogs mi byed do/_/luT la byings phyed ba'i bal dang po la iT 'os iT spyar bas 
[\[241b.5\]]da di tA/_da ditA ro+o/_da ditA raH/_da ditA se/_da ditA sA the/_da di tAt+h+we/_da di tAng+h+we/_da ditA he/_da ditA swa te/_da di tAsma he/_smon ba'i ling la'ang iT sbyar bas/_da di ShISh+Ta/_da diShI yAstuM/_da diShI ran sogs so/_/l+raT-il/_lbal dang po'i iT dang s+yatA sa zhes pas s+ya sbyin las/_da diSh+yate/
[\[241b.6\]]da diSh+ye te/_da diSh+yan+te sogs so/_/de bzhin du l+r-ing la/_ad diSh+ya ta/_a da diSh+ye tAM/_a da di Sh+yan+ta sogs so/_/Sh+waSh+ka 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la/_laT sogs Ah+ma ne pad rnams sbyar/_cho ga bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra/_'dir sub kyi byings sogs kyi byings kyi dang po'i Shas ra mi 'gyur te/

[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]bas/_a Sh+waSh+kiSh+Ta/_a ShaSh+kiShA tAM/_aSh+waSh+kaSha ta sogs so/_/liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_Sha Sh+waSh+ke/_Sha ShaSh+ka te/_Sha Sh+waSh+ki re/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_Sha Sh+waSh+ki She/_Sha ShaSh+kA the/_Sha Sh+waSh+ke d+h+we/_Sha Sh+waSh+kiD+h+we/_skyes bu phyi ma 
[\[242a.2\]]gsum la/_Sha Sh+waSh+ke/_Sha Sh+waSh+ke ba he/_Sha Sh+waSh+ki ma he/_luT la/_iT sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum pa/_Sh+waSh+ki tAro+o/_Sh+waSh+ki tAraH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_Sh+waSh+kitAse/_Sh+waSh+ki tAsA the/_Sh+waSh+ki tAd+hA+e/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_Sh+waSh+ki tA he/_Sh+waSh+ki tA swa 
[\[242a.3\]]he/_Sh+waSh+kitA sma he/_smon pa'i ling gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_Sh+waSh+ki ShISh+Ta/_Sh+waSh+kiSh-I yAs+t+waM/_ShaSh+ki ShI ran/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_Sh+waSh+ki ShI Sh+ThAH/_Sh+waSh+ki ShI yAs+thAM/_Sh+waSh+ki ShI ng+h+waM/_Sh+waSh+ki ShID+h+waM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_Sh+waSh+ki ShI ya/_Sh+waSh+ki ShI ba hi/_Sh+waSh+ki ShI mahi/
[\[242a.4\]]l+r-iT la/_s+ya dang lbal dang po'i iT sbyin pas/_Sh+waSh+ki Sh+ya te/_Sh+waSh+ki Sh+ye he/_Sh+waSh+ki Sh+yan+te sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a Sh+waSh+kiSh+ya ta/_a Sh+waSh+ki Sh+ye tAM/_a Sh+waSh+ki Sh+yan+ta sogs so/_!_/ri dza 'gro ba la ste gnas pa la'ang ngo zhes pa la/_laT sogs Ang+ma ne bad rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga

[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]atsa la yaN 'os/_mtshams sbyar bas/_b.ri pa l+ya ya te/_'grel bar a ya te pha rol la'ang bra te dang nir dang dur rnams kyi ra yig la ru 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/zhes bshad bas/_prah+ya ya te/_nir ya te/_dur ya te lta bu'o/_!_/da ya 'gro ba dang /_'tshe ba 
[\[246a.2\]]dang /_sbyin pa rnams la'o zhes pa la/_laT la sogs pa sbyar _yongs su 'gro bar byed/_'bi bya ba thams cad a ya dang 'dra ste/_laT la/_da ya te sogs so/_/ling la/_da yo ta sogs so/_/liT_so sor 'gro bar byed/_mi 'gro bar byed/_ngen par 'gro bar byed/_la/_da ya tAM sogs 
[\[246a.3\]]so/_/lang la/_ad yata sogs so/_/lung la/_ang yiSh+Da sogs so/_/liT la/_da ya a ya As las kyang ngos Am sbyar bas/_da yAM tsa kre/_da yAM ba b+hU ba/_da yA mA sa sogs so/_/luT la/_da yi tA sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_da yi ShISh+Ta sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/

[\[246a.5\]]lbal dang po rnams la iT yang na bar bya ste/_'grel bar lung drangs pa/_tsAya s+phA yapyA yA miD+wA/_tsA ya s+phA ya byA ya rnams kyi iT yang na'o/_/tsA y+r-i mchod pa/_sbA yI dang o byA yI 'phel ba rnams kyi liT ma gtogs pa'i lba la dang po la iT yang na par bya ste/_lung la/_iT sbyar

[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]ba/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_bas+phA ye/_pas+phA yA te/_bas+phA yi te/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_pas+phA yIShe/_pas+phAyA the/_pas+phA ying+h+we /_pa s+phA yiD+h+we/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_/pas+phA ye/_bas+phA yib he/_pas+phA yi ma he/_luT la iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/_s+pha yi tA/

[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]bI b+ha t+si ShI Sh+Ta sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_bI b+ha t+si Sh+ya ta sogs so/_/l+r-ing la/_a bI b+ha t+si Sh+ya ta sogs so/_/d+yu ta 'ang rab la 'o zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_/laT la/_/t+yo ta te sogs so/_/ling la/_d+yo te ta sogs so/_/loT la d+yo ta tAM sogs so/_/lang la/_a d+yo ta ha sogs so/_/d+yu d+b+h+yo lu di/

[\[250a.4\]]dag par bsgyur bar bya ste/_di d+yu te/_di d+yu tA te/_di d+yu ti re/_di d+yu ti She/_sogs so/_/luT la/_iT sbyar bas/_d+yo ti tA sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_d+yo ti ShA Sh+Ta sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_d+yo ti Sh+ya te sogs so/_l+r-ing la/_a d+yo ti Sh+ya ta sogs so/_!_/br-i tu 'jug pa la ngo shes ba 
[\[250a.5\]]la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT la brta te sogs so/_/ling la/_brte ta sogs so/_/loT la/_brta tAM sogs so/_/la [\[]pa [\]]la/_a brta ta sogs so/_/lung la d+yu ta rnams las lung la'o zhes pas/_yang na pa ra smai pa da rnams dang A t+ma ne ba da rnams yang na bar d+yas bas/_par smai pad sbyar 
[\[250a.6\]]ba'i phyogs la/_a br-i ta ta/_a br-i ta tAM/_a br-i tan sogs so/_/A t+ma ne ba da'i phyogs la/_tsI si tsar bsgyur/_wa la dang po'i iT sbyar bas/_a brti Sh+Ta/_a brti ShA tAM/_a brti Sha ta sogs so/_/leT la/_ba br-i te/_ba br-i tA te/_pa br-i ti re sogs so/_/luT la/_brti bA/
[\[250a.7\]]brti tA rau/_brti dA ra:sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_brti ShI Sh+Ta/_brti ShI yA stAM/_brti ShI ra na sogs so/_/br-i d+d+h+ya:s+ya sa no:br-i ta rnams la s+ya san dag la'o/_/br-i ta la sogs pa ste/_br-i tu 'jug pa/_br-i b+hu 'phel ba/_shw-i d+hu sgra smad pa/_s+ya n+dU zag pa/_kr-i bU nus pa rnams te/
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]byings de rnams A d+ma ne pa da can yin kyang /_s+ya dang san dag pha rol la par smi ba da rnams kyang yang na 'gyur ro/_na br-i d+d+h+ya sh+tsa tu r+b+h+ya:br-i ta rnams las bzhi rnams las ma yin no/_/br-i ta sogs lnga las kr-i bU bor ba'i bzhi 'khyings phyed bas yig dang po can bar smai pa da rnams pha rol la iT 'gyur ba ma 
[\[250b.2\]]yin zhing skabs 'gar rkyen gzhan la yang na bar bya ste/_br-i tu la/_br-i ta rnams las zhes bas/_l-iT par smai ba da rnams sbyar ba'i phyogs la/_brta ti/_sar+t+s+ya ti/_bar+t+s+ya:/_bar+t+s+ya n+ti sogs so/_/A t+ma ni ba da rnams sbyar ba'i phyogs la/_brta Sh+ye te/_brti Sh+ye te/_brti Sh+ye te/_brti Sh+ya n+te sogs so/_/de 
[\[250b.3\]]bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_par smai pa da'i phyogs la/_a ba r+t+s+ya ta/_a bar+t+s+ya taM/_a s+ya n+da ta sogs so/_/a d+ma ne ba da sbyar ba'i phyogs la/_a brti Sh+ya ta/_a brti Sh+ye tAM/_a brti Sh+ya n+da sogs so/_!_/s+ya n+dU zag pa la'o zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT la/_s+ya n+da te sogs so/_/ling 
[\[250b.4\]]la/_s+ya n+de ta sogs so/_/loT la/_s+ya n+da tAM sogs so/_/ling la/_a s+ya n+da ta sogs so/_lung la/_d+yu ta sogs kyis par smai pad rnams dang /_a t+ma ne pad rnams yang na bar byas pas/_pa ra smai ba da sbyar ba'i phyogs la pu Sha sogs d+yu ta sogs zhes pas/_ts+li ang du bsgyur/
[\[250b.5\]]i ta 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis bas/_a s+yad ta/_a s+ya ta tI/_a s+ya dan sogs so/_A s+ya d+na sogs so/_/A t+Ya ne ba da'i phyogs la/_U 'gro ba sogs kyis i Ta yang na bar byas pas/_iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/_a s+ya n+di Sh+Ta/_as+ya n+di ShA tAM/_a s+ya n+di Sha ta sogs so/_/iT ma sbyar ba'i 
[\[250b.6\]]phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a s+yaM ta/_a s+ya n+da tAM/_a s+ya n+d+sa ta/_phyogs kyi skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a s+ya n+dAH/_a s+ya n+thAM/_a s+yaM d+haM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a s+yaM d+si/_a s+yaM d+mA ti/_a s+yaM d+s+mA hi/_laT skyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_sas+yaM de/_sa s+yaM ta t+she/_sa 
[\[250b.7\]]s+yaM di re/_skyes bu dbus ma _la ta dz+ha la las dz+ha la la 'os si tsa phyis/_dz+har 'dra ba la dz+har rnams kyi 'os dra [{]pab[}]phyis/_khar la tsar 'os da ta drangs/_gsum la/_sa s+yaM di She/_sa s+yaM d+se/_sa s+yaM dA the/_sa s+yaM di d+h+we/_a s+yaM ng+he/_dz+har 'dra ba la/_dz+har rnams kyi 'os da phyis/_sa s+yaM d+h+we/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_sa s+yaM de/_sa 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]s+yaM di ba he/_sa s+yaM rwa ha/_sa s+yaM di ma he/_sa s+yaM d+ma he/_luT la iT yang na bar bas pas/_iT sbyin pa'i phyogs la/_s+yaM di twa sogs dang /_iT med pa'i phyogs la/_dz+har 'dra ba la dz+har rnams kyi 'os dra phyis pas/_s+yaM tA/_s+ya n+tA rau/_s+ya n+tA ra:sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_/
[\[251a.2\]]iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/_s+yaM di ShI Sh+Ta/_s+yaM di ShI yA stAM/_s+yaM di ShI ran sogs dang /_iT med pa'i phyogs la/_khar la tsar 'os da tar bsgyur bas/_/s+yAM t+sI Sh+Ta sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_br-i ta rnams las s+ya san yang dag bos/_pa ra sme ba da rnams dang A t+ma ne pa da rnams yang na bar byas bas 
[\[251a.3\]]pa ra smai pa da'i phyogs la br-i ta rnams las bzhi rnams la sa ma yin no zhes pas iT mi 'gyur te/_khar la tsar 'os da tar bsgyur bas/_/s+yaM d+m+ya ta:/_s+yaM d+s+ya n+di sogs so/_/A Sh+ma ne pa da'i phyogs la/_U ta 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/_iT 'i phyogs la/_s+yaM di 
[\[251a.4\]]Sh+ya te sogs dang /_iT med pa'i phyogs la/_s+yaM t+s+ya te sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_bar smai pa'i phyogs la/_a s+yaM t+se ta/_a s+yaM d+s+yan sogs dang /_A t+ma ne ba da sbyar ba'i phyogs la iT yang na par byas pas/_a s+yaM di Sh+ya ta sogs sam/_yang na a s+yaM [{]r+l+tsu[\]]ta sogs so/_/a 
[\[251a.5\]]nu bi ba r+ya b+hi ni b+h+ya:s+ya n+da te ra prA Ni Shu/_srog chags ma yin pa la a nu pi pa ri a b+hi ni rnams las s+ya n+pa te'i 'o/_/srog chags ma yin pa la 'jug pa na nyer bsgyur a nu la sogs pa 'di rnams las/_s+ya d+na te yi sa yig ni Sha yig tu yang na 'gyur te/_a nu Sh+ya n+da te ra tha:sogs sam/_a nu 
[\[251a.6\]]s+ya n+da te ra tha: sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_bi/_pa ri/_a b+hi/_ni rnams kyang sbyar bar bya'o/_/srog chogs ma yin pa zhes pas rnam bcad kyi srog chags la 'jug pa na Sha ra mi 'gyur te/_ni s+ya n+da te ha stI/_!_/kr-i pU nus pa la 'o zhes pa la laT/_shing rta rjes su rgyu/_sogs _shing rta rjes su rgyu/
[\[251a.7\]]sbyar/_kr-i bo rol:/_kr-i phU'i ra la'o/_/kr-i pU'i ra yig ni rkyen pha rol la la yig tu bsgyur bar bya la/_de yang mtha' gcig tu ni ma nges pas skabs 'gar mi bsgyur ba yang yod do/_/kr-i pU la/_laT/_glang chen nges par rgyu/_sha ba/_mdo 'dis r-i l-i/_pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_/ka wa te sogs so/_/
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]leng la/_ka lpe ta sogs so/_/loT la/_ka lpa tAM sogs so/_/lang la/_a ka lpa ta sogs so/_/lung la/_d+yA ta rnams las lung la 'os/_bar smai pa da rnams dang A d+ma ne pa da rnams yang na bar byas pas/_par smai pa da'i phyogs la/_pu Sha sogs d+yU ta sogs zhes pas tsI ang du bsgyur 
[\[251b.2\]]bas/_a kl-i pa ta/_a kl-i ba tAM/_a kl-i pan sogs so/_/A d+ma ne pa da'i phyogs la U ta 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/_i Ta'i phyogs la/_a ka lpi Sh+Ta/_/a ka lpi ShA tAM/_a ka lpi Sha ta sogs dang /_iT med pa'i phyogs la/_ling si tsA bA t+ma ne ba de Shu/_A d+ma 
[\[251b.3\]]ne pa da rnams la ling si tsa dag go/_/byings ha la mtha' can i ka so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge u pa d+hAn yod pa las/_smon ba'i ling dang /_si tsa A t+ma ne pa da tsa na dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang po can yod pa ste/_iT med pa rnams ka 'gro ba'i ming can zhes brda chad byed de/_yon tan dang 'phel 
[\[251b.4\]]ba sogs mi byed ba'i don no/_/skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a kl-i lta/_a kl-i prA tAM/_a kl-i p+sa ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a kl-i p+thA:/_a kli p+d+h+raM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a kl-i p+si/_a kl-i p+s+wa hi/_liT sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tsa kl-i pe/
[\[251b.5\]]tsa kl-i pA ti/_tsa kl-i pi re/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_dz+hal las dz+ha la 'os si tsa phyis/_tsa kl-i pi She/_tsa kl-i p+se/_tsa kl-i pA tha/_tsa kl-i pi d+h+we/_tsa kl-i pi D+h+re/_dz+ha la las dz+hal las si tsa phyis/_dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha 'os ba ba/_tsa kl-i p+d+h+we/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsa kl-i pe/_tsa kl-i pi ba he/_tsa kl-i pA he/
[\[251b.6\]]tsa kl-i pi ma he/_tsa kl-i b+ma he/_lu Ti tsa kl-i ba:luT la'ang gl-i ba'i 'o/_/kl-i pa la luT dang 'ang gi sgras l+riT dang l+ring rnams kyi bar smai pa da rnams yang na 'gyur zhing /_san gyi mtha' la yang par smai pa da rnams yang na 'gyur ro/_tA si tsa kl-i pa:/_tA sa la 'ang kl-i pa'i 'o/_kl-i pa las pha rol gyi tAs 
[\[251b.7\]]dang sa yig dang po byings byed pa par smi pa da rnams la'ang iT 'gyur ba ma yin te/_luT la'ang zhes pas pa ra smai pa da dang A t+ma ne pa da yang na bar byas pas pa ra smai pa da'i phyogs la/_mdo 'dis iT mi 'jug_/pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_ka l+p+tA/_ka l+p+hA rau/_ka l+p+hAr:/[ \[]k+p+gA[\]]
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]si sogs so/_/A t+ma ne pa da'i phyogs la U ta 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/_iT byin pa'i phyogs la/_kalpi tA/_kalpi tA tau/_ka lpi tA ra:/_ka lpi tA se sogs so/_i Ta ma byin ba'i phyogs la/_/kal+p+hA/_ka l+m+n+ra ro/_kal+h+pha ra:/_ka ltA se sogs so/_/
[\[252a.2\]]smon pa'i ling la/_/U ta 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas bas/_iT byin pa'i phyogs la/_kalpi ShI Sh+Ta sogs dang /_iT med pa'i phyogs la/_Atwa ne pa da rnams la ling si tsa dag go zhes pas ki ta yin pas yon tan mi byed de/_kl-i r+sI:Sh+Ta/_kl-i sh+sI yA s+t+raM/_kli p+sI ra na sogs so/_/
[\[252a.3\]]l+r-iT la/_luT la 'ang kl-i ba'i 'os/_pa ra smai pa da dang a t+ma ne pa da yang na bar byas pas bar smai pa da sbyar pa'i phyogs la/_tAs la'ang kl-i ba'i 'os iT mi 'jug ste/_kal+b+s+ya ti/_ka p+b+s+ya ta:/_ka l+b+s+ya n+ti sogs so/_/A t+ma ne ba de'i phyogs la/_U ta 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas 
[\[252a.4\]]pas/_iT byin pa'i phyogs la/_ka lpi Sh+ya te sogs dang /_iT med pa'i phyogs la/_ka l+b+s+ya te sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_luT la'ang kl-i pa'i 'os par smai pa da dang a+wa t+ma ne pa da yang na bar byas pas/_pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i phyogs ya/_tA sa la 'ang zhes pas 
[\[252a.5\]]iT mi 'jug ste/_a ka l+p+s+ya ta/_a ka l+b+s+ya tAM/_a ka l+p+s+ya tAM/_a ka l+p+s+ya sogs so/_A tA ne ba da'i phyogs la iT yang na bar byas pas/_a ka lpi Sh+ya ta sogs sam/_a ka l+p+s+ya ta sogs/_!_/bya tha sdug bsngal dang yang dag par g.yo ba dag la 'o zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_/laT la/
[\[252a.6\]]bya tha te sogs so/_ling la/_bya the ta sogs so/_loT la/_bya tha tAM sogs so/_/lang la/_a bya tha ta sogs so/_/lung la/_a bya thi Sh+Ta/_a bya thi ShA tI/_a bya thi Sha ta sogs so/_bya tho liTi/_bya tho li Ti/_bya tha'i liT la'o/_liT pha rol la bya tha gnyis brjod pa'i a b+h+ya 
[\[252a.7\]]sa'i saM pra sA ra Na ra 'gyur te/_pi bya the/_bi bya thrA re/_pi bya thi re/_pi bya thi She/_sogs so/_luT la/_bya thi tA sogs so/_smon pa'i ling la/_bya thi ShI Sh+Ta sogs so/_l+r-iT la/_bya thi Sh+ya te sogs so/_l+r-ing la/_a bya thi Sh+ya ta sogs so/_nyi twa rA mgyogs pa la'o/
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT la/_tAr te sogs so/_/ling la/_twa re ta sogs so/_loT la/_twa ra tAM sogs so/_lang la/_a twa ra ta sogs so/_/lung la/_a twa re k+Sha sogs so/_/liT la/_ta twa te/_ta twa re/_ta twa ri re/_ta twa ri She sogs so/_/luT la/_twa 
[\[252b.2\]]ri tA sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_twa ri ShI Sh+Ta sogs so/_/l-iT la/_twa ri Sh+ya te sogs so/_/l+r-ing la/_a twa ri Sh+ya ta sogs so/_/de rnams kyi byed pa po la sha pa 'jug pa'i yu la b+hU la sogs pa las byings A t+ma ne pa da 'jug pa rnams la laT sogs rnam dbye A t+ma me rnams sbyar ba'i 
[\[252b.3\]]cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal la dang bcas par rags pa rnams bshad zin to//_!_//da ni b+hU la sogs pa gnyis ka'i tshig can rnams la laT sogs par smai pa da dang /_A t+ma ne pa da rnams gnyis ka sbyor ba dang /_yang byings A t+ma ne can la A t+na ne sbyor ba dang /_par smai ba 
[\[252b.4\]]da can la par smai ba da rnams sbyor ba sogs cho ga ci rigs pa thun mong du bshad par bya ste/_!_/Du pa tsa Sha mtshed pa la'o zhes pa la/_rjes 'brel phyis nas laT sogs sbyar bas/_la Ta'i pa ra smai pa da rnams la/_ba tsa ti/_pa tsa ta:/_pa tsa n+ti sogs so/_/A t+na ne pa da rnams la/_pa 
[\[252b.5\]]tsa te/_pa tse te/_pa tsa n+te sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_byed pa po la shab byin pas ling gi par smai ba da rnams la/_pa tse ta/_pa tse tAM/_pa tse yu:sogs so/_/A t+ma ne pad rnams la/_pa tse ta/_pa tse yA tAM/_btse ra na sogs so/_/lo Ta'i par smi pa da rnams la/_pa tsa tu/_pa tsa tA ta/_pa tsa 
[\[252b.6\]]tAM/_pa tsa n+tu sogs so/_/A t+na ne pa da rnams la/_ba tsa tAM/_ba tse tAM/_pa tsa n+taM sogs so/_/lang gi par smai pa da rnams la/_a pa tsa ta/_a pa tsa tAM/_a pa tsa na sogs so/_/A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/_a pa tsa ta/_a pa tse tAM/_a pa tsa t+na sogs so/_lung la/_byings 
[\[252b.7\]]a niT yig pas iT mi 'jug/_bad bra dza sogs kyis u ba d+hA ring po/_tsu'i ku 'os/_tsa ka/_/kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha ra bsgyur ba dang /_dz+hal dang po can rnams la dz+hal 'os si tsa dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs bas/_par smai pa da rnams la/_a pA k+Shi ta/_a 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]pA k+tAM/_a bA k+Sha:sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_A t+ma ne ba da rnams la/_a pa k+ta/_a pa k+ShA tAM/_a pa k+Sha ta sogs te/_A t+ma ne rnams la u pa d+hA ring po mi byed do/_/liT la byings gnyis brjod pa dang ki ta rnams la i b+h+yAs dbyi zhing er bsgyur ba dang /_wa la dang 
[\[253a.2\]]po rnams la kr-i br-i sr-i sogs kyi mdos iT sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_pa pA tsa/_pe tsa tu:/_pe tsu:/_pa tsi tha/_pa pa k+tha sogs dang /_A t+ma ni pa da rnams la/_pe tse/_pe tsA te/_pe tsi re sogs so/_/luT la/_tsu'i ku 'os tsa kar bsgyur 
[\[253a.3\]]bas/_par smai pa da rnams/_pa k+tA/_pa k+tA ro/_pa k+tA ra:/_pa k+tA si sogs so/_A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/_pak+tA/_pa kyArau/_pa k+tA ra:/_pa k+tA si sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling gi par smai pa da rnams la/_pa ts+tA stAM/_pa ts+yA su:sogs so/_A t+ma ne pa da rnams la tsu'i ku dang /_kun 
[\[253a.4\]]nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_pa k+ShI Sh+Ta/_pa Sh+rI yA staM/_pa Sh+rI ra na sogs so/_/l+r-iT la'ang tsu'i ku dang /_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis par smai pa da rnams la/_bak+Sh+ya ti/_pha Sh+Sh+ya ta:/_pa k+b+ya T+ti sogs dang /_A d+ma de rnams la pa k+Sh+ya te/_pa k+Sh+ye te/_pa n+b+ya n+te sogs so/_/
[\[253a.5\]]nge bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi par smai pa da rnams la a pa k+Sh+ya ta/_a \u0f7ck+Sh+ya dAM/_a pa k+Sh+ya na sogs dang /_A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/_a pa k+Sh+ya ta/_a pa k+Sh+ye taM/_a pa k+Sh+ya n+ta sogs so/_!_/pa t+l-i laM la yang ste 'gro ba la lo zhes pa la/_byings par smai ba da can yin pas laT sogs par smai pa da
