[\[253a.6\]]rnams sbyar bas/_laT la/_pa ta ti sogs so/_/li bas/_pa te ta sogs so/_/loT la/_pa ta tu sogs so/_/lang la/_a pa ta ta sogs so/_/pa taHbum/_/pa ta'i bum 'o/_/pa ta'i tsI bskyur ba ang pha rol la bum A gam ster bar bya ste/_ma gnas kyi don dang u brjod 
[\[253a.7\]]don no/_/pa ta la lung /_lung la tsI pu Sha sogs d+yu ta sogs li 'gro ba sogs kyis tsI ang du bsgyur/_mdo'i das pus A ga ma byin pas/_a pa b+ta ta/_a pa p+ta dAM/_a pa t+ta na sogs so/_/liT la/_ki ta rnams la a b+h+yA sa phyis nas er bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs bas 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]ba pA ta/_be ta tu:/_pe tu:/_pe ti tha/_sogs so/_/luT la/_wa la dang po'o iT sbyar bas/_ma ti tU sogs so/_/smon ba'i ling la/_/pa tA ta/_pa d+yA stAM/_pa d+yA su:sogs dang /_l-iT la/_wa la dang po'i iT sbyar bas/_pa ti Sh+ya ti/_pa ti Sh+ya taH
[\[253b.2\]]pa ti Sh+ya n+ti sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+ring la/_a pa ti Sh+ya ta/_a ba ti Sh+ya tAM/_a pa ti Sh+ya na sogs so/_!_/Tu ba mu skyug pa la'o zhes la la 'ang par smai pa da can yin pas laT sogs pa ra smai par rnams sbyar bas/_laT la/_tha ma ti sogs so/_/ling la/
[\[253b.3\]]ba me ta sogs so/_/loT la/_ba ma tu sogs so/_/lang la/_a ba ma ta sogs so/_/lung la/_wa la dang po'i iT sbyar bas/_a ba mI tA/_a pa mi s+b+TAM/_a pa mi Shu: sogs so/_'grel bar lung drangs pas/_bam e twA b+hAs lo pau bA/_ba ma'i a b+hA sa dbyi ba dang e nyid yang na 'o/_/
[\[253b.4\]]gong du sha sha dad pa dang po zhes a b+hA sa mi dbyi bar bshad kyang de'i dmigs bsal laT ki ta pha rol la ba ma'i a d+h+yAs dbyi ba dang ar bsgyur dbyi ba dang ar bsgyur ba sogs yang na bar bya ste/_ba bA ma/_them tuH/_ba ba ma tuH/_be muH/_ba ba muH/_be mi tha/_ba ba mi tha/_luT la wa la dang po'i iT byin pas/_ba mi 
[\[253b.5\]]tA sogs dang /_smon pa'i ling la/_bamyA ta/_ba myA stAM/_ba myA suHsogs so/_/l+r-iT la wa la dang po'i iT byin pas/_ba mi Sh+ya ti sogs so/_/de bzhin du /_Na la _l+r-ing la/_e tus/_a ba mi Sh+yata _us _sogs so/_b+h+ra tha/_mu g.yo ba la'o zhes ba'ang par smai pa da can yin 
[\[253b.6\]]bas laT sogs bar smai pa da rnams sbyar/_byings thams cad pa bzho po la byed pa po la sha ba dang /_/thrA sha/_b+h+lA sha/_b+h+ra mu sogs kyi mdos/_sh+ya na yang na bar byas pas/_laT la/_b+h+ra ma ti sogs sam/_b+h+rA mya ti sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_ling la/_b+h+ra me ta sogs sam/_b+thA bye 
[\[253b.7\]]ta sogs so/_/loT la/_b+h+ra ma tu sogs sam/_b+h+rA mya tu sogs so/_/lang la/_a b+h+ra ma ta sogs sam/_a b+h+rA mya ta sogs so/_lung la wa la dang po'i iT byin pas/_a b+h+ra mI ta/_a b+h+ra mi Sh+TaM/_a b+h+ra mi Shu:sogs so/_/pA dzr-I b+h+ta mu tra sAM/_dzrAM b+h+ra mu _tras rnams kyi yang 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]na'o/_/dzri ShU lang tsho nyams pa/_b+h+ra mu g.yo ba/_tra sI skyo ba rnams kyi liT ki ta pha rol la a b+h+yAs dbyib dang er bsgyur ba sogs yang na bar bya ste/_pa g+h+rA ma/_b+h+re matuH/_ba b+h+ra ma tuH/_b+h+re muH/_b+h+re mi tha/_bar+h+ra mi tha sogs so/_/luT la/_wa la da 
[\[254a.2\]]po'i iT sbyar bas/_b+h+ra mi tA sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_b+h+ru mya ta sogs so/_/l+r-iT la wa la dang po'i iT sbyar bas/_b+h+ra mi Sh+ya ti sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_Na li/_l+r-ing la/_a tus/_a d+h+ra miSh+ya ta/_us/_sogs so/_/tha ba_!/Sha ta bzod pa la'o zhes pa byings A t+ma ni 
[\[254a.3\]]can yin pas laT sogs A t+ma ne bad rnams sbyor/_byings kyi dang po'i Sha'i sa 'os/_Sha sar sgyur ba sogs kyi bsgrub pas/_laT la/_sa ha te sogs so/_ling la/_sa he ta sogs so/_/loT la/_sa hi Sha ta sogs so/_/lung la/_as ha ta sogs so/_/lung la_iT 
[\[254a.4\]]sbyin pas/_a sa hi Sh+Ta/_a sa hi ShA tAM/_a sa hi Sha ta sogs so/_/liT la/_se he/_se hA te/_si hi re sogs so/_/luT la/_iShu sa ha sogs kyi mdos iT yang na bar byas bas/_i Ta'i phyogs la/_sa hi tA/_sa hi tA rau/_/sa hi tA ra:sogs dang /_iT med 
[\[254a.5\]]pa'i phyogs la/_sa ha la/_luT/_tAs/_luTa'i dang po sogs kyis ta DA/_sa ha/_tA/_ha'i D+ha 'os ha D+ha/_dz+ha Sha las d+hA min pas ta tha dag gi d+ha 'os/_ta d+ha/_Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os d+ha D+ha ra bsgyur bas/_sa D+ha/_D+hA zhes pa la/_sa hi ba ho rod wa r+Na s+ya/_sa hi/_ba ha dag gi a yig 
[\[254a.6\]]gi o ta'o/_/D+ha'i n+Da la dbyi 'os D+ha phyis pa las/_Sha ha bzod pa dang /_ba ha thob pa dag gi a yig ni o ta du bsgyur bar bya ste/_D+ha'i D+ha la zhes pas D+ha gong ma phyis/_mdo 'dis o ta bsgyur bas/_so D+hA/_de bzhin du/_so D+hA rau/_so D+haraH/_sa hi ba ho rod wa rnams so/_/so D+hA:so b+ha'i 'o/_/
[\[254a.7\]]sa ha/_so D+ha zhes 'gyur ba'i sngon du nyer bsgyur Shar 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can byung yang so D+hA zhes pas Sha yig tu mi 'gyur te/_bi so D+hA/_pa ri so D+ha sogs so/_smon pa'i ling la wa la dang po'i iT sbyar bas/_/sa hi ShI Sh+Ta/_sa hi ShI yA stAM/_sa hi ShI ra na sogs so/_/l+r-ing la'ang wa la dang 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]po'i iT sbyar bas/_sa hi Sh+ya te/_sa hi Sh+ye te/_sa hi Sh+ya na te sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a ma hi Sh+ya ta/_a la hi Sh+ye tAM/_a sa hi Sh+ya n+ta sogs so/_!_/Sha d+li rnam par 'gyur ba dang 'gro ba dang kun nas mnyes par byed pa la'o zhes pa par smai pad can yin pas/_laT sogs par smai 
[\[254b.2\]]pa ba rnams sbyar/_byings thams cad pa bzhi po la/_bA g+h+ra d+h+mA sogs kyi mdos sId du bsgyur bas/_laT la/_sI de ta sogs so/_ling la/_sI de ta sogs so/_/loT la/_sI da tu sogs so/_/lang la/_a sI da ta sogs so/_/lung la/_pu Sha sogs d+yu ta sogs l-i 'gro ba 
[\[254b.3\]]zhes pas ts+li ang du bsgyur bas/_a sad ta/_a sad tI/_a sa dan sogs so/_/liT la/_sa sA ra/_/seng taH/_sed tuH/[ \[]ye+u[\]] duH/_se di tha/_sas t+tha sogs so/_/luT la/_khar la tsar 'os da ta ru bsgyur bas/_sa t+tA/_sa t+tA rau/_sa t+tA raH/_sa t+t+ra si sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la 
[\[254b.4\]]sA d+yA ta/_sad+yA stAM/_sa d+yA suHsogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_sa ng+s+ya ti/_sa t+s+ya taH/_sa t+s+ya n+ti sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a sa d+s+ya ta/_a sa d+s+ya ta/_a sa d+s+ya tAM/_a sa d+s+tan sogs so/_sha deH/_shi taH/_shi di'i sha 'gro ba'i 'o/_/sha d+l-i 'jig pa la'o zhes pa byings ngo bo par smai pa can yin kyang 
[\[254b.5\]]sha 'gro ba rnams kyi a p+ma ne pad rnams 'jug ste/_laT sogs byings thams cad pa bzhi pa'i A t+ma ne pa ja rnams sbyar/_thA g+h+ra[\[] ng+h+yA[\]]sogs kya mdos shad shI ya zhes par bsgyur bas/_laTal/_shI ya te sogs so/_/ling la/_shI re ta sogs so/_/loT la/_shA ya tAM sogs so/_/lang 
[\[254b.6\]]la/_a shI ya ta sogs so/_/lung sogs byings phyed pa rnams kyi par smai pa da rnams sbyor te/_lung la/_pu Sha sogs kyi ts+li ing du bsgyur bas/_a sha da ta/_a sha da tAM/_a sha dan sogs so/_/liT la/_sha shAd/_she da tuH/_she duH/_she di ba/_sha shat+thasogs so/_/
[\[254b.7\]]luT la/_khar la tsa ba 'os da ta ru bsgyur bas/_sha t+tA/_shat+tA rau/_sha t+tA raH/_sha t+tA si sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_/sha d+yA ta/_/sha d+yA stAM/_sha d+yA su:sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_khar la tsa ra 'os da ta ru bsgyur nas drangs/_sha t+s+ya ti/_sha t+s+ya taH/_sha d+s+ya Ti sogs so/_/de bzhin 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]du/_l+r-ing la/_a sha t+s+ya ta/_a sha d+s+ya tAM/_a sha t+s+ya na sogs so/_!_/pha Na 'gro ba la 'o zhes pa par smai ba da can yin pas laT sogs par smai ba da rnams [\[]skye rabs [\]]/_laT la/_pha Na ti sogs so/_/ling la/_pha Ne ta sogs so/_/loT la/_/pha na tu sogs so/_/ling pha a pha Na ta sogs so/_/lung la 
[\[255a.2\]]l+ra la dang po'i iT sbyar bas/_a phA NI ta/_a phA Ni Sh+TAM/_a phA Ni Shu :sogs so/_/pa NAM tsas b+tA nI/_pha Na rnams kyi 'ang bdun rnams kyi'o/_/pha Na la sogs pa rnams kyi nang nas kyang pha Na 'gro ba/_rA dzI/_b+h+rA dzri/_Tu b+h+rA shr-i/_Tu b+h+lA shr-i rnams 'bad ba s+ya mu dang swan sgra ste/_byings bdun 
[\[255a.3\]]po 'di rnams kyi liT ka 'gro ba'i _bad bra dza sogs kyis u ba d+hA 'phel ba/_ming can pha rol la a [\[]b+hA[\]] sa dbyi ba dang e ru bsgyur ba sogs yang na bar bya ste/_pha Na la liT sbyar bas/_pa phA Na/_phe Na tuH/_pha pha Na tuH/_phe NuH/_pa pha NuH/_phe N-i tha/_pa pha Ni tha sogs so/_/luT la wa la dang 
[\[255a.4\]]po'i iT byin bas/_pha ni tA/_pha Ni tA sau/_pha Ni tA raH/_pha Ni tA mi sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_pa N+yA ta/_pha d+yA stAM/_pha N+yA saH:sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_wal dang po'i Nang _iT _a tus _sbyar bas/_us_pha Ni Sh+ya ti/_thal _pha Ni Sh+ya taH/_pha Ni Sh+ya n+ti sogs so/_/
[\[255a.5\]]de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a pha Ni Sh+ya ta/_a pha Ni Sh+ya tAM/_a pha Ni Sh+ya na sogs so/_!_/rA dzri 'bar ba la 'o zhes pa byings gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas laT sogs par smai pa da rnams dang /_a t+ma ne gnyis ka 'jug ste/_laT 'i par smai pa da la/_RA dza ti/_rA dza tiH/_RA dza n+ti sogs 
[\[255a.6\]]so/_/A t+ma ne bar rnams la/_rA dza te/_rA dza n+te sogs so/_/ling gi par smai pa da rnams sbyar bas/_rA dze ta/_rA dzai tAM/_rA dza yuHsogs so/_/A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/_rA dze ta/_rAdze yA tAM/_rA dzai ra na sogs so/_/lo Ta'i bar smai pa da rnams sbyar bas/_rA 
[\[255a.7\]]dza tu/_rA dza tA ta/_rA dza tAM/_rA dza n+tu sogs so/_/A t+ma ne pa da la/_rA dza tAM/_rA dze tAM/_ra dza n+tAM sogs so/_/lang gi par smai pa da rnams sbyar bas/_a rA dza ta/_a rA dza tAM/_a rA dza na sogs so/_/A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/_a rA dza ta/_a rA dze tAM/_a rA dza n+ta sogs so/_/
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]lung gi bar sma ba da rnams la/_a tA dzI ta/_a rA dzi Sh+TAM/_a rA dzi ShuHsogs so/_/A d+ma ne pa da rnams la/_a rA dzi Sh+Ta/_a tA ShA tAM/_a rA dzi Sha ta sogs so/_/liT la/_pha Na rnams kyi 'ang bdun rnams kyi 'os a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba sogs yang na bar bya ste/_bar smai pa da rnams la 
[\[255b.2\]]ra rA dza/_re dza taH/_ra rA dza tuH/_re dzuH/_ra rA dzuHsogs dang /_A d+ma ne pa da rnams sbyar bas/_re dze/_ra rA dze/_re dzU te/_ra rA dzA te/_re dzi re/_ra rA dzi re sogs so/_/lu Ta'i par smai pa da rnams sbyar bas/_rA dzi tA/_rA dzi tA rau/_rA dzi tA 
[\[255b.3\]]raH/_Nel/_rA dzi tA/_a tu sa/[ \[]si[\]] sogs so/_/A t+ma _us _ne pa da rnams la/_rA dzi tA/_rA dzi tA rau/_rA dzi tA ra:/_te _rA dzi tA se sogs so/[ \[]A tI[\] ]so/_smon pa'i ling gi par smai pa da rnams la/_rA dz+yA ta/_rA dz+yA stAM/_rA dz+yA suHsogs dang /_A d+ma ne pa da sbyar bas/
[\[255b.4\]]rA dzi ShI Sh+Ta/_rA dzi bI yA stAM/_rI dzi Sh+yi na sogs/_l+r-i ta tri pa ra smai pa da rnams/_rA dzi Sh+ya ti/_rA dzi Sh+ya taH/_rA dzi Sh+ya n+ti sogs dang /_rA dzi Sh+ya n+ta sogs dang /_A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/_rAdzi Sh+ya te/_rA dzi b+h+ye te/_rA dzi Sh+ya n+te sogs so/_/l+r-ing gi par smai pa da rnams la/_a rA dzi b+h+ya ta/
[\[255b.5\]]a rA dzi Sh+ya tAM/_a rAdzi Sh+ya na sogs dang /_A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/_a rA dzi Sh+ya ta/_a rA Sh+ya ye tAM/_a rA dzi Sh+ya n+ta sogs so/_!_/Tu b+hA shri 'bar ba la'o zhes pa A t+ma ne pa da can yin pas laT sogs A t+ma ne rnams 'jug ste/_byings thams can pa bzhi bo la/_b+h+rA sha/_b+h+lA 
[\[255b.6\]]sha/_/b+h+ra mu sogs kyi mdos/_byed pa po'i don la shab dang Sh+ya na yang na bar byas pas/_laT la/_b+ha sha te sogs sam/_yang na/_b+h+rA sha Sh+Ta sogs so/_/de bzhin du ling la/_b+h+rA she ta sogs sam/_b+h+rA sh+ye ta sogs so/_/loT la/_b+h+rA sha tAM sogs sam/_b+h+rA sh+ya tAM _sogs 
[\[255b.7\]]so/_/lang /_a b+h+rA sha ta sogs sam/_a b+h+rA sh+ya sogs so/_/lung la wa la dang po'i aTi sbyin pas/_a b+h+rA shi Sh+Ta sogs so/_/liT la pha Na sogs kyi mdos a b+h+yas dbyib sogs yang na bar byas pas/_b+h+re she/_bab+h+ra she/_b+h+re shA te/_bab+h+rA shA te/_b+h+re shi re/_ba 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]b+h+rA shi re sogs so/_/luT la iT byin pas/_b+h+rA shi tA sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_/b+h+rA shi ShI Sh+Ta sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_b+h+rA shi Sh+ya te sogs so/_l+r-ing la/_a b+h+ra shi Sh+ya ta sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_b+h+rA shr-i 'bar ba yang cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa dang 
[\[256a.2\]]'dra'o/_!_/swa na sgra la la'o zhes pa byings par smai pa da can yin pas laT sogs pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar bas/_laT la/_swa na ti sogs so/_/ling la/_swa ne ta sogs so/_/loT la/_sra na tu sogs so/_/lang la/_a swa na ta sogs so/_/lung la 'phel ba yang na bar byas/_a 
[\[256a.3\]]swa nI ta/_a swa ni Sh+thaM/_a swa ni ShuHsogs sam/_/a swA nI ta sogs so/_l-iT la/_pha Na sogs kyi a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba sogs yang na bar byas pas/_sa swA na/_swa ne taH/_sa swa na taH/_se nuH/_sa swa nuHsogs so/_/luT la/_wa la dang po'i eT sbyar bas/_swa 
[\[256a.4\]]ni tA sogs dang /_smon pa'i ling la/_/s+yA n+yI ta sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_/swa ni Sh+ya ti sogs so/_/l+r-ing la/_/i swa niSh+yata sogs so/_/gong du'i las kyang swa ni zas la 'o zhes bas/_swa ni'i sngon du bi dang a ba zas kyi don brjod pa na Sha ru 'gyur te/_/bi Sh+wa Na ti mA saM/_zas ma yin 
[\[256a.5\]]nas Sha ru mi 'gyur bas/_bi swa na ti bI NA sogs te/_de bzhin du a wa yang sbyar bar bya'o/_!_/kha nu kun nas rko ba la 'o zhes par smai ba da can yin pas laT sogs par smai pa da rnams sbyar bas/_laT la/_kha na ti sogs so/_/ling la/_kha na ta sogs so/_/sha za bar byed/_loT la/_kha na 
[\[256a.6\]]tu sogs so/_/lang la/_pi wang gi sgra/_a kha na ta sogs so/_/lung la/_'phel ba yang na bar byas bas/_a khA nI ta/_a kA ni Sh+TAM/_a khA ni Shu:sogs so/_/liT la/_ki ta rnams la/_gam ha na/_dza na kha na sogs kyi mdos u pa d+hA'i a dbyi ba sogs 
[\[256a.7\]]kyis bsgrubs pas/_tsa khA tuH/_tsa khA tuH/_tsa kh+nuHsogs so/_/luT la/_wal dang po'i iT byin pas/_kha ni tA sogs so/_ye bi b+hA ShA/_ya la 'dab ka'o/_/byings kha na rko ba/_dza na skye ba/_Sha na kun nas gus pa rnams kyi Ti rkyen ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can ya yig dang po can 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]pha rol la yang a ta du 'gyur te/_smon pa'i ling la/_kha n+yA ta sogs sam/_kha yA ta sogs so/_l+r-iT la/_kha ni Sh+ya ti sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a kha ni Sh+ya ta sogs so/_!_/tsA y-i? mchod pa dang zhi bdag la 'o zhes bdag la 'o zhes pa 'ang par smai pa da can yin pas laT sogs par smai pa da rnams 
[\[256b.2\]]sbyar bas/_laT la/_tsA ya ti sogs so/_/lingal/_tsA ye ta sogs so/_/loT la/_tsA ya tu sogs so/_/lang la/_a tsA ya ta sogs so/_/lung la/_tsA ya spA ya pyA ya sogs kyi lung 'dren gyis iT yang na par byas/_iT ma byin ba'i phyogs la/_/wa? ya? dag gi wal la dbyi 'o zhes ya dbyi ba sogs kyis 
[\[256b.3\]]bsgrus pas/_a tsA yI ta/_a tsA yi Sh+TAM/_a tsA yi ShuHsogs sam/_a tsA sI ta/_a tsa stAM/_a tsA suHsogs so/_/liT la/_tsa tsA ya/_/tsa tsA ya tuH/_tsa tsA yuHsogs so/_/luT la/_iT yang na par byas bas/_tsA yi tA sogs sam/_tsA tA sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling 
[\[256b.4\]]la/_tsA y+yA ta sogs so/_/l+r-iT la iT ster ba dang ya? dbyi ba yang na par byas pas/_tsA yi Sh+ya ti sogs sam/_tsA s+ya ti sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_/l+r-ing la/_a tsA yi Sh+ya ta sogs sam/_a tsA s+ya sogs so/_!_/la Sha mdzes pa la la'o zhes pa yang par smai pa da can yin pas laT sogs 
[\[256b.5\]]par smai pa da rnams 'jug ste/_byings thams cad pa bzhi po rnams la/_b+h+rA sha b+h+rA sha b+h+rA mu sogs kyi mdos sha ba dang sh+ya na yang na bar byas pas/_laT la/_la Sha ti sogs sam/_la Sh+ya ti sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_ling la/_la She ta sogs sam/_la Sh+ye ta sogs so/_/loT la/
[\[256b.6\]]la Sha tu sogs sam/_la Sh+ya tu sogs so/_/lang la/_a la Sha ta sogs sam/_a la Sh+ya ta sogs so/_/lung la/_wal dang po'i aT byin 'phel ba yang na par byas pas/_a lA ShI ta/_a lA Shi ShuHsogs sam/_/a la ShI ta sogs so/_/liT la/_la 
[\[256b.7\]]lA Sha/_le Sha tuH/_le ShuHsogs so/_/luT la wal dang po'i iT byin pas/_la Shi tA sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_la Sh+ya ta sogs so/_/l+r-iT la iT sbyar bas/_la Shi Sh+ya ti sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_/l-ing la/_a la Shi Sh+ya ta sogs so/_/U du pa d+hA yA go 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]ha:/_go ha'i u pa d+hA'i U ta'o/_/rkyen a tsa dang po can pha rol la go ha ste/_go hu kun nas sgrib pa'i u pa d+hA'i u yig ni U ta ste U ring por 'gyur te/_!_/gu hU gnyis ka'i chig can yin pas/_laTa'i par smi pa da la/_/gU ha ti sogs dang /_A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/_gU ha te 
[\[257a.2\]]sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_/lang gi par smai rnams la/_gU he ta sogs dang /_A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/_/gU te ta sogs so/_/loTa'i par smai rnams la/_gU ha sogs dang /_a t+ma ne rnams la/_gU ta tAM sogs so/_/lung la/_Uta 'gro ba sogs kyi iT yang na bar byed de/_iT 
[\[257a.3\]]byin pa'i phyogs la go ha'i zhes pa'i mdos u pa d+hA ring po byed de/_eT byin pa'i phyogs kyi pa ra smai rnams la/_a gU hI ta/_a gU hI Sh+TAM/_a bU hi ShuHsogs dang /_A t+ma ne rnams la/_agU hi Sh+Ta/_a gU hi Sha tAM/_gU ha tAM sogs so/_/i Ta med pa'i phyogs la i ka u ba ng+hA sha la iT 
[\[257a.4\]]med pa sogs kyis tsI k+sa ru bsgyur/_ha'i D+nya 'os/_ha D+ha/_a tsa gcig pa'i ba sha'i b+ha Sha dz+ha Sha mtha'i sa d+h+wa dag la'o zhes pa'i mdos gag+ha/_sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka 'os T+haka_/kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis Sha ra bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a g+hu k+Sha ta/_a g+hu k+Sha tAM/_a 
[\[257a.5\]]g+hu k+Sha sogs dang /_iT med pa'i phyogs kyi A t+ma ne ba da la/_lu gwA du ha di ha li ha gu hAM A t+ma ne pa de n+t+ye/_du ha _di ha _li ha _gu ha rnams kyi A t+ma ne ba da so la gnas pa las yang na 'jig go/_/du ha 'jog _di ha nye bar gsog pa/_li ha ro myang ba/_gu hU kun nas sgrib pa rnams la ba 
[\[257a.6\]]rol gyi tsI bsgyur ba'i k+sa ni rnam dbye A t+ma ne pa da so la gnas pa 'am so las skyes pa'i yi ge dang po can pha rol la yang na 'jig ste/_k+sa mi 'jig pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_a g+hu k+Sha ta/_k+sa 'jig pa'i phyogs la/_ha'i D+ha 'os da ha D+ha/_d+ha min pa sogs kyis ta b+ha/
[\[257a.7\]]Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os/_d+ha D+ha D+ha'i D+hal dbyi 'os/_D+ha gong ma phyis/_D+h+ra ru phyis _l-i du la sa rnams so la gnas zhes pas/_ba la snga ma'i a Na gyi ring po'o zhes pa'i mdos U ring por bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a gU D+ha/_k+si s+yA tsi/_k+sa'i a tsa la'o/_/li ha sogs las pha rol 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]gyi ts+la'i 'gyur ba'i k+sa'i mtha' rnam dbye A t+ma ne pa da a tsa dang po can rnams pha rol la dbyi ste/_skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_a g+hu k+ShA tAM/_a g+hu k+Sha ta/_yang 'grel bar a tsa dang po yin kyang mang tshig la kra'i mtha' 'ga' zhig dbyi bar mi 'dod do zhes bshad pas/_a g+hu k+Sha n+ta 
[\[257b.2\]]lta bu'o/_/cho ga de rnams dang 'dra bar byas pas/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a gU D+hAH/_a g+hu k+Sha thAH/_a g+hu k+ShA thAM/_a g+hu_a tsa gcig pa'i ba sha'i sogs kyis ga g+har bsgyur ba'o/_D+h+waM/_a g+hu d+haM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a g+hu k+Shi/_a g+hu k+ShA ba hi/_a g+hu k+ShA ma hi/_li Ta'i 
[\[257b.3\]]bar smai pa da rnams la/_dzu gU ha/_dzu gU ha tuH/_dzu g+hu huH/_dzu gU hi tha/_dzu gU D+ha _shras_sogs dang /_A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/_dzu gU hA te/_dzu gU hi re/_dzu gU Sh+She sogs so/_/luT la iT yang na bar byas pas/_gU hi tA/_gA hi tA rau/_gU 
[\[257b.4\]]hi tA ra:/_gU hi si sogs sam/_gU D+hA/_gU D+hA rau/_gU D+hA raH/_thal/_gU D+hA si sogs so/_/A t+ma ne la yang /_bU hi tA/_gU hi tA rau/_gU hi tAraH/_gU hi tA si sogs sam/_gU D+hA/_gU ng+hA rau/_g+hu D+haraH/_gU D+hA se sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling gi par smai pa da rnams la/
[\[257b.5\]]gu h+yA ta/_guh+yA stA/_gu h+yA su \u0f7f sogs dang /_A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/_U ta 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na par byas pas/_gU hi D+ti Sh+Ta/_gU hi ShI yA staM/_gU hi ShI ra na sogs sam/_g+tu k+Sh+yi Sh+Ta/_gU k+ShI yA staM/_k+ShI ran sogs so/_/l+r-iT la yang iT yang na bar byas pas par smai pa da 
[\[257b.6\]]rnams la/_gU hi Sh+yi ti/_gU hi Sh+ya taH/_gU hi Sh+ya n+ti sogs sam/_g+tu k+Sh+ya ti/_g+tu k+Sh+ya taH/_g+hu k+Sh+ya n+ti sogs so/_A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/_gU hi Sh+ya te/_gU hi Sh+ye te/_gU hi Sh+ya n+te sogs sam/_g+hu k+Sh+ya te/_g+hu k+Sh+ya te/_g+hu k+Sh+ya n+ti sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi par smai pa da rnams la/_a gU 
[\[257b.7\]]hi Sh+yata/_a gU hi Sh+ya tAM/_a gU hi Sh+ya na sogs sam/_a g+hu k+Sh+ya ta/_a g+hu k+Sh+ya tAM/_a g+hu k+Sh+ya na sogs so/_/A t+ma ne rnams la/_a gU hi Sh+ya ta/_a gU hi Sh+ye tAM/_a gU hi Sh+ya n+ta sogs sam/_a g+hu k+Sh+ya ta/_a g+hu k+Sh+ye tAM/_a g+hu k+Sh+ya n+ta sogs so+o/_!_/hr-i nya 'phrog pa la 'o zhes pa'ang 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas laT sogs par smai pa da rnams dang /_a t+ma ne pa da rnams gnyis ka 'jug ste/_laTa'i par smai ba da rnams la/_ha ra ti sogs dang /_A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/_har te sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_ling gi par smai pa da rnams la/_ha re ta sogs 
[\[258a.2\]]dang /_A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/_ha re ta sogs so/_/loTa'i pa ra smai pa da rnams la/_/ha ra tu sogs dang /_A t+ma me pa da rnams la/_ha ra tAM sogs so/_/lang gi ba ra smai pa da rnams la/_a ha ra ta sogs dang /_/A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/_a ha ra ta sogs so/_/lung gi pa ra smai pa da rnams 
[\[258a.3\]]la/_si tsa la 'phel ba par smai pa da rnams la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/_a hA r+ShI ta/_a hA r+Sh+TIta/_a hA r+Shu:/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a hA r+ShI:/_a hA r+Sh+Ta/_a hA r+Sh+TA/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a hA r+ShaM/_a hA r+ShA/_a ha r+Sh+ma/_u sh+tsa/_r-i las kyang ngo /_/byings r-i mtha' 
[\[258a.4\]]las pha rol gyi iT med pa'i ts+li bsgyur ba'i si tsa rnam dbye A t+ma ne pa nga pha rol can dang /_smon pa'i ling A t+ma ne rnams kyang ka 'gro ba'i ming can zhes brda chad byed de dgos pa ni 'phel ba dang yon tan mi byed pa'i don te/_hr-i nya la lung A t+ma ne rnams spyar bas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a hr-i ta/
[\[258a.5\]]a hr-i ShA tAM/_a hr-i Sha ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a hri TA:/_a hr-i ShA thAM/_a hr-i d+h+raM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a hr-i Shi/_a hr-i Sha hi/_a hr-i Sh+ma hi/_liT la/_a b+h+yA sa med pa sogs kyis/_gzugs thung ngu las so zhes pas/_dz+ha la dang po can rnams la si tsa 'jig go/_byings 
[\[258a.6\]]gnyis brjod/_r-i a ta 'os r-i a/_ku ha ngag gi tsu 'os/_ha dz+ha/_a b+h+yA sa'i tsa ra 'ang ngos/_dz+ha dzar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_dza hA ri/_dza hra ru:/_dza hU:/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_dza ha cwa/_dza nya thu:/_dza hra/_skyes bu 
[\[258a.7\]]phyi ma gsum la/_dza hA ra/_dza ha ra/_dza ha ri ba/_dza ha ri ma/_de bzhin du/_A t+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_dza hre/_dza hrA te/_dza hri re/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_dza hA ri She/_dza hrA the/_dza ha ri d+h+we/_dza ha'i D+h+we/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_dza hre/_dza ha ri ba he/_dza 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]ha ri ma he/_luT la/_byings thams cad pa dang byings byed pa dag gi 'os yon tan byas pas/_par smai pa da rnams la/_ha rtA/_ha tAM rau/_ha rtA raH/_ha rtA si sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/_ha rtA/_ha rtA rau/_ha rtA pa:/_ha rtA se sogs dang /_smon pa'i ling gi par smai pa da rnams 
[\[258b.2\]]la/_sha ya ka_/ling rnams la ring 'os r-i ring du bsgyur bas/_hr-i yA ta/_hr-i yA stAM/_hri yA suHsogs dang /_A t+ma na pa da rnams la/_r-i las kyang ngos/_ki ta yin pa sa yon tan sogs mi byed de/_hri ShI Sh+Ta/_hri ShI yA stAM/_hri ShI ra na sogs so/_/l+r-iT dang l+r-ing la/_r-i ta ha na 
[\[258b.3\]]dag gi s+ya la'o zhes pa'i mdos iT sbyor te/_l+r-iTa'i bar smai pa da la/_ha ri Sh+yati sogs dang /_/A t+ma ne pa da la/_ha ri Sh+ya te sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_/l+r-ing gi par smai ba da la/_a ha ri Sh+ya ri ta sogs dang /_A t+ma ne pa da la/_a ha ri Sh+ya ta sogs so/_!_/b+h+r-i nya 'gengs pa la 'o zhes pa'ang gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas laTa'i 
[\[258b.4\]]pa ra smai pa da la/_b+ha ra ti sogs dang /_A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/_b+ha ra te sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_ling gi a tang la/_b+ha re ta sogs dang /_tang la/_b+ha re ta sogs so/_/loTa'i a ta nga la/_b+ha ra tu sogs dang /_tang la/_b+ha ra tAM sogs so/_/lang gi a ta nga la/_a 
[\[258b.5\]]b+ha ra ta sogs dang /_tang la/_a b+har ta sogs so/_/lung gi a tang la/_/si tsa la 'phel ba zhes sogs kyi mdos 'phel ba byas pas/_/a b+ha r+Sh+Ti ta/_a b+har+Sh+TAM/_a b+hA r+Shu:sogs dang /_/lung gi tang la/_r-i las kyang ngos/_ki ta yin pas yon tan mi byed/_gzugs thung ngu 
[\[258b.6\]]las so zhes pa'i mdos rnams dbye dz+hal dang po rnams la si tsa dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a b+h+r-i ta/_a b+h+r-i ShA tAM/_a b+h+r-i Sha ta sogs so/_/liT la/_kr-i sraM b+h+r-i sogs kyi wa la dang po rnams la iT mi 'jug ste/_a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ba b+hA ra/_ba b+h+ra tuH/_ba 
[\[258b.7\]]d+h+ruH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ba b+ha r+b+ba/_ba b+h+ra thuH/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_bab+hA ra/_bab+ha ra/_ba b+h+r-i ba/_/ba b+h-i ma/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ba b+h+re/_ba b+h+ra te/_ba b+hi re/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ba b+h+r-i She/_ba b+h+r-I She/_ba b+h+r-i D+h+we/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]la/_ba b+h+re/_ba b+h-i ba he/_bab+h+r-i ba he/_luT la 'grel par iT yang na bar bshad pas/_/a tang la/_/b+ha ri tA/_b+ha ri tA si sogs sam/_b+ha rtA/_b+ha rtA so sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_ta ra la/_b+ha ri tA/_b+ha ri tA se sogs sam/_b+ha rtA se sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/_sha sha 
[\[259a.2\]]ya ka ling rnams la ring 'os r-i ring du bsgyur bas/_b+h+rI yA ta sogs dang /_tang /_r-i las kyang ngos ki ta yin pas yon tan sogs mi byed de/_b+h-i ShI Sh+Ta sogs so/_/l+r-iT dang l+r-ing la/_/r-i ta ha na dag gi s+ya la 'os/_aT byin pas/_l+r-iTa'i a tang la/_/b+ha ri Sh+ya ti sogs dang /_ta ba la/_b+ha ri Sh+ya 
[\[259a.3\]]te sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi a tang la/_i b+ha ri Sh+ya ta sogs dang /_tang la/_a b+ha ri Sh+ya ta sogs so/_!_/dA na kun nas 'gems pa la'o zhes pa la/_/mA na ba ng+ha dA na sogs kyi san dang san la a ta kyi 'os/_a b+h+yA sa i ta mA na ba d+ha dA na sogs kyi I ta du bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs 
[\[259a.4\]]pas/_bI dA m+sa zhes grub pa la/_laT sogs A t+ma ne pa da rnams sbyor te/_byis nyid gnyis ka'i tshig can yin kyang san mtha' la tar rnams 'gyur zhes bshad de/_laTal/_dI dA n+sa te sogs so/_/ling la/_dI dA n+sa tI sogs so/_/loT la/_dA dA n+sa tI sogs so/_/lang la/_a 
[\[259a.5\]]dI dA n+sa ta sogs so/_/lung la/_wa la dang po'i iT dang aT kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/_a dI dA nI Sh+Ta sogs so/_/liT la/_kAs sogs kyis A ma sbyar bas/_dI dA n+sI tsa kre/_dI dA n+saM b+hA ba/_dI dA n+sa mA sa sogs so/_/luT la yang iT byin pas/_dI dA n+si tA sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_/dI dA n+si 
[\[259a.6\]]ShI Sh+Ta sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_dI dA n+si Sh+ya te sogs so/_/l+r-ing la/_a dI rA n+si Sh+ya ta sogs so/_!_/shA na rno ba la 'o zhes pa la yang san sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_shI shA n+sa te sogs cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa dA na gyi skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra'o/_!_/b+ha dza bsten pa la 'o zhes 
[\[259a.7\]]pa gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas laT sogs pa ra smai pa da rnams dang A t+ma ne ba da rnams gnyis ka 'jug ste/_laTa'i a teng la/_b+ha dza ti sogs dang /_tang la/_/b+ha dza te sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_ling gi a tang la/_b+ha dze ta sogs dang /_/tang la/_b+ha dze ta sogs so/_/loTa'i a tang la/
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]b+ha dza tu sogs dang /_tang la/_b+ha dza tAM sogs so/_/lang gi a tang la/_a b+ha dza ta sogs dang /_tang la/_a b+ha dza ta sogs so/_/lung la tsu'i ku 'os/_dza ga/_/khang la tsa ra 'os/_ga ka_/dz+ha la las dz+ha la la 'os rnam dbye dz+ha la dang po rnams la si tsa 'jig_/dz+ha 'am yin pa rnams la kun nas bsgyur pa sogs kyis 
[\[259b.2\]]sa Sha ra bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs bas/_a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a b+ha k+ShI ta/_a b+hA k+tAM/_ab+hA k+ShuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a b+hA k+ShIH/_ab+hAk+ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/a b+hAk+ShaM/_a b+hA k+Sha/_a b+hAk+Sh+ma/_de bzhin du/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a b+hA k+Sha ab+hA k+ShA 
[\[259b.3\]]tAM/_a b+hAk+Sha ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a b+hA k+ShaH/_a b+hA k+ShA thAM/_rang b+h+ra sogs kyi 'phel ba/_a b+hA k+ShaM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a b+hA k+Shi/_a b+hA k+Sha hi/_a b+hA k+Sh+ma hi/_liT la/_byings gnyis brjod ki ta rnams la/_trI phal b+ha dza tra pa las kyang ngos/_a b+h+yas dbyib dang er bsgyur ba sogs kyis 
[\[259b.4\]]bsgrubs pas/_a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_bab+hA dza/_b+hadza tuH/_b+he dzaH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_b+he dzi tha/_b+ha b+ha k+ja/_b+he dza thuH/_b+he dza/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_bab+hA dza/_ba b+ha dza/_b+he dzi ba/_b+ho dzi ma/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_b+he dze/_b+he dzA te/_b+he dzi re/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum 
[\[259b.5\]]la/_b+he dzi She/_b+he dzA+e the/_b+he dzi ng+h+we/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_b+he dze/_b+he dza ba he/_b+he dzim he/_luT la/_tsu'i ku 'os/_dza ga/_/khar la tsar 'os/_ga kar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a tang la/_b+ha k+tA/_b+ha k+tA si sogs dang /_/tang la/_b+ha k+tA/_g+ha k+tA se sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling gi a 
[\[259b.6\]]tang la/_b+ha dz+yA ta/_b+ha dz+yA s+t+raM/_b+ha dz+yA su:sogs dang /_/tang la/_ci'i ku 'os/_dza ga_/khar la tsar 'os/_ga ka_/kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha ra bsgyur pas/_b+ha k+ShI Sh+Ta/_b+ha k+ShI yA stAM/_b+ha k+ShI ra na sogs so/_/l+r-iT la 'ang bshad ma thag pa'i cho ga dang mthun par bsgrubs pas/_a tang la/_b+ha k+Sh+ya ti 
[\[259b.7\]]sogs dang /_tang la/_b+ha k+Sh+ya te sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi a tang la/_a b+ha k+Sh+ya ta sogs dang /_/tang la/_a b+ha k+Sh+ya ta sogs dang /_tang la/_A b+hak+Sh+ya ta sogs dang /_!_/shri nya bsten pa la lo zhes pa 'ang gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas laT sogs pa ra smai pa dang A t+ma ne pa da gnyis ka 'jug ste/_laTa'i a tang la/_shra ya ti sogs 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]dang /_tang la/_shra ya te sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_ling gi a tang la/_shra ye ta sogs dang /_/tang la/_shra ye ta sogs so/_/loTa'i a tang la/_shra ya tu sogs dang /_/tang la/_shra ya tAM sogs so/_/lang gi a tang la/_a shra ya ta sogs dang /_tang la/_a shra ya ta sogs so/_/
[\[260a.2\]]lung la/_Ni shr-i dru sogs kyis ts+li tsang du bsgyur/_tsang la 'os/_byings gnyis brjod/_dang po'i hal lhag po 'os/_ra phyis/_a tsa la byings sh+nu sogs kyi i ya sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_/a tang la/_/a shi shri ya tAM/_a shi shri yan sogs dang /_/tang la/_a shi shri ya ta/_a shi shri ya 
[\[260a.3\]]tAM/_a shi shri ya n+ta sogs so/_/liT la 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can ma yin pa rnams la/_swa ny+dza las brtsegs pa la liTa'i ki ta yang na'o zhes pas lung 'dren gyi kita kyi brda chad yang na bar byas pas/_kita kyi phyogs la i ya dang kita ma yin pa'i phyogs la yon tan byed de/_a tang gi skyes bu dang po 
[\[260a.4\]]gsum la/_shi shA ya/_shi shri ya tu:/_shi shri yu:/_shi shra yu \u0f7f/_shi shri yuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_shi shra yi tha/_shi shra ya thuH/_shi shri ya thuH/_shi shri ya/_shi shri ya/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_shi shrA ya/_shu shra ya/_shi shri yi ba/_shi shri yi ba/_/shi shra yi ma/_shi shri yi ma/_shi shri yi ma/_de bzhin 
[\[260a.5\]]du/_tang la yang /_shi shA ye/_shi shri ye/_shi shri yA te/_shi shri yA te sogs so/_/luT la wal dang po'i iT byin/_byings thams cad ba sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_a tang la/_shra yi tA/_shra yi tA si sogs dang /_tang la/_shra yi tA/_shra yi tA se sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/
[\[260a.6\]]kr-i ta ma yin pa sogs/_ta_kyis _te_ring po byas _a tA_bas/_shrI yAta/_shI yA stAM/_shrI yA suHsogs dang /_tang la iT byin pas/_shra yi ShA Sh+Ta/_shra yi ShI yA stAM/_shra yi ShI ra na sogs so/_/w-iT la 'ang iT byin nas yon tan byas pas/_a tang la/_shra yi Sh+ya ti sogs dang /_tang la/_shra 
[\[260a.7\]]yi Sh+ya te sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi a tang la/_a shra yi Sh+yata sogs dang /_tang la/_a shra yi Sh+ya ta sogs so/_!_/ra ny+dza tshos la'o zhes pa'ang gnyis ka'i tshig can yin bas laT sogs pa ra smai ba da rnams dang A t+ma ne pa da gnyis ka 'jug go/_/rA ny+dze sh+tsa/_rany+dzi'i 'ang ngo /_rany+dza'i 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]na yang byed pa po'i don gyi sha pa pha rol la dbyi ste/_na phyis pas/_laTa'i a tang la/_ra dza ti sogs dang /_tang la/_ra dza te sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_ling gi a tang la/_ra dze ta sogs dang /_tang la/_ra dze ta sogs so/_/loTa'i a tang la/_ra dza tu sogs 
[\[260b.2\]]dang /_tang la/_ra dza tAM sogs so/_/lang gi a tang la/_/a ra dza ta sogs dang /_tang la/_a ra dza ta sogs so/_/lung la/_tsu'i ku 'os/_dza ga_/kha ra la tsa ra 'os/_ga ka/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha dang rnam dbye dz+hal dang po rnams la/_dz+hal 
[\[260b.3\]]las dz+ha la la 'os/_si tsa dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a tang la/_bad b+h+ra dza sogs kyis 'phel ba'ang bya ste/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a rAM k+ShI ta/_a rAM k+ShI ta/_a rAM k+ShuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a rAM k+ShIH/_a rAM k+taM/_a rAM k+ta/_skyes bu 
[\[260b.4\]]phyi ma gsum la/_a rAM k+ShAM/_a rAM k+tsa/_a rI k+ShA/_de bzhin du tang la/_a raM k+ta/_a raM k+ShA tAM/_a rAM k+Sha ta sogs so/_/liTa'i 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can ma yin pa rnams la/_swa ny+dza sogs kyis na dbyi ba yang na bar byed de/_a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum 
[\[260b.5\]]ra ra ny+dza/_ra ra ny+dza tuH/_ra ra dza tuH/_ri ra ny+dzaH/_ra ra dzuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ra ra ny+dzi tha/_ra raM k+tha/_ra ra ny+dza thuH/_ra ra dza thuH/_ra ra ny+dza/_ra ra dza/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ra ra ny+dza/_ra ra ny+dzi ba/_ra ra dzi ba/_ra ra ny+dzi ma/_ra ra dzi ma/_de bzhin 
[\[260b.6\]]du/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_/ra ra ny+dze/_ra ra dze/_ra ra ny+dzA te/_ra ra dzA ta/_ra ra ny+dzi re/_ra ra dzi re/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ra ra ny+dzi She/_ra ra dzi She/_ra ra ny+dza the/_ra ra dzA the/_ra ra ny+dzi d+h+we/_ra ra dzi D+h+we/_ra ra dzi d+h+re/_ra ra dzi d+h+re/_skyes bu phyi ma 
[\[260b.7\]]gsum la/_ra ra ny+dze/_ra ra dze/_ra ra ny+dzi ba he/_ra ra dzi ba he/_ra rany+dzi ma he/_ra ra dzi ma he/_luT la/_tsu'i ku dang khar la tsar byas pas/_a tang la/_raM k+tA/_raM k+tA si sogs dang /_tang la/_raM k+tA/_raM k+tA se sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/_i ta ma yin pa 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]sogs kyi na phyis bas/_ra dz+yA ta/_ra dz+yA stAM/_ra dz+yA suHsogs dang /_tang la/_tsu'i ku 'o dang /_khar la tsar/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis/_raM k+ShI Sh+Ta/_raM k+ShA yA stAM/_raM k+ShI ra na sogs so/_/l+r-iT la 'ang tsu'i ku sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a tang la/
[\[261a.2\]]raM k+Sh+ya ti sogs dang /_/tang la/_RaM k+Sh+ya te sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi a tang la/_a raM k+Sh+ya ta sogs dang /_tang la/_a raM k+Sh+ya ta sogs so/_!_/twi Sha 'bar la'o zhes pa'ang gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas laT sogs kyi par smai pa da 
[\[261a.3\]]dang /_A t+ma ne pa da gnyis ka 'jug ste/_laTa'i a ta pa la/_twe Sha ti sogs dang /_tang la/_twe Sha te sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_ling la/_twe She ta sogs dang /_tang la/_twe She ta sogs so/_/loTa'i a tang la/_twe Sha tu sogs dang /_tang la/_twe Sha tAM sogs so/_/
[\[261a.4\]]lang gi a tang la/_a twe Sha ta sogs dang /_tang la/_a twe Sha ta sogs so/_/lung la/_sha la u ba d+hA iT med pa lak+sa 'os/_/tsI k+sa ru bsgyur/_ka phyis/_sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka 'os/_Sha ka/_/kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis Sha ra bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/
[\[261a.5\]]a tang la/_a twi k+Sha ta/_a two k+Sha tAM/_a twi k+Sha na sogs dang /_tang la/_a dwi k+Sha ta/_a twi k+ShA tAM/_a twi k+Sha ta sogs so/_/liT 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can ma yin pa rnams la/_swa ny+dza sogs kyi lung 'dren gyis kita du yang na bar byas/_a tang la/_ti te Sha/_ti twe Sha 
[\[261a.6\]]tuH/_ti twiSha tuH/_ti twe ShaH/_ti t+yi ShuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ti twa Shi tha/_gla'i a tsal 'os ka pyis/_ti twi Shi tha/_ti twek+Sha/_ti twe Sha thuH/_ti twi Sha thuH/_ti twe Sha/_ti twi Sha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ti twe Sha/_ti twe Sha ba/_ti twi Shi ba/_ti twi Shi 
[\[261a.7\]]ma/_ti twi Sham/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ti twa She/_ti twa She/_thal/_ti te ShA te/_ti twe ShA te/_ti twe ShA te/_thal_re/_ti twe Sha ri/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ti twe Shi She/_ti twe Shi She/_ti twe ShA the/_ti twe ShA the/_ti twe ShI ng+hA+e/_ti tri ShI d+h+re/
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ti twe She/_ti twi She/_ti twe Shi ba he/_ti twi Shi ba he/_ti twi Shi ma he/_ti twi Shi ma he/_luT la/_pu ka mtha' sogs kyi yon tan dang /_Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os ta Ta ra bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a tang la/_twe Sh+Da/_twe Sh+TA/_si sogs dang /_tang 
[\[261b.2\]]la/_twe Sh+TA/_de sh+TAr se sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/_twi Sh+yU ta/_Sh+yA stAM/_twi Sh+yA suHsogs dang /_tang la/_sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka 'os/_Sha ka/_/kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/_twi k+ShI thA/_twi k+ShI yA stAM/_twi k+ShI ran sogs 
[\[261b.3\]]so/_/l+r-iT la 'ang Sha ka ra bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/_a tang la/_twe k+Sh+ya ti sogs dang /_tang la/_twe k+Sh+ya te sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi a tang la/_a twe k+Sh+ya ta sogs dang /_/tang la/_atwe k+Sh+ya ta sogs so/_!_/ya dza lha mchod pa dang /_/'grogs bar byed 
[\[261b.4\]]pa dang sbyin pa rnams la'o zhes pa'ang gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas/_a tang dang /_tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/_laTa'i a tang la/_ya dza ti sogs dang /_tang la/_ya dza te sogs so/_/ling gi a tang la/_ya dze ta sogs dang /_tang la/_ya dze ta sogs so/_/loTa'i a tang la/_/ya dza ta sogs 
[\[261b.5\]]dang /_tang la/_ya dza tAM sogs so/_/lang gi a tang la/_a ya dza ta sogs dang /_/tang la a ya dza ta sogs so/_/lung gi dz+hal dang po rnams la/_dz+ha la las dz+hal la 'os/_si tsa phyis/_pra sh+tsa b+h+ra s+ja sogs kyis dza Sha/_Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os ta Tar bsgyur ba sogs dang 
[\[261b.6\]]dz+hal dang po ma yin pa rnams la/_sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka 'os Sha ka/_/kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a yA k+ShI ta/_a yA Sh+TAH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a yA k+ShIH/_a yA Sh+TaM/_a yA Sh+Ta/_skyes 
[\[261b.7\]]bu phyi ma gsum la/_a yA k+ShaM/_a yA k+Sh+wa/_a yA k+Sh+ma/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a ya Sh+Ta/_a ya k+ShA tAM/_a ya k+Sha ta/_bad b+ha dza sogs kyis 'phel ba/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a ya Sh+ThA:/_a ya k+ShA thAM/_dz+ha la las zhes pas [\[]si tsa[\]]phyis mtha'i dz+hal 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]rnams kyi dza sha 'os Sha D+wa Sha Tu la Sha cu 'os ng+ha T+ha/_a ya D+D+haM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a ya k+Shi/_a ya k+Sha hi/_li T+ya b+h+yas s+yo b+ha ye ShAM/_liT la gnyis rnams kyi a b+h+ya sa'i 'o/_/liT pha rol la gnyis rnams te ba tsa la sogs pa rnams dang /
[\[262a.2\]]gra ha la sogs pa rnams kyis a b+h+yA sa'i saM pra sA ra Nar 'gyur te/_ya dza ba tsa sogs kyi nang tshan yin pas/_liTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_i yA dza/_ba tsi sra pi ya dzA dI nI ki ti/_ba tsi swa pi/_ya dza la sogs pa rnams kyi ki ta la'o/_/ba tsa 'chang pa/
[\[262a.3\]]nyi Sh+wa pa nyal ba gnyis dang ya dza la la sogs pa rnams kyi ka 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la a b+h+yA sa yod na gnyis ka dang a b+h+yA sa med kyang ya Na'i yi ge rnams saM pra sA ra Nar 'gyur te/_liTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_I dza tunaH/_I dzuH/_skyes 
[\[262a.4\]]bu dbus ma gsum la/_i ya dzi tha/_i ya Sh+Tha/_I dza thu:/_i dza/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_i yA dza/_i ya dza/_I dzi ba/_I dzi ma/_de bzhin du/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_I dze/_I dzA te/_I dzi re/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_I 
[\[262a.5\]]dzi Shi/_I dzA the/_I dzi ng+h+we/_I _bra sh+tsa b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis dza Sha Sha Tul Sha [\[]Tu[\]] 'os tha Tha/_dzi D+h+we/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_I dze/_I dzi ba he/_I dzi ma he/_luT la/_bra sh+tsa b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis dza Sha/_Sha Tu la Sha Tu sogs kyi a tang la/_ya Sh+TA/_ya Sh+TA si sogs 
[\[262a.6\]]dang /_tang la/_ya Sh+Ta/_ya Sh+TA se sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling gi a_tang la/_ba tsi swa pi ya dza la sogs pa rnams kyi kita la 'os saM pra sA ra Na ra bsgyur bas/_i dz+yA ta/_i dz+yA stAM/_i dz+yA suHsogs dang /_tang la/_bra sh+tsa b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis dza Sha/_sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka 'os/
[\[262a.7\]]Sha ka/_/kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis ya k+ShI Sh+Ta/_ya k+ShI yA stAM/_ya k+ShI ra na sogs so/_/l+r-iT la 'ang dza Sha ra bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a tang la/_ya k+Sh+ya ti sogs dang /_tang la/_ya k+Sh+ya te sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi a tang la/_a ya k+Sha ta sogs 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]dang /_tang la/_a k+Sh+ya ta sogs so/_!_/Tu ba pa sa bon 'debs pa la'o zhes pa la yang a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/_laTa'i a tang la/_ba pa ti sogs dang /_tang la/_pa pa te sogs so/_/ling gi a tang la/_ba pe ta sogs dang /_tang la/_ba pe ta sogs so/
[\[262b.2\]]loTa'i a tang la/_pa pa tu sogs dang /_tang la/_pa pa tAM sogs so/_/lang gi a tang la/_a ba pa ta sogs dang /_tang la/_a ba pa ta sogs so/_/lung la dz+ha la dang po can rnams la/_dz+hal las dz+hal la 'os si tsi dbyi pa sogs byas pas/_a tang gi skyes bu dang po 
[\[262b.3\]]gsum la/_a bab+sI ta/_a pa p+tAM/_a ba p+suH_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a ba p+sIH/_a ba p+taM/_a ba p+ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a ba p+saM/_a ba p+sA/_a pa p+sa/_de bzhin du/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a ba b+ta/_a ba b+sA thAM/_a pa p+sa ta/_skyes bu 
[\[262b.4\]]dbus ma gsum la/_a ba p+thAH/_a ba p+sA thaM/_a ba [\[]s+t+waM[\]]/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a ba p+si/_a ba p+s+wa hi/_a ba p+s+wa hi/_liT la ki ta ma yin pa rnams la/_liT la gnyis rnams kyi a b+h+yA sa'i 'os/_a b+h+yA sa saM pra sA ra Na ra bsgyur ba dang /_kita rnams la ba tsi/_swa bi/
[\[262b.5\]]ya dza sogs kyi mdos gnyis ka saM pra sA ra Na ra bsgyur nas/_dz+hal las dz+hal 'os si tsa phyis mtha' dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha 'os pa ba/_a ka 'dra ba la ring po sogs byas pas/_a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_u pA pa/_U pa tuH/_U puH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_u ba pi tha/_u 
[\[262b.6\]]ba p+ba/_U pa thuH/_U pa/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_u bA pa/_u ba pa/_U pi ba/_U pi ma/_de bzhin du/_tang rnams la/_U be/_U pA te/_U pi re sogs so/_/luTa'i a tang la/_ba p+tA/_ba p+tA si sogs dang /_tang la/_bap+tA/_pa p+tA se sogs 
[\[262b.7\]]so/_/smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/_ba tsa swa pi ya dza sogs kyis saM pra s+'a ra Na byas pas/_u pyA ta/_u pyA stAM/_u pyA suHsogs dang /_tang la/_ba p+sISh+Ta/_bap+sI yA s+hAM/_bap+sI ra na sogs so/_l+r-iT la'ang ba 'dren pa ma gtogs bya ba gzhan med do/_a tang la/_bap+s+ya 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]ti sogs dang /_tang la/_bap+s+ya te sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi a tang la/_a ba b+s+ya ta sogs da nga /_tang la/_a bap+s+ya ta sogs so/_!_/ba ha thob par byed pa la'o zhes pa la 'ang a tang dang /_tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/_laTa'i a tang la/_ba ha ti 
[\[263a.2\]]sogs dang /_tang la/_ba ha ti sogs so/_/ling gi a tang la/_ba he ta sogs dang /_tang la/_ba he ta sogs so/_/loT la/_ba ha tu sogs dang /_tang la/_ba ha tAM sogs so/_lang gi a tang la/_a ba ha ta sogs dang /_tang la/_a ba 
[\[263a.3\]]ha ta sogs so/_/lung la/_dz+hal dang po can ma yin pa rnams la ha'i D+ha 'os/_ha D+ha/_sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka 'os/_D+haka/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur ba sogs dang /_dz+hal dang po rnams la hra D+ha/_dz+hal las dz+hal la 'os si tsa phyis/_d+hA ma yin pa la sogs kyis ta dang tha dag 
[\[263a.4\]]d+ha/_Sha Tul Sha Tu 'os ng+ha D+ha/_D+ha'i D+hal dbyi 'os D+ha gong ma phyis/_sa ha'i baha dag gi a yig gi o ta 'os/_a o ta du bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a [\[]l+TA[\]]k+ShI ta/_a bo D+hAM/_a bo D+haM/_a wA k+ShuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a wA k+ShIH/
[\[263a.5\]]a bo D+haM/_a bo D+ha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a wA k+ShaM/_a wA k+Sh+ma/_a wA k+Sh+ma/_de bzhin du/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a bo D+ha/_a wa k+ShA tAM/_a ba k+Sha ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum _bar [\[]b+h+ra[\]] dza sogs kyis 'phel ba/_la/_a bo D+hAH/_a ba k+ShA thAM/_a bo D+haM/_skyes bu phyi ma 
[\[263a.6\]]gsum la/_a bak+Shi/_a ba k+ShA hi/_a ba k+Sh+ma hi/_liT la kita min pa rnams la/_liT la gnyis rnams kyi sogs kyi mdos a b+h+yAs/_saM pra sA ra Na dang /_kita rnams la wa tsa swa pi ya dza sogs kyis gnyis ka saM pra sA ra Na ra 'gyur ba sogs byas pas a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_u bA ha/
[\[263a.7\]]U ha tuH/_UhuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_u ba hi tha/_u bo D+ha/_thal/_U ha thuH/_U ha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_u bA ha/_u ba ha/_U hi ba/_U hi ma/_de bzhin du/_tang la/_U he/_U hA te/_U hi re sogs so/_/luT la/_ha'i D+ha/_d+hA ma yin pa sogs kyis ta d+ha/_Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os/_d+ha D+ha/_D+ha'i D+ha 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]la dbyi 'os D+ha gong ma phyis/_sa hi ba ha sogs kyis o ta du bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a tang la/_bo D+hA/_bo D+hA si sogs dang /_tang la/_bo D+hA/_po D+hA se sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/_ba tsi swa pi ya dza sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Na byas pas/_u h+yA ta/_u h+yA su:sogs dang /_tang 
[\[263b.2\]]la/_ha'i D+ha 'os/_ha D+ha/_/sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka 'os/_D+ha ka/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur ba sogs byis pas/_wa k+ShI Sh+Ta/_wa k+ShI yA stAM/_ba k+ShA ra na sogs so/_/l+r-iT la'ang ha D+ha ra bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a tang la/_wa k+Sh+ya ti/_wa k+Sh+ya taH/_ba k+Sh+ya n+ti sogs dang /_tang la/_ba k+Sh+ya te/
[\[263b.3\]]ba k+Sh+ye ti/_ba k+Sh+ya n+te sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi a tang la/_a ba k+Sh+yu ta/_a ba k+Sh+ya tAM/_a ba k+Sh+ya na sogs dang /_tang la/_a ba k+Sh+ya ta/_a ba k+Sh+ye tAM/_a ba k+Sh+ya n+ta sogs so/_!_/be nya thags 'thag pa la'o zhes pa'ang gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas laT sogs a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/_laTa'i a 
[\[263b.4\]]tang la/_pa ya ti sogs dang /_tang la/_ba ya sogs so/_/ling gi a tang la/_ba ye ta sogs dang /_tang la/_ba ye ta sogs so/_/loTa'i a tang la/_ba ya tu sogs dang /_tang la/_ba ya tAM sogs so/_/lang gi a tang la/_a ba ya ta sogs dang /_tang la/_a ba ya ta sogs so/_/lung 
[\[263b.5\]]gi a tang la/_sha 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis e tsa A ta/_ya ma/_ram/_nam/_A ta rnams kyis ka 'ang ngos/_iT dang sa ka byin pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a bA sI Sh+TAM/_a bA si ShuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a bA sIH/_a bA si Sh+Ta/_skyes 
[\[263b.6\]]bu phyi ma gsum la/_a bA si ShaM/_a bA si ShA/_a bA si Sh+ma/_tang bas 'dren pa ma gtogs bya ba lhag po med de/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a bA sta/_a bA sA tAM/_a bA sa ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a bA s+th+raH/_a bA sA thAM/_a bA sA ng+h+waM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a w+wa si/
[\[263b.7\]]a bA swa hi/_a bA sma hi/_liT la/_be nya ny-id du gnas pa dang /_ba yi ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs gnyis 'byung ste be nya nyid du gnas pa'i phyogs la/_be nyaH/_be nya'i'o/_/gong du liT la gnyis rnams kyi zhes sogs kyis be nyab tsa'i _ng+ha la'ang ros si tsa phyis pa lo/_sogs khongs yin kyang de'i 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]dmigs bsal/_liT pha rol la be nya'i saM pra sAr Na mi phyed de/_be nya la liT sbyar bas/_a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ba bau/_ba btuH/_ba buH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ba bi tha/_ba bA tha/_ba ba thuH/_ba ba/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ba bau/_ba bi ba/_ba bi ma/_tang la'ang 
[\[264a.2\]]iT las kyang Ata kyi dbyi 'os A phyis pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ba be/_ba bA te/_ba bI re/_skyes bu dbus/_Ata las Na la gyi au 'os/_Na la yau/_iT las kyang A ta kyi dbyi 'os/_/A phyis/_ma gsum la/_ba bi She/_ba bA the/_ba bi ng+he/_ba bi D+he/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ba be/_ba bi ba he/_ba bi 
[\[264a.3\]]ma he/_yang phyogs gcig la/_be nyo ba yiH/_nge nya'i wa yi'o/_be nya ni liT pha rol la ba yi zhes par yang na 'gyur te/_liTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_be nya/_wa yi ru bsgyur i brjod pa'i don yin pas phyis/_a b+h+yA sa med pa sogs kyis byings gnyis brjod/_liT la 
[\[264a.4\]]gnyis rnams kyi sogs kyi mdos a b+h+yA sa saM pra sA ra Na ra byas pas/_u bA ya/_gnyis tshig la byings gnyis brjod/_ba tsi swa pi ya dza sogs kyi mdos/_ba gnyis ka saM pra sA ra Na ra bsgyur/_a ka 'dra ba la ring po 'os ring por bsgyur bas/_U ya?/_a tus zhes pa la gra hi dz+yA ba yi bya d+hi ba Sh+Ti bi tsa ti 
[\[264a.5\]]dr-i sh+tsa ti pr-i tsha ti pr-i dz+dza tI nI di ti tsa gra hi dz+yA ba yi byA d+hi/_ba Sh+Ti pi tsa ti br-i sh+tsa ti pr-i tsha ti b+h+r-i dz+ya ti rnams kyi nga 'gro ba la'ang ngo /_/gra ha nye bar len pa/_dz+yA lang tsho nyams pa/_ba yi ste/_be nya snal ma'i rgyud/_bya d+ha ba snun pa/_ba sha mdzes pa'i baSh+Ti/_bi tsir tha dang du 'gyur ba/_bra sh+tsu gcod pa/_prats+tsha shes par 'dod 
[\[264a.6\]]pa/_b+h+ra dz+dza 'tshe pa rnams kyi ya Na so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams ni rkyen ka 'gro ba'i ming can dang /_nga 'gro ba'i ming can rnams pha rol la saM pra sA ra Na ra 'gyur ro/_/li Tib yo yaH/_liT la ba ya'i ya'o/_/ba shad ma thag pa gra hi dz+yA ba yi sogs kyi mdos/_ba ya'i ya yang i ru 'gyur ba thob kyang de'i 
[\[264a.7\]]dmigs bsal/_liT kita pha rol la ba ya'i ya yig ni saM pra sA ra Na ra 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/ba sh+tsA s+yA n+ya ta ra s+yaM ki ta/_ki ta la de'i 'ang wa yang na'o/_/liT kita pa rol la de'i ste wa ya'i ya yig gi saM pra sA ra Nar mi 'gyur bar bshad pa de ni w+ra yig tu yang na 'gyur te/_ya? dang wa yang na bar byas 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]bas/_u ya taH/_U ba tuH/_de bzhin du mang tshig la/_U yuH/_U buH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_u ba yi tha/_U ya thuH/_U ba thuH/_U ya/_U ba/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_u wA ya/_u wa ya/_U yi wa/_U bi ba/_U yi ma/_tang la'ang de 
[\[264b.2\]]bzhin du skyes bu dang po gsum la/_U ye/_U be/_U yA te/_U bA te/_U yi re/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum _a bus _la/_a/_She/_U bi She/_U snga the/_U bA_Nal/_the/_U yi D+he/_U ye D+he/_wa/_U bi d+h+we/_U bi D+h+we/_skyes mo/_bu phyi ma gsum la/_U 
[\[264b.3\]]ye/_U be/_U yi ba hi/_U bi ba hi/_U/_ta/_yi ma hi/_U/_A tAM_bi ma hi/_luT/_dz+ha _la/_sha 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis e tsa A ta du bsgyur ba ma/_thas _gtogs bya ba/_A thAM/_gzhan med pas/_ng+hAM/_a tang la/_d+hAM/_bA tA/_bA tA si sogs dang /_tang la/
[\[264b.4\]]bA _iT/_tA/_bA tA se/_ba ti/_sogs so/_/smon ba'i ling _ma hi/_gi a tang la/_ba tsi swa pi sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Na ra bsgyur/_kr-i ta ma yin pa sogs kyis ring po byas pas/_U yA ta/_U yA stAM/_U yA suHsogs so/_/tang la bya ba gzhan med/_bA sI Sh+Ta/_bA sI yA sdI/_bA sI ran sogs 
[\[264b.5\]]so/_/l+r-iT la'ang e tsa A ta du bsgyur bas a tang la/_wa s+ya ti sogs dang /_tang la/_wA s+ya te sogs so/_tang la/_wA s+ya te sogs so/_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi a tang la/_a pa s+ya ta sogs dang /_tang la/_a ba s+ya ta sogs so/_!_/bye nya kun nas sgrig pa la'o zhes pa'ang gnyis ka'i tshig can te/_laTa'i 
[\[264b.6\]]a tang la/_bya ya ti sogs dang /_tang la/_bya ya te sogs so+o/_/ling gi a tang la/_bya ye ta sogs dang /_tang la/_bya ye ta sogs so/_/loTa'i a tang la/_bya ya tu sogs dang /_tang la/_bya ya tAM sogs so/_/lang gi a tang la/_a bya ya ta sogs dang /_tang la/_a bya ya ta sogs 
[\[264b.7\]]so/_/lung ga a tang la/_yam/_ram/_nam/_A ta rnams kyis ka'ang ngos/_sa ka dang iT byin pas/_a byA sI ta/_a byA si Sh+TAM/_a byA si ShuHsogs dang /_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a byA sta/_a byA sA tAM/_a byA sa ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a byA s+thA/_a 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]byA sA thAM/_a byA d+h+raM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a byA si/_a byA swa hi/_a byA sma hi/_na byo liTi/_byA'i liT la ma yin no/_/bye nya'i e tsa ni liT pha rol la A ta du 'gyur ba ma yin te/_bye nya la liT/_liT la gnyis rnams kyi sogs kyi mdos/_a b+h+yA sa 
[\[265a.2\]]saM pra sA ra Na byas/_a tsa'i _d+ha pha'ang ngos si tsa phyis/_nya Na 'gro ba la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/_bi byA ya/_'grel par lung drangs pa/_bye nyaHki ti'i TisaM bra sA ra NaM bA/_bye nya'i liT ki ta la saM pra sA ra Na yang na'o/_/bye nya'i a b+h+yA sa ra ma zad liT ki ta pha rol la gnyis ka saM pra sA ra Nar 
[\[265a.3\]]yang na bsgyur te/_a b+h+yA sa nyid saM pra sA ra Na byas pa'i phyogs kyi rnam dbye sa a tsa dang po can rnams _Nal_la/_e tsa'i a ya a wa sogs dang /_gnyis ka saM pra sA ra Na'i phyogs la i ka gi a tsa la ya Na byas pas/_skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig gnyis la/_pi bya ya tuH/
[\[265a.4\]]bi bya tuH/_di bya yuH/_bi byuH/_de bzhin du/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_bi bya yi tha/_bi bya yi tha/_bi bya ya thuH/_bi bya thuH/_bi bya ya/_bi bya/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_bi byA ya/_bi bya ya/_bi bya ya/_bi bya yi ba/_bi byi ba/_bi bya yim/_bi byi ma/_de bzhin du/_tang la yang /_bi bya ye/_bi bye/_bi bya yA te/_bi byA te/
[\[265a.5\]]bi bya yi re/_bi byi re sogs so/_/luT la/_shi ta ma _a t+ti a rti byA ya ti rnams kyi iT 'os/_thal la iT yang na bar mi byed/_yin pa sogs kyis e tsa A ta du bsgyur bas/_a tang la/_byA tA/_byA tA si sogs dang /_tang la/_byA tA se sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling gi/_ta/_a tang la/_A tAM/_shi ta 
[\[265a.6\]]ma yin/_d+ha/_ba sogs kyis e tsa A ta/_ba tsi swa pi sogs kyis saM bra sA ra Na dang /_kr-ita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring po byas pas/_bI yA ta/_bI y+wa stAM/_bi yA suHsogs dang /_tang la/_byA sI Sh+Ta/_byA sI yA stAM/_/sogs so/_/l+r-iT la e tsa a ta du bsgyur bas/_a tang la/_byA s+ya ti sogs 
[\[265a.7\]]dang /_tang la/_byA s+ya te sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi a tang la/_a byA s+ya ta sogs dang /_tang la/_a byA s+ya ta sogs so/_!_/hwau nya 'gran pa la ste sgra la yang ngo zhes pa 'ang gnyis ka'i tshig can te/_laTa'i a tang la/_hwa ya ti sogs dang /_tang la/_hwa ya te sogs so/_/ling 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]gi a tang la/_hwa ya ta sogs dang /_tang la/_hwa ye ta sogs so/_/loTa'i a tang la/_hwa ya tu sogs dang /_tang la/_hwa ya tAM sogs so/_/lang gi a tang la/_a hwa ya ta sogs dang /_tang la/_a hwa ya ta sogs so/_/li bi si ci hwa sh+tsa/_li bi si tsi hwA pa sa kyang ngo /_/li ba byug pa/_Shi tsa 'dzag pa/_hwA 'gran 
[\[265b.2\]]pa rnams las kyang ts+li ni ang du 'gyur te/_ts+li ang du bsgyur/_iT ba'ang A ta kyi dbyi 'os a phyis a tang la /_ahwa tAM/_a hwa na sogs so/_/tang la yang na bar byad da/_A t+ma ne pa de Sh+wa n+ya ta ra s+yAM/_A t+ma ne pa da rnams la yang na'o/_/li ba/_Shi tsa/_hwA rnams las A dat+ma ne pa da rnams pha rol la 
[\[265b.3\]]ts+li ang du bsgyur ba dang /_si tsar bsgyur ba yang na bar bya ste/_ts+li ang du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la A phyis bas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a hwa ta/_a hwe tAM/_a hwa n+ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a hwa thAH/_a hwe thAM/_a hwa d+hAM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a hwe/_a hwA ba hi/_a hwA ma hi/
[\[265b.4\]]ts+li si tsa ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_i tsa A ta du bsgyur ba kho na ste/_A hwa sta/_a hwa sA tAM/_a hwa sa ta sogs so/_/a b+h+ya sta s+ya tsa/_a b+h+ya sta'i 'ang ngo /_/liT pha rol la hwa'i a b+h+ya sta'i saM bra sA ra Na ra 'gyur te/_hwA la liT/_a b+h+yA sta ste gnyis ka saM pra sA ra Na byas/_ki ta ma yin pa rnams la 
[\[265b.5\]]'phel ba dang yon tan/_ki ta rnams la/_a tsa la shU byings sogs kyi u pa byas pas/_a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_dzu hA ba/_dzu hu ba tuH/_dzu hu buH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_dzu ha bi tha/_dzu ho tha/_dzu hu ba thuH/_dzu hu ba/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_dzu hA 
[\[265b.6\]]ba/_dzu ha ba/_dzu hu bi ba/_dzu hu bi ma/_de bzhin du/_tang la 'ang dzu hu be/_dzu hu bA te/_dzu hu bi re/_luT la shi ha ma yin pa sogs kyis e tsa A ta du bsgyur bas/_a tang la/_hwA tA/_hwA tA si sogs dang /_tang la/_hwA tA/_hwA tA se sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/_gzhan yang 
[\[265b.7\]]brtsegs pa dang po'i yang na 'os/_e A data du bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/_hwA yA ta/_hwA yAM stAM/_hwA yA suHsogs sam/_/hA+e yA ta/_hwe yA stAM/_hwe yA suHsogs so/_/tang la/_e tsa A ta du bsgyur bas/_hwA sI yA stAM/_hwA si ra na sogs so/_/l+r-iT la 'ang e tsa dra sA ta 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]du bsgyur bas/_a tang la/_hwA s+ya ti sogs dang /_tang la/_hwA s+ya ta sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi a tang la/_a twA s+ya ta sogs dang /_tang la/_a hwA s+ya ta sogs so/_!_/bas nges bar gnas pa la'o zhes pa bar smai pa da can yin pas laT sogs a tang 
[\[266a.2\]]rnams 'jug ste/_laT la/_bas ti sogs so/_/ling la/_ba se ta sogs so/_/loT la/_bas tu sogs so/_/lang la/_a bas ha sogs so/_/sa s+yA r+ng+ha d+hA tu ke/_byings phyed pa las sa'i 'o/_/byings phyed pas yig dang po can pha rol la ba sa'i sa yig ni ta yig tu bsgyur bar bya ste/_was la 
[\[266a.3\]]lung sbyar bas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a wA t+sI ta/_a wA d+tAM/_a bA t+suH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a wA t+sIH/_a bA t+taM/_a bA t+ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a bA t+saM/_a bA d+sA/_a bA d+s+ma shA si ba si g+ha sI nAM tsa/_shA si _ba si _g+ha si rnams kyi 'ang ngo /_/shA su rjes 
[\[266a.4\]]su ston pa/_bas nges par gnas pa/_g+ha sl-i za ba rnams kyi/_bang t+h+ra sogs kyis 'phel ba dz+hal las dz+hal la 'os si tsa phyis/_sa yig ni i Na so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang /_ka yig sngon ma las Sha yig tu 'gyur te/_bas la liT byin/_ki ta ma yin pa rnams la liT la gnyis rnams kyi sogs 
[\[266a.5\]]kyi a b+h+yA sa saM pra sAr Na ra bsgyur ba dang /_kiT rnams la ba tsi sra bi sogs kyis gnyis ka saM pra sA ra Na dang mdo 'dis sa Sha ra bsgyur bas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_u bA sa/_U Sha tuH/_U ShuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_u ba si tha/_a ba s+tha/_U Sha thuH/_U Sha/_skyes bu phyi 
[\[266a.6\]]ma gsum la/_u bA sa/_u bas/_U Shi ba/_U Sham/_luT la bstA/_bsta rau/_bsta rau/_bstaraH/_bstA si sogs dang /_smon pa'i ling la/_btsi sA li sogs kyi saM pra sA ra Na dang /_shI sa/_ba si/_g+ha si sogs kyi sas Sha ra bsgyur bas/_u Sh+yA ta/_u Sh+yA stAM/_U Sh+yA suHsogs so/_/
[\[266a.7\]]l+r-iT la/_byings phyed pa la sa'i 'as sa tar bsgyur bas/_bat+s+ya ti sogs dang /_de bzhin du w-ing li/_a bat+s+ya ta sogs so/_/bdag sa la par brjod pa la'o zhes pa la'ang par smai pa da rnams 'jug ste/_laT la/_bad ti sogs dang /_ling la/_ba da ta sogs so/_/loT 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]la/_bad tu sogs so/_/lang la/_a ba da ta sogs so/_/lung la/_ba la dang po'i iT dang /_bad b+h+ra ja sogs kyi su 'phel ba byas pas/_a bA dI ta/_a bA di Sh+TAM/_a bA di ShaHsogs so/_/liT la/_ki ta ma yin pa rnams la/_liT la gnyis kyi sogs kyis a b+h+ya sa saM pra 
[\[266b.2\]]sA ra Na dang /_gi ta rnams la ba tsi swa bi sogs kyis gnyis ka saM pra sA ra Na ra bsgyur bas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_u bAd/_U da tuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_u ba di tha/_U da thunaH/_U da/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_u bA da/_a ba da/_U dI ba/
[\[266b.3\]]U di ma/_luT la wa la dang po'i iT sbyar bas/_ba di tA/_ba di tA rau/_ba di tA raH/_ba di tA si sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_u d+yA ta/_u d+yA stAM/_u d+yA suHsogs so/_/l-iT la/_-iT byin bas/_ba di Sh+ya ti sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a 'di Sh+ya ta sogs so/_!_/
[\[266b.4\]]Tu o shwi 'gro ba dang 'phel ba dag la'o zhes pa'ang par smai pad can yin pas/_laT sogs a tang rnams 'jug ste/_laT la/_shwa_ba tsi sA bi sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Na ra bsgyur/_ya ti sogs so/_/ling la/_shwa ya tu sogs so/_/loT la/_shwa ya tu sogs so/_/lang la/_a shA ya ta sogs 
[\[266b.5\]]so/_/lung la bsgrub tshul gsum 'byung ste/_dz+w-I sta m+b+mu/_mru tsu/_m+lu tsi sogs kyis ts+li ang du bsgyur ba dang /_/si tsa ru bsgyur ba yang na bar bya ste/_ang gi phyogs la/_shwa yi teraH/_shwa ya ti'i a'o/_/ts+li bsgyur ba'i ang pha rol la shwa ya ti'i i yig ni a yig tu 'gyur te/_a 
[\[266b.6\]]a a ta kyi yin tan la 'os/_gnyis dag gis gcig pha rol gyi gzugs su song /_a shwa ta/_a shwa tAM/_a shwa na sogs so/_/ts+li si tsang bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_wa la dang po'i iT byin pas/_a shwa yI ta/_a shwa yi Sh+DA/_a shwa yi ShuHsogs dang /_yang nad+he Ta shwi dag 
[\[266b.7\]]di 'ad ma ka 'os/_ts+li tsang du bsgyur tsad la 'os/_byings gnyis brjod/_dang po'i ha la lhag po dang /_a tsa la/_sh+du byings sogs kyis u ba tu bsgyur bas/_a shi shwi ya ta/_a shi shwi ya taM/_a shi shwi ya na sogs so/_/bi b+hA ShA shA+eH/_shwi'i gdam nga'o/_/liT pha rol shwi'i sa pra sA ra Na ra bsgyur 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka can du bya ste/_bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_shu shA ba/_shu shu ba tuH/_shu shu buH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_shu sha ba tha/_shu shu ba thuH/_shu shu ba/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_shu shA ba/_shu shu bi ba/_shu shu bi ma/_ma bsgyur ba'i 
[\[267a.2\]]phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_shi shwA ya/_shi shwi ya tuH/_shi shwi _mdo 'dis ba dbyings bcas u ru bsgyur nas/_de nas byings gnyis brjod/_kita man pa rnams la rang bzhin yon tan dang 'phel ba/_kita rnams la a tsal sh+nu sogs kyis u ba/_yuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_shi shwa ya tha/_shi shwi ya thuH/_shi shwi ya 
[\[267a.3\]]skyes bu phyi ma la/_shi shA ya/_shi shwa ya/_shi shwi yib/_shi shwi yim/_l+r-iT la wa la dang po'i iT byin pas/_shwa yi tA/_shwa yi tA sI sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_wa tsi swa pi sogs kyis saM bra sA ra Na byas/_kr-ita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/_shU yA ta/_shU yA stAM/_shU yA suHphyogs 
[\[267a.4\]]so/_/l+r-iT la wa la dang po'i iT byin pas/_shwa yi Sh+ya ti sogs dang /_de bzhin du w-ing la/_a shwa yi Sh+ya ta sogs so/_/i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na sU tra d+d+h+rA da ya s+sa mA b+ta:zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Ni'i mdo las b+h+rU la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so//_//de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen 
[\[267a.5\]]po bA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las/_byed pa po la sha pra 'jug pa'i yul b+hU la sogs pa rnams las/_byings gzhan don gyi tshig can pa ra smai pa da 'jug pa rnams la rnam dbye ba ra smai pa da rnams sbyor 
[\[267a.6\]]tshul dang /_byings bdag don gyi tshig can A t+ma ne pa da 'jug pa rnams la rnam dbye A t+ma ne pa da rnams sbyor tshul/_byings gnyis ka'i tshig can rnams la rnam dbye pa ra smi pa da rnams dang A t+ma ne pa da gnyis ka spyor tshul sogs spyir btang dmigs bas la dang bcas pa rags pa rnams 
[\[267a.7\]]re zhig rdzogs so//_//da ni a da la sogs pa byed pa po'i don gyi sha pa 'jig pa'i bya ba rnams bstan par bya ste/_a di pra b+h+r-i ti b+h+yaHsha paH/_a nga la sogs pa rnams las sha pa kyi'o/_/byings a ta za ba la'o zhes pa la ngo bo'i rkyen i sbyar ba'i a di la sogs pa rnams la byed 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]pa po'i don gyi sha ba 'jig ste/_!_/ad la laT sogs a tang rnams sbyar/_byed pa po la sha pa 'os sha pa sbyin/_mdo 'dis sha pa phyis pa su laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a t+taH/_a da n+ti/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a t+si/_a t+thaH/_a t+tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a d+mi/_a dwaH/_a t+maH/
[\[267b.2\]]ling gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a d+yA da/_a d+yA tAM/_a d+yUnaH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a d+yAH/_a d+yA tAM/_a d+yA ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a d+yAM/_a _khar la tsa ra 'os da ta/_d+yA ba/_a d+yA ma/_loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a t+tu/_a t+tA ta/_a t+tAM/_a da n+du/_skyes bu dbus 
[\[267b.3\]]ma'i gcig tshig la/_hu dz+ha w+h+yo_us la tshig mtha' min pa'i 'os gnyis dag gis gcig pha rol gyi gzugs/_he T+d+hiH/_hu d+hal rnams las hi'i d+hi 'o/_/hu sbyin pa dang byings mtha' dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams las pha rol gyi hi ni d+hi ru 'gyur te/_a d+d+hi/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_a t+taM/_a t+ta/
[\[267b.4\]]skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a dA ni/_a dA ba/_a dA ma/_a daHsarbe ShAM/_A da las thams cad kyi'o/_/Ad las byings thams cad ha la gcig pa a pr-i k+ta'i _a da la/_laT sha pa/_a di sogs kyis sha pa phyis/_la si'i hi ste pa 'gro ba'ang ma yin nos/_si hi ru bsgyur mdo 'dis hi b+hi nga drangs/_ming can de la 
[\[267b.5\]]la mig mi'i ni 'os mi'i phyi ma la A Ta ste pi ta 'ang ngos/[ \[]A [\]]Ta sbyin/_la bas dang mes su bsgyur la nga dang 'dra ba sogs kyi pas phyis/_phyi ma la AT ste'i ta'ang ngos/_AT da drangs/_aT A ga ma ster ba sngon gyi drang srong thams cad 'dod de/_lang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_A da tA/_AT/_skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_A t+tAM/
[\[267b.6\]]A da na/_de bzhin du skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a daH/_A t+tAM/_A t+ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_A daM/_A dA/_A t+ma/_lung sa nor+g+ha sl-i/_lung san dag la g+ha sl-i'o/_/lung dang san dag pha rol la a da ni g+ha sl-i zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/_l-i ni l-i 'gro ba'i don no/_/a g+ha sa ta/_a g+ha sa tAM/_a g+has 
[\[267b.7\]]sogs so/_/li D+ya n+ya ta ra s+yAM/_liT la yang na 'o/_/a ta ni liT pha rol la g+ha sl-ir yang na 'gyur te/_ad g+ha sl-ir bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_byings gnyis brjod/_ku ha dag gi tsu 'os/_g+ha dz+ha a b+h+yA sa'i tsa ra 'ang ngos/_dz+ha dza/_ki ta_pu Sha sogs d+yu ta sogs l-i 'gro ba zhes pas tswi ang du bsgyur ba'o/_/
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]rnams la gam/_ha na/_dzan/_khan g+has rnams sogs kyis u d+hA phyis/_khar la tsa ra 'os g+ha ka _shA si _ba si _g+ha si rnams kyi 'ang ngos/_sa Shar bsgyur ba sogs byas bas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_dza g+hA sa/_dza k+Sha tuH/_dza k+ShuH/_skyes bu dbus ma 
[\[268a.2\]]gsum la/_dza g+ha si tha/_dza k+ShathuH/_dza k+Sha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_dza g+hA sa/_dza g+has/_dzak+Shi ba/_dzak+Shi ma/_g+ha sl-i ra ma bsgyur pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_A da/_A da tuH/_A duH/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_A di tha/_A da thuH/_A da/_skyes bu phyi ma 
[\[268a.3\]]gsum la/_Ad/_A di pa/_A di ma/_luT la khar la tsa ra 'os/_dra tra byas bas/_a t+tA/_a t+tA rau/_a t+tA raH/_a t+tA di sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_a d+yA ta/_a d+yA stAM/_a d+yA suHsogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_ra la tsa ra 'os dra tar bsgyur bas/_a d+s+ya ti/_a d+s+ya taH/_a d+s+ya n+ti sogs 
[\[268a.4\]]dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_A t+s+ya ta/_A t+s+ya tAM/_A d+s+ya na sogs so/_!_/p+sA za ba la'o zhes pa la'ang pa ra smi pa da can yin bas/_laT sogs a tang rnams 'jug la/_a di la sogs pa rnams las sha pa kyi 'os sha pa 'jig ste/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_p+sA yAM/
[\[268a.5\]]p+sA ni/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_b+sA si/_p+sA thaH/_p+sA tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_p+sA mi/_p+sA baH/_p+sA maH/_ling gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_p+sA yA ta/_p+sA yA tAM/_p+sA yuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_p+sA yAH/_p+sA yA taM/_p+sA yA ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_p+sA yAM/
[\[268a.6\]]p+sA ya ba/_p+sA yA ma/_loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_p+sA tu/_p+sA tA ta/_p+sA tAM/_p+sA n+tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_p+sA hi/_p+sA tA ta/_p+sA taM/_p+sA ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_p+sA ni/_p+sA ba/_p+sA ma/_lang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la a b+sA ta a b+sA ta/_a p+sA tAM/_lang shA ka TA ye 
[\[268a.7\]]na s+ya ba/_lang gi shA ka TA ya ma'i nges pa'o/_/A ta mtha' las lang bsgyur ba'i dz+hi ni dzus su 'gyur te/_sngon gyi drang srong shA ka Ta' ya na'i 'dod pa ltar na nges par 'gyur bar bshad de/_p+sA la/_lang la dz+hi ru bsgyur/_shA ka TA ya na'i 'dod pa ltar dzus su bsgyur ba dang /_a n+ta ru bsgyur 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]ba yang na bar byas bas/_a p+suH/_a p+ma na/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a p+sAH/_a p+sA taM/_a p+sA ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a p+sAM/_a p+sA ba/_a p+sA ma/_lung la/_yaM/_raM/_naM/_A ta rnams kyis ka 'ang ngos/_sa ka A gam dang iT byin pas/_skyes bu dang 
[\[268b.2\]]po gsum la/_a p+sA sI ta/_a p+sA si Sh+TAM/_a p+sA saM Shi \u0f7f/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a p+sA sIH/_a b+sA si Sh+TaM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a p+sA si ShaM/_a p+sA si Sh+wa/_a p+sA si Sh+ma/_l-iTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_pa p+sau/_pa p+sa tuH/_ba blaH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/
[\[268b.3\]]pa p+si tha/_pa p+sA tha/_pa p+sa thuH/_pa p+sa/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_pa p+sau/_pa p+si ba/_pa p+si ma/_luT la/_p+sA tA/_p+sA tA rau/_p+sA tA ra:/_p+sA tA si sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_gzhan/_A ta las Nal gyi au 'os Nal au ru sbUr/_iT las khyad AT kyi [\[]dbyi sos A phyis/[\]]brtsegs pa dang po'i 
[\[268b.4\]]yang na 'os/_A e ru bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/_p+sA yA ta/_p+sA yA stAM/_p+sA yA \u0f7fsogs sam/_p+se yA ta/_spe yA staM/_spe yA su \u0f7fsogs so/_/l+r-iTal/_spA s+ya ti/_spA s+ya taH/_spA s+ya n+ti sogs dang /_l+r-ing la/_a spA s+ya ta/_a spA s+ya tAM/_a spA s+ya na 
[\[268b.5\]]sogs so/_!_/ba sha mdzes pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams 'jug cing sha pa 'jig ste/_kita rnams la gra? hi sogs kyi saM pra sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Na dang /_bra sh+tsa b+h+ra rdza sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur bas/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_za sh+tsa sogs kyi Sha bul Sha Tu 'os taT/_ba Sh+Ti/_u Sh+TaH_/u 
[\[268b.6\]]sha n+ti/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ba k+Shi/_bra sha sogs kyi sha Sha/_sa la lha dag gi so gsol/_Sha pha/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis Sha/_u Sh+baH/_u d+tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ba sh+mi/_u shAH/_gra hi dz+yA sogs kyi saM pra sAr Na byas pas ga u sh+yA ta/_u sh+ya tAM/_u sh+ya tAM/_u sh+yu \u0f7f/_bra sh+tsa sogs kyi sha Sha/[ \[]Shab Sha Tu 'os taT khra hi sogs kyi bra sar/[\]]rab bsgyur 
[\[268b.7\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_u sh+yAH/_bra sh+tsa sogs kyi sha Sha TA sogs kyis tha Tha/_gra hi sogs kyi saM pra sAr Na ra bas/_u sh+yA taM/_u sh+yA ta/_/skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_u sh+yAM/_u sh+yA ba/_a sh+yA ma/_loT la'ang kita rnams la gra hi dz+yA sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Na dang /_dz+ha la 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]dang po rnams la bra sh+tsa b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis sha Sha dang /_Sh+Tu la Sha Tu sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ba Sh+tu/_u Sh+TA ta/_u Sh+TaM/_u shan+sha/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_u D+hi/_u Sh+DA ta/_u Sh+Ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_/
[\[269a.2\]]ba shA ni/_ba shA ba/_ba shA ma/_lang gi skyes bu dang po gcig tshig la/_ba shal lang /_la ti/_i ta kyi 'ang nges i phyis/_ha la dA pi sogs kyis ta phyis/_ba sha la hi/_gra hi sogs kyis saM bu sA ra Na pra sh+tsa sogs kyis sha Sha/_hu dz+ha la sogs kyis hi d+hi Sha [\[]Tub[\]]Sha Tu 'os b+ha T+h+wa/_mtha'i dz+ha la sogs kyis Sha Da/_bra sh+tsa 
[\[269a.3\]]sogs _AT/_AT/_kyis sha Sha/_mtha'i dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha 'os/_Sha Da/_gnas med pa la yang na'os/_a baT/_a baT/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_au Sh+TAM/_au sha na/_de bzhin du/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a baDa/_a ba Ta/_au Sh+TaM/_au Sh+Ta/_skyes 
[\[269a.4\]]bu phyi ma gsum la/_a ba shaM/_au shwa/_au sh+ma/_lung la/_ha la dang po yang ba sogs kyis 'phel ba yang na ba dang /_iT sbyar bas/_a bA shIta/_gra he sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Na aca dang po rnams kyi AT 'os/_byings la AT/_AT las kyang ngos 'phel ba/_a bA shi Sh+TaM/_bA shi ShaH/
[\[269a.5\]]sogs sam/_a gA shita sogs so/_/l-iT la kita ma yin pa rnams la/_gnyis rnams sogs kyis a b+h+yAs/_saM bra sA ra Na dang kita rnams la gra ha sogs kyis gnyis ka saM pra sAr Na ra bsgyur/_a ka 'ang ba la ring bo sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/
[\[269a.6\]]u bA sha/_U sha tuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_u ba shi tha/_U sha thuH/_U sha/_/skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_u bA sha/_/u ba sha/_/U shi ba/_U shi ma/_luT la/_ba shi tA/_ba shi tA rau/_ba shi tA raH/_ba shi tA raH/_ba shi tA raH/_ba shi tA si sogs so/_/smon pa'i 
[\[269a.7\]]ling la/_gra ha b+h+yA sogs kyis sa pra sA ra Na byas pas/_u sh+yA ta/_u sh+yA stA/_u sh+ya suH/_u sh+yAH/_u sh+yA staM sogs so/_/l+r-iT las wal dang po'i iT byin pas/_ba shi Sh+ya ti/_ba shi Sh+ya taH/_ba shi Sh+ya n+ti sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a pa shi Sh+ya ta/
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]A ba shi Sh+ya tAM/_a la shi Sha na sogs so/_!_/ta na 'tshe ba dang 'gro ba dag la'o zhes pa la 'ang /_laT sogs par smi pa ra rnams 'jug cing shal kyang 'jig ste/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_ha n+te/_a nu dA t+ho pa de sha ba na ti ta no t+yA dI nA ma nu nA si ka lo pa dz+ha li k+di ti/
[\[269b.2\]]a nu dA t+ta nye ba'i yul ba no ti/_ta no ti la sogs pa rnams kyi rjes su sna ldan dz+ha la kang 'gro ba la dbyi'o/_/a nu dA t+ta nye ba'i yul te/_ya mu nyi bar 'gog pa/_ra mu rtse ba/_na ma rab tu 'dud pa/_ga m+l-i 'gro ba/_ha na 'tsho ba/_ma nu shes pa rnams dang /_ba no ti ste/_ba nu 
[\[269b.3\]]'tshe ba dang /_ta no ti la sogs pa ste/_ta nu rgyas pa/_k+Sha nu 'tshe ba/_r-i nu 'gro ba/_g+h+r-i Nu 'bar ba/_ba nu slong ba/_ma nu rtogs pa rnams kyi rjes su sna ldan gyi yi ge rnams rkyen dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang po can ka dang nga 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste/_ha na 
[\[269b.4\]]la skyes bu dang po gnyis tshig sbyar bas/_ha taH/_mang tshig la/_ga ma _ha na _dza na sogs kyis u pa d+hA phyis/_ha n+ti'i hi ny+Ni ta rnams la 'os/_ha g+har bsgyur bas/_g+hA n+ti/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ha n+si/_ha thaH/_ha za/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/
[\[269b.5\]]ha n+yi/_ha n+baH/_ha n+maH/_ba mo rbA/_tha mo dag la yang na'o/_/nyer bsgyur na Na ra 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can sngon du byung na ha na gyi na yig ni ba yig dang ma yig dag pha rol la Na yig tu yang na 'gyur te/_pra ha n+mi/_pra ha N+mi/_pra ha naH/_pra ha N+baHsogs so/_/ling 
[\[269b.6\]]gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ha n+yA ta/_ha n+yA tAM/_ha n+yAH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ha n+yAH/_ha n+yAte/_ha n+yA ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ha n+yAM/_ha n+yA ba/_ha n+yA ma/_nyer bsgyur rgyu _rab tu mtshe bar byed/_mtshan can sngon du byung na/_ha n+ti'i a ta sngon ma'i 
[\[269b.7\]]'os/_na r+Nar 'gyur te/_pra ha N+ya ta sogs so/_/loT la/_kita rnams la/_a nu dA t+ta nye ba'i yul sogs kyis rjes su sA ldan dbyi ba dang /_a tsa dang po can rnams la/_gam_ha na sogs kyi u pa d+hA dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]po gsum la/_ha n+tu/_ha twA ta/_ha tAM/_g+h+na n+tu/_skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/_ha n+ti rdzaH/_ha n+ti'i dza'o/_/si'i hi ste ba 'gro ba 'ang ma yin no zhes pas loT la si hi ru bsgyur ba'i hi pha rol la ha n+ti'i dza zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/_dza hi ha ha 
[\[270a.2\]]tA ta/_a si ng+d+ha ba da trA shra yi/_'di la gzhi mnyam pa pha ma grub po/_dza hi zhes gzhi mnyam du gnas pa 'di la a ta las hi'i 'o zhes pas hi ra byi bam grub ste/_snga ma ha na zhes na yig gi rgyu mtshan nyid las so/_/gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_ha taM/_ha ta
[\[270a.3\]]skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_phyi ma la AT sta bita 'ang ngos AT sbyin pas/_ha nA ni/_ha nA pa/_ha nA ma/_lang la/_ha la gcig pa rnams/_ha la dI ba sogs kyis dbyi ba dang /_kita dz+hal dang po can rnams la a nu dA t+ta sogs kyis na dbyi/_a tsa dang po can rnams 
[\[270a.4\]]la ga ma ha la sogs kyis u pa ng+hA dbyi ba sogs byas bas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a ha na/_a ha tAM/_a g+h+na na/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a ha ni/_a ha ha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a ha naM/_a han+ba/_lu ngi tsa/_lung la 'ang do/_/lung pha rol la ha na ni ba ng+han ni bang+ha zhes par bsgyur bar 
[\[270a.5\]]bya ste/_ha na la lung /_mdo 'dis ha na bad+ha ru bsgyur/_bal dang po'i iT/_ata kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/_a ba d+hI ta/_a ba d+hi Shu sogs so/_/leT la byings gnyis brjod/_ku ha dag gi tsa 'os ha dz+ha/_a b+h+yA sa'i tsa ra 'ang ngos/_dz+ha dza/_Nal gnyis 
[\[270a.6\]]la/_ha n+ti'i hi ny+Ni ta ni rnams la 'os ha g+ha/_u pa d+hA'i 'ang ngos 'phel ba/_kaM ta rnams la gam han sogs kyis u pa/_rdzes su a phyis ba yin la/_dang po nas ha la mtha' ma yin pas/_pa da sogs kyis 'phel pa 'dir mi byed/_ng+hA phres/_ha n+ti'i hi sogs kyis ha g+har bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/
[\[270a.7\]]g+hAn/_dza g+h+na tuH/_dza g+hUH/_skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/_/a b+h+yA sA ts+tsa/_a b+h+yAs las kyang ngo /_/a b+h+yAs las kyang pha rol gyi ha ni g+ha ru bsgyur te/_dza g+ha ni tha/_dza g+ha n+tha/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_dza g+h+na thuH/_dza g+h+na/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]dza g+nan/_dza g+na na/_dzag+ni ba/_dzag+hi ma/_luT la/_han+tA/_han+tA rau/_han+tAH/_han+dAH/_han+ta si sogs so/_/ha no ba ng+ha li di/_ling la han gyi bang+da'o/_/smon pa'i ling pha rol ma han ni ba ng+ha zhes par sgyur bar bya ste/_han la/_smon ling /_mdo 'dis ba ng+ha rab sgyur/_a ta kyi 
[\[270b.2\]]dbyi 'os a phyi pas/_ba ng+h+yA ta/_sa ng+h+tA staM/_pa ng+h+yA suH sogs so_/l+riT la/_r-i ta han dag gis sa la 'os/_iT byin pas/_ha ni Sh+ya ti/_ha ni Sh+ya taH/_ha ni Sh+ya n+ti sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a ha ni Sh+ya ta/_a ta ni Sh+ya na sogs so/_!/
[\[270b.3\]]d+yu mngon par 'gro ba la 'o zhes par la a tar 'jug cing a'i sogs kyis sha pa kyang 'jig go/_/u to br-ing+hirluki ha wi/_'jig pa ha la la uta kyis 'phel ba'o/_/sha pa 'jig pa lta bu bar rkyen 'jig pa la rkyen hal dang po ba 'gro ma'i ming can pha rol la uta kyi 'phel bar 'gyur te/
[\[270b.4\]]d+yu la luTal sbyar bas/_skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_d+yauti/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_d+yu taH/_d+yu ba n+ti/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_d+yauSha/_d+yu thaH/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_d+yau mi/_d+yo baH/_d+yu ma baH/_ling la bya ba lhag po med de/_d+yu yA ta/_d+yu yA staM/
[\[270b.5\]]d+yu yAHsogs so/_/loT la/_tipa ha la dang po can rnams la 'phel ba dang /_a tsa dang dang po can rnams la/_a tsa la sh+nu byings sogs kyis u bar bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_d+yau tu/_d+yau tA ta/_d+yu tAM/_d+yu ba n+tu/_skyes bu dbus ma 
[\[270b.6\]]gsum la/_d+yu hi/_d+yu tA ta/_d+yu taM/_d+yu ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_d+ya bA ni/_d+ya bA ba/_d+ya bA ma/_de bzhin du lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a d+yau ta/_a d+yu tAM/_a d+yu ba na/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a d+yauH/_a d+yu taM/_a d+yu ta/_skyes bu 
[\[270b.7\]]phyi ma gsum la/_a d+ya baM/_yon tan/_a d+yu ba/_a d+yu ma/_lung la/_si tsal 'phel _AT byin nas yon tan byas so/_ba par smai pad rnams la 'os/_'phel bar byas pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a d+yau ShI da/_a d+yau Sh+DAM/_a d+yau ShuH_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]a d+yau ShIH/_a d+yau Sh+TAM/_a d+yau Sh+Ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a d+yau ShaM/_a d+yau Sh+ma/_liT la/_Nal gnyis dang thal ma yin pa rnams la/_swa ny+dza brtsegs pa dang po sogs kyi lung 'dren gyis ki ta yang na byas pas/_kita kyi phyogs la/_a tsa 
[\[271a.2\]]sh+nu byings kyi u pa dang /_ki ta ma yin pa'i phyogs la yon tan byas pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_du d+yA ba/_du rgyu ba tuH/_du d+ya ba tuH/_du d+yu buH/_du d+ya buH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_du d+yo tha/_du d+ya bi tha/_du d+yu ba thuH/_du d+yab thuH/_du d+yu ba/_du d+ya ba/_skyes 
[\[271a.3\]]bu phyi ma gsum la/_du d+yA ba/_du d+ya ba/_du d+yu bi ba/_du d+ya bi ba/_du d+yu bi ma/_du d+ya bi ma/_luT byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_h+yo tA/_d+yo tA rau/_d+yo tA raH/_d+yo tA si sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la kr-i ta ma yin pa sogs kyis 
[\[271a.4\]]ring po byas pas/_d+yU yA ta/_d+yU yA stAM/_d+yu yA suH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa sogs kyis yon tan dang /_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha byas pas/_d+yo Sh+ya ti/_d+yo Sh+ya haH/_d+yo Sh+yahaH/_d+yo Sh+ya n+ti sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a d+yo 
[\[271a.5\]]Sh+ya ta/_a d+yo Sh+ya tAM/_a d+yo Sh+ya nas sogs so/_!_/yu sres pa la'o zhes ba la'ang a tang rnams 'jug cing cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra ste/_laTa'i skyes ba dang po gsum la/_yau ti/_yu taH/_yu nga n+ti/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_yau Sh-i/_yu thaH/_yu tha/
[\[271a.6\]]skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_yau mi/_yu baH/_yu maH/_ling la/_yu yA ta/_yu yA tAM/_yu yuHsogs so/_/loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_yo tu/_yu tA ta/_yu tAM/_yu ban+tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_yu hi/_yu tA ta/_yu taM/_yu ta/_skyes 
[\[271a.7\]]bu phyi ma gsum la/_ya bA ni/_ya bA ba/_ya bA ma/_ling gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a yo ta/_a yu tAM/_a yu ba na/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a yauH/_a yu taM/_a yu ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a ya baM/_a yu ba/_a yu ma/
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]lung la ba la dang po'i iT sbyar bas/_a yA bI ta/_a yA byaSh+DAM/_a yI bi ShuHsogs so/_/l+riTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_yu yA ba/_yu yu ba tuH/_yu yu buH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_yu ya bi tha/_yu yu ba shuH/_yu yu ba/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum 
[\[271b.2\]]la/_yu yA ba/_yu la ba/_yu yu bib/_yu_si tsal 'phel ba/_yu bi ma/_luT la bal dang po'i iT sbyar bas/_ya bi tA/_ya bi tA rau/_ya bi tA raH/_ya bi tA si sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la kr-ita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring po byas bas/_yU yA ta/_yU 
[\[271b.3\]]yA stAM/_yu yA su:sogs so/_/l+r-iT la iT byin pas/_ya bi Sh+ya ti sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_ling la/_a ya bi Sh+ya ta sogs so/_!_/Nu bstod pa 'o zhes pa la a tang rnams sbyor/_cho ga yu dang 'dra ste/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_nau ti/_nu taH/_nu ba n+ti/
[\[271b.4\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_nauShi/_nu thaH/_nu tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_nau mi/_nu maH/_ling la/_nu yA tAM/_nu yuHsogs so/_/loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_nau tu/_nu tA ta/_ni ba n+tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_nu 
[\[271b.5\]]hi/_nu tA ta/_nu taM/_nu ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_na bA ni/_na bA ba/_na bA ma/_lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a nau ta/_a nu tAM/_a nu ba na/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a noH/_a nu taM/_a nu ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a nu baM/_a nu ba/_a nu ma/
[\[271b.6\]]lung la wa la dang po'i iT dang /_si tsa 'phel ba par smai ba da rnams la 'os 'phel ba byas bas/_/a nA bI ta/_a nA bi Sh+TAM/_a nA bi ShuHsogs sam/_yang na 'grel bar nu las pa la dang po la iT yang na mi 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas iT med pa'i phyogs la 'phel ba byas pas/
[\[271b.7\]]a nau ShI ta/_a nau Sh+TAM/_a nau Sh+TAM/_a nauShuHsogs so/_/liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_nu nA ba/_nu nu ba tuH/_nu nu buH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_nu nu ba thuH/_nu nu ba/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_nu TAb/_nu na bing /_nu nu bi ma/_luT 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]la/_na bi tA sogs sam/_no tA sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la ring bo byas bas/_nU yA ta/_nU yA staM/_nu yA suHsogs so+o/_/l+r-iT la iT yang na bar byas pas/_na pi Sh+ya ti sogs sam/_no Sh+ya dati sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a 
[\[272a.2\]]na bi Sh+yata sogs sam/_/a no Sh+ya da sogs so/_!_/k+Shu rno ba la'o zhes pa 'ang yu dang 'dra ste/_a tang rnams spyar bas/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_k+Sh+Nau ti/_k+Sh+NutaH/_k+Sh+Nu pa n+ti/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_k+Sh+Nau+u Shi/_k+Sh+nu thaH/_k+Sh+Nu tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/
[\[272a.3\]]k+Sh+Nau mi/_k+Sh+Nu baH/_k+Sh+Na maH/_ling la/_k+Sh+Nu yA ta/_k+Sh+Nu yA tAM/_k+Sh+Nu yuHsogs so/_/loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_k+Sh+Nau tu/_k+Sh+Na tA ta/_k+Sh+Nu tAM/_k+Sh+Nu ba T+tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_k+Sh+Nu hi/_k+Sh+Nu tAM ta/_k+Sh+Nu taM/_k+Sh+Nu ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/
[\[272a.4\]]k+Sh+Na bA ni/_k+Sh+Na bA ba/_k+Sh+Na bA ma/_lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a k+Sh+nau ta/_a k+Sh+nu tAM/_a k+Sh+Nu ban/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a k+Sh+NauH/_a k+Sh+Nu taM/_a k+Shu ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a k+Sh+Na baM/_a k+Sh+nu ba/_ak+Shu ma/_lung la bal dang po'i iT sbyar/
[\[272a.5\]]'phel ba byas pas/_a k+Sh+NA bI ta/_a k+Sh+Nu biSh+TA+e/_a k+Sha pa ShuHsogs so/_liT gnyis brjod/_dang po'i hal lhag po 'os/_/kha dang Na phyis/_ku haM dag gi tsu Na la gnyis dang thal bor te/_gzhan rnams kita yang na bar byas pas/_skyes bu dngo po gsum
