[\[272a.6\]]la/_tsu k+ShA ba/_tsu k+Sh+na ba tuH/_tsu k+Sh+Nu butuH/_tsu k+Sh+nu buH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tsu k+Sh+Na bi tha/_tsu k+Sh+Na ba thuH/_tsu k+Sh+Na ba thuH/_tsu k+Sh+Na thu/_tsu k+Sh+Na ba/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsu k+Sh+Na ba/_tsa k+Sh+Na ba/_tsu k+Sh+Na bi ba/_tsu k+Sh+Nu bi ba/_tsu k+Sh+Na bi ma/_tsu k+Sh+Nu bi ma/
[\[272a.7\]]luT la iT byin bas/_k+Sh+Na bi tA/_k+Sh+Na bi tA rau/_k+Sh+Na bi tA raH/_k+Sh+Na bi tA/_si sogs so/_/smon pa'i li ra la kr-i ta ma yig pa sogs kyis ring po byas pas/_k+Sh+Nu yA ta/_k+Sh+Nu yA staM/_k+Sh+Nu yA ta/_k+Sh+Nu yA stAM/_k+Sh+Nu yA suHsogs so/_/waT la wa la dang pa'i iT sbyar bas/_k+Sh+Na bi Sh+ya ti sogs dang 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a k+Sh+Na bi Sh+ya ta sogs so/_!_/Sh+Nu rab tu 'dzag pa la'o zhes pa'ang [\[]phar[\]] smi pa da can yin pas a tang rnams 'jug cing sha ba 'jig_byings kyi dang po'i Sha 'i sa 'os Sha sa/_rgyu mtshan med na rgyu mtshan can yang med do zhes bas/_Na 'ang na ru log/_snu 
[\[272b.2\]]zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_cho ga bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra ste/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_snau ti/_snu ti/_sdu ba sti/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_snau Shi/_snu thaH/_snu tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_snau mi/_snu baH/_snu maH/_ling 
[\[272b.3\]]la/_snu yA ta/_snu yA tAM/_snu luHsogs so/_/loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_sno tu/_snu tA ta/_snu tAM/_snu ban+hu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_snu hi/_snu tA ta/_snu taM/_snu ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_sna bA ni/_sna bA ba/_sna bA ma/_lung 
[\[272b.4\]]gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a snau ta/_a snu tAM/_a snu ba na/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a snauH/_a snu taM/_a snu ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a sna paM/_a snu ba/_a snu ma/_lung la wa la dang mo'i iT dang 'phel ba byas bas/_a snA pI ta/
[\[272b.5\]]a snU bi Sh+D+daM/_a snA bi ShuHsogs so/_/liT la Na la gnyis dang thal bor ba'i rnam dbye gzhan rnams swa ny+dza brtsegs pa dang po sogs kyi kita yang na par byas pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_su k+Shu ba/_su k+Shu ba tuH/_su k+Shu ba tuH/_su k+Sh+nu buH/_skyes bu dbus 
[\[272b.6\]]ma gsum la/_su Sh+Na bi tha/_su Sh+Na ba bruH/_su Sh+NA bathuH/_su Sh+Na ba/_su Sh+Nu ba/_skyes phyi ma gsum la/_su Sh+Nu bi ba/_su Sh+Na bam/_su Sh+Ta bi ba/_su Sh+Tu bi ba/_su Sh+Nu bi ma/_su Sh+Ta bi ma/_luT la iT byin pas/_sna bi tA/_sna bi tA si sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la 
[\[272b.7\]]kr-ita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring po byas pas/_snuM yA ta/_snU yA stAM/_snA lA suHsogs so/_/l+r-iT la iT byin bas/_sna bi Sh+ya ti sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la'ang iT byin pas/_a sna bi Sh+ya ta sogs so/_!_/i Na 'gro ba la'o zhes ba la'ang a ta ra rnams 'jug 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]ste/_a di sogs kyis sha ba 'jig_/byings kyi Nu rjes 'brel bi ta la yon tan sogs byas pas/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/_e ti/_i taH/_i No ya Na/_i Na gyi ya Na'o/_/rkyen pi ta ma yin pa a tsa dang po can pha rol 
[\[273a.2\]]la i Na ni ya Na so sor bsdu pa'i yi ger 'gyur te/_skyes bu dang bo'i mang tshig la/_ya n+ti/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_e Shi/_i thiH/_i tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_e mi/_i baH/_imaH/_ling la/_i yA ta/_i yA tAM/_i yuHsogs 
[\[273a.3\]]so/_/loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_e tu/_i tA ta/_i tAM/_yan+tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_i hi/_i tA ta/_i ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a yA ni/_a yA pa/_a yA ma/_lang la/_a tsa dang po la AT 
[\[273a.4\]]'os/_byings la AT/_AT las kyang ngos 'phel ba byas pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ai ta/_ai tAM/_A ya na/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_aiH/_ai taM/_ai ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_A yaM/_ai ba/_ai ma/_i No gA 
[\[273a.5\]]ngi /_lung la i Na gyi kA'o/_/lung pha rol la i Na ni gA zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/_i Na la/_lung /_A la 'phel ba byas bas ai zhes ba la la [\[]D+b+haM[\]]/_dz+ha a n+ta/_ita kyi 'ang ngos i byis brtsegs pa'i mtha' dbyi 'as/_ta phyis/_e tsa'i a la apa sogs kyis mtshams sbyar/_mdo 
[\[273a.6\]]'dis gAr bsgyur/_gA ti/_s+thA/_g+hu pA/_b+hU sogs kyis si tsa 'jig pas/_a gA ta/_a gA tAM/_a guH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a gAH/_a gA taM/_a gA ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a gI/_a gA ba/_a gA ma/_liTa'i skyes bu dang 
[\[273a.7\]]po'i gcig tshig la/_i Na liT a b+h+yAs med pa sogs kyis byings gnyis brjod/_la ti ba/_hipa Na la/_a tsa'i ny+ra Na 'gro ba la 'os 'phel ba e tsa'i al a ba sogs kyis i A ya?/_a b+h+yA sa'i 'dra ba ma yin pa la 'os i gong ma i yang dang a 'gro ba rim bzhin drangs 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]pas i yA ya/_dI r+g+ha i NaHki ti/_ka 'gro ba la i Na gyi ring po'o/_/liT ka 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la in gyi a b+h+ya sa ring bor 'gyur te/_skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_i gnyis brjod mdo 'dis a b+h+yA sa ring bo/_i Na gyi ya Na 'os i phyi ma y+ra drangs 
[\[273b.2\]]bas/_I ya tuH/_I yAH/_de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_i ya yi tha/_i ye tha/_I ya thuH/_I ya/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_i yA ya/_i ya ya/_i yi ba/_i yi ma/_luT la byings thams cad pa dang 
[\[273b.3\]]byings byed pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_e tA/_e tA rau/_e tA raHsogs so/_/smon pa'i ling ba kr-ita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring bo byas/_I yA ta/_I yA stAM/_I yA suHsogs so/_/e te rli ngi/_/e ti'i ling la'o/_/nyer bsgyur sngon du sbyor na i Na'i smon 
[\[273b.4\]]pa'i ling pha rol la thung ngur 'gyur te/_I yAta ces grub pa'i sngon du a nu bzhag_/mdo 'dis thung ngu /_i ka gi a tsa la ya Na byas pas/_a n+wi yA ta sogs so/_/l+r-iT la yon tan byas pas/_e Sh+ya ti/_e Sh+ya taH/_e Sh+ya n+taM sogs dang /_l+r-ing 'ang de dang 'dra ba la/_a tsa 
[\[273b.5\]]dang po'i AT 'os AT byin/_AT las kyang ngos 'phel ba byas pas/_i Sh+ya ta/_ai Sh+ya tAM/_ai Sh+ya na sogs so/_!_/i ka dran pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams 'jug ste/_'grel par lung drangs pa/_i NA di ka i ti tsa ba k+ta bya mi ti Na t+ka r+ya rU paM tsa/_i Na 'dra bar i ka ces 
[\[273b.6\]]pa'ang brjod bar bya ste/_bya ba i Na 'dra zhing gzugs 'ang ngo /_/i ka ces pa 'di 'ang i Na dang 'dra bar brjod par bya ste/_i ti sogs sgrub tshul gyi bya ba thams cad 'dra la/_i Na skabs kyi mdo rnams kyang thams cad 'jug cing bsgrubs zin gyi gzugs thams cad kyang i Na dang 
[\[273b.7\]]'dra bas/_laT sogs sde tshan bcu po thams cad la rigs 'gre bas/_sgrub tshul bsgrubs zin gyi gzugs sogs dper brjod logs su ma bkod do/_!_/mA mchod pa la zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams 'jug ste/_a di sogs kyis sha pa 'jig pas laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]la/_mA ti/_mA taH/_mA N+ti/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_mA si/_mA thaH/_mA tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_mA mi/_mA baH/_mA maH/_ling la/_mA yA ta/_mA yA tAM/_mA yuHsogs so/_/loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_mA tu/_mA tA ta/_mAM tAM/
[\[274a.2\]]mA n+tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_mA hi mA tA ta/_mA taM/_mA ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_mA ni/_mA ba/_mA ma/_lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a mA tAM/_a muH/_a mA na/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a mAH/_a mA taM/_a mA ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/
[\[274a.3\]]a mAM/_a mA ba/_a mA ma/_lung la/_ya ma/_ra ma/_nam sogs kyis sa ka dang iT byin pas/_a mA sI ta/_a mA si ShuHsogs so/_/liTa'i _lang la shA ka TAl Nas ngas ba 'os/_dz+hi dzus/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ma mau/_ma ma tuH/_ma muH/_skyes bu 
[\[274a.4\]]dbus ma gsum la/_ma mi tha/_ma ma thuH/_ma ma/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ma mau/_ma mi pa/_ma me ma/_luT la/_mA tA/_mA tA ro/_mA tA raH/_mA tA si sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_ling la e 'os er bsgyur bas/_me yA ta/_me yA stAM/_me yA suHsogs 
[\[274a.5\]]so/_/l+r-iT la/_mA s+ya ti sogs dang /_l+ring la/_a mA s+ya ta sogs so/_!_/yA thob pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams 'jug ste/_cho ga phal cher mA dang 'dra bas/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po+o gsum la/_yA ti/_yA taH/_yA n+ti/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_yA si/_yA thaH/_yA 
[\[274a.6\]]tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_yA ma/_yA baH/_yA maH/_ling la/_yA yAta/_yA yA staM/_yA yAHsogs so/_/loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_yA tu/_yA tA ta/_yA tAM/_yA n+tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_yA hi/_la tA ta/_yA taM/_yA ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_yA 
[\[274a.7\]]ni/_yA ba/_yA ma/_lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a yA ta/_a yA tAM/_ayuH/_a yA na/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a yAH/_a yA taM/_a yA ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a yAM/_a yA ba/_a yA ma/_lung la/_yam/_ram/_nam sogs kyis 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]sa ka dang iT byin pas/_a yA sbyi ta/_a yA si Sh+TAM/_a yA si ShuHsogs so/_/liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ya yau/_ya ya tuH/_ya yuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ya yi tha/_ya ya thuH/_ya ya/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_/ya yau/_ya yi ba/_ya yi 
[\[274b.2\]]ma/_luT la/_yA tA/_yA tA rau/_yA tA raH/_yA tA sI sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_'dir er mi 'gyur bas/_yA yA ta/_yA yA stAM/_yA yA suHsogs so/_/l+raT la/_yA s+ya ti sogs dang /_l+r-ing la/_a sA s+yata sogs so/_/bA 'gro ba dang dri ba dag la 'o dang /_/
[\[274b.3\]]drA smad ba la'o gnyis kyang cho ga thams cad yA dang 'dra'o/_!_/khyA gtam la'o zhes pa'ang bshad ma thag pa rnams dang phal cher 'dra ste/_laT la/_khyA ti/_khyA taH/_khyA n+ti sogs so/_/ling la/_khyA yAta/_khyA yA stAM/_khyA yuHsogs so/_/loT la/_khyA tu/_khyA tA ta/_khyA tAM/_khyA n+tu 
[\[274b.4\]]drA ba/_smon pa'i ling la/_gzhan yang brtsegs pa sogs kyis e ru bsgyur ba dang /_mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byed pa'o/_sogs so/_/lang la/_a khyA ta/_a khyA tAM/_a khyAH/_a khyA na sogs so/_/a s+ya ti ba k+ti khyA ti b+h+yo nyang /_a s+ya ti/_bak+ti/_khyA ti rnams las ang 'o/_/a su 'phel pa/_ba tsa 
[\[274b.5\]]brjod pa khyA gtam rnams las ts+li ni ang du bsgyur te/_khyA la/_lung /_lung la ts+li 'os ts+li byin/_mdo 'dis ts+li ang /_iT las kyang A ta kyi dbyi 'os A phyis bas/_a khya ta/_a khya tAM/_a khya na sogs so/_/liT la gnyis brjod/_ha la dang po lhag po/_ku ha ngag gi tsu 'os/_kha 
[\[274b.6\]]tsha/_a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/_tsha tsar bsgyur ba sogs byas pas skyes bu dang po gsum pa/_tsa khyau/_tsa khyatuH/_tsa k+buH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tsa khyi tha/_tsa khya thuH/_tsa khya/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsa khyau/_tsa khyi ba/_tsa khyi ma/_luT la/_khyA tA rau/_khyA tA raH/_khyA tA si sogs 
[\[274b.7\]]so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_gzhan yang brtsegs pa dang po sogs kyis er bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas bas/_khye yA ta/_khye yA stAM/_khye yA suHsogs sam/_khyA yA ta/_khyA yA stAM/_khyA yA suHsogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_khyA s+ya ti sogs so/_/l+r-ing la/_a khyA s+ya ta sogs so/_!_/bi dang shes pa 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]la'o zhes ba la bar smai pa da rnams 'jug ste bi do liTo bA/_bid las liTa'i yang na'o/_bi da las pha rol gyi laT bsgyur ba'i a tang gi ti ba la sogs pa rnams rim pa bzhin Na la la sogs pa rnams su yang na 'gyur te/_bid la/_laT/_sha pa 'jig/_mdo 'dis ti ba sogs Na la sogs su bsgyur ba'i 
[\[275a.2\]]phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_bed/_bid tuH/_bi duH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/[ \[]bat+b+ra/[\] ]ba di thur/_bid/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_be da/_pi dwa/_bid+ma/_Nal la sogs bar ma bsar ba'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_bat+ti/_bat+taH/_bi ra n+ti/_skyes bu 
[\[275a.3\]]dbus ma gsum la/_be t+si/_bi t+thaH/_bit+tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_be d+mi/_bi draH/_bi d+maH/_ling la bya ba lhag po med pas/_bi d+yAta/_bi d+yA tAM/_bi d+yAHsogs so/_/bi dAM ku rba n+ti t+ya n+ya ta ra s+yA/_bi dAM ku rba n+tu zhes pa yang na'o/_/bi ta la loT pha rol la yang na A ma sbyor zhing loT 
[\[275a.4\]]yang 'jig pa dang kr-i nya loTa'i rkyen can rjes su sbyor ba sogs tshig phrad du byas pas/_bi dAM ka ro tu sogs te/_bi dAM sA+on mas Du kr-i nya byed pa la/_loT rjes 'brel phyis la ti ai u 'os/_i u ru bsgyur bas/_bi dI kr-i tu ba ces pa la/_ta nA di b+h+ya uH/_ta na la sogs pa rnams 
[\[275a.5\]]las u'o/_ta nu rgyas ba la sogs pa rnams las byings thams cad ba pha rol la byed pa po'i don gyi shab kyi yul la u 'gyur te/_u sbyar byings thams cad ba dang byis phyed pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_bi dAM ka ro tu 'grub pa'o/_/a ta u t+sA r+b+ba ng+hA tu ke/_a ta kyi u ta byings thams cad 
[\[275a.6\]]pa la'o/_/kr-i nya u'i mtha' can gyi ad ni byings thams cad ba ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la u tu du 'gyur te/_/loTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_bi dAM ku ru tAM/_bi dAM ku rba n+tu/_de bzhin du skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_bi dAM ku ru/_bi dAM ku ru tA ta/_pi dAM ku ru tA ta/_bi dAM ku ru taM/_bi dAM ku 
[\[275a.7\]]ru ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_pi dAM ka ra bA Ni/_bi dAM ka ra bA ba/_bi dAM ka ra bA ma/_A ma ma sbyar ba'i phyogs la bi ta rnams la/_pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byed sha pa 'jig pas skyes bu dang po gsum la/_be t+tA ta/_bi t+tAM/_bi/_rkyen uta las kyang brtsegs pa ma yin pa sogs kyis hi phyis/
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]dan+tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_bid+d+hi/_bit+tA ta/_bi t+taM/_bit+ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_be dA ni/_bedA ba/_be dA ma/_phid la lang spyar ba'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/_a bde/_a beta/_a bi tAM/_'grel bar lung drangs ba/_be t+te rla ngo dz+ho swa/_be ti las lang gi 
[\[275b.2\]]dz+hi'i dzus yang na'o/_/bi ta las/_hu dz+hal la hi h+hi 'os hi d+hir bsgyur/_pha rol gyi lang bsgyur ba'i dz+hi ni dzus su yang na 'gyur te/_a bi duH/_a bi dan/_skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/_da sh+tsa/_da'i 'ang ngo /_byings mtha'i da srog med pha rol nas si pa phyis pa de ni yang na ru ru 'gyur te u 
[\[275b.3\]]brjod don no/_/a beH/_a be ta/_a bed/_skyes bu dbus ma'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_a bi t+taM a bi t+ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a be daM/_a bi dwa/_a bi t+ma/_lung la iT byin yon tan byas bas/_a be dI ta/_a be di Sh+TaM/_a be di ShuHsogs so/_/liT la/_u Sha 
[\[275b.4\]]bid dzA gr-i sogs kyis yang na A ma sbyar bas/_bi dAM ba b+hU ba/_bi dAM tsa kA ra/_bi dA mA sa sogs sam/_/yang na liT nyid sbyar/_byings gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_bi bed/_bi bid tuH/_bi bi duH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_bi be 
[\[275b.5\]]di tha/_bi bi nga thuH/_bi bid/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_bi bed/_bi bi di ba/_bi bi di ma/_luT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/_be di tA/_be di tA rau/_the di tA raH/_be di tA si sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_/bi d+yA ta/_bi d+yA stAM/_bi d+yA suHsogs so/_/l+r-iT la iT byin 
[\[275b.6\]]yon tan byas pas/_be di Sh+ya ti sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a be di Sh+ya ta sogs so/_!_/as yod pa la'o zhes pa la'ang pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyor te/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_a sti/_sh+nA so ra l+lo paH/_sh+na as dag gi a ta dbyi'o/_rkyen sh+na 
[\[275b.7\]]dang as kyi a yig byings thams cad pa ka da 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la dbyi ste/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_staH/_san+ti/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a si/_tA la a sti dag gis dbyi 'os sa phyis/_s+thaH/_s+tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a smi/_swaH_as 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]la laT sha ba 'jig/_/la bas dang mas su bsgyur/_sh+na as dag gi a dbyi 'os/_a phyis/_sa drangs/_smaH/_ling la sh+tsa as dag gi a tang byi 'os a phyis sra yA la drangs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_s+yA ta/_s+yA tAM/_s+yAH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_s+yAH/_s+yA taM/_s+yA ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_s+yAM/_s+yA ba/
[\[276a.2\]]s+yA ma/_de bzhin du loT la 'ang ka nga 'gro ba rnams la a dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a [\[]snu/[\]]stA ta/_stAM/_san+tU/_g+h+wa so re d+d+hA+e ba b+h+yA sa le pa sh+tsa/_g+hu as dag gi hi la e ste a b+h+yAs dbyi ba'ang ngo /_/byings g+hu'i ming can rnams dang as kyi loT bsgyur ba'i hi pha 
[\[276a.3\]]rol la e ru bsgyur zhing g+hu sogs kyis a b+hA sa 'ang dbyi ste/_as la/_loT/_sha pa 'jig/_la si pa/_si hi 'os/_si hi ra bsgyur/_mdo 'dis as e ru bsgyur/_hu dz+ha la la hi d+hi'o zhes pas hi ng+hi ra 'gyur te/_a sa zhes snga ma dz+hal gyi yi ge yin pas 'di la gzhi mnyam pa la sam 
[\[276a.4\]]grub po zhes pa'i mdos da lta gzhi mnyam yang snga ma'i sa yig gi rgyu mtshan te/_e d+hi/_yang na tu hi dag gi zhes pas/_hi tA tang du bsgyur bas/_stA ta/_skyes bu dbus ma'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_staM/_sta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a sA ni/_a sA ma/_lang la/
[\[276a.5\]]ha la gcig pa rnams la a sti si tsa sogs kyis IT/_kang 'gro ba rnams la a dbyi ba sogs byas pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_A sI ta/_A stI/_A san/_de bzhin du/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_A sIH/_A staM/_A sta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_A saM/_A swa/
[\[276a.6\]]A sma/_a ste n+h+biH/_a sti'i b+hU'o/_/rnam dbye byings byed pa'i ming can rnams pha rol la a sti ste/_as ni b+hU zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/_a ma kyi a phyis kyang 'i ba la gzhi mnyam pa las ma thub po zhes pas sngon ma'i A'i rgyu mtshan la AT byin pa'o/_a sa la lung /_mdo 'dis b+hU ru bsgyur/_gA ti sogs kyis si tsa 
[\[276a.7\]]'jig/_'grel par b+hU a ha ra bsgyur ba dang /_a sa b+hUr bsgyur ba dag las ha la gcig pa la IT mi 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas IT mi ster te/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a b+hU ta/_a b+hU tAM/_a b+hU ba na sogs te/_bya ba dang gzugs thams cad b+hU yod pa'i skabs dang 'dra'o/_/byings phyed pa yin kyang 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]liT pha rol la b+hU mi 'gyur te/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_A si/_A sa tuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_As tha/_A sa thuH/_A sa/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_A sa/_A si ba/_A si ma/_luT smon ling liT l+ring rnams as g+hU tu bsgyur pas cho ga dang gzugs 
[\[276b.2\]]sogs thams cad b+hU yod pa'i skabs dang 'dra ste khyad par cung zad kyang med do/_/u pas r+g+ha prA du rgyA ma sti r+ya ts+ba ranaH/_nyar bsgyur dang prA dur dag las i sti'i ya a tsa pha rol la'o/_/nyer bsgyur sa Sha ra 'gyur pa'i rgyu mtshan can dang mi zad ba'i nang tshan prA dur sngon ma las a sta'i sa yig 
[\[276b.3\]]ni ya yig dang a tsa dang po can gyi rkyen pha rol na yod pa la Sha ru bsgyur te/_ni Sha n+ti/_ni Sh+yA ta/_prA duHShan+ti/_prA duHSh+yA ta/_a tsa dang ya dang po can ma yin no mi 'gyur te/_ni staH/_prA dustaHsogs so/_!_/mri dzU Sha dag pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams 'jug ste/_mr-i dze r+b+r-i d+d+hiH/
[\[276b.4\]]mr-i dzi'i 'phel ba'o/_/ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can ma yin pa'i _a tsa dang po/_ya dang po can/_rnam dbye byings thams cad pa rnams dang byings phyed pa rnams pha rol la mr-i dzi'i i ka gi 'phel par 'gyur te/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_mdo 'dis 'phel ba/_bra sh+tsa b+h+ra l+dza sogs kyis 
[\[276b.5\]]dza Sha/_Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os ta Ta ra bsgyur bas/_mA n+Sh+Ti/_gnyis tshig la/_ka nga 'gro ba 'phel ba mi byed bra sh+tsa sogs dang /_Sha D+ra sogs kyi mr-i Sh+TaH_'grel par lung drangs pa/_k+di t+ya tsi mr-i dzo pra ng+d+ha rba/_k+nga 'gro ba a tsa mr-i dza'i 'phel ba yang na'o/_/kar 'gro ba'i ming can 
[\[276b.6\]]yin kyang a tsa dang po can la mr-i dza'i 'phel ba yang na bya ste/_/ming tshig la/_mA dza n+ta/_mr-i dza n+ti/_de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_mA r+k+Shi/_mr-i Sh+ThaH/_mr-i Sh+Sha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_mA t+d+mi/_mr-i dz+waH/_mr-i dz+maH/_ling la cho ga lhag po med pas/_mr-i dz+yA ta/
[\[276b.7\]]mr-i dz+yA tAM/_mr-i dz+yuHsogs so/_/loT la/_laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas skyes bu dang po gsum la/_la i ba/_bra sh+tsa sogs kyis dza Sha sa laH/_nga D+ha dag gi zhes pas/_ba ka/_rkun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/_mA n+Sh+TAH/_mr-ir+k+Shi_/_mA rdzan+tu/_mr-i dza n+tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_mr-i [\[]T+Sha[\] ]/dza la/_loT la si pa si hi ru bsgyur/_hu dz+ha la zhes pas 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]hi t+hi/_bra sh+tsa sogs kyis dza Sha/_mtha'i dz+hal sogs kyis Sha Da/_Sha Tu la sogs kyis ng+ha D+ha/_mr-i Sh+TaM/_mr-i Sh+Ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_mA rdza ni/_mA rdzA ba/_mA rdzA ma/_lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a mA r+DA/_a mA r+DA/_a mr-i Sh+TAM/_A mA rdza na/_a mr-i dza na/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a mA r+DA/_a mA r+Da/_a 
[\[277a.2\]]mr-i Sh+Ta/_a mr-i Sh+Ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a mA rdzaM/_a mr-i dz+wa/_a mr-i dz+ma/_lung la U 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na par bya ste/_i Ta byin pa'i phyogs la/_mr-i dzi'i 'phel ba 'os 'phel ba byas pas/_a mA rdzI ta/_a mA rdzi Sh+TA/_a mA rdzi ShuHsogs dang /_iT med 
[\[277a.3\]]pa'i phyogs la/_r-i ta u bad+hA'i yang na 'os/_a ma A gam ster ba dang /_mi ster ba yang na bar byas/_dz+hal dang po rnams la dz+hal las 'os si tsa 'jig_/bra sh+tsa sogs kyis dza Sha/_Sh+Tu la Sh+Tu sogs dang /_sa la Sha D+ha dag gi sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a ma byin pa'i phyogs 
[\[277a.4\]]kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a mrA k+ShI ta/_a m+Ta Sh+TAM/_a mrA k+ShuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a mrA k+ShiH/_a mr-i Sh+Ta/_a mrI Sh+Tu/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a mA k+ShaM_a mrA k+ShA/_a mrA k+Sh+ma/_a ma A ga ma ma byin pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a 
[\[277a.5\]]mA k+ShIta/_a mAr+Sh+TaM/_mr-i dza'i 'phel ba 'os ring po/_bad zA dza sogs kyis ring po/_a mA r+g+ShuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a mA r+k+ShAH/_a mA N+Ta/_a mA r+Sh+Ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a mA r+k+ShaM/_a mA r+k+Sh+wa/_a mA r+k+Sh+ma/_liT la/_kang 'pho ba'i ming can a dang po rnams la 
[\[277a.6\]]'phel ba yang na ba dang /_Na la gnyis dang thal la 'phel ba byed pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ma mA rdza/_ma mA rdza tuH/_ma mr-i dza tuH/_ma mr-i dza tuH/_ma mA rdzuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ma mA rdzi tha/_ma mA r+Sh+T+wa/_ma mA thuH/_ma mr-i dza thuH/_ma mA rdza/_ma 
[\[277a.7\]]mr-i dza/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ma mA rdzi /_ma mA rdzi ba/_ma mr-i dzi ba/_ma mA rdzi ma/_ma mr-i dzi ma/_ma mr-i dzi ma/_luT la Uta 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/_iTa'i phyogs la/_mA rdzi tA/_mA rdzi tA si sogs dang /_iT med pa'i phyogs la/_mA r+Sh+Ta/
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]mA r+Sh+TA si sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_mr-i dz+yA ta/_mr-i dz+yA staM/_mr-i dz+yA suHsogs so/_/l+r-iT la yang iT yang na bar byas bas/_iT byin pa'i phyogs la/_ma rdzi Sh+ya ti sogs dang /_iT med pa'i phyogs la/_bra sh+tsa sogs kyis dza Sha/_sa la Sha D+ha dag gis Sha kra/_/kun nas 
[\[277b.2\]]bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/_'phel ba byas pas/_mA r+Sh+ya te sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a ma rdzi Sh+ya ta sogs lam/_yang na/_a ma r+k+Sh+yata sogs so/_!_/ba tsa 'chad pa la 'o zhes pa la 'ang a tang rnams 'jug ste/_'grel par btsa dang swa pi dag las pha rol byings 
[\[277b.3\]]thams cad pa pi ta min pa rnams kyang kang 'gro ba'i ming can ma yin no zhes bshad de/_dgos pa ni saM pra sA ra Na mi byed pa'i don no/_/yang 'grel bar btsa la laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i mang tshig a n+ti mi 'jug go zhes kyang bshad de/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig dang gnyis 
[\[277b.4\]]tshig la/_tsu'i ku 'os ca ka ra bsgyur bas/_bak+ti/_bak+taH/_de bzhin du/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_bak+Shi/_bak+thaH/_bak+tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_bats+mi/_btswaH/_ba ts+maH/_ling la/_bats+yAtAM/_bats+yUHsogs so/_/loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum 
[\[277b.5\]]la/_bak+tu/_bak+tAta/_bak+taM/_btsan+tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_bak+d+hi/_bak+tAta/_bak+taM/_bak+ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_btsA ni/_ba tsA ba/_ba tsA ma/_lang gi skyes ba dang po gsum la/_a ba ka/_a ba ga/_a ba k+t-I/_a ba tsa na/_skyes bu dbus ma 
[\[277b.6\]]gsum la/_a ba ka/_a ba ka/_a ba k+taM/_a ba k+ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum _hu dz+hal la hi d+hi 'os hi d+hi mtha'i dz+hi la sogs kyis ka ga/_la/_a ba tsi/_a ba tswa/_a ba ts+ma/_lung la/_a s+ya ti/_ba k+ti/_khyA tI rnams las ang ngos ts+li ang du bsgyur/_a bats+ra/_a tra ces pa la/_ba tsa u ma/

[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]a bo tsa ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a bo tsaM/_a bo tsA ba/_a bo tsA ma/_liT la Nal gnyis dang thal la gnyis rnams kyi sogs kyis A b+h+yAs saM phra sA ra Na dang ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can rnams la/_ba tsi swa pi ya dza sogs kyis gnyis ka saM pra sA ra Na ra bsgyur/_a ga

[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]sad pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a ta ra rnams 'jug ste/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_dzA ga rti/_dzA gri taH/_dzA graM ti/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_dzA gar+Shi/_dzA gr-i thaH/_dza gr-i tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_dzA garmi/_dzA gr-i baH/_dzA gr-i maH/_ling /_dzA gr-i yA ta/_dzA gr-i ya tAM/_dzA gr-i yuH/_sogs so/

[\[280b.4\]]gr-i taM/_a dzA gr-i ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a dzA ga raM/_a dzA gr-i ba/_a dzA gr-i ma/_dzA gro \u0f85 bi tsi N+Na ldi t+su/_dzA gr-i gyi pi tsi Na Na lang 'gro ba rnams ma yin pa rnams la'o/_/dzA gr-i gyi rkyen bi dang tsi Na dang Na la dang /_gzhan yang nga 'gro ba'i ming can ma yin pa rkyen byings phyed pa'i ming can rnams pha rol la yon tan

[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]rnams 'jug ste/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_da ri drA ti/_i d+da ri dra s+ya/_da ri drA'i i ta'o/_/byings thams cad pa ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can ha la dang po pha rol la da ri drA'i A ta ni i ta du 'gyur te/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig la/_da ra dri taH/
[\[281a.2\]]sh+nA b+h+ya sta yo rA taH/_sh+nA a b+h+ya sta dag A ta kyi'o/_/byings thams cad pa ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can a ca dang po pha rol la rkyen sh+n+ra dang byings a b+h+ya sta'i ming can rnams kyi A ta dbyi ste/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i ming tshig la/_la?/_dz+hi/_a b+h+ya sta las a ta 'os dz+ha a ta/_mdo 'dis A phyis 
[\[281a.3\]]bas/_da ri dra ti/_de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_da ri drA si/_da ri drA si/_da ri drI thaH/_da ri drI tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_da ri drA mi/_da ri dri baH/_ling la/_da ri dra'i i ta 'os/_i ru bsgyur bas/_da ri dri yA ta/_da ri dri yA tAM/_da ri dri yuH/
[\[281a.4\]]sogs so/_/loT la'ang ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can ha la dang po rnams la A ta iT bsgyur ba dang a tsa dang po rnams la dbyi ba sogs byas bas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_da ri drA tu/_da ri dri tri ta/_da ri dri tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_da ri dri hi/_da ri dri hi/_da ri dri tA ta/_da ri dri taM/_da ri dri ta/_skyes 
[\[281a.5\]]bu phyi ma gsum la/_da ri drA Ni//_da ri drA ba/_da ri drA ma/_de bzhin du lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a da ri dri ta/_a da ri dri tAM/_a da ri druH/_si tsa a b+h+ya sta sogs kyis dz+hi dzus/_sh+nA a b+h+ya sta dag gi A ta kyi 'os A phyis/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a da ri drAH/_a da ri dri taM/_a da ri dri ta/_skyes bu phyi ma 
[\[281a.6\]]gsum la/_a da ri draM/_a da ri dri ba/_a da ri dri ma/_'grel bar lung drangs pa/_da ri drA te rA r+ng+ha d+hA tu ke A l+lo bo/_da ri drA ti'i byings phyed pa la A ta dbyi'o/_/da ri drA ti'i A ta ni/_san dang Nu la dang l+yuT rnams ma yin pa'i rkyen byings phyed pa'i ming can pha rol la dbyi'o/_/yang 'grel par byings phyed 
[\[281a.7\]]pa yin kyang lung la yang na bar bya'o/_/zhes bshad pas/_a dbyi ba'i phyogs la wal dang po'i iT byin pas/_a da ri drI ta/_a da ri drI Sh+TAM/_a da ri dri ShuH/_sogs so/_yang na mi dbyi ba'i phyogs la/_yam ram nam A ta rnams kyis sa ka 'ang ngos ka dang iT byin pas/_a da ri drA si ta/_a 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]da ri drI sa Sh+TAM/_a da ri drA si ShuH/_sogs so/_/liT la byings gnyis brjod/_dang po'i ha la lhag po 'os/_a b+h+ya sa'i dang zhag gzhan thams cad phyis pas/_da ri drA ti'i byings phyid pa la A ta dbyi 'os A ta dbyi 'os A ta dbyi ba sogs byas pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_da da ri drau/_da da ri dra tuH/
[\[281b.2\]]da da ri druH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_da da ri dri tha/_da da ri dra thuH/_da da ri dra/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_da da ri drau/_da da ri dri ba/_da da ri dri ma/_'grel par lung drangs pa/_a ne/_kA tsa A m+ba k+ta byaH/_a tsa gcig ma yin pa la'ang A ma rjod par byed do/_/byings a tsa gcig pa 
[\[281b.3\]]ma yin pa'i liT pha rol la A ma sbyor bar bya ste zhes pas liT pha rol la A ma sbyor ba thob kyang de'i dmigs bsal/_yang 'grel bar lung drangs ba/_da ri drA te rA mA/_da ri drA te rA mA/_da ri drA ti'i A ma yang na'o/_/da ri drA ti'i liT pha rol la A ma sbyor ba dang mi sbyor ba yang na bar bya ste/_A ma mi sbyor 
[\[281b.4\]]ba'i dper brjod bshad zin la/_A ma sbyar la/_iT 'jig pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_/da ri drAM ba b+hU ba/_da ri drAM tsa kA ra/_da ri drA mA sa/_sogs so/_/luT la iT byin/_da ri drA ti'i byings phyed pa la A ta dbyi 'os A phyis pas/_da ri di tA/_da ri dri tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling 
[\[281b.5\]]la/_A ta phyis pas/_da ri d+h+yA ta/_da ri d+h+yA stA/_da ri d+r+yA siH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la iT byin A ta phyis pas/_da ri dri Sh+ya hi/_sogs so/_de bzhin du ling la/_a da ri dri Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/tsa kA sri 'bar ba la'o zhes pa la'ang pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyor te/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tsa 
[\[281b.6\]]kA sti/_tsa kA staH/_tsa kA sa ti/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tsa kA s+si/_tsa kA s+thaH/_tsa kA s+tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsa kA smi/_tsa kA swaH/_tsa kA smaH/_ling la/_tsa kA s+yA ta/_tsa kA s+yA tAM/_tsa ka s+yAH/_sogs so/_/loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tsa kA stu/_tsa kA stA ta/_tsa kA stAM/_tsa kA sa 
[\[281b.7\]]tu/_skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/_si pa/_si hi hu dz+hal la zhes pas hi d+hi/_dz+hal rnams kyis dza sha rnams sos/_sa dar bsgyur ba dang /_yang na 'grel par d+hi la sa dbyi'o zhes bshad pas/_tsa kA d+d+hi/_tsa kA d+d+hi/_tsa kA stA ta/_skyes bu dbus ma'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_tsa 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]kA staM/_tsa kA sta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsa kA sA ni/_tsa kA sA ba/_tsa kA sA ma/_ti pya na steH/_a sti ma yin pa'i ti pa la'o/_/a sti ma yin pa'i byings mtha'i sa yig ni lang bsgyur ba'i ti ba pha rol la dra ru 'gyur te/_a tsa kA ta/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la 
[\[282a.2\]]a tsa kA stAM/_a tsa kA suH/_si pi k+hA to ru rbA/_si pa la byongs kyi ru yang na'o/_/lang bsgyur ba'i sib pha rol la byings mtha'i yig ni yang na rur 'gyur zhing yang na ru 'gyur te/_a tsa kAH/_a tsa kAd/_a tsa kA staM/_a tsa kA sta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a tsa kA saM/_a tsa kA swa/_a tsa kA sma/_lung la 
[\[282a.3\]]iT byin pas/_a tsa kA sI ta/_a tsa kA si Sh+TAM/_a tsa kA si ShuH/_sogs so/_/liT la a tsa gcig ma yin pa sogs kyis A ma yang na bar byas pas/_A ma med pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu rang po gsum la/_tsa tsa kA sa/_tsa tsa kA sa tuH/_tsa tsa kA suH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tsa tsa kA si 
[\[282a.4\]]tha/_tsa tsa kA sa thuH/_tsa tsa kA sa/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsa tsa kA sa/_tsa tsa kA si ba/_tsa tsa kA si ma/_A ma sbyar ba'i phyogs la/_tsa kA sAM ba b+hU ba/_tsa gA sAM tsa kA ra/_tsa kA sA mA sa/_sogs so/_/luT la/_iT byin pas/_tsa kA si tA/_tsa kA si tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la 
[\[282a.5\]]tsa kA s+yA ta/_tsa kA s+yA staM/_tsa kA sA suH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la yang iT byin pas/_tsa kA si Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_l+r-ing la/_a tsa kA si Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/shA su rjes su ston pa la'o zhes pa la laT sogs a tang rnams 'jug ste/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_shA sti/_shA sa 
[\[282a.6\]]i dang he loH/_shUs kyis iT ang ha la dag la 'o/_/shAs kyi u pa d+hA'i A ni ts+li bsgyur ba'i ang rkyen kang 'gro ba'i ming can ha la dang po can pha rol la ita du 'gyur te/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig la/_shi Sh+TaH/_shA su la/_laT sha ba 'jig_la tas mdo'i 'dis i shA si g+ha si ba si sogs kyis Sha/_Sha Ta 
[\[282a.7\]]sogs kyis taT/_mang tshig la/_a b+h+ya sta las a ta 'os/_dz+ha a ta du bsgyur bas/_shA sa ti/_de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_shA s+si/_shI Sh+ThaH/_shi Sh+Tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_shA smi/_shi ShaH/_shi Sh+maH/_lang la/_shi Sh+yA ta/_shi Sh+yA tAM/_shi Sh+yuH/_sogs so/_/loTa'i skyes 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]bu dang po gsum la/_shA stu/_shi Sh+TA ta/_shi Sh+TAM/_shA sa tu/_loTa'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/_shA hau/_hi la shA'o/_/shAs ni loT bsgyur ba'i hi pha rol la shA zhes par 'gyur te/_shA su la/_loT sha ba 'jig_/la si pa/_si hi 'os/_si hi/_mdo 'dis shAs shA ru bsgyur/_'di la bzhi 
[\[282b.2\]]mnyam pa las ma gru pa zhes pas sngon ma sa'i rgyu mtshan las hi yang hu dz+hal la hi d+hi 'os hi d+hir bsgyur bas/_shA d+hi/_yang na hi tA tang du bsgyur bas/_shi Sh+TA ta/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_shi Sh+Ti/_shi Sh+Ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_shA sA ni/_shA sA ba/_shA sA ma/_lang gi skyes bu dang po'i 
[\[282b.3\]]gcig tshig la/_la ti pa/_iT kyi'ang ngos i phyis/_a sti ma yin pa'i ti la 'os/_sa? da?/_ha la dI pa sogs kyis ta? phyis/_gnas med pa sogs kyis a shAd/_a shA ta/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_a shi Sh+TAM/_a shI suH/_skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/_si pa la byings kyi ru 
[\[282b.4\]]yang na 'os ru dang /_da yang na bar byas pas/_a shAH/_a shA ta/_a shAd/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_a shI Sh+TaM/_a shi Sh+Ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a shA saM/_a shi ShA/_a shi Sh+ma/_lung la/_sa rti shA sti a rti rnams las kyang ngos/_ts+li ang du bsgyur/_shAs kyis ita ang 
[\[282b.5\]]ha la dag la 'os/_u pa d+hA ita du bsgyur/_shA si/_g+ha si bsi sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur bas/_a shi Sha ta/_a shi Sha tA/_a shi Sha na/_sogs so/_/loT la gnyes brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_sha shAs/_sha shA sa tuH/_sha shA suH/_skyes bu dbus ma 
[\[282b.6\]]gsum la/_sha shA si tha/_sha shA sa thuH/_sha shAs/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_sha shAs/_sha shA sib/_sha shA si ma/_luT la/_shA si tA/_shA si tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_shAs kyi ita ang ta la dag la 'os u ba d+hA i/_shA si g+ha si bsi sogs kyis sa Sha ra bsgyur ba sogs 
[\[282b.7\]]byas pas/_shi Sh+yA ta/_shi Sh+yA stAM/_sha Sh+yA suH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la ba la dang po'i iT byin pas/_shA si Sh+ya ti/_shA si Sh+ya taH/_shA si Sh+ya n+ti/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a shA si Sh+ya ta/_a shA Sh+ya tAM/_a shA si Sh+ya na/_sogs so/_/tsa k+Shing gsal bar brjod pa la'o zhes pa la/_laT 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]sogs A t+ma ne ba da rnams 'jug ste/_dz+hal dang po rnams la brtsegs pa'i dang po sa ka sogs kyis dbyi ba dang /_Sha Tu la Sha Tu sogs kyis bsgrugs pas/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tsa Sh+Ti/_tsa k+Sha te/_tsa k+Sha te/_skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/[ \[]lda [\]]thAs/
[\[283a.2\]]thAs kyi se 'os/_thAs se/_brtsegs pa'i dang pos ka sogs kyis ka phyis/_sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka 'os/_Sha ka/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha byas pas/_tsa k+She/_gnyis tshig la/_tsa k+ShA the/_mang tshig la/_la? d+hAM/_brtsegs pa sogs kyis ka phyis/_Sha Tu sogs kyis d+ha D+ha/_Ta 'gro ba 
[\[283a.3\]]sogs kyis Ti e/_dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha 'os Sha Da byas pas/_tsa D+D+h+wi/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsa k+She/_tsa k+Sh+wa he/_tsa k+Sh+ma he/_lang la/_brtsegs pa sogs kyis ka phyis/_sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka 'os/_Sha ka_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/_tsa k+ShI ta/_tsa k+ShI yA tAM/_tsa k+ShI ran/_skyes bu 
[\[283a.4\]]dbus ma gsum la/_tsa k+ShI thAH/_tsa k+ShA A thAM/_tsa k+ShI d+h+waM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsa k+ShI ya/_tsa k+ShA ba hi/_loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tsa Sh+TAM/_tsa k+ShA tAM/_tsa k+Sha tAM/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tsa k+Sh+wa/_tsa k+Sha thAM/_tsa D+h+raM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsa k+Shai/_tsa k+ShA thAM/_tsa D+d+h+raM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsa k+Shai/_tsa k+ShA ba hai/_tsa k+ShA 
[\[283a.5\]]ma hai/_lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a tsa Sh+Ta/_a tsa k+ShA tAM/_a tsa k+Sha ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a tsa Sh+ShAH/_a tsa k+ShA thAM/_a tsa D+d+hAM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a tsa k+Shi/_a tsa k+Sh+wa hi/_tsa k+Shi ngaHkhyA nya/_tsa k+Shing gi khyA nya'o/_/rkyen byings phyed pa'i ming can pha rol la tsa k+Shing 
[\[283a.6\]]ni khyA nya zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/_nya yig ni a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug pa'i don te/_lung la/_tsa k+Shing /_khyA nya du bsgyur/_a s+ya ti/_bak+ti khyA ti rnams la ang ngos/_ts+li ang du bsgyur/_A ta kyis dbyi 'os A dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a 
[\[283a.7\]]khyad/_a khya tAM/_a khyan/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a khyaH/_a khya taM/_a khya ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a khyaM/_a khyA ba/_a khyA ma/_de bzhin du/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a khya ta/_a khye tAM/_a khya n+ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a khya thAH/_a khye thAM/_a khya d+h+yaM/
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a khye/_a khyA ba hi/_a khyA ma hi/_'grel par lung drangs pa/_k+sA nya pI Sh+Ta/_k+sA nya'ang 'dod do/_/rkyen byings phyed pa'i ming can pha rol la tsa k+Shing ni khyA ru 'gyur bar ma zad yang na k+sA nya zhes bar bsgyur ba'ang 'dod de/_tsa tsa k+Shing /_skA ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi lung gi a 
[\[283b.2\]]tang la/_ya ma/_ra ma/_nam sogs kyis ka dang iT byin pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a k+sA sI ta/_a k+sA sI ShuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a k+sA sIH/_a k+sA si Sh+Ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a k+sA si ShaM/_a k+sA si Sh+wa/_a k+sA sa Sh+mi/_tang la ts+li si tsa ra bsgyur 
[\[283b.3\]]pa'i sa 'dren kho na ste/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a k+ShA sta/_a k+ShA sa tAM/_ak+ShAs ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a k+ShA s+jAH/_a k+ShA sA [\[]brAM/[\] ]a k+ShA ng+hAM/_ng+ha la'ang ngos sa phyis/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a k+ShA si/_ak+ShA swa hi/_ak+ShA sma hi/_yang 'grel bar/_tsak+Shing spang ba'am bor ba'i 
[\[283b.4\]]don dang 'brel ba na khyA nya dang k+sA dag tu 'gyur bam yin zhing de'i tshe tang kho na 'jug go zhes bshad pas/_khya nya sogs su ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_bal dang po'i iT sbyar bas/_lung gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a tsa k+Shi Sh+Ta/_a tsa k+Shi ShA tAM/_a tsa k+Shi Sha ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a tsa k+Shi Sh+dzAH/
[\[283b.5\]]a tsa k+Shi ShA thAM/_a tsa k+Shi d+h+wa/_a tsa k+Shi D+h+wi/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a tsa k+Shi Shi/_a tsa k+Shi Sh+wa hi/_a tsa k+Shi Sh+ma hi/_bA liTi/_liT la yang na'o/_/liT pha rol la tsa k+Shing nyid du gnas pa dang khyA nya ru bsgyur ba dang k+sA nya ru bsgyur ba rnams yang na bar bya ste/_tsa k+Shing nyid du gnas pa'i phyogs la tang rnams 
[\[283b.6\]]sbyar bas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tsa tsa kI/_tsa tsa k+ShA te/_tsa tsa k+Shi re/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tsa tsa k+Shi Shi/_tsa tsa k+ShA the/_tsa tsa k+Shi d+hA+e/_tsa tsa kI D+h+re/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsa tsa k+She/_tsa tsa k+She ba he/_tsa tsa k+Shi ma he/_tsa tsa k+Shi ma he/_tsa k+Shing khyA nya ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_a tang dang tang gnyis ka 
[\[283b.7\]]'jug pas/_a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tsa khyo/_tsa khya tuH/_tsa khyAH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tsa khyi tha/_tsa khyA tha/_tsa khya thuH/_tsa khya/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsa khyau/_tsa khyi ba/_tsa khyi ma/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tsa khye/_tsa khyA te/_tsa khyi re/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]la/_tsa khyi She/_tsa khyA the/_tsa khyi d+h+we/_tsa khyi D+h+we/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsa khyi/_tsa khyi ba he/_tsa khyi ma he/_yang tsa k+Shing k+sA nya ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs la 'ang a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug cing a yig mtha' can yin pas cho ga rnams khyA nya dang 'dra ste/_a tang gi skyes bu dang 
[\[284a.2\]]po gsum la/_tsa k+sau/_tsa k+sa tuH/_tsa k+suH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tsa k+si tha/_tsa k+sA tha/_tsa k+sA thuH/_tsa k+sa/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsa k+sau/_tsa k+si ba/_tsa k+si ma/_de bzhin du/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tsa k+se/_tsa k+sA te/_tsa k+sI re/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tsa k+si She/_tsa k+sa the/_tsa k+si d+h+we/_tsa k+si 
[\[284a.3\]]D+h+we/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsa k+se/_tsa k+si ba he/_tsa k+si ma he/_luT la khyA nyu ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi a tang la/_khyA tA/_khyA tA si/_sogs dang /_tang la/_khyA tA/_khyA tA se/_sogs so/_/k+sA nya ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi a tang la/_k+sA tA/_k+sA tA si/_sogs dang /_tang la/_k+sA tA/_k+sA tA se/_sogs 
[\[284a.4\]]so/_/yang bor ba'i don la sbyor ba'i dbang du byas na/_tsa k+Shing nyid gnas pa la luT tang rnams sbyar/_bal dang po'i iT byin pas/_tsa k+Shi tA/_tsa k+Shi tA rau/_tsa k+Shi tA raH/_tsa k+Shi tA se/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ming la/_khya nya ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi a tang la gzhan yang brtsegs pa dang po sogs 
[\[284a.5\]]kyis er bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar bya ste/_khyA yA ta/_khyA yA stAM/_khyA yA suH/_sogs sam/_khye yA ta/_khye yA stAM/_khyA yA suH/_sogs sam/_khye yA ta/_khye yA stAM/_khye yA su:/_sogs so/_/tang la er mi bsgyur bas/_khyA sI Sh+Ta/_khyA sI yA stAM/_khyA sI ran/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_k+sA nya ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs la'ang a tang 
[\[284a.6\]]la A nyid dang e yang na bar byas pas/_k+sA yA ta/_k+sA yA stAM/_k+sA yA suH/_sogs sam/_k+se yA ta/_k+se yA stAM/_k+se yA suH/_sogs so/_/tang la er mi bsgyur bas/_k+sA sA Sh+Ti/_k+sA sI yA stAM/_k+sA sI ran/_sogs so/_/tsa k+Shid nyid du gnas ba'i phyogs la tang rnam sa sbyar/_bal dang po'i iT 
[\[284a.7\]]byin pas/_tsa k+Shi ShI Sh+Ta/_tsa k+Shi ShI yA stAM/_tsa k+Shi ShI ran/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la khyA nya bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi a tang la/_khyA s+ya ti/_khyA s+ya taH/_khyA s+ya n+ti/_sogs dang /_tang la/_khyA s+ya te/_khyA s+ye te/_khyA s+ya n+te/_sogs so/_/k+sA nya ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi a tang la/_k+sA s+ya ti/_k+sA s+ya taH/_k+sA s+ya n+ti/
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]sogs dang /_tang la/_k+sA s+ya te/_k+sA s+ye te/_k+sA s+ya n+te/_sogs so/_/tsa k+Shing rang du gnas pa'i phyogs la tang rnams kho na 'jug/_/bal dang po'i iT sbyar bas/_tsa k+Shi Sh+ya te/_tsa k+Shi Sh+ye te/_tsa k+Shi Sh+ya n+te/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la 'ang khyA nya ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi a tang la/
[\[284b.2\]]a k+sA s+ya ta/_a k+sA s+ya tAM/_a k+sA s+ya na/_sogs dang /_tang la/_a k+sA s+ya ta/_a k+sA s+yi tAM/_a k+sA s+ya n+ta/_sogs so/_/k+sA nya ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi a tang la/_a k+sA s+ya ta/_a k+sA s+ya tAM/_a k+sA s+yan/_sogs dang /_tang la/_ak+sA s+ya tAM/_a k+sA s+ya n+ta/_sogs so/_/tsa k+Shing 
[\[284b.3\]]nyid du gnas pa'i phyogs la tang rnams sbyar te/_bal dang po'i iT byin kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyi sa Shar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a tsa k+Shi Sh+yu te/_a tsa k+Shi Sh+ye tAM/_a tsa k+Shi Sh+ya n+ta/_sogs so/_!_/IDa bstod pa la'o zhes ba'i tang rnams sbyar te/_laTa'i skyes bu 
[\[284b.4\]]dang po'i gcig tshig la/_la tang sha ba 'jig_/Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/_khar la tsa ra 'os/_/Da Ta/_Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os taT drangs pas/_I T+Te/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_IDA te/_I Da te/_I Da dza no r+d+h+wa la'ang ngo /_/I Da dang dza na skyed par 
[\[284b.5\]]byed pa dang /_I sha dbang phyug nyid las kyang byings thams cad pa se dang ng+h+wa dag la iT A gam ster te/_laTa'i skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_I Di She/_I Di the/_I Di ng+h+we/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_I De/_I DA he/_A T+ma he/_ling la/_a ta mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sI 
[\[284b.6\]]yuTa'i sra phyis nas drangs pas/_I DI ta/_I DI yA tAM/_I DI ran/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_I DI thAH/_I DI yA thAM/_I DI d+h+waM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_I DI ya/_I DI ba hi/_I DI ma hi/_loT la/_khar la tsa ra dang /_Sha Tu la Sha Tu sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_skyes 
[\[284b.7\]]bu dang po gsum la/_I T+TAM/_I DA tAM/_I Da tAM/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_I Di Sh+Sha/_I Da dza na dag ka ng+h+wa la'ang ngos iT/_I DA thA/_I Di d+h+wi/_I Da dza na dag la ng+h+wa la'ang ngos iT/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_I Dai/_I DA ma hai/_I DA ma hai/_lang la/_a tsa dang po'i AT dang /_AT 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]las kyang ngos 'phel ba/_/bar la tsa ra dang /_Sha Tu la Sha Tu sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ai T+Ta/_ai DA tAM/_ai Da ha/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ai T+TAH/_ai TA thAM/_ai Di ng+h+waM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ai Di/_ai D+wi hi/_ai D+ma hi 
[\[285a.2\]]lung la/_bal dang po'i iT byin pas/_ai Di Sh+Ta/_ai Di ShA tAM/_ai Di Sha ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_e Di Sh+TAH/_ai Di ShA thAM/_ai Di ng+h+waM/_ai Di ng+h+waM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ai Di Shi/_ai Di Sh+wa hi/_a+liDa dza na dag la ng+h+wa la 'ang ngos iT/_ai Di Sh+ma hi/_liT la byings i tsa dang po 
[\[285a.3\]]lci ba ldan pa sogs kyis A ma sbyor ba dang mi sbyor ba yang na bar byas pas/_I DA tsa kre/_IDI ba b+hU ba sogs sam/_I Da la/_liT byings gnyis brjod/_a ka 'dra ba sogs byas bas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_I De/_I DA te/_I Di re/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_I De 
[\[285a.4\]]She/_I DA the/_I Di D+h+we/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_I De/_I Di ba he/_I bi ma he/_luT la bal dang po'i iT byin pas/_I Di tA/_I Di tA se/_sogs dang /_smon pa'i ling la'ang iT byin pas/_I Di ShI Sh+Ta/_I Di ShI yA stAM/_I Di ShI ran/_sogs so/_l+r-iT la'ang /
[\[285a.5\]]iT byin pas/_I Di Sh+ya te/_I Di Sh+ya n+te/_I Di Sh+ya n+te/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du l+r-ing la/_A+ai Di Sh+ya ta/_ai Di Sh+ye tAM/_aiDi Sh+ya n+ta/_sogs so/_!_/I sha dbang phyug nyid la'o zhes pa'ang bya ba thams cad bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra ste/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_I Sh+Te/_U shA te/_I sha te/
[\[285a.6\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_/I shi She/_I shA the/_A+e shi ng+hI/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_I she/_I shwa he/_I shwa he/_ling la/_A ta mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sI yuTa'i sa phyis nas drangs pas/_I shI ta/_I shI yA tAM/_I _brash+tsa/_b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis sa Sha/_Sha Tu la Sha Tu sogs/_shI ran/
[\[285a.7\]]sogs so/_/loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_I Sh+TAM/_I shA tAM/_I sha tAM/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_I shi Sh+wa/_I shA thAM/_I shi ng+h+waM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_I shai/_I shA ba hai/_I shA ma hai/_lang la a tsa dang po'i AT dang 'phel ba byas pas/_ai Sh+Ta/_ai shA tAM/_ai sha ta/_skyes bu 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]dbus ma gsum la/_ai Sh+ThAH/_ai shA thaM/_ai shi ng+h+waM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ai shi/_ai shwa hi/_ai sh+ma hi/_lung la/_bal dang po'i iT byin pas/_ai shi Sh+Ta/_ai shi ShA tAM/_ai shi Sha ta/_sogs so/_/liT la A ma sbyor ba dang mi sbyor ba yang na bar byas pas/_I shI tsa kri/_I shAM ba

[\[286a.1\]]ngos A ma sbyar bas/_A sAM tsa kre/_A sAM ba b+hU ba/_A sA mA sa/_sogs so/_/luT la bal dang po'i iT byin pas/_A si tA/_A si tA se/_A si tA se/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la'ang iT byin pas/_A si ShI Sh+Ta/_A si ShI yA stAM/_A si ShI ran/_sogs so/_/

[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]ma byin pa'i phyogs la/_a so Sh+ya ta/_a so Sh+ya tAM/_a so Sh+ya n+ta/_sogs so/_!_/shIng nyal ba la'o zhes pa la'ang tang rnams 'jug ste/_shIngaHsarba d+h+wa tu ke gu NaH/_shIng gi byings thams cad pa la yon tan no/_/byings thams cad pa'i ming can rnams pha rol la shIng gi yon tan

[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]la/_shi shi ye/_shi shi yi ba he/_shi shi yi ma he/_luT la bal dang po'i iT dang /_byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_sha yi tA/_sha yi tA se/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_smon pa'i ling la/_sha yi ShI Sh+Ta/_sha yi ShI yA stAM/_sha yi

[\[288a.4\]]a d+hI yA te/_a d+hI ya te/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a d+hI She/_a d+hI yA the/_a d+hI d+he/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a d+hI ye/_a d+hI ba he/_a d+hI ma he/_ling la/_ata ma yin pa la ling gis dbyi 'os sa phyis/_a ka 'dra ba la ring por gyur d+hi na pha rol dbyi ba sogs byas pas/_skyes bu

[\[288a.7\]]d+h+yai ya te/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a d+h+yai thAH/_a d+h+yai yA thAM/_a d+h+yai d+h+waM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a d+h+yai yi/_a d+h+yai ba hi/_a d+h+yai ma hi/_bi Sh+hA ShA lung l+r-ing dag la gdam pa'o/_/lung l+r-ing /_sngon la byings ing la a tsa lash+nu sogs kyis i ya/_de nas ma tsa dang po sogs kyis A Ta/_AT las kyang 'phel ba/
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]dag pha rol la ing ni gAng zhes par bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka can du bya'o/_/gang kuTA di b+h+yo \u0f85ny+Nita di ta/_gAng kuT la sogs pa rnams las nya ta 'gro ba ma yin pa rnams nga 'gro ba'o/_/ing bsgyur ba'i gAng dang kuT la sogs pa rnams las pha rol gyi rkyen nya Na 'gro ba ma yin 
[\[288b.2\]]pa rnams la/_nga 'gro ba'i ming can zhes brda chad byed de/_dgos pa ni yon tan sogs mi byed pa'i don no/_/g+hu mA s+thA bA pA dza hA ti sAM ha li/_g+hu mA s+thA gA bA dza hA ti sA rnams kyi ha la la'o/_/byings g+hu'i ming can rnams dang /_mAng gus pa/_Sh+Tha'agro ba las ldog pa/_ing bsgyur ba'i gAng 
[\[288b.3\]]pA 'thung ba/_dza hA ti ste o hA ka gtong ba/_sA ste Sho mtha'i las rnams kyi A ta ni rkyen kang 'gro ba'i ming can ha la dang po can pha rol la I ta du bsgyur bar bya ste/_lung l+r-ing la 'dam ka 'os/_ing gAng du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la lung sbyar/_mdo 'dis A ta I ta/_a d+hi sngon/_ts+li sa tsa ra bsgyur ba 
[\[288b.4\]]sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a d+h+ya gI Sh+Ta/_a d+h+ya gI ShA tAM/_a d+h+ya gI Sha ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a d+h+ya gI Sh+ThAH/_a d+h+ya gI ShA thAM/_a d+h+ya gi d+h+y+waM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a d+h+ya gI Shi/_a d+h+ya gI Sh+wa hi/_a d+h+ya gI Sh+ma hi/_gAng du ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_a tsa 
[\[288b.5\]]dang po'i a+waT/_AT las kyang ngos 'phel ba byas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a d+h+yai Sh+Ta/_a d+h+yai ShA tAM/_a d+h+yai Sha ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a d+h+yai Sh+ShAH/_a d+h+yai ShA thAM/_a d+h+yai ng+hAM/_a skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a d+h+ya gI Shi/_a d+h+ya gI Sha hi/_a d+h+ya gI Sh+ma hi/_gAng du ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_a tsa 
[\[288b.6\]]ing ni gAng du bsgyur bar bya ste/_a ng+hi sngon ma'i ing la liT/_mdo 'dis gAng du bsgyur/_gnyis brjod/_iT la'ang Ata kyi dbyi 'os/_A ta dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a d+hi dzo ge/_a d+hi dza gA te/_a d+hi dza gi re/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a d+hi dza gi She/
[\[288b.7\]]a d+hi dza gA ze/_a d+hi dza gi d+h+we/_a d+hi dza gi D+h+we/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a d+hi dza ge/_a d+hi dza gi ba he/_a d+hi dza gi ma he/_luT la byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_a d+h+ye tA/_a d+h+ye tA se/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du smon pa'i ling la/_a d+h+ye ShI Sh+Ta/_a d+h+ye ShI 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]yA stAM/_a d+h+ye ShI ran/_sogs so/_/l-iT la'ang yon tan byas pas/_a d+h+ye Sh+ya te/_sogs so/_/l+r-ing la/_lung l+r-ing dag la gang mang 'os/_gAng du bsgyur ba yang na bar byas bas/_gAng gi phyogs la/_g+hu mA s+thA gA sogs kyis Ita du bsgyur bas/_a d+h+ya gAM Sh+ya ta/
[\[289a.2\]]a d+h+ya gI Sh+ye dAM/_a d+h+ya gI Sh+ya n+ta/_sogs dang /_ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_a tsa dang po sogs kyis AT/_AT las kyang ngos 'phel ba byas pas/_ad+h+yai Sh+ya ta/_a d+h+yai Sh+ye tAM/_a d+h+yai Sh+ya n+ta/_sogs so/_!_/dI d+hIng 'bar ba dang rtse ba dag la'o zhes pa la'ang tang rnams sbyor te/_hal dang po 
[\[289a.3\]]rnams la bya ba med/_a tsa dang po rnams la/_a'i a tsa gcig ma yin pa sogs kyis ya ru bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs bas/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_dI d+hA te/_dI d+h+ya te/_dI d+h+ya te/_skyes bu dbu ma gsum la/_dI d+h+yI She/_dI d+h+yI the/_dI d+h+yI d+h+yA+e/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_dI 
[\[289a.4\]]d+he/_dI d+hI ba he/_dI d+hI ma he/_yA ba r+Na yo rdI d+h+hi be byoH/_yi i yig dag la dI d+hI be bI dag gi'o/_/rkyen yi ste ya yig dang i yig dang pha rol la/_dI d+hI dang be bI dag gi mtha' dbyi ste/_dI d+hIl/_ling /_ata mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sI yuTa'i sra phyis/_mdo 'dis byings kyi I 
[\[289a.5\]]gyis drangs pas/_dI d+hI ta/_dI d+hI yA tAM/_dI d+hI ran/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_dI d+hI thAH/_dI d+hI yA thAM/_dI d+hI d+hAM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_dI d+hI ba he/_dI d+hI ma hi/_loT la/_laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_dI d+hI tAM/_dI d+hI dAM/
[\[289a.6\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_dI d+hI Sh+wa/_dI d+h+ya thAM/_dI d+hI d+hAM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_dI d+h+ye/_dI d+h+yA ba hai/_dI d+h+yA ma hai/_de bzhin du/_lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a dI d+hI ta/_a dI d+h+ya tAM/_a dI d+h+ya ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a dI d+hI thAH/_a dI d+h+yA thAM/_a dI d+hI d+h+waM/_skyes bu 
[\[289a.7\]]phyi ma gsum la/_a dI d+hi/_yi i yig dag la dI d+hI bo bI dag gi 'os I phyis/_a dI d+hI ba hi/_dI d+hI be bI iT rnams kyi 'os yon tan mi byed/_a dI d+hI ma hi/_lung la bal dang po'i iT yi yig dag la dI d+hI be bI dag gi 'os byings mtha'i I phyis pas/_a dI d+hi Sh+Ta/_a dI d+hi ShA tAM/_a dI d+hi ShA ta/_sogs so/_/
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]liT la/_a tsa gcig ma yin pa sogs kyis A ma sbyar bas/_dI d+hI tsa kre/_dI d+h+yAM ba b+h+yAb/_dI d+h+yA mA sa/_sogs so/_luT la/_bal dang po'i iT yi i yig dag la dI d+h+yI me bI dag gi 'os I phyis pas/_dI d+hi tAM/_dI d+hi tA se/_de bzhin du/_smon pa'i ling la'ang iT ster ba sogs 
[\[289b.2\]]byas pas/_dI d+hi ShI Sh+Ta/_dI d+hi ShI yA stAM/_dI d+hi ShI ran/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la iT byin I dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_dI d+hi ShA te/_dI d+hi Sh+ye te/_dI d+hi Sh+ya n+te/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+ring la/_a dI d+hi Sh+ya ta/_a dI d+hi Sh+ya tAM/_a dI d+hi Sh+ya n+ta/_sogs so/_!_/be bI rngan ba 
[\[289b.3\]]mtshungs pa la'o zhes ba la'ang tang rnams 'jug cing cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra ste/_be bI te/_be byA te/_be bya te/_sogs so/_!_/dI Sha mi dga' ba dag la'o zhes pa la a tang rnams 'jug ste/_ba 'gro ba'i ming can rnams la bu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan dang /
[\[289b.4\]]Sha Tu la Sha Tu sogs byas pas/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_dwi Sh+Ti/_dwi Sh+TaH/_dwi Sh+TaH/_dwi ShA n+ti/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_dwi k+Shi/_dI Sh+ThaH/_dwi Sh+Tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_dwi Sh+mi/_dwi Sh+wa/_dwa Sh+maH/_ling la Sha 'dren pa kho na ste/_dwi Sh+yA ta/_dwi Sh+yA tAM/_dwi Sh+yAH/_sogs so/_loTa'i 
[\[289b.5\]]skyes bu dang po gsum la/_dwe Sh+Tu/_dwe th+TA ta/_dwi Sh+TAM/_dwi Sha n+tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_dwi n+d+hi/_dwi Sh+TA ta/_dwi Sh+TaM/_dwi Sh+Ta/_sa la na D+ha dag gis ka_/kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis Sha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_dwe ShA Ni/_dwe ShA pa/_dwe ShA ma/_lang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/
[\[289b.6\]]a dwe Ta/_a dwe Ta/_a dwi Sh+TaM/_mang tshig la/_dwi Sha sh+tsa/_dwi Sha las kyang ngo /_/dwi Sha _la/_si ba/_si hi/_dzu ha las hi d+hi/_mtha' dz+hal sogs Sha Da/_Sha Tul Sha Tu 'os d+ha d+ha drangs/_las kyang pha rol gyi lang bsgyur ba'i dz+hi dzus su yang na 'gyur te/_a dwi ShuH/_a dwi Sha na/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a dreT

[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]gi ka 'os/_Sha ka/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha ra bsgyur ba sogs byas bas/_a dwi k+Shata/_a dwi k+Sha tAM/_a dwi k+Sha na sogs so/_/liT la gnyis brjod Na la gnyis dang thal ma gtogs gzhan ma rnams la/_swa ny+dza brtsegs pa sogs kyis kita 
[\[290a.2\]]yang na bar byas pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_de dwi Sha/_di dre Sha tuH/_di dwi Sha tuH/_di dwe ShuH/_di dwi ShuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_di dwi Shi tha/_di dwe Sh+Sha/_di dwa Sha thuH/_di dwi Sha thuH/_di dwi Sha/_di dwi Sha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_di dwe Sha/_di dwe Shi ba/_di dwi Shi ba/_di dwe Shi ma/_di dwi Shi ma/_luT

[\[290a.6\]]kyis da d+ha bu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan/_khar la tsa ra 'os/_g+ha ka _/kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur bas/_d+ho k+Shi/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_thas du g+haH/_du g+ha/_tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_do h+mi/_du hAH/_du h+maH/_du h+maH/_sgrub tshul de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs

[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sI yuT 'is phyis nas ha drangs pas/_du hI taM/_du nI yA tAM/_du hI ran/_sogs so/_/loT la laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/_a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_do g+b+hu/_du g+b+hA ta/_du g+b+haM/_du ha n+tu/_skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/_la sipa/_si'i

[\[291a.1\]]skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/_a d+hu k+Sha thAH/_a d+huk+d+hAH/_gnyis tshig la/_a d+hu k+ShA thAM/_mang tshig la/_a d+hu k+Sha d+hAM/_a d+hu g+d+hAM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a d+hu k+Shi/_a d+hu k+Shi/_a d+hu k+Sha ba hi/_a d+hu k+ShA ma hi/_liT la gnyis brjod pa sogs byas pas/_a tang gi

[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]bas/_la k+ShI Sh+Ta/_la k+ShI yA stAM/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan/_ha'i D+ha/_sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a tang la/_le k+Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_tang la/_le k+Sh+ya te/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi a

[\[292b.6\]]skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/_a tang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_U r+NoM tu/_U r+No tu/_U r+Nu tA ta/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_U r+Nu tAM/_U r+Nu ba n+tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_U r+Nu hi/_U r+Nu tA ta/_U r+Nu taM/_U r+Nu ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_U r+Na bA Ni/_U r+Na 
[\[292b.7\]]bA ba/_U r+Na bA ma/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_U r+Nu tAM/_U r+Nu pA tAM/_U r+Nu ba tAM/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_U r+Nu Sha/_U r+Nu bA thAM/_U r+Nu d+h+raM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_U r+Nu bi/_U r+Na bA bai/_U r+Na bA ma hai/_gu No nya pri k+the/_a pr-i k+ta la yon tan no/_U r+No ti'i byings thams 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]cad pa a pr-i k+ta ste/_yi ge ha la gcig pa pa 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol 'phel ba yang na bar mi byed par yon tan kho na byed de/_lang gi a tang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_la ti pa ita kyi 'ang ngos i phyis mi ngo 'dis yon tan/_a tsa dang po'i aT 
[\[293a.2\]]aT las kyang ngos 'phel ba byas pas/_au r+No ta/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_au r+Nu tAM/_A+au r+Nu ban/_de bzhin du/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_au r+NoH/_au r+Nu taM/_au r+Nu ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_au r+Na baM/_au r+Nu ba/_au r+Nu ma/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_au r+Nu ta/
[\[293a.3\]]o r+Nu bA tAM/_au r+Nu ba ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_au r+Nu thAH/_au r+Nu ba th-I/_au r+Nu d+h+waM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_au r+Nu bi/_au r+Nu ba hi/_au r+Nu ma hi/_U r+No te rbi b+h+wa ShA/_A r+No ti'i gdam nga'o/_U r+No ti'i iT dang por yod pa'i si tsa ba ra smi pa da can pha rol la 'phel ba dang yon tan 
[\[293a.4\]]gdam nga can du bya ste/_lung gi a tang gi 'phel ba byas pa'i phyogs la/_au r+NA bI ta/_au r+NA bi Sh+TaM/_au r+NA bi ShuH/_sogs dang /_yon tan kyi phyogs la/_au r+Na bI ta/_au r+Na bi ShuM/_au r+Na bi ShuH/_bi b+hA Sho r+NoH/_U r+Nu'i yang na'o/_/U r+Nu'i pha rol gyi iT dang po can gyi rkyen gang yin kyang 
[\[293a.5\]]yang na nga 'gro ba'i ming can du bya ste/_dgos pa ni yon tan dang 'phel ba gnyis mi byed pa'i don no/_/ngi ta kyi phyogs la a tsa la sh+nu byings sogs kyi u bar bsgyur bas/_au r+Nu bI ta/_au r+Nu bi Sh+TaM/_au r+Nu bi ShuH/_sogs so/_/tang la/_U r+Nu'i yang na 'os/_yon tan dang u bar bsgyur ba yang na bar 
[\[293a.6\]]byas pas/_au r+Nu bi Sh+Ta/_au r+Nu bi ShA tAM/_au r+Nu bi Sha ta/_sogs sam/_au r+Nu bi Sh+Te/_au r+Nu bi ShA tAM/_au r+Nu bi Sha ta/_sogs so/_/'grel par lung drangs pa/_U r+Nu te rA ma ni She ng+ha \u0f7f/_U r+Nu ti las A ma mi 'gyur ro/_/gong du r-i ts+tsha ma yin pa'i i tsa dang po lci ba ldan pa la liT pha rol la A ma sbyor 
[\[293a.7\]]bar bshad kyang do'i dmigs bsal/_i tsa dang po lci ba ldan pa yin kyang U ma sbyor ba ma yin no/_/a dzA di r+d+wi tI ya s+ya/_a tsa dang po las gnyis pa'i 'o/_/a tsa dang por yod pa'i byings las gnyis pa de a tsa gar rung gcig dang ldan pa yin na/_liT sogs byings gnyis brjod 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]pa'i rgyu mtshan can pha rol la a tsa dang po de gnyis mi brjod par cha shas hal srog ldan de gnyis brjod do/_/na na drAHsaM yo gA da yaH/_na dang rnams brtsegs pa'i dang po rnams ma yin no/_/na dang da dang ra yig rnams a tsa dang po'i pha rol hal a tsa ldan pa brtsegs pa'i dang po na yod pa 
[\[293b.2\]]rnams ni liT sogs pha rol la gnyis su mi 'gyur te/_U r+Nu la/_liT/_a tsa dang po las gnyis pa'i 'os nu gnyis brjod/_mdo 'dis ra gnyis su mi 'gyur/_'phel ba dang yon tan dang u bar bsgyur ba sogs rkyen so so'i thob ltar bsgrubs pas/_a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum 
[\[293b.3\]]la/_U r+Nu nA ba/_U r+Nu nu ba tu/_U r+Nu nu ba tuH/_U r+Nu nu buH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_U r+Nu na bi tha/_U r+Nu nu bi tha/_U r+Nu nu ba thuH/_U r+Nu ni ba/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_U r+Nu nA ba/_U r+Nu nA ba_U r+Nu na bi ba/_U r+Nu nu bi ba/_U r+Nu na bi [\[]mas[\]]/_U r+Nu nu bi [\[]mas/[\] ]bde bzhin du/_tang gi skyes bu 
[\[293b.4\]]dang po gsum la/_U r+Nu nu be/_U r+Nu nu bA te/_U r+Nu nuM bi re/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_U r+Nu'i yang na 'os/_yon tan dang u ba yang na bar byas ba'o/_/U r+Nu nu bi She/_U r+Nu na bi She/_/U r+Nu nu/_Nal/_bA the/_U r+Nu na bi d+h+we/_U r+Nu na bi D+h+we/_U r+Nu nu bi d+h+we/_U r+Nu nu bi D+h+we/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_U r+Nu nu be/
[\[293b.5\]]U r+Nu na bi ba he/_U r+Nu nu bi ba he/_U r+Nu na ri ma he/_U r+Nu bi ma he/_luT la/_U r+Nu'i yang na 'os yon tan dang u ba yang na bar byas pas/_a tang la/_U r+Nu bi tA/_U r+Nu bi tA si/_sogs sam/_U r+Nu bi tA/_U r+Nu bi tA si/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_tang la yang U r+Nu bi tA/_U r+Nu bi

[\[293b.7\]]pas/_U r+Nu bi ShI Sh+Ta/_U r+Na bi ShI yA stAM/_U rna bi ShI ran/_sogs sam/_U r+Nu di ShI Sh+Ta/_sogs so/_/liT la'ang iT byin/_yon tan dang u yang na bar byas pas/_a tang la/_U r+Nu bi Sh+ya ti/_U r+Nu bi Sh+ya taH/_U r+Na bi Sh+ya n+ti/_sogs sam/_U r+Nu bi Sh+ya ti/_sogs so/_/ter la'ang /
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]U r+Na bi Sh+ya t+ye/_U r+Na bi Sh+ye te/_U r+Na bi Sh+ya n+te/_sogs sam/_U r+Nu bi Sh+ya te/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_w-ing gi a tang la/_au r+Na bi Sh+ya ta/_au r+Nu bi Sh+ya tAM/_au r+Na bi Sh+ya na/_sogs sam/_au r+Nu bi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/tang la/_au r+Na bi Sh+ya ta/_au r+Na bi Sh+ya tAM/

[\[295b.1\]]buH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tsu k+Sha bi tha/_tsu k+Sho tha/_tsu k+Sha bathuH/_tsu k+Shu bathuH/_tsu k+Sha ba/_tsu k+Shu ba/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsu k+Sha ba/_tsu k+Sha ba/_tsu k+Sha bi ba/_tsu k+Shu bi ba/_tsu k+Sha bi ma/_tsu k+Shu bi ma/_luT la bal dang po'i yon tan byas pas/_k+Sha bi tA/_k+Sha bi tA si/

[\[296b.7\]]Nar bsgyur bas/_a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_u bA tsa/_U tsa tuH/_U tsaH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_u ba k+k+ra/_u ba tsi tha/_U tsa thAH/_U tsa/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_u bA tsa/_u ba tsi/_U tsi ba/_U tsi ma/_de bzhin du/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_U tse/_U 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]A te/_U tsi re/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_U tsi She/_U tsA the/_U tsi d+h+we/_U tsi D+hA+e/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_U tse/_U tsi ba he/_U tsi ma he/_luT la/_tsu'i ku 'os tsa ka ra bsgyur nas drangs pas/_a tang la/_b+tA/_bak+tA se/_sogs dang /_tang 
[\[297a.2\]]la/_bak+tA/_bak+tA se/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/_ba tsi swa pi sogs kyis saM pra ra Na ra bsgyur bas/_u tsAta/_u ts+yA stAM/_u ts+yA suH/_sogs so/_/tang la/_tsu'i ku 'os/_ka tsa/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha bsgyur bas/_bak+ShI k+Ta/_bak+tI yA tAM/
[\[297a.3\]]bak+ShI ra na/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la 'ang tsu'i ku/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/_a tang la/_ba k+Sh+yi ti/_bak+Sh+ya taH/_bak+Sh+ya n+ti/_sogs dang /_/tang la/_ba k+Sh+ya te/_ba k+Sh+ya n+te/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi a tang la/_a ba k+Sh+ya ta/_a bak+Sh+ya tAM/_a bak+Sh+ya na/_sogs 
[\[297a.4\]]dang /_tang la/_a ba k+Sh+ya ta/_a ba k+She tAM/_a ba k+Sh+ya n+ta/_sogs so/_/i ti bA Nini bya ka ra Na s+ya sU tA da dAd la:samA p+tAH/_zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Ni'i mdo las a da la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so//_//de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na 
[\[297a.5\]]gzhung 'brel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las/_byed pa po'i don gyi sha pa 'jig pa ad la sogs pa rnams la/_laT sogs sbyor tshul spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas par rags pa rnams re zhig 
[\[297a.6\]]rdzogs so//_//da ni dzu ho ti la sogs pa'i cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/_/dzu ho d+yA di b+h+yaHsh+luH/_dzu ho ti la sogs pa rnams las sh+lu'o/_/byis hu sbyin pa la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni dzu ha til sogs pa rnams te/_/de rnams las pha rol gyi byed pa po la sha pa'o zhes pas sha pa ni sh+lu 
[\[297a.7\]]zhes par bsgyur bar bya'o/_/shA+au/_shU la'o/_/sha pa shU ru bsgyur bas shU pha rol la byings a b+h+yAs med pa'i gnyis brjod par bya zhing shU'ang 'jig ste/_!_/hu sbyin pa dang bza' ba dag la'o zhes pa la laT sogs a tang rnams sbyar/_byed pa po la sha pa/_dzu ho te sogs kyis sha ba shUr 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]bsgyur/_mdo 'dis byings gnyis brjod cing shU 'ang 'jig_/ku ha dag gi tsu 'os ha dz+ha/_a b+hA swa'i tsas 'ang 'os ha dz+har bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs bas/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_dzu ho ti/_dzu hu taH/_dzu hwa ti/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_dzu ho Shi/_dzu hu tha:dzu dzu 
[\[297b.2\]]hu tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_dzu ho mi/_dzu hu baH/_dzu hu maH/_dzu hu'i bar gong ltar bsgrubs pas/_ling la/_dzu hu yA ta/_dzu hu yA tAM/_dzu hu yuH/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_dzu ho tu/_dz+ha a ta hu sh+nu dag gi sogs kyis a Na/_dzu hu tA ta/_dzu hu tAM/_dzu ho tu/
[\[297b.3\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_dzu hu d+hi/_dzu hu tA ta/_dzu hu taM/_dzu hu ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_dzu ha bA ni/_dzu ha bA ba/_dzu ha bA ma/_lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a dzu ho ta/_a dzu hu tAM/_a dzu ha buH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a dzu hoH/_a dzu hu taM/_a dzu hu ta/_skyes bu 
[\[297b.4\]]phyi ma gsum la/_a dzu ha baM/_du dz+ha la las hi n+ti/_a dzu hu ma/_lung la si tsa la 'phel bar par smai ba da rnams la 'os/_/'phel ba byas bas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a hau ShI ta/_mi tsa a s+d+ya sta sogs kyis th+hi dzus/_dzus la 'ang ngos yon tan/_a hau Sh+TAM/_a hau ShuH/_skyes bu dbus ma 
[\[297b.5\]]gsum la/_a ho ShIH/_a hau Sh+TaM/_a hau Sh+Ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a hau ShaM/_a hau Sha/_a hau Sh+ma/_liT la/_b+hI hrI b+h+r-i hu bAM shU ba ts+tsa/_b+hI hrI b+h+r-i hu rnams kyi shU bzhin du yang do/_/nyi b+hI 'thigs pa/_hrI ngo tsha ba/_b+h+r-i nya 'dzin pa/_hu sbyin pa rnams kyi leT pha rol la A ma yang na sbyor te/
[\[297b.6\]]A ma la'ang shU bzhin gnyis brjod pa sogs bya ste/_A ma gyi phyogs la/_dzu ha bAM tsa kA ra/_dzu ha bAM ba b+hU ba/_dzu ha bA mA sa/_sogs dang /_A ma ma sbyar ba'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_dzu hA ba/_dzu hu ba tuH/_dzu hu buH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_dzu ha bi tha/_dzu ho tha/
[\[297b.7\]]dzu hu ba thuH/_dzu hu ba/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_dzu hA ba/_dzu ha ba/_dzu hu bi ba/_dzu hu bi ma/_luT la byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_ho tA/_ho tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la kr-ita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring byas pas/_hU yA ta/
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]hU yA stAM/_hU yA suH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_ho Sh+ya ti/_ho Sh+ya n+ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a ho Sh+ya ta/_a ho Sh+ya tAM/_a ho Sh+ya na/_sogs so/_!_/nyi b+hI 'jigs pa a'o 
[\[298a.2\]]zhes ba la'ang a tang rnams sbyor zhing sha ba shUr bsgyur ba sogs cho ga phal cher hu dang 'dra ste/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_bi b+he ti/_b+hi yon n+ya ta ra s+yAM/_b+hI'i yang na'o/_b+hI'i I yig ni byings thams cad ba hal dang po kang 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la i thung ngur yang na 
[\[298a.3\]]bsgyur te/_skyes bu dang po gnyis tshig la/_bi b+hi taH/_bi b+hI taH/_mang tshig la a tsa gcig ma yin pa sogs kyis ya Nar bsgyur bas/_bi b+h+ya ti/_de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_bi b+he She/_bi b+hi thaH/_bi b+hithaH/_bi b+hi tha/_bi b+hI tha/_skyes bu 
[\[298a.4\]]phyi ma gsum la/_bi b+hi mi/_bi b+hi baH/_bi b+hI baH/_bi b+hi maH/_bi b+hI maH/_ling la/_b+hI'i yang na 'os I thung ngur yang na bsgyur bas/_bi b+hi yA ta/_bi b+hi yA tAM/_bi b+hi yuH/_sogs sam/_bi b+hi yA ta/_bi b+hI yA tAM/_bi b+hI yuH/_sogs so/_/loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_bi b+he 
[\[298a.5\]]tu/_bi b+hi tA ta/_bi b+hi tA ta/_bi b+hI tAM/_bi b+hI tAM/_bi b+h+ya tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_bi b+hi hi/_bi b+hI hi/_bi b+hi tA ta/_bi b+hI tA ta/_bi b+hi taM/_bi b+hi taM/_bi b+hi ta/_bi b+hI ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_bi b+ha yA ni/_bi b+ha yA ba/_bi b+ha yA ma/_de bzhin du/_lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum 
[\[298a.6\]]la/_a bi b+he ta/_a bi b+hi tAM/_a bi b+hI tAM/_a bi b+h+yuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a bi b+heH/_a bi b+hi taM/_a bi b+hI taM/_a bi b+hi ta/_a bi b+hi ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a bi b+ha yaM/_a bi b+hi ba/_a bi b+hI ba/_a bi b+hi ma/_a bi b+hI ma/_lung la/_si tsa la 'phel ba par smai ba 
[\[298a.7\]]de rnams la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a b+hai ShI ta/_a b+hai Sh+TAM/_a b+hai ShuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a b+hai ShIH/_a b+hai Sh+TaM/_a b+hai Sh+Ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a b+hai ShaM/_a b+hai Sh+wa/_a b+hai Sh+ma/_liT la/_b+hI hrI sogs kyis A ma yang na bar byed de/_A ma 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]gyi phyogs la/_bi b+ha yAM tsa kA ra/_bi b+ha yAM ba b+hU ba/_bi b+ha yA mA sa/_sogs dang /_A ma ma sbyar ba'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_bi b+hA ya/_bi b+h+ya tuH/_bi b+h+yuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_bi b+ha yi tha/_bi b+he tha/_bi b+h+ya thuH/_bi b+h+ya/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_bi b+hA ya/_bi

[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]yon tan byas pas/_hre tA/_hre tA si/_sogs so/_smon pa'i ling la/_hrI yA ta/_hrI yA stAM/_hrI yA suH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la yon tan byas pas/_hre Sh+ya te/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a hre Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/br-I skyong ba dang rdzogs par

[\[299a.4\]]'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la u ta du bsgyur te/_skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig la/_pi pU rtaH/_mang tshig la/_bi pur ti/_de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_pi pa r+Sh+wi/_pi pU r+thaH/_pi pU r+tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_pi pU rbaH/_pi pU rmaH/

[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]pa bar tuH/_pa pa ruH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_pa pa ri tha/_pa pa thuH/_pa par/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ba pA ra/_pa pa ra/_pa pa ri ba/_pa pa ri ma/_luT la/_b+h+r-i r-I ta dag las yang na 'os iT dang IT yang na bar byas pas/_ba ri tA/_ba ri tA si/_sogs sam/_ba rI tA/_pa 
[\[299b.2\]]rI tA si/_sogs so/_/smon ba'i ling la/_o Sh+Ta'i sngon ma ma yin pa'i a tu 'os/_r-I u tu/_r-i'i a nal ra pha rol los ru/_u pa ng+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/_pU r+YA ta/_pU r+YA stAM/_pA r+YA suH/_l+r-iT la/_b+h+r-i r-I ta sogs kyis i Ta dang IT dang IT yang na bar byas pas/_pa ri Sh+ya ta/_sogs sam/
[\[299b.3\]]pa ri Sh+ya ta/_sogs sam/_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a pa rI Sh+ya ta/_sogs sam/_a pa rI Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/pr-i skyong ba dang rdzogs par byed pa dag la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/_prI dang cung zad mi 'dra bas/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_pi pa rti/_pi pr-i taH/_pi pra ti/_skyes bu 
[\[299b.4\]]dbus ma gsum la/_pi pa r+Shi/_pi pr-i thaH/_pi pr-i tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_pi pa rmi/_pi pr-i baH/_pi pr-i maH/_ling la/_pi pr-i yA ta/_pi pr-i yA tAM/_pi pr-i yuH/_sogs so/_/loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_pi pa rtu/_pi pr-i tA ta/_pi pr-i tAM/_pi pra ti/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/

[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]yA tAM/_pri yA suH/_sogs so/_/l-iT la/_r-iT ha na sogs kyis iT sbyar bas/_ba ri Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l-ing la/_a pa ri Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/o tA ka gtong la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/_shab shUr bsgyur ba sogs kyis 
[\[300a.2\]]bsgrubs pas/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_dza hA ti/_dza hA te Sh+tsa/_dza hA ti'i 'ang ngo /_/g+hu'i mang can ma yin pa'i dza hA ti'i Ata ni byings thams cad pa hal dang po kang 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la i ta du yang na 'gyur ro/_/I ha l+ya g+hoH/_g+hu ma yin pa'i ha la la I'o/_/
[\[300a.3\]]g+hu'i ming can ma yin pa'i byings a d+h+ya sta'i ming can rnams dang rkyen sh+nA'i a+wa ta ni byings thams cad pa ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la I ru bsgyur bar bya ste/_skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig la/_dza hA ti'i 'ang ngos ita dang mdo 'dis I yang na bar byas pas/_dza hi taH/_dza hI taH/_mang tshig 
[\[300a.4\]]la/_a b+h+ya sta las ata 'os dz+nya a ta/_sh+nA a b+h+ya sta dag gi Ata 'os A phyis pas/_dza ha ti/_de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_dza hi si/_dzi hi thaH/_dza hI thaH/_dza hi tha/_dza hI tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_dza hA mi/_dza hi baH/_dza hI baH/_dza hi maH/_dza hI maH/
[\[300a.5\]]lo po yi/_ya la dbyi'o/_/dza hA ti'i A ta ni byings thams cad pa ya yig dang po can pha rol la dbyi ste/_ling la/_dza h+yA ta/_dza h+yA tA/_dza h+yAH/_sogs so/_/loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_dza hA tu/_dza hI tA ta/_dza hI tA ta/_dza hi tAM/_dza hI tAM/_dza ha tu/_A tsa hau/_hil A 'ang 
[\[300a.6\]]ngo /_/loT bsgyur ba'i hi pha rol la dza hA tI'i yang na A nyid du gnas te/_loTa'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/_dza hA hi/_dza hi hi/_dza hI hi/_dza hi tA ta/_dza hI tA ta/_ste gzugs lnga 'byung ngo /_/gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_dza hi taM/_dza hI taM/_dza hI ta/_dza hi ta/_skyes bu phyi ma 
[\[300a.7\]]gsum la/_dza hA ni/_dza hA ba/_dza hA ma/_lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a dza hA ta/_a dza hi tAM/_a dza hI tAM/_a dza hu:/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a dza hA:/_a dza hi taM/_a dza hI taM/_a dza hi ta/_a dza hI ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a dza hAM/_a dza hi ba/_a dza hI 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]ba/_a dza hi ma/_a dza hI ma/_lung la/_ya ma/_ra ma/_nam/_Ata mtha' sogs kyis sa ka dang iT byin pas/_a hA sI ta/_a hA sI Sh+TAM/_a hA si Sh+TAM/_a hA si ShuH/_sogs so/_/liT la gnyis brjod/_A ta las Na la au 'os/_rnal gnyis au/_iT la'ang Ata kyis dbyi ba sogs 
[\[300b.2\]]byas pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_dza hau/_dza ha tuH/_dza huH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_dza hA tha/_dza hi tha/_dza ha thuH/_dza ha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_dza hau/_dza hi ba/_dza hi ma/_luT la/_hA tA/_hA tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_ling la e 'os e ru bsgyur pas 
[\[300b.3\]]te yAta/_he yA stAM/_he yA suH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_hA s+ya ti/_sogs dang /_l+r-ing la/_a hA s+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/ri 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams 'jug ste/_r-i pa/_sha ba shUr bsgyur/_shU la 'ang ngos gnyis brjod/_a rti pi brti dag gi 'ang ngos/_a b+h+yA sa aM/_a 
[\[300b.4\]]b+h+yA sa'i 'dra ba mang ma yin pa la 'os/_i ya ru bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_i ya rti/_i y+r-i taH/_i y+ra ti/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_i ya r+Shi/_i y+rathaH/_i y+r-i tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_i ya rme/_i y+r-i baH/_i y+r-i maH/
[\[300b.5\]]ling la/_i y+r-i yA ta/_i y+r-i yA tAM/_i y+r-i yuH/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_i ya rtu/_i y+r-i tA ta/_a y+r-i tAM/_i y+ra tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_i y+r-i hi/_i y+r-i tA ta/_i y+r-i taM/_i y+r-i ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_i ya rA Ni/
[\[300b.6\]]i ya rA ba/_i ya rA ma/_lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ai yaH/_ai y+r-i tAM/_ai ya ruH/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ai yaH/_ai y+r-i taM/_ai y+r-i ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ai ya raM/_ai y+r-i ba/_ai y+r-i ma/_lung la/_sa rti shwa sti a rti rnams las kyang ngos/_ts+li ang 
[\[300b.7\]]du bsgyur/_r-i dr-i sha dag gis ang la yon tan byas/_a tsa dang po'i AT/_AT yas kyang ngos 'phel ba/_byings thams cad ba sogs kyis yon tan/_hal dI ba sogs kyis tar ras phyis/_pas/_A ra ta/_A ra tAM/_A ran/_sogs so/_/yang na r-i sr-i dag las ang yang na 'o zhes lung 'dren gyis ts+li si tsa ru bsgyur 'phel 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]ba byas pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_A r+ShI ta/_A r+Sh+Ti/_A r+ShuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_A r+ShIH/_A raSh+TaM/_A r+Sh+Ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_A r+ShaM/_A r+Sh+wa/_A r+Sh+ma/_liT la/_byings gnyis brjod/_r-i'i a ha 'os/_a b+h+yAs a/_r-i ts+tsha 
[\[301a.2\]]ti r-I ta rnams kyi 'os 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can ma yin pa rnams la yon tan dang /_Nal gnyis la 'phel ba byas/_a ka 'dra ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_A ra/_A ra tuH/_a ruH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_A ri tha/_A ra thuH/_A ra/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/
[\[301a.3\]]A ra/_A ri ba/_A ri ma/_luT la yon tan byas pas/_a rtA/_a rtA si/_sogs so/_smon pa'i ling la/_a rti brtsegs ba dang po dag gis yon tan nos yon tan byas pas/_a r+yA ta/_a r+yA stAM/_a r+yA suH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_r-ita han dag las s+ya la 'os iT byin/
[\[301a.4\]]byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_a ri Sh+ya ti/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_A ri Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/Ni dzir gtsang ba dang gso ba dag la'o zhes pa la yang a tang rnams sbyor te/_Ni dzAM tra yA NAM gu NaHsh+lo/_Ni dza sogs gsum rnams kyis 
[\[301a.5\]]shU la yon tan no/_/Ni dzi ra gtsang ba/_bi dzir tha dad par 'gyur pa/_bi Sh+l-i khyab pa gsum gyi a b+h+yAs sh+lu pha rol la yon tan du 'gyur te/_Ni dza la/_shapa/_dzu ho ti sogs kyis shapa sh+lur bsgyur/_sh+lu la 'os gnyis brjod/_mdo 'dis a b+h+yA sa yon tan/_tsu'i ku sogs kyis bsgrubs 
[\[301a.6\]]pas/_ne ne k+te/_bu ka mtha' sogs yon tan/_ne ni k+taH/_ne ni dza ti/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ne ne k+Shi/_ne ni k+thaH/_ne ni k+tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ne ni dz+mi/_ne ni dz+ma/_ne ni dz+waH/_ling la/_ne ni dz+yA ta/_ne ni dz+yA tAM/_ne ni dz+yuH/_sogs so/_/loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ne ni k+tu/
[\[301a.7\]]ne ni k+t+ra ta/_ne ni k+tAM/_ne ni dza tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ne ni g+d+hi/_hu dz+hal la hi d+hi tsu'i ku/_ne ni k+tA ta/_ne ni k+taM/_ne ni k+ta/_nA b+h+ya sta s+yA tsi pi ti sA rba ng+hA tu ke/_byings thams cad pa a tsa pa 'gro ba la a b+h+ya sta'i ma yin no/_/byings thams cad pa a tsa dang po pa 'gro ba'i ming can pha 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]rol la a b+h+ya sta'i u pa d+hA yon tan du 'gyur ba ma yin te/_loTa'i skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ne ni dzA ni_ne ni dzA ba/_ne ni dzA ma/_lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a ne nag_/a ne ni ka_/a ne ni k+tAM/_a ne ni dzuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a ne ne ga/_a ne ne ka/_a ne ni k+taM/

[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]be bi dze/_be bi dz+wa he/_be bi dz+ma he/_ling gi a tang la/_be bi dz+yA ta/_be bi dz+yA tAM/_be bi dz+yuH/_sogs dang /_tang la/_mtha' yin pa sogs kyis sI yuTa'i sa phyis drangs pas/_be bi dzI ta/_be bi dzI tAM/_be bi dzI ran/_sogs so/_/loTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po

[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]dz+hal sogs ShaDa/_ShaTu la Sha Tu 'os/_d+ha D+ha/_bi bi Sh+TA ta/_bi biSh+Ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_be bi ShA Ni/_be bi ShA ba/_be bi ShA ma/_lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a be beDa/_a be beT/_a be bi Sh+ShAM/_a be bi ShuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a be

[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]'dam ka 'os/_Ti a ta? du yang na bar byas pas/_dza dzA yA ta/_dza dzA yA tAM/_dza dzA yuH/_sogs sam/_dza dza n+ya ta/_dza dza n+yA tAM/_dza dza n+yuH/_sogs so/_/loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_dza dza n+tu/_dza dzA tA ta/_dza dzA tAM/_dza dz+nya tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_dza dzA hi/_dza dzA tA ta/_dza dzA

[\[303b.6\]]b+h+ya sta dag gi A ta 'os A phyis/_khar la tsar 'os da ta sogs byas bas/_da t+taH/_da da ti/_de bzhin du/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_da dA si/_da t+thaH/_da t+tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_da dA mi/_da dwaH/_da dwaH/_de bzhin du/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_da t+te/_da dA te/_da dA te/_skyes
