[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]kyis A phyis pas/_da dI ta/_da dI yA twaM/_da dI ran/_sogs so/_/loTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_da dA tu/_da dA ta/_da t+tAM/_da da tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_de haM/_da t+tA ta/_da t+taM/_da t+ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_da dA ni/_da dA ba/_da dA ma/_tang 
[\[304a.2\]]gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_da t+t+waM/_da dA tAM/_da da tAM/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_da t+mA/_da dA thAM/_da d+d+hAM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_da dai/_da dA ba hai/_da dA ma hai/_lang gi a tang gi skyes bu dang po/_g+hu as dag gi hi la e ta de a b+h+yAs dbyi ba'ang ngos bsgrubs pa'o/_gsum la/_a da dA ta/_a da t+tAM/
[\[304a.3\]]a da duH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a da dAH/_a da t+taM/_a da t+ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a da dAM/_a da dA/_a da d+ma/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a da t+ta/_a da dA taM/_a da da ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a da t+thAH/_a da dA thAM/_a da d+d+h+waM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum 
[\[304a.4\]]la/_a da di/_a da dwa hi/_a da d+ma hi/_lung gi a tang la/_ga ti/_s+thA/_g+hu/_pA/_b+hU rnams la sogs kyis si tsa phyis pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a dA ta/_a dA tAM/_a duH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a dAH/_a dA tAM/_a dA ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a dAM/_a dA ba/_a dA 
[\[304a.5\]]ma/_tang la/_s+thA/_g+hu dag gi ita 'ang ngos/_si tsa ki ta dang A i ta dz+ha la dang po rnams la/_gzugs thung ngu las sogs kyis si tsang byi ba sogs byas pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a di ta/_a di ShA tAM/_a di ShA ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a di thAH/_a di ShA thAM/_a di d+d+haM/
[\[304a.6\]]skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a di Shi/_a di Sh+wa hi/_a di Sh+ma hi/_liT la/_Na la gnyis au dang /_iT la'ang A ta kyis dbyi 'os/_A phyis pas/_a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_da dau/_da da tuH/_da duH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_da di tha/_da dA tha/_da da thuH/_da da/_skyes bu 
[\[304a.7\]]phyi ma gsum la/_da dau/_da di ba/_da di ma/_de bzhin du/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_da de/_da dA te/_da di re/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_da di Sha/_da dA the/_da di d+he/_da di D+hA+e/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_da de/_da di ba he/_da di ma he/_luTa'i a tang la/_dA dA/_dA tA si/
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]sogs dang /_tang la/_dA tA/_dA tA se/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling gi e tang la/_ling la e 'os/_er bsgyur bas/_de yA ta/_de yA stAM/_de yA suH/_sogs dang /_tang la/_dA yI Sh+Ta/_dA sI yA stAM/_dA sAM ran/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la'ang bya ba gzhan med/_a tang la/_dA s+ya ti/_sogs 
[\[304b.2\]]dang /_tang la/_dA s+ya te/_sogs so/_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi a tang la/_a dA s+ya ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_a dA s+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/Du d+tA nya 'dzin pa dang gso ba dag la'o zhes pa'ang a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/_sha ba sh+lur bsgyur bas/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig 
[\[304b.3\]]tshig la/_da d+h+ra ti/_de d+ha sta thosh+tsa/_da d+ha'i ta tha dag la 'ang 'o/_/Du d+hA nya/_gnyis brjod a b+h+yA sa'i 'ang ngos d+ha sngon ma dar bsgyur bas/_da d+hA zhes pa sh+nA a b+h+ya sta dag gi A ta dbyi 'os A byis/_da d+ha zhes pas pha rol tu ta yig dang tha yig dang 'ang sgras ya dang d+h+wa rnams byung na da de smar yang d+har 
[\[304b.4\]]bsgyur bar bya ste/_laTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig la/_d+ha t+taH/_skyes bu dang po'i mang tshig la/_da d+ha ti/_de bzhin du/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_da d+hA si/_d+ha t+thaH/_d+ha t+tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_da d+hA mi/_da d+hA mi/_da t+t+wa mi/_da d+t+waH/_da t+t+maH/_de bzhin du/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/
[\[304b.5\]]t+ha t+te/_da d+hA te/_da ng+ha ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_d+ha t+se/_da d+hA the/_d+ha d+t+hA/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_da d+he/_da d+hA he/_da d+h+ma he/_ling gi ya tang la/_sh+nA sogs kyis A phyis bas/_da d+h+yA ta/_da d+h+yA tAM/_da d+h+yu \u0f7f/_sogs dang /_tang la/_mtha' yin pa sogs kyis sa phyis/_sh+na sogs 
[\[304b.6\]]A phyis bas/_da d+hI ta/_da d+hI tAM/_da d+hI ran/_sogs so/_/loTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_da d+hA tu/_da d+hA ta/_da t+tAM/_da d+ha tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_d+he hi/_d+ha t+tA ta/_d+he t+taM/_d+ha t+ti/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_da d+hA ni/_da d+hA pa/_da d+hA ma/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum 
[\[304b.7\]]la/_d+ha t+taM/_da d+hA tAM/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_d+ha t+s+ra/_da d+hA thAM/_da d+d+hAM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_da d+ho/_da d+hA ba hai/_da d+hA ma hai/_lang gi a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a da d+hA ta/_a da d+hu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a da d+hA[\[]ma[\] ]a d+ha t+taM/_a d+ha t+ta/
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a da d+hAM/_a da d+h+wa/_a d+h+ma/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a d+ha t+ta/_a da d+hA tAM/_a da d+ha ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a d+ha t+thAH/_a da d+hA thAM/_a d+ha d+d+hAM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a da d+hi/_a da d+hA hi/_a da d+hA hi/
[\[305a.2\]]lung gi a tang la/_ga ti s+thA g+hu sogs kyis si tsa phyis pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a d+hA ta/_a d+hA tAM/_a d+huH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a d+hAH/_a d+hA taM/_a d+hA ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a d+haM/_a d+hA ma/_tang la/_s+thA g+hu dag gi ita 'ang ngos/_si tsa kita dang A ir bskya 
[\[305a.3\]]gzugs thung ngu la 'ang ngos/_si tsa dbyi ba sogs byas bas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a d+hi ta/_a d+hi ShA tAM/_a d+hi Sha ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a d+hi thAH/_a d+hi thAM/_a d+hi d+hAM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a d+hi Shi/_a d+hi Sha hi/_a d+hi Sh+ma hi/_liT la/_iT la'ang A ta kyis dbyi 'os a phyas pas/_a tang 
[\[305a.4\]]gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_da d+hau/_da d+ha tuH/_da d+huH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_da d+hi tha/_da d+hA tha/_da d+hA thuH/_da d+ha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_da d+hau/_da d+hi ba/_da d+hi ma/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_da d+hA+e/_da d+hA te/_da d+haM re/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_da d+hi She/_da 
[\[305a.5\]]d+hA the/_da d+haM d+hA+e/_da d+hi D+he/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_da d+he/_da d+hi ba he/_da d+hi ma he/_luT la cho ga gzhan med pas/_a tang la/_d+hA tA si/_sogs dang /_tang la/_d+hA tA/_d+hA tA se/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/_ling la e 'os er bsgyur ba sogs byas bas/_d+he yA ta/
[\[305a.6\]]d+he yA staM/_d+he yA suH/_tang la/_d+hA sI Sh+Ta/_d+hA sI yA stAM/_d+hA sI ran/_sogs so/_/l+r-iTa'i a tang la/_d+hA s+ya ti/_sogs dang /_tang la/_d+hA s+ya te/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi a tang la/_a_te/_sogs dang /_tang la/_a d+hA s+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_b+h+r-i nya 'dzin pa dang gso ba dag la'o zhes pa la'ang 
[\[305a.7\]]a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/_b+h+r-i nyA mi ta/_b+h+r-i nya rnams kyi a ta'o/_/b+h+r-i nya sogs te/_Du b+h+r-i nya/_'dzin pa/_mAng tshad o hAng 'gro ba gsum gyi shU pha rol la a b+h+yA sa ita du bsgyur bar bya ste/_sha ba sh+lu gnyis brjod/_mdo 'dis a b+h+yA sa ita du bsgyur ba sogs byas bas 
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]laTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_bi b+ha rti/_bi b+h-i taH/_bi b+h+ra ti/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_bi b+ha r+Shi/_bi b+h+r-i thaH/_bi b+h+r-i tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_bi b+ha rmi/_bi b+h+r-i baH/_bi b+h+r-i ma/_de bzhin du/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_bi b+h+r-I te/_bib+h+rA te/_be b+h+ra te/_skyes bu dbus ma/
[\[305b.2\]]gsum la/_bi b+h+r-i She/_bi b+h+rA the/_bi b+h+r-i d+h+we/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_bi b+h+re/_bi b+h+r-i ba he/_bi b+h+r-i ma he/_ling gi a tang la/_bi b+h+r-i yA ta/_bi b+h+r-i yA tAM/_bi b+h+r-i yuH/_sogs dang /_tang la mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sI yuTa'i sa phyis/_i ka gi a tsa la ya Na byas bas/_bi b+h+r-i ta/_bi b+h+rI 
[\[305b.3\]]yA tAM/_bi b+h+rI ngan/_sogs so/_/loTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_bi b+ha rtu/_bi b+h+r-i tA ta/_bi b+h+r-i tAM/_bi b+h+ra tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_bi b+h+r-i hi/_bi b+h+r-i tA ta/_bi b+h+r-i taM/_bi b+h+r-i ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_bi b+ha rA Ni/_be b+ha rA ba/_bi b+ha rA ma/_tang gi skyes bu dang po 
[\[305b.4\]]gsum la/_bi b+h+r-i tAM/_bi b+h+rA tAM/_bi b+h+ra tAM/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_bi b+h+r-i Sha/_bi b+h+rA thAM/_bi b+h+rA d+hAM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_bi b+ha rai/_di b+ha rA ba hai/_bi b+ha rA ma hai/_lang gi a tang gi skyes [\[]bu [\]]dang po gsum la/_a bi b+haH/_a bi b+h+r-i tAM/_a bi b+ha ruH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum

[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]sh+yan/_di ba la sogs pa rnams las sh+yan 'o/_/byings di bu la sogs pa rnams las byings thams cad pa rnams pha rol la byed pa po'i don gyi sha pa kyi yul la sh+yan 'gyur te/_na dbyangs don dang shata kyi don no/_/di pa la sh+yan rjes 'brel phyis/_u pa d+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur

[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]'thag pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams 'dzug ste/_cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra bas/_laT la/_sI bya ti/_sogs dang /_ling la/_sI bye ti/_sogs so/_/ling la/_sI bye ta/_sogs so/_loT la/_sI bya tu/_sogs dang /_lang la/_a sI bya ta/_sogs so/_/

[\[308a.4\]]byA stAM/_sI byA suH/_sogs so/_/l+riT la/_bal dang po'i iT dang /_pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_se bi Sh+ya ti/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a se bi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/nr-i tI lus po bskyod pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/_laT 
[\[308a.5\]]la/_nr-i t+ya ti/_sogs dang /_ling la/_nr-i t+ye ta/_sogs so/_/loT la/_nr-i t+ya tu/_sogs dang /_lang la/_a nr-i t+ya ta/_sogs so/_/lung la/_bal dang po'i eT dang /_bu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_a na rtI ta/_a na rti Sh+TAM/_a na rti ShuH/_sogs so/
[\[308a.6\]]liT la gnyis brjod pa sogs byas pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_na na rta/_na nr-i ta tuH/_na nr-i tuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_na na rti/_na nr-i ta thuH/_na nr-i ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_na na rta/_na nr-i ti ba/_na nr-i ti ma/_luT la/_iT byin pas/_na rti tA si/_sogs 
[\[308a.7\]]so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_nr-i t+yA ta/_nr-i t+yA stAM/_nr-i d+yA suH/_sogs so/_/se nya si tsi kr-i ta ts+r-i ta tsh-I da tr-i da nr-i taH/_kr-i ta ts+r-i ta tshw-i da tr-i da_nr-i ta las si tsa ma yin pa'i sa la'o/_kr-i tI bcod pa/_ts-i dI 'tshe ba/_u tsh+r-i dir 'bar ba/_u tr-i dir 'tshe ba/_nr-i tAM lus bskyod pa rnams las 
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]pha rol gyis tsam yin pa'i byings phyed pa su yig dang po can la iT yang 'gyur te/_l+r-ingaT iT byin pa'i phyogs la/_na rti Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_iT med pa'i phyogs la/_na r+t+s+ya ti/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a na rti Sh+ya ta/_sogs so sam/_a na r+t+s+ya ta/_sogs 
[\[308b.2\]]so/_!_/ta sI skyo ba la 'o zhes pa la a tang rnams sbyor te/_b+h+rA sha/_b+h+lA sha/_kla mu/_kra mu/_tra sI sogs kyis sha pa dang sh+yan yang na bar byas pas/_laT la/_sogs sam/_tra s+ya ti/_sogs so/_ling la/_tra se ta/_sogs sam/_tra s+ye ta/_sogs so/_/
[\[308b.3\]]loT la/_tra sa tu/_sogs sam/_tra s+ya tu/_sogs so/_/lang la/_a tra sa ta/_sogs som/_a tra s+ya ta/_sogs so/_/lung la iT byin/_ba da bra dza sogs kyis 'phel ba byas pas/_a trA sI ta/_a trA si Sh+TAM/_a trA si ShuH/_sogs so/_liTal/_Nal gnyis ma yin

[\[308b.6\]]bas/_tra si Sh+ya ti/_sogs so/_/l+ring la/_a tra si Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/dzr-I Sha lang tsho nyams pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyar te/_byings kyi r-I ta kyi i ta r-i i ta/_r-i'i a na las ra pha rol los/_rA/_u ba p+hA'i 'ang ngo sa ring por bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/_laT 
[\[308b.7\]]la/_dzI r+Ya ti/_sogs dang /_ling la/_dzI r+Yi ta/_sogs so/_/loT la/_dzI r+Ya tu/_sogs dang /_lang la/_a dzI r+Ya ta/_sogs so/_/lung la/_dzr-i sta m+b+hu/_mru tsu sogs kyis ts+li ang du bsgyur ba dang si tsar bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/_ang gi phyogs la/_r-i dr-i sha dag gi ang la yon/

[\[309a.1\]]tan nos yon tan byas pas/_a dza ra ta/_a dza ra tAM/_a dza ra na/_sogs so/_/si tsa'i phyogs la/_iT byin/_si tsa la 'phel ba sogs kyis 'phel ba byas bas/_a dzA r-i ta/_a dzA ri Sh+TAM/_a dzA ri ShuH/_sogs so/_/liT la/_gnyis brjod/_r-i'i a ta

[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]pa/_Na sha mi mthong ba/_tri pa tshim pa/_dr-i pa dga' ba/_dru ha 'tshe ba byed du 'jug par 'dod pa/_mu ha the tshom/_Sh+Nu ha skyug pa/_Sh+Ni ha dga' ba rnams las pha rol gyi byings phyed pa bal dang po can iT yang na 'gyur ro/_/ne T+ya li Ti ra ng+heH/_ra ng+hi'i liT ma yin pa'i 
[\[312a.2\]]iT la ma yin no/_/gong du ra ng+hi dang dza b+ha dag la a tsa pha rol la num A ga ma ster bar bshad kyang de'i dmigs bsal a tsa dang po yin kyang i Ta pha rol gyi iT ma yin pas/_iT pha rol la ra ng+hi la num 'gyur ba ma yin te/_ra ng+ha la/_luT sbyar bas/_ra ng+ha la sogs pa rnams las kyang 
[\[312a.3\]]ngos iT yang na bar byas/_mdo 'dis num A ka ma mi ster/_iTa'i phyogs la/_ra ng+hi tA/_ra ng+hi tA si/_sogs so/_/iT med pa'i phyogs la/_dz+ha Sha sogs kyis ta ng+ha/_dz+ha la sogs kyis ng+ha dar bsgyur bas/_ra ng+ng+hA/_ra ng+ng+hA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_ra ng+h+yA ta/_ra ng+h+yA stAM/_ra ng+h+yA suH/_sogs 
[\[312a.4\]]so/_/l+r-iT la/_ra ng+ha la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo /_/iT yang na bar byas pas/_iTa'i phyogs la/_ra ng+hi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_iT med pa'i phyogs la/_khar la tsar 'os ng+ha tar bsgyur bas/_ra t+s+ya ti/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a ra ng+hiSh+ya ta/_sogs sam/_a ra t+s+ya ta/_sogs 
[\[312a.5\]]so/_!_/tr-i pa tshim pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/_laT la/_tr-i bya ti/_sogs dang /_ling la/_tr-i pye ta/_sogs so/_/loT la/_tr-i pya tu/_sogs dang /_lang la/_a tr-i pya ta/_sogs so/_/lung la/_puSha la sogs pas/_ts+li ang du bsgyur ba dang si tsa ra bsgyur pa yang na bar 
[\[312a.6\]]byas pas/_ang gi phyogs la/_a tr-i pa taM/_a tr-i pa tA/_a tr-i pa na/_sogs dang /_si tsa'i phyogs la/_ra ng+ha la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngos/_iT yang na byar bya ste/_iTa'i phyogs la puka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_a tar+pIta/_a tar+pi Sh+TAM/_a ta rbi ShuH/_sogs 
[\[312a.7\]]dang /_iT med pa'i phyogs la/_a nu dA N+ta'i'ang r-i ta u pa ng+hA'i a ma yang na 'os/_am yang na bar byed de/_am ma byin pa'o phyogs la/_si tsa la 'phel ba dang /_dz+ha la dang po rnams la si tsa dbyi ba sogs byas pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a tAr+p+tAM/_a tAr+p+suH/_skyes 
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]bu dbus ma gsum la/_a tAr+p+sIH/_a tA r+b+taM/_a tA r+b+ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a tA r+p+saM/_a tA r+p+s+wa/_a tAr+b+s+ma/_sogs so/_/am gyi phyogs la/_i ka gi a tsa la ya Na dang /_de nas i tsa la 'phel ba/_dz+ha la dang po rnams la si tsa dbyi pa sogs byas pas/_skyes bu dang po 
[\[312b.2\]]gsum la/_a trAp+sIta/_a trAp+tAM/_atrAMp+suH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_atrAp+sIH/_a trAb+haM/_a trAp+ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a trap+saM/_a trAp+s+wa/_a trAp+s+ma/_sogs so/_/liT la/_gnyis brjod r-i'i a ta sogs byas pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ta tar+pa/_ta tra 
[\[312b.3\]]pa tuH/_ta tr-i puH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ta tarbi tha/_ta tar+p+tha/_ta tr-i pa thuH/_ta tr-i pa/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ta tar+pa/_ta tr-i pi ba/_ta tr-i pi ma/_luT la/_ra ng+ha la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngos iT yang na bar byas pas/_iTa'i phyogs la/_ta r+pi tA/_ta r+pi tA si/

[\[312b.5\]]byas/_iT med pa'i phyogs la am yang na bar byas pas/_tar+p+ri Sh+ya ti/_sogs sam/_tar+p+s+ya ti/_sogs sam/_yang na trap+s+ya ti/_sogs so/_/de bzhi du/_l+r-ing la/_a ta rbi Sh+ya ta/_sogs sam/_a ta r+p+s+ya ta/_sogs sam/_yang na a trap+s+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/dr-i pa dga' ba 
[\[312b.6\]]dang grol bar byed pa dag la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams 'jug cing /_cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa tr-i pa dang 'dra ste khyad par cung zad tsam yang med do/_!_/mu ha rmongs pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/_laT la/_mu h+ya ti/_sogs dang /_ling la/_mu h+ye ta/_sogs so/_/

[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_mu mo hi tha/_mu mu ha thuH/_mu mu ha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_mu mo ha/_mu mu ho pa/_mu mu hi ma/_luT la/_ra ng+ha la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngos/_iT yang na bar byas pas/_iTa'i phyogs la/_mo hi tA/_mo hi tA si/
[\[313a.2\]]sogs dang /_iT med pa'i phyogs la/_dru ha/_mu ha/_Sh+Nu ha/_Sh+Ni ha/_rnams kyis yang na'o/_/ha D+ha ru bsgyur ba dang g+ha ru bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/_D+ha'i phyogs la/_puka mtha' sogs kyis yod tan/_dz+ha Sha sogs kyis ta ng+ha/_Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os ng+haD+ha/_D+ha las D+ha dbyi 'os 
[\[313a.3\]]D+ha gong ma phyis pas/_mo D+hA/_mo D+ha si/_sogs dang /_g+har bsgyur pa'i phyogs la/_puka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan/_dz+ha Sha sogs kyis ta ng+ha/_dz+ha la sogs kyis g+ha gar bsgyur bas/_mo g+ng+hA/_mo g+ng+hA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_mu h+yA ta/_mu h+yA stAM/_mu h+yA suH/_sogs so/_/

[\[313a.7\]]bsgyur ba'i ang pha rol la na shi'i a ta e nyid du yang na bsgyur te/_a ne sha ta/_a ne sha tAM/_a ne shan/_sogs so/_/liT la kita rnams la/_a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba sogs byas pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_na nA sha_/ne sha tuH/_ne shuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ne shi tha/_ne sha thuH/
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]ne sha_/skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_na nA sha_/ne shi ba/_ne shi ma/_ma sheHShA n+ta s+ya/_na shi'i Sha mtha'i 'o/_/brash+dza b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis na shi'i sha Shar bsgyur bas Sha mtha' can du gyur pa na/_de'i sngon du na Nar 'gyur pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi yi ge byung yang na Nar 'gyur ba ma yin te/_na sha_/luTa'i rkyen can gyi 
[\[313b.2\]]sngon du pra bzhag na Na ra mi 'gyur/_pra na Sh+TA lta bu'o/_/luT la ra ng+ha sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas iTa'i phyogs la/_na shi tA/_na shi tA si/_sogs dang /_iT med pa'i phyogs la/_mas+dzin sho rnuM ha li/_mas+dzi na sha dag gi hal la numa'o/_/Tu mas+dzi dag pa dang na sha dag la rkyen hal dang po 
[\[313b.3\]]can ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can ma yin pa rnams pha rol la num A ga ma 'gyur te/_ma gnas don u brjod don no/_/na sha la/_luT/_brash+dza b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis sha Sha/_mdo 'dis num byin/_Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os/_ta Tar bsgyur bas/_naMSh+TA/_naM Sh+TA rau/_naM Sh+TA raH/_nAM Sh+TA si/_sogs dang /_'grel

[\[313b.5\]]na sh+yA suH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_ra ng+ha sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/_iTa'i phyogs la/_na shi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_iT med pa'i phyogs la/_mas+dzin sha dag gi hal la num 'os/_num A ga ma/_yardzin sha sogs kyis num A ga ma/_bras+dza sogs kyis sha Sha ra bsgyur ba dang /_na sha'i

[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]dang po gsum la/_su Shu be/_su Shu bA te/_suShu bi re/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_su Shu bi She/_su Shu bA the/_su Shu bi ng+hA+e/_su Shu bi D+hA+e/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_su Shu be/_su Shu bi ba he/_su Shu bi ma he/_lugs la/_swa ra ti/_sU ti/_sU ya ti sogs kyis

[\[316a.3\]]sa bi Sh+ya te/_sogs sam/_so Sh+ya te/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a sa bi Sh+ya ta/_sogs sam/_a se Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/dIng zad pa la'o zhes pa la'ang tang rnams 'jug ste/_laT la/_dI ya te/_sogs dang /_ling la/_dI ye ta/_sogs so/_/loT la/_dI ya tAM/_sogs dang /_lang la/
[\[316a.4\]]a dI ya ta/_sogs so/_/mI nA ti mi no ti dI dAM l+ya pi tsa/_mI nA ti mi no ti/_dIng rnams kyi l+yab la'ang ngo /_/mI nya 'tshe ba/_Du mi nya rab tu 'phen pa/_dIng zad pa rnams kyi mtha' kr-i ta sogs kyi rkyen l+ya ba pha rol la A ta du bsgyur cing 'ang gi sgras Nal gnyis dang thal ma gtogs pa'i liT rnams dang /_rkyen 
[\[316a.5\]]sha 'gro ba ma yin pa pha rol la'ang A ta du bsgyur te/_dIng pa lung /_mdo 'dis A ta tu bsgyur bas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a dA sta/_a dA sA tAM/_a dA sa ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a dA s+thAH/_a dA sA thA/_a dA ng+h+waM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a dA si/_a dA swa hi/_a dA sma hi/
[\[316a.6\]]dI do yuT tsi kI ti/_dIng las a tse kra dra 'gro ba la yuTa'o/_/dIng las pha rol gyi a tsa kra nga 'gro ba'i ming can la yuT A ga ma 'gyur te/_liT la gnyis brjod thung ngu 'os/_a b+h+yA sa thung ngu /_mdo 'dis yuT byin pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_di dI ye/_di dI yA te/_di dI yi re/_skyes bu 
[\[316a.7\]]dbus ma gsum la/_di dI yi She/_di dI yA the/_di dI yi ng+h+we/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_di dI ye/_di dI yi ba he/_di dI yi ma he/_luT la/_mI nA ti/_mi no ti/_dIng rnams kyis l+yab la'ang ngos A ta du bsgyur bas/_dA tA/_dA tA se/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_smon pa'i ling la/_dA sISh+Ta/_dA 
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]sI yA stAM/_dA sI ran/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la'ang mI nA ti sogs kyis A ta du bsgyur bas/_dA s+ya te/_sogs dang /_l+r-ing la/_a dA s+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/dza ni rab tu skye ba la'o zhes pa la'ang tang rnams 'jug ste/_dz+nyA dza no rdzA/_dz+nyA dzan dag gi dzA'o/_/dz+nyA khong du chud pa dang /_dzan skye ba dag gi rkyen sha 
[\[316b.2\]]'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la dzA zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/_dzan la/_sh+yan/_mdo 'dis dzA ra bsgyur bas/_laT la/_dzA ya te/_sogs dang /_ling la/_dzA yi ta/_sogs so/_/loT la/_dzA ya tAM/_sogs dang /_lang la/_a dzA ya ta/_sogs so/_/dza ni ba ng+h+yo sh+tsa/_dza ni pa ng+hi dag gi 'ang ngo /_/dza ni skye ba 
[\[316b.3\]]dang ba ng+hi dag gi ts+li bsgyur ba'i tsi Na dang kr-i ta sogs kyi rkyen nya 'gro ba rnams la u pa ng+hA 'phel bar bsgyur ba ma yin te/_dzan la lung sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_la ta/_dI pa dzan bu ng+ha sogs kyis ts+li/_tsi Na ra bsgyur pa dang si tsar bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/_tsi Na'i phyogs la mdo 
[\[316b.4\]]'dis 'phel ba mi byed/_tsi Na las 'jig gos ta phyis/_a dza ni/_si tsa'i phyogs la iT byin pas/_a dza ni Sh+Ta/_gnyis tshig dang ma tshig la/_a dza ni ShA tAM/_a dza ni Sha ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a dza ni Sh+ThAH/_a dza ni ShA thAM/_a dza ni ng+hAM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a dza ni Shi/
[\[316b.5\]]a dza ni ShA hi/_a dza ni Sh+ma hi/_liT la/_gam han dzan sogs kyis u pa ng+hA phyis/_sa tu'i sha tsu la sha tsu 'os/_na nyar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_dza dz+nyi/_dza dz+nyA te/_dza dz+nyi re/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_dza dz+nyi Sha/_dza dz+nyA the/_dza dz+nyi ng+hA+e/_dza dz+nyi D+ny+we/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_dza dz+nyi/

[\[316b.7\]]dI bI 'bar ba la'o zhes pa la'ang tang rnams sbyar te/_laT la/_dI pya te/_sogs dang /_ling la/_dI bye ta/_sogs so/_/loT la/_dI pya tAM/_sogs dang /_lang la/_a dI pya ta/_sogs so/_/lung gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_dI pa dza na bu ng+ha sogs kyis ts+li tsi Nar bsgyur ba dang si tsar 
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]bsgyur pa yang na bar byas pas/_a dI po'am/_a dI piSh+Ta/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_a dI pi Sh+Ta tAM/_a dI pi Sha ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a dI pi Sh+TAH/_a dI pi ShA thAM/_a dI pi ng+hAM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a dI pi Shi/_a dI bi ShA

[\[317a.3\]]luT la iT byin pas/_dI pi tA/_dI pi tA se/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_smon pa'i ling la/_dI pi ShI Sh+Ta/_dI pi ShI yA stAM/_dI pi ShI ran/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la'ang iT byin pas/_dI pi Sh+ya te/_sogs dang /_l+r-ing la/_a dI pi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/pU rI tshim pa la'o zhes pa la'ang tang 
[\[317a.4\]]rnams sbyor te/_laT la/_pUr+ya te/_sogs dang /_ling la/_bUr+ye ta/_sogs so/_/loT la/_pUr+ya tAM/_sogs dang /_lang la/_a pU r+Ya ta/_sogs so/_/lung gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_dI ba dzan bu ng+ha sogs kyis ts+li tsi Na dang si sa yang na bar byas pas/_a pU ri/_a pU ri Sh+Ta/_lhag ma 
[\[317a.5\]]rnams la iT byin pas/_a pU ri ShA tAM/_a pU ri Sha ta/_sogs so/_/liT la gnyis brjod/_thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_pu pU re/_pu pA rA te/_pu pU ri re/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_pu pU ri re/_pu pU rA the/_pu pU ri ng+hA+e/_pu pU ri D+hA+e/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum

[\[317a.7\]]rnams sbyor te/_laT la/_pa d+ye te/_sogs dang /_ling la/_pa d+ye ta/_sogs so/_/loT la/_pa r+ya tAM/_sogs dang /_lang la/_a pa d+ya ta/_sogs so/_tsi Na te pa daH/_pad las ta la tsi Na'o/_/pa da las lung gi la bsgyur ba'i tang gi gcig tshig ta pha rol la ts+li tsi Nar bsgyur te/_pa da la/_lung la ta/
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]mdo 'dis ts+li tsi Nar bsgyur/_u pa ng+hA'i 'ang ngos/_'phel ba/_tsi Na las 'jig gos ta phyis pas/_a pA di/_lhag ma rnams la/_dz+ha la dang po can la si tsa phyis/_khar la tsar sogs byas pas/_skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_a bat+thA tAM/_a pa t+sa ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum 
[\[317b.2\]]la/_a pat+thAH/_a pat+sA thAM/_a pang+ng+hAM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a bat+si/_a pat+sA hi/_liT la a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba sogs kyis skyes bu dang po gsum la/_pe de/_pe dA te/_be di re/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_pe di She/_pe tA the/_pe di ng+h+we/_pe di D+hA+e/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_pe de/_pe di ba he/_pe di ma he/_luT la Shar la tsa ra 'os/_da

[\[317b.4\]]lang la/_a bu ng+h+ya ta/_sogs so/_/lung gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_dI pa dza na bu ng+ha sogs kyis ts+li tsa Na dang si tsa yang na bar byas/_tsi Na'i phyogs la buka sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_a bo ng+hi/_si tsi'i phyogs la dz+hal las dz+hal la 'os si tsa phyis/_dz+haSha mtha' sogs kyis ta ng+ha/
[\[317b.5\]]dz+hal sogs kyis ng+ha da ra bsgyur bas/_a bu t+hA/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_a tsa gcig pa sogs ba b+ha ra bsgyur bas/_a ng+hut+sAtAM/_a b+hut+sa ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a bu ng+ng+hAH/_a b+hu t+sA thAM/_a b+hu/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a b+hu t+si/_a b+hut+s+wa hi/_a b+hu t+sA hi/_liT la gnyis 
[\[317b.6\]]brjod pa sogs kyis/_bu bu ng+he/_bu bu ng+hA te/_bu bu ng+hi re/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_bu bu ng+hi She/_bu bu ng+hA the/_bu bu ng+hi ng+h+we/_bu bu ng+hi D+hA+e/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_bu bu ng+he/_bu bu ng+hi pa he/_bu bu ng+hi ma he/_luT la/_pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan/_dz+haSha mtha' sogs kyis ta ng+ha/

[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]a b+ho t+s+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/Na ha 'ching ba la'o zhes pa la yang a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/_Na'i na 'os Na na/_di ba sogs la sh+yan/_ha drangs pas laTa'i a tang la/_na h+ya ti/_sogs dang /_tang la/_na h+ya te/_sogs so/_/ling gi a tang la/_na h+ye ta/_sogs dang /

[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]da t+s+ya te/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi a tang la/_a na t+s+ya ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_a na t+s+ya ta/_sogs so/_/i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trA ta di b+hAd yaHsa mA p+tAH/_zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i ma do las di bul sogs pa rnams rdzogs so//_!_//de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i

[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]se/_sogs sam/_so tA/_so tA se/_sogs so/_/smon ba'i ling gi a tang la/_kr-i ta ma yin pa sogs kyis ring po byas bas/_sU yA ta/_sU yA stAM/_sU yA suH/_sogs dang /_tang la/_ru du su sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/_sa bi ShI Sh+Ta/_sa bi ShI yA stAM/_sa bi ShI ran/_sogs

[\[319b.7\]]tang la/_mI nA ti mi no ti dIng sogs kyis i A ta/_ts+li si tsar bsgyur pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a mA sta/_a mA sA tAM/_a mA sA ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a mA s+thAH/_a mA sA thAM/_a mA ng+hAM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a mA si/_a mA sA hi/_a mA sma hi/_liTa'i a tang 
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]la/_Nal gnyis dang thal la/_mI nA ti sogs kyis i A ta/_kita rnams la a tsa gcig ma yin pa sogs kyis ya Nar bsgyur bas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ma mau/_mi mya tuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ma mi tha/_ma mA tha/_mi mya thuH/_mi mya/

[\[320a.4\]]A ta du bsgyur bas/_mA sI Sh+Ta/_mA sI yA stAM/_mA sI ran/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la'ang i A ta du bsgyur bas a tang la/_mA s+ya hi/_sogs dang /_tang la/_mA s+ya te/_sogs so/_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi a tang la/_a mA s+ya ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_a mA s+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/tsi nya gsog 
[\[320a.5\]]ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang dang tang gnyis ka sbyor te/_laTa'i a tang la/_tsi no ti/_sogs dang /_tang la/_tsi nu te/_sogs so/_/ling gi a tang la/_tsi nu yA ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_tsi n+wI ta/_tsi n+wI ta/_sogs so/_/loTa'i a tang la/_tsi no tu/_sogs dang /_tang la/_tsi nu tAM/_sogs so/_/
[\[320a.6\]]lang gi a tang la/_a tsi no ta/_sogs dang /_tang la a tsi nu ta/_sogs so/_/lung gi a tang la/_si tsa la 'phel ba sogs kyis 'phel ba byas pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a tsi ShI ta/_a tsai Sh+TAM/_a tsai ShuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a tsai ShIH/_a tsai Sh+TaM/_a tsai Sh+Ta/
[\[320a.7\]]skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a tsai ShaM/_a tsai ShA/_a tsaiSh+ma/_tang la/_byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a tseSh+Ta/_a tse ShA tAM/_a tse Sha ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a tse Sh+ShAH/_a tse ShA thAM/_a tse ng+h+waM/_skyes bu phyi ma 
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]gsum la/_a tse Shi/_a tse Sh+ma hi/_pi b+hA ShA tseH/_tsi'i 'dam ka'o/_/tsi nya'i l-iT san pha rol la gnyis brjod pa'i tsa ka bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka can du bya ste/_tsi nya la liT sbyar/_tsa kar bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi a tang gi/_skyes bu dang po gnyis la/_tsi kA ya/_tsi kya tuH/
[\[320b.2\]]tsikyuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tsi ke tha/_tsi ka yi tha/_tsi kya thuH/_tsi kya/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsi kA ya/_tsi ka ya/_tsi kyi ba/_tsi kyi ma/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tsi kye/_tsi kyA te/_tsi kyi re/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tsi kyi She/_tsi kyA the/_tsi kyi ng+hA+e/_tsi kyi D+h+we/_skyes 
[\[320b.3\]]bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsi kye/_tsi kyi ba he/_tsi kyi ma he/_sogs dang /_tsa kar ma bsgyur pa'i phyogs kyi a tang la/_tsi tsA ya/_tsi ts+ya tuH/_tsi ts+yuH/_sogs dang /_tang la/_tsi ts+ye/_tsi ts+yA te/_tsi ts+yi re/_sogs so/_/luT la byings thams cad ba dang byings phyed pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_a 
[\[320b.4\]]tang la/_tse tA/_tse tA si/_sogs dang /_tang la/_tse tA/_tse tA se/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/_kr-ita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/_tsI yA ta/_tsI yA stAM/_tsI yA suH/_sogs dang /_tang la yon tan byas pas/_tse ShI Sh+Ta/_tse ShI yA stAM/_tse ShI ran/_sogs so/_/
[\[320b.5\]]l+r-iT la'ang yon tan byas bas/_a tang la/_tse Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_tang la/_tse Sh+ya te/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi a tang la/_a tse Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/s+t+r-inya kun nas 'gebs pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/_laTa'i 
[\[320b.6\]]a tang la/_s+t+r-i No ti/_sogs dang /_tang la/_s+t+r-i Nu te/_sogs so/_/ling gi a tang la/_s+t+r-i Nu yA ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_s+t+r-i N+wI ta/_sogs so/_/loTa'i a tang la/_s+t+r-i No tu/_sogs dang /_tang la/_s+t+r-i Nu tAM/_sogs so/_/lang gi a tang la/_a s+t+r-i No ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_a s+t+r-i Nu ta/
[\[320b.7\]]sogs so/_/lung gi a tang la/_si tsa la 'phel pa pa ra smai pa da rnams la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a stAr+ShI ha/_a stAr+Sh+TAM/_a s+t+rar+ShuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a stA r+ShI+uH/_a stAr+Sh+TaM/_a stAr+Sh+Ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a stAr+ShaM/_a stAr+Sha/_a 
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]skAr+Sh+ma/_r-ita sh+tsa saM yo gA teH/_r-ita las kyang brtsegs pa dang po las so/_/brtsegs pa dang po'i r-i ta mtha' las kyang si tsa dang smon pa'i ling A t+ma ne pa da pha rol na yod pa las iT yang na 'gyur te/_st-i la lung gi tang rnams sbyar ba'i iT byin pa'i phyogs kyi skyes

[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]las sa la 'os iT byin pas/_a tang la/_sta ri Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_tang la/_sta ri Sh+ya te/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi a tang la/_a sta ri Sh+ya ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_a sta ri Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/br-inya sgrib pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/_laTa'i

[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]du ng+hA ba/_du ng+hu ba tuH/_du ng+hu buH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_du ng+ho tha/_du ng+ha bi tha/_du ng+hu ba thuH/_du ng+ha ba/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_du ng+hA ba/_du ng+ha ba/_du ng+hu bi ba/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_du ng+hu be/_du ng+hu bA_te/_du ng+hu bi ra/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_du ng+hu bi She/_du ng+hu

[\[322b.6\]]a hi no ta/_sogs so/_/hi nu mI nA/_he nu mI nA dag gi'o/_/hi 'gro ba las pha rol gyi sh+nu'i na dang /_mInya 'tshe ba las pha rol gyi sh+nA'i na yig ni nyer bsgyur na Nar bsgyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can sngon du byung na Na yig tu bsgyur bar bya ste/_pra hi No ti/_sogs so/_/lung la/_si tsa la 'phel ba par smai 
[\[322b.7\]]pa da rnams la'os 'phel ba byas pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a hai ShI ta/_a hai Sh+TAM/_a hai ShuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a haiShIH/_a hai ShAM/_a hai Sh+Ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a hai ShaM/_a hai Sh+wa/_a hai Sh+ma/_rab tu 'gro bar byed dam rab tu 'phel bar byed/_he ra tsa di/_ha'i tsang ma yin 
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]pa la'o/_/tsang ma yin pa'i rkyen byings gnyis brjod pa'i rgyu mtshan can pha rol la hi 'gro pa'i ha phyi ma ni g+ha yig tu bsgyur bar bya ste/_hi la liT byings gnyis brjod ku ha dag gi tsu 'os a b+h+yA sa'i ha dz+ha/_a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos dz+ha dza/_mdo 'dis ha phyi ma g+har bsgyur 
[\[323a.2\]]bas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_dzig+hA ya_dzi g+h+ya tuH/_dzi g+h+yuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_dzi g+he tha/_dzi g+ha yi tha/_dzi g+h+ya thuH/_dza g+h+ya/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_dzi g+hA ya/_dzi g+h+yi ba/_dzi g+h+yi ma/_luT la yon tan byas pas/_he tA/_he tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la kr-i ta ma 
[\[323a.3\]]yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/_hI yA ta/_hI yA stAM/_hi yA suH/_sogs dang /_l+r-iT la byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_hi Sh+ya ti/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a he Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/kr-i bi 'tshe ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor 
[\[323a.4\]]te/_ng+hin+bi kr-i N+b+yo ra tsa/_ng+hi n+bi _kr-i N+wi dag gi a'ang ngo /_ng+hi bi srogs kr-i bi 'tshe ba dag la byed pa po'i don gyi sh+nu'i yul la u 'gyur zhing u pha rol la de gnyis kyi mtha'i ba yig kyang a yig tu bsgyur bar bya ste/_kr-ibi la u i ta 'gro ba'i byings la nu ma 'os/_num A ga ma/_ma gnas don u brjod 
[\[323a.5\]]don/_mdo 'dis ba ar bsgyur/_ata kyi dbyi 'os a phyis/_num gyi na u la drangs pas/_kr-i Nu zhes pa grub la/_laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT la/_kr-i No ti sogs dang /_ling la/_kr-i Nu yA ta/_sogs so/_/loT la/_kr-i No tu/_sogs dang /_lang la/_a kr-i No ta sogs te cho ga thams cad 
[\[323a.6\]]sh+nu'i skabs dang 'dra'o/_/lung la bal dang po'i iT byin/_iT 'gro ba'i byings la num 'os/_num A ga ma byin pas/_a kr-i N+wI ta/_a kr-i N+wi Sh+TAM/_a kr-i N+wi ShuH/_sogs so/_/liT la'ang num byin gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tsa kr-i N+wa/_tsa kr-i N+wa tuH/
[\[323a.7\]]tsa kr-i NuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tse kr-i N+wi tha/_tsa kr-i N+wa thuH/_tsa kr-i N+wa/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsa kr-i N+wa/_tsa kr-i NI ba/_tsa kr-i N+wi ma/_luT la/_num dang iT byin pas/_kr-i N+wi tA/_kr-i N+wi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la num byin pas/_kr-i N+w+yA ta/_kr-i N+yA stAM/_kr-i N+ya suH/_sogs so/_/
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]sr-iT la/_kr-i N+wi Sh+ya ti/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la'ang /_a kr-i N+wi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/ng+hi bi srog la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/_ng+hi n+wi/_kr-i N+wi dag gi a'ang ngos/_sh+nu'i yul la u bra a/_ita 'gro ba'i byings la num 'os/_num A ga ma/_ata kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/
[\[323b.2\]]ng+hi nu zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT la/_ng+hi no te/_sogs dang /_ling la/_ng+hi nu yA ta/_sogs so/_/loT la/_ng+hi no tu/_sogs dang /_lang la/_a ng+hi no ta/_sogs so/_/lung la/_num dang iT byin pas/_a ng+hi n+wI ta/_a ng+hi n+waSh+TAM/_a ng+hi n+wi ShuH/_sogs so/_/liT la/_num 
[\[323b.3\]]byin gnyis brjod pa sogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_di ng+hi n+wa/_di ng+hi n+wa tuH/_di ng+hi nUH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_di ng+hi n+wi tha/_di ng+hi n+wa thuH/_di ng+hi n+wa/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_di ng+hi n+wa/_di ng+hi n+wi ba/_di ng+hi n+wi ma/_luT la/_ng+hi n+wi tA/_ng+hi n+wi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_ng+hi n+w+yAta/
[\[323b.4\]]ng+hin+w+yA stAM/_ng+hi n+w+yA suH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_ng+hi n+wi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_l+r-ing la/_a ng+hi n+wi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/dan+b+hu ngan g.yo ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/_i tra 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis pas/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_da b+h+no ti/_da b+hU taH/_da b+hU ba n+ti/_skyes 
[\[323b.5\]]bu dbus ma gsum la/_da b+h+no Shi/_da b+hU thaH/_da b+h+nu tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_da b+h+no mi/_da b+h+nu baH/_da b+h+nu maH/_ling la/_da b+h+nu yA ta/_da b+h+nu yA tAM/_da b+h+na yuH/_sogs so/_/loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_da b+h+no tu/_da b+h+nu tA ta/_da b+h+nu tAM/_da b+h+nu ban+tu/_skyes bu dbus ma _ats+ngal sh+nu byings sogs ts+tsi 
[\[323b.6\]]u bar bsgyur/_gsum la/_da b+h+nu hi/_da b+h+nu tA ta/_da b+h+nu taM/_da b+h+nu ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_da b+h+na bA ni/_da b+h+na bA ba/_da b+h+na bA ma/_lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a da b+h+no ta/_a da b+h+nu tAM/_a da b+h+nu ban/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a da b+h+noH/_a da b+h+nu taM/_a da b+h+nu ta/_skyes bu phyi 
[\[323b.7\]]ma gsum la/_a da b+h+na baM/_a da b+h+nu ba/_a da b+h+nu ma/_lung la/_iT byin pas/_sha dam+b+hI ta/_a dam+b+hISh+TAM/_a dam+b+hi ShuH/_sogs so/_/'grel par lung drangs pa/_shra n+thi gra n+thidam+b+hi b+h+yaH/_pa ro\u0f85pi l+li Ta ki dwa k+ta byaH/_shran+thi gran+thi dam+b+hi rnams las pha rol gyi liT ba 'gro ba ma yin pa rnams ka 'gro 
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]bar brjod do/_/shran+tha grol bar byed pa/_gran+tha spel ba/_dan+thu ngan g.yo pa rnams las pha rol gyi liT bsgyur ba'i pa 'gro ba'i ming can ma yin pa rnams ka 'gro ba'i ming can du brjod par bya'o/_/yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/_ki ti li Ti dam+b+ha e taM bak+ta byaHliT ka 'gro ba 
[\[324a.2\]]la dam+b+ha'i e nyid du brjod par bya'o/_/liT ka 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la/_dam+b+ha'i a b+h+yA sa dbyi zhing e nyid du brjod pa sogs yang na bar bya ste/_liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_da dam+b+ha/_da dam+b+ha tuH/_da dam+b+huH/_dem+b+huH/_yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/_shran+thi gran+thi dam+b+hAM tha na li yo 
[\[324a.3\]]po bA/_shran+thi gran+thI dam+b+ha rnams kyi thal la yang na mi dbyi'o/_/shran+thi gran+thi dam+b+ha rnams kyi liT bsgyur ba'i thal pha rol la'ang a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba dang er bsgyur ba yang na bar bya ste/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_da dam+b+hi tha/_dem+b+hi tha/_da dam+b+ha thuH/_dem+b+ha thuH/_da dam+b+ha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_da dam+b+ha/
[\[324a.4\]]da dam+b+hi ba/_dem+b+hi ba/_dam+b+hi ma/_dem+b+hi ma/_luT la iT byin pas/_dam+b+hi tA/_dam+b+hi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis pas/_da b+h+yA ta/_de b+h+yA stI/_da b+h+yA suH/_l+r-iT la iT byin pas/_dam+b+hi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a dam+b+hi Sh+ya ta/_sogs 
[\[324a.5\]]so/_!_/a shUng khyab pa la'o zhes pa la tang rnams 'jug ste/_a tsa dang po rnams la a tsa la sh+nu byings sogs kyis u bar bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/_laTa'i/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a sh+nu te/_a sh+mu bA_te/_a sh+nu ba te/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a sh+nu She/_a sh+nu bA the/_a sh+nu ng+h+we/_skyes bu 
[\[324a.6\]]phyi ma gsum la/_a sh+nu be/_a sh+nu ba he/_a sh+nu ma he/_ling la mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sa phyis u bar bsgyur bas/_a sh+nu bI ta/_a sh+nu bI yA tAM/_a sh+nu bI ran/_sogs so/_/'o ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a sh+nu tAM/_a sh+nu bA tAM/_a sh+nu ba tAM/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a sh+nu Sh+wa/_a sh+nu 
[\[324a.7\]]bA the/_a sh+nu ng+hAM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a sh+na bai/_a sh+na pA ba hai/_a sh+na bA ma hai/_lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_A sh+nu ta/_A sh+nu bA tA/_A sh+nu ba ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_A sh+nu thAH/_A sh+nu pA thAM/_A sh+nu ng+h+waM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_A sh+nu bi/_A sh+nu ba hi/_A sh+nu ma hi/
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]lung la U ta 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/_iTa'i phyogs la/_A shiSh+Ta/_A shiShA tAM/_A shi Sha ta/_sogs so/_/iT med pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_dz+hal las dz+hal la'os si tsa phyis/_brash+tsa b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis shaSha/_Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os/_ta Tar 
[\[324b.2\]]bsgyur bas/_ASh+TA/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_brash+tsa b+h+rAs+dza sogs kyis shaSha/_sa laSha D+ha dag gi ka 'os Sha ka_/kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha ra bsgyur bas/_A k+ShA tAM/_A k+Sha ta/_de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_A Sh+TAH/_a Sh+ThA thAM/
[\[324b.3\]]A D+h+raM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_A k+Shi/_A k+Sh+wa hi/_A k+Sh+ma hi/_a sh+no te sh+tsa/_a sh+no ti'i 'ang ngo /_/ash+no ti'i lang liT pha rol la byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po'i a ta kyi 'os a b+h+yA sa ring por bsgyur ba'i pha rol tu nu ta A ga ma 'gyur te/_a shU la/_liT/_byings gnyis brjod/_dang po'i 
[\[324b.4\]]ng+ha sa sogs kyis Sha Da/_a ta kyi 'os ring por bsgyur/_mdo 'dis nuT A ga ma byin Ta gnas don u brjod don drangs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_A na she_/A na shA te/_A na shi re/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_A na shi She/_a na k+She/_A na shA the/_A na shi ng+h+re/_A na shi D+h+we/_A na D+hA+e/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum 
[\[324b.5\]]la/_A na she/_A na shi ba he/_A na shwa he/_A na shi ma he/_A na sh+ma he/_luT la iT yang na bar byas pas/_a shi tA/_a shi tA se/_sogs sam/_a Sh+tha/_a Sh+DA se/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_iT yang na bar byas pas/_a shi ShISh+Ta/_a shi ShI yA stAM/_a shi ShI ran/_sogs sam/
[\[324b.6\]]iT med pa'i phyogs la/_brash+tsa b+h+ras+dza sogs kyis sha Sha/_sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka'os Sha ka_/kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha ra bsgyur bas/_a k+ShISh+Ti/_a k+ShI yA stAM/_a k+ShI ran/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la'ang a shi Sh+ya te/_sogs sam/_a k+Sh+ya ti/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing 
[\[324b.7\]]la/_A shi Sh+ya ta/_sogs sam/_A k+Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trA t+sA da yaHsa mA p+tAHzhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las su la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so//_//de rnams kyi brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper 
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las/_su la sogs pa byed pa po'i don gyi sha pa kyi yul la sh+nu 'jug pa rnams kyi cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so//_!_//da ni tung 
[\[325a.2\]]la sogs pa rnams kyi cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/_!_/tud gzir ba la'o zhes pa la laT sogs a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/_tu dA di b+h+yaHshaH/_tu da la sogs pa rnams las sha'o/_/byings tud la sogs pa rnams las pha rol tu shapra kyi yul la sha 'gyur te/_sha shi ta kyi don 
[\[325a.3\]]no/_/laTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tud ti/_tu da taH/_tudan+ti/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tu da si/_tud thaH/_tu da tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tu dA mi/_tu dA paH/_tu dA maH/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tu da te/_tu de te/_tu dan+te/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tu da se/
[\[325a.4\]]tu de the/_tu da ng+h+we/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tu da/_tu dA ba he/_tu dA ma he/_ling gi a tang la/_a ta las yA i ya 'os yA suTa'i yA i y+rar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tu de ta/_tu de tAM/_tu de yuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tu deH/_tu de taM/_tu de ta/_skyes 
[\[325a.5\]]bu phyi ma gsum la/_tu de yaM/_tu de ba/_tu de ma/_tang la mtha' min pa sogs kyis sra phyis pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tu de ta/_tu de yA tAM/_tu de ran/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tu de thAH/_tu de yA thAM/_tu de ng+h+raM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tu de ya/_tu de pa hi/_tu de ma hi/_loTa'i a tang gi skyes 
[\[325a.6\]]bu dang po gsum la/_tu da tu/_tu da tA tu/_tu da tAM/_tu dan+tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tu da/_tu da tA ta/_tu da taM/_tu da ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tu dA ni/_tu dA ba/_tu dA ma/_laTa'i tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tu da tAM/_tu de tAM/_tu dan+tAM/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tudaswa/_tu de thAM/
[\[325a.7\]]tu da ng+h+waM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tu da/_tu dA ba hi/_tu dA ma he/_lang gi a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a tu da ta/_a tu da tAM/_a tu da naM/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a tu daH/_a tu da taM/_a tu da ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a tu di/_a tu dA ba/_a tu dA ma/_tang gi skyes bu 
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]dang po gsum la/_a tu da ta/_a tu de tAM/_a tu dan+ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a tu da thAH/_sha tu de thAM/_a tu da ng+hAM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a tu de/_a tu dA ba hi/_a tu dA ma hi/_lung gi a tang la/_bad bra dza sogs kyis 'phel ba/_dz+hal dang po rnams la/_dz+hal las dz+hal la'os/_si tsa 
[\[325b.2\]]phyis/_khar la tsa ra 'os da tang bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a tau t+sI ta/_a tau t+tAM/_a tau t+suH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a tau t+sIH/_a taut+taM/_a tau t+ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a tau t+saM/_a taut+sA/_a tau t+s+ma/_de bzhin du/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a 
[\[325b.3\]]tu t+ta/_a tu t+sAtAM/_a tut+sata/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a tut+thAH/_a tu t+sA thAM/_a tu ng+ng+hAM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a tut+si/_a tut+s+ra hi/_a tut+s+ma hi/_liT la gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tu do da/_tu tu da tuH/_tu tu duH/_skyes bu dbus ma 
[\[325b.4\]]gsum la/_tu to di tha/_tu tot+tha/_tu tu da thuH/_tu tu da/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tu to da/_tu tu da/_tu tu di ba/_tu tu di ma/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tu tu de/_tu tu dA te/_tu tu de re/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tu tu di She/_tu tu di the/_tu tu di ng+h+we/_tu tu di D+h+we/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tu tu de/
[\[325b.5\]]tu tu di ba hi/_tu tu di ma hi/_luT la buka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan khar la tsar sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a tang la/_to t+tA/_to t+tA si/_sogs dang /_tang la/_to t+tA/_to t+tA se/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/_tu d+yA ta/_tu d+yA stAM/_tu d+yA suH/_sogs dang /_tang la/_khar la tsa ra 'os da tar 
[\[325b.6\]]bsgyur bas/_tut+sISh+Ta/_tut+sI yA stAM/_tu t+sI ran/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_puka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan dang /_khar la tsa ra 'os da tar bsgyur bas/_a tang la/_tot+s+ya ti/_sogs dang /_tang la/_to t+s+ya te/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi a tang la/_a tot+s+ya ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_a tot+s+ya ta/_sogs 
[\[325b.7\]]so/_!_/b+h+rasna 'chod pa la'o zhes pa la a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/_b+h+ras+dza la sha gra ti dz+yA ba yi bya ng+hi ba Sh+Ti bi tsa ti br-ish+tsa ti br-i tsha ti sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Na ra bsgyur/_dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha 'os/_sad/_sa tu'i sha tsu la sha tsu 'os da dzar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_laTa'i a tang la/
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]b+h+r-idz+dza ti/_sogs dang /_tang la/_b+h+r-idz+dza ta/_sogs so/_/ling gi a tang la/_b+h+r-idz+dze ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_b+h+r-idz+dzi ta/_sogs so/_/loTa'i a tang la/_b+h+r-idza tu/_sogs dang /_tang la/_b+h+r-idz+dza tAM/_sogs so/_/lang gi a tang la/_a b+h+r-idz+dza ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_a b+h+r-idz+dza ta/
[\[326a.2\]]sogs so/_/lung la a tang gi_/skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_brtsegs pa'i dang pa sa ka dag gi 'os sa phyis/_bra sh+tsab+h+ras+dza sogs kyis dza Sha/_sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka 'os Sha ka_/kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/_bad bra dze sogs kyis 'phel ba byas pas/_a b+h+rA k+ShI ta/_gnyis tshig 
[\[326a.3\]]la/_brtsegs pa'i dang po sa ga sogs kyis sa phyis/_dz+hal las dz+hal la 'os/_si tsa phyis/_brash+tsa b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis dza Sha/_Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os ta Tar bsgyur bas/_a b+h+rA Sh+TAM/_mang tshig la brtsegs pa'i dang po sogs kyis sa phyis/_brash+tsa b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis dza Sha/_sa la Sha D+ha dag ga ka 'os Sha ka_/
[\[326a.4\]]kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur bas/_a b+h+rA k+ShuH/_de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a b+h+rAk+ShIH/_a b+h+rASh+nyAM/_a b+h+rA Sh+Ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a b+h+rAk+ShaM/_a b+h+rAk+Sh+ma/_tang la 'phel ba mi byed gzhan sngon ma ltar bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu 
[\[326a.5\]]dang po gsum la/_a b+h+raSh+Ta/_a b+h+rak+ShA tAM/_a b+h+ras ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a b+h+raSh+thAH/_a b+h+rak+ShA thAM/_a b+h+ra D+D+hAM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a b+h+rak+Shi/_sa b+h+rak+ShA hi/_a b+h+ra k+Sh+ma hi/_b+h+ra s+dzo b+ha rdza n+ya ta ra s+yAM/_b+h+ra s+dza'i b+ha rdza yang na'o/_/b+h+ra s+dza'i byings phyed pa rnams pha rol la b+ha rdza zhes par yang na bsgyur 
[\[326a.6\]]par bya ste/_b+ha s+dzal liT mdo 'dis b+ha rdzar bsgyur/_a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos b+ha ba/_dang po'i hal lhag po sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a dang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ba b+ha rdza/_ba b+ha R+dza tuH/_ba b+ha rdzuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ba b+hardzi tha/_ba b+har+Sh+Tha/_ba b+ha rdza thuH/_ba b+ha rdza/_skyes 
[\[326a.7\]]bu phyi ma gsum la/_ba b+ha rdza/_ba b+hardzi ba/_ba b+ha rdzi ma/_de bzhin du/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ba b+hardze/_ba b+hardzA te/_ba b+hardze re/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ba b+hardzi Sha/_ba b+hardzA the/_ba b+hardzi ng+h+we/_ba b+hardzi D+h+we/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_brash+tsa b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis dza Sha/_Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os tha Sha/
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]ba b+hardze/_ba b+hardze ba he/_ba b+hardzi ma he/_b+h+ras+dza b+hardzar ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la byings gnyis brjod/_dang po'i ta la lhag po 'os/_ra sogs phyis/_a b+h+yA ma'i tsar 'os b+ha bar bsgyur dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/_sa?da?/_sa tu'i sha tsu la sha tsu 'os da dzra ra bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/
[\[326b.2\]]a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ba b+h+radz+dza/_ba b+h+radz+dza tuH/_ba b+h+radz+dzuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ba b+h+radz+dzi tha/_ba b+h+raSh+Tha/_ba b+h+radz+dza thuH/_ba b+h+radz+dza/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ba b+h+radz+dza/_ba b+h+radz+dzi ba/_ba b+h+radz+dzi ma/_de bzhin du/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ba b+h+radz+dze/_bab+h+rAdz+dzA te/_ba b+h+radz+dzi te/_skyes bu 
[\[326b.3\]]dbus ma gsum la/_ba b+h+radz+dzi She/_ba b+h+radz+dzA the/_ba b+h+radz+dzi ng+h+we/_ba b+h+radz+dzi D+h+we/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ba b+h+radz+dze/_brtsegs pa dang po'i sa ka dag gi 'os sa phyis/_grash+tsa b+h+ras+dza sogs kyis dza Sha/_Sha Tu laSha Tu 'os dza Tha/_ba b+h+radz+dzi ba he/_ba b+h+radz+dzi ma he/_luT la/_b+h+ras+dza b+hardzar bsgyur pa'i phyogs la/_brash+tsaM b+h+ras+dza sogs kyis dza Sha/
[\[326b.4\]]ShaTu la Sha Tu 'os ta Ta ra bsgyur pas/_a tang la/_b+har+Sh+Ta/_b+har+Sh+Ta si/_sogs dang /_tang la/_b+har+Sh+TA/_b+har+Sh+TA se/_sogs so/_/b+hardzar ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_brtsegs pa'i dang po sa ka dag gi 'os/_sa phyis/_brash+tsa b+h+ra s+dza sogs dza Sha ra bsgyur ba sogs kyis a tang la/_b+h+raSh+TA/_b+haSh+TA si/_sogs dang /
[\[326b.5\]]tang la/_b+h+raSh+TA/_b+h+raSh+TA se/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/_gra hi dz+yA ba yi bya ng+hi sogs kyis bra gA ra Nar bsgyur bas/_b+h+r-i dz+yA ta/_b+h+r-i dz+yA stAM/_b+h+r-i dz+tA suH/_sogs dang /_tang la/_b+h+ras+dza/_b+h+rardzar bsgyur pa'i phyogs la/_brash+tsa b+h+ras+dza sogs kyis dza Sha/_sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka_/kun 
[\[326b.6\]]nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha ra bsgyur bas/_b+har+k+ShISh+Tu/_b+har+k+ShI yA stAM/_b+har+k+Shi ran/_sogs so/_/b+hardza ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_brtsegs pa'i dang po sa ka sogs kyis sa phyis/_brash+tsa b+h+ras+dza sogs kyis sa Sha/_sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka 'os Sha ka/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur 
[\[326b.7\]]bas/_b+h+rak+ShiSh+Ta/_b+h+rak+ShI yA stAM/_b+h+rak+ShI ran/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la de dang 'dra par bsgrubs pas/_b+hardzar bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi a tang la/_b+har+k+Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_tang la/_b+har+k+Sh+ya te/_sogs so/_/b+hadza ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi a tang la/_b+h+rak+Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_tang la/_b+hak+Sh+ya te/_sogs so/_/de 
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_b+hardzar bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi a tang la/_a b+har+k+Sh+ya ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_a b+har+k+Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/b+hardzar ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi a tang la/_a b+h+rar+k+Sh+ya ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_a b+h+ra k+Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/muts+li thar pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang dang 
[\[327a.2\]]tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/_she mutsa ti nAM/_mu tsa la sogs pa rnams kyi sha la'o/_mu ts+li tha ra ba/_lup+l-i gcod pa/_bip+l-i rnyed pa/_li pa byug pa/_Shi tsa 'dzag pa/_kr-i tI gcod pa/_pi sha tsha shas/_Shi da yongs su 'jog pa rnams ni/_mu tsa la sogs ba ste 'di rnams la rkyen sha pha rol la num a/
[\[327a.3\]]ma 'gyur te/_num byin pas/_laTa'i a tang la/_muny+tsa ti/_sogs dang /_tang la/_muny+tsa te/_sogs so/_/ling gi a tang la/_muny+tsa ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_muny+tse ta/_sogs so/_/loTa'i a tang la/_muny+tsa tu/_sogs dang /_tang la/_muny+tsa tAM/_sogs so/_/lang gi a tang la/_a muny+tsa ta/
[\[327a.4\]]sogs dang /_tang la/_a muny+tsa ta/_sogs so/_/lung gi a tang la pu ka mtha' sogs d+yu ta sogs kyis ts+li ang du bsgyur bas/_a mu tsa ta/_a mu tsa tAM/_a mu tsa na/_sogs dang /_tang /_dz+hal dang po rnams la/_dz+hal las dz+hal la 'os si tsa dbyi/_gzhan rnams la tsu'i ku 'os/_tsa ka_/kun nas 
[\[327a.5\]]bsgyur ba sogs kyis Shar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a muk+ta/_a muk+ShA tAM/_a muk+Sha ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a muk+thAH/_a muk+ShA thAM/_a muk+Sh+hAM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a muk+Shi/_a muk+Sh+wa hi/_a muk+Sh+ma hi/_liT la gnyis brjod pa sogs 
[\[327a.6\]]kyis bsgrubs pas/_a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_mu mo tsa/_mu mu tsa tuH/_mu mu tsuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_mu mo tsa tha/_mu mok+tha/_mu mu tsa thuH/_mu mu tsa/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_mu mo tsa/_mu mu tsa ba/_mu mu tsi ma/_de bzhin du tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_mu mu tse/_mu 
[\[327a.7\]]mu tsA ta/_mu mu tsi re/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_mu mu tsi She/_mu mu tsA thi/_mu mu tsi ng+h+wi/_mu mu tsi D+h+we/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_mu mu tse/_mu mu tsi ba he/_mu mu tsi ma he/_luT la tsu'i ku 'os tsa kar bsgyur pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas bas/_a tang la/_mok+tA/_mo g+tAsi/_sogs dang /
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]tang la/_auk+tA/_mek+tA se/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/_tsa 'dren pa kho na ste/_mu ts+yA ta/_mu ts+yA stAM/_mu ts+yA suH/_sogs dang /_tang la tsu'i ku 'os/_tsa kar bsgyur kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur bas/_mok+ShI Sh+Ta/_mok+ShI yA stAM/_mauk+ShA+e ran/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du 
[\[327b.2\]]l-iTa'i a tang la/_mo k+Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_tang la/_mok+Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la'ang a tang la/_a mok+Sh+ya ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_a mo k+Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/li ba phyug pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/_mu tsa la sogs pa rnams kyi sha la 'os/_num A ka

[\[331b\]]
[\[331b.1\]]laT la/_spr-i sha ti/_sogs dang /_ling la/_spr-i+-i she ta/_sogs so/_/loT la/_sgr-i sha tu/_sogs dang /_lang la/_a spr-i shata/_sogs so/_/lung la/_kr-iSha/_mri sha_/spr-i sha sogs kyis ts+lisi tsar yang na bsgyur te/_sitsa ra bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_a nu tAN+ta'i 'ang r-i ta u pa ng+hA'i am yang 
[\[331b.2\]]na 'os am yang na bar byed de/_am byin pa'i phyogs la/_brash+tsa b+h+rasnga sogs kyis shaSha/_dz+hal dang po rnams la/_dz+hal las dz+hal 'os sitsa phyis/_Sha tu la ShaTu/_sogs dang /_sa la ShaD+ha sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a sbrA k+ShIta/_a smASh+TAM/_a s+t+rAk+ShuH/_skyes bu 
[\[331b.3\]]dbus ma gsum la/_asprAk+ShIH/_a sprASh+TaM/_a sprASh+Ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a sbrA k+Sha/_a sprAk+ShA/_a sprAk+Sh+ma/_am ma byin pa'i phyogs la/_gzhan tshog 'dra ba la/_bad bra sh+tsa sogs kyis 'phel ba byas/_ra drangs bas/_ika shi a tsal ya Nar bsgyur/_de nas pad brash+tsa sogs kyis 'phel ba byas pas/_skyes bu 
[\[331b.4\]]dang po gsum la/_aspArgI ta/_aspAr+ShAM/_a spAr+k+ShuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a spAr+g+ShIH/_a spAr+ShAM/_asbAr+Sh+tsa/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_aspArkAM/_a spArkA/_a spAr+k+ShA/_yang na shal ika u ba ng+hA iT med pa la k+sa 'os/_tsI k+sar bsgyur/_brash+tsa b+h+ras+dza sogs sha Sha/_sal ShaD+hadag gi ka/
[\[331b.5\]]kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a spr-i k+Shata/_a spr-ik+Sha twaM/_a spr-i k+Shan/_sogs so/_/liT la byings gnyis brjod r-i'i ata 'os r-i ata/_shar dang po sogs kyis sa phyis pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/pasbar+sha/_pa spr-i sha tuH/_pa spr-i shuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum 
[\[331b.6\]]la/_pa spa r+shi tha/_pa spar+ShA/_ba spr-i sha thuH/_pa spr-i sha/_/skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_paspa r+sha/_pa spr-i shi ba/_paspr-i shi ma/_luT la/_anu dAN+ta'i 'ang r-ita u ba ng+hA'i am lang na 'os/_am A ga ma yang na bar byas/_brash+tsa b+h+ras+dza sogs kyis sha Sha/_Shatu la Sha Tu sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/
[\[331b.7\]]spraSh+Da'/_spraSh+DA si/_sogs sam/_spar+Sh+Da/_spar+Sh+TA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_spr-i sh+yAta/_spraM sh+yAstAM/_spr-i sh+yAsuH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_a nu dA t+ta'i'ang r-ita u pang+hA'i am yang na 'os/_am yang na par byas/_brash+tsa b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis sha Sha/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar/
[\[332a\]]
[\[332a.1\]]bsgyur bas/_s+thak+Sh+ya ti/_sogs sam/_s+tharar+k+Sh+ya_ti/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a spAr+k+Sh+ya ta/_sogs sam/_sogs so/_!_/cItI 'tshe ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams spyor te/_laT la/_tsI ta ti/_sogs dang /_ling la/_tsA te ta/_sogs 
[\[332a.2\]]so/_/loT la/_ts+r-ita tu/_sogs dang /_lang la/_ats+r-i ta ta/_sogs so/_/lung la/_iT byin puka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_a tsi rtIta/_a tsa rtiSh+DA/_a tsartiShuH/_sogs so/_/liT la gnyis brjod re'i a ta 'os ata du bsgyur bas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tsa tsa rta/
[\[332a.3\]]tsa ts+ri tatuH/_tsats+r-i tuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tsa tsa rti tha/_tsa ts+r-i ta thuH/_tsa ts+r-i ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsa tsa rta/_tsa ts+r-i ti ba/_tsa ts+r-i ti ma/_luT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/_tsa rtitA/_tsartitA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_ts+rit+yAta/_nr-ing+yAstAM/_ts+rit+yAsu/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT 
[\[332a.4\]]la kr-iT ts+r-ita sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas yon tan byas pas/_tsarti Sh+yati/_sogs sam/_tsar+t+h+ya ti/_sogs so/_/l+r-ing la/_atsa rtiSh+yata/_sogs sam/_atsar+t+m+yata/_sogs so/_!_/prats+tsha shes par 'dod pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams spyor te/_gra hi dz+yA sogs kyis saM pra sAr 
[\[332a.5\]]Nar bsgyur bas/_laT la/_br-its+tsha ti/_sogs dang /_ling la/_br-its+tshe ta/_sogs so/_/loT la/_braMts+tsha tu/_sogs dang /_lang la/_abr-its+tshata/_sogs so/_/lung la/_brash+tsa sogs kyis Sha/_sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka/_/kun nas bskyur ba sogs dang /_dz+hal dang po rnams la/_dz+hal gyi dz+hal 
[\[332a.6\]]la 'os si tsa phyis/_Sha Tu la Sha Tu/_bad brash+tsa sogs kyis 'phel ba byas pas skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a prAk+ShIta/_a prASh+TAM/_a prAk+ShuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a prASh+TaH/_a prASh+TaM/_apraSh+Ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a prAk+ShaM/_aprAk+Sha/_a bAk+Sh+ma/_liT la gnyis brjod pa 
[\[332a.7\]]sogs kyis skyes bu dang po gsum la/_pa prats+tsha/_pa prats+tshatuH/_pa prats+tshu tuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_pa prats+tshi tha/_papraSh+Tha/_pa prats+tshathuH/_pa brats+tsha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_pa prats+tsha/_pa prats+tshi ba/_ba prats+tshi ma/_luT la/_brash+tsa b+h+ra sA sogs kyis Sha/_Sha Tul Sha Tu 'os ta Tar bsgyur bas/_praSh+TA/
[\[332b\]]
[\[332b.1\]]pra Sh+TA si/_sogs so/_smon pa'i ling la/_bra hi dz+yA sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur bas/_pr-its+tsh+yA ta/_prits+tsh+yA stAM/_pr-its+tsh+yA su:/_sogs so/_w-iT la/_bra sh+tsa b+h+ra snga sogs kyis Sha/_sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka 'os Sha ka/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur bas/_bra k+Sh+ya ti _sogs dang de 
[\[332b.2\]]bzhin du/_l+ring la/_a prak+Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/sr-idza rnam par bcad pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor re/_laT la/_sr-i dza ti/_sogs dang /_ling la/_sr-i dze ta/_sogs so/_loT la/_sr-i dza tu/_sogs dang /_yang la/_a sr-i dza ta/_sogs so/_lung la sr-i dzi dr-i sha dag gi 
[\[332b.3\]]ka 'gro ba ma yin pa la dz+ha la la a ma 'os/_a ma A ga ma byin/_i ka gi a tsa la ya Na dang /_bra sh+tsa sogs kyis dza Sha/_sa la Sha D+ha sogs kyis Sha ka/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha dang /_dz+ha la dang bo can rnams la/_dz+ha la las dz+ha la la 'os si tsa phyis/_Sha Tu la Sha Tu sogs 
[\[332b.4\]]kyis skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a sra k+ShI ta/_a sra Sh+TAM/_a sra k+Shu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a srak+ShiH/_a sra Sh+TaM/_a sraSh+Ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a srak+ShaM/_a srak+ShA/_a sra k+Sh+ya/_liT la/_gnyis brjod/_r-i'i ata 'os/_r-i ata du bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu 
[\[332b.5\]]dang po gsum la/_sa sardza/_sa sr-idza tuH/_sa sr-i dzuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_sa sa rdzi tha/_sa sar+ShA/_sa sr-i dza thuH/_sa sr-i dza/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_sa sardza/_sa sr-i dza ba/_sa sr-i dzi ma/_luT la/_sr-i dzi dr-i sha dag gi ka 'gro ba ma yin pa la dz+ha la la a ma 'os a ma byin/_ika 
[\[332b.6\]]gi yaN/_bra ts+tsa sogs kyis dza Sha/_Sha Tu la Sha Tu sogs kyis/_sraSh+TA/_sraSh+TA si/_sogs so/_smon pa'i ling la/_sr-i dz+yAta/_sr-i dz+yA stAM/_sr-i dz+yA suH/_sogs so/_l+r-iT la/_sr-idza dr-i sha dag gi ka 'gro ba ma yin pa la dz+ha la la a ma 'os/_a ma A ga ma byin/_i ka gi a tsa la yaN 'os 
[\[332b.7\]]r-i ra ru bsgyur/_brash+tsa b+h+rastsa mr-idza/_sr-idza sogs kyis dza Sha/_sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka 'os/_Sha ka/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha bsgyur bas/_srak+Sh+ya ti/_srak+Sh+ya taH/_srak+Sh+ya n+ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a sra k+Sh+yata/_a srak+Sh+ya tAM/_a srak+Sh+yan/_sogs so/_!_Tu ma sngo dag pa/
[\[333a\]]
[\[333a.1\]]la'o zhes pa la'ang a rang rnams 'jug ste/_dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha 'os/_srang /_sa tu'i sha tsu la sha tsu 'os da dzar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_laT la/_madz+dza ti/_sogs dang /_ling la/_madz+dze ta/_sogs so/_loT la/_madz+dza tu/_sogs dang /_lang 
[\[333a.2\]]la/_a madz+dza ta/_sogs so/_lung la/_brtsegs pa'i dang pos ka dag gi 'os sa phyis/_bad bra sh+tsa sogs kyis 'phel ba/_mas+dzin sha dag gi ha la la num 'os nu ma byin/_tsu'i ku 'os/_dza ga/_Sha ra la tsa 'os/_ga ka/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur ba dang /_dz+hal dang 
[\[333a.3\]]po rnams la/_dz+hal las dz+hal la 'os/_si tsa dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a mAM k+ShI ta/_a mI k+tAM/_a mAMk+ShuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a mAM k+Shi/_a mAM k+ti/_a mAM k+ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a mAM k+ShaM/_a mAM k+Sh+wa/_ling la gnyis 
[\[333a.4\]]brjod pa sogs kyas bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ma madz+dza/_ma madz+dza tuH/_ma madz+dzuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ma madz+dzi tha/_ma mAM k+tha/_ma madz+dza/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ma madz+dza/_ma madz+dzi ba/_ma madz+dzi ma/_luT la brtsegs pa'i dang pos ka dag gi 'os 
[\[333a.5\]]sa phyis/[ (]mal+dzin[,]mas+dzin [)]sha dag gi ha la la nu ma 'os/_nu ma A ga ma byin/_tsu'i ku 'os/_dza ga/_khar la tsa ra 'os ga ka drangs pas/_maM k+tA/_maM k+tA ro/_maM k+tA raH/_maM k+tA si/_sogs so/_smon pa'i ling la/_dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha 'os/_sang /_sa tu'i sha tsu la sha tsu 'os da dza ra bskyur bas/
[\[333a.6\]]madz+dz+ya ta/_madz+dz+yA stAM/_madz+h+ya suH/_sogs so/_l+r-iT la/_brtsegs pa'i dang po sogs kyis phyis/_mas+dzi dr-i sha dag gi ha la la nu ma 'os/_num A ga ma byin/_tsu'i ku 'os dza pa/_khar la tsha ra 'os/_ga ka/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur bas/_maMk+Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/
[\[333a.7\]]wang li/_a ma k+Sh+yi ta/_sogs so/_!_bits+tsha 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/_'grel par lung drangs pa/_bits+tshi rA yo bA/_bets+tshi las A ya yang na'o/_gong du ku pU d+hU pa bits+tsha/_pa Na pa na rnams las A ya 'o zhes bshad kyang /_bits+tsha las A ya yang na bar bya ste/_laT la/_bits+tsha ya ti/
[\[333b\]]
[\[333b.1\]]sogs sam/_bits+tsha ti/_sogs so/_ling la/_bits+tsha ye ta/_sogs sam/_bits+tshe ta/_sogs so/_loT la/_bits+tsha ya tu/_sogs sam/_sogs so/_lang la/_a bits+tshA yata/_sogs sam/_a bits+tsha ta/_sogs so/_lung la iT byin kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/_a bits+tshA yIta/
[\[333b.2\]]a bits+tshA yi ShuH/_sogs sam/_a bits+tshA ta/_a bits+tshI Sh+TaM/_a bits+tshA Sh+TaH/_sogs so/_liT la/_A ya sbyar ba'i phyogs la/_kAs rkyen mtha' sogs kyis A ma sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_bits+tsA yAM tsa kA ra/_bits+tshA yAM ba b+hU ba/_bits+tshA yA mA sa/_sogs so/_A ya med pa'i 
[\[333b.3\]]phyogs la gnyis brjod pas skyes bu dang po gsum la/_bi bits+tsha/_bi bits+tsha tuH/_bi bits+tshuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_bi bi ts+tsha tha/_bi bits+tsha thuH/_bi bits+tshaH/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_bi bits+tsha/_bi bits+tshi ba/_bi bits+tshi mi/_luT la iT yang na bar byas pas/_bits+tshA yi tA/_bits+tshA yi tA si sogs 
[\[333b.4\]]sam/_bits+tshi tA/_bits+tshi tA si/_sogs so/_smon pa'i ling la/_bits+tshA y+YA ta/_bits+tshA y+YA stUM/_bits+tshA y+YA staM/_bits+tshA y+YA suH/_sogs sam/_bits+tsh+yA ta/_bits+tsh+yA staM/_bits+tsh+yA suH/_sogs so/_/l+r-ita la iT byin pas/_bits+tshA yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs sam/_bi ts+tshA Sh+ya ti/_sogs so/_/l+r-ing la/_a bits+tshA yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs sam/_a bits+tshi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/
[\[333b.5\]]mr-i sha bzod pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/_laT la/_mr-i sha ti/_sogs dang /_ling la/_mr-i she ta/_sogs so/_loT la/_mr-i sha tu/_sogs dang /_lang la/_a mr-i shata/_sogs so/_lung la/_kr-iSha/_mr-i sha/_spr-i sha sogs kyis ts+l-i si tsar yang na bsgyur te/_si tsa'i 
[\[333b.6\]]phyogs la/_a nu dA t+ha'i r-ita u pa d+h+wa'i a ma yang na 'os/_a ma A ga ma yang na bar byed de/_a ma byin pa'i phyogs la/_bra sh+tsa b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis sha Sha/_dz+ha dang po rnams la dz+ha la sa dz+hal la 'os si tsa phyis/_Sha Tu la Sha Tu/_sogs dang /_sa la Sha D+ha sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu 
[\[333b.7\]]dang po gsum la/_a mrak+ShI ta/_bang phra sh+tsa sogs kyis 'phel ba/_a mrASh+TAM/_a mrA k+ShuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a mrA k+ShIH/_a mrA Sh+Ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a mrA k+ShaM/_a mrA kh+ShA/_a mrA k+Sh+ma/_a ma med pa'i phyogs la gzhan cho ga 'dra/_pad bra sh+tsa sogs kyis 'phel ba byas nas ra drangs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum/
[\[334a\]]
[\[334a.1\]]la/_a m+war+k+Shi ta/_a m+war+Sh+TAM/_a mU r+k+ShuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a mA r+k+ShI:/_a mAr+Sh+TaM/_a mAr+Sh+Ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a mAr+k+ShaM/a mArka/_a mAr+k+Sh+ma/_yang na/_shal ika u pa d+hA sogs kyis ts+li k+sar bsgyur/_bra sh+tsa sogs kyisasha Sha/_sa la ShaD+ha dag gi ka 'os/
[\[334a.2\]]Sha ka/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha ra bsgyur bas/_a mr-i k+Sha ta/_a mr-i k+Sha tAM/_a mr-i k+Shan/_sogs so/_l+r-iT la/_byings gnyis brjod/_r-i'i ata 'os/_r-i ata du bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ma ma r+sha/_ma mri sha tuH/_ma mr-i shuH/_skyes bu dbus ma 
[\[334a.3\]]gsum la/_ma marki tha/_ma mar+Sh+tha/_ma mr-i sha thuH/_ma mr-i sha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ma mar+sha/_ma mr-i shi ba/_mi mr-i shi ma/_luT la/_a nu dA t+ta'i 'ang r-ita u pa d+hA sogs kyis a ma yang na bar byas/_brash+tsa b+hA s+dza sogs kyis sha Sha/_Sha Tu la Sha Tu sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_mraSh+TA/_mraSh+TA si/
[\[334a.4\]]sogs sam/_mar+Sh+TA/_mar+Sh+TA si/_sogs so/_smon pa'i ling la/_mr-i sh+yA ta/_mr-i sh+yAta/_mr-i sh+yA stAM/_mr-i sh+yA suH/_sogs so/_l+r-iT la/_sa nu dA t+ha'i 'ang r-ita u pa d+hA sogs kyis a ma yang na bar byas/_brash+tsa b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis sha Sha/_sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka 'os/_Sha ka/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs 
[\[334a.5\]]pas/_mrak+Sh+ya ti/_sogs sam/_mar+k+Sh+ya ti/_sogs so/_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a mrak+Sh+ya ta/_sogs sam/_a mar+k+Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_i ShU 'dod pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams 'jug ste/_i Shu ga mi ya ma rnams kyi Sha tshar bsgyur/_laT la/_its+tsha ti/_sogs dang /_ling 
[\[334a.6\]]la/_its+tshe ta/_sogs so/_loT la/_its+tsha tu/_sogs dang /_lang la/_ai ts+tsha ta/_sogs so/_lung la/_ba la dang po'i iT byin/_a tsa dang po sogs kyis AT/_AT las kyang ngos 'phel ba byas pas/_ai ShI ta/_i Shi Sh+TI/_aiShi Sh+TAM/_ai Shi ShuH/_sogs so/_liT la gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis/
[\[334a.7\]]bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ya tsa dang po sogs kyis AT/_AT las kyang ngos 'phel ba/_i ye Sha/_bu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan/_a b+h+yAs 'dra ba ma yin pa sogs kyis i yar bsgyur/_I Sha tuH/_I ShuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_i ye Shi tha/_I Sha thuH/_i Sha/_skyes bu phyi/
[\[334b\]]
[\[334b.1\]]ma gsum la/_i ye Sha/_I Shi ba/_I Shi ma/_luT la/_i Shu tas/_lu b+ha ru Sha/_R-i Sha las sos/_iT yang na bar byas pas/_i Shi tA/_e Shi tA si/_sogs sam/_eSh+TA so/_sogs so/_smon pa'i ling la/_iSh+ya ta/_iSh+yA stAM/_iSh+yA suH/_sogs so/_l+r-iT la/_bu ka mtha' 
[\[334b.2\]]sogs kyis yon tan/_iT byin pas/_i Sh+ya ti/_sogs so/_de bzhin du/_l+r-iT la/_ai Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/kuT gya gyu la'o zhes pa la'ang tang rnams sbyor te/_laT la/_kuT taM/_sogs dang /_ling la/_kuTe ta/_sogs dang /_loT la/_kuT tu/_sogs dang /_lang la/_kuT tu/_sogs 
[\[334b.3\]]so/_/lung la/_gAng kuT la sogs pa rnams las nyaN 'gro ba ma yin pa ngita 'os/_yon tan dang 'phel ba sogs mi byed/_iT byin pas/_a ku TI ta/_a ku TI ShuH/_sogs so/_liT la gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tsu koT/_tsu kuT 
[\[334b.4\]]tuH/_tsu ku TuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tsu ku Ti tha/_tsu kuT thuH/_tsu kuT/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsu ko Ta/_tsu ku Ti ba/_tsu ku Ti ma/_luT la iT byin/_gang kuT sogs kyis yon tan mi byed/_kuTi tA/_kuTi tA si/_sogs so/_smon pa'i ling la/_ku T+yA ta/_ku T+yA staM/_ku T+yA suH/_sogs so/_/
[\[334b.5\]]l+r-iT la iT byin/_gAng kuT sogs kyis yon ta mi byed/_ku Ti Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a ku Ti Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/bya tsa zol byed pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/_gra hi dz+yA sogs kyis saM pra sAr Nar bsgyur bas/_bi tsa ti/_sogs dang /_ling la/_bi tse ta/_sogs 
[\[334b.6\]]so/_loT la/_bi tsa tu/_sogs dang /_lang la/_a bi tsa ta/_sogs so/_lung la/_bal dang po'i iT byin/_gAng kuT sogs kyi ngita yin pas/_ngi ta pha rol la gra hi dz+yA sogs kyis saM bra sA ra Na byas pas/_bi tsI ta/_bi tsi Shu/_bi tsi ShuH/_sogs so/_liT la/_byings gnyis brjod/_Nal gnyis 
[\[334b.7\]]la/_gnyis rnams kyi sogs kyis a b+h+yAs saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur/_gzhan rnams la gra hi dz+yA sogs kyis gnyis ka saM pra sA ra Na byas pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_bi byA tsa/_bi bi tsa tuH/_bi bi tsuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_bi bi tsi thu/_bi bi tsa thaH/_bi bi tsuH/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_bi byA 
[\[335a\]]
[\[335a.1\]]tsa/_bi bya tsa/_bi bi tsi ba/_bi bi tsi ma/_luT la iT byin/_gAng kuT sogs kyis ngita yin pas/_ngita pha rol la gra hi dz+yA sogs kyis saM pra sAr Na byas pas/_bi tsi tA/_bi tsi tA si/_sogs so/_smon pa'i ling la/_gra hi dz+yA sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Na byas pas/_bits+yA ta/_bits+yA stAM/
[\[335a.2\]]bi ts+yA suH/_sogs so/_l+r-ita la bal dang po'i iT byin/_gAng kuT sogs kyis ngita yin pas/_ngita pha rol la gra hi dz+yA sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Na byas pas/_bi tsi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+ring la/_a bi tsi Sh+yata/_sogs so/_!_/tUT rnam par gcod pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a 
[\[335a.3\]]tang rnams sbyor te/_b+h+rA sha b+h+y+wa sha klA mu kra mu tra si tU Ti la Sha las yang na 'os/_sha dang sh+yan yang na bar byas pas/_laT la/_truT ti/_sogs sam/_tru TA ti/_sogs so/_ling la/_tru Te ta/_sogs sam/_tru T+ye ta/_sogs so/_loT la/_truT tu/_sogs sam/_tru T+ya tu/_sogs 
[\[335a.4\]]so/_lang la/_a tru Ta ta/_sogs sam/_a tru T+ya ta/_sogs so/_lung la/_gUng kuT sogs kyis yon tan dang 'phel ba sogs mi byed/_iT byin pas/_a tru TI ta/_a tru TiSh+T-I/_a tru Ti ShuH/_sogs so/_liT la gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis/_tu troT/_tu tru Ta tu:/_tu tru TuH/
[\[335a.5\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tu tru Ti tha/_tu tru Ta thuH/_tu tru Ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tu troT/_tu tru Ti ba/_tu tru Ti ma/_luT la iT byin/_gang kuT sogs kyis yon tan mi byed/_tru Ti tA/_tru Ti tA si/_sogs so/_smon pa'i ling la/_tru T+yA ta/_tru T+yA staM/_tru T+yA suH/_l+r-iT la iT 
[\[335a.6\]]byin/_gAng kuT sogs kyis yon tan mi byed/_tru Ti Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ingal/_a tru Ti Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/sbu ra 'phro ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/_laT la/_s+phu ra ti/_sogs dang /_ling la/_s+phu re ta/_sogs so/_loT ya/_s+phu ra tu/_sogs dang /
[\[335a.7\]]lang la/_a s+phu ra ta/_sogs so/_lung la iT byin/_gAng kuT sogs kyis yon tan sogs mi byed pas/_a s+phu rI ta/_a s+phu ri Sh+TAM/_a s+phu ri ShuH/_sogs so/_liT la gnyis brjod shar dang po sogs kyis sa phyis/_a b+h+ya sa'i tsa ra'ang ngos pha bar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/
[\[335b\]]
[\[335b.1\]]skyes bu dang po gsum la/_pu s+phor/_pu s+phu ra tuH/_pu s+phu ruH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_pus+phu ri tha/_pus+phu ra thuH/_pu s+phu ra/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_phu s+pho ra/_pu s+phu ri ba/_pu s+phu ri ma/_luT la iT byin/_gAng kuT sogs kyis yon tan mi byed/_s+phu ri tU/_s+phu ri tA si/_sogs 
[\[335b.2\]]so/_smon pa'i ling la/_u ba d+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/_s+phUr+YA ta/_s+phUr+YA staM/_s+phUr+Ya suH/_sogs so/_l+r-iT la iT byin/_gAng kuT sogs kyis yon tan mi byed/_s+phu ri Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a s+phu ra ta/_sogs so/_s+phu ra hi s+phu la t+ya rni rni bi b+h+yaH/_nir ni 
[\[335b.3\]]bi rnams las s+phu ra ti s+phu la ti dag gi'o/_nyer brgyud ni ra dang ni dang bi rnams las pha rol gyi s+phu ra ti dang s+phu ti dag gi sa yi ni Sha yig tu yang na bsgyur te/_niHSh+phu ra ti/_ni s+s+phu ra ti/_ni s+phu ra ti/_ni s+s+phu ra ti/_bi Sh+phu ra ti/_bi s+s+phu ra ti/_niHs+phu la ti/_ni s+s+phu la ti/_sogs so/_!_/s+phu la kun 
[\[335b.4\]]nas sogs pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/_smon pa'i ling gi skabs su ring po mi byed pa tsam ma gtogs cho ga thams cad s+phu ra dang 'dra ste/_s+phu la ti/_sogs so/_!_/NU bstod pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/_Na'i na'o Na na/_a tsa la sh+nu byings sogs kyis u 
[\[335b.5\]]bar bsgyur bas/_laT la/_nu pa ti/_sogs dang /_ling la/_nu be ta/_sogs so/_loT la/_nu pa tu/_sogs dang /_lang la/_a nu ba ta/_sogs so/_lung la/_iT byin/_gAng kuT sogs kyis yon tan dang 'phel ba sogs mi byed/_a tsa la sh+nu byings sogs kyis u bar bsgyur bas 
[\[335b.6\]]a nu bI ta/_a nu biSh+TAM/_a nu bi ShuH/_sogs so/_liT la/_gnyis brjod Na la gnyis la 'phel ba dang /_gzhan rnams la u bar bsgyur bas skyes bu dang po gsum la/_nu nU ga_nu nu ba tuH/_nu nu buH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_nu nu bi tha/_nu nu ba thuH/_nu nu ba/_skyes bu phyi ma 
[\[335b.7\]]gsum la/_nu nA ba/_nu na ba/_nu nu pi ba/_nu nu bi ma/_luT la iT byin/_gAng kuT sogs kyis yon tan mi byed/_atsa la sh+nu byings sogs kyis u bar bsgyur bas/_nu bi tA/_nu bi tA si/_sogs so/_smon pa'i ling ba/_nU yAta/_nU yA Sh+TaM/_nU yA suH/_sogs so/_l+r-iT la iT byin/
[\[336a\]]
[\[336a.1\]]gAng kuT sogs kyis yon tan mi byed/_a tsa la sh+nu byings sogs kyis u bar bsgyur bas/_nu piSh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+ring la/_a nu piSh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/mr-ing srog gtong ba la'o/_mr-i ya te rlung la dosh+tsa/_mr-i ya ti las lung lung 
[\[336a.2\]]dag gi lang ngo /_mr-i ya ta las rkyen sha 'gro ba'i mtha' dang lung dang smon pa'i ling 'ang At+ma ne pa de rnams sbyor zhing gzhan rnams kyi par sme pa de rnams sbyor te/_mr-ing la sha/_/sha ya ka ling rnams la ring 'os r-i ring du bsgyur/_a tsa la sh+nu byings sogs kyis i yar bsgyur bas/
[\[336a.3\]]laT la/_mri ya te/_sogs dang /_ling la/_mri ya ta/_sogs so/_loT la/_mri ya tAM/_sogs dang /_lang la/_a mri ya ta/_sogs so/_lung la/_dz+ha la dang po rnams la gzugs thung ngu las sos/_si tsa dbyi ba sogs byas pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a mr-i ta/_a

[\[336b\]]
[\[336b.1\]]la/_a bi dza ta/_sogs so/_bi dza iT/_bi dza las iTa'o/_bi dza las pha rol gyi nya Na 'gro 'bi ming can ma yin pas rkyen iT dang po can ning 'gro ba'i ming can zhes ming 'dogs byed de/_dgos pa ni yon tan dang 'phel ba 'gog pa'i don te/_lung la/_a bi dziSh+Ta/_a bi dzo ShA tAM/

[\[336b.7\]]'gyur te/_sha shita kyi don dang ma yig ma 'gro ba atsa'i mtha' las pha rol lo'i don no/_luTa'i par smai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_la ti pa/_mdo 'dis sh+na ma byin/_ma gnas don/_sha shi ta don/_dz+ha Sha sogs kyis tha d+ha/_dz+ha la sogs kyis d+ha dar bsgyur bas/_ru Nad+d+hi/_gnyis/
[\[337a\]]
[\[337a.1\]]tshig la/_la/_tis/_sh+na ma byin/_rjes 'brel phyis/_sh+na as dag gi ata dbyi 'os k+dita pha rol la na'i srog a phyis/_dz+ha Sha sogs kyis ta d+ha/_dz+ha ra 'dra ba la dz+har rnams kyi 'os d+ha gong ma phyis/_na'i yang tshig mtha' ma yin pas dz+hal la 'os na nga ro byas pas/_rUM d+haH/

[\[337b\]]
[\[337b.1\]]byas pas/_ang du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_a ru d+ha ta/_a ra d+ha tAM/_a ru d+ha na/_sogs dang /_si tsar bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_ba da bra sh+tsa sogs kyis 'phel ba byas/_rnam dbye dz+hal dang po rnams la/_dz+hal las dz+hal la 'os si tsa phyis/_dz+ha Sha sogs kyis ta tha dag d+ha dang /_dz+ha sha la dz+hal

[\[338a\]]
[\[338a.1\]]sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi a tang la/_a ro t+s+ya ta/_sogs dang /_tang dang /_a ro t+s+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/u tsh+r-i dir 'bar ba dang rtse ba dag la'o zhes pa la a tang rnams sbyor te/_la Ta'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_la tipa/_ru d+ha sogs kyi sh+na ma byin

[\[338a.4\]]laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tsh+r-i Na t+tu/_tsh+r-i n+tA ta/_tsh+r-i n+tAM/_tsh+r-i nA n+tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tsh+r-i n+d+t+hi/_tsh+r-i n+tA ta/_tsh+r-i n+taM/_tsh+r-i n+ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsh+r-i n+dA ni/_tsh+r-i n+dA ba/_tsh+r-i n+dA ma/_de bzhin du/_lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a tsh+r-i Na da/_a tsh+r-i Na ta/_a

[\[338a.6\]]tsh+r-i da na/_sogs dang /_si tsa'i phyogs la iT de'i lang ngos da ru ra rnam bcad/_gnas med pa la yang na 'os/_da nyid dam ta/_byin/_pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_a tsha rdI ta/_a tsha rdi Sh+TAM/_a tsha rdi ShuH/_sogs so/_/liT la gnyis brjod ri'i ata 'os r-i a/_a b+h+yA sa'i tsa ra 'ang ngos/_tsha tsar 
[\[338a.7\]]bsgyur ba sogs kyis skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tsa tsha rda/_tsa tsh+r-i da tuH/_tsa tsh+r-i duH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tsa tsh+ra rdi tha/_tsa tsh+r-i da thuH/_tsh+rad/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsa tsh+r-i rda/_tsa tsh+r-i di ba/_tsa tsh+r-i di ma/_luT la iT byin/_buka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_tsh+ra rdi tA/
[\[338b\]]
[\[338b.1\]]tsh+ra dzi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_tsh+r-i d+yA ta/_tsh+r-i d+yA stAM/_tsh+r-i d+yA suH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_krita ts+r-ita tsh+r-ita tr-ita/_nr-i ta las si tsa ma yin pas sa la 'os iT yang na bar byas/_buka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_/iTa'i phyogs la/_tsh+ra dzi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /
[\[338b.2\]]iT med pa'i phyogs la/_tsha r+t+s+ya ti/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a tsha rdi Sh+ya ta/_sogs sam/_a tsha r+t+s+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/u tr-i di ra 'tshe ba dang ma gus pa dag la'o zhes pa la'ang a tar rnams sbyor te/_cho ga thams cad tsh+y-i da dang 'dra ste/_laTa'i skyes bu dang pa gsum 
[\[338b.3\]]la/_tr-i Na rti/_t+y-i n+taH/_t+y-i n+da n+ti/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tr-i Na t+si/_tr-i n+t+thaH/_tr-i n+t+tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tr-i Na d+mi/_tr-i n+t+waH/_tr-i n+t+maH/_ling la/_tr-i n+d+yA ta/_tr-i n+t+yA tAM/_sogs so/_/loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tr-i Na tu/_tr-i n+tA ta/_tr-i n+tAM/_tr-i n+ta n+tU/_skyes bu dbus ma 
[\[338b.4\]]gsum la/_tr-i n+d+b+hi/_tr-i n+tA ta/_tr-i n+taM/_tr-i n+ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tr-i Na dA ni/_tr-i Na dA ba/_tr-i Na dA ma/_lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a tr-i Na ta/_a tr-i Na da/_a tr-i n+tAM/_a tr-i n+da na/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a tr-i NaH/_a tr-i Na ta/_a tr-i Na da/_a tr-i n+taM/_a tr-i n+ta/_skyes bu 
[\[338b.5\]]phyi ma gsum la/_a tr-i Na daM/_a tr-i n+d+wa/_a tr-i n+d+ma/_lung la ir 'gro ba sogs kyis ts+li ang dang si tsa yang na bar byas pas/_ang gi phyogs la/_-i tri da ta/_a tr-i da tAM/_a tr-i da na/_sogs dang /_si tsa'i phyogs la iT byin pas/_a ta rdI ta/_a ta rdI Sh+TAM/_a ta rdi ShuH/_sogs 
[\[338b.6\]]so/_/l+r-ing la gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ta ta rda/_ta tr-i tuH/_ta tr-i duH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ta ta rdi tha/_ta tr-i da thuH/_ta tr-i da/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ta ta rda/_ta tr-i di ba/_ta tr-i di ma/_luT la iT byin pas/_ta rdi tA/_ta rdi tA si/
[\[338b.7\]]sogs so/_/smon pa'i lir la/_tr-i d+yA ta/_tr-i d+yA stAM/_tr-i d+yA suH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_krita ts+r-ita tsh+r-ita tr-id nr-id las si tsam yin pa'i sa la 'os/_iT yang na bar byas pas/_iTa'i phyogs la/_ta rdi s+ya ti/_sogs dang /_iT med pa'i phyogs la/_ti t+d+s+ya ti/_sogs so/_/
[\[339a\]]
[\[339a.1\]]de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la'ang iT yang na bar byas pas/_a ta rdi Sh+ya ta/_sogs sam/_a ta r+t+m+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/shi Sh+li khyad par la'o zhes pa la'ang a tar rnams sbyor te/_laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_la ti pa/_Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os/_ta 
[\[339a.2\]]Tar bsgyur bas/_shi na Sh+Ti/_gnyis tshig la/_la tas/_sh+na as dag gi a dbyi 'os/_na'i a phyis/_na'i 'ang tshig mtha' ma yin pa'i dz+hal la 'os nra nga ro/_Sha Tu laSha Tu 'os/_ta Tar bsgyur bas/_shiM Sh+TaH/_mang tshig la/_sh+na as sogs kyis a phyis/_na nga ro byas pas/

[\[342b.1\]]gsum la/_ta nu/_ta nu tAta/_ta nu taM/_ta nu ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ta na bA ni/_ta na bA ba/_ta na bA ma/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ta nu tAM_ta n+wA tAM/_ta n+wa tAM/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ta nu Sh+wa/_ta n+wa thAM/_ta nu ng+hAM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ta na bai/_ta na bA ba hai/_ta na bA ma hai/
