[\[343a.1\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ta ta ni tha/_te na thuH/_te na/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ta tA na/_ta ta na/_te ni ba/_te ni ma/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_te ne/_te nA te/_te ni ri/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_te ni She/_te nA the/_te ni ng+hA+e/_te ni dz+nye/_skyes bu 
[\[343a.2\]]phyi ma gsum la/_te ne/_te ni ba he/_te ni ma he/_luT la iT byin pas/_a tang la/_ta ni tA/_ta ni tA si/_sogs dang /_tang la/_ta ni tA/_ta ni tA se/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/_ta n+yAta/_ta n+yA stAM/_ta n+yA suH/_sogs so/_/tang la iT byin pas/_ta ni ShISh+Ta 
[\[343a.3\]]ta ni ShI yAstAM/_ta ni ShI ran/_sogs so/_/l+r-iTa'i a tang la/_ta ni Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_tang la/_ta ni Sh+ya te/_sogs so/_/l+r-ing gi a tar la/_ata ni Sh+ya ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_a ta ni Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/Sha nu sbyin pa la'o zhes pa la a tang dang tang gnyis ka 
[\[343a.4\]]'jug ste/_laTa'i a tang la/_sa no taM/_sogs dang /_tang la/_as nu te/_sogs so/_/l+ring gi a tang la/_sanu ya ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_san+wI ta/_sogs so/_/loTa'i a tang la/_sa no tu/_sogs dang /_tang la/_sa nu tAM/_sogs so/_/lang gi a tang la/
[\[343a.5\]]a sa no ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_a sa nu ta sogs so/_/lung gi a tang la iT byin/_hal dang po yang ba sogs kyis 'phel ba yang na bar byas pas/_a sA nI ta/_a sAnISh+DA/_a sAni ShuH/_sogs dang /_yang na/_a sa nI ta/_sogs so/_/tang la/_ta dang 
[\[343a.6\]]thAs la/_ta nal sogs pa rnams las ta thAs dag la 'os/_si tsa dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba yang bar byas/_si tsa phyis pa'i phyogs la/_a nu dAt+ta nye ba'i yul sogs kyi na phyis/_san dz+hal dag la dzan san khan rnams kyi 'os ring por bsgyur/_si tsa ma phyis pa'i phyogs dang 
[\[343a.7\]]gzhan rnams la iT byin pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a sA ta/_a sa niSh+Ta/_a sa ni ShA tAM/_a sa ni Sha ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a sa thAH/_a sa ni Sh+Th+D+raH/_a saniShA thAM/_a sa ni d+h+raM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_as niSha/_a sa ni Sh+wa hi/_a sa niSh+ma 
[\[343b\]]
[\[343b.1\]]hi/_liT la gnyis brjod/_g+dita rnams la a b+h+ya sa dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_sa sA na/_sa na tuHse nuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_sa sa ni tha/_sen thuH/_sen/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_sa sAn/_sa sa na/_se ni ba/_se ni ma/_tang gi skyes bu dang po

[\[343b.3\]]'dam ka 'os/_Ti Ata du bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/_sA yA ta/_sA yA stAM/_sA yA suH/_sogs sam/_sa n+yAta/_sa n+yA stAM/_sa n+yA suH/_sogs so/_/tang la iT byin pas/_sa ni ShISh+Ta/_sa ni ShI yA stAM/_sa ni ShI ran/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la iT byin pas/_a tang la/_sa ni Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_tang la/_sa ni 
[\[343b.4\]]Sh+ya te/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi a tang la/_a sa ni Sh+yata/_sogs dang /_tang la/_sas ni Sh+yata/_sogs so/_!_/k+Shi Nu 'tshe ba la'o zhes pa la a tang dang tang gnyis ka sbyor te/_'grel bar lung drangs pa/_u bra t+ya ye ta nA de rno pang+hA guNaH/_u rkyen la ta na la sogs pa'i u bang+hA yon tan ma yin no/_/rkyen 
[\[343b.5\]]u pha rol la tan la sogs pa rnams kyi u mang+hA raM yig yin na yon tan yang na bar byed la/_gzhan rnams la yon tan bya ba ma yin te/_laTa'i a tang la/_k+ShiNo ti/_sogs dang /_tang la/_k+ShiNu te/_sogs so/_ling gi a tang la/_k+ShiNu yAta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_k+Shi NI ta/_sogs so/_/laTa'i a tang la/_k+ShiNo tu/
[\[343b.6\]]sogs dang /_tang la/_k+Shi Nu tAM/_sogs so/_/lang gi a tang la/_ak+Shi Nota/_sogs dang /_tang la/_ak+Shi Nu ta/_sogs so/_/lung gi atang la/_iT byin pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon byas pas/_ak+She Ni ta/_ak+She Ni Sh+TAM/_a k+She Ni Sha ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_ta dar thAs la/_tan la sogs pa rnams las

[\[344a\]]
[\[344a.1\]]Ni ShA tAM/_ak+She Ni Sha ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ak+Shi thAH/_ak+She NiSh+ThaH_ak+She Ni ShA thAM/_ak+She Ni d+haM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ak+She Ni Shi/_ak+She Ni Sh+wa hi/_ak+She Ni Sh+ma hi/_liT la gnyis brjod/_hal dang bo lhag po dang /_kuha dag gi tsu 'os/_kra tsa pu ka mtha' sogs 
[\[344a.2\]]kyis yon tan byas pas/_a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tsi k+SheN/_tsik+She NatuH/_tsi k+She NuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tsi k+Shi Ni tha/_tsi k+She Na thuH/_tsi k+She Na/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsik+She Na/_tsik+She Ni ba/_tsi k+Sha Ni ma/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tsik+She Ne/_tsik+She NAte/_tsik+She Ni te/_skyes bu dbus

[\[344a.5\]]ak+She Ni Sh+ya ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_ak+She Ni Sh+yata/_sogs so/_!_/ruM Na 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang dang tang gnyis ka sbyor te/_r-i u pa ng+hA ma yin pa sogs kyi lung 'dren gyis yon tan yang na bar byas te/_laTa'i a tang la/_r-i No ti/_sogs sam/_ar+No ti/_sogs so/_/tang la/_ri Nu te/_sogs sam/_ar+Nu te/

[\[344b\]]
[\[344b.1\]]ta thAs dag la 'os si tsa dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba yang na bar byas/_phyis pa'i phyogs la/_anu dAt+ta nye ba'i yul sogs kyis Na yang phyis/_si tsa ma phyis pa'i phyogs dang gzhan rnams la iT byin pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_Arta/_Ar+NaMSh+Ta/_Ar+NiShA tAM/_Ar+NiSha ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_Ar+thA ma/
[\[344b.2\]]Arni ShAH/_Ar+Ni ShA thAM/_Ar+Ni ng+h+waM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_Ar+NiShi/_Ar+Ni Sh+ma hi/_Ar+NiSh+ma hi/_liT la/_Na la gnyis dang thal la gnyis brjod/_r-i'i a ta 'os r-i a/_pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan dang po'i ata kyi 'os ring por bsgyur/_de las ha la gnyis sogs kyis nuT A nam byin/
[\[344b.3\]]gzhan k+tita rnams la byings gnyis brjod/_r-i'i ata 'os r-i gong ma ata/_a las yon tan nos mtshams sbyar bas/_a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_An r+Na/_ar+NatuH/_ar+NuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_A na rni tha/_a rna thuH/_ar+Na thuH/_ar+Na/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a+wan r+Na/_a r+Ni ba/

[\[344b.5\]]ar+Ni tA/_ar+Ni tA se/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/_r-iN+yAta/_raM N+yA sdAM/_raM N+yA suH/_sogs dang /_tang la/_iT byin/_pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_ar+Ni ShISh+Ta/_ar+NiShI yA stAM/_ar+Ni ShI ran/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la'ang iT byin yon tan byas pas/_a tang la/_ar+NiSh+ya te/_sogs dang /_tang la/

[\[345a\]]
[\[345a.1\]]ka ro te/_ka ngo ti las rtag tu'o/_/ka ro ti las pha rol gyi rkyen u ni bam pha rol la rtag tu dbyi ste/_skyes bu phyi ma'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_kurbaH/_kurmaH/_de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/_tang gi skyes bu dang po

[\[345b\]]
[\[345b.1\]]la 'phel ba da ra smai pa da rnams la 'os/_'phel ba byas pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a kA r+ShI ta/_a kA r+ShAM/_a kA r+ShuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a kA r+ShIH/_a kA r+th+TaM/_a kA r+Sh+Ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a kA r+ShaM/_a

[\[346a\]]
[\[346a.1\]]Sh+ya te/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi a tang la/_a ka ri Sh+ya ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_a ka ri Sh+ya ti/_sogs so/_/saM pa r+Yu be b+h+yAH/_ka ro tau b+hU Sha Ne/_saM pa ri u rnams

[\[346a.3\]]ri ni bi rnams las sogs kyis Shar bsgyur ba'o/_/u pa ska ro ti/_rgyan nye bar byed/_/pa r+Ya k+kA r+ShI ta/_rgyan yongs su byas/_pa r+Yu Sh+k+rA r+ShI ta/_u ba sngon ma'i kr-i la liT aT a b+h+yAs bar na yod kyang ngos/_ka'i sngon du suT/_u pa tsa skAr/_sngon rgyan nye bar byas/_u 
[\[346a.4\]]ba dang saM sngon ma'i kr-i la/_liT aT a b+h+yA sa dang bar na yod kyang ngos/_suT byin/_la tas dang dz+hi ru bsgyur/_!_ba ri sngon ma'i kr-i la lung aT a b+h+yAs bar na yon kyang ngos/_ka'i sngon du suT byin/_sib la sogs pa rnams kyis yang na 'os/_sa kar yang na ngar byas/_!_de 
[\[346a.5\]]gnyis a tus dang us su bsgyur/_suT ka'i steng du byung bas/_brtsegs pa'i pha rol la liT rnams k+dita ma yin pas/_byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pa ste/_a tang dang tang gnyis ka'i lhag ma kun la rigs 'gre'o/_/u pa tsa ska ra tuH/_sngon rgyan nye bar dag

[\[346b\]]
[\[346b.1\]]la'ang ngo /_/saM ba ri u pa rnams las pha rol gyi ka ro ti las 'dus pa'i don la'ang suT 'byung te/_u bska ro ti ka n+yaM/_saM ska ro ti kan+yaM/_pa ri Sh+ka ro ti ka n+yUM/_sogs so/_/u pA t+pa ti ya t+ne be kr-i ta bA kyA d+hA hA re Shu/_u pa las so sor 'bad 
[\[346b.2\]]pa dang /_rnam 'gyur brjod pa dang /_rtog pa rnams la'o/_u pa las pha rol/_bu mo la nye bar 'dus par byed/_bu mo la yang dag par 'dus par byed/_ba mo la yongs su 'dus par byed/_gyi ka ro ti la so sor 'bad pa dang /_rnam 'gyur brjod pa dang /
[\[346b.3\]]rtog pa rnams kyi don la suT 'gyur te/_ga N+ThaM gu Na s+yo pa sku ru te/_u pa ska ro ti k+hUM k+te/_rnam 'gyur brjod pa'i don/_so pa ska ro ti shA staM/_i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trA t+ta nA da yaH/_sa mA p+tAH/_zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las/_ta

[\[346b.5\]]pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las/_tan la sogs pa byed pa po'i don gyi sha ba kyi yul la u 'jug pa rnams kyi cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal dang 
[\[346b.6\]]bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so//_//da ni kr-i la sogs pa rnams kyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/_!_Du kr-I nya rdzas tshang ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/_kyA di b+h+yAH/_sh+nA/_krI la sogs pa rnams las sh+nA'o/_/krI 
[\[346b.7\]]la sogs pa rnams las sha pa kyi yul la sh+nA pha rol du 'gyur te/_ha la dang po ka pa 'gro ba'i ming can rnams/_g+hum yin pa'i hal la I 'os/_Ir bsgyur ba dang /_a tsa dang po rnams la sh+nA a b+h+ya sta dag gi A ta 'os/_A dbyi ba sogs byas pas/_laTa'i 
[\[347a\]]
[\[347a.1\]]a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_kr-I NA ti/_krI NA taH/_krI Na n+ti/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_krI NA si/_krI NI thaH/_krI NI tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_krI NA mi/_krI NI baH/_krI NA maH/_de bzhin du/_tang

[\[347a.3\]]bsgyur bas/_krI NI yA ta/_krI NI yA tAM/_krI NI yuH/_sogs so/_/tang la/_mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sI yuTa'i sa phyis/_sh+nA a b+h+yA sta dag gi Ata 'os/_A phyis nas drangs bas/_krI NI ta/_krI NI yA tAM/_krI NI ran sogs so/_/loT 
[\[347a.4\]]la la Ta'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/_a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_krI NA tu/_kr-I NI tA ta/_krI NI tAM/_krI NA n+tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_krI NI hi/_krI NI tA ta/_krI NI ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_krI NA ni/_krI NA ba/_krI NA ma/_tang

[\[347a.6\]]krI Na na/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a krI NaH/_a krI NI taM/_a krI NI ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a krI NI/_a krI NI ba/_a krI NI ma/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a krI NI ta/_a krI NA tAM/_a krI Na ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a krI NI 
[\[347a.7\]]thAH/_a krI NA thAM/_a krI NI d+h+waM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a krI Ni/_a krI NI ba hi/_a krI NI ma hi/_lung gi a tang la/_si tsa la 'phel ba sogs kyis 'phel ba byas pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a krA+ai ShI ta/_a krai Sh+TAM/_a krai ShuH/_skyes bu dbus 
[\[347b\]]
[\[347b.1\]]ma gsum la/_a krai ShIH/_a krai Sh+TaM/_a krai Sh+Ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a krai ShaM/_a krai Sh+wa/_a krai Sh+ma/_tang la byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a kre Sh+Ta/_a kre ShA tAM/_a kre Sha ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/
[\[347b.2\]]a kre Sh+nAH/_a kri ShA thAM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a kre Shi/_a kre Sh+wa hi/_a kre Sh+ma hi/_liT la/_gnyis brjod 'di brtsegs pa can yin pas kang 'gro ba'i ming can ma yin pas yon tan dang 'phel ba sogs byas pas/_a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/
[\[347b.3\]]tsi krA ya/_tsi krA ya tuH/_tsa tra yuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tsi kra ya tha/_tsi kre tha/_tsi kra ya thuH/_tsi kra ya/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsi krA ya/_tsi kra ya/_tsi kra yi ba/_tsi kra yi ma/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tsi kra ye/_tsi kra yA te/_tsi kra yi re/
[\[347b.4\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tsi kra yi She/_tsi kra yA the/_tsi kra yi d+he/_tsi kra yi D+he/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsi kra ye/_tsi kra yi ba he/_tsi kra yi ma he/_luT la byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_a tang la/_kre tA/_kre tA si sogs dang /_tang 
[\[347b.5\]]la/_kre tA/_kre tA se sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/_krI yA ta/_krI yA stAM/_krI yA suH/_sogs so/_/tang la byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pa/_kre ShI+u Sh+Ta/_kre ShA yA staM/_kre ShI ran/_sogs so/_l+r-iTal byings thams cad pa sogs 
[\[347b.6\]]kyis yon tan byas pas/_/a tang la/_kre Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_tang la/_kra Sh+ya te/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi a tang la/_a kre Sh+ya ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_a kre Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/sku nya kun tu grol ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang dang tang 
[\[347b.7\]]gnyis ka sbyor te/_sta m+b+hu stu m+b+hu ska m+b+hu sku m+b+hu sku r+b+b+h+yaH/_sh+tsu sh+tsa/_sta m+b+hu stu m+b+hu ska m+b+hu sku m+b+hu/_ku nya rnams las sh+na 'ang ngo /_/sta m+b+hu dang stu m+b+hu dang ska m+b+hu dang sku m+b+hu rnams sgrib pa/_sku nya kun tu grol ba rnams las pha rol tu sha pa kyi yul la sh+nA 'gyur zhing sh+nu 'ang 'gyur te/_sku nya la sh+nu dang sh+nu 
[\[348a\]]
[\[348a.1\]]yang na bar byas pas/_laTa'i a tang la/_sku nA ti/_sogs sam/_sku no ti/_sogs so/_/tang la/_sku nI te/_sogs sam/_sku nu te/_sogs so/_/ling gi a tang la/_sku nI yAta/_sogs sam/_sku nu yAta/_sogs so/_tang la/_sku nI ta/_sogs

[\[348a.4\]]skau Sh+wa/_a skau Sh+ma/_tang la byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a sko Sh+Ta/_a sko ShA tAM/_a sko Sha ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a sko Sh+ThAH/_a sko ShA thAM/_a sko d+hAM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a sko Shi/_a sko Sha hi/_a sko Sh+m+ra nyi/

[\[348b\]]
[\[348b.1\]]pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_sko ShI Sh+Ta/_sko ShI yA stAM/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la'ang yon tan byas pas/_a tang la/_sko Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_d+nyatang la/_sko Sh+ya te/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi a tang la/_a sko Sh+ya ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_a sko Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/

[\[348b.4\]]sogs sam/_a sta b+h+no ta/_a sta b+h+nu tAM/_a sta b+h+nu ba na/_sogs so/_/lung la/_dzrI sta m+b+hu/_mru tsa m+lu tsa sogs kyis ts+laM ang dang si tsa yang na bar byas/_ang gi phyogs la/_i ti 'gro ba sogs kyis ma phyis pas/_a sta b+ha ta/_a sta b+ha tAM/_a sta b+ha tAM/_a sta b+ha na/_sogs dang /_si tsa'i

[\[349a\]]
[\[349a.1\]]sogs sam/_stu b+h+nu yA ta/_sogs so/_/loT la/_stu b+h+na tu/_sogs sam/_stu b+h+no tu/_sogs so/_lang la/_a stu b+h+nA ta/_sogs sam/_a stu b+hA+o ta/_sogs so/_/lung la iT byin pas/_a stu m+b+h+nI ta/_a stu m+b+hi Sh+TAM/_a stu m+b+hi ShuH/_sogs so/_/liT la gnyis

[\[349b\]]
[\[349b.1\]]sogs dang /sh+nA'i rkyen can ma yin na mi 'gyur te/bi ska b+ho ti/_sogs so/_!_/sku m+b+hu sgrib ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/_sh+na dang sh+nu yang na bar byas/_ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis ma phyis pas/_laT la/_sku b+h+nA ti/_sogs dang /_sku b+hA+o ti/_sogs so/_/ling la/

[\[350a.1\]]sogs kyi Ata du bsgyur nas gnyis brjod gzhan rnams la gnyis brjod thung ngu 'os/_thung ngur bsgyur/_a tsa gcig ma yin pa sogs kyis ya Nar bsgyur bas/_a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ma mau/_mi mya tuH/_mi myuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum

[\[350b\]]
[\[350b.1\]]yang na par bya ste/_pu nA ti/_pU nA ti/_sogs so/_/lung gi a tang la iT byin/_si tsa 'phel ba par smai pa da rnams la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/_a pA bI ta/_a pA bi Sh+TAM/_a pA bi ShuH/_sogs so/_/tang la iT byin/_byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/

[\[351a\]]
[\[351a.1\]]a kA ri ShuH/_tang la/_br-i r-I ta las yang na 'os/_iT dang IT yang na bar byas/_byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_a ka ri Sh+Ta/_a ka ri ShA tAM/_a ka ri Sha ta/_sogs sam/_a ka rI Sh+Ta/_a ka'i rI ShA tAM/_a ka rI Sha ta/_sogs so/_/
[\[351a.2\]]liT la gnyis brjod r-i'i a ta 'os/_r-i a ku ha dag gis tsu 'os/_ka tsa Na la gnyis la 'phel ba dang /_gzhan rnams la/_r-its+tsa ti r-I ta rnams kyi 'os yon tan byas pas/_a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tsa kA ra/_tsa ka ra tuH/_tsa ka ruH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tsa ka ri 
[\[351a.3\]]tha/_tsa ka ra thuH/_tsa ka ra/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsa kA ra/_tsa ka ra/_tsa ka ri ba/_tsa ka ri ma/_tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tsa ka re/_tsa ka rA te/_tsa ka ri re/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tsa ka ri She/_tsa ka rA the/_tsa ka ri d+hA+e/_tsa ka ri D+h+re/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsa ka re/_tsa ka ri ba he/
[\[351a.4\]]tsa ka ri ma he/_luT la br-i r-I ta las yang na 'os/_iT dang IT yang na par byas pas/_a tang la/_ka ri tA/_ka ri tA si/_sogs sam/_ka rI tA/_ke rI tA si/_sogs so/_/tang la/_ka ri tA/_ka ri tA se/_sogs sam/_ka rI tA/_ka rI tA se/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/
[\[351a.5\]]byings kyi rI ta gyi i ta 'os/_r-i i ta/_r-i'i a Na la ra pha rol los ra byin/_u bad+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/_kI r+YA ta/_kIr+YAstaM/_kI r+YA suH/_sogs so/_/tang la iT byin yon tan byas pas/_ka rI Shi Sh+Ta/_ka rI Shi yA s+ThaM/_ka rI Shi ra na/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_br-i r-I ta las yang na 
[\[351a.6\]]'os/_iT dang IT yang na bar byas/_yon tan byas pas/_a tang la/_ka ri Sh+ya ti/_sogs sam/_ka rI Sh+ya ti/_sogs so/_/tang la/_ka ri Sh+ya te/_sogs sam/_ka rI Sh+ya te/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi a tang la/_a ka ri Sh+ya ta/_sogs sam/_a ka rI Sh+ya ta/_sogs 
[\[351a.7\]]so/_tang la/_a ka ri Sh+ya ta/_sogs sam/_a ka rI Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/d+hU nya 'gul ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang dang tang gnyis ka sor te/_pU la sogs pa rnams kyi thung ngu 'os/_thung ngur bsgyur bas/_laTa'i a tang la/_b+hu nA ti/_sogs dang /_tang la/
[\[351b\]]
[\[351b.1\]]hU nI te/_sogs so/_/ling gi a tang la/_d+hu mI yA Ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_d+hu nI ta/_sogs so/_/loTa'i a tang la/_d+hu nA tU/_sogs dang /_tang la/_d+hu nI tI/_sogs so/_/lang gi a tang la/_a d+hu na ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_a d+hu rI ta/_sogs so/_lung 
[\[351b.2\]]la/_U ta 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byed/_a tang la 'phel ba byas pas/_iTa'i phyogs la/_ad+hA bI ta/_ad+hA bi Sh+DAM/_a d+hA bu ShuH/_sogs dang /_iT med pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a d+hau ShA ta/_/ad+hau Sh+DAM/_ad+hau ShuH/_skyes bu dbus ma 
[\[351b.3\]]gsum la/_a d+hauShIH/_a d+hau Sh+TAM/_a N+hauSh+Ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a d+hau ShaM/_a d+hau ShA/_a d+hauSh+ma/_tang la yon tan byas pas/_ad+ha biSh+Ta/_a d+ha bi ShA tAM/_a d+ha bi Sha ta/_sogs sam/_iT med pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ad+hoSh+Ta/_a

[\[351b.5\]]du d+hu buH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_du d+hu bi tha/_du d+hu bA thuH/_du d+hu bi ba/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_du ng+hu ba/_du ng+hu bi ba/_du ng+hu bi ma/_rang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_du ng+hu pe/_du ng+hA bA te/_du ng+hU bir/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_/du ng+hu bi Shi/_du ng+hu bA the/_du ng+hu bi ng+he+u/

[\[351b.7\]]sogs sam/_d+ho tA/_d+ho tA se/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/_d+hU yA ta/_d+hU yA s+t+rAM/_d+hU yA suH/_sogs dang /_bdag iT yang na bar byas pas/_d+ha bi ShI Sh+Ta/_d+ha bi ShI yA s+t+waM/_d+ha bi ShI ran/_sogs sam/_d+ho ShI Sh+Ta/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la'ang iT yang na bar 
[\[352a\]]
[\[352a.1\]]byas pas/_a tang la/_d+ha bi Sh+ya ti/_sogs sam/_b+ho Sh+ya ti/_sogs so/_/tang la/_d+ha bi Sh+ya te/_sogs sam/_d+hoSh+ya te/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi a tang la/_a d+ha bi Sh+ya ta/_sogs sam/_a d+ho Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/tang la/_a d+ha bi Sh+ya ta/
[\[352a.2\]]sogs sam/_a d+ho Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/gra ha nye bar len pa la la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/_gra ha dz+yA sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Na ra bsgyur bas/_laT la/_gr-ih+Na ti/_gr-ih+Ni taH/_gr-ih+Na n+ti/_sogs dang /_ling la/_gr-ih+NI yA ta/_sogs so/_/loTa'i skyes bu dang po 
[\[352a.3\]]gsum pa/_gr-ih+NA hu/_gr-ih+NI tAM/_gr-ih+Na n+tu/_ha laH/_shAH/_shAn dz+nyau/_ha la las sh+NA'i shA na tsa hi la'o/_/byings ha la mtha' can las pha rol gyi sh+nA ni loT bsgyur ba'i hi pha rol la shA ni tsa zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/_gra ha la/_loT/_sh+nA gra hi sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Nar 
[\[352a.4\]]bsgyur/_la si pa/_si'i hing sogs kyis si pa hing /_mdo 'dis/_sh+nA shA na tsa ri bsgyur/_tsa dbyangs don/_shra shi ta kyi don/_a ta las hi'i 'os/_hi phyis pas/_gr-i hA Na/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_gr-i h+NI taM/_gr-i h+NI ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_gr-i hwA ni/_gr-i h+NA 
[\[352a.5\]]ba/_gr-ih+NA ma/_lang la/_a gr-i h+NA ta/_a gr-i h+NI tAM/_a gr-ih+Na na/_sogs so/_/gra hau \u0f85 li Ti dwir+g+haH/_gra ha las liT ma yin pa la ring po'o/_/gra ha las pha rol gyi liT ma yin pa'i byings phyed pa bal dang po can rnams la -iT ring por 'gyur te/_lung la/_a gra hI ta/
[\[352a.6\]]a gra hI Sh+TAM/_a gra hIShuH/_sogs so/_/liT la byings gnyis brjod Na la gnyis dang thal la/_gnyis rnams kyi sogs kyis a N+yAs saM pra sA ra Na dang gzhan rnams la gra hi sogs kyis gnyis ka saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur/_r-i'i a ta 'os r-i a ta/_ku ha dag gi tsu 'os ga dzar 
[\[352a.7\]]bsgyur ba sogs kyis skyes bu dang po gsum la/_dza grA ha/_dza gr-i ha tuH/_dza gr-i huH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_dza gra hi tha/_dza gr-i ha thuH/_dza gr-i ha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_dza grA ha/_dza gra ha/_dza gr-i hi ba/_dza gr-i hi ma/_luT la bal dang po'i iT byin/_gra ha las/_liT ma 
[\[352b\]]
[\[352b.1\]]yin pa la ring bo 'os de ring por bsgyur bas/_gra hI dA/_gra hI tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_gra hi dz+yA sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Na bsgyur bas/_gr-i h+yA ta/_gr-i h+ya stAM/_gr-i h+yA suH/_sogs so/_l+r-iT la/_bal dang po sogs kyis iT/_gra ha la sa l-iT ma yin pa sogs kyis

[\[352b.3\]]yA ta/_sogs so/_laT la/_shrI NA tu/_sogs dang /_lang la/_a shr-i NA ta/_sogs so/_lung la/_i Ta byin/_si tsa la 'phel ba sogs kyis 'phel ba byas pas/_a shA rI ta/_a shA ri Sh+TAM/_a shA ri ShuH/_sogs so/_shr-I dr-I/_brAM hra swo bA/_sh-I dr-I br-I rnams kyi thung ngu'o/
[\[352b.4\]]shrI 'tshe ba/_dr-I rnam par 'joms pa/_pr-I skyong bar byed pa rnams kyi liT bsgyur pa'i kang 'gro ba rnams pha rol la thung ngur yang na bsgyur te/_thung ngur bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_i ka gi a tsa la ya Na dang thung ngur ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_r-i ts+tsha ti r-I ta rnams kyi 'os yon tan byas pas/
[\[352b.5\]]skyes bu dang po gi gsum la/_sha shA ra/_sha shra tuH/_sha shar tuH/_sha shUH/_sha sha ruH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_sha sha ri tha/_sha shra thuH/_sha shar thuH/_sha shra/_sha shar/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_sha shAr /_sha sha ra/_sha shri ba/_sha sha ri pa/_sha shri ma/_sha sha

[\[353b.1\]]ma gsum la/_pa pa ri tha/_pa pra thuH/_pa par thuH/_pa pra/_pa par/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_pa pA ra/_pa pa ra/_pa pr-i ba/_pa pa ri ba/_pa pri ma/_pa pa ri ma/_luT la/_br-i r-I Ta dag las yang na 'os/_iT dang IT yang na bar byas bas/_ba ri tA/_ba ri tA si/_sogs sam/_pa

[\[354a\]]
[\[354a.1\]]s+yata/_sogs so/_!_/br-I sgrib pa la'o zhes ba la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/_laT la/_pr-i NA ti/_sogs dang /_ling la/_br-I NI yA ta/_sogs so/_/loT la/_br-I NA tu/_sogs dang /_lang la/_a pr-i NA ta/_sogs so/_/lung la 'phel ba byas pas/_skyes bu dang po

[\[354a.7\]]bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/_dz+nyA yA ta/_dz+nyA yA stAM/_dz+nyA yA suH/_sogs sam/_dz+nye yA ta/_sogs so/_l+r-iT la/_dz+nyA s+ya ti/_sogs dang /_l+r-ing la/_a dz+nyA s+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/shra n+b+ra grol par byed pa dang /_so sor dga' bar byed pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/_i ta 
[\[354b\]]
[\[354b.1\]]'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis pas/_laT la/_shra th+n+ra ti/_sogs dang /_ling la/_shra th+nI yA ta/_sogs so/_/loT la/_shra th+nA tu/_sogs dang /_lang la/_a shra th+nA ta/_sogs so/_/lung la iT byin pas/_a shra n+thI ta/_a shra n+thi kh+TAM/_a shra n+thi ShuH/_sogs so/_/liTa'i 
[\[354b.2\]]skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_sha shra n+tha/_'grel par lung drangs pa/_shra n+thi gro n+th+yaH/_ke ti li Ti se ti tha yi tsa e twaM ke tsi dwA/_shra n+thi gran+thi dag gi liT ka 'gro ba dang tha li iT dang bcas pa la e nyid 'ga' zhig tu yang na'o/_/shra n+tha dang /_gran+tha dag gi liT bsgyur pa ka 'gro ba'i 
[\[354b.3\]]ming can rnams dang tha la iT dang bcas pa rnams pha rol la a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba dang e nyid du bsgyur ba sogs 'ga' zhig tu yang na par bya ste/_skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_shre tha tuH/_sha shra n+tha tuH/_shre thuH/_sha shra n+thAH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_shre

[\[354b.5\]]sogs kyis na phyis pas/_shra th+yA ta/_shra th+yA s+dzAM/_shra th+ya suH/_sogs so/_/l+raT la iT byin pas/_shra n+thi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_l+ring la/_a shran+thi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/gran+tha spel ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/_cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa 
[\[354b.6\]]shran+tha dang 'dra'o/_!_/ku Sha nges par 'gugs pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/_laT la/_kuSh+NA ti/_sogs dang /_ling la/_kuSh+NI yA ta/_sogs so/_/loT la/_kuSh+NA tu/_sogs dang /_lang la/_a ku Sh+NA ta/_sogs so/_/ni raHku Sh+laH/_nir las 
[\[354b.7\]]ku Sha las so/_/nyer bsgyur nir sngon ma'i ku Sha las pha rol gyi byings phyed pa bal dang po can la iT yang na 'gyur te/_lung la iT byin pa'i phyogs la/_nir ko ShI ta/_nir ko Shi Sh+TAM/_nir ko Shi ShuH/_sogs dang /_iT med pa'i phyogs la/_shal i ka u bab+hA 
[\[355a\]]
[\[355a.1\]]sogs kyis cI'i kAr bsgyur/_ShaD+ha dag gi ka 'os/_Sha ka kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur bas/_nir ku k+Sha tA/_ni ra ku k+Sha tAM/_ni ra ku k+Sha na/_sogs so/_/nir sngon du med na iT rtag tu 'gyur ta/_a ko ShI ta/_a ko Shi Sh+TAM/_sogs so/_/
[\[355a.2\]]liT la gnyis brjod/_ku ha dag gi cu 'os/_ka tsar bsgyur bas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tsu ko Sha/_tsa ku Sha tuH/_tsu ku ShuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tsu ko She tha/_tsu ku Sha thuH/_tsu ku Sha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsu ko Sha/_tsu ku Shi ba/_tsu k+Na Shi ma/_luT la iT byin yon 
[\[355a.3\]]tan byas pas/_ko Shi tA/_ko Shi tA si/_sogs so/_smon pa'i ling la/_kuSh+yA ta/_kuSh+yAstAM/_kuSh+yA suH/_sogs so/_l+r-iT la/_la dang po'i iT byin/_pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_ko Shi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_wang la/_a ko Shi Sh+ya ta/_sogs 
[\[355a.4\]]so/_!_/a sha zas la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/_/laT la/_a sh+nA ti/_sogs dang /_ling la/_a sh+mI yA ta/_sogs so/_/loT la/_a sh+nA tu/_sogs dang /_lang la/_A sh+nA ta/_sogs so/_lung la iT byin pas/_A shI ta/
[\[355a.5\]]A shi Sh+TAM/_A shi ShaH/_sogs so/_/liT la gnyis brjod/_a ka 'dra ba la ring po byas pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_A sha/_A sha tuH/_A shuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_A shi tha/_A sha thuH/_A sha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_A sha_/A shi ba/_A shi ma/_luT la/_iT byin pas/_a shi ta/
[\[355a.6\]]a shi tA si/_sogs so/_smon pa'i ling la/_/a sh+yA ta/_a sh+yA stA/_a sh+yA suH/_sogs so/_l-iT la iT byin pas/_a shi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_A shi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/br-i yang dag bar gus pa la'o zhes ba la tang rnams sbyor te/_laT la/
[\[355a.7\]]br-i NI te/_sogs dang /_ling la/_br-i NI ta/_sogs so/_/loT la/_br-i NI tAM/_sogs dang /_lang la/_a br-i NI ta/_sogs so/_/lung la/_br-i r-I ta las yang na 'os/_iT dang I ta yang na par byas bas/_a ba ri Sh+Ta/_a ba ri ShA tAM/_a ba ri Sha ta/_sogs so/_a ba rI Sh+Ta/
[\[355b\]]
[\[355b.1\]]sogs so/_/'grel par br-i la pha rol gyi lung dang /_smon pa'i ling la yang na iT mi 'jug go zhes pa bshad pas/_i ta ma byin pa'i phyogs la/_dz+hal dang po rnams la/_gzugs thung ngu las kyang ngos/_si tsa phyis pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a br-i ta/_a br-i ShA tAM/_a br-i Sha 
[\[355b.2\]]ta/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a br-i thAH/_a br-i ShA thAM/_a br-i d+h+raM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a braM Sha/_a br-i Sh+ma hi/_liT la gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ba bre/_ba bre te/_ba bri re/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ba br-i She/_ba brA the/_ba brid+hA+e/_skyes bu 
[\[355b.3\]]phyi ma gsum la/_ba bre/_ba br-i ba he/_ba br-i ma he/_luT la br-i rAM ta las yang 'os/_iT dang IT yang na bar byas/_ba ri tA/_ba ri tA se/_sogs sam/_pa rI tA/_pa rI tA se/_sogs so/_smon pa'i ling la/_iT byin pas/_ba ri ShI Sh+Ta/_ba ri ShI yA stAM/_ba ri ShI ran/_sogs dang /_yar 
[\[355b.4\]]na iT ma byin pas/_br-i ShI Sh+Ta/_sogs so/_l+r-iT la br-i rAM ta las yang na 'os/_iT dang IT yang na bar byas pas/_pa r-i Sh+ya te/_sogs sam/_parI Sh+ya te/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a pa ri Sh+ya ta/_sogs sam/_a pa rI Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/i ti pA Ni ni byA kar Na s+ya lU 
[\[355b.5\]]trA N+yA da yaH/_samA b+haM/_zhes pa pA Ni ni byA kar Na'i mdo las krI la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so//_//de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA kar Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod la legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba 
[\[355b.6\]]las krI la sogs pa byed pa po'i don ma sha pa kyi yul la sh+nA 'jug pa rnams kyi cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so//_//da ni tsu ra la sogs pa rnams kyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/_!_tsu ra rku ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/_sa t+yA pa 
[\[355b.7\]]pA sha rI pa pI NA tU la Sh+kho ka se nA lo ma twa tsa ba r+Na tsa rma tsU r+Na cu rA di b+h+yo Ni tsa/_sa t+yA pa bden pa/_pA sha_zhags pa/_rU pa gzugs/_bI NA sgra brnyan/_tU la phra mo/_sh+lo ka tshigs bcad/_se na sde/_lo ma spu/_twa tsa pags pa/_bar+Na mdog/_tsa rma pags pa/_tsU r+Na phye ba/_tsu ra 
[\[356a\]]
[\[356a.1\]]la sogs pa rnams la sa Ni tsa'o/_/sa t+yA pa la sogs pa rtags de rnams dang /_byings tsu ra la sogs pa rnams las rang don la Ni tsa pha rol tu 'gyur te/_tsa dbyangs don dang Na 'phel ba'i don no/_/tsu ra la/_Ni tsa pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas 
[\[356a.2\]]tso ri zhes pa grub pa la laT sogs sbyar/_byed pa po la sha pa byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan e tsa'i a ya sogs kyis mtshams sbyar bas/_laT la/_tso ra ya ti/_sogs dang /_ling la/_tso ra ye ta/_sogs so/_/loT la/_tso ra ya tu/_sogs dang /_lang la/_a tso ra 
[\[356a.3\]]ya ta/_sogs so/_/Ni tsa sh+tsa/_Ni tsa las kyang ngo /_/Ni tsa'i mtha' las kyang byed pa po la sems dang ldan pa 'bras bu thob pa'i don la At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug ste/_laT la/_tso ra ya te/_sogs dang /_ling la/_tso ra ya ta/_sogs so/_/loT la/_tso ra ya tAM/_sogs dang /
[\[356a.4\]]lang la/_a tso ra ya ta/_sogs so/_/lung la/_tso ril/_lung tsI byin/_Ni shri sogs kyis tsI tsang du bsgyur/_tsang la 'os byings gnyis brjod/_ha la dang po sogs kyis ra phyis/_yang ba'i ring po 'os/_a b+h+yA sa ring bor bsgyur/_Ni la tsang la u pa d+hA'i thung ngu 'os/_u sad+hA thung 
[\[356a.5\]]ngur bsgyur/_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni tsa'ang phyis pas/_a tang gi skyes pu dang po gsum la/_a tsU tsu ra ta/_a tsU tsu ra tAM/_a tsU tsu ran/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a tsU tsu raH/_a tsU tsu ra taM/_a tsU tsu ra ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a tsU tsu ra raM/_a tsU tsu rA ba/_a tsU tsu rA

[\[356b\]]
[\[356b.1\]]tsa r+YA suH/_sogs dang /_Ni tsa las kyang ngos tang rnams sbyor na/_bal dang po'i iT byin yon tan byas pas/_tso ra yi ShI Sh+Ta/_tso ra yi ShI yA staM/_tso ra yi ShI ra na/_sogs so/_/l-iT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/_tso ra ya Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_Ni tsa la'ang ngos/_tang la/_tso ri yi Sh+ya te/_sogs

[\[356b.3\]]sha pa sbyar bas/_laT la/_tso ra ti/_sogs dang /_ling la/_tso re ta/_sogs so/_/loT la/_tso ra tu/_sogs dang /_lang la/_a tso ra ta/_sogs so/_/lung la/_iT byin pu ga mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a tso rI ta/_a tso rI Sh+tAM/_a tso ri ShuH/_skyes bu

[\[356b.7\]]u pa d+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/_kIrti zhes grub pa la/_laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT la/_kIrta ya ti/_sogs dang /_ling la/_kIrta ye ta/_sogs dang /_loT la/_kIrta ya tu/_sogs so/_lang la/_a kI rta ya ta/_sogs so/_/lung la/_Ni shr-i sogs kyi tsI tsa ra du bsgyur/_tsang la'ang 
[\[357a\]]
[\[357a.1\]]ngos/_kir gnyis brjod/_ha la dang po sogs kyis ra phyis/_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os/_Ni tsa phyis pas/_a tsi kIrta ta/_a tsi kIrta tAM/_a tsi lakIrta na/_sogs so/_/liT la A ma sbyar bas/_kIrta yAM tsa kAr/_kI rta yAM ba b+hU ba/_kI rta yA mA sa/_sogs so/_luT la iT

[\[357a.5\]]ga dza mdo 'dis Ir yang na bsgyur Ni'i iT med pa la 'os/_Ni tsa phyis pas/_dzI ga Na ta/_dzI ga Na tAM/_dzI ga Na na/_sogs sam/_dza ga Na ta/_sogs so/_/liT la/_A ma sbyar bas/_ga Na yAM tsa kA ra/_ga Na yAM ba b+hU ba/_ga Na yA mA sa/_sogs so/_/luT la iT byin yon tan

[\[357b\]]
[\[357b.1\]]ye ta/_sogs so/_/loT la/_ka tha ya tu/_sogs dang /_lang la/_a ka tha ya ta/_sogs so/_/lung la 'grel par lung drangs pa/_ka tho \u0f85b+h+yA sa s+ya I twaM ko tse dwA/_ka tha'i a b+h+yA sa'i i nyid 'ga' zhig tu yang na'o/_/Ni tsang dag pha rol la ka tha'i a b+h+yA sa'i I nyid skabs 'ga' zhig tu yang

[\[357b.3\]]liT la Am sbyar bas/_ka tha yAM tsa kAr/_ka tha yAM ba b+hU ba/_ka tha yA mA sa/_sogs so/_/luT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/_a ka tha yi tA/_a ka tha yi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_Ni iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/_ka th+yA ta/_ka th+yA stAM/_ka th+yA suH/_skabs 'dir a ka byis pa yin 
[\[357b.4\]]pas Ni tsar pas na bzhin gyi bya ba mi byed do/_/sogs so/_/l+r-iT la iT byin yon tan byas bas/_ka tha yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a ka tha yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/aM ka 'gro ba dang mtshan nyid dag la'o zhes pa la 'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/_a ta kyi dbyi 'os byings mtha'i 
[\[357b.5\]]a phyis bas/_laT la/_aM ka ya ti/_sogs dang /_ling la/_aM ka ya te/_sogs so/_/loT la/_aM ka ya tu/_sogs dang /_lang la/_AM ka ya ta/_sogs so/_/lung la/_'grel par aM ka'i tsang pha rol la a tsa gnyis mi [(]brtong[,]brtod [)]par ka gnyis brjod ba'am yang na Ni tsa dang 
[\[357b.6\]]bcas ba gnyis brjod do zhes bshad pas ka gnyis brjod pa'i phyogs la/_AM tsa ka ta/_AM tsa ka tAM/_AM tsa ka na/_sogs dang /_Ni tsa dang bcas pa gnyis brjod pa'i phyogs la yang Na'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyi ma phyis pas/_AM tsi ka ta/_AM tsi ka tAM/_AM tshi ka na/_sogs so/_/
[\[357b.7\]]liT la A ma sbyar bas/_aM ka yAM ba b+hU ba/_aM ka yAM tsa kA ra/_aM ka yA mAs/_sogs so/_/luT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/_aM ka yi tA/_aM ka yi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni tsa phyis pas/_aM kyA ta/_aM kyA stAM/_aM kyA suH/
[\[358a\]]
[\[358a.1\]]sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_iT byin yon tan byas pas/_aM ka yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_l+r-ing la/_AM ka yi Sh+yata/_sogs so/_/'grel par/_AM ka'i mtha'i a Ni tsa pha rol la yang na yi dbyi'o zhes bshad pas/_a ma phyis pa'i phyogs la/_a tsa'i nya Na 'gro 
[\[358a.2\]]ba la'o zhes pas 'phel ba byas pas/_aM kA Ni tsa zhes grub pa la/_a rti hrI ts+lI rI krU yI k+Sh+mA y+YA tAM pu k+Nau/_a rti hrI ts+lI rI krU yI k+Sh+mA yI _AM ta rnams kyi Ni la pu ka'o/_/a rti te/_r-i 'gro ba/_hI do tsha ba/_ts+lI 'gro ba/_rIng nyan pa/_krU yI s+tha/_k+Sh+mA yI rnam par 'dar pa rnams rang byings sA ta mgra' can 
[\[358a.3\]]rnams la Ni tsa pha rol la bu ka A ga ma 'gyur te/_ka gnas don u brjod don no/_/i kA Ni la/_mdo 'dis pu ka byin pas/_aM kA pi zhes grub pa la/_laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT la/_aM kA pa yi ti/_sogs dang /_ling la/_aM kA pa ye ta/_sogs dang /_loT la/_aM kA pa ya tu/
[\[358a.4\]]sogs so/_/lang la/_AM kA ba ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la ka gnyis brjod Na'i iT med pa la 'os/_Ni na phyis pra tsad la drangs pas/_AM tsa kA pa ta/_AM tsa kA ba tAM/_AM tsa kA pa na sogs te/_skabs 'dir pu ka bar na yod pas Ni tsa gnyis mi brjod pas yang na bar mi byed do/_/liT 
[\[358a.5\]]la Am sbyar bas/_aM kA pa yAM tsa kA ra/_aM kA pa yAM ba b+hU ba/_aM kA pa yA mA sa/_sogs so/_/luT la iT byin pas/_aM kA pa yi tA/_aM kA pa yi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni tsa phyis pas/_aM kA pyAta/_aM kA byA stAM/_aM kA pyA suH/_sogs so/_l+r-iT 
[\[358a.6\]]la iT byin yon tan byas pas/_aM kA pa yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_AM kA pa yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/ar+tha slong ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/_a ta kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/_laTa'i a tang la/_a r+tha ya ti/_sogs dang /_tang la/
[\[358a.7\]]a [\[]r+tha[\]] ya te/_sogs so/_/ling gi a tang la/_a r+tha ye ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_a r+tha ye ta/_sogs so/_/loTa'i a tang la/_a r+tha ya tu/_sogs dang /_tang la/_a r+tha ya tAM/_sogs so/_/lang gi a tang la/_A r+tha ya ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_A r+tha ya ta/_sogs so/_/lung 
[\[358b\]]
[\[358b.1\]]la/_'grel par a r+tha'i tsang pha rol la tha nyid gnyis brjod pa'am/_yang na tha Ni tsa dang bcas pa gnyis brjod do zhes bshad pas/_tha nyid gnyis brjod pa'i phyogs kyi a tang la/_A rta tha ta/_A rta tha tAM/_A rta tha na/_sogs dang /_tang la/_A rta tha ta/_A rta the tAM/_a rta tha n+ta/_sogs so/_/
[\[358b.2\]]Ni tsa dang bcas pa la gnyis brjod pa'i phyogs kyi a tang la/_A rti tha ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_A rti tha ta/_sogs so/_/liT la A ma sbyar bas/_a r+tha yAM tsa kA ra/_a r+tha yAM ba b+hU ba/_a r+tha yA mA sa/_a r+tha yAM tsa kre/_sogs so/_/luT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/_a tang la/
[\[358b.3\]]a r+tha yi tA/_a r+tha yi tA si/_sogs dang /_tang la/_a r+tha yi tA/_a r+tha yi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/_Ni'i iT med pa la'os/_Ni phyis bas/_a r+th+yA ta/_a r+th+yA stAM/_a r+th+yAsuH/_sogs dang /_tang la iT byin pas/_ar+tha yi ShI Sh+Ta/_a r+tha yi ShI lA s+t+rAM/_a r+tha yi 
[\[358b.4\]]Shi ran/_sogs so/_l+r-iT la/_iT byin yon tan byas pas/_a tang la/_ar+tha yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_tang la/_A r+tha yi Sh+ya te/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+ring gi a tang la/_A r+tha yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_tang la/_A r+tha yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/yang 'grel par a r+tha'i a yang 
[\[358b.5\]]Ni tsa pha rol la yang na ming dbyi'o zhes bshad bas/_a ma phyis pa'i phyogs la/_a tsa'i nya Na 'gro ba la 'os 'phel ba byas/_a rti hrI ts+li rI krU yi k+Sh+mA yI A ta rnams kyi Ni la pu ka 'os/_pu ka A ga ma byin/_sha pa la yon tan byas pas/_laTa'i a tang la/_a r+tha pa ya ti/_sogs 
[\[358b.6\]]dang /_tang la/_a r+tha pa ya te/_sogs so/_/ling gi a tang /_ar+thA pa ye ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_a r+thA pa ye ta/_sogs so/_/loTa'i a tang la/_a r+thA pa ya tu/_sogs dang /_tang la/_a r+thA pa ya tAM/_sogs so/_/lang gi a tang la/_A r+thA pa ya ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/
[\[358b.7\]]A r+thA pa ya ta/_sogs so/_/lung la/_pu ka bar na yod pas Ni gnyis mi ba rdzong tha gnyis brjod pas/_a tang la/_A rta thA pa ta/_A rta thA pa tAM/_A rta thA pa na/_sogs dang /_tang la/_A rta thA pa ta/_A rta thA pa tAM/_A rta thA pa n+ta/_sogs so/_/liT la A ma sbyar bas/_a r+thA pa yAM tsa kA 
[\[359a\]]
[\[359a.1\]]ra/_a r+thA pa yAM ba b+hU ba/_a r+thA pa yA mA sa/_a r+thA pa yAM tsa kre/_sogs dang /_luT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/_a tang la/_a r+thA pa yi tA/_a r+thA pa yi tA si/_sogs so/_/tang la/_a r+thA pa yi tA/_a r+thA pa yi tA se/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/
[\[359a.2\]]Ni phyis pas/_a r+thA pyA ta/_a r+thA pyA stAM/_a r+thA pyA suH/_sogs dang /_tang la iT byin yon tan byas pas/_a r+thA pa yi ShI Sh+Ta/_ar+thA pa yi ShI yA stAM/_a r+thA pa yi ShI ran/_sogs so/_/l+r-iTa'i a tang la/_a r+thA pa yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_tang la/_a r+thA pa yi Sh+ya te/_sogs so/_/
[\[359a.3\]]de bzhin du/_l+r-ing gi a tang la/_A r+thA pa yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs dang /_tang la/_A r+thA pa yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU drA ts+tsu rA da yaH/_sa mA b+hAH/_zhes pa pA Ni ni byA kar Na'i mdo las tsur la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so//_//de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan 
[\[359a.4\]]bcos chen po bA Ni ni byA kar Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las/_tsu ra la sogs ba rnams kyi cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so//_//
[\[359a.5\]]de ltar b+hU la sogs pa byings sde tshan bcu la rnam dbye brgyad dang brgyad cu'am/_la yig sde tshan bcu sbyar ba'i bya ba byed tshul gyi rnam 'gyur rags pa rnams bshad zin nas/_da ni byings byings su bsgrub pa dang /_ming byings su bsgrub pa'i rkyen mtha' can gyi bya ba rnams bshad par 
[\[359a.6\]]bya ste/_de yang dang po Ni tsa ni/_he tu ma ti tsA he tuH/_rgyu dang bcas pa dang rgyu med pa las kyang ngo /_/rgyu dang bcas pa ste rang gi dgos don gyi bya ba rang gis byed pa'am/_gzhan zhig byed du 'jug ba'i don dang rgyu med pa ste/_gzhan gyi bya ba zhig rang gis byed pa'am/_gzhan zhig byed du 
[\[359a.7\]]'jug pa rtogs par byed pa la'ang byings las pha rol tu Ni tsa 'gyur te/_kr-i la Ni tsa/_a tsa'i nya Na 'gro ba la'o zhes pas 'phel ba byas/_kA ri zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_kAr yiMti/_kAriM yar ta/_kA ra yo tu/_a kA ra yiM te/_sogs dang /_lung la Ni shri sogs kyis ts+li tsang 
[\[359b\]]
[\[359b.1\]]du bsgyur/_tsang la 'os byings gnyis brjod/_r-i'i a ta 'os r-i a/_ku ha dag gi tsu/_Ni la tsang la u pa d+hA thung ngu 'os/_u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur/_a ka ma phyis pa la yang bal tsang pha rol las na bzhin nos/_a b+h+yA sa'i a i yang ba'i ring po 'oMs/_de ring por bsgyur/
[\[359b.2\]]Ni'i iT med pa la 'os/_Ni tsa phyis ra drangs pas/_a tsI ka ra ta/_a tsI ka ra tAM/_a tsI ka ra na/_sogs so/_/liT la A ma sbyar bas/_kA ra yAM ba b+hU ba/_kA ra yAM tsa kA ra/_ka ra yA mA sa/_sogs so/_/luT la iT byin pas/_kA ra yi tA/_kA ra yi tA si/_sogs so/_/sman 
[\[359b.3\]]pa'i ling la Ni iT med pa la 'os Ni i tsa phyis pas/_kA r+YA ta/_kA r+YA stAM/_kA r+YA suH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/_kA ra yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a kA ra yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/tsu ra la rgyu dang bcas pa dang rgyu med pa la'ang ngos/
[\[359b.4\]]Ni tsa sbyar/_bu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_tso ri zhes grub pa la leT sogs sbyar bas/_tso ri yaM te/_tso ra yi ta/_tso ra yo tu/_a tso ri ye ta/_lung la/_nA gA+o pi shA spri di tAM/_a ka phyis ba dang shA su r-i ta 'gro ba rnams kyi ma yin no/_/byings kyi mtha' nas a ka so sor 
[\[359b.5\]]bsdu ba'i yi ge phyis ba dang /_shA su rjes su bstod ba dang /_byings r-i ta 'gro ba rnams kyi tsang pha rol na yod pa'i Ni la u bad+hA thung ngur bsgyur ba ma yin no zhes bas u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur ba mi thob kyang /_'grel pa ra tsur la sogs pa rnams ni rtag tu Ni tsa'i mtha' can yin pas a ka phyis 
[\[359b.6\]]ba yin kyang tsang pha rol la u pa dU thung dur bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byed do zhes bshad pas/_thung ngur bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_Ni shri sogs kyis tsI tsang /_tsang la 'os gnyis brjod u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur/_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni tsa phyis pas/_a tsu tsur ta/_a tsu 
[\[359b.7\]]tsu ra tAM/_a tsu tsu ra na/_sogs dang /_yang na gzhan cho ga rnams 'dra ba la u pa d+hA thung ngur ma bsgyur bas/_a tsu tso ra ta/_a tsu tso ra tAM/_a tsu tso ra na/_sogs so/_/liT la A ma sbyar bas/_tso ra yAM ba b+hU ba/_tso ra yAM tsa kA ra/_tso ra yA mA sa/_sogs so/_/luT la iT byin pas/_tso ra 
[\[360a\]]
[\[360a.1\]]yi tA/_tsor yi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_Ni'i iT med pa la'os Ni tsa phyis pas/_tso r+Ya ta/_tso r+YA stAM/_tso r+YA suH/_sogs so/_/liT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/_tso ra yi mya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a tso ra yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/shA su 
[\[360a.2\]]rjes su bstod pa la'o zhes pa la rgyu dang bcas pa dang rgyu med pa la'ang ngos Ni tsa sbyar bas/_shA si zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_shA saM ya ti/_shA si ye ta/_shA sa yi tu/_a shA sa ya ta/_lung la/_Ni shri sogs kyis ts+li tsang du bsgyur/_tsang la 'os byings gnyis brjod/_a ka 
[\[360a.3\]]phyis pa shA su ri ta 'gro ba rnams kyi ma yin no/_/u pa d+hA thung ngur mi bsgyur Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/_a sha shA sa ta/_a sha shA sa tAM/_a sha shA sa na/_sogs so/_/liT la/_A ma sbyor bas/_shA sa yAM ba b+hU ba/_shA sa yAM tsa kA ra/_shA sa yA mA sa/_sogs so/_/
[\[360a.4\]]luT la iT byin yon tan byas bas/_shA sa yi tA/_shA sa yi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni tsa phyis pas/_shA s+yA ta/_shA s+yA stAM/_shA s+yA suH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la iT byin pas/_shA sa yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a 
[\[360a.5\]]shAs yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/D+hau kr-i 'gro ba la'o zhes ba la/_rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa byin/_rjes 'brel phyis pas/_D+ho ki zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_D+hau ki ya ti/_D+ho ka ya ta/_D+hau ka ye tu/_a D+hau ka yi ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/_Ni shri sogs kyis ts+li tsa du bsgyur/
[\[360a.6\]]tsang la 'os gnyis brjod/_thung ngu 'os thung ngu dang a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/_D+haDa aka phyis pa shA sa r-i ta 'gro ba sogs kyis u pa ng+hA thung ngur mi bsgyur Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/_a Du D+hau ke ta/_uDa D+hau ka na tAM/_a Du D+hau ka na/_sogs so/_/liT la/_A ma sbyar bas/_D+hau ka yAM 
[\[360a.7\]]tsa kAr/_sogs so/_/luT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/_D+hau ka yi tA/_D+ho ka yi tA si/_sogs dang /_smon pa'i ling la/_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/_D+hau kyA ta/_D+hau kyA s+yAM/_D+hau kyA suH/_sogs so/_/l+riT la in byin yon tan byas pas/_D+hau ka yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de 
[\[360b\]]
[\[360b.1\]]bzhun du/_l+r-ing la/_a D+hau ka yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/Tu o shwi 'gro ba dang 'phel ba dag la 'o zhes pa la/_rgyu dang bcas ba sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/_a tsa'i nya Na 'gro ba la 'os 'phel ba dang a tsa'i a ya sogs kyis/_shwa yi zhes pa grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_shwA ya ya ti/
[\[360b.2\]]shwA ya ye ta/_shwA yi ya tu/_a shwA ya ya ta/_sogs so/_/Nau tsa saM shrA ngoH/_/Ni la'ang sa na tsang dag la'o/_/shwa ya ti Ni la'ang sa na tsang dag pha rol la sa pra sAr nar yang Na bsgyur te/_lung la saM pra sA ra Ni'i phyogs la/_shwi Ni tsa ces pa la/_Ni shri sogs kyis ts+li tsang /_mdo 'di+es saM pra 
[\[360b.3\]]sA ra Nar bsgyur/_shu Ni tsang tsang la 'os gnyis brjod/_yang ba'i ring po 'os/_de ring por bsgyur/_a tsa'i nya Na 'gro ba la 'os 'phel ba/_e tsa sogs kyis au A bar bsgyur/_Ni tsang la u pad+hA'i thung ngu 'os/_u pad+hA thung ngur bsgyur/_de nas Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis 
[\[360b.4\]]pas/_a shU sha ba ta/_a shU sha ba tAM/_a shU sha ba na/_sogs dang /_saM pra sA ra Na ma byas pa'i phyogs la/_tsang la 'os byings gnyis brjod/_ha la dang po sogs kyis ba phyis/_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni tsa phyis pas/_a shi shwa ya ta/_a shi shwa ya tAM/_a shi shwa ya na/_sogs 
[\[360b.5\]]so/_/liT la/_A ma sbyar bas/_shwA ya yAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_/luT la iT byin pas/_shwU ye yi tA/_shwA ya yi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_Ni'i iT med pa la'os Ni phyis bas/_shwA y+YA ta/_shwA y+YA stAM/_shwA y+YA suH/_sogs so/_/l+riT la iT byin yon tan 
[\[360b.6\]]byas bas/_shrA ya yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a shwA ya yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/sta m+wU skri ba pa la'o zhes pa la rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/_sta m+b+hi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_sta m+b+ha ya ti/_sta m+b+ha ye ta/_sta mA b+ha ya tu/_a sta m+ha ya ta/
[\[360b.7\]]sogs so/_/sta m+b+hu si bu sa hAM tsa di/_sta m+b+tu si bus ha rnams kyi tsang la'o/_/sta m+b+hu sgrib pa/_Shi bu thags kyi rgyu/_Sha ha bzod pa rnams kyi nyer bsgyur sa Shar bsgyur ba'i rgyu mtshan tsa na sngon du byung yang tsang la pha rol la Shar bsgyur ba ma yin te/_lung la/_Ni shri sogs kyis sats+li tsang /
[\[361a\]]
[\[361a.1\]]gnyis brjod/_shar dang po sogs kyis sa phyis/_Ni'i iT med ba la 'os Ni phyis/_a ba sngon/_mdo 'dis Sha ra mi bsgyur/_a bA ta sta m+b+ha ta/_a bA ta sta m+b+ha tAM/_a bA ta sta m+b+ha na/_sogs so/_/liT la A ma sbyar bas/_stam+b+ha yAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_/luT 
[\[361a.2\]]la iT byin bas/_sta m+b+ha yi tA/_sta m+b+ha yi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon ba'i ling la Ni phyis bas/_sta m+b+hA ta/_staM m+b+hA stAM/_sta m+b+h+yA suH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la iT byin pas/_sta m+b+ha yi Sh+yA ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a sta m+b+ha yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/Shi bu thags kyi 
[\[361a.3\]]rgyu la'o zhes ba la'ang rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/_puka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_sa bi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_se ba ya ti/_se ba ya ta/_se ba ya tu/_a se ba ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/_Ni shri sogs kyis ts+li tsang du bsgyur/
[\[361a.4\]]tsang la 'os ngos byings gnyis brjod/_yang ba'i ring po 'os ring por bsgyur/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa phyi ma Sha/_Ni la tsang la u bad+ha'i thung ngu 'os/_u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur /_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os/_Ni phyis/_pa ri sngon/_sta m+b+hU si bu sogs kyis sa Sha ra mi 
[\[361a.5\]]bsgyur/_mtshams sbyar bas/_par+Ya sI Shi ba ta/_bar+Ya sI Shi ba tAM/_bar+Ya sI Shi ba na/_sogs so/_/liT la/_A ma sbyar bas/_se ba yAM tsa kA ra/_sogs dang /_luT la iT byin pas/_se pa yi tA/_se ba yi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/
[\[361a.6\]]se byA ta/_se byA stAM/_se byA suH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_iT byin yon tan byas pas/_se ba yi ng+hu ti/_sogs so/_l+r-ing la/_a se ba yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/Sha ha bzod pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/_u bang+hA'i 'os 'phel ba byas/_sA hi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/
[\[361a.7\]]sA he ya ti/_sA ha ya tu/_a sA he ya ta/_sogs so/_/lung la/_Ni shrisogs kyis ts+li tsang /_tsang la 'os gnyis brjod/_a ka ma phyis pa la yang ba la yang ba la tsang pa rol la san bzhin nos/_a i yang ba'i ring po 'os de ring po/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa phyi ma 
[\[361b\]]
[\[361b.1\]]la/_Ni bcar la u pa d+hA'i zung du 'os/_thung ngur bsgyur/_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni tsha phyis/_bi sngon/_stam+b+hu shA su sa ha sogs kyis sa Shar mi bsgyur te/_bya sI Sha ta ta /_bya sI Sha ha tAM/_bya sI Sha ha na/_sogs so/_/liT la A ma sbyar bas/_sA ha yAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_/luT la 
[\[361b.2\]]iT byin pas/_sa hi tA/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_sA h+yA ta/_sA h+yA stA/_sA h+yA suH/_sogs so/_/l-iT la/_iT byin yon tan byas pas/_sA ha yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a sA ha yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/tsa kA sr-i sgra smad pa la'o zhes pa la/_rgyu dang bcas 
[\[361b.3\]]pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar bas/_tsa kA si zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_tsa kA si ya ti/_tsa kA sa ye ta/_tsa kI sa ya tu/_tsa kI sa ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/_Ni shri sogs kyis ts+li tsang /_tsang la 'os tsa gnyis brjod/_a ka ma phyis pa la yang ba la tsang pha rol la san 
[\[361b.4\]]bzhin nos/_a i yang ba'i ring po 'os de ring por bsgyur/_a ka phyis pa shA su ri ta 'gros ba sogs kyis u bang+hA thung ngur mi bsgyur/_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os/_Ni phyis pas/_a tsI tsa kA sa ta/_a tsI tsa kA sa twaM/_a tsI tsa kA sa na/_sogs so/_/'grel par lung drangs pa/_su b+hA to ra 
[\[361b.5\]]ni kA tsa sh+tsa sa nA t+ka tsi dwA/_sub kyi byings dang a tsa gcig ma yin pa'i san bzhin 'ga' zhig tu yang na'o/_/sub kyi byings rnams dang byings a tsa gcig ma yin pa rnams kyi Ni tsang pha rol las na bzhin gyi bya ba skabs 'ga' zhig tu yang na bar bya ste/_lung la gzhan cho ga sngon ma dang 'dra 
[\[361b.6\]]ba la/_ir bsgyur ba sogs ma byas pas/_a tsa tsa kA sa ta/_a tsa tsa kA sa tAM/_a tsa tsa kA san/_sogs so/_/liT la A ma sbyar pas/_tsa kAs yAM tsa kA ra/_sogs dang /_luT la iT byin bas/_tsa kA sa yi ta/_tsa kA sa yi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon ba'i ling la/_Ni'i iT 
[\[361b.7\]]med pa la'o sa Ni phyis pas/_tsa kA s+yA ta/_tsa kA s+yA stAM/_tsa kA s+yA suH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT pa iT byin pas/_tsa kA sa yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a tsa kA sa yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/u n+di gshir ba la'o zhes pa la/_rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar bas 
[\[362a\]]
[\[362a.1\]]u nI zhes grub pa la/_laT sogs sbyar bas/_un+di ya ti/_u n+di ye ta/_an+da ye tu/_aun+da ye ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/_Ni shri sogs kyis tsI tsang /_tsang la 'os da Ni dang bcas ba gnyis brjod/_a tsa dang po'i a+wa Ta/_AT las kyang ngos 'phel ba 
[\[362a.2\]]byas/_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/_aun+dI da ta/_aun+di da tAM/_aun+di da na/_sogs so/_/liT la A ma sbyar pas/_un+da yAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_/luT la in byin pas/_un+da yi tA/_un+da yi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis 
[\[362a.3\]]bas/_u n+d+yA ta/_u n+d+yAstaM/_un+d+yA suH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/_u n+da yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_aun+da yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/u b+nga lugs la'o zhes pa la/_rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar bas/_u b+ngi zhes grub pa la/
[\[362a.4\]]la sogs sbyang bas/_u b+dza ya ti/_u b+dza ya ta/_u b+dza ya tu/_au b+dza ya ta/_sogs so/_/lung la/_Ni shri sogs kyis ts+li tsang /_tsang la 'os dza Ni dang bcas pa gnyis brjod/_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/_aub+dzi dza ta/_au b+dzi dza traM/_au b+dzi dza na/_sogs so/_/
[\[362a.5\]]liT la A ma sbyar bas/_u b+dza yAM tsa kAr/_sogs so/_/luT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/_ub+dza yi tA/_ub+dza yi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la Ni'i iT med ba la'os/_Ni phyis pas/_ub+dz+yA ta/_ub+dz+yAstAM/_u b+dz+yasuH/_sogs so/_l+r-iT la iT byin pas/_ub+dza 
[\[362a.6\]]yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_aub+dza yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/a rtsa mchod pa la'o zhes pa la/_rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa spyar bas/_a rtsi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_a rtsa ya ti/_a rtsa ye ta/_a rtsa ya tu/_a rtsa ya ta/_sogs dang /
[\[362a.7\]]lung la/_Ni shri sogs kyis tsa Ni dang bcas pa gnyis brjod/_Ni'i iT med ba la 'os Ni phyi ma phyis pas/_A rtsi tsa tA/_A rtsi tsa tAM/_A rtsi tsa na/_sogs so/_/liT la/_A ma sbyar bas/_a rtsa yAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_/luT la iT byin pas/_a rtsa yi tA/_a rtsa yi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling 
[\[362b\]]
[\[362b.1\]]la/_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os/_Ni phyis pas/_a r+ts+yA ta/_a r+ts+yA stAM/_a r+ts+yA suH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_iT byin pas/_a rtsa yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_A rtsa yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/drai nyal ba la'o zhes pa la/_rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/_drA yi zhes 
[\[362b.2\]]grub ba la/_laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _drA ya ya ti/_ling _drA ya ya ta/_laT _drA ya ya tu/_a drA ya ya ta/_sogs so/_lung la/_Ni shri sogs kyis ts+li tsang du bsgyur/_tsang la 'os drA gnyis brjod/_thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/_ha la dang po sogs kyis ra phyis Ni'i iT med pa la 'os/_Ni phyis pas/_a da dra 
[\[362b.3\]]ya ta/_a da dra ya tAM/_a da dra yan/_sogs so/_/liT la Am sbyar bas/_drA ya yAM tsa kA ra/_sogs dang /_luT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/_drA ya yi tA/_drA ya yi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i lang la/_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/_drA y+YA ta/_drA y+YA stAM/_drA y+YA suH/_sogs so/
[\[362b.4\]]Ni la tsa pa la u ba ng+nA'i thung ngu'os thung ngur bsgyur/_l+r-iT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/_drA ya yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a drA ya yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/ra b+ha rtsom pa la'o zhes pa la rgyu dang bcas sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/_ra b+he rashA ts+li ToH/_ra b+hi'i sha liT dag ma yin pa'i 
[\[362b.5\]]a tsa la'o/_/ra b+hi'i sha phyis ba'i atsa dang liT bsgyur ba'i atsa dang po can ma yin pa'i rkyen atsa dang po can pha rol la num A ga ma 'gyur te/_num byin/_ma gnas don u brjod don rnams phyis pas/_ra m+b+ho zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_ram+b+hi ya ti/_ram+b+hi ye ta/[ \[]loT[\]]ram+b+ha ya tu/
[\[362b.6\]]a ra m+b+ha yi ta/_sogs so/_/lung la/_'grel par tsang pa rol la ram+b+ha gnyis brjod pa ma yin no zhes bshad pas/_gnyis mi brjod/_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/_a ram+b+ha ta/_a ram+b+ha tAM/_a ram+b+ha na/_sogs so/_/liT la Am sbyar bas/_ram+b+ha yAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_/luT la 
[\[362b.7\]]iT byin pas/_ram+b+ha yi tA/_ram+b+ha yi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/_ram+b+h+yA ta/_ram+b+h+yA stAM/_ram+b+h+yA suH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la iT byin pas/_ram+b+ha yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a ram+b+ha yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/Du la b+ha Sha thob pa 
[\[363a\]]
[\[363a.1\]]la'o zhes pa la/_rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/_la b+he sh+tsa/_la b+ha'i 'ang ngo /_/la b+hi'i 'ang sha phyis pa dang /_liT bsgyur ba'i a tsa dang po ma yin pas rkyen atsa dang po can pha rol la num A ga ma 'gyur te/_num rjes 'brel phyis/_lam+b+hi zhes grub 
[\[363a.2\]]pa la/_laT sogs sbyar pas/_laT _lam+b+ha ya ti/_loT_lam+b+ha ye ta/_lam+b+ha ya tu/_lang _a la m+b+ha ya ta/_sogs so/_/'grel bar lam+b+ha'i 'ang tsang pha rol la gnyis brjod pa ma yin no zhes bshad pas/_gnyis mi brjod Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/_sha lam+b+ha ta/_a la m+b+ha tAM/_a la m+b+ha na/
[\[363a.3\]]sogs so/_/liT la A ma sbyar bas/_lam+b+ha yAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_/luT la iT byin pas/_lam+b+ha yi tA/_lam+b+ha yi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon ba'i ling la/_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/_lam+b+h+yA ta/_lam+b+h+yA stAM/_lam+b+h+yA suH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la iT byin bas/_lam+b+ha yi 
[\[363a.4\]]Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a lam+b+ha yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/hi 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa byin/_e tsa'i nya Na 'gro ba la 'os 'phel ba e tsa sogs kyis A yar bsgyur bas/_hA yi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _hA ya ya ti/_hA 
[\[363a.5\]]ya ya ta/_ling _hA yA ya tu/_loT _a hA ya ya ta/_lang _sogs so/_/lung la/_Ni shri sogs kyis ts+li tsang /_tsang la 'os byings gnyis brjod/_ku ha dag gi tsu/_yang ba'i ring po Ni'i iT med pa la phyis pas/_a dzI ha ya ta/_a dzI hA yA tAM/_a dzI ha yan/_sogs so/_/liT la/_A ma sbyar bas/
[\[363a.6\]]hA ya yAM tsa ka ra/_sogs so/_/luT la/_iT byin pas/_hA ya yi tA/_hA ya yi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/_hA y+YA ta/_hA y+YA stAM/_hA y+YA suH/_/sogs so/_/Ni la tsang la u bar+hA+e'i thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/_l+r-iT la iT byin pas/_hA ya yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs 
[\[363a.7\]]dang /_l+r-ing la/_a hA la yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/U na yongs su nyams pa la'o zhes pa la/_rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/_U ni zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_U na ya ti/_U na ye ta/_U na ya tu/_A+au na ya ta/_sogs so/_/lung la/_non ya ti d+h+wa na ya t+yi la ba 
[\[363b\]]
[\[363b.1\]]rgya rda ya ti b+h+yAH/_U na ya ti d+h+wa na ya ti i la ya ti a rda ya ti rnams las ma yin no/_/U na yongs su nyams pa/_ng+h+wan s+tha/_e la dang a rda 'gro ba rnams Ni tsa'i mtha' can pha rol las ts+li tsang du bsgyur ba ma yin te/_tsI si tsar bsgyur iT byin bas/_au ba yI ta/_au na yi swAM/_au na yi ShuH/
[\[363b.2\]]sogs so/_/'grel par skabs 'ga' zhig tu sdeb sbyor sogs kyi dgos pa yod na tsang du bsgyur bar bshad pas/_tsang du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la Ni tsa dang bcas pa gnyis brjod/_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/_au naM na ta/_au ni na tAM/_au ni na na/_sogs so/_/liT la Am sbyar 
[\[363b.3\]]bas/_U na yAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_/luT la iT byin pas/_U na yi tA/_U na yi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_Ni phyis pas/_U n+yA ta/_U n+yA stAM/_U n+yA suH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la iT byin pas/_U na yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_au na yi Sh+ya ta/
[\[363b.4\]]sogs so/_!_/d+h+wa na sgra la'o zhes pa la 'ang Ni tsa sbyar/_d+h+ra ni zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _d+h+wa ni la ti/_ling _d+h+wa ni ye ta/_loT _d+h+wa na ya tu/_lang _a ng+h+wa na ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/_ts+li tsang dang si tsa yang na bar byas pas/_si tsa'i phyogs la aTi byin pas/_a ng+hA na yI ta/_ang+ha na yi Sh+TAM/_a ng+h+wa na 
[\[363b.5\]]yi ShuH/_sogs so/_/tsang gi phyogs la byings gnyis brjod/_ha la dang po sogs kyis ba phyis/_/a ka ma phyis pa ba la yang ba la tsang pha rol la san bzhin nos ir bsgyur/_/ni'i iT med pa la'os/_Ni phyis pas/_a di d+h+wa na ta/_a [{]ding[,]deng[}\u0fb7\u0fad] na tAM/_a di ng+h+wa na na/_sogs so/_/liT la 
[\[363b.6\]]A ma sbyar bas/_d+h+wa na yAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_/luT la iT byin pas/_d+h+wan yi tA/_d+h+wa na yi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la Ni phyis pas/_d+h+wa n+yA ta/_d+h+wa n+yA swAM/_d+h+wa n+yA suH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la iT byin pas/_d+h+ra na yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_l+r-ing la'ang iT byin yon tan 
[\[363b.7\]]byas pas/_a d+h+wa na yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/ai la 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/_e li zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_e la ya Ni/_ling _e la ye ta/_loT _e la ya tu/_lang _ai li ye ta/_sogs so/_/ts+li si tsa dang tsang yang na bar byas pas/_si tsa'i phyogs la iT byin pas/
[\[364a\]]
[\[364a.1\]]ai la yI ta/_ai la yi Sh+TAM/_ai la yi ShuH/_sogs dang /_tsang gi phyogs la/_la Ni dang bcas pa gnyis brjod/_Ni phyis pas/_ai li la ta/_sogs so/_liT la A ma sbyar bas/_e la yAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_/luT la iT byin pas/_e la yi tA/_sogs so/
[\[364a.2\]]smon pa'i ling la/_Ni iT med pa la'os Ni phyis pas/_e l+yA ta/_e l+yA stAM/_e l+yA suH/_sogs so/_l+r-iT la iT byin pas/_e la yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la'ang iT byin bas/_e la yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/a rda 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la/_rgyu dang bcas 
[\[364a.3\]]pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar ba'i a rdi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT/_a rdi ya ti/_ling /_a rda ye ta/_loT/_a rda ya tu/_lang /_A rdi ya ta/_sogs so/_/lung la ts+li si tsa dang tsang yang na bar byas pas/_si tsa'i phyogs la iT byin pas/_A rda yI ta/_A rda yi Sh+TAM/_A rda yi muH/_sogs dang /_tsang gi 
[\[364a.4\]]phyogs la da Ni dang bcas pa gnyis brjod/_Ni'i iT med pa la'os Ni phyis pas/_A rdi da ta/_A rdi da tAM/_A rdi da na/_sogs so/_/liT la/_A ma sbyar bas/_A rda yAM tsa kA ra/_sogs dang /_luT la iT byin pas/_a rda yi tA/_a rda yi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la 
[\[364a.5\]]Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis bas/_a r+d+yA ha/_a r+d+yA stAM/_a r+d+yA suH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/_a rda yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_l+ring la/_A rda yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/smr-i kun tu klog pa la'o zhes pa la/_rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/
[\[364a.6\]]a tsa'i nya Na 'gro ba la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/_smA ri zhes grub pa la/_laT la sogs ba sbyar bas/_laT/_smA ra ya taM/_ling /_smA ra ye ta/_loT/_smA ra ya tu/_lang /_a smA ra ya ta/_sogs so/_/lung la/_a d+s+m+r-i dr-i twa ra bra tha mra da s+t+r-i spa shAM/_smr-i dr-i twa ra pra tha mra da s+t+r-i spa sha rnams kyi a ta'o/_/smr-i kun tu klog ba 
[\[364a.7\]]dr-i rnam par 'dzoms pa/_nyi twa ra kun tu mgyogs pa/_pra thar ba tu bshad pa/_mra da nye da pa/_s+t+r-i nya kun tu 'gebs pa/_sba sha rab tu gsher ba rnams kyi Ni dang bcas pa tsang pha rol la a b+h+yA sa a ta du bsgyur la ir bsgyur ba ma yin te/_Ni shri sogs kyis ts+li tsang du bsgyur/_tsang la 'os 
[\[364b\]]
[\[364b.1\]]gnyis brjod mdo 'dis ir mi bsgyur/_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/_a saM sma ra ta/_a sa smar tAM/_a sa smar na/_sogs so/_liT la A ma sbyar bas/_sma ra yAM tsa kAr/_sogs so/_/luT la iT byin pas/_smA ra yi tA/_smA ra yi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la 
[\[364b.2\]]Ni'i iT med ba la 'os Ni phyis pas/_smA r+YA ta/_smA r+YA stAM/_smA r+YA suH/_sogs so/_/Ni la tsang la u pad+hA'i thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/_l+r-iT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/_smA ra yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_l+ring la/_a smA ra yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/dr-i rnam par 'dzoms pa la'o zhes pa 
[\[364b.3\]]la rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/_a tsa'i nya Na 'gro ba la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/_dA ri zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT/_dA ri ya ti/_ling /_dA ri ya ta/_lang /_dA ra ya tu/_a dI ri yaT/_sogs so/_/lung la ts+li tsa da du bsgyur/_smr-i dr-i sogs kyis a b+h+yA sa a ta/_Ni'i iT med pa 
[\[364b.4\]]la 'os Ni phyis pas/_a da da ra ta/_a da dA tAM/_a da da ra na/_sogs so/_/liT la A ma sbyar bas/_dA ra yAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_/luT la iT byin pas/_dA ra yi tA/_dA ra yi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/_dA r+YA ta/_dA r+YA s+t+waM/
[\[364b.5\]]dA r+YA suH/_sogs so/_/NAM la tsang la sogs kyis thung ngur bsgyur/_l+r-iT la iT byin pas/_dA ra yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_l+r-ing la/_a dAr yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/nyi twa ra kun tu mgyogs pa la la'o zhes pa la rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/_twa ri zhes grub pa la laT la sogs 
[\[364b.6\]]pa sbyar pas/_laT/_twa ra ya ti/_ling /_twa ra ye ta/_loT/_twa ra ya tu/_lang /_a twa ra ya ta/_sogs so/_/l+r-ing la/_ts+li tsang gnyis brjod/_smr-i dr-i dwa ra sogs kyis ir mi bsgyur/_Ni ri iT med pa la 'os/_Ni phyis pas/_a ta twa ra ta/_a ta dA ra tAM/_a ta twa ra na/_sogs so/_/liT la A ma sbyar bas/_twa ra yAM tsa 
[\[364b.7\]]kA ra/_sogs so/_/luT la iT byin pas/_twa ra yi tA/_twa ra yi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la Ni'i iT med pa la 'osaNi phyis pas/_twa r+YA ta/_twa r+YA stAM/_twa r+YA suH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la iT byin pas/_twa ra yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_l+r-ing la/_a twa ra yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/
[\[365a\]]
[\[365a.1\]]pra tha rab tu bshad pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar bas/_pra thi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _pra thi yar ti/_ling _pra tha ye ta/_loT_pra tha ya tu/_lang _a pra tha ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la ts+li tsang du bsgyur/_smr-i dr-i twa ra pra tha sogs kyis ir mi bsgyur Ni'i iT med pa la 'os 
[\[365a.2\]]Ni phyis pas/_a pa pra tha ta/_a pa pra tha tAM/_a pa pra tha na/_sogs so/_/liT laA ma sbyar bas/_pra tha yAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_/luT la iT byin pas/_pra tha yi tA/_pra tha yi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la Ni phyis pas/_pra th+yA ta/_pra th+yAstAM/_pra th+yA suH/_sogs so/_/
[\[365a.3\]]l+r-iT la iT byin pas/_pra tha yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_l+r-ing la/_a pra tha yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/mrad nyed pa la'o zhes pa la rgyu bcas ba sogs kyis Ni sbyar bas/_mra di zhes pa la laT sogs sbyor te/_laT _mra da ya nyi/_ling _mra da ye ta/_loT_mra da ya tu/_lang _a mra 
[\[365a.4\]]da ya ta/_sogs so/_/lung la tsang gnyis brjod/_smr-i dr-i twar pra tha mra da sogs kyis i ra mi bsgyur Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis bas/_a ma mra da ta/_a ma mra da tAM/_a ma mra da na/_sogs so/_/liT la A ma sbyar/_mra da yAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_/luT la iT byin pas/_mra da yi 
[\[365a.5\]]tA/_mra da yi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i lingal/_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/_mra d+yA ta/_mra d+yA stAM/_mra d+yA suH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_mra da yi bya ti/_sogs dang /_l+r-ing la/_a mra da yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/s+t+r-i nya kun nas 'gebs pa la'o zhes pa la rgyu dang bcas 
[\[365a.6\]]ba sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/_a tsa'i nya Na 'gro ba la'os 'phel ba byas pas/_stA ri zhes grub pa la liT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _s+t+rar ya ti/_ling _stAr ye ta/_loT _star ya tu/_lang _a stAr ya ta/_sogs so/_/lung la/_ts+li tsang du bsgyur gnyis brjod/_shar dang po sogs 
[\[365a.7\]]kyis sa phyis/_sm-i d-i sogs kyis ir mi bsgyur/_Ni la tsang la u pa d+hA'i thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/_a ta star ta/_a te star tAM/_a ta star na/_sogs so/_/liT la A ma sbyar bas/_stA ra yAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_/luT la/
[\[365b\]]
[\[365b.1\]]iT byin pas/_sar yi tA/_stAr yi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la Ni phyis pas/_stA r+YA ta/_stA r+YA stAM/_stA r+YA suH/_sogs so/_/l+riT la iT byin pas/_stA ra yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_l+r-ing la/_a stA ra yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/sba sha rab tu gsher ba la'o zhes pa la 
[\[365b.2\]]Ni tsa sbyar/_u pa d+hA'i 'os 'phel ba byas pas/_spA shi zhes grub pa la/_laT sogs sbyar bas/_spA sha ya ti/_ling_spA sha ye ta/_loT _spA sha ya tu/_ling _a spA sha ya ta/_sogs so/_/lung la ts+li tsang gnyis brjod/_shar dang po sogs kyis su phyis/_smri dri sogs 
[\[365b.3\]]kyis id mi bsgyur/_Ni la tsar la u pa d+hA'i thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/_a pa spa sha ta/_a pa spa sha twaM/_a ba spa sha na/_sogs so/_/liT la A ma sbyar bas/_sbA sha yAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_/luT la iT byin pas/_spA sha yi tA/_spA 
[\[365b.4\]]sha yi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la Ni phyis pas/_spA sh+yA ta/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_spA sha yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_l+r-ing la/_a spA sha yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/beSh+Ta dkris pa la'o zhes pa la rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar bas/_beSh+Ti zhes srub pa la laT sogs 
[\[365b.5\]]sbyar bas/_laT _beSh+Ta ya te/_ling _beSh+Tu ye te/_loT _beSh+Ta ya tu/_lang _a beSh+Ta ya ta/_sogs so/_/lung la/_bib+hA ShA be Sh+TeH/_be Sh+Ti'i 'dam ka'o/_/beSh+Ti'i Ni dang bcas pa'i tsang pha rol la a b+h+yA sa a ta du bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba gdam ngag can du bya ste/_aT du bsgyur ba'i 
[\[365b.6\]]phyogs la/_a ba beSh+Ta ta/_a ba beSh+Ta ta/_a beSh+Ta na/_sogs dang /_aT du ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur bas/_a bi beSh+Ta ta/_a bi beSh+Ta tAM/_a bi beSh+Ta na/_sogs so/_lhag ma rnams la/_laT _beSh+Ta yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _beSh+Ta yi tA/_smon pa'i 
[\[365b.7\]]ling _beSh+T+ya ta/_l+r-iT beSh+Ta yi Sh+T+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a beSh+Ta yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/b+h+rA dzr-i 'bar ba la'o zhes pa la rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/_b+h+rA dza zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _b+h+rA dza ya ti/_ling _b+h+rA dza ye ta/_loT b+h+rA dza ya tu/_lang _a b+h+rA dza ya ta/
[\[366a\]]
[\[366a.1\]]sogs so/_/lung la/_b+h+rA dzaM b+h+rAs b+hA Sha di badzI ba mI la bI DA ma n+ya ta ra stAM/_b+h+rA dza b+h+rA sa b+hA Sha dI pa dzI ba mIl pIT rnams kyi yang na'o/_/b+hA dzrai dang b+h+rA sr-i 'bar ba/_b+hA Sha brjod pa/_dI pa 'bar ba/_dzI ba srog 'tsho ba/_mI la sbyor ba/_pIT kun du 'thibs pa rnams 
[\[366a.2\]]kyi Ni dang bcas pa'i tsang pha rol u pa d+hA thung ngur yang nra bsgyur te/_thung ngur bsgyur pa'i phyogs la/_Ni shri sogs kyis ts+li tsang gnyis brjod/_thung ngur bsgyur ra phyis/_a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/_b+ha ba a ka ma phyis pa la yang ba la tsang pha rol la san bzhin nos/_a i/_mdo 'dis 
[\[366a.3\]]u pa d+hA thung ngu /_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/_a bi b+h+ra dza ta/_a bib+h+ra dza tAM/_a bi b+h+ra dza na/_sogs dang /_thung ngur ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_a bi b+h+rA dza ta/_a bi b+h+rA dza tAM/_a bi b+h+rA dza na/_sogs so/_/la yig lhag ma rnams la/_liT _b+h+rA dza yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _b+h+rA 
[\[366a.4\]]dza yi tA/_smon pa'i ling _b+h+rA dz+yA ta/_liT _b+h+rA dza yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a b+h+rA dza yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/b+h+rA sa 'bar pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar ngas b+h+rA si zhes pa la/_laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _b+h+rA sa ya ti/_ling _b+h+rA sa ye ta/_loT _b+h+rA sa ya tu/_lang _a b+h+rA sa ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/
[\[366a.5\]]b+h+rA dza b+h+rA sa sogs kyi mdos/_u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/_a ba b+h+rA sa ta/_sogs sam/_a bi b+h+rA sa ta/_sogs so/_/la yig phye ma rnams la/_ling _b+h+rAs yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _b+h+rAs yi tA/_smon pa'i ling _b+h+rA s+yA ta/_l+r-iT_b+h+rA sa yi Sh+ya ti/_ling _a b+h+rA 
[\[366a.6\]]sa yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_!_/b+hA Sha brjod pa la Ni tsa sbyar/_de la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _b+h+rA Sha yi ti/_ling _b+h+rA Sha ye ta/_loT _b+hA Sha ya tu/_lang _b+h+rA Sha ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/_b+h+rA dza b+h+rA sha sogs kyis u pad+hA thung ngur bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar 
[\[366a.7\]]byas pas/_a bi b+ha Sha ta/_sogs sam/_a bi b+h+rA Sha ta/_sogs so/_/la yig phyi ma rnams la/_liT _b+hA Sha yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _b+h+rA Sha yi tA/_smon pa'i ling _b+hA Sh+yA ta/_l+r-iT _b+hA Sha yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a b+hA Sha yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/dI pa 'bar pa la Ni tsa dang laT sogs sbyar bas/
[\[366b\]]
[\[366b.1\]]laT _dI pa ya ti/_ling _dI pa ye ta/_loT _dI pa ya tu/_lang _a dI ba ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/_b+h+rA dza b+h+rA sha sogs kyis u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur pa dang mi bsgyur pa yang na bar byas pas/_a di di ba ta/_sogs sam/_a di dI pa ta/_sogs so/_/la yig phyi ma rnams la/_laT _dI ba yAM 
[\[366b.2\]]tsa kA ra/_luT _dI pa yi twa/_smon ling _dI byA ta/_l+r-iT _dI ba yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a dI pa yi Sh+yA ta/_sogs so/_!_/dzI ba srog 'tsho ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar nas laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _dzI ba ya ti/_ling _dzI ba ya ta/_loT _dzI ba ya tu/_lang _a dzI ba ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/_b+h+rA dza b+h+rA 
[\[366b.3\]]sha sogs kyis u bad+hA thung ngur bsgyur pa dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/_a dzi dzi ba ta/_sogs sam/_a dzi dzI ba ta/_sogs so/_/la yig phyi ma rnams la/_liT _dzI ba yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _dzI ba yi tA/_smon ling _dzI byA ta/_l+r-iT _dzI pa yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a dzI ba yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/
[\[366b.4\]]mI la sbyor ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar nas laT la sogs pa rnams sbyar bas/_laT _mI la ya ti/_ling _mI la ye ta/_loT _mI la ya tu/_lang _a mI laya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/_b+h+rA dza b+h+rA sa sogs kyis u ba d+hA thung ngur bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur pa yang na bar byas pas/_a mi mi 
[\[366b.5\]]la ta/_sogs sam/_a mi mi la ta/_sogs so/_/la yig phyi ma rnams la/_liT _mI la yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _mI la yi tA/_smon ling _mI l+yA ta/_l+riT _mI la yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a mI la yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/pIT kun du 'thibs pa la'o zhes pa la rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa 
[\[366b.6\]]sbyar/_pI dri zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _pI Da ya ti/_liT _pIT ye ta/_loT _pI Da ya tu/_lang _a pI Di ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/_b+h+rA dza b+h+rA sa sogs kyis u pa d+hU thung ngur bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/_a bi bi Da ta/_sogs sam/_a pi 
[\[366b.7\]]pI Da ta/_sogs so/_/la yig phyi ma rnams la/_liT _pI Da yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _pI Da yi tA/_smon ling _pI D+yA ta/_smon ling _pI D+yA ta/_l+r-iT _pI Da yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a pI Da yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/ka Na sgra la'i zhes pa la rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/_u pa d+hA'i 'os 'phel ba byas pas/_kA Ni 
[\[367a\]]
[\[367a.1\]]zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _kA Na ya tI/_ling _kA Na ya ta/_leT _kA Na ya tu/_laT_a kA Na ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/_ka Na ra Na b+ha Na shra Na hA+e ny+la pa lu pa lu Tha he ShAM tsa/_ka Na ra Na ba Na b+ha Na shra Na hwe nya la pa lu pa lu Tha hA i Sha rnams 
[\[367a.2\]]kyi 'ang ngo /_/ka Na ra Na ba Na b+ha Na rnams sgra/_sha Na 'tshed pa/_hwe nya 'dren pa/_la pa yongs su brjod pa/_lu pha sbed pa/_lu Tha srub pa/_o hA ka gtong ba/_i Shu 'dod pa rnams kyi 'ang Ni dang bcas pa'i tsang pha rol la u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar bya ste/_thung ngur bsgyur 
[\[367a.3\]]ba'i phyogs la san bzhin gyi bya ba 'jug cing /_thung ngur ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la san bzhin gyi bya ba'ang mi 'jug ste/_a tsI ka Na ta/_sogs sam/_a tsa kA Na ta/_sogs so/_/la yig lhag ma rnams la/_liT _kA Na yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _kA Na yi tA/_smon ling _kA N+yA ta/_l+r-iT _kA Na yi Sh+ya ti/
[\[367a.4\]]l+r-ing _a kA Na yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/ra Na sgra la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/_u pa d+hA'i 'phel pa 'os 'phel ba byas pas/_rA Ni zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _rA Na ya ti/_ling _rA Na ye ta/_loT _rA Na ya tu/_lang _a rA Na ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/_ka ra Na sogs kyi 
[\[367a.5\]]mdos/_u pad+hA thung ngur bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur pa yang na bar byas pas/_a rI ra Na ta/_sogs sam/_a ra rA Na ta/_sogs so/_/liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/_liT _rA Na yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _rA Na yi ta/_smon ling _rA N+yA ta/_l+r-iT _rA Na yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a rA Na yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/
[\[367a.6\]]pa Na s+tha la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar 'phel ba byas pas/_bA Ni zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar/_laT _bA Na ya ti/_ling _bA Na ya ta/_loT _bA Na ya ta/_lang _a bA Na ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/_ka Na ra Na sogs kyis u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur pa dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/_a bI ba 
[\[367a.7\]]Na ta/_sogs sam/_a ba bA Na ta/_sogs so/_/liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/_liT _bA Na yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _bA Na yi tA/_smon ling _bA N+yA ta/_l+r-iT _bA Na yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing_a bA Na yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/b+ha Na sbra la'o zhes pa la rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/_u pa d+hA'i 'os 
[\[367b\]]
[\[367b.1\]]'phel ba byas/_b+hA Ni zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar pas/_laT _b+hA Na ya ti/_ling _b+hA Na ya ta/_loT _b+hA Na ya tu/_lang _a b+hA Na ya ta/_sogs so/_/lung la/_ka Na ra Na sogs kyis u pad+hA thung ngur bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/_a bI b+ha Na ta/_sogs sam/_a 
[\[367b.2\]]ba b+hA Na ta/_sogs so/_/liT sogs phyi ma rnams la/_liT _b+hA Na yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _b+hA Na yi tA/_smon ling _b+hA N+yAti/_l+r-iT_b+hA Na yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a b+hA Na yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/de bzhin du/_shra Na 'tshed pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar 'phel ba byas pas/_shra Ni zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar 
[\[367b.3\]]bas/_laT _shrA Na ya ti/_ling _shrA Na ye ta/_loT _shrA Na ya tu/_lang _a shrA Na ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/_ka Na ra Na sogs kyis u bad+hA thung ngur bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang Na bar byas pas/_a shI shra Na ta/_sogs sam/_a sha shrA Na ta/_sogs so/_/la yig lhag ma rnams 
[\[367b.4\]]la/_liT _shrA Na yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _shrA Na yi tA/_smon ling _shrA N+yA ta/_l-iT _shrA Na yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a shrA Na yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/twe nya'i dper brjod 'og tu 'chad la/_!_/la ba yongs su brjod pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar 'phel ba byas pas/_lA pi zhes grub ba la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _lA 
[\[367b.5\]]pa ya ti/_ling _lA pa ye ta/_loT _lA pa ya tu/_lang _a lA pa ya te/_sogs so/_/lung la/_ka Na ra Na sogs kyis u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur pa yang na bar byas pas/_a lI la pa ta/_sogs sam/_a la lA ba ta/_sogs so/_/liT sogs lhag ma rnams la rim pa bzhin/
[\[367b.6\]]liT _lA pa yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _lA pa yi tA/_smon ling _lA byA ta/_l+r-iT _lA pa yi Sh+ya ti/_l+ring _a lA pa yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/lu ba sbed pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/_pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_lo pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _lo pa ya ti/_ling _lo pa 
[\[367b.7\]]ye ta/_loT _lo pa ya tu/_lang _a lo pa ya ta/_sogs so/_/lung la/_ka Na ra Na sogs kyis u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/_a lU la pa ta/_sogs sam/_a lu lo pa ta/_sogs so/_/liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/_liT _lo pa yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _lo pa 
[\[368a\]]
[\[368a.1\]]yi tA/_smon ling _lo byA ta/_l+r-iT _lo pa yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a lo ba yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/luT srub ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa yon tan byas pas/_lo thi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar pas/_laT _lo Tha ya ti/_ling _lo Tha ye ta/_loT _lo Tha ya tu/_lang _a lo Tha ya ta/
[\[368a.2\]]sogs dang /_lung la/_ka Na ra Na sogs kyis u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/_a lU la Tha ta/_sogs sam/_a li'o Tha ta/_sogs so/_/liT sogs lhag ma rnams la rim pa bzhin/_liT _lo Tha yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _lo Tha yi tA/_smon ling _lo Th+yA ta/_l+r-iH_lo Tha yi 
[\[368a.3\]]Sh+ya ta/_ling _a lo Tha yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/o hA ka gtong ba la'o zhes pa la/_Ni tsa a rti hri ts+lI rI/_sogs kyis pu ka A ga ma byin pas/_hA pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _hA pa ya ti/_ling _hA pa ye ta/_loT _tA ba ya tu/_laT _a hA pa ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/
[\[368a.4\]]ka Na ra Na sogs kyis u bang+hA thung ngur bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/_a dzI ha pa ta/_sogs sam/_a dza tA pa ta/_sogs so/_/la yig lhag ma rnams la/_liT _hrA pa yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _hA pa yi tA/_smon ling _hA byA ta/_l+r-iT _hA pa yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a hA ba yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/
[\[368a.5\]]i Shu 'dod pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar yon tan byas pas/_laT _e Sha ya ti/_ling _e Sha ye ta/_loT _e Sha ya tu/_lang _ai Sha ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/_a tsa dang po'i AT/_AT las kyang ngos 'phel ba byed dgos pas u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur bas rjes mi mdon kyang /_Sha 
[\[368a.6\]]Ni dang bcas pa gnyis brjod pas u pa d+hU thung ngur bsgyur pa'i phyogs la san bzhin gyi bya ba 'jug pas yang ba'i ring po dang /_thung ngur ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la ring por mi bsgyur bas/_ai ShI Sha ta/_sogs sam/_ai Shi Sha ta/_sogs so/_/liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/_liT _e Sha 
[\[368a.7\]]yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _e Sha yi tA/_smon ling _e Sh+ya ta/_l+r-iT_e Sha yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _ai Sha yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/kr-i ta yongs su sgrog pa la'o zhes pa la rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/_u pang+hA'i 'ang ngos i ta du bsgyur/_r-i'i a Na lar pha rol los ra/_u pa d+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por 
[\[368b\]]
[\[368b.1\]]bsgyur bas/_kIrti zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _kI rta ya ti/_ling _kI rta ye ta/_loT_kIrta ya tu/_lang _a kIrta ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/_u r-i ta/_ra'i ri ta'o/_/byings kyi u pa d+hA'i r-i yig ni tsang dang bcas pa'i Ni pha rol la i ta dang yon tan sogs mi byed par yang na r-i ta 
[\[368b.2\]]nyid du gnas te/_a tsI kr-i ta da/_sogs sam/_yang na i ta du bsgyur bas/_a tsI kI rta ta/_sogs so/_/liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/_liT _kI rta yAM tsa kA ra/_laT kI rta yi tA/_smon ling _kI r+t+yAti/_l+riT _kI rta yi Sh+ya ti/_l+ring a kI rta yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/bri tu yod pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa 
[\[368b.3\]]sbyar/_'grel par skabs 'gar u bang+hA'i i ta du mi bsgyur zhes bshad pas/_ri i ta du mi bsgyur/_pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_brti zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _brta ya ti/_ling _brta ye ta/_l+r-iT _brta ya tu/_lang _a brta ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la 
[\[368b.4\]]r-i'i r-i ta 'os/_r-i ta nyid du gnas ba dang yon tan yang na bar byas/_yon tan byas pa'i phyogs la san bzhin gyi bya ba mi 'jug_/Ni'i iT med pa la phyis bas/_a bI br-i ta ta/_sogs sam/_a ba brta ta/_sogs so/_/liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/_liT _brta yAM ca kA ra/_luT _brta 
[\[368b.5\]]yi tA/_smon ling _bar+t+yA ta/_l+r-iT _brta yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a brta yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/mr-i dzu Sha dag pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/_mr-i dzi ri 'phel ba la 'os 'phel byas pas/_mA rdzi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _mA rdzas ya ti/_ling _mA rdza ye ta/_loT_mArdza ya tu/_lang _a mA rdza 
[\[368b.6\]]ya Ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/_r-i'i r-i ta 'os/_u bad+hA r-i nyid du gnas pa'am 'phel ba yang na bar byas/_'phel ba'i phyogs las na bzhin gyi bya ba mi 'jug Ni phyis pas/_a mI mr-i ja ta/_sogs sam/_a ma mA rdza ta/_sogs so/_/liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/_liT _mA rdza yAM tsa 
[\[368b.7\]]kA ra/_luT _mA rdza yi tA/_smon ling _mA r+dz+yA ta/_l+riT _mA rdza yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-iT _a mA rdza yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/nyi Sh+wa pa nyal ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa byin/_u pa d+hA'i 'os 'phel ba byas pas/_swA pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _swA pa ya ti/_ling _swA pa ye ta/_loT _swA pa ya tu/
[\[369a\]]
[\[369a.1\]]lang _a swA pa ya ta/_sogs so/_lung la/_swA pe shA di/_swA pi'i tsar la'o/_/swa pa Ni mtha' can ni ts+li bsgyur bas tsang pha rol la si pra sA ra Na ra bsgyur te/_swa pi la tsang /_Ni la tsang la u pad+hA'i thung ngu 'os thur ngur bsgyur/_mdo 'dis saM pra sAr Na/_tsang la 'os gnyis brjod/_yang ba'o

[\[369a.3\]]sho phra mor byed pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/_sha 'gro na ma yin pa nye ba'i yul la e tsa'i u ta 'os e tsa A ta ngu bsgyur/_shA Ni zhes pa la/_shA nA sA hwA byA be paM yu ka_/shA tshA sA hwA byA be pA rnams kyi yu ka'o/_/sho phra mor byed pa/_tshe gcod pa/_Sho mtha'i las/_he nya
