[\[369a.4\]]'dren pa/_bye nya kun nas sbrib pa/_be nya thags kyi rgyu/_pA ba t+yang ba rnams kyi Ni pha rol la yu ka A gam 'gyur te/_ka gnas don u brjod don no/_/shA yi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _shA ya ya ti/_ling _shA ya ye ta/_loT _shA ya ya tu/_lang _a shA ya ya ta/
[\[369a.5\]]sogs so/_/lung la/_gnyis brjod Ni la tsang la u ba d+hA'i 'os thung ngur bsgyur bas/_a sha sha ya ta/_sogs so/_liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/_liT _shA ya yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _shA ya yi tA/_smon ling _shA y+YA ta/_l+r-iT _shA ya yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a shA ya yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/de 
[\[369a.6\]]bzhin du/_tsho gcod pa la'o zhes pa la/_Ni tsa e tsa A ta yu ka A ga ma byin pas/_tshA yi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _tshA ya ya ti/_ling _tshA ya ye ta/_loT _tshA ya ya tu/_lang _a tshA ya ya ta/_lung _a tsa tsha ya ta/_liT _tshA ya yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _tshA ya yi tA/_smon ling _tsha 
[\[369a.7\]]y+YA ta/_l+r-iT _tshA ya yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a tshA ya yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/Sho mtha'i las la'o zhes pa la/_Ni tsa e tsa A ta yu ka ma byin pas/_sA yi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _sA ya ya ti/_ling _sA ya ye ta/_loT _sA ya ya tu/_lang _a sA ya ya ta/_lung _a sa sa 
[\[369b\]]
[\[369b.1\]]ya ta/_liT_swa ya yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _sA ya yi tA/_smon ling _sA y+YA ta/_l+r-iT _sA ya yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a sA ya yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/hA+e nya 'dren pa la'o zhes pa la chi tsa e tsa/_A ta/_yu ka A ga ma byin pas/_hwA yi ne sa grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _hwA ya ya ti/_ling _hwA ya ye ta/
[\[369b.2\]]loT _hwA ya ya tu/_lang _a hwA ya ya ta/_ling la/_hwaH_si pra sA ra NaM/_hwA'i saM pra sA ra Na'o/_hwI'i Ni dang bcas pa'i tsang pha rol la rtag tu saM bra snar Na ra bsgyur te/_hwA yi tsang Ni la tsang u bad+yA'i thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/_mdo 'dis saM pra sAr Na gnyis brjod lang ba'i ring po/_/'grel par 
[\[369b.3\]]saM pra sAr Na'i pha rol la la yu ka A ga ma dbyi'o zhes bshad pas yu ka phyis/_a tsa liny+ni ta la 'os 'phel ba/_e tsa'i a yu sogs kyis au A ba/_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis/_ka Na ra Na sogs kyis u bad+hA thung ngur bsgyur pa dang mi bsgyur pa yang na bar byas pas/_a dzu hA ba ta/
[\[369b.4\]]sogs sam/_a dzU ha ba ta/_sogs so/_/liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/_liT _hwA ya yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _hwA ya yi tA/_smon ling _hwA y+YA ta/_l+r-iT _hwA ya yi Sh+ya ta/_l+r-ing _a hwA ya yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/bye nya kun nas sgrib pa la/_Ni tsa e tsa'i A ta/_yu ka A ga ma byin bas/_bya yi zhes grub ba 
[\[369b.5\]]la laT sogs sbyar bas/_l+raT _byA ya ya ti/_l+ring _byA ya ye ta/_loT _byA ya ya tu/_lang _a byA ya ya ta/_lung _a ba byA ya ta/_liT _byA ya yAM tsa kA ra/_luT_byA ya yi tA/_smon ling _byA y+YA ta/_l+r-iT _bya ya yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a byA ya yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/be nya thags kyi rgyu la'o zhes pa la/_Ni tsa 
[\[369b.6\]]e tsa _A ta _yu ka A ga ma byin pas/_bA yi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _bA ya yi hi/_ling _bA ya ye ta/_loT _bA ya ya tu/_lang _a bA ya ya ta/_lung _a ba ba ya ta/_liT _bA ya yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _bA ya yi tA/_smon ling _bA y+YA ta/_l+riT _bA ya yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a bA ya yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs 
[\[369b.7\]]so/_!_/de bzhin du/_pA btung ba la Ni tsa sbyar yu ka A ga ma byin pas/_bA yi zhes ba la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _bA ya ya ti/_ling _pA ya ye ta/_loT _pA ya ya tu/_lang _a bA ya ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/_lo paHpi ba te rI tswA b+h+yAs s+ya/_pe ba ti'i dbyi zhing a b+h+yA sa'i I ta 'ang ngo /_/Ni dang 
[\[370a\]]
[\[370a.1\]]bcas pa'i tsang pha rol la pi ba ti'i u pad+hA dbyi zhing a b+h+yA sa'i 'ang I ta du bsgyur bar bya ste/_pA ye la tsang lung gnyis brjod/_Ni'i iT med pa la'os Ni phyis/_mdo 'dis u pa d+hA phyis a b+h+yA sa'ang I ta du bsgyur bas/_a pI pya ta/_sogs so/_/liT sogs lhag ma rnams la 
[\[370a.2\]]liT _pA ya yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _pA ya yi tA/_smon ling _pA y+YA ta/_l+r-iT _pA ya yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a pA ya yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/ri 'gro pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/_arti hrI ts+lI sogs kyis pu ka A ga ma/_pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_aR+pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _aR+pa 
[\[370a.3\]]ya ti/_ling_aR+pa ye ta/_loT _aR+pa ya tu/_lang _AR+pa ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/_aR+pi la tsang tsang la 'os byings gnyis brjod/_r-i'i a ta 'os/_de a uT dang 'phel ba byas Ni'i iT med pa la'os Ni phyis pas/_AR+pa ta/_sogs so/_/liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/_liT _aR+pa yAM tsa kA ra/
[\[370a.4\]]luT _aR+pa yi tA/_smon ling _aR+p+yAta/_l+riT _aR+payi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-iT _aR+pa yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _AR+pa yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/hrI ngo tsha ba la'o zhes pa la/_Ni tsa a rti hri sogs kyis pu ka A gam byin/_pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_hre pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _hre ba ya ti/_l+r-ing _hre pa ye ta/
[\[370a.5\]]loT _hre pa ya tu/_lang _a hre pa ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/_gnyis brjod/_Ni la tsang la u pa d+hA thung ngu /_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/_a dzi hri ba ta/_sogs so/_/liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/_liT _hre pa yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _hre pa yi tA/_smon ling _hre byA ta/_l+r-iT _hre pa yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a hre 
[\[370a.6\]]pa yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/ts+lI 'gro ba la Ni tsa sbyar/_a rti hrI sogs kyis pu ka A ga ma/_pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_ts+li pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _ts+la pa ya ti/_ling _ts+le pa ye ta/_loT tsA+e pa ya tu/_lang _a ts+le pa ya ta/_lung _a tsi ts+li pa ta/_liT _ts+le pa yAM tsa kA 
[\[370a.7\]]ra/_luT _ts+le pa yi tA/_smon ling _ts+le pyA ta/_l+r-iT _a ts+le pa yi Sh+ya ta/_l+r-ing _a ts+le pa yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/rId nyan ba la'o zhes la/_Ni tsa a rti hrI sogs kyis pu ka A ga ma/_pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_re pi zhes grub ba la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _re pa ya ti/_liT _re ba ye ta/
[\[370b\]]
[\[370b.1\]]loT _re pa ya tu/_lang _a re pa ya ta/_lung _a ri ri pa ta/_liT _re pa yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _re pa yi tA/_smon long _re pyA ta/_l+r-iT _re ba yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _re pa yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/kru ya sgra la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/_a rti hrI sogs kyis pu ka A ga ma byin/_ba ya dag gi bal la dbyi 'os ya phyis/_pu ka 
[\[370b.2\]]mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_kro p-i zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _kro ba ya ti/_ling _kro pa ya ti/_long _kro ba ya tu/_lang _a kro pa ya ta/_lung _a tsu kru pa ta/_liT_kro pa yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _kro pa yi tA/_smon ling _kro pyA ta/_l-iT _krau pa yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a kro pa yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs 
[\[370b.3\]]so/_!_/k+Sh+mA yI rnam par 'dar ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/_pA ya dag gi pa la la dbyi 'os ya phyis pas/_k+Sh+mA pi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _k+Sh+mA ba ya ti/_ling _k+Sh+mA pa ye ta/_loT _k+Sh+mA pa ya tu/_lang _a k+Sh+mA ba ya ta/_lung _a tsa k+Sh+mA ba ta/_liT _k+Sh+mA pa yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _k+Sh+mA pa yi tA/
[\[370b.4\]]smon ling _k+Sh+mA pyA ta/_l+r-iT _k+Sh+mA pa yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a k+Sh+mA pa yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/Sh+ThA 'gro ba las dog pa la Ni tsa/_arti hrI sogs kyis pu ka A ga ma byin pas/_s+thA pi zhes pa grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _s+thA pa ya ti/_ling _s+thA pa ya ta/_loT _s+thA ba ya tu/_lang _a s+thA pa ya ta/_sogs 
[\[370b.5\]]dang /_lung la/_tiSh+Tha te ri ti/_ti Sh+tha ti'i i ta'o/_/Ni dang bcas pa'i tsang pha rol la ta Sh+thi ti'i u pad+hA i ta du bsgyur te/_s+thA pi la tsang /_mdo 'dis i ta du bsgyur/_gnyis brjod/_shar dang po sogs kyis sa phyis/_a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/_tha ta_ku ni nas bsgyur ba la sogs kyis sa Sha/
[\[370b.6\]]ma Tu la Sha Tu 'os tha Tha/_Ni'i iT med ba la 'os Ni phyis pas/_a tiSh+Thi pa ta/_sogs dang /_liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/_liT _s+thA pa yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _s+thA ba yi tA/_smon ling _s+thA pyA ta/_l+r-iT _s+thA pa ya Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a s+thA ba Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/g+h+rA dri nye bar len pa la'o zhes pa la/
[\[370b.7\]]Ni tsa a rti hrI sogs kyis pu ka A ga ma byin pas/_g+h+rA pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _g+h+rA pa ya ti/_ling _g+h+rA ba ye ta/_loT _g+h+rA pa ya tu/_lang _a g+h+rA pa ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/_dzi g+h+ra te rbA/_dzi g+h+ra ti'i yang na'o/_/Ni dang bcas pa'i tsang pha rol la dzi g+h+ra ti'i u pa d+hU i ta 
[\[371a\]]
[\[371a.1\]]du yang na bsgyur te/_a dzi g+h+ri pa ta/_sogs sam/_a dza gra pa ta/_sogs so/_/liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/_liT_g+h+rA pa yAM tsa kA ra/_laT _g+h+rA pa yi tA/_smon ling _g+h+rA pyA ta/_l+r-iT _g+h+rA pa yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a g+h+rA pa yi Sh+ya tra/_sogs so/_!_/bA sbyong ba la'o zhes ba la/
[\[371a.2\]]Ni tsa _'grel par lung drangs pa/_bA te r+Nau lu gA ga mo ni t+yaM/_pA ti'i Ni ya lu ka A ga ma rtag tu'o/_/bA ti'i Ni pha rol la lu ka A ga ma rtag tu 'gyur te/_u brjod don ka gnas don rnams phyis pas/_pA li zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar pas/_laT _pA la ya ti/_ling _pA la ye ta/
[\[371a.3\]]loT _pA la ya tu/_lang _a pA la ya ta/_lung _a pa pa la ta/_liT _pA la yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _pA la yi tA/_smon ling _pA l+yA ta/_l+r-iT _pA layi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a pA la yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/pA 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/_po bing+hU na ne dzu ka_/pA'i rnam par g.yo ba la dzu ka'o/_/bA'i Ni tsa 
[\[371a.4\]]pha rol la rnam par g.yo ba la 'jug pa'i don la jug A ga ma 'gyur te/_ka gnas don u brjod don yin pas rjes 'bral phyis pas/_bA dzi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _bA dza ya ti/_ling _bA dza ye ta/_loT _bA dza ya tu/_lang _a bA dza ya ta/_lung _a ba ba dza ta/_l+r-iT _bA dza yAM tsa 
[\[371a.5\]]kA ra/_luT _bA dza yi tA/_smon ling _bA dz+yA ta/_l+r-iT _bA dza yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a bA dza yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs dang /_rnam par g.yo ba'i don min na dzu ka mi 'gyur te/_a rti hrI sogs kyis pu ka byin pas/_laT _bA ba ya ti/_luT _a ba bapa ta/_sogs so/_!_/d+hU nya 'gul ba la'o zhes ba la Ni tsa 'grel 
[\[371a.6\]]pa la lung drangs pa/_d+hU nya prI nyo nu ka ke tsa dwA/_d+hU nya prI nya dag gi nu ka 'ga' zhig tu yang na'o/_/d+hU nya 'gul ba dang prI nya tshim pa dag gi Ni tsa pha rol la nu ka sA ga ma skabs 'gar yang na 'gyur te/_nu ka sbyar pa'i phyogs la/_laT _d+hU na ya ti/_ling _d+hU na ye ta/_loT _d+hU na ya tu/_lang _a d+hU na ya ta/
[\[371a.7\]]lung _a du d+hu na ta/_liT _d+hU na yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _d+hU na yi tA/_smon ling _ng+hU n+yA ta/_l+r-iT _d+hU na yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a d+hU na yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs dang /_nu ka ma byin pa'i phyogs la 'phel ba byas pas/_d+hA bi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _d+hA ba ya ti/_ling _d+hA ba ye ta/_loT _d+hA ba ya tu/
[\[371b\]]
[\[371b.1\]]lang _a drA ba ya ta/_lung _a_du d+ha ba ta/_liT _d+hA pa yI tsa kA ra/_luT _d+hA pa yi tA/_smon ling _d+hA byA ta/_l+r-iT _b+hA ba yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a d+hA ba yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/prI nya tshim pa la Ni tsa/_d+hA nya prI nya dag gi nu ka 'ga' zhig tu yang na 'os/_nu ka sbyar ba'i phyogs la/_laT _brI Na ya ti/_ling _prI Na ye ta/
[\[371b.2\]]loT _prI Na yi tu/_lang _a prI Na ya ta/_lung _a prI Na ta/_liT _prI Na yAM tsa ka ra/_luT _prI Na yi tA/_smon ling _prI N+yA ta/_l+riT _prI Na yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a prI Na Sh+ya ta/_sogs dang /_nu ka med pa'i phyogs la/_a tsa'i nya Na 'gro ba la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/_prA yi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar 
[\[371b.3\]]pas/_laT _brA ya ya ti/_lung _a pi pra ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/lIng sbyor bar byed pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/_bi b+hA ShA lI ya teH/_lI ya ti'i 'dam ka'o/_/lI ya ti'i mtha' Ni tsa dang l+ya pa pha rol la A ta du yang na bsgyur bar bya ste/_A ta du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_a rti hrI sogs kyis pu ka A gam sbyar 
[\[371b.4\]]bas/_lA bi zhes pa grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _lA pa ya ti/_ling _lA pa ye ta/_loT _lA pa ya tu/_lang _a lA pa ya ta/_lung _a la la pa ta/_liT/_lA pa yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _lA pa yi tA/_smon ling _lA pyA ta/_l+r-iT _lA pa yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a lA yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/lI l+yo rnu ka lu kA ba n+ya 
[\[371b.5\]]ta ra s+yaM/_lI lI dag gi nu ka dag yang na'o/_/lI chung ngur gyur pa dang lI sbyor bar byed pa dag gi snum pa byug pa'i don la rim pa bzhin nu ka dang lu ka A ga ma dag yang na 'gyur te/_laT _lI na ya ti/_lung _a li li na ta/_sogs dang /_'grel par lung drangs pas/_pa laM b+ha nA b+hi b+ha ba pU dzA 
[\[371b.6\]]su li yo ni t+ya mA twa ma shi ti bA ts+yaM/_'jig pa sngon byung mchod pa rnams lalI dag gi sha 'gro ba ma yin pa la A nyid rtag tu brjod do/_/lIng sbyor ba dang lI chung ngur gyur pa dag gi 'jig pa dang sngon byung ba dang mchod pa rnams kyi don dang sbyar ba na sha 'gro ba ma yin pa'i rkyen gang byung yang A nyid du 
[\[371b.7\]]rtag tu brjod bar bya ste/_laT _lA pa ya ti/_lIng dang lI gnyis ka bsgrub lugs dang gzugs gnyis ka 'dra ste A ta ngu bsgyur nas bu ka byin pa'o/_/lung _a la la pa ta/_sogs so/_/li yaH_saM mAn na shA lI nI ka ra Na yo sh+tsa/_lI las kun nas gus pa dad gnod pa dag la yang na'o/_/lI Ni tsa'i mtha' cad las 
[\[372a\]]
[\[372a.1\]]kun nas gus pa dang gnod pa byed pa dang rab tu thob pa la yang laT sogs A t+ma ne pa da rnams 'gyur te/_dza TA b+hi rA lA pa ya te/_sh+ye no brti kA mu l+lA pa ya te/_ka s+ShA mu l+lA pa ya te/_sogs so/_!_/nyi b+hI 'jigs pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/_bi b+he te r+he tu b+ha ye/_bi b+he ti'i 
[\[372a.2\]]'jigs pa'i rgyu la'o/_/'jigs pa'i rgyu brjod pa las bi b+hi ti'i mtha' Ni tsa pha rol la A ta du yang na bsgyur ro/_/'grel bar lung drangs pa/_ra la pa tsa na rnams pa kun nas gus par 'dod/_khras co ka la gnod pa byed par 'dod/_khyod su thob ral 'dod/_pra yo dza k+ShAd+b+ha yaM tsa bA ts+yaM/_'jigs pa'i sbyor ba las kyang brjod do/_/'jigs 
[\[372a.3\]]pa'i rgyur ma zad 'jigs pa skyong ba las kyang bi b+he ti'i Ni tsa pha rol la A ta du yang na bsgyur ro/_/b+hI smyo r+he tu b+ha ye/_b+hI smi dag las 'jigs pa'i rgyu la'o/_/b+hI dang Sh+maM cung zad rgod pa dag las 'jigs pa'i rgyu brjod pa la tang rnams sbyor te/_bi b+he ti'i 'jigs pa'i rgyu la 'os A ta du bsgyur/
[\[372a.4\]]artihA sogs kyis pu ka A ga ma byin pas/_b+hA bi zhes grub pa la/_mdo 'dis laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/_laT _ba pa ya te/_ling _b+hA pa ye ta/_loT _b+hA pa ya tAM/_lang _a b+hA ba ya ta/_lung _a ba b+ha pa ta/_liT _b+hA ba yAM tsa kre/_luT _b+hA pa yi tA/_smon pa'i ling _b+hA pa yi ShI Sh+Ta/_/l+r-iT _b+hA 
[\[372a.5\]]pa yi Sh+ya te/_l+r-ing _a b+hA pa yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs sam/_yang na/_b+hi yo he tu b+ha ye Shu ka_/b+hI'i 'jigs pa'i rgyu la Shu ka'o/_/b+hI'i Ni tsa pha rol la 'jigs pa'i rgyu la Shu ka A ga ma 'gyur te/_Shu ka byin pas/_laT _b+hI Sha ya te/_luT _a b+hi Sha te/_sogs so/_!_/Sh+mi cung zad rgod pa la'o zhes pa la 
[\[372a.6\]]Ni tsa sbyar/_ni t+yaM sma ya teH/_sma ya ti'i rtag tu'o/_/'jigs pa'i rgyu dang sbyor ba na/_sma ya ti'i mtha' Ni tsa pha rol la A ta du rtag tu 'gyur te/_I A ta/_i rta hrI sogs kyis bu ka A ga ma byin pas/_smA pi zhes grub pa la/_b+hI smi dag las 'jigs pa'i rgyu la 'os laT sogs dang rnams sbyar 
[\[372a.7\]]pas/_laT _smA pa ya te/_ling _smA pa ye ta/_loT _smA pa ya tAM/_lang _a smA pa ya ta/_lung _a sI Sh+ma pa ta/_liT _smA pa yAM tsa kre/_luT _smA pa yi tA/_smon pa'i ling _smA pa yi ShI Sh+Ta/_l+r-iT _smA pa yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a smA pa yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/s+pha yI 'phel ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/_smA yoHbaH/_smA 
[\[372b\]]
[\[372b.1\]]yI'i pa'o/_/s+phA yi zhes pa'i mtha'i ya yi ga ni Ni tsa pha rol la ba yig tu bsgyur par bya ste/_mdo 'dis par bsgyur pas/_s+phA bi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _s+phA ba ya ti/_ling _s+phA ba ye ta/_loT _s+phA ba ya tu/_lang _a s+phA ba ya ta/_lung _a si s+phA ba ta/_liT _s+phA ba yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _s+phA 
[\[372b.2\]]pa yi tA/_smon ling _s+phA byA ta/_l+riT _s+phA ba yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a s+phA ba yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/shad+l-i 'jigs pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/_sha de ra ga tau taH/_sha di'i 'gro ba ma yin pa la ta'o/_/shA di'i mtha'i da yig ni ba lang lta bu 'gro ba ma yin pa brjod pa'i don la Ni tsa pha rol la ta yig tu bsgyur par bya ste/
[\[372b.3\]]shA ti zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_liT _shA ta ya ti/_ling _shA ta ye ta/_loT _shA ta ya tu/_lang _a shA ta ya ta/_lung _a shI sha ta ta/_liT _shA ta yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _shA ta yi tA/_smon ling _shA t+yA ta/_l+riT _shA ta yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a shA ta yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs dang /_'gro ba yin na da tar mi 'gyur bas/
[\[372b.4\]]laT _a shA da ya ti/_lung _a shI da sha ta/_sogs so/_/tshig grogs dang sbyar pa'i dper brjod ni/_pha lA ni shA ta ya ti/_gAHshA da ya ti go pA la kaH/_!_/ru ha skye ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/_ru haH_po\u0f85n+ya ta ra s+yAM/_ru ha'i ba yang na'o/_/ru ha zhes pa'i mtha'i ha yig ni Ni tsa pha rol la pa yig tu yang na 
[\[372b.5\]]ba sar te/_ro bi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _ro pa ya ti/_ling _ro ba ye ta/_loT _ro/_'bras bu rnams 'khebs par byed/_ba lang rnams 'ded par byed phyugs rdzi/_pa ya tu/_lang _a ro pa ya ta/_lung _a rU ru pa ta/_liT _ro pa yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _ro pa yi tA/_smon ling _ro byA ta/_l+r-iT _ro pa yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a ro pa yi 
[\[372b.6\]]Sh+ya ta/_sogs sam/_yang na bar ma bsgyur pas/_laT _ro ha ya ti/_lung _a rU ru ha ta/_sogs so/_!_/krI rdzas brdze pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/_krIng dzI nAM Nau/_krI ing dzi rnams kyi Ni la'o/_/krI nya rdzas brje ba/_ing klog pa/_dzi rgyal ba rnams kyi mtha' Ni tsa pha rol la A ta du bsgyur te/_a rti hrI sogs 
[\[372b.7\]]kyis bu ga byin pas/_kA pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _krA pa ya ti/_ling _krA pa ye ta/_loT _krA pa ya tu/_lang _a krA pa ya ta/_lung _a tsi krA pa ta/_liT _krA ba yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _krA pa yi tA/_smon ling _krA pyA ta/_l+r-iT _krA pa yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a krA pa yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/a d+hi sngon ma'i ing klog pa la 
[\[373a\]]
[\[373a.1\]]Ni tsa/_krI ing sogs kyis mtha' a+wa ta/_arti hrI sogs kyis pu ka A ga ma/_i ka gi a tsa la ya Nar bsgyur pas/_a d+h+yA bi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _a d+h+yA pa ye ta/_loT _a d+h+yA pa ya tu/_lang _a d+h+yA pa ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/_Nau tsa saM sh+tsa ngoH/
[\[373a.2\]]Ni la'ang sa na car dag la'o/_/Ni tsa dang bcas pa'i san dang tsang dag pha rol la'ang ing gi gAng du yang na bsgyur te/_gAng du bsgyur pa'i phyogs la/_a d+h+yA dzI ga pa ta/_sogs dang /_ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_a d+hi sngon ma'i A pi la tsang /_A i ru log_/de gnyis brjod a tsa dang po sogs kyis aT/
[\[373a.3\]]AT las kyang ngos 'phel ba/_e tsa'i a ya sogs kyis ai A ya/_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/_a d+h+yA yi pa ta/_sogs so/_/liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/_liT _a d+h+yA pa yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _a d+h+yA payi tA/_smon pa'i ling _a d+h+yA pyA ta/_l+r-iT _a d+h+yA ba yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _ad+h+yA pa yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/
[\[373a.4\]]dzi rgyal ba la'o zhes ba la Ni tsa/_krI ing dzi sogs kyi mtha' A ta a rti hI sogs kyis bu ka mtha' A gam byin pas/_dzA pa zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _dzA pa ya ti/_ling _dzA pa ye ta/_loT _dzA pa ye tu/_lang _a dzA pa ya ta/_lung _a dzI dza pa ta/_leT _dzA pa yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _dzA ba yi tA/_smon ling _dzA 
[\[373a.5\]]pyA ta/_l+r-iT _dzA pa yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a dzA pa yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/Shi d+ha yang dag par mnyes pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/_sid+h+ya te ra bA ra lau ki ke_/sid+h+ya ti'i 'jig rten pha rol nyid ma yin pa la'o/_/sid+h+ya ti'i i yig 'jig rten pha rol gyi don nyid ma yin pa la Ni pha rol la A ta du bsgyur bar bya ste/_sA d+hi 
[\[373a.6\]]zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _sA d+ha ya ti/_ling _sA d+ha ye ta/_loT _sA d+ha ya tu/_lang _a sA d+ha ya ta/_lung _a sA sa d+ha ta/_laT _sA d+ha yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _sA d+ha yi tA/_smon pa'i ling _sA d+h+yA ta/_l+r-iT _sA d+ha yi Sh+ya ti/_l+ring _a sA d+ha ya Sh+ya ta/_sogs sam/_laT _yang na se d+ha ya ti/_lung _a sI si d+ha ta/
[\[373a.7\]]sogs so/_/de dag tshig grogs dang bcas pa'i dper brjod ni/_rA dza sA d+ha ya ti/_rgyal po mnyes bar 'dod/_ku ruHsed+ha ya ti/_bla ma mnyes par 'dod/_!_tsi nya sogs pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/_tsi s+phu ra r+No/_tsi spur dag gi Ni la'o/_tsi nya dang spu ra dag gi Ni tsa pha rol la A ta du yang na bsgyur te/_A ta du bsgyur pa'i 
[\[373b\]]
[\[373b.1\]]phyogs la/_arti hrI sogs kyis pu ka A ga ma byin pas/_tsA pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _tsA pa ya ti/_ling _tsA pA ye ta/_loT _tsA pa ya tu/_lang _a tsA pa ya ta/_lung _a tsI tsa pa ta/_liT_tsA pa yAM tsa kA ra/_luT_tsA pa yi tA/_smon ling _tsA pyA ta/_l+r-iT _tsA ba yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a tsA pa yi Sh+ya ta/
[\[373b.2\]]sogs sam/_yang na a tsa'i ny+ni ta la'os 'phel ba byas pas/_laT _tsA ya ya ti/_lung _a tsI tsa ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/spu ra 'phro ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/_tsi spur dag gi Ni la 'os/_A ta du bsgyur pa dang mi bsgyur pa yang na par byas bsaA ta du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_spA ri zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _spA 
[\[373b.3\]]ra ya ti/_ling _spAr ye ta/_loT _spAr ya tu/_lang _a spA ra ya ta/_lung _a pu spA ra ta/_liT _spAr yI tsa kA ra/_luT _spAr yi tA/_smon ling _spAr r+YA ta/_l+r-iT _spAr yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a spAr yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs sam/_A ta ngu ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_laT _spor ya ti/_lung _a pu spur ta/_sogs so/_!_/be nya thags kyi rgyu 
[\[373b.4\]]la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/_pra dza ni pI ya teH/_bI ya ti'i rab tu skye ba la'o/_/bI ya ti'i rab tu skye ba'i don la 'jug pa na Ni tsa pha rol la A ta du bsgyur te/_pu ka byin bas/_bA pe zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _bA pa ya ti/_ling _bA ba ye ta/_loT _bA pa ya tu/_lung _a bA ba ya ta/_lung _a bI ba pa ta/_loT_bA pa 
[\[373b.5\]]yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _pA pa yi tA/_smon long _bA byA ta/_l-iT/_bA pa yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs sam/_yang na shi ta ma yin pa nye ba'i yul la e tsa'i A ta 'os e tsa A ta/_shA tshA sogs kyis yu ka A ga ma byin/_bA yi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar pas/_laT _bA la ya ti/_lung _a bI ba ya ta/_sogs 
[\[373b.6\]]so/_!_/ShU nya ba stod pa la'o zhes ba la Ni tsa sbyar/_a tsa'i ny+Ni ta la 'os 'phel ba byas/_stA bi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar pas/_laT _stA ba ya ti/_ling _stA ba ya ta/_loT _stA ba ya tu/_lang _a stA ba ya ta/_lung _a Shu Sh+Ta ba ta/_liT _stA ba yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _stA pa ye ta/_smon ling _stA byA ta/_l+r-iT _stA ba yi Sh+ya ti/
[\[373b.7\]]l+ring _a stA pa yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/b+hU yod pa la'o zhes ba la Ni tsa/_'phel ba byas pas/_b+hA pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_b+hA ba la ti/_ling _b+hA ba ye ta/_loT _b+hA ba ya tu/_lang _a b+hA ba ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/_oHbu ya Na dz+ya ba re/_u'i pu ya Na dzi a pha rol la'o/_/san pha byings 
[\[374a\]]
[\[374a.1\]]gnyis brjod pa'i a b+ha sa'i a yig ni pu ste pa sde dang yan so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams dang dza yig dang a yig dang a yig rnams gang rung zhig pha rol yod na i yig tu bsgyur te/_skabs 'dir a ka ma phyis ba la yang ba la tsang pha rol la san bzhin nos/_san dang 'dra ba'i bya ba 
[\[374a.2\]]'jug pas/_u ir bsgyur/_yang ba'i ring po 'os de ring por bsgyur/_Ni phyis pas/_a bI b+ha bta/_sogs dang /_la yig lhag ma rnams la/_liT _b+hA ba yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _b+hA ba yi tA/_smon pa'i ling _b+hA byA ta/_l+r-iT _b+hA ba yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a b+hA ba yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/yu sre ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/
[\[374a.3\]]'phel pa byas/_yA bi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _yA ba ya ti/_ling _yA ba ye ta/_loT _yA ba ya tu/_lang _a yA ba ya ta/_lung la/_a ka ma phyis pa sogs kyis sa na bzhin gyi bya ba 'jug bas/_u i dang de ring por bsgyur bas/_a yI ya ba ta/_sogs dang /_liT sogs lhag ma 
[\[374a.4\]]rnams la/_liT _yA pa yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _yA ba yi tA/_smon pa'i ling _yA byA ta/_l+riT _yA ba yi Sh+ya ta/_l+r-ing _a yA ba yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_!_dzi 'go ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar bas/_dzA bi zhes grub ba la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _dzA ba ya ti/_ling _dzA ba ye ta/_loT _dzA ba ya tu/_lang _a 
[\[374a.5\]]ba ya ta/_lung _a dzI dza ba ta/_liT _dzA ba yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _dzA ba yi ta/_smon ling _dzA byA ta/_l+r-iT _dzA ba yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a dzA ba yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/sru 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar 'phel ba byas pas/_swA pi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _spA ba ya ti/_ling _srA ba ye ta/_loT _srA ba ya 
[\[374a.6\]]tu/_lung _a sra ba ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/_sra ba ti shr-i No ti dra ba ti bra ba ti bla ba tI nAM bA/_sra ba ti shr-i No ti dra ba ti bra ba ti bla ba ti bya ba ti rnams kyi yang na'o/_/sru 'gro ba/_shru nya na pa/_dru 'gro ba sru dang blung dang byung rnams 'gro ba rnams kyi san dang Ni dang bcas pa'i tsang pha rol la a 
[\[374a.7\]]b+h+yAs ir yang na bsgyur te/_a si sra ba ta/_sogs so/_a su sra ba ta/_sogs so/_/la yig lhag ma rnams la/_liT _srA ba yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _srA ba yi tA/_smon ling _srA byA ta/_l+r-iT _srA ba yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a srA ba yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/de bzhin du/_shru thos pa la Ni tsa sbyar bas/_shrA 
[\[374b\]]
[\[374b.1\]]pi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _shA ba ya ti/_ling _shrA ba ye ta/_loT_shA pa ya tu/_sogs dang /_lung la/_ir yang na bsgyur pas/_a shi shra ba ta/_sogs sam/_a shu shra ba ta/_sogs sam/_a shu shra ba ta/_sogs so/_/liT _sogs lhag ma rnams la/_liT _shrA ba yAM tsa kA ra/_luT shrA ba 
[\[374b.2\]]yi tA/_smon ling _shrA byA ta/_l+r-iT _shA ba yi Sh+ya ti/_l+ring _a shA pa ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/dru 'gro ba la Ni tsa sbyar bas/_drA bi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_l+r-iT _drA ba ya te/_ling _drA ba ye ta/_loT _drA ba ya tu/_l-ing _a drA ba ya ta/_lung la/_i ra yang na bsgyur bas/_a di dra ba ta/_sogs sam/
[\[374b.3\]]a du dra ba ta/_sogs so/_/liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/_liT _drA ba yAM tsa kA ra/_luT_drA ba yi tA/_smon ling _drA ba ta/_l+r-iT _drA ba yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a drA ba yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/bru 'gro ba la Ni tsa sbyar/_prA bi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar pas/_laT _pA ba ya ti/_ling _prA ba yi ta/_loT _prA ba ya tu/
[\[374b.4\]]lang _a pA ba ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/_ir yang na bsgyur bas/_a pi pra ba ta/_sogs sam/_a pu pra ba ta/_sogs so/_/liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/_liT _brA ba yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _bru ba yi tA/_smon ling _brA byA ta/_smon ling _brA byA ta/_l+r-iT _prA ba yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a brA ba yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/p+lu 'gro ba la Ni tsa 
[\[374b.5\]]sbyar 'phel ba byas pas/_p+lA bi zhes pa la sogs sbyar pas/_laT _p+lA ba ya ti/_ling _p+lA ba ye ta/_loT _p+lA ba ya tu/_lang _a p+lA ba ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/_ir yang na bsgyur bas/_a pi p+la ba ta/_sogs sam/_a pu bla ba ta/_sogs so/_/liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/_liT _prA ba yAM 
[\[374b.6\]]tsa kA ra/_luT _p+lA ba yi tA/_smon ling _blA byA ta/_l+r-iT _p+lA ba yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a p+lU ba yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/byung 'gro ba la'o zhes ba la Ni tsa sbyar 'phel ba byas pas/_byA bi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _byA ba ya ti/_ling _byA ba ye ta/_laT _byA ba ya tu/_lang _a byA ba ya ta/_lung la/_sir yang 
[\[374b.7\]]na bar byas pas/_a bi bya ba ta/_sogs sam/_a bu bya ba ta/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT sogs lhag ma rnams la/_liT _bya ba yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _byA ba yi ta/_smon ling _byA byA ta/_l+riT _byA ba yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a byA ba yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/gu hU kun nas sgrib pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/_go ha'i u 
[\[375a\]]
[\[375a.1\]]pa d+hA'i U ta 'os ring po bsgyur bas/_gU ti zhes grub pa la laT la sogs pa rnams sbyar bas/_laT _gU ha ya ti/_ling _gU ha ye ta/_loT _gU ha ya tu/_lang _a gU ha ya ta/_lung _a dzU gu ha ta/_liT _gU ha yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _gU ha yi tA/_smon pa'i ling _gU h+yA ta/_l+r-iT _gU ha yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing 
[\[375a.2\]]gU ha yi_/sogs so/_!_/du Sha nyon mongs ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/_do Sho Nau/_do Sha'i Ni la'o/_/du Sha'i u pad+hA'i u ni Ni pha rol la U ru 'gyur te/_dU Shi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _dU Sha yi ti/_ling _dU Sha ye ta/_loT _dU Sha ya tu/_lang _a dU Sha ya ta/_lung _a du dU Sha ta/
[\[375a.3\]]liT _dU Sha yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _dU Sha yi tA/_smon ling _dU Sh+yA ta/_l+r-iT _dU Sha yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a dU Sha yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs dang /_bA tsi t+ta bi rA be/_/sems nyon mongs pa la yang na'o/_/du Sha'i u pad+hA'i u yig ni sems nyon mongs pa la 'jug pa na Ni pha rol la U ra yang na 'gyur te/_U ra bsgyur ba'i cho ga 
[\[375a.4\]]bstan zin la/_ma bsgyur pa'i phyogs la pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_laT _do Sha ya ti/_lung _a dU du Sha ta/_sogs so/_!_/d+haT byed pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/_mi tAM hra swaH/_ma 'gro ba rnams kyi thung ngu'o/_/g+ha Ta la sogs pa ma 'gro ba'i ming can rnams kyi u pad+hA Ni tsa 
[\[375a.5\]]pha rol la thung ngur bsgyur te/_laT _g+ha Ta ya ti/_ling _g+ha Ta ye ta/_loT _g+ha Ta ya tu/_lang _a g+ha Ta ya ta/_lung _a dzI g+ha Ta ta/_liT _g+ha Ta yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _g+ha Ta yi tA/_smon ling _g+ha n+yA ta/_l+r-iT _g+ha Ta yi Sh+ya ti/_l+ring _a g+ha Ta yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/de bzhin du/_bya tha sdug bsngal dang 'jigs pas g.yo ba 
[\[375a.6\]]dga' 'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar u pad+hA'i 'os 'phel ba byas pa slar thung ngur bsgyur bas/_bya thi la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _bya tha ya ti/_ling _bya tha ya ta/_loT _bya tha ya tu/_lang _a bya tha ya ta/_lung _a bI bya tha ta/_liT _bya tha yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _bya tha li tA/_smon ling _bya th+ya ta/_l+r-iT _bya tha yi Sh+ya ti/
[\[375a.7\]]l+ring _a bya tha yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/dza nI skye ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/_dza nI dzrI Shu k+na sa rany+dzo ma m+tA sh+tsa/_dza nI_dzr-I Shu_k+nas _rany+dza'i 'ang ma mtha' 'o/_/dza ni skye ba/_dzr-I Sh+ya lang tsho nyams pa/_k+nas sgra/_rany+dza tshos rnams kyi 'ang Ni tsa pha rol la ma mtha' can du ming 'dogs byed de/_dgos pa ni ma 
[\[375b\]]
[\[375b.1\]]'gro ba rnams kyi thung ngu 'os u pa drA thung ngur bsgyur ba'i don te/_laT _dza na ya ti/_ling _dza na ye ta/_loT _dza na ya tu/_lang _a dza na ya ta/_lung _a dzI dza na te/_liT _dza na yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _dza na yi tA/_smon pa'i ling _dza n+yA ta/_l+r-iT _dza na yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a dza ni Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/dzri Sha lang tsho nyams pa la Ni tsa/_a tsa'i 
[\[375b.2\]]ny+ni ta la 'os 'phel ba/_dza nI _dzrI Sha_k+na sa _rany+dza'i 'ang ma mtha' 'os thung ngur bsgyur/_dza ri zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _dza ra ya ti/_ling _dza ra ye ta/_loT _dza ra ya tu/_lang /_a dza ra ya ta/_lung _a dzI dza ra ta/_liT _dza ra yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _dza ra yi tA/_smon long _dza rlA ta/_l+r-iT _dza ra yi Sh+ya te/_l+r-ing _a dza ra yi 
[\[375b.3\]]Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/k+na sa sgra la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/_k+na si zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/_k+na si zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _k+na sa ya ti/_ling _k+na sa ye ta/_loT _k+na sa ya tu/_lang _a k+na sa ya ta/_lung _a tsI k+nas ta/_liT _k+nas yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _k+na nas yi tA/_smon ling _k+na s+yA ta/_l+r-iT _k+na sa yi 
[\[375b.4\]]Sh+ya te/_l+r-ing _ak+nas yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/rany+dza chis la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/_rany+dzi la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT_rany+dza ya ti/_ling _rany+dza ye ta/_loT_ra ny+dza ya tu/_lang _a rany+dza ya ta/_lung _a rI ra ny+dza ta/_liT _rany+dza yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _rany+dza yi tA/_smon ling _rany+dz+yA ta/_l+r-iT _rany+dza yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a rany+dza yi Sh+ya ta/
[\[375b.5\]]sogs so/_/'grel par lung drangs ba/_rany+dze r+Nau mr-i ga ras Ne na lo paH/_rany+dza'i Ni la [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi mdog lan dbyi'o/_/rany+dza'i Ni tsa pha rol la [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi mdog la 'jug ban na dbyi ste/_laT _ra dza ya ti/_lung _ba rI ra dza ta/_sogs so/_!_/dz+nya khong du chud pa la Ni tsa sbyar/_laT _dz+nyA pa ya ti/_lung _a dzI dz+nyA 
[\[375b.6\]]ba ta/_sogs dang /_mAr Na to Sha Na ni shA ma ne Shu dz+nya/_'chi ba dang dga' ba dang rno par byed pa rnams la dz+nya'o/_/'chi ba la sogs pa don 'di rnams la 'jug pa na dz+nyA ma 'gro ba'i ming can te/_dgos pa ni thung ngur bsgyur ba'i don te/_dz+nya la Ni tsa a rti hrI sogs kyis pu ka A ga ma byin/_mdo 'dis su 
[\[375b.7\]]pa d+hA thung ngur 'gyur bas/_dz+ha bi zhes grub ba la laT sogs sbyar/_laT _dz+ha pa ya ti/_ling _dz+nyi pa ye ta/_loT _dz+nya pa ya tu/_lung _a dz+nya pa ya ta/_lung _a dzI dz+nya ba ta/_liT _dz+nya pa yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _dz+nya pa yi tA/_smon pa'i ling _dz+nya pyA ta/_l+r-iT _dz+nya pa yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a dz+nya pa yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/don de rnams 'jug pa'i tshig grogs 
[\[376a\]]
[\[376a.1\]]dang sbyar ba'i dper brjod ni/_saM dz+nya pa ya ti shA trun/_bidz+nya pa ya ti rA dzA naM/_dz+nya pa ya ti sha s+t+raM lta bu'o/_!_/dz+wa la 'bar ba la Ni tsa sbyar/_dz+wa la hwa la h+ma ra na mo \u0f85 nu ba sargA ta pA glA spA pa T+wa ma sh+tsa/_nyer bsgyur med pa las/_dz+wa la/_hwa la _hA la na ma dang glA_/snA pa na ba ma'i 'ang ngo /_/nyer bsgyur 
[\[376a.2\]]sngon du med pa la/_dz+wa la 'bar ba/_hwa la dang h+ma la g.yo ba/_Na ma sgra_de zla bo rnams kun du 'chi bar 'dod/[ {]mye [,]me [}]la po rnams dges par 'dod/_mtshon cha rab du rno bar byed par 'dod/_rnams dang /_glA lus rnam par nyams pa/_snAgatsang ba/_ba na slong ba/_Tu bam skyug pa rnams kyang ma 'gro ba'i ming can te/_dgos pa ni thung ngur bsgyur ba'i don 
[\[376a.3\]]te/_laT _dz+wa la ya ti/_ling _dzA la ye ta/_loT _dz+wa la ya tu/_lang _a dz+wa la ya ta/_lung _a dzI dz+wa ya ta/_liT _dz+wa la yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _dz+wa la yi tA/_smon pa'i ling _dz+wa l+yA ta/_l+r-iT _dz+wa la ya Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a dz+wa la yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/de bzhin du/_hwa la g.yo ba la Ni tsa sbyar/_thung ngur bsgyur/_hwa li zhes pa la laT sogs 
[\[376a.4\]]sbyar bas/_laT hwa la ya ti/_phud _a dzI hwa la ta/_sogs so/_/h+ma la g.yo ba la Ni tsa sbyar thung ngur bsgyur/_h+ma'i zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _h+ma la ya ti/_lung _a dzI h+ma la ta/_sogs so/_/Na ma sgra la Ni tsa thung ngur bsgyur/_laT _na ma ya ti/_lung _a nI na ma ta/_sogs so/_!_/glA lus rnam par 
[\[376a.5\]]nyams pa la/_Ni tsa sbyar/_pu ka A ga ma byin thung ngur bsgyur bas/_laT _glA ba ya ti/_lung _a dzI gla ba ta/_sogs so/_!_/Sh+NA gtsang ba la 'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/_arti hrI sogs kyis pu ka A ga ma thung ngur bsgyur/_sna bi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _snapa ya ti/_lung _a sI Sh+Na pa ta/_sogs so/_!_/ba na slong 
[\[376a.6\]]ba la Ni tsa thung ngur bsgyur/_ba ni zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _ba na ya te/_lung _a bI ba na ta/_sogs so/_!_/thu ba ma skyug ba la Ni tsa thung ngur bsgyur pas/_ba mi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyang bas/_laT _ba ma ya ti/_lung _a bI ba ma ta/_sogs so/_/nyer bsgyur yod na thung ngur mi bsgyur te _laT _pA dz+wA 
[\[376a.7\]]la ya ti/_lung _brA dzI dz+wa la ta/_sogs so/_!_/ka mu mdzes pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/_na ka mya mi tsa maH/_ka ma am tsam gyi ma yin no/_/ka mu mdzes pa/_a mi nad/_tsa ma za ba rnams mtha' can ma yin te/_dgos pa ni thung ngur mi bsgyur ba'i don te/_u pad+hA'i 'os 'phel ba byas/_kA mi zhes pa la 
[\[376b\]]
[\[376b.1\]]mdo 'dis thung ngur mi bsgyur laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _kA ma ya ti/_lang _kA ma ye ta/_loT _kA ma ya tu/_lang _a kA ma ya ta/_lung _a tsI ka ma ta/_liT _kA ma yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _kA ma li tA/_smon ling _kA mya ta/_l+r-iT _kA ma yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a kA ma yi s+ya ti/_sogs so/_!_/a mi na da la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa 
[\[376b.2\]]'phel ba byas/_A mi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _A ma ya ti/_ling _A ma ye ta/_loT _A ma ya tu/_lang _A ma ya ta/_lung la/_ma Ni dang bcas ba gnyis brjod pas/_A mi ma ta/_sogs dang /_liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/_liT _A ma yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _A ma yi tA/_smon ling _A myA ta/
[\[376b.3\]]l+r-iT _A ma yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _A ma yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/tsa ma za ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa 'phel ba byas/_tsA mi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _tsA ma ya ti/_ling _tsA ma ye ta/_loT _tsA ma ya tu/_lang _a tsA ma yA ta/_lung _a tsI tsa ma ta/_liT_tsA ma yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _tsA ma yi tA/_smon ling _tsA myA ta/_l+r-iT _tsA ma 
[\[376b.4\]]yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a tsA ma yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs/_!_/sha mu nye bar zhi ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa 'phel ba byas bas/_laT _shA ma ya ti/_ling _a shI sha ma ta/_sogs so/_/sha mo \u0f85 da rnya ne mi ta/_sha mu'i mi mthong ba lam 'gro ba'o/_/sha mu mi mthong ba'i don la 'jug ba nam 'gro ba'i ming can te dgos pa ni thung 
[\[376b.5\]]ngur bsgyur ba'i don te/_mdo 'dis thung ngur bsgyur/_sha mi zhes grub ba la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _sha ma ya ti/_ling _sha ma ye ta/_loT _sha ma ya tu/_lang _a sha ma ya tu/_lung _a shI sha ma ta/_liT _sha ma yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _sha ma yi tA/_smon ling _sha myA ta/_l+y-iT _sha ma yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a sha ma yi Sh+ya ta/
[\[376b.6\]]sogs so/_!_/ya mu nye bar ni ba la Ni tsa 'phel ba byas pas/_laT _yA ma ya ti/_ling _yA ma ye ta/_loT _yA ma ya tu/_lang _a yA ma ya ta/_lung _a yAM ya ma ta/_liT _yA ma yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _yA ma yi tA/_smon ling _yA myA ta/_l+r-iT _yA ma yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a yA ma yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs dang /_ya mo nya pa ri be Sha Ne/_ya 
[\[376b.7\]]mu'i yongs su 'jug pa ma yin ba la'o/_/ya mu'i yongs su 'jug pa ma yin ba 'am 'gro ba'i ming can du bya ste/_dgos pa ni thung ngur bsgyur ba'i don no/_/laT _ya ma ya ti/_lung _a yI ya ma ta/_/sogs so/_!_/s+kha dir rko ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyang /_u pa d+ha'i 'os 'phel ba byas/_s+khA bi zhes ba la laT 
[\[377a\]]
[\[377a.1\]]sogs sbyar bas/_laT _s+khA da ya ti/_ling _s+khA da ye ta/_loT _s+khA da ya tu/_lang _a s+kha da ya ta/_lung _a tsI s+kha da ta/_liT _s+khA da yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _s+khA da yi tA/_smon ling _s+khA d+yA ta/_l+r-iT _s+khA da yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a s+khA da ya Sh+ya ta/_sogs dang /_s+khA dir ba ba ri b+h+yAM tsa/_s+kha di'i a ba dang ba ri dag las kyang 
[\[377a.2\]]ngo /_/a ba dang pa ri dag las pha rol gyi s+kha di'i 'ang 'gro ba'i ming can te/_thung ngur bsgyur bas/_a ba s+kha da ya ti/_ba ri s+kha da ya ti/_'grel par lung drangs pa/_so pha sarga s+kha deHpha Ni sh+tsa mi t+ko tsa dwA/_nyer bsgyur dang bcas pa'i s+kha di dang pha Na dag gi ma 'gro ba 'ga' zhig tu yang na'o/_nyer bsgyur gang 
[\[377a.3\]]ring zhig sngon na yod pa'i s+kha di ra dang pha Na gnyis ni skabs 'ga' zhig tu ma 'gro ba'i ming can du yang na bar bya ste/_pra s+kha da ya ti/_pra s+khA da ya ti/_sogs so/_!_/pha Na s+kha la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa 'phel ba byas/_phA Ni zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _phA Na ya ti/_ling_phA Na ye ta_/
[\[377a.4\]]loT _phA Na ya tu/_lang _a phA Na ya ta/_lung a bI pha Na ta/_liT _phA Na yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _phA Na yi tA/_smon ling _phA N+ya ta/_l+r-iT _phA Na yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a phA Na yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs dang /_nyer bsgyur sngon du byung na nyer bsgyur dang bcas pa'i s+kha di dang pha Na dag sogs kyi lung 'dren gyi mi ta du yang na bar 
[\[377a.5\]]byas pas/_pra pha Na ya ti/_sogs sam/_pra pha Na ya ti/_sogs so/_!_/i Na 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/_Nau gi mir bod+ha ne/_khong du chud pa ma yin pa la Ni la ga mi'o/_/khong du chud pa'i don ma yin pa la Ni tsa pha rol la i Na ni ga mi zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/_i brjod don yin pas 
[\[377a.6\]]phyis ma Ni tsa'i i la drangs pas/_ga mi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _ga ma ya ti/_ling ga ma ye ta/_loT _ga ma ya tu/_lang _a ga ma ya ta/_lung _a dzI ga ma ta/_liT _ga ma yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _ga ma yi tA/_smon ling _ga myA ta/_l+r-iT _ga ma yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a ga ma yi Sh+ya ta/_khong du chud pa'i 
[\[377a.7\]]don la 'jug pa nag ru mi 'gyur te/_a tsa'i ny+Ni ta la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/_a yi zhes khru ba pa la laT sogs sbyar/_A ya ya ti/_sogs dang /_lung la/_A yi/_tsang byings gnyis brjod/_a tsa dang po sogs kyis A Ta/_A Ta las kyang ngos 'phel ba/_e tsa'i a ya sogs kyis A ya 
[\[377b\]]
[\[377b.1\]]Ni la tsang la sogs kyis u ba d+hA thung ngur bsgyur Ni'i iT mid pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/_A ya ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/han 'tshe ba la Ni tsa sbyar/_ha na sto \u0f85 tsi N+Na loH/_tsi Na dang cal dag ma yin pa la han gyi ta'o/_/tsi Na dang Na la ma yin pa'i nya Na 'gro ba'i rkyen pha rol la han gyi mtha' ta yig tu 'gyur 
[\[377b.2\]]te/_ha n+ti'i ha'i nya na 'gro ba'ang ngos/_ha g+ha mdo 'dis na ta 'phel ba byas/_g+hA ti zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _g+hA ta ya ta/_ling _g+hA ta ye ta/_loT _g+hA ta ya tu/_lang _a g+hA taya ta/_lung a dzI g+ha ta ta/_liT _g+hA ta yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _g+hA ta yi tA/_smon long _g+hA t+yA ta/_l+r-iT _g+hA ta yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a g+hA 
[\[377b.3\]]ta yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/I r+Sh+ya phrag dog gi don la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/_I r+Sh+yi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_lang _I r+Sh+ya ya ti/_ling _I r+Sh+ya ye ta/_loT _i r+Sh+yA ya tu/_lang _ai r+Sh+ya ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/_I r+Sh+yi la/_tsang Sha Ni dang bcas ba gnyis brjod/_a tsa dang po sogs kyis A ta 
[\[377b.4\]]'phel ba byas/_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni Ni phyis pas/_ai r+Shi Sh+yata/_sogs sam/_yang na/_I r+Sh+ya te/_s+t+raM tI ya s+ya dwe/_I r+Sh+ya ti'i gsum pa'i gnyis so/_/I r+Sh+ya ti'i Ni dang bcas pa'i tsang pha rol la ha la brtsegs pa'i gsum pa de nyid yang na gnyis brjod de/_brtsegs pa'i gsum pa ya nyid 
[\[377b.5\]]gnyis brjod pas/_ai r+Sh+yi ya ta/_sogs so/_/la yig lhag ma rnams la/_liT _I r+Sh+ya yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _i r+Sh+ya yi tA/_smon ling _I r+Sh+ya ta/_l+r-iT _I r+Sh+ya yi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _air+Sh+ya yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/ai ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU hrA ta Ni dza n+DAHsamA b+hAH/_zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las Ni tsa mtha' can rnams 
[\[377b.6\]]rdzogs so//_//de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs_ha la las yas rnams kyi yam lang d+y-i 'os ya gong ma phyis/_zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu'i dran pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las Ni tsa'i mtha' can rnams kyi cho ga rags pa rnams 
[\[377b.7\]]re zhig rdzogs so//_!_//gnyis pa byings byings su bsgrub pa'i rkyen san gyi 'jug yul rnams bshad par bya ste/_d+hA toHkarma NaHsa mA na ka r+t+r-i kA di ts+tshA yAM bA/_byings las las dang 'dod pa byed pa po mnyam pa las yang na'o/_/byings las pha rol tu bya ba'i las dang 'dod pa'i don byed pa po mnyam 
[\[378a\]]
[\[378a.1\]]ba ste/_byed pa po dang bcas pa rtogs par byed pa'i don las na yang na 'gyur te/_a da za ba/_sun sbyar/_lung san dag la g+ha sl-i 'os g+ha sl-ir bsgyur l-i phyis/_san yang dag la 'os byings gnyis brjod/_ku ha dag gi tsu 'os/_g+ha dz+ha ab+h+ya sa'i tsa ra 'ang 'os/_dz+ha dza/_san la i ta 
[\[378a.2\]]'os/_ir bsgyur/_khar la tsa ra 'os sra ta ru bsgyur bas/_dzi g+ha t+sa zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar/_byed pa po la sha ba/_rjes 'brel phyis nas/_a ta la yon tan la 'os gnyis dag gi gcig pha rol gyi gzugs su bsgyur ba sogs byas bas/_laT _dzi g+ha t+sa ti/_ling _dzi g+ha t+se ta/_loT _dzi g+ha t+sa tu/
[\[378a.3\]]lang _a dzi g+ha t+sa ta/_sogs dang /_lung la/_iT byin/_a ta kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/_a dzi g+hat+si ta/_a dzi g+ha t+si Sh+TAM/_a dzi g+ha t+si ShuH/_sogs so/_/liT la kA sa sogs kyis A ma sbyar/_a ta kyi dbyi 'os a phyis bas/_dzi g+ha t+sAM tsa kA ra/_dzi g+ha t+sAM ba b+sU _rba bar 'dod/_ba/_dzi g+ha t+sA mA sa/_sogs so/_/luT 
[\[378a.4\]]la iT byin a phyis bas/_dzi g+ha t+si tA/_dzi g+ha t+si tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_dzi g+ha t+s+ya ta/_dzi g+hat+s+ya staM/_dzi g+ha t+s+ya suH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la/_iT byin a phyis pas/_dzi g+ha t+si Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+ring la/_a dzi g+ha t+si Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/dI da zad pa la'o zhes pa las na sbyar gnyis 
[\[378a.5\]]brjod thung ngur bsgyur pas/_di dI Sha zhes pa la laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/_laT _di da She te/_ling _di dI She ta/_loT _dri dI Sha tAM/_lang _a di dI Sha te/_lung _a di dI Shi Sh+Ta_/liT _di dI ShI tsa kre/_luT _di di ShI tA/_smon ling _di dI Shi ShI Sh+Ta/_l+r-iT _di dI Shi Sh+ya te/_l+r-ing _a di dI Sha Sh+ya ta/_sogs dang /_'grel bar lung 
[\[378a.6\]]drangs pa/_dIngaHsa n+yA t+saM ke tsi dwa/[ {]ding [,]deng [}]gi san la A nyid 'ga' zhig tu yang na'o/_/dIng gis rna pha rol la a nyid du bsgyur ba skabs 'gar yang na bar bya ste/_A ta du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_a b+h+yA sa thung ngur bsgyur/_san la i ta 'os i ta du bsgyur bas/_ri dAs zhes pa la laT sogs 
[\[378a.7\]]sbyar bas/_laT _di dIs te/_ling _di dA se ta/_loT _di dI sa tI/_lang _a di dA sa ta/_lung _a di dA siSh+Ta/_liT_di dA sAM tsa kre/_luT _di dA si tA/_smon ling _di dA si ShI Sh+Ta/_l+r-iT _di dA si Sh+ya te/_ling _a di dA si Sh+ya ta/_l-ing _a di dA siSh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/d+yu ta 'bar la'o zhes pa las na sbyar/_san yang dag la 'os gnyis 
[\[378b\]]
[\[378b.1\]]brjod/_d+yu ta dang swa po dag gi saM pra sA ra Na 'os/_a b+h+yas saM pra sAr Nar bsgyur/_bal dang po'i iT byin bas/_di d+yu ta i san zhes pa la/_ra lo byu pa d+hA r+d+ha lA de saM sh+tsa/_u i u pa d+hA ha la dang po dang ra la las san 'ang ngo /_/byings ha la dang po can i yig dang u yig gang rung zhig u pa ng+hA na yod pa 
[\[378b.2\]]dang byings ra yig dang la yig mtha' can las pha rol gyi san iT dang bcas pa'ang ka 'gro ba'i ming can du yang na bya ste/_kita kyi phyogs la yon tan mi byed/_ki ta ma yin pa'i phyogs la pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_di d+yA ti Sha 'am/_di d+yo ti Sha/_zhes pa grub pa la laT sogs tang 
[\[378b.3\]]rnams sbyar bas/_di d+yu ti Sha te/_laT _do d+yo ti Sha te/_di d+yu ti Sha ta/_ling _di d+yo ti She ta/_di d+yu ti Sha tAM/_loT _di d+yo ti Sha tAM/_a di d+yu ti Sha ta/_lang _a di d+yo ti Sha ta/_a di d+yu ti Shi Sh+Ta/_lung _a di d+yo ti Shi Sh+Ta/_di d+yu ti ShAM tsa kre/_liT _di d+yo te ShAM tsa kre/_di d+yu ti Shi tA/_luT _di d+yu ti Shi tA/_di d+yu ti ShI Shi Sh+Ta/_smon ling _di d+yo ti 
[\[378b.4\]]Shi ShI Sh+Ta/_di d+yu ti Shi Sh+ya te/_l+r-iT _do d+yo ti Shi Sh+ya te/_a di d+yu ti Shi Sh+ya ta/_l+ring _a di d+yo ti Shi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/u ts+tse chag pa la'o zhes pa las na sbyar/_'grel par u ts+tshi'i tsha iT dang bcas pa gnyis brjod ces byung bas/_tshig gnyis brjod/_a b+h+ya sa'i tsar 'ang ngos tsha tsar bsgyur bas/_u 
[\[378b.5\]]tsi ts+tsha Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _u tsi ts+tshi Sha ti/_ling _u tsi ts+tshi She ta/_loT _u tsits+tshi Sha tu/_lang _au tsa ts+tshi Sha ta/_lung _au tsi ts+tshi tI ta/_liT _u tsi ts+tshi ShAM tsa kA ra/_luT _u tsi ts+tshi Sh-i tA/_smon ling _u tsi ts+tshi Sh+ya ta/_l+r-iT _u tsi ts+tshi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing au tsi ts+tshi Shi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/ing glog pa la Ni dang san sbyar 
[\[378b.6\]]Ni la'ang san tsar dag la 'os yang na i gAng du bsgyur/_gnyis brjod/_gu ha dag gi tsu 'os/_gA dzA thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/_san la i ta 'os/_de i ta ngal dang po'i i ta byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan/_arti hI sogs kyis pug _A ga ma byin/_e tsa'i a ya/_ad+hi sngon du bzhag pas 
[\[378b.7\]]a d+hi dzi gA ba yi Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar/_laT _a d+h+ya dzi gA pa yi Sha ti/_ling _a d+hi dzi gA pa yi She ta/_loT _a d+hi dza gA pa yi Sha tu/_lang _a d+h+ya dzi gA pa yi Sha ta/_lung _a d+h+ya dzi gA pa yi ShI ta/_liT _a d+h+yA dzi gA pa yi ShI tsa kA ra/_luT _a dz+hi dzi gA pa yi Shi tA/_smon pa'i ling _a d+hi dzi gA pa yi Sh+yA ta/_liT _a d+hi 
[\[379a\]]
[\[379a.1\]]dzi gA pa yi Shi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a d+h+ya dzi sA ba yi Shi Sh+ya ta/_sogs dang /_gAng du ma bsgyur pa'i phyogs la/_krI ing dzi rnams kyi Ni la 'os/_A nga bsgyur/_a rti hrI sogs kyis pu ka A ga ma byin/_san yang dag la 'os pa Ni dang bcas pa gnyis brjod/_bal dang po'i iT byin/_byings 
[\[379a.2\]]thams cad ba sogs kyis yon tan e tsa'i pa ya sogs dang a d+hi sngon du bzhag pas/_ad+h+yA pi pa yi Sha/_zhes grub ba la laT sogs sbyar pas/_laT _a d+h+ya pi pa yi Sha ti/_lung _a d+h+yA pi pa yi ShI ta/_sogs so/_!_/Tu o shwi 'gro ba dang 'phel ba dag la'o zhes pa la Ni dang sa na/_Ni la'ang sa na 
[\[379a.3\]]tsang dag la 'os saM pra sA Na rayang na bsgyur te/_ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_laT _shi shwa ya yi Sha ti/_lung _a shi shwa la yi ShI ta/_sogs dang /_bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_laT _shu shA ba yi Sha ti/_lung _a shu sha ba yi ShI ta/_sogs dang /_yang Ni tsa med pa byings nyid la sa na sbyar na/_iT byin 
[\[379a.4\]]yon tan byas pas/_laT _shi shwa yi Sha ti/_lung _a shi shwa ya ShI ta/_sogs so/_!_/hwe nya 'gran pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa san sbyar/_shi ta ma yin pa nye ba'i yul sogs kyis e tsa A ta/_hwA'i saM pra sA ra Na 'os/_saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur/_gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_dzu sA ba yi Sha 
[\[379a.5\]]zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _dzu hA ba yi Sha ti/_ling _dzu hA ba yi She ta/_loT _dzu hA ba ya Sha tu/_lang _a dzu hA ba yi Sha ta/_lung _a dzu hA ba yi ShI ta/_liT _dzu hA ba yi ShAM tsa kA ra/_luT _dzu hA ba yi Shi tA/_smon ling _dzu hA ba yi Sh+yA ta/_l+r-iT _dzu hA ba yi Shi Sh+ya tu/_l+r-ing _a dzu hA ba yi Shi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so//
[\[379a.6\]]a ni srog la'o zhes pa las na/_bal dang po'i iT byin/_san yang dag la'os/_na iT dang bcas pa gnyis brjod bas/_a ni ni Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar/_laT _a ni ni Sha ti/_ling _a ni ni She ta/_loT _a ni ni Sha tu/_lang _A ni ni Sha ta/_lung _A ni ni ShI ta/_liT _a ni ni 
[\[379a.7\]]ShAM tsa kA ra/_luT _a ni ni Shi tA/_smon ling _a ni ni Sh+ya ta/_l+r-iT _a ni ni Shi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a ni ni Shi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/u b+hau sA b+h+yA sa s+ya/_sa la a b+h+ya sa'i gnyis dag gi'o/_/a ni ti'i san pha rol la nyer bsgyur na Na bsgyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can sngon du byung na a b+h+yA sa dang u pa d+hA'i na yig gnyis ka Na 
[\[379b\]]
[\[379b.1\]]yig tu bsgyur bar bya ste/_swA ni ni Sha ti/_sogs so/_!_/br-i tu 'jug pa la'o zhes pa las na sbyar/_ha la n+tA ts+tsa/_hal mtha' las kyang ngo /_byings mtha' ha la so sor bsdu ba yin pa u pang+hA na i ka so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yong pa de'i pha rol gyi san iT med pa ni ka 'gro ba'i ming can te/_'dir at+yA 
[\[379b.2\]]rnams la/_br-i ta rnams las bzhi rnams las sogs iT mi 'jug_/gnyis brjod/_r-i'i a ta/_de san la i ta 'os i ta du bsgyur/_mdo 'dis ki ta yin pas yon tan sogs mi byed/_bi bri t+sa zhes grub pa la laT sogs a tang rnams sbyar bas/_laT _bi br-it+sa ti/_ling _bi br-i t+si ta/_loT _bi 
[\[379b.3\]]br-it+sa tu/_lang _a bi br-it+si ta/_lung _a bi br-i t+sI ta/_liT _bi br-i t+sI tsa kA ra/_luT _bi br-i t+si tA/_smon ling _bi br-i t+s+yA ta/_l+r-iT _bi br-i t+si Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a bi br-i t+si Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/tang rnams la ba la dang po'i iT byin yon tan byas/_bi brti Sha/_zhes pa laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _bi brti Sha te/_ling _bi br-i rti 
[\[379b.4\]]She ta/_loT _bri brti Sha tAM/_lang _a bi brti Sha ta/_lung _a bi brti Shi Sh+Ta/_liT _bi brti ShAM tsa kri/_luT _bi brti Shi tA/_smon ling _bi brti ShI Sh+Ta/_l+r-iT _bi brti Shi Sh+ya te/_l+r-ing _a bi brti Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/nr-i ti lus bskyod pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/_kr-ita _tsw-i ti nr-i ta_tr-i ta_nr-i ta sogs kyis iT yang na bar 
[\[379b.5\]]byas/_iT med pa'i phyogs la/_san ki ta yin pas yon tan sogs mi byed/_iTa'i phyogs la yon tan byas gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_ni nr-i t+sa ti/_laT _ni na rti Sha ti/_ni nr-i t+se/_ling _ni na rti Sha ta/_ni nr-i t+sa tu/_loT _ni na rti Sha tu/_a ni nr-i t+sa ta/_lang _a ni na rti Sha ta/_a ni nr-i t+sI ta/_lung _a 
[\[379b.6\]]ni na rti ShI ta/_ni nr-i t+sAM tsa kA ra/_liT _ni na rti ShAM tsa kA ra/_ni nr-i t+sI tA/_luT _ni na rti Shi tA/_ni nr-i t+s+ya ta/_smon pa' ling _ni na rti Sh+yA ta/_ni na rti Sh+ya ti/_l+r-iT _ni na rti Shi Sh+ya ti/_a ni nr-i t+si Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a ni na rti Sha Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/tr-I rkyal bar byed pa dang sgrol bar byed pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/_iT _sa ni bA sa 
[\[379b.7\]]la iT yang na'o/_/br-ing br-i nya dag dang byings r-I ta mtha' rnams las pha rol gyi san la iT yang na 'gyur ro/_/i ko dz+nya la/_i ka las dz+nya la la'o/_/byings i ka so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge'i mtha' can las pha rol gyi san dz+ha la dang po can te iT med pa de ni ka 'gro ba'i ming can du bya ste/_iT 
[\[380a\]]
[\[380a.1\]]med pa'i phyogs la mdo 'dis san ki ta yin pas yon tan dang 'phel ba mi byed/_byings kyi r-I ta kyi i ta 'os r-I ita du bsgyur/_gnyis brjod r-I'i a Na pha rol lo sar byin/_u pad+hA'i 'ang ngos ring bor bsgyur bas/_ti tI r+Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _ti 
[\[380a.2\]]tI r+Sha ti/_ling _ti tI r+She ta/_loT _ti tI r+Sha tu/_lang _a ti tI r+Shi ta/_lung _a ti tI r+ShI ta/_liT _ti tI r+ShI tsa kA ra/_luT _ti tI r+ShI trA/_smon ling _ti tI r+Sha Sh+ya ta/_l+r-iT_ti tIr+Sha Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a ti tI r+Shi Sh+ya ta/_sogs dang /_iTa'i phyogs la b-i r-I ta dag las yang na 'os iT dang IT yang na bar byas gnyis brjod/_r-I'i a ta dang 
[\[380a.3\]]san la iT/_byings thams cad ba sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_laT _ti ta ri Sha ti/_lung _a ti ta ri ShI ta/_liT _ti ta ri ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs sam/_laT_ti ta rI Sha ti/_lung _a ti ta rI ShI ta/_liT _a ti ta rI ShI tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_bring kun nas gus pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/_a dz+nyA na ba/
[\[380a.4\]]mAM sa ni/_a tsa han gam rnams kyi san la'o/_/byings a tsa'i mtha' can rnams kyi mtha' dang han gam dag gi u pa d+hA rnams na pha rol la ring bor bsgyur te/_br-i br-Ir bsgyur/_san la iT yang na 'os iT yang na bar byas/_iT med pa'i phyogs la san ki ta yin pas/_oSh+Ti'i dang po 
[\[380a.5\]]ma yin pa'i a tu 'os/_r-I ta _u ta du bsgyur/_rI'i a Na la ra pha rol lo sar sbyar/_gnyis brjod/_u pa d+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/_bu dU r+Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _bu bU bU r+Sha ta/_ling _bu bU r+She ta/_loT _bu bU r+Sha tu/_lang _a bu bU r+Sha ta/_lung _a bu bU r+ShI ta/_liT _bu bU r+ShAM 
[\[380a.6\]]tsa kA ra/_luT _bu bU r+Shi tA/_smon ling _bu bU r+ShA ta/_l+r-iT _bu bU r+Shi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a bu bU r+Shi Sh+ya ta/_sogs dang /_iTa'i phyogs la/_br-i rI sogs kyis iT dang IT yang na bar byas/_gnyis brjod/_r-i'i a ta dang sa nas la i ta/_byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_laT _bi bir 
[\[380a.7\]]Sha ta/_lung _a bi ba ri ShA ta/_liT _bi b.ri ShA tsa kA ra/_sogs sam/_laT _bi ba ri ShA ti/_lung _a bi ba rI ShI ta/_liT _bi ba rI ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/Du kr-i nya byed pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/_a ca ha na gam rnams kyi sa na la 'os ring por bsgyur/_byings kyi r-I ta kyi i ta/_r-I'i a Na la ra pha 
[\[380b\]]
[\[380b.1\]]rol gnyis/_ku ha dag gi tsu/_saM sngon du bzhag_/ka ro ti'i saM pa ri u pa sogs kyi mdos ka'i sngon du suT A gam byin/_'grel par skabs 'dir iT yang na bar mi byed de iT mi ster ba kho na'o zhes bshad pas iT mi 'jug_/saM tsi skI r+ShA zhes grub ba la laT sogs sbyar bas/
[\[380b.2\]]laT _saM tsi skA+e r+Sha ti/_ling _saM tsi skI r+Sha ta/_loT _saM tsi skI r+Sha tu/_lang _sa ma tsi skI r+Sha ta/_lung _sa ma tsi skI r+ShI ta/_liT _saM tsi skAM r+ShAM tsa kA ra/_luT _saM tsi skI r+ShI tA/_smon ling _saM tsi skI r+Shi ta/_l+r-iT _saM tsi skI r+Shi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _sam tsi skI r+Shi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/d+hA gya gyu la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/_a tsa han gam rnams 
[\[380b.3\]]kyis na la 'os ring por bsgyur/_san la iT yang na 'os iT yang na bar byed de/_iT med pa'i phyogs la/_o Sh+Ti sngon ma ma yin ba'i u ta du bsgyur/_gnyis brjod r-i'i a Na lar pha rol u pa d+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/_du d+hU r+Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar/_laT _du 
[\[380b.4\]]d+hU r+ShA ti/_lung _a du d+hU r+ShI ta/_liT _du d+hU r+ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs dang /_iTa'i phyogs la yon tan byas pas/_laT _di t+yA ri Sha ti/_lung _a di d+hA ri ShI ta/_liT _di d+hA ri ShA tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/dzi rgyal ba la'o zhes pa la san/_dzi'i san liT dag la 'os dza gar bsgyur/_gnyis brjod pas/_laT _dzi gaM 
[\[380b.5\]]ti/_ling _dzi gi She ta/_loT _dzi gi Sha tu/_lang _a dzi gi Sha ta/_lung _a dzi gi ShI ta/_liT _dzi gi ShAM tsa kA ra/_luT_dzi gi Sh+yA tA/_smon ling _dzi gi Sh+yA ta/_l+r-iT _dzi gi Shi Sh+yA ti/_l+r-ing _a dzi gi Sh+yaM Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/tsi nya sogs pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/_tsi'i 'dam ka 'os tsa/_ra bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur 
[\[380b.6\]]ba 'dam ka can du byas pas/_laT _tsi ki Sha ti/_lung _a tsi ki ShI ta/_liT _tsi ki ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs sam/_laT _tsi tsi ShA ti/_lung _a tsi tsi ShI ta/_l-iT _tsi tsi ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/ha na 'tshe ba la'o zhes pa la san/_gnyis brjod/_ku ha dag gi tsu/_a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/_dz+nya dza/_san 
[\[380b.7\]]la iT 'os i ta du bsgyur/_a tsa ha na gam rnams kyis na la'os ring por bsgyur bas/_laT _dzi b+hA n+sa ti/_a b+h+yA sa las kyang ngom ta b+ha/_ling _dzi g+hA n+se ta/_loT _dzi g+hA n+sa tu/_lang _a dzi g+hA n+sa ta/_lung _a dzi g+hA n+sI ta/_liT _dzi g+hA n+sI tsa kA ra/_luT_dzi g+hA n+si tA/_smon ling _dzi g+hA n+sA ta/_l+r-iT _dzi g+hA n+si Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a dzi g+hA n+si Sh+ya ta/
[\[381a\]]
[\[381a.1\]]sogs so/_!_/iN 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/_sa ni tsa/_san la 'ang ngo /_/i Na'i san pha rol la 'ang rtogs pa'i don la 'jug pa ma yin na ga mi zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste i brjod don no/_/ga mi ru bsgyur/_a tsa ha na gam rnams kyis na la 'os u pang+hA ring por 
[\[381a.2\]]bsgyur iT byin pas/_laT _dzi gA mi Sha ti/_liT _dzi gA mi She ta/_loT _dzi gA mi Sha tu/_lang _a dzi gA mi Sha ta/_lung _a dzi gA mi ShI ta/_liT _dzi gA mi ShAM tsa kA ra/_luT _dzi gA mi Shi tA/_smon ling _dzi gA mi Sh+yA ta/_l+r-iT _dzi gA mi Shi Sh+ya ti/_a dzi gA mi Shi Sh+ya ta/_sogs dang /_rtogs pa'i don yin na ga mi ru mi 
[\[381a.3\]]bsgyur/_'grel par a tsa gcig pa dang po la san nyid gnyis brjod do zhes byung bas/_sa gnyis brjod/_san la i ta 'os i ta du bsgyur/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa gnyis Sha/_pra ti sngon du bzhag pas/_laT _pra tI Shi Sha ti/_ling _pra tI Shi She ta/_loT _pra trI Shi Sha tu/_lang _a pra tai 
[\[381a.4\]]Shi Sha ta/_lung _a pra ti Shi ShI ta/_liT _pra tI Shi ShAM tsa kA ra/_luT _pra tI Shi Shi tA/_smon ling _pra tI Shi Sh+yA ta/_l+r-iT _pra tI Shi Shi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a pra tI Shi Shi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/i ka dran pa la'o zhes pa la'ang cho ga dang gzugs thams cad i Na dang 'dra ste khyad par cung zad tsam yang med do/_!_/ing 
[\[381a.5\]]klog pa la'o zhes pa la san/_id sh+tsa/_ing gi 'ang ngo /_/ing gi 'ang san pha rol la ga mi ru bsgyur bar bya ste/_ga mi ru bsgyur gnyis brjod/_ku ha dag gi tsu 'os ga dza/_san la i ta 'os i ta du bsgyur/_a tsa ha na gam rnams kyis na la 'os u pa d+hA ring por bsgyur bas/_dzi gA mi Sha zhes 
[\[381a.6\]]grub pa la laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/_laT _dzi gA mi Sha te/_ling _dzi gA mi ShaM ta/_loT _dzi gA mi Sha tAM/_lang _a dzi gA mi Sha ta/_lung _a dzi gA mi Sha Sh+Ta/_liT _dzi gA mi ShAM tsa kra/_luT _a_dzi gA mi Shi tA/_smon ling _dza gA mi Shi ShI Sh+Ta/_l+r-iT _dzi gA mi Shi Sh+ya ta/_l+r-ing _a dzi gA mi Shi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/
[\[381a.7\]]I r+Sh+ya 'dod pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa dang san sbyar/_'grel par lung drangs pa/_I r+Sh+ya teH/_sa no bA hwi dwaM/_I r+Sh+ya ti las san nyid gnyis yang na'o/_/I r+Sh+yA ti las pha rol gyi san nyid yang na gnyis brjod par bya ste/_san gnyis brjod/_san la i ta 'os gong ma i ta du bsgyur/
[\[381b\]]
[\[381b.1\]]I r+Sh+yi Shi Sha/_zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _I r+Sh+yi Shi ma ti/_lung _I r+Sh+ye ShiShI ta/_liT _I r+Sh+yi Shi ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs dang /_yang na/_I r+Sh+ya ti'i gsum pa'i gnyis sos ya Ni dang bcas pa gnyis brjod pas/_I r+Sh+yi yi Sha zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _I r+Sh+yi yi Sha ti/
[\[381b.2\]]lung _I r+Sh+yi yi ShI ta/_liT _I r+Sh+yi yi ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/b+hU yod pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/_sa ni gra ha gu ho sh+tsa/_gra ha gu ha dag gi 'ang san la'o/_/gra ha nye bar len pa dang /_gu hU kun nas sgrib pa dang 'ang sgras byings mtha' u ka so sor bsdu ba rnams las pha rol gyi san la 
[\[381b.3\]]iT mi 'gyur te/_gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_bu g+hA Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _bu b+hU Sha ti/_lung _a bu b+hA ShI ta/_liT _bu b+hU ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/de bzhin du/_hu byin pa la san sbyar/_mdo 'dis iT mi 'jug/_a tsa ha na gam rnams kyis na 
[\[381b.4\]]la 'os ring por bsgyur gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_dzu hU Sha zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _dzu hU Sha ti/_lung _a dzu hU ShI ta/_liT _dzu hU ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/gu hU kun nas sgrib pa la'o zhes ba la san gnyis brjod ku ha dag gi tsu ha'i D+ha 'os/_ha D+ha _a tsa 
[\[381b.5\]]gcig pa'i b+ha Sha mtha' sogs kyis ga g+ha/_sa la Sha N+ha ngag gi ka 'os/_D+ha ka kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha ra bsgyur/_dzu g+hu k+Sha zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _dzu g+hu k+Sha ti/_lung _a dzu g+hu k+ShI ta/_liT _dzu g+hu k+ShaM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/gra ha nye bar len pa la san sbyar/_ru 
[\[381b.6\]]da bid mu Sha gra hi swa bi bra tshAHsaM sh+tsa/_rud _bid _mu Sha gra hi _swa bi pra tsha las san 'ang ngo /_/ru da mchi ma 'dzag pa/_bid shes pa/_mu Sha rku ba/_gra ha nye bar len pa/_swa pi nya la ba/_bra ts+tsha shes par 'dod pa rnams las pha rol gyi kr-i ta sogs kyi rkyen k+t+wa dang san yang ka 'gro ba'i ming can 
[\[381b.7\]]te/_san ki ta yin pas/_gra hi dz+yA sogs kyis saM sra sA raN bsgyur/_gnyis brjod r-i'i a ta dang /_san la i ta ha'i D+ha 'os/_ha D+ha/_a tsa gcig ba'i b+ha Sha mtha' sogs kyis/_ga g+ha/_sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka_/kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha ra bsgyur _dzi g+h+r-i k+Sha zhes grub pa la laT 
[\[382a\]]
[\[382a.1\]]sogs sbyar bas/_laT _dzi g+h+r-i k+Sha ti/_lung _a dzi g+h+r-i k+ShI ta/_liT _dzi g+h-I k+ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/nyi Sha ba nyal ba la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/_san ki ta yin pas/_btsi swa pi sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur/_gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis/_su Shu p+sa zhes grub pa la laT 
[\[382a.2\]]sogs sbyar bas/_laT _su Shu p+sa ti/_lung _a su Shu p+sI ta/_liT _a su Shu p+hAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/Sh+mir cung zad rgod pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/_smi pUr raM dzU a shI sa ni/_smi pUr r-i a ny+dzU a sha rnams kyi san la'o_/Sh+mir cung zad rgod pa/_bUd dag pa/_r-i 'gro ba/_a ny+dzU gsal ba/
[\[382a.3\]]a sha zas rnams las pha rol gyi san la iT 'gyur te/_iT byin byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan dang /_gnyis brjod sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_siSh+ma yi Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/_laT _si Sh+ma yi Sha te/_lung _asi Sh+ma yi Shi Sh+Ta/_liT _si Sh+ma 
[\[382a.4\]]yi ShAM tsa kre/_sogs so/_!_/pUng dag pa la'o zhes pa la san/_iT byin yon tan bas e tsa'i a ya gnyis brjod/_u'i pu ya Na dzi a pha rol los/_u ir bsgyur ba sogs kyis po pa bi Sha zhes pa la laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/_laT _pi pa bi Sha te/_lung _a pi ba bi Shi Sh+Ta/
[\[382a.5\]]liT _pi ba bi ShAM tsa kre/_sogs so/_!_/r-i 'gro ba la san/_yon tan rA iT dang bcas pa gnyis brjod pas/_a ri ri Sha zhes grub ba la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _a ri ri Sha ti/_lung _A ri ri ShI ta/_liT _A ri ri ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/a ny+dzU gsal ba dang 'tshab par byed pa dang 
[\[382a.6\]]'gro ba rnams la'o zhes ba la san sbyar/_iT byin/_dza iT dang bcas pa gnyis brjod pas/_any+dzi dzi Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar/_laT _a h+dzi dzi ShI ta/_lung _any+dzi dzi ShI ta/_liT _a ny+dzi dzi ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/a sha zas la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/_iT byin/_sha iT dang 
[\[382a.7\]]bcas pa gnyis brjod/_a shi shi Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT_a shi shi Sha ti/_lung _A shi shi ShI ta/_liT _ashi shi ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/kr-I nya 'tshe ba la'o zhes ba la san sbyar/_kir sh+tsa bany+tsa b+h+yaH/_kr-i las kyang lnga rnams las so/_/kr-I la sogs pa lnga ste/_kr-I nya 
[\[382b\]]
[\[382b.1\]]'tshe ba/_gr-I mid pa/_dr-I rnam par 'joms pa/_ng+g+rIM nya 'dzin pa/_prats+tsha shes par 'dod pa rnams las kyang san la iT 'gyur te/_mdo 'dis iT byin yon tan byas/_gnyis brjod r-i'i a ta/_san la i ta 'os i ta du bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_tsi ka ri Sha zhes grub ba la laT sogs sbyar bas/
[\[382b.2\]]laT_tsi ka ri Sha ti/_lung _a tsi ka ri ShI ta/_liT _tsi ka ri ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/de bzhin du/_gr-I med pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/_iT byin pas/_laT _dzi ga ri Sha ti/_lung _a dzi ga ri ShI ta/_liT _dzi ga ri ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/dr-I rnam par 'joms pa la san sbyar iT byin/_yon tan 
[\[382b.3\]]sogs kyis/_di da ri Sha/_zhes pa la laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/_laT _di da ri Sha te/_lung _a di da ri Shi ShU/_liT _di da ri ShAM tsa kre/_sogs so/_!_/d+h+r-i nya 'dzin pa la san sbyar iT byin/_di d+ha ri Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/_laT _di d+ha ri Sha te/_lung _a di d+ha ri Shi Sh+Ta/
[\[382b.4\]]liT _di ng+ha ri ShAM tsa kre/_sogs so/_/'grel par de rnams r-I ha mtha' yin kyangaIT ring po mi 'gyur zhes byung bas IT mi 'jug go/_!_/pra ts+tsha shes par 'dod pa la san/_ru da bi daM sogs kyi mdos san ki ta yin pas/_ki ta pha rol la gra hi dz+yA sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Na ra bsgyur/_gnyis 
[\[382b.5\]]brjod san la ita/_mdo 'dis iT byin/_pi pr-i ts+tsha Sha/_zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _pi pr-i ts+tshi Sha ti/_lung _a bi pr-i ts+tshi ShI ta/_liT _pi pr-i ts+tsha ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/d+hU nya g.yo ba la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/_iT mi 'jug gnyis brjod pas/_du d+hU Sha/_zhes pa la laT 
[\[382b.6\]]sogs sbyar bas/_laT _du d+hU Sha ti/_lung _a du d+hU ShI ta/_liT _du d+hU ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/di bu rtse ba la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/_bal dang po'i iT pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas/_di de bi Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _di de bi Sha ti/_lung _a di de bi ShI ta/
[\[382b.7\]]liT _di de bi ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/Shi bu thags kyi rgyu la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/_iT byin gnyis brjod/_sa Sha ra mi 'gyur yon tan byas/_si se bi Sha/_zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _si se bi Sha ti/_lung _a si se bi ShI ta/_liT _ si se bi ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/ri tU 'phel 
[\[383a\]]
[\[383a.1\]]ba la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/_sanI ban+ta r+t+ha b+n+ra s+dza da m+bU shri sbr-i yU r+Nu b+ha ra dz+nyA paM sa nAM/_I pa mtha' dang r-id+ha b+h+ra s+dza dmU shri sbr-i yu U r+Nu b+tar dz+nyA pi san rnams kyi san la'o/_/su pa kyi byings mo rkyen a+wi pa mtha' can rnams dang /_r-i dU 'phel ba/_b+h+ra sbra 'tshed pa/_dam+b+hu ngan 
[\[383a.2\]]g.yo ba/_shri gus pa/_sbr-i sgra/_yu sre pa/_U r+Nu nya kun nas 'gebs pa/_b+har ste/_Du b+h+r-ita 'dzin pa/_dz+nyA khong du chud pa/_Sha Na sbyin pa rnams las pha rol gyi san la iT yang na 'gyur te/_iT byin pa'i phyogs la pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan/_d+ha aT dang bcas pa gnyis brjod/
[\[383a.3\]]a b+h+yA sa'i tsang la ba ngos/_d+ha dar bsgyur/_a dzi d+hi Sha/_zhes grub pa la phaT sogs sbyar bas_laT _a dzi d+hi Sha ti/_lung _A rdi d+hi ShI ta/_liT _a rdi d+hiShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs dang /_iT med pa'i phyogs la/_A pa dz+nyA p+Y+ri d+hA mI ta/_A pa _dz+nyA bi r-i b+ha rnams kyi I ta'o/_/A p-I khyab pa/_dz+nyA long du nu da 
[\[383a.4\]]pa/_r-i d+hu 'phel pa rnams kyi iT med pa'i pha rol la a tsa I ta du 'gyur zhing a b+h+yA sa'ang dbyi ste/_u pad+hA'i 'ang ngos/_r-i ita/_mdo 'dis/_de IT du bsgyur/_r-i'i a Na lar pha rol la lo sa ra byin/_a b+h+yA sa phyis/_khar la tsa ra 'os d+ha tar bsgyur bas/_I tA zhes grub pa la laT sogs 
[\[383a.5\]]sbyar bas/_laT_I r+t+sa ti/_ling _I r+t+se ta/_laT _A r+t+sa tu/_lang _ai r+t+sa ta/_lung _ai r+t+sA ta/_I r+t+sAM tsa kA ra/_luT _I r+t+sI ta/_smon ling _I r+t+sA ta/_l+riT _I r+t+sa Sh+yati/_l+r-ing _ai r+t+sa Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/b+h+ra swA 'ched pa la'o zhes pa la san/_iTa'i phyogs la/_b+h+ra l+dza'i b+hardza yang na 'os/_b+ha rdzar bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur 
[\[383a.6\]]ba yang na bar byas gnyis brjod/_san la ita 'os i ta du bsgyur bas/_laT _bi b+h+ra s+dza Sha ta/_lung _a bi b+h+ra s+dzi ShI ta/_liT _bi b+h+ra s+dzi ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs sam/_laT _bi b+ha rdzi Sha ti/_lung _a bi b+ha rdzi ShI ta/_liT _bi b+ha rdzi ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_/iT med pa'i phyogs la/_b+h+ra s+dzi b+hardza ra bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur 
[\[383a.7\]]ba yang na bar byed/_ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la brtsegs pa'i dang pos ka sogs kyis phyis/_bra shA b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis dza Sha/_sa la Sha D+ha sogs kyis Sha ka/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_pi b+h+ra k+Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyang bas/
[\[383b\]]
[\[383b.1\]]laT _bi b+h+ra k+Sha ti/_ling _a bi b+h+ra k+ShI ta/_liT _pi b+h+ra k+ShI tsa kA ra/_sogs dang /_b+ha rdza bsgyur ba'i phyogs la gzhan cho ga 'dra bal/_su k+Sha'i steng du drangs pas/_laT _bi b+ha rka ti/_lung _a bi b+ha r+k+ShI ta/_liT _bi b+ha r+k+ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/da swU dan g.yo ba la'o zhes pa las na sbyar/_I pa mtha' r-i d+hU 
[\[383b.2\]]sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas/_iTa'i phyogs la/_laT _di dam+hi Sha ti/_lung _a di da m+b+hi ShI ta/_liT _di da m+b+hi ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs dang /_iT ma byin pa'i phyogs la/_dom+b+ha its+tsha/_dam+b+ha'i i ta'ang ngo /_/iT med pa'i san pha rol la dam+b+ha'i a tsa ita du bsgyur zhing 'ang gi sgras tsang yang na I ta 
[\[383b.3\]]du 'gyur la a b+h+yA sa'ang dbyi ste/_ha la mtha' las kyang ngos san kita yin pas/_ke ta pha rol la i ta 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis ma phyis/_mdo 'dis i ta dang a+wi ta yang na bar byas/_a b+h+yA sa phyis/_a tsa gcig ba b+ha Sha sogs kyis da d+ha/_khar la tsar 'os/_b+ha par bsgyur 
[\[383b.4\]]bas/_laT _d+hi b+sa ti/_lung _a d+hi p+sI ta/_liT _d+hi b+sAM tsa kA ra/_sogs som/_laT _d+hI p+sa ti/_lung _a d+hI p+sI ta/_liT _d+hI p+sAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/shr-i gum pa la'o zhes pa las na sbyar/_I pa mtha' sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas/_iTa'i phyogs la yon tan byas pas/_laT_shi shra yi Sha ti/_lung _a 
[\[383b.5\]]shi shra yi ShI ta/_liT_shi shra yi ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs dang /_iT med pa'i phyogs la/_a tsa hin gam rnams kyi san la 'os ring por bsgyur bas/_laT _shi shrI Sha ti/_lung _a shi shrI ShI ta/_liT _shi shI ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/spraM sgra la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/_I pa mtha' sogs kyis 
[\[383b.6\]]iT yang na bar byas/_iTa'i phyogs la yon tan byas pas/_laT _si swa ri Sha ti/_lung _a si swa ri ShI ta/_liT _si swa ri ShI tsa kA ra/_sogs dang /_iT med pa'i phyogs la/_a tsa han gam sogs kyis ring po/_/o Sh+Ti'i sngon ma me yin pa'i u ta 'os r-i u ta/_r-i'i a Na la ra/
[\[383b.7\]]gnyis brjod/_u pad+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/_laT _su sbU r+Sha ti/_lung _a su swU r+ShI ta/_liT _su swU r+ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/yu sre ba la'o zhes pa la san/_I pa mtha' sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas/_iTa'i phyogs la yon tan dang /_pu ya Na dzi a pha rol la u'i 
[\[384a\]]
[\[384a.1\]]'os/_ab+h+ya sa'i u ir bsgyur bas/_laT _yi ya bi Sha ti/_lung _a yi ya bi ShI ta/_liT_yi ya bi ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs dang /_iT med pa'i phyogs la/_a tsa han ga ma sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/_laT _yu yU Sha ta/_lung _a yu yU ShI ta/_liT_yu yU ShAM tsa kA ra/
[\[384a.2\]]sogs so/_!_/U r+Nu nya kun nas 'gebs pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/_I ba mtha' sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas/_iTa'i phyogs la yon tan byas pas/_laT_U r+Nu na bi Sha ti/_lung _a r+Nu na'i ShI ta/_liT _U r+Nu na bi ShAM tsa ku ra/_sogs dang /_iT med pa'i phyogs la/_a tsa ha na ga ma 
[\[384a.3\]]sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/_laT_U r+NU nU Sha ti/_lung _au r+NA nU ShI ta/_liT _U r+Nu nU ShAM tsa ku ra/_sogs so/_b+h+r-i nya 'dzin pa la san/_a+wi pa mtha' sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas/_iTa'i phyogs la yon tan byas pas/_laT _bi b+ha ri Sha ti/_lung _a bi b+ha ri ShI ta/_liT _bi b+ha ri ShAM tsa k+Sha 
[\[384a.4\]]ra/_sogs dang /_iT med pa'i phyogs la/_au Sh+Tu'i sngon ma ma yin pas u ta 'os/_r-i u ta/_ra'i a Na la ra pha rol gnyis brjod/_a b+h+yA sa'i tsa ra 'ang ngos/_b+ha ba_u pad+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/_laT_bu b+hU r+ShA ti/_lung _a bu b+hU rI ta/_liT _bu b+hU r+ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/
[\[384a.5\]]dz+nyA khongs su chud pa la Ni tsa/_arti hrI sogs kyis pu ka A ga ma byin pas/_dz+nyA pi la san sbyar/_I pa mtha' sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas/_iTa'i phyogs la/_laT_dzi dz+nyA pa yi Sha ti/_lung _o dzi dz+nyA pa yi ShI ta/_liT _dzi dz+nyA pa yi ShI tsa kA ra/_sogs dang /_iT med pa'i phyogs la/
[\[384a.6\]]Ni tsa iT med pa la 'os Ni tsa phyis/_A pa_dz+nyA pi/_r-i d+ha rnams kyi Ita 'os a tsa Ita dang a b+h+yAs phyis pas/_laT_dz+nyI p+sa ti/_lung _a dz+nyI b+sA ti/_liT_dz+nyI p+sAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_/Sha Na sin pa la san/_I pa mtha' sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas/_iTa'i phyogs la/_laT_sis 
[\[384a.7\]]ni Sha ti/_lung _a pi sa ni ShI ta/_liT_si sa ni ShA tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_/iT med pa'i phyogs la/_dza na kha nas rnams kyis na dz+ha la dag la 'os/_mtha' A ta du bsgyur/_laT_si sA sa ti/_lung _a si sA sI ta/_laT_si sA sAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/ta nu rgyas ba la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/
[\[384b\]]
[\[384b.1\]]'grel bar lung drangs pa/_ta ni pa ti da ri drA b+h+yaHsa nI D+wA/_ta ni_pa ti _da ri drwa rnams las san la iT yang na'o/_/ta nu rgyas pa/_pa t+l-i lhung ba/_da r-i drA ngan 'gro rnams las pha rol gyi san la iT yang na 'gyur te/_iT byin pa'i phyogs la/_laT_ti ta ni Sha ti/_lung _a ti ta ni 
[\[384b.2\]]ShI ta/_liT _ti ta ni ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs dang /_iT med pa'i phyogs la/_ta no ti rbi b+hA ShA/_ta no ti'i 'dam ka'o/_/ta no ti'i u pa d+hA iT med pa'i san pha rol la ring por bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka can te/_laT _ti tA na te/_lung _ti tA n+sI ta/_liT _ti tA n+sAM tsa kA ra/_sogs sam/_ti ta n+sa ti/
[\[384b.3\]]a ti ta n+sI ta/_ti ta n+sAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_/'grel par/_ta na tu las the tshom la 'jug pa la'ang san 'gyur ro zhes bshad de/_bsgrub tshul dang gzugs snga ma rnams dang 'bra'o/_/mr-ing srog gtong ba la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/_a tsa ha na gam sogs kyis ring por bsgyur/
[\[384b.4\]]o Sh+Ti'i sngon ma ma yin pa'i u ta 'os/_r-i u ta r-i'i aN lar pha rol/_gnyis brjod/_u pad+hA'i'ang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/_laT_mu mUr+Sha ti/_lung _a mu mU r+ShI ta/_liT_mu mU r+ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_/patI lhung ba la'o zhes pa las na sbyar/_ta nu pa ti da ri drA sogs kyi lung 'dren gyis 
[\[384b.5\]]iT yang na bar byas/_iTa'i phyogs la/_laT _pi pa ti Sha ti/_lung _a pi pa ti ShI ta/_liT_pi pa ti ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs dang /_iT ma byin ba'i phyogs la/_sa ni mI mA g+hu rab+ha la b+ha sha ka pa ta pa dA ma tsa i sha_/san la mI mA g+hu ra b+ha lab+ha sha ka pa ta pa da rnams kyi a tsa'i i sha'o/_/iT 
[\[384b.6\]]med pa'i san pha rol la mAng gus pa/_mI nya 'tshed pa g+hu'i ming can rnams dang /_ra ba rtsom pa/_DU la b+ha Sha thob pa/_sha kl-i nus pa/_ba t+l-i lhung ba/_pa da 'gro ba rnams kyi a tsa i shar 'gyur zhing a b+h+yA sa'ang dbyi ste/_a tsa i sar bsgyur/_brtsegs ba'i dang po sra ka sogs kyis sa phyis/
[\[384b.7\]]a b+h+yAs lang phyes pas/_laT _pit+sa ti/_lung _a pit+sI ta/_liT _pit+sAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/da ri drA ngan 'gro la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/_ta nu pa ti da ri drA sogs kyi lung 'dren gyis iT yang na bar byas/_iTa'i phyogs la/_iT la'ang a+waT kyi dbyi 'os A phyis pas/_laT _di da ri di Sha ti/
[\[385a\]]
[\[385a.1\]]lung _a di da ri dri Sh-I ta/_liT _di da ri dri ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs dang /_iT med pa'i phyogs la/_laT _di da ri drA sa ti/_lung _a di da ri drA sI ta/_liT di da ri drA sAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/mI nya 'tshe da pa la san/_san la mI mA sogs kyis a tsa is dang a b+h+yA sa phyis/_sa'i byings 
[\[385a.2\]]phyed pa la 'os/_sa tar bsgyur bas/_laT_mi t+sa ti/_lung _a mi t+sI ta/_liT_mi t+sAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/mA dgus pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/_san la mI mA sogs kyis a tsa is su bsgyur/_a b+h+yA sa phyis/_sa'i byings phyed pa la'os/_sa tar bsgyur bas/_mi t+sa zhes grub pa la laT 
[\[385a.3\]]sogs tar rnams sbyar bas/_laT_mi t+sa te/_lung _a mi t+si Sh+Ta/_liT _mi t+sAM tsa kre/_sogs so/_!_/Du dA nya sbyin pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/_/na pa mI mA g+hu sogs kyis a b+h+yAs phyis nas a tsa is su bsgyur/_sa'i byings phyed pa la 'os sa tar bsgyur bas/_laT _di t+sa ti/_lung _a di t+sI 
[\[385a.4\]]ta/_liT _di t+sI tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/Dub+hA ta 'dzin pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar sngon ma bzhin bsgrubs pas/_laT _d+hi t+sa ti/_lung _a b+hi t+sI ta/_loT_b+hi t+sAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/rab+ha rtsom pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/_san la mI mA sogs kyis a tsa is su bsgyur zhing a b+h+yAs phyis/
[\[385a.5\]]brtsegs pa'i dang pos ka sogs kyis sa phyis/_khar la tsa ra 'os b+ha par bsgyur/_rip+sa zhes grub ba la laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/_laT _ri p+sa ta/_lung _a rip+si Sh+Ta/_liT _rip+sAM tsa kre/_sogs so/_!_/de bzhin du/_Du la b+ha Sha thob pa la san sbyar bas/_laT li p+sa ti/_lung _a li p+si Sh+Ta/
[\[385a.6\]]liT _li p+sAM tsa kre/_sogs so/_/sha k-I nus pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/_san la mI mA sogs kyis a tsa is dang a b+h+yA sa phyis/_brtsegs pa'i dang pos ka sogs kyis sa phyis/_kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis san gyi saSha ra bsgyur bas/_laT_shi k+Sha ti/_lung _a shi k+ShI ta/_laT_shi k+ShAM tsa 
[\[385a.7\]]kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/bad 'gro ba la'i zhes pa la san sbyar/_san la mI mA sogs kyis a tsa is dang a b+h+yA sa phyis/_brtsegs pa'i dang pos ka sogs kyis sa phyis/_khar la tsar 'os da tar bsgyur/_pit+sa zhes grub pa la laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/_laT_pit+sa te/_a 
[\[385b\]]
[\[385b.1\]]pit+si Sh+Ta/_liT _pit+sAM sAM tsa kre/_sogs so/_!_/A p-I khyab ba la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/_A pa_dz+nyA pi ri d+ha rnams kyi I ta 'os/_a tsa I ta dang a b+h+yA sa phyis pas/_laT _I p+sa ti/_lung _ai p+sI ta/_liT _I p+sAMM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/dA d+ha yang dag par grub pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/_'grel 
[\[385b.2\]]par lung drangs pa/_rad+ho he d+se yAM sa nI s+yA ts+ya/_ra d+ha'i 'tshe ba la san i sar brjod do/_/rad+ha 'tshe ba'i don la 'jug pa na san pha rol la a tsa i sar bsgyur zhing a b+h+yA sa dbyi ste/_a tsa i sar bsgyur a b+h+yA sa phyis/_brtsegs pa'i dang po sogs kyis sa phyis/_khar la tsa ra 'os d+ha tar 
[\[385b.3\]]bsgyur bas/_pra ti r-i t+sa ti/_laT _sogs so/_/'tshe ba'i don min na is su mi 'gyur bas/_gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_laT_A ri rA t+sa ti/_lung _A ri rA t+sI ta/_liT _A ri rA t+sAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/mu ts+l-i gro ba la la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/_mu tso nya ka rma s+ya gu No pA/_mu 
[\[385b.4\]]tsa'i la sam/_so sor 'tshe bar 'dod/_yin pa'i yon tan la yang na'o/_/mu tsa'i las kyi don la sbyar ba ma yin pa 'dod pa kho na'i don la 'jug pa na iT_kun du 'grub par 'dod/_med ba'i san pha rol la u pad+mA yon tan du yang na bsgyur zhing bsgyur ba na a b+h+yAs yang dbyi ste/_yon tan a Sh+yAs phyis/
[\[385b.5\]]tsu'i ku 'os tsa kar bsgyur bas/_laT _mo_ti/_lung _a mo k+ShI ta/_liT _mo k+ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs dang /_las kyi don yin na yon tan mi byed pas/_laT_mu mu k+Sha ti/_lung _a mu mu k+ShI ta/_liT _mu mu k+ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/s+phu ra 'phro ba la byo zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/_tsi nya sbyar dag gi Ni la yang na 
[\[385b.6\]]nyos A ta du bsgyur bas/_spA ri zhes pa las na gnyis brjod/_shar dang po sogs kyis sa phyis/_a b+hA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos pha pa iT byin pas/_laT _pu spAr yi ShA ti/_lung _a pu spAr yi ShI ta/_liT_pu s+yA ra yi ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs dang /_yang A ta du ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la yon tan 
[\[385b.7\]]byas pas/_laT_pu s+pho ra yi Sha ti/_lung _a pu s+pho ra yi ShI ta/_liT_pu s+pho ra yi ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs dang /_!_/k+Shu sgra la'o zhes pa la Ni sbyar 'phel ba byas pas/_k+ShA bi zhes pa la san dang iT gnyis brjod/_ha la dang po lhag po dang /_ku ha dag gi tsu 'os ka tsar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas 
[\[386a\]]
[\[386a.1\]]laT_tsu k+ShA ba yi Sha ti/_lung_a tsu k+ShA ba yi ShI ta/_liT _tsu k+ShA ba yi ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/pU dag pa la Ni tsa 'phel ba byas pas pA bi zhes ba la san dang iT gnyis brjod/_u'i pu ya Na dzi a pha rol la 'os u ra bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/
[\[386a.2\]]laT _pi pA ba yi Sha ti/_luT _a pi pA ba yi ShI ta/_liT _pi pA ba yi ShI ta/_liT _pi pA ba yi ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/b+hU yod pa la Ni tsa 'phel ba byas pas/_b+hA bi zhes pa la san dang iT sbyar/_gnyis brjod/_u'i pu ya Na dzi a pha rol la 'os u ir bsgyur bas/_laT_pri b+hA ba yi Sha ti/_lung _bi b+hA pa yi ShI ta/
[\[386a.3\]]liT _bi b+hA ba yi ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/yu bsre ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa 'phel ba byas pas/_yA bi zhes pa la san dang iT/_gnyis brjod/_u'i pu yan sogs kyis u ir bsgyur bas/_laT_yi yA ba yi Sha ti/_lung _a yi yA ba yi ShI ta/_liT _yi yA ba yi ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs 
[\[386a.4\]]so/_!_/de bzhin du/_ru sgra la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa'i mtha' can la san dang iT sbyar/_gnyis brjod/_u'i pu yaN sogs kyis u ir bsgyur pas/_laT _ri rA ba yi Sha ti/_lung _a ri rA ba yi ShI ta/_liT_ri rA ba yi ShI tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_/de dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/_lU nya gcod 
[\[386a.5\]]pa la/_laT _li lA ba yi Sha ti/_lung _a li lA ba yi ShI ta/_liT _li yA ba yi ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/dzu 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la/_laT_dzi dzA ba yi Sha ti/_lung _a dzi dzA ba yi ShI ta/_liT _dzi dzA ba yi ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/Nu bstod pa la Ni tsa sbyar 'phel ba byas pas/_nA bi zhes pa la san 
[\[386a.6\]]dang aT sbyar/_gnyis brjod sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_laT _nu nA ba yi Sha ti/_lung _a nu nA ba yi ShI ta/_liT_nu nA ba yi ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/sru 'gro ba la Ni tsa sbyar 'phel ba byas pas/_srA bi zhes grub pa la san dang iT sbyar/_gnyis brjod/_sra ba ti/_shr-i Ni ti/_dra ba ti/_pra ba 
[\[386a.7\]]ti/_pA ba ti/_bya ba ti rnams kyi yang na 'os/_a b+h+yA sa ir bsgyur bas/_laT _si srA ba yi Sha ti/_ling _a si srA ba yi ShAM ta/_liT _si srA ba yi ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/ru tsa 'bar ba la'o zhes pa la san sbyar iT byin/_u i u ba d+hA ha la dang po dang ral las san 'ang ngos/_san iT dang 
[\[386b\]]
[\[386b.1\]]bcas ba ki ta du yang na bar byas pas/_kita kyi phyogs la yon tan med/_ki ta ma yin pa'i phyogs la/_pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas bas/_laT _ru ro tsi Sha ti/_lung _a ru ro tsiShI ta/_liT_ru ro tsi ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs sam/_laT _ru rutsi Sha ti/_sogs so/_!_/de bzhin du/_li kha ri mo 
[\[386b.2\]]'dri ba la'o zhes ba la san sbyar iT byin/_san ki ta du yang na bar byas pas/_laT _li le khi Sha ti/_lung _a li le khi ShI ta/_liT _li le khi ShI tsa kA ra/_sogs sam/_laT _li li khi Sha ti/_lung _a li li khi ShI ta/_liT _li li khi ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/ru dar mchi ma 'dzag pa la'o zhes pa la 
[\[386b.3\]]san dang iT/_rud_bid_mu Sha sogs kyis san iT dang bcas pa ki ta yin pas yon tan mi byed/_laT_ru ru di Sha ti/_lung _a ru ru di ShI ta/_liT _ru ru di ShI tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/de bzhin du/_bi da shes pa la/_laT _bi bi di Sha ti/_lung _a bi bi di ShI ta/_liT _bi bi di ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_/
