[\[386b.4\]]mu Sha rkub la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/_iT byin/_ki ta yin pas yon tan mi byed/_laT _mu mu Shi Sha ti/_lung _a mu mu Shi_ShA ta/_liT _mu mu Shi ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/Sh+Tu nya bstod pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/_gnyis brjod/_stau ti N+yauHa b+h+yA sa s+ya/_stau ti dang Ni dag gi a b+h+ya sa'i 
[\[386b.5\]]'o/_/taM ti dang byings Ni tsa mtha' can gyi sa yig ni a b+h+yAs in so sor bsdu ba'i pha rol la Sha yig tu 'gyur te/_mdo 'dis sa Shar bsgyur/_/Sha Tu la Sha ru 'os/_ta Ta_a tsa ha na gam sogs kyis ring bor bsgyur bas/_laT_tu Sh+TU Sha ti/_lung _tu Sh+Tu ShI ta/_liT _tu Sh+TU ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs 
[\[386b.6\]]so/_!_/nyi Sh+wa ba nyal ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa u ba ng+hA'i 'os 'phel ba byas/_swA pi zhes ba la san sbyar/_iT byin/_gnyis brjod/_d+yu ti swA pi dag gi saM bra sA ra Na 'os/_a b+h+yA sa saM bra sAr Nar bsgyur/_stau ti dang Ni dag gi a b+h+yA sa'i 'os sa Shar bsgyur bas/_laT_su Sh+wA pa yi 
[\[386b.7\]]Sh+ya ti/_lung _a su ShA pa yi ShI ta/_liT_suShA pa yi ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/nyi Sh+wa da mi gsal ba'i sgra la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/_pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas/_swe di zhes pa la san dang iT/_saHswi di swa di sa hA nAM tsa/_swi di swa dis ha rnams kyis 'ang ngo /_/swi di mi gsal 
[\[387a\]]
[\[387a.1\]]ba'i sgra/_swa di ro myang ga sa ha bzod pa rnams kyi sa yig ni a b+h+yA sa in so sor bsdu ba dang Ni tsa'i mtha' yin kyang Shar mi bsgyur bas yig tu gnas te/_gnyis brjod/_hal dang po lhag po 'os/_ba phyis/_mdo 'dis sa Shar mi bsgyur bas/_laT _si swe da yi Sha ti/_lung _a 
[\[387a.2\]]si swe da yi Sh+wi ta/_liT_si swe da yi ShI tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/swa da ro myang ba la/_Ni tsa u bad+hA'i 'os 'phel ba byas pas/_swA di zhes pa la san iT byin/_gnyis brjod pa phyis/_san la i ta 'os a ti du bsgyur/_mdo 'dis sa Sha ra mi bsgyur bas/_laT_si swA da yi Sha ti/_lung _a si swA da yi 
[\[387a.3\]]ShI ta/_liT_si swA da yi ShAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/sa ha bzod pa la Ni tsa 'phel ba byas/_sA he zhes pa la san sbyar/_iT byin/_gnyis brjod/_san la ita 'os i ta du bsgyur/_mdo 'dis sa Shar mi bsgyur bas/_laT_si swA ha yi Sha ti/_lung _a si sA ha yi ShI ta/_liT_si sA da yi ShAM tsa kA ra/
[\[387a.4\]]sogs so/_!_/'grel par rang don la byin pa'i san gyi mtha' la 'ang dgos pa yod san sbyor ro zhes bshad pas/_gu pU sbed pa la gu pa ti dza ki ta rnams la san 'os/_san gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_dzu gu p+sa zhes pa la byings las las dang 'dod pa byed pa po mnyam 
[\[387a.5\]]pa las yang na 'os/_slar yang san byin/_gnyis brjod zin yin pas slar mi brjod/_bal dang po'i iT kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/_dzu gu p+si Sha zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT_dzu gu p+si Sha ti/_ling _dzu gu p+si Shi ta/_loT _dzu gu p+si Shi tu/_lang _a dzu gu p+si Sha ta/
[\[387a.6\]]lung _a dzu gu p+si ShI ta/_liT _dzu gup+si ShAM tsa kA ra/_luT_dzu gu p+si Shi tA/_smon ling _dzu gu p+si Sh+yA ta/_l+r-iT _dzu gu p+si Shi Sh+yA ti/_l+r-ing _a dzu gu p+si Shi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/i tipA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU tA t+sa na n+taHsa mA p+tAH/_zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las san mtha' can rnams rdzogs so//_//de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos 
[\[387a.7\]]chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las san gyi mtha' can rnams kyi cho ga rags pa rnams ri zhig rdzogs so//_//gsum pa byings byings su bsgrub pa'i rkyen yang gi 'jug yul rnams bshad 
[\[387b\]]
[\[387b.1\]]par bya ste/_d+hA to re kA tso ha lA deHkri yA sa ma b+hi hA re yang /_byings a tsa gcig pa ha la dang po las bya ba yang dag par sdud pa la yang ngo /_/ru tsa 'bar ba dang shu tsa mya ngan gnyis ma yin pa'i byings a tsa gcig pa ha la dang po can las bya ba yang dag pas sdud pa ste shin tu ba dang yang yang gi don la yang 
[\[387b.2\]]pha rol tu 'gyur te/_nga yig ni san yang dag la 'os byings gnyis brjod pa'i don no/_/'grel par lung drangs pa/_sU tsi sU tri mU d+yaT r+t+ya shU r+No ti b+h+yo yang /_sU tsi/_sU tri mU tri aT ti a rti a sha U r+No ti rnams las yang ngo /_/sU tsa phra ma/_sU tra bar tu grol ba/_mU tra rab tu 'dzag pa/_aT 'gro ba/
[\[387b.3\]]r-i 'gro ba/_a sha zas/_U r+Shu nya 'gebs pa rnams las shin tu ba dang yang yang gi don la yang 'gyur ro/_/ni t+yaM kau Ti [{]mye [,]me [}]ga tau/_'gro ba la 'khyog po kho na la'o/_/'gro ba'i don gyi byings las shin tu ba dang yang yang gi don ma yin pa'i 'khyog por 'gro ba kho na'i don la 'jug pa na yang pha rol tu 
[\[387b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/lu pas nga tsa ra dza pa dza b+ha da ha da sha grI b+s+ye b+hA ba ga rtA yAM/_lu pa sa ra tsa ra dza pa dza b+ha_da had sha gr-i rnams las smad pa nyid la'o/_/lu p-I gcod pa/_Sha d-I rnam par 'gro ba/_tsar 'gro ba/_dza pa yid/_dza b+ha lus rnam par nyams pa/_da ha thal bar byed pa/_da sha mche ba/_g-I gsal 
[\[387b.5\]]bar byed pa rnams las smad pa nyid la 'jug pa la yang 'gyur te bya ba yang dag par bsdu ba tsam la ni ma yin no/_!_/swu tsa phram byed pa la'o zhes pa la yang ba san yang dag la 'os gnyis brjod/_thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur bas/_su sU tsa/_yang zhes pa la/_gu no yang lu koH/_yang 'jig 
[\[387b.6\]]pa dag la yon tan no/_/yang gi rkyen 'jig pa dang mi 'jig pa dag pha rol la'ang a b+h+yAs yon tan du bsgyur te/_mdo 'dis yon tan byas pas/_so sU ts+ya zhes grub pa la/_laT sogs tang rnams sbyor te/_byed pa po la shab a ta las yon tan la'os gnyis dag gi gcig sngon ma'i gzugs su

[\[388a\]]
[\[388a.1\]]iT byin pas/_a so sU tsi Sh+Ta/_a so sU tsi ShA tAM/_a so sU tsi Sha ta/_sogs so/_/liT la/_kA sa sogs kyi A ma sbyar/_ya'i ha la las 'os ya phyis pas/_so sU tsAM tsa kre/_so sU tsAM ba b+hU ba/_so sU tsAM mA sa/_sogs so/_/la yig phyi ma rnams la bal dang po'i

[\[388b\]]
[\[388b.1\]]shA sh+ya te/_ling _a shA sh+yi ta/_loT _a shA sh+ya tAM/_ling_A shA sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/lung pa/_iT byin ya'i hal las sos/_ya phyis pas/_A shA shi Sh+Ta/_sogs dang /_liT la A ma sbyar/_ya'i hal las so so ya phyis pas/_a shA shAM tsa kre/_sogs so/_/lhag ma

[\[388b.7\]]g+hu mA s+thA/_gA bA sogs kyis a tsa IT du bsgyur te/_yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_laT _de dI ya te/_ling _de dI ye ta/_loT _de dI ya tAM/_lang _a de dI ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la iT byin a ta kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/_a de dI yi Sh+Ta/_sogs so/_/liT la A ma 
[\[389a\]]
[\[389a.1\]]sbyar a phyis pas/_de dI yAM tsa kre/_sogs dang /_lhag ma rnams la/_luT_de dI yi tA/_smon ling /_de dI yi ShI Sh+Ta/_l+r-iT _de dI yi Sh+ya te/_l+r-ing _a de dI yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/de bzhin du/_Du r+hA nya 'dzin pa la yang /_A I ta du bsgyur/_gnyis brjod/_yang 'jig pa 
[\[389a.2\]]sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_laT _de d+hI ya te/_lung _a di d+hI yiSh+Ta/_liT _ded+hI yAM tsa kre/_luT _de d+hI yi tA/_sogs so/_!_/mAng gus pa la'o zhes pa la yang /_A Ita/_gnyis brjod/_yon tan byas pas/_laT _me mI ya te/_lung _a me mI yi Sh+Ta/_liT _me mI yAM tsa kre/_luT _me mI yi tA/
[\[389a.3\]]sogs so/_!_/Sh+TA 'gro ba las ldog pa la yang /_A I ta du bsgyur/_gnyis brjod/_shar dang po sogs kyis sa phyis/_a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos tha ta/_yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/_Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os tha thar bsgyur ba sogs kyis 
[\[389a.4\]]bsgrubs pas/_laT _te Sh+ThI ya te/_lung _a te Sh+ThI yi Sh+Ta/_liT te Sh+ThI yAM tsa kre/_luT _te Sh+ThI yi Sh+Ta/_sogs so/_!_/gai sgra la'o zhes pa la yang /_sha 'gro ba nye ba'i yul ma yin pa la e tsa'i A ta 'os/_e tsa A ta/_g+hu mA s+ThA gA sogs kyis I ta du bsgyur/_gnyis brjod/_ku ha dag gi tsu 
[\[389a.5\]]dang yon tan byas pas/_laT _dze gI ya te/_lung _a dze gI yi Sh+Ta/_liT _dze gI yAM tsa kre/_luT _dzi gI yi tA/_sogs so/_!_/o hA ka gtong ba la yang sbyar/_g+hu sogs kyis A AM/_gnyis brjod/_ku ha dag gi tsu/_a b+h+yA sa'i tsa ra 'ang ngos/_dz+ha dza/_yon tan byas pas/_laT_dze hi ya ti/
[\[389a.6\]]lung _a dze hI yi Sh+Ta/_liT _dze hA yAM tsa kre/_luT _dzi hI yi tA/_sogs so/_!_/Sho mtha'i las la'o zhes pa la yang sbyar/_sha 'gro ba nye ba'i yul ma yin pa sogs kyis e tsa A ta/_g+hu sogs kyis i ta/_gnyis brjod yon tan dang kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis Shar bsgyur bas/_laT _se 
[\[389a.7\]]ShI ya te/_lung _a sI ShI yi Sh+Ta/_liT _se Shi AM tsa kre/_luT_se ShI yi tA/_sogs so/_!_/Tu o shwi 'gro ba dang 'phel ba dag la'o zhes pa la yang /_shwi'i 'dam ka 'os/_saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka can du byas pas/_bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_laT_sho shU ya te/_lung _a 
[\[389b\]]
[\[389b.1\]]sho shU yi Sh+Ta/_liT _sho shU yAM tsa kre/_luT _sho shU yi tA/_sogs dang /_ma bsgyur ba'o phyogs la/_laT _she shI ya te/_lung _a she shI yiSh+Ta/_liT _she shwI yAM tsa kre/_she shwI yi tA/_sogs so/_!_/smr-i dran pa la'o zhes pa la yang sbyar/_gnyis brjod/_yang 'jig pa sogs kyis a b+h+yA sa 
[\[389b.2\]]yon tan/_ha la dang po lhag po sogs kyis ma dang ra phyis/_ka 'gro ba ma yin pa'i ring po 'os ring por bsgyur/_yang la'ang ngos yon tan byas pas/_laT_sA sma r+Ya te/_lung _a sA sma ri Sh+Ta/_liT_sA sma rA tsa kre/_luT _sA sma ri tA/_sogs so/_!_/Du kr-inya byed pa la'o zhes pa la yang /_r-i ta kyi rIng 'os 
[\[389b.3\]]ring du bsgyur/_gnyis brjod/_thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/_r+ra phyis/_ku ha dag gi tsu/_yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_laT_tse krI ya te/_lung _a tse krI yi Sh+Ta/_liT _tse krI yAM tsa kra/_luT_tse krI yi tA/_sogs so/_/sam sngon du byung na ka'i sngon du suT byin pas/_laT_sAM tse skrI ya te/
[\[389b.4\]]sogs so/_!_/Shi tsa srung ba la'o zhes pa la yang sbyar/_gnyis brjod/_yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_laT_se si ts+ya te/_lung _a se si tsi Sh+Ta/_liT_se si tsI tsa kre/_luT_sa si tsi tA /_sogs so/_/si tso ya di/_si tsa'i yang la'o/_/si tsa'i sa yig ni nyer bsgyur dang a b+h+yA sa/_sa 
[\[389b.5\]]Shar bsgyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can sngon du byung yang /_yang pha rol la Shar mi 'gyur te/_a b+h+yA sa'i dper brjod bstan zin la/_nyer bsgyur la ni se si ts+ya te/_sogs so/_!_/bra dza 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la yang /_gnyis brjod/_ha la dang po sogs kyi sar phyis/_ka 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur 
[\[389b.6\]]bas/_laT_bA pra dz+ya te/_lung _a pA pra dzi Sh+Ta/_liT _bA pra dzI tsa kre/_luT bA bra dzi tA/_sogs so/_!_/grI gsal ba la'o zhes pa la/_yang /_gro ya ngi /_gr-I'i yang la'o/_/gr-i'i ra yig ni yang pha rol la la yig tu bsgyur bar bya ste/_byings kyi r-I ta kyi i ta 'os r-I iT/_r-i'i a Na lar pha rol los du/
[\[389b.7\]]mdo 'dis r+ra l+rar bsgyur/_gnyis brjod/_ku ha dag gi tsu dang /_yang 'jig ba sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_laT _dze gi l+ya te/_lung _a dze gi li Sh+Ta/_liT _dze gi lAM tsa kre/_luT_dze gi li tA/_sogs so/_!_/lu p-I gcod pa la'o zhes pa la/_yang sbyar/_gnyis brjod/_yang 'jig pa sogs kyis 
[\[390a\]]
[\[390a.1\]]yon tan byas pas/_laT _lo lu pya te/_lung _a lo lu puSh+Ta/_liT _lo lu pAM tsa kre/_luT _lo lu pi tA/_sogs so/_!_/ku 'bar ba la'o zhes pa la/_yang sbyar/_na ka ba te r+Ya ngi /_na ka ba te'i yang la ma yin no/_ka ba ti'i a b+h+yA sa'i ka yig ni yang pha rol la tsa yig tu bsgyur ba 
[\[390a.2\]]ma yin te/_gnyis brjod/_yang 'jig pa sogs yon tan/_mdo 'dis ka tsa ra mi bsgyur/_laT _ko kU ya te/_lung _a ko kU yiSh+Ta/_liT _ko kU yAM tsa kre/_luT _ko kU yi tA/_sogs so/_'grel bar skabs 'gar bsgyur ba'ang yod do zhes bshad pas/_laT _tso kU ya te/_sogs so/!_/pany+tsu 
[\[390a.3\]]'gro ba la'o zhes pa la/_yang sbyar/_nI gwany+tsu sraM su d+h+waM su ka sa pa ta pa da skan+dAM/_many+tsu _sraM su [ \[]d+ny+waM [\]]su ka sa/_pa ta pa da skan+da rnams kyi nI ka'o/_pany+tsu 'gro ba/_sraM su dang /_d+h+waM su 'og tu lhung ba/_ka sa 'gro ba/_la d+l-i lhung ba/_pa da 'gro ba/_skan+da 'gro ba rnams kyi yang gi rkyen gnas pa dang 'jig pa dag pha rol la 
[\[390a.4\]]ab+h+yA sa la nI ka A ga ma 'gyur te/_ka gnas don no/_gnyis brjod/_mdo 'dis nI ka A ga ma/_glo bur ba kita yin pas a b+h+ya sa ring por bsgyur/_ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis ngita pha rol lan phyis pas/_laT _ba nI pats+ya te/_lung _a ba nI ba tsi Sh+Ta/_liT _ba nI ba tsI tsa kre/_luT _ba nI ba tsi tA/_sogs so/
[\[390a.5\]]!_sraM su 'og tu lhung ba la'o zhes pa la/_yang gnyis brjod/_mdo 'dis nI ka A ga ma byin/_ka 'gro ba'i rgyu mtshan las a b+hA sa ring por mi 'gyur du phyis/_ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis pas/_laT _sa nI sra s+ya te/_lung _a sa nI sra siSh+Ta/_liT _sa nI sra sAM tsa kre/_luT _sa ni sra sa si tA/
[\[390a.6\]]sogs so/_!_/ya mu nye bar 'gog pa la'o zhes pa la/_yang sbyar/_nu ga to\u0f85 nu nA si kAn+ta s+ya/_rjes su sna ldan mtha' can gyi a ti gya nu ga'o/_byings rjes su sna ldan gyi mtha' can u pa d+hA ata yin pa'i a b+h+yAs la yang rkyen gnas pa dang 'jig pa dag pha rol la nuka A ga ma 'gyur te/_ka gnas 
[\[390a.7\]]don dang a brjod pa'i don no/_gnyis brjod hal dang so lhag po sogs kyis mra phyis/_mdo 'dis nu A ga ma byin/_pr-i Sho da ra sogs kyis nang ngor byas/_kita kyi rgyu mtshan las ring por mi 'gyur bas/_laT _yaM ya mya te/_lung _a yaM ya miSh+Ta/_liT _yaM ya mAM tsa kre/_luT _yaM ya mi tA/_sogs 
[\[390b\]]
[\[390b.1\]]so/_!/_Tu ba mu skyug pa la'o zhes pa la yang sbyar/_gnyis brjod/_ma phyis mdo 'dis nu ka A ga ma byin/_na'i 'ang tshig mtha' min pa'i dz+nyal la nang ro/_kita la ring por mi bsgyur/_laT _baM ba mya te/_lung _a baM ba miSh+Ta/_liT _baM ba mAM tsa kre/_luT _baM ba mi tA/_sogs so/_!_/ta nu rgyas ba la'o zhes pa 
[\[390b.2\]]la/_yang gnyis brjod/_nu phyis/_mdo 'dis nuka A ga ma ring po mi byed/_laT _tan+ta n+ya te/_lung _atan+ta ni Sh+Ta/_liT _tan+ta nI tsa kre/_luT _tan+ta ni tA/_sogs so/_/rjes su sna ldan gyi mtha' yin kyang u pa d+hA ata yin na nuka mi 'gyur te/_b+hA ma khro ba la'o zhes pa la yang sbyar/_gnyis brjod/_a b+h+ya 
[\[390b.3\]]sa bi tsara'ang ngos/_b+ha ga thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/_kita min pa sogs kyis slar yang ring por bsgyur bas/_laT _bA b+hA mya te/_lung /_a bA b+hA miSh+Ta/_liT _bA b+hA mAM tsa kre/_luT _bA b+hU mi tA/_sogs so/_dzan skye ba la'o zhes pa la/_yang /_yal 'dam ka 'os mtha' ata du bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam 
[\[390b.4\]]ka can du byed/_ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_rjes su ldan mtha' can gyis ta kyi nu ka A ga ma byin pas/_laT _dzaM dzan+ya te/_lung _a dzaM dza nAM niSh+Ta/_liT _dzaM dza nAM tsa kre/_luT _dzaM dza ni tA/_sogs dang /_ata du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_gnyis brjod/_thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/_kita ma yin pa sogs kyis slar ring 
[\[390b.5\]]por bsgyur bas/_laT _dzA dzA ya te/_lung _a dzA dzA yiSh+Ta/_liT _dzA dzA yAM tsa kre/_luT _dzA dzA yi tA/_sogs so/_!_/Sha na sbyin pa la'o zhes pa la/_yang /_a la 'dam ka 'os/_Ata du bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka byas/_ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la rjes su sna ldan sogs kyis nu ka'i byin pas/_laT _saM sa 
[\[390b.6\]]n+ya te/_lung _a saM sa nISh+Ta/_liT _saM sa nI tsA kre/_luT _saM sa ni tA/_sogs dang /_Ata du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_laT _sA sA ya te/_lung _a sA sA yiSh+Ta/_liT _sA sA yAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/de bzhin du/_kha na rko ba la/_laT _tsi kha n+ya te/_lung _a tsi kha niSh+Ta/_liT _tsi kha nAM tsa kre/_luT _tsi kha ni tA/
[\[390b.7\]]sogs sam/_laT _tsA khA ya te/_lung _a tsA khA yiSh+Ta/_liT _tsa khA yAM tsakre/_luT _tsA khA yi tA/_sogs so/_!_han 'tshe ba la/_yang /_gnyis brjod/_nu phyis/_ku ha dag gi tsu/_a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/_dz+ha dza/_rjes su sda ldan mtha'i sogs kyis nuka A ga ma/_a b+h+yA las kyang ngos ha g+har bsgyur 
[\[391a\]]
[\[391a.1\]]ba sogs kyis/_laT _dzaM g+ha n+ya te/_lung _adzi g+ha ni Sh+TA/_liT _dzik+ha nI tsa kre/_luT _dzig+ha ni tA/_sogs so/_'grel bar lung drangs pa/_ha n+teHhid+la yAM ya ngi g+hI b+hA bo bak+ta byaH/_ha n+ti'i 'tshe ba la yang la g+hI nyid du brjod do/_han+ti'i yang pha rol la 'tshe ba'i don la g+hI zhes par bsgyur bar bya 
[\[391a.2\]]ste/_ha na/_g+hI ru bsgyur/_gnyis brjod/_thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/_na phyis/_ku ha dag gi tsu/_a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/_dz+ha dza/_yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_laT _dza g+hi ya te/_lung _a dze g+h+wA gi yiShA/_liT _dzeg+h+wI yAM tsa kre/_luT _dze g+h+wI yi tA/_sogs so/_!_/dza ba yid la'o zhes pa la yang 
[\[391a.3\]]sbyar/_dza pa dzi b+ha da ha da sha b+hany+dza pa shAM tsa/_dza pa _dzab+ha _da ha da sha _b+hany+dza pa sha rnams kyi 'ang ngo /_dza pa yid/_dzab+ha lus rnam par nyams pa/_da ha thal bar byed pa/_da sha mche ba/_b+hany+dzu kun du nyed pa/_pa sha 'chad pa rnams kyi a b+h+yA sa la'ang yang rkyen gnas pa dang 'jig pa dag pha rol la nuka A ga 
[\[391a.4\]]ma 'gyur te/_gnyis brjod/_mdo 'dis nuka A ga ma byin pas/_laT _dzaM dza pya te/_lung _a dzaM dza piSh+Ta/_liT _dzaM dza pAM tsa kre/_sogs so/_!_/de bzhin du/_dza b+ha lus rnam par nyams pa la/_yang gnyis brjod/_nuka byin pas/_laT _dzaM dza b+h+ya te/_lung _a dzaM dza b+hiSh+Ta/_liT _dzaM dza b+hAM tsa kre/_sogs so/_!_/
[\[391a.5\]]da ha thal bar byed pa la/_yang sbyar nuka byin pas/_laT _di da h+ya to/_lung _a daM da hiSh+Ta/_liT _daM da hAM tsa kre/_sogs so/_!_/da sha mche ba la/_yang gnyis brjod/_nu ka byin pas/_laT _daM da sh+ya te/_lung _a di da Shi Sh+Ta/_liT_daM da shAM tsa kre/_sogs so/_!_/b+t+wany+dzu nyed pa la yang /_iT 'gro ba ma yin pa 
[\[391a.6\]]sogs kyis na phyis/_gnyis brjod/_nuka A ga ma byin bas/_laT _baM b+ha dz+ya ti/_lung _a baM b+ha dzi Sh+Ta/_liT _baM b+ha dzAM tsa kre/_sogs so/_!_/pa sha 'ching ba la/_yang gnyis brjod/_nuka A ga ma byin pas/_laT _paM pa shu te/_lung _a paM pa shiSh+Ta/_liT _paM pa shA tsa kre/_sogs so/_!_/tso la g.yo ba la'o/
[\[391a.7\]]zhes pa la/_yang sbyar/_'grel bar lung drangs pa/_sa tsa yAn+ta s+yA b+h+yA sa s+ya nu gwA/_la tsa ya'i mtha'i a b+h+yA sa'i nuka yang na'o/_byings tsha yig dang la yig dang ya yig rnams kyi mtha' can gyi a b+h+yA sa la yang rkyen gnas pa dang 'jig pa dag pha rol la nuka A ga ma yang na 'gyur te/_nuka byin pa'i 
[\[391b\]]
[\[391b.1\]]phyogs la/_laT _tsi tsa l+ya te/_lung _a tsaM tsa liSh+Ta/_liT _tsaM tsa lAM tsa kre/_sogs dang /_nuka ma byin pa'i phyogs la kita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring por bskyur bas/_laT _tsA tsa l+ya te/_lung _a tsA tsa liSh+Ta/_liT/_tsA tsa lAM tsa kre/_sogs so/_!_/de bzhin du/_many+tsa khri la'o zhes pa la/_yang /_ita 'gro ba ma 
[\[391b.2\]]yin pa sogs kyis na phyis/_lung 'dren 'dis a b+h+yA sa la nuka yang na bar byas pas/_laT _maM ma ts+ya te/_lung _a maM ma tsiSh+Ta/_liT _maM ma tsI tsa kre/_sogs sam/_laT _mA ma ts+ya te/_lung _a mA ma tsiSh+Ta/_liT _mA ma tsI tsa kre/_sogs so/_!_/da ya sbyin pa la nuka yang na bar byas pas/_laT _daM da y+Ya te/_lung _a 
[\[391b.3\]]daM da yiSh+Ta/_liT _daM da yAM tsa kre/_sogs sam/_laT _dA da y+Ya te/_lung a dA da yiSh+Ta/_liT _dA da yAM tsa kre/_sogs so/_!_tsa ra 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la/_yang sbyar/_tsa ra pha lo tsa/_tsa ra pha la dag gi 'ang ngo /_/tsa ra dang pa la dag gi a b+h+yA sa ata la yang 'jig pa dang gnas pa dag pha rol la nuka A ga ma 
[\[391b.4\]]'gyur te/_ut+pa ra s+yAtaH/_ata las pha rol gyi uta'o/_tsa ra dang phal dag gi a b+h+yA sa ata las pha rol gyi a ni yang gnas pa dang 'jig pa dag pha rol la uta du bsgyur te/_gnyis brjod/_mdo 'dis a uta/_mdo snga mas nuka A ma byin/_ha la las sos ring por bsgyur bas/_laT _tsaM 
[\[391b.5\]]tsUr+Ya te/_lung _a tsaM tsU riSh+Ta/_liT _tsaM tsU rAM tsa kre/_sogs so/_!_/phal rdzogs pa la'o zhes pa la/_yang sbyar cho ga tsa ra dar 'dra bar bsgrubs bas/_laT _paM phu l+ya te/_lung _a paM phu liSh+Ta/_liT _paM phulAM tsa kre/_sogs so/_!_/nr-i ti lus bskyod pa la'o zhes pa la/_yang sbyar/_rI gr-i du pa d+ha s+ya tsa/
[\[391b.6\]]r-ita u pa ng+hA'i'ang rIka'o/_/byings r-ita u pa d+hA na yod pa'i a b+h+ya sa la'ang yang rkyen 'jig pa dang gnas pa dag pha rol la rIka A ga ma 'gyur te ka gnas don no/_k+Shu b+h+wA di Shu tsa/_k+Shu b+hA la sogs pa rnams la'ang ngo /_k+Shu b+ha khro ba la sogs pa rnams kyi rtsa tshig gis ma zin na'ang gzugs 
[\[391b.7\]]legs shing brjod bde ba rnams su bya'o san yang dag la 'os byings gnyis brjod/_r-i'i ata 'os r-i ata mdo snga ma'i rIka A ga ma byin/_mdo 'dis na Nar mi bsgyur bar/_laT _na rI nr-i t+ya te/_lung _an rI nr-i tiSh+Ta/_liT _na rI nr-i tAM tsa kre/_sogs so/_!_/gra ha nye bar len pa la/_yang sbyar/_gra hi 
[\[392a\]]
[\[392a.1\]]dz+yA sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur/_gnyis brjod r-i'i ata/_r-ita u pad+hA'i 'ang rIka 'os/_rIka A ga ma byin pas/_laT _dza rI gr-i h+yaM te/_lung _a dza rI kr-i hiSh+Ta/_liT _dza rI gr-i haM tsa kre/_sogs so/_!_/kr-i pU nus pa la'o zhes pa la yang sbyar/_kr-i pa'i ra la phos r-i l-ir bskyur 
[\[392a.2\]]gnyis brjod/_r-i'i ata 'grel par l-i u pa d+hA can la lI ka A ga ma 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/_lIka byin pas/_laT _tsa lI kl-i pya te/_lung _a tsa lI kl-i piSh+Ta/_liT _tsalI kl-i pAM tsa kre/_sogs so/_!_/braSh+tsu gcod pa la'o zhes pa la/_yang /_gra hi dz+wA+e sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur/_gnyis brjod 
[\[392a.3\]]r-i'i ata/_'grel par hal brtsegs pa'i sngon ma'i r-ita la'ang rIka A ga ma 'gyur ro zhes byung bas/_rIka byin/_laT _ba rI pr-i b+h+ya te/_lung _a ba bI br-i sh+tsISh+Ta/_liT _pa rI br-i sh+tsAM tsa kre/_sogs so/_!_/de bzhin du/_prats+tsa shes par 'dod pa la'o zhes pa la/_yang sbyar/_gra hi dz+yA sogs kyis saM pra sAr 
[\[392a.4\]]Nar bsgyur/_gnyis brjod/_r-i li ata/_r-Ika A ga ma byin pas/_laT _pa rI pr-i ts+n+ya he/_lung _a pa rI p-i ts+tshiSh+Ta/_liT _pa rI pr-i ts+tshaM tsa kre/_sogs so/_!_/nyi Sh+wa pa nyal ba la'o zhes pa la/_yang sbyar/_swa pi s+ya mi bye nyAM ya ngi /_swa pa _s+ya ma _byenya rnams kyi yang la'o/_Sha pa nyal ba/_s+ya mi rnam par rtog 
[\[392a.5\]]pa/_byenya kun nas sgrib pa rnams kyi yang pha rol la saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur te/_saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur/_gnyis brjod yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_laT _so su bya te/_lung _a so su piSh+Ta/_liT _so su pAM tsa kre/_sogs so/_!_/de bzhin du/_s+ya mal/_yang sbyar/_saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur/_gnyis brjod yon 
[\[392a.6\]]tan byas pas/_laT _se si mya te/_lung _a se si miSh+Ta/_liT _se si mAM tsa kre/_sogs so/_!_/byenya kun nas sgrib pa la/_yang sbyar/_saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur/_yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan/_krita min pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/_laT _ba pI ya ti/_lung _a be ba yiSh+Ta/_laT _be bI yAM 
[\[392a.7\]]tsa kre/_sogs so/_!_/ba sha mdzes pa la'o zhes pa la yang sbyar/_na pa shaH/_pa sha'i ma yin no/_yang pha rol lab sha'i saM prasAr Nar bsgyur ba ma yin te/_gnyis brjod ki ta ma yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/_laT _bA ba sh+ya te/_lung _a bA ba shiSh+Ta/_liT _bA ba shI tsa kre/_sogs so/_/
[\[392b\]]
[\[392b.1\]]!_tsi nya gsog pa la'o zhes pa la/_yang sbyar/_tsU yaHkI/_tsi'i kI'o/_ci nya'i yang pha rol la kI zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/_tsi kIr bsgyur/_gnyis brjod/_thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/_ku ha dag gi tsu/_yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_laT _tse kI ya te/_lung a tse kI yiSh+Ta/_liT _tse kI 
[\[392b.2\]]yAM tsa kre/_sogs so/_!_/g+hA dri nye bar len pa la'o zhes pa la/_yang sbyar/_Id+h+yA d+hA+o:/_g+hA d+h+s+wa dag gi Ita'o/_yang pha rol pa/_g+h+yA dar/_d+h+m+ra dag gi mtha' Ita du bsgyur bar bya ste/_mtha' Ita du bsgyur/_gnyis brjod/_ra phyis/_ku ha dag gi tsu/_thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/_yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan byas 
[\[392b.3\]]pas/_laT _dze g+hI a te/_lung _a dze g+h+yI yiSh+Ta/_liT _dze g+h+yI yAM tsa kre/_sogs so/_!_/de bzhin du/_d+h+yA sgra dang me kun nas sbyor ba la'o zhes pa la/_yang sbyar/_mdo 'dis mtha' Ita du bsgyur/_gnyis brjod/_ma phyis/_thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/_a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/_d+ha da/_yang 'jig pa sogs kyis 
[\[392b.4\]]yon tan byas pas/_laT _de D+h+yI ya te/_lung a de d+h+me yiSh+Ta/_liT _de d+h+yI yAM tsa kre/_sogs so/_!_/shIng nyal ba la'o zhes pa la/_yang sbyar/_a yang kI ti/_kA nga 'gro ba la a yang ngo /_rkyen pa yig dang bo ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la shing gi mtha' a yang du bsgyur te/_da dbyangs 'gog pa'i 
[\[392b.5\]]don dang ya'i a brjod don no/_I a yang du bsgyur/_kita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/_laT _shA shay+Ya te/_lung _a shA sha yiSh+Ta/_liT _shA sha yAM tsa kre/_sogs so/_!_/D+hA+au kr-i 'gro ba pa'o zhes pa la/_yang sbyar/_gnyis brjod/_thung ngu 'os/_au Ur bsgyur/_yang 'jig pa sogs 
[\[392b.6\]]kyis de slar yon tan/_a g+h+yA sa'i tsa ra 'ang 'os/_D+ha Dar bsgyur bas/_laT _Do D+ho kya te/_ling _Do D+ho kye ta/_loT _Do D+hau kya tAM/_lang _aDo D+hau kya ta/_lung _a Do D+hau kiSh+Ta/_liT _Do D+hau kAMtsa kre/_luT _Do D+hau ki tA/_smod ling _Do D+hau ki ShI Sh+Ta/_l+r-iT _Do D+hau ki Sh+ya te/_l+r-ing /_a Do D+hau ki Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU 
[\[392b.7\]]trAta ya dan+tAHsamA p+tAH/_zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las yang gi mtha' rnams rdzogs so//_//de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni bya ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las yang 
[\[393a\]]
[\[393a.1\]]rkyen gyi mtha' can rnams kyi cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so//_//da ni yang rkyen 'jig pa'i cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/_ya ngonya tsi tsa/_yang gi a tsa la yang ngo /_yang gi rkyen ni rkyen a tsa dad pa can pha rol dang gzhan 
[\[393a.2\]]yang mang po la 'jig go zhes pa ni spyir btang ba'o/_rkyen phyis kyang rkyen gyi bya ba gnyis brjod pa sogs ni mi gnas pa ma yin no/_yang gi rkyen gnas pa thams cad la laT sogs ata ma ne pa da rnams sbyor zhing /_yang rkyen 'jig pa thams cad la laT sogs par smai par rnams sbyor te/
[\[393a.3\]]yang 'jig pa las shapa kyang rtag tu 'jig go/_/ya ngo bA/_yang las yang na'o/_yang 'jig pa las pha rol gyi byings thams cad pa ha la dang po pa 'gro ba'i ming can la Ita A ga ma yang na 'gyur te/_b+hu yod pa la/_yang /_san yang dag la 'os byings gnyis brjod/_yang gi a tsa la'ang ngos yang 
[\[393a.4\]]'jig//thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/_yang 'jig pa dag gi yon tan nos a b+h+yas yon tan/_a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/_b+ha ba/_la ti pa/_mdo 'dis IT yang na bar byas yon tan byas pas/_bo b+ha bI ti 'am/_yang na bo b+ho ti/_skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig sogs thams cad la/_b+hU/_bo b+hUr bsgyur 
[\[393a.5\]]pa'i bang chog 'dra/_la tas su bsgyur bas/_bo tU taH/_mang tshig la/_a b+h+ya sta las ata 'os/_dz+ha ata du bsgyur/_a tsa la sh+nu byings sogs kyi u bar bsgyur bas/_bo b+hU ba ti/_de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_bo b+ha bI Shi/_bo b+ho Shi/_bo b+hU thaH/_bo b+hU tha/_skyes bu phyi 
[\[393a.6\]]ma gsum la/_bo b+ha bI mi/_bo b+ho mi/_bo b+hU baH/_bo b+hU maH/_ling gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_bo b+hU yAta/_bo b+hU yA tAM/_bo b+hU yuH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_bo b+hU yAH/_bo b+hU yA tAM/_bo b+hU yA ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_bo b+hU yAM/_bo b+hU yA ba/_bo b+hU yA ma/_loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/
[\[393a.7\]]bo b+ha bI tu/_bo b+ho tu/_bo b+hU tA ta/_bo b+hU tAM/_bo b+hU ba tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_bo b+hU ti/_bo b+hU tA ta/_bo b+hU tAM/_bo b+hU ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_bo b+ha bI ni/_bo b+ha bA ba/_ba b+ha bA ma/_lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a bo b+ha bIta/_a bo b+ho ta/_a bo b+hU tAM/_a bo b+hU buH/_si tsa a b+h+ya stsa sogs kyis dz+hi dzus/
[\[393b\]]
[\[393b.1\]]skyes byung bus ma gsum la/_a bo b+ha bIH/_a bo b+hoH/_a bo b+hU taM/_a bo b+hA ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a bo g+ha bi/_a bo b+hU ba/_a bo b+hU ma/_lung la/_gA ti s+thA b+hU sA b+hu sogs kyi si tsa phyis pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a po b+hU ta/_a bo b+hU tAM/_a bo b+ha bu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a 
[\[393b.2\]]bo b+hUH/_a bo b+hU taM/_a bo b+hU ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a be b+hU baM/_a bo b+hU ba/_a bo b+hU ma/_liT la kas sogs kyis A ma sbyar bas/_bo b+ha bAM tsa kA ra/_bo b+hi pAM ba b+hU ba/_bo b+ha bA mA sa/_sogs dar/_'grel par skabs 'ga' zhig tu yang 'jig _si tsa a th+ya sta sogs kyis dz+hiM dzul /_dzus la'ang ngos yon tan/
[\[393b.3\]]pa la A ma mi sbyor ba yang srid do zhes byung bas/_A ma ma sbyar ba'i _b+hU'i lung liT dag la b+hu'i buka 'os buka A ga ma/_phyogs la/_a tsa dang po rnams la/_b+hU'i lung liT dag buka 'os buka A ga ma byin pas/_skyes bu dang gsum la/_bo b+hU ba/_bo b+hU btuH/_bo b+hU buH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_bo b+hU bi tha/
[\[393b.4\]]bo b+hU ba thuH/_bo b+hU ba/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_bo b+hU pa/_bo b+hU bi ba/_bo b+hU bi ma/_yang na buka ma byin par tsa pa gnyis la 'phel ba dang /_thal la yon tan gzhan rnams la/_a tsa la sh+nu byings sogs kyi u bar bsgyur bas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_bo b+hA ba/_bo b+hU ba tuH/_bo b+hU buH/_skyes bu dbus 
[\[393b.5\]]ma gsum la/_bo b+ha bi tha/_bo b+hU ba thuH/_bo b+hu ba/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_bo b+hA ba/_bo b+ha ba/_bo b+hu bi ba/_bo b+hu bi ma/_luT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/_bo b+ha bi tI/_bo b+ha bi tA si/_sogs so/_smon pa'i ling la/_bo b+hU yA ta/_bo b+hU yA stAM/_bo b+hU yA suH/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la iT byin yon tan byas 
[\[393b.6\]]pas/_bo b+ha biSh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du l+r-ing la/_a bo b+ha biSh+yata/_sogs so/_!_/pany+tsu 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la/_yang sbyar/_gnyis brjod/_pany+tsu _sraM su _d+hAM su/_b+h+raM su sogs kyis nIka A ga ma byin/_yang gi atsa la'ang ngos yang phyis pas/_ba nI nga ny+tsa zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar 
[\[393b.7\]]bas/_skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_yang las yang na 'os iT yang na par byas/_IT med pa'i phyogs la/_tsu'i bu byas pas/_ba nI baM tsI ti/_pa nI bi k+ti/_gnyis tshig la ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis/_tsu'i ku 'os tsa kar bsgyur bas/_pa nI baM k+taH/_mang tshig la/_a 
[\[394a\]]
[\[394a.1\]]b+h+ya sta las ata 'os dz+nya ata du bsgyur bas/_ba nI baM tsa ti/_de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ba nI baM tsI Shi/_ba nI baM k+Shi/_ba nI bak+thaH/_ba nI bak+tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ba nI baM tsI mi/_ba nI baMts+mi/_ba nI baM tswaH/_ba nI baM tsa maH/_liT la 
[\[394a.2\]]ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis pas/_baha nI ba ts+yata/_ba nI ba ts+yA tAM/_ba nI bi ts+yuH/_sogs so/_/loT la laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ba nI baM tsI tu/_ba nI bok+tu/_ba nI baMk+tA ta/_ba nI bak+tAM/_ba nI ba tsa tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_ba nI bag+d+hi/_ba nI 
[\[394a.3\]]bak+tA ta/_ba nI bak+taM/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ba nI baM tsA ni/_ba nI baM tsA ba/_ba nI baM tsA ma/_de bzhin du/_lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a ba nI baM ts+tsi ta/_a ba nI banra/_i dkyi 'ang ngos i phyis ha la dI ba sogs kyis ta phyis/_brtsegs pa'i mtha' dbyi 'os tsa phyis/_a ba nI bak+tAM/_a ba nI ba tsuH/_skyes bu dbus ma 
[\[394a.4\]]gsum la/_a ba nI bi tsI:/_a pa nI ba na/_a ba nI bak+taM/_a ba nI bak+ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ang nI baM tsi/_a ba nI btsA/_a ba nI bats+ma/_lung la iT sbyar bas/_a ba nI baM tsI ta/_a ba nI baM tsiSh+TaM/_a ba nI baM tsi ShuH/_sogs so/_liT la kAs sogs kyi A ma _si tsa a b+h+ya sta logs kyis dz+hi dzus/
[\[394a.5\]]sbyar bas/_ba nI baM tsi k+Shar/_sogs so/_luT la iT byin pas/_ba nI bi tsi tA/_ba nI baM tsi tA si/_sogs so/_smon pa'i ling la/_ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis pas/_ba nI ba ts+yata/_ba nI ba ts+ya stAM/_ba nI ba ts+yI suH/_l-iT la iT byin pas/_ba ni baM tsi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du l+r-ing la/_a 
[\[394a.6\]]ba nI baM tsi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/ga m+l-i 'gro ba la/_yang sbyar/_gnyis brjod/_rjes su sna ldan mtha'i sogs kyi nuka A ga ma byin/_kuha dag gi tsu/_na nga ror byas/_yang phyis pas/_dzi ga ma zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_yang las yang na 'os IT yang na bar 
[\[394a.7\]]byas pas/_dzi ga mI ti/_dzi gaM ti/_gnyis tshig la/_rjes su sna ldan nye ba'i yul sogs kyis ma phyis pas [ \[] [\] ]mang tshig la/_a b+h+ya sta las ata 'os/_dz+ha ata/_ga ma ha na sogs kyis yang na u ba d+hA phyis bas/_dzi ga ma ti/_de bzhin du/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_dzi ga mI Shi/
[\[394b\]]
[\[394b.1\]]dzi gaM si/_dzaM ga thaH/_dzi ga tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_dzi ga mi mi/_dza ga n+mi/_dzi ga n+wa/_dzi ga n+ma/_ling la/_dzi ga mya ta/_dzi ga myA tAM/_dzi ga myuH/_sogs so/_/loT la laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_dzaM ga mI tu/_dzaM gaM tu/_dzaM ga tA ta/_dzi ga tAM/_dzaM ga ma tu/_dzi g+ma tu/_skyes bu dbus ma 
[\[394b.2\]]gsum la/_dzaM ga hi/_dzaM ga tA ta/_dzaM ga taM/_dzaM ga ta/_skyes bu phyi ma/_ba ma dag la'ang ngos mra na/_gsum la/_dzaM ga mA ni/_dzaM ga mA pa/_dzaM ga mA ma/_de bzhin du/_lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a dzaM ga mA ta/_a dzaM ga ma/_a dzaM ga tAM/_a dzaM ga muH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a dza ga mIH/_a dzaM ga ma/
[\[394b.3\]]a dzaM ga taM/_a dzaM ga ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a dzaM ga maM/_a dzaM ga n+wa/_a dzaM gan+ma sogs so/_/lung la iT byin pas/_a dzaM ga mI ta/_a dzaM ga maSh+DaM/_a dzaM mi ShuH/_sogs so/_/liT la A ma sbyar bas/_dzaM ga mAM tsa kA ra sogs so/_/luT la iT byin bas/_dzaM ga mi tA/_dzaM ga 
[\[394b.4\]]mi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_dzaM ga myA ta/_dzaM ga myA stAM/_dzaM ga myA suH_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la iT byin pas/_dzaM ga mi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du l+r-ing la/_a dzaM ga mi Sh+yata/_sogs so/_!_/ha na 'tshe ba la'o zhes pa la yang /_gnyis brjod/_ku ha dag gi tsu/_a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 
[\[394b.5\]]'ang ngos/_dz+ha dza/_rjes su sna ldan mtha'i sogs kyis nuka A ga ma/_de ra ror byas/_a b+h+ya sta las a ta 'os/_ha g+har bsgyur bas/_dzaM g+ha na/_zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar/_skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_yang las yang na 'os/_iT yang na bar byas pas/_dzaM g+ha nI ti/_dzaM gan+ti/_gnyis 
[\[394b.6\]]tshig la/_rjes su sna ldan nye ba'i yul sogs kyis na phyis pas/_dzaMg+ha taH/_mang tshig la/_a b+h+ya sta las ata'os/_dza a ta/_ga ma ha na sogs kyis u pa d+hA yang na phyis pas/_dzaM g+ha na ti/_dzaM g+ha ti/_de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_dzaM ga nI Sha/_dzaM b+ha n+si/

[\[395a\]]
[\[395a.1\]]gsum la/_dzi g+ha hi/_dzi ga tA tA/_dzi g+ha ti/_dzi g+ha ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_dzi g+ha nA ni/_dzaMg+ha nA ba/_dzaM g+ha nA ma/_de bzhin du/_lar gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a dzi g+ha nI ta/_a dzi g+ha na/_a dzi g+ha tAM/_a dzi g+ha nuH/_a dzi b+hUH/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a dzi g+ha niH/_a dzi g+ha na/_a 
[\[395a.2\]]dzi g+ha taM/_a dzi g+ha ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a dzi g+ha naM/_a dzi g+ha n+wa/_a dzi g+ha n+ma/_lung la iT byin pas/_a dzi g+ha nIta/_a dzi g+ha ni Sh+N+waM/_a dzi g+ha ni Shu:/_sogs so/_/liT la A ma sbyar bas/_dzi g+ha nAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_/luT la iT byin pas/_dzi g+ha ni tA/_dzi g+ha ni tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i 
[\[395a.3\]]ling la/_dzi g+ha n+ya ta/_dzi g+ha n+ya staM/_dzi g+ha n+yA su:/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la iT byin bas/_dzi g+ha ni Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_l+r-ing la/_a dzi g+ha ni Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/tsa ra 'gro ra la'o zhes pa la yang sbyar/_gnyis brjod/_tsa ra pha la dag gi 'ang ngos/_nuka A ga ma byin/_ata las pha rol gyi uta 
[\[395a.4\]]'os uta du bsgyur/_yang gi a tsa la'ang ngos yang phyis pas/_tsi tsur zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_yang las yang na 'os/_IT yang na bar byas/_yon tan mi byed bas/_tsaM tsu rI ti/_tsaM tsU rti/_gnyis tshig la ha la las kyang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/_tsaM tsU rta:/
[\[395a.5\]]mang tshig la/_a b+h+ya sta las ata 'os/_dz+nya ata du bsgyur bas/_tsi tsu ra ti/_de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs bas/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tsi tsu rI Shi/_tsaM tsU rI/_tsi tsU r+tha:/_tsi tsU r+tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsi tsu rI mi/_ha la las kyang ngos ring por bsgyur/_tsi tsU rmi/_tsi tsU rba:/_tsi tsU rma:/_ling la ha la 
[\[395a.6\]]las kyang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/_tsi tsU r+YA ta/_tsi tsU r+Yuta/_tsaM tsUr+YuH/_sogs so/_/loT la laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tsi tsu rI tu/_tsi tsU rtu/_tsi tsU rtA ta/_tsi tsU rtaM/_tsi tsu rta tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tsi tsU r+t+hi/_tsi tsU rtA ta/_tsi tsU rtaM/_tsi tsU rta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum 
[\[395a.7\]]la/_tsi tsu rA Ni/_tsi tsu rA ba/_tsi tsu rA ma/_de bzhin du lang ga skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a tsi tsu rIta/_a tsi tsu:/_a tsi tsU rtA/_a tsi tsu r+ya:/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a tsi tsU rI:/_a tsi tsu:/_a tsi tsU rtaM/_a tsi tsU rta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a tsi tsu raM/_a tsi tsU rba/_a tsi tsU rma/_lung la iT byin pas/
[\[395b\]]
[\[395b.1\]]a tsi tsu rI ta/_a tsi tsu ri Sh+TaM/_a tsi tsu ri Shu:/_sogs so/_/liT la A ma sbyar/_tsi tsu rI tsa kA ra sogs so/_/luT la iT byin pas/_tsi tsu ri tA/_tsi tsu ri tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_ha la las kyang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/_tsi tsU r+Ya ta/_tsi tsU r+YA stAM/_tsi tsU r+YA su:/_sogs so/_/l+r-iT la 
[\[395b.2\]]iT byin pas/_tsi tsu ri Sh+ya ti/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du l+r-ing la/_a tsi tsu ri sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/kha na rko ba la'o zhes pa la yang sbyar/_gnyis brjod/_ku ha dag gi tsu 'os/_kha tsha/_a b+h+yA sa'i tsa ra 'ang ngos/_tsha tsa/_rjes su sna ldan mtha'i sogs kyis nuka I ga ma byin/_yang gi a tsa la 
[\[395b.3\]]'ang ngos ya phyis pas/_tsi kha na/_zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar/_skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_yang las yang na 'os/_IT yang na bar byas pas/_tsi kha nI ti/_tsi kha n+ti/_gnyis tshig la/_dza na kha na/_sa na sogs kyis Ti Ata du bsgyur bas/_tsi khA ta:/_mang tshig la/_a b+h+ya sta las aT 'os 
[\[395b.4\]]dz+ha ata du bsgyur/_ga ma ha na kha na sogs kyis u ba d+hA yang na phyis pas/_tsi kha na ti/_tsi kh+na ti/_de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tsi kha nI Shi/_tsi kha n+si/_tsi khA tha:/_tsi khA tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsi kha nI mi/_tsi kha n+mi/_tsi kha n+wa:/_tsi kha n+ma/_ling la/_tsi 
[\[395b.5\]]kha n+yAta/_tsi kha n+yA tAM/_tsi kha n+yu:/_sogs so/_/loT la laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/_tsi kha nI tu/_tsi kha n+tu/_tsi khA tA ta/_tsi khA tAM/_tsi kha na tu/_tsi kh+na tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_tsi khA hi/_tsi khA tA ta/_tsi khA taM/_tsi khA ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsi kha nA ni/_tsi kha nA ba/_tsi kha nA ma/_de bzhin 
[\[395b.6\]]du lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a tsi kha nI ta/_a tsi kha na/_a tsi khA tAM/_a tsi kha nu:/_a tsi kh+nu:/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a tsi kha nI:/_a tsi kha na/_a tsi kha taM/_a tsi kA ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a tsi kha naM/_a tsi kha n+wa/_a tsi kha n+ma/_la yig lhag ma rnams la rim pa bzhin 
[\[395b.7\]]lung _a tsi nI ta/_liT _tsi kha nAM tsi ka ra/_luT _tsi kha ni tA/_smon ling _tsi kha n+yA ta/_l+r-iT _tsi kha ni Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a tsi kha na Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/di bu rtse ba la'o zhes pa la/_yang byin/_gnyis brjod/_yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan/_yang gi a tsa la'ang ngos/_yang phyis/_de di ba ces grub pa la laT 
[\[396a\]]
[\[396a.1\]]sogs sbyar/_skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_yang las yang na 'os/_IT yang na bar byas pas/_ITa'i phyogs la/_de di bI ti/_IT med pa'i phyogs la/_tshwo:/_shU Tha nu nA si ke tsa/_tsha ba dag gi rjes su sna ldan la'ang shra U Sh+ra dag go/_/byings mtha'i tsha yig dang ba 
[\[396a.2\]]yig ni kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen kwa dang /_rjes su sna ldan dang /_dz+ha la dang po ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can rnams pha rol la rim pa bzhin tshu shra dang bra U Tha zhes par bsgyur bar bya'o/_'grel par lu ba drangs pa/_yang lu ki shU thau bA dz+ha li ba ka re/_yang 'jig pa la shra U Tha dag dz+ha la dang ba yig la yang na'o/_byings 
[\[396a.3\]]mtha'i tsha yig dang ba yig dag yang 'jig pa na/_k+ngita ma yin kyang dz+ha la dang po can dang ba yig pha rol la rim pa bzhin shra U Tha dag tu yang na 'gyur te/_U Thar bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_ika gi atsa la ya Na dang /_de nas yon tan/_U Tha ra ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_ba ya dag gis pa la la dbyi 
[\[396a.4\]]'os ba phyis yon tan byas pas/_de d+yo ti/_de de ti/_gnyis tshig la/_U Tha ra bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas/_ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_ba ya dag gi ba la la dbyi 'os ba phyis pas/_de d+hU ta:/_de di ta:/_mang tshig la/_a b+h+ya sta las ata 'os dz+nya ata du bsgyur bas/_de di ba ti/_de rnams dang 
[\[396a.5\]]'dra bar bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_de di bI Shi/_de di Shi/_de de Shi/_de d+yA tha/_de di tha:/_de di tha:/_de d+yU tha/_de di tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_de di bI mi/_de d+yo mi/_de de mi/_de d+yA ba:/_de d+yU ma:/_de di ma:/_ling la/_de di byA tAM/_de di byu:sogs so/_loT la laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas 
[\[396a.6\]]skyes bu dang po gsum la/_de di thI tu/_de d+yo tu/_de de tu/_de d+yU tAM/_de di tAM/_de di ba tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_de d+yU ti/_de d+yU tA ta/_de d+yU taM/_de di taM/_de d+yU ta/_de di ta:/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_de di bI naM/_de di bA ba/_de di bA ma/_de bzhin du lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a de di bIta/_a de d+yod/_a de de ta/
[\[396a.7\]]a de d+yU tAM/_a de di tAM/_a de di pu:/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a de di bI:/_a de d+yo:/_a de de:/_a de d+yU to/_a de de taM/_a de d+yU ta/_a de di ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a de di baM/_a de d+yU ba/_a de di ba/_a de d+yU ma/_lung la iT byin pas/_a de di bIta/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_la yig/
[\[396b\]]
[\[396b.1\]]lhag ma rnams la/_liT _de di bAM tsa kA ra/_luT _de di bi tA/_smon ling _de dI byA ta/_l+r-iT _de di bi Sh+ya taM/_l+r-ing _a de di pi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_bi tsha 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la yang sbyar/_gnyis brjod/_yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan/_yang gi a tsa la'ang ngos yang phyis pas/_be bi tsha zhes pa la laT sogs 
[\[396b.2\]]sbyar/_skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_yang las yang na 'os Ita yang na bar byas/_IT med pa'i phyogs la/_bra sh+tsa b+h+ra s+ja sogs kyis tsha'am sha Sha/_Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os ta Ta/_yon tan byas pas/_be bi tshI ti/_be biSh+Ti/_gnyis tshig la/_pra sh+tsa b+h+ra s+tha sogs kyis tsha 'am sha Sha/_Sha Tu la Sha 
[\[396b.3\]]Tu 'os ta Tar bsgyur bas/_be biSh+Ta:/_mang tshig la/_a b+h+yA sta las ata 'os dz+ha ata du bsgyur bas/_be bi tsha ti/_de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_be bitshI Shi/_be bi k+Shi/_be biSh+Tha:/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_be bitshI mi/_be bi sh+ma:/_be bi shwa:/_be+e bi tshwa:/_be bi 
[\[396b.4\]]sh+ma:/_ling la/_bi bi tsh+yA ta/_be bi tsh+yA tAM/_be bi tsh+yu:/_sogs so/_/loT la laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs bas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_bi bi tshI tu/_be biSh+DaM/_be biSh+DaM/_be bi tsha tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_be bi b+hi/_be biSh+DA ta/_be biSh+TaM/_be biSh+Ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_be bi tshA ni/_be bi tshA pa/_be 
[\[396b.5\]]bi tshA ma/_de bzhin du/_lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a be bi tshi ta/_a be beT/_a be biSh+TAM/_a be bi tshu:/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a be bi tshI:/_a be biT/_a be biSh+TaM/_a be biSh+Ta:/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a be bi tshi/_a be bi shwa/_a be bi tshwa/_a be bi sh+ma/_la yig lhag ma rnams 
[\[396b.6\]]la/_lung _a be bi tshIta/_liT_be bi tshI tsa kA ra/_luT _be bi tshi tA/_smon ling _be bi tsh+yA ta/_l+r-iT/_be bi tshi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a be bi tshi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_yu bsre ba la'o zhes pa la/_yang sbyar/_gnyis brjod/_yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan byas/_yang gi a tsa la'ang ngos yang phyis pas/_yo yu zhes pa 
[\[396b.7\]]la laT sogs sbyar bas/_skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_yang las yang na 'os IT yang na bar byas/_yon tan byas pas/_yo ya bI ti/_yo yo ti/_gnyis tshig la/_yo yu ta:/_mang tshig la/_a b+h+ya sta las ata 'os dz+ha a ta du bsgyur/_a tsa la sh+mu byings sogs kyis u bar bskyar bas/_yo
[\[397a\]]
[\[397a.1\]]yu ba ti/_de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrub pas/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_yo ya bI Shi/_yo yo Shi/_yo yu thaH/_yo yu tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_yo ya bI mi/_yo yo mi/_yo yu ba:/_yo yu ma:/_ling la kr-ita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/_yo yU yAta/
[\[397a.2\]]yo yU yA tAM/_yo yU yu:/_sogs so/_/loT la laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_yo ya bI tu/_yo yo tu/_yo yu tA ta/_yo yu tAM/_yo yu ba tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_yo yu hi/_yo yu tA ta/_yo yu taM/_yo yu ta/_yo yA bA ni/_yo ya bA ba/_yo ya bA ma/_de bzhin 
[\[397a.3\]]du lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a yo ya bIta/_a yo yota/_a yo yu tAM/_a yo ya bu:/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a yo ya bA:/_a yo yo:/_a yo yu tAM/_a yo yu ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a yo ya baM/_a yo yu ba/_a yo yu ma/_la yig lhag ma rnams la/_lung _a 
[\[397a.4\]]yo ya bI ta/_liT _yo ya bAM tsa kA ra/_luT _yo ya bi tA/_smon pa'i ling _yo yU yAta/_l+r-iT _yo ya bi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a yo ya bi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/o hA ka gtong ba la'o zhes pa la/_yang sbyar/_gnyis brjod/_thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/_ku ha da ga gi tsu/_a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/_dz+ha dza/_ka 'gro ba ma 
[\[397a.5\]]yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur/_yang gi atsa la'ang ngos ya phyis pas/_dzA hA/_zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar/_skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_IT yang bar byas/_ITa'i phyogs la IT mtshams sbyar bas/_dzA hi ti/_dzA hA ti/_gnyis tshig la/_g+hu min pas ha la la I 'os/
[\[397a.6\]]A Ir bsgyur bas/_dzA hA ta:/_mang tshig la/_a b+h+ya sta las ata'o/_dz+ha a ta/_sh+nA a b+h+ya sta dag gi ata kyi 'os a phyis pas/_dzA ha ti/_de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_dzA he Shi/_dzA hA si/_dzA hI tha:/_dzA hI tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_dzA he mi/_dzA hA mi/
[\[397a.7\]]dzA hI ba:/_dzA hI ma:/_ling la ya la dbyi 'os A phyis pas/_dzA h+yA ta/_dzA h+yA tAM/_dzA h+yu:/_sogs so/_/loT la laT ltar bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_dzA he tu/_dzA hA tA/_dzA hI tA ta/_dzA hI tAM/_dzA ha tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_dzA hI hi/_dzA hI tA ta/_dzA hI tAM/_dzA hI ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_dzA 
[\[397b\]]
[\[397b.1\]]hA ni/_dzA hA ba/_dzA hA ma/_de bzhin du lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a dzA ti ta/_a dA hA ta/_a dzA hI tAM/_a dzA hu:/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a dzA hi:/_a dzA tAH/_a dzA hI taM/_a dzA hI ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a dzA hAM/_a dzA hI ba/_a dzA hI ma/_la yig lhag ma rnams la/_lung _a dzA hiSh+Ta/_liT _dzA 
[\[397b.2\]]hAM tsa kA ra/_luT _dzA hi tA/_smon ling _dzA h+yA ta/_l+r-iT_dzA hi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a dzA hi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_daM sha mche ba la'o zhes pa la/_yang /_gnyis brjod/_dza ba/_dza b+ha sogs kyis nu ka A ga ma byin/_yang phyis pas/_daM daM sha zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar/_skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_IT yang na bar byas/_ITa'i 
[\[397b.3\]]phyogs la na phyis pas/_daM da shI ti/_daM daM Sh+Ti/_gnyis tshig la/_ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis/_bra sh+tsa b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis sha Sha/_Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os ta Tar bsgyur bas/_daM daSh+Ta:/_mang tshig la/_a b+h+ya sta las ata 'os dz+ha ata du bsgyur bas/_daM da sha ti/_de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs 
[\[397b.4\]]pas/_skyes dbus ma gsum la/_daM da shi Shi/_daM daM k+Shi/_daM daM Sh+Tha:/_daM da Sh+Tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_daM da shI mi/_daM daM sh+mi/_daM da shwa:/_daM da sh+ma:/_ling la iT 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis drangs pas/_daM da sh+yA ta/_daM da sh+yA tAM/_daM da sh+yu:/_sogs so/_/loT la laT ltar bsgrubs bas/_daM da shI 
[\[397b.5\]]tu/_daM daM Sh+Tu/_daM da Sh+TA ta/_daM da Sh+TAM/_daM da sha tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_daM da D+ny+ha/_daM da Sh+TA ta/_daM daM Sh+TaM/_daM daM Sh+Ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_daM daM shA ni/_daM daM shU ba/_daM daM shA ma/_de bzhin du/_lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a daM da shi ta/_a daM da na/_a daM da Sh+TAM/_a daM da shu:/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/
[\[397b.6\]]a daM da shI:/_a da dan/_a daM daSh+TaM/_a daM da Sh+Ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a daM daM shi/_a daM da shwa/_a daM da sh+ma/_la yig phyi ma rnams la/_lung _a daM daM shI ta/_liT _daM daM shAM tsa kA ra/_luT _daM daM sh+yI tA/_smon ling /_daM da sh+yA ta/_l+r-iT _daM daM shi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a daM daM shi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_nyi Sha ba nyal ba la'o 
[\[397b.7\]]zhes pa la yang sbyar/_sA pi s+ya mi dag gi yang la 'os saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur/_gnyis brjod/_yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan/_yang gi a tsa la 'ang ngos yang phyis pas/_so Shu pa ces pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_skyes bu dar po'i tshig la/_IT yang na bar byas bas/_so Shu pI ti/
[\[398a\]]
[\[398a.1\]]so Sho b+ti/_gnyis tshig la/_so Shu b+ha:/_mang tshig la dz+ha ata du bsgyur bas/_so Shu pa ti/_de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_so Shu pI Shi/_so Sho p+li/_so Shu p+tha:/_so Shu p+tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_so Shu pI mi/_so Shu p+mi/_so Shu p+ba:/_so Shu p+ma:/_ling la/_so

[\[398a.4\]]luT _so Shu bi tA/_smon ling /_so Shu byA ta/_l+r-iT _so Shu pi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a so Shu pi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/yang na saM pra sA ra Nar ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_ka 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis a b+h+yA sa ring por bsgyur bas/_sA swa pI ti/_sA swa p+ti/_sogs cho ga snga ma dang dang 'dra'o/_!_/b+hi dir 'joms pa la'o zhes pa la/_yang 
[\[398a.5\]]sbyar/_gnyis brjod/_a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos b+ha ba/_yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan/_yang gi a tsa la'ang ngos yang phyis pas/_be b+hid ces pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_iT yang na bar byas pas/_be b+hi dI ti/_be b+he t+ti/_gnyis tshig la/_kha ra la tsa ra 'os da tar 
[\[398a.6\]]bsgyur bas/_be b+hi t+ta:/_mang tshig la/_a b+h+ya sta las ata 'os/_a ta du bsgyur bas/_be b+hi da ti/_de bzhin du/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_be b+hi dI Shi/_be b+he t+si/_be b+hi t+tha:/_be b+hi t+tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_be b+hi bI mi/_be b+hi d+mi/_be b+hi dA:/_be b+hi d+ma:/_ling la/_be b+hi d+yA ta/_be b+hi d+yA tAM/_be b+hi d+yu:/_sogs
