[\[398b\]]
[\[398b.1\]]be b+he ta/_a be b+hi t+tAM/_a be b+hi du:/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a be b+hi dI:/_a be b+hi ta/_a be b+hi t+taM/_a be b+hi t+ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a be b+hi daM/_a be b+hi dwo/_a be b+hi d+ma/_na b+hA tu lo ba A r+d+ha d+hA tu ke/_byings phyis pa'i byings phyed pa la ma yin no/_yang phyis pa lta bu byings kyi cha shas phyis pa'i pha 
[\[398b.2\]]rol tu byings phyed/_dz+hi dzus _pa yon tan dang /_'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can byung yang byings de la 'phel ba dang yon tan sogs mi byed de/_la yig lhag ma rnams la/_lung _a be b+hi dI ta/_liT _be b+hi dI tsa kA ra/_luT _be b+hi di tA/_smon pa'i ling _be b+hi d+yA ta/_l+r-iT _be b+hi di Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a be b+hi di Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/br-i tu 'jug pa la'o 
[\[398b.3\]]zhes pa la/_yang sbyar/_gnyis brjod/_ta phyis/_ru gri kau tsa lu ki/_'jig pa la ru ka rig dag kyang ngo /_/byings r-i ta u pad+hA na yod pa'i a b+h+yA sa la yang 'jig pa pha rol la ru ka A ga ma dang rig A ga ma dang 'ang gi sgras rIka A ga ma rnams 'gyur te/_glo bur ba de rnams kyi ka gnas don dang ruka gi u 
[\[398b.4\]]brjod pa'i don te/_bar+b+r-i ta 'am/_ba ri br-i ta'am/_ba ri br-ita/_ces pa gsum po gang rung sgrub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la IT yang na bar byas pas/_bar+b+r-i tI ti/_barba r+t+ti/_gnyis tshig la/_bar+b+r-i t+ta:/_mang tshig la/_dz+ha ata du bsgyur bas/_bar+b+r-i ta ti/_de rnams dang 'dra bar 
[\[398b.5\]]bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_bar+b+r-i tI Shi/_barba r+t+si/_bar+b+r-i t+tha:/_bar+b+r-i tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_bar+b+r-i tI mi/_barba r+t+mi/_bar+b+r-i twa:/_bar+b+r-i t+ma:/_ling la/_bar+b+r-i t+yA ta/_bar+b+r-i t+yA tAM/_bar+b+r-i t+yu:/_sogs so/_/loT la laT ltar bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_bar+b+r-i rtI tu/_ba bar+t+ta/_bar+b+r-i t+tA ta/_bar+b+r-i t+tAM/
[\[398b.6\]]bar+b+r-i ta tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_bar+b+r-i t+t+hi/_bar+b+r-i t+taMta/_ba r+b+r-i t+taM/_bar+b+r-i t+ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_bar+b+r-i tA ni/_bar+b+r-i tA ba/_bar+b+r-i tA ma/_de bzhin du lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a bar+b+r-i tI ta/_a barba:/_a bar+b+r-i tAM/_a bar+b+r-i tu:/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a bar+b+r-i tI:/_a barba:/_a bar+b+r-i t+taM/_a bar+b+r-i t+ta/
[\[398b.7\]]skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a bar+b+r-i tAM/_a bar+b+r-i twa/_a bar+b+r-i t+ma/_lhag ma rnams la/_lung _a bar+b+r-i tI ta/_liT _bar+b+r-i tAM tsa kA ra/_luT _bar+b+r-i ti tA/_smon ling _bar+b+r-i t+yA ta/_l+r-iT _bar+b+r-i ti Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a bar+b+r-i rti Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/yang na/_dz+hi dzus/_ba ri br-i tI ti/_ba ri bar+t+ti/_sogs so/_/ba rI br-i tI ti/_ba rI bar+t+ti/_sogs te/_A ga 
[\[399a\]]
[\[399a.1\]]ma mi 'dra ba'i khyad par tsam ma gtogs cho ga gzhan rnams 'dra'o/_!_/gr-i d+hu mngon par 'dod pa la'o zhes pa la/_yang gnyis brjod/_r-i'i a ta/_ku ha dag gi tsu/_'jig pa la ru ka rika dag kyang ngos/_ruka A ga ma byin/_yang phyis pas/_dza r+b+r-i d+ha/_zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar/_skyes bu 
[\[399a.2\]]dang po'i gcig tshig la/_I ba yang na bar byas pas/_d+har 'dra ba dz+har rnams kyi 'os d+ha phyis/_dza r+g+r-i d+hI ti/_dzarga r+d+hi/_gnyis tshig la/_dz+ha Sha mtha' sogs kyis tad+ha/_dz+ha sha las dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha 'os d+ha dar bsgyur bas/_dza r+g+r-id+d+ha:/_mang tshig la/_dz+ha ata du bsgyur bas/_dzar+g+ra d+ha ti/_de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dbus ma 
[\[399a.3\]]gsum la/_dzar+g+r-i d+hI Shi/_dzarga d+har+d+h+mi/_dzar+g+r-i d+d+ha:/_dzanr-i t+t+ha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_dza r+n+r-i d+hI mi/_dzarga r+d+h+mi/_dza r+g+r-i dA:/_dzar+g+r-i d+h+ma:/_ling la/_dzar+g+r-i d+h+yA ta/_dzar+g+r-i d+h+yA tAM/_dzar+g+r-i r+d+h+yu:/_sogs so/_/loT la laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_dzar+g+r-i d+hI tu/_dzarga r+d+hu/_dzar+g+r-i d+d+hA ta/_dzar+g+r-i d+ha tu/_skyes bu 
[\[399a.4\]]dbus ma gsum la/_dza r+g+r-i d+d+hI/_dzar+g+r-i d+d+hA ta/_dzar+g+r-i d+d+hi/_dzar+g+r-i d+d+ha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_dzar+g+r-i d+hA ni/_dza r+g+r-i d+hA ba/_dzargi d+hA ma/_de bzhin du lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a dzar+g+r-i d+hI ta/_a dzarga:/_a dzar+g+r-i d+t+hAM/_a dzar+g+r-i d+hu:/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a dzar+g+r-i d+hI:/_a dzarga:/_a dzar+g+r-i d+t+hAM/_a dzar+g+r-i d+t+ha/_skyes bu 
[\[399a.5\]]phyi ma gsum la/_a dzar+g+r-i d+haM/_a dzar+g+r-id+h+ma/_a dzar+g+r-i d+h+ma/_lhag ma rnams la/_lung _a dzar+g+r-i d+hI ta/_liT _dzar+g+r-i d+hAM tsa kA ra/_luT _dzar+g+r-i d+hi tA/_smon ling _dzar+g+r-i d+h+yA ta/_l+r-iT _dzar+g+r-i d+hi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a dzar+g+r-i d+hi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/yang na rika 'am rIka A ga ma sbyar bas/_dza ri gr-i d+hI ti/_dza ri gar+d+hi/_sogs sam/_dza rI gr-i d+hI ti/_dza rI gar+d+hi/
[\[399a.6\]]sogs so/_!_/Du kr-inya byed pa la'o zhes pa la/_yang gnyis brjod/_r-i'i ata/_ku ha dag gi tsu/_ri ta/_sh+tsa/_r-i ta las kyang ngo /_byings r-ita mtha' can las kyang yang 'jig pa pha rol la a b+h+yAs la ruka dang rig dang rIka A ga ma rnams 'gyur te/_mdo 'dis ruka A ga ma byin/_yang gi a tsa la'ang 
[\[399a.7\]]ngos yang phyis pas/_tsar+k+r-i zhes pa la laT sogs sbyor te/_skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_a+ngiT yang na bar byas pas/_tsarka rI ti/_tsarka rti/_gnyis tshig la/_tsir+k+r-i ta:/_mang tshig la/_a b+h+ya sta las ata yos/_dz+ha ata/_ika gi atsa la ya Na byas pas/_tsar+k+ra ti/_de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas skyes 
[\[399b\]]
[\[399b.1\]]bu dbus ma gsum la/_tsarka rli Shi/_tsarki r+Sha/_tsar+k+r-itha:/_tsar+k+r-i tha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsarka rI mi/_tsarka rmi/_tsar+k+r-i pa:/_leng la/_tsar+k+r-i yAta/_tsar+k+r-i yA tAM/_tsar+k+r-i yu:/_sogs so/_/loT la laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po gsum la/_tsarka r-I tu/_tsarka rtu/_tsar+k+r-i tA ta/_tsar+k+r-i tAM/_tsar+k+ra tu/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/
[\[399b.2\]]tsar+k+r-i hi/_tsar+k+r-i nA ta/_tsar+k+r-i ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_tsarka rA Ni/_tsarka rA ba/_tsarka rA ma/_de bzhin du lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/_a tsarka rI ta/_a tsarka Sha la tsar+k+r-i tAM/_a tsarka tu:/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_a tsarka rI:/_a tsar+k+ra:/_a tsar+k+r-i taM/_a tsar+k+r-i ta/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_a tsarka ri/_a tsar+k+r-i ba/_a tsar+k+r-i ma/_lhag 
[\[399b.3\]]ma rnams la/_lung _a tsar+k+ri ta/_liT _tsar+k+r-I tsa kA ra/_luT _tsar+k+ri tA/_smon ling _tsar+k+ri thA ta/_l+r-iT _tsar+k+ri Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a tsar+k+r-i Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_/ri ka dar rI ka gnyis kyang glo bur ba'i khyad par ma gtogs laT sogs dang phrad pa'i cho ga 'dra ste/_tsa ri ka rI ti/_tsa ri karti/_sogs som/_tsa rI ka rA ti/_tsa rI karti/_sogs so/_/i ti bA Ni ni byA ka ra Na 
[\[399b.4\]]liT byin gi ka gi a tsa la ya Sha da A ma sbyAng yig gi a tsa la ya Na/_s+ya sU trA ta _sha yig ling rnams la ring 'os r-i lIng du bsgyur/_yang lu gan+nA:sa mA b+hA:/_zhes pa pA Ni ni b+hA ka ra Na'i mdo las yang 'jig pa'i mtha' rnams rdzogs so//_//de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po bA Ni ni byA ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs 
[\[399b.5\]]zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las/_yang 'jig pa'i mtha' can gyi cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so//_//gsum pa ming byings su bsgrubs pa'i kya tsa'i 'jug yul dang cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/_supa A rma na:kya tsha/_su pa 
[\[399b.6\]]yas bar dag nyid la kyatsa'o/_byings ming du bsgrubs zin supa 'jug pa'i yul la bdag nyid 'dod pa'i don la ming de nyid slar byings su bsgrubs ba'i rkyen kyatsa yang na 'gyur te/_tsa yig dbyangs 'gog pa'i don dang /_ka yig kyatsa la'ang ngos don no/_kya tsi tsa/_kyatsa la'ang ngo /_rkyen kyatsa pha rol la rtags 
[\[399b.7\]]mtha'i a yig ni Ita du bsgyur te/_bu dra zhes pa'i rtags la/_kyatsa sbyar/_rjes 'brel phyis/_mdo 'dis a Ita du bsgyur bas/_pu trI ya zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyor te/_byed pa po la sha pa/_ata las yon tan la 'os gnyis dag gi gcig pha rol gyi gzugs su bsgyur pas/_laT _phu 
[\[400a\]]
[\[400a.1\]]trI ya ti/_ling _putrI ya ta/_loT _pu trI ya tu/_lang _a putrI ya ta/_sogs dang /_lung la iT byin/_a ta kyi dbyi 'os a phyis bas/_a pu trI yI ta/_sogs so/_/liT la A ma sbyar a phyis bas/_putrAM yAM tsa kA ra/_but+nyi yAM ba b+hU ba/_pu trI yA mA sa/_sogs so/_/luT la iT byin a phyis pas/_bu trI yi tA/_bu trI 
[\[400a.2\]]yi tA si/_sogs so/_/bu 'dod par byed/_smon pa'i ling la a phyis bas/_bu trI y+YA stAM/_putrI y+YAsuH/_sogs so/_/l+riT la iT byin a phyis pas/_bu trI yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du l+r-ing la/_a pu trI yi Sh+yata/_sogs so/_!_/go zhes ba'i rtags la kya tsa sbyar/_ya'i rkyen la ba'i mtha' can nos a bar bsgyur bas/_ga 
[\[400a.3\]]bya zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar/_laT _ga bya ti/_lung _ug byita/_liT _ga byAMtsa kA ra/_luT _ga byi tA/_smon ling _ga byA ta/_sogs so/_!_/yang byings phyed rnams la kya'i 'dam ka 'os yang na la phyis pas/_lung _ag bIta/_liT _ga bAM tsa ka ra/_phuT _ga bi tA/_smon lung _ga byA ta_/l+r-iT _ga bi byAta/_l+r-iT _ga bi Sh+ya ti/_l+r-ing _a ga biSh+yata/_sogs sam/_a ga 
[\[400a.4\]]byI ta/_sogs so/_!_/de bzhin du/_nau shes pa'i rtags la kya tsa sbyar/_ya'i rkyen la pa'i mtha' _kya'i 'dam ka 'os y+ra/_can nos/_A bar bsgyur bas/_na bya/_zhes ba la laT sogs sbyar/_laT _nAbya ti/_anA byIta/_lung _anA bIta/_nA byAM tsa kAr/_liT _nA bAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/twa ta ces pa'i rtags la kya tsa sbyar bas/_twa ng+ya zhes 
[\[400a.5\]]pi la lags sogs sbyar/_laT _tA ng+ya ti/_a twa d+yItA/_lung a tA dI ta/_twa r+yAM tsa kA ra/_liT _tA dAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/de bzhin du mad ces pa la kya tsa sbyar bas/_laT _ma ng+ya ti/_a ma ng+yI ta/_lung _a ma ngIta/_ma d+yI tsa kA ra/_liT _ma dAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/yaSh+mad ces pa la kyatsa sbyar bas/_laT _yuSh+ma ng+ya ti/_a yuSh+ma d+yIta/_lung _a 
[\[400a.6\]]yuSh+ma dita/_yushaMSh+ma ng+y+naM tsa kA ra/_liT _yuSh+ma _khyod 'dod par byed/_dAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/de bzhin du/_laT _asma ng+ya ti/_Asma ng+yIta/_lung _A smad+yI ta/_asma ng+yAM tsa kA ra/_liT asma _bdag 'dod par byed/_dA tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/gi ra zhes ba'i rtags la kya tsa/_hal las kyang ngos u pang+hA ring por bsgyur bas/_khyod 'dod par byed/
[\[400a.7\]]laT _gIr+Ya ti/_smra bar 'dod/_agIr+YI ta/_lung _a gIrIta/_gIr+YAM tsa kA ra/_liT _gI rAtsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/deb ces bdag 'dod par byed/_bal rtags kyatsa/_hal las kyang ngos u ba ng+hA ring bor bsgyur bas/_laT _drI bya ti/_mtho ris 'dod/_a dI byI ta/_lung _a dI bIta/_dI byAM tsa kA ra/_liT _dI pAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/a das zhes pa'i rtags 
[\[400b\]]
[\[400b.1\]]la kyatsa sbyar bas/_laT _a das+ya ti/_de 'dod bar byed/_A da s+yI ta/_lung _A da sIta/_a da s+yAM tsa kA ra/_liT _a dasAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/kar+t+r-i zhes pa'i rtags la kya tsa sbyar/_raMta kyi rIng 'os rIng du bsgyur bas/_laT _ka r+t+rI ya ti/_byed par 'dod/_lung _a kar+t+rI yI ta/_liT _kar+t+rI yAM tsa kA ra_/_sogs so/_!_/gArga zhes pa'i rtags la kya tsa sbyar/_kya tsa 
[\[400b.2\]]las 'ang ngos IT du bsgyur bas/_phaT _gArgI ya ti/_lung _a gArgI yI ta/_liT _gArga'i yA tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_/naHkye/_na'i kya la'o/_/rkyen/_kyatsa/_kyang /_kyaSha rnams pha rol la rtags na mtha' can gyi na yig ni tshig mtha' dang 'dra bar dbyi ste/_rA dza na la kya tsa sbyar/_mdo 'dis na phyis/_kya tsal 'ang ngos I ta du bsgyur bas/_laT _rIdzA ya 
[\[400b.3\]]ti/_rgyal por 'dod/_lung _a rI dzI yI ta/_liT _rIdzI yAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/btsa zhes ba'i rtags la kyatsa sbyar bas/_laT _bac+yatI/_a bats+yita/_lung _a btsIta/_ba ts+yIta/_bats+yAM tsa kA ra/_leT ba tsI tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/ka bi zhes pa'i rtags la kyatsa sbyar/_kr-itam yin ba sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/_laT _ka bI ya ti/_lung _a ka bA+e yI ta/
[\[400b.4\]]liT _ka pI yAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_!_/sa mi ng+ha zhes ba'i rtags la kyatsa sbyar bas/_laT _sa mi ng+h+ya ti/_sbyin sreg gi shing 'dod/_brjod par 'dod/_sogs dang /_kya s+ya bi b+hA ShA kya'i 'dam ka'o/_/rtags hal mtha' can las pha rol gyi kya tsa dang /_kyang dang /_kya Sha rnams ni byings phyed pa pha rol la yang na dbyi ste/_a sa mi d+h+yIta/_lung _a sa 
[\[400b.5\]]mib+dIta/_saM mi ng+h+yAM tsa kA ra/_liT _sa mi ng+h+raM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_/namAnU bya ye b+h+yAH/_kyatsa/_ma mtha' dang mi zad ba rnams las kya tsa ma yin no/_/rtags ma mtha' can rnams dang mi zad pa rnams las rkyen kya tsa 'gyur ba ma yin te/ma mtha' can la/_ki mi ts+tsha ti/_mi zad pa la/_utse+e+u ri tsa ti/_sogs so/_/a sha nA yod n+ya 
[\[400b.6\]]ng+hanA yA bu b+hukA pi bA sA gar+ng+he Shu/_a shanA ya/_u da n+ya ng+ha nA ya rnams ltogs bskom pa 'dod pa rnams la'o/_/a shanA ya/_u da n+ya/_ng+nya nA ya rnams/_ltogs pa/_skom pa/_'dod pa rnams brjod pa la kya tsa'i mtha' can tshig phrad du bya ste/_a sha nA _ci 'dod par byed/_ya ti/_u da n+ya tho 'dod par byed/_ti/_ng+ha nA ya ti/_sogs 
[\[400b.7\]]so/_/ltogs pa sogs kyi don ma yin na kya tsa la'ang ngos I ta du bsgyur bas/_a sha nI ya ti/_khyab par 'dod/_u da kI ya ti/_chu 'dod bar byed/_ng+ha nI yati/_nor 'dod par byed/_sogs so/_/a shwak+ShI ra braMSha la ba NA mArma brI tau kya tsi/_a shwa _k+thor _br-iSha _la paN rnams kyi kya tsal bdag nyid dga' ba la'o/_/a shwa la 
[\[401a\]]
[\[401a.1\]]sogs pa rtags de rnams la kya tsa pha rol la bdag nyid dga' ba'i 'dod ba'i don la 'jug pa na suka A ga ma 'gyur te/_ka gnas don u brjod don no/_/a shwa s+ya ti baDa ba/_/k+ShI ras+ya ti bA la/_br-i Sha s+ya ti gauH/_la ba Na s+ya t+yuSh+TaH/_sogs so/_/'grel par rtags a tsa ngi mtha' can las kya tsa pha rol la 
[\[401a.2\]]'dod pa'o don la suka dang a suka A ga ma yang na 'gyur zhing glo bur ba de gnyis kyis 'ang Shar mi 'gyur zhes bshad pas/_da ng+hi s+ya ti/_da ng+h+yas+ya ti/_sogs sam/_rgod ma rta 'dod par byed/_byis pa ngos 'dod par byed/_ba glang 'dod par byed/_rnga mo tshA 'dod par byed/_yang na A ga ma ma byin kr-i tam yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/_dang+hI 
[\[401a.3\]]pa ti/_sogs so/_/bzhi pa kA mya tsa'i 'jug yul bshad pa ni/_kA myats+tsha kA mya tsa'ang ngo /_rtags las bdag nyid 'dod ba'i don la zho 'dod/_/kya tsar ma zad kA mya tsa yang 'gyur te tsa dbyangs don no/_!_/bu tu zhes pa'i rtags la kA myatsa sbyar bas/_laT _pu tra kA mya ti/_ling _pu tra kA myeta/_liT _loT pu trakA mya tu/_lang /_a pu trakA mya ta/_lung a pu 
[\[401a.4\]]zho 'dod/_trakA myIta/_liT bu tra kAmyAM tsa kAr/_luT pu trakA [{]myi [,]mi [}]tA/_smon leng pu trakA myAta/_liT putra kA [{]myi [,]mi [}]Sh+ya ti/_l+rong a pu trakA miSh+yata/_sogs so/_!_de bzhin du/_ya shas zhes pa'i rtags la kA mya tsa sbyar bas/_laT ya shaskA mya ti/_lung a su 'dod par byed/_ya shaskA myita/_liT yang shaskA myAM tsa kA/_sogs so/_/
[\[401a.5\]]de bzhin du/_serbeSha zhes pa'i rtags lakA myatsa sbyar bas/_laT sarbi Sh+kA myahal las yam rnams kyi yam la dbye 'os ya byis_/te/_sogs so/_!_/ki ma la kA myatsa sbyar bas/_laT kiM kA mya tsa sbyar bas/_laT kiM kA mya ti/_sogs so/_de bzhin du/_laT sraHkA mya te/_grags ba 'dod/_sogs so/_/u pa mAnA dA tsA re/_nye bar 'jal ba las kun spyod pa la'o/_/
[\[401a.6\]]rtags las nye bar 'jal ba'i kun spyod kyi don la'ang mar gsar bdod/_kyatsa pha rol tu 'gyur te/_bu tra mi bA ca ra ti/_zhes pa'i don la kya tsa sbyar/_kya tsal 'ang ngos Ita du bsgyur bas/_ci 'dod par byad/_putrIya ti mA Na ba kaM/_de bzhin mtho ris 'dod par byed/_du/_biSh+Nu ya ti dwi dzaH/_sogs so/_ang+hi ka raNAts+tsa/_lhag par byed 
[\[401a.7\]]pa las kyang ngo /_/ming la khang pa lta bu gzhi las lhag par byed ba'i nye bar 'jal ba'i kun spyod pa'i las bu bzhin du kun du spyod par byed/_kyang kyatsa 'gyur ta/_pra sAdAH/_ibAtsAr bu bzhin du sbyor bar byed bram ze'i bye'u/_tiku T+yaM/_khang chur la khang bzang bzhin spyod bar byed khyab 'jug bzhin spyod bar byed gnyis skyes/_zhes pa'i don 
[\[401b\]]
[\[401b.1\]]la/_bra sAdI ya ti kun+yaM/_khang chung la khang bzang bzhin sbyong par byed/_sogs so/_/kartuHkyang sa lo pash+tsa/_byed pa po las kyang ste sa dbyi ba 'ang ngo /_/ming las byed pa po la nye bar 'jal ba'i kun spyod pa'i don la kyang 'gyur zhing kyang gi rkyen pha rol la rtags mtha'i sa'ang yang na dbyi ste/_nga yig tang rnams 
[\[401b.2\]]sbyor ba'i do dang /_ka bya'i 'dam ka 'os spyi don no/_!_/pa yas zhes pa'i rtags la kyang sbyar sa dbye ba dang mi dbyi ba yang na bar byas pas/_sa phyis pa'i phyogs la/_kr-ita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/_laTapa yA ya te/_'o ma bzhin sbyong par byed/_ling nga yA yi ta/_loT pa yA 
[\[401b.3\]]ya tAM/_lang a pa yA ya ta/_lung a pa yA yiSh+Ta/_liT pa yA yAM tsa kre/_luT pa yA yi tA/_smon ling ba yA yi ShI Sh+Ta/_l+r-iT ba yA yi Sh+ya te/_l+r-ing a ba yA yi Sh+yata/_sogs dang /_sa mi dbyi ba'i phyogs la/_laT pa ya s+ya te/_lung a pa ya s+yiSh+Ta/_lung a pa ya siSh+Ta/_liT pa ya s+yI tsa kri/
[\[401b.4\]]zhiT pa ya sAM tsakre/_de bzhin du/_ku mA rI zhes pa la kyang /_kyang mA ni na dag la'ang ngos/_mo rkyen dI pa phyis kraMta ma yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas_/ku mA rA ya ti b-i+ung+hA/_sogs so/_/o dza so nyab+sa ra so ni t+yaM/_o dzas ab+sa ras dag gi rtag tu'o/_/o dzas dang ab+sa ras 
[\[401b.5\]]dag gis yig kyang pha rol la rtag tu dbyi ste/_sa phyis kr-itam yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/_odzAya te du rba laH/_ap+sArAya te kurU pa/_sogs so/_/su pU rba s+ya man so ni t+yaM/_su sngon _gzhon nu ma bzhin sbyong par byed rgan mo/_ma'i ma nas kyi rtag tu'o/_/nyer bsgyur su sngon ma'i nams kyis yig ni kyang pha rol la 
[\[401b.6\]]rtag tu dbyi ste/_sa byis/_kr-i tam yin pa sogs kyis ring bor bsgyur bas/_su ma nA ya te duSh+Ta ma naH/_shugs can du rlom ste snyobs ngan/_chu byung mar rlom ste gzugs nga nas/_sogs so/_/AtsA reg l+ma klI ba ho N+heb+h+yaHkwip+bA/_gal+ma/_kwI ba/_ho D+ha rnams las kun spyod ba la kwi ba yang na'o/_/gal+ma/_klI ga hoD+ha rnams las kun spyod pa'i don 
[\[401b.7\]]'akyang 'gyur zhing kwi ba'ang 'gyur te/_kwi ba kyi mtha' la yid zad du rlom ste bsam nag pa'am bsam ngan pa/_aT sogs hang rnams sbyor ro/_/gal+ma la/_kwi pa sbyar/_kwi pa yongs rdzogs phyis/_byings thams cad pa rnams la/_shab ata las yon tan la'o dang /_byings phyed pa rnams la bal dang bo'i iT dang liT 
[\[402a\]]
[\[402a.1\]]la Am sbyar a takyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/_laT gal+ma te/_ling gal+me ta/_loTag+matA/_lang a gal+mata/_lung a gal+miSh+Ta/_liT gal+m+waMtsa kre/_guT gal+mi tA/_smin ling gal+mi ShISh+ta/_/l+r-iT gal+mi Sh+ya te/_l+r-ir _a gal+mi Sh+ya ta/_sogs dang /_yang na kyang sbyar ring por bsgyur bas/_gal+mA ya te/
[\[402a.2\]]sogs so/_de bzhin du/_klAM ba te/_sogs sam/_klI bA ya te/_ho D+ja te/_haD+ha ya te/_sogs so/_de rnams tshig grogs dang sbyar ba'i dber brjod ni/_/gal+ma te tIk+Sh+NaH/_'jam bor rlom ste tsu ba po/_klI ba te pu ru ShaH/_ma ning bzhin spyod par byed smyes pa/_hoD+ha te baN+DitaH/_blun pa bzhin skyod bar byed mkhas ba/_'grel par gal+ma sogs su ma zad 
[\[402a.3\]]rtags thams cad la kun sbyod pa'i don la 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/_kr-iSh+Na ti/_nag por zhin spyod par byed/_swa ti/_bdag bzhin spyod par byed/_de ba ti/_lha bzhin spyod par byed/_sogs mtha' yas so/_/b+h+raM shA di b+h+yo b+hu bya tswe rla pash+tsa ha laH/_b+h+raM sha la sogs pa rnams las gyur pa la tswi ma yin pa las hal dbyi ba'ang ngo /_/
[\[402a.4\]]b+h-i sha la sogs pa rnams las shin tu ba ma yin ba shin tu bar gyur pa lta bu gsar byung gi don tswi byin pa'i mtha' ma yin pa la don de dag la kyang 'gyur zhing /_/kyang pha rol la rtags de rnams kyi mtha'i hal rnams kyang dbyi ste/_b+h+raMshA ya ste/_zhin du spyod par byed/_un+ma nA ya te/_mtho bar sems bar byed/_sogs te/_b+h+r-i 
[\[402a.5\]]sha sogs ni/_b+h+r-i sh+ka/_shin tu/_un+ma nas/_mtho bar sems/_shI g+hA/_myur pa/_paN+Di ta/_mkhas pa/_ut+su ka/_rtsol ba/_ab+hi ma nas/_mngon smom/_durma nas/_yid mi bde ba n-i bta/_mi ba dang /_shu tsi/_gtsang ba/_mI la/_sngon bo/_badzra/_rdorje/_phe Na/_lpug brtsas/_bshang ba/_ha ri ta/_ljang gu/_ma dra/_zab dbyangs/_sogs so/_'grel par de rnams la gsar byung gi 
[\[402a.6\]]don la kwi ba kyang yang na 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/_b+h+r-i sha te/_sogs so/_/lo hi tI ngi NA dz+b+yaHkya Sha/_lo hi ta la sogs pa dang DA tsa rnams las kyaSha'o/_lo hi ta la sogs pa rnams dang DA tsa'i mtha' rnams las gsar byung gi don la kya Sha kya Sha 'gyur te/_Sha yig/kyaSha las yang na 'os don dang /_ka yig kya'i 'dam 
[\[402a.7\]]ka 'os spyi don no/_/bA kyaShaHkya Sha yas yang na'o/_/kya Sha'i mtha' las laT sogs tang rnams 'gyur shing yang na a tang rnams kyang 'gyur te/_shin du dmar bar byed/_lo hi tA ye ti/_laT lo hitA ya ta/_lo hi NA yeta/_ling lo hi tA yaT ha/_lo hi tA ye ha/_lo hi tA yang tu/_loT lo hi NA nyAM/_a lo hi tA ya ta/_lang a lo hi dA ya ta/
[\[402b\]]
[\[402b.1\]]a lo hi tA yI ta/_lung a lo hi tA yiSh+Ta/_lo hi tA yAM tsa kA ra/_liT lo hi tA yAM tsa kri/_lo hi tA yi tA si _luT lo hi tA yi tA se/_lo hi tA y+YA ta/_smon ling lo hi tA yiShASh+Ta/_lo hi tA yi Sh+yati/_l+r-iT lo hi tA yi Sh+ya te/_a lo hi tA yi Sh+ya ta/_l+r-ing a lo hi ta yi Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/de bzhin du/_tsarmA ya ti/_bags ba byed/_tsarmA ya tai/
[\[402b.2\]]sogs dang /_DA tsa'i mtha' la/_paT pa T+wa ya ti/_shin tu lam ba lam ba byed/_paT paT+wa ya ti/_sogs so/_/kaSh+TA ya karma Ne/_kaSh+Ta la las la'o/_/kaSh+Ta la mi dge ba ched du byed pa'i las kyi don la kyang 'gyur te/_kaSh+TA ya te/_tshegs kyi ched du 'gro/_sogs so/_/sa tra kak+Sha kak+Ta kraMtsh+rag ha ne b+h+yaH/_pA pa tsi kIr+ShA yAM/_sa tra kak+Sha kaSh+Ta 
[\[402b.3\]]kraM tsh+ra ga han rnams las sdig ba byed par 'dod pa la'o/_satra/_kak+Sha/_kaSh+Ta/_kr-i tsh+ra/_ga ha na rnams las sdig pa byed par 'gro bar 'dod pa'i don la kyang 'gyur te/_sa trA ya te/_rgyur nam tshul la 'gro/_kak+ShA ya te/_rtswa'i ched du 'asro/_kak+TA ya te/_tshegs kyi ched du 'gro/_kr-i tsh+rA ya te/_ga ha nA ya ti/_thigs po la 'gro/_sogs so/_/karma No ro 
[\[402b.4\]]man+tha ta po b+h+yAM brti tsa roH/_rom n+tha dang ta pas ngag la g.yo ba'i las la 'jug ba la'o/_/ro man+tha las 'gram ba g.yo ba'i don la 'jug pa dang ta pas g.yo ba'i don la 'jug pa las kyang 'gyur te/_ro man+thA ya te gau/_/ba lang skyugs bldad byed/_ta pa s+ya te/_/dka' thub la 'gro/_sogs te/_'grel par ta pas kyang gi mtha' can 
[\[402b.5\]]la a tad rnams 'jug par bshad do/_/bASh+poSh+ma b+h+yaM mu dwa ma ne/_bASh+pa USh+ma dag las steng du 'phyur ba la'o/_/bASh+pa USh+ma dag las steng du 'phyur ba'i don la kyang 'gyur te/_bASh+bA ya te/_rlung 'gyur bar byed/_USh+mA ya te/_drod 'phyur bar byed/_sogs so/_/phe nAts+tsa/_phe na las kyang ngo /_phen las kyang steng du 'phyur ba'i don la 
[\[402b.6\]]kyang 'gyur te/_phe nA ya te/_lbu ba 'phyur bar byed/_sogs so/_/'grel bar lung drangs pa/_/ng+hU mAb+wA/_ng+hU ma las yang na'o/_/ng+hU ma las steng du 'phyur ba'i don la kyang 'gyur zhing yang na laT sogs a dang rnams sbyor te/_/ng+hU mA ya te/_du ba 'phyur bar byed/_sogs so/_/sha b+de be+er ka la hA b+hA ka N+Tham ng+h+ye b+h+yaH
[\[402b.7\]]kar Ne/_shap+da be+er ka la ha a b+h+ra ka N+Tha ma b+h+ya rnams las byed pa la'o/_/shap+da la sogs pa 'di rnams las byed pa'i don la kyang 'gyur te/_shap+hA ya te/_sbra byed do/_/be+e rA ya te/_'khon byed do/_/ka la hA ya te/_'khrug ba byed do/_/a b+h+rA ya te/_sprin byed do/_/kaN+thA ya te/_mthin pa byed do/_ma ng+h+yA ya te/_dbus khyed do/_/sogs so/_/su di na ngu rdi 
[\[403a\]]
[\[403a.1\]]na nI hA re b+ny+ya sh+tsa/_su di na du rdi na nI hA ra rnams las kyang ngo /_/su di na la sogs pa 'di rnams las kyang byed ba'i don la kyang 'gyur te/_su de nA ya te/_nyi ma bzang po byed/_du rdin ya tre/_yul ngan byed/_nI hA rA ya te/_khug rna byed/_sogs so/_/su khA di b+h+yaHkar+t+r-i bde nAyAM/_su kha la sogs pa rnams las rig par byed 
[\[403a.2\]]pa la'o/_/su kha la sogs ba rnams las rig par byed pa'am/_myong bar byed pa'am/_thob par byed pa'i don la kyang 'gyur te/_su khA ya te/_bde ba myong bar byed/_duHkhA ya ta/_sdug bsngal myong bar byed/_sogs te/_su kha lang sogs pa rnams ni/_su khra/_bdab duHkhya/_sdug bsngal/_tr-i pra/_khrag zhi mchod spyin/_kr-its+tsa/_dka' ba/_a gra/_mchog 
[\[403a.3\]]a lI ka/_rdzun nam mi bden pa/_kr-i pa Na/_rta dang mdab dang seng sna dang nyon mongs ba dang ral gri/_a ru Na/_dmar skya/_ka ru Na/_snying rje/_soD+ha/_dar ma/_bra dI pa/_mar me'am rab gsal/_ma dra/_zab dbyangs/_sogs so/_/na mo ba ri sh+tsi trang kyatsa/_na mas ba ri bas tsi trang la kyatsa'o/_/na mas/_ba ri bas gnyis la gus par byed pa dang /_tsi tra ba las ngo mtshar 
[\[403a.4\]]par byed pa'i don la kya tsa 'gyur te_/tsi trang gi nga yig tang rnams sbyor ba'i don no/_/nam s+ya ti de pAn/_lha rnams la phyag byed/_ba ri ba s+ya ti gu rUn/_bla ma rnams la mcho ba tu byed/_tsi trI ya te twaM/_khyod la ngo mtshar bar byed/_sogs so/_/puts+tsha dud sa ne/_/puts+tsha las u ta las 'phen pa la'o/_/nyer bsgyur uta sngon ma'i puts+tshal 'phen par byed 
[\[403a.5\]]pa'i don la kyang 'gyur te/_ut+puts+tsha ya te/_rjam steng du g.yob par byed/_sogs so/_/par+Yud sha ne tsa/_pa ri uta las kyang khyab pa la'o/_/nyer bsgyur ba ri dang uta sngon ma'i puts+tsha las khyab par byed pa'i don la kyang 'gyur te/_ba ri puts+tsha ya te/_rngam yongs su rgyas par byed/_ut+buts+tsha ya te/_rnga ma rgyas par byed/_sogs so/_/'grel par 
[\[403a.6\]]lung drangs pa/_b+hAN+NAt+sa mA tsa ya ne/_b+hAN+Da las sam las gsog par byed pa la'o/_/sam snga ma'i b+hAN+Da las gsog par byed pa'i don la kyang 'gyur te/_saM g+hAN+NAya te/_snod du gsog par byed/_sogs so/_tsi b.rAd rdza ne ba ri ng+hA ne pA/_tsi bar las bor bsdud pa la yang na'o/_/sam sngon ma'i tsi bar las gzhan gyis bor ba 
[\[403a.7\]]slar sdud par byed pa'i don la kyang yang na 'gyur te/_tsi ba rA ya te b+hik+ShuH/_lhan bsdud mar byed slong /_muN+Da mi shra sh+lak+Sh+Na la pa Na bra ta bas+t+ra ha lakr-i ta dU ste b+m+yo Ni tsa/_muN+Da skra/_misha/_sres pa/_sh+lak+Sh+Na/_mtshan nyid legs pa/_la ba Na/_tshwa/_prata/_gtsad ma/_bas+t+ra/_gos/_hal/_tho dang /_kr-i ta/_gco dag/_tUsta/_thag rnams las Ni tsa'o/_/muD+Da 
[\[403b\]]
[\[403b.1\]]la sogs pa 'di rnams las byed pa'i don la Ni tsa 'gyur te/_NA biSh+Tha pat+p+rA ti pa di kas+ya/_ming gi Ni la iSh+Tha bzhin no/_/ming la Ni tsa sbyar ba ming gi Ti dbyi ba sogs de phan gyi rkyen i Tha na dang 'dra bar sgrub ste/_i Sh+Than gyi skabs kyi cho ga thams cad 'jug ste/_muN+Da la Ni tsa/_mdo 'dis a phyis bas/_muN+Di 
[\[403b.2\]]zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT _muN+Da ya ti/_ling muN+Da ye ta/_loT muN+Da ya tu/_lang a muN+Da ya ha/_sogs so/_lung la/_Ni shrI dru sogs kyis ts+li tsang du bskyur/_tsang la 'os mu gnyis brjod/_Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/_a mu mu N+Data/_a mu mu N+DatAM/_a mu mu N+Dan/_sogs so/_/liT la 
[\[403b.3\]]kAs sogs kyis Am sbyar/_muN+Da yAtsa kA ra/_muN+Da yAM ba b+hU ba/_muN+Da yA mAs/_sogs so/_luT la iT phyin pas/_muN+Da yi tA/_muN+Da yi tA si/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_Ni iT med pa la phyis/_muN+yAta/_muN+d+yAs+h+rAM/_muN+d+yAsuH/_sogs so/_/liT la iT byin pas/_muN+Da yi Sh+ya ti/_sogs dang /_de bzhin du 
[\[403b.4\]]l+r-ing la/_a muN+Da yi Sh+ya ta sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_mi shral Ni tsa sbyar bas/_mi shra ya ti/_sogs dang /_lung latsI tsad du bsgyur/_mi gnyis brjod/_iT med pa la Ni phyis pas/_a mi mi shrata/_sogs dang /_liT la Am sbyar bas/_mi shra yAM tsa kA ra/_sogs so/_/lhag ma rnams la/_luT mi shra yi tA/_smon ling mi 
[\[403b.5\]]sh+r+yAta/_l+r-iT mi shra yi Sh+ya ti/_l+ring a mi sha yi Sh+yata/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_shAk+Sh+Na la Ni tsa sbyar bas/_laT shA k+Sh+Na ya ti/_lung a sha sh+lak+Sh+Na ta/_liT sh+la k+Sh+Na yAM tsa kA ra/_luT sh+lak+Sh+Na yi tA/_smon ling sh+la g+Sh+N+yata/_sogs so/_/la ba Na la Ni tsa sbyar bas/_laT la ba Na ya ti/_lung a la la ba Na ta/_liT la ba Na yAM tsa kA ra/_luT la 
[\[403b.6\]]ba Na yi tA/_smon long _la baN+yA ta/_sogs so/_/bra ta ba Ni tsa sbyar bas/_laT bra ta ya ti/_lung ab bra ta ta/_leT bra ta yAM tsa kA ra/_luT bra ta yi tA/_smon lung bra d+yA ta/_sogs so/_bas+t+ral Ni tsa sbyar bas/_laT bas+t+ra ya ti/_lung a bstata/_liT bas+t+ra yAM tsa kA ra/_luT bsta yi tA/_smon ling bskyu ta/_sogs so/_/hal la 
[\[403b.7\]]Ni tsa sbyar bas/_laT hal ya ti/_lung a dzaha la ta/_liT hal yAM tsa kA ra/_luT ha la yi tA/_smon ling ha l+yAta/_sogs so/_/kr-i ta la N-i tsa sbyar bas/_laT _kr-i ta ya ti/_lung a tsI kyaMta ta/_Ni la tsang ba san bzhin sogs kyis a i/_yang ba'i ring po/_/liT kr-ita yAM tsa kA ra/_luT kraM ta yi tA/_smon pa'i ling kr-i ng+yA ta/_sogs so/_/tUsta la Ni tsa sbyar/
[\[404a\]]
[\[404a.1\]]laT tU ste ye ti/_lung a tu tUsta tA/_liT tu sta yAM tsa kA ra/_luT tUsta yi tA/_smon ling tra s+ny+yata/_sogs so/_/sa t+ya zhes pa'i rtags la/_sa t+ya pa bA sha/_rU pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/_'grel bar lung drangs pa/_ar+tha be das t+yAnA mA bu ka/_ar+tha/_bed sat+ya rnams kyi A bu ka'o/_ar+tha/_bed/_sa t+ya rnams kyi mthar 
[\[404a.2\]]Ni tsa pha rol la A puka A ga ma 'gyur te ka gnas don u brjod don no/_/sat+yApi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/_laT sa ng+yA pa ya ti/_bdan pa byed/_lung a sa s+ng+yapa ta/_liT sa t+yA bAM tsa kA ra/_luT sa t+yapi tA/_smin ling _sa t+yAng+ha ta/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_ar+tha la/_laT ar+thA pa ya ti/_don byed/_lung a rta tha pa ta/_'brel par ar+tha'i tsad pa 
[\[404a.3\]]rol la tha nyid gnyis brjod ba' ma zhes sogs dong tu dwangs ba bzhin/_liT ar+thA pa yAM tsa kA ra/_luT ar+thA pa yi tA/_smon ling ar+thA pyata/_sogs so/_/be da la/_laT _be dA pa ya ti/_rig par byed/_lung a bi be da bta/_luT bedI pa yAM tsa kA ra/_luT be dA ba yi tA/_smin ling be dA byAta/_sogs so/_/bA sha zhes ba la Ni tsa sbyar/_ming gi Nil i Sh+Tha na 
[\[404a.4\]]bzhin nos/_a phyis pas/_pA shi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar/_laT pA sha ya ti/_zhabs ba byed/_lung a ba ba shata/_liT pA sha yAMtsa k+nga ra/_luT pA sha yi tA/_smon ling bA sh+yAta/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_rU la pa/_laT rU ba ya ti/_gzugs byed/_lung _a ru ru ba ta/_liT rU pa yAM tsa kA ra//_luT _rU ba yi trA/_smon ba'i ling _rA pyA ta sogs 
[\[404a.5\]]so/_/bI NA la/_laT _bI Na ya ti/_tha snyan byed/_lung _a bi bi Na ta/_liT bI Na yAM tsa kA ra/_luT _bI Na yi tA/_smon ling _bI N+yA ta/_sogs so/_/tU la la/_laT _tU la ya ti/_phra mor byed/_lung a tu t+lul ta/_liT tU la yAM tsa kA ra/_luT tUl yi tA/_smon ling tU l+yAta/_sogs so/_/shA+o ka la/_laT sh+lo ka ya ti/_tshigs bcad byed/_lung a shu sh+lu kata ShiT sh+lo 
[\[404a.6\]]ka yAM tsa kA ra/_laT sh+loka yi tA/_smon pa'i ling _sh+lo kyAta sogs so/_/senA la/_laT se rnA ya ti/_lde byed do/_/lung a si sin ta/_liT sen yA tsa kA ra/_luT se na yi tA/_smon pa'i ling sen+yA ta/_sogs so/_/lo ma la/_laT lo ma ya ti/_sgra byed/_lung a lu lu mata/_liT lo ma yAM tsa kA ra/_luT lo ma yi tA/_smon ba'i ling _lo myAta/_sogs so/_/twa tsa la/_laT twatsa 
[\[404a.7\]]ya ta/_lag pa brgyad/_lung a ta zhwatsA te/_liT tra tsa yAM tsa kA ra/_luT twa tsa yi tA/_smon ling twa ts+yAta/_sogs so/_/bar+Na la/_laT bar+Na ya ti/_mdog byed/_khung a bar+Na ta/_liT ba r+Na yAM tsa kA ra/_luT bar+Na yi tA/_smon ming _bar+N+ya ta/_sogs so/_/tsa rma la/_laT tsa rma ya ti/_bags ba byed/_lung a tsa tsa rmata/_luT tsa rma yi tA_/smon ling tsa rmyAta/_sogs so/_tsUr+Na 
[\[404b\]]
[\[404b.1\]]la/_laTatsUr+Na ya ti/_phye mar byad/_lung a tsutsu r+Nata/_liT tsUr+NayAM tsa kA ra/_luT tsU r+Na yi tA/_smon ling tsu r+N+yA ta/_sogs so/_/'grel bar/_shin tu byed pa'i don la yang Ni tsa 'gyur bar bshad bas/_hasta la Ni tsa sbyar/_laT ha sta ya ti/_lag bar shin s+ya byed/_lung a dza ha sta ta/_liT ha sta yAM tsa kA ra/_luT ha sta yi tA/_smon ling ha s+d+yata/_sogs so/_/
[\[404b.2\]]ShaN+Tha la Ni tsa sbyar bas/_laT ShaSh+Tha ya ti/_drug byed/_lung a Sha Sha Sh+Thata/_liT ShaSh+ThA thAM tsa kA ra/_luT ShaSh+Tha yi tA/_smon ling ShaSh+yAta/_sogs so/_/ka bi la Ni tsa/_ming gi Ni la iSh+Than bzhin nos Ti byis pas/_laT ka ba ya ti/_snyan ngag byed/_lung a tsI ka bta/_aka ma phyis pa sogs kyis sad bzhin i tar ring por byas/_liT ka ba yAM tsa kA ra/_luT ka pha 
[\[404b.3\]]yi tA/_smon ling ka byA ta/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_paDu la/_laT baT ya tri/_mkhas par byed/_lung u bI paT ta/_liT baDa yAM tsa kA ra/_luT paT yi tA/_smon ling pa T+yAta/_sogs so/_/yang 'grel bar/_ming las bshad ba'i don la yang Ni tsa 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/_g+ha ta la Ni tsa sbyar/_laT g+hata ya ti/_lung a dzag+hata ta/
[\[404b.4\]]liT g+hata yAM tsa kA ra/_luT g+ha ta yi tA/_smon ling g+hat+yAta/_sogs te tshig grogs dang sbyar ba'i dper brjod ni/_g+ha ta ya ti sha drUn/_dbra rnams gsod bar bshad/_de bzhin du ban+ng+ha la Ni tsa sbyar bas/_laT ban+ng+nya ya ti/_lung a ba ban+s+hata/_liTaMban+ng+nya yAM tsa kA ra/_luT pan+ng+ha yi tA/_smon ling ban+ng+hAta/_sogs te/_ban+b+ha ya ti tsauraH/_chom rkun 'ching bar byed/
[\[404b.5\]]U D+hi zhes ba'i rtags la Ni tsa sbyar/_Ti byis pas/_laT u D+ha ya ti/_thob par byed/_sogs dang /_lung la skabs 'dir 'grel bar D+ha nyid Ni tsa dang bcas pa gnyis brjod pa dang /_yang na D+ha dang po ha bsgyur ba yin pas a ng+h+yA sa nyid du log nas bya ba byed pa yang na bar bshad pas/_a Di D+ha ta/_sogs sam/_yang 
[\[404b.6\]]na/_odziD+nyata/_sogs so/_/lhag ma rnams la/_liT U D+ha yAM tsa kA ra/_luT UD+ha yi tA/_smon ling U D+h+yAta/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du UD+ha la Ni tsa sbyar bas/_laT UD+ha ya ti/_thob nas byed/_auDa D+hata/_lung audzaD+ha ta/_liT U D+ha yAM tsa kA ra/_luT U D+ha yi tA/_smon ling UD+h+yA ta/_sogs so/_/'grel bar lung drangs pa/
[\[404b.7\]]bra kr-i t+yai shA tsa br-ing+ng+hibu gA ga mau/_rang bzhin a tsa gcig ba la 'phel ba dang buka A ga ma'o/_rtags Ti phyis ba sogs ma yin ba'i a tsa gcig pa la Ni tsa pha rol la 'phel ba byed cing buka a+ngag ma yang 'gyur te/_swa zhes pa'i rtags laNi tsa byin/_lung 'dren 'dis 'phel ba dang bu ka A ga ma byin pas/_laT swA pa ya 
[\[405a\]]
[\[405a.1\]]tI|_luT a sa swA bta/_liT swA pa yAMtsa kA ra/_luT swA ya yi tA/_smon ling swApyAta/_sogs so/_/e NI zhes pa'i rtags la Ni tsa sbyar/_ming gi Ni la iSh+Tha bzhin nos mi rkyen phyis pas/_laT e na ya ti/_lung e+e Na Na ta/_liT an yAM tsa kA ra/_luT e Na yi tA/_smon pa'i ling e 
[\[405a.2\]]t+s+yAta/_sogs _bdag byed/_so/_/pr-i thu la Ni tsaTaM phyis/_r-ita kyir 'os r-i rar bsgyur pas/_laT pra tha ya ti/_lung a pa pra thata/_liT _pra tha yAMtsa kA ra/_luT pra tha yi tA/_smon ling pra th+yAta/_sogs so/_/s+thU la [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mo bzhin spyod/_zhes pa'i rtags la Ni tsa sbyar/_ming gi Ni la iSh+Tha bzhin nos Ti 
[\[405a.3\]]yaN dang bcas pa phyis nas yon tan byas pas/_laT sbra ba ya ti/_lung as+tha bta/_liT s+tha _yangs par byed/_ba yAM tsa kA ra/_luT s+tha ba yi tA/_smon ling s+tha byAta/_sogs so/_/pri ya zhes pa'i rtags la Ni tsa sbyar/_iSh+Tha bzhin nos/_pri ya braru bsgyur/_rang bzhin a tsa gcig pa sogs kyi 
[\[405a.4\]]lung 'dren gyis 'phel ba dang puka byin bas/_laT _prA sbom par byed/_pa ya ti/_lung a ba pra bta/_liT bra pa yAM tsa kA ra/_luT brApa yi tA/_smon khing brApyAta/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du s+tha ri zhes pa'i rtags la Ni tsa sbyar/_iSh+Tha bzhin nos s+thari/_s+tha ru bsgyur/_'phel ba dang puka byin pas/_laT s+thA 
[\[405a.5\]]pa ya ti/_lung a ta s+tha pa ta/_liT s+thA pa yAM tsa kA ra/_luT s+thA pa yi tA/_dga' bar byed/_smon ling s+thA byA ta/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_sAng+hu zhes pa'i rtags la Ni tsa sbyar/_ming gi Ni la iSh+Tha bzhin nos/_sA ng+hu/_sA ng+har bsgyur Ti phyis pas/_laT sA ng+ha ya taM/_lung a sa sa ng+nyata/_liT sAng+ha yAMtsa kA ra/
[\[405a.6\]]brtan par byed/_luT sA ng+nya yi tA/_smon lung sAng+h+yAta/_sogs so/_/yu ba zhes pa'i rtags la Ni tsa/_iSh+Tha bzhin nos yu ba/_ka nar bsgyur 'phel ba mi byed pas/_laT ka na ya ti/_lung atsa ka na ta/_liT ka na yAM tsa kA ra/_luT ka na yi tA/_smon pa'i ling ka _legs pa/_n+yAta/_sogs so/_/sra dza bin zhes 
[\[405a.7\]]pa'i rtags la Ni tsa iSh+Tha bzhin nos/_bin rkyen phyis pas/_laT sra dza ya ti/_'phred ldan/_lung a sa sra dzata/_liT sra dza yAM tsa kA ra/_luT sra dza yi tA/_smon ling sra dz+yata/_gzhon pa/_sogs so/_/i sha mata ces pa'i rtags la Ni tsa sbyar/_iSh+Tha bzhin nos/_ma tu pa kyi rjes phyis pas/_laT i sha 
[\[405b\]]
[\[405b.1\]]ya ti/_lung ai sha sha ta/_biT e sha yAM tsa kA ra/luT e sha yi tA/_smon ling e sh+yAta/_sogs so/_/shwetA shwA shwa ta ra ga loTi tA hwa ra kAka NAM man+ta ka lo pash+tsa/shwe ta/_a shwa/_a shwa tar/_ga loDi/_a hwa ra/_kA ka rnams kyi mtha' dbyi'o/_/shwe ta la sogs pa 'di rnams las rang 
[\[405b.2\]]dpal ldan/_don la Ni tsa 'gyur zhing Ni tsa pha rol la rtags 'di rnams kyi mtha' yang dbyi bar bya ste/_laT shweta ya ti/_lung a shi shwi tata/_liT shwa ta yAM tsa kA _dkar po/_rta/_rta mchog_/mnga' thang can/_kun du nod pa/_bya rog/_ra/_luT shwe ta yi tA/_smon ling shwet+yAta/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/
[\[405b.3\]]laT a shwa ya ti/_lung A sha shwata/_liT a shwayAM tsa kA ra_/luT a shwa yi tA/_smon lung a sh+w+yata/_sogs so/_/laT a shwa ta ra ya ti/_kayang A sha shwa ta ra ta/_liT a shwa ta ra yAMtsa kA ra/_luT a shwa ta ra yi tA/_smon ling a shwa tar+YAta/_sogs so/_/laT ga loDa ya hi/_lung a dza 
[\[405b.4\]]galuDa ta/_liT ga loDa yAM tsa kA ra/_lun ga loDa yi tA/_smon ling ga lo D+h+yAta/_sogs so/_/laT A hwar ya ti/_lung A dza hwa rata/_liT A hwa ra yAM tsa kA ra/_luT A hwa ra yi tA/_smon ling ahwar+YAta/_sogs so/_/laT kA ka ya ti/_lung a tsa ka kata/_liT kwa ka yAM tsa kA ra/_luT kA ka yi tA/_smon 
[\[405b.5\]]ling kA kyAta/_sogs so/_/kaN+DA di b+h+yo yaka/_/kaN+Du la sogs pa rnams la ya ka'o/_/kaN+DU la sogs pa rnams las pha rol du byed pa'i don la ya ka 'gyur te/_ka kita kyi don to/_/kaN+DU sogs nga 'gro ba ma yin pa rnams la yaka gi mtha' las laT sogs tang dang a tang gnyis ka 
[\[405b.6\]]'jug la/_nga 'gro ba rnams la tang kho na sbyor ro/_/kaN+DUya ti/_laT kaN+DU ya te/_a kaN+DU yIta/_lung a kaN+DU yiSh+Da/_kaN+Du yAM tsa kA ra/_liT kaNU yAM tsa kre/_kaNU yi tA si/_luT kaN+DU yi tA se/_kaN+DU y+YAta_/smon ling kaN+DU yi ShISh+Ta/_sogs so/_/kaN+DU sogs ni/_kaN+DU/_ban+dU/_a 
[\[405b.7\]]sU|_kwu Nita/_ma nying /_hraM NIng /_sa khra go/_beng /_nAng /_beT/_lAT/_ti ras/_mi snang ba/_i yas/_u ras/_thang /_ku su b+ha/_le brgan rtsi/_ma gang+ha/_dbus 'gyur 'chang /_me ng+ha/_yid gzhungs pa/_b+hi Shadza/_sman/_triSh+Du b+ha/_gsum sngags/_a nar/_ar ra/_sa mar/_uSh+Ni ha/_i Shu b+ha/
[\[406a\]]
[\[406a.1\]]ur Na/_tu ra Na/_b+ha ra Na/_e lA/_be lA/_ke lA/_khe la/_leT/_loT/_su kha/_duHkha/_sogs so/_/kyadzan+tAt+san/_kya tsa'i mtha' las sana'o/_/ming la kya tsa sbyar bas kya tsa'i mtha' las 'dod pa'i don la san pha rol tu 'gyur te/_putrI ya la san sbyar 
[\[406a.2\]]bal dang po'i iT byin/_'grel par ming _sug smel/_dus/_rtse ba/_rtsed mo/_gi byings rnams _bde ba/_sdug bsngal/_ni gnyis brjod pa'i rgyu mtshan can pha rol la rang nyid gang 'dod gnyis brjod par bshad pas/_dper na/_pu dang ti dang yi gsum gang rung gcig gnyis brjod pas/
[\[406a.3\]]pu pu trI yiSha ti/_sogs sam/_pu titrI yi Sha ti/_sogs sam/_yang na pu trI yi yi Sha ti/_sogs so/_/yang 'grel par ming de atsa dang po yin na atsa de gnyis mi brjod kyi a tsa'i rjes kyi hal dbyangs bcas gang rung gnyis brjod do zhes bshad pas/_a shwi ya la san 
[\[406a.4\]]bu bzhin sbyor bar 'dod/_sbyar|_iT byin/_yi dang shi gang rung gnyis brjod pas/_a shi shwi yi Sha te/_sogs sam/_a shwi yi yi Sha ti/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_in+d+rI yal san/_iT spyar bas/_in+d+rI yi Sha ti/_sogs sam/_in+d+rI yi yaM Sha ti/_sogs so/_'grel 
[\[406a.5\]]par lung drangs pa/_kaN+D+wA de s+t+r-i ti ya s+yab/_kaN+DU la sogs pa rnams kyi gsum _dbang phyug bzhin _spyod par 'dod/_pa nyid do/_/kaN+DU la sogs pa yaka bi mtha' la'ang san 'gyur zhing de rnams kyi gsum pa nyid _dbang po bzhin spyod par 'dod/_gnyis brjod par bya ste/_ka N+DU ya la san sbyar/_iT 
[\[406a.6\]]byin/_a ta kyi dbyi 'os a phyis/_lung 'dren 'dis gsum pa yi gnyis brjod pas/_kaN+DU yi yi Sha ti/_sogs so/_/'grel par Nir gi mtha' la'ang san 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/_kA mi la san sbyar iT byin gnyis brjod pas/_tsi kA ma yi Sha ti/_sogs so/_/i ti p+la NaM ni 
[\[406a.7\]]byA kar Na s+ya sU trAn+lA ma ng+hA ta baHsamAp+tAH/_zhes pa pA Ni ni byA kar Na'i mdo las ming gi bying rnams rdzogs so/_/de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA kar Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing 
[\[406b\]]
[\[406b.1\]]rta zhes bya ba las/_ming byings su bsgrub pa'i cho ga rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so//_//da ni byings dang nyer bsgyur sbyor tshul gyi cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/_a nu b.rA b+h+yAM kr-inyaH/_a nu parA dag las kr-inya las so/_/nyer bsgyur a nu dang pa rla dag las pha rol gyi 
[\[406b.2\]]kr-inya las 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i byed pa po la laT sogs par sme pa da rnams sbyor te/_anuka ro ti/_pa rA ka ro ti sogs so/_/a b+hipra t+yati b+h+yaHk+ShipaH/_ab+hi/pra ti/_a ti rnams las k+Shib las so/_/a b+hi/_prati/_a ti rnams las pha ro gyi k+Shi pa las 'bras bu dang ldan

[\[410a.1\]]pra ku ru te/_sogs so/_/a ng+heHpra ha sa ne/_a ng+hi las nus pa la'o/_/ang+hi las pha rol gyi kr-inya las nus pa rtogs par byed pa la tang rnams 'gyur te/_dai ng+yA na b+hi ku ru tebiSh+NuH/_baiHshab+da karma NaH/_bi las sgra'i las las so/_/bi las pha rol gyi kr-inya las sgra'i las

[\[410b\]]
[\[410b.1\]]parA kram te/_Adau ng+gamane/_Ang las 'gyed pa la'o/_/Ang las pha rol gyi kram las steng du 'od zer 'gyed ba la 'jug pan tang rnams 'gyur te/_A kra ma te sUr+YaH/_beHpA ngA bi har te/_bi las rkang pa gas pa la'o/_/pi las pha rol gyi kram las rkang pa gas pa rtogs

[\[412b.1\]]nI te/_sogs so/_/bib+hA Sho pa pA den pra ti ya mA ne/_nye ba'i tshig rtogs pa la gdam nga'o/_/nye ba'i tshig rtogs pa'i 'bras bu ldan pa'i byed pa po la tang dang a tang rnams 'dam ka can du bya ste/_swa yadz+nyaM yAdza te/_swa ya dz+nye ya dza ti/_sogs so/_/i ti pA Ni ni byA kar Na s+ya sU tAng+h+yA

[\[414b\]]
[\[414b.1\]]ya Sh+TA ro/_sogs so/_/smon pa'i ling la/_dza Sha/_sa la Sha D+ha dag gis ka kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_ak+ShISh+Ta/_yak+ShI yAstAM/_sogs so/_/de bzhin du/_l+r-iT dang l+r-ing la/_yak+Sh+ya te/_a yak+Sh+ya ta/_sogs so/_!_/shIng la ya ka/_ka 'gro ba la a 
[\[414b.2\]]yang ngos a yang du bsgyur bas/_laT shay+Ya te/_ling shay+Ye ta/_loT shay+Ya tAM/_lang u sha y+Ya ta/_sogs so/_/lung gi gcig tshig la/_ts+li tsi Nar bsgyur bas/_a shAyi/_gnyis tshig sogs la/_iT byin/_ciN bzhin yang na bar byas pas/_a shA yi ShA tAM/_sogs sam/

[\[415a.1\]]te/_ling ta pye ta/_loT ta pyatAM/_lang a ta bya ta/_sogs so/_/ta po nyanu ta pe tsa/_ta pa'i anu ta pa'i 'ang ngo /_/ta pa dang a nu sngon ma'i ta pa'i'ang pha rol gyi c+li ni ci Nir mi bsgyur te/_dz+hal las dz+hal la 'os si tsa dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a nu tap+ta/_a nu

[\[417b.1\]]cin dag ma yin no/_/byings Ni tsa'i mtha' rnams dang /_shran+tha dang grar+tha dang brUnya rnams la las kyi don la ya ka dang tsin 'gyur ba ma yin zhing laT sogs At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyor te/_kA ra ya te/_shraSh+T+hI te/_gra th+nI te/_brU te/_sogs so/_/'grel par lung drangs pa/_kr-I gr-I shrinya b+hU ShAr+the 
[\[417b.2\]]b+h+yaHsan n+nyAts+tsa ya ka tsi No+o na/_kr-I g+r+'-i shrinya/_rgyan gyi don rnams dang san mtha' la'ang ya ka tsi Na dag ma yin no/_/kr-I dang /_gr-I dang /_shr-i nya dang byings rgyan gyi don can rnams dang /_byings san mtha' can rnams las kyang ya ka dang tsi Na dag 'gyur ba ma yin te/_kI ra te/_gI ra te/_shra ya te/_taM sa te/
