[\[417b.7\]]yul thun mong du bshad pa rnams bstan par bya ste/_a b+hidz+nyA ba tsa ne l+r-iT/_dngos su shes pa'i brjod pa la l+r-iTa'o/_/dngos su shes pa'i brjod pa de ring ma yin pa byung ba'i sgra sbyor ba la l+r-iT 'gyur te/_bal la l+r-iT sa'i byings phyed pa la 'os sa tar bsgyur/_sma ra si kr-iShA ma thudA yAM 
[\[418a\]]
[\[418a.1\]]bad+s+yamaH/_na ya di/_yata la ma yin no/_/dngos su shes pa dran pa'i brjod par gyur pa'i de ring ba yin pa byung ba'i don la yata kyi sgra sbyor ba la l+r-iT 'gyur ba ma yin te/_a b+hi dzAnA si kr-iSh+Na ya dwa zhe\u0f85b+huMdz+ma hi/_bi b+hAShA sA kAMk+She/_de 'dod pa la yang na'o/_/bya ba'i bar de 'dod pa 
[\[418a.2\]]dran nam nag po bcom brlag rnams su sdad/_la dran pa brjod pa sbyor ba la yata yod med gang yin kyang l+r-iT yang na 'gyur te/_l+r-iT sma ra si de ba dat+ta ba ne bat+s+yA maH/_lang smar si de ba dat+ta ba na ya ba sAm/_b+hUdzAl lang /_dngos por shes sam nag po gang nags su zos pa/_pa ronyak+She leT/_lkog tu gyur pa la liT 'o/_/
[\[418a.3\]]lkog tu gyur pa bsgrub pa'i yul la de ring ma yin pa byung ba brjod pa la liT 'gyur te/_rA mo rA dz+yaM tsa kA ra/_dran nam lhas byin nags su sdad ba/_dran nam lhas byin nags su sdad pa/_'grel par lung drangs pa/_ut+ma phuru She be+etsi t+t+yA ba ronyak+ShaM/_sems nyams pa las pa ronya k+Sha'i skyes bu dang po'o/_/
[\[418a.4\]]lkog tu gyur pa'i byung ba brjod pa'i sems nyams pa'i don la liTa'i skyes bu dang po _dga' byed kyis rgyal srid byas so/_/'gyur te/_sup+tonyahaM ki la bi la lA pa/_l-iT 'grel par smad pa rtogs par byed pa la'ang liT 'gyur ro shes byung bas/_nA haM ka ling+haM dza gA ma/_liT ha sha shA to rling+tsa/_ha sha 
[\[418a.5\]]shwata dag las ling 'ang ngo /_/ha dang sha shwata kyi sgra sbyor ba las ling gi yul la lang 'gyur zhing liT yang 'gyur te/_lang _hA _bdag nyal bas cal col sgras so/_/ka ro ta/_liT ha tsa kA ra/_lang _sha shwa da ka rota/_liT sha shwats+tsa kA ra/_pra sh+ne _bdag rtsod ldan la mi 'gro/_tsA san na kA le/_yang dag par 
[\[418a.6\]]dri ba la'ang sdod pa'i dus la'o/_/yang dag par dri ba'i don la'ang gnas pa'am sdod pa'i dus rtogs par byed pa la lang 'gyur zhing liTa'ang 'gyur te/_lang A_ ngo mtshar bar byas/_gats+tsata kiM/_liT dza gA _rnying pa byas/_ma ka/_l+r-iT sme/_smal l+r-iTa'o/_/sma'i sgra sbyor ba la l+r-iTa'i yul la laT 
[\[418a.7\]]'gyur te/_ya dza tisma yu ng+hiSh+Thir/_g.yul ngor gnas kyi mchod sbyin byas/_a pa ronyak+She ca/_lkog tu gyur pa ma yin pa la'ang ngo /_/lkog tu gyur pa'i don brjod pa ma yin pa la'ang sma'i sgra _cil 'gro bar byed/_sbyor ba la laT 'gyur te/_brulIT/_brabI ti sma dra h+mA/_tshangs brjod par byed/_na no+o pr-iSh+Ta pra ti ba 
[\[418b\]]
[\[418b.1\]]tsa ne/_na nu la dri ba so song brjod pa la'o/_/na nu sbyor ba la dri pa so sor brjod pa'i don la 'jug pa la laT 'gyur te/_na nu karo ti ba b+hoH/_na n+worbib+hA ShA/_na nu dag las yang na'o/_/mi zad pa na dang nu dag dang sbyor ba las byung ba'i don la laT yang na 'gyur te/_a haM na ka ro mi/_laT a 
[\[418b.2\]]haMnA kAr+ShaM/_lung luT a haM nu ka ro mi/_lung a haM n+wa kArmi/_bu ri lub+hAsme/_sma ma yin pa la pur la lung 'ang ngo /_/khyab bdag gi snga dus byas/_sma'i sgra yod pa ma yin pa'i pur sbyor ba las byung ba brjod pa la laT 'gyur zhing lung yang 'gyur te/_ba san+ti ha purAtshA trAH/_a bAt+su_bdag gis ma byas 
[\[418b.3\]]raM ha purA tshA trAH/_sma sbyor ba yin _bdag gi ba res par byas/_na lung mi 'gyur te/_luT yadza ti sma pu r+Sha/_yA bat+purA ni ba ta yo rlaT/_yA bta pu rA dag las nges chig la laTa'o/_/yA bta dang pu rA dag dang sbyor ba la nges pa'i chig gi ngon la 'byung _pas _sngon 'dir slob ma bsdad/_lung pa brjod pa 
[\[418b.4\]]la laT 'gyur te/_yA pang+ng+huMk+te/_laT pu rA b+huM k+te/_bi b+hA ShA kadA kan+yoH/_ka dA kar+hi dag _sngon mchod sbyin byas/_las yang na'o/_/ka dA dang kar+hi sgra sbyor ba la 'byung 'gyur gyi don la laT yang na 'gyur te/_laT ka dA b+huM k+te/_l+r-iT kA dA b+ho k+Sh+ye te/_laT kar+ha k+he/_l+r-iT _kar+hi b+hok+Sh+ya te/_laT _kar+ha b+huM k+he/_l+r-iT _kar+hi b+ho k+Shu te/_kim br-it+teli b+sA yAM/_kim 
[\[418b.5\]]'jug pa las 'dod pa _gang za bar 'gyur/_sngar thos/_la'o/_/ki+-i 'jug pa ste kim nyid dang kim rkyen mtha' can rnams dang sbyor ba las 'dod pa rtogs par byed 'byung 'gyur la laT 'gyur te/_kim pi _ci la za bar 'gyur/_praM b+ho dza yi si/_ci la za bar byed/_laT _ka ta ra bipraM b+ho dza ya si/_sogs 
[\[418b.6\]]sam|_l+riT b+hodz+yi Sh+ya te pi praM ki ma/_lip+sAsAn sing+ng+hau tsa/_'dod pa can 'grub pa la'ang ngo /_/gang 'dod pa'i don de 'grung pa'i 'byung 'gyur brjod pa la'ang laT 'gyur te/_laT _yonyan+na da tA ti/_l+r-iT yo nyan+na dA s+ya ti/_loT r+tham k+ShaNe tsa/_b+hudza Ni/_ci za par 'dod bram ze/_loTa'i don gyi mtshan nyid la'o/
[\[418b.7\]]ci za bar 'dod bram ze/_loTa'i don can gyi 'byung 'gyur gyi mtshan nyid brjod pa la'ang laT 'gyur te/_laTakr-iSh+NaHb+huM k+te/_nag po za par shog/_loT kr-iSh+Na b+huMk+hAM/_brta mAn sAmI pye brtamAn _gang zas sbyin bar 'gyur/_bdwA/_da ltar ba nye ba la da ltar ba bzhin yang na'o/_/da ltar ba nye ba'i yul de 'das nas 
[\[419a\]]
[\[419a.1\]]yun ring po song ba ma yin pa dang ma 'ongs pa yun ring po ma yin 'das ma 'ongs gnyis ka la da ltar ba bzhin du laT sogs da ltar ba'i rkyen rnams yang na 'gyur te/_laT kadA gats+tsha ti/_lang ya dA gats+tsha ti/_yang na/_lung kangA gats+tshata/_l+r-iT ya drwa ga mi Sh+ya ti/_A shaMsA yAMb+hA ta bats+tsa/
[\[419a.2\]]the tshom la _'das pa bzhin yang na'o/_/bya ba the tshom can yin na ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar ba'i don la'ang 'das pa'i rkyen rnams yang na 'gyur te/_lung de benA bar+ShIta/_yang na/_luT de be na bar+Thati/_ci la yong /_gang la 'gro_/l+r-iT de ben par+Shi Sh+ya te/_caM la yong /_gang la 'gro bar byed/_k+Shipra btsa ne l+r-iT/
[\[419a.3\]]mgyogs par brjod pa la l+r-iTa'o/_/ma phyogs par brjod pa rtogs par byed pa'i 'byung 'gyur la l+r-iT nyid 'gyur te/_l+r-iT A yA s+ya ti shI g+h+raM/_lhas char 'bebs sam 'beb sar 'gyur/_lha sa char phab/_A shaM sAb tsa ni _lhas char 'bebs par 'gyur/_ling /_the tshom brjod pa la linga'o/_/the tshom brjod pa'i 
[\[419a.4\]]'byung 'gyur rtogs par byed pa la ling nyid 'gyur te/_gurU peAta/_'grel par uta dang a pi dag sbyor ba la _thob par 'gyur 'bral la/_ling gi yul la l+r-ing 'gyur ro zhes byung bas/_uta b+ho k+Sh+ye/_a pya b+ho k+Sh+ye/_gar+hA yAM lanyaDa pi dzA tA+oH/_a pi dzA tu dag las smod pa la laTa'o/
[\[419a.5\]]a pi dang r+ShA tu dag dang sbyor ba la smad _u bsdom ma'i iN 'gro ba la ling /_bla ma'i nye bar 'gyur/_pa rtogs pa la dus gsum ka la laT 'gyur te/_laT a pi dzA yAM t+ya dza si/_laT dzA tu gA Ni kA _l+r-ing gi iT/_shin tu tha/_zas kyang /_mAd t+se/_bib+hA ShA ka tham lip+tsa/_ka tham la ling 'ang yang na'o/_/ka thi 
[\[419a.6\]]gyi sgra sbyor ba las smad pa rtogs par byed pa la laT 'gyur zhing ling 'ang yang na 'gyur te/_ling ka thaM ng+harma \u0f7et+ya dzeH/_laT kathaM ng+harmaM t+ya dza si/_'grel _man 'am yang 'bor bar byed/_nam zhig smad tshong ma len bar byed/_par ka thaM gyi sgra yod pa la smad pa rtogs par byed pa la 'byung 'gyur la l+r-ing rtag tu 'gyur te/
[\[419a.7\]]ka tha nAm ta tra b+ha bA na ng+ha rmaM at+ya k+Sh+yata/_laT ji ltar ming de la khyod chos bor bar 'argyur/_kim brit+te ling l+r-iTo+o/_ki ma _ji ltar chos bor ba/_'jug pa la ling l+r-iT dag go/_/ki ma 'jug pa ste kiM nyid dang kiM rkyen mtha' can dang spyor ba la smang pa rtogs par byed pa la ling dang l+r-iT dag 'gyur te/_ka ta ro b+hapAn 
[\[419b\]]
[\[419b.1\]]ni de ta/_ling ka ta ro b+ha bA na ni di Sh+ya ti/_kim ki lA s+h+yar+the Shu l+r-iT/_kim kil yod pa'i don rnams la l+r-iTa'o/_/kim ki la'i sgra dang yod pa'i don rnams la dus gsum ka la l+r-iT 'gyar te/_kiM ki la t+paM shU drA n+naM b+ho k+Sh+ya se/_asti shUdrIM ga mi k+Sh+ya si/_b+ha ba ting bUdrIM ga mi k+Sh+ya si/_bi ng+ya te shru drI ga mi k+Sh+yar 
[\[419b.2\]]tsi khyod smyad par byed/_ti/_dzAtu ya ngo rling /_dzAtu yang dag las ling ngo /_/dzAtu dang yang dag sbyor ba las smad pa la dus gsum ka la ling 'gyur te/_dzA tu ta tra b+ha bAn shU draM yA dza _ci drag khyod dmangs rigs zas za bar 'gyur/_l+riT yeta/_yat+ta tra twi _yod pa dmangs rigs mol 'gro bar 'gyur/_shUdraM yA dza ye ta/
[\[419b.3\]]ya dA ya r+yor+Yo ge tsa/_/ya tA ya di ga gi sbyor bal 'ang ngo /_/ya dA dang ya di sgra sbyor ba la'ang smod ba rtogs par byed pa la ling 'gyur te/_ya dA twaM shU draM _nam zhig der khyod dmangs rigs la mchod sbyin byed/_yA dza yeta/_ya di twaM shUdraM yA dza yeta/_yats+tsa ya tra yoH/_gang der khyod dmangs rigs la mchod sbyin byed/
[\[419b.4\]]ya ts+tsa ya tra dag gi'o/_/yats+tsa dang yatra dag gi sbyong ba la'ang smad pa rtogs par byed pa la ling 'gyur te/_yats+tsa ta tra b+ha bAn br-i ShalaM yA dza yeta/_ya tra ta tra hwaM br-i Sha laM _gang tshe khyod dmangs rigs la mchod sbyin byed/_gang tshe khyod dmangs rigs mchod sbyin byed/_yA dza yita/_tsitrI kar Ne tsa/_ngo mtshar bar byed pa 
[\[419b.5\]]la'ang ngo /_/yats+tsa dang ya tra dag yod pa la ngo mtshar ba rtogs par byed pa la ling 'gyur te/_gang yang der khyod dmangs rigs la mchong sbyin byed/_gang du der khyod dmangs rigs la mchod sbyin byed/_yats+tsa twaM shUdraM yA dza yeta/_ya tra twaM shU draM yA dza ye ta/_she She l+r-iDa ya dau/_lhag ma dang ya dim yin pa la l+r-iTa'o/_/
[\[419b.6\]]lhag ma ste yats+tsa dang ya tra dag dang ya di sbyor ba ma yin pa las gzhan du ngo mtshar ba rtogs par byed pa la l+r-iT 'gyur te/_ash+tsAr+YAM an+ng+ha nAm kr-iSh+Na dra k+Sh+ya ti/_Ash+tsar+YaM _gang yang khyod dmangs rigs la mchod sbyin byed/_gang du khyod dmangs rigs la mchod sbyin byed/_bang+hi ro nA ma shash+da shro Sh+ya ti/_u ta byoHsa mar+tha 
[\[419b.7\]]yo rling /_uta a bi dag las legs pa'i don la linga'o/_/uta dang a pi sbyor ba las legs pa'i don rtogs par byed pa _ngo mtshar long ba zhes bya ba nag po lta bar byed/_ngo mtshar 'on pa zhes bya ba sgra nyan bar byed/_la ling 'gyur te/_uta ha n+yA ta de+e t+yaM ha ri/_'phrog byed kyis lha min 'dzoms par byed _a pi ha n+yata te+e t+yaM ha 
[\[420a\]]
[\[420a.1\]]ri|_ling ni mi t+tekr-iyA ti pat+to+o g+hU tenya ni t+yaM l+r-ing /_ling gi yul la bya ba shor ba dang byung ba la'ang l+r-ing rtag tu'o/_/ling gi yul la bya ba shor ba dang byung ba'i dus rtogs par byed pa la l+r-ing rtag tu 'gyur te/_ka mo me nyab+ho k+Sh+yata b+ha bAn/_saM b+hA ba nenya la mi ti tse t+si h+nyA pra yi ge/
[\[420a.2\]]srid pa la a laM zhes pa gal te grub par mi sbyor ro/_/srid pa rtogs par byed pa la alaM zhes pas don gyi yul la gal te a laM nyid kyi sgra grub par mi sbyor ba la ling mi 'gyur te/_a pi gi ri shir sAb+hiMd+yata/_bib+nyA ShAng+hA to+osaM b+hA ba na ba ninya ya di/_byings la _khyod kyis bdag gi las skyong bar mdzod/_srid pa brjod pa la yang mi yin pa la yang 
[\[420a.3\]]na'o/_/byings la srid pa brjod pa rtogs par byed pa la ya de'i sgra sbyor ba ma yin pa la ling 'gyur zhing yang na l+r-iT 'gyur te/_ling b+huny+dzIta b+ha bAn/_l+r-iT b+ho k+Sh+ya te b+ha bA na/_he tu he tu mato rling /_ri bo yang ma gos 'bugs nus/_rgyu dang rgyu can dag la ling 'o/_/rgyu dang rgyu can dag byung ba'i bya ba la 'jug pa rtogs par 
[\[420a.4\]]byed pa la ling 'gyur zhing yang na l+r-iT 'gyur te/_bung+ng+hA ya na meta su khaM yA yAta/_bung+ng+hA yan meta su khaM yA s+ya ti/_khyod kyis zas/_za bar 'gyur khyod kyis/_its+tshA r+thiShu ling lo To+o/_'dod pa'i don rnams la ling loT dag go/_/byings las 'dod pa'i don rnams rtogs par byed pa la ling dang loT 
[\[420a.5\]]dag 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas la phyag byas pas bde ba thob/_sangs rgyas la phyag byas pas bde ba thob par 'gyur/_b+huM dzI ta b+ha bAn/_b+huMk+tAM b+ha bAn/_ling tsa/_ling tsa/_ling 'ang ngo /_/byed po dang lhan cig pa'i las kyi don rtogs par byed pa'i 'dod pa'i don la'ang ling 'gyur te/_b+huM dzI ta yats+tsha ti/_its+tshar+the 
[\[420a.6\]]ng+h+yo bi b+hAShA brta mA ne/_'dod pa'i don rnams las da ltar bal yang na'o/_/'dod pa'i don rnams rtogs par phyed _khyod za bar 'gyur/_pa las da ltar bal laT 'gyur bar ma zad ling 'ang yang na 'gyur te/_b+ha bAn its+tsheta/_b+habAn its+tsha ti/_pre+e ShA nu dz+nyA prAp+ta kA leShu kraMt+yA g+tsa/_zos nas byin/
[\[420a.7\]]spring bskul rjes su shes pa dus la bab pa rnams la kr-ita rnams kyang ngo /_/spring bskul rjes su shes pa dus la bab pa rnams la loT 'gyur zhing kr-iT sogs kyi rkyen rnams kyang 'gyur te/_grA maM gats+tsha tu/_grong du song shig/_khyod 'dod pa 'byod/_kartu ma ts+tsha du/_'dod par phyis shig/_e ba kuru/_de ltar gyis shig/
[\[420b\]]
[\[420b.1\]]kaT ku ru/_ar+he kr-it+ya tr-i tsash+tsa/_'os pa la kr-ita traM tsa'ang ngo /_/'os ba rtogs par byed pa la l-ing 'gyur zhing kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen t-i tsa'ang 'gyur te/_twaM kan+yAM baheH/_sha ki lihu/_nus pa la ling 'ang ngo /_/nus pa rtogs par byed pa la ling 'gyur zhing kraMta sogs kyi rkyen 'ang 
[\[420b.2\]]rtsA lhas gyis shig/_'gyur te/_twaM b+hA raM ba heH/_samuts+tsha yenya n+ya ta ra s+yAM/_tshogs pa la yang na'/_/tshogs pa'am 'dus pa rtogs par byed pa la _khyod la bu mo 'os/_loT 'gyur zhing yang na kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen rnams kyang 'gyur ro/_/sa muts+tsha ye sA mAn+ya ba tsa na s+ya/_tshogs pa mnyam 
[\[420b.3\]]par brjod pa'i 'o/_/tshogs _khyod la khur 'os/_pa mnyam par brjod pa rtogs par byed pa la'ang loT 'gyur zhing gzhan yang laT sogs mang po 'gyur te/_loT yA hi/_laT yAta/_lung a yA sIta/_l+r-iT yA s+ya ti/_'grel par/_gnyis gnyis bldabs pa sogs la loT mi 'jug pa 
[\[420b.4\]]rnams la laT sor ro zhes byung bas/_pun punaHpi ba ti/_pun punaHkhA da ti/_pu na pun swasti/_sogs so/_/i ti pA Ni ni byAkar Na s+ya sU trA ta _thob par shog/_thob par byed/_thob zin/_thob par 'gyur/_kAlA r+tha brtAHsamAp+tAH/_zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las dus kyi 
[\[420b.5\]]don gyi 'jug pa rnams rdzogs _slar nas slar 'thung bar byed/_slar nas slar bzar bar byed/_slar yang slar yang bde legs su gyur cig/_so//_//de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA kar Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs 
[\[420b.6\]]bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las laT sogs 'das ma 'ongs da ltar ba sogs kyi dus kyi khyad par gyi don la 'jug yul rags pa rnams bshad zin te/_'grel par ji skad du/_d+t+ratU nA man n+ta tA ts+tsa nA nA r+tha twAts+tsa sarba thA/_a pi ng+hA tu ma sha kya mi t+ya la mA khyA ta khyA ta khyA pa ne/_byings 
[\[420b.7\]]rnams kyang ni mtha' yas nyid/_/sna tshogs don nyid thams cad du/_/byings rnams mngon gsal nus ji bzhin/_/kun bshad rdzogs par bshad pa'o/_/zhes kyang byung bas/_byings re res don mang po dang /_byings mang po don re rel 'jug pa sogs mtha' yas la/_de 
[\[421a\]]
[\[421a.1\]]rnams kyi don gsal bar brjod dgos ba rnams rang gi nus pa dang 'tsham pa kun nas bshad pa'i don rnams tshang bar bshad zin no zhes pa ste/_de ltar brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pANini byA kar Na'i mdo slob dpon chen porA ma tsan+d+ras mdzad pa'i 'grel pa dang bcas pa'i 
[\[421a.2\]]go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las/_laT sogs sde tshan bcu bam ti sogs brgya brgyad cu ste rnam dbye sde tshan phyi ma rnams byings la sbyor tshul sogs zhib mor bstan pa kun bshad pa'i rab tu bya ba rnams re zhig rdzogs so/_/
[\[421a.3\]]@##/_/bla ma dang chos skyong srung ma'i tshogs la sgo gsum gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/_/de ltar byings tshig tu bsgrub pa kun nas bshad pa'i cho ga rnams bstan zin nas/_da ni byings ming du bsgrub pa'i rkyen kr-ita la sogs pa rnams kyi 'jug yul cho ga dper brjod sogs bshad par bya 
[\[421a.4\]]ste|_ng+hA toH/_byings las so/_/'chad 'gyur kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen ta bya la sogs pa 'di rnams byed sa las pha rol tu 'gyur te byings ming du bsgrub pa'i rkyen zhes bya'o/_/ta tro pa pa daM sap+ta mIs+thaM/_de la bdun pa gnas pa nye ba'i tshig go/_/kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen can de'i sngon du byur ba'i bdun pa 
[\[421a.5\]]gnas pa ste rnam dbye bdun pa'i don brjod pa'i tshig de la nye ba'i tshig gi ming can zhes ming 'dogs byed do/_/bA sarU ponyas+t+ri yAM/_bud med ma yin pa gzugs mtshungs pa min pa yang na'o/_/bud med du bsgrub pa'i rkyen ma yin pa rkyen dmigs bsal can dang /_bsgrubs zin gyi gzugs 
[\[421a.6\]]mtshungs pa ma yin pa'i spyir btang gi rkyen ni dmigs bsal gyi yul la'ang yang na 'gyur ro/_/kr-it+yAHprAng N+wu laH/_NUl las sngon ma kr-ita'o/_/'og nas 'byung pa'i rkyen N+wul las sngon ma'i rkyen gang yin pa de rnams dang der ma zad byings ming du byed pa'i rkyen 'chad 'gyur thams cad la kr-ita 
[\[421a.7\]]khyi ming can zhes ming 'dogs byed do/_/karta ri kraMta/_byed pa po lakr-ita'o/_/byed pa po ste byed pa can dang bya ba'i don la bying las rkyen kr-ita kyi ming can rnams 'gyur ro zhes pa spyir btang ba'o/_/ta yo reb kr-i t+yak+ta khalar+thAH/_kr-ita k+ta khal dag don de dag nyid la'o/_/gong du rkyen kr-ita kyi ming 
[\[421b\]]
[\[421b.1\]]can rnams byed pa po'i don la 'gyur bar bshad kyang de'i dmigs bsal kr-ita kyi ming can yin kyang rkyen k+ta dang khal gnyis ni don de dag nyid de dngos po dang las kyi don nyid la 'gyur gyis byed pa po'i don la 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/ta byat+ta byA nI yaraH/_ta byata/_ta bya anI yar rnams so/_/k+ta dang 
[\[421b.2\]]khal du ma zad byings las bya ba'i don las pha rol du dngos po dang las dag la/_ta byata dang ta bya dang /_a nI yar rnams 'gyur te/_ta byata'i tra yig ni rigs mtshon pa'i don dang anI yar gyi ra yig dbyangs 'gog pa'i don no/_/i ng+ha 'phel pa la ta byata dang ta bya anI yar rnams sbyar/_ta 
[\[421b.3\]]bya gnyis la byings phyed pa sogs kyis bal dang po'i iT byin/_ma ning la su am du bsgyur ba sogs bya phas/_a ng+hita byaM/_eng+ha nI yaM/_'grel bar dngos po'i don gyi rkyen can rnams la su sogs gcig tshig kho na 'jug cing rtags kyang ma ning nyid do zhes kyang byung ngo /_/de bzhin du 
[\[421b.4\]]cinya gsog pa la ta bya a nI yar sbyar/_byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_tabya _tse ta _'phel bar byas/_byaHtwayAng+tarmaH/_tsa ya nI yaHtwa yAng+harmaH/_bseHta byata/_ba si las ta byata'o/_/bsi las byed pa po'i don la ta byata 'gyur ro/_/karta ri Nits+tsa/
[\[421b.5\]]byed pa po la Na 'gro ba'ang ngo /_/ta byata byed pa po'i don la sbyor ba na ta byata la Na 'gro ba'i ming can zhes bya ste dgos pa ni 'phel ba byed pa'i don no/_/khyod kyis chos gsog par byas/_bas nges par gnas pa la mdo sngon ma'i ta bya ta sbyar/_mdo 'dis 'phel ba byas pas/_bA s+hA byaH/_'grel bar 
[\[421b.6\]]lung drangs pa/_karma karta ri ke lim/_las dang byed pa po la ke li ma'o/_/las dang byed pa po dag la ke li ma 'gyur te/_pa tsa 'tshed pa la ke li ma sbyar/_ka yon tan 'gog pa'i don yin pas phyis/_tsa drangs pas/_pa tse li mAHtaN+Du lAH/_kr-i t+ya tsaH/_sdod par byed dang ma gnas par byed/
[\[421b.7\]]kr-ita a tsa'i 'o/_nyed bsgyur na Nar bsgyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can sngon du byung na kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen atsa'i pha rol gyi na yig ni Na yig tu bskyur te/_pra sngon ma'i yA thob ba la a nI yar sbyar/_mdo 'dis Nar bskyur bas/_'bras 'tshod par byed/_pra yANIyaM/_rab tu thob bar byas/_Nerbi b+hAShA/_Ni 
[\[422a\]]
[\[422a.1\]]las yang na'o/_/nyer bsgyur na Nar 'gyur pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi pha rol gyi byings Ni tsa'i mtha' can las pha rol gyi kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen atsa las pha rol gyi na yig ni Nar bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka can du bya ste_/yA Ni mtha' can la anI yar sbyar bas/_pra yA pa 
[\[422a.2\]]NI yaM/_pra yA pa nI yaM/_hal sh+tsedzu pa ng+hAta/_ha la las kyang i tsa u pa ng+hA las so/_/byings hal dang po i tsa u pa ng+hA can la pha rol gyi kraMta sogs kyi rkyen a tsa las pha rol gyi na yig ni nyer bsgyur rgyu mtshan can sngon du byung na Nar yang na bsgyur te/_ku pa khro ba la anI yar puka mtha' 
[\[422a.3\]]rab tu thob par 'dod pa byas/_sogs kyis yon tan byas/_mdo 'dis Nar yang na bsgyur bas/_pra ko pa NIyaM/_pra ko panI yaM/_i dzA deH/_sa nu maH/_i tsa dang po las num dang bcas pa'i'o/_/byings i tsa dang po sogs la num dang bcas pa yin kyang a tsa las pha rol gyi kr-ita kyi 
[\[422a.4\]]na yig ni nyer bsgyur rgyu mtshan can sngon ma la Nar bsgyur te_/i khi 'gro ba la a na'i yar ita 'go ba _rab tu khro bar byas/_sogs kyis num/_pra sdon/_mdo 'dis na Nar bsgyur bas/_pren+kha NI yaM/_na b+hA b+hU pU ka mi ga mi byA yI be pAM/_b+hA _b+hU pU _kami _ga mi _pyA yI _be pa rnams kyi ma yin 
[\[422a.5\]]no/_/b+hA 'bar ba/_b+hU yod pa/_pUnya dag pa/_ka mu mdzes pa/_gam+l-i 'gro ba_/o pyA yI 'phel ba/_be pr-i g.yo ba rnams kyi pha rol gyi atsa las pha rol po'i krita sogs kyi na yig _song zhig/_Nar bsgyur ba ma yin te/_byings de rnams la anI yar sbyar bas_/prab+hA nI 
[\[422a.6\]]yaM_/prab+ha ba nI yaM/_/bra pa pa nI yaM/_pra ka ma nIya/_prag ma nI yaM/_pra byA yanI yaM/_brabe pa nI yaM/_'grel par/_b+hA la ba sogs Nitsa'i mtha' can la'ang Nar mi 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/_pra b+hA pa nI yaM/_sogs so/_/yang 'grel par khyA la sogs pa'i pha rab tu 'bar bar byas/_rab tu yod/
[\[422a.7\]]rab tu dag par byas/_rab tu mdzes bar byas/_rab tu 'gro bar byas/_rab tu 'phel bar byas/_rab tu g.yo bar byas/_rol la'ang Nar mi 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/_pra khyA nI yaM/_rab tu smra bar byas/_pra snA _rab tu 'bar bar 'dod/_nI yaM/_rab tu 'khru bar byas/_pradA nI brAh+ma NaH/_rab tu sbyin gnas bram ze/_yang 'grel 
[\[422b\]]
[\[422b.1\]]par/_pUnya las yang na Nar 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/_pra pa bi NI yaM yo maH/_sogs so/_/kr-it+ya l+Yu To ba hulaM/_mang po la kr-ita l+YuTa'o/_/bya ba sogs don mang po la kr-ita kyi ming can gyi rkyen l+YuT 'gyur te/_dper brjod 'og tu 'chad do/_/a tso yata/_a tsa las ya ta'o/_/byings 
[\[422b.2\]]a tsa mtha' can rnams las pha rol du bya ba'i don la _rab tu dag zhib /_ya ta 'gyur te/_tsinya gsog pa dang dzi rgyal ba la yata/_byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_tseyaM pu N+yaM twa yA/_dze yaM ma yA/_sogs so/_/'grel par byings dang po a tsa mtha' can 
[\[422b.3\]]rjes su hal mthar 'gyur ba la'ang ya ta 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/_dA la san sbyar/_mA g+hur b+ha la b+ha sogs kyis a tsa i sar bsgyur/_a b+h+yA sa phyis/_sa'i byings phyed _khyed kyis bsod nams gsog par bya/_bdag gis rgyal bar bya/_pa la 'os sa tar bsgyur bas/_det+sa zhes pa la ya ta 
[\[422b.4\]]sbyar ata kyi dbyi 'os a phyis bas/_di t+s+yaM/_I d+yati/_ya ta la Ita'o/_/byings Ata mtha' can ni rkyen yata pha rol la Ita du bsgyur bar bya ste/_dA sbyin pa/_dz+nyA khong du chud pa/_pA btung ba rnams la yata/_mdo 'dis A Ita/_byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/
[\[422b.5\]]de yaM/_dz+nyeyaM/_pe yaM/_sogs so/_/sbyin bya/_'grel par lung drangs pa/_ta ki shasaM tsa ti ya ti dza ni b+h+yash+tsa yata/_ta ki _sha si _tsa ti _ya ti/_dza ni rnams las kyang yata'o/_/byings 'di rnams las kyang bya ba'i don la yata 'gyur re/_ta kyaM/_sha s+yaM/_tsa t+yaM/_ya t+yaM/_dza n+yaM/_'grel 
[\[422b.6\]]sbyin bya/_shes bya/_btung bya/_par lung drangs pa/_ha no bA yata/_han las yang na'o/_/han 'tshe ba las yata yang na 'gyur ro/_/yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/_ba ng+ha'ang ngo /_/han gyi pha rol du yata byin na han _rgod bya/_'tshe bya/_slong bya/_'bad bya/_skye bya/_nyid pang+ha 
[\[422b.7\]]zhes par 'gyur te/_han la lung 'dren snga ma'i yata byin lung 'dren 'dis han ba ng+har bsgyur bas/_ba ng+h+yaM/_'tshe ba bya/_por du pa ng+hAta/_ata u pa ng+hA las bu las so/_/byings u ba ng+hA ata yin papu ste mtha' na pa sde'i yi ge gang rung zhig yod pa las yata 'gyur te/_la b+ha thob pa 
[\[423a\]]
[\[423a.1\]]dza pa bzlas pa/_ra pa smrab rnams la mdo 'dis yata sbyar/_drangs pas/_la b+h+yaM/_dza pyaM/_ra pyaM/_sogs so/_/A ngonya pi/_Ang las kyang ngo /_/nyer bsgyur Ang las pha rol gyi la b+ha thob pa las rkyen ya dang po pha rol la num A ga ma 'gyur te/_ma gnas 
[\[423a.2\]]don u brjod don no/_/A la m+ng+h+yaM gauH/_u pA ta shaM sA yaM/_u pa las the tshom la'o/_/thob bya/_bzlas bya/_smra bya/_nyer bsgyur u pa las pha rol gyi la b+ha las the tshom rtogs par bya ba la num A ga ma 'gyur te/_u pa la m+b+h+yaM/_sha ki sa hosh+tsa/_sha ki _sa ha dag las kyang 
[\[423a.3\]]ngo /_/sha klo nus _kun nas thob bya ba lang /_pa dang Sha ha bzod pa dag las kyang yata 'gyur te/_shakyaM/_sah+yaM/_ga da ma da tsar ya mash+tsA nu pa sarge/_nyer bsgyur med pa la ga dam da tsa ra yam las kyang ngo /_/nyer bsgyur sdon thob bam nye bar/_na med pa'i gad gsal bar brjod pa/_mdI dag pa/_tsa ra 
[\[423a.4\]]g.yo ba/_ya mu nye bar 'gog ba rnams las kyang yata 'gyur te/_ga ng+yaM/_mang+yaM/_tsar+YaM/_ya myaM/_nus pa/_bzod bya/_tsa re rA ditsA gu rau/_tsa ri'i Ang las kyang bla ma ma yin pa las so/_/Ang las pha rol gyi tsa ra las kyang bla ma brjod pa ma yin pa la yata 'gyur te/_Atsa r+YaM de shaH/_bla 
[\[423a.5\]]ma yin na N+ya sbyar u pa ng+hA'i 'os 'phel ba rkang pa ste tshig lhug pa'i med/_myos 'gyur chang /_spyod pa/_'gog bya/_byas pas/_AtsA r+YaH/_a ba ng+yapaN+ya bradz+yA gah+yapa Ni ta byA ni ro b+he ShuH/_a pa ng+ya _pa N+ya _bradz+ya rnams smad bya/_btsong bya/_'gog pa med pa rnams la'o/_/nanya sngon ma'i bad smra _yul kun du spyod pa/
[\[423a.6\]]za/_pa na tha snyad/_bra dza 'gro ba rnams la yata sbyar bas/_a bang+yaM/_paN+yaM/_pra dz+yaM rnams rim pa bzhin/_slob dpon/_smad bya/_bcod bya/_'gog pa med pa rnams brjod pa la tshig phrad do/_/ba h+yaM ka ra NaM/_bah+yaM byed pa la'o/_/baha thob la ya ta sbyar bas/_ba h+yaM zhes pa byed pa po brjod pa 
[\[423a.7\]]la tshig phrad du bya ste/_bah+yaM shakaTaM/_shing rta byed/_kha na ma tho ba/_zong /_'gro bya/_ar+YaHs+hA mi bai sh+ya yoH/_ar+YaHjo bo dang rje'u rigs dag la'o/_/r-i 'gro ba la yata sbyar bas ar+YaHzhes pa ni jo bo dang rje' rigs dag brjod pa la tshig phrad do/_/r-i tu ma t+yu pa sar+YA/_u pa sar+YA zla 
[\[423b\]]
[\[423b.1\]]mtshan can ma la'o/_/u pa snga ma'i sr-i 'gro ba la yata sbyar bas/_u pa sar+YA zhes pa bud med zla mtshan can ma brjod pa la tshig phrad do/_/a dzar+YaM sang+ga taM/_a dzar+YaM yad dag song ba la'o/_/na nya snga ma'i dzrI lang tsho nyams pa la yata sbyar bas/_a dzar+Ya/_zhes pa yang dag par song ba 
[\[423b.2\]]brjod pa la tshig phrad du bya'o/_/ri ha lo r+N+yata/_r-i dang hal las N+yata'o/_/byings r-i mtha' can dang hal mtha' can las bya ba'i don la N+yata 'gyur te/_Na yig 'phel ba'i don dang ta dbyangs don no/_/kr-inya byed ba/_hr-inya 'tshe ba dag la mdo 'dis N+yata sbyar/_dar yol ba'am na tshod song pa/_a tsa'i 'ang 
[\[423b.3\]]nya Na 'gro ba la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/_kAr+YaM/_hAr+YaM/_sogs so/_/han 'tshe ba laN+yata/_tsiN dang Nal ma yin pa la han gyi ta 'os/_nata/_han+ta'i nyaN 'gro ba la 'os ha g+ha/_upa ng+hA'i 'os 'phel ba byas pas/_g+hA d+yaM/_tsa dzoHku g+hi N+ya toH/_tsa dza dag gi g+hi N+yata dag la 
[\[423b.4\]]ku'o/_/byings mtha'i tsa yig dang dza yig _dgos bya/_'phrog bya/_dag ni rkyen g+ha 'gro ba rnams dang N+yata pha rol la grangs mthun pa'i ka sder bsgyur te/_btsa 'tshed pa la/_r-i dang hal sogs kyis N+yata/_mdo 'dis tsaka _'tshe bya _u pang+hA'i 'os 'phel ba byas bas/_pAkyaM/_de 
[\[423b.5\]]bzhin du/_ru dzal N+yata mdo 'dis dza ga/_bug mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_ro gyaM/_na kwAdeH/_ku dang po'i ma yin no/_/ku steka sde dang po na yod pa'i mtha'i tsa dza dag ni g+hita dang N+yata pha rol la ka sder 'gyur ba ma yin te/_gardza sgra'i don la'o zhes pa la N+yata/_mdo _btso bya/
[\[423b.6\]]'dis dza gar mi 'gyur/_gar+dz+yaM/_sogs so/_/a dzi bra dz+yosh+tsa/_a ji bra dzi dag gi _na dab/_'ang ngo /_/a dza 'phen pa/_bra dza 'gro ba dag dang 'ang sgras badza 'gro ba rnams kyi'ang ka sder 'gyur ba ma yin te/_u pang+ngA'i 'os 'phel ba byas pas/_Adz+yaM/_brAdz+yaM/_bAdz+yaM/_bany+tserga 
[\[423b.7\]]tau/_pany+tsi'i 'gro ba la'o/_/sgra sgrog_bany+tsi'i 'gro ba'i don brjod pa na ka sder mi 'gyur te/_bany+tsuM/_'gro bya/_'gro ba'i don ma yin na 'gyur te/_baM kyaM kASh+ThAM/_shing skyog po'am 'khyogs pa/_N+ya A ba sh+ya ke_/N+ya la lhag par la'o/_/N+ya pha rol la lhag par bya ba la _mad/_'gro bya/_'jug pa 
[\[424a\]]
[\[424a.1\]]na tsa dza dag ka sder 'gyur ba ma yin te/_a ba sh+yapA ts+yi/_sogs so/_/ya dza yA tsa ru tsa pra ba tsa rtsash+tsa/_yadza _yAtsa _ru tsa _pra btsa _r-i tsa'i 'ang ngo /_/yadza lha mchod pa/_yAtsa slong ba/_rutsa 'bar ba/_pra sngon ma'i ba tsa brjod pa/_r-itsa mchod pa rnams kyi'ang N+ya 
[\[424a.2\]]pha rol la ka sder 'gyur ba ma yin te/_yAdz+yaM/_yA ts+yaM/_lhag par 'tshed/_rots+yaM/_pra bAts+yaM/_artsAM/_'grel bar t+ya dza lang tsho nyams pa dang pUdza mchod pa dag gi 'ang N+ya pha rol la ka sder 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bshad pas/_t+yAdz+yaM/_pU dz+yaM/_ba tso nyasha b+nga saMdz+nya yAM/_ba tsa'i sgra'i 
[\[424a.3\]]ming ma yin la'o/_/ba tsa'i sgra'i _mchod bya/_slong bya/_ming ste brjod _'bar bya/_rab tu brjod bya/_mchod bya/_pa'i don ma yin pa la ka sder mi 'gyur te/_bAts+yaM/_brjod pa'i don la ka sder 'gyur bas/_bAkyaM/_pra yo dz+ya ni yo _rgan po/_mchod bya/_dz+yo+o shakyAr+tha/_pra yo dz+ya ni yo dz+ya dag 
[\[424a.4\]]nus pa'i don la'o/_/pra dang ni sngon ma'i yu dzir sbyor ba la N+yata sbyar bas/_pra yo dz+ya dang ni yodz+ya dag nus pa'i don brjod pa la tshig phrad do/_/nus pa'i don _mi smra ba/_min na dza gar bsgyur bas/_pra yo gyaM/_brjod bya/_ni yo gyaM/_'grel pa/_b+hu dza'i 'ang za ba'i don la ka sder mi 'gyur ro 
[\[424a.5\]]zhes pa shad pas/_b+hodz+ya man+naM/_za ba'i don min na ka sder 'gyur te/_b+ho gyaM/_orA ba sh+ya ke/_u las nges ba can la'o/_/byings u yig mtha' can las gdon mi za ba'am nges pa can gyi _rab tu sbyor bya/_nges par sbyor bya/_dngos po rtogs par byed pa'i don la N+yata 'gyur te/_lUnya 
[\[424a.6\]]gcod pa la N+yata/_bza' bya bas/_a tsa'i 'ang nya Na 'gro ba la 'os 'phel ba/_skyong bya/_ya'i rkyen la ba'i mtha' can nos au A bar bsgyur bas/_a ba sh+ya lA byaM/_sogs so/_/A su yu ba pir bi la pi tra pi tsa mash+tsa/_Asu _yu _ba pi _ra pi_ la pi _tra pi _tsam las kyang ngo /_/Ang 
[\[424a.7\]]snga ma'i Shunya mngon par skye ba/_yu spel ba/_Tu ba ba sa bon 'debs pa/_rab dang la pa gsal bar brjod pa/_tra pUSha ngo tsha ba/_tsa mu za ba _nges par gcad bya/_rnams las kyang N+yata 'gyur te/_A sA byaM/_kun du skye bar bya/_yA byaM/_spel bar bya/_pA pyaM/_gdab par bya/_rA pyaM/_gsal bar brjod pa lA 
[\[424b\]]
[\[424b.1\]]pyaM|_trApyaM/_tsA myaM/_dam+b+heshatsa/_dam+b+hi las kyang ngo /_/da m+b+hi las N+yata 'gyur zhing na'ang dbyi ste/_dA b+h+yaM/_'grel par lung drangs pa/_b+hadz+dzay+Ya dzAn mAM ya dwA/_b+hadza _dza ya _yadza _A na ma rnams kyi yata yang na'o/_/b+ha dza bsten pa/_dza ya dang ya dza lha mchod pa Ang sngon ma'i na ma 
[\[424b.2\]]khrel yod/_bza' bya/_rab tu 'dud pa rnams las N+yad 'gyur zhing yang na yata 'gyur te/_tshul 'chos pa/_N+yata kyi phyogs la u pa ng+hA'i 'os 'phel ba byas pas/_N+yata _b+hA dz+yaM/_yata b+ha dz+yaM/_r+t+yata _dzA y+YaM/_yata _dzay+Ya/_N+yata _yA dz+yaM/_yaT _ya dz+yaM/_N+yata _AnA myaM/_yata _An myaM/_A nA y+Yonya ni t+ye/_A 
[\[424b.3\]]nA y+Ya mi rtag pa la'o/_/Ang sngon ma'i nInya 'dren pa la N+yata sbyar bas/_A na y+Ya mi rtag pa ste lho phyogs kyi me brjod pa la tshig phrad do/_/gzhan du/_A ne yaM/_pra _brten bya/_NA y+YonyasaM _mchod bya/_matau/_pra _mchod bya_|_NA y+YaHyang dag _kun nas 'dud pa/_par 'dod pa ma yin pa 
[\[424b.4\]]la'o/_/pra sngon ma'i NInya 'dren pa la N+yata sbyar bas/_tsor _pra NA y+YaH/_lho'i me/_zhes pa ni yang dag par 'dod pa ma yin pa brjod pa la tshig phrad du _drang bar bya/_bya ste/_yang dag par 'dod pa ma yin pa las gzhan du/_pra Ne yaMsA ng+huH/_pAy+Ya sAn+tsA y+Ya ni kA y+Ya mA na ha bi rni bAs sA 
[\[424b.5\]]mi ng+he nIShuH/_bA y+Ya _sAn+nA y+Ya _ni kA y+Ya _ng+hAy+Ya rnams nga _chom rkun/_rgyal dang /_sreg rdzas dang /_gnas dang /_yam shing rnams la'o/_/pA btung ba/_sam sngon ma'i NI thob pa/_ni snga ma'i tsinya gsog pa/_ng+heT _legs po rab tu 'dren/_btung ba rnams la N+yata sbyar bas/_pA y+Ya/
[\[424b.6\]]sAn+na y+Ya/_ni kA y+Ya/_ng+hA y+Ya rnams ni rim pa bzhin/_nga rgyal dang /_sreg rdzas dang /_gnas dang yam shing rnams brjod pa la tshig phrad do/_/don de rnams las gzhan du yata sbyar bas/_pe yaM/_san+ne yaM/_ni tse yaM/_ng+he yaM/_kra tau kuN+Da pA y+Ya saMtsA yau/_kuN+Da pA y+Ya/_sany+tsa y+Ya _de rgyal/
[\[424b.7\]]mar gyi khyad par/_gnas ris/_yam shing /_dag mchod sbyin la'o/_/kuN+Da sngon ma'i phA btung ba dang saM sngon ma'i tsinya gsog ba dag la N+yata sbyar bas/_kuN+Da pA y+Ya dang /_zhi ba 'thung /_btung ba/_kun nas 'dren pa/_nges par gsog pa/_btung ba/_mchod sbyin/_sany+tsA y+Ya dag mchod sbyin mngon par brjod 
[\[425a\]]
[\[425a.1\]]pa la tshig phrad du bya'o/_/a mA ba s+ya ta ra s+yaM/_a mA ba se yang na'o/_/a mA sngon ma'i bas nges par gnas pa la N+yata 'gyur zhing 'phel ba yang na bar bya ste/_a mA bA s+yA/_a mA ba s+yA/_pa daHsu pi kyap+tsa/_su pa la bad las kyang pa 'ang ngo /_su pa las pha rol 
[\[425a.2\]]gyi bad smra ba la yata 'gyur zhing kyapa kyang 'gyur te/_kyapa kyi pa tu ka A ga ma'i don dang /_ka yig ka nga 'gro ba sogs kyi don te/_bra h+nA snga ma'i bad la kyapa/_ba tsi swa pi ya dza la sogs _gnam stong /_pa rnams kyi ka 'gro ba la 'os/_/saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur/_a las yon tan nos 
[\[425a.3\]]mtshams sbyar bas/_bra h+mo d+yaM/_yang na yata sbyar/_brah+ma ba d+yaM/_b+hu bo b+hA be/_b+hU las dngos po la'o/_/su pa las pha rol gyi b+hU yod pa la dngos po brjod pa la kyapa 'gyur te/_brah+ma b+hU yaM ga ta/_supa las pha rol min na yata sbyar bas/_b+ha byaM/_ha na sta tsa/_ha na las ta'ang 
[\[425a.4\]]ngo /_/tshangs pa'i brjod pa/_nyer bsgyur sngon na med pa'i _tshangs pa'i brjod pa/_su pa las pha rol gyi han 'tshe ba la dngos po brjod pa la kyapa 'gyur zhing na'ang tar bsgyur bar bya ste/_tshangs par gyur pa rtogs/_DAb _brah+ma ha d+yA/_e tistu shA sbr-i dr-i dzA ShaH kyapa/_legs ldan/_e ti stu shAs/_br-i dr-i 
[\[425a.5\]]dzuSha las kyapa'o/_/e ti ste/_iN 'gro ba _Sh+Tunya bstod pa/_shA su rjes su ston pa/_br-inya sgrib pa/_dr-ing ma gus pa/_dzu Sh-i dga' ba rnams las kyang kyapa 'gyur ro/_hra swa s+ya pi ti kr-i ti tu ka/_/tshangs bcom ma/_thung ngu'i pa 'gro ba la kr-ita la tu ka'o/_/byings atsa thung ngu'i mtha' 
[\[425a.6\]]can la kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen pa 'gro ba pha rol du byung na tu ka A ga ma 'gyur te/_-iN dang stu la kyapa mdo 'dis tu ka byin pas/_i h+yaM/_stu t+yaM/_shA su la kyapa/_shAs kyi ang ha la dag la ita 'os/_A ita du bsgyur/_iN la Sha 'os sa Shar bsgyur bas/_shi Sh+yaH/_pr-inya 
[\[425a.7\]]dang dr-i nga la kyapa/_tuka A ga ma byin pas/_pr-i t+yaH/_sgrib pa/_A dr-i t+yaH/_kun du ma gus pa/_dzuSha la kyapa sbyar bas/_'di ltar/_bstod pa/_dzu Sh+yaH/_dga' ba/_shaM si gu hi du hi b+h+yo bA/_shaM si/_gu hi/_du hi rnams las yang na'o/_shi su bstod pa/_du ha 'jo ba/_slob ma/_gu hU 
[\[425b\]]
[\[425b.1\]]nas sgrib pa rnams las kyapa yang na 'gyur te/_ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis pas/_sha s+yaM/_du h+yaM/_gu h+yaM/_yang na yata sbyar bas/_shi s+yaM/_do h+yaM/_go h+yaM/_Ang pU rbA da dze sh+tsa saM dz+nyA yAM/_Ang sngon ma las a dzi las kyang ming la'o/_Ang sngon ma'i a dza 'phen 
[\[425b.2\]]pa la kyapa sbyar bas/_A dz+yi zhes pa'ang ming brjod pa la tshig phrad do/_/r-i du pa d+hAts+tsA kl-i bi ts+r-i taH/_lo tog/_ba bzhon ma/_gsang ba/_n+ny-Ita u pa d+hA las _bstod pa/_'jo ba/_gsang ba/_kyang kl-i pa dang ts+r-ita ma yin pa las so/_/byings r-ita u pa d+hA las kyang kl-i pU nus pa dang ts+r-i tI 'tshed pa dag 
[\[425b.3\]]ma yin pa la kyapa/_mar/_'gyur te/_dr-i tu 'jug pa la kyapa sbyar bas/_dr-i t+yaM/_kl-i pU dang ts+r-i tI la N+yata sbyar bas/_saM kal+b+yaM/_bi tsar+t+yaM/_pA Nau sr-i dze r+N+yata/_pA Ni la sr-i dza las N+yata'o/_pA Ni sngon ma'i sr-i dza rnam par bcad pa las N+yata 'gyur te/_tsa dza sogs kyis gar bsgyur/_phu ka 
[\[425b.4\]]mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/_pA Ni sa rgyA ra dz+dzuH/_sa ma ba purbA ts+tsa/_'jug pa/_saM a ba sngon ma las kyang ngo /_kun du rtogs pa/_rnam par dpyod pa/_nyer bsgyur saM a pa sngon ma'i sr-idza las kyang N+yata 'gyur te/_sa ma ba sargyaM/_Itsa khanaH/_kha na'i I'ang ngo /_kha nu 'joms pa la 
[\[425b.5\]]kyapa 'gyur zhing na I ru bsgyur te/_lag pas bsgril thag pa/_kha na la kyapa/_na Ir bsgyur/_a las yon tan byas pas/_khe yaM/_b+h+r-i nyo ny+ra saM dz+nyA yAM/_b+h+r-inya las ming ma yin pa la'o/_b+h+r-inya 'dzin pa la gang /_legs par kun tu rnam par bcad/_zag gi ming ma yin pa la kyapa 'gyur te/
[\[425b.6\]]thung ngu sogs kyis tuka byin pas/_b+h+r-i t+yaM/_ming ma yin na N+yata sbyar 'phel ba byas pas/_b+hAr+YA/_saM b+h+r-inyo bA/_saM b+h+r-inya/_'joms pa/_las yang na'o/_/saM sngon ma'i b+h+r-inya las kyapa yang na 'gyur zhing yang na N+yata 'gyur te/_saM b+h+r-i t+yaH/_saM b+hAr+YaH/_sr-i dze rbi b+hA ShA/_sr-i dzi'i 'dam ka'o/
[\[425b.7\]]sr-idza rnam par bcad pa la kyapa dang _gla rdan/_N+yata 'dam ka can du bya ste/_kyapa sr-i dz+yaH/_rnam par bcad pa/_N+yota/_sAr+dz+yA/_rA dza sU ya sUr+Ya mr-i Sho d+ya ru ts+ya ku pya kr-iSh+Ta pa ts+yA bya th+yA/_rA dza sUya/_sUr+Ya/_mr-iSho d+ya/_ru ts+ya/_ku pya/_kr-iSh+Ta pa ts+ya/_bsags pa/_rgyal rigs legs pa/_a bya th+ya rnams so/_rA dza 
[\[426a\]]
[\[426a.1\]]sngon ma'i Shu ded pa/_sr-i 'gro ba/_mr-i Sha sngon ma'i ba da brjod pa/_ru tsa 'bar ba/_ku pa khro ba/_kr-iSh+Ta sngon ma'i pa tsa 'tshed pa/_nanya sngon ma'i bya tha sdug bsngal ba rnams las kyapa sbyar bas/_rA dza sU ya/_sUr+Ya/_mr-i Sho d+ya/_ru ts+ya/_ku pya/_kr-iSh+Ta pa ts+ya/_a bya 
[\[426a.2\]]th+ya rnams rim pa bzhin/_rgyal po khrus byed do/_/nyi ma/_mi bden par byed do/_/gsal bar byed do/_/khro bar byed do/_/blangs nas btso bar bya'o/_/nad med par bya'o zhes pa rnams _rgyal po khrus byed do/_/nyi ma/_mi bden par byed do/_/gsal ba byed do/_/khro bar bya'o/_/blangs nas btso bar bya'o/_/
[\[426a.3\]]nad med par bya'o/_/brjod pa la tshig phrad du bya'o/_/b+hi d+yo d+h+h+yau na de/_b+had+ya/_ad+h+h+ya dag chu bo la'o/_/b+hi dir 'joms pa dang /_udz+dz+ha gtong ba dag la kyapa sbyar bas/_b+hi d+ya dang /_ud+t+h+ya dag chu bo'i ming brjod pa la tshig phrad du bya'o/_/pu Sh+ya sid+t+h+yau na k+Sha tre/_pu Sh+ya dang sid+h+ya dag skar ma la'o/_/pu Sha 
[\[426a.4\]]rgyas pa dang Shi d+hU bstan bcos dag la kyapa sbyar bas/_pu Sh+ya/_si d+h+ya dag skar ma brjod pa la tshig phrad do/_/bi pU ya bi nI ya dzi t+ya muny+dzakalka ha li Shu/_bi pU ya/_binI ya/_tshu bo/_chu bo/_dze t+ya rnams muny+dza snyigs pa ma thong ba rnams la'o/_bi snga ma'i pUng dag pa dang NInya thob pa/_dzi rgyal ba 
[\[426a.5\]]rnams la kyapa sbyar bas/_bipU ya/_binI ya/_rgyal/_rgyu skar/_dzi t+ya rnams rtswa muny+dza'i ska rags dang /_snyigs ma dang /_thong ba rnams brjod pa la tshig phrad do/_/pra t+ya bi b+h+yAM gra heHts+tshan+da si/_pra ti a pi dag las gra hi las sdeb sbyor la'o/_pra ti dang a pi dag las pha rol gyi gra ha nye bar 
[\[426a.6\]]len pa/_rtswa muny+dza'i ska rags/_snyog ma'am 'dres pa'am snyigs ma/_thong ba can/_las sdeb sbyor la kyapa 'gyur te/_gra hi dz+ya sogs kyis saM pra sAr Nar bsgyur bas/_pra ti gr-i h+yaM/_a pi gr-i h+yaM/_pa dA swai ri pA h+yA pa k+She Shu tsa/_tshig rang dbang min pa phyi rol phyogs rnams la'ang ngo /_tshig dang /_rang 
[\[426a.7\]]dbang min pa dang /_phyi rol dang /_phyogs rnams kyi don brjod pa la'ang gra ha las kyapa 'gyur te/_a pa gr-i h+ya pa daM/_tshig mtshams ma sbyar ba/_so sor 'dzin/_'dzin kyang /_gr-i h+yaHa swai ri/_rang dbang min pa bzung /_grA ma gr-i h+yA sen/_grong gi phyi rol na dmag/_rwa ma gr-i h+yaH/_dga' byed kyi phyogs/
[\[426b\]]
[\[426b.1\]]bi b+hA ShA kr-i br-i ShoH/_kr-i br-iSha dag las 'dam ka'o/_/kr-inya byed dang /_br-i Shu bkru ba dag las kyapa dang N+yata 'dam ka can du bya ste/_kyapa _kr-i t+yaM/_n+yata _kAr+Ya/_kyapa _br-i Sh+yaM/_N+yata _bar+Sh+yaM/_'grel par lung drangs pa/_prai ShA ti sarga prA p+ta ka leShu kr-i t+ya sh+tsa/_rab tu 'dod pa skye ba thob pa'i dus 
[\[426b.2\]]rnams la kr-ita'ang ngo /_rab tu thob pa'i dus dang skye ba'am klog pa dang thob pa'i dus rnams brjod pa la'ang kr-ita kyi ming can gyi _bya ba'am dgos pa'am 'bras bu'am 'phrin las/_khrus bya/_rkyen rnams 'gyur te/_pra sngon ma'i iShu 'dod pa dang /_ad+hi sngon ma'i ing klog pa dang /_pra snga ma'i 
[\[426b.3\]]a bl-i khyab pa rnams la snga phyi gnyis la k+ta dang bar pa la yata sbyar bas/_pre Shi ta twaM/_a d+h+ye yaM/_prA p+ta te kA laH/_b+ha bya ge ya pra ba tsa nI yo pa s+thA nI a dze n+yA p+lA byA pA t+yAH/_p+ha bya _ge ya _pra ba tsa nI ya/_u pa s+thA ni ya _dzan+yA _p+lA byA _pA t+yA rnams so/_/b+hU yod pa dang gai sgra la yata dang /
[\[426b.4\]]pra sngon ma'i pa tsa brjod pa dang /_u pa snga ma'i s+thA gnas pa dag la a _khyod rab tu 'dod nas/_klog bya/_khyod kyis thob pa'i dus/_nI yar dang /_dzan skye ba dang /_p+lu 'gro ba dang /_pa t+li lhung pa gsum la N+yata rnams sbyar bas/_b+ha bya/_gi ya/_pra ba tsa nI yaH/_u pa s+thA nI ya/_dzA n+yA/_blA byA/
[\[426b.5\]]pA t+yA rnams kyang tshig phrad du bya'o/_/'grel par lung drangs pa/_sha ki ling tsa/_nus pa la ling 'ang ngo /_/nus pa rtogs par byed pa la ling 'gyur zhing /_kr-ita kyi rkyen rnams kyang 'gyur te/_ba ha la a nI yar _yod pa/_bsgrags pa/_gsungs rab/_nye gnas/_skye ba/_'gro bya/
[\[426b.6\]]lhung bya/_sbyar bas/_ba ha nI yaH/_i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU t+r+'a t+k+r-i taHsamA p+taH/_zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las kr-ita rnams rdzogs so//_//de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod 
[\[426b.7\]]pa legs bshad nor _thob nus/_bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen gyi nang nas gtso che ba dngos po dang las kyi don la 'jug pa'i rkyen rnams kyi 'jug yul cho ga dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so//_//da ni byed pa po'i don gyi rkyen rnams 
[\[427a\]]
[\[427a.1\]]kyi cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/_N+wul tr-i tsau/_N+wul tr-i tsa dag go/_/byings las byed pa po ste byed pa can dang bya ba'i don la N+wul dang tr-itsa 'gyur te/_N+wul gyi la dang tr-itsa'i dbyangs don/_Na 'phel ba sogs kyi don no/_kr-inya la N+wul/_a tsa'i'ang nyaN 'gro ba la sogs 'phel 
[\[427a.2\]]ba/_rjes 'brel la phyis nas/_yu bu dag gi a na a ka dag gos bu a kar bsgyur bas/_kA ra kaH/_kr-inya la tr-itsa/_byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan byas/_su sbyin bas/_kartA/_de bzhin du/_NInya thob pa la N+wul dang tr-itsa gnyis sbyar bas/_N+wul nA+e ya kaH/_ne tA/_tr-itsa/
[\[427a.3\]]kuT la N+wul dang tr-itsa/_N+wul la yon tan/_tr-itsa la ba la dang po'i iT/_kuT sogs kyi kita _byed pa/_yin pas yon tan mi byed/_N+wul/_koT kaH/_tr-itsa su _kuTi tA/_Du dAnya la/_N+wul/_byed po/_dang tr-itsa N+wul gyi phyogs la/_tsiN kr-ita dag la Ata las yu ka 'os yuka/_'dren par byed/
[\[427a.4\]]A ga ma byin pas/_N+wul_dA ya kaH/_tr-itsa su_dA tA/_sha mu dang dmu la N+wul dang titsa ma mtha' sogs kyis 'phel pa mi byed/_iT byin pas/_kyu byed/_N+wul/_sha ma kaH/_tr-itsa/_sha mi tA/_N+wul/_da ma kaH/_tr-itsa _da ni tA/_sogs so/_/'grel par las kyi don la'ang N+wul 'gyur ro zhes byung 
[\[427a.5\]]bas/_hr-inya la N+wul sbyar 'phel/_sbyin pa byed/_ba byas pas/_pa da hA ra kaH/_na n+di gra hi pa tsA di b+h+yo l+yu Ni bya tsa/_na n+di gra hi pa tsa la sogs pa rnams las l+lu Ni ni atsa zhi bar byed/_rnams so/_zhi bar byed/_byed pa po'i don la nan+da la sogs pa rnams la l+Yu dang /_l+la hi la sogs pa rnams 
[\[427a.6\]]la Ni ni dang /_pa tsa la sogs pa rnams la atsa rnams 'gyur te/_rkang pas byed/_l+Yu'i la rtags don dang /_Ni ni na'i i brjod don dang Na 'phel ba'i don/_a tsa'i tsa dbyangs don no/_nan+da dga' ba/_pa sa gnas pa/_ma da dga' ba/_dU Sha sun 'byin byed pa/_sA d+ha 'grub pa/_shu 
[\[427a.7\]]b+ha mdzes pa/_br-i d+ha 'phel ba/_Sha ha bzod pa/_ta pa gdung pa/_dzalpa bzlas pa rnams la l+Yu la phyis/_yu a nar bsgyur bas/_nan+da naH/_dga' byed/_ba sa naH/_gnas byed/_ma da naH/_myos byed/_dU Sha NaH/_sun 'byin/_sA d+ha naH/_sgrub byed/_sho b+ha naH/_mdzes byed/_bar+d+ha naH/_'phel byed/
[\[427b\]]
[\[427b.1\]]sa ha naH/_ta pa naH/_dzalpa na/_sogs so/_/gra ha dang /_s+thA la Ni ni gra ha la 'phel ba dang /_s+thA la Ata la puka 'os puka byin pas/_grA hrI/_s+thA pI/_sogs so/_/pa tsa dang di pu tse ba la atsa byin pas/_pa tsaH/_de baH/_sogs so/_/ya ngonya tsi tsi ti ya ngo luka/_/yang 
[\[427b.2\]]bzod byed/_gdung byed/_smra byed/_las atsa ste yang 'ang 'jig go/_/byings yang gi mtha' can la'ang a tsa 'gyur te atsa pha rol la yang _'dzin par byed/_gnas par byed/_yang 'jig go/_/NI dang lU yang rkyen bcas/_'tshed par byed/_lha/_ne nI ya dang lo lU ya la atsa byin yang 'jig/_/
[\[427b.3\]]yang phyis pa'i rjes yin pas yon tan mi byed/_snga ma la atsa gcig ma yin pa sogs kyis yan dang /_phyi ma la atsa la sh+nu byings sogs kyis u bar bsgyur bas/_ne n+yaH/_lo lu baH/_sogs so/_/'grel par u mtha' can las yang rkyen yang na mi 'jig go zhes bshad 
[\[427b.4\]]pas/_yang na yang rkyen ma phyis pa ata kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/_ro rU yaH/_sogs so/_/tsa ri tsa li pa ti pa dI nAM bA twi twa ma pyA k+tsA b+h+y+ra sa se/_tsa ri _tsa li _shin tu 'dren par byed/_shin tu gcod par byed/_pa ti/_ba di rnams kyi gnyis nyid yang na ste a b+h+yA sa'i A k+tsa 'ang ngo /_tsa ra dang tsa 
[\[427b.5\]]la g.yo ba/_pa da lhung ba/_ba da brjod pa rnams kyi atsa pha rol la/_shin tu smra bar byed/_yang na gnyis brjod cing gnyis brjod pa na a b+h+ya sa'i Ak+tsa A ga ma 'gyur te/_a brjod don tsa khyad don ka gnas don no/_byings de rnams la atsa gnyis brjod Ak+tsa A ga ma byin pas/_tsa 
[\[427b.6\]]rA tsa raH/_tsa lA tsa laH/_pa tA pa taH/_pa dA pa daH/_sogs sam yang na gnyis ma brjod na/_tsa raH/_tsa laH/_pa taH/_pa daH/_sogs so/_/'grel par/_kr-inya la dngos po'i don la ka 'gyur te/_ka pha rol la gnyis brjod pa'ang ngo zhes bshad pas/_kr-i la ka gnyis brjod/
[\[427b.7\]]'gro bar byed/_g.yo bar byed/_lhung bar byed/_smra bar byed/_ri'i ata/_ku ha dag gi tsu/_kra kita _'gro bar byed/_g.yo bar byed/_ltung bar byed/_sga bar byed/_kyi don yin pas kra phyis/_ika gi atsa la yaN sbyar pas/_tsa kraM/_bya ba/_yang na atsa sbyar bas/_ka raH/_byed pa/_rA treHkr-i ti bi b+hA 
[\[428a\]]
[\[428a.1\]]ShA/_rA tri'i kr-ita la gdam nga'o/_ming kr-ita rkyen can pha rol la rA tril mu ma A ga ma ster ba dang mi ster ba yang na bar byas pas/_rA triM tsaraH/_rA tritsa raH/_sogs so/_/i gu pa d+hadz+nyA prI ki raHkaH/_i ka u pad+hAX dang dz+nyA phrI kr-I las ka'o/_/byings ika u pa 
[\[428a.2\]]d+hAn yod pa dang dz+nya khong du chud pa/_prInya tshim pa/_kr-i rnam par g.yeng ba rnams las ka 'gyur te/_kra ki ta kyi don no/_i ka u pa d+hA la bi snga ma'i k+Shipa _mtshan mo spyod pa/_'phel pa la ka byin pas/_pi k+Shi paH/_dz+nyA la ka/_iT la'ang Ata kyi dbyi 'os A phyis pas/_dz+nyaHprI la ka/
[\[428a.3\]]atsa la sh+nu byings sogs kyis i yar bsgyur bas/_pri yaH/_uta snga ma'i kr-I la ka//byings kyi r-Ita kyi ita 'os r-I ita/_r-i'i aN la ra pha rol los ra byin pas/_u t+ki raH/_'grel par kr-I mid pa/_rnam g.yeng /_la'ang ka 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/_giraH/_shes/_A[:]
[\[428a.4\]]ta sh+tso pa sarge/_Ata las kyang nyer bsgyur la'o/_dga' ba/_nyer bsgyur gang rung sngon nas yod pa'i byings Ata mtha' can las kyang ka 'gyur te/_pras+thaH/_su daH/_pra dz+nyaH/_'thor ba/_a b+hi dz+nyaH/_sogs so/_pA g+hA d+h+mA d+heT dr-i shaHshaH/_pA _g+h+ra _d+h+mA _d+heT _dr-i sha las _mid par byed/
[\[428a.5\]]sha'o/_/pA btung ba/_g+hA dri nye bar len pa/_d+h+mA sgra/_d+heT btung ba/_dr-i shir lta ba rnams las sha pha rol tu 'gyur te/_sha yig shita kyi don no/_bre/_legs sbyin/_shes rab/_mngon par shes pa/_pA g+h+na sogs kyis pi ba sogs su bsgyur bas/_ut+pi baH/_udz+dzi g+h+raH/_bi d+ha maH/
[\[428a.6\]]ud+d+ha yaH/_ut+pa sh+yaH/_sogs so/_a nu pas rgA l+li m+pa pon+da d+hA ri pA ri ded+thu de dzi tse ti sA ti sA hi b+h+ya sh+tsa/_zher bsgyur med pa las li m+pa/_bin+da _d+hA ri _pA ri _de bi _u de dzi tse ti _sA hi rnams las kyang ngo /_/li pi byug pa dang /_pi di cha shas la _steng 'thung /_steng snom/_rnam par gdung /
[\[428a.7\]]shin tu 'thung /_steng du blta/_ita 'gro ba sogs kyis nu ma dang /_d+h+r-inya 'dzin pa/_pr-i dga' ba/_bi da shes pa/_uta sngon ma'i/_e dzr-i 'baRa ba/_tsi tI ming /_sa ta mdo'i byings/_Sha ha bzod pa rnams Ni tsa'i mtha' can/_d+hA ra sogs nyer bsgyur sngon na med las sha 'gyur te/_yon 
[\[428b\]]
[\[428b.1\]]tan bya/_bas/_li m+paH/_bin+daH/_pA ra yaH/_pe da yaH/_u de dza yaH/_tsa ta yaH/_sA ta yaH/_sA ha yaH/_da dA ti da d+hA t+yorbi b+hA ShA/_da dA ti/_da d+hA ti dag las 'dam ka'o/_/Du dA nya sbyin pa dang /_Du d+hAnya 'dzin pa dag las sha 'gyur la sha pha rol la yang na sh+pu bzhin 
[\[428b.2\]]gnyis kyang _th+yug pa byed/_cha shas byed/_'dzin 'dod byed/_dga' bar byed/_shes par byed/_shin tu 'bar bar byed/_shes par byed/_mdo byed dam gzhung byed/_bzod pa byed/_brjod de/_dwanya dang d+hAnya la sha gnyis brjod/_a b+h+ya sta dag gi 'os a phyis pas/_dngaH/_da ng+haH/_yang na Ata las uka byin pas/_dA 
[\[428b.3\]]ya:/_d+hA ya:/_lta bu'o/_dz+wa lwa di b+h+yo Na:a n+ya ta ra s+yaM/_dz+wa la sogs pa rnams la Na yang na'o/_dz+wal 'bar ba nas kab kyi bar dz+wal la sogs pa ste byings de rnams la Na yang na 'gyur te/_Na 'phel ba sogs kyi don no/_/sbyin par byed/_'dzin par byed/_dz+wA la:/_tsA la:/_sogs dang /
[\[428b.4\]]sbyin par byed/_'dzin par byed/_yang na atsa sbyar bas/_dzA la:/_tsa la:/_sogs so/_sh+yA d+h+ya shru saM s+r+wa tIN pa sA ba hr-i liha sh+liSha shwa sh+tsa/_sh+yA _Ata _bya d+ha _A shru _saM sru _a t+liN _a ba sA _a ba hr-i _li ha _sh+liSha shwas las kyang ngo /_/'bar ba/_g.yo ba/_sh+yaing 'gro ba'i sh+yA dang /
[\[428b.5\]]byings Ata mtha' can rnams dang bya d+ha 'tshog pa/_'bar ba/_g.yog _Ang sngon ma'i shru thos pa/_saM sngon ma'i sru 'gro ba/_a ti snga ma'i in 'gro ba/_a ba snga ma'i Sho mtha'i las dang /_hr-inya 'tshe ba/_liha ro myang ba/_sh+li Sha 'khyung pa/_shwas srog rnams las kyang Na 'gyur te/_etsa rnams 
[\[428b.6\]]sha 'gro ba nye ba'i yul ma yin pa sogs kyis Ata du bsgyur/_Ata las uka ster ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_sh+yA ya:/_dA ya:/_pyA d+ha:/_A shwA ba:/_saM srA ba:/_a t+yA ya:/_a ba sA ya:/_a ba hA ra:/_le ha:/_sh+leSha:/_shwAs:/_du n+yor nu pa sarba/_nyer bsgyur med 
[\[428b.7\]]pa la du nI dag las so/_/nyer bsgyur sngon na med pa'i Tu du nye par gdung ba dang /_NInya 'dren pa dag las Na 'gyur _zil nga'am ba mo/_sbyin pa/_nang /_kun nas thos pa/_yang dag pa la 'gro ba/_shin tu 'grog/_mtha' dag/_kun 'phrog/_ro myang ba/_'khyud pa/_dbugs 'byung /_te/_dA ba:/_nags tsha la/
[\[429a\]]
[\[429a.1\]]nA ya:/_pi b+hA ShA gra ha:/_gra ha las 'dam ka'o/_gra ha las Na yang na 'gyur te/_graha:/_dza la tshar:/_yang na atsa sbyar bas/_graha:sUr+YA di:/_ge he ka:/_khang pa la ka'o/_gra ha las khang pa brjod pa la ka 'gyur te/_gra hi dz+yA sogs kyis saM phra sA Nar bsgyur 
[\[429a.2\]]bas/_'dren pa'am khrid/_gr-iha:/_shalpi ni Sh+wun/_bzo bo la Sh+wu na no/_/nr-i tI lus bskyod pa/_chu srin 'dzin khri/_chu na rgyu ba/_kha nu 'joms pa/_gza' ste nyi ma la sogs pa/_rany+dza rnams las bzo bo brjod pa la Sh+wun 'gyur te/_na dbyangs don/_Sha Shi ta la dI Sha'i don/_yu pu dag gi an a ka 
[\[429a.3\]]dag gos bu a kar bsgyur bas/_khab bam khad pa'am khyim/_narta ka:/_kha na ka:/_ta dza ka:/_btso blag mkhan/_ga:thaka:/_gA la tha kan 'o/_gai sgra la'o zhes pa la sha 'gro ba nye ba'i yul ma yin pa sogs kyis etsa Ata du bsgyur bas gA las tha kan 'gyur te/_gA tha ka:/_N+yu T+tsa/
[\[429a.4\]]N+yu Ta lang ngo /_gA las N+yuT 'ang 'gyur te/_Ta Tita kyi/_gar mkhan/_rkos mkhan/_tshig phrad la na phyis/_don dang Na 'phel ba'i don/_yu a nar bsgyur Ata las yuka A ga ma byin pas/_gA ya na:/_ha sh+tsa prI hi kA la yo:/_hA las kyang 'bru dang dus/_blu mkhan nam tshigs bcad mkhan 
[\[429a.5\]]dag la'o/_o hAka gtong ba las 'bru dang dus dag brjod la N+yuta 'gyur te/_hA ya na:/_nA ma brI ha ya:/_hA ya na:sa m+pa t+sa ra:/_pru sr-i lwa:sa ma p+hi hA re bun/_pru sr-i lU las/_glu mkhan ma/_mnyam pa'i byed pa la bun 'o/_prung dang sr-i 'gro ba/_lUnya gcod pa rnams sa mnyam 
[\[429a.6\]]pa'i byed pa brjod pa la bun 'gyur te/_na dbyangs don bu a kar bsgyur bas/_'bru/_zhes bya ba'i 'bru/_zhes bya ba'i 'bru/_'dor byed de lo'o/_pra ba ka:/_sa ra kaH/_la ba ka:/_A shi She tsa/_smon pa la'ang ngo /_/byings las smon pa rtogs par byed pa la'ang bun 'gyur te/_dzI ba srog 'tsho ba/_nan+da 
[\[429a.7\]]dga' ba la bun sbyar bas/_dzIb ka:/_'tsho bar shog/_nan+da ka:/_dga' bar shog//_sogs so/_k+titsa k+tau tsa saM dz+nyA yAM/_khrus mkhan/_phor bzo ba/_'dreg mkhan/_ming la k+titsa dang k+ta dag kyang ngo /_/byings las ming gi don brjod pa la k+titsa dang k+ta dag 'gyur ro/_ti tu tra ta thA si su sa ra ka 
[\[429b\]]
[\[429b.1\]]se shu tsa/_ti tu_tra ta[: ]thA si su[: ]sar[: ]ka sa rnams la'ang ngo /_kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen ti la sogs pa 'di rnams la iT 'gyur ba ma yin no/_b+hU yod pa la mdo sngon mas k+ti tsa byin/_tsa dbyangs don kra yon tan 'gog pa'i don mdo 'dis iT 'gyur ba ma yin te/_b+hU hiH/_de bzhin du 
[\[429b.2\]]srog chags mang la nas skye ba la k+titsa sbyar bas/_sU taH/_sogs so/_/a nu nA si kas+ya shwi dz+ha loH/_rjes su sna ldan gyi dz+hal kang 'gro ba la kwing dag la'o/_/byings rjes su sna ldan mtha' can gyi u pa d+hA ni kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen dz+h+yal dang po kang 'gro ba'i ming _'byor ba/_can dang kwipa 
[\[429b.3\]]rnams pha rol la ring por 'gyur ro/_skye ba/_nak+ti tsi dIr+g+ha sh+tsa/_k+titsa la ring po'ang ma yin no/_gong du k+dita dz+hal dang po la rjes su sna ldan mtha' can gyi u pa d+hA ring por bsgyur ba bshad kyang de'i dmigs bsal rkyen k+titsa pha rol la ban sogs dang tan sogs iT med pa rnams kyis 
[\[429b.4\]]u pa d+hA ring por bsgyur ba dang na dbyi ba sogs mi byed de/_ya mu nye bar 'gog pa/_ba nu slong ba/_ta nu rgyas pa rnams la k+titsa sbyar bas/_yaM ti/_baM ti/_taM ti/_sogs so/_sa naHk+ti tsi lo pa sh+tsA n+ya ta ra s+yAM/_san gyi k+titsa la yang na dbyi'o/_san te Sha nu sbyin pa'i na yig dpyi ba dang 
[\[429b.5\]]A ta du bsgyur ba sogs k+titsa pha rol la yang na pya ste/_sA tiH/_sa yiH/_san+tiH/_karma N+ya Na/_las las aNa'o/_bya ba'i las gang yin/_'gog pa/_slong ba/_rgyas pa/_pa de las pha rol du bya ba'i don la aN 'gyur te/_kum+b+ha kA ra:/_kAN+Da lA baH/_sogs so/_hwA bA ma sh+tsa/_hwA bA 
[\[429b.6\]]mA las kyang ngo /_hwenya 'dren benya thags kyi rgyu'i etsa/_sbyin pa/_sbyin pa/_Ata du bsgyur pas hwA dag dang mAng tshad rnams las kyang aN 'gyur te/_Ata las yuka A ga ma byin pas/_swarga hwA yaH/_taM tu bA yaH/_bum pa byed pa ste rdza mkhan/_tsher ma brngab/_d+hA n+ya mA yaH/_A tonya nu pa 
[\[429b.7\]]sarge kaH/_Ata las nyer bsgyur med pa la ka'o/_las las pha rol gyi byings Ata mtha' las nyer bsgyur med pa la ka 'gyur te/_dA sbyin pa la ka/_iT las kyang Ata kyi dbyi 'os A phyis pas/_mtho ris su 'dren/_thags kyi rgyu/_go da:/_ba lang sbyin/_'gru'i tshad de bya'o/_zhos sbyin/_kan+pa la 
[\[430a\]]
[\[430a.1\]]daH/_su bis+thAH/_su pa la s+thA las so/_su pa mtha' las pha rol gyi s+thA gnas pa las ka 'gyur te/_aN 'gyur ba ma yin no/_sa ma s+thAH/_ba na s+thAH/_a m+thA mA go b+hA mi sa byA ba dwi tri ku she ku shaM kwaM gu many+dza puny+dzi pa ra me bar+hi di bya g+ni b+h+yeHs+thAH/_a m+pa _a mA _go _b+hU mi _sa pyA pa 
[\[430a.2\]]dwi tri _ku _she ku _shaM ku _aM gu _many+dzi _puny+dza _par me _bar+hi _di bi _ag+ni rnams las s+thI'i'o/_a m+pa la sogs pa 'di rnams las pha rol gyi _mnyam gnas/_nags gnas/_s+thI sa yig ni Sha yig tu 'gyur te/_de rnams sngon ma'i s+thA la ka//_A phyis mdo 'dis sa Sha/_Sha TU la kha Tu 'os/
[\[430a.3\]]tha Thar bsgyur bas/_a mA Sh+ThaH/_A mA Sh+ThaH/_goSh+ThaH/_b+hU mi Sh+ThaH/_sa byA pa Sh+ThaH/_dwiSh+ThaH/_triSh+ThaH/_kuSh+ThaH/_shekuSh+ThaH/_aM guSh+ThaH/_puny+dzaSh+ThaH/_pa ra meSh+ThaH/_bar+hiSh+ThaH/_di biSh+ThaH/_a g+niSh+ThaH/_tun+da sho ka yoH/_pa ri mr-i dzA pha nu ngoH/_pa ri mr-i dza dang a pa 
[\[430a.4\]]nu da dag las le lo dang mya _ma gnas/_ma lang gnas/_sa gnas/_g.yas gnas/_gnyis gnas/_gsum gnas/_ngan gnas/_gcub gnas/_phur bu gnas/_mthe bong gnas/_le brgan nam btsod/_dpung pa/_mchog gnas/_rma bya/_lha gnas/_me gnas/_ngan ngag la'o/_pa ri mr-i dza dang a pa nu da dag las rim pa bzhin 
[\[430a.5\]]le lo dang mya ngan dag brjod pa la ka 'gyur te/_pa ri mr-i dzaH/_a la saH/_a pa nu daH/_shokA/_mU la bi b+hu dzA de sh+tsa/_bi b+hu dza la sogs pa rnams las kyang rtsa pa la'o/_pi b+hu dza la sogs pa rnams las kyang rtsa pa brjod pa la ka 'gyur te/_bi b+hu dzaH/_ku mu daM/_pre dA dz+nyaH/_pra las 
[\[430a.6\]]dA dz+nya las so/_pra snga ma'i dA sbyin pa dang dz+nyA shes pa las ka _le lo/_'gyur te/_pra daH/_mya ngan/_pra dz+nyAH/_gA poSh+Ta ka/_gA pA dag las Taka'o/_supa las pha rol gyi gai sgra dang pA btung ba dag las Ta ka 'gyur te/_ka kita kyi don da Ta dI pa kyi don no//_ku mu da'i rtsa ba/_bak+t+ra gaH/_sa ma gaH/
[\[430a.7\]]sU ra paH/_chang 'thung ba/_shi d+hu paH/_ha ra te ra nu d+ya ma ne tsa/_ha ta ti las nus _rab sbyin/_shes rab/_pa ma yin pa la'ang ngo /_ha ra ti ste hr-inya 'tshe ba las nus pa ma yin pa'i don la atsa 'gyur te/_aM sha ha raH/_cha shas 'phrog/_nus pa yin na Na sbyar _zhal nas gsung /_snyan mchog gi g+pu 
[\[430b\]]
[\[430b.1\]]bas/_b+hA ra hA raH/_shak+ti lAM ga la ku sha ya Sh+Ti to ma ra g+ha Ta nu Shu gra heH/_shak+ti _lAM ga la _kur sha _yaSh+Ti _to ma ra _g+ha Ta _da TI _d+ha nu rnams la gra hi las so/_shak+ti la sogs pa 'di rnams snga ma'i gra ha las atsa 'gyur te/_shak+ti gra haH/_lAM ga la gra haH/_ku sha gra haH/
[\[430b.2\]]khur 'phrog/_yaSh+Ti gra haH/_to ma ra gra haH/_g+ha Ta gra haH/_da Ti gra haH/_d+ha nu gra haH/_ba ya si tsa/_na tshod la'o/_na tshod brjod pa dang 'di la pa'i hr-inya la atsa 'gyur te/_ka ba tsa ha raHku mA raH/_'grel par ngang tshul brjod pa la Ang _mdung 'dzin/_gshol mdza' 'dzin/_ku sha 'dzin/
[\[430b.3\]]dbyug pa 'dzin/_dgra sta 'dzin/_sAng 'dzin/_gzhu 'dzin/_sngon ma'i hr-inya las a tsa 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/_pha lA ha raH/_yang 'grel par bdun pa'i rjes _go cha phrogs so gzhon nu yis/_gnas pa la'ang atsa 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/_sta m+b+he sngon ma'i ra mu la 
[\[430b.4\]]a tsa byin pas/_sta m+b+he ra maH/_ha stiH/_'grel par lung drangs pa/_a d+hi ka ra ne she teH/_she ti las lhag par byed pa la'o/_me tog phrogs pa/_shIng nyal ba las lhag par bya ba rtogs par byed pa la a tsa 'gyur te/_kha sha yaH/_u dar sha yaH/_sogs so/_gi rau she te r+DaH/
[\[430b.5\]]gi ra lang she ti las Da'o/_blang po che/_gi ra las pha rol gyi shIng las Da 'gyur te/_Ti'i 'os Ti phyis/_de'i khyad don gyis Da phyis pas/_gi ra shaH/_tse reSh+ThaH/_tsa ri las Ta'o/_su pa las pha rol gyi tsa ra g.yo ba la _nam mkha' la nyal/_brang la nyal/_Ta 'gyur te/_Tu Tita d+ha sogs kyi 
[\[430b.6\]]dIpa kyi don no/_ku ru tsa raH/_b+hik+ShA se nA dA ye Shu tsa/_b+hik+ShA _se nA _dA ya rnams la'ang ngo /_/b+hi k+ShA la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi pha rol gyi tsa _ri nyal/_ra las kyang Ta 'gyur te/_b+hi k+ShA tsa raH/_se nA tsa raH/_dA ya tsa raH/_pu raHa gra tonya gre Shu sa rte/_pu raH/_a gra taH/_a gre rnams las rti las 
[\[430b.7\]]so/_sgra ngan du 'gro ba/_pu ra sogs 'di rnams las pha rol gyi sr-i 'gro ba laT 'gyur te/_pu raHsa raH/_sngon du 'gro ba/_a gra taHsaraH/_sngon du 'gro ba/_a gre sa raH/_rtser 'gro ba/_slong du 'gro/_sde spyod pa/_blangs te sbyod pa/_pU rbe kar+t+r-i/_pUrba la byed pa las so/_pU rba las pha rol gyi sr-i las byed pa po'i 
[\[431a\]]
[\[431a.1\]]tshig laT 'gyur te/_pUrba sa raH/_kr-i nyo he tu tIts+tshA l+yA nu lo [{]mye [,]me [}]Shu/_kr-inya las rgyu dang de'i ngang tshul dang rjes su mthun pa rnams la'o/_kr-inya las rgyu'i byed pa po dang de'i ngang tshul rtogs par byed pa dang /_rjes su mthun pa'i byed pa po rnams laT 'gyur te/_bid+yA sha skaraH/_rgyu'i byed pa/
[\[431a.2\]]shrAd+h+nyA ka raH/_ngang tshul/_sngon du 'gro bar byed/_ba tsa na ka raH/_rjes su mthun/_sogs so/_kr-i ka mi kaM sa kun m+b+ha pA tra ku shar+NI Sh+wa na pya ya s+ya/_kr-i/_ka mi/_kaM sa/_kum+b+ha _pA tra _ku shA _kar+NI rnams la mi zad pa ma yin pa'i 'o/_/mi zad pa ma yin pa'i rnam par bcad _rig pas grags par byed/
[\[431a.3\]]dad pa byed/_pa ni kr-i la sogs pa 'di rnams _smra bar byed/_pha rol la sa nyid du 'gyur gyis gzhan du mi 'gyur te/_dper brjod gong du bshad pa'i bi d+yA shaHyi rnam bcad kr-i pha rol la sar bsgyur ba lta bu'o/_di bA bi b+hA ni shA brab+hA b+ha sar+n+tA na n+tA di ba hu nA n+di kiM li pi li pi ba li b+ha k+ti kar+t+r-i tsi tra k+She tra saM khyA dzaM 
[\[431a.4\]]g+ha bA gwa ngar+Ya d+ta d+d+ha nu ra ru Sh+Shu/_di bA _bi b+hA _ni shA _pra b+hA _b+has _an+ta _a nan+ta _A di _ba hu _nAn+di/_ki _li pi _li po _ba li _b+hak+ti _kar+t+r-i _tsi tra _k+She tra _saM khyA _dzaM g+ha _bA hu _u ras _yad _ta da _d+ha nus _a rus rnams la'o/_/di bA la sogs pa 'di rnams las pha rol gyi kr-inya las Ta 
[\[431a.5\]]'gyur te/_di bA ka raH/_nas/_nyin mo/_mtshan mo/_nyin mo/_mtha'/_mtha' yas/_dang po/_mang po/_dga' ba/_ci/_byug pa/_legs pa/_stobs/_bus pa/_byed pa/_ri mo/_shing /_grangs/_parla/_dpung pa/_brang /_gang /_do/_gzhu/_sdug bsngal/_a ru ska raH'i bar ro/_'grel par/_keM/_yad _tad _ba hu rnams las pha 
[\[431a.6\]]rol gyi kr-i las _nyin byed/_yang na a tsa 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/_kiM ka raH/_ya t+ka raH/_ta t+ka raH/_ba hu ka raH/_karma Ni b+h+r-i tau/_karma na las g.yog la'o/_rnam na las pha rol gyi kr-inya las g.yog po brjod pa laT 'gyur te/_sdug bsngal byed/_karma ka raH/_b+h+r-i twiH/_na shab+da sh+lo ka ke la ha 
[\[431a.7\]]gA thA bai ra tsA Tu sU tra man+t+ra pa de Shu/_shab+da _sgra/_sh+lo ka/tshigs bcad/_ci byed/_gang byed/_de byed/_mang po byed/_ka la ha _'khrug pa/_gA thA _smra ba/_bai ra _dgra/_tsA Tu/[ {]brdzun[,]rdzun[}]/_sU tra _mdo/_man+t+ra _sngags/_tshig _pa da rnams la ma yin no/_shab+dan la sogs pa 'di _las byed de/_g.yog go/_rnams las pha rol kyi kr-inya 
[\[431b\]]
[\[431b.1\]]las Ta 'gyur ba ma yin te/_de rnams las pha rol gyi kr-i la a na sbyar bas/_shab+da kA raH/_nas/_pa da kA raHyi bar ro/_sta m+ba sha kr-i tI ri na/_sta m+ba sha kr-i ti dag la i na 'o/_sta mA dang /_sha kr-ita dag las pha rol gyi kr-inya la rim pa bzhin 'bru dang be'u brjod pa la in 'gyur te/_na dbyangs don yon 
[\[431b.2\]]tan byas pas/_sta m+ba ka riH/_drI hiH/_sha kr-i t+ka riH/_bat+saH/_ha ra/_sgra byed/_tshig byed/_teHdr-i ti nA tha yoHpa shau/_ha ra ti las dr-i ti/_nA tha dag las phyugs la'o/_dr-i ti/_nA tha dag gi pha rol las ha ra ti ste hr-inya las phyugs kyi byed pa po la in 'gyur te/_dr-i ti _ha ti/_pa shuH/
[\[431b.3\]]nA tha ha riH/_sdong po byed ste/_'bru/_lan cig byed pa ste/_be'u'am ma hes gshin pa/_pa shuH/_pha le gra hi rA t+ma b+ha ri sh+tsa/_pha le gra hiH/_A t+ma m+b+ha ri'ang ngo /_pha le sngon ma'i gra ha dang /_A t+maM snga ma'i b+h+r-inya la in sbyar bas/_pha le gra hiHdang /_A t+ma m+b+ha riH/_bags ldan gyi [{]ri dgas[,]ri dwags[}]/_phyugs/
[\[431b.4\]]'dam seng /_dag tshig phrad do/_ku k+Shi m+b+ha riHtsa/_ku k+Shi m+b+ha riH'ang ngo /_ku k+ShiM snga ma'i _phyugs/_b+h+r-inya las in sbyar bas/_kuk+Shi m+b+ha riHzhes pa'ang tshig phrad do/_e dzeHkha sha_/e dzi las kha sha'o/_su pa las pha rol _'bras bu 'dzin/_bdag 'dzin/_gyi e dzi las kha sha 'gyur te/_sha 
[\[431b.5\]]shita kyi don dang /_khra mu ma gyi don no/_a ru r+d+wi Sha da dza n+ta s+ya mu ma/_sdug bsngal dang mi mthun pa la atsa mtha'i mu ma'o/_lto 'ger ba/_kha 'gro ba'i rkyen can gyi tshig pha rol la de sngon ma'i rtags a tsa mtha' can la sdug bsngal dang mi mthun pa dag gi don la mu ma A ga ma 'gyur te/_ma gnas don 
[\[431b.6\]]dang u brjod don no/_dza na snga ma'i e dzi la mdo snga ma'i kha sha yon tan/_mdo 'dis mu ma A ga ma byin pas/_dza na me dza ya:/_bA ta shu nI til srA d+d+he Sh+wa dza d+he Ta tu da dza hA ti b+h+yaHkha sha _bA ta _shu nI _til _srA d+d+hA rnams la a dza/_d+heT _tud _dza hA ti rnams las kha sha'o/_bA ta snga ma'i a dza 
[\[431b.7\]]shu nI sngon ma'i/_d+heT ti la snga ma'i _tud _srA d+d+hA sngon ma'i hA ka rnams las kha sha 'gyur te/_mu ma A ga ma byin pas/_skye bo g.yo ba/_bA ta ma dzaH/_rlung ltar 'gro bar dgas/_shu niM d+ha yaH/_khyi mo la 'thung ba/_til n+tu daH/_til brdung /_shi zas 'dor ba/_srAd+d+haM dza haH/_sha 'gro ba la sh+lu bzhin banyis brjod pa'o//
[\[432a\]]
[\[432a.1\]]khi t+ya na bya ya se/_mi zad pa ma yin pa'i kha 'gro ba la'o/_rkyen kha 'gro ba can pha rol la de'i sngon ma'i rtags de la muM A ga ma 'gyur zhing gal te rtags de'i mtha' a tsa ring po yin na thung ngur bsgyur te/_dper brjod gong du bstan pa'i mu ma rnams dang /_shu nI dang shrAd+h+nyA'i 
[\[432a.2\]]mtha' thung ngur bsgyur ba lta bu'o/_nA si kA stan yor+d+h+mA d+he ToH/_nA si kA dang /_stan dag las d+h+mA dang d+heT dag las so/_nA si kA sngon ma'i d+h+mA dang sta na sngon ma'i d+heT dag las kyang kha sha 'gyur te/_nA si kan+d+ha maH/_sta nan+d+ha yaH/_nA DI muSh+T+yo sh+tsa/_nA DI _muSh+TI dag las kyang ngo /_nA DI dang /_muSh+Ti 
[\[432a.3\]]dag gi pha rol gyi d+h+mA dang d+heT dag las kyang kha sha 'gyur te/_nA Din+d+ha maH/_nA DIn+d+ha yaH/_nA DIn+d+ha yaH/_muSh+Ti n+d+ha maH/_muSh+Ti n+d+ha yaH/_u di kU le ru dzi ba hoH/_kU/_g+hA pA d+h+ma sogs kyis shita la d+ha mar bsgyur/_sna zhig/_nu ma 'thung ba/_la la uta ru dzi ba ha dag las so/_k+du la las pha rol gyi 
[\[432a.4\]]uta sngon ma'i du dzi dang ba ha dag las kha sha 'gyur te/_kU la mu dru dzaH/_rtsa zhig lu tshur zhig _kU la mu dwa haH/_ba hA/_rtsa 'thung /_khu tshur 'thung /_b+h+ri li haH/_ba ha/_a b+h+ra la li ha las so/_ba ha dag a b+h+ra dag las pha rol gyi li ha las kha sha 'gyur te/_ba haM li haHgoH/_a b+h+raM li haH/_bA yuH/_pa ri mA 
[\[432a.5\]]ne pa tsaH/_tshad la pa tsa las so/_/tshad 'jal bar/_rigs shin tu nad can/_rigs mtho thob pa/_byed pa las pha rol gyi pa tsa las kha sha 'gyur te/_dro NaM pa tsA s+tha li/_pra s+thaM pa tsA/_mi tan khe tsa/_mi tan kha la'ang ngo /_mi ta dang na kha _thob pa ro myang ba ste ba lang /_sprin nam lhang tsher/_rlung /_dag las 
[\[432a.6\]]pha rol gyi pa tsa la'ang kha sha 'gyur te/_mi taM pa tsaH/_brAh+ma NI/_na khaM pa tsA/_ya bA gUH/_a sUr+Ya la lAT yor+d+r-i shata po/_a sUr+Ya dang la _bre po che gang 'tshod par byed/_bre gang 'tshod/_lAT dag la dr-i sha ta pa dag las so/_/a sUr+Ya dang la lAT dag las pha rol gyi rim pa bzhin dr-i sha dang ta pa 
[\[432a.7\]]dag las kha sha 'gyur te/_a sUrmaM pa sh+yaH/_bram ze mo/_thug pa'am tshod ma/_mu kha/_gdong nyi ma la mi lta/_la lA TaM ta paHsUr+YaH/_dpral ba gdung byed de nyi ma/_u graM pa sh+ye ram+ma da pA Nin+d+ha mA sh+tsa/_u graM _pa sh+ya _i ram+ma da _pA Nin+d+ha ma rnams kyang ngo /_/u gra sngon ma'i dr-i sha dang /_ir 
[\[432b\]]
[\[432b.1\]]sngon ma'i ma da dang /_pA Ni snga ma'i d+h+mA rnams la kha sha sbyar bas/_u graM pa sh+ya/_iram+ma da/_pAnin+d+ha ma rnams kyang tshig phrad do/_'grel par/_ka ra las pha rol gyi d+h+mA las kyang kha sha 'gyur bar bshad pas/_ka ran+d+ha maH/_pri ya ba she ba daHkha tsa/_pri ya _ba sha ya ba da las kha tsa'o/_/
[\[432b.2\]]pre ya dang ba sha dag las pha rol gyi ba da las kha tsa 'gyur te/_drags shugs blta/_chang la dga' ba/_lag pa zhib/_tsa dbyangs don/_kha khita kyi don no/_/gri yaM ba daH/_ba sham+ba daH/_'grel par su pa las pha rol _phyed bste khag ba/_gyi ga ma las kha tsa 'gyur par bshad pas/_p+hu dzi ga maH/
[\[432b.3\]]bi hA yas:pi hatsa/_yihA ya sa'i bi ha'ang ngo /_bi hA yas las pha rol gyi gam las kha tsa 'gyur zhing bi ha yas kyang bi ha zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/_dga' ba brjod ba/_legs pa brjod pa/_bi haM ga maH/_'grel par yang na kha tsa la nga 'gro ba bzhin rjes su sna ldan dbyi'o zhes _lag 'gro 
[\[432b.4\]]bshad pas/_b+hu dzi gaH/_bi haM gaH/_sogs so/_dwi Sha par yaHtA piH/_dwi Sha pa ra dag la tA pi las so/_dwi Sha dang pa pa dag las pha rol gyi ta pa Nitsa'i mtha' can la kha tsa 'gyur ro/_nam mkha' la 'gro ba ste 'dab chags so/_kha tsi hra swaH/_kha tsa la thung ngu'o/_kha tsa pha rol la Ni tsa las 
[\[432b.5\]]byung ba'i u pa _las 'gro/_mkha' 'gro/_d+hA bud med brjod pa ma yin pa thung ngur 'gyur te/_dwi Sha dang pa ra snga ma'i tA pi la mdo snga mas kha tsa Ni iT med pa la phyis/_mdo 'dis u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur bas/_dwi ShaM ta paH/_bud med yin na/_dwi sha tI tA paH/_bA tsi ya mo pra te/
[\[432b.6\]]brtul zhugs la bA tsa las ya ma la'o/_mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs la 'jug pa na dA tsa las pha rol gyi ya mu la kha tsa 'gyur ro/_bA tsaM ya ma pu raM da rau tsa/_bA tsaM ya ma pu raM da ra dag kyang ngo /_dgra brdung /_pha rol brdung /_bA tsa snga ma'i ya mu dang pu ra snga ma'i dr-i la _mi mthun ba mo brdung /
[\[432b.7\]]kha tsa sbyar bas/_bA tsi ya ma/_mi smra ba ngag bsdams pa'am smra bcad/_grong 'jom te/_dbang po lo/_pu raM da ra dag tshig phrad do/_sarbe sa haH/_sarba las ha las so/_sarba snga ma'i sa ha las kha tsa 'gyur te/_sarbaM sa haH/_sngon bzod/_'grel ba ra b+ha ga snga ma'i dr-i las kyang kha tsa 'gyur bar 
[\[433a\]]
[\[433a.1\]]bshad pas/_b+ha gaM da raH/_sarba kU lA b+h+ra ka r+Yi She Shu ka ShaH/_sarba kU la a b+h+ra ka ri Sha rnams la ka Sha las so/_sarba la sogs pa 'di gsum las pha rol gyi ka Sha las kha tsa 'gyur te/_sarbaM ka ShaH/_kha laH/_kU laM ka ShaH/_na dzIH/_a b+h+raM ka ShaH/_gi riH/_ka rI ShaM 
[\[433a.2\]]ka ShaH/_pAt+yA/_me d+ha rti b+ha ye Shu kr-inyaH/_mtshan ma 'joms/_me d+ha ri ti b+ha ya rnams la kr-inya las so/_mi d+ha ri ti/_b+ha ya rnams las pha rol gyi kr-inya las kha tsa 'gyur te/_me d+haM ka raH/_r-i ti ng+ka raH/_b+ha _kun la 'tshe ste ngan pa/_yaM ka raH/_chu klung /_a b+ha yaM ka raH/_ri po/_k+She ma bri ya ma 
[\[433a.3\]]dre tsa/_rlung _k+She ma _pri ya _ma bral 'ang ngo /_k+She ma _pre ya _ma dra rnams las pha rol gyi kr-inya las kha tsa 'gyur zhing aNa'ang 'gyur te/_k+She maM ka raH/_k+She maM kA raH/_blo gros byed/_bden byed/_pri yaM ka raH/_'jigs byed/_ma druM ka/_mi 'jigs pa byed raH/_ma dra kA raH/
[\[433a.4\]]A shi te b+hu paH/_ka ra Na b+hA ba yoH/_A shi ta la _b+hU las byed dang dngos po dag las so/_/A shi ta las pha rol gyi b+hU las byed pa dang dngos _bde bar byed/_po dag la 'jug pa la kha tsa 'gyur te/_dga' bar byed/_a la mA shi daM b+ha ba o da naH/_su kha nA shi tiM b+ha baM/_zab dbyangs byed/
[\[433a.5\]]saM dz+nyA AMb+h+r-i tr-I br-i ji d+hA ris hi ta pi da maH/_b+h+r-i _tr-I _br-i _dzi _d+hA ri _sa hi _ta pi _da ma las ming la'o/_/supa las pha rol gyi byings 'di rnams las ming la kha tsa 'gyur te/_bi shwam+b+ha raH/_ra thaM ta raM/_pa ti m+ba rA/_sha truny+dza yaH/_ba sun+d+ha raH/_khyod zas kyi nus pa brgyad cu/_khyod la bde ba brgyad cu/
[\[433a.6\]]sha tru n+sa haH/_sha dru n+ha paH/_a ri n+da maH/_ga ma sh+tsa/_ga ma las kyang ngo /_supa las pha rol gyi gam las kyang ming la kha tsa 'gyur te/_p+lurbaM gamaH/_pan+thAnaH/_hr-i da yaM ga mAH/_sna tshogs 'dzin/_shing rta sgrol ba/_khyod 'dam pa/_dgra las rgyal ba/_nor 'dzin/_bA tsaH/_an+tA n+t+ya tA d+h+wo ra spA ra khA nan+de Shu DaH/_an+ta 
[\[433a.7\]]dgra bzod pa/_dgra brdung ba/_dgra 'dul ba/_an+t+ya ta/_ad+h+wa/_u ras/_pA ra _kha _a nan+ta rnams la Da'o/_/an+ta sogs rtags 'di rnams _sngon du 'gro ba/_lam/_snying la 'bab pa/_las pha rol gyi gam laDa 'gyur te/_Ti 'os/_Ti phyis/_de'i khyad/_tshig/_don gyi Da phyis pas/_an+ta gaH/_mthar 'gro/
[\[433b\]]
[\[433b.1\]]an+d+ya ta gaH/_a d+h+wa gaH/_u ra gaH/_pA ra gaH/_kha gaH/_a nan+ta gaH/_u rasaHsa lo pash+tsa/_u rasa'i sa dbyi ba'ang ngo /_/gam pha rol la u ras kyi sa dbyi ste/_dper brjod bshad zin to/_sarba pan+ha yo sh+tsa/_sarba _pan+nadag la'ang ngo /_sarba dang pan+na dag las pha rol gyi 
[\[433b.2\]]shin tu 'gro/_lam 'gro/_lto 'gro/_pha rol 'gro/_mkha' la 'gro/_mtha' yas 'gro/_gam las kyang Da 'gyur te/_sarba gaH/_pan+na gaH/_'grel par _u ras pha rol gyi gam las yang na kha tsa 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/_u raM ga maH/_su du ro\u0f85 d+hi ka ra Ne/_su du ra dag las lhag par byed 
[\[433b.3\]]pa la'o/_/su dang dur dag las pha rol gyi gam las lhag par byed pa la Da 'gyur te/_sugaH/_durgaH/_thams cad du 'gro/_rkang mi 'gro/_'grel par de rnams su ma zad gzhan yang mang po las pha rol gyi ga ma la Da 'gyur _lto 'gro/_ro zhes bshad pas/_nirgaH/_sarba tra gaH/_tu ragaH/
[\[433b.4\]]grA ma gaH/_sogs so/_/a shi Shi ha naH/_smon pa la han las so/_su pa las _bde 'gro/_'gro dka'/_pha rol gyi ha na las smon pa brjod pa la Da 'gyur te/_sha trU haH/_kle shA pa haH/_ta mo\u0f85pa haH/_du:kha pa haH/_sogs so/_/lak+Sha Ne dzA _mi 'gro ba/_kun du 'gro/_mgyogs 'gro/
[\[433b.5\]]grong 'gro/_yA pa t+yoSh+Taka/_dzA ya dang pa yi dag la mtshan nyid la'o/_dzA ya dang pa ti dag las pha rol gyi han las mtshan nyid la 'jug pa na Taka 'gyur te/_dgra bo 'joms/_a ba sngon ma'i han/_nyon mongs 'joms/_mun pa 'joms/_sdug bsngal 'joms/_kra kita kyi don Ta dI pa kyi don no/_/gam han 
[\[433b.6\]]sogs kyis u pa d+hA phyis/_han+ta'i ha'i g+ha 'os ha g+har bsgyur bas/_dzA yA g+h+no nA/_pa ti g+h+ni s+t+rI/_a ma nu Sh+ya kar+t+r-i ke tsa/_byed pa po mi ma yin pa la'ang ngo /_byed pa po mi ma yin pa'i byed pa bo rtogs par byed pa la su pa las pha rol gyi han la Taka 'gyur te/_sh+leSh+ma g+h+naM/_tr-i ka Tu kaM/
[\[433b.7\]]pit+ta b+h+naM/_mkhris pa 'joms/_g+h+r-i taM/_mar/_bA ta g+h+naM/_rlung 'joms/_chung ma 'joms pa ste skyes pa/_bad ga 'joms ma ste bud med/_tai laM/_til mar/_pA Ni g+ha tA Da g+hau shi lpi ni/_pA ni g+ha/_tA Da g+ha dag bzo po la'o/_pA Ni dang tra Da snga ma'i han la Taka sbyar bas/_pA Ni _peg rdog bzo ba _g+ha dang /_bad kan 'joms/_tsha ba gsum/
[\[434a\]]
[\[434a.1\]]tADa g+ha dag chig phrad do/_'grel par/_rA dza snga ma'i han las Taka sbyar bas/_rA dza ga/_zhes pa'ang tshig phrad do zhes pa'ang byung ngo /_A D+h+ya su b+ha ga s+thU la pa li tan g+hA n+t+ha pri ye Shu ts+w+ya r+the Sha tswau kr-inyaHka ra Ne khyun/_u D+h+ya _su b+ha ga _s+thU la _pa li ta _nag+na/_an+d+ha pri ya 
[\[434a.2\]]rnams la tswi'i _grog bzo ba/_don la tswi med pa la kr-inya las byed pa la khyuna'o/_/A D+h+ya la sogs _rgyal po 'joms/_pa 'di rnams las pha rol gyi kr-inya gsar byung gi don la tswi ma byinapa la byed pa dang byed pa po la khyun 'gyur te/_na dbyangs don kha khi ta la mum gyi don yu a na ra bsgyur bas/
[\[434a.3\]]A D+h+yaM ka ra NaM/_su g+ha gaM kar NaM/_s+thU laM ka ra NaM/_ba li taM ka ra NaM/_nag+naM ka ra NaM/_an+d+haM ka ra NaM/_pri yaM ka ra NaM/_karta ri b+hu baH/_khiSh+Nu tsa khu ka nyau/_byed pa pau la b+hU las khiSh+Nu tsa khu ka nya dag go/_/A D+h+ya la sogs pa rnams las pha rol gyi b+hU las gsar byung gi don la tswi ma byin pa

[\[434a.5\]]bri yaM p+ha niSh+NuH/_pri yang b+hA bu kaH'i pa ra ro/_sat+sU dwi Sha dru ha du ha yu dza bi da b+hi da tshi da dzi n+yaHkwi pa/_sata _sU _dwi Sha _dru ha _du ha _yu dza _bi da _b+hi da_tshi da _dzi _nI la kI pa'o/_/supa dang nyer bsgyur snga ma las sa ta ste/_Sha na kun nas gus pa/_ShU srog _phyug por gyur/_chags mnga' 
[\[434a.6\]]nas skye ba/_dga' bar gyur/_dwi Sha mi mdza' ba/_dru ha ra na pa/_du ha 'jo ba/_yu dzir sbyor ba/_bi da shes pa/_b+hi dir rnam par 'joms pa/_tshi dir dum bur byed pa/_dzi rgyal ba/_nI thob pa rnams la kI pa 'gyur te/_pa tu la A ga ma'i don/_ka kita kyi don i brjod don/_bra yang dbyi ste/_su

[\[434b\]]
[\[434b.1\]]ma NIH/_'grel par grA ma dang a gra dag las pha rol gyi nI'i na Nar bsgyur bar bshad pas na Nar bsgyur ba'o/_/b+ha dzo N+wiH/_b+ha dza las N+wi'o/_supa las pha rol gyi b+ha dza las N+wi 'gyur te/_Na 'phel don/_i brjod don pa yang phyis pas/_ar+d+ha b+hAka/_pA da b+hAka_/tshan+da si sa haH/

[\[434b.3\]]Duha/_zhes pa la su byin pas/_a na DA na/_dza nas na kha na kra ma ga mo biT/_dzan _san _rab tu bzod pa/_khan/_kra ma _ga ma las biTa'o/_supa dang nyer bsgyur las pha rol gyi byings 'di rnams la biT 'gyur te/_Ta dwI pa don bi'o 'os bi dbyi'o/_tshanA si/_sdeb sbyor la'o/_/

[\[435a\]]
[\[435a.1\]]gyi pa gnyis dang na dbyangs don/_i gsum brjod don/_ka kita kyi don te/_tA ba nin/_su dA mA/_legs byin/_kwa ni pa/_su dA bA/_legs byin/_ka nIpa/_b+hu ri dA bA/_sogs so/_/'grel par rkyen de rnams Ata mtha' ma yin pa gzhan yang mang po la 'jug go zhes bshad 
[\[435a.2\]]pas/_su gan+b+ha/_sogs so/_kwi p+tsa/_kwi pa'ang ngo /_supa las pha rol dang supa med pa dang nyer bsgyur _saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa la thams cad gnas pa'i zhes sogs kyis/_sa sbyin nam gser sbyin/_sngon na yod pa dang med pa gang la'ang byings thams cad la bya ba'i don la kwipa 'gyur te/_u khA srata/
[\[435a.3\]]bde 'gro/_par+Na d+h+wata/_sa srAT/_bi rAT/_sogs mtha' yas so/_an+teH/_a n+ti'i 'o/_/an srog gi na yig rtags sam nyer bsgyur rgyu mtshan can sngon du byung na Nar 'gyur te/_prAN/_kwi pa byin pa'i rjes so/_artsi shu tsi ru tsi tsi hu sr-i pi tsha di tsh+r-i di b+h+ya is/_artsiH_yal ga lhung /
[\[435a.4\]]shu tsiH_lo ma lhung /_kun mdzes/_rnam mdzes/_ru tsiH_tsi huH_sr-i piH_tsha diH_tsh+r-i di rnams las isa'o/_/byings de rnams las bya ba'i don la is 'gyur te/_artsiH/_sho tsiH/_ro tsiH/_tse hiH/_srog chags/_sarbiH/_tsha diH/_tsha rdiH/_d+ha narti tsak+Shing pr-I pa pi tra pi dza ni ya dze rus/_d+hanaH_artiH

[\[435b\]]
[\[435b.1\]]mtha'i ba u pa d+hA'i a dang bcas pa rnams U zhes par 'gyur te/_dz+war dang tAral kwipa/_kwil yongs rdzogs phyis/_mdo 'dis Ur bsgyur bas/_su _dzUH/_au _dzU rau/_su tUH/_au _tU rau/_sr-ib la kwipa/_kwipa phyis/_ba U/_i ka gi atsa la yaN byas pas/_su _sUH/_au _sru pau/_ab 
[\[435b.2\]]ka kwipa/_kwipa phyis/_ba U/_'grel par Ur bsgyur na 'phel pa byed par bshad pas 'phel ba byas pas/_au zhes grub/_dzan sngon du bzhag_/dza nauH/_'bar ba/_dzanA bau/_mgyogs/_mabal kwipa/_kwipa phyis/_ba a bcas U mra drangs pas/_su mUH/_'gro _o _mu bau/

[\[435b.4\]]ga maHkwau/_gam gyi kwi la'o/_kwipa pha rol la gam gyi ma dbyi zhing tuka A gam yang 'gyur te/_aM ga gta/_sogs so/_/'grel par/_yam/_man/_tan rnams kyi'ang kwipa la rjes su sna ldan dbyi zhing tuka A gam 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/_chags pa/_rgyas pa/_yata/_mata/
